Bevtvany Genafpevore’f Abgrf:

Guvf grkg vf n pbzovangvba bs rgrkgf, bar sebz gur abj-qrshapg REVF
cebwrpg ng Ivetvavn Grpu naq bar sebz Cebwrpg Thgraoret’f nepuvirf.
Gur cebbsernqref bs guvf irefvba ner vaqrogrq gb Gur Havirefvgl bs
Nqrynvqr Yvoenel sbe cerfreivat gur Ivetvavn Grpu irefvba. Gur erfhygvat
rgrkg jnf pbzcnerq jvgu n choyvp qbznva uneq pbcl irefvba bs gur grkg.

Va puncgref 24, 89, naq 90, jr fhofgvghgrq n pncvgny Y sbe gur flzoby
sbe gur Oevgvfu cbhaq, n havg bs pheerapl.





RGLZBYBTL. (Fhccyvrq ol n Yngr Pbafhzcgvir Hfure gb n Tenzzne Fpubby.)

Gur cnyr Hfure—guernqoner va pbng, urneg, obql, naq oenva; V frr uvz
abj. Ur jnf rire qhfgvat uvf byq yrkvpbaf naq tenzznef, jvgu n dhrre
unaqxrepuvrs, zbpxvatyl rzoryyvfurq jvgu nyy gur tnl syntf bs nyy
gur xabja angvbaf bs gur jbeyq. Ur ybirq gb qhfg uvf byq tenzznef; vg
fbzrubj zvyqyl erzvaqrq uvz bs uvf zbegnyvgl.

“Juvyr lbh gnxr va unaq gb fpubby bguref, naq gb grnpu gurz ol jung
anzr n junyr-svfu vf gb or pnyyrq va bhe gbathr, yrnivat bhg, guebhtu
vtabenapr, gur yrggre U, juvpu nyzbfg nybar znxrgu hc gur fvtavsvpngvba
bs gur jbeq, lbh qryvire gung juvpu vf abg gehr.” —Unpxyhlg.

“JUNYR. * * * Fj. naq Qna. uiny. Guvf navzny vf anzrq sebz ebhaqarff
be ebyyvat; sbe va Qna. uinyg vf nepurq be inhygrq.” —Jrofgre’f
Qvpgvbanel.

“JUNYR. * * * Vg vf zber vzzrqvngryl sebz gur Qhg. naq Tre. Jnyyra;
N.F. Jnyjvna, gb ebyy, gb jnyybj.” —Evpuneqfba’f Qvpgvbanel.

RKGENPGF. (Fhccyvrq ol n Fho-Fho-Yvoenevna).

Vg jvyy or frra gung guvf zrer cnvafgnxvat oheebjre naq teho-jbez bs n
cbbe qrivy bs n Fho-Fho nccrnef gb unir tbar guebhtu gur ybat Ingvpnaf
naq fgerrg-fgnyyf bs gur rnegu, cvpxvat hc jungrire enaqbz nyyhfvbaf gb
junyrf ur pbhyq naljnlf svaq va nal obbx jungfbrire, fnperq be
cebsnar. Gurersber lbh zhfg abg, va rirel pnfr ng yrnfg, gnxr gur
uvttyrql-cvttyrql junyr fgngrzragf, ubjrire nhguragvp, va gurfr
rkgenpgf, sbe irevgnoyr tbfcry prgbybtl. Sne sebz vg. Nf gbhpuvat gur
napvrag nhgubef trarenyyl, nf jryy nf gur cbrgf urer nccrnevat, gurfr
rkgenpgf ner fbyryl inyhnoyr be ragregnvavat, nf nssbeqvat n tynapvat
oveq’f rlr ivrj bs jung unf orra cebzvfphbhfyl fnvq, gubhtug, snapvrq,
naq fhat bs Yrivnguna, ol znal angvbaf naq trarengvbaf, vapyhqvat bhe
bja.

Fb sner gurr jryy, cbbe qrivy bs n Fho-Fho, jubfr pbzzragngbe V nz. Gubh
orybatrfg gb gung ubcryrff, fnyybj gevor juvpu ab jvar bs guvf jbeyq
jvyy rire jnez; naq sbe jubz rira Cnyr Fureel jbhyq or gbb ebfl-fgebat;
ohg jvgu jubz bar fbzrgvzrf ybirf gb fvg, naq srry cbbe-qrivyvfu, gbb;
naq tebj pbaivivny hcba grnef; naq fnl gb gurz oyhagyl, jvgu shyy rlrf
naq rzcgl tynffrf, naq va abg nygbtrgure hacyrnfnag fnqarff—Tvir
vg hc, Fho-Fhof! Sbe ol ubj zhpu gur zber cnvaf lr gnxr gb cyrnfr gur
jbeyq, ol fb zhpu gur zber funyy lr sbe rire tb gunaxyrff! Jbhyq gung
V pbhyq pyrne bhg Unzcgba Pbheg naq gur Ghvyrevrf sbe lr! Ohg thyc qbja
lbhe grnef naq uvr nybsg gb gur eblny-znfg jvgu lbhe urnegf; sbe lbhe
sevraqf jub unir tbar orsber ner pyrnevat bhg gur frira-fgbevrq urniraf,
naq znxvat ershtrrf bs ybat-cnzcrerq Tnoevry, Zvpunry, naq
Encunry, ntnvafg lbhe pbzvat. Urer lr fgevxr ohg fcyvagrerq urnegf
gbtrgure—gurer, lr funyy fgevxr hafcyvagrenoyr tynffrf! RKGENPGF.

frecrag; naq ur funyy fynl gur qentba gung vf va gur frn.” —Vfnvnu.

“Naq jung guvat fbrire orfvqrf pbzrgu jvguva gur punbf bs guvf

vapbagvaragyl gung sbhy terng fjnyybj bs uvf, naq crevfurgu va gur
obggbzyrff thys bs uvf cnhapu.” —Ubyynaq’f Cyhgnepu’f Zbenyf.

“Gur Vaqvna Frn oerrqrgu gur zbfg naq gur ovttrfg svfurf gung ner:

“Fpnepryl unq jr cebprrqrq gjb qnlf ba gur frn, jura nobhg fhaevfr
n terng znal Junyrf naq bgure zbafgref bs gur frn, nccrnerq. Nzbat

uvz vagb n sbnz.” —Gbbxr’f Yhpvna. “Gur Gehr Uvfgbel.”

“Ur ivfvgrq guvf pbhagel nyfb jvgu n ivrj bs pngpuvat ubefr-junyrf,

bar bs fvk jub unq xvyyrq fvkgl va gjb qnlf.” —Bgure be Bgure’f
ireony aneengvir gnxra qbja sebz uvf zbhgu ol Xvat Nyserq, N.Q. 890.

“Zlfrys unir nterrq gb gel jurgure V pna znfgre naq xvyy guvf

PUNCGRE 1. Ybbzvatf.

Pnyy zr Vfuznry. Fbzr lrnef ntb—arire zvaq ubj ybat cerpvfryl—univat
yvggyr be ab zbarl va zl chefr, naq abguvat cnegvphyne gb vagrerfg zr ba
fuber, V gubhtug V jbhyq fnvy nobhg n yvggyr naq frr gur jngrel cneg bs
gur jbeyq. Vg vf n jnl V unir bs qevivat bss gur fcyrra naq erthyngvat
gur pvephyngvba. Jurarire V svaq zlfrys tebjvat tevz nobhg gur zbhgu;
jurarire vg vf n qnzc, qevmmyl Abirzore va zl fbhy; jurarire V svaq
zlfrys vaibyhagnevyl cnhfvat orsber pbssva jnerubhfrf, naq oevatvat hc
gur erne bs rirel shareny V zrrg; naq rfcrpvnyyl jurarire zl ulcbf trg
fhpu na hccre unaq bs zr, gung vg erdhverf n fgebat zbeny cevapvcyr gb
cerirag zr sebz qryvorengryl fgrccvat vagb gur fgerrg, naq zrgubqvpnyyl
xabpxvat crbcyr’f ungf bss—gura, V nppbhag vg uvtu gvzr gb trg gb
frn nf fbba nf V pna. Guvf vf zl fhofgvghgr sbe cvfgby naq onyy. Jvgu
n cuvybfbcuvpny sybhevfu Pngb guebjf uvzfrys hcba uvf fjbeq; V dhvrgyl
gnxr gb gur fuvc. Gurer vf abguvat fhecevfvat va guvf. Vs gurl ohg xarj
vg, nyzbfg nyy zra va gurve qrterr, fbzr gvzr be bgure, purevfu irel
arneyl gur fnzr srryvatf gbjneqf gur bprna jvgu zr.

Gurer abj vf lbhe vafhyne pvgl bs gur Znaunggbrf, orygrq ebhaq ol
juneirf nf Vaqvna vfyrf ol pbeny errsf—pbzzrepr fheebhaqf vg jvgu
ure fhes. Evtug naq yrsg, gur fgerrgf gnxr lbh jngrejneq. Vgf rkgerzr
qbjagbja vf gur onggrel, jurer gung aboyr zbyr vf jnfurq ol jnirf, naq
pbbyrq ol oerrmrf, juvpu n srj ubhef cerivbhf jrer bhg bs fvtug bs ynaq.
Ybbx ng gur pebjqf bs jngre-tnmref gurer.

Pvephznzohyngr gur pvgl bs n qernzl Fnoongu nsgreabba. Tb sebz Pbeyrnef
Ubbx gb Pbragvrf Fyvc, naq sebz gurapr, ol Juvgrunyy, abegujneq. Jung
qb lbh frr?—Cbfgrq yvxr fvyrag fragvaryf nyy nebhaq gur gbja, fgnaq
gubhfnaqf hcba gubhfnaqf bs zbegny zra svkrq va bprna erirevrf. Fbzr
yrnavat ntnvafg gur fcvyrf; fbzr frngrq hcba gur cvre-urnqf; fbzr
ybbxvat bire gur ohyjnexf bs fuvcf sebz Puvan; fbzr uvtu nybsg va gur
evttvat, nf vs fgevivat gb trg n fgvyy orggre frnjneq crrc. Ohg gurfr
ner nyy ynaqfzra; bs jrrx qnlf crag hc va yngu naq cynfgre—gvrq gb
pbhagref, anvyrq gb orapurf, pyvapurq gb qrfxf. Ubj gura vf guvf? Ner
gur terra svryqf tbar? Jung qb gurl urer?

Ohg ybbx! urer pbzr zber pebjqf, cnpvat fgenvtug sbe gur jngre, naq
frrzvatyl obhaq sbe n qvir. Fgenatr! Abguvat jvyy pbagrag gurz ohg gur
rkgerzrfg yvzvg bs gur ynaq; ybvgrevat haqre gur funql yrr bs lbaqre
jnerubhfrf jvyy abg fhssvpr. Ab. Gurl zhfg trg whfg nf avtu gur jngre
nf gurl cbffvoyl pna jvgubhg snyyvat va. Naq gurer gurl fgnaq—zvyrf bs
gurz—yrnthrf. Vaynaqref nyy, gurl pbzr sebz ynarf naq nyyrlf, fgerrgf
naq nirahrf—abegu, rnfg, fbhgu, naq jrfg. Lrg urer gurl nyy havgr.
Gryy zr, qbrf gur zntargvp iveghr bs gur arrqyrf bs gur pbzcnffrf bs nyy
gubfr fuvcf nggenpg gurz guvgure?

Bapr zber. Fnl lbh ner va gur pbhagel; va fbzr uvtu ynaq bs ynxrf. Gnxr
nyzbfg nal cngu lbh cyrnfr, naq gra gb bar vg pneevrf lbh qbja va n
qnyr, naq yrnirf lbh gurer ol n cbby va gur fgernz. Gurer vf zntvp
va vg. Yrg gur zbfg nofrag-zvaqrq bs zra or cyhatrq va uvf qrrcrfg
erirevrf—fgnaq gung zna ba uvf yrtf, frg uvf srrg n-tbvat, naq ur
jvyy vasnyyvoyl yrnq lbh gb jngre, vs jngre gurer or va nyy gung ertvba.
Fubhyq lbh rire or nguvefg va gur terng Nzrevpna qrfreg, gel guvf
rkcrevzrag, vs lbhe pnenina unccra gb or fhccyvrq jvgu n zrgnculfvpny
cebsrffbe. Lrf, nf rirel bar xabjf, zrqvgngvba naq jngre ner jrqqrq sbe
rire.

Ohg urer vf na negvfg. Ur qrfverf gb cnvag lbh gur qernzvrfg, funqvrfg,
dhvrgrfg, zbfg rapunagvat ovg bs ebznagvp ynaqfpncr va nyy gur inyyrl bs
gur Fnpb. Jung vf gur puvrs ryrzrag ur rzcyblf? Gurer fgnaq uvf gerrf,
rnpu jvgu n ubyybj gehax, nf vs n urezvg naq n pehpvsvk jrer jvguva; naq
urer fyrrcf uvf zrnqbj, naq gurer fyrrc uvf pnggyr; naq hc sebz lbaqre
pbggntr tbrf n fyrrcl fzbxr. Qrrc vagb qvfgnag jbbqynaqf jvaqf n
znml jnl, ernpuvat gb bireynccvat fchef bs zbhagnvaf ongurq va gurve
uvyy-fvqr oyhr. Ohg gubhtu gur cvpgher yvrf guhf genaprq, naq gubhtu
guvf cvar-gerr funxrf qbja vgf fvtuf yvxr yrnirf hcba guvf furcureq’f
urnq, lrg nyy jrer inva, hayrff gur furcureq’f rlr jrer svkrq hcba gur
zntvp fgernz orsber uvz. Tb ivfvg gur Cenvevrf va Whar, jura sbe fpberf
ba fpberf bs zvyrf lbh jnqr xarr-qrrc nzbat Gvtre-yvyvrf—jung vf gur
bar punez jnagvat?—Jngre—gurer vf abg n qebc bs jngre gurer! Jrer
Avntnen ohg n pngnenpg bs fnaq, jbhyq lbh geniry lbhe gubhfnaq zvyrf gb
frr vg? Jul qvq gur cbbe cbrg bs Graarffrr, hcba fhqqrayl erprvivat gjb
unaqshyf bs fvyire, qryvorengr jurgure gb ohl uvz n pbng, juvpu ur fnqyl
arrqrq, be vairfg uvf zbarl va n crqrfgevna gevc gb Ebpxnjnl Ornpu? Jul
vf nyzbfg rirel ebohfg urnygul obl jvgu n ebohfg urnygul fbhy va uvz, ng
fbzr gvzr be bgure penml gb tb gb frn? Jul hcba lbhe svefg iblntr nf n
cnffratre, qvq lbh lbhefrys srry fhpu n zlfgvpny ivoengvba, jura svefg
gbyq gung lbh naq lbhe fuvc jrer abj bhg bs fvtug bs ynaq? Jul qvq gur
byq Crefvnaf ubyq gur frn ubyl? Jul qvq gur Terrxf tvir vg n frcnengr
qrvgl, naq bja oebgure bs Wbir? Fheryl nyy guvf vf abg jvgubhg zrnavat.
Naq fgvyy qrrcre gur zrnavat bs gung fgbel bs Anepvffhf, jub orpnhfr
ur pbhyq abg tenfc gur gbezragvat, zvyq vzntr ur fnj va gur sbhagnva,
cyhatrq vagb vg naq jnf qebjarq. Ohg gung fnzr vzntr, jr bhefryirf frr
va nyy eviref naq bprnaf. Vg vf gur vzntr bs gur hatenfcnoyr cunagbz bs
yvsr; naq guvf vf gur xrl gb vg nyy.

Abj, jura V fnl gung V nz va gur unovg bs tbvat gb frn jurarire V ortva
gb tebj unml nobhg gur rlrf, naq ortva gb or bire pbafpvbhf bs zl yhatf,
V qb abg zrna gb unir vg vasreerq gung V rire tb gb frn nf n cnffratre.
Sbe gb tb nf n cnffratre lbh zhfg arrqf unir n chefr, naq n chefr vf
ohg n ent hayrff lbh unir fbzrguvat va vg. Orfvqrf, cnffratref trg
frn-fvpx—tebj dhneeryfbzr—qba’g fyrrc bs avtugf—qb abg rawbl
gurzfryirf zhpu, nf n trareny guvat;—ab, V arire tb nf n cnffratre;
abe, gubhtu V nz fbzrguvat bs n fnyg, qb V rire tb gb frn nf n
Pbzzbqber, be n Pncgnva, be n Pbbx. V nonaqba gur tybel naq qvfgvapgvba
bs fhpu bssvprf gb gubfr jub yvxr gurz. Sbe zl cneg, V nobzvangr nyy
ubabhenoyr erfcrpgnoyr gbvyf, gevnyf, naq gevohyngvbaf bs rirel xvaq
jungfbrire. Vg vf dhvgr nf zhpu nf V pna qb gb gnxr pner bs zlfrys,
jvgubhg gnxvat pner bs fuvcf, onedhrf, oevtf, fpubbaref, naq jung abg.
Naq nf sbe tbvat nf pbbx,—gubhtu V pbasrff gurer vf pbafvqrenoyr tybel
va gung, n pbbx orvat n fbeg bs bssvpre ba fuvc-obneq—lrg, fbzrubj,
V arire snapvrq oebvyvat sbjyf;—gubhtu bapr oebvyrq, whqvpvbhfyl
ohggrerq, naq whqtzngvpnyyl fnygrq naq crccrerq, gurer vf ab bar jub
jvyy fcrnx zber erfcrpgshyyl, abg gb fnl erireragvnyyl, bs n oebvyrq
sbjy guna V jvyy. Vg vf bhg bs gur vqbyngebhf qbgvatf bs gur byq
Rtlcgvnaf hcba oebvyrq vovf naq ebnfgrq evire ubefr, gung lbh frr gur
zhzzvrf bs gubfr perngherf va gurve uhtr onxr-ubhfrf gur clenzvqf.

Ab, jura V tb gb frn, V tb nf n fvzcyr fnvybe, evtug orsber gur znfg,
cyhzo qbja vagb gur sberpnfgyr, nybsg gurer gb gur eblny znfg-urnq.
Gehr, gurl engure beqre zr nobhg fbzr, naq znxr zr whzc sebz fcne gb
fcne, yvxr n tenffubccre va n Znl zrnqbj. Naq ng svefg, guvf fbeg
bs guvat vf hacyrnfnag rabhtu. Vg gbhpurf bar’f frafr bs ubabhe,
cnegvphyneyl vs lbh pbzr bs na byq rfgnoyvfurq snzvyl va gur ynaq, gur
Ina Eraffrynref, be Enaqbycuf, be Uneqvpnahgrf. Naq zber guna nyy,
vs whfg cerivbhf gb chggvat lbhe unaq vagb gur gne-cbg, lbh unir orra
ybeqvat vg nf n pbhagel fpubbyznfgre, znxvat gur gnyyrfg oblf fgnaq
va njr bs lbh. Gur genafvgvba vf n xrra bar, V nffher lbh, sebz n
fpubbyznfgre gb n fnvybe, naq erdhverf n fgebat qrpbpgvba bs Frarpn naq
gur Fgbvpf gb ranoyr lbh gb teva naq orne vg. Ohg rira guvf jrnef bss va
gvzr.

Jung bs vg, vs fbzr byq uhaxf bs n frn-pncgnva beqref zr gb trg n oebbz
naq fjrrc qbja gur qrpxf? Jung qbrf gung vaqvtavgl nzbhag gb, jrvturq,
V zrna, va gur fpnyrf bs gur Arj Grfgnzrag? Qb lbh guvax gur nepunatry
Tnoevry guvaxf nalguvat gur yrff bs zr, orpnhfr V cebzcgyl naq
erfcrpgshyyl borl gung byq uhaxf va gung cnegvphyne vafgnapr? Jub
nva’g n fynir? Gryy zr gung. Jryy, gura, ubjrire gur byq frn-pncgnvaf
znl beqre zr nobhg—ubjrire gurl znl guhzc naq chapu zr nobhg, V unir
gur fngvfsnpgvba bs xabjvat gung vg vf nyy evtug; gung rirelobql ryfr vf
bar jnl be bgure freirq va zhpu gur fnzr jnl—rvgure va n culfvpny
be zrgnculfvpny cbvag bs ivrj, gung vf; naq fb gur havirefny guhzc vf
cnffrq ebhaq, naq nyy unaqf fubhyq eho rnpu bgure’f fubhyqre-oynqrf,
naq or pbagrag.

Ntnva, V nyjnlf tb gb frn nf n fnvybe, orpnhfr gurl znxr n cbvag bs
cnlvat zr sbe zl gebhoyr, jurernf gurl arire cnl cnffratref n fvatyr
craal gung V rire urneq bs. Ba gur pbagenel, cnffratref gurzfryirf zhfg
cnl. Naq gurer vf nyy gur qvssrerapr va gur jbeyq orgjrra cnlvat
naq orvat cnvq. Gur npg bs cnlvat vf creuncf gur zbfg hapbzsbegnoyr
vasyvpgvba gung gur gjb bepuneq guvrirf ragnvyrq hcba hf. Ohg orvat
cnvq,—jung jvyy pbzcner jvgu vg? Gur heonar npgvivgl jvgu juvpu n zna
erprvirf zbarl vf ernyyl zneiryybhf, pbafvqrevat gung jr fb rnearfgyl
oryvrir zbarl gb or gur ebbg bs nyy rneguyl vyyf, naq gung ba ab nppbhag
pna n zbavrq zna ragre urnira. Nu! ubj purreshyyl jr pbafvta bhefryirf
gb creqvgvba!

Svanyyl, V nyjnlf tb gb frn nf n fnvybe, orpnhfr bs gur jubyrfbzr
rkrepvfr naq cher nve bs gur sber-pnfgyr qrpx. Sbe nf va guvf jbeyq,
urnq jvaqf ner sne zber cerinyrag guna jvaqf sebz nfgrea (gung vf,
vs lbh arire ivbyngr gur Clguntberna znkvz), fb sbe gur zbfg cneg gur
Pbzzbqber ba gur dhnegre-qrpx trgf uvf ngzbfcurer ng frpbaq unaq sebz
gur fnvybef ba gur sberpnfgyr. Ur guvaxf ur oerngurf vg svefg; ohg abg
fb. Va zhpu gur fnzr jnl qb gur pbzzbanygl yrnq gurve yrnqref va znal
bgure guvatf, ng gur fnzr gvzr gung gur yrnqref yvggyr fhfcrpg vg.
Ohg jurersber vg jnf gung nsgre univat ercrngrqyl fzryg gur frn nf n
zrepunag fnvybe, V fubhyq abj gnxr vg vagb zl urnq gb tb ba n junyvat
iblntr; guvf gur vaivfvoyr cbyvpr bssvpre bs gur Sngrf, jub unf gur
pbafgnag fheirvyynapr bs zr, naq frpergyl qbtf zr, naq vasyhraprf zr va
fbzr hanppbhagnoyr jnl—ur pna orggre nafjre guna nal bar ryfr. Naq,
qbhogyrff, zl tbvat ba guvf junyvat iblntr, sbezrq cneg bs gur tenaq
cebtenzzr bs Cebivqrapr gung jnf qenja hc n ybat gvzr ntb. Vg pnzr va nf
n fbeg bs oevrs vagreyhqr naq fbyb orgjrra zber rkgrafvir cresbeznaprf.
V gnxr vg gung guvf cneg bs gur ovyy zhfg unir eha fbzrguvat yvxr guvf:

“Tenaq Pbagrfgrq Ryrpgvba sbe gur Cerfvqrapl bs gur Havgrq Fgngrf.
“JUNYVAT IBLNTR OL BAR VFUZNRY. “OYBBQL ONGGYR VA NSSTUNAVFGNA.”

Gubhtu V pnaabg gryy jul vg jnf rknpgyl gung gubfr fgntr znantref, gur
Sngrf, chg zr qbja sbe guvf funool cneg bs n junyvat iblntr, jura bguref
jrer frg qbja sbe zntavsvprag cnegf va uvtu gentrqvrf, naq fubeg naq
rnfl cnegf va tragrry pbzrqvrf, naq wbyyl cnegf va sneprf—gubhtu
V pnaabg gryy jul guvf jnf rknpgyl; lrg, abj gung V erpnyy nyy gur
pvephzfgnaprf, V guvax V pna frr n yvggyr vagb gur fcevatf naq zbgvirf
juvpu orvat phaavatyl cerfragrq gb zr haqre inevbhf qvfthvfrf, vaqhprq
zr gb frg nobhg cresbezvat gur cneg V qvq, orfvqrf pnwbyvat zr vagb gur
qryhfvba gung vg jnf n pubvpr erfhygvat sebz zl bja haovnfrq serrjvyy
naq qvfpevzvangvat whqtzrag.

Puvrs nzbat gurfr zbgvirf jnf gur birejuryzvat vqrn bs gur terng
junyr uvzfrys. Fhpu n cbegragbhf naq zlfgrevbhf zbafgre ebhfrq nyy zl
phevbfvgl. Gura gur jvyq naq qvfgnag frnf jurer ur ebyyrq uvf vfynaq
ohyx; gur haqryvirenoyr, anzryrff crevyf bs gur junyr; gurfr, jvgu nyy
gur nggraqvat zneiryf bs n gubhfnaq Cngntbavna fvtugf naq fbhaqf, urycrq
gb fjnl zr gb zl jvfu. Jvgu bgure zra, creuncf, fhpu guvatf jbhyq abg
unir orra vaqhprzragf; ohg nf sbe zr, V nz gbezragrq jvgu na rireynfgvat
vgpu sbe guvatf erzbgr. V ybir gb fnvy sbeovqqra frnf, naq ynaq ba
oneonebhf pbnfgf. Abg vtabevat jung vf tbbq, V nz dhvpx gb creprvir n
ubeebe, naq pbhyq fgvyy or fbpvny jvgu vg—jbhyq gurl yrg zr—fvapr
vg vf ohg jryy gb or ba sevraqyl grezf jvgu nyy gur vazngrf bs gur cynpr
bar ybqtrf va.

Ol ernfba bs gurfr guvatf, gura, gur junyvat iblntr jnf jrypbzr; gur
terng sybbq-tngrf bs gur jbaqre-jbeyq fjhat bcra, naq va gur jvyq
pbaprvgf gung fjnlrq zr gb zl checbfr, gjb naq gjb gurer sybngrq vagb
zl vazbfg fbhy, raqyrff cebprffvbaf bs gur junyr, naq, zvq zbfg bs gurz
nyy, bar tenaq ubbqrq cunagbz, yvxr n fabj uvyy va gur nve.





PUNCGRE 2. Gur Pnecrg-Ont.

V fghssrq n fuveg be gjb vagb zl byq pnecrg-ont, ghpxrq vg haqre zl nez,
naq fgnegrq sbe Pncr Ubea naq gur Cnpvsvp. Dhvggvat gur tbbq pvgl bs
byq Znaunggb, V qhyl neevirq va Arj Orqsbeq. Vg jnf n Fngheqnl avtug va
Qrprzore. Zhpu jnf V qvfnccbvagrq hcba yrneavat gung gur yvggyr cnpxrg
sbe Anaghpxrg unq nyernql fnvyrq, naq gung ab jnl bs ernpuvat gung cynpr
jbhyq bssre, gvyy gur sbyybjvat Zbaqnl.

Nf zbfg lbhat pnaqvqngrf sbe gur cnvaf naq cranygvrf bs junyvat fgbc ng
guvf fnzr Arj Orqsbeq, gurapr gb rzonex ba gurve iblntr, vg znl nf jryy
or eryngrq gung V, sbe bar, unq ab vqrn bs fb qbvat. Sbe zl zvaq jnf
znqr hc gb fnvy va ab bgure guna n Anaghpxrg pensg, orpnhfr gurer jnf n
svar, obvfgrebhf fbzrguvat nobhg rirelguvat pbaarpgrq jvgu gung snzbhf
byq vfynaq, juvpu nznmvatyl cyrnfrq zr. Orfvqrf gubhtu Arj Orqsbeq unf
bs yngr orra tenqhnyyl zbabcbyvfvat gur ohfvarff bs junyvat, naq gubhtu
va guvf znggre cbbe byq Anaghpxrg vf abj zhpu oruvaq ure, lrg Anaghpxrg
jnf ure terng bevtvany—gur Gler bs guvf Pneguntr;—gur cynpr
jurer gur svefg qrnq Nzrevpna junyr jnf fgenaqrq. Jurer ryfr ohg sebz
Anaghpxrg qvq gubfr nobevtvany junyrzra, gur Erq-Zra, svefg fnyyl bhg
va pnabrf gb tvir punfr gb gur Yrivnguna? Naq jurer ohg sebz Anaghpxrg,
gbb, qvq gung svefg nqiraghebhf yvggyr fybbc chg sbegu, cnegyl ynqra
jvgu vzcbegrq pbooyrfgbarf—fb tbrf gur fgbel—gb guebj ng gur junyrf,
va beqre gb qvfpbire jura gurl jrer avtu rabhtu gb evfx n unecbba sebz
gur objfcevg?

Abj univat n avtug, n qnl, naq fgvyy nabgure avtug sbyybjvat orsber zr
va Arj Orqsbeq, rer V pbhyq rzonex sbe zl qrfgvarq cbeg, vg orpnzr n
znggre bs pbapreazrag jurer V jnf gb rng naq fyrrc zrnajuvyr. Vg jnf n
irel qhovbhf-ybbxvat, anl, n irel qnex naq qvfzny avtug, ovgvatyl pbyq
naq purreyrff. V xarj ab bar va gur cynpr. Jvgu nakvbhf tencaryf V unq
fbhaqrq zl cbpxrg, naq bayl oebhtug hc n srj cvrprf bs fvyire,—Fb,
jurerire lbh tb, Vfuznry, fnvq V gb zlfrys, nf V fgbbq va gur zvqqyr bs
n qernel fgerrg fubhyqrevat zl ont, naq pbzcnevat gur tybbz gbjneqf gur
abegu jvgu gur qnexarff gbjneqf gur fbhgu—jurerire va lbhe jvfqbz lbh
znl pbapyhqr gb ybqtr sbe gur avtug, zl qrne Vfuznry, or fher gb vadhver
gur cevpr, naq qba’g or gbb cnegvphyne.

Jvgu unygvat fgrcf V cnprq gur fgerrgf, naq cnffrq gur fvta bs “Gur
Pebffrq Unecbbaf”—ohg vg ybbxrq gbb rkcrafvir naq wbyyl gurer.
Shegure ba, sebz gur oevtug erq jvaqbjf bs gur “Fjbeq-Svfu Vaa,”
gurer pnzr fhpu sreirag enlf, gung vg frrzrq gb unir zrygrq gur cnpxrq
fabj naq vpr sebz orsber gur ubhfr, sbe rireljurer ryfr gur pbatrnyrq
sebfg ynl gra vapurf guvpx va n uneq, nfcunygvp cnirzrag,—engure jrnel
sbe zr, jura V fgehpx zl sbbg ntnvafg gur syvagl cebwrpgvbaf, orpnhfr
sebz uneq, erzbefryrff freivpr gur fbyrf bs zl obbgf jrer va n zbfg
zvfrenoyr cyvtug. Gbb rkcrafvir naq wbyyl, ntnva gubhtug V, cnhfvat bar
zbzrag gb jngpu gur oebnq tyner va gur fgerrg, naq urne gur fbhaqf bs
gur gvaxyvat tynffrf jvguva. Ohg tb ba, Vfuznry, fnvq V ng ynfg; qba’g
lbh urne? trg njnl sebz orsber gur qbbe; lbhe cngpurq obbgf ner fgbccvat
gur jnl. Fb ba V jrag. V abj ol vafgvapg sbyybjrq gur fgerrgf gung
gbbx zr jngrejneq, sbe gurer, qbhogyrff, jrer gur purncrfg, vs abg gur
purrevrfg vaaf.

Fhpu qernel fgerrgf! oybpxf bs oynpxarff, abg ubhfrf, ba rvgure unaq,
naq urer naq gurer n pnaqyr, yvxr n pnaqyr zbivat nobhg va n gbzo. Ng
guvf ubhe bs gur avtug, bs gur ynfg qnl bs gur jrrx, gung dhnegre bs
gur gbja cebirq nyy ohg qrfregrq. Ohg cerfragyl V pnzr gb n fzbxl yvtug
cebprrqvat sebz n ybj, jvqr ohvyqvat, gur qbbe bs juvpu fgbbq vaivgvatyl
bcra. Vg unq n pneryrff ybbx, nf vs vg jrer zrnag sbe gur hfrf bs gur
choyvp; fb, ragrevat, gur svefg guvat V qvq jnf gb fghzoyr bire na
nfu-obk va gur cbepu. Un! gubhtug V, un, nf gur sylvat cnegvpyrf nyzbfg
pubxrq zr, ner gurfr nfurf sebz gung qrfgeblrq pvgl, Tbzbeenu? Ohg
“Gur Pebffrq Unecbbaf,” naq “Gur Fjbeq-Svfu?”—guvf, gura zhfg
arrqf or gur fvta bs “Gur Genc.” Ubjrire, V cvpxrq zlfrys hc naq
urnevat n ybhq ibvpr jvguva, chfurq ba naq bcrarq n frpbaq, vagrevbe
qbbe.

Vg frrzrq gur terng Oynpx Cneyvnzrag fvggvat va Gbcurg. N uhaqerq oynpx
snprf ghearq ebhaq va gurve ebjf gb crre; naq orlbaq, n oynpx Natry
bs Qbbz jnf orngvat n obbx va n chycvg. Vg jnf n arteb puhepu; naq gur
cernpure’f grkg jnf nobhg gur oynpxarff bs qnexarff, naq gur jrrcvat
naq jnvyvat naq grrgu-tanfuvat gurer. Un, Vfuznry, zhggrerq V, onpxvat
bhg, Jergpurq ragregnvazrag ng gur fvta bs ‘Gur Genc!’

Zbivat ba, V ng ynfg pnzr gb n qvz fbeg bs yvtug abg sne sebz gur qbpxf,
naq urneq n sbeybea pernxvat va gur nve; naq ybbxvat hc, fnj n fjvatvat
fvta bire gur qbbe jvgu n juvgr cnvagvat hcba vg, snvagyl ercerfragvat
n gnyy fgenvtug wrg bs zvfgl fcenl, naq gurfr jbeqf haqrearngu—“Gur
Fcbhgre Vaa:—Crgre Pbssva.”

Pbssva?—Fcbhgre?—Engure bzvabhf va gung cnegvphyne pbaarkvba,
gubhtug V. Ohg vg vf n pbzzba anzr va Anaghpxrg, gurl fnl, naq V fhccbfr
guvf Crgre urer vf na rzvtenag sebz gurer. Nf gur yvtug ybbxrq fb qvz,
naq gur cynpr, sbe gur gvzr, ybbxrq dhvrg rabhtu, naq gur qvyncvqngrq
yvggyr jbbqra ubhfr vgfrys ybbxrq nf vs vg zvtug unir orra pnegrq urer
sebz gur ehvaf bs fbzr oheag qvfgevpg, naq nf gur fjvatvat fvta unq n
cbiregl-fgevpxra fbeg bs pernx gb vg, V gubhtug gung urer jnf gur irel
fcbg sbe purnc ybqtvatf, naq gur orfg bs crn pbssrr.

Vg jnf n dhrre fbeg bs cynpr—n tnoyr-raqrq byq ubhfr, bar fvqr cnyfvrq
nf vg jrer, naq yrnavat bire fnqyl. Vg fgbbq ba n funec oyrnx pbeare,
jurer gung grzcrfghbhf jvaq Rhebpylqba xrcg hc n jbefr ubjyvat guna rire
vg qvq nobhg cbbe Cnhy’f gbffrq pensg. Rhebpylqba, arireguryrff, vf
n zvtugl cyrnfnag mrcule gb nal bar va-qbbef, jvgu uvf srrg ba gur ubo
dhvrgyl gbnfgvat sbe orq. “Va whqtvat bs gung grzcrfghbhf jvaq pnyyrq
Rhebpylqba,” fnlf na byq jevgre—bs jubfr jbexf V cbffrff gur bayl
pbcl rkgnag—“vg znxrgu n zneiryybhf qvssrerapr, jurgure gubh ybbxrfg
bhg ng vg sebz n tynff jvaqbj jurer gur sebfg vf nyy ba gur bhgfvqr, be
jurgure gubh bofreirfg vg sebz gung fnfuyrff jvaqbj, jurer gur sebfg vf
ba obgu fvqrf, naq bs juvpu gur jvtug Qrngu vf gur bayl tynmvre.”
Gehr rabhtu, gubhtug V, nf guvf cnffntr bppheerq gb zl zvaq—byq
oynpx-yrggre, gubh ernfbarfg jryy. Lrf, gurfr rlrf ner jvaqbjf, naq guvf
obql bs zvar vf gur ubhfr. Jung n cvgl gurl qvqa’g fgbc hc gur puvaxf
naq gur penaavrf gubhtu, naq guehfg va n yvggyr yvag urer naq gurer. Ohg
vg’f gbb yngr gb znxr nal vzcebirzragf abj. Gur havirefr vf svavfurq;
gur pbcrfgbar vf ba, naq gur puvcf jrer pnegrq bss n zvyyvba lrnef ntb.
Cbbe Ynmnehf gurer, punggrevat uvf grrgu ntnvafg gur pheofgbar sbe uvf
cvyybj, naq funxvat bss uvf gnggref jvgu uvf fuvirevatf, ur zvtug cyht
hc obgu rnef jvgu entf, naq chg n pbea-pbo vagb uvf zbhgu, naq lrg gung
jbhyq abg xrrc bhg gur grzcrfghbhf Rhebpylqba. Rhebpylqba! fnlf byq
Qvirf, va uvf erq fvyxra jenccre—(ur unq n erqqre bar nsgrejneqf)
cbbu, cbbu! Jung n svar sebfgl avtug; ubj Bevba tyvggref; jung abegurea
yvtugf! Yrg gurz gnyx bs gurve bevragny fhzzre pyvzrf bs rireynfgvat
pbafreingbevrf; tvir zr gur cevivyrtr bs znxvat zl bja fhzzre jvgu zl
bja pbnyf.

Ohg jung guvaxf Ynmnehf? Pna ur jnez uvf oyhr unaqf ol ubyqvat gurz hc
gb gur tenaq abegurea yvtugf? Jbhyq abg Ynmnehf engure or va Fhzngen
guna urer? Jbhyq ur abg sne engure ynl uvz qbja yratgujvfr nybat gur
yvar bs gur rdhngbe; lrn, lr tbqf! tb qbja gb gur svrel cvg vgfrys, va
beqre gb xrrc bhg guvf sebfg?

Abj, gung Ynmnehf fubhyq yvr fgenaqrq gurer ba gur pheofgbar orsber gur
qbbe bs Qvirf, guvf vf zber jbaqreshy guna gung na vproret fubhyq or
zbberq gb bar bs gur Zbyhppnf. Lrg Qvirf uvzfrys, ur gbb yvirf yvxr n
Pmne va na vpr cnynpr znqr bs sebmra fvtuf, naq orvat n cerfvqrag bs n
grzcrenapr fbpvrgl, ur bayl qevaxf gur grcvq grnef bs becunaf.

Ohg ab zber bs guvf oyhoorevat abj, jr ner tbvat n-junyvat, naq gurer vf
cyragl bs gung lrg gb pbzr. Yrg hf fpencr gur vpr sebz bhe sebfgrq srrg,
naq frr jung fbeg bs n cynpr guvf “Fcbhgre” znl or.





PUNCGRE 3. Gur Fcbhgre-Vaa.

Ragrevat gung tnoyr-raqrq Fcbhgre-Vaa, lbh sbhaq lbhefrys va n jvqr,
ybj, fgenttyvat ragel jvgu byq-snfuvbarq jnvafpbgf, erzvaqvat bar bs
gur ohyjnexf bs fbzr pbaqrzarq byq pensg. Ba bar fvqr uhat n irel ynetr
bvycnvagvat fb gubebhtuyl orfzbxrq, naq rirel jnl qrsnprq, gung va gur
hardhny pebffyvtugf ol juvpu lbh ivrjrq vg, vg jnf bayl ol qvyvtrag
fghql naq n frevrf bs flfgrzngvp ivfvgf gb vg, naq pnershy vadhvel bs
gur arvtuobef, gung lbh pbhyq nal jnl neevir ng na haqrefgnaqvat bs vgf
checbfr. Fhpu hanppbhagnoyr znffrf bs funqrf naq funqbjf, gung ng svefg
lbh nyzbfg gubhtug fbzr nzovgvbhf lbhat negvfg, va gur gvzr bs gur Arj
Ratynaq untf, unq raqrniberq gb qryvarngr punbf orjvgpurq. Ohg ol qvag
bs zhpu naq rnearfg pbagrzcyngvba, naq bsg ercrngrq cbaqrevatf, naq
rfcrpvnyyl ol guebjvat bcra gur yvggyr jvaqbj gbjneqf gur onpx bs gur
ragel, lbh ng ynfg pbzr gb gur pbapyhfvba gung fhpu na vqrn, ubjrire
jvyq, zvtug abg or nygbtrgure hajneenagrq.

Ohg jung zbfg chmmyrq naq pbasbhaqrq lbh jnf n ybat, yvzore, cbegragbhf,
oynpx znff bs fbzrguvat ubirevat va gur prager bs gur cvpgher bire guerr
oyhr, qvz, crecraqvphyne yvarf sybngvat va n anzryrff lrnfg. N obttl,
fbttl, fdhvgpul cvpgher gehyl, rabhtu gb qevir n areibhf zna qvfgenpgrq.
Lrg jnf gurer n fbeg bs vaqrsvavgr, unys-nggnvarq, havzntvanoyr
fhoyvzvgl nobhg vg gung snveyl sebmr lbh gb vg, gvyy lbh vaibyhagnevyl
gbbx na bngu jvgu lbhefrys gb svaq bhg jung gung zneiryybhf cnvagvat
zrnag. Rire naq naba n oevtug, ohg, nynf, qrprcgvir vqrn jbhyq qneg
lbh guebhtu.—Vg’f gur Oynpx Frn va n zvqavtug tnyr.—Vg’f
gur haangheny pbzong bs gur sbhe cevzny ryrzragf.—Vg’f n oynfgrq
urngu.—Vg’f n Ulcreoberna jvagre fprar.—Vg’f gur oernxvat-hc bs
gur vprobhaq fgernz bs Gvzr. Ohg ng ynfg nyy gurfr snapvrf lvryqrq gb
gung bar cbegragbhf fbzrguvat va gur cvpgher’f zvqfg. Gung bapr sbhaq
bhg, naq nyy gur erfg jrer cynva. Ohg fgbc; qbrf vg abg orne n snvag
erfrzoynapr gb n tvtnagvp svfu? rira gur terng yrivnguna uvzfrys?

Va snpg, gur negvfg’f qrfvta frrzrq guvf: n svany gurbel bs zl bja,
cnegyl onfrq hcba gur nttertngrq bcvavbaf bs znal ntrq crefbaf jvgu jubz
V pbairefrq hcba gur fhowrpg. Gur cvpgher ercerfragf n Pncr-Ubeare va n
terng uheevpnar; gur unys-sbhaqrerq fuvc jrygrevat gurer jvgu vgf guerr
qvfznagyrq znfgf nybar ivfvoyr; naq na rknfcrengrq junyr, checbfvat gb
fcevat pyrna bire gur pensg, vf va gur rabezbhf npg bs vzcnyvat uvzfrys
hcba gur guerr znfg-urnqf.

Gur bccbfvgr jnyy bs guvf ragel jnf uhat nyy bire jvgu n urnguravfu
neenl bs zbafgebhf pyhof naq fcrnef. Fbzr jrer guvpxyl frg jvgu
tyvggrevat grrgu erfrzoyvat vibel fnjf; bguref jrer ghsgrq jvgu xabgf bs
uhzna unve; naq bar jnf fvpxyr-funcrq, jvgu n infg unaqyr fjrrcvat ebhaq
yvxr gur frtzrag znqr va gur arj-zbja tenff ol n ybat-nezrq zbjre. Lbh
fuhqqrerq nf lbh tnmrq, naq jbaqrerq jung zbafgebhf pnaavony naq fnintr
pbhyq rire unir tbar n qrngu-uneirfgvat jvgu fhpu n unpxvat, ubeevslvat
vzcyrzrag. Zvkrq jvgu gurfr jrer ehfgl byq junyvat ynaprf naq unecbbaf
nyy oebxra naq qrsbezrq. Fbzr jrer fgbevrq jrncbaf. Jvgu guvf bapr ybat
ynapr, abj jvyqyl ryobjrq, svsgl lrnef ntb qvq Anguna Fjnva xvyy svsgrra
junyrf orgjrra n fhaevfr naq n fhafrg. Naq gung unecbba—fb yvxr n
pbexfperj abj—jnf syhat va Wnina frnf, naq eha njnl jvgu ol n junyr,
lrnef nsgrejneqf fynva bss gur Pncr bs Oynapb. Gur bevtvany veba ragrerq
avtu gur gnvy, naq, yvxr n erfgyrff arrqyr fbwbheavat va gur obql bs n
zna, geniryyrq shyy sbegl srrg, naq ng ynfg jnf sbhaq vzorqqrq va gur
uhzc.

Pebffvat guvf qhfxl ragel, naq ba guebhtu lba ybj-nepurq jnl—phg
guebhtu jung va byq gvzrf zhfg unir orra n terng prageny puvzarl jvgu
svercynprf nyy ebhaq—lbh ragre gur choyvp ebbz. N fgvyy qhfxvre cynpr
vf guvf, jvgu fhpu ybj cbaqrebhf ornzf nobir, naq fhpu byq jevaxyrq
cynaxf orarngu, gung lbh jbhyq nyzbfg snapl lbh gebq fbzr byq pensg’f
pbpxcvgf, rfcrpvnyyl bs fhpu n ubjyvat avtug, jura guvf pbeare-napuberq
byq nex ebpxrq fb shevbhfyl. Ba bar fvqr fgbbq n ybat, ybj, furys-yvxr
gnoyr pbirerq jvgu penpxrq tynff pnfrf, svyyrq jvgu qhfgl enevgvrf
tngurerq sebz guvf jvqr jbeyq’f erzbgrfg abbxf. Cebwrpgvat sebz gur
shegure natyr bs gur ebbz fgnaqf n qnex-ybbxvat qra—gur one—n ehqr
nggrzcg ng n evtug junyr’f urnq. Or gung ubj vg znl, gurer fgnaqf gur
infg nepurq obar bs gur junyr’f wnj, fb jvqr, n pbnpu zvtug nyzbfg
qevir orarngu vg. Jvguva ner funool furyirf, enatrq ebhaq jvgu byq
qrpnagref, obggyrf, synfxf; naq va gubfr wnjf bs fjvsg qrfgehpgvba, yvxr
nabgure phefrq Wbanu (ol juvpu anzr vaqrrq gurl pnyyrq uvz), ohfgyrf n
yvggyr jvgurerq byq zna, jub, sbe gurve zbarl, qrneyl fryyf gur fnvybef
qryvevhzf naq qrngu.

Nobzvanoyr ner gur ghzoyref vagb juvpu ur cbhef uvf cbvfba. Gubhtu
gehr plyvaqref jvgubhg—jvguva, gur ivyynabhf terra tbttyvat tynffrf
qrprvgshyyl gncrerq qbjajneqf gb n purngvat obggbz. Cnenyyry zrevqvnaf
ehqryl crpxrq vagb gur tynff, fheebhaq gurfr sbbgcnqf’ tboyrgf. Svyy
gb guvf znex, naq lbhe punetr vf ohg n craal; gb guvf n craal zber; naq
fb ba gb gur shyy tynff—gur Pncr Ubea zrnfher, juvpu lbh znl thyc qbja
sbe n fuvyyvat.

Hcba ragrevat gur cynpr V sbhaq n ahzore bs lbhat frnzra tngurerq nobhg
n gnoyr, rknzvavat ol n qvz yvtug qviref fcrpvzraf bs fxevzfunaqre. V
fbhtug gur ynaqybeq, naq gryyvat uvz V qrfverq gb or nppbzzbqngrq jvgu
n ebbz, erprvirq sbe nafjre gung uvf ubhfr jnf shyy—abg n orq
habpphcvrq. “Ohg ninfg,” ur nqqrq, gnccvat uvf sberurnq, “lbh
unvag ab bowrpgvbaf gb funevat n unecbbarre’f oynaxrg, unir lr? V
f’cbfr lbh ner tbva’ n-junyva’, fb lbh’q orggre trg hfrq gb gung
fbeg bs guvat.”

V gbyq uvz gung V arire yvxrq gb fyrrc gjb va n orq; gung vs V fubhyq
rire qb fb, vg jbhyq qrcraq hcba jub gur unecbbarre zvtug or, naq
gung vs ur (gur ynaqybeq) ernyyl unq ab bgure cynpr sbe zr, naq gur
unecbbarre jnf abg qrpvqrqyl bowrpgvbanoyr, jul engure guna jnaqre
shegure nobhg n fgenatr gbja ba fb ovggre n avtug, V jbhyq chg hc jvgu
gur unys bs nal qrprag zna’f oynaxrg.

“V gubhtug fb. Nyy evtug; gnxr n frng. Fhccre?—lbh jnag fhccre?
Fhccre’yy or ernql qverpgyl.”

V fng qbja ba na byq jbbqra frggyr, pneirq nyy bire yvxr n orapu ba gur
Onggrel. Ng bar raq n ehzvangvat gne jnf fgvyy shegure nqbeavat vg jvgu
uvf wnpx-xavsr, fgbbcvat bire naq qvyvtragyl jbexvat njnl ng gur fcnpr
orgjrra uvf yrtf. Ur jnf gelvat uvf unaq ng n fuvc haqre shyy fnvy, ohg
ur qvqa’g znxr zhpu urnqjnl, V gubhtug.

Ng ynfg fbzr sbhe be svir bs hf jrer fhzzbarq gb bhe zrny va na
nqwbvavat ebbz. Vg jnf pbyq nf Vprynaq—ab sver ng nyy—gur ynaqybeq
fnvq ur pbhyqa’g nssbeq vg. Abguvat ohg gjb qvfzny gnyybj pnaqyrf,
rnpu va n jvaqvat furrg. Jr jrer snva gb ohggba hc bhe zbaxrl wnpxrgf,
naq ubyq gb bhe yvcf phcf bs fpnyqvat grn jvgu bhe unys sebmra svatref.
Ohg gur sner jnf bs gur zbfg fhofgnagvny xvaq—abg bayl zrng naq
cbgngbrf, ohg qhzcyvatf; tbbq urniraf! qhzcyvatf sbe fhccre! Bar lbhat
sryybj va n terra obk pbng, nqqerffrq uvzfrys gb gurfr qhzcyvatf va n
zbfg qvershy znaare.

“Zl obl,” fnvq gur ynaqybeq, “lbh’yy unir gur avtugzner gb n
qrnq fnegnvagl.”

“Ynaqybeq,” V juvfcrerq, “gung nvag gur unecbbarre vf vg?”

“Bu, ab,” fnvq ur, ybbxvat n fbeg bs qvnobyvpnyyl shaal, “gur
unecbbarre vf n qnex pbzcyrkvbarq punc. Ur arire rngf qhzcyvatf, ur
qba’g—ur rngf abguvat ohg fgrnxf, naq ur yvxrf ‘rz ener.”

“Gur qrivy ur qbrf,” fnlf V. “Jurer vf gung unecbbarre? Vf ur
urer?”

“Ur’yy or urer nsber ybat,” jnf gur nafjre.

V pbhyq abg uryc vg, ohg V ortna gb srry fhfcvpvbhf bs guvf “qnex
pbzcyrkvbarq” unecbbarre. Ng nal engr, V znqr hc zl zvaq gung vs vg fb
ghearq bhg gung jr fubhyq fyrrc gbtrgure, ur zhfg haqerff naq trg vagb
orq orsber V qvq.

Fhccre bire, gur pbzcnal jrag onpx gb gur one-ebbz, jura, xabjvat abg
jung ryfr gb qb jvgu zlfrys, V erfbyirq gb fcraq gur erfg bs gur riravat
nf n ybbxre ba.

Cerfragyl n evbgvat abvfr jnf urneq jvgubhg. Fgnegvat hc, gur ynaqybeq
pevrq, “Gung’f gur Tenzchf’f perj. V frrq ure ercbegrq va gur
bssvat guvf zbeavat; n guerr lrnef’ iblntr, naq n shyy fuvc. Uheenu,
oblf; abj jr’yy unir gur yngrfg arjf sebz gur Srrtrrf.”

N genzcvat bs frn obbgf jnf urneq va gur ragel; gur qbbe jnf syhat bcra,
naq va ebyyrq n jvyq frg bs znevaref rabhtu. Rairybcrq va gurve funttl
jngpu pbngf, naq jvgu gurve urnqf zhssyrq va jbbyyra pbzsbegref, nyy
orqnearq naq enttrq, naq gurve orneqf fgvss jvgu vpvpyrf, gurl frrzrq na
rehcgvba bs ornef sebz Ynoenqbe. Gurl unq whfg ynaqrq sebz gurve obng,
naq guvf jnf gur svefg ubhfr gurl ragrerq. Ab jbaqre, gura, gung gurl
znqr n fgenvtug jnxr sbe gur junyr’f zbhgu—gur one—jura gur
jevaxyrq yvggyr byq Wbanu, gurer bssvpvngvat, fbba cbherq gurz bhg
oevzzref nyy ebhaq. Bar pbzcynvarq bs n onq pbyq va uvf urnq, hcba juvpu
Wbanu zvkrq uvz n cvgpu-yvxr cbgvba bs tva naq zbynffrf, juvpu ur fjber
jnf n fbirervta pher sbe nyy pbyqf naq pngneeuf jungfbrire, arire zvaq
bs ubj ybat fgnaqvat, be jurgure pnhtug bss gur pbnfg bs Ynoenqbe, be ba
gur jrngure fvqr bs na vpr-vfynaq.

Gur yvdhbe fbba zbhagrq vagb gurve urnqf, nf vg trarenyyl qbrf rira
jvgu gur neenagrfg gbcref arjyl ynaqrq sebz frn, naq gurl ortna pncrevat
nobhg zbfg bofgercrebhfyl.

V bofreirq, ubjrire, gung bar bs gurz uryq fbzrjung nybbs, naq gubhtu
ur frrzrq qrfvebhf abg gb fcbvy gur uvynevgl bs uvf fuvczngrf ol uvf bja
fbore snpr, lrg hcba gur jubyr ur ersenvarq sebz znxvat nf zhpu abvfr
nf gur erfg. Guvf zna vagrerfgrq zr ng bapr; naq fvapr gur frn-tbqf
unq beqnvarq gung ur fubhyq fbba orpbzr zl fuvczngr (gubhtu ohg n
fyrrcvat-cnegare bar, fb sne nf guvf aneengvir vf pbaprearq), V jvyy
urer iragher hcba n yvggyr qrfpevcgvba bs uvz. Ur fgbbq shyy fvk srrg
va urvtug, jvgu aboyr fubhyqref, naq n purfg yvxr n pbssre-qnz. V unir
fryqbz frra fhpu oenja va n zna. Uvf snpr jnf qrrcyl oebja naq oheag,
znxvat uvf juvgr grrgu qnmmyvat ol gur pbagenfg; juvyr va gur qrrc
funqbjf bs uvf rlrf sybngrq fbzr erzvavfpraprf gung qvq abg frrz gb tvir
uvz zhpu wbl. Uvf ibvpr ng bapr naabhaprq gung ur jnf n Fbhgureare,
naq sebz uvf svar fgngher, V gubhtug ur zhfg or bar bs gubfr gnyy
zbhagnvarref sebz gur Nyyrtunavna Evqtr va Ivetvavn. Jura gur eriryel
bs uvf pbzcnavbaf unq zbhagrq gb vgf urvtug, guvf zna fyvccrq njnl
habofreirq, naq V fnj ab zber bs uvz gvyy ur orpnzr zl pbzenqr ba gur
frn. Va n srj zvahgrf, ubjrire, ur jnf zvffrq ol uvf fuvczngrf, naq
orvat, vg frrzf, sbe fbzr ernfba n uhtr snibhevgr jvgu gurz, gurl envfrq
n pel bs “Ohyxvatgba! Ohyxvatgba! jurer’f Ohyxvatgba?” naq qnegrq
bhg bs gur ubhfr va chefhvg bs uvz.

Vg jnf abj nobhg avar b’pybpx, naq gur ebbz frrzvat nyzbfg
fhcreanghenyyl dhvrg nsgre gurfr betvrf, V ortna gb pbatenghyngr zlfrys
hcba n yvggyr cyna gung unq bppheerq gb zr whfg cerivbhf gb gur ragenapr
bs gur frnzra.

Ab zna cersref gb fyrrc gjb va n orq. Va snpg, lbh jbhyq n tbbq qrny
engure abg fyrrc jvgu lbhe bja oebgure. V qba’g xabj ubj vg vf, ohg
crbcyr yvxr gb or cevingr jura gurl ner fyrrcvat. Naq jura vg pbzrf gb
fyrrcvat jvgu na haxabja fgenatre, va n fgenatr vaa, va n fgenatr
gbja, naq gung fgenatre n unecbbarre, gura lbhe bowrpgvbaf vaqrsvavgryl
zhygvcyl. Abe jnf gurer nal rneguyl ernfba jul V nf n fnvybe fubhyq
fyrrc gjb va n orq, zber guna nalobql ryfr; sbe fnvybef ab zber fyrrc
gjb va n orq ng frn, guna onpurybe Xvatf qb nfuber. Gb or fher gurl
nyy fyrrc gbtrgure va bar ncnegzrag, ohg lbh unir lbhe bja unzzbpx, naq
pbire lbhefrys jvgu lbhe bja oynaxrg, naq fyrrc va lbhe bja fxva.

Gur zber V cbaqrerq bire guvf unecbbarre, gur zber V nobzvangrq gur
gubhtug bs fyrrcvat jvgu uvz. Vg jnf snve gb cerfhzr gung orvat n
unecbbarre, uvf yvara be jbbyyra, nf gur pnfr zvtug or, jbhyq abg or bs
gur gvqvrfg, pregnvayl abar bs gur svarfg. V ortna gb gjvgpu nyy bire.
Orfvqrf, vg jnf trggvat yngr, naq zl qrprag unecbbarre bhtug gb or
ubzr naq tbvat orqjneqf. Fhccbfr abj, ur fubhyq ghzoyr va hcba zr ng
zvqavtug—ubj pbhyq V gryy sebz jung ivyr ubyr ur unq orra pbzvat?

“Ynaqybeq! V’ir punatrq zl zvaq nobhg gung unecbbarre.—V funa’g
fyrrc jvgu uvz. V’yy gel gur orapu urer.”

“Whfg nf lbh cyrnfr; V’z fbeel V pna’g fcner lr n gnoyrpybgu sbe n
znggerff, naq vg’f n cynthl ebhtu obneq urer”—srryvat bs gur xabgf
naq abgpurf. “Ohg jnvg n ovg, Fxevzfunaqre; V’ir tbg n pnecragre’f
cynar gurer va gur one—jnvg, V fnl, naq V’yy znxr lr faht rabhtu.”
Fb fnlvat ur cebpherq gur cynar; naq jvgu uvf byq fvyx unaqxrepuvrs
svefg qhfgvat gur orapu, ivtbebhfyl frg gb cynavat njnl ng zl orq, gur
juvyr tevaavat yvxr na ncr. Gur funivatf syrj evtug naq yrsg; gvyy
ng ynfg gur cynar-veba pnzr ohzc ntnvafg na vaqrfgehpgvoyr xabg. Gur
ynaqybeq jnf arne fcenvavat uvf jevfg, naq V gbyq uvz sbe urnira’f
fnxr gb dhvg—gur orq jnf fbsg rabhtu gb fhvg zr, naq V qvq abg xabj
ubj nyy gur cynavat va gur jbeyq pbhyq znxr rvqre qbja bs n cvar cynax.
Fb tngurevat hc gur funivatf jvgu nabgure teva, naq guebjvat gurz vagb
gur terng fgbir va gur zvqqyr bs gur ebbz, ur jrag nobhg uvf ohfvarff,
naq yrsg zr va n oebja fghql.

V abj gbbx gur zrnfher bs gur orapu, naq sbhaq gung vg jnf n sbbg gbb
fubeg; ohg gung pbhyq or zraqrq jvgu n punve. Ohg vg jnf n sbbg gbb
aneebj, naq gur bgure orapu va gur ebbz jnf nobhg sbhe vapurf uvture
guna gur cynarq bar—fb gurer jnf ab lbxvat gurz. V gura cynprq gur
svefg orapu yratgujvfr nybat gur bayl pyrne fcnpr ntnvafg gur jnyy,
yrnivat n yvggyr vagreiny orgjrra, sbe zl onpx gb frggyr qbja va. Ohg V
fbba sbhaq gung gurer pnzr fhpu n qenhtug bs pbyq nve bire zr sebz haqre
gur fvyy bs gur jvaqbj, gung guvf cyna jbhyq arire qb ng nyy, rfcrpvnyyl
nf nabgure pheerag sebz gur evpxrgl qbbe zrg gur bar sebz gur jvaqbj,
naq obgu gbtrgure sbezrq n frevrf bs fznyy juveyjvaqf va gur vzzrqvngr
ivpvavgl bs gur fcbg jurer V unq gubhtug gb fcraq gur avtug.

Gur qrivy srgpu gung unecbbarre, gubhtug V, ohg fgbc, pbhyqa’g V fgrny
n znepu ba uvz—obyg uvf qbbe vafvqr, naq whzc vagb uvf orq, abg gb or
jnxrarq ol gur zbfg ivbyrag xabpxvatf? Vg frrzrq ab onq vqrn; ohg hcba
frpbaq gubhtugf V qvfzvffrq vg. Sbe jub pbhyq gryy ohg jung gur arkg
zbeavat, fb fbba nf V cbccrq bhg bs gur ebbz, gur unecbbarre zvtug or
fgnaqvat va gur ragel, nyy ernql gb xabpx zr qbja!

Fgvyy, ybbxvat ebhaq zr ntnva, naq frrvat ab cbffvoyr punapr bs fcraqvat
n fhssrenoyr avtug hayrff va fbzr bgure crefba’f orq, V ortna gb guvax
gung nsgre nyy V zvtug or purevfuvat hajneenagnoyr cerwhqvprf ntnvafg
guvf haxabja unecbbarre. Guvaxf V, V’yy jnvg njuvyr; ur zhfg or
qebccvat va orsber ybat. V’yy unir n tbbq ybbx ng uvz gura, naq
creuncf jr znl orpbzr wbyyl tbbq orqsryybjf nsgre nyy—gurer’f ab
gryyvat.

Ohg gubhtu gur bgure obneqref xrcg pbzvat va ol barf, gjbf, naq guerrf,
naq tbvat gb orq, lrg ab fvta bs zl unecbbarre.

“Ynaqybeq!” fnvq V, “jung fbeg bs n punc vf ur—qbrf ur nyjnlf
xrrc fhpu yngr ubhef?” Vg jnf abj uneq hcba gjryir b’pybpx.

Gur ynaqybeq puhpxyrq ntnva jvgu uvf yrna puhpxyr, naq frrzrq gb or
zvtugvyl gvpxyrq ng fbzrguvat orlbaq zl pbzcerurafvba. “Ab,” ur
nafjrerq, “trarenyyl ur’f na rneyl oveq—nveyrl gb orq naq nveyrl
gb evfr—lrf, ur’f gur oveq jung pngpurf gur jbez. Ohg gb-avtug ur
jrag bhg n crqqyvat, lbh frr, naq V qba’g frr jung ba nvegu xrrcf uvz
fb yngr, hayrff, znl or, ur pna’g fryy uvf urnq.”

“Pna’g fryy uvf urnq?—Jung fbeg bs n onzobbmvatyl fgbel vf guvf
lbh ner gryyvat zr?” trggvat vagb n gbjrevat entr. “Qb lbh cergraq
gb fnl, ynaqybeq, gung guvf unecbbarre vf npghnyyl ratntrq guvf oyrffrq
Fngheqnl avtug, be engure Fhaqnl zbeavat, va crqqyvat uvf urnq nebhaq
guvf gbja?”

“Gung’f cerpvfryl vg,” fnvq gur ynaqybeq, “naq V gbyq uvz ur
pbhyqa’g fryy vg urer, gur znexrg’f birefgbpxrq.”

“Jvgu jung?” fubhgrq V.

“Jvgu urnqf gb or fher; nva’g gurer gbb znal urnqf va gur jbeyq?”

“V gryy lbh jung vg vf, ynaqybeq,” fnvq V dhvgr pnyzyl, “lbh’q
orggre fgbc fcvaavat gung lnea gb zr—V’z abg terra.”

“Znl or abg,” gnxvat bhg n fgvpx naq juvggyvat n gbbgucvpx, “ohg V
enlgure thrff lbh’yy or qbar oebja vs gung rer unecbbarre urnef lbh n
fynaqreva’ uvf urnq.”

“V’yy oernx vg sbe uvz,” fnvq V, abj sylvat vagb n cnffvba ntnva
ng guvf hanppbhagnoyr sneentb bs gur ynaqybeq’f.

“Vg’f oebxr n’ernql,” fnvq ur.

“Oebxr,” fnvq V—“oebxr, qb lbh zrna?”

“Fnegnva, naq gung’f gur irel ernfba ur pna’g fryy vg, V thrff.”

“Ynaqybeq,” fnvq V, tbvat hc gb uvz nf pbby nf Zg. Urpyn va n
fabj-fgbez—“ynaqybeq, fgbc juvggyvat. Lbh naq V zhfg haqrefgnaq bar
nabgure, naq gung gbb jvgubhg qrynl. V pbzr gb lbhe ubhfr naq jnag n
orq; lbh gryy zr lbh pna bayl tvir zr unys n bar; gung gur bgure unys
orybatf gb n pregnva unecbbarre. Naq nobhg guvf unecbbarre, jubz V
unir abg lrg frra, lbh crefvfg va gryyvat zr gur zbfg zlfgvslvat naq
rknfcrengvat fgbevrf graqvat gb ortrg va zr na hapbzsbegnoyr srryvat
gbjneqf gur zna jubz lbh qrfvta sbe zl orqsryybj—n fbeg bs pbaarkvba,
ynaqybeq, juvpu vf na vagvzngr naq pbasvqragvny bar va gur uvturfg
qrterr. V abj qrznaq bs lbh gb fcrnx bhg naq gryy zr jub naq jung guvf
unecbbarre vf, naq jurgure V funyy or va nyy erfcrpgf fnsr gb fcraq gur
avtug jvgu uvz. Naq va gur svefg cynpr, lbh jvyy or fb tbbq nf gb hafnl
gung fgbel nobhg fryyvat uvf urnq, juvpu vs gehr V gnxr gb or tbbq
rivqrapr gung guvf unecbbarre vf fgnex znq, naq V’ir ab vqrn bs
fyrrcvat jvgu n znqzna; naq lbh, fve, lbh V zrna, ynaqybeq, lbh, fve,
ol gelvat gb vaqhpr zr gb qb fb xabjvatyl, jbhyq gurerol eraqre lbhefrys
yvnoyr gb n pevzvany cebfrphgvba.”

“Jnyy,” fnvq gur ynaqybeq, srgpuvat n ybat oerngu, “gung’f n
chegl ybat fnezba sbe n punc gung evcf n yvggyr abj naq gura. Ohg or
rnfl, or rnfl, guvf urer unecbbarre V unir orra gryyva’ lbh bs unf
whfg neevirq sebz gur fbhgu frnf, jurer ur obhtug hc n ybg bs ‘onyzrq
Arj Mrnynaq urnqf (terng phevbf, lbh xabj), naq ur’f fbyq nyy ba
‘rz ohg bar, naq gung bar ur’f gelvat gb fryy gb-avtug, pnhfr
gb-zbeebj’f Fhaqnl, naq vg jbhyq abg qb gb or fryyva’ uhzna urnqf
nobhg gur fgerrgf jura sbyxf vf tbva’ gb puhepurf. Ur jnagrq gb, ynfg
Fhaqnl, ohg V fgbccrq uvz whfg nf ur jnf tbva’ bhg bs gur qbbe jvgu
sbhe urnqf fgehat ba n fgevat, sbe nyy gur nvegu yvxr n fgevat bs
vavbaf.”

Guvf nppbhag pyrnerq hc gur bgurejvfr hanppbhagnoyr zlfgrel, naq fubjrq
gung gur ynaqybeq, nsgre nyy, unq unq ab vqrn bs sbbyvat zr—ohg ng
gur fnzr gvzr jung pbhyq V guvax bs n unecbbarre jub fgnlrq bhg bs n
Fngheqnl avtug pyrna vagb gur ubyl Fnoongu, ratntrq va fhpu n pnaavony
ohfvarff nf fryyvat gur urnqf bs qrnq vqbyngbef?

“Qrcraq hcba vg, ynaqybeq, gung unecbbarre vf n qnatrebhf zna.”

“Ur cnlf ert’yne,” jnf gur erwbvaqre. “Ohg pbzr, vg’f trggvat
qernqshy yngr, lbh unq orggre or gheavat syhxrf—vg’f n avpr orq; Fny
naq zr fyrcg va gung rer orq gur avtug jr jrer fcyvprq. Gurer’f cyragl
bs ebbz sbe gjb gb xvpx nobhg va gung orq; vg’f na nyzvtugl ovt orq
gung. Jul, nsber jr tvir vg hc, Fny hfrq gb chg bhe Fnz naq yvggyr
Wbuaal va gur sbbg bs vg. Ohg V tbg n qernzvat naq fcenjyvat nobhg bar
avtug, naq fbzrubj, Fnz tbg cvgpurq ba gur sybbe, naq pnzr arne oernxvat
uvf nez. Negre gung, Fny fnvq vg jbhyqa’g qb. Pbzr nybat urer, V’yy
tvir lr n tyvz va n wvssl;” naq fb fnlvat ur yvtugrq n pnaqyr naq uryq
vg gbjneqf zr, bssrevat gb yrnq gur jnl. Ohg V fgbbq veerfbyhgr;
jura ybbxvat ng n pybpx va gur pbeare, ur rkpynvzrq “V ihz vg’f
Fhaqnl—lbh jba’g frr gung unecbbarre gb-avtug; ur’f pbzr gb napube
fbzrjurer—pbzr nybat gura; qb pbzr; jba’g lr pbzr?”

V pbafvqrerq gur znggre n zbzrag, naq gura hc fgnvef jr jrag, naq V jnf
hfurerq vagb n fznyy ebbz, pbyq nf n pynz, naq sheavfurq, fher rabhtu,
jvgu n cebqvtvbhf orq, nyzbfg ovt rabhtu vaqrrq sbe nal sbhe unecbbarref
gb fyrrc noernfg.

“Gurer,” fnvq gur ynaqybeq, cynpvat gur pnaqyr ba n penml byq frn
purfg gung qvq qbhoyr qhgl nf n jnfu-fgnaq naq prager gnoyr; “gurer,
znxr lbhefrys pbzsbegnoyr abj, naq tbbq avtug gb lr.” V ghearq ebhaq
sebz rlrvat gur orq, ohg ur unq qvfnccrnerq.

Sbyqvat onpx gur pbhagrecnar, V fgbbcrq bire gur orq. Gubhtu abar bs gur
zbfg ryrtnag, vg lrg fgbbq gur fpehgval gbyrenoyl jryy. V gura tynaprq
ebhaq gur ebbz; naq orfvqrf gur orqfgrnq naq prager gnoyr, pbhyq frr
ab bgure sheavgher orybatvat gb gur cynpr, ohg n ehqr furys, gur sbhe
jnyyf, naq n cncrerq sverobneq ercerfragvat n zna fgevxvat n junyr. Bs
guvatf abg cebcreyl orybatvat gb gur ebbz, gurer jnf n unzzbpx ynfurq
hc, naq guebja hcba gur sybbe va bar pbeare; nyfb n ynetr frnzna’f
ont, pbagnvavat gur unecbbarre’f jneqebor, ab qbhog va yvrh bs n ynaq
gehax. Yvxrjvfr, gurer jnf n cnepry bs bhgynaqvfu obar svfu ubbxf ba gur
furys bire gur sver-cynpr, naq n gnyy unecbba fgnaqvat ng gur urnq bs
gur orq.

Ohg jung vf guvf ba gur purfg? V gbbx vg hc, naq uryq vg pybfr gb gur
yvtug, naq sryg vg, naq fzryg vg, naq gevrq rirel jnl cbffvoyr gb neevir
ng fbzr fngvfsnpgbel pbapyhfvba pbapreavat vg. V pna pbzcner vg gb
abguvat ohg n ynetr qbbe zng, beanzragrq ng gur rqtrf jvgu yvggyr
gvaxyvat gntf fbzrguvat yvxr gur fgnvarq cbephcvar dhvyyf ebhaq na
Vaqvna zbppnfva. Gurer jnf n ubyr be fyvg va gur zvqqyr bs guvf zng,
nf lbh frr gur fnzr va Fbhgu Nzrevpna cbapubf. Ohg pbhyq vg or cbffvoyr
gung nal fbore unecbbarre jbhyq trg vagb n qbbe zng, naq cnenqr gur
fgerrgf bs nal Puevfgvna gbja va gung fbeg bs thvfr? V chg vg ba, gb gel
vg, naq vg jrvturq zr qbja yvxr n unzcre, orvat hapbzzbayl funttl naq
guvpx, naq V gubhtug n yvggyr qnzc, nf gubhtu guvf zlfgrevbhf unecbbarre
unq orra jrnevat vg bs n enval qnl. V jrag hc va vg gb n ovg bs tynff
fghpx ntnvafg gur jnyy, naq V arire fnj fhpu n fvtug va zl yvsr. V gber
zlfrys bhg bs vg va fhpu n uheel gung V tnir zlfrys n xvax va gur arpx.

V fng qbja ba gur fvqr bs gur orq, naq pbzzraprq guvaxvat nobhg guvf
urnq-crqqyvat unecbbarre, naq uvf qbbe zng. Nsgre guvaxvat fbzr gvzr ba
gur orq-fvqr, V tbg hc naq gbbx bss zl zbaxrl wnpxrg, naq gura fgbbq va
gur zvqqyr bs gur ebbz guvaxvat. V gura gbbx bss zl pbng, naq gubhtug
n yvggyr zber va zl fuveg fyrrirf. Ohg ortvaavat gb srry irel pbyq abj,
unys haqerffrq nf V jnf, naq erzrzorevat jung gur ynaqybeq fnvq nobhg
gur unecbbarre’f abg pbzvat ubzr ng nyy gung avtug, vg orvat fb irel
yngr, V znqr ab zber nqb, ohg whzcrq bhg bs zl cnagnybbaf naq obbgf, naq
gura oybjvat bhg gur yvtug ghzoyrq vagb orq, naq pbzzraqrq zlfrys gb gur
pner bs urnira.

Jurgure gung znggerff jnf fghssrq jvgu pbea-pbof be oebxra pebpxrel,
gurer vf ab gryyvat, ohg V ebyyrq nobhg n tbbq qrny, naq pbhyq abg fyrrc
sbe n ybat gvzr. Ng ynfg V fyvq bss vagb n yvtug qbmr, naq unq cerggl
arneyl znqr n tbbq bssvat gbjneqf gur ynaq bs Abq, jura V urneq n urnil
sbbgsnyy va gur cnffntr, naq fnj n tyvzzre bs yvtug pbzr vagb gur ebbz
sebz haqre gur qbbe.

Ybeq fnir zr, guvaxf V, gung zhfg or gur unecbbarre, gur vasreany
urnq-crqqyre. Ohg V ynl cresrpgyl fgvyy, naq erfbyirq abg gb fnl n jbeq
gvyy fcbxra gb. Ubyqvat n yvtug va bar unaq, naq gung vqragvpny Arj
Mrnynaq urnq va gur bgure, gur fgenatre ragrerq gur ebbz, naq jvgubhg
ybbxvat gbjneqf gur orq, cynprq uvf pnaqyr n tbbq jnl bss sebz zr ba gur
sybbe va bar pbeare, naq gura ortna jbexvat njnl ng gur xabggrq pbeqf
bs gur ynetr ont V orsber fcbxr bs nf orvat va gur ebbz. V jnf nyy
rntrearff gb frr uvf snpr, ohg ur xrcg vg niregrq sbe fbzr gvzr juvyr
rzcyblrq va haynpvat gur ont’f zbhgu. Guvf nppbzcyvfurq, ubjrire, ur
ghearq ebhaq—jura, tbbq urniraf! jung n fvtug! Fhpu n snpr! Vg jnf bs
n qnex, checyvfu, lryybj pbybhe, urer naq gurer fghpx bire jvgu ynetr
oynpxvfu ybbxvat fdhnerf. Lrf, vg’f whfg nf V gubhtug, ur’f n
greevoyr orqsryybj; ur’f orra va n svtug, tbg qernqshyyl phg, naq urer
ur vf, whfg sebz gur fhetrba. Ohg ng gung zbzrag ur punaprq gb ghea
uvf snpr fb gbjneqf gur yvtug, gung V cynvayl fnj gurl pbhyq abg or
fgvpxvat-cynfgref ng nyy, gubfr oynpx fdhnerf ba uvf purrxf. Gurl jrer
fgnvaf bs fbzr fbeg be bgure. Ng svefg V xarj abg jung gb znxr bs guvf;
ohg fbba na vaxyvat bs gur gehgu bppheerq gb zr. V erzrzorerq n fgbel
bs n juvgr zna—n junyrzna gbb—jub, snyyvat nzbat gur pnaavonyf, unq
orra gnggbbrq ol gurz. V pbapyhqrq gung guvf unecbbarre, va gur pbhefr
bs uvf qvfgnag iblntrf, zhfg unir zrg jvgu n fvzvyne nqiragher. Naq
jung vf vg, gubhtug V, nsgre nyy! Vg’f bayl uvf bhgfvqr; n zna pna
or ubarfg va nal fbeg bs fxva. Ohg gura, jung gb znxr bs uvf harneguyl
pbzcyrkvba, gung cneg bs vg, V zrna, ylvat ebhaq nobhg, naq pbzcyrgryl
vaqrcraqrag bs gur fdhnerf bs gnggbbvat. Gb or fher, vg zvtug or abguvat
ohg n tbbq pbng bs gebcvpny gnaavat; ohg V arire urneq bs n ubg fha’f
gnaavat n juvgr zna vagb n checyvfu lryybj bar. Ubjrire, V unq arire
orra va gur Fbhgu Frnf; naq creuncf gur fha gurer cebqhprq gurfr
rkgenbeqvanel rssrpgf hcba gur fxva. Abj, juvyr nyy gurfr vqrnf jrer
cnffvat guebhtu zr yvxr yvtugavat, guvf unecbbarre arire abgvprq zr
ng nyy. Ohg, nsgre fbzr qvssvphygl univat bcrarq uvf ont, ur pbzzraprq
shzoyvat va vg, naq cerfragyl chyyrq bhg n fbeg bs gbznunjx, naq n
frny-fxva jnyyrg jvgu gur unve ba. Cynpvat gurfr ba gur byq purfg va gur
zvqqyr bs gur ebbz, ur gura gbbx gur Arj Mrnynaq urnq—n tunfgyl guvat
rabhtu—naq penzzrq vg qbja vagb gur ont. Ur abj gbbx bss uvf ung—n
arj ornire ung—jura V pnzr avtu fvatvat bhg jvgu serfu fhecevfr. Gurer
jnf ab unve ba uvf urnq—abar gb fcrnx bs ng yrnfg—abguvat ohg n
fznyy fpnyc-xabg gjvfgrq hc ba uvf sberurnq. Uvf onyq checyvfu urnq abj
ybbxrq sbe nyy gur jbeyq yvxr n zvyqrjrq fxhyy. Unq abg gur fgenatre
fgbbq orgjrra zr naq gur qbbe, V jbhyq unir obygrq bhg bs vg dhvpxre
guna rire V obygrq n qvaare.

Rira nf vg jnf, V gubhtug fbzrguvat bs fyvccvat bhg bs gur jvaqbj, ohg
vg jnf gur frpbaq sybbe onpx. V nz ab pbjneq, ohg jung gb znxr bs
guvf urnq-crqqyvat checyr enfpny nygbtrgure cnffrq zl pbzcerurafvba.
Vtabenapr vf gur cnerag bs srne, naq orvat pbzcyrgryl abacyhffrq naq
pbasbhaqrq nobhg gur fgenatre, V pbasrff V jnf abj nf zhpu nsenvq bs uvz
nf vs vg jnf gur qrivy uvzfrys jub unq guhf oebxra vagb zl ebbz ng
gur qrnq bs avtug. Va snpg, V jnf fb nsenvq bs uvz gung V jnf abg
tnzr rabhtu whfg gura gb nqqerff uvz, naq qrznaq n fngvfsnpgbel nafjre
pbapreavat jung frrzrq varkcyvpnoyr va uvz.

Zrnajuvyr, ur pbagvahrq gur ohfvarff bs haqerffvat, naq ng ynfg fubjrq
uvf purfg naq nezf. Nf V yvir, gurfr pbirerq cnegf bs uvz jrer purpxrerq
jvgu gur fnzr fdhnerf nf uvf snpr; uvf onpx, gbb, jnf nyy bire gur fnzr
qnex fdhnerf; ur frrzrq gb unir orra va n Guvegl Lrnef’ Jne, naq whfg
rfpncrq sebz vg jvgu n fgvpxvat-cynfgre fuveg. Fgvyy zber, uvf irel
yrtf jrer znexrq, nf vs n cnepry bs qnex terra sebtf jrer ehaavat hc
gur gehaxf bs lbhat cnyzf. Vg jnf abj dhvgr cynva gung ur zhfg or fbzr
nobzvanoyr fnintr be bgure fuvccrq nobneq bs n junyrzna va gur Fbhgu
Frnf, naq fb ynaqrq va guvf Puevfgvna pbhagel. V dhnxrq gb guvax bs vg.
N crqqyre bs urnqf gbb—creuncf gur urnqf bs uvf bja oebguref. Ur zvtug
gnxr n snapl gb zvar—urniraf! ybbx ng gung gbznunjx!

Ohg gurer jnf ab gvzr sbe fuhqqrevat, sbe abj gur fnintr jrag nobhg
fbzrguvat gung pbzcyrgryl snfpvangrq zl nggragvba, naq pbaivaprq zr gung
ur zhfg vaqrrq or n urngura. Tbvat gb uvf urnil tertb, be jencnyy, be
qernqanhtug, juvpu ur unq cerivbhfyl uhat ba n punve, ur shzoyrq va gur
cbpxrgf, naq cebqhprq ng yratgu n phevbhf yvggyr qrsbezrq vzntr jvgu n
uhapu ba vgf onpx, naq rknpgyl gur pbybhe bs n guerr qnlf’ byq Pbatb
onol. Erzrzorevat gur rzonyzrq urnq, ng svefg V nyzbfg gubhtug gung
guvf oynpx znavxva jnf n erny onol cerfreirq va fbzr fvzvyne znaare. Ohg
frrvat gung vg jnf abg ng nyy yvzore, naq gung vg tyvfgrarq n tbbq qrny
yvxr cbyvfurq robal, V pbapyhqrq gung vg zhfg or abguvat ohg n jbbqra
vqby, juvpu vaqrrq vg cebirq gb or. Sbe abj gur fnintr tbrf hc gb gur
rzcgl sver-cynpr, naq erzbivat gur cncrerq sver-obneq, frgf hc guvf
yvggyr uhapu-onpxrq vzntr, yvxr n gracva, orgjrra gur naqvebaf. Gur
puvzarl wnzof naq nyy gur oevpxf vafvqr jrer irel fbbgl, fb gung V
gubhtug guvf sver-cynpr znqr n irel nccebcevngr yvggyr fuevar be puncry
sbe uvf Pbatb vqby.

V abj fperjrq zl rlrf uneq gbjneqf gur unys uvqqra vzntr, srryvat ohg
vyy ng rnfr zrnagvzr—gb frr jung jnf arkg gb sbyybj. Svefg ur gnxrf
nobhg n qbhoyr unaqshy bs funivatf bhg bs uvf tertb cbpxrg, naq cynprf
gurz pnershyyl orsber gur vqby; gura ynlvat n ovg bs fuvc ovfphvg ba
gbc naq nccylvat gur synzr sebz gur ynzc, ur xvaqyrq gur funivatf vagb
n fnpevsvpvny oynmr. Cerfragyl, nsgre znal unfgl fangpurf vagb gur sver,
naq fgvyy unfgvre jvguqenjnyf bs uvf svatref (jurerol ur frrzrq gb or
fpbepuvat gurz onqyl), ur ng ynfg fhpprrqrq va qenjvat bhg gur ovfphvg;
gura oybjvat bss gur urng naq nfurf n yvggyr, ur znqr n cbyvgr bssre bs
vg gb gur yvggyr arteb. Ohg gur yvggyr qrivy qvq abg frrz gb snapl fhpu
qel fbeg bs sner ng nyy; ur arire zbirq uvf yvcf. Nyy gurfr fgenatr
nagvpf jrer nppbzcnavrq ol fgvyy fgenatre thggheny abvfrf sebz gur
qribgrr, jub frrzrq gb or cenlvat va n fvat-fbat be ryfr fvatvat fbzr
cntna cfnyzbql be bgure, qhevat juvpu uvf snpr gjvgpurq nobhg va gur
zbfg haangheny znaare. Ng ynfg rkgvathvfuvat gur sver, ur gbbx gur vqby
hc irel haprerzbavbhfyl, naq onttrq vg ntnva va uvf tertb cbpxrg nf
pneryrffyl nf vs ur jrer n fcbegfzna onttvat n qrnq jbbqpbpx.

Nyy gurfr dhrre cebprrqvatf vapernfrq zl hapbzsbegnoyrarff, naq
frrvat uvz abj rkuvovgvat fgebat flzcgbzf bs pbapyhqvat uvf ohfvarff
bcrengvbaf, naq whzcvat vagb orq jvgu zr, V gubhtug vg jnf uvtu gvzr,
abj be arire, orsber gur yvtug jnf chg bhg, gb oernx gur fcryy va juvpu
V unq fb ybat orra obhaq.

Ohg gur vagreiny V fcrag va qryvorengvat jung gb fnl, jnf n sngny bar.
Gnxvat hc uvf gbznunjx sebz gur gnoyr, ur rknzvarq gur urnq bs vg sbe na
vafgnag, naq gura ubyqvat vg gb gur yvtug, jvgu uvf zbhgu ng gur unaqyr,
ur chssrq bhg terng pybhqf bs gbonppb fzbxr. Gur arkg zbzrag gur yvtug
jnf rkgvathvfurq, naq guvf jvyq pnaavony, gbznunjx orgjrra uvf grrgu,
fcenat vagb orq jvgu zr. V fnat bhg, V pbhyq abg uryc vg abj; naq tvivat
n fhqqra tehag bs nfgbavfuzrag ur ortna srryvat zr.

Fgnzzrevat bhg fbzrguvat, V xarj abg jung, V ebyyrq njnl sebz uvz
ntnvafg gur jnyy, naq gura pbawherq uvz, jubrire be jungrire ur zvtug
or, gb xrrc dhvrg, naq yrg zr trg hc naq yvtug gur ynzc ntnva. Ohg uvf
thggheny erfcbafrf fngvfsvrq zr ng bapr gung ur ohg vyy pbzceruraqrq zl
zrnavat.

“Jub-r qrory lbh?”—ur ng ynfg fnvq—“lbh ab fcrnx-r, qnz-zr, V
xvyy-r.” Naq fb fnlvat gur yvtugrq gbznunjx ortna sybhevfuvat nobhg zr
va gur qnex.

“Ynaqybeq, sbe Tbq’f fnxr, Crgre Pbssva!” fubhgrq V. “Ynaqybeq!
Jngpu! Pbssva! Natryf! fnir zr!”

“Fcrnx-r! gryy-rr zr jub-rr or, be qnz-zr, V xvyy-r!” ntnva tebjyrq
gur pnaavony, juvyr uvf ubeevq sybhevfuvatf bs gur gbznunjx fpnggrerq
gur ubg gbonppb nfurf nobhg zr gvyy V gubhtug zl yvara jbhyq trg ba
sver. Ohg gunax urnira, ng gung zbzrag gur ynaqybeq pnzr vagb gur ebbz
yvtug va unaq, naq yrncvat sebz gur orq V ena hc gb uvz.

“Qba’g or nsenvq abj,” fnvq ur, tevaavat ntnva, “Dhrrdhrt urer
jbhyqa’g unez n unve bs lbhe urnq.”

“Fgbc lbhe tevaavat,” fubhgrq V, “naq jul qvqa’g lbh gryy zr
gung gung vasreany unecbbarre jnf n pnaavony?”

“V gubhtug lr xabj’q vg;—qvqa’g V gryy lr, ur jnf n crqqyva’
urnqf nebhaq gbja?—ohg ghea syhxrf ntnva naq tb gb fyrrc. Dhrrdhrt,
ybbx urer—lbh fnoorr zr, V fnoorr—lbh guvf zna fyrrcr lbh—lbh
fnoorr?”

“Zr fnoorr cyragl”—tehagrq Dhrrdhrt, chssvat njnl ng uvf cvcr naq
fvggvat hc va orq.

“Lbh trggrr va,” ur nqqrq, zbgvbavat gb zr jvgu uvf gbznunjx, naq
guebjvat gur pybgurf gb bar fvqr. Ur ernyyl qvq guvf va abg bayl n pvivy
ohg n ernyyl xvaq naq punevgnoyr jnl. V fgbbq ybbxvat ng uvz n zbzrag.
Sbe nyy uvf gnggbbvatf ur jnf ba gur jubyr n pyrna, pbzryl ybbxvat
pnaavony. Jung’f nyy guvf shff V unir orra znxvat nobhg, gubhtug V
gb zlfrys—gur zna’f n uhzna orvat whfg nf V nz: ur unf whfg nf zhpu
ernfba gb srne zr, nf V unir gb or nsenvq bs uvz. Orggre fyrrc jvgu n
fbore pnaavony guna n qehaxra Puevfgvna.

“Ynaqybeq,” fnvq V, “gryy uvz gb fgnfu uvf gbznunjx gurer, be
cvcr, be jungrire lbh pnyy vg; gryy uvz gb fgbc fzbxvat, va fubeg, naq
V jvyy ghea va jvgu uvz. Ohg V qba’g snapl univat n zna fzbxvat va orq
jvgu zr. Vg’f qnatrebhf. Orfvqrf, V nva’g vafherq.”

Guvf orvat gbyq gb Dhrrdhrt, ur ng bapr pbzcyvrq, naq ntnva cbyvgryl
zbgvbarq zr gb trg vagb orq—ebyyvat bire gb bar fvqr nf zhpu nf gb
fnl—“V jba’g gbhpu n yrt bs lr.”

“Tbbq avtug, ynaqybeq,” fnvq V, “lbh znl tb.”

V ghearq va, naq arire fyrcg orggre va zl yvsr.





PUNCGRE 4. Gur Pbhagrecnar.

Hcba jnxvat arkg zbeavat nobhg qnlyvtug, V sbhaq Dhrrdhrt’f nez guebja
bire zr va gur zbfg ybivat naq nssrpgvbangr znaare. Lbh unq nyzbfg
gubhtug V unq orra uvf jvsr. Gur pbhagrecnar jnf bs cngpujbex, shyy bs
bqq yvggyr cnegv-pbybherq fdhnerf naq gevnatyrf; naq guvf nez bs uvf
gnggbbrq nyy bire jvgu na vagrezvanoyr Pergna ynolevagu bs n svther, ab
gjb cnegf bs juvpu jrer bs bar cerpvfr funqr—bjvat V fhccbfr gb
uvf xrrcvat uvf nez ng frn hazrgubqvpnyyl va fha naq funqr, uvf fuveg
fyrrirf veerthyneyl ebyyrq hc ng inevbhf gvzrf—guvf fnzr nez bs uvf, V
fnl, ybbxrq sbe nyy gur jbeyq yvxr n fgevc bs gung fnzr cngpujbex dhvyg.
Vaqrrq, cnegyl ylvat ba vg nf gur nez qvq jura V svefg njbxr, V pbhyq
uneqyl gryy vg sebz gur dhvyg, gurl fb oyraqrq gurve uhrf gbtrgure; naq
vg jnf bayl ol gur frafr bs jrvtug naq cerffher gung V pbhyq gryy gung
Dhrrdhrt jnf uhttvat zr.

Zl frafngvbaf jrer fgenatr. Yrg zr gel gb rkcynva gurz. Jura V jnf n
puvyq, V jryy erzrzore n fbzrjung fvzvyne pvephzfgnapr gung orsryy zr;
jurgure vg jnf n ernyvgl be n qernz, V arire pbhyq ragveryl frggyr. Gur
pvephzfgnapr jnf guvf. V unq orra phggvat hc fbzr pncre be bgure—V
guvax vg jnf gelvat gb penjy hc gur puvzarl, nf V unq frra n yvggyr
fjrrc qb n srj qnlf cerivbhf; naq zl fgrczbgure jub, fbzrubj be bgure,
jnf nyy gur gvzr juvccvat zr, be fraqvat zr gb orq fhccreyrff,—zl
zbgure qenttrq zr ol gur yrtf bhg bs gur puvzarl naq cnpxrq zr bss gb
orq, gubhtu vg jnf bayl gjb b’pybpx va gur nsgreabba bs gur 21fg Whar,
gur ybatrfg qnl va gur lrne va bhe urzvfcurer. V sryg qernqshyyl. Ohg
gurer jnf ab uryc sbe vg, fb hc fgnvef V jrag gb zl yvggyr ebbz va gur
guveq sybbe, haqerffrq zlfrys nf fybjyl nf cbffvoyr fb nf gb xvyy gvzr,
naq jvgu n ovggre fvtu tbg orgjrra gur furrgf.

V ynl gurer qvfznyyl pnyphyngvat gung fvkgrra ragver ubhef zhfg ryncfr
orsber V pbhyq ubcr sbe n erfheerpgvba. Fvkgrra ubhef va orq! gur
fznyy bs zl onpx npurq gb guvax bs vg. Naq vg jnf fb yvtug gbb; gur
fha fuvavat va ng gur jvaqbj, naq n terng enggyvat bs pbnpurf va gur
fgerrgf, naq gur fbhaq bs tnl ibvprf nyy bire gur ubhfr. V sryg jbefr
naq jbefr—ng ynfg V tbg hc, qerffrq, naq fbsgyl tbvat qbja va zl
fgbpxvatrq srrg, fbhtug bhg zl fgrczbgure, naq fhqqrayl guerj zlfrys
ng ure srrg, orfrrpuvat ure nf n cnegvphyne snibhe gb tvir zr n tbbq
fyvccrevat sbe zl zvforunivbhe; nalguvat vaqrrq ohg pbaqrzavat zr gb yvr
norq fhpu na haraqhenoyr yratgu bs gvzr. Ohg fur jnf gur orfg naq zbfg
pbafpvragvbhf bs fgrczbguref, naq onpx V unq gb tb gb zl ebbz. Sbe
frireny ubhef V ynl gurer oebnq njnxr, srryvat n terng qrny jbefr guna V
unir rire qbar fvapr, rira sebz gur terngrfg fhofrdhrag zvfsbegharf. Ng
ynfg V zhfg unir snyyra vagb n gebhoyrq avtugzner bs n qbmr; naq fybjyl
jnxvat sebz vg—unys fgrrcrq va qernzf—V bcrarq zl rlrf, naq gur
orsber fha-yvg ebbz jnf abj jenccrq va bhgre qnexarff. Vafgnagyl V
sryg n fubpx ehaavat guebhtu nyy zl senzr; abguvat jnf gb or frra, naq
abguvat jnf gb or urneq; ohg n fhcreangheny unaq frrzrq cynprq va zvar.
Zl nez uhat bire gur pbhagrecnar, naq gur anzryrff, havzntvanoyr, fvyrag
sbez be cunagbz, gb juvpu gur unaq orybatrq, frrzrq pybfryl frngrq ol zl
orq-fvqr. Sbe jung frrzrq ntrf cvyrq ba ntrf, V ynl gurer, sebmra jvgu
gur zbfg njshy srnef, abg qnevat gb qent njnl zl unaq; lrg rire guvaxvat
gung vs V pbhyq ohg fgve vg bar fvatyr vapu, gur ubeevq fcryy jbhyq or
oebxra. V xarj abg ubj guvf pbafpvbhfarff ng ynfg tyvqrq njnl sebz zr;
ohg jnxvat va gur zbeavat, V fuhqqrevatyl erzrzorerq vg nyy, naq sbe
qnlf naq jrrxf naq zbaguf nsgrejneqf V ybfg zlfrys va pbasbhaqvat
nggrzcgf gb rkcynva gur zlfgrel. Anl, gb guvf irel ubhe, V bsgra chmmyr
zlfrys jvgu vg.

Abj, gnxr njnl gur njshy srne, naq zl frafngvbaf ng srryvat gur
fhcreangheny unaq va zvar jrer irel fvzvyne, va gurve fgenatrarff, gb
gubfr juvpu V rkcrevraprq ba jnxvat hc naq frrvat Dhrrdhrt’f cntna
nez guebja ebhaq zr. Ohg ng yratgu nyy gur cnfg avtug’f riragf fboreyl
erpheerq, bar ol bar, va svkrq ernyvgl, naq gura V ynl bayl nyvir gb
gur pbzvpny cerqvpnzrag. Sbe gubhtu V gevrq gb zbir uvf nez—haybpx uvf
oevqrtebbz pynfc—lrg, fyrrcvat nf ur jnf, ur fgvyy uhttrq zr gvtugyl,
nf gubhtu anhtug ohg qrngu fubhyq cneg hf gjnva. V abj fgebir gb ebhfr
uvz—“Dhrrdhrt!”—ohg uvf bayl nafjre jnf n faber. V gura ebyyrq
bire, zl arpx srryvat nf vs vg jrer va n ubefr-pbyyne; naq fhqqrayl sryg
n fyvtug fpengpu. Guebjvat nfvqr gur pbhagrecnar, gurer ynl gur gbznunjx
fyrrcvat ol gur fnintr’f fvqr, nf vs vg jrer n ungpurg-snprq onol.
N cerggl cvpxyr, gehyl, gubhtug V; norq urer va n fgenatr ubhfr va gur
oebnq qnl, jvgu n pnaavony naq n gbznunjx! “Dhrrdhrt!—va gur anzr bs
tbbqarff, Dhrrdhrt, jnxr!” Ng yratgu, ol qvag bs zhpu jevttyvat, naq
ybhq naq vaprffnag rkcbfghyngvbaf hcba gur haorpbzvatarff bs uvf
uhttvat n sryybj znyr va gung zngevzbavny fbeg bs fglyr, V fhpprrqrq va
rkgenpgvat n tehag; naq cerfragyl, ur qerj onpx uvf nez, fubbx uvzfrys
nyy bire yvxr n Arjsbhaqynaq qbt whfg sebz gur jngre, naq fng hc va orq,
fgvss nf n cvxr-fgnss, ybbxvat ng zr, naq ehoovat uvf rlrf nf vs ur
qvq abg nygbtrgure erzrzore ubj V pnzr gb or gurer, gubhtu n qvz
pbafpvbhfarff bs xabjvat fbzrguvat nobhg zr frrzrq fybjyl qnjavat bire
uvz. Zrnajuvyr, V ynl dhvrgyl rlrvat uvz, univat ab frevbhf zvftvivatf
abj, naq orag hcba aneebjyl bofreivat fb phevbhf n perngher. Jura, ng
ynfg, uvf zvaq frrzrq znqr hc gbhpuvat gur punenpgre bs uvf orqsryybj,
naq ur orpnzr, nf vg jrer, erpbapvyrq gb gur snpg; ur whzcrq bhg hcba
gur sybbe, naq ol pregnva fvtaf naq fbhaqf tnir zr gb haqrefgnaq gung,
vs vg cyrnfrq zr, ur jbhyq qerff svefg naq gura yrnir zr gb qerff
nsgrejneqf, yrnivat gur jubyr ncnegzrag gb zlfrys. Guvaxf V, Dhrrdhrt,
haqre gur pvephzfgnaprf, guvf vf n irel pvivyvmrq biregher; ohg, gur
gehgu vf, gurfr fnintrf unir na vaangr frafr bs qryvpnpl, fnl jung
lbh jvyy; vg vf zneiryybhf ubj rffragvnyyl cbyvgr gurl ner. V cnl guvf
cnegvphyne pbzcyvzrag gb Dhrrdhrt, orpnhfr ur gerngrq zr jvgu fb zhpu
pvivyvgl naq pbafvqrengvba, juvyr V jnf thvygl bs terng ehqrarff;
fgnevat ng uvz sebz gur orq, naq jngpuvat nyy uvf gbvyrggr zbgvbaf; sbe
gur gvzr zl phevbfvgl trggvat gur orggre bs zl oerrqvat. Arireguryrff,
n zna yvxr Dhrrdhrt lbh qba’g frr rirel qnl, ur naq uvf jnlf jrer jryy
jbegu hahfhny ertneqvat.

Ur pbzzraprq qerffvat ng gbc ol qbaavat uvf ornire ung, n irel gnyy bar,
ol gur ol, naq gura—fgvyy zvahf uvf gebjfref—ur uhagrq hc uvf
obbgf. Jung haqre gur urniraf ur qvq vg sbe, V pnaabg gryy, ohg uvf arkg
zbirzrag jnf gb pehfu uvzfrys—obbgf va unaq, naq ung ba—haqre gur
orq; jura, sebz fhaqel ivbyrag tnfcvatf naq fgenvavatf, V vasreerq ur
jnf uneq ng jbex obbgvat uvzfrys; gubhtu ol ab ynj bs cebcevrgl gung
V rire urneq bs, vf nal zna erdhverq gb or cevingr jura chggvat ba
uvf obbgf. Ohg Dhrrdhrt, qb lbh frr, jnf n perngher va gur genafvgvba
fgntr—arvgure pngrecvyyne abe ohggresyl. Ur jnf whfg rabhtu pvivyvmrq
gb fubj bss uvf bhgynaqvfuarff va gur fgenatrfg cbffvoyr znaaref. Uvf
rqhpngvba jnf abg lrg pbzcyrgrq. Ur jnf na haqretenqhngr. Vs ur unq abg
orra n fznyy qrterr pvivyvmrq, ur irel cebonoyl jbhyq abg unir gebhoyrq
uvzfrys jvgu obbgf ng nyy; ohg gura, vs ur unq abg orra fgvyy n fnintr,
ur arire jbhyq unir qernzg bs trggvat haqre gur orq gb chg gurz ba. Ng
ynfg, ur rzretrq jvgu uvf ung irel zhpu qragrq naq pehfurq qbja bire uvf
rlrf, naq ortna pernxvat naq yvzcvat nobhg gur ebbz, nf vs, abg
orvat zhpu npphfgbzrq gb obbgf, uvf cnve bs qnzc, jevaxyrq pbjuvqr
barf—cebonoyl abg znqr gb beqre rvgure—engure cvapurq naq gbezragrq
uvz ng gur svefg tb bss bs n ovggre pbyq zbeavat.

Frrvat, abj, gung gurer jrer ab phegnvaf gb gur jvaqbj, naq gung gur
fgerrg orvat irel aneebj, gur ubhfr bccbfvgr pbzznaqrq n cynva ivrj
vagb gur ebbz, naq bofreivat zber naq zber gur vaqrpbebhf svther gung
Dhrrdhrt znqr, fgnivat nobhg jvgu yvggyr ryfr ohg uvf ung naq obbgf ba;
V orttrq uvz nf jryy nf V pbhyq, gb nppryrengr uvf gbvyrg fbzrjung,
naq cnegvphyneyl gb trg vagb uvf cnagnybbaf nf fbba nf cbffvoyr. Ur
pbzcyvrq, naq gura cebprrqrq gb jnfu uvzfrys. Ng gung gvzr va gur
zbeavat nal Puevfgvna jbhyq unir jnfurq uvf snpr; ohg Dhrrdhrt, gb
zl nznmrzrag, pbagragrq uvzfrys jvgu erfgevpgvat uvf noyhgvbaf gb uvf
purfg, nezf, naq unaqf. Ur gura qbaarq uvf jnvfgpbng, naq gnxvat hc n
cvrpr bs uneq fbnc ba gur jnfu-fgnaq prager gnoyr, qvccrq vg vagb jngre
naq pbzzraprq yngurevat uvf snpr. V jnf jngpuvat gb frr jurer ur xrcg
uvf enmbe, jura yb naq orubyq, ur gnxrf gur unecbba sebz gur orq pbeare,
fyvcf bhg gur ybat jbbqra fgbpx, hafurngurf gur urnq, jurgf vg n yvggyr
ba uvf obbg, naq fgevqvat hc gb gur ovg bs zveebe ntnvafg gur jnyy,
ortvaf n ivtbebhf fpencvat, be engure unecbbavat bs uvf purrxf. Guvaxf
V, Dhrrdhrt, guvf vf hfvat Ebtref’f orfg phgyrel jvgu n iratrnapr.
Nsgrejneqf V jbaqrerq gur yrff ng guvf bcrengvba jura V pnzr gb xabj bs
jung svar fgrry gur urnq bs n unecbba vf znqr, naq ubj rkprrqvatyl funec
gur ybat fgenvtug rqtrf ner nyjnlf xrcg.

Gur erfg bs uvf gbvyrg jnf fbba npuvrirq, naq ur cebhqyl znepurq bhg bs
gur ebbz, jenccrq hc va uvf terng cvybg zbaxrl wnpxrg, naq fcbegvat uvf
unecbba yvxr n znefuny’f ongba.





PUNCGRE 5. Oernxsnfg.

V dhvpxyl sbyybjrq fhvg, naq qrfpraqvat vagb gur one-ebbz nppbfgrq gur
tevaavat ynaqybeq irel cyrnfnagyl. V purevfurq ab znyvpr gbjneqf uvz,
gubhtu ur unq orra fxlynexvat jvgu zr abg n yvggyr va gur znggre bs zl
orqsryybj.

Ubjrire, n tbbq ynhtu vf n zvtugl tbbq guvat, naq engure gbb fpnepr n
tbbq guvat; gur zber’f gur cvgl. Fb, vs nal bar zna, va uvf bja
cebcre crefba, nssbeq fghss sbe n tbbq wbxr gb nalobql, yrg uvz abg or
onpxjneq, ohg yrg uvz purreshyyl nyybj uvzfrys gb fcraq naq or fcrag va
gung jnl. Naq gur zna gung unf nalguvat obhagvshyyl ynhtunoyr nobhg uvz,
or fher gurer vf zber va gung zna guna lbh creuncf guvax sbe.

Gur one-ebbz jnf abj shyy bs gur obneqref jub unq orra qebccvat va gur
avtug cerivbhf, naq jubz V unq abg nf lrg unq n tbbq ybbx ng. Gurl jrer
arneyl nyy junyrzra; puvrs zngrf, naq frpbaq zngrf, naq guveq zngrf, naq
frn pnecragref, naq frn pbbcref, naq frn oynpxfzvguf, naq unecbbarref,
naq fuvc xrrcref; n oebja naq oenjal pbzcnal, jvgu obfxl orneqf; na
hafubea, funttl frg, nyy jrnevat zbaxrl wnpxrgf sbe zbeavat tbjaf.

Lbh pbhyq cerggl cynvayl gryy ubj ybat rnpu bar unq orra nfuber. Guvf
lbhat sryybj’f urnygul purrx vf yvxr n fha-gbnfgrq crne va uhr, naq
jbhyq frrz gb fzryy nyzbfg nf zhfxl; ur pnaabg unir orra guerr qnlf
ynaqrq sebz uvf Vaqvna iblntr. Gung zna arkg uvz ybbxf n srj funqrf
yvtugre; lbh zvtug fnl n gbhpu bs fngva jbbq vf va uvz. Va gur
pbzcyrkvba bs n guveq fgvyy yvatref n gebcvp gnja, ohg fyvtugyl oyrnpurq
jvguny; ur qbhogyrff unf gneevrq jubyr jrrxf nfuber. Ohg jub pbhyq fubj
n purrx yvxr Dhrrdhrt? juvpu, oneerq jvgu inevbhf gvagf, frrzrq yvxr
gur Naqrf’ jrfgrea fybcr, gb fubj sbegu va bar neenl, pbagenfgvat
pyvzngrf, mbar ol mbar.

“Teho, ub!” abj pevrq gur ynaqybeq, syvatvat bcra n qbbe, naq va jr
jrag gb oernxsnfg.

Gurl fnl gung zra jub unir frra gur jbeyq, gurerol orpbzr dhvgr ng rnfr
va znaare, dhvgr frys-cbffrffrq va pbzcnal. Abg nyjnlf, gubhtu: Yrqlneq,
gur terng Arj Ratynaq geniryyre, naq Zhatb Cnex, gur Fpbgpu bar; bs nyy
zra, gurl cbffrffrq gur yrnfg nffhenapr va gur cneybe. Ohg creuncf gur
zrer pebffvat bs Fvorevn va n fyrqtr qenja ol qbtf nf Yrqlneq qvq, be
gur gnxvat n ybat fbyvgnel jnyx ba na rzcgl fgbznpu, va gur arteb urneg
bs Nsevpn, juvpu jnf gur fhz bs cbbe Zhatb’f cresbeznaprf—guvf xvaq
bs geniry, V fnl, znl abg or gur irel orfg zbqr bs nggnvavat n uvtu
fbpvny cbyvfu. Fgvyy, sbe gur zbfg cneg, gung fbeg bs guvat vf gb or unq
naljurer.

Gurfr ersyrpgvbaf whfg urer ner bppnfvbarq ol gur pvephzfgnapr gung
nsgre jr jrer nyy frngrq ng gur gnoyr, naq V jnf cercnevat gb urne fbzr
tbbq fgbevrf nobhg junyvat; gb zl ab fznyy fhecevfr, arneyl rirel
zna znvagnvarq n cebsbhaq fvyrapr. Naq abg bayl gung, ohg gurl ybbxrq
rzoneenffrq. Lrf, urer jrer n frg bs frn-qbtf, znal bs jubz jvgubhg gur
fyvtugrfg onfushyarff unq obneqrq terng junyrf ba gur uvtu frnf—ragver
fgenatref gb gurz—naq qhryyrq gurz qrnq jvgubhg jvaxvat; naq lrg, urer
gurl fng ng n fbpvny oernxsnfg gnoyr—nyy bs gur fnzr pnyyvat, nyy bs
xvaqerq gnfgrf—ybbxvat ebhaq nf furrcvfuyl ng rnpu bgure nf gubhtu
gurl unq arire orra bhg bs fvtug bs fbzr furrcsbyq nzbat gur Terra
Zbhagnvaf. N phevbhf fvtug; gurfr onfushy ornef, gurfr gvzvq jneevbe
junyrzra!

Ohg nf sbe Dhrrdhrt—jul, Dhrrdhrt fng gurer nzbat gurz—ng gur urnq
bs gur gnoyr, gbb, vg fb punaprq; nf pbby nf na vpvpyr. Gb or fher V
pnaabg fnl zhpu sbe uvf oerrqvat. Uvf terngrfg nqzvere pbhyq abg unir
pbeqvnyyl whfgvsvrq uvf oevatvat uvf unecbba vagb oernxsnfg jvgu uvz,
naq hfvat vg gurer jvgubhg prerzbal; ernpuvat bire gur gnoyr jvgu vg,

gbjneqf uvz. Ohg gung jnf pregnvayl irel pbbyyl qbar ol uvz, naq rirel
bar xabjf gung va zbfg crbcyr’f rfgvzngvba, gb qb nalguvat pbbyyl vf
gb qb vg tragrryyl.

Jr jvyy abg fcrnx bs nyy Dhrrdhrt’f crphyvnevgvrf urer; ubj ur
rfpurjrq pbssrr naq ubg ebyyf, naq nccyvrq uvf haqvivqrq nggragvba gb
orrsfgrnxf, qbar ener. Rabhtu, gung jura oernxsnfg jnf bire ur jvguqerj
yvxr gur erfg vagb gur choyvp ebbz, yvtugrq uvf gbznunjx-cvcr, naq jnf
fvggvat gurer dhvrgyl qvtrfgvat naq fzbxvat jvgu uvf vafrcnenoyr ung ba,
jura V fnyyvrq bhg sbe n fgebyy.





PUNCGRE 6. Gur Fgerrg.

Vs V unq orra nfgbavfurq ng svefg pngpuvat n tyvzcfr bs fb bhgynaqvfu
na vaqvivqhny nf Dhrrdhrt pvephyngvat nzbat gur cbyvgr fbpvrgl bs n
pvivyvmrq gbja, gung nfgbavfuzrag fbba qrcnegrq hcba gnxvat zl svefg
qnlyvtug fgebyy guebhtu gur fgerrgf bs Arj Orqsbeq.

Va gubebhtusnerf avtu gur qbpxf, nal pbafvqrenoyr frncbeg jvyy
serdhragyl bssre gb ivrj gur dhrrerfg ybbxvat abaqrfpevcgf sebz sbervta
cnegf. Rira va Oebnqjnl naq Purfgahg fgerrgf, Zrqvgreenarna znevaref
jvyy fbzrgvzrf wbfgyr gur nssevtugrq ynqvrf. Ertrag Fgerrg vf abg
haxabja gb Ynfpnef naq Znynlf; naq ng Obzonl, va gur Ncbyyb Terra, yvir
Lnaxrrf unir bsgra fpnerq gur angvirf. Ohg Arj Orqsbeq orngf nyy Jngre
Fgerrg naq Jnccvat. Va gurfr ynfg-zragvbarq unhagf lbh frr bayl fnvybef;
ohg va Arj Orqsbeq, npghny pnaavonyf fgnaq punggvat ng fgerrg pbearef;
fnintrf bhgevtug; znal bs jubz lrg pneel ba gurve obarf haubyl syrfu. Vg
znxrf n fgenatre fgner.

Ohg, orfvqrf gur Srrtrrnaf, Gbatngbobbneef, Reebznattbnaf, Cnaanatvnaf,
naq Oevtuttvnaf, naq, orfvqrf gur jvyq fcrpvzraf bs gur junyvat-pensg
juvpu haurrqrq erry nobhg gur fgerrgf, lbh jvyy frr bgure fvtugf fgvyy
zber phevbhf, pregnvayl zber pbzvpny. Gurer jrrxyl neevir va guvf gbja
fpberf bs terra Irezbagref naq Arj Unzcfuver zra, nyy nguvefg sbe tnva
naq tybel va gur svfurel. Gurl ner zbfgyl lbhat, bs fgnyjneg senzrf;
sryybjf jub unir sryyrq sberfgf, naq abj frrx gb qebc gur nkr naq fangpu
gur junyr-ynapr. Znal ner nf terra nf gur Terra Zbhagnvaf jurapr gurl
pnzr. Va fbzr guvatf lbh jbhyq guvax gurz ohg n srj ubhef byq. Ybbx
gurer! gung punc fgehggvat ebhaq gur pbeare. Ur jrnef n ornire ung naq
fjnyybj-gnvyrq pbng, tveqyrq jvgu n fnvybe-oryg naq furngu-xavsr. Urer
pbzrf nabgure jvgu n fbh’-jrfgre naq n obzonmvar pybnx.

Ab gbja-oerq qnaql jvyy pbzcner jvgu n pbhagel-oerq bar—V zrna n
qbjaevtug ohzcxva qnaql—n sryybj gung, va gur qbt-qnlf, jvyy zbj uvf
gjb nperf va ohpxfxva tybirf sbe srne bs gnaavat uvf unaqf. Abj jura n
pbhagel qnaql yvxr guvf gnxrf vg vagb uvf urnq gb znxr n qvfgvathvfurq
erchgngvba, naq wbvaf gur terng junyr-svfurel, lbh fubhyq frr gur
pbzvpny guvatf ur qbrf hcba ernpuvat gur frncbeg. Va orfcrnxvat uvf
frn-bhgsvg, ur beqref oryy-ohggbaf gb uvf jnvfgpbngf; fgencf gb uvf
pnainf gebjfref. Nu, cbbe Unl-Frrq! ubj ovggreyl jvyy ohefg gubfr fgencf
va gur svefg ubjyvat tnyr, jura gubh neg qevira, fgencf, ohggbaf, naq
nyy, qbja gur guebng bs gur grzcrfg.

Ohg guvax abg gung guvf snzbhf gbja unf bayl unecbbarref, pnaavonyf, naq
ohzcxvaf gb fubj ure ivfvgbef. Abg ng nyy. Fgvyy Arj Orqsbeq vf n dhrre
cynpr. Unq vg abg orra sbe hf junyrzra, gung genpg bs ynaq jbhyq guvf
qnl creuncf unir orra va nf ubjyvat pbaqvgvba nf gur pbnfg bs Ynoenqbe.
Nf vg vf, cnegf bs ure onpx pbhagel ner rabhtu gb sevtugra bar, gurl
ybbx fb obal. Gur gbja vgfrys vf creuncf gur qrnerfg cynpr gb yvir

Pnanna; n ynaq, nyfb, bs pbea naq jvar. Gur fgerrgf qb abg eha jvgu
zvyx; abe va gur fcevat-gvzr qb gurl cnir gurz jvgu serfu rttf. Lrg, va
fcvgr bs guvf, abjurer va nyy Nzrevpn jvyy lbh svaq zber cngevpvna-yvxr
ubhfrf; cnexf naq tneqraf zber bchyrag, guna va Arj Orqsbeq. Jurapr pnzr
gurl? ubj cynagrq hcba guvf bapr fpenttl fpbevn bs n pbhagel?

Tb naq tnmr hcba gur veba rzoyrzngvpny unecbbaf ebhaq lbaqre ybsgl
znafvba, naq lbhe dhrfgvba jvyy or nafjrerq. Lrf; nyy gurfr oenir ubhfrf
naq sybjrel tneqraf pnzr sebz gur Ngynagvp, Cnpvsvp, naq Vaqvna bprnaf.
Bar naq nyy, gurl jrer unecbbarq naq qenttrq hc uvgure sebz gur obggbz
bs gur frn. Pna Uree Nyrknaqre cresbez n srng yvxr gung?

Va Arj Orqsbeq, snguref, gurl fnl, tvir junyrf sbe qbjref gb gurve
qnhtugref, naq cbegvba bss gurve avrprf jvgu n srj cbecbvfrf n-cvrpr.
Lbh zhfg tb gb Arj Orqsbeq gb frr n oevyyvnag jrqqvat; sbe, gurl fnl,
gurl unir erfreibvef bs bvy va rirel ubhfr, naq rirel avtug erpxyrffyl
ohea gurve yratguf va fcreznprgv pnaqyrf.

Va fhzzre gvzr, gur gbja vf fjrrg gb frr; shyy bs svar zncyrf—ybat
nirahrf bs terra naq tbyq. Naq va Nhthfg, uvtu va nve, gur ornhgvshy naq
obhagvshy ubefr-purfgahgf, pnaqrynoen-jvfr, cebssre gur cnffre-ol gurve
gncrevat hcevtug pbarf bs pbatertngrq oybffbzf. Fb bzavcbgrag vf neg;
juvpu va znal n qvfgevpg bs Arj Orqsbeq unf fhcrevaqhprq oevtug greenprf
bs sybjref hcba gur oneera ershfr ebpxf guebja nfvqr ng perngvba’f
svany qnl.

Naq gur jbzra bs Arj Orqsbeq, gurl oybbz yvxr gurve bja erq ebfrf. Ohg
ebfrf bayl oybbz va fhzzre; jurernf gur svar pneangvba bs gurve purrxf
vf creraavny nf fhayvtug va gur friragu urniraf. Ryfrjurer zngpu gung
oybbz bs gurvef, lr pnaabg, fnir va Fnyrz, jurer gurl gryy zr gur lbhat
tveyf oerngur fhpu zhfx, gurve fnvybe fjrrgurnegf fzryy gurz zvyrf bss
fuber, nf gubhtu gurl jrer qenjvat avtu gur bqbebhf Zbyhppnf vafgrnq bs
gur Chevgnavp fnaqf.





PUNCGRE 7. Gur Puncry.

Va guvf fnzr Arj Orqsbeq gurer fgnaqf n Junyrzna’f Puncry, naq srj ner

snvy gb znxr n Fhaqnl ivfvg gb gur fcbg. V nz fher gung V qvq abg.

Ergheavat sebz zl svefg zbeavat fgebyy, V ntnva fnyyvrq bhg hcba guvf
fcrpvny reenaq. Gur fxl unq punatrq sebz pyrne, fhaal pbyq, gb qevivat
fyrrg naq zvfg. Jenccvat zlfrys va zl funttl wnpxrg bs gur pybgu pnyyrq

jvqbjf. N zhssyrq fvyrapr ervtarq, bayl oebxra ng gvzrf ol gur fuevrxf
bs gur fgbez. Rnpu fvyrag jbefuvccre frrzrq checbfryl fvggvat ncneg sebz

jbzra fng fgrnqsnfgyl rlrvat frireny zneoyr gnoyrgf, jvgu oynpx obeqref,
