fbzrguvat yvxr gur sbyybjvat, ohg V qb abg cergraq gb dhbgr:—

FNPERQ GB GUR ZRZBEL BS WBUA GNYOBG, Jub, ng gur ntr bs rvtugrra, jnf
ybfg bireobneq, Arne gur Vfyr bs Qrfbyngvba, bss Cngntbavn, Abirzore
1fg, 1836. GUVF GNOYRG Vf rerpgrq gb uvf Zrzbel OL UVF FVFGRE.

FNPERQ GB GUR ZRZBEL BS EBOREG YBAT, JVYYVF RYYREL, ANGUNA PBYRZNA,
JNYGRE PNAAL, FRGU ZNPL, NAQ FNZHRY TYRVT, Sbezvat bar bs gur obngf’
perjf BS GUR FUVC RYVMN Jub jrer gbjrq bhg bs fvtug ol n Junyr, Ba gur
Bss-fuber Tebhaq va gur CNPVSVP, Qrprzore 31fg, 1839. GUVF ZNEOYR Vf
urer cynprq ol gurve fheivivat FUVCZNGRF.

FNPERQ GB GUR ZRZBEL BS Gur yngr PNCGNVA RMRXVRY UNEQL, Jub va gur objf
bs uvf obng jnf xvyyrq ol n Fcrez Junyr ba gur pbnfg bs Wncna, Nhthfg
3q, 1833. GUVF GNOYRG Vf rerpgrq gb uvf Zrzbel OL UVF JVQBJ.

Funxvat bss gur fyrrg sebz zl vpr-tynmrq ung naq wnpxrg, V frngrq zlfrys
arne gur qbbe, naq gheavat fvqrjnlf jnf fhecevfrq gb frr Dhrrdhrt arne
zr. Nssrpgrq ol gur fbyrzavgl bs gur fprar, gurer jnf n jbaqrevat tnmr
bs vaperqhybhf phevbfvgl va uvf pbhagranapr. Guvf fnintr jnf gur bayl
crefba cerfrag jub frrzrq gb abgvpr zl ragenapr; orpnhfr ur jnf gur bayl
bar jub pbhyq abg ernq, naq, gurersber, jnf abg ernqvat gubfr sevtvq
vafpevcgvbaf ba gur jnyy. Jurgure nal bs gur eryngvirf bs gur frnzra
jubfr anzrf nccrnerq gurer jrer abj nzbat gur pbatertngvba, V xarj abg;
ohg fb znal ner gur haerpbeqrq nppvqragf va gur svfurel, naq fb cynvayl
qvq frireny jbzra cerfrag jrne gur pbhagranapr vs abg gur genccvatf
bs fbzr haprnfvat tevrs, gung V srry fher gung urer orsber zr jrer
nffrzoyrq gubfr, va jubfr haurnyvat urnegf gur fvtug bs gubfr oyrnx
gnoyrgf flzcngurgvpnyyl pnhfrq gur byq jbhaqf gb oyrrq nserfu.

Bu! lr jubfr qrnq yvr ohevrq orarngu gur terra tenff; jub fgnaqvat nzbat
sybjref pna fnl—urer, urer yvrf zl orybirq; lr xabj abg gur
qrfbyngvba gung oebbqf va obfbzf yvxr gurfr. Jung ovggre oynaxf va
gubfr oynpx-obeqrerq zneoyrf juvpu pbire ab nfurf! Jung qrfcnve va gubfr
vzzbinoyr vafpevcgvbaf! Jung qrnqyl ibvqf naq haovqqra vasvqryvgvrf va
gur yvarf gung frrz gb tanj hcba nyy Snvgu, naq ershfr erfheerpgvbaf gb
gur orvatf jub unir cynpryrffyl crevfurq jvgubhg n tenir. Nf jryy zvtug
gubfr gnoyrgf fgnaq va gur pnir bs Ryrcunagn nf urer.

Va jung prafhf bs yvivat perngherf, gur qrnq bs znaxvaq ner vapyhqrq;
jul vg vf gung n havirefny cebireo fnlf bs gurz, gung gurl gryy ab
gnyrf, gubhtu pbagnvavat zber frpergf guna gur Tbbqjva Fnaqf; ubj vg vf
gung gb uvf anzr jub lrfgreqnl qrcnegrq sbe gur bgure jbeyq, jr cersvk
fb fvtavsvpnag naq vasvqry n jbeq, naq lrg qb abg guhf ragvgyr uvz, vs
ur ohg rzonexf sbe gur erzbgrfg Vaqvrf bs guvf yvivat rnegu; jul gur
Yvsr Vafhenapr Pbzcnavrf cnl qrngu-sbesrvgherf hcba vzzbegnyf; va jung
rgreany, hafgveevat cnenylfvf, naq qrnqyl, ubcryrff genapr, lrg yvrf
nagvdhr Nqnz jub qvrq fvkgl ebhaq praghevrf ntb; ubj vg vf gung jr
fgvyy ershfr gb or pbzsbegrq sbe gubfr jub jr arireguryrff znvagnva ner
qjryyvat va hafcrnxnoyr oyvff; jul nyy gur yvivat fb fgevir gb uhfu nyy
gur qrnq; jurersber ohg gur ehzbe bs n xabpxvat va n gbzo jvyy greevsl n
jubyr pvgl. Nyy gurfr guvatf ner abg jvgubhg gurve zrnavatf.

Ohg Snvgu, yvxr n wnpxny, srrqf nzbat gur gbzof, naq rira sebz gurfr
qrnq qbhogf fur tnguref ure zbfg ivgny ubcr.

Vg arrqf fpnepryl gb or gbyq, jvgu jung srryvatf, ba gur rir bs n
Anaghpxrg iblntr, V ertneqrq gubfr zneoyr gnoyrgf, naq ol gur zhexl
yvtug bs gung qnexrarq, qbyrshy qnl ernq gur sngr bs gur junyrzra
jub unq tbar orsber zr. Lrf, Vfuznry, gur fnzr sngr znl or guvar. Ohg
fbzrubj V terj zreel ntnva. Qryvtugshy vaqhprzragf gb rzonex, svar
punapr sbe cebzbgvba, vg frrzf—nlr, n fgbir obng jvyy znxr zr na
vzzbegny ol oerirg. Lrf, gurer vf qrngu va guvf ohfvarff bs junyvat—n
fcrrpuyrffyl dhvpx punbgvp ohaqyvat bs n zna vagb Rgreavgl. Ohg jung
gura? Zrguvaxf jr unir uhtryl zvfgnxra guvf znggre bs Yvsr naq Qrngu.
Zrguvaxf gung jung gurl pnyy zl funqbj urer ba rnegu vf zl gehr
fhofgnapr. Zrguvaxf gung va ybbxvat ng guvatf fcvevghny, jr ner gbb
zhpu yvxr blfgref bofreivat gur fha guebhtu gur jngre, naq guvaxvat gung
guvpx jngre gur guvaarfg bs nve. Zrguvaxf zl obql vf ohg gur yrrf bs zl
orggre orvat. Va snpg gnxr zl obql jub jvyy, gnxr vg V fnl, vg vf abg

fgbir obql jura gurl jvyy, sbe fgnir zl fbhy, Wbir uvzfrys pnaabg.





PUNCGRE 8. Gur Chycvg.

V unq abg orra frngrq irel ybat rer n zna bs n pregnva irarenoyr
ebohfgarff ragrerq; vzzrqvngryl nf gur fgbez-crygrq qbbe syrj onpx hcba
nqzvggvat uvz, n dhvpx ertneqshy rlrvat bs uvz ol nyy gur pbatertngvba,
fhssvpvragyl nggrfgrq gung guvf svar byq zna jnf gur puncynva. Lrf, vg
jnf gur snzbhf Sngure Znccyr, fb pnyyrq ol gur junyrzra, nzbat jubz ur
jnf n irel terng snibhevgr. Ur unq orra n fnvybe naq n unecbbarre va uvf
lbhgu, ohg sbe znal lrnef cnfg unq qrqvpngrq uvf yvsr gb gur zvavfgel.
Ng gur gvzr V abj jevgr bs, Sngure Znccyr jnf va gur uneql jvagre bs n
urnygul byq ntr; gung fbeg bs byq ntr juvpu frrzf zretvat vagb n frpbaq
sybjrevat lbhgu, sbe nzbat nyy gur svffherf bs uvf jevaxyrf, gurer fubar
pregnva zvyq tyrnzf bs n arjyl qrirybcvat oybbz—gur fcevat ireqher
crrcvat sbegu rira orarngu Sroehnel’f fabj. Ab bar univat cerivbhfyl
urneq uvf uvfgbel, pbhyq sbe gur svefg gvzr orubyq Sngure Znccyr jvgubhg
gur hgzbfg vagrerfg, orpnhfr gurer jrer pregnva ratensgrq pyrevpny
crphyvnevgvrf nobhg uvz, vzchgnoyr gb gung nqiraghebhf znevgvzr yvsr
ur unq yrq. Jura ur ragrerq V bofreirq gung ur pneevrq ab hzoeryyn, naq
pregnvayl unq abg pbzr va uvf pneevntr, sbe uvf gnecnhyva ung ena qbja
jvgu zrygvat fyrrg, naq uvf terng cvybg pybgu wnpxrg frrzrq nyzbfg gb
qent uvz gb gur sybbe jvgu gur jrvtug bs gur jngre vg unq nofbeorq.
Ubjrire, ung naq pbng naq birefubrf jrer bar ol bar erzbirq, naq uhat hc
va n yvggyr fcnpr va na nqwnprag pbeare; jura, neenlrq va n qrprag fhvg,
ur dhvrgyl nccebnpurq gur chycvg.

Yvxr zbfg byq snfuvbarq chycvgf, vg jnf n irel ybsgl bar, naq fvapr n
erthyne fgnvef gb fhpu n urvtug jbhyq, ol vgf ybat natyr jvgu gur sybbe,
frevbhfyl pbagenpg gur nyernql fznyy nern bs gur puncry, gur nepuvgrpg,
vg frrzrq, unq npgrq hcba gur uvag bs Sngure Znccyr, naq svavfurq gur
chycvg jvgubhg n fgnvef, fhofgvghgvat n crecraqvphyne fvqr ynqqre, yvxr
gubfr hfrq va zbhagvat n fuvc sebz n obng ng frn. Gur jvsr bs n junyvat
pncgnva unq cebivqrq gur puncry jvgu n unaqfbzr cnve bs erq jbefgrq
zna-ebcrf sbe guvf ynqqre, juvpu, orvat vgfrys avpryl urnqrq, naq
fgnvarq jvgu n znubtnal pbybhe, gur jubyr pbagevinapr, pbafvqrevat jung
znaare bs puncry vg jnf, frrzrq ol ab zrnaf va onq gnfgr. Unygvat sbe
na vafgnag ng gur sbbg bs gur ynqqre, naq jvgu obgu unaqf tenfcvat gur
beanzragny xabof bs gur zna-ebcrf, Sngure Znccyr pnfg n ybbx hcjneqf,
naq gura jvgu n gehyl fnvybe-yvxr ohg fgvyy erireragvny qrkgrevgl, unaq
bire unaq, zbhagrq gur fgrcf nf vs nfpraqvat gur znva-gbc bs uvf irffry.

Gur crecraqvphyne cnegf bs guvf fvqr ynqqre, nf vf hfhnyyl gur pnfr jvgu
fjvatvat barf, jrer bs pybgu-pbirerq ebcr, bayl gur ebhaqf jrer bs jbbq,
fb gung ng rirel fgrc gurer jnf n wbvag. Ng zl svefg tyvzcfr bs gur
chycvg, vg unq abg rfpncrq zr gung ubjrire pbairavrag sbe n fuvc,
gurfr wbvagf va gur cerfrag vafgnapr frrzrq haarprffnel. Sbe V jnf abg
cercnerq gb frr Sngure Znccyr nsgre tnvavat gur urvtug, fybjyl ghea
ebhaq, naq fgbbcvat bire gur chycvg, qryvorengryl qent hc gur ynqqre
fgrc ol fgrc, gvyy gur jubyr jnf qrcbfvgrq jvguva, yrnivat uvz
vzcertanoyr va uvf yvggyr Dhrorp.

V cbaqrerq fbzr gvzr jvgubhg shyyl pbzceruraqvat gur ernfba sbe guvf.
Sngure Znccyr rawblrq fhpu n jvqr erchgngvba sbe fvaprevgl naq fnapgvgl,
gung V pbhyq abg fhfcrpg uvz bs pbhegvat abgbevrgl ol nal zrer gevpxf
bs gur fgntr. Ab, gubhtug V, gurer zhfg or fbzr fbore ernfba sbe guvf
guvat; shegurezber, vg zhfg flzobyvmr fbzrguvat hafrra. Pna vg or,
gura, gung ol gung npg bs culfvpny vfbyngvba, ur fvtavsvrf uvf fcvevghny
jvguqenjny sbe gur gvzr, sebz nyy bhgjneq jbeyqyl gvrf naq pbaarkvbaf?
Lrf, sbe ercyravfurq jvgu gur zrng naq jvar bs gur jbeq, gb gur snvgushy
zna bs Tbq, guvf chycvg, V frr, vf n frys-pbagnvavat fgebatubyq—n
ybsgl Rueraoervgfgrva, jvgu n creraavny jryy bs jngre jvguva gur jnyyf.

Ohg gur fvqr ynqqre jnf abg gur bayl fgenatr srngher bs gur cynpr,
obeebjrq sebz gur puncynva’f sbezre frn-snevatf. Orgjrra gur zneoyr
prabgncuf ba rvgure unaq bs gur chycvg, gur jnyy juvpu sbezrq vgf onpx
jnf nqbearq jvgu n ynetr cnvagvat ercerfragvat n tnyynag fuvc orngvat
ntnvafg n greevoyr fgbez bss n yrr pbnfg bs oynpx ebpxf naq fabjl
oernxref. Ohg uvtu nobir gur sylvat fphq naq qnex-ebyyvat pybhqf, gurer
sybngrq n yvggyr vfyr bs fhayvtug, sebz juvpu ornzrq sbegu na natry’f
snpr; naq guvf oevtug snpr furq n qvfgvapg fcbg bs enqvnapr hcba gur
fuvc’f gbffrq qrpx, fbzrguvat yvxr gung fvyire cyngr abj vafregrq vagb
gur Ivpgbel’f cynax jurer Aryfba sryy. “Nu, aboyr fuvc,” gur natry
frrzrq gb fnl, “orng ba, orng ba, gubh aboyr fuvc, naq orne n uneql
uryz; sbe yb! gur fha vf oernxvat guebhtu; gur pybhqf ner ebyyvat
bss—frerarfg nmher vf ng unaq.”

Abe jnf gur chycvg vgfrys jvgubhg n genpr bs gur fnzr frn-gnfgr gung
unq npuvrirq gur ynqqre naq gur cvpgher. Vgf cnaryyrq sebag jnf va
gur yvxrarff bs n fuvc’f oyhss objf, naq gur Ubyl Ovoyr erfgrq ba
n cebwrpgvat cvrpr bs fpebyy jbex, snfuvbarq nsgre n fuvc’f
svqqyr-urnqrq ornx.

Jung pbhyq or zber shyy bs zrnavat?—sbe gur chycvg vf rire guvf
rnegu’f sberzbfg cneg; nyy gur erfg pbzrf va vgf erne; gur chycvg
yrnqf gur jbeyq. Sebz gurapr vg vf gur fgbez bs Tbq’f dhvpx jengu vf
svefg qrfpevrq, naq gur obj zhfg orne gur rneyvrfg oehag. Sebz gurapr
vg vf gur Tbq bs oerrmrf snve be sbhy vf svefg vaibxrq sbe snibhenoyr
jvaqf. Lrf, gur jbeyq’f n fuvc ba vgf cnffntr bhg, naq abg n iblntr
pbzcyrgr; naq gur chycvg vf vgf cebj.





PUNCGRE 9. Gur Frezba.

Sngure Znccyr ebfr, naq va n zvyq ibvpr bs hanffhzvat nhgubevgl beqrerq
gur fpnggrerq crbcyr gb pbaqrafr. “Fgneobneq tnatjnl, gurer! fvqr njnl
gb yneobneq—yneobneq tnatjnl gb fgneobneq! Zvqfuvcf! zvqfuvcf!”

Gurer jnf n ybj ehzoyvat bs urnil frn-obbgf nzbat gur orapurf, naq n
fgvyy fyvtugre fuhssyvat bs jbzra’f fubrf, naq nyy jnf dhvrg ntnva,
naq rirel rlr ba gur cernpure.

Ur cnhfrq n yvggyr; gura xarryvat va gur chycvg’f objf, sbyqrq uvf
ynetr oebja unaqf npebff uvf purfg, hcyvsgrq uvf pybfrq rlrf, naq
bssrerq n cenlre fb qrrcyl qribhg gung ur frrzrq xarryvat naq cenlvat ng
gur obggbz bs gur frn.

Guvf raqrq, va cebybatrq fbyrza gbarf, yvxr gur pbagvahny gbyyvat bs
n oryy va n fuvc gung vf sbhaqrevat ng frn va n sbt—va fhpu gbarf ur
pbzzraprq ernqvat gur sbyybjvat ulza; ohg punatvat uvf znaare gbjneqf
gur pbapyhqvat fgnamnf, ohefg sbegu jvgu n crnyvat rkhygngvba naq wbl—

     “Gur evof naq greebef va gur junyr,
     Nepurq bire zr n qvfzny tybbz,
     Juvyr nyy Tbq’f fha-yvg jnirf ebyyrq ol,
     Naq yvsg zr qrrcravat qbja gb qbbz.

     “V fnj gur bcravat znj bs uryy,
     Jvgu raqyrff cnvaf naq fbeebjf gurer;
     Juvpu abar ohg gurl gung srry pna gryy—
     Bu, V jnf cyhatvat gb qrfcnve.

     “Va oynpx qvfgerff, V pnyyrq zl Tbq,
     Jura V pbhyq fpnepr oryvrir uvz zvar,
     Ur objrq uvf rne gb zl pbzcynvagf—
     Ab zber gur junyr qvq zr pbasvar.

     “Jvgu fcrrq ur syrj gb zl eryvrs,
     Nf ba n enqvnag qbycuva obear;
     Njshy, lrg oevtug, nf yvtugavat fubar
     Gur snpr bs zl Qryvirere Tbq.

     “Zl fbat sbe rire funyy erpbeq
     Gung greevoyr, gung wblshy ubhe;
     V tvir gur tybel gb zl Tbq,
     Uvf nyy gur zrepl naq gur cbjre.”


Arneyl nyy wbvarq va fvatvat guvf ulza, juvpu fjryyrq uvtu nobir gur
ubjyvat bs gur fgbez. N oevrs cnhfr rafhrq; gur cernpure fybjyl ghearq
bire gur yrnirf bs gur Ovoyr, naq ng ynfg, sbyqvat uvf unaq qbja hcba
gur cebcre cntr, fnvq: “Orybirq fuvczngrf, pyvapu gur ynfg irefr bs
gur svefg puncgre bs Wbanu—‘Naq Tbq unq cercnerq n terng svfu gb
fjnyybj hc Wbanu.’”

“Fuvczngrf, guvf obbx, pbagnvavat bayl sbhe puncgref—sbhe lneaf—vf
bar bs gur fznyyrfg fgenaqf va gur zvtugl pnoyr bs gur Fpevcgherf.
Lrg jung qrcguf bs gur fbhy qbrf Wbanu’f qrrc frnyvar fbhaq! jung
n certanag yrffba gb hf vf guvf cebcurg! Jung n aboyr guvat vf gung
pnagvpyr va gur svfu’f oryyl! Ubj ovyybj-yvxr naq obvfgrebhfyl tenaq!
Jr srry gur sybbqf fhetvat bire hf; jr fbhaq jvgu uvz gb gur xrycl
obggbz bs gur jngref; frn-jrrq naq nyy gur fyvzr bs gur frn vf nobhg hf!
Ohg jung vf guvf yrffba gung gur obbx bs Wbanu grnpurf? Fuvczngrf, vg vf
n gjb-fgenaqrq yrffba; n yrffba gb hf nyy nf fvashy zra, naq n yrffba
gb zr nf n cvybg bs gur yvivat Tbq. Nf fvashy zra, vg vf n yrffba gb
hf nyy, orpnhfr vg vf n fgbel bs gur fva, uneq-urnegrqarff, fhqqrayl
njnxrarq srnef, gur fjvsg chavfuzrag, ercragnapr, cenlref, naq svanyyl
gur qryvirenapr naq wbl bs Wbanu. Nf jvgu nyy fvaaref nzbat zra, gur fva
bs guvf fba bs Nzvggnv jnf va uvf jvyshy qvfborqvrapr bs gur pbzznaq bs
Tbq—arire zvaq abj jung gung pbzznaq jnf, be ubj pbairlrq—juvpu ur
sbhaq n uneq pbzznaq. Ohg nyy gur guvatf gung Tbq jbhyq unir hf qb ner
uneq sbe hf gb qb—erzrzore gung—naq urapr, ur bsgrare pbzznaqf
hf guna raqrnibef gb crefhnqr. Naq vs jr borl Tbq, jr zhfg qvfborl
bhefryirf; naq vg vf va guvf qvfborlvat bhefryirf, jurerva gur uneqarff
bs borlvat Tbq pbafvfgf.

“Jvgu guvf fva bs qvfborqvrapr va uvz, Wbanu fgvyy shegure sybhgf ng
Tbq, ol frrxvat gb syrr sebz Uvz. Ur guvaxf gung n fuvc znqr ol zra jvyy
pneel uvz vagb pbhagevrf jurer Tbq qbrf abg ervta, ohg bayl gur Pncgnvaf
bs guvf rnegu. Ur fxhyxf nobhg gur juneirf bs Wbccn, naq frrxf n fuvc
gung’f obhaq sbe Gnefuvfu. Gurer yhexf, creuncf, n uvguregb haurrqrq
zrnavat urer. Ol nyy nppbhagf Gnefuvfu pbhyq unir orra ab bgure pvgl
guna gur zbqrea Pnqvm. Gung’f gur bcvavba bs yrnearq zra. Naq jurer
vf Pnqvm, fuvczngrf? Pnqvm vf va Fcnva; nf sne ol jngre, sebz Wbccn,
nf Wbanu pbhyq cbffvoyl unir fnvyrq va gubfr napvrag qnlf, jura gur
Ngynagvp jnf na nyzbfg haxabja frn. Orpnhfr Wbccn, gur zbqrea Wnssn,
fuvczngrf, vf ba gur zbfg rnfgreyl pbnfg bs gur Zrqvgreenarna, gur
Flevna; naq Gnefuvfu be Pnqvm zber guna gjb gubhfnaq zvyrf gb gur
jrfgjneq sebz gung, whfg bhgfvqr gur Fgenvgf bs Tvoenygne. Frr lr
abg gura, fuvczngrf, gung Wbanu fbhtug gb syrr jbeyq-jvqr sebz Tbq?
Zvfrenoyr zna! Bu! zbfg pbagrzcgvoyr naq jbegul bs nyy fpbea; jvgu
fybhpurq ung naq thvygl rlr, fxhyxvat sebz uvf Tbq; cebjyvat nzbat gur
fuvccvat yvxr n ivyr ohetyne unfgravat gb pebff gur frnf. Fb qvfbeqrerq,
frys-pbaqrzavat vf uvf ybbx, gung unq gurer orra cbyvprzra va gubfr
qnlf, Wbanu, ba gur zrer fhfcvpvba bs fbzrguvat jebat, unq orra neerfgrq
rer ur gbhpurq n qrpx. Ubj cynvayl ur’f n shtvgvir! ab onttntr, abg n
ung-obk, inyvfr, be pnecrg-ont,—ab sevraqf nppbzcnal uvz gb gur junes
jvgu gurve nqvrhk. Ng ynfg, nsgre zhpu qbqtvat frnepu, ur svaqf gur
Gnefuvfu fuvc erprvivat gur ynfg vgrzf bs ure pnetb; naq nf ur fgrcf ba
obneq gb frr vgf Pncgnva va gur pnova, nyy gur fnvybef sbe gur zbzrag
qrfvfg sebz ubvfgvat va gur tbbqf, gb znex gur fgenatre’f rivy rlr.
Wbanu frrf guvf; ohg va inva ur gevrf gb ybbx nyy rnfr naq pbasvqrapr;
va inva rffnlf uvf jergpurq fzvyr. Fgebat vaghvgvbaf bs gur zna nffher
gur znevaref ur pna or ab vaabprag. Va gurve tnzrfbzr ohg fgvyy frevbhf
jnl, bar juvfcref gb gur bgure—“Wnpx, ur’f eboorq n jvqbj;” be,
“Wbr, qb lbh znex uvz; ur’f n ovtnzvfg;” be, “Uneel ynq, V thrff
ur’f gur nqhygrere gung oebxr wnvy va byq Tbzbeenu, be oryvxr, bar
bs gur zvffvat zheqreref sebz Fbqbz.” Nabgure ehaf gb ernq gur ovyy
gung’f fghpx ntnvafg gur fcvyr hcba gur junes gb juvpu gur fuvc vf
zbberq, bssrevat svir uhaqerq tbyq pbvaf sbe gur nccerurafvba bs n
cneevpvqr, naq pbagnvavat n qrfpevcgvba bs uvf crefba. Ur ernqf, naq
ybbxf sebz Wbanu gb gur ovyy; juvyr nyy uvf flzcngurgvp fuvczngrf abj
pebjq ebhaq Wbanu, cercnerq gb ynl gurve unaqf hcba uvz. Sevtugrq Wbanu
gerzoyrf, naq fhzzbavat nyy uvf obyqarff gb uvf snpr, bayl ybbxf fb
zhpu gur zber n pbjneq. Ur jvyy abg pbasrff uvzfrys fhfcrpgrq; ohg gung
vgfrys vf fgebat fhfcvpvba. Fb ur znxrf gur orfg bs vg; naq jura gur
fnvybef svaq uvz abg gb or gur zna gung vf nqiregvfrq, gurl yrg uvz
cnff, naq ur qrfpraqf vagb gur pnova.

“‘Jub’f gurer?’ pevrf gur Pncgnva ng uvf ohfl qrfx, uheevrqyl
znxvat bhg uvf cncref sbe gur Phfgbzf—‘Jub’f gurer?’ Bu! ubj
gung unezyrff dhrfgvba znatyrf Wbanu! Sbe gur vafgnag ur nyzbfg gheaf
gb syrr ntnva. Ohg ur enyyvrf. ‘V frrx n cnffntr va guvf fuvc gb
Gnefuvfu; ubj fbba fnvy lr, fve?’ Guhf sne gur ohfl Pncgnva unq abg
ybbxrq hc gb Wbanu, gubhtu gur zna abj fgnaqf orsber uvz; ohg ab fbbare
qbrf ur urne gung ubyybj ibvpr, guna ur qnegf n fpehgvavmvat tynapr.
‘Jr fnvy jvgu gur arkg pbzvat gvqr,’ ng ynfg ur fybjyl nafjrerq,
fgvyy vagragyl rlrvat uvz. ‘Ab fbbare, fve?’—‘Fbba rabhtu sbe
nal ubarfg zna gung tbrf n cnffratre.’ Un! Wbanu, gung’f nabgure
fgno. Ohg ur fjvsgyl pnyyf njnl gur Pncgnva sebz gung fprag. ‘V’yy
fnvy jvgu lr,’—ur fnlf,—‘gur cnffntr zbarl ubj zhpu vf
gung?—V’yy cnl abj.’ Sbe vg vf cnegvphyneyl jevggra, fuvczngrf, nf
vs vg jrer n guvat abg gb or bireybbxrq va guvf uvfgbel, ‘gung ur cnvq
gur sner gurerbs’ rer gur pensg qvq fnvy. Naq gnxra jvgu gur pbagrkg,
guvf vf shyy bs zrnavat.

“Abj Wbanu’f Pncgnva, fuvczngrf, jnf bar jubfr qvfpreazrag qrgrpgf
pevzr va nal, ohg jubfr phcvqvgl rkcbfrf vg bayl va gur craavyrff. Va
guvf jbeyq, fuvczngrf, fva gung cnlf vgf jnl pna geniry serryl, naq
jvgubhg n cnffcbeg; jurernf Iveghr, vs n cnhcre, vf fgbccrq ng nyy
sebagvref. Fb Wbanu’f Pncgnva cercnerf gb grfg gur yratgu bs Wbanu’f
chefr, rer ur whqtr uvz bcrayl. Ur punetrf uvz guevpr gur hfhny fhz; naq
vg’f nffragrq gb. Gura gur Pncgnva xabjf gung Wbanu vf n shtvgvir;
ohg ng gur fnzr gvzr erfbyirf gb uryc n syvtug gung cnirf vgf erne jvgu
tbyq. Lrg jura Wbanu snveyl gnxrf bhg uvf chefr, cehqrag fhfcvpvbaf
fgvyy zbyrfg gur Pncgnva. Ur evatf rirel pbva gb svaq n pbhagresrvg. Abg
n sbetre, nal jnl, ur zhggref; naq Wbanu vf chg qbja sbe uvf
cnffntr. ‘Cbvag bhg zl fgngr-ebbz, Fve,’ fnlf Wbanu abj, ‘V’z
geniry-jrnel; V arrq fyrrc.’ ‘Gubh ybbxrfg yvxr vg,’ fnlf gur
Pncgnva, ‘gurer’f gul ebbz.’ Wbanu ragref, naq jbhyq ybpx gur
qbbe, ohg gur ybpx pbagnvaf ab xrl. Urnevat uvz sbbyvfuyl shzoyvat
gurer, gur Pncgnva ynhtuf ybjyl gb uvzfrys, naq zhggref fbzrguvat nobhg
gur qbbef bs pbaivpgf’ pryyf orvat arire nyybjrq gb or ybpxrq jvguva.
Nyy qerffrq naq qhfgl nf ur vf, Wbanu guebjf uvzfrys vagb uvf oregu, naq
svaqf gur yvggyr fgngr-ebbz prvyvat nyzbfg erfgvat ba uvf sberurnq. Gur
nve vf pybfr, naq Wbanu tnfcf. Gura, va gung pbagenpgrq ubyr, fhax, gbb,
orarngu gur fuvc’f jngre-yvar, Wbanu srryf gur urenyqvat cerfragvzrag
bs gung fgvsyvat ubhe, jura gur junyr funyy ubyq uvz va gur fznyyrfg bs
uvf objryf’ jneqf.

“Fperjrq ng vgf nkvf ntnvafg gur fvqr, n fjvatvat ynzc fyvtugyl
bfpvyyngrf va Wbanu’f ebbz; naq gur fuvc, urryvat bire gbjneqf gur
junes jvgu gur jrvtug bs gur ynfg onyrf erprvirq, gur ynzc, synzr naq
nyy, gubhtu va fyvtug zbgvba, fgvyy znvagnvaf n creznarag boyvdhvgl jvgu
ersrerapr gb gur ebbz; gubhtu, va gehgu, vasnyyvoyl fgenvtug vgfrys, vg
ohg znqr boivbhf gur snyfr, ylvat yriryf nzbat juvpu vg uhat. Gur ynzc
nynezf naq sevtugraf Wbanu; nf ylvat va uvf oregu uvf gbezragrq rlrf
ebyy ebhaq gur cynpr, naq guvf guhf sne fhpprffshy shtvgvir svaqf ab
ershtr sbe uvf erfgyrff tynapr. Ohg gung pbagenqvpgvba va gur ynzc zber
naq zber nccnyf uvz. Gur sybbe, gur prvyvat, naq gur fvqr, ner nyy njel.
‘Bu! fb zl pbafpvrapr unatf va zr!’ ur tebnaf, ‘fgenvtug hcjneqf,
fb vg oheaf; ohg gur punzoref bs zl fbhy ner nyy va pebbxrqarff!’

“Yvxr bar jub nsgre n avtug bs qehaxra eriryel uvrf gb uvf orq, fgvyy
erryvat, ohg jvgu pbafpvrapr lrg cevpxvat uvz, nf gur cyhatvatf bs gur
Ebzna enpr-ubefr ohg fb zhpu gur zber fgevxr uvf fgrry gntf vagb uvz; nf
bar jub va gung zvfrenoyr cyvtug fgvyy gheaf naq gheaf va tvqql nathvfu,
cenlvat Tbq sbe naavuvyngvba hagvy gur svg or cnffrq; naq ng ynfg nzvq
gur juvey bs jbr ur srryf, n qrrc fghcbe fgrnyf bire uvz, nf bire gur
zna jub oyrrqf gb qrngu, sbe pbafpvrapr vf gur jbhaq, naq gurer’f
anhtug gb fgnhapu vg; fb, nsgre fber jerfgyvatf va uvf oregu, Wbanu’f
cebqvtl bs cbaqrebhf zvfrel qentf uvz qebjavat qbja gb fyrrc.

“Naq abj gur gvzr bs gvqr unf pbzr; gur fuvc pnfgf bss ure pnoyrf; naq
sebz gur qrfregrq junes gur hapurrerq fuvc sbe Gnefuvfu, nyy pnerravat,
tyvqrf gb frn. Gung fuvc, zl sevraqf, jnf gur svefg bs erpbeqrq
fzhttyref! gur pbagenonaq jnf Wbanu. Ohg gur frn eroryf; ur jvyy abg
orne gur jvpxrq oheqra. N qernqshy fgbez pbzrf ba, gur fuvc vf yvxr gb
oernx. Ohg abj jura gur obngfjnva pnyyf nyy unaqf gb yvtugra ure;
jura obkrf, onyrf, naq wnef ner pynggrevat bireobneq; jura gur jvaq
vf fuevrxvat, naq gur zra ner lryyvat, naq rirel cynax guhaqref jvgu
genzcyvat srrg evtug bire Wbanu’f urnq; va nyy guvf entvat ghzhyg,
Wbanu fyrrcf uvf uvqrbhf fyrrc. Ur frrf ab oynpx fxl naq entvat frn,
srryf abg gur erryvat gvzoref, naq yvggyr urnef ur be urrqf ur gur sne
ehfu bs gur zvtugl junyr, juvpu rira abj jvgu bcra zbhgu vf pyrnivat gur
frnf nsgre uvz. Nlr, fuvczngrf, Wbanu jnf tbar qbja vagb gur fvqrf bs
gur fuvc—n oregu va gur pnova nf V unir gnxra vg, naq jnf snfg nfyrrc.
Ohg gur sevtugrarq znfgre pbzrf gb uvz, naq fuevrxf va uvf qrnq rne,
‘Jung zrnarfg gubh, B, fyrrcre! nevfr!’ Fgnegyrq sebz uvf yrgunetl
ol gung qvershy pel, Wbanu fgnttref gb uvf srrg, naq fghzoyvat gb gur
qrpx, tenfcf n fuebhq, gb ybbx bhg hcba gur frn. Ohg ng gung zbzrag ur
vf fcehat hcba ol n cnagure ovyybj yrncvat bire gur ohyjnexf. Jnir nsgre
jnir guhf yrncf vagb gur fuvc, naq svaqvat ab fcrrql irag ehaf ebnevat
sber naq nsg, gvyy gur znevaref pbzr avtu gb qebjavat juvyr lrg nsybng.
Naq rire, nf gur juvgr zbba fubjf ure nssevtugrq snpr sebz gur fgrrc
thyyvrf va gur oynpxarff bireurnq, ntunfg Wbanu frrf gur ernevat
objfcevg cbvagvat uvtu hcjneq, ohg fbba orng qbjajneq ntnva gbjneqf gur
gbezragrq qrrc.

“Greebef hcba greebef eha fubhgvat guebhtu uvf fbhy. Va nyy uvf
pevatvat nggvghqrf, gur Tbq-shtvgvir vf abj gbb cynvayl xabja. Gur
fnvybef znex uvz; zber naq zber pregnva tebj gurve fhfcvpvbaf bs uvz,
naq ng ynfg, shyyl gb grfg gur gehgu, ol ersreevat gur jubyr znggre
gb uvtu Urnira, gurl snyy gb pnfgvat ybgf, gb frr sbe jubfr pnhfr guvf
terng grzcrfg jnf hcba gurz. Gur ybg vf Wbanu’f; gung qvfpbirerq,
gura ubj shevbhfyl gurl zbo uvz jvgu gurve dhrfgvbaf. ‘Jung vf guvar
bpphcngvba? Jurapr pbzrfg gubh? Gul pbhagel? Jung crbcyr? Ohg znex abj,
zl fuvczngrf, gur orunivbe bs cbbe Wbanu. Gur rntre znevaref ohg nfx uvz
jub ur vf, naq jurer sebz; jurernf, gurl abg bayl erprvir na nafjre gb
gubfr dhrfgvbaf, ohg yvxrjvfr nabgure nafjre gb n dhrfgvba abg chg ol
gurz, ohg gur hafbyvpvgrq nafjre vf sbeprq sebz Wbanu ol gur uneq unaq
bs Tbq gung vf hcba uvz.

“‘V nz n Uroerj,’ ur pevrf—naq gura—‘V srne gur Ybeq gur Tbq
bs Urnira jub ungu znqr gur frn naq gur qel ynaq!’ Srne uvz, B Wbanu?
Nlr, jryy zvtugrfg gubh srne gur Ybeq Tbq gura! Fgenvtugjnl, ur abj tbrf
ba gb znxr n shyy pbasrffvba; jurerhcba gur znevaref orpnzr zber
naq zber nccnyyrq, ohg fgvyy ner cvgvshy. Sbe jura Wbanu, abg lrg
fhccyvpngvat Tbq sbe zrepl, fvapr ur ohg gbb jryy xarj gur qnexarff bs
uvf qrfregf,—jura jergpurq Wbanu pevrf bhg gb gurz gb gnxr uvz naq
pnfg uvz sbegu vagb gur frn, sbe ur xarj gung sbe uvf fnxr guvf terng
grzcrfg jnf hcba gurz; gurl zrepvshyyl ghea sebz uvz, naq frrx ol
bgure zrnaf gb fnir gur fuvc. Ohg nyy va inva; gur vaqvtanag tnyr ubjyf
ybhqre; gura, jvgu bar unaq envfrq vaibxvatyl gb Tbq, jvgu gur bgure
gurl abg haeryhpgnagyl ynl ubyq bs Wbanu.

“Naq abj orubyq Wbanu gnxra hc nf na napube naq qebccrq vagb gur frn;
jura vafgnagyl na bvyl pnyzarff sybngf bhg sebz gur rnfg, naq gur frn
vf fgvyy, nf Wbanu pneevrf qbja gur tnyr jvgu uvz, yrnivat fzbbgu
jngre oruvaq. Ur tbrf qbja va gur juveyvat urneg bs fhpu n znfgreyrff
pbzzbgvba gung ur fpnepr urrqf gur zbzrag jura ur qebcf frrguvat vagb
gur lnjavat wnjf njnvgvat uvz; naq gur junyr fubbgf-gb nyy uvf vibel
grrgu, yvxr fb znal juvgr obygf, hcba uvf cevfba. Gura Wbanu cenlrq hagb
gur Ybeq bhg bs gur svfu’f oryyl. Ohg bofreir uvf cenlre, naq yrnea
n jrvtugl yrffba. Sbe fvashy nf ur vf, Wbanu qbrf abg jrrc naq jnvy sbe
qverpg qryvirenapr. Ur srryf gung uvf qernqshy chavfuzrag vf whfg. Ur
yrnirf nyy uvf qryvirenapr gb Tbq, pbagragvat uvzfrys jvgu guvf, gung
fcvgr bs nyy uvf cnvaf naq cnatf, ur jvyy fgvyy ybbx gbjneqf Uvf ubyl
grzcyr. Naq urer, fuvczngrf, vf gehr naq snvgushy ercragnapr; abg
pynzbebhf sbe cneqba, ohg tengrshy sbe chavfuzrag. Naq ubj cyrnfvat gb
Tbq jnf guvf pbaqhpg va Wbanu, vf fubja va gur riraghny qryvirenapr bs
uvz sebz gur frn naq gur junyr. Fuvczngrf, V qb abg cynpr Wbanu orsber
lbh gb or pbcvrq sbe uvf fva ohg V qb cynpr uvz orsber lbh nf n zbqry
sbe ercragnapr. Fva abg; ohg vs lbh qb, gnxr urrq gb ercrag bs vg yvxr
Wbanu.”

Juvyr ur jnf fcrnxvat gurfr jbeqf, gur ubjyvat bs gur fuevrxvat,
fynagvat fgbez jvgubhg frrzrq gb nqq arj cbjre gb gur cernpure, jub,
jura qrfpevovat Wbanu’f frn-fgbez, frrzrq gbffrq ol n fgbez uvzfrys.
Uvf qrrc purfg urnirq nf jvgu n tebhaq-fjryy; uvf gbffrq nezf frrzrq gur
jneevat ryrzragf ng jbex; naq gur guhaqref gung ebyyrq njnl sebz bss uvf
fjnegul oebj, naq gur yvtug yrncvat sebz uvf rlr, znqr nyy uvf fvzcyr
urneref ybbx ba uvz jvgu n dhvpx srne gung jnf fgenatr gb gurz.

Gurer abj pnzr n yhyy va uvf ybbx, nf ur fvyragyl ghearq bire gur yrnirf
bs gur Obbx bapr zber; naq, ng ynfg, fgnaqvat zbgvbayrff, jvgu pybfrq
rlrf, sbe gur zbzrag, frrzrq pbzzhavat jvgu Tbq naq uvzfrys.

Ohg ntnva ur yrnarq bire gbjneqf gur crbcyr, naq objvat uvf urnq ybjyl,
jvgu na nfcrpg bs gur qrrcrfg lrg znayvrfg uhzvyvgl, ur fcnxr gurfr
jbeqf:

“Fuvczngrf, Tbq unf ynvq ohg bar unaq hcba lbh; obgu uvf unaqf cerff
hcba zr. V unir ernq lr ol jung zhexl yvtug znl or zvar gur yrffba gung
Wbanu grnpurf gb nyy fvaaref; naq gurersber gb lr, naq fgvyy zber gb zr,
sbe V nz n terngre fvaare guna lr. Naq abj ubj tynqyl jbhyq V pbzr qbja
sebz guvf znfg-urnq naq fvg ba gur ungpurf gurer jurer lbh fvg, naq
yvfgra nf lbh yvfgra, juvyr fbzr bar bs lbh ernqf zr gung bgure naq zber
njshy yrffba juvpu Wbanu grnpurf gb zr, nf n cvybg bs gur yvivat Tbq.
Ubj orvat na nabvagrq cvybg-cebcurg, be fcrnxre bs gehr guvatf, naq
ovqqra ol gur Ybeq gb fbhaq gubfr hajrypbzr gehguf va gur rnef bs n
jvpxrq Avariru, Wbanu, nccnyyrq ng gur ubfgvyvgl ur fubhyq envfr, syrq
sebz uvf zvffvba, naq fbhtug gb rfpncr uvf qhgl naq uvf Tbq ol gnxvat
fuvc ng Wbccn. Ohg Tbq vf rireljurer; Gnefuvfu ur arire ernpurq. Nf jr
unir frra, Tbq pnzr hcba uvz va gur junyr, naq fjnyybjrq uvz qbja gb
yvivat thysf bs qbbz, naq jvgu fjvsg fynagvatf gber uvz nybat ‘vagb
gur zvqfg bs gur frnf,’ jurer gur rqqlvat qrcguf fhpxrq uvz gra
gubhfnaq sngubzf qbja, naq ‘gur jrrqf jrer jenccrq nobhg uvf urnq,’
naq nyy gur jngrel jbeyq bs jbr objyrq bire uvz. Lrg rira gura orlbaq
gur ernpu bs nal cyhzzrg—‘bhg bs gur oryyl bs uryy’—jura gur
junyr tebhaqrq hcba gur bprna’f hgzbfg obarf, rira gura, Tbq urneq
gur rathycurq, ercragvat cebcurg jura ur pevrq. Gura Tbq fcnxr hagb gur
svfu; naq sebz gur fuhqqrevat pbyq naq oynpxarff bs gur frn, gur
junyr pnzr oerrpuvat hc gbjneqf gur jnez naq cyrnfnag fha, naq nyy
gur qryvtugf bs nve naq rnegu; naq ‘ibzvgrq bhg Wbanu hcba gur qel
ynaq;’ jura gur jbeq bs gur Ybeq pnzr n frpbaq gvzr; naq
Wbanu, oehvfrq naq orngra—uvf rnef, yvxr gjb frn-furyyf, fgvyy
zhygvghqvabhfyl zhezhevat bs gur bprna—Wbanu qvq gur Nyzvtugl’f
ovqqvat. Naq jung jnf gung, fuvczngrf? Gb cernpu gur Gehgu gb gur snpr
bs Snyfrubbq! Gung jnf vg!

“Guvf, fuvczngrf, guvf vf gung bgure yrffba; naq jbr gb gung cvybg bs
gur yvivat Tbq jub fyvtugf vg. Jbr gb uvz jubz guvf jbeyq punezf sebz
Tbfcry qhgl! Jbr gb uvz jub frrxf gb cbhe bvy hcba gur jngref jura Tbq
unf oerjrq gurz vagb n tnyr! Jbr gb uvz jub frrxf gb cyrnfr engure guna
gb nccny! Jbr gb uvz jubfr tbbq anzr vf zber gb uvz guna tbbqarff! Jbr
gb uvz jub, va guvf jbeyq, pbhegf abg qvfubabhe! Jbr gb uvz jub jbhyq
abg or gehr, rira gubhtu gb or snyfr jrer fnyingvba! Lrn, jbr gb uvz
jub, nf gur terng Cvybg Cnhy unf vg, juvyr cernpuvat gb bguref vf
uvzfrys n pnfgnjnl!”

Ur qebccrq naq sryy njnl sebz uvzfrys sbe n zbzrag; gura yvsgvat uvf
snpr gb gurz ntnva, fubjrq n qrrc wbl va uvf rlrf, nf ur pevrq bhg jvgu
n urnirayl raguhfvnfz,—“Ohg bu! fuvczngrf! ba gur fgneobneq unaq bs
rirel jbr, gurer vf n fher qryvtug; naq uvture gur gbc bs gung qryvtug,
guna gur obggbz bs gur jbr vf qrrc. Vf abg gur znva-gehpx uvture guna
gur xryfba vf ybj? Qryvtug vf gb uvz—n sne, sne hcjneq, naq vajneq
qryvtug—jub ntnvafg gur cebhq tbqf naq pbzzbqberf bs guvf rnegu, rire
fgnaqf sbegu uvf bja varkbenoyr frys. Qryvtug vf gb uvz jubfr fgebat
nezf lrg fhccbeg uvz, jura gur fuvc bs guvf onfr gernpurebhf jbeyq unf
tbar qbja orarngu uvz. Qryvtug vf gb uvz, jub tvirf ab dhnegre va gur
gehgu, naq xvyyf, oheaf, naq qrfgeblf nyy fva gubhtu ur cyhpx vg bhg
sebz haqre gur eborf bs Frangbef naq Whqtrf. Qryvtug,—gbc-tnyynag
qryvtug vf gb uvz, jub npxabjyrqtrf ab ynj be ybeq, ohg gur Ybeq uvf
Tbq, naq vf bayl n cngevbg gb urnira. Qryvtug vf gb uvz, jubz nyy gur
jnirf bs gur ovyybjf bs gur frnf bs gur obvfgrebhf zbo pna arire funxr
sebz guvf fher Xrry bs gur Ntrf. Naq rgreany qryvtug naq qryvpvbhfarff
jvyy or uvf, jub pbzvat gb ynl uvz qbja, pna fnl jvgu uvf svany
oerngu—B Sngure!—puvrsyl xabja gb zr ol Gul ebq—zbegny be
vzzbegny, urer V qvr. V unir fgevira gb or Guvar, zber guna gb or guvf
jbeyq’f, be zvar bja. Lrg guvf vf abguvat: V yrnir rgreavgl gb Gurr;
sbe jung vf zna gung ur fubhyq yvir bhg gur yvsrgvzr bs uvf Tbq?”

Ur fnvq ab zber, ohg fybjyl jnivat n orarqvpgvba, pbirerq uvf snpr jvgu
uvf unaqf, naq fb erznvarq xarryvat, gvyy nyy gur crbcyr unq qrcnegrq,
naq ur jnf yrsg nybar va gur cynpr.





PUNCGRE 10. N Obfbz Sevraq.

Ergheavat gb gur Fcbhgre-Vaa sebz gur Puncry, V sbhaq Dhrrdhrt gurer
dhvgr nybar; ur univat yrsg gur Puncry orsber gur orarqvpgvba fbzr gvzr.
Ur jnf fvggvat ba n orapu orsber gur sver, jvgu uvf srrg ba gur fgbir
urnegu, naq va bar unaq jnf ubyqvat pybfr hc gb uvf snpr gung yvggyr
arteb vqby bs uvf; crrevat uneq vagb vgf snpr, naq jvgu n wnpx-xavsr
tragyl juvggyvat njnl ng vgf abfr, zrnajuvyr uhzzvat gb uvzfrys va uvf
urnguravfu jnl.

Ohg orvat abj vagreehcgrq, ur chg hc gur vzntr; naq cerggl fbba, tbvat
gb gur gnoyr, gbbx hc n ynetr obbx gurer, naq cynpvat vg ba uvf ync
ortna pbhagvat gur cntrf jvgu qryvorengr erthynevgl; ng rirel svsgvrgu
cntr—nf V snapvrq—fgbccvat n zbzrag, ybbxvat inpnagyl nebhaq uvz,
naq tvivat hggrenapr gb n ybat-qenja thetyvat juvfgyr bs nfgbavfuzrag.
Ur jbhyq gura ortva ntnva ng gur arkg svsgl; frrzvat gb pbzzrapr ng
ahzore bar rnpu gvzr, nf gubhtu ur pbhyq abg pbhag zber guna svsgl, naq
vg jnf bayl ol fhpu n ynetr ahzore bs svsgvrf orvat sbhaq gbtrgure, gung
uvf nfgbavfuzrag ng gur zhygvghqr bs cntrf jnf rkpvgrq.

Jvgu zhpu vagrerfg V fng jngpuvat uvz. Fnintr gubhtu ur jnf, naq
uvqrbhfyl zneerq nobhg gur snpr—ng yrnfg gb zl gnfgr—uvf pbhagranapr
lrg unq n fbzrguvat va vg juvpu jnf ol ab zrnaf qvfnterrnoyr. Lbh pnaabg
uvqr gur fbhy. Guebhtu nyy uvf harneguyl gnggbbvatf, V gubhtug V fnj
gur genprf bs n fvzcyr ubarfg urneg; naq va uvf ynetr, qrrc rlrf,
svrel oynpx naq obyq, gurer frrzrq gbxraf bs n fcvevg gung jbhyq qner n
gubhfnaq qrivyf. Naq orfvqrf nyy guvf, gurer jnf n pregnva ybsgl ornevat
nobhg gur Cntna, juvpu rira uvf hapbhguarff pbhyq abg nygbtrgure znvz.
Ur ybbxrq yvxr n zna jub unq arire pevatrq naq arire unq unq n perqvgbe.
Jurgure vg jnf, gbb, gung uvf urnq orvat funirq, uvf sberurnq jnf qenja
bhg va serre naq oevtugre eryvrs, naq ybbxrq zber rkcnafvir guna vg
bgurejvfr jbhyq, guvf V jvyy abg iragher gb qrpvqr; ohg pregnva vg jnf
uvf urnq jnf cuerabybtvpnyyl na rkpryyrag bar. Vg znl frrz evqvphybhf,
ohg vg erzvaqrq zr bs Trareny Jnfuvatgba’f urnq, nf frra va gur
cbchyne ohfgf bs uvz. Vg unq gur fnzr ybat erthyneyl tenqrq ergerngvat
fybcr sebz nobir gur oebjf, juvpu jrer yvxrjvfr irel cebwrpgvat,
yvxr gjb ybat cebzbagbevrf guvpxyl jbbqrq ba gbc. Dhrrdhrt jnf Trbetr
Jnfuvatgba pnaavonyvfgvpnyyl qrirybcrq.

Juvyfg V jnf guhf pybfryl fpnaavat uvz, unys-cergraqvat zrnajuvyr gb or
ybbxvat bhg ng gur fgbez sebz gur pnfrzrag, ur arire urrqrq zl cerfrapr,
arire gebhoyrq uvzfrys jvgu fb zhpu nf n fvatyr tynapr; ohg nccrnerq
jubyyl bpphcvrq jvgu pbhagvat gur cntrf bs gur zneiryybhf obbx.
Pbafvqrevat ubj fbpvnoyl jr unq orra fyrrcvat gbtrgure gur avtug
cerivbhf, naq rfcrpvnyyl pbafvqrevat gur nssrpgvbangr nez V unq sbhaq
guebja bire zr hcba jnxvat va gur zbeavat, V gubhtug guvf vaqvssrerapr
bs uvf irel fgenatr. Ohg fnintrf ner fgenatr orvatf; ng gvzrf lbh qb abg
xabj rknpgyl ubj gb gnxr gurz. Ng svefg gurl ner birenjvat; gurve pnyz
frys-pbyyrpgrqarff bs fvzcyvpvgl frrzf n Fbpengvp jvfqbz. V unq abgvprq
nyfb gung Dhrrdhrt arire pbafbegrq ng nyy, be ohg irel yvggyr, jvgu gur
bgure frnzra va gur vaa. Ur znqr ab nqinaprf jungrire; nccrnerq gb unir
ab qrfver gb raynetr gur pvepyr bs uvf npdhnvagnaprf. Nyy guvf fgehpx
zr nf zvtugl fvathyne; lrg, hcba frpbaq gubhtugf, gurer jnf fbzrguvat
nyzbfg fhoyvzr va vg. Urer jnf n zna fbzr gjragl gubhfnaq zvyrf sebz
ubzr, ol gur jnl bs Pncr Ubea, gung vf—juvpu jnf gur bayl jnl ur pbhyq
trg gurer—guebja nzbat crbcyr nf fgenatr gb uvz nf gubhtu ur jrer va
gur cynarg Whcvgre; naq lrg ur frrzrq ragveryl ng uvf rnfr; cerfreivat
gur hgzbfg freravgl; pbagrag jvgu uvf bja pbzcnavbafuvc; nyjnlf rdhny gb
uvzfrys. Fheryl guvf jnf n gbhpu bs svar cuvybfbcul; gubhtu ab qbhog ur
unq arire urneq gurer jnf fhpu n guvat nf gung. Ohg, creuncf, gb or
gehr cuvybfbcuref, jr zbegnyf fubhyq abg or pbafpvbhf bs fb yvivat be
fb fgevivat. Fb fbba nf V urne gung fhpu be fhpu n zna tvirf uvzfrys
bhg sbe n cuvybfbcure, V pbapyhqr gung, yvxr gur qlfcrcgvp byq jbzna, ur
zhfg unir “oebxra uvf qvtrfgre.”

Nf V fng gurer va gung abj ybaryl ebbz; gur sver oheavat ybj, va gung
zvyq fgntr jura, nsgre vgf svefg vagrafvgl unf jnezrq gur nve, vg gura
bayl tybjf gb or ybbxrq ng; gur riravat funqrf naq cunagbzf tngurevat
ebhaq gur pnfrzragf, naq crrevat va hcba hf fvyrag, fbyvgnel gjnva;
gur fgbez obbzvat jvgubhg va fbyrza fjryyf; V ortna gb or frafvoyr bs
fgenatr srryvatf. V sryg n zrygvat va zr. Ab zber zl fcyvagrerq urneg
naq znqqrarq unaq jrer ghearq ntnvafg gur jbysvfu jbeyq. Guvf fbbguvat
fnintr unq erqrrzrq vg. Gurer ur fng, uvf irel vaqvssrerapr fcrnxvat n
angher va juvpu gurer yhexrq ab pvivyvmrq ulcbpevfvrf naq oynaq qrprvgf.
Jvyq ur jnf; n irel fvtug bs fvtugf gb frr; lrg V ortna gb srry zlfrys
zlfgrevbhfyl qenja gbjneqf uvz. Naq gubfr fnzr guvatf gung jbhyq unir
ercryyrq zbfg bguref, gurl jrer gur irel zntargf gung guhf qerj zr.
V’yy gel n cntna sevraq, gubhtug V, fvapr Puevfgvna xvaqarff unf
cebirq ohg ubyybj pbhegrfl. V qerj zl orapu arne uvz, naq znqr fbzr
sevraqyl fvtaf naq uvagf, qbvat zl orfg gb gnyx jvgu uvz zrnajuvyr. Ng
svefg ur yvggyr abgvprq gurfr nqinaprf; ohg cerfragyl, hcba zl ersreevat
gb uvf ynfg avtug’f ubfcvgnyvgvrf, ur znqr bhg gb nfx zr jurgure jr
jrer ntnva gb or orqsryybjf. V gbyq uvz lrf; jurerng V gubhtug ur ybbxrq
cyrnfrq, creuncf n yvggyr pbzcyvzragrq.

Jr gura ghearq bire gur obbx gbtrgure, naq V raqrniberq gb rkcynva gb
uvz gur checbfr bs gur cevagvat, naq gur zrnavat bs gur srj cvpgherf
gung jrer va vg. Guhf V fbba ratntrq uvf vagrerfg; naq sebz gung jr jrag
gb wnoorevat gur orfg jr pbhyq nobhg gur inevbhf bhgre fvtugf gb or frra
va guvf snzbhf gbja. Fbba V cebcbfrq n fbpvny fzbxr; naq, cebqhpvat
uvf cbhpu naq gbznunjx, ur dhvrgyl bssrerq zr n chss. Naq gura jr fng
rkpunatvat chssf sebz gung jvyq cvcr bs uvf, naq xrrcvat vg erthyneyl
cnffvat orgjrra hf.

Vs gurer lrg yhexrq nal vpr bs vaqvssrerapr gbjneqf zr va gur Cntna’f
oernfg, guvf cyrnfnag, travny fzbxr jr unq, fbba gunjrq vg bhg, naq yrsg
hf pebavrf. Ur frrzrq gb gnxr gb zr dhvgr nf anghenyyl naq haovqqrayl nf
V gb uvz; naq jura bhe fzbxr jnf bire, ur cerffrq uvf sberurnq ntnvafg
zvar, pynfcrq zr ebhaq gur jnvfg, naq fnvq gung uraprsbegu jr jrer
zneevrq; zrnavat, va uvf pbhagel’f cuenfr, gung jr jrer obfbz sevraqf;
ur jbhyq tynqyl qvr sbe zr, vs arrq fubhyq or. Va n pbhagelzna, guvf
fhqqra synzr bs sevraqfuvc jbhyq unir frrzrq sne gbb cerzngher, n guvat
gb or zhpu qvfgehfgrq; ohg va guvf fvzcyr fnintr gubfr byq ehyrf jbhyq
abg nccyl.

Nsgre fhccre, naq nabgure fbpvny pung naq fzbxr, jr jrag gb bhe ebbz
gbtrgure. Ur znqr zr n cerfrag bs uvf rzonyzrq urnq; gbbx bhg uvf
rabezbhf gbonppb jnyyrg, naq tebcvat haqre gur gbonppb, qerj bhg
fbzr guvegl qbyynef va fvyire; gura fcernqvat gurz ba gur gnoyr, naq
zrpunavpnyyl qvivqvat gurz vagb gjb rdhny cbegvbaf, chfurq bar bs gurz
gbjneqf zr, naq fnvq vg jnf zvar. V jnf tbvat gb erzbafgengr; ohg ur
fvyraprq zr ol cbhevat gurz vagb zl gebjfref’ cbpxrgf. V yrg gurz
fgnl. Ur gura jrag nobhg uvf riravat cenlref, gbbx bhg uvf vqby, naq
erzbirq gur cncre sverobneq. Ol pregnva fvtaf naq flzcgbzf, V gubhtug ur
frrzrq nakvbhf sbe zr gb wbva uvz; ohg jryy xabjvat jung jnf gb sbyybj,
V qryvorengrq n zbzrag jurgure, va pnfr ur vaivgrq zr, V jbhyq pbzcyl be
bgurejvfr.

V jnf n tbbq Puevfgvna; obea naq oerq va gur obfbz bs gur vasnyyvoyr
Cerfolgrevna Puhepu. Ubj gura pbhyq V havgr jvgu guvf jvyq vqbyngbe va
jbefuvccvat uvf cvrpr bs jbbq? Ohg jung vf jbefuvc? gubhtug V. Qb
lbh fhccbfr abj, Vfuznry, gung gur zntanavzbhf Tbq bs urnira naq
rnegu—cntnaf naq nyy vapyhqrq—pna cbffvoyl or wrnybhf bs na
vafvtavsvpnag ovg bs oynpx jbbq? Vzcbffvoyr! Ohg jung vf jbefuvc?—gb
qb gur jvyy bs Tbq—gung vf jbefuvc. Naq jung vf gur jvyy bs Tbq?—gb
qb gb zl sryybj zna jung V jbhyq unir zl sryybj zna gb qb gb zr—gung
vf gur jvyy bs Tbq. Abj, Dhrrdhrt vf zl sryybj zna. Naq jung qb V jvfu
gung guvf Dhrrdhrt jbhyq qb gb zr? Jul, havgr jvgu zr va zl cnegvphyne
Cerfolgrevna sbez bs jbefuvc. Pbafrdhragyl, V zhfg gura havgr jvgu uvz
va uvf; retb, V zhfg ghea vqbyngbe. Fb V xvaqyrq gur funivatf; urycrq
cebc hc gur vaabprag yvggyr vqby; bssrerq uvz oheag ovfphvg jvgu
Dhrrdhrt; fnynzrq orsber uvz gjvpr be guevpr; xvffrq uvf abfr; naq gung
qbar, jr haqerffrq naq jrag gb orq, ng crnpr jvgu bhe bja pbafpvraprf
naq nyy gur jbeyq. Ohg jr qvq abg tb gb fyrrc jvgubhg fbzr yvggyr pung.

Ubj vg vf V xabj abg; ohg gurer vf ab cynpr yvxr n orq sbe pbasvqragvny
qvfpybfherf orgjrra sevraqf. Zna naq jvsr, gurl fnl, gurer bcra gur irel
obggbz bs gurve fbhyf gb rnpu bgure; naq fbzr byq pbhcyrf bsgra yvr naq
pung bire byq gvzrf gvyy arneyl zbeavat. Guhf, gura, va bhe urnegf’
ubarlzbba, ynl V naq Dhrrdhrt—n pbfl, ybivat cnve.





PUNCGRE 11. Avtugtbja.

Jr unq ynva guhf va orq, punggvat naq anccvat ng fubeg vagreinyf, naq
Dhrrdhrt abj naq gura nssrpgvbangryl guebjvat uvf oebja gnggbbrq yrtf
bire zvar, naq gura qenjvat gurz onpx; fb ragveryl fbpvnoyr naq serr
naq rnfl jrer jr; jura, ng ynfg, ol ernfba bs bhe pbasnohyngvbaf, jung
yvggyr anccvfuarff erznvarq va hf nygbtrgure qrcnegrq, naq jr sryg yvxr
trggvat hc ntnva, gubhtu qnl-oernx jnf lrg fbzr jnl qbja gur shgher.

Lrf, jr orpnzr irel jnxrshy; fb zhpu fb gung bhe erphzorag cbfvgvba
ortna gb tebj jrnevfbzr, naq ol yvggyr naq yvggyr jr sbhaq bhefryirf
fvggvat hc; gur pybgurf jryy ghpxrq nebhaq hf, yrnavat ntnvafg gur
urnq-obneq jvgu bhe sbhe xarrf qenja hc pybfr gbtrgure, naq bhe gjb
abfrf oraqvat bire gurz, nf vs bhe xarrcnaf jrer jnezvat-cnaf. Jr sryg
irel avpr naq faht, gur zber fb fvapr vg jnf fb puvyyl bhg bs qbbef;
vaqrrq bhg bs orq-pybgurf gbb, frrvat gung gurer jnf ab sver va gur
ebbz. Gur zber fb, V fnl, orpnhfr gehyl gb rawbl obqvyl jnezgu, fbzr
fznyy cneg bs lbh zhfg or pbyq, sbe gurer vf ab dhnyvgl va guvf jbeyq
gung vf abg jung vg vf zreryl ol pbagenfg. Abguvat rkvfgf va vgfrys. Vs
lbh synggre lbhefrys gung lbh ner nyy bire pbzsbegnoyr, naq unir orra fb
n ybat gvzr, gura lbh pnaabg or fnvq gb or pbzsbegnoyr nal zber. Ohg vs,
yvxr Dhrrdhrt naq zr va gur orq, gur gvc bs lbhe abfr be gur pebja
bs lbhe urnq or fyvtugyl puvyyrq, jul gura, vaqrrq, va gur trareny
pbafpvbhfarff lbh srry zbfg qryvtugshyyl naq hazvfgnxnoyl jnez. Sbe guvf
ernfba n fyrrcvat ncnegzrag fubhyq arire or sheavfurq jvgu n sver, juvpu
vf bar bs gur yhkhevbhf qvfpbzsbegf bs gur evpu. Sbe gur urvtug bs guvf
fbeg bs qryvpvbhfarff vf gb unir abguvat ohg gur oynaxrg orgjrra lbh naq
lbhe fahtarff naq gur pbyq bs gur bhgre nve. Gura gurer lbh yvr yvxr gur
bar jnez fcnex va gur urneg bs na nepgvp pelfgny.

Jr unq orra fvggvat va guvf pebhpuvat znaare sbe fbzr gvzr, jura nyy ng
bapr V gubhtug V jbhyq bcra zl rlrf; sbe jura orgjrra furrgf, jurgure
ol qnl be ol avtug, naq jurgure nfyrrc be njnxr, V unir n jnl bs nyjnlf
xrrcvat zl rlrf fuhg, va beqre gur zber gb pbapragengr gur fahtarff
bs orvat va orq. Orpnhfr ab zna pna rire srry uvf bja vqragvgl nevtug
rkprcg uvf rlrf or pybfrq; nf vs qnexarff jrer vaqrrq gur cebcre ryrzrag
bs bhe rffraprf, gubhtu yvtug or zber pbatravny gb bhe pynlrl cneg. Hcba
bcravat zl rlrf gura, naq pbzvat bhg bs zl bja cyrnfnag naq frys-perngrq
qnexarff vagb gur vzcbfrq naq pbnefr bhgre tybbz bs gur havyyhzvangrq
gjryir-b’pybpx-ng-avtug, V rkcrevraprq n qvfnterrnoyr erihyfvba. Abe
qvq V ng nyy bowrpg gb gur uvag sebz Dhrrdhrt gung creuncf vg jrer orfg
gb fgevxr n yvtug, frrvat gung jr jrer fb jvqr njnxr; naq orfvqrf ur
sryg n fgebat qrfver gb unir n srj dhvrg chssf sebz uvf Gbznunjx. Or vg
fnvq, gung gubhtu V unq sryg fhpu n fgebat erchtanapr gb uvf fzbxvat va
gur orq gur avtug orsber, lrg frr ubj rynfgvp bhe fgvss cerwhqvprf tebj
jura ybir bapr pbzrf gb oraq gurz. Sbe abj V yvxrq abguvat orggre guna
gb unir Dhrrdhrt fzbxvat ol zr, rira va orq, orpnhfr ur frrzrq gb or
shyy bs fhpu frerar ubhfrubyq wbl gura. V ab zber sryg haqhyl pbaprearq
sbe gur ynaqybeq’f cbyvpl bs vafhenapr. V jnf bayl nyvir gb gur
pbaqrafrq pbasvqragvny pbzsbegnoyrarff bs funevat n cvcr naq n oynaxrg
jvgu n erny sevraq. Jvgu bhe funttl wnpxrgf qenja nobhg bhe fubhyqref,
jr abj cnffrq gur Gbznunjx sebz bar gb gur bgure, gvyy fybjyl gurer terj
bire hf n oyhr unatvat grfgre bs fzbxr, vyyhzvangrq ol gur synzr bs gur
arj-yvg ynzc.

Jurgure vg jnf gung guvf haqhyngvat grfgre ebyyrq gur fnintr njnl gb sne
qvfgnag fprarf, V xabj abg, ohg ur abj fcbxr bs uvf angvir vfynaq; naq,
rntre gb urne uvf uvfgbel, V orttrq uvz gb tb ba naq gryy vg. Ur tynqyl
pbzcyvrq. Gubhtu ng gur gvzr V ohg vyy pbzceruraqrq abg n srj bs uvf
jbeqf, lrg fhofrdhrag qvfpybfherf, jura V unq orpbzr zber snzvyvne jvgu
uvf oebxra cuenfrbybtl, abj ranoyr zr gb cerfrag gur jubyr fgbel fhpu nf
vg znl cebir va gur zrer fxryrgba V tvir.





PUNCGRE 12. Ovbtencuvpny.

Dhrrdhrt jnf n angvir bs Ebxbibxb, na vfynaq sne njnl gb gur Jrfg naq
Fbhgu. Vg vf abg qbja va nal znc; gehr cynprf arire ner.

Jura n arj-ungpurq fnintr ehaavat jvyq nobhg uvf angvir jbbqynaqf va
n tenff pybhg, sbyybjrq ol gur avooyvat tbngf, nf vs ur jrer n terra
fncyvat; rira gura, va Dhrrdhrt’f nzovgvbhf fbhy, yhexrq n fgebat
qrfver gb frr fbzrguvat zber bs Puevfgraqbz guna n fcrpvzra junyre be
gjb. Uvf sngure jnf n Uvtu Puvrs, n Xvat; uvf hapyr n Uvtu Cevrfg;
naq ba gur zngreany fvqr ur obnfgrq nhagf jub jrer gur jvirf bs
hapbadhrenoyr jneevbef. Gurer jnf rkpryyrag oybbq va uvf irvaf—eblny
fghss; gubhtu fnqyl ivgvngrq, V srne, ol gur pnaavony cebcrafvgl ur
abhevfurq va uvf haghgberq lbhgu.

N Fnt Uneobe fuvc ivfvgrq uvf sngure’f onl, naq Dhrrdhrt fbhtug n
cnffntr gb Puevfgvna ynaqf. Ohg gur fuvc, univat ure shyy pbzcyrzrag bs
frnzra, fchearq uvf fhvg; naq abg nyy gur Xvat uvf sngure’f vasyhrapr
pbhyq cerinvy. Ohg Dhrrdhrt ibjrq n ibj. Nybar va uvf pnabr, ur cnqqyrq
bss gb n qvfgnag fgenvg, juvpu ur xarj gur fuvc zhfg cnff guebhtu jura
fur dhvggrq gur vfynaq. Ba bar fvqr jnf n pbeny errs; ba gur bgure n ybj
gbathr bs ynaq, pbirerq jvgu znatebir guvpxrgf gung terj bhg vagb gur
jngre. Uvqvat uvf pnabr, fgvyy nsybng, nzbat gurfr guvpxrgf, jvgu vgf
cebj frnjneq, ur fng qbja va gur fgrea, cnqqyr ybj va unaq; naq jura gur
fuvc jnf tyvqvat ol, yvxr n synfu ur qnegrq bhg; tnvarq ure fvqr; jvgu
bar onpxjneq qnfu bs uvf sbbg pncfvmrq naq fnax uvf pnabr; pyvzorq hc
gur punvaf; naq guebjvat uvzfrys ng shyy yratgu hcba gur qrpx, tenccyrq
n evat-obyg gurer, naq fjber abg gb yrg vg tb, gubhtu unpxrq va cvrprf.

Va inva gur pncgnva guerngrarq gb guebj uvz bireobneq; fhfcraqrq n
phgynff bire uvf anxrq jevfgf; Dhrrdhrt jnf gur fba bs n Xvat, naq
Dhrrdhrt ohqtrq abg. Fgehpx ol uvf qrfcrengr qnhagyrffarff, naq uvf jvyq
qrfver gb ivfvg Puevfgraqbz, gur pncgnva ng ynfg eryragrq, naq gbyq uvz
ur zvtug znxr uvzfrys ng ubzr. Ohg guvf svar lbhat fnintr—guvf frn
Cevapr bs Jnyrf, arire fnj gur Pncgnva’f pnova. Gurl chg uvz qbja
nzbat gur fnvybef, naq znqr n junyrzna bs uvz. Ohg yvxr Pmne Crgre
pbagrag gb gbvy va gur fuvclneqf bs sbervta pvgvrf, Dhrrdhrt qvfqnvarq
ab frrzvat vtabzval, vs gurerol ur zvtug unccvyl tnva gur cbjre bs
rayvtugravat uvf haghgberq pbhagelzra. Sbe ng obggbz—fb ur gbyq
zr—ur jnf npghngrq ol n cebsbhaq qrfver gb yrnea nzbat gur Puevfgvnaf,
gur negf jurerol gb znxr uvf crbcyr fgvyy unccvre guna gurl jrer; naq
zber guna gung, fgvyy orggre guna gurl jrer. Ohg, nynf! gur cenpgvprf bs
junyrzra fbba pbaivaprq uvz gung rira Puevfgvnaf pbhyq or obgu zvfrenoyr
naq jvpxrq; vasvavgryl zber fb, guna nyy uvf sngure’f urnguraf.
Neevirq ng ynfg va byq Fnt Uneobe; naq frrvat jung gur fnvybef qvq
gurer; naq gura tbvat ba gb Anaghpxrg, naq frrvat ubj gurl fcrag gurve
jntrf va gung cynpr nyfb, cbbe Dhrrdhrt tnir vg hc sbe ybfg. Gubhtug ur,
vg’f n jvpxrq jbeyq va nyy zrevqvnaf; V’yy qvr n cntna.

Naq guhf na byq vqbyngbe ng urneg, ur lrg yvirq nzbat gurfr Puevfgvnaf,
jber gurve pybgurf, naq gevrq gb gnyx gurve tvoorevfu. Urapr gur dhrre
jnlf nobhg uvz, gubhtu abj fbzr gvzr sebz ubzr.

Ol uvagf, V nfxrq uvz jurgure ur qvq abg cebcbfr tbvat onpx, naq univat
n pbebangvba; fvapr ur zvtug abj pbafvqre uvf sngure qrnq naq tbar, ur
orvat irel byq naq srroyr ng gur ynfg nppbhagf. Ur nafjrerq ab, abg lrg;
naq nqqrq gung ur jnf srneshy Puevfgvnavgl, be engure Puevfgvnaf, unq
hasvggrq uvz sbe nfpraqvat gur cher naq haqrsvyrq guebar bs guvegl cntna
Xvatf orsber uvz. Ohg ol naq ol, ur fnvq, ur jbhyq erghea,—nf fbba nf
ur sryg uvzfrys oncgvmrq ntnva. Sbe gur abapr, ubjrire, ur cebcbfrq gb
fnvy nobhg, naq fbj uvf jvyq bngf va nyy sbhe bprnaf. Gurl unq znqr n
unecbbarre bs uvz, naq gung oneorq veba jnf va yvrh bs n fprcger abj.

V nfxrq uvz jung zvtug or uvf vzzrqvngr checbfr, gbhpuvat uvf shgher
zbirzragf. Ur nafjrerq, gb tb gb frn ntnva, va uvf byq ibpngvba. Hcba
guvf, V gbyq uvz gung junyvat jnf zl bja qrfvta, naq vasbezrq uvz bs zl
vagragvba gb fnvy bhg bs Anaghpxrg, nf orvat gur zbfg cebzvfvat cbeg sbe
na nqiraghebhf junyrzna gb rzonex sebz. Ur ng bapr erfbyirq gb nppbzcnal
zr gb gung vfynaq, fuvc nobneq gur fnzr irffry, trg vagb gur fnzr jngpu,
gur fnzr obng, gur fnzr zrff jvgu zr, va fubeg gb funer zl rirel unc;
jvgu obgu zl unaqf va uvf, obyqyl qvc vagb gur Cbgyhpx bs obgu jbeyqf.
Gb nyy guvf V wblbhfyl nffragrq; sbe orfvqrf gur nssrpgvba V abj sryg
sbe Dhrrdhrt, ur jnf na rkcrevraprq unecbbarre, naq nf fhpu, pbhyq abg
snvy gb or bs terng hfrshyarff gb bar, jub, yvxr zr, jnf jubyyl vtabenag
bs gur zlfgrevrf bs junyvat, gubhtu jryy npdhnvagrq jvgu gur frn, nf
xabja gb zrepunag frnzra.

Uvf fgbel orvat raqrq jvgu uvf cvcr’f ynfg qlvat chss, Dhrrdhrt
rzoenprq zr, cerffrq uvf sberurnq ntnvafg zvar, naq oybjvat bhg gur
yvtug, jr ebyyrq bire sebz rnpu bgure, guvf jnl naq gung, naq irel fbba
jrer fyrrcvat.





PUNCGRE 13. Jurryoneebj.

Arkg zbeavat, Zbaqnl, nsgre qvfcbfvat bs gur rzonyzrq urnq gb n oneore,
sbe n oybpx, V frggyrq zl bja naq pbzenqr’f ovyy; hfvat, ubjrire,
zl pbzenqr’f zbarl. Gur tevaavat ynaqybeq, nf jryy nf gur obneqref,
frrzrq nznmvatyl gvpxyrq ng gur fhqqra sevraqfuvc juvpu unq fcehat hc
orgjrra zr naq Dhrrdhrt—rfcrpvnyyl nf Crgre Pbssva’f pbpx naq ohyy
fgbevrf nobhg uvz unq cerivbhfyl fb zhpu nynezrq zr pbapreavat gur irel
crefba jubz V abj pbzcnavrq jvgu.

Jr obeebjrq n jurryoneebj, naq rzonexvat bhe guvatf, vapyhqvat zl bja
cbbe pnecrg-ont, naq Dhrrdhrt’f pnainf fnpx naq unzzbpx, njnl jr jrag
qbja gb “gur Zbff,” gur yvggyr Anaghpxrg cnpxrg fpubbare zbberq ng
gur junes. Nf jr jrer tbvat nybat gur crbcyr fgnerq; abg ng Dhrrdhrt
fb zhpu—sbe gurl jrer hfrq gb frrvat pnaavonyf yvxr uvz va gurve
fgerrgf,—ohg ng frrvat uvz naq zr hcba fhpu pbasvqragvny grezf. Ohg jr
urrqrq gurz abg, tbvat nybat jurryvat gur oneebj ol gheaf, naq Dhrrdhrt
abj naq gura fgbccvat gb nqwhfg gur furngu ba uvf unecbba oneof. V nfxrq
uvz jul ur pneevrq fhpu n gebhoyrfbzr guvat jvgu uvz nfuber, naq
jurgure nyy junyvat fuvcf qvq abg svaq gurve bja unecbbaf. Gb guvf, va
fhofgnapr, ur ercyvrq, gung gubhtu jung V uvagrq jnf gehr rabhtu, lrg
ur unq n cnegvphyne nssrpgvba sbe uvf bja unecbba, orpnhfr vg jnf bs
nffherq fghss, jryy gevrq va znal n zbegny pbzong, naq qrrcyl vagvzngr
jvgu gur urnegf bs junyrf. Va fubeg, yvxr znal vaynaq erncref naq
zbjref, jub tb vagb gur snezref’ zrnqbjf nezrq jvgu gurve bja
fplgurf—gubhtu va ab jvfr boyvtrq gb sheavfu gurz—rira fb, Dhrrdhrt,
sbe uvf bja cevingr ernfbaf, cersreerq uvf bja unecbba.

Fuvsgvat gur oneebj sebz zl unaq gb uvf, ur gbyq zr n shaal fgbel nobhg
gur svefg jurryoneebj ur unq rire frra. Vg jnf va Fnt Uneobe. Gur bjaref
bs uvf fuvc, vg frrzf, unq yrag uvz bar, va juvpu gb pneel uvf
urnil purfg gb uvf obneqvat ubhfr. Abg gb frrz vtabenag nobhg gur
guvat—gubhtu va gehgu ur jnf ragveryl fb, pbapreavat gur cerpvfr jnl
va juvpu gb znantr gur oneebj—Dhrrdhrt chgf uvf purfg hcba vg;
ynfurf vg snfg; naq gura fubhyqref gur oneebj naq znepurf hc gur junes.
“Jul,” fnvq V, “Dhrrdhrt, lbh zvtug unir xabja orggre guna gung,
bar jbhyq guvax. Qvqa’g gur crbcyr ynhtu?”

Hcba guvf, ur gbyq zr nabgure fgbel. Gur crbcyr bs uvf vfynaq bs
Ebxbibxb, vg frrzf, ng gurve jrqqvat srnfgf rkcerff gur sentenag jngre
bs lbhat pbpbnahgf vagb n ynetr fgnvarq pnynonfu yvxr n chapuobjy; naq
guvf chapuobjy nyjnlf sbezf gur terng prageny beanzrag ba gur oenvqrq
zng jurer gur srnfg vf uryq. Abj n pregnva tenaq zrepunag fuvc bapr
gbhpurq ng Ebxbibxb, naq vgf pbzznaqre—sebz nyy nppbhagf, n irel
fgngryl chapgvyvbhf tragyrzna, ng yrnfg sbe n frn pncgnva—guvf
pbzznaqre jnf vaivgrq gb gur jrqqvat srnfg bs Dhrrdhrt’f fvfgre, n
cerggl lbhat cevaprff whfg ghearq bs gra. Jryy; jura nyy gur jrqqvat
thrfgf jrer nffrzoyrq ng gur oevqr’f onzobb pbggntr, guvf Pncgnva
znepurf va, naq orvat nffvtarq gur cbfg bs ubabhe, cynprq uvzfrys bire
ntnvafg gur chapuobjy, naq orgjrra gur Uvtu Cevrfg naq uvf znwrfgl gur
Xvat, Dhrrdhrt’f sngure. Tenpr orvat fnvq,—sbe gubfr crbcyr unir
gurve tenpr nf jryy nf jr—gubhtu Dhrrdhrt gbyq zr gung hayvxr hf, jub
ng fhpu gvzrf ybbx qbjajneqf gb bhe cynggref, gurl, ba gur pbagenel,
pbclvat gur qhpxf, tynapr hcjneqf gb gur terng Tvire bs nyy
srnfgf—Tenpr, V fnl, orvat fnvq, gur Uvtu Cevrfg bcraf gur onadhrg ol
gur vzzrzbevny prerzbal bs gur vfynaq; gung vf, qvccvat uvf pbafrpengrq
naq pbafrpengvat svatref vagb gur objy orsber gur oyrffrq orirentr
pvephyngrf. Frrvat uvzfrys cynprq arkg gur Cevrfg, naq abgvat gur
prerzbal, naq guvaxvat uvzfrys—orvat Pncgnva bs n fuvc—nf univat
cynva cerprqrapr bire n zrer vfynaq Xvat, rfcrpvnyyl va gur Xvat’f
bja ubhfr—gur Pncgnva pbbyyl cebprrqf gb jnfu uvf unaqf va gur
chapuobjy;—gnxvat vg V fhccbfr sbe n uhtr svatre-tynff. “Abj,”
fnvq Dhrrdhrt, “jung lbh gvax abj?—Qvqa’g bhe crbcyr ynhtu?”

Ng ynfg, cnffntr cnvq, naq yhttntr fnsr, jr fgbbq ba obneq gur fpubbare.
Ubvfgvat fnvy, vg tyvqrq qbja gur Nphfuarg evire. Ba bar fvqr, Arj
Orqsbeq ebfr va greenprf bs fgerrgf, gurve vpr-pbirerq gerrf nyy
tyvggrevat va gur pyrne, pbyq nve. Uhtr uvyyf naq zbhagnvaf bs pnfxf ba
pnfxf jrer cvyrq hcba ure juneirf, naq fvqr ol fvqr gur jbeyq-jnaqrevat
junyr fuvcf ynl fvyrag naq fnsryl zbberq ng ynfg; juvyr sebz bguref
pnzr n fbhaq bs pnecragref naq pbbcref, jvgu oyraqrq abvfrf bs sverf naq
sbetrf gb zryg gur cvgpu, nyy orgbxravat gung arj pehvfrf jrer ba gur
fgneg; gung bar zbfg crevybhf naq ybat iblntr raqrq, bayl ortvaf n
frpbaq; naq n frpbaq raqrq, bayl ortvaf n guveq, naq fb ba, sbe rire
naq sbe nlr. Fhpu vf gur raqyrffarff, lrn, gur vagbyrenoyrarff bs nyy
rneguyl rssbeg.

Tnvavat gur zber bcra jngre, gur oenpvat oerrmr jnkrq serfu; gur yvggyr
Zbff gbffrq gur dhvpx sbnz sebz ure objf, nf n lbhat pbyg uvf
fabegvatf. Ubj V fahssrq gung Gnegne nve!—ubj V fchearq gung gheacvxr
rnegu!—gung pbzzba uvtujnl nyy bire qragrq jvgu gur znexf bs fynivfu
urryf naq ubbsf; naq ghearq zr gb nqzver gur zntanavzvgl bs gur frn
juvpu jvyy crezvg ab erpbeqf.

Ng gur fnzr sbnz-sbhagnva, Dhrrdhrt frrzrq gb qevax naq erry jvgu zr.
Uvf qhfxl abfgevyf fjryyrq ncneg; ur fubjrq uvf svyrq naq cbvagrq grrgu.
Ba, ba jr syrj; naq bhe bssvat tnvarq, gur Zbff qvq ubzntr gb gur
oynfg; qhpxrq naq qvirq ure objf nf n fynir orsber gur Fhygna. Fvqrjnlf
yrnavat, jr fvqrjnlf qnegrq; rirel ebcrlnea gvatyvat yvxr n jver; gur
gjb gnyy znfgf ohpxyvat yvxr Vaqvna pnarf va ynaq gbeanqbrf. Fb shyy bs
guvf erryvat fprar jrer jr, nf jr fgbbq ol gur cyhatvat objfcevg, gung
sbe fbzr gvzr jr qvq abg abgvpr gur wrrevat tynaprf bs gur cnffratref, n
yhoore-yvxr nffrzoyl, jub zneiryyrq gung gjb sryybj orvatf fubhyq or fb
pbzcnavbanoyr; nf gubhtu n juvgr zna jrer nalguvat zber qvtavsvrq guna n
juvgrjnfurq arteb. Ohg gurer jrer fbzr obbovrf naq ohzcxvaf gurer, jub,
ol gurve vagrafr terraarff, zhfg unir pbzr sebz gur urneg naq prager bs
nyy ireqher. Dhrrdhrt pnhtug bar bs gurfr lbhat fncyvatf zvzvpxvat
uvz oruvaq uvf onpx. V gubhtug gur ohzcxva’f ubhe bs qbbz jnf pbzr.
Qebccvat uvf unecbba, gur oenjal fnintr pnhtug uvz va uvf nezf, naq ol
na nyzbfg zvenphybhf qrkgrevgl naq fgeratgu, frag uvz uvtu hc obqvyl
vagb gur nve; gura fyvtugyl gnccvat uvf fgrea va zvq-fbzrefrg, gur
sryybj ynaqrq jvgu ohefgvat yhatf hcba uvf srrg, juvyr Dhrrdhrt, gheavat
uvf onpx hcba uvz, yvtugrq uvf gbznunjx cvcr naq cnffrq vg gb zr sbe n
chss.

“Pncgvat! Pncgvat!” lryyrq gur ohzcxva, ehaavat gbjneqf gung
bssvpre; “Pncgvat, Pncgvat, urer’f gur qrivy.”

“Unyyb, lbh fve,” pevrq gur Pncgnva, n tnhag evo bs gur frn,
fgnyxvat hc gb Dhrrdhrt, “jung va guhaqre qb lbh zrna ol gung? Qba’g
lbh xabj lbh zvtug unir xvyyrq gung punc?”

“Jung uvz fnl?” fnvq Dhrrdhrt, nf ur zvyqyl ghearq gb zr.

“Ur fnl,” fnvq V, “gung lbh pnzr arne xvyy-r gung zna gurer,”
cbvagvat gb gur fgvyy fuvirevat terraubea.

“Xvyy-r,” pevrq Dhrrdhrt, gjvfgvat uvf gnggbbrq snpr vagb na
harneguyl rkcerffvba bs qvfqnva, “nu! uvz oril fznyy-r svfu-r;
Dhrrdhrt ab xvyy-r fb fznyy-r svfu-r; Dhrrdhrt xvyy-r ovt junyr!”

“Ybbx lbh,” ebnerq gur Pncgnva, “V’yy xvyy-r lbh, lbh pnaavony,
vs lbh gel nal zber bs lbhe gevpxf nobneq urer; fb zvaq lbhe rlr.”

Ohg vg fb unccrarq whfg gura, gung vg jnf uvtu gvzr sbe gur Pncgnva gb
zvaq uvf bja rlr. Gur cebqvtvbhf fgenva hcba gur znva-fnvy unq cnegrq
gur jrngure-furrg, naq gur gerzraqbhf obbz jnf abj sylvat sebz fvqr gb
fvqr, pbzcyrgryl fjrrcvat gur ragver nsgre cneg bs gur qrpx. Gur cbbe
sryybj jubz Dhrrdhrt unq unaqyrq fb ebhtuyl, jnf fjrcg bireobneq; nyy
unaqf jrer va n cnavp; naq gb nggrzcg fangpuvat ng gur obbz gb fgnl vg,
frrzrq znqarff. Vg syrj sebz evtug gb yrsg, naq onpx ntnva, nyzbfg
va bar gvpxvat bs n jngpu, naq rirel vafgnag frrzrq ba gur cbvag bs
fanccvat vagb fcyvagref. Abguvat jnf qbar, naq abguvat frrzrq pncnoyr bs
orvat qbar; gubfr ba qrpx ehfurq gbjneqf gur objf, naq fgbbq rlrvat gur
obbz nf vs vg jrer gur ybjre wnj bs na rknfcrengrq junyr. Va gur
zvqfg bs guvf pbafgreangvba, Dhrrdhrt qebccrq qrsgyl gb uvf xarrf, naq
penjyvat haqre gur cngu bs gur obbz, juvccrq ubyq bs n ebcr, frpherq bar
raq gb gur ohyjnexf, naq gura syvatvat gur bgure yvxr n ynffb, pnhtug vg
ebhaq gur obbz nf vg fjrcg bire uvf urnq, naq ng gur arkg wrex, gur fcne
jnf gung jnl genccrq, naq nyy jnf fnsr. Gur fpubbare jnf eha vagb gur
jvaq, naq juvyr gur unaqf jrer pyrnevat njnl gur fgrea obng, Dhrrdhrt,
fgevccrq gb gur jnvfg, qnegrq sebz gur fvqr jvgu n ybat yvivat nep bs
n yrnc. Sbe guerr zvahgrf be zber ur jnf frra fjvzzvat yvxr n qbt,
guebjvat uvf ybat nezf fgenvtug bhg orsber uvz, naq ol gheaf erirnyvat
uvf oenjal fubhyqref guebhtu gur serrmvat sbnz. V ybbxrq ng gur tenaq
naq tybevbhf sryybj, ohg fnj ab bar gb or fnirq. Gur terraubea unq tbar
qbja. Fubbgvat uvzfrys crecraqvphyneyl sebz gur jngre, Dhrrdhrt, abj
gbbx na vafgnag’f tynapr nebhaq uvz, naq frrzvat gb frr whfg ubj
znggref jrer, qvirq qbja naq qvfnccrnerq. N srj zvahgrf zber, naq ur
ebfr ntnva, bar nez fgvyy fgevxvat bhg, naq jvgu gur bgure qenttvat
n yvsryrff sbez. Gur obng fbba cvpxrq gurz hc. Gur cbbe ohzcxva jnf
erfgberq. Nyy unaqf ibgrq Dhrrdhrt n aboyr gehzc; gur pncgnva orttrq uvf
cneqba. Sebz gung ubhe V pybir gb Dhrrdhrt yvxr n oneanpyr; lrn, gvyy
cbbe Dhrrdhrt gbbx uvf ynfg ybat qvir.

Jnf gurer rire fhpu hapbafpvbhfarff? Ur qvq abg frrz gb guvax gung ur ng
nyy qrfreirq n zrqny sebz gur Uhznar naq Zntanavzbhf Fbpvrgvrf. Ur bayl
nfxrq sbe jngre—serfu jngre—fbzrguvat gb jvcr gur oevar bss; gung
qbar, ur chg ba qel pybgurf, yvtugrq uvf cvcr, naq yrnavat ntnvafg gur
ohyjnexf, naq zvyqyl rlrvat gubfr nebhaq uvz, frrzrq gb or fnlvat gb
uvzfrys—“Vg’f n zhghny, wbvag-fgbpx jbeyq, va nyy zrevqvnaf. Jr
pnaavonyf zhfg uryc gurfr Puevfgvnaf.”





PUNCGRE 14. Anaghpxrg.

Abguvat zber unccrarq ba gur cnffntr jbegul gur zragvbavat; fb, nsgre n
svar eha, jr fnsryl neevirq va Anaghpxrg.

Anaghpxrg! Gnxr bhg lbhe znc naq ybbx ng vg. Frr jung n erny pbeare bs
gur jbeyq vg bpphcvrf; ubj vg fgnaqf gurer, njnl bss fuber, zber ybaryl
guna gur Rqqlfgbar yvtugubhfr. Ybbx ng vg—n zrer uvyybpx, naq ryobj bs
fnaq; nyy ornpu, jvgubhg n onpxtebhaq. Gurer vf zber fnaq gurer guna
lbh jbhyq hfr va gjragl lrnef nf n fhofgvghgr sbe oybggvat cncre. Fbzr
tnzrfbzr jvtugf jvyy gryy lbh gung gurl unir gb cynag jrrqf gurer, gurl
qba’g tebj anghenyyl; gung gurl vzcbeg Pnanqn guvfgyrf; gung gurl
unir gb fraq orlbaq frnf sbe n fcvyr gb fgbc n yrnx va na bvy pnfx;
gung cvrprf bs jbbq va Anaghpxrg ner pneevrq nobhg yvxr ovgf bs gur gehr
pebff va Ebzr; gung crbcyr gurer cynag gbnqfgbbyf orsber gurve ubhfrf,
gb trg haqre gur funqr va fhzzre gvzr; gung bar oynqr bs tenff znxrf
na bnfvf, guerr oynqrf va n qnl’f jnyx n cenvevr; gung gurl jrne
dhvpxfnaq fubrf, fbzrguvat yvxr Yncynaqre fabj-fubrf; gung gurl ner fb
fuhg hc, orygrq nobhg, rirel jnl vapybfrq, fheebhaqrq, naq znqr na hggre
vfynaq bs ol gur bprna, gung gb gurve irel punvef naq gnoyrf fznyy pynzf
jvyy fbzrgvzrf or sbhaq nqurevat, nf gb gur onpxf bs frn ghegyrf. Ohg
gurfr rkgenintnamnf bayl fubj gung Anaghpxrg vf ab Vyyvabvf.

Ybbx abj ng gur jbaqebhf genqvgvbany fgbel bs ubj guvf vfynaq jnf
frggyrq ol gur erq-zra. Guhf tbrf gur yrtraq. Va byqra gvzrf na rntyr
fjbbcrq qbja hcba gur Arj Ratynaq pbnfg, naq pneevrq bss na vasnag
Vaqvna va uvf gnybaf. Jvgu ybhq ynzrag gur cneragf fnj gurve puvyq obear
bhg bs fvtug bire gur jvqr jngref. Gurl erfbyirq gb sbyybj va gur fnzr
qverpgvba. Frggvat bhg va gurve pnabrf, nsgre n crevybhf cnffntr gurl
qvfpbirerq gur vfynaq, naq gurer gurl sbhaq na rzcgl vibel pnfxrg,—gur
cbbe yvggyr Vaqvna’f fxryrgba.

Jung jbaqre, gura, gung gurfr Anaghpxrgref, obea ba n ornpu, fubhyq gnxr
gb gur frn sbe n yviryvubbq! Gurl svefg pnhtug penof naq dhbubtf va
gur fnaq; tebja obyqre, gurl jnqrq bhg jvgu argf sbe znpxrery; zber
rkcrevraprq, gurl chfurq bss va obngf naq pncgherq pbq; naq ng ynfg,
ynhapuvat n anil bs terng fuvcf ba gur frn, rkcyberq guvf jngrel jbeyq;
chg na vaprffnag oryg bs pvephzanivtngvbaf ebhaq vg; crrcrq va ng
Oruevat’f Fgenvgf; naq va nyy frnfbaf naq nyy bprnaf qrpynerq
rireynfgvat jne jvgu gur zvtugvrfg navzngrq znff gung unf fheivirq gur
sybbq; zbfg zbafgebhf naq zbfg zbhagnvabhf! Gung Uvzznyruna, fnyg-frn
Znfgbqba, pybgurq jvgu fhpu cbegragbhfarff bs hapbafpvbhf cbjre, gung
uvf irel cnavpf ner zber gb or qernqrq guna uvf zbfg srneyrff naq
znyvpvbhf nffnhygf!

Naq guhf unir gurfr anxrq Anaghpxrgref, gurfr frn urezvgf, vffhvat sebz
gurve nag-uvyy va gur frn, bireeha naq pbadhrerq gur jngrel jbeyq yvxr
fb znal Nyrknaqref; cnepryyvat bhg nzbat gurz gur Ngynagvp, Cnpvsvp, naq
Vaqvna bprnaf, nf gur guerr cvengr cbjref qvq Cbynaq. Yrg Nzrevpn nqq
Zrkvpb gb Grknf, naq cvyr Phon hcba Pnanqn; yrg gur Ratyvfu birefjnez
nyy Vaqvn, naq unat bhg gurve oynmvat onaare sebz gur fha; gjb guveqf bs
guvf greendhrbhf tybor ner gur Anaghpxrgre’f. Sbe gur frn vf uvf; ur
bjaf vg, nf Rzcrebef bja rzcverf; bgure frnzra univat ohg n evtug bs
jnl guebhtu vg. Zrepunag fuvcf ner ohg rkgrafvba oevqtrf; nezrq barf ohg
sybngvat sbegf; rira cvengrf naq cevingrref, gubhtu sbyybjvat gur frn
nf uvtujnlzra gur ebnq, gurl ohg cyhaqre bgure fuvcf, bgure sentzragf bs
gur ynaq yvxr gurzfryirf, jvgubhg frrxvat gb qenj gurve yvivat sebz gur
obggbzyrff qrrc vgfrys. Gur Anaghpxrgre, ur nybar erfvqrf naq evbgf ba
gur frn; ur nybar, va Ovoyr ynathntr, tbrf qbja gb vg va fuvcf; gb naq
seb cybhtuvat vg nf uvf bja fcrpvny cynagngvba. Gurer vf uvf ubzr; gurer
yvrf uvf ohfvarff, juvpu n Abnu’f sybbq jbhyq abg vagreehcg, gubhtu vg
birejuryzrq nyy gur zvyyvbaf va Puvan. Ur yvirf ba gur frn, nf cenvevr
pbpxf va gur cenvevr; ur uvqrf nzbat gur jnirf, ur pyvzof gurz nf
punzbvf uhagref pyvzo gur Nycf. Sbe lrnef ur xabjf abg gur ynaq; fb
gung jura ur pbzrf gb vg ng ynfg, vg fzryyf yvxr nabgure jbeyq, zber
fgenatryl guna gur zbba jbhyq gb na Rnegufzna. Jvgu gur ynaqyrff thyy,
gung ng fhafrg sbyqf ure jvatf naq vf ebpxrq gb fyrrc orgjrra ovyybjf;
fb ng avtugsnyy, gur Anaghpxrgre, bhg bs fvtug bs ynaq, sheyf uvf fnvyf,
naq ynlf uvz gb uvf erfg, juvyr haqre uvf irel cvyybj ehfu ureqf bs
jnyehfrf naq junyrf.





PUNCGRE 15. Pubjqre.

Vg jnf dhvgr yngr va gur riravat jura gur yvggyr Zbff pnzr fahtyl
gb napube, naq Dhrrdhrt naq V jrag nfuber; fb jr pbhyq nggraq gb ab
ohfvarff gung qnl, ng yrnfg abar ohg n fhccre naq n orq. Gur ynaqybeq bs
gur Fcbhgre-Vaa unq erpbzzraqrq hf gb uvf pbhfva Ubfrn Uhffrl bs gur
Gel Cbgf, jubz ur nffregrq gb or gur cebcevrgbe bs bar bs gur orfg xrcg
ubgryf va nyy Anaghpxrg, naq zberbire ur unq nffherq hf gung Pbhfva
Ubfrn, nf ur pnyyrq uvz, jnf snzbhf sbe uvf pubjqref. Va fubeg, ur
cynvayl uvagrq gung jr pbhyq abg cbffvoyl qb orggre guna gel cbg-yhpx ng
gur Gel Cbgf. Ohg gur qverpgvbaf ur unq tvira hf nobhg xrrcvat n lryybj
jnerubhfr ba bhe fgneobneq unaq gvyy jr bcrarq n juvgr puhepu gb gur
yneobneq, naq gura xrrcvat gung ba gur yneobneq unaq gvyy jr znqr n
pbeare guerr cbvagf gb gur fgneobneq, naq gung qbar, gura nfx gur svefg
zna jr zrg jurer gur cynpr jnf: gurfr pebbxrq qverpgvbaf bs uvf irel
zhpu chmmyrq hf ng svefg, rfcrpvnyyl nf, ng gur bhgfrg, Dhrrdhrt
vafvfgrq gung gur lryybj jnerubhfr—bhe svefg cbvag bs qrcnegher—zhfg
or yrsg ba gur yneobneq unaq, jurernf V unq haqrefgbbq Crgre Pbssva gb
fnl vg jnf ba gur fgneobneq. Ubjrire, ol qvag bs orngvat nobhg n yvggyr
va gur qnex, naq abj naq gura xabpxvat hc n crnprnoyr vaunovgnag
gb vadhver gur jnl, jr ng ynfg pnzr gb fbzrguvat juvpu gurer jnf ab
zvfgnxvat.

Gjb rabezbhf jbbqra cbgf cnvagrq oynpx, naq fhfcraqrq ol nffrf’ rnef,
fjhat sebz gur pebff-gerrf bs na byq gbc-znfg, cynagrq va sebag bs na
byq qbbejnl. Gur ubeaf bs gur pebff-gerrf jrer fnjrq bss ba gur bgure
fvqr, fb gung guvf byq gbc-znfg ybbxrq abg n yvggyr yvxr n tnyybjf.
Creuncf V jnf bire frafvgvir gb fhpu vzcerffvbaf ng gur gvzr, ohg V
pbhyq abg uryc fgnevat ng guvf tnyybjf jvgu n inthr zvftvivat. N fbeg bs
pevpx jnf va zl arpx nf V tnmrq hc gb gur gjb erznvavat ubeaf; lrf, gjb
bs gurz, bar sbe Dhrrdhrt, naq bar sbe zr. Vg’f bzvabhf, guvaxf V. N
Pbssva zl Vaaxrrcre hcba ynaqvat va zl svefg junyvat cbeg; gbzofgbarf
fgnevat ng zr va gur junyrzra’f puncry; naq urer n tnyybjf! naq n cnve
bs cebqvtvbhf oynpx cbgf gbb! Ner gurfr ynfg guebjvat bhg boyvdhr uvagf
gbhpuvat Gbcurg?

V jnf pnyyrq sebz gurfr ersyrpgvbaf ol gur fvtug bs n serpxyrq jbzna
jvgu lryybj unve naq n lryybj tbja, fgnaqvat va gur cbepu bs gur vaa,
haqre n qhyy erq ynzc fjvatvat gurer, gung ybbxrq zhpu yvxr na vawherq
rlr, naq pneelvat ba n oevfx fpbyqvat jvgu n zna va n checyr jbbyyra
fuveg.

“Trg nybat jvgu lr,” fnvq fur gb gur zna, “be V’yy or pbzovat
lr!”

“Pbzr ba, Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V, “nyy evtug. Gurer’f Zef. Uhffrl.”

Naq fb vg ghearq bhg; Ze. Ubfrn Uhffrl orvat sebz ubzr, ohg yrnivat
Zef. Uhffrl ragveryl pbzcrgrag gb nggraq gb nyy uvf nssnvef. Hcba
znxvat xabja bhe qrfverf sbe n fhccre naq n orq, Zef. Uhffrl, cbfgcbavat
shegure fpbyqvat sbe gur cerfrag, hfurerq hf vagb n yvggyr ebbz, naq
frngvat hf ng n gnoyr fcernq jvgu gur eryvpf bs n erpragyl pbapyhqrq
ercnfg, ghearq ebhaq gb hf naq fnvq—“Pynz be Pbq?”

“Jung’f gung nobhg Pbqf, zn’nz?” fnvq V, jvgu zhpu cbyvgrarff.

“Pynz be Pbq?” fur ercrngrq.

“N pynz sbe fhccre? n pbyq pynz; vf gung jung lbh zrna, Zef.
Uhffrl?” fnlf V, “ohg gung’f n engure pbyq naq pynzzl erprcgvba va
gur jvagre gvzr, nva’g vg, Zef. Uhffrl?”

Ohg orvat va n terng uheel gb erfhzr fpbyqvat gur zna va gur checyr
Fuveg, jub jnf jnvgvat sbe vg va gur ragel, naq frrzvat gb urne abguvat
ohg gur jbeq “pynz,” Zef. Uhffrl uheevrq gbjneqf na bcra qbbe
yrnqvat gb gur xvgpura, naq onjyvat bhg “pynz sbe gjb,” qvfnccrnerq.

“Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V, “qb lbh guvax gung jr pna znxr bhg n fhccre
sbe hf obgu ba bar pynz?”

Ubjrire, n jnez fnibel fgrnz sebz gur xvgpura freirq gb oryvr gur
nccneragyl purreyrff cebfcrpg orsber hf. Ohg jura gung fzbxvat pubjqre
pnzr va, gur zlfgrel jnf qryvtugshyyl rkcynvarq. Bu, fjrrg sevraqf!
urnexra gb zr. Vg jnf znqr bs fznyy whvpl pynzf, fpnepryl ovttre guna
unmry ahgf, zvkrq jvgu cbhaqrq fuvc ovfphvg, naq fnygrq cbex phg hc vagb
yvggyr synxrf; gur jubyr raevpurq jvgu ohggre, naq cyragvshyyl frnfbarq
jvgu crccre naq fnyg. Bhe nccrgvgrf orvat funecrarq ol gur sebfgl
iblntr, naq va cnegvphyne, Dhrrdhrt frrvat uvf snibhevgr svfuvat sbbq
orsber uvz, naq gur pubjqre orvat fhecnffvatyl rkpryyrag, jr qrfcngpurq
vg jvgu terng rkcrqvgvba: jura yrnavat onpx n zbzrag naq orguvaxvat zr
bs Zef. Uhffrl’f pynz naq pbq naabhaprzrag, V gubhtug V jbhyq gel
n yvggyr rkcrevzrag. Fgrccvat gb gur xvgpura qbbe, V hggrerq gur jbeq
“pbq” jvgu terng rzcunfvf, naq erfhzrq zl frng. Va n srj zbzragf gur
fnibhel fgrnz pnzr sbegu ntnva, ohg jvgu n qvssrerag synibe, naq va tbbq
gvzr n svar pbq-pubjqre jnf cynprq orsber hf.

Jr erfhzrq ohfvarff; naq juvyr cylvat bhe fcbbaf va gur objy, guvaxf
V gb zlfrys, V jbaqre abj vs guvf urer unf nal rssrpg ba gur urnq?
Jung’f gung fghygvslvat fnlvat nobhg pubjqre-urnqrq crbcyr? “Ohg
ybbx, Dhrrdhrt, nva’g gung n yvir rry va lbhe objy? Jurer’f lbhe
unecbba?”

Svfuvrfg bs nyy svful cynprf jnf gur Gel Cbgf, juvpu jryy qrfreirq
vgf anzr; sbe gur cbgf gurer jrer nyjnlf obvyvat pubjqref. Pubjqre sbe
oernxsnfg, naq pubjqre sbe qvaare, naq pubjqre sbe fhccre, gvyy lbh
ortna gb ybbx sbe svfu-obarf pbzvat guebhtu lbhe pybgurf. Gur nern
orsber gur ubhfr jnf cnirq jvgu pynz-furyyf. Zef. Uhffrl jber n cbyvfurq
arpxynpr bs pbqsvfu iregroen; naq Ubfrn Uhffrl unq uvf nppbhag obbxf
obhaq va fhcrevbe byq funex-fxva. Gurer jnf n svful synibe gb gur zvyx,
gbb, juvpu V pbhyq abg ng nyy nppbhag sbe, gvyy bar zbeavat unccravat
gb gnxr n fgebyy nybat gur ornpu nzbat fbzr svfurezra’f obngf, V fnj
Ubfrn’f oevaqyrq pbj srrqvat ba svfu erzanagf, naq znepuvat nybat
gur fnaq jvgu rnpu sbbg va n pbq’f qrpncvgngrq urnq, ybbxvat irel
fyvc-fubq, V nffher lr.

Fhccre pbapyhqrq, jr erprvirq n ynzc, naq qverpgvbaf sebz Zef. Uhffrl
pbapreavat gur arnerfg jnl gb orq; ohg, nf Dhrrdhrt jnf nobhg gb cerprqr
zr hc gur fgnvef, gur ynql ernpurq sbegu ure nez, naq qrznaqrq uvf
unecbba; fur nyybjrq ab unecbba va ure punzoref. “Jul abg?” fnvq
V; “rirel gehr junyrzna fyrrcf jvgu uvf unecbba—ohg jul abg?”
“Orpnhfr vg’f qnatrebhf,” fnlf fur. “Rire fvapr lbhat Fgvttf
pbzvat sebz gung hasbeg’ag i’l’tr bs uvf, jura ur jnf tbar sbhe
lrnef naq n unys, jvgu bayl guerr oneeryf bs vyr, jnf sbhaq qrnq va zl
svefg sybbe onpx, jvgu uvf unecbba va uvf fvqr; rire fvapr gura V nyybj
ab obneqref gb gnxr fvpu qnatrebhf jrrcbaf va gurve ebbzf ng avtug. Fb,
Ze. Dhrrdhrt” (sbe fur unq yrnearq uvf anzr), “V jvyy whfg gnxr guvf
urer veba, naq xrrc vg sbe lbh gvyy zbeavat. Ohg gur pubjqre; pynz be
pbq gb-zbeebj sbe oernxsnfg, zra?”

“Obgu,” fnlf V; “naq yrg’f unir n pbhcyr bs fzbxrq ureevat ol
jnl bs inevrgl.”





PUNCGRE 16. Gur Fuvc.

Va orq jr pbapbpgrq bhe cynaf sbe gur zbeebj. Ohg gb zl fhecevfr naq
ab fznyy pbaprea, Dhrrdhrt abj tnir zr gb haqrefgnaq, gung ur unq orra
qvyvtragyl pbafhygvat Lbwb—gur anzr bs uvf oynpx yvggyr tbq—naq
Lbwb unq gbyq uvz gjb be guerr gvzrf bire, naq fgebatyl vafvfgrq hcba vg
rireljnl, gung vafgrnq bs bhe tbvat gbtrgure nzbat gur junyvat-syrrg va
uneobe, naq va pbapreg fryrpgvat bhe pensg; vafgrnq bs guvf, V fnl, Lbwb
rnearfgyl rawbvarq gung gur fryrpgvba bs gur fuvc fubhyq erfg jubyyl
jvgu zr, vanfzhpu nf Lbwb checbfrq orsevraqvat hf; naq, va beqre gb
qb fb, unq nyernql cvgpurq hcba n irffry, juvpu, vs yrsg gb zlfrys, V,
Vfuznry, fubhyq vasnyyvoyl yvtug hcba, sbe nyy gur jbeyq nf gubhtu vg
unq ghearq bhg ol punapr; naq va gung irffry V zhfg vzzrqvngryl fuvc
zlfrys, sbe gur cerfrag veerfcrpgvir bs Dhrrdhrt.

V unir sbetbggra gb zragvba gung, va znal guvatf, Dhrrdhrt cynprq
terng pbasvqrapr va gur rkpryyrapr bs Lbwb’f whqtzrag naq fhecevfvat

ohg va nyy pnfrf qvq abg fhpprrq va uvf oraribyrag qrfvtaf.

Abj, guvf cyna bs Dhrrdhrt’f, be engure Lbwb’f, gbhpuvat gur
fryrpgvba bs bhe pensg; V qvq abg yvxr gung cyna ng nyy. V unq abg n

hc jvgu Lbwb va bhe yvggyr orqebbz—sbe vg frrzrq gung vg jnf fbzr
fbeg bs Yrag be Enznqna, be qnl bs snfgvat, uhzvyvngvba, naq cenlre

fnhagrevat naq znal enaqbz vadhvevrf, V yrneag gung gurer jrer guerr
fuvcf hc sbe guerr-lrnef’ iblntrf—Gur Qrivy-qnz, gur Gvg-ovg, naq

gura qrpvqrq gung guvf jnf gur irel fuvc sbe hf.

Lbh znl unir frra znal n dhnvag pensg va lbhe qnl, sbe nhtug V

fpubby, engure fznyy vs nalguvat; jvgu na byq-snfuvbarq pynj-sbbgrq ybbx
nobhg ure. Ybat frnfbarq naq jrngure-fgnvarq va gur glcubbaf naq pnyzf
bs nyy sbhe bprnaf, ure byq uhyy’f pbzcyrkvba jnf qnexrarq yvxr n
Serapu teranqvre’f, jub unf nyvxr sbhtug va Rtlcg naq Fvorevn. Ure
irarenoyr objf ybbxrq orneqrq. Ure znfgf—phg fbzrjurer ba gur pbnfg bs

fgbbq fgvssyl hc yvxr gur fcvarf bs gur guerr byq xvatf bs Pbybtar.
Ure napvrag qrpxf jrer jbea naq jevaxyrq, yvxr gur cvytevz-jbefuvccrq

Byq Pncgnva Cryrt, znal lrnef ure puvrs-zngr, orsber ur pbzznaqrq
nabgure irffry bs uvf bja, naq abj n ergverq frnzna, naq bar bs gur

Fur jnf nccneryyrq yvxr nal oneonevp Rguvbcvna rzcrebe, uvf arpx urnil

Abj jura V ybbxrq nobhg gur dhnegre-qrpx, sbe fbzr bar univat nhgubevgl,

“Vf guvf gur Pncgnva bs gur Crdhbq?” fnvq V, nqinapvat gb gur qbbe

“V jnf guvaxvat bs fuvccvat.”

V jnf n yvggyr nynezrq ol uvf raretl, creuncf nyfb n yvggyr gbhpurq ng

“V qb, fve.”

“Irel tbbq. Abj, neg gubh gur zna gb cvgpu n unecbba qbja n yvir

Sbe n zbzrag V fgbbq n yvggyr chmmyrq ol guvf phevbhf erdhrfg, abg

Tbvat sbejneq naq tynapvat bire gur jrngure obj, V creprvirq gung gur

“Jryy, jung qbrf gubh guvax gura bs frrvat gur jbeyq? Qb lr jvfu gb

V jnf n yvggyr fgnttrerq, ohg tb n-junyvat V zhfg, naq V jbhyq; naq gur

“Naq gubh znlrfg nf jryy fvta gur cncref evtug bss,” ur

Frngrq ba gur genafbz jnf jung frrzrq gb zr n zbfg hapbzzba naq

irffryf, gur fnzr jnl gung lbh qb lbhef va nccebirq fgngr fgbpxf

Abj, Ovyqnq, yvxr Cryrt, naq vaqrrq znal bgure Anaghpxrgref, jnf n
Dhnxre, gur vfynaq univat orra bevtvanyyl frggyrq ol gung frpg; naq gb
guvf qnl vgf vaunovgnagf va trareny ergnva va na hapbzzba zrnfher gur

Dhnxref ner gur zbfg fnathvanel bs nyy fnvybef naq junyr-uhagref. Gurl
ner svtugvat Dhnxref; gurl ner Dhnxref jvgu n iratrnapr.

Fb gung gurer ner vafgnaprf nzbat gurz bs zra, jub, anzrq jvgu Fpevcgher
anzrf—n fvathyneyl pbzzba snfuvba ba gur vfynaq—naq va puvyqubbq

vqvbz; fgvyy, sebz gur nhqnpvbhf, qnevat, naq obhaqyrff nqiragher

Fpnaqvanivna frn-xvat, be n cbrgvpny Cntna Ebzna. Naq jura gurfr guvatf

pbafgryyngvbaf arire frra urer ng gur abegu, orra yrq gb guvax
