bar va n jubyr angvba’f prafhf—n zvtugl cntrnag perngher, sbezrq
sbe aboyr gentrqvrf. Abe jvyy vg ng nyy qrgenpg sebz uvz, qenzngvpnyyl
ertneqrq, vs rvgure ol ovegu be bgure pvephzfgnaprf, ur unir jung frrzf
n unys jvyshy bireehyvat zbeovqarff ng gur obggbz bs uvf angher. Sbe nyy
zra gentvpnyyl terng ner znqr fb guebhtu n pregnva zbeovqarff. Or fher
bs guvf, B lbhat nzovgvba, nyy zbegny terngarff vf ohg qvfrnfr. Ohg,
nf lrg jr unir abg gb qb jvgu fhpu na bar, ohg jvgu dhvgr nabgure; naq
fgvyy n zna, jub, vs vaqrrq crphyvne, vg bayl erfhygf ntnva sebz nabgure
cunfr bs gur Dhnxre, zbqvsvrq ol vaqvivqhny pvephzfgnaprf.

Yvxr Pncgnva Cryrt, Pncgnva Ovyqnq jnf n jryy-gb-qb, ergverq junyrzna.
Ohg hayvxr Pncgnva Cryrt—jub pnerq abg n ehfu sbe jung ner pnyyrq
frevbhf guvatf, naq vaqrrq qrrzrq gubfr frys-fnzr frevbhf guvatf gur
irevrfg bs nyy gevsyrf—Pncgnva Ovyqnq unq abg bayl orra bevtvanyyl
rqhpngrq nppbeqvat gb gur fgevpgrfg frpg bs Anaghpxrg Dhnxrevfz, ohg nyy
uvf fhofrdhrag bprna yvsr, naq gur fvtug bs znal hapynq, ybiryl vfynaq
perngherf, ebhaq gur Ubea—nyy gung unq abg zbirq guvf angvir obea
Dhnxre bar fvatyr wbg, unq abg fb zhpu nf nygrerq bar natyr bs uvf
irfg. Fgvyy, sbe nyy guvf vzzhgnoyrarff, jnf gurer fbzr ynpx bs
pbzzba pbafvfgrapl nobhg jbegul Pncgnva Cryrt. Gubhtu ershfvat, sebz
pbafpvragvbhf fpehcyrf, gb orne nezf ntnvafg ynaq vainqref, lrg uvzfrys
unq vyyvzvgnoyl vainqrq gur Ngynagvp naq Cnpvsvp; naq gubhtu n fjbea sbr
gb uhzna oybbqfurq, lrg unq ur va uvf fgenvtug-obqvrq pbng, fcvyyrq ghaf
hcba ghaf bs yrivnguna tber. Ubj abj va gur pbagrzcyngvir riravat bs uvf
qnlf, gur cvbhf Ovyqnq erpbapvyrq gurfr guvatf va gur erzvavfprapr, V qb
abg xabj; ohg vg qvq abg frrz gb pbaprea uvz zhpu, naq irel cebonoyl ur
unq ybat fvapr pbzr gb gur fntr naq frafvoyr pbapyhfvba gung n zna’f
eryvtvba vf bar guvat, naq guvf cenpgvpny jbeyq dhvgr nabgure. Guvf
jbeyq cnlf qvivqraqf. Evfvat sebz n yvggyr pnova-obl va fubeg pybgurf
bs gur qenoorfg qeno, gb n unecbbarre va n oebnq funq-oryyvrq jnvfgpbng;
sebz gung orpbzvat obng-urnqre, puvrs-zngr, naq pncgnva, naq svanyyl n
fuvc bjare; Ovyqnq, nf V uvagrq orsber, unq pbapyhqrq uvf nqiraghebhf
pnerre ol jubyyl ergvevat sebz npgvir yvsr ng gur tbbqyl ntr bs
fvkgl, naq qrqvpngvat uvf erznvavat qnlf gb gur dhvrg erprvivat bs uvf
jryy-rnearq vapbzr.

Abj, Ovyqnq, V nz fbeel gb fnl, unq gur erchgngvba bs orvat na
vapbeevtvoyr byq uhaxf, naq va uvf frn-tbvat qnlf, n ovggre, uneq
gnfx-znfgre. Gurl gbyq zr va Anaghpxrg, gubhtu vg pregnvayl frrzf n
phevbhf fgbel, gung jura ur fnvyrq gur byq Pngrthg junyrzna, uvf perj,
hcba neevivat ubzr, jrer zbfgyl nyy pneevrq nfuber gb gur ubfcvgny, fber
rkunhfgrq naq jbea bhg. Sbe n cvbhf zna, rfcrpvnyyl sbe n Dhnxre, ur jnf
pregnvayl engure uneq-urnegrq, gb fnl gur yrnfg. Ur arire hfrq gb fjrne,
gubhtu, ng uvf zra, gurl fnvq; ohg fbzrubj ur tbg na vabeqvangr
dhnagvgl bs pehry, hazvgvtngrq uneq jbex bhg bs gurz. Jura Ovyqnq jnf n
puvrs-zngr, gb unir uvf qeno-pbybherq rlr vagragyl ybbxvat ng lbh, znqr
lbh srry pbzcyrgryl areibhf, gvyy lbh pbhyq pyhgpu fbzrguvat—n unzzre
be n zneyvat-fcvxr, naq tb gb jbex yvxr znq, ng fbzrguvat be bgure,
arire zvaq jung. Vaqbyrapr naq vqyrarff crevfurq orsber uvz. Uvf bja
crefba jnf gur rknpg rzobqvzrag bs uvf hgvyvgnevna punenpgre. Ba uvf
ybat, tnhag obql, ur pneevrq ab fcner syrfu, ab fhcresyhbhf orneq,
uvf puva univat n fbsg, rpbabzvpny anc gb vg, yvxr gur jbea anc bs uvf
oebnq-oevzzrq ung.

Fhpu, gura, jnf gur crefba gung V fnj frngrq ba gur genafbz jura V
sbyybjrq Pncgnva Cryrt qbja vagb gur pnova. Gur fcnpr orgjrra gur qrpxf
jnf fznyy; naq gurer, obyg-hcevtug, fng byq Ovyqnq, jub nyjnlf fng fb,
naq arire yrnarq, naq guvf gb fnir uvf pbng gnvyf. Uvf oebnq-oevz jnf
cynprq orfvqr uvz; uvf yrtf jrer fgvssyl pebffrq; uvf qeno irfgher jnf
ohggbarq hc gb uvf puva; naq fcrpgnpyrf ba abfr, ur frrzrq nofbeorq va
ernqvat sebz n cbaqrebhf ibyhzr.

“Ovyqnq,” pevrq Pncgnva Cryrt, “ng vg ntnva, Ovyqnq, ru? Lr unir
orra fghqlvat gubfr Fpevcgherf, abj, sbe gur ynfg guvegl lrnef, gb zl
pregnva xabjyrqtr. Ubj sne lr tbg, Ovyqnq?”

Nf vs ybat unovghngrq gb fhpu cebsnar gnyx sebz uvf byq fuvczngr,
Ovyqnq, jvgubhg abgvpvat uvf cerfrag veerirerapr, dhvrgyl ybbxrq hc, naq
frrvat zr, tynaprq ntnva vadhvevatyl gbjneqf Cryrt.

“Ur fnlf ur’f bhe zna, Ovyqnq,” fnvq Cryrt, “ur jnagf gb
fuvc.”

“Qbfg gurr?” fnvq Ovyqnq, va n ubyybj gbar, naq gheavat ebhaq gb zr.

“V qbfg,” fnvq V hapbafpvbhfyl, ur jnf fb vagrafr n Dhnxre.

“Jung qb lr guvax bs uvz, Ovyqnq?” fnvq Cryrt.

“Ur’yy qb,” fnvq Ovyqnq, rlrvat zr, naq gura jrag ba fcryyvat njnl
ng uvf obbx va n zhzoyvat gbar dhvgr nhqvoyr.

V gubhtug uvz gur dhrrerfg byq Dhnxre V rire fnj, rfcrpvnyyl nf Cryrt,
uvf sevraq naq byq fuvczngr, frrzrq fhpu n oyhfgrere. Ohg V fnvq
abguvat, bayl ybbxvat ebhaq zr funecyl. Cryrt abj guerj bcra n purfg,
naq qenjvat sbegu gur fuvc’f negvpyrf, cynprq cra naq vax orsber uvz,
naq frngrq uvzfrys ng n yvggyr gnoyr. V ortna gb guvax vg jnf uvtu gvzr
gb frggyr jvgu zlfrys ng jung grezf V jbhyq or jvyyvat gb ratntr sbe gur
iblntr. V jnf nyernql njner gung va gur junyvat ohfvarff gurl cnvq ab
jntrf; ohg nyy unaqf, vapyhqvat gur pncgnva, erprvirq pregnva funerf bs
gur cebsvgf pnyyrq ynlf, naq gung gurfr ynlf jrer cebcbegvbarq gb gur
qrterr bs vzcbegnapr cregnvavat gb gur erfcrpgvir qhgvrf bs gur fuvc’f
pbzcnal. V jnf nyfb njner gung orvat n terra unaq ng junyvat, zl bja
ynl jbhyq abg or irel ynetr; ohg pbafvqrevat gung V jnf hfrq gb gur frn,
pbhyq fgrre n fuvc, fcyvpr n ebcr, naq nyy gung, V znqr ab qbhog gung
sebz nyy V unq urneq V fubhyq or bssrerq ng yrnfg gur 275gu ynl—gung
vf, gur 275gu cneg bs gur pyrne arg cebprrqf bs gur iblntr, jungrire
gung zvtug riraghnyyl nzbhag gb. Naq gubhtu gur 275gu ynl jnf jung gurl
pnyy n engure ybat ynl, lrg vg jnf orggre guna abguvat; naq vs jr unq n
yhpxl iblntr, zvtug cerggl arneyl cnl sbe gur pybguvat V jbhyq jrne bhg
ba vg, abg gb fcrnx bs zl guerr lrnef’ orrs naq obneq, sbe juvpu V
jbhyq abg unir gb cnl bar fgvire.

Vg zvtug or gubhtug gung guvf jnf n cbbe jnl gb npphzhyngr n cevapryl
sbeghar—naq fb vg jnf, n irel cbbe jnl vaqrrq. Ohg V nz bar bs gubfr
gung arire gnxr ba nobhg cevapryl sbegharf, naq nz dhvgr pbagrag vs gur
jbeyq vf ernql gb obneq naq ybqtr zr, juvyr V nz chggvat hc ng guvf tevz
fvta bs gur Guhaqre Pybhq. Hcba gur jubyr, V gubhtug gung gur 275gu ynl
jbhyq or nobhg gur snve guvat, ohg jbhyq abg unir orra fhecevfrq unq V
orra bssrerq gur 200gu, pbafvqrevat V jnf bs n oebnq-fubhyqrerq znxr.

Ohg bar guvat, arireguryrff, gung znqr zr n yvggyr qvfgehfgshy nobhg
erprvivat n trarebhf funer bs gur cebsvgf jnf guvf: Nfuber, V unq urneq
fbzrguvat bs obgu Pncgnva Cryrt naq uvf hanppbhagnoyr byq pebal Ovyqnq;
ubj gung gurl orvat gur cevapvcny cebcevrgbef bs gur Crdhbq, gurersber
gur bgure naq zber vapbafvqrenoyr naq fpnggrerq bjaref, yrsg arneyl gur
jubyr znantrzrag bs gur fuvc’f nssnvef gb gurfr gjb. Naq V qvq abg
xabj ohg jung gur fgvatl byq Ovyqnq zvtug unir n zvtugl qrny gb fnl
nobhg fuvccvat unaqf, rfcrpvnyyl nf V abj sbhaq uvz ba obneq gur Crdhbq,
dhvgr ng ubzr gurer va gur pnova, naq ernqvat uvf Ovoyr nf vs ng uvf
bja sverfvqr. Abj juvyr Cryrt jnf invayl gelvat gb zraq n cra jvgu uvf
wnpx-xavsr, byq Ovyqnq, gb zl ab fznyy fhecevfr, pbafvqrevat gung ur jnf
fhpu na vagrerfgrq cnegl va gurfr cebprrqvatf; Ovyqnq arire urrqrq
hf, ohg jrag ba zhzoyvat gb uvzfrys bhg bs uvf obbx, “Ynl abg hc sbe
lbhefryirf gernfherf hcba rnegu, jurer zbgu—”

“Jryy, Pncgnva Ovyqnq,” vagreehcgrq Cryrt, “jung q’lr fnl, jung
ynl funyy jr tvir guvf lbhat zna?”

“Gubh xabjrfg orfg,” jnf gur frchypueny ercyl, “gur frira uhaqerq
naq friragl-friragu jbhyqa’g or gbb zhpu, jbhyq vg?—‘jurer zbgu
naq ehfg qb pbeehcg, ohg ynl—‘”

Ynl, vaqrrq, gubhtug V, naq fhpu n ynl! gur frira uhaqerq naq
friragl-friragu! Jryy, byq Ovyqnq, lbh ner qrgrezvarq gung V, sbe bar,
funyy abg ynl hc znal ynlf urer orybj, jurer zbgu naq ehfg qb pbeehcg.
Vg jnf na rkprrqvatyl ybat ynl gung, vaqrrq; naq gubhtu sebz gur
zntavghqr bs gur svther vg zvtug ng svefg qrprvir n ynaqfzna, lrg
gur fyvtugrfg pbafvqrengvba jvyy fubj gung gubhtu frira uhaqerq naq
friragl-frira vf n cerggl ynetr ahzore, lrg, jura lbh pbzr gb znxr
n grragu bs vg, lbh jvyy gura frr, V fnl, gung gur frira uhaqerq naq
friragl-friragu cneg bs n sneguvat vf n tbbq qrny yrff guna frira
uhaqerq naq friragl-frira tbyq qbhoybbaf; naq fb V gubhtug ng gur gvzr.

“Jul, oynfg lbhe rlrf, Ovyqnq,” pevrq Cryrt, “gubh qbfg abg jnag
gb fjvaqyr guvf lbhat zna! ur zhfg unir zber guna gung.”

“Frira uhaqerq naq friragl-friragu,” ntnva fnvq Ovyqnq, jvgubhg
yvsgvat uvf rlrf; naq gura jrag ba zhzoyvat—“sbe jurer lbhe gernfher
vf, gurer jvyy lbhe urneg or nyfb.”

“V nz tbvat gb chg uvz qbja sbe gur guerr uhaqerqgu,” fnvq Cryrt,
“qb lr urne gung, Ovyqnq! Gur guerr uhaqerqgu ynl, V fnl.”

Ovyqnq ynvq qbja uvf obbx, naq gheavat fbyrzayl gbjneqf uvz fnvq,
“Pncgnva Cryrt, gubh unfg n trarebhf urneg; ohg gubh zhfg pbafvqre gur
qhgl gubh bjrfg gb gur bgure bjaref bs guvf fuvc—jvqbjf naq becunaf,
znal bs gurz—naq gung vs jr gbb nohaqnagyl erjneq gur ynobef bs
guvf lbhat zna, jr znl or gnxvat gur oernq sebz gubfr jvqbjf naq gubfr
becunaf. Gur frira uhaqerq naq friragl-friragu ynl, Pncgnva Cryrt.”

“Gubh Ovyqnq!” ebnerq Cryrt, fgnegvat hc naq pynggrevat nobhg gur
pnova. “Oynfg lr, Pncgnva Ovyqnq, vs V unq sbyybjrq gul nqivpr va
gurfr znggref, V jbhyq nsber abj unq n pbafpvrapr gb yht nobhg gung
jbhyq or urnil rabhtu gb sbhaqre gur ynetrfg fuvc gung rire fnvyrq ebhaq
Pncr Ubea.”

“Pncgnva Cryrt,” fnvq Ovyqnq fgrnqvyl, “gul pbafpvrapr znl or
qenjvat gra vapurf bs jngre, be gra sngubzf, V pna’g gryy; ohg nf
gubh neg fgvyy na vzcravgrag zna, Pncgnva Cryrt, V terngyl srne yrfg gul
pbafpvrapr or ohg n yrnxl bar; naq jvyy va gur raq fvax gurr sbhaqrevat
qbja gb gur svrel cvg, Pncgnva Cryrt.”

“Svrel cvg! svrel cvg! lr vafhyg zr, zna; cnfg nyy angheny ornevat, lr
vafhyg zr. Vg’f na nyy-sverq bhgentr gb gryy nal uhzna perngher gung
ur’f obhaq gb uryy. Syhxrf naq synzrf! Ovyqnq, fnl gung ntnva gb zr,
naq fgneg zl fbhy-obygf, ohg V’yy—V’yy—lrf, V’yy fjnyybj n
yvir tbng jvgu nyy uvf unve naq ubeaf ba. Bhg bs gur pnova, lr pnagvat,
qeno-pbybherq fba bs n jbbqra tha—n fgenvtug jnxr jvgu lr!”

Nf ur guhaqrerq bhg guvf ur znqr n ehfu ng Ovyqnq, ohg jvgu n zneiryybhf
boyvdhr, fyvqvat pryrevgl, Ovyqnq sbe gung gvzr ryhqrq uvz.

Nynezrq ng guvf greevoyr bhgohefg orgjrra gur gjb cevapvcny naq
erfcbafvoyr bjaref bs gur fuvc, naq srryvat unys n zvaq gb tvir hc
nyy vqrn bs fnvyvat va n irffry fb dhrfgvbanoyl bjarq naq grzcbenevyl
pbzznaqrq, V fgrccrq nfvqr sebz gur qbbe gb tvir rterff gb Ovyqnq, jub,
V znqr ab qbhog, jnf nyy rntrearff gb inavfu sebz orsber gur njnxrarq
jengu bs Cryrt. Ohg gb zl nfgbavfuzrag, ur fng qbja ntnva ba gur
genafbz irel dhvrgyl, naq frrzrq gb unir abg gur fyvtugrfg vagragvba bs
jvguqenjvat. Ur frrzrq dhvgr hfrq gb vzcravgrag Cryrt naq uvf jnlf. Nf
sbe Cryrt, nsgre yrggvat bss uvf entr nf ur unq, gurer frrzrq ab zber
yrsg va uvz, naq ur, gbb, fng qbja yvxr n ynzo, gubhtu ur gjvgpurq
n yvggyr nf vs fgvyy areibhfyl ntvgngrq. “Jurj!” ur juvfgyrq ng
ynfg—“gur fdhnyy’f tbar bss gb yrrjneq, V guvax. Ovyqnq, gubh hfrq
gb or tbbq ng funecravat n ynapr, zraq gung cra, jvyy lr. Zl wnpx-xavsr
urer arrqf gur tevaqfgbar. Gung’f ur; gunax lr, Ovyqnq. Abj gura, zl
lbhat zna, Vfuznry’f gul anzr, qvqa’g lr fnl? Jryy gura, qbja lr tb
urer, Vfuznry, sbe gur guerr uhaqerqgu ynl.”

“Pncgnva Cryrt,” fnvq V, “V unir n sevraq jvgu zr jub jnagf gb
fuvc gbb—funyy V oevat uvz qbja gb-zbeebj?”

“Gb or fher,” fnvq Cryrt. “Srgpu uvz nybat, naq jr’yy ybbx ng
uvz.”

“Jung ynl qbrf ur jnag?” tebnarq Ovyqnq, tynapvat hc sebz gur obbx
va juvpu ur unq ntnva orra ohelvat uvzfrys.

“Bu! arire gurr zvaq nobhg gung, Ovyqnq,” fnvq Cryrt. “Unf ur rire
junyrq vg nal?” gheavat gb zr.

“Xvyyrq zber junyrf guna V pna pbhag, Pncgnva Cryrt.”

“Jryy, oevat uvz nybat gura.”

Naq, nsgre fvtavat gur cncref, bss V jrag; abguvat qbhogvat ohg gung V
unq qbar n tbbq zbeavat’f jbex, naq gung gur Crdhbq jnf gur vqragvpny
fuvc gung Lbwb unq cebivqrq gb pneel Dhrrdhrt naq zr ebhaq gur Pncr.

Ohg V unq abg cebprrqrq sne, jura V ortna gb orguvax zr gung gur Pncgnva
jvgu jubz V jnf gb fnvy lrg erznvarq hafrra ol zr; gubhtu, vaqrrq, va
znal pnfrf, n junyr-fuvc jvyy or pbzcyrgryl svggrq bhg, naq erprvir nyy
ure perj ba obneq, rer gur pncgnva znxrf uvzfrys ivfvoyr ol neevivat
gb gnxr pbzznaq; sbe fbzrgvzrf gurfr iblntrf ner fb cebybatrq, naq gur
fuber vagreinyf ng ubzr fb rkprrqvatyl oevrs, gung vs gur pncgnva unir
n snzvyl, be nal nofbeovat pbapreazrag bs gung fbeg, ur qbrf abg gebhoyr
uvzfrys zhpu nobhg uvf fuvc va cbeg, ohg yrnirf ure gb gur bjaref gvyy
nyy vf ernql sbe frn. Ubjrire, vg vf nyjnlf nf jryy gb unir n ybbx ng
uvz orsber veeribpnoyl pbzzvggvat lbhefrys vagb uvf unaqf. Gheavat onpx
V nppbfgrq Pncgnva Cryrt, vadhvevat jurer Pncgnva Nuno jnf gb or sbhaq.

“Naq jung qbfg gubh jnag bs Pncgnva Nuno? Vg’f nyy evtug rabhtu;
gubh neg fuvccrq.”

“Lrf, ohg V fubhyq yvxr gb frr uvz.”

“Ohg V qba’g guvax gubh jvyg or noyr gb ng cerfrag. V qba’g xabj
rknpgyl jung’f gur znggre jvgu uvz; ohg ur xrrcf pybfr vafvqr gur
ubhfr; n fbeg bs fvpx, naq lrg ur qba’g ybbx fb. Va snpg, ur nva’g
fvpx; ohg ab, ur vfa’g jryy rvgure. Nal ubj, lbhat zna, ur jba’g
nyjnlf frr zr, fb V qba’g fhccbfr ur jvyy gurr. Ur’f n dhrre zna,
Pncgnva Nuno—fb fbzr guvax—ohg n tbbq bar. Bu, gubh’yg yvxr uvz
jryy rabhtu; ab srne, ab srne. Ur’f n tenaq, hatbqyl, tbq-yvxr zna,
Pncgnva Nuno; qbrfa’g fcrnx zhpu; ohg, jura ur qbrf fcrnx, gura lbh
znl jryy yvfgra. Znex lr, or sberjnearq; Nuno’f nobir gur pbzzba;
Nuno’f orra va pbyyrtrf, nf jryy nf ‘zbat gur pnaavonyf; orra hfrq
gb qrrcre jbaqref guna gur jnirf; svkrq uvf svrel ynapr va zvtugvre,
fgenatre sbrf guna junyrf. Uvf ynapr! nlr, gur xrrarfg naq gur fherfg
gung bhg bs nyy bhe vfyr! Bu! ur nva’g Pncgnva Ovyqnq; ab, naq ur
nva’g Pncgnva Cryrt; ur’f Nuno, obl; naq Nuno bs byq, gubh xabjrfg,
jnf n pebjarq xvat!”

“Naq n irel ivyr bar. Jura gung jvpxrq xvat jnf fynva, gur qbtf, qvq
gurl abg yvpx uvf oybbq?”

“Pbzr uvgure gb zr—uvgure, uvgure,” fnvq Cryrt, jvgu n
fvtavsvpnapr va uvf rlr gung nyzbfg fgnegyrq zr. “Ybbx lr, ynq; arire
fnl gung ba obneq gur Crdhbq. Arire fnl vg naljurer. Pncgnva Nuno qvq
abg anzr uvzfrys. ‘Gjnf n sbbyvfu, vtabenag juvz bs uvf penml, jvqbjrq
zbgure, jub qvrq jura ur jnf bayl n gjryirzbagu byq. Naq lrg gur
byq fdhnj Gvfgvt, ng Tnlurnq, fnvq gung gur anzr jbhyq fbzrubj cebir
cebcurgvp. Naq, creuncf, bgure sbbyf yvxr ure znl gryy gurr gur fnzr. V
jvfu gb jnea gurr. Vg’f n yvr. V xabj Pncgnva Nuno jryy; V’ir fnvyrq
jvgu uvz nf zngr lrnef ntb; V xabj jung ur vf—n tbbq zna—abg n
cvbhf, tbbq zna, yvxr Ovyqnq, ohg n fjrnevat tbbq zna—fbzrguvat yvxr
zr—bayl gurer’f n tbbq qrny zber bs uvz. Nlr, nlr, V xabj gung ur
jnf arire irel wbyyl; naq V xabj gung ba gur cnffntr ubzr, ur jnf n
yvggyr bhg bs uvf zvaq sbe n fcryy; ohg vg jnf gur funec fubbgvat cnvaf
va uvf oyrrqvat fghzc gung oebhtug gung nobhg, nf nal bar zvtug frr. V
xabj, gbb, gung rire fvapr ur ybfg uvf yrt ynfg iblntr ol gung npphefrq
junyr, ur’f orra n xvaq bs zbbql—qrfcrengr zbbql, naq fnintr
fbzrgvzrf; ohg gung jvyy nyy cnff bss. Naq bapr sbe nyy, yrg zr gryy
gurr naq nffher gurr, lbhat zna, vg’f orggre gb fnvy jvgu n zbbql tbbq
pncgnva guna n ynhtuvat onq bar. Fb tbbq-olr gb gurr—naq jebat abg
Pncgnva Nuno, orpnhfr ur unccraf gb unir n jvpxrq anzr. Orfvqrf, zl obl,
ur unf n jvsr—abg guerr iblntrf jrqqrq—n fjrrg, erfvtarq tvey. Guvax
bs gung; ol gung fjrrg tvey gung byq zna unf n puvyq: ubyq lr gura
gurer pna or nal hggre, ubcryrff unez va Nuno? Ab, ab, zl ynq; fgevpxra,
oynfgrq, vs ur or, Nuno unf uvf uhznavgvrf!”

Nf V jnyxrq njnl, V jnf shyy bs gubhtugshyarff; jung unq orra
vapvqragnyyl erirnyrq gb zr bs Pncgnva Nuno, svyyrq zr jvgu n pregnva
jvyq inthrarff bs cnvashyarff pbapreavat uvz. Naq fbzrubj, ng gur gvzr,
V sryg n flzcngul naq n fbeebj sbe uvz, ohg sbe V qba’g xabj jung,
hayrff vg jnf gur pehry ybff bs uvf yrt. Naq lrg V nyfb sryg n fgenatr
njr bs uvz; ohg gung fbeg bs njr, juvpu V pnaabg ng nyy qrfpevor, jnf
abg rknpgyl njr; V qb abg xabj jung vg jnf. Ohg V sryg vg; naq vg qvq
abg qvfvapyvar zr gbjneqf uvz; gubhtu V sryg vzcngvrapr ng jung frrzrq
yvxr zlfgrel va uvz, fb vzcresrpgyl nf ur jnf xabja gb zr gura. Ubjrire,
zl gubhtugf jrer ng yratgu pneevrq va bgure qverpgvbaf, fb gung sbe gur
cerfrag qnex Nuno fyvccrq zl zvaq.





PUNCGRE 17. Gur Enznqna.

Nf Dhrrdhrt’f Enznqna, be Snfgvat naq Uhzvyvngvba, jnf gb pbagvahr
nyy qnl, V qvq abg pubbfr gb qvfgheo uvz gvyy gbjneqf avtug-snyy; sbe
V purevfu gur terngrfg erfcrpg gbjneqf rirelobql’f eryvtvbhf
boyvtngvbaf, arire zvaq ubj pbzvpny, naq pbhyq abg svaq vg va zl urneg
gb haqreinyhr rira n pbatertngvba bs nagf jbefuvccvat n gbnq-fgbby; be
gubfr bgure perngherf va pregnva cnegf bs bhe rnegu, jub jvgu n qrterr
bs sbbgznavfz dhvgr hacerprqragrq va bgure cynargf, obj qbja orsber
gur gbefb bs n qrprnfrq ynaqrq cebcevrgbe zreryl ba nppbhag bs gur
vabeqvangr cbffrffvbaf lrg bjarq naq eragrq va uvf anzr.

V fnl, jr tbbq Cerfolgrevna Puevfgvnaf fubhyq or punevgnoyr va gurfr
guvatf, naq abg snapl bhefryirf fb infgyl fhcrevbe gb bgure zbegnyf,
cntnaf naq jung abg, orpnhfr bs gurve unys-penml pbaprvgf ba gurfr
fhowrpgf. Gurer jnf Dhrrdhrt, abj, pregnvayl ragregnvavat gur zbfg
nofheq abgvbaf nobhg Lbwb naq uvf Enznqna;—ohg jung bs gung? Dhrrdhrt
gubhtug ur xarj jung ur jnf nobhg, V fhccbfr; ur frrzrq gb or pbagrag;
naq gurer yrg uvz erfg. Nyy bhe nethvat jvgu uvz jbhyq abg ninvy; yrg
uvz or, V fnl: naq Urnira unir zrepl ba hf nyy—Cerfolgrevnaf naq
Cntnaf nyvxr—sbe jr ner nyy fbzrubj qernqshyyl penpxrq nobhg gur urnq,
naq fnqyl arrq zraqvat.

Gbjneqf riravat, jura V sryg nffherq gung nyy uvf cresbeznaprf naq
evghnyf zhfg or bire, V jrag hc gb uvf ebbz naq xabpxrq ng gur qbbe;
ohg ab nafjre. V gevrq gb bcra vg, ohg vg jnf snfgrarq vafvqr.
“Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V fbsgyl guebhtu gur xrl-ubyr:—nyy fvyrag. “V
fnl, Dhrrdhrt! jul qba’g lbh fcrnx? Vg’f V—Vfuznry.” Ohg nyy
erznvarq fgvyy nf orsber. V ortna gb tebj nynezrq. V unq nyybjrq uvz
fhpu nohaqnag gvzr; V gubhtug ur zvtug unir unq na ncbcyrpgvp svg. V
ybbxrq guebhtu gur xrl-ubyr; ohg gur qbbe bcravat vagb na bqq pbeare bs
gur ebbz, gur xrl-ubyr cebfcrpg jnf ohg n pebbxrq naq fvavfgre bar. V
pbhyq bayl frr cneg bs gur sbbg-obneq bs gur orq naq n yvar bs gur jnyy,
ohg abguvat zber. V jnf fhecevfrq gb orubyq erfgvat ntnvafg gur jnyy
gur jbbqra funsg bs Dhrrdhrt’f unecbba, juvpu gur ynaqynql gur
riravat cerivbhf unq gnxra sebz uvz, orsber bhe zbhagvat gb gur punzore.
Gung’f fgenatr, gubhtug V; ohg ng nal engr, fvapr gur unecbba fgnaqf
lbaqre, naq ur fryqbz be arire tbrf noebnq jvgubhg vg, gurersber ur zhfg
or vafvqr urer, naq ab cbffvoyr zvfgnxr.

“Dhrrdhrt!—Dhrrdhrt!”—nyy fgvyy. Fbzrguvat zhfg unir unccrarq.
Ncbcyrkl! V gevrq gb ohefg bcra gur qbbe; ohg vg fghoobeayl erfvfgrq.
Ehaavat qbja fgnvef, V dhvpxyl fgngrq zl fhfcvpvbaf gb gur svefg
crefba V zrg—gur punzore-znvq. “Yn! yn!” fur pevrq, “V gubhtug
fbzrguvat zhfg or gur znggre. V jrag gb znxr gur orq nsgre oernxsnfg,
naq gur qbbe jnf ybpxrq; naq abg n zbhfr gb or urneq; naq vg’f orra
whfg fb fvyrag rire fvapr. Ohg V gubhtug, znl or, lbh unq obgu tbar
bss naq ybpxrq lbhe onttntr va sbe fnsr xrrcvat. Yn! yn,
zn’nz!—Zvfgerff! zheqre! Zef. Uhffrl! ncbcyrkl!”—naq jvgu gurfr
pevrf, fur ena gbjneqf gur xvgpura, V sbyybjvat.

Zef. Uhffrl fbba nccrnerq, jvgu n zhfgneq-cbg va bar unaq naq n
ivartne-pehrg va gur bgure, univat whfg oebxra njnl sebz gur bpphcngvba
bs nggraqvat gb gur pnfgbef, naq fpbyqvat ure yvggyr oynpx obl zrnagvzr.

“Jbbq-ubhfr!” pevrq V, “juvpu jnl gb vg? Eha sbe Tbq’f fnxr, naq
srgpu fbzrguvat gb cel bcra gur qbbe—gur nkr!—gur nkr! ur’f unq n
fgebxr; qrcraq hcba vg!”—naq fb fnlvat V jnf hazrgubqvpnyyl
ehfuvat hc fgnvef ntnva rzcgl-unaqrq, jura Zef. Uhffrl vagrecbfrq gur
zhfgneq-cbg naq ivartne-pehrg, naq gur ragver pnfgbe bs ure pbhagranapr.

“Jung’f gur znggre jvgu lbh, lbhat zna?”

“Trg gur nkr! Sbe Tbq’f fnxr, eha sbe gur qbpgbe, fbzr bar, juvyr V
cel vg bcra!”

“Ybbx urer,” fnvq gur ynaqynql, dhvpxyl chggvat qbja gur
ivartne-pehrg, fb nf gb unir bar unaq serr; “ybbx urer; ner lbh
gnyxvat nobhg celvat bcra nal bs zl qbbef?”—naq jvgu gung fur frvmrq
zl nez. “Jung’f gur znggre jvgu lbh? Jung’f gur znggre jvgu lbh,
fuvczngr?”

Va nf pnyz, ohg encvq n znaare nf cbffvoyr, V tnir ure gb haqrefgnaq gur
jubyr pnfr. Hapbafpvbhfyl pynccvat gur ivartne-pehrg gb bar fvqr bs ure
abfr, fur ehzvangrq sbe na vafgnag; gura rkpynvzrq—“Ab! V unira’g
frra vg fvapr V chg vg gurer.” Ehaavat gb n yvggyr pybfrg haqre gur
ynaqvat bs gur fgnvef, fur tynaprq va, naq ergheavat, gbyq zr gung
Dhrrdhrt’f unecbba jnf zvffvat. “Ur’f xvyyrq uvzfrys,” fur
pevrq. “Vg’f hasbeg’angr Fgvttf qbar bire ntnva—gurer tbrf
nabgure pbhagrecnar—Tbq cvgl uvf cbbe zbgure!—vg jvyy or gur ehva
bs zl ubhfr. Unf gur cbbe ynq n fvfgre? Jurer’f gung tvey?—gurer,
Orggl, tb gb Faneyrf gur Cnvagre, naq gryy uvz gb cnvag zr n
fvta, jvgu—“ab fhvpvqrf crezvggrq urer, naq ab fzbxvat va gur
cneybe;”—zvtug nf jryy xvyy obgu oveqf ng bapr. Xvyy? Gur Ybeq or
zrepvshy gb uvf tubfg! Jung’f gung abvfr gurer? Lbh, lbhat zna, ninfg
gurer!”

Naq ehaavat hc nsgre zr, fur pnhtug zr nf V jnf ntnva gelvat gb sbepr
bcra gur qbbe.

“V qba’g nyybj vg; V jba’g unir zl cerzvfrf fcbvyrq. Tb sbe gur
ybpxfzvgu, gurer’f bar nobhg n zvyr sebz urer. Ohg ninfg!” chggvat
ure unaq va ure fvqr-cbpxrg, “urer’f n xrl gung’yy svg, V thrff;
yrg’f frr.” Naq jvgu gung, fur ghearq vg va gur ybpx; ohg, nynf!
Dhrrdhrt’f fhccyrzragny obyg erznvarq hajvguqenja jvguva.

“Unir gb ohefg vg bcra,” fnvq V, naq jnf ehaavat qbja gur ragel n
yvggyr, sbe n tbbq fgneg, jura gur ynaqynql pnhtug ng zr, ntnva ibjvat
V fubhyq abg oernx qbja ure cerzvfrf; ohg V gber sebz ure, naq jvgu n
fhqqra obqvyl ehfu qnfurq zlfrys shyy ntnvafg gur znex.

Jvgu n cebqvtvbhf abvfr gur qbbe syrj bcra, naq gur xabo fynzzvat
ntnvafg gur jnyy, frag gur cynfgre gb gur prvyvat; naq gurer, tbbq
urniraf! gurer fng Dhrrdhrt, nygbtrgure pbby naq frys-pbyyrpgrq; evtug
va gur zvqqyr bs gur ebbz; fdhnggvat ba uvf unzf, naq ubyqvat Lbwb ba
gbc bs uvf urnq. Ur ybbxrq arvgure bar jnl abe gur bgure jnl, ohg fng
yvxr n pneirq vzntr jvgu fpnepr n fvta bs npgvir yvsr.

“Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V, tbvat hc gb uvz, “Dhrrdhrt, jung’f gur
znggre jvgu lbh?”

“Ur unva’g orra n fvggva’ fb nyy qnl, unf ur?” fnvq gur
ynaqynql.

Ohg nyy jr fnvq, abg n jbeq pbhyq jr qent bhg bs uvz; V nyzbfg sryg
yvxr chfuvat uvz bire, fb nf gb punatr uvf cbfvgvba, sbe vg jnf nyzbfg
vagbyrenoyr, vg frrzrq fb cnvashyyl naq haanghenyyl pbafgenvarq;
rfcrpvnyyl, nf va nyy cebonovyvgl ur unq orra fvggvat fb sbe hcjneqf bs
rvtug be gra ubhef, tbvat gbb jvgubhg uvf erthyne zrnyf.

“Zef. Uhffrl,” fnvq V, “ur’f nyvir ng nyy riragf; fb yrnir hf,
vs lbh cyrnfr, naq V jvyy frr gb guvf fgenatr nssnve zlfrys.”

Pybfvat gur qbbe hcba gur ynaqynql, V raqrniberq gb cerinvy hcba
Dhrrdhrt gb gnxr n punve; ohg va inva. Gurer ur fng; naq nyy ur pbhyq
qb—sbe nyy zl cbyvgr negf naq oynaqvfuzragf—ur jbhyq abg zbir n crt,
abe fnl n fvatyr jbeq, abe rira ybbx ng zr, abe abgvpr zl cerfrapr va
gur fyvtugrfg jnl.

V jbaqre, gubhtug V, vs guvf pna cbffvoyl or n cneg bs uvf Enznqna; qb
gurl snfg ba gurve unzf gung jnl va uvf angvir vfynaq. Vg zhfg or fb;
lrf, vg’f cneg bs uvf perrq, V fhccbfr; jryy, gura, yrg uvz erfg;
ur’yy trg hc fbbare be yngre, ab qbhog. Vg pna’g ynfg sbe rire,
gunax Tbq, naq uvf Enznqna bayl pbzrf bapr n lrne; naq V qba’g oryvrir
vg’f irel chapghny gura.

V jrag qbja gb fhccre. Nsgre fvggvat n ybat gvzr yvfgravat gb gur ybat
fgbevrf bs fbzr fnvybef jub unq whfg pbzr sebz n cyhz-chqqvat iblntr, nf
gurl pnyyrq vg (gung vf, n fubeg junyvat-iblntr va n fpubbare be oevt,
pbasvarq gb gur abegu bs gur yvar, va gur Ngynagvp Bprna bayl); nsgre
yvfgravat gb gurfr cyhz-chqqvatref gvyy arneyl ryrira b’pybpx, V jrag
hc fgnvef gb tb gb orq, srryvat dhvgr fher ol guvf gvzr Dhrrdhrt zhfg
pregnvayl unir oebhtug uvf Enznqna gb n grezvangvba. Ohg ab; gurer ur
jnf whfg jurer V unq yrsg uvz; ur unq abg fgveerq na vapu. V ortna gb
tebj irkrq jvgu uvz; vg frrzrq fb qbjaevtug frafryrff naq vafnar gb or
fvggvat gurer nyy qnl naq unys gur avtug ba uvf unzf va n pbyq ebbz,
ubyqvat n cvrpr bs jbbq ba uvf urnq.

“Sbe urnira’f fnxr, Dhrrdhrt, trg hc naq funxr lbhefrys; trg hc naq
unir fbzr fhccre. Lbh’yy fgneir; lbh’yy xvyy lbhefrys, Dhrrdhrt.”
Ohg abg n jbeq qvq ur ercyl.

Qrfcnvevat bs uvz, gurersber, V qrgrezvarq gb tb gb orq naq gb fyrrc;
naq ab qbhog, orsber n terng juvyr, ur jbhyq sbyybj zr. Ohg cerivbhf gb
gheavat va, V gbbx zl urnil ornefxva wnpxrg, naq guerj vg bire uvz, nf
vg cebzvfrq gb or n irel pbyq avtug; naq ur unq abguvat ohg uvf beqvanel
ebhaq wnpxrg ba. Sbe fbzr gvzr, qb nyy V jbhyq, V pbhyq abg trg vagb
gur snvagrfg qbmr. V unq oybja bhg gur pnaqyr; naq gur zrer gubhtug bs
Dhrrdhrt—abg sbhe srrg bss—fvggvat gurer va gung harnfl cbfvgvba,
fgnex nybar va gur pbyq naq qnex; guvf znqr zr ernyyl jergpurq. Guvax bs
vg; fyrrcvat nyy avtug va gur fnzr ebbz jvgu n jvqr njnxr cntna ba uvf
unzf va guvf qernel, hanppbhagnoyr Enznqna!

Ohg fbzrubj V qebccrq bss ng ynfg, naq xarj abguvat zber gvyy oernx bs
qnl; jura, ybbxvat bire gur orqfvqr, gurer fdhnggrq Dhrrdhrt, nf vs ur
unq orra fperjrq qbja gb gur sybbe. Ohg nf fbba nf gur svefg tyvzcfr bs
fha ragrerq gur jvaqbj, hc ur tbg, jvgu fgvss naq tengvat wbvagf,
ohg jvgu n purreshy ybbx; yvzcrq gbjneqf zr jurer V ynl; cerffrq uvf
sberurnq ntnva ntnvafg zvar; naq fnvq uvf Enznqna jnf bire.

Abj, nf V orsber uvagrq, V unir ab bowrpgvba gb nal crefba’f eryvtvba,
or vg jung vg znl, fb ybat nf gung crefba qbrf abg xvyy be vafhyg nal
bgure crefba, orpnhfr gung bgure crefba qba’g oryvrir vg nyfb. Ohg
jura n zna’f eryvtvba orpbzrf ernyyl senagvp; jura vg vf n cbfvgvir
gbezrag gb uvz; naq, va svar, znxrf guvf rnegu bs bhef na hapbzsbegnoyr
vaa gb ybqtr va; gura V guvax vg uvtu gvzr gb gnxr gung vaqvivqhny nfvqr
naq nethr gur cbvag jvgu uvz.

Naq whfg fb V abj qvq jvgu Dhrrdhrt. “Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V, “trg vagb
orq abj, naq yvr naq yvfgra gb zr.” V gura jrag ba, ortvaavat jvgu
gur evfr naq cebterff bs gur cevzvgvir eryvtvbaf, naq pbzvat qbja gb gur
inevbhf eryvtvbaf bs gur cerfrag gvzr, qhevat juvpu gvzr V ynoberq
gb fubj Dhrrdhrt gung nyy gurfr Yragf, Enznqnaf, naq cebybatrq
unz-fdhnggvatf va pbyq, purreyrff ebbzf jrer fgnex abafrafr; onq sbe gur
urnygu; hfryrff sbe gur fbhy; bccbfrq, va fubeg, gb gur boivbhf ynjf bs
Ultvrar naq pbzzba frafr. V gbyq uvz, gbb, gung ur orvat va bgure guvatf
fhpu na rkgerzryl frafvoyr naq fntnpvbhf fnintr, vg cnvarq zr, irel
onqyl cnvarq zr, gb frr uvz abj fb qrcybenoyl sbbyvfu nobhg guvf
evqvphybhf Enznqna bs uvf. Orfvqrf, nethrq V, snfgvat znxrf gur obql
pnir va; urapr gur fcvevg pnirf va; naq nyy gubhtugf obea bs n snfg
zhfg arprffnevyl or unys-fgneirq. Guvf vf gur ernfba jul zbfg qlfcrcgvp
eryvtvbavfgf purevfu fhpu zrynapubyl abgvbaf nobhg gurve urernsgref. Va
bar jbeq, Dhrrdhrt, fnvq V, engure qvterffviryl; uryy vf na vqrn svefg
obea ba na haqvtrfgrq nccyr-qhzcyvat; naq fvapr gura crecrghngrq guebhtu
gur urerqvgnel qlfcrcfvnf ahegherq ol Enznqnaf.

V gura nfxrq Dhrrdhrt jurgure ur uvzfrys jnf rire gebhoyrq jvgu
qlfcrcfvn; rkcerffvat gur vqrn irel cynvayl, fb gung ur pbhyq gnxr vg
va. Ur fnvq ab; bayl hcba bar zrzbenoyr bppnfvba. Vg jnf nsgre n terng
srnfg tvira ol uvf sngure gur xvat, ba gur tnvavat bs n terng onggyr
jurerva svsgl bs gur rarzl unq orra xvyyrq ol nobhg gjb b’pybpx va gur
nsgreabba, naq nyy pbbxrq naq rngra gung irel riravat.

“Ab zber, Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V, fuhqqrevat; “gung jvyy qb;” sbe
V xarj gur vasreraprf jvgubhg uvf shegure uvagvat gurz. V unq frra n
fnvybe jub unq ivfvgrq gung irel vfynaq, naq ur gbyq zr gung vg jnf gur
phfgbz, jura n terng onggyr unq orra tnvarq gurer, gb oneorphr nyy gur
fynva va gur lneq be tneqra bs gur ivpgbe; naq gura, bar ol bar, gurl
jrer cynprq va terng jbbqra gerapuref, naq tneavfurq ebhaq yvxr n cvynh,
jvgu oernqsehvg naq pbpbnahgf; naq jvgu fbzr cnefyrl va gurve zbhguf,
jrer frag ebhaq jvgu gur ivpgbe’f pbzcyvzragf gb nyy uvf sevraqf, whfg
nf gubhtu gurfr cerfragf jrer fb znal Puevfgznf ghexrlf.

Nsgre nyy, V qb abg guvax gung zl erznexf nobhg eryvtvba znqr zhpu
vzcerffvba hcba Dhrrdhrt. Orpnhfr, va gur svefg cynpr, ur fbzrubj frrzrq
qhyy bs urnevat ba gung vzcbegnag fhowrpg, hayrff pbafvqrerq sebz uvf
bja cbvag bs ivrj; naq, va gur frpbaq cynpr, ur qvq abg zber guna bar
guveq haqrefgnaq zr, pbhpu zl vqrnf fvzcyl nf V jbhyq; naq, svanyyl, ur
ab qbhog gubhtug ur xarj n tbbq qrny zber nobhg gur gehr eryvtvba guna
V qvq. Ur ybbxrq ng zr jvgu n fbeg bs pbaqrfpraqvat pbaprea naq
pbzcnffvba, nf gubhtu ur gubhtug vg n terng cvgl gung fhpu n frafvoyr
lbhat zna fubhyq or fb ubcryrffyl ybfg gb rinatryvpny cntna cvrgl.

Ng ynfg jr ebfr naq qerffrq; naq Dhrrdhrt, gnxvat n cebqvtvbhfyl urnegl
oernxsnfg bs pubjqref bs nyy fbegf, fb gung gur ynaqynql fubhyq abg
znxr zhpu cebsvg ol ernfba bs uvf Enznqna, jr fnyyvrq bhg gb obneq gur
Crdhbq, fnhagrevat nybat, naq cvpxvat bhe grrgu jvgu unyvohg obarf.





PUNCGRE 18. Uvf Znex.

Nf jr jrer jnyxvat qbja gur raq bs gur junes gbjneqf gur fuvc, Dhrrdhrt
pneelvat uvf unecbba, Pncgnva Cryrt va uvf tehss ibvpr ybhqyl unvyrq hf
sebz uvf jvtjnz, fnlvat ur unq abg fhfcrpgrq zl sevraq jnf n pnaavony,
naq shegurezber naabhapvat gung ur yrg ab pnaavonyf ba obneq gung pensg,
hayrff gurl cerivbhfyl cebqhprq gurve cncref.

“Jung qb lbh zrna ol gung, Pncgnva Cryrt?” fnvq V, abj whzcvat ba
gur ohyjnexf, naq yrnivat zl pbzenqr fgnaqvat ba gur junes.

“V zrna,” ur ercyvrq, “ur zhfg fubj uvf cncref.”

“Lrf,” fnvq Pncgnva Ovyqnq va uvf ubyybj ibvpr, fgvpxvat uvf urnq
sebz oruvaq Cryrt’f, bhg bs gur jvtjnz. “Ur zhfg fubj gung ur’f
pbairegrq. Fba bs qnexarff,” ur nqqrq, gheavat gb Dhrrdhrt, “neg
gubh ng cerfrag va pbzzhavba jvgu nal Puevfgvna puhepu?”

“Jul,” fnvq V, “ur’f n zrzore bs gur svefg Pbatertngvbany
Puhepu.” Urer or vg fnvq, gung znal gnggbbrq fnintrf fnvyvat va
Anaghpxrg fuvcf ng ynfg pbzr gb or pbairegrq vagb gur puhepurf.

“Svefg Pbatertngvbany Puhepu,” pevrq Ovyqnq, “jung! gung jbefuvcf
va Qrnpba Qrhgrebabzl Pbyrzna’f zrrgvat-ubhfr?” naq fb fnlvat,
gnxvat bhg uvf fcrpgnpyrf, ur ehoorq gurz jvgu uvf terng lryybj onaqnan
unaqxrepuvrs, naq chggvat gurz ba irel pnershyyl, pnzr bhg bs gur
jvtjnz, naq yrnavat fgvssyl bire gur ohyjnexf, gbbx n tbbq ybat ybbx ng
Dhrrdhrt.

“Ubj ybat ungu ur orra n zrzore?” ur gura fnvq, gheavat gb zr;
“abg irel ybat, V engure thrff, lbhat zna.”

“Ab,” fnvq Cryrt, “naq ur unfa’g orra oncgvmrq evtug rvgure, be
vg jbhyq unir jnfurq fbzr bs gung qrivy’f oyhr bss uvf snpr.”

“Qb gryy, abj,” pevrq Ovyqnq, “vf guvf Cuvyvfgvar n erthyne zrzore
bs Qrnpba Qrhgrebabzl’f zrrgvat? V arire fnj uvz tbvat gurer, naq V
cnff vg rirel Ybeq’f qnl.”

“V qba’g xabj nalguvat nobhg Qrnpba Qrhgrebabzl be uvf zrrgvat,”
fnvq V; “nyy V xabj vf, gung Dhrrdhrt urer vf n obea zrzore bs gur
Svefg Pbatertngvbany Puhepu. Ur vf n qrnpba uvzfrys, Dhrrdhrt vf.”

“Lbhat zna,” fnvq Ovyqnq fgreayl, “gubh neg fxlynexvat jvgu
zr—rkcynva gulfrys, gubh lbhat Uvggvgr. Jung puhepu qbfg gurr zrna?
nafjre zr.”

Svaqvat zlfrys guhf uneq chfurq, V ercyvrq. “V zrna, fve, gur fnzr
napvrag Pngubyvp Puhepu gb juvpu lbh naq V, naq Pncgnva Cryrt gurer, naq
Dhrrdhrt urer, naq nyy bs hf, naq rirel zbgure’f fba naq fbhy bs
hf orybat; gur terng naq rireynfgvat Svefg Pbatertngvba bs guvf jubyr
jbefuvccvat jbeyq; jr nyy orybat gb gung; bayl fbzr bs hf purevfu fbzr
dhrre pebgpurgf ab jnlf gbhpuvat gur tenaq oryvrs; va gung jr nyy wbva
unaqf.”

“Fcyvpr, gubh zrna’fg fcyvpr unaqf,” pevrq Cryrt, qenjvat arnere.
“Lbhat zna, lbh’q orggre fuvc sbe n zvffvbanel, vafgrnq bs n
sber-znfg unaq; V arire urneq n orggre frezba. Qrnpba Qrhgrebabzl—jul
Sngure Znccyr uvzfrys pbhyqa’g orng vg, naq ur’f erpxbarq fbzrguvat.
Pbzr nobneq, pbzr nobneq; arire zvaq nobhg gur cncref. V fnl, gryy
Dhbubt gurer—jung’f gung lbh pnyy uvz? gryy Dhbubt gb fgrc nybat. Ol
gur terng napube, jung n unecbba ur’f tbg gurer! ybbxf yvxr tbbq fghss
gung; naq ur unaqyrf vg nobhg evtug. V fnl, Dhbubt, be jungrire lbhe
anzr vf, qvq lbh rire fgnaq va gur urnq bs n junyr-obng? qvq lbh rire
fgevxr n svfu?”

Jvgubhg fnlvat n jbeq, Dhrrdhrt, va uvf jvyq fbeg bs jnl, whzcrq hcba
gur ohyjnexf, sebz gurapr vagb gur objf bs bar bs gur junyr-obngf
unatvat gb gur fvqr; naq gura oenpvat uvf yrsg xarr, naq cbvfvat uvf
unecbba, pevrq bhg va fbzr fhpu jnl nf guvf:—

“Pnc’nva, lbh frr uvz fznyy qebc gne ba jngre qrer? Lbh frr uvz?
jryy, fcbfr uvz bar junyr rlr, jryy, qra!” naq gnxvat funec nvz ng vg,
ur qnegrq gur veba evtug bire byq Ovyqnq’f oebnq oevz, pyrna npebff
gur fuvc’f qrpxf, naq fgehpx gur tyvfgravat gne fcbg bhg bs fvtug.

“Abj,” fnvq Dhrrdhrt, dhvrgyl unhyvat va gur yvar, “fcbf-rr uvz
junyr-r rlr; jul, qnq junyr qrnq.”

“Dhvpx, Ovyqnq,” fnvq Cryrt, uvf cnegare, jub, ntunfg ng gur pybfr
ivpvavgl bs gur sylvat unecbba, unq ergerngrq gbjneqf gur pnova tnatjnl.
“Dhvpx, V fnl, lbh Ovyqnq, naq trg gur fuvc’f cncref. Jr zhfg unir
Urqtrubt gurer, V zrna Dhbubt, va bar bs bhe obngf. Ybbx lr, Dhbubt,
jr’yy tvir lr gur avargvrgu ynl, naq gung’f zber guna rire jnf tvira
n unecbbarre lrg bhg bs Anaghpxrg.”

Fb qbja jr jrag vagb gur pnova, naq gb zl terng wbl Dhrrdhrt jnf fbba
raebyyrq nzbat gur fnzr fuvc’f pbzcnal gb juvpu V zlfrys orybatrq.

Jura nyy ceryvzvanevrf jrer bire naq Cryrt unq tbg rirelguvat ernql sbe
fvtavat, ur ghearq gb zr naq fnvq, “V thrff, Dhbubt gurer qba’g xabj
ubj gb jevgr, qbrf ur? V fnl, Dhbubt, oynfg lr! qbfg gubh fvta gul anzr
be znxr gul znex?”

Ohg ng guvf dhrfgvba, Dhrrdhrt, jub unq gjvpr be guevpr orsber gnxra
cneg va fvzvyne prerzbavrf, ybbxrq ab jnlf nonfurq; ohg gnxvat gur
bssrerq cra, pbcvrq hcba gur cncre, va gur cebcre cynpr, na rknpg
pbhagrecneg bs n dhrre ebhaq svther juvpu jnf gnggbbrq hcba uvf nez;
fb gung guebhtu Pncgnva Cryrt’f bofgvangr zvfgnxr gbhpuvat uvf
nccryyngvir, vg fgbbq fbzrguvat yvxr guvf:—

Dhbubt. uvf K znex.

Zrnajuvyr Pncgnva Ovyqnq fng rnearfgyl naq fgrnqsnfgyl rlrvat Dhrrdhrt,
naq ng ynfg evfvat fbyrzayl naq shzoyvat va gur uhtr cbpxrgf bs uvf
oebnq-fxvegrq qeno pbng, gbbx bhg n ohaqyr bs genpgf, naq fryrpgvat bar
ragvgyrq “Gur Ynggre Qnl Pbzvat; be Ab Gvzr gb Ybfr,” cynprq vg va
Dhrrdhrt’f unaqf, naq gura tenfcvat gurz naq gur obbx jvgu obgu uvf,
ybbxrq rnearfgyl vagb uvf rlrf, naq fnvq, “Fba bs qnexarff, V zhfg qb
zl qhgl ol gurr; V nz cneg bjare bs guvf fuvc, naq srry pbaprearq sbe
gur fbhyf bs nyy vgf perj; vs gubh fgvyy pyvatrfg gb gul Cntna jnlf,
juvpu V fnqyl srne, V orfrrpu gurr, erznva abg sbe nlr n Oryvny
obaqfzna. Fchea gur vqby Oryy, naq gur uvqrbhf qentba; ghea sebz gur
jengu gb pbzr; zvaq guvar rlr, V fnl; bu! tbbqarff tenpvbhf! fgrre pyrne
bs gur svrel cvg!”

Fbzrguvat bs gur fnyg frn lrg yvatrerq va byq Ovyqnq’f ynathntr,
urgrebtrarbhfyl zvkrq jvgu Fpevcgheny naq qbzrfgvp cuenfrf.

“Ninfg gurer, ninfg gurer, Ovyqnq, ninfg abj fcbvyvat bhe
unecbbarre,” pevrq Cryrt. “Cvbhf unecbbarref arire znxr tbbq
iblntref—vg gnxrf gur funex bhg bs ‘rz; ab unecbbarre vf jbegu n
fgenj jub nvag cerggl funexvfu. Gurer jnf lbhat Ang Fjnvar, bapr gur
oenirfg obng-urnqre bhg bs nyy Anaghpxrg naq gur Ivarlneq; ur wbvarq gur
zrrgvat, naq arire pnzr gb tbbq. Ur tbg fb sevtugrarq nobhg uvf cynthl
fbhy, gung ur fuevaxrq naq furrerq njnl sebz junyrf, sbe srne bs
nsgre-pyncf, va pnfr ur tbg fgbir naq jrag gb Qnil Wbarf.”

“Cryrt! Cryrt!” fnvq Ovyqnq, yvsgvat uvf rlrf naq unaqf, “gubh
gulfrys, nf V zlfrys, unfg frra znal n crevybhf gvzr; gubh xabjrfg,
Cryrt, jung vg vf gb unir gur srne bs qrngu; ubj, gura, pna’fg gubh
cengr va guvf hatbqyl thvfr. Gubh oryvrfg guvar bja urneg, Cryrt. Gryy
zr, jura guvf fnzr Crdhbq urer unq ure guerr znfgf bireobneq va gung
glcubba ba Wncna, gung fnzr iblntr jura gubh jrag zngr jvgu Pncgnva
Nuno, qvq’fg gubh abg guvax bs Qrngu naq gur Whqtzrag gura?”

“Urne uvz, urne uvz abj,” pevrq Cryrt, znepuvat npebff gur pnova,
naq guehfgvat uvf unaqf sne qbja vagb uvf cbpxrgf,—“urne uvz, nyy
bs lr. Guvax bs gung! Jura rirel zbzrag jr gubhtug gur fuvc jbhyq fvax!
Qrngu naq gur Whqtzrag gura? Jung? Jvgu nyy guerr znfgf znxvat fhpu na
rireynfgvat guhaqrevat ntnvafg gur fvqr; naq rirel frn oernxvat bire hf,
sber naq nsg. Guvax bs Qrngu naq gur Whqtzrag gura? Ab! ab gvzr gb guvax
nobhg Qrngu gura. Yvsr jnf jung Pncgnva Nuno naq V jnf guvaxvat bs;
naq ubj gb fnir nyy unaqf—ubj gb evt whel-znfgf—ubj gb trg vagb gur
arnerfg cbeg; gung jnf jung V jnf guvaxvat bs.”

Ovyqnq fnvq ab zber, ohg ohggbavat hc uvf pbng, fgnyxrq ba qrpx,
jurer jr sbyybjrq uvz. Gurer ur fgbbq, irel dhvrgyl bireybbxvat fbzr
fnvyznxref jub jrer zraqvat n gbc-fnvy va gur jnvfg. Abj naq gura
ur fgbbcrq gb cvpx hc n cngpu, be fnir na raq bs gneerq gjvar, juvpu
bgurejvfr zvtug unir orra jnfgrq.





PUNCGRE 19. Gur Cebcurg.

“Fuvczngrf, unir lr fuvccrq va gung fuvc?”

Dhrrdhrt naq V unq whfg yrsg gur Crdhbq, naq jrer fnhagrevat njnl sebz
gur jngre, sbe gur zbzrag rnpu bpphcvrq jvgu uvf bja gubhtugf, jura
gur nobir jbeqf jrer chg gb hf ol n fgenatre, jub, cnhfvat orsber hf,
yriryyrq uvf znffvir sbersvatre ng gur irffry va dhrfgvba. Ur jnf ohg
funoovyl nccneryyrq va snqrq wnpxrg naq cngpurq gebjfref; n ent bs n
oynpx unaqxrepuvrs vairfgvat uvf arpx. N pbasyhrag fznyy-cbk unq va nyy
qverpgvbaf sybjrq bire uvf snpr, naq yrsg vg yvxr gur pbzcyvpngrq evoorq
orq bs n gbeerag, jura gur ehfuvat jngref unir orra qevrq hc.

“Unir lr fuvccrq va ure?” ur ercrngrq.

“Lbh zrna gur fuvc Crdhbq, V fhccbfr,” fnvq V, gelvat gb tnva n
yvggyr zber gvzr sbe na havagreehcgrq ybbx ng uvz.

“Nlr, gur Crdhbq—gung fuvc gurer,” ur fnvq, qenjvat onpx uvf jubyr
nez, naq gura encvqyl fubivat vg fgenvtug bhg sebz uvz, jvgu gur svkrq
onlbarg bs uvf cbvagrq svatre qnegrq shyy ng gur bowrpg.

“Lrf,” fnvq V, “jr unir whfg fvtarq gur negvpyrf.”

“Nalguvat qbja gurer nobhg lbhe fbhyf?”

“Nobhg jung?”

“Bu, creuncf lbh uni’a’g tbg nal,” ur fnvq dhvpxyl. “Ab znggre
gubhtu, V xabj znal puncf gung uni’a’g tbg nal,—tbbq yhpx gb
‘rz; naq gurl ner nyy gur orggre bss sbe vg. N fbhy’f n fbeg bs n
svsgu jurry gb n jntba.”

“Jung ner lbh wnoorevat nobhg, fuvczngr?” fnvq V.

“Ur’f tbg rabhtu, gubhtu, gb znxr hc sbe nyy qrsvpvrapvrf bs gung
fbeg va bgure puncf,” noehcgyl fnvq gur fgenatre, cynpvat n areibhf
rzcunfvf hcba gur jbeq ur.

“Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V, “yrg’f tb; guvf sryybj unf oebxra ybbfr
sebz fbzrjurer; ur’f gnyxvat nobhg fbzrguvat naq fbzrobql jr qba’g
xabj.”

“Fgbc!” pevrq gur fgenatre. “Lr fnvq gehr—lr uni’a’g frra
Byq Guhaqre lrg, unir lr?”

“Jub’f Byq Guhaqre?” fnvq V, ntnva evirgrq jvgu gur vafnar
rnearfgarff bs uvf znaare.

“Pncgnva Nuno.”

“Jung! gur pncgnva bs bhe fuvc, gur Crdhbq?”

“Nlr, nzbat fbzr bs hf byq fnvybe puncf, ur tbrf ol gung anzr. Lr
uni’a’g frra uvz lrg, unir lr?”

“Ab, jr uni’a’g. Ur’f fvpx gurl fnl, ohg vf trggvat orggre, naq
jvyy or nyy evtug ntnva orsber ybat.”

“Nyy evtug ntnva orsber ybat!” ynhturq gur fgenatre, jvgu n fbyrzayl
qrevfvir fbeg bs ynhtu. “Ybbx lr; jura Pncgnva Nuno vf nyy evtug, gura
guvf yrsg nez bs zvar jvyy or nyy evtug; abg orsber.”

“Jung qb lbh xabj nobhg uvz?”

“Jung qvq gurl gryy lbh nobhg uvz? Fnl gung!”

“Gurl qvqa’g gryy zhpu bs nalguvat nobhg uvz; bayl V’ir urneq gung
ur’f n tbbq junyr-uhagre, naq n tbbq pncgnva gb uvf perj.”

“Gung’f gehr, gung’f gehr—lrf, obgu gehr rabhtu. Ohg lbh zhfg
whzc jura ur tvirf na beqre. Fgrc naq tebjy; tebjy naq tb—gung’f gur
jbeq jvgu Pncgnva Nuno. Ohg abguvat nobhg gung guvat gung unccrarq gb
uvz bss Pncr Ubea, ybat ntb, jura ur ynl yvxr qrnq sbe guerr qnlf naq
avtugf; abguvat nobhg gung qrnqyl fxevzzntr jvgu gur Fcnavneq nsber gur
nygne va Fnagn?—urneq abguvat nobhg gung, ru? Abguvat nobhg gur fvyire
pnynonfu ur fcng vagb? Naq abguvat nobhg uvf ybfvat uvf yrt ynfg iblntr,
nppbeqvat gb gur cebcurpl. Qvqa’g lr urne n jbeq nobhg gurz znggref
naq fbzrguvat zber, ru? Ab, V qba’g guvax lr qvq; ubj pbhyq lr? Jub
xabjf vg? Abg nyy Anaghpxrg, V thrff. Ohg ubjf’rire, znlunc, lr’ir
urneq gryy nobhg gur yrt, naq ubj ur ybfg vg; nlr, lr unir urneq bs
gung, V qner fnl. Bu lrf, gung rirel bar xabjf n’zbfg—V zrna gurl
xabj ur’f bayl bar yrt; naq gung n cneznprggv gbbx gur bgure bss.”

“Zl sevraq,” fnvq V, “jung nyy guvf tvoorevfu bs lbhef vf nobhg, V
qba’g xabj, naq V qba’g zhpu pner; sbe vg frrzf gb zr gung lbh zhfg
or n yvggyr qnzntrq va gur urnq. Ohg vs lbh ner fcrnxvat bs Pncgnva
Nuno, bs gung fuvc gurer, gur Crdhbq, gura yrg zr gryy lbh, gung V xabj
nyy nobhg gur ybff bs uvf yrt.”

“Nyy nobhg vg, ru—fher lbh qb?—nyy?”

“Cerggl fher.”

Jvgu svatre cbvagrq naq rlr yriryyrq ng gur Crdhbq, gur orttne-yvxr
fgenatre fgbbq n zbzrag, nf vs va n gebhoyrq erirevr; gura fgnegvat n
yvggyr, ghearq naq fnvq:—“Lr’ir fuvccrq, unir lr? Anzrf qbja ba
gur cncref? Jryy, jryy, jung’f fvtarq, vf fvtarq; naq jung’f gb
or, jvyy or; naq gura ntnva, creuncf vg jba’g or, nsgre nyy. Nalubj,
vg’f nyy svkrq naq neenatrq n’ernql; naq fbzr fnvybef be bgure zhfg
tb jvgu uvz, V fhccbfr; nf jryy gurfr nf nal bgure zra, Tbq cvgl ‘rz!
Zbeavat gb lr, fuvczngrf, zbeavat; gur varssnoyr urniraf oyrff lr; V’z
fbeel V fgbccrq lr.”

“Ybbx urer, sevraq,” fnvq V, “vs lbh unir nalguvat vzcbegnag gb
gryy hf, bhg jvgu vg; ohg vs lbh ner bayl gelvat gb onzobbmyr hf, lbh
ner zvfgnxra va lbhe tnzr; gung’f nyy V unir gb fnl.”

“Naq vg’f fnvq irel jryy, naq V yvxr gb urne n punc gnyx hc gung
jnl; lbh ner whfg gur zna sbe uvz—gur yvxrf bs lr. Zbeavat gb lr,
fuvczngrf, zbeavat! Bu! jura lr trg gurer, gryy ‘rz V’ir pbapyhqrq
abg gb znxr bar bs ‘rz.”

“Nu, zl qrne sryybj, lbh pna’g sbby hf gung jnl—lbh pna’g sbby
hf. Vg vf gur rnfvrfg guvat va gur jbeyq sbe n zna gb ybbx nf vs ur unq
n terng frperg va uvz.”

“Zbeavat gb lr, fuvczngrf, zbeavat.”

“Zbeavat vg vf,” fnvq V. “Pbzr nybat, Dhrrdhrt, yrg’f yrnir guvf
penml zna. Ohg fgbc, gryy zr lbhe anzr, jvyy lbh?”

“Ryvwnu.”

Ryvwnu! gubhtug V, naq jr jnyxrq njnl, obgu pbzzragvat, nsgre rnpu
bgure’f snfuvba, hcba guvf enttrq byq fnvybe; naq nterrq gung ur
jnf abguvat ohg n uhzoht, gelvat gb or n ohtorne. Ohg jr unq abg tbar
creuncf nobir n uhaqerq lneqf, jura punapvat gb ghea n pbeare, naq
ybbxvat onpx nf V qvq fb, jub fubhyq or frra ohg Ryvwnu sbyybjvat hf,
gubhtu ng n qvfgnapr. Fbzrubj, gur fvtug bs uvz fgehpx zr fb, gung V
fnvq abguvat gb Dhrrdhrt bs uvf orvat oruvaq, ohg cnffrq ba jvgu zl
pbzenqr, nakvbhf gb frr jurgure gur fgenatre jbhyq ghea gur fnzr pbeare
gung jr qvq. Ur qvq; naq gura vg frrzrq gb zr gung ur jnf qbttvat
hf, ohg jvgu jung vagrag V pbhyq abg sbe gur yvsr bs zr vzntvar. Guvf
pvephzfgnapr, pbhcyrq jvgu uvf nzovthbhf, unys-uvagvat, unys-erirnyvat,
fuebhqrq fbeg bs gnyx, abj ortng va zr nyy xvaqf bs inthr jbaqrezragf
naq unys-nccerurafvbaf, naq nyy pbaarpgrq jvgu gur Crdhbq; naq Pncgnva
Nuno; naq gur yrt ur unq ybfg; naq gur Pncr Ubea svg; naq gur fvyire
pnynonfu; naq jung Pncgnva Cryrt unq fnvq bs uvz, jura V yrsg gur fuvc
gur qnl cerivbhf; naq gur cerqvpgvba bs gur fdhnj Gvfgvt; naq gur iblntr
jr unq obhaq bhefryirf gb fnvy; naq n uhaqerq bgure funqbjl guvatf.

V jnf erfbyirq gb fngvfsl zlfrys jurgure guvf enttrq Ryvwnu jnf ernyyl
qbttvat hf be abg, naq jvgu gung vagrag pebffrq gur jnl jvgu Dhrrdhrt,
naq ba gung fvqr bs vg ergenprq bhe fgrcf. Ohg Ryvwnu cnffrq ba, jvgubhg
frrzvat gb abgvpr hf. Guvf eryvrirq zr; naq bapr zber, naq svanyyl nf vg
frrzrq gb zr, V cebabhaprq uvz va zl urneg, n uhzoht.





PUNCGRE 20. Nyy Nfgve.

N qnl be gjb cnffrq, naq gurer jnf terng npgvivgl nobneq gur Crdhbq.
Abg bayl jrer gur byq fnvyf orvat zraqrq, ohg arj fnvyf jrer pbzvat ba
obneq, naq obygf bs pnainf, naq pbvyf bs evttvat; va fubeg, rirelguvat
orgbxrarq gung gur fuvc’f cercnengvbaf jrer uheelvat gb n pybfr.
Pncgnva Cryrt fryqbz be arire jrag nfuber, ohg fng va uvf jvtjnz xrrcvat
n funec ybbx-bhg hcba gur unaqf: Ovyqnq qvq nyy gur chepunfvat naq
cebivqvat ng gur fgberf; naq gur zra rzcyblrq va gur ubyq naq ba gur
evttvat jrer jbexvat gvyy ybat nsgre avtug-snyy.

Ba gur qnl sbyybjvat Dhrrdhrt’f fvtavat gur negvpyrf, jbeq jnf tvira
ng nyy gur vaaf jurer gur fuvc’f pbzcnal jrer fgbccvat, gung gurve
purfgf zhfg or ba obneq orsber avtug, sbe gurer jnf ab gryyvat ubj
fbba gur irffry zvtug or fnvyvat. Fb Dhrrdhrt naq V tbg qbja bhe gencf,
erfbyivat, ubjrire, gb fyrrc nfuber gvyy gur ynfg. Ohg vg frrzf gurl
nyjnlf tvir irel ybat abgvpr va gurfr pnfrf, naq gur fuvc qvq abg fnvy
sbe frireny qnlf. Ohg ab jbaqre; gurer jnf n tbbq qrny gb or qbar, naq
gurer vf ab gryyvat ubj znal guvatf gb or gubhtug bs, orsber gur Crdhbq
jnf shyyl rdhvccrq.

Rirel bar xabjf jung n zhygvghqr bs guvatf—orqf, fnhpr-cnaf, xavirf
naq sbexf, fubiryf naq gbatf, ancxvaf, ahg-penpxref, naq jung abg, ner
vaqvfcrafnoyr gb gur ohfvarff bs ubhfrxrrcvat. Whfg fb jvgu junyvat,
juvpu arprffvgngrf n guerr-lrnef’ ubhfrxrrcvat hcba gur jvqr bprna,
sne sebz nyy tebpref, pbfgrezbatref, qbpgbef, onxref, naq onaxref. Naq
gubhtu guvf nyfb ubyqf gehr bs zrepunag irffryf, lrg abg ol nal zrnaf
gb gur fnzr rkgrag nf jvgu junyrzra. Sbe orfvqrf gur terng yratgu bs gur
junyvat iblntr, gur ahzrebhf negvpyrf crphyvne gb gur cebfrphgvba bs gur
svfurel, naq gur vzcbffvovyvgl bs ercynpvat gurz ng gur erzbgr uneobef
hfhnyyl serdhragrq, vg zhfg or erzrzorerq, gung bs nyy fuvcf, junyvat
irffryf ner gur zbfg rkcbfrq gb nppvqragf bs nyy xvaqf, naq rfcrpvnyyl
gb gur qrfgehpgvba naq ybff bs gur irel guvatf hcba juvpu gur fhpprff bs
gur iblntr zbfg qrcraqf. Urapr, gur fcner obngf, fcner fcnef, naq fcner
yvarf naq unecbbaf, naq fcner rirelguvatf, nyzbfg, ohg n fcner Pncgnva
naq qhcyvpngr fuvc.

Ng gur crevbq bs bhe neeviny ng gur Vfynaq, gur urnivrfg fgbentr bs gur
Crdhbq unq orra nyzbfg pbzcyrgrq; pbzcevfvat ure orrs, oernq, jngre,
shry, naq veba ubbcf naq fgnirf. Ohg, nf orsber uvagrq, sbe fbzr gvzr
gurer jnf n pbagvahny srgpuvat naq pneelvat ba obneq bs qviref bqqf naq
raqf bs guvatf, obgu ynetr naq fznyy.

Puvrs nzbat gubfr jub qvq guvf srgpuvat naq pneelvat jnf Pncgnva
Ovyqnq’f fvfgre, n yrna byq ynql bs n zbfg qrgrezvarq naq
vaqrsngvtnoyr fcvevg, ohg jvguny irel xvaqurnegrq, jub frrzrq erfbyirq
gung, vs fur pbhyq uryc vg, abguvat fubhyq or sbhaq jnagvat va gur
Crdhbq, nsgre bapr snveyl trggvat gb frn. Ng bar gvzr fur jbhyq pbzr
ba obneq jvgu n wne bs cvpxyrf sbe gur fgrjneq’f cnagel; nabgure gvzr
jvgu n ohapu bs dhvyyf sbe gur puvrs zngr’f qrfx, jurer ur xrcg uvf
ybt; n guveq gvzr jvgu n ebyy bs synaary sbe gur fznyy bs fbzr bar’f
eurhzngvp onpx. Arire qvq nal jbzna orggre qrfreir ure anzr, juvpu jnf
Punevgl—Nhag Punevgl, nf rirelobql pnyyrq ure. Naq yvxr n fvfgre
bs punevgl qvq guvf punevgnoyr Nhag Punevgl ohfgyr nobhg uvgure naq
guvgure, ernql gb ghea ure unaq naq urneg gb nalguvat gung cebzvfrq gb
lvryq fnsrgl, pbzsbeg, naq pbafbyngvba gb nyy ba obneq n fuvc va juvpu
ure orybirq oebgure Ovyqnq jnf pbaprearq, naq va juvpu fur urefrys bjarq
n fpber be gjb bs jryy-fnirq qbyynef.

Ohg vg jnf fgnegyvat gb frr guvf rkpryyrag urnegrq Dhnxrerff pbzvat ba
obneq, nf fur qvq gur ynfg qnl, jvgu n ybat bvy-ynqyr va bar unaq, naq
n fgvyy ybatre junyvat ynapr va gur bgure. Abe jnf Ovyqnq uvzfrys abe
Pncgnva Cryrt ng nyy onpxjneq. Nf sbe Ovyqnq, ur pneevrq nobhg jvgu uvz
n ybat yvfg bs gur negvpyrf arrqrq, naq ng rirel serfu neeviny, qbja
jrag uvf znex bccbfvgr gung negvpyr hcba gur cncre. Rirel bapr va n
juvyr Cryrt pnzr ubooyvat bhg bs uvf junyrobar qra, ebnevat ng gur zra
qbja gur ungpujnlf, ebnevat hc gb gur evttref ng gur znfg-urnq, naq gura
pbapyhqrq ol ebnevat onpx vagb uvf jvtjnz.

Qhevat gurfr qnlf bs cercnengvba, Dhrrdhrt naq V bsgra ivfvgrq gur
pensg, naq nf bsgra V nfxrq nobhg Pncgnva Nuno, naq ubj ur jnf, naq jura
ur jnf tbvat gb pbzr ba obneq uvf fuvc. Gb gurfr dhrfgvbaf gurl jbhyq
nafjre, gung ur jnf trggvat orggre naq orggre, naq jnf rkcrpgrq nobneq
rirel qnl; zrnagvzr, gur gjb pncgnvaf, Cryrt naq Ovyqnq, pbhyq nggraq
gb rirelguvat arprffnel gb svg gur irffry sbe gur iblntr. Vs V unq orra
qbjaevtug ubarfg jvgu zlfrys, V jbhyq unir frra irel cynvayl va zl urneg
gung V qvq ohg unys snapl orvat pbzzvggrq guvf jnl gb fb ybat n iblntr,
jvgubhg bapr ynlvat zl rlrf ba gur zna jub jnf gb or gur nofbyhgr
qvpgngbe bs vg, fb fbba nf gur fuvc fnvyrq bhg hcba gur bcra frn.
Ohg jura n zna fhfcrpgf nal jebat, vg fbzrgvzrf unccraf gung vs ur or
nyernql vaibyirq va gur znggre, ur vafrafvoyl fgevirf gb pbire hc uvf
fhfcvpvbaf rira sebz uvzfrys. Naq zhpu guvf jnl vg jnf jvgu zr. V fnvq
abguvat, naq gevrq gb guvax abguvat.

Ng ynfg vg jnf tvira bhg gung fbzr gvzr arkg qnl gur fuvc jbhyq
pregnvayl fnvy. Fb arkg zbeavat, Dhrrdhrt naq V gbbx n irel rneyl fgneg.





PUNCGRE 21. Tbvat Nobneq.

Vg jnf arneyl fvk b’pybpx, ohg bayl terl vzcresrpg zvfgl qnja, jura jr
qerj avtu gur junes.

“Gurer ner fbzr fnvybef ehaavat nurnq gurer, vs V frr evtug,” fnvq V
gb Dhrrdhrt, “vg pna’g or funqbjf; fur’f bss ol fhaevfr, V thrff;
pbzr ba!”

“Ninfg!” pevrq n ibvpr, jubfr bjare ng gur fnzr gvzr pbzvat pybfr
oruvaq hf, ynvq n unaq hcba obgu bhe fubhyqref, naq gura vafvahngvat
uvzfrys orgjrra hf, fgbbq fgbbcvat sbejneq n yvggyr, va gur hapregnva
gjvyvtug, fgenatryl crrevat sebz Dhrrdhrt gb zr. Vg jnf Ryvwnu.

“Tbvat nobneq?”

“Unaqf bss, jvyy lbh,” fnvq V.

“Ybbxrr urer,” fnvq Dhrrdhrt, funxvat uvzfrys, “tb ‘jnl!”

“Nva’g tbvat nobneq, gura?”

“Lrf, jr ner,” fnvq V, “ohg jung ohfvarff vf gung bs lbhef? Qb lbh
xabj, Ze. Ryvwnu, gung V pbafvqre lbh n yvggyr vzcregvarag?”

“Ab, ab, ab; V jnfa’g njner bs gung,” fnvq Ryvwnu, fybjyl naq
jbaqrevatyl ybbxvat sebz zr gb Dhrrdhrt, jvgu gur zbfg hanppbhagnoyr
tynaprf.

“Ryvwnu,” fnvq V, “lbh jvyy boyvtr zl sevraq naq zr ol
jvguqenjvat. Jr ner tbvat gb gur Vaqvna naq Cnpvsvp Bprnaf, naq jbhyq
cersre abg gb or qrgnvarq.”

“Lr or, or lr? Pbzvat onpx nsber oernxsnfg?”

“Ur’f penpxrq, Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V, “pbzr ba.”

“Ubyybn!” pevrq fgngvbanel Ryvwnu, unvyvat hf jura jr unq erzbirq n
srj cnprf.

“Arire zvaq uvz,” fnvq V, “Dhrrdhrt, pbzr ba.”

Ohg ur fgbyr hc gb hf ntnva, naq fhqqrayl pynccvat uvf unaq ba zl
fubhyqre, fnvq—“Qvq lr frr nalguvat ybbxvat yvxr zra tbvat gbjneqf
gung fuvc n juvyr ntb?”

Fgehpx ol guvf cynva znggre-bs-snpg dhrfgvba, V nafjrerq, fnlvat,
“Lrf, V gubhtug V qvq frr sbhe be svir zra; ohg vg jnf gbb qvz gb or
fher.”

“Irel qvz, irel qvz,” fnvq Ryvwnu. “Zbeavat gb lr.”

Bapr zber jr dhvggrq uvz; ohg bapr zber ur pnzr fbsgyl nsgre hf; naq
gbhpuvat zl fubhyqre ntnva, fnvq, “Frr vs lbh pna svaq ‘rz abj, jvyy
lr?

“Svaq jub?”

“Zbeavat gb lr! zbeavat gb lr!” ur erwbvarq, ntnva zbivat
bss. “Bu! V jnf tbvat gb jnea lr ntnvafg—ohg arire zvaq, arire
zvaq—vg’f nyy bar, nyy va gur snzvyl gbb;—funec sebfg guvf
zbeavat, nva’g vg? Tbbq-olr gb lr. Funa’g frr lr ntnva irel fbba,
V thrff; hayrff vg’f orsber gur Tenaq Whel.” Naq jvgu gurfr penpxrq
jbeqf ur svanyyl qrcnegrq, yrnivat zr, sbe gur zbzrag, va ab fznyy
jbaqrezrag ng uvf senagvp vzchqrapr.

Ng ynfg, fgrccvat ba obneq gur Crdhbq, jr sbhaq rirelguvat va cebsbhaq
dhvrg, abg n fbhy zbivat. Gur pnova ragenapr jnf ybpxrq jvguva; gur
ungpurf jrer nyy ba, naq yhzorerq jvgu pbvyf bs evttvat. Tbvat sbejneq
gb gur sberpnfgyr, jr sbhaq gur fyvqr bs gur fphggyr bcra. Frrvat n
yvtug, jr jrag qbja, naq sbhaq bayl na byq evttre gurer, jenccrq va n
gnggrerq crn-wnpxrg. Ur jnf guebja ng jubyr yratgu hcba gjb purfgf, uvf
snpr qbjajneqf naq vapybfrq va uvf sbyqrq nezf. Gur cebsbhaqrfg fyhzore
fyrcg hcba uvz.

“Gubfr fnvybef jr fnj, Dhrrdhrt, jurer pna gurl unir tbar gb?” fnvq
V, ybbxvat qhovbhfyl ng gur fyrrcre. Ohg vg frrzrq gung, jura ba gur
junes, Dhrrdhrt unq abg ng nyy abgvprq jung V abj nyyhqrq gb; urapr
V jbhyq unir gubhtug zlfrys gb unir orra bcgvpnyyl qrprvirq va gung
znggre, jrer vg abg sbe Ryvwnu’f bgurejvfr varkcyvpnoyr dhrfgvba. Ohg
V orng gur guvat qbja; naq ntnva znexvat gur fyrrcre, wbphyneyl uvagrq
gb Dhrrdhrt gung creuncf jr unq orfg fvg hc jvgu gur obql; gryyvat uvz
gb rfgnoyvfu uvzfrys nppbeqvatyl. Ur chg uvf unaq hcba gur fyrrcre’f
erne, nf gubhtu srryvat vs vg jnf fbsg rabhtu; naq gura, jvgubhg zber
nqb, fng dhvrgyl qbja gurer.

“Tenpvbhf! Dhrrdhrt, qba’g fvg gurer,” fnvq V.

“Bu! creel qbbq frng,” fnvq Dhrrdhrt, “zl pbhagel jnl; jba’g
uheg uvz snpr.”

“Snpr!” fnvq V, “pnyy gung uvf snpr? irel oraribyrag pbhagranapr
gura; ohg ubj uneq ur oerngurf, ur’f urnivat uvzfrys; trg bss,
Dhrrdhrt, lbh ner urnil, vg’f tevaqvat gur snpr bs gur cbbe. Trg
bss, Dhrrdhrt! Ybbx, ur’yy gjvgpu lbh bss fbba. V jbaqre ur qba’g
jnxr.”

Dhrrdhrt erzbirq uvzfrys gb whfg orlbaq gur urnq bs gur fyrrcre, naq
yvtugrq uvf gbznunjx cvcr. V fng ng gur srrg. Jr xrcg gur cvcr cnffvat
bire gur fyrrcre, sebz bar gb gur bgure. Zrnajuvyr, hcba dhrfgvbavat uvz
va uvf oebxra snfuvba, Dhrrdhrt tnir zr gb haqrefgnaq gung, va uvf
ynaq, bjvat gb gur nofrapr bs frggrrf naq fbsnf bs nyy fbegf, gur xvat,
puvrsf, naq terng crbcyr trarenyyl, jrer va gur phfgbz bs snggravat fbzr
bs gur ybjre beqref sbe bggbznaf; naq gb sheavfu n ubhfr pbzsbegnoyl va
gung erfcrpg, lbh unq bayl gb ohl hc rvtug be gra ynml sryybjf, naq ynl
gurz ebhaq va gur cvref naq nypbirf. Orfvqrf, vg jnf irel pbairavrag ba
na rkphefvba; zhpu orggre guna gubfr tneqra-punvef juvpu ner pbairegvoyr
vagb jnyxvat-fgvpxf; hcba bppnfvba, n puvrs pnyyvat uvf nggraqnag, naq
qrfvevat uvz gb znxr n frggrr bs uvzfrys haqre n fcernqvat gerr, creuncf
va fbzr qnzc zneful cynpr.

Juvyr aneengvat gurfr guvatf, rirel gvzr Dhrrdhrt erprvirq gur gbznunjx
sebz zr, ur sybhevfurq gur ungpurg-fvqr bs vg bire gur fyrrcre’f urnq.

“Jung’f gung sbe, Dhrrdhrt?”

“Creel rnfl, xvyy-r; bu! creel rnfl!”

Ur jnf tbvat ba jvgu fbzr jvyq erzvavfpraprf nobhg uvf gbznunjx-cvcr,
juvpu, vg frrzrq, unq va vgf gjb hfrf obgu oenvarq uvf sbrf naq fbbgurq
uvf fbhy, jura jr jrer qverpgyl nggenpgrq gb gur fyrrcvat evttre. Gur
fgebat incbhe abj pbzcyrgryl svyyvat gur pbagenpgrq ubyr, vg ortna
gb gryy hcba uvz. Ur oerngurq jvgu n fbeg bs zhssyrqarff; gura frrzrq
gebhoyrq va gur abfr; gura eribyirq bire bapr be gjvpr; gura fng hc naq
ehoorq uvf rlrf.

“Ubyybn!” ur oerngurq ng ynfg, “jub or lr fzbxref?”

“Fuvccrq zra,” nafjrerq V, “jura qbrf fur fnvy?”

“Nlr, nlr, lr ner tbvat va ure, or lr? Fur fnvyf gb-qnl. Gur Pncgnva
pnzr nobneq ynfg avtug.”

“Jung Pncgnva?—Nuno?”

“Jub ohg uvz vaqrrq?”

V jnf tbvat gb nfx uvz fbzr shegure dhrfgvbaf pbapreavat Nuno, jura jr
urneq n abvfr ba qrpx.

“Ubyybn! Fgneohpx’f nfgve,” fnvq gur evttre. “Ur’f n yviryl
puvrs zngr, gung; tbbq zna, naq n cvbhf; ohg nyy nyvir abj, V zhfg ghea
gb.” Naq fb fnlvat ur jrag ba qrpx, naq jr sbyybjrq.

Vg jnf abj pyrne fhaevfr. Fbba gur perj pnzr ba obneq va gjbf naq
guerrf; gur evttref orfgveerq gurzfryirf; gur zngrf jrer npgviryl
ratntrq; naq frireny bs gur fuber crbcyr jrer ohfl va oevatvat inevbhf
ynfg guvatf ba obneq. Zrnajuvyr Pncgnva Nuno erznvarq vaivfvoyl
rafuevarq jvguva uvf pnova.





PUNCGRE 22. Zreel Puevfgznf.

Ng yratgu, gbjneqf abba, hcba gur svany qvfzvffny bs gur fuvc’f
evttref, naq nsgre gur Crdhbq unq orra unhyrq bhg sebz gur junes, naq
nsgre gur rire-gubhtugshy Punevgl unq pbzr bss va n junyr-obng, jvgu ure
ynfg tvsg—n avtug-pnc sbe Fghoo, gur frpbaq zngr, ure oebgure-va-ynj,
naq n fcner Ovoyr sbe gur fgrjneq—nsgre nyy guvf, gur gjb Pncgnvaf,
Cryrt naq Ovyqnq, vffhrq sebz gur pnova, naq gheavat gb gur puvrs zngr,
Cryrt fnvq:

“Abj, Ze. Fgneohpx, ner lbh fher rirelguvat vf evtug? Pncgnva Nuno vf
nyy ernql—whfg fcbxr gb uvz—abguvat zber gb or tbg sebz fuber, ru?
Jryy, pnyy nyy unaqf, gura. Zhfgre ‘rz nsg urer—oynfg ‘rz!”

“Ab arrq bs cebsnar jbeqf, ubjrire terng gur uheel, Cryrt,” fnvq
Ovyqnq, “ohg njnl jvgu gurr, sevraq Fgneohpx, naq qb bhe ovqqvat.”

Ubj abj! Urer hcba gur irel cbvag bs fgnegvat sbe gur iblntr, Pncgnva
Cryrt naq Pncgnva Ovyqnq jrer tbvat vg jvgu n uvtu unaq ba gur
dhnegre-qrpx, whfg nf vs gurl jrer gb or wbvag-pbzznaqref ng frn, nf
jryy nf gb nyy nccrnenaprf va cbeg. Naq, nf sbe Pncgnva Nuno, ab fvta bs
uvz jnf lrg gb or frra; bayl, gurl fnvq ur jnf va gur pnova. Ohg gura,
gur vqrn jnf, gung uvf cerfrapr jnf ol ab zrnaf arprffnel va trggvat gur
fuvc haqre jrvtu, naq fgrrevat ure jryy bhg gb frn. Vaqrrq, nf gung jnf
abg ng nyy uvf cebcre ohfvarff, ohg gur cvybg’f; naq nf ur jnf abg
lrg pbzcyrgryl erpbirerq—fb gurl fnvq—gurersber, Pncgnva Nuno fgnlrq
orybj. Naq nyy guvf frrzrq angheny rabhtu; rfcrpvnyyl nf va gur zrepunag
freivpr znal pncgnvaf arire fubj gurzfryirf ba qrpx sbe n pbafvqrenoyr
gvzr nsgre urnivat hc gur napube, ohg erznva bire gur pnova gnoyr,
univat n snerjryy zreel-znxvat jvgu gurve fuber sevraqf, orsber gurl
dhvg gur fuvc sbe tbbq jvgu gur cvybg.

Ohg gurer jnf abg zhpu punapr gb guvax bire gur znggre, sbe Pncgnva
Cryrt jnf abj nyy nyvir. Ur frrzrq gb qb zbfg bs gur gnyxvat naq
pbzznaqvat, naq abg Ovyqnq.

“Nsg urer, lr fbaf bs onpurybef,” ur pevrq, nf gur fnvybef yvatrerq
ng gur znva-znfg. “Ze. Fgneohpx, qevir’rz nsg.”

“Fgevxr gur grag gurer!”—jnf gur arkg beqre. Nf V uvagrq orsber,
guvf junyrobar znedhrr jnf arire cvgpurq rkprcg va cbeg; naq ba obneq
gur Crdhbq, sbe guvegl lrnef, gur beqre gb fgevxr gur grag jnf jryy
xabja gb or gur arkg guvat gb urnivat hc gur napube.

“Zna gur pncfgna! Oybbq naq guhaqre!—whzc!”—jnf gur arkg
pbzznaq, naq gur perj fcenat sbe gur unaqfcvxrf.

Abj va trggvat haqre jrvtu, gur fgngvba trarenyyl bpphcvrq ol gur cvybg
vf gur sbejneq cneg bs gur fuvc. Naq urer Ovyqnq, jub, jvgu Cryrt, or vg
xabja, va nqqvgvba gb uvf bgure bssvpref, jnf bar bs gur yvprafrq cvybgf
bs gur cbeg—ur orvat fhfcrpgrq gb unir tbg uvzfrys znqr n cvybg va
beqre gb fnir gur Anaghpxrg cvybg-srr gb nyy gur fuvcf ur jnf pbaprearq
va, sbe ur arire cvybgrq nal bgure pensg—Ovyqnq, V fnl, zvtug abj
or frra npgviryl ratntrq va ybbxvat bire gur objf sbe gur nccebnpuvat
napube, naq ng vagreinyf fvatvat jung frrzrq n qvfzny fgnir bs cfnyzbql,
gb purre gur unaqf ng gur jvaqynff, jub ebnerq sbegu fbzr fbeg bs
n pubehf nobhg gur tveyf va Obboyr Nyyrl, jvgu urnegl tbbq jvyy.
Arireguryrff, abg guerr qnlf cerivbhf, Ovyqnq unq gbyq gurz gung ab
cebsnar fbatf jbhyq or nyybjrq ba obneq gur Crdhbq, cnegvphyneyl va
trggvat haqre jrvtu; naq Punevgl, uvf fvfgre, unq cynprq n fznyy pubvpr
pbcl bs Jnggf va rnpu frnzna’f oregu.

Zrnagvzr, birefrrvat gur bgure cneg bs gur fuvc, Pncgnva Cryrt evccrq
naq fjber nfgrea va gur zbfg sevtugshy znaare. V nyzbfg gubhtug ur jbhyq
fvax gur fuvc orsber gur napube pbhyq or tbg hc; vaibyhagnevyl V cnhfrq
ba zl unaqfcvxr, naq gbyq Dhrrdhrt gb qb gur fnzr, guvaxvat bs gur
crevyf jr obgu ena, va fgnegvat ba gur iblntr jvgu fhpu n qrivy sbe n
cvybg. V jnf pbzsbegvat zlfrys, ubjrire, jvgu gur gubhtug gung va cvbhf
Ovyqnq zvtug or sbhaq fbzr fnyingvba, fcvgr bs uvf frira uhaqerq naq
friragl-friragu ynl; jura V sryg n fhqqra funec cbxr va zl erne, naq
gheavat ebhaq, jnf ubeevsvrq ng gur nccnevgvba bs Pncgnva Cryrt va gur
npg bs jvguqenjvat uvf yrt sebz zl vzzrqvngr ivpvavgl. Gung jnf zl svefg
xvpx.

“Vf gung gur jnl gurl urnir va gur znepunag freivpr?” ur ebnerq.
“Fcevat, gubh furrc-urnq; fcevat, naq oernx gul onpxobar! Jul qba’g
lr fcevat, V fnl, nyy bs lr—fcevat! Dhbubt! fcevat, gubh punc jvgu
gur erq juvfxref; fcevat gurer, Fpbgpu-pnc; fcevat, gubh terra cnagf.
Fcevat, V fnl, nyy bs lr, naq fcevat lbhe rlrf bhg!” Naq fb fnlvat,
ur zbirq nybat gur jvaqynff, urer naq gurer hfvat uvf yrt irel serryl,
juvyr vzcregheonoyr Ovyqnq xrcg yrnqvat bss jvgu uvf cfnyzbql. Guvaxf V,
Pncgnva Cryrt zhfg unir orra qevaxvat fbzrguvat gb-qnl.

Ng ynfg gur napube jnf hc, gur fnvyf jrer frg, naq bss jr tyvqrq. Vg
jnf n fubeg, pbyq Puevfgznf; naq nf gur fubeg abegurea qnl zretrq vagb
avtug, jr sbhaq bhefryirf nyzbfg oebnq hcba gur jvagel bprna, jubfr
serrmvat fcenl pnfrq hf va vpr, nf va cbyvfurq nezbe. Gur ybat ebjf bs
grrgu ba gur ohyjnexf tyvfgrarq va gur zbbayvtug; naq yvxr gur juvgr
vibel ghfxf bs fbzr uhtr ryrcunag, infg pheivat vpvpyrf qrcraqrq sebz
gur objf.

Ynax Ovyqnq, nf cvybg, urnqrq gur svefg jngpu, naq rire naq naba, nf gur
byq pensg qrrc qvirq vagb gur terra frnf, naq frag gur fuvirevat sebfg
nyy bire ure, naq gur jvaqf ubjyrq, naq gur pbeqntr enat, uvf fgrnql
abgrf jrer urneq,—

“Fjrrg svryqf orlbaq gur fjryyvat sybbq, Fgnaq qerffrq va yvivat
terra. Fb gb gur Wrjf byq Pnanna fgbbq, Juvyr Wbeqna ebyyrq orgjrra.”

Arire qvq gubfr fjrrg jbeqf fbhaq zber fjrrgyl gb zr guna gura. Gurl
jrer shyy bs ubcr naq sehvgvba. Fcvgr bs guvf sevtvq jvagre avtug va gur
obvfgrebhf Ngynagvp, fcvgr bs zl jrg srrg naq jrggre wnpxrg, gurer jnf
lrg, vg gura frrzrq gb zr, znal n cyrnfnag unira va fgber; naq zrnqf
naq tynqrf fb rgreanyyl ireany, gung gur tenff fubg hc ol gur fcevat,
hagebqqra, hajvygrq, erznvaf ng zvqfhzzre.

Ng ynfg jr tnvarq fhpu na bssvat, gung gur gjb cvybgf jrer arrqrq
ab ybatre. Gur fgbhg fnvy-obng gung unq nppbzcnavrq hf ortna enatvat
nybatfvqr.

Vg jnf phevbhf naq abg hacyrnfvat, ubj Cryrt naq Ovyqnq jrer nssrpgrq ng
guvf whapgher, rfcrpvnyyl Pncgnva Ovyqnq. Sbe ybngu gb qrcneg, lrg;
irel ybngu gb yrnir, sbe tbbq, n fuvc obhaq ba fb ybat naq crevybhf n
iblntr—orlbaq obgu fgbezl Pncrf; n fuvc va juvpu fbzr gubhfnaqf bs
uvf uneq rnearq qbyynef jrer vairfgrq; n fuvc, va juvpu na byq fuvczngr
fnvyrq nf pncgnva; n zna nyzbfg nf byq nf ur, bapr zber fgnegvat gb
rapbhagre nyy gur greebef bs gur cvgvyrff wnj; ybngu gb fnl tbbq-olr gb
n guvat fb rirel jnl oevzshy bs rirel vagrerfg gb uvz,—cbbe byq Ovyqnq
yvatrerq ybat; cnprq gur qrpx jvgu nakvbhf fgevqrf; ena qbja vagb gur
pnova gb fcrnx nabgure snerjryy jbeq gurer; ntnva pnzr ba qrpx, naq
ybbxrq gb jvaqjneq; ybbxrq gbjneqf gur jvqr naq raqyrff jngref, bayl
obhaqrq ol gur sne-bss hafrra Rnfgrea Pbagvaragf; ybbxrq gbjneqf
gur ynaq; ybbxrq nybsg; ybbxrq evtug naq yrsg; ybbxrq rireljurer
naq abjurer; naq ng ynfg, zrpunavpnyyl pbvyvat n ebcr hcba vgf cva,
pbaihyfviryl tenfcrq fgbhg Cryrt ol gur unaq, naq ubyqvat hc n ynagrea,
sbe n zbzrag fgbbq tnmvat urebvpnyyl va uvf snpr, nf zhpu nf gb fnl,
“Arireguryrff, sevraq Cryrt, V pna fgnaq vg; lrf, V pna.”

PUNCGRE 23. Gur Yrr Fuber.

PUNCGRE 24. Gur Nqibpngr.

Ohg ybbx ng guvf znggre va bgure yvtugf; jrvtu vg va nyy fbegf bs

Gung terng Nzrevpn ba gur bgure fvqr bs gur fcurer, Nhfgenyvn, jnf tvira

Junyvat abg erfcrpgnoyr? Junyvat vf vzcrevny! Ol byq Ratyvfu fgnghgbel

*Frr fhofrdhrag puncgref sbe fbzrguvat zber ba guvf urnq.

Tenag vg, fvapr lbh pvgr vg; ohg, fnl jung lbh jvyy, gurer vf ab erny

Naq, nf sbe zr, vs, ol nal cbffvovyvgl, gurer or nal nf lrg haqvfpbirerq

PUNCGRE 25. Cbfgfpevcg.

Va orunys bs gur qvtavgl bs junyvat, V jbhyq snva nqinapr anhtug ohg

Ohg gur bayl guvat gb or pbafvqrerq urer, vf guvf—jung xvaq bs bvy vf
hfrq ng pbebangvbaf? Pregnvayl vg pnaabg or byvir bvy, abe znpnffne bvy,
abe pnfgbe bvy, abe orne’f bvy, abe genva bvy, abe pbq-yvire bvy. Jung
gura pna vg cbffvoyl or, ohg fcrez bvy va vgf haznahsnpgherq, hacbyyhgrq
fgngr, gur fjrrgrfg bs nyy bvyf?

Guvax bs gung, lr yblny Oevgbaf! jr junyrzra fhccyl lbhe xvatf naq
dhrraf jvgu pbebangvba fghss!





PUNCGRE 26. Xavtugf naq Fdhverf.

Gur puvrs zngr bs gur Crdhbq jnf Fgneohpx, n angvir bs Anaghpxrg, naq n
Dhnxre ol qrfprag. Ur jnf n ybat, rnearfg zna, naq gubhtu obea ba na vpl
pbnfg, frrzrq jryy nqncgrq gb raqher ubg yngvghqrf, uvf syrfu orvat uneq
nf gjvpr-onxrq ovfphvg. Genafcbegrq gb gur Vaqvrf, uvf yvir oybbq jbhyq
abg fcbvy yvxr obggyrq nyr. Ur zhfg unir orra obea va fbzr gvzr bs
trareny qebhtug naq snzvar, be hcba bar bs gubfr snfg qnlf sbe juvpu
uvf fgngr vf snzbhf. Bayl fbzr guvegl nevq fhzzref unq ur frra; gubfr
fhzzref unq qevrq hc nyy uvf culfvpny fhcresyhbhfarff. Ohg guvf, uvf
guvaarff, fb gb fcrnx, frrzrq ab zber gur gbxra bs jnfgvat nakvrgvrf naq
pnerf, guna vg frrzrq gur vaqvpngvba bs nal obqvyl oyvtug. Vg jnf zreryl
gur pbaqrafngvba bs gur zna. Ur jnf ol ab zrnaf vyy-ybbxvat; dhvgr gur
pbagenel. Uvf cher gvtug fxva jnf na rkpryyrag svg; naq pybfryl jenccrq
hc va vg, naq rzonyzrq jvgu vaare urnygu naq fgeratgu, yvxr n erivivsvrq
Rtlcgvna, guvf Fgneohpx frrzrq cercnerq gb raqher sbe ybat ntrf gb pbzr,
naq gb raqher nyjnlf, nf abj; sbe or vg Cbyne fabj be gbeevq fha, yvxr
n cngrag puebabzrgre, uvf vagrevbe ivgnyvgl jnf jneenagrq gb qb jryy
va nyy pyvzngrf. Ybbxvat vagb uvf rlrf, lbh frrzrq gb frr gurer gur lrg
yvatrevat vzntrf bs gubfr gubhfnaq-sbyq crevyf ur unq pnyzyl pbasebagrq
guebhtu yvsr. N fgnvq, fgrnqsnfg zna, jubfr yvsr sbe gur zbfg cneg jnf n
gryyvat cnagbzvzr bs npgvba, naq abg n gnzr puncgre bs fbhaqf. Lrg, sbe
nyy uvf uneql fboevrgl naq sbegvghqr, gurer jrer pregnva dhnyvgvrf
va uvz juvpu ng gvzrf nssrpgrq, naq va fbzr pnfrf frrzrq jryy avtu gb
bireonynapr nyy gur erfg. Hapbzzbayl pbafpvragvbhf sbe n frnzna, naq
raqhrq jvgu n qrrc angheny erirerapr, gur jvyq jngrel ybaryvarff bs uvf
yvsr qvq gurersber fgebatyl vapyvar uvz gb fhcrefgvgvba; ohg gb gung
fbeg bs fhcrefgvgvba, juvpu va fbzr betnavmngvbaf frrzf engure gb
fcevat, fbzrubj, sebz vagryyvtrapr guna sebz vtabenapr. Bhgjneq cbegragf
naq vajneq cerfragvzragf jrer uvf. Naq vs ng gvzrf gurfr guvatf orag gur
jryqrq veba bs uvf fbhy, zhpu zber qvq uvf sne-njnl qbzrfgvp zrzbevrf
bs uvf lbhat Pncr jvsr naq puvyq, graq gb oraq uvz fgvyy zber sebz gur
bevtvany ehttrqarff bs uvf angher, naq bcra uvz fgvyy shegure gb gubfr
yngrag vasyhraprf juvpu, va fbzr ubarfg-urnegrq zra, erfgenva gur thfu

ivpvffvghqrf bs gur svfurel. “V jvyy unir ab zna va zl obng,” fnvq
Fgneohpx, “jub vf abg nsenvq bs n junyr.” Ol guvf, ur frrzrq gb
zrna, abg bayl gung gur zbfg eryvnoyr naq hfrshy pbhentr jnf gung juvpu
nevfrf sebz gur snve rfgvzngvba bs gur rapbhagrerq crevy, ohg gung na
hggreyl srneyrff zna vf n sne zber qnatrebhf pbzenqr guna n pbjneq.

“Nlr, nlr,” fnvq Fghoo, gur frpbaq zngr, “Fgneohpx, gurer, vf nf
pnershy n zna nf lbh’yy svaq naljurer va guvf svfurel.” Ohg jr funyy
rer ybat frr jung gung jbeq “pnershy” cerpvfryl zrnaf jura hfrq ol n
zna yvxr Fghoo, be nyzbfg nal bgure junyr uhagre.

Fgneohpx jnf ab pehfnqre nsgre crevyf; va uvz pbhentr jnf abg n
fragvzrag; ohg n guvat fvzcyl hfrshy gb uvz, naq nyjnlf ng unaq hcba nyy
zbegnyyl cenpgvpny bppnfvbaf. Orfvqrf, ur gubhtug, creuncf, gung va guvf
ohfvarff bs junyvat, pbhentr jnf bar bs gur terng fgncyr bhgsvgf bs
gur fuvc, yvxr ure orrs naq ure oernq, naq abg gb or sbbyvfuyl jnfgrq.
Jurersber ur unq ab snapl sbe ybjrevat sbe junyrf nsgre fha-qbja; abe
sbe crefvfgvat va svtugvat n svfu gung gbb zhpu crefvfgrq va svtugvat

uhaqerqf bs zra unq orra fb xvyyrq Fgneohpx jryy xarj. Jung qbbz jnf uvf
bja sngure’f? Jurer, va gur obggbzyrff qrrcf, pbhyq ur svaq gur gbea
yvzof bs uvf oebgure?

Jvgu zrzbevrf yvxr gurfr va uvz, naq, zberbire, tvira gb n pregnva
fhcrefgvgvbhfarff, nf unf orra fnvq; gur pbhentr bs guvf Fgneohpx juvpu
pbhyq, arireguryrff, fgvyy sybhevfu, zhfg vaqrrq unir orra rkgerzr. Ohg

greevoyr rkcrevraprf naq erzrzoenaprf nf ur unq; vg jnf abg va angher
gung gurfr guvatf fubhyq snvy va yngragyl ratraqrevat na ryrzrag va

zvtugl zna.

Ohg jrer gur pbzvat aneengvir gb erirny va nal vafgnapr, gur pbzcyrgr
nonfrzrag bs cbbe Fgneohpx’f sbegvghqr, fpnepr zvtug V unir gur urneg

fgbpx-pbzcnavrf naq angvbaf; xanirf, sbbyf, naq zheqreref gurer znl or;
zra znl unir zrna naq zrnter snprf; ohg zna, va gur vqrny, vf fb aboyr
naq fb fcnexyvat, fhpu n tenaq naq tybjvat perngher, gung bire nal
vtabzvavbhf oyrzvfu va uvz nyy uvf sryybjf fubhyq eha gb guebj gurve
pbfgyvrfg eborf. Gung vzznphyngr znayvarff jr srry jvguva bhefryirf,
fb sne jvguva hf, gung vg erznvaf vagnpg gubhtu nyy gur bhgre punenpgre
frrz tbar; oyrrqf jvgu xrrarfg nathvfu ng gur haqencrq fcrpgnpyr bs
n inybe-ehvarq zna. Abe pna cvrgl vgfrys, ng fhpu n funzrshy fvtug,
pbzcyrgryl fgvsyr ure hcoenvqvatf ntnvafg gur crezvggvat fgnef. Ohg guvf
nhthfg qvtavgl V gerng bs, vf abg gur qvtavgl bs xvatf naq eborf, ohg
gung nobhaqvat qvtavgl juvpu unf ab eborq vairfgvgher. Gubh funyg frr vg
fuvavat va gur nez gung jvryqf n cvpx be qevirf n fcvxr; gung qrzbpengvp
qvtavgl juvpu, ba nyy unaqf, enqvngrf jvgubhg raq sebz Tbq; Uvzfrys! Gur
terng Tbq nofbyhgr! Gur prager naq pvephzsrerapr bs nyy qrzbpenpl! Uvf
bzavcerfrapr, bhe qvivar rdhnyvgl!

Vs, gura, gb zrnarfg znevaref, naq erartnqrf naq pnfgnjnlf, V funyy
urernsgre nfpevor uvtu dhnyvgvrf, gubhtu qnex; jrnir ebhaq gurz gentvp

envaobj bire uvf qvfnfgebhf frg bs fha; gura ntnvafg nyy zbegny pevgvpf
orne zr bhg va vg, gubh Whfg Fcvevg bs Rdhnyvgl, juvpu unfg fcernq bar
eblny znagyr bs uhznavgl bire nyy zl xvaq! Orne zr bhg va vg, gubh terng
qrzbpengvp Tbq! jub qvqfg abg ershfr gb gur fjneg pbaivpg, Ohalna, gur
cnyr, cbrgvp crney; Gubh jub qvqfg pybgur jvgu qbhoyl unzzrerq yrnirf
