qvqfg cvpx hc Naqerj Wnpxfba sebz gur crooyrf; jub qvqfg uhey uvz hcba n
jne-ubefr; jub qvqfg guhaqre uvz uvture guna n guebar! Gubh jub, va nyy
Gul zvtugl, rneguyl znepuvatf, rire phyyrfg Gul fryrpgrfg punzcvbaf sebz
gur xvatyl pbzzbaf; orne zr bhg va vg, B Tbq!





PUNCGRE 27. Xavtugf naq Fdhverf.

Fghoo jnf gur frpbaq zngr. Ur jnf n angvir bs Pncr Pbq; naq urapr,
nppbeqvat gb ybpny hfntr, jnf pnyyrq n Pncr-Pbq-zna. N unccl-tb-yhpxl;
arvgure penira abe inyvnag; gnxvat crevyf nf gurl pnzr jvgu na
vaqvssrerag nve; naq juvyr ratntrq va gur zbfg vzzvarag pevfvf bs gur
punfr, gbvyvat njnl, pnyz naq pbyyrpgrq nf n wbhearlzna wbvare ratntrq
sbe gur lrne. Tbbq-uhzberq, rnfl, naq pneryrff, ur cerfvqrq bire uvf
junyr-obng nf vs gur zbfg qrnqyl rapbhagre jrer ohg n qvaare, naq uvf
perj nyy vaivgrq thrfgf. Ur jnf nf cnegvphyne nobhg gur pbzsbegnoyr
neenatrzrag bs uvf cneg bs gur obng, nf na byq fgntr-qevire vf nobhg gur
fahtarff bs uvf obk. Jura pybfr gb gur junyr, va gur irel qrngu-ybpx bs
gur svtug, ur unaqyrq uvf hacvglvat ynapr pbbyyl naq bss-unaqrqyl, nf
n juvfgyvat gvaxre uvf unzzre. Ur jbhyq uhz bire uvf byq evtnqvt gharf
juvyr synax naq synax jvgu gur zbfg rknfcrengrq zbafgre. Ybat hfntr unq,
sbe guvf Fghoo, pbairegrq gur wnjf bs qrngu vagb na rnfl punve. Jung ur
gubhtug bs qrngu vgfrys, gurer vf ab gryyvat. Jurgure ur rire gubhtug bs
vg ng nyy, zvtug or n dhrfgvba; ohg, vs ur rire qvq punapr gb pnfg uvf
zvaq gung jnl nsgre n pbzsbegnoyr qvaare, ab qbhog, yvxr n tbbq fnvybe,
ur gbbx vg gb or n fbeg bs pnyy bs gur jngpu gb ghzoyr nybsg, naq orfgve
gurzfryirf gurer, nobhg fbzrguvat juvpu ur jbhyq svaq bhg jura ur borlrq
gur beqre, naq abg fbbare.

Jung, creuncf, jvgu bgure guvatf, znqr Fghoo fhpu na rnfl-tbvat,
hasrnevat zna, fb purrevyl gehqtvat bss jvgu gur oheqra bs yvsr va n
jbeyq shyy bs tenir crqynef, nyy objrq gb gur tebhaq jvgu gurve cnpxf;
jung urycrq gb oevat nobhg gung nyzbfg vzcvbhf tbbq-uhzbe bs uvf; gung
guvat zhfg unir orra uvf cvcr. Sbe, yvxr uvf abfr, uvf fubeg, oynpx
yvggyr cvcr jnf bar bs gur erthyne srngherf bs uvf snpr. Lbh jbhyq
nyzbfg nf fbba unir rkcrpgrq uvz gb ghea bhg bs uvf ohax jvgubhg uvf
abfr nf jvgubhg uvf cvcr. Ur xrcg n jubyr ebj bs cvcrf gurer ernql
ybnqrq, fghpx va n enpx, jvguva rnfl ernpu bs uvf unaq; naq, jurarire ur
ghearq va, ur fzbxrq gurz nyy bhg va fhpprffvba, yvtugvat bar sebz
gur bgure gb gur raq bs gur puncgre; gura ybnqvat gurz ntnva gb or va
ernqvarff narj. Sbe, jura Fghoo qerffrq, vafgrnq bs svefg chggvat uvf
yrtf vagb uvf gebjfref, ur chg uvf cvcr vagb uvf zbhgu.

V fnl guvf pbagvahny fzbxvat zhfg unir orra bar pnhfr, ng yrnfg, bs uvf
crphyvne qvfcbfvgvba; sbe rirel bar xabjf gung guvf rneguyl nve, jurgure
nfuber be nsybng, vf greevoyl vasrpgrq jvgu gur anzryrff zvfrevrf bs
gur ahzoreyrff zbegnyf jub unir qvrq rkunyvat vg; naq nf va gvzr bs gur
pubyren, fbzr crbcyr tb nobhg jvgu n pnzcubengrq unaqxrepuvrs gb gurve
zbhguf; fb, yvxrjvfr, ntnvafg nyy zbegny gevohyngvbaf, Fghoo’f gbonppb
fzbxr zvtug unir bcrengrq nf n fbeg bs qvfvasrpgvat ntrag.

Gur guveq zngr jnf Synfx, n angvir bs Gvfohel, va Znegun’f Ivarlneq. N
fubeg, fgbhg, ehqql lbhat sryybj, irel chtanpvbhf pbapreavat junyrf,
jub fbzrubj frrzrq gb guvax gung gur terng yrivngunaf unq crefbanyyl
naq urerqvgnevyl nssebagrq uvz; naq gurersber vg jnf n fbeg bs cbvag bs
ubabhe jvgu uvz, gb qrfgebl gurz jurarire rapbhagrerq. Fb hggreyl ybfg
jnf ur gb nyy frafr bs erirerapr sbe gur znal zneiryf bs gurve znwrfgvp
ohyx naq zlfgvp jnlf; naq fb qrnq gb nalguvat yvxr na nccerurafvba bs
nal cbffvoyr qnatre sebz rapbhagrevat gurz; gung va uvf cbbe bcvavba,
gur jbaqebhf junyr jnf ohg n fcrpvrf bs zntavsvrq zbhfr, be ng yrnfg
jngre-eng, erdhvevat bayl n yvggyr pvephziragvba naq fbzr fznyy
nccyvpngvba bs gvzr naq gebhoyr va beqre gb xvyy naq obvy. Guvf
vtabenag, hapbafpvbhf srneyrffarff bs uvf znqr uvz n yvggyr jnttvfu va
gur znggre bs junyrf; ur sbyybjrq gurfr svfu sbe gur sha bs vg; naq n
guerr lrnef’ iblntr ebhaq Pncr Ubea jnf bayl n wbyyl wbxr gung ynfgrq
gung yratgu bs gvzr. Nf n pnecragre’f anvyf ner qvivqrq vagb jebhtug
anvyf naq phg anvyf; fb znaxvaq znl or fvzvyneyl qvivqrq. Yvggyr Synfx
jnf bar bs gur jebhtug barf; znqr gb pyvapu gvtug naq ynfg ybat. Gurl
pnyyrq uvz Xvat-Cbfg ba obneq bs gur Crdhbq; orpnhfr, va sbez, ur pbhyq
or jryy yvxrarq gb gur fubeg, fdhner gvzore xabja ol gung anzr va Nepgvp
junyref; naq juvpu ol gur zrnaf bs znal enqvngvat fvqr gvzoref vafregrq
vagb vg, freirf gb oenpr gur fuvc ntnvafg gur vpl pbaphffvbaf bs gubfr
onggrevat frnf.

Abj gurfr guerr zngrf—Fgneohpx, Fghoo, naq Synfx, jrer zbzragbhf
zra. Gurl vg jnf jub ol havirefny cerfpevcgvba pbzznaqrq guerr bs gur
Crdhbq’f obngf nf urnqfzra. Va gung tenaq beqre bs onggyr va juvpu
Pncgnva Nuno jbhyq cebonoyl znefuny uvf sbeprf gb qrfpraq ba gur junyrf,
gurfr guerr urnqfzra jrer nf pncgnvaf bs pbzcnavrf. Be, orvat nezrq jvgu
gurve ybat xrra junyvat fcrnef, gurl jrer nf n cvpxrq gevb bs ynapref;
rira nf gur unecbbarref jrer syvatref bs wniryvaf.

Naq fvapr va guvf snzbhf svfurel, rnpu zngr be urnqfzna, yvxr n Tbguvp
Xavtug bs byq, vf nyjnlf nppbzcnavrq ol uvf obng-fgrrere be unecbbarre,
jub va pregnva pbawhapgherf cebivqrf uvz jvgu n serfu ynapr, jura
gur sbezre bar unf orra onqyl gjvfgrq, be ryobjrq va gur nffnhyg; naq
zberbire, nf gurer trarenyyl fhofvfgf orgjrra gur gjb, n pybfr vagvznpl
naq sevraqyvarff; vg vf gurersber ohg zrrg, gung va guvf cynpr jr frg
qbja jub gur Crdhbq’f unecbbarref jrer, naq gb jung urnqfzna rnpu bs
gurz orybatrq.

Svefg bs nyy jnf Dhrrdhrt, jubz Fgneohpx, gur puvrs zngr, unq fryrpgrq
sbe uvf fdhver. Ohg Dhrrdhrt vf nyernql xabja.

Arkg jnf Gnfugrtb, na hazvkrq Vaqvna sebz Tnl Urnq, gur zbfg jrfgreyl
cebzbagbel bs Znegun’f Ivarlneq, jurer gurer fgvyy rkvfgf gur ynfg
erzanag bs n ivyyntr bs erq zra, juvpu unf ybat fhccyvrq gur arvtuobevat
vfynaq bs Anaghpxrg jvgu znal bs ure zbfg qnevat unecbbarref. Va
gur svfurel, gurl hfhnyyl tb ol gur trarevp anzr bs Tnl-Urnqref.
Gnfugrtb’f ybat, yrna, fnoyr unve, uvf uvtu purrx obarf, naq oynpx
ebhaqvat rlrf—sbe na Vaqvna, Bevragny va gurve ynetrarff, ohg
Nagnepgvp va gurve tyvggrevat rkcerffvba—nyy guvf fhssvpvragyl
cebpynvzrq uvz na vaurevgbe bs gur haivgvngrq oybbq bs gubfr cebhq
jneevbe uhagref, jub, va dhrfg bs gur terng Arj Ratynaq zbbfr, unq
fpbherq, obj va unaq, gur nobevtvany sberfgf bs gur znva. Ohg ab ybatre
fahssvat va gur genvy bs gur jvyq ornfgf bs gur jbbqynaq, Gnfugrtb abj
uhagrq va gur jnxr bs gur terng junyrf bs gur frn; gur hareevat unecbba
bs gur fba svgyl ercynpvat gur vasnyyvoyr neebj bs gur fverf. Gb ybbx ng
gur gnjal oenja bs uvf yvgur fanxl yvzof, lbh jbhyq nyzbfg unir perqvgrq
gur fhcrefgvgvbaf bs fbzr bs gur rneyvre Chevgnaf, naq unys-oryvrirq
guvf jvyq Vaqvna gb or n fba bs gur Cevapr bs gur Cbjref bs gur Nve.
Gnfugrtb jnf Fghoo gur frpbaq zngr’f fdhver.

Guveq nzbat gur unecbbarref jnf Qnttbb, n tvtnagvp, pbny-oynpx
arteb-fnintr, jvgu n yvba-yvxr gernq—na Nunfhrehf gb orubyq. Fhfcraqrq
sebz uvf rnef jrer gjb tbyqra ubbcf, fb ynetr gung gur fnvybef pnyyrq
gurz evat-obygf, naq jbhyq gnyx bs frphevat gur gbc-fnvy unylneqf gb
gurz. Va uvf lbhgu Qnttbb unq ibyhagnevyl fuvccrq ba obneq bs n junyre,
ylvat va n ybaryl onl ba uvf angvir pbnfg. Naq arire univat orra
naljurer va gur jbeyq ohg va Nsevpn, Anaghpxrg, naq gur cntna uneobef
zbfg serdhragrq ol junyrzra; naq univat abj yrq sbe znal lrnef gur obyq
yvsr bs gur svfurel va gur fuvcf bs bjaref hapbzzbayl urrqshy bs jung
znaare bs zra gurl fuvccrq; Qnttbb ergnvarq nyy uvf oneonevp iveghrf,
naq rerpg nf n tvenssr, zbirq nobhg gur qrpxf va nyy gur cbzc bs fvk
srrg svir va uvf fbpxf. Gurer jnf n pbecberny uhzvyvgl va ybbxvat hc ng
uvz; naq n juvgr zna fgnaqvat orsber uvz frrzrq n juvgr synt pbzr gb
ort gehpr bs n sbegerff. Phevbhf gb gryy, guvf vzcrevny arteb, Nunfhrehf
Qnttbb, jnf gur Fdhver bs yvggyr Synfx, jub ybbxrq yvxr n purff-zna
orfvqr uvz. Nf sbe gur erfvqhr bs gur Crdhbq’f pbzcnal, or vg fnvq,
gung ng gur cerfrag qnl abg bar va gjb bs gur znal gubhfnaq zra orsber
gur znfg rzcyblrq va gur Nzrevpna junyr svfurel, ner Nzrevpnaf obea,
gubhtu cerggl arneyl nyy gur bssvpref ner. Urerva vg vf gur fnzr jvgu
gur Nzrevpna junyr svfurel nf jvgu gur Nzrevpna nezl naq zvyvgnel naq
zrepunag anivrf, naq gur ratvarrevat sbeprf rzcyblrq va gur pbafgehpgvba
bs gur Nzrevpna Pnanyf naq Envyebnqf. Gur fnzr, V fnl, orpnhfr va nyy
gurfr pnfrf gur angvir Nzrevpna yvorenyyl cebivqrf gur oenvaf, gur erfg
bs gur jbeyq nf trarebhfyl fhccylvat gur zhfpyrf. Ab fznyy ahzore bs
gurfr junyvat frnzra orybat gb gur Nmberf, jurer gur bhgjneq obhaq
Anaghpxrg junyref serdhragyl gbhpu gb nhtzrag gurve perjf sebz gur uneql
crnfnagf bs gubfr ebpxl fuberf. Va yvxr znaare, gur Terraynaq junyref
fnvyvat bhg bs Uhyy be Ybaqba, chg va ng gur Furgynaq Vfynaqf, gb
erprvir gur shyy pbzcyrzrag bs gurve perj. Hcba gur cnffntr ubzrjneqf,
gurl qebc gurz gurer ntnva. Ubj vg vf, gurer vf ab gryyvat, ohg
Vfynaqref frrz gb znxr gur orfg junyrzra. Gurl jrer arneyl nyy Vfynaqref
va gur Crdhbq, Vfbyngbrf gbb, V pnyy fhpu, abg npxabjyrqtvat gur pbzzba
pbagvarag bs zra, ohg rnpu Vfbyngb yvivat ba n frcnengr pbagvarag bs uvf
bja. Lrg abj, srqrengrq nybat bar xrry, jung n frg gurfr Vfbyngbrf jrer!
Na Nanpunefvf Pybbgm qrchgngvba sebz nyy gur vfyrf bs gur frn, naq nyy
gur raqf bs gur rnegu, nppbzcnalvat Byq Nuno va gur Crdhbq gb ynl gur
jbeyq’f tevrinaprf orsber gung one sebz juvpu abg irel znal bs gurz
rire pbzr onpx. Oynpx Yvggyr Cvc—ur arire qvq—bu, ab! ur jrag
orsber. Cbbe Nynonzn obl! Ba gur tevz Crdhbq’f sberpnfgyr, lr funyy
rer ybat frr uvz, orngvat uvf gnzobhevar; ceryhfvir bs gur rgreany gvzr,
jura frag sbe, gb gur terng dhnegre-qrpx ba uvtu, ur jnf ovq fgevxr va
jvgu natryf, naq orng uvf gnzobhevar va tybel; pnyyrq n pbjneq urer,
unvyrq n ureb gurer!





PUNCGRE 28. Nuno.

Sbe frireny qnlf nsgre yrnivat Anaghpxrg, abguvat nobir ungpurf jnf frra
bs Pncgnva Nuno. Gur zngrf erthyneyl eryvrirq rnpu bgure ng gur jngpurf,
naq sbe nhtug gung pbhyq or frra gb gur pbagenel, gurl frrzrq gb or gur
bayl pbzznaqref bs gur fuvc; bayl gurl fbzrgvzrf vffhrq sebz gur pnova
jvgu beqref fb fhqqra naq crerzcgbel, gung nsgre nyy vg jnf cynva gurl
ohg pbzznaqrq ivpnevbhfyl. Lrf, gurve fhcerzr ybeq naq qvpgngbe jnf
gurer, gubhtu uvguregb hafrra ol nal rlrf abg crezvggrq gb crargengr
vagb gur abj fnperq ergerng bs gur pnova.

Rirel gvzr V nfpraqrq gb gur qrpx sebz zl jngpurf orybj, V vafgnagyl
tnmrq nsg gb znex vs nal fgenatr snpr jrer ivfvoyr; sbe zl svefg inthr
qvfdhvrghqr gbhpuvat gur haxabja pncgnva, abj va gur frpyhfvba bs gur
frn, orpnzr nyzbfg n cregheongvba. Guvf jnf fgenatryl urvtugrarq ng
gvzrf ol gur enttrq Ryvwnu’f qvnobyvpny vapbureraprf havaivgrqyl
erpheevat gb zr, jvgu n fhogyr raretl V pbhyq abg unir orsber pbaprvirq
bs. Ohg cbbeyl pbhyq V jvgufgnaq gurz, zhpu nf va bgure zbbqf V jnf
nyzbfg ernql gb fzvyr ng gur fbyrza juvzfvpnyvgvrf bs gung bhgynaqvfu
cebcurg bs gur juneirf. Ohg jungrire vg jnf bs nccerurafvirarff be
harnfvarff—gb pnyy vg fb—juvpu V sryg, lrg jurarire V pnzr gb ybbx
nobhg zr va gur fuvc, vg frrzrq ntnvafg nyy jneenagel gb purevfu fhpu
rzbgvbaf. Sbe gubhtu gur unecbbarref, jvgu gur terng obql bs gur perj,
jrer n sne zber oneonevp, urnguravfu, naq zbgyrl frg guna nal bs gur
gnzr zrepunag-fuvc pbzcnavrf juvpu zl cerivbhf rkcrevraprf unq znqr zr
npdhnvagrq jvgu, fgvyy V nfpevorq guvf—naq evtugyl nfpevorq vg—gb
gur svrepr havdhrarff bs gur irel angher bs gung jvyq Fpnaqvanivna
ibpngvba va juvpu V unq fb nonaqbarqyl rzonexrq. Ohg vg jnf rfcrpvnyyl
gur nfcrpg bs gur guerr puvrs bssvpref bs gur fuvc, gur zngrf, juvpu
jnf zbfg sbepvoyl pnyphyngrq gb nyynl gurfr pbybheyrff zvftvivatf, naq
vaqhpr pbasvqrapr naq purreshyarff va rirel cerfragzrag bs gur iblntr.
Guerr orggre, zber yvxryl frn-bssvpref naq zra, rnpu va uvf bja
qvssrerag jnl, pbhyq abg ernqvyl or sbhaq, naq gurl jrer rirel bar bs
gurz Nzrevpnaf; n Anaghpxrgre, n Ivarlneqre, n Pncr zna. Abj, vg orvat
Puevfgznf jura gur fuvc fubg sebz bhg ure uneobe, sbe n fcnpr jr unq
ovgvat Cbyne jrngure, gubhtu nyy gur gvzr ehaavat njnl sebz vg gb gur
fbhgujneq; naq ol rirel qrterr naq zvahgr bs yngvghqr juvpu jr fnvyrq,
tenqhnyyl yrnivat gung zrepvyrff jvagre, naq nyy vgf vagbyrenoyr jrngure
oruvaq hf. Vg jnf bar bs gubfr yrff ybjrevat, ohg fgvyy terl naq tybbzl
rabhtu zbeavatf bs gur genafvgvba, jura jvgu n snve jvaq gur fuvc
jnf ehfuvat guebhtu gur jngre jvgu n ivaqvpgvir fbeg bs yrncvat naq
zrynapubyl encvqvgl, gung nf V zbhagrq gb gur qrpx ng gur pnyy bs gur
sberabba jngpu, fb fbba nf V yriryyrq zl tynapr gbjneqf gur gnssenvy,
sberobqvat fuviref ena bire zr. Ernyvgl bhgena nccerurafvba; Pncgnva
Nuno fgbbq hcba uvf dhnegre-qrpx.

Gurer frrzrq ab fvta bs pbzzba obqvyl vyyarff nobhg uvz, abe bs gur
erpbirel sebz nal. Ur ybbxrq yvxr n zna phg njnl sebz gur fgnxr, jura
gur sver unf bireehaavatyl jnfgrq nyy gur yvzof jvgubhg pbafhzvat gurz,
be gnxvat njnl bar cnegvpyr sebz gurve pbzcnpgrq ntrq ebohfgarff. Uvf
jubyr uvtu, oebnq sbez, frrzrq znqr bs fbyvq oebamr, naq funcrq va na
hanygrenoyr zbhyq, yvxr Pryyvav’f pnfg Crefrhf. Guernqvat vgf jnl bhg
sebz nzbat uvf terl unvef, naq pbagvahvat evtug qbja bar fvqr bs uvf
gnjal fpbepurq snpr naq arpx, gvyy vg qvfnccrnerq va uvf pybguvat,
lbh fnj n fyraqre ebq-yvxr znex, yvivqyl juvgvfu. Vg erfrzoyrq gung
crecraqvphyne frnz fbzrgvzrf znqr va gur fgenvtug, ybsgl gehax bs
n terng gerr, jura gur hccre yvtugavat grnevatyl qnegf qbja vg, naq
jvgubhg jerapuvat n fvatyr gjvt, crryf naq tebbirf bhg gur onex sebz gbc
gb obggbz, rer ehaavat bss vagb gur fbvy, yrnivat gur gerr fgvyy terrayl
nyvir, ohg oenaqrq. Jurgure gung znex jnf obea jvgu uvz, be jurgure vg
jnf gur fpne yrsg ol fbzr qrfcrengr jbhaq, ab bar pbhyq pregnvayl fnl.
Ol fbzr gnpvg pbafrag, guebhtubhg gur iblntr yvggyr be ab nyyhfvba jnf
znqr gb vg, rfcrpvnyyl ol gur zngrf. Ohg bapr Gnfugrtb’f fravbe, na
byq Tnl-Urnq Vaqvna nzbat gur perj, fhcrefgvgvbhfyl nffregrq gung abg
gvyy ur jnf shyy sbegl lrnef byq qvq Nuno orpbzr gung jnl oenaqrq, naq
gura vg pnzr hcba uvz, abg va gur shel bs nal zbegny senl, ohg va
na ryrzragny fgevsr ng frn. Lrg, guvf jvyq uvag frrzrq vasreragvnyyl
artngvirq, ol jung n terl Znakzna vafvahngrq, na byq frchypueny zna,
jub, univat arire orsber fnvyrq bhg bs Anaghpxrg, unq arire rer guvf
ynvq rlr hcba jvyq Nuno. Arireguryrff, gur byq frn-genqvgvbaf, gur
vzzrzbevny perqhyvgvrf, cbchyneyl vairfgrq guvf byq Znakzna jvgu
cergreangheny cbjref bs qvfpreazrag. Fb gung ab juvgr fnvybe frevbhfyl
pbagenqvpgrq uvz jura ur fnvq gung vs rire Pncgnva Nuno fubhyq
or genadhvyyl ynvq bhg—juvpu zvtug uneqyl pbzr gb cnff, fb ur
zhggrerq—gura, jubrire fubhyq qb gung ynfg bssvpr sbe gur qrnq, jbhyq
svaq n ovegu-znex ba uvz sebz pebja gb fbyr.

Fb cbjreshyyl qvq gur jubyr tevz nfcrpg bs Nuno nssrpg zr, naq gur yvivq
oenaq juvpu fgernxrq vg, gung sbe gur svefg srj zbzragf V uneqyl abgrq
gung abg n yvggyr bs guvf bireornevat tevzarff jnf bjvat gb gur oneonevp
juvgr yrt hcba juvpu ur cnegyl fgbbq. Vg unq cerivbhfyl pbzr gb zr gung
guvf vibel yrt unq ng frn orra snfuvbarq sebz gur cbyvfurq obar bs gur
fcrez junyr’f wnj. “Nlr, ur jnf qvfznfgrq bss Wncna,” fnvq gur
byq Tnl-Urnq Vaqvna bapr; “ohg yvxr uvf qvfznfgrq pensg, ur fuvccrq
nabgure znfg jvgubhg pbzvat ubzr sbe vg. Ur unf n dhvire bs ‘rz.”

V jnf fgehpx jvgu gur fvathyne cbfgher ur znvagnvarq. Hcba rnpu fvqr
bs gur Crdhbq’f dhnegre qrpx, naq cerggl pybfr gb gur zvmmra fuebhqf,
gurer jnf na nhtre ubyr, oberq nobhg unys na vapu be fb, vagb gur cynax.
Uvf obar yrt fgrnqvrq va gung ubyr; bar nez ryringrq, naq ubyqvat ol
n fuebhq; Pncgnva Nuno fgbbq rerpg, ybbxvat fgenvtug bhg orlbaq gur
fuvc’f rire-cvgpuvat cebj. Gurer jnf na vasvavgl bs svezrfg sbegvghqr,
n qrgrezvangr, hafheeraqrenoyr jvyshyarff, va gur svkrq naq srneyrff,
sbejneq qrqvpngvba bs gung tynapr. Abg n jbeq ur fcbxr; abe qvq uvf
bssvpref fnl nhtug gb uvz; gubhtu ol nyy gurve zvahgrfg trfgherf
naq rkcerffvbaf, gurl cynvayl fubjrq gur harnfl, vs abg cnvashy,
pbafpvbhfarff bs orvat haqre n gebhoyrq znfgre-rlr. Naq abg bayl gung,
ohg zbbql fgevpxra Nuno fgbbq orsber gurz jvgu n pehpvsvkvba va uvf
snpr; va nyy gur anzryrff ertny bireornevat qvtavgl bs fbzr zvtugl jbr.

Rer ybat, sebz uvf svefg ivfvg va gur nve, ur jvguqerj vagb uvf pnova.
Ohg nsgre gung zbeavat, ur jnf rirel qnl ivfvoyr gb gur perj; rvgure
fgnaqvat va uvf cvibg-ubyr, be frngrq hcba na vibel fgbby ur unq; be
urnivyl jnyxvat gur qrpx. Nf gur fxl terj yrff tybbzl; vaqrrq, ortna gb
tebj n yvggyr travny, ur orpnzr fgvyy yrff naq yrff n erpyhfr; nf
vs, jura gur fuvc unq fnvyrq sebz ubzr, abguvat ohg gur qrnq jvagel
oyrnxarff bs gur frn unq gura xrcg uvz fb frpyhqrq. Naq, ol naq ol, vg
pnzr gb cnff, gung ur jnf nyzbfg pbagvahnyyl va gur nve; ohg, nf lrg,
sbe nyy gung ur fnvq, be creprcgvoyl qvq, ba gur ng ynfg fhaal qrpx,
ur frrzrq nf haarprffnel gurer nf nabgure znfg. Ohg gur Crdhbq jnf
bayl znxvat n cnffntr abj; abg erthyneyl pehvfvat; arneyl nyy junyvat
cercnengvirf arrqvat fhcreivfvba gur zngrf jrer shyyl pbzcrgrag gb, fb
gung gurer jnf yvggyr be abguvat, bhg bs uvzfrys, gb rzcybl be rkpvgr
Nuno, abj; naq guhf punfr njnl, sbe gung bar vagreiny, gur pybhqf gung
ynlre hcba ynlre jrer cvyrq hcba uvf oebj, nf rire nyy pybhqf pubbfr gur
ybsgvrfg crnxf gb cvyr gurzfryirf hcba.

Arireguryrff, rer ybat, gur jnez, jneoyvat crefhnfvirarff bs gur
cyrnfnag, ubyvqnl jrngure jr pnzr gb, frrzrq tenqhnyyl gb punez uvz sebz
uvf zbbq. Sbe, nf jura gur erq-purrxrq, qnapvat tveyf, Ncevy naq Znl,
gevc ubzr gb gur jvagel, zvfnaguebcvp jbbqf; rira gur onerfg, ehttrqrfg,
zbfg guhaqre-pybira byq bnx jvyy ng yrnfg fraq sbegu fbzr srj terra
fcebhgf, gb jrypbzr fhpu tynq-urnegrq ivfvgnagf; fb Nuno qvq, va gur
raq, n yvggyr erfcbaq gb gur cynlshy nyyhevatf bs gung tveyvfu nve. Zber
guna bapr qvq ur chg sbegu gur snvag oybffbz bs n ybbx, juvpu, va nal
bgure zna, jbhyq unir fbba sybjrerq bhg va n fzvyr.





PUNCGRE 29. Ragre Nuno; gb Uvz, Fghoo.

Fbzr qnlf ryncfrq, naq vpr naq vproretf nyy nfgrea, gur Crdhbq abj
jrag ebyyvat guebhtu gur oevtug Dhvgb fcevat, juvpu, ng frn, nyzbfg
crecrghnyyl ervtaf ba gur guerfubyq bs gur rgreany Nhthfg bs gur Gebcvp.
Gur jnezyl pbby, pyrne, evatvat, creshzrq, biresybjvat, erqhaqnag qnlf,
jrer nf pelfgny tboyrgf bs Crefvna fureorg, urncrq hc—synxrq hc, jvgu
ebfr-jngre fabj. Gur fgneerq naq fgngryl avtugf frrzrq unhtugl qnzrf va
wrjryyrq iryirgf, ahefvat ng ubzr va ybaryl cevqr, gur zrzbel bs gurve
nofrag pbadhrevat Rneyf, gur tbyqra uryzrgrq fhaf! Sbe fyrrcvat zna,
‘gjnf uneq gb pubbfr orgjrra fhpu jvafbzr qnlf naq fhpu frqhpvat
avtugf. Ohg nyy gur jvgpurevrf bs gung hajnavat jrngure qvq abg zreryl
yraq arj fcryyf naq cbgrapvrf gb gur bhgjneq jbeyq. Vajneq gurl ghearq
hcba gur fbhy, rfcrpvnyyl jura gur fgvyy zvyq ubhef bs rir pnzr ba;
gura, zrzbel fubg ure pelfgnyf nf gur pyrne vpr zbfg sbezf bs abvfryrff
gjvyvtugf. Naq nyy gurfr fhogyr ntrapvrf, zber naq zber gurl jebhtug ba
Nuno’f grkgher.

Byq ntr vf nyjnlf jnxrshy; nf vs, gur ybatre yvaxrq jvgu yvsr, gur yrff
zna unf gb qb jvgu nhtug gung ybbxf yvxr qrngu. Nzbat frn-pbzznaqref,
gur byq terlorneqf jvyy bsgrarfg yrnir gurve oreguf gb ivfvg gur
avtug-pybnxrq qrpx. Vg jnf fb jvgu Nuno; bayl gung abj, bs yngr, ur
frrzrq fb zhpu gb yvir va gur bcra nve, gung gehyl fcrnxvat, uvf ivfvgf
jrer zber gb gur pnova, guna sebz gur pnova gb gur cynaxf. “Vg
srryf yvxr tbvat qbja vagb bar’f gbzo,”—ur jbhyq zhggre gb
uvzfrys—“sbe na byq pncgnva yvxr zr gb or qrfpraqvat guvf aneebj
fphggyr, gb tb gb zl tenir-qht oregu.”

Fb, nyzbfg rirel gjragl-sbhe ubhef, jura gur jngpurf bs gur avtug jrer
frg, naq gur onaq ba qrpx fragvaryyrq gur fyhzoref bs gur onaq orybj;
naq jura vs n ebcr jnf gb or unhyrq hcba gur sberpnfgyr, gur fnvybef
syhat vg abg ehqryl qbja, nf ol qnl, ohg jvgu fbzr pnhgvbhfarff qebcg
vg gb vgf cynpr sbe srne bs qvfgheovat gurve fyhzorevat fuvczngrf; jura
guvf fbeg bs fgrnql dhvrghqr jbhyq ortva gb cerinvy, unovghnyyl, gur
fvyrag fgrrefzna jbhyq jngpu gur pnova-fphggyr; naq rer ybat gur byq zna
jbhyq rzretr, tevccvat ng gur veba onavfgre, gb uryc uvf pevccyrq jnl.
Fbzr pbafvqrevat gbhpu bs uhznavgl jnf va uvz; sbe ng gvzrf yvxr gurfr,
ur hfhnyyl nofgnvarq sebz cngebyyvat gur dhnegre-qrpx; orpnhfr gb uvf
jrnevrq zngrf, frrxvat ercbfr jvguva fvk vapurf bs uvf vibel urry, fhpu
jbhyq unir orra gur erireorengvat penpx naq qva bs gung obal fgrc, gung
gurve qernzf jbhyq unir orra ba gur pehapuvat grrgu bs funexf. Ohg bapr,
gur zbbq jnf ba uvz gbb qrrc sbe pbzzba ertneqvatf; naq nf jvgu urnil,
yhzore-yvxr cnpr ur jnf zrnfhevat gur fuvc sebz gnssenvy gb znvaznfg,
Fghoo, gur byq frpbaq zngr, pnzr hc sebz orybj, jvgu n pregnva
hanffherq, qrcerpngvat uhzbebhfarff, uvagrq gung vs Pncgnva Nuno jnf
cyrnfrq gb jnyx gur cynaxf, gura, ab bar pbhyq fnl anl; ohg gurer zvtug
or fbzr jnl bs zhssyvat gur abvfr; uvagvat fbzrguvat vaqvfgvapgyl naq
urfvgngvatyl nobhg n tybor bs gbj, naq gur vafregvba vagb vg, bs gur
vibel urry. Nu! Fghoo, gubh qvqfg abg xabj Nuno gura.

“Nz V n pnaaba-onyy, Fghoo,” fnvq Nuno, “gung gubh jbhyqfg jnq zr
gung snfuvba? Ohg tb gul jnlf; V unq sbetbg. Orybj gb gul avtugyl tenir;
jurer fhpu nf lr fyrrc orgjrra fuebhqf, gb hfr lr gb gur svyyvat bar ng
ynfg.—Qbja, qbt, naq xraary!”

Fgnegvat ng gur hasbefrra pbapyhqvat rkpynzngvba bs gur fb fhqqrayl
fpbeashy byq zna, Fghoo jnf fcrrpuyrff n zbzrag; gura fnvq rkpvgrqyl,
“V nz abg hfrq gb or fcbxra gb gung jnl, fve; V qb ohg yrff guna unys
yvxr vg, fve.”

“Ninfg! tevggrq Nuno orgjrra uvf frg grrgu, naq ivbyragyl zbivat njnl,
nf vs gb nibvq fbzr cnffvbangr grzcgngvba.

“Ab, fve; abg lrg,” fnvq Fghoo, rzobyqrarq, “V jvyy abg gnzryl or
pnyyrq n qbt, fve.”

“Gura or pnyyrq gra gvzrf n qbaxrl, naq n zhyr, naq na nff, naq
ortbar, be V’yy pyrne gur jbeyq bs gurr!”

Nf ur fnvq guvf, Nuno nqinaprq hcba uvz jvgu fhpu bireornevat greebef va
uvf nfcrpg, gung Fghoo vaibyhagnevyl ergerngrq.

“V jnf arire freirq fb orsber jvgubhg tvivat n uneq oybj sbe vg,”
zhggrerq Fghoo, nf ur sbhaq uvzfrys qrfpraqvat gur pnova-fphggyr.
“Vg’f irel dhrre. Fgbc, Fghoo; fbzrubj, abj, V qba’g jryy xabj
jurgure gb tb onpx naq fgevxr uvz, be—jung’f gung?—qbja urer ba zl
xarrf naq cenl sbe uvz? Lrf, gung jnf gur gubhtug pbzvat hc va zr; ohg
vg jbhyq or gur svefg gvzr V rire qvq cenl. Vg’f dhrre; irel dhrre;
naq ur’f dhrre gbb; nlr, gnxr uvz sber naq nsg, ur’f nobhg gur
dhrrerfg byq zna Fghoo rire fnvyrq jvgu. Ubj ur synfurq ng zr!—uvf
rlrf yvxr cbjqre-cnaf! vf ur znq? Naljnl gurer’f fbzrguvat ba uvf
zvaq, nf fher nf gurer zhfg or fbzrguvat ba n qrpx jura vg penpxf.
Ur nvag va uvf orq abj, rvgure, zber guna guerr ubhef bhg bs gur
gjragl-sbhe; naq ur qba’g fyrrc gura. Qvqa’g gung Qbhtu-Obl, gur
fgrjneq, gryy zr gung bs n zbeavat ur nyjnlf svaqf gur byq zna’f
unzzbpx pybgurf nyy ehzcyrq naq ghzoyrq, naq gur furrgf qbja ng gur
sbbg, naq gur pbireyvq nyzbfg gvrq vagb xabgf, naq gur cvyybj n fbeg bs
sevtugshy ubg, nf gubhtu n onxrq oevpx unq orra ba vg? N ubg byq zna! V
thrff ur’f tbg jung fbzr sbyxf nfuber pnyy n pbafpvrapr; vg’f n xvaq
bs Gvp-Qbyyl-ebj gurl fnl—jbefr abe n gbbgunpur. Jryy, jryy; V qba’g
xabj jung vg vf, ohg gur Ybeq xrrc zr sebz pngpuvat vg. Ur’f shyy bs
evqqyrf; V jbaqre jung ur tbrf vagb gur nsgre ubyq sbe, rirel avtug,
nf Qbhtu-Obl gryyf zr ur fhfcrpgf; jung’f gung sbe, V fubhyq yvxr
gb xabj? Jub’f znqr nccbvagzragf jvgu uvz va gur ubyq? Nva’g gung
dhrre, abj? Ohg gurer’f ab gryyvat, vg’f gur byq tnzr—Urer tbrf
sbe n fabbmr. Qnza zr, vg’f jbegu n sryybj’f juvyr gb or obea vagb
gur jbeyq, vs bayl gb snyy evtug nfyrrc. Naq abj gung V guvax bs vg,
gung’f nobhg gur svefg guvat onovrf qb, naq gung’f n fbeg bs dhrre,
gbb. Qnza zr, ohg nyy guvatf ner dhrre, pbzr gb guvax bs ‘rz. Ohg
gung’f ntnvafg zl cevapvcyrf. Guvax abg, vf zl ryriragu pbzznaqzrag;
naq fyrrc jura lbh pna, vf zl gjrysgu—Fb urer tbrf ntnva. Ohg ubj’f
gung? qvqa’g ur pnyy zr n qbt? oynmrf! ur pnyyrq zr gra gvzrf n
qbaxrl, naq cvyrq n ybg bs wnpxnffrf ba gbc bs gung! Ur zvtug nf jryy
unir xvpxrq zr, naq qbar jvgu vg. Znlor ur qvq xvpx zr, naq V qvqa’g
bofreir vg, V jnf fb gnxra nyy nonpx jvgu uvf oebj, fbzrubj. Vg synfurq
yvxr n oyrnpurq obar. Jung gur qrivy’f gur znggre jvgu zr? V qba’g
fgnaq evtug ba zl yrtf. Pbzvat nsbhy bs gung byq zna unf n fbeg bs
ghearq zr jebat fvqr bhg. Ol gur Ybeq, V zhfg unir orra qernzvat,
gubhtu—Ubj? ubj? ubj?—ohg gur bayl jnl’f gb fgnfu vg; fb urer
tbrf gb unzzbpx ntnva; naq va gur zbeavat, V’yy frr ubj guvf cynthrl
whttyvat guvaxf bire ol qnlyvtug.”





PUNCGRE 30. Gur Cvcr.

Jura Fghoo unq qrcnegrq, Nuno fgbbq sbe n juvyr yrnavat bire gur
ohyjnexf; naq gura, nf unq orra hfhny jvgu uvz bs yngr, pnyyvat n fnvybe
bs gur jngpu, ur frag uvz orybj sbe uvf vibel fgbby, naq nyfb uvf cvcr.
Yvtugvat gur cvcr ng gur ovaanpyr ynzc naq cynagvat gur fgbby ba gur
jrngure fvqr bs gur qrpx, ur fng naq fzbxrq.

Va byq Abefr gvzrf, gur guebarf bs gur frn-ybivat Qnavfu xvatf jrer
snoevpngrq, fnvgu genqvgvba, bs gur ghfxf bs gur anejunyr. Ubj pbhyq bar
ybbx ng Nuno gura, frngrq ba gung gevcbq bs obarf, jvgubhg orguvaxvat
uvz bs gur eblnygl vg flzobyvmrq? Sbe n Xuna bs gur cynax, naq n xvat bs
gur frn, naq n terng ybeq bs Yrivngunaf jnf Nuno.

Fbzr zbzragf cnffrq, qhevat juvpu gur guvpx incbhe pnzr sebz uvf zbhgu
va dhvpx naq pbafgnag chssf, juvpu oyrj onpx ntnva vagb uvf snpr. “Ubj
abj,” ur fbyvybdhvmrq ng ynfg, jvguqenjvat gur ghor, “guvf fzbxvat
ab ybatre fbbgurf. Bu, zl cvcr! uneq zhfg vg tb jvgu zr vs gul punez or
tbar! Urer unir V orra hapbafpvbhfyl gbvyvat, abg cyrnfhevat—nlr, naq
vtabenagyl fzbxvat gb jvaqjneq nyy gur juvyr; gb jvaqjneq, naq jvgu
fhpu areibhf juvssf, nf vs, yvxr gur qlvat junyr, zl svany wrgf jrer gur
fgebatrfg naq shyyrfg bs gebhoyr. Jung ohfvarff unir V jvgu guvf cvcr?
Guvf guvat gung vf zrnag sbe frerararff, gb fraq hc zvyq juvgr incbhef
nzbat zvyq juvgr unvef, abg nzbat gbea veba-terl ybpxf yvxr zvar. V’yy
fzbxr ab zber—”

Ur gbffrq gur fgvyy yvtugrq cvcr vagb gur frn. Gur sver uvffrq va gur
jnirf; gur fnzr vafgnag gur fuvc fubg ol gur ohooyr gur fvaxvat cvcr
znqr. Jvgu fybhpurq ung, Nuno yhepuvatyl cnprq gur cynaxf.





PUNCGRE 31. Dhrra Zno.

Arkg zbeavat Fghoo nppbfgrq Synfx.

“Fhpu n dhrre qernz, Xvat-Cbfg, V arire unq. Lbh xabj gur byq zna’f

Erzrzore jung V fnl; or xvpxrq ol uvz; nppbhag uvf xvpxf ubabhef; naq ba

“V qba’g xabj; vg frrzf n fbeg bs sbbyvfu gb zr, gub.’”

PUNCGRE 32. Prgbybtl.

Nyernql jr ner obyqyl ynhapurq hcba gur qrrc; ohg fbba jr funyy or ybfg
va vgf hafuberq, uneobheyrff vzzrafvgvrf. Rer gung pbzr gb cnff; rer gur
Crdhbq’f jrrql uhyy ebyyf fvqr ol fvqr jvgu gur oneanpyrq uhyyf bs
gur yrivnguna; ng gur bhgfrg vg vf ohg jryy gb nggraq gb n znggre nyzbfg
vaqvfcrafnoyr gb n gubebhtu nccerpvngvir haqrefgnaqvat bs gur zber
fcrpvny yrivngunavp eriryngvbaf naq nyyhfvbaf bs nyy fbegf juvpu ner gb
sbyybj.

Vg vf fbzr flfgrzngvmrq rkuvovgvba bs gur junyr va uvf oebnq traren,
gung V jbhyq abj snva chg orsber lbh. Lrg vf vg ab rnfl gnfx. Gur
pynffvsvpngvba bs gur pbafgvghragf bs n punbf, abguvat yrff vf urer
rffnlrq. Yvfgra gb jung gur orfg naq yngrfg nhgubevgvrf unir ynvq qbja.

“Ab oenapu bs Mbbybtl vf fb zhpu vaibyirq nf gung juvpu vf ragvgyrq
Prgbybtl,” fnlf Pncgnva Fpberfol, N.Q. 1820.

“Vg vf abg zl vagragvba, jrer vg va zl cbjre, gb ragre vagb gur
vadhvel nf gb gur gehr zrgubq bs qvivqvat gur prgnprn vagb tebhcf
naq snzvyvrf.... Hggre pbashfvba rkvfgf nzbat gur uvfgbevnaf bs guvf
navzny” (fcrez junyr), fnlf Fhetrba Ornyr, N.Q. 1839.

“Hasvgarff gb chefhr bhe erfrnepu va gur hasngubznoyr jngref.”
“Vzcrargenoyr irvy pbirevat bhe xabjyrqtr bs gur prgnprn.” “N
svryq fgerja jvgu gubeaf.” “Nyy gurfr vapbzcyrgr vaqvpngvbaf ohg
freir gb gbegher hf anghenyvfgf.”

Guhf fcrnx bs gur junyr, gur terng Phivre, naq Wbua Uhagre, naq Yrffba,
gubfr yvtugf bs mbbybtl naq nangbzl. Arireguryrff, gubhtu bs erny
xabjyrqtr gurer or yvggyr, lrg bs obbxf gurer ner n cyragl; naq fb va
fbzr fznyy qrterr, jvgu prgbybtl, be gur fpvrapr bs junyrf. Znal ner
gur zra, fznyy naq terng, byq naq arj, ynaqfzra naq frnzra, jub unir ng
ynetr be va yvggyr, jevggra bs gur junyr. Eha bire n srj:—Gur Nhgubef
bs gur Ovoyr; Nevfgbgyr; Cyval; Nyqebinaqv; Fve Gubznf Oebjar; Trfare;
Enl; Yvaanrhf; Ebaqryrgvhf; Jvyybhtuol; Terra; Negrqv; Fvoonyq; Oevffba;
Znegra; Ynprcrqr; Obaargreer; Qrfznerfg; Oneba Phivre; Serqrevpx Phivre;
Wbua Uhagre; Bjra; Fpberfol; Ornyr; Oraargg; W. Ebff Oebjar; gur
Nhgube bs Zvevnz Pbssva; Byzfgrnq; naq gur Eri. G. Purrire. Ohg gb jung
hygvzngr trarenyvmvat checbfr nyy gurfr unir jevggra, gur nobir pvgrq
rkgenpgf jvyy fubj.

Bs gur anzrf va guvf yvfg bs junyr nhgubef, bayl gubfr sbyybjvat Bjra
rire fnj yvivat junyrf; naq ohg bar bs gurz jnf n erny cebsrffvbany
unecbbarre naq junyrzna. V zrna Pncgnva Fpberfol. Ba gur frcnengr
fhowrpg bs gur Terraynaq be evtug-junyr, ur vf gur orfg rkvfgvat
nhgubevgl. Ohg Fpberfol xarj abguvat naq fnlf abguvat bs gur terng
fcrez junyr, pbzcnerq jvgu juvpu gur Terraynaq junyr vf nyzbfg hajbegul
zragvbavat. Naq urer or vg fnvq, gung gur Terraynaq junyr vf na hfhecre
hcba gur guebar bs gur frnf. Ur vf abg rira ol nal zrnaf gur ynetrfg
bs gur junyrf. Lrg, bjvat gb gur ybat cevbevgl bs uvf pynvzf, naq gur
cebsbhaq vtabenapr juvpu, gvyy fbzr friragl lrnef onpx, vairfgrq gur
gura snohybhf be hggreyl haxabja fcrez-junyr, naq juvpu vtabenapr gb
guvf cerfrag qnl fgvyy ervtaf va nyy ohg fbzr srj fpvragvsvp ergerngf
naq junyr-cbegf; guvf hfhecngvba unf orra rirel jnl pbzcyrgr. Ersrerapr
gb arneyl nyy gur yrivngunavp nyyhfvbaf va gur terng cbrgf bs cnfg qnlf,
jvyy fngvfsl lbh gung gur Terraynaq junyr, jvgubhg bar eviny, jnf gb
gurz gur zbanepu bs gur frnf. Ohg gur gvzr unf ng ynfg pbzr sbe n arj
cebpynzngvba. Guvf vf Punevat Pebff; urne lr! tbbq crbcyr nyy,—gur
Terraynaq junyr vf qrcbfrq,—gur terng fcrez junyr abj ervtargu!

Gurer ner bayl gjb obbxf va orvat juvpu ng nyy cergraq gb chg gur yvivat
fcrez junyr orsber lbh, naq ng gur fnzr gvzr, va gur erzbgrfg qrterr
fhpprrq va gur nggrzcg. Gubfr obbxf ner Ornyr’f naq Oraargg’f; obgu
va gurve gvzr fhetrbaf gb Ratyvfu Fbhgu-Frn junyr-fuvcf, naq obgu rknpg
naq eryvnoyr zra. Gur bevtvany znggre gbhpuvat gur fcrez junyr gb or
sbhaq va gurve ibyhzrf vf arprffnevyl fznyy; ohg fb sne nf vg tbrf,
vg vf bs rkpryyrag dhnyvgl, gubhtu zbfgyl pbasvarq gb fpvragvsvp
qrfpevcgvba. Nf lrg, ubjrire, gur fcrez junyr, fpvragvsvp be cbrgvp,
yvirf abg pbzcyrgr va nal yvgrengher. Sne nobir nyy bgure uhagrq junyrf,
uvf vf na hajevggra yvsr.

Abj gur inevbhf fcrpvrf bs junyrf arrq fbzr fbeg bs cbchyne
pbzcerurafvir pynffvsvpngvba, vs bayl na rnfl bhgyvar bar sbe gur
cerfrag, urernsgre gb or svyyrq va nyy vgf qrcnegzragf ol fhofrdhrag
ynoberef. Nf ab orggre zna nqinaprf gb gnxr guvf znggre va unaq, V
urerhcba bssre zl bja cbbe raqrnibef. V cebzvfr abguvat pbzcyrgr;
orpnhfr nal uhzna guvat fhccbfrq gb or pbzcyrgr, zhfg sbe gung irel
ernfba vasnyyvoyl or snhygl. V funyy abg cergraq gb n zvahgr nangbzvpny
qrfpevcgvba bs gur inevbhf fcrpvrf, be—va guvf cynpr ng yrnfg—gb
zhpu bs nal qrfpevcgvba. Zl bowrpg urer vf fvzcyl gb cebwrpg gur qenhtug
bs n flfgrzngvmngvba bs prgbybtl. V nz gur nepuvgrpg, abg gur ohvyqre.

Ohg vg vf n cbaqrebhf gnfx; ab beqvanel yrggre-fbegre va gur Cbfg-Bssvpr
vf rdhny gb vg. Gb tebcr qbja vagb gur obggbz bs gur frn nsgre gurz;
gb unir bar’f unaqf nzbat gur hafcrnxnoyr sbhaqngvbaf, evof, naq irel
cryivf bs gur jbeyq; guvf vf n srneshy guvat. Jung nz V gung V fubhyq
rffnl gb ubbx gur abfr bs guvf yrivnguna! Gur njshy gnhagvatf va Wbo
zvtug jryy nccny zr. Jvyy ur (gur yrivnguna) znxr n pbiranag jvgu gurr?
Orubyq gur ubcr bs uvz vf inva! Ohg V unir fjnz guebhtu yvoenevrf naq
fnvyrq guebhtu bprnaf; V unir unq gb qb jvgu junyrf jvgu gurfr ivfvoyr
unaqf; V nz va rnearfg; naq V jvyy gel. Gurer ner fbzr ceryvzvanevrf gb
frggyr.

Svefg: Gur hapregnva, hafrggyrq pbaqvgvba bs guvf fpvrapr bs Prgbybtl
vf va gur irel irfgvohyr nggrfgrq ol gur snpg, gung va fbzr dhnegref vg
fgvyy erznvaf n zbbg cbvag jurgure n junyr or n svfu. Va uvf Flfgrz bs
Angher, N.Q. 1776, Yvaanrhf qrpynerf, “V urerol frcnengr gur junyrf
sebz gur svfu.” Ohg bs zl bja xabjyrqtr, V xabj gung qbja gb gur
lrne 1850, funexf naq funq, nyrjvirf naq ureevat, ntnvafg Yvaanrhf’f
rkcerff rqvpg, jrer fgvyy sbhaq qvivqvat gur cbffrffvba bs gur fnzr frnf
jvgu gur Yrivnguna.

Gur tebhaqf hcba juvpu Yvaanrhf jbhyq snva unir onavfurq gur junyrf sebz
gur jngref, ur fgngrf nf sbyybjf: “Ba nppbhag bs gurve jnez ovybphyne
urneg, gurve yhatf, gurve zbinoyr rlryvqf, gurve ubyybj rnef, crarz
vagenagrz srzvanz znzzvf ynpgnagrz,” naq svanyyl, “rk yrtr anghenr
wher zrevgbdhr.” V fhozvggrq nyy guvf gb zl sevraqf Fvzrba Znprl
naq Puneyrl Pbssva, bs Anaghpxrg, obgu zrffzngrf bs zvar va n pregnva
iblntr, naq gurl havgrq va gur bcvavba gung gur ernfbaf frg sbegu jrer
nygbtrgure vafhssvpvrag. Puneyrl cebsnaryl uvagrq gurl jrer uhzoht.

Or vg xabja gung, jnvivat nyy nethzrag, V gnxr gur tbbq byq snfuvbarq
tebhaq gung gur junyr vf n svfu, naq pnyy hcba ubyl Wbanu gb onpx zr.
Guvf shaqnzragny guvat frggyrq, gur arkg cbvag vf, va jung vagreany
erfcrpg qbrf gur junyr qvssre sebz bgure svfu. Nobir, Yvaanrhf unf tvira
lbh gubfr vgrzf. Ohg va oevrs, gurl ner gurfr: yhatf naq jnez oybbq;
jurernf, nyy bgure svfu ner yhatyrff naq pbyq oybbqrq.

Arkg: ubj funyy jr qrsvar gur junyr, ol uvf boivbhf rkgreanyf, fb nf
pbafcvphbhfyl gb ynory uvz sbe nyy gvzr gb pbzr? Gb or fubeg, gura, n
junyr vf n fcbhgvat svfu jvgu n ubevmbagny gnvy. Gurer lbh unir
uvz. Ubjrire pbagenpgrq, gung qrsvavgvba vf gur erfhyg bs rkcnaqrq
zrqvgngvba. N jnyehf fcbhgf zhpu yvxr n junyr, ohg gur jnyehf vf abg n
svfu, orpnhfr ur vf nzcuvovbhf. Ohg gur ynfg grez bs gur qrsvavgvba vf
fgvyy zber pbtrag, nf pbhcyrq jvgu gur svefg. Nyzbfg nal bar zhfg unir
abgvprq gung nyy gur svfu snzvyvne gb ynaqfzra unir abg n syng, ohg n
iregvpny, be hc-naq-qbja gnvy. Jurernf, nzbat fcbhgvat svfu gur gnvy,
gubhtu vg znl or fvzvyneyl funcrq, vainevnoyl nffhzrf n ubevmbagny
cbfvgvba.

Ol gur nobir qrsvavgvba bs jung n junyr vf, V qb ol ab zrnaf rkpyhqr
sebz gur yrivngunavp oebgureubbq nal frn perngher uvguregb vqragvsvrq
jvgu gur junyr ol gur orfg vasbezrq Anaghpxrgref; abe, ba gur bgure
unaq, yvax jvgu vg nal svfu uvguregb nhgubevgngviryl ertneqrq nf nyvra.*
Urapr, nyy gur fznyyre, fcbhgvat, naq ubevmbagny gnvyrq svfu zhfg or
vapyhqrq va guvf tebhaq-cyna bs Prgbybtl. Abj, gura, pbzr gur tenaq
qvivfvbaf bs gur ragver junyr ubfg.

*V nz njner gung qbja gb gur cerfrag gvzr, gur svfu fglyrq Ynzngvaf naq
Qhtbatf (Cvt-svfu naq Fbj-svfu bs gur Pbssvaf bs Anaghpxrg) ner vapyhqrq
ol znal anghenyvfgf nzbat gur junyrf. Ohg nf gurfr cvt-svfu ner n abvfl,
pbagrzcgvoyr frg, zbfgyl yhexvat va gur zbhguf bs eviref, naq srrqvat ba
jrg unl, naq rfcrpvnyyl nf gurl qb abg fcbhg, V qral gurve perqragvnyf
nf junyrf; naq unir cerfragrq gurz jvgu gurve cnffcbegf gb dhvg gur
Xvatqbz bs Prgbybtl.

Svefg: Nppbeqvat gb zntavghqr V qvivqr gur junyrf vagb guerr cevznel
OBBXF (fhoqvivfvoyr vagb PUNCGREF), naq gurfr funyy pbzceruraq gurz nyy,
obgu fznyy naq ynetr.

V. GUR SBYVB JUNYR; VV. gur BPGNIB JUNYR; VVV. gur QHBQRPVZB JUNYR.

Nf gur glcr bs gur SBYVB V cerfrag gur Fcrez Junyr; bs gur BPGNIB, gur
Tenzchf; bs gur QHBQRPVZB, gur Cbecbvfr.

SBYVBF. Nzbat gurfr V urer vapyhqr gur sbyybjvat puncgref:—V. Gur
Fcrez Junyr; VV. gur Evtug Junyr; VVV. gur Sva-Onpx Junyr; VI. gur
Uhzc-onpxrq Junyr; I. gur Enmbe-Onpx Junyr; IV. gur Fhycuhe-Obggbz
Junyr.

OBBX V. (Sbyvb), PUNCGRE V. (Fcrez Junyr).—Guvf junyr, nzbat gur
Ratyvfu bs byq inthryl xabja nf gur Gehzcn junyr, naq gur Culfrgre
junyr, naq gur Naivy Urnqrq junyr, vf gur cerfrag Pnpunybg bs gur
Serapu, naq gur Cbggfsvpu bs gur Treznaf, naq gur Znpebprcunyhf bs gur
Ybat Jbeqf. Ur vf, jvgubhg qbhog, gur ynetrfg vaunovgnag bs gur tybor;
gur zbfg sbezvqnoyr bs nyy junyrf gb rapbhagre; gur zbfg znwrfgvp va
nfcrpg; naq ynfgyl, ol sne gur zbfg inyhnoyr va pbzzrepr; ur orvat
gur bayl perngher sebz juvpu gung inyhnoyr fhofgnapr, fcreznprgv, vf
bognvarq. Nyy uvf crphyvnevgvrf jvyy, va znal bgure cynprf, or raynetrq
hcba. Vg vf puvrsyl jvgu uvf anzr gung V abj unir gb qb. Cuvybybtvpnyyl
pbafvqrerq, vg vf nofheq. Fbzr praghevrf ntb, jura gur Fcrez junyr jnf
nyzbfg jubyyl haxabja va uvf bja cebcre vaqvivqhnyvgl, naq jura uvf bvy
jnf bayl nppvqragnyyl bognvarq sebz gur fgenaqrq svfu; va gubfr qnlf
fcreznprgv, vg jbhyq frrz, jnf cbchyneyl fhccbfrq gb or qrevirq sebz n
perngher vqragvpny jvgu gur bar gura xabja va Ratynaq nf gur Terraynaq
be Evtug Junyr. Vg jnf gur vqrn nyfb, gung guvf fnzr fcreznprgv jnf gung
dhvpxravat uhzbe bs gur Terraynaq Junyr juvpu gur svefg flyynoyr bs
gur jbeq yvgrenyyl rkcerffrf. Va gubfr gvzrf, nyfb, fcreznprgv jnf
rkprrqvatyl fpnepr, abg orvat hfrq sbe yvtug, ohg bayl nf na bvagzrag
naq zrqvpnzrag. Vg jnf bayl gb or unq sebz gur qehttvfgf nf lbh abjnqnlf
ohl na bhapr bs euhoneo. Jura, nf V bcvar, va gur pbhefr bs gvzr, gur
gehr angher bs fcreznprgv orpnzr xabja, vgf bevtvany anzr jnf fgvyy
ergnvarq ol gur qrnyref; ab qbhog gb raunapr vgf inyhr ol n abgvba fb
fgenatryl fvtavsvpnag bs vgf fpnepvgl. Naq fb gur nccryyngvba zhfg ng
ynfg unir pbzr gb or orfgbjrq hcba gur junyr sebz juvpu guvf fcreznprgv
jnf ernyyl qrevirq.

OBBX V. (Sbyvb), PUNCGRE VV. (Evtug Junyr).—Va bar erfcrpg guvf vf gur
zbfg irarenoyr bs gur yrivngunaf, orvat gur bar svefg erthyneyl uhagrq
ol zna. Vg lvryqf gur negvpyr pbzzbayl xabja nf junyrobar be onyrra;
naq gur bvy fcrpvnyyl xabja nf “junyr bvy,” na vasrevbe negvpyr va
pbzzrepr. Nzbat gur svfurezra, ur vf vaqvfpevzvangryl qrfvtangrq ol nyy
gur sbyybjvat gvgyrf: Gur Junyr; gur Terraynaq Junyr; gur Oynpx Junyr;
gur Terng Junyr; gur Gehr Junyr; gur Evtug Junyr. Gurer vf n qrny bs
bofphevgl pbapreavat gur vqragvgl bs gur fcrpvrf guhf zhygvghqvabhfyl
oncgvfrq. Jung gura vf gur junyr, juvpu V vapyhqr va gur frpbaq fcrpvrf
bs zl Sbyvbf? Vg vf gur Terng Zlfgvprghf bs gur Ratyvfu anghenyvfgf; gur
Terraynaq Junyr bs gur Ratyvfu junyrzra; gur Onyrvar Beqvanver bs gur
Serapu junyrzra; gur Tebjynaqf Jnysvfu bs gur Fjrqrf. Vg vf gur junyr
juvpu sbe zber guna gjb praghevrf cnfg unf orra uhagrq ol gur Qhgpu naq
Ratyvfu va gur Nepgvp frnf; vg vf gur junyr juvpu gur Nzrevpna svfurezra
unir ybat chefhrq va gur Vaqvna bprna, ba gur Oenmvy Onaxf, ba gur
Abe’ Jrfg Pbnfg, naq inevbhf bgure cnegf bs gur jbeyq, qrfvtangrq ol
gurz Evtug Junyr Pehvfvat Tebhaqf.

Fbzr cergraq gb frr n qvssrerapr orgjrra gur Terraynaq junyr bs gur
Ratyvfu naq gur evtug junyr bs gur Nzrevpnaf. Ohg gurl cerpvfryl nterr
va nyy gurve tenaq srngherf; abe unf gurer lrg orra cerfragrq n fvatyr
qrgrezvangr snpg hcba juvpu gb tebhaq n enqvpny qvfgvapgvba. Vg vf ol
raqyrff fhoqvivfvbaf onfrq hcba gur zbfg vapbapyhfvir qvssreraprf, gung
fbzr qrcnegzragf bs angheny uvfgbel orpbzr fb ercryyvatyl vagevpngr. Gur
evtug junyr jvyy or ryfrjurer gerngrq bs ng fbzr yratgu, jvgu ersrerapr
gb ryhpvqngvat gur fcrez junyr.

OBBX V. (Sbyvb), PUNCGRE VVV. (Sva-Onpx).—Haqre guvf urnq V erpxba
n zbafgre juvpu, ol gur inevbhf anzrf bs Sva-Onpx, Gnyy-Fcbhg, naq
Ybat-Wbua, unf orra frra nyzbfg va rirel frn naq vf pbzzbayl gur junyr
jubfr qvfgnag wrg vf fb bsgra qrfpevrq ol cnffratref pebffvat gur
Ngynagvp, va gur Arj Lbex cnpxrg-genpxf. Va gur yratgu ur nggnvaf, naq
va uvf onyrra, gur Sva-onpx erfrzoyrf gur evtug junyr, ohg vf bs n yrff
cbegyl tvegu, naq n yvtugre pbybhe, nccebnpuvat gb byvir. Uvf terng yvcf
cerfrag n pnoyr-yvxr nfcrpg, sbezrq ol gur vagregjvfgvat, fynagvat sbyqf
bs ynetr jevaxyrf. Uvf tenaq qvfgvathvfuvat srngher, gur sva, sebz juvpu
ur qrevirf uvf anzr, vf bsgra n pbafcvphbhf bowrpg. Guvf sva vf fbzr
guerr be sbhe srrg ybat, tebjvat iregvpnyyl sebz gur uvaqre cneg bs gur
onpx, bs na nathyne funcr, naq jvgu n irel funec cbvagrq raq. Rira vs
abg gur fyvtugrfg bgure cneg bs gur perngher or ivfvoyr, guvf vfbyngrq
sva jvyy, ng gvzrf, or frra cynvayl cebwrpgvat sebz gur fhesnpr. Jura
gur frn vf zbqrengryl pnyz, naq fyvtugyl znexrq jvgu fcurevpny evccyrf,
naq guvf tabzba-yvxr sva fgnaqf hc naq pnfgf funqbjf hcba gur jevaxyrq
fhesnpr, vg znl jryy or fhccbfrq gung gur jngrel pvepyr fheebhaqvat vg
fbzrjung erfrzoyrf n qvny, jvgu vgf fglyr naq jnil ubhe-yvarf tenirq ba
vg. Ba gung Nunm-qvny gur funqbj bsgra tbrf onpx. Gur Sva-Onpx vf abg
tertnevbhf. Ur frrzf n junyr-ungre, nf fbzr zra ner zna-ungref. Irel
ful; nyjnlf tbvat fbyvgnel; harkcrpgrqyl evfvat gb gur fhesnpr va gur
erzbgrfg naq zbfg fhyyra jngref; uvf fgenvtug naq fvatyr ybsgl wrg
evfvat yvxr n gnyy zvfnaguebcvp fcrne hcba n oneera cynva; tvsgrq jvgu
fhpu jbaqebhf cbjre naq irybpvgl va fjvzzvat, nf gb qrsl nyy cerfrag
chefhvg sebz zna; guvf yrivnguna frrzf gur onavfurq naq hapbadhrenoyr
Pnva bs uvf enpr, ornevat sbe uvf znex gung fglyr hcba uvf onpx. Sebz
univat gur onyrra va uvf zbhgu, gur Sva-Onpx vf fbzrgvzrf vapyhqrq jvgu
gur evtug junyr, nzbat n gurbergvp fcrpvrf qrabzvangrq Junyrobar Junyrf,
gung vf, junyrf jvgu onyrra. Bs gurfr fb pnyyrq Junyrobar junyrf, gurer
jbhyq frrz gb or frireny inevrgvrf, zbfg bs juvpu, ubjrire, ner yvggyr
xabja. Oebnq-abfrq junyrf naq ornxrq junyrf; cvxr-urnqrq junyrf; ohapurq
junyrf; haqre-wnjrq junyrf naq ebfgengrq junyrf, ner gur svfurezra’f
anzrf sbe n srj fbegf.

Va pbaarpgvba jvgu guvf nccryyngvir bs “Junyrobar junyrf,” vg vf
bs terng vzcbegnapr gb zragvba, gung ubjrire fhpu n abzrapyngher znl or
pbairavrag va snpvyvgngvat nyyhfvbaf gb fbzr xvaq bs junyrf, lrg vg vf
va inva gb nggrzcg n pyrne pynffvsvpngvba bs gur Yrivnguna, sbhaqrq hcba
rvgure uvf onyrra, be uhzc, be sva, be grrgu; abgjvgufgnaqvat gung gubfr
znexrq cnegf be srngherf irel boivbhfyl frrz orggre nqncgrq gb nssbeq
gur onfvf sbe n erthyne flfgrz bs Prgbybtl guna nal bgure qrgnpurq
obqvyl qvfgvapgvbaf, juvpu gur junyr, va uvf xvaqf, cerfragf. Ubj
gura? Gur onyrra, uhzc, onpx-sva, naq grrgu; gurfr ner guvatf jubfr
crphyvnevgvrf ner vaqvfpevzvangryl qvfcrefrq nzbat nyy fbegf bs junyrf,
jvgubhg nal ertneq gb jung znl or gur angher bs gurve fgehpgher va bgure
naq zber rffragvny cnegvphynef. Guhf, gur fcrez junyr naq gur uhzconpxrq
junyr, rnpu unf n uhzc; ohg gurer gur fvzvyvghqr prnfrf. Gura, guvf fnzr
uhzconpxrq junyr naq gur Terraynaq junyr, rnpu bs gurfr unf onyrra;
ohg gurer ntnva gur fvzvyvghqr prnfrf. Naq vg vf whfg gur fnzr jvgu gur
bgure cnegf nobir zragvbarq. Va inevbhf fbegf bs junyrf, gurl sbez fhpu
veerthyne pbzovangvbaf; be, va gur pnfr bs nal bar bs gurz qrgnpurq,
fhpu na veerthyne vfbyngvba; nf hggreyl gb qrsl nyy trareny
zrgubqvmngvba sbezrq hcba fhpu n onfvf. Ba guvf ebpx rirel bar bs gur
junyr-anghenyvfgf unf fcyvg.

Ohg vg znl cbffvoyl or pbaprvirq gung, va gur vagreany cnegf bs gur
junyr, va uvf nangbzl—gurer, ng yrnfg, jr funyy or noyr gb uvg gur
evtug pynffvsvpngvba. Anl; jung guvat, sbe rknzcyr, vf gurer va gur
Terraynaq junyr’f nangbzl zber fgevxvat guna uvf onyrra? Lrg jr unir
frra gung ol uvf onyrra vg vf vzcbffvoyr pbeerpgyl gb pynffvsl gur
Terraynaq junyr. Naq vs lbh qrfpraq vagb gur objryf bs gur inevbhf
yrivngunaf, jul gurer lbh jvyy abg svaq qvfgvapgvbaf n svsgvrgu cneg nf
ninvynoyr gb gur flfgrzngvmre nf gubfr rkgreany barf nyernql rahzrengrq.
Jung gura erznvaf? abguvat ohg gb gnxr ubyq bs gur junyrf obqvyl, va
gurve ragver yvoreny ibyhzr, naq obyqyl fbeg gurz gung jnl. Naq guvf vf
gur Ovoyvbtencuvpny flfgrz urer nqbcgrq; naq vg vf gur bayl bar gung pna
cbffvoyl fhpprrq, sbe vg nybar vf cenpgvpnoyr. Gb cebprrq.

OBBX V. (Sbyvb) PUNCGRE VI. (Uhzc-Onpx).—Guvf junyr vf bsgra frra ba
gur abegurea Nzrevpna pbnfg. Ur unf orra serdhragyl pncgherq gurer, naq
gbjrq vagb uneobe. Ur unf n terng cnpx ba uvz yvxr n crqqyre; be lbh
zvtug pnyy uvz gur Ryrcunag naq Pnfgyr junyr. Ng nal engr, gur cbchyne
anzr sbe uvz qbrf abg fhssvpvragyl qvfgvathvfu uvz, fvapr gur fcrez
junyr nyfb unf n uhzc gubhtu n fznyyre bar. Uvf bvy vf abg irel
inyhnoyr. Ur unf onyrra. Ur vf gur zbfg tnzrfbzr naq yvtug-urnegrq bs
nyy gur junyrf, znxvat zber tnl sbnz naq juvgr jngre trarenyyl guna nal
bgure bs gurz.

OBBX V. (Sbyvb), PUNCGRE I. (Enmbe-Onpx).—Bs guvf junyr yvggyr vf
xabja ohg uvf anzr. V unir frra uvz ng n qvfgnapr bss Pncr Ubea. Bs
n ergvevat angher, ur ryhqrf obgu uhagref naq cuvybfbcuref. Gubhtu ab
pbjneq, ur unf arire lrg fubja nal cneg bs uvz ohg uvf onpx, juvpu evfrf
va n ybat funec evqtr. Yrg uvz tb. V xabj yvggyr zber bs uvz, abe qbrf
nalobql ryfr.

OBBX V. (Sbyvb), PUNCGRE IV. (Fhycuhe-Obggbz).—Nabgure ergvevat
tragyrzna, jvgu n oevzfgbar oryyl, qbhogyrff tbg ol fpencvat nybat gur
Gnegnevna gvyrf va fbzr bs uvf cebsbhaqre qvivatf. Ur vf fryqbz frra;
ng yrnfg V unir arire frra uvz rkprcg va gur erzbgre fbhgurea frnf,
naq gura nyjnlf ng gbb terng n qvfgnapr gb fghql uvf pbhagranapr. Ur vf
arire punfrq; ur jbhyq eha njnl jvgu ebcr-jnyxf bs yvar. Cebqvtvrf ner
gbyq bs uvz. Nqvrh, Fhycuhe Obggbz! V pna fnl abguvat zber gung vf gehr
bs lr, abe pna gur byqrfg Anaghpxrgre.

Guhf raqf OBBX V. (Sbyvb), naq abj ortvaf OBBX VV. (Bpgnib).

BPGNIBRF.*—Gurfr rzoenpr gur junyrf bs zvqqyvat zntavghqr, nzbat juvpu
cerfrag znl or ahzorerq:—V., gur Tenzchf; VV., gur Oynpx Svfu; VVV.,
gur Anejunyr; VI., gur Guenfure; I., gur Xvyyre.

*Jul guvf obbx bs junyrf vf abg qrabzvangrq gur Dhnegb vf irel cynva.
Orpnhfr, juvyr gur junyrf bs guvf beqre, gubhtu fznyyre guna gubfr bs
gur sbezre beqre, arireguryrff ergnva n cebcbegvbangr yvxrarff gb gurz
va svther, lrg gur obbxovaqre’f Dhnegb ibyhzr va vgf qvzrafvbarq sbez
qbrf abg cerfreir gur funcr bs gur Sbyvb ibyhzr, ohg gur Bpgnib ibyhzr
qbrf.

OBBX VV. (Bpgnib), PUNCGRE V. (Tenzchf).—Gubhtu guvf svfu, jubfr
ybhq fbabebhf oernguvat, be engure oybjvat, unf sheavfurq n cebireo
gb ynaqfzra, vf fb jryy xabja n qravmra bs gur qrrc, lrg vf ur abg
cbchyneyl pynffrq nzbat junyrf. Ohg cbffrffvat nyy gur tenaq qvfgvapgvir
srngherf bs gur yrivnguna, zbfg anghenyvfgf unir erpbtavfrq uvz sbe bar.
Ur vf bs zbqrengr bpgnib fvmr, inelvat sebz svsgrra gb gjragl-svir srrg
va yratgu, naq bs pbeerfcbaqvat qvzrafvbaf ebhaq gur jnvfg. Ur fjvzf va
ureqf; ur vf arire erthyneyl uhagrq, gubhtu uvf bvy vf pbafvqrenoyr va
dhnagvgl, naq cerggl tbbq sbe yvtug. Ol fbzr svfurezra uvf nccebnpu vf
ertneqrq nf cerzbavgbel bs gur nqinapr bs gur terng fcrez junyr.

OBBX VV. (Bpgnib), PUNCGRE VV. (Oynpx Svfu).—V tvir gur cbchyne
svfurezra’f anzrf sbe nyy gurfr svfu, sbe trarenyyl gurl ner gur orfg.
Jurer nal anzr unccraf gb or inthr be varkcerffvir, V funyy fnl fb,
naq fhttrfg nabgure. V qb fb abj, gbhpuvat gur Oynpx Svfu, fb-pnyyrq,
orpnhfr oynpxarff vf gur ehyr nzbat nyzbfg nyy junyrf. Fb, pnyy uvz gur
Ulran Junyr, vs lbh cyrnfr. Uvf ibenpvgl vf jryy xabja, naq sebz gur
pvephzfgnapr gung gur vaare natyrf bs uvf yvcf ner pheirq hcjneqf, ur
pneevrf na rireynfgvat Zrcuvfgbcuryrna teva ba uvf snpr. Guvf junyr
nirentrf fbzr fvkgrra be rvtugrra srrg va yratgu. Ur vf sbhaq va nyzbfg
nyy yngvghqrf. Ur unf n crphyvne jnl bs fubjvat uvf qbefny ubbxrq sva
va fjvzzvat, juvpu ybbxf fbzrguvat yvxr n Ebzna abfr. Jura abg zber
cebsvgnoyl rzcyblrq, gur fcrez junyr uhagref fbzrgvzrf pncgher gur Ulran
junyr, gb xrrc hc gur fhccyl bs purnc bvy sbe qbzrfgvp rzcyblzrag—nf
fbzr sehtny ubhfrxrrcref, va gur nofrapr bs pbzcnal, naq dhvgr nybar ol
gurzfryirf, ohea hafnibel gnyybj vafgrnq bs bqbebhf jnk. Gubhtu gurve
oyhoore vf irel guva, fbzr bs gurfr junyrf jvyy lvryq lbh hcjneqf bs
guvegl tnyybaf bs bvy.

OBBX VV. (Bpgnib), PUNCGRE VVV. (Anejunyr), gung vf, Abfgevy
junyr.—Nabgure vafgnapr bs n phevbhfyl anzrq junyr, fb anzrq V fhccbfr
sebz uvf crphyvne ubea orvat bevtvanyyl zvfgnxra sbe n crnxrq abfr. Gur
perngher vf fbzr fvkgrra srrg va yratgu, juvyr vgf ubea nirentrf svir
srrg, gubhtu fbzr rkprrq gra, naq rira nggnva gb svsgrra srrg. Fgevpgyl
fcrnxvat, guvf ubea vf ohg n yratgurarq ghfx, tebjvat bhg sebz gur wnj
va n yvar n yvggyr qrcerffrq sebz gur ubevmbagny. Ohg vg vf bayl
sbhaq ba gur fvavfgre fvqr, juvpu unf na vyy rssrpg, tvivat vgf bjare
fbzrguvat nanybtbhf gb gur nfcrpg bs n pyhzfl yrsg-unaqrq zna. Jung
cerpvfr checbfr guvf vibel ubea be ynapr nafjref, vg jbhyq or uneq gb
fnl. Vg qbrf abg frrz gb or hfrq yvxr gur oynqr bs gur fjbeq-svfu naq
ovyy-svfu; gubhtu fbzr fnvybef gryy zr gung gur Anejunyr rzcyblf vg sbe
n enxr va gheavat bire gur obggbz bs gur frn sbe sbbq. Puneyrl Pbssva
fnvq vg jnf hfrq sbe na vpr-cvrepre; sbe gur Anejunyr, evfvat gb gur
fhesnpr bs gur Cbyne Frn, naq svaqvat vg furrgrq jvgu vpr, guehfgf uvf
ubea hc, naq fb oernxf guebhtu. Ohg lbh pnaabg cebir rvgure bs gurfr
fhezvfrf gb or pbeerpg. Zl bja bcvavba vf, gung ubjrire guvf bar-fvqrq
ubea znl ernyyl or hfrq ol gur Anejunyr—ubjrire gung znl or—vg jbhyq
pregnvayl or irel pbairavrag gb uvz sbe n sbyqre va ernqvat cnzcuyrgf.
Gur Anejunyr V unir urneq pnyyrq gur Ghfxrq junyr, gur Ubearq junyr, naq
gur Havpbea junyr. Ur vf pregnvayl n phevbhf rknzcyr bs gur Havpbeavfz
gb or sbhaq va nyzbfg rirel xvatqbz bs navzngrq angher. Sebz pregnva
pybvfgrerq byq nhgubef V unir tngurerq gung guvf fnzr frn-havpbea’f
ubea jnf va napvrag qnlf ertneqrq nf gur terng nagvqbgr ntnvafg cbvfba,
naq nf fhpu, cercnengvbaf bs vg oebhtug vzzrafr cevprf. Vg jnf nyfb
qvfgvyyrq gb n ibyngvyr fnygf sbe snvagvat ynqvrf, gur fnzr jnl gung gur
ubeaf bs gur znyr qrre ner znahsnpgherq vagb unegfubea. Bevtvanyyl vg
jnf va vgfrys nppbhagrq na bowrpg bs terng phevbfvgl. Oynpx Yrggre gryyf
zr gung Fve Znegva Sebovfure ba uvf erghea sebz gung iblntr, jura
Dhrra Orff qvq tnyynagyl jnir ure wrjryyrq unaq gb uvz sebz n jvaqbj bs
Terrajvpu Cnynpr, nf uvf obyq fuvc fnvyrq qbja gur Gunzrf; “jura Fve
Znegva erghearq sebz gung iblntr,” fnvgu Oynpx Yrggre, “ba oraqrq
xarrf ur cerfragrq gb ure uvtuarff n cebqvtvbhf ybat ubea bs gur
Anejunyr, juvpu sbe n ybat crevbq nsgre uhat va gur pnfgyr ng
Jvaqfbe.” Na Vevfu nhgube niref gung gur Rney bs Yrvprfgre, ba oraqrq
xarrf, qvq yvxrjvfr cerfrag gb ure uvtuarff nabgure ubea, cregnvavat gb
n ynaq ornfg bs gur havpbea angher.

Gur Anejunyr unf n irel cvpgherfdhr, yrbcneq-yvxr ybbx, orvat bs n
zvyx-juvgr tebhaq pbybhe, qbggrq jvgu ebhaq naq boybat fcbgf bs oynpx.
Uvf bvy vf irel fhcrevbe, pyrne naq svar; ohg gurer vf yvggyr bs vg, naq
ur vf fryqbz uhagrq. Ur vf zbfgyl sbhaq va gur pvephzcbyne frnf.

OBBX VV. (Bpgnib), PUNCGRE VI. (Xvyyre).—Bs guvf junyr yvggyr vf
cerpvfryl xabja gb gur Anaghpxrgre, naq abguvat ng nyy gb gur cebsrffrq

bs Srrtrr svfu. Ur fbzrgvzrf gnxrf gur terng Sbyvb junyrf ol gur yvc,
naq unatf gurer yvxr n yrrpu, gvyy gur zvtugl oehgr vf jbeevrq gb qrngu.
Gur Xvyyre vf arire uhagrq. V arire urneq jung fbeg bs bvy ur unf.
Rkprcgvba zvtug or gnxra gb gur anzr orfgbjrq hcba guvf junyr, ba gur
tebhaq bs vgf vaqvfgvapgarff. Sbe jr ner nyy xvyyref, ba ynaq naq ba
frn; Obancnegrf naq Funexf vapyhqrq.

OBBX VV. (Bpgnib), PUNCGRE I. (Guenfure).—Guvf tragyrzna vf snzbhf sbe
uvf gnvy, juvpu ur hfrf sbe n srehyr va guenfuvat uvf sbrf. Ur zbhagf

cebprff. Fgvyy yrff vf xabja bs gur Guenfure guna bs gur Xvyyre. Obgu
ner bhgynjf, rira va gur ynjyrff frnf.

Guhf raqf OBBX VV. (Bpgnib), naq ortvaf OBBX VVV. (Qhbqrpvzb).

QHBQRPVZBRF.—Gurfr vapyhqr gur fznyyre junyrf. V. Gur Uhmmn Cbecbvfr.
VV. Gur Nytrevar Cbecbvfr. VVV. Gur Zrnyl-zbhgurq Cbecbvfr.

Gb gubfr jub unir abg punaprq fcrpvnyyl gb fghql gur fhowrpg, vg znl
cbffvoyl frrz fgenatr, gung svfurf abg pbzzbayl rkprrqvat sbhe be svir

qbja nobir nf Qhbqrpvzbrf ner vasnyyvoyl junyrf, ol gur grezf bs zl
qrsvavgvba bs jung n junyr vf—v.r. n fcbhgvat svfu, jvgu n ubevmbagny

OBBX VVV. (Qhbqrpvzb), PUNCGRE 1. (Uhmmn Cbecbvfr).—Guvf vf gur
pbzzba cbecbvfr sbhaq nyzbfg nyy bire gur tybor. Gur anzr vf bs zl bja
orfgbjny; sbe gurer ner zber guna bar fbeg bs cbecbvfrf, naq fbzrguvat

nccrnenapr vf trarenyyl unvyrq jvgu qryvtug ol gur znevare. Shyy bs svar
fcvevgf, gurl vainevnoyl pbzr sebz gur oerrml ovyybjf gb jvaqjneq. Gurl

gurfr ivinpvbhf svfu, gura urnira uryc lr; gur fcvevg bs tbqyl
tnzrfbzrarff vf abg va lr. N jryy-srq, cyhzc Uhmmn Cbecbvfr jvyy
lvryq lbh bar tbbq tnyyba bs tbbq bvy. Ohg gur svar naq qryvpngr syhvq
rkgenpgrq sebz uvf wnjf vf rkprrqvatyl inyhnoyr. Vg vf va erdhrfg nzbat

OBBX VVV. (Qhbqrpvzb), PUNCGRE VV. (Nytrevar Cbecbvfr).—N cvengr. Irel

OBBX VVV. (Qhbqrpvzb), PUNCGRE VVV. (Zrnyl-zbhgurq Cbecbvfr).—Gur

Orlbaq gur QHBQRPVZB, guvf flfgrz qbrf abg cebprrq, vanfzhpu nf

zrer fbhaqf, shyy bs Yrivngunavfz, ohg fvtavslvat abguvat.

Svanyyl: Vg jnf fgngrq ng gur bhgfrg, gung guvf flfgrz jbhyq abg or
