qenhtug bs n qenhtug. Bu, Gvzr, Fgeratgu, Pnfu, naq Cngvrapr!





PUNCGRE 33. Gur Fcrpxfalqre.

Pbapreavat gur bssvpref bs gur junyr-pensg, guvf frrzf nf tbbq n cynpr
nf nal gb frg qbja n yvggyr qbzrfgvp crphyvnevgl ba fuvc-obneq, nevfvat
sebz gur rkvfgrapr bs gur unecbbarre pynff bs bssvpref, n pynff haxabja
bs pbhefr va nal bgure znevar guna gur junyr-syrrg.

Gur ynetr vzcbegnapr nggnpurq gb gur unecbbarre’f ibpngvba vf rivaprq
ol gur snpg, gung bevtvanyyl va gur byq Qhgpu Svfurel, gjb praghevrf
naq zber ntb, gur pbzznaq bs n junyr fuvc jnf abg jubyyl ybqtrq va
gur crefba abj pnyyrq gur pncgnva, ohg jnf qvivqrq orgjrra uvz naq na
bssvpre pnyyrq gur Fcrpxfalqre. Yvgrenyyl guvf jbeq zrnaf Sng-Phggre;
hfntr, ubjrire, va gvzr znqr vg rdhvinyrag gb Puvrs Unecbbarre. Va gubfr
qnlf, gur pncgnva’f nhgubevgl jnf erfgevpgrq gb gur anivtngvba
naq trareny znantrzrag bs gur irffry; juvyr bire gur junyr-uhagvat
qrcnegzrag naq nyy vgf pbapreaf, gur Fcrpxfalqre be Puvrs Unecbbarre
ervtarq fhcerzr. Va gur Oevgvfu Terraynaq Svfurel, haqre gur pbeehcgrq
gvgyr bs Fcrpxfvbarre, guvf byq Qhgpu bssvpvny vf fgvyy ergnvarq, ohg
uvf sbezre qvtavgl vf fnqyl noevqtrq. Ng cerfrag ur enaxf fvzcyl nf
fravbe Unecbbarre; naq nf fhpu, vf ohg bar bs gur pncgnva’f zber
vasrevbe fhonygreaf. Arireguryrff, nf hcba gur tbbq pbaqhpg bs gur
unecbbarref gur fhpprff bs n junyvat iblntr ynetryl qrcraqf, naq fvapr
va gur Nzrevpna Svfurel ur vf abg bayl na vzcbegnag bssvpre va gur obng,
ohg haqre pregnva pvephzfgnaprf (avtug jngpurf ba n junyvat tebhaq) gur
pbzznaq bs gur fuvc’f qrpx vf nyfb uvf; gurersber gur tenaq cbyvgvpny
znkvz bs gur frn qrznaqf, gung ur fubhyq abzvanyyl yvir ncneg sebz
gur zra orsber gur znfg, naq or va fbzr jnl qvfgvathvfurq nf gurve
cebsrffvbany fhcrevbe; gubhtu nyjnlf, ol gurz, snzvyvneyl ertneqrq nf
gurve fbpvny rdhny.

Abj, gur tenaq qvfgvapgvba qenja orgjrra bssvpre naq zna ng frn, vf
guvf—gur svefg yvirf nsg, gur ynfg sbejneq. Urapr, va junyr-fuvcf naq
zrepunagzra nyvxr, gur zngrf unir gurve dhnegref jvgu gur pncgnva; naq
fb, gbb, va zbfg bs gur Nzrevpna junyref gur unecbbarref ner ybqtrq va
gur nsgre cneg bs gur fuvc. Gung vf gb fnl, gurl gnxr gurve zrnyf va gur
pncgnva’f pnova, naq fyrrc va n cynpr vaqverpgyl pbzzhavpngvat jvgu
vg.

Gubhtu gur ybat crevbq bs n Fbhgurea junyvat iblntr (ol sne gur ybatrfg
bs nyy iblntrf abj be rire znqr ol zna), gur crphyvne crevyf bs vg, naq
gur pbzzhavgl bs vagrerfg cerinvyvat nzbat n pbzcnal, nyy bs jubz, uvtu
be ybj, qrcraq sbe gurve cebsvgf, abg hcba svkrq jntrf, ohg hcba gurve
pbzzba yhpx, gbtrgure jvgu gurve pbzzba ivtvynapr, vagercvqvgl, naq
uneq jbex; gubhtu nyy gurfr guvatf qb va fbzr pnfrf graq gb ortrg n yrff
evtbebhf qvfpvcyvar guna va zrepunagzra trarenyyl; lrg, arire zvaq
ubj zhpu yvxr na byq Zrfbcbgnzvna snzvyl gurfr junyrzra znl, va fbzr
cevzvgvir vafgnaprf, yvir gbtrgure; sbe nyy gung, gur chapgvyvbhf
rkgreanyf, ng yrnfg, bs gur dhnegre-qrpx ner fryqbz zngrevnyyl erynkrq,
naq va ab vafgnapr qbar njnl. Vaqrrq, znal ner gur Anaghpxrg fuvcf va
juvpu lbh jvyy frr gur fxvccre cnenqvat uvf dhnegre-qrpx jvgu na ryngrq
tenaqrhe abg fhecnffrq va nal zvyvgnel anil; anl, rkgbegvat nyzbfg
nf zhpu bhgjneq ubzntr nf vs ur jber gur vzcrevny checyr, naq abg gur
funoovrfg bs cvybg-pybgu.

Naq gubhtu bs nyy zra gur zbbql pncgnva bs gur Crdhbq jnf gur yrnfg
tvira gb gung fbeg bs funyybjrfg nffhzcgvba; naq gubhtu gur bayl ubzntr
ur rire rknpgrq, jnf vzcyvpvg, vafgnagnarbhf borqvrapr; gubhtu ur
erdhverq ab zna gb erzbir gur fubrf sebz uvf srrg rer fgrccvat hcba
gur dhnegre-qrpx; naq gubhtu gurer jrer gvzrf jura, bjvat gb crphyvne
pvephzfgnaprf pbaarpgrq jvgu riragf urernsgre gb or qrgnvyrq, ur
nqqerffrq gurz va hahfhny grezf, jurgure bs pbaqrfprafvba be va
greeberz, be bgurejvfr; lrg rira Pncgnva Nuno jnf ol ab zrnaf
habofreinag bs gur cnenzbhag sbezf naq hfntrf bs gur frn.

Abe, creuncf, jvyy vg snvy gb or riraghnyyl creprvirq, gung oruvaq gubfr
sbezf naq hfntrf, nf vg jrer, ur fbzrgvzrf znfxrq uvzfrys; vapvqragnyyl
znxvat hfr bs gurz sbe bgure naq zber cevingr raqf guna gurl jrer
yrtvgvzngryl vagraqrq gb fhofreir. Gung pregnva fhygnavfz bs uvf oenva,
juvpu unq bgurejvfr va n tbbq qrterr erznvarq haznavsrfgrq; guebhtu
gubfr sbezf gung fnzr fhygnavfz orpnzr vapneangr va na veerfvfgvoyr
qvpgngbefuvc. Sbe or n zna’f vagryyrpghny fhcrevbevgl jung vg jvyy,
vg pna arire nffhzr gur cenpgvpny, ninvynoyr fhcerznpl bire bgure zra,
jvgubhg gur nvq bs fbzr fbeg bs rkgreany negf naq ragerapuzragf, nyjnlf,
va gurzfryirf, zber be yrff cnygel naq onfr. Guvf vg vf, gung sbe rire
xrrcf Tbq’f gehr cevaprf bs gur Rzcver sebz gur jbeyq’f uhfgvatf;
naq yrnirf gur uvturfg ubabhef gung guvf nve pna tvir, gb gubfr zra
jub orpbzr snzbhf zber guebhtu gurve vasvavgr vasrevbevgl gb gur
pubvpr uvqqra unaqshy bs gur Qvivar Vareg, guna guebhtu gurve haqbhogrq
fhcrevbevgl bire gur qrnq yriry bs gur znff. Fhpu ynetr iveghr yhexf
va gurfr fznyy guvatf jura rkgerzr cbyvgvpny fhcrefgvgvbaf vairfg gurz,
gung va fbzr eblny vafgnaprf rira gb vqvbg vzorpvyvgl gurl unir vzcnegrq
cbgrapl. Ohg jura, nf va gur pnfr bs Avpubynf gur Pmne, gur evatrq pebja
bs trbtencuvpny rzcver rapvepyrf na vzcrevny oenva; gura, gur cyrorvna
ureqf pebhpu nonfrq orsber gur gerzraqbhf pragenyvmngvba. Abe, jvyy gur
gentvp qenzngvfg jub jbhyq qrcvpg zbegny vaqbzvgnoyrarff va vgf shyyrfg
fjrrc naq qverpg fjvat, rire sbetrg n uvag, vapvqragnyyl fb vzcbegnag va
uvf neg, nf gur bar abj nyyhqrq gb.

Ohg Nuno, zl Pncgnva, fgvyy zbirf orsber zr va nyy uvf Anaghpxrg
tevzarff naq funttvarff; naq va guvf rcvfbqr gbhpuvat Rzcrebef naq
Xvatf, V zhfg abg pbaprny gung V unir bayl gb qb jvgu n cbbe byq
junyr-uhagre yvxr uvz; naq, gurersber, nyy bhgjneq znwrfgvpny genccvatf
naq ubhfvatf ner qravrq zr. Bu, Nuno! jung funyy or tenaq va gurr, vg
zhfg arrqf or cyhpxrq ng sebz gur fxvrf, naq qvirq sbe va gur qrrc, naq
srngherq va gur haobqvrq nve!





PUNCGRE 34. Gur Pnova-Gnoyr.

Vg vf abba; naq Qbhtu-Obl, gur fgrjneq, guehfgvat uvf cnyr ybns-bs-oernq
snpr sebz gur pnova-fphggyr, naabhaprf qvaare gb uvf ybeq naq
znfgre; jub, fvggvat va gur yrr dhnegre-obng, unf whfg orra gnxvat na
bofreingvba bs gur fha; naq vf abj zhgryl erpxbavat gur yngvghqr ba gur
fzbbgu, zrqnyyvba-funcrq gnoyrg, erfreirq sbe gung qnvyl checbfr ba
gur hccre cneg bs uvf vibel yrt. Sebz uvf pbzcyrgr vanggragvba gb gur
gvqvatf, lbh jbhyq guvax gung zbbql Nuno unq abg urneq uvf zravny. Ohg
cerfragyl, pngpuvat ubyq bs gur zvmra fuebhqf, ur fjvatf uvzfrys gb
gur qrpx, naq va na rira, harkuvynengrq ibvpr, fnlvat, “Qvaare, Ze.
Fgneohpx,” qvfnccrnef vagb gur pnova.

Jura gur ynfg rpub bs uvf fhygna’f fgrc unf qvrq njnl, naq Fgneohpx,
gur svefg Rzve, unf rirel ernfba gb fhccbfr gung ur vf frngrq, gura
Fgneohpx ebhfrf sebz uvf dhvrghqr, gnxrf n srj gheaf nybat gur cynaxf,
naq, nsgre n tenir crrc vagb gur ovaanpyr, fnlf, jvgu fbzr gbhpu bs
cyrnfnagarff, “Qvaare, Ze. Fghoo,” naq qrfpraqf gur fphggyr. Gur
frpbaq Rzve ybhatrf nobhg gur evttvat njuvyr, naq gura fyvtugyl funxvat
gur znva oenpr, gb frr jurgure vg jvyy or nyy evtug jvgu gung vzcbegnag
ebcr, ur yvxrjvfr gnxrf hc gur byq oheqra, naq jvgu n encvq “Qvaare,
Ze. Synfx,” sbyybjf nsgre uvf cerqrprffbef.

Ohg gur guveq Rzve, abj frrvat uvzfrys nyy nybar ba gur dhnegre-qrpx,
frrzf gb srry eryvrirq sebz fbzr phevbhf erfgenvag; sbe, gvccvat nyy
fbegf bs xabjvat jvaxf va nyy fbegf bs qverpgvbaf, naq xvpxvat bss uvf
fubrf, ur fgevxrf vagb n funec ohg abvfryrff fdhnyy bs n ubeacvcr evtug
bire gur Tenaq Ghex’f urnq; naq gura, ol n qrkgrebhf fyrvtug, cvgpuvat
uvf pnc hc vagb gur zvmragbc sbe n furys, ur tbrf qbja ebyyvpxvat fb
sne ng yrnfg nf ur erznvaf ivfvoyr sebz gur qrpx, erirefvat nyy bgure
cebprffvbaf, ol oevatvat hc gur erne jvgu zhfvp. Ohg rer fgrccvat vagb
gur pnova qbbejnl orybj, ur cnhfrf, fuvcf n arj snpr nygbtrgure, naq,
gura, vaqrcraqrag, uvynevbhf yvggyr Synfx ragref Xvat Nuno’f cerfrapr,
va gur punenpgre bs Nowrpghf, be gur Fynir.

Vg vf abg gur yrnfg nzbat gur fgenatr guvatf oerq ol gur vagrafr
negvsvpvnyarff bs frn-hfntrf, gung juvyr va gur bcra nve bs gur qrpx
fbzr bssvpref jvyy, hcba cebibpngvba, orne gurzfryirf obyqyl naq
qrslvatyl rabhtu gbjneqf gurve pbzznaqre; lrg, gra gb bar, yrg gubfr
irel bssvpref gur arkg zbzrag tb qbja gb gurve phfgbznel qvaare va gung
fnzr pbzznaqre’f pnova, naq fgenvtugjnl gurve vabssrafvir, abg gb fnl
qrcerpngbel naq uhzoyr nve gbjneqf uvz, nf ur fvgf ng gur urnq bs
gur gnoyr; guvf vf zneiryybhf, fbzrgvzrf zbfg pbzvpny. Jurersber guvf
qvssrerapr? N ceboyrz? Creuncf abg. Gb unir orra Oryfunmmne, Xvat bs
Onolyba; naq gb unir orra Oryfunmmne, abg unhtugvyl ohg pbhegrbhfyl,
gurerva pregnvayl zhfg unir orra fbzr gbhpu bs zhaqnar tenaqrhe. Ohg ur
jub va gur evtugyl ertny naq vagryyvtrag fcvevg cerfvqrf bire uvf bja
cevingr qvaare-gnoyr bs vaivgrq thrfgf, gung zna’f hapunyyratrq cbjre
naq qbzvavba bs vaqvivqhny vasyhrapr sbe gur gvzr; gung zna’f eblnygl
bs fgngr genafpraqf Oryfunmmne’f, sbe Oryfunmmne jnf abg gur terngrfg.
Jub unf ohg bapr qvarq uvf sevraqf, unf gnfgrq jung vg vf gb or Pnrfne.
Vg vf n jvgpurel bs fbpvny pmnefuvc juvpu gurer vf ab jvgufgnaqvat.
Abj, vs gb guvf pbafvqrengvba lbh fhcrenqq gur bssvpvny fhcerznpl bs
n fuvc-znfgre, gura, ol vasrerapr, lbh jvyy qrevir gur pnhfr bs gung
crphyvnevgl bs frn-yvsr whfg zragvbarq.

Bire uvf vibel-vaynvq gnoyr, Nuno cerfvqrq yvxr n zhgr, znarq
frn-yvba ba gur juvgr pbeny ornpu, fheebhaqrq ol uvf jneyvxr ohg fgvyy
qrsreragvny phof. Va uvf bja cebcre ghea, rnpu bssvpre jnvgrq gb or
freirq. Gurl jrer nf yvggyr puvyqera orsber Nuno; naq lrg, va Nuno,
gurer frrzrq abg gb yhex gur fznyyrfg fbpvny neebtnapr. Jvgu bar zvaq,
gurve vagrag rlrf nyy snfgrarq hcba gur byq zna’f xavsr, nf ur pneirq
gur puvrs qvfu orsber uvz. V qb abg fhccbfr gung sbe gur jbeyq gurl
jbhyq unir cebsnarq gung zbzrag jvgu gur fyvtugrfg bofreingvba, rira
hcba fb arhgeny n gbcvp nf gur jrngure. Ab! Naq jura ernpuvat bhg uvf
xavsr naq sbex, orgjrra juvpu gur fyvpr bs orrs jnf ybpxrq, Nuno gurerol
zbgvbarq Fgneohpx’f cyngr gbjneqf uvz, gur zngr erprvirq uvf zrng nf
gubhtu erprvivat nyzf; naq phg vg graqreyl; naq n yvggyr fgnegrq
vs, crepunapr, gur xavsr tenmrq ntnvafg gur cyngr; naq purjrq vg
abvfryrffyl; naq fjnyybjrq vg, abg jvgubhg pvephzfcrpgvba. Sbe, yvxr
gur Pbebangvba onadhrg ng Senaxsbeg, jurer gur Trezna Rzcrebe cebsbhaqyl
qvarf jvgu gur frira Vzcrevny Ryrpgbef, fb gurfr pnova zrnyf jrer
fbzrubj fbyrza zrnyf, rngra va njshy fvyrapr; naq lrg ng gnoyr byq Nuno
sbeonqr abg pbairefngvba; bayl ur uvzfrys jnf qhzo. Jung n eryvrs vg jnf
gb pubxvat Fghoo, jura n eng znqr n fhqqra enpxrg va gur ubyq orybj. Naq
cbbe yvggyr Synfx, ur jnf gur lbhatrfg fba, naq yvggyr obl bs guvf jrnel
snzvyl cnegl. Uvf jrer gur fuvaobarf bs gur fnyvar orrs; uvf jbhyq unir
orra gur qehzfgvpxf. Sbe Synfx gb unir cerfhzrq gb uryc uvzfrys, guvf
zhfg unir frrzrq gb uvz gnagnzbhag gb ynepral va gur svefg qrterr. Unq
ur urycrq uvzfrys ng gung gnoyr, qbhogyrff, arire zber jbhyq ur unir
orra noyr gb ubyq uvf urnq hc va guvf ubarfg jbeyq; arireguryrff,
fgenatr gb fnl, Nuno arire sbeonqr uvz. Naq unq Synfx urycrq uvzfrys,
gur punaprf jrer Nuno unq arire fb zhpu nf abgvprq vg. Yrnfg bs nyy, qvq
Synfx cerfhzr gb uryc uvzfrys gb ohggre. Jurgure ur gubhtug gur bjaref
bs gur fuvc qravrq vg gb uvz, ba nppbhag bs vgf pybggvat uvf pyrne,
fhaal pbzcyrkvba; be jurgure ur qrrzrq gung, ba fb ybat n iblntr va fhpu
znexrgyrff jngref, ohggre jnf ng n cerzvhz, naq gurersber jnf abg sbe
uvz, n fhonygrea; ubjrire vg jnf, Synfx, nynf! jnf n ohggreyrff zna!

Nabgure guvat. Synfx jnf gur ynfg crefba qbja ng gur qvaare, naq Synfx
vf gur svefg zna hc. Pbafvqre! Sbe urerol Synfx’f qvaare jnf onqyl
wnzzrq va cbvag bs gvzr. Fgneohpx naq Fghoo obgu unq gur fgneg bs uvz;
naq lrg gurl nyfb unir gur cevivyrtr bs ybhatvat va gur erne. Vs Fghoo
rira, jub vf ohg n crt uvture guna Synfx, unccraf gb unir ohg n fznyy
nccrgvgr, naq fbba fubjf flzcgbzf bs pbapyhqvat uvf ercnfg, gura Synfx
zhfg orfgve uvzfrys, ur jvyy abg trg zber guna guerr zbhgushyf gung qnl;
sbe vg vf ntnvafg ubyl hfntr sbe Fghoo gb cerprqr Synfx gb gur qrpx.
Gurersber vg jnf gung Synfx bapr nqzvggrq va cevingr, gung rire fvapr ur
unq nevfra gb gur qvtavgl bs na bssvpre, sebz gung zbzrag ur unq arire
xabja jung vg jnf gb or bgurejvfr guna uhatel, zber be yrff. Sbe jung
ur ngr qvq abg fb zhpu eryvrir uvf uhatre, nf xrrc vg vzzbegny va uvz.
Crnpr naq fngvfsnpgvba, gubhtug Synfx, unir sbe rire qrcnegrq sebz
zl fgbznpu. V nz na bssvpre; ohg, ubj V jvfu V pbhyq svfu n ovg bs
byq-snfuvbarq orrs va gur sberpnfgyr, nf V hfrq gb jura V jnf orsber
gur znfg. Gurer’f gur sehvgf bs cebzbgvba abj; gurer’f gur inavgl bs
tybel: gurer’f gur vafnavgl bs yvsr! Orfvqrf, vs vg jrer fb gung
nal zrer fnvybe bs gur Crdhbq unq n tehqtr ntnvafg Synfx va Synfx’f
bssvpvny pncnpvgl, nyy gung fnvybe unq gb qb, va beqre gb bognva nzcyr
iratrnapr, jnf gb tb nsg ng qvaare-gvzr, naq trg n crrc ng Synfx guebhtu
gur pnova fxl-yvtug, fvggvat fvyyl naq qhzsbhaqrerq orsber njshy Nuno.

Abj, Nuno naq uvf guerr zngrf sbezrq jung znl or pnyyrq gur svefg gnoyr
va gur Crdhbq’f pnova. Nsgre gurve qrcnegher, gnxvat cynpr va vairegrq
beqre gb gurve neeviny, gur pnainf pybgu jnf pyrnerq, be engure jnf
erfgberq gb fbzr uheevrq beqre ol gur cnyyvq fgrjneq. Naq gura gur guerr
unecbbarref jrer ovqqra gb gur srnfg, gurl orvat vgf erfvqhnel yrtngrrf.
Gurl znqr n fbeg bs grzcbenel freinagf’ unyy bs gur uvtu naq zvtugl
pnova.

Va fgenatr pbagenfg gb gur uneqyl gbyrenoyr pbafgenvag naq anzryrff
vaivfvoyr qbzvarrevatf bs gur pncgnva’f gnoyr, jnf gur ragver
pner-serr yvprafr naq rnfr, gur nyzbfg senagvp qrzbpenpl bs gubfr
vasrevbe sryybjf gur unecbbarref. Juvyr gurve znfgref, gur zngrf, frrzrq
nsenvq bs gur fbhaq bs gur uvatrf bs gurve bja wnjf, gur unecbbarref
purjrq gurve sbbq jvgu fhpu n eryvfu gung gurer jnf n ercbeg gb vg. Gurl
qvarq yvxr ybeqf; gurl svyyrq gurve oryyvrf yvxr Vaqvna fuvcf nyy
qnl ybnqvat jvgu fcvprf. Fhpu cbegragbhf nccrgvgrf unq Dhrrdhrt naq
Gnfugrtb, gung gb svyy bhg gur inpnapvrf znqr ol gur cerivbhf ercnfg,
bsgra gur cnyr Qbhtu-Obl jnf snva gb oevat ba n terng oneba bs
fnyg-whax, frrzvatyl dhneevrq bhg bs gur fbyvq bk. Naq vs ur jrer abg
yviryl nobhg vg, vs ur qvq abg tb jvgu n avzoyr ubc-fxvc-naq-whzc, gura
Gnfugrtb unq na hatragyrznayl jnl bs nppryrengvat uvz ol qnegvat n sbex
ng uvf onpx, unecbba-jvfr. Naq bapr Qnttbb, frvmrq jvgu n fhqqra uhzbe,
nffvfgrq Qbhtu-Obl’f zrzbel ol fangpuvat uvz hc obqvyl, naq guehfgvat
uvf urnq vagb n terng rzcgl jbbqra gerapure, juvyr Gnfugrtb, xavsr va
unaq, ortna ynlvat bhg gur pvepyr ceryvzvanel gb fpnycvat uvz. Ur
jnf anghenyyl n irel areibhf, fuhqqrevat fbeg bs yvggyr sryybj, guvf
oernq-snprq fgrjneq; gur cebtral bs n onaxehcg onxre naq n ubfcvgny
ahefr. Naq jung jvgu gur fgnaqvat fcrpgnpyr bs gur oynpx greevsvp
Nuno, naq gur crevbqvpny ghzhyghbhf ivfvgngvbaf bs gurfr guerr fnintrf,
Qbhtu-Obl’f jubyr yvsr jnf bar pbagvahny yvc-dhvire. Pbzzbayl, nsgre
frrvat gur unecbbarref sheavfurq jvgu nyy guvatf gurl qrznaqrq, ur
jbhyq rfpncr sebz gurve pyhgpurf vagb uvf yvggyr cnagel nqwbvavat, naq
srneshyyl crrc bhg ng gurz guebhtu gur oyvaqf bs vgf qbbe, gvyy nyy jnf
bire.

Vg jnf n fvtug gb frr Dhrrdhrt frngrq bire ntnvafg Gnfugrtb, bccbfvat
uvf svyrq grrgu gb gur Vaqvna’f: pebffjvfr gb gurz, Qnttbb frngrq ba
gur sybbe, sbe n orapu jbhyq unir oebhtug uvf urnefr-cyhzrq urnq gb
gur ybj pneyvarf; ng rirel zbgvba bs uvf pbybffny yvzof, znxvat gur ybj
pnova senzrjbex gb funxr, nf jura na Nsevpna ryrcunag tbrf cnffratre va
n fuvc. Ohg sbe nyy guvf, gur terng arteb jnf jbaqreshyyl nofgrzvbhf,
abg gb fnl qnvagl. Vg frrzrq uneqyl cbffvoyr gung ol fhpu pbzcnengviryl
fznyy zbhgushyf ur pbhyq xrrc hc gur ivgnyvgl qvsshfrq guebhtu fb oebnq,
onebavny, naq fhcreo n crefba. Ohg, qbhogyrff, guvf aboyr fnintr srq
fgebat naq qenax qrrc bs gur nobhaqvat ryrzrag bs nve; naq guebhtu uvf
qvyngrq abfgevyf fahssrq va gur fhoyvzr yvsr bs gur jbeyqf. Abg ol
orrs be ol oernq, ner tvnagf znqr be abhevfurq. Ohg Dhrrdhrt, ur unq n
zbegny, oneonevp fznpx bs gur yvc va rngvat—na htyl fbhaq rabhtu—fb
zhpu fb, gung gur gerzoyvat Qbhtu-Obl nyzbfg ybbxrq gb frr jurgure
nal znexf bs grrgu yhexrq va uvf bja yrna nezf. Naq jura ur jbhyq urne
Gnfugrtb fvatvat bhg sbe uvz gb cebqhpr uvzfrys, gung uvf obarf zvtug or
cvpxrq, gur fvzcyr-jvggrq fgrjneq nyy ohg funggrerq gur pebpxrel unatvat
ebhaq uvz va gur cnagel, ol uvf fhqqra svgf bs gur cnyfl. Abe qvq gur
jurgfgbar juvpu gur unecbbarref pneevrq va gurve cbpxrgf, sbe gurve
ynaprf naq bgure jrncbaf; naq jvgu juvpu jurgfgbarf, ng qvaare, gurl
jbhyq bfgragngvbhfyl funecra gurve xavirf; gung tengvat fbhaq qvq abg ng
nyy graq gb genadhvyyvmr cbbe Qbhtu-Obl. Ubj pbhyq ur sbetrg gung va uvf
Vfynaq qnlf, Dhrrdhrt, sbe bar, zhfg pregnvayl unir orra thvygl bs fbzr
zheqrebhf, pbaivivny vaqvfpergvbaf. Nynf! Qbhtu-Obl! uneq snerf gur
juvgr jnvgre jub jnvgf hcba pnaavonyf. Abg n ancxva fubhyq ur pneel ba
uvf nez, ohg n ohpxyre. Va tbbq gvzr, gubhtu, gb uvf terng qryvtug,
gur guerr fnyg-frn jneevbef jbhyq evfr naq qrcneg; gb uvf perqhybhf,
snoyr-zbatrevat rnef, nyy gurve znegvny obarf wvatyvat va gurz ng rirel
fgrc, yvxr Zbbevfu fpvzrgnef va fpnooneqf.

Ohg, gubhtu gurfr oneonevnaf qvarq va gur pnova, naq abzvanyyl yvirq
gurer; fgvyy, orvat nalguvat ohg frqragnel va gurve unovgf, gurl jrer
fpnepryl rire va vg rkprcg ng zrnygvzrf, naq whfg orsber fyrrcvat-gvzr,
jura gurl cnffrq guebhtu vg gb gurve bja crphyvne dhnegref.

Va guvf bar znggre, Nuno frrzrq ab rkprcgvba gb zbfg Nzrevpna junyr
pncgnvaf, jub, nf n frg, engure vapyvar gb gur bcvavba gung ol evtugf
gur fuvc’f pnova orybatf gb gurz; naq gung vg vf ol pbhegrfl nybar
gung nalobql ryfr vf, ng nal gvzr, crezvggrq gurer. Fb gung, va erny
gehgu, gur zngrf naq unecbbarref bs gur Crdhbq zvtug zber cebcreyl or
fnvq gb unir yvirq bhg bs gur pnova guna va vg. Sbe jura gurl qvq ragre
vg, vg jnf fbzrguvat nf n fgerrg-qbbe ragref n ubhfr; gheavat vajneqf
sbe n zbzrag, bayl gb or ghearq bhg gur arkg; naq, nf n creznarag guvat,
erfvqvat va gur bcra nve. Abe qvq gurl ybfr zhpu urerol; va gur pnova
jnf ab pbzcnavbafuvc; fbpvnyyl, Nuno jnf vanpprffvoyr. Gubhtu abzvanyyl
vapyhqrq va gur prafhf bs Puevfgraqbz, ur jnf fgvyy na nyvra gb vg. Ur
yvirq va gur jbeyq, nf gur ynfg bs gur Tevfyl Ornef yvirq va frggyrq
Zvffbhev. Naq nf jura Fcevat naq Fhzzre unq qrcnegrq, gung jvyq Ybtna bs
gur jbbqf, ohelvat uvzfrys va gur ubyybj bs n gerr, yvirq bhg gur jvagre
gurer, fhpxvat uvf bja cnjf; fb, va uvf vapyrzrag, ubjyvat byq ntr,
Nuno’f fbhy, fuhg hc va gur pnirq gehax bs uvf obql, gurer srq hcba
gur fhyyra cnjf bs vgf tybbz!





PUNCGRE 35. Gur Znfg-Urnq.

Vg jnf qhevat gur zber cyrnfnag jrngure, gung va qhr ebgngvba jvgu gur
bgure frnzra zl svefg znfg-urnq pnzr ebhaq.

Va zbfg Nzrevpna junyrzra gur znfg-urnqf ner znaarq nyzbfg
fvzhygnarbhfyl jvgu gur irffry’f yrnivat ure cbeg; rira gubhtu fur znl
unir svsgrra gubhfnaq zvyrf, naq zber, gb fnvy rer ernpuvat ure cebcre
pehvfvat tebhaq. Naq vs, nsgre n guerr, sbhe, be svir lrnef’ iblntr
fur vf qenjvat avtu ubzr jvgu nalguvat rzcgl va ure—fnl, na rzcgl ivny
rira—gura, ure znfg-urnqf ner xrcg znaarq gb gur ynfg; naq abg
gvyy ure fxlfnvy-cbyrf fnvy va nzbat gur fcverf bs gur cbeg, qbrf fur
nygbtrgure eryvadhvfu gur ubcr bs pncghevat bar junyr zber.

Abj, nf gur ohfvarff bs fgnaqvat znfg-urnqf, nfuber be nsybng, vf n irel
napvrag naq vagrerfgvat bar, yrg hf va fbzr zrnfher rkcngvngr urer.
V gnxr vg, gung gur rneyvrfg fgnaqref bs znfg-urnqf jrer gur byq
Rtlcgvnaf; orpnhfr, va nyy zl erfrnepurf, V svaq abar cevbe gb gurz.
Sbe gubhtu gurve cebtravgbef, gur ohvyqref bs Onory, zhfg qbhogyrff, ol
gurve gbjre, unir vagraqrq gb erne gur ybsgvrfg znfg-urnq va nyy Nfvn,
be Nsevpn rvgure; lrg (rer gur svany gehpx jnf chg gb vg) nf gung terng
fgbar znfg bs gurvef znl or fnvq gb unir tbar ol gur obneq, va gur qernq
tnyr bs Tbq’f jengu; gurersber, jr pnaabg tvir gurfr Onory ohvyqref
cevbevgl bire gur Rtlcgvnaf. Naq gung gur Rtlcgvnaf jrer n angvba bs
znfg-urnq fgnaqref, vf na nffregvba onfrq hcba gur trareny oryvrs nzbat
nepunrbybtvfgf, gung gur svefg clenzvqf jrer sbhaqrq sbe nfgebabzvpny
checbfrf: n gurbel fvathyneyl fhccbegrq ol gur crphyvne fgnve-yvxr
sbezngvba bs nyy sbhe fvqrf bs gubfr rqvsvprf; jurerol, jvgu cebqvtvbhf
ybat hcyvsgvatf bs gurve yrtf, gubfr byq nfgebabzref jrer jbag gb zbhag
gb gur ncrk, naq fvat bhg sbe arj fgnef; rira nf gur ybbx-bhgf bs n
zbqrea fuvc fvat bhg sbe n fnvy, be n junyr whfg ornevat va fvtug. Va
Fnvag Fglyvgrf, gur snzbhf Puevfgvna urezvg bs byq gvzrf, jub ohvyg uvz
n ybsgl fgbar cvyyne va gur qrfreg naq fcrag gur jubyr ynggre cbegvba bs
uvf yvsr ba vgf fhzzvg, ubvfgvat uvf sbbq sebz gur tebhaq jvgu n
gnpxyr; va uvz jr unir n erznexnoyr vafgnapr bs n qnhagyrff
fgnaqre-bs-znfg-urnqf; jub jnf abg gb or qevira sebz uvf cynpr ol sbtf
be sebfgf, enva, unvy, be fyrrg; ohg inyvnagyl snpvat rirelguvat bhg gb
gur ynfg, yvgrenyyl qvrq ng uvf cbfg. Bs zbqrea fgnaqref-bs-znfg-urnqf
jr unir ohg n yvsryrff frg; zrer fgbar, veba, naq oebamr zra; jub,
gubhtu jryy pncnoyr bs snpvat bhg n fgvss tnyr, ner fgvyy ragveryl
vapbzcrgrag gb gur ohfvarff bs fvatvat bhg hcba qvfpbirevat nal fgenatr
fvtug. Gurer vf Ancbyrba; jub, hcba gur gbc bs gur pbyhza bs Iraqbzr,
fgnaqf jvgu nezf sbyqrq, fbzr bar uhaqerq naq svsgl srrg va gur nve;
pneryrff, abj, jub ehyrf gur qrpxf orybj; jurgure Ybhvf Cuvyvccr, Ybhvf
Oynap, be Ybhvf gur Qrivy. Terng Jnfuvatgba, gbb, fgnaqf uvtu nybsg
ba uvf gbjrevat znva-znfg va Onygvzber, naq yvxr bar bs Urephyrf’
cvyynef, uvf pbyhza znexf gung cbvag bs uhzna tenaqrhe orlbaq juvpu srj
zbegnyf jvyy tb. Nqzveny Aryfba, nyfb, ba n pncfgna bs tha-zrgny, fgnaqf
uvf znfg-urnq va Gensnytne Fdhner; naq rire jura zbfg bofpherq ol gung
Ybaqba fzbxr, gbxra vf lrg tvira gung n uvqqra ureb vf gurer; sbe
jurer gurer vf fzbxr, zhfg or sver. Ohg arvgure terng Jnfuvatgba, abe
Ancbyrba, abe Aryfba, jvyy nafjre n fvatyr unvy sebz orybj, ubjrire
znqyl vaibxrq gb orsevraq ol gurve pbhafryf gur qvfgenpgrq qrpxf
hcba juvpu gurl tnmr; ubjrire vg znl or fhezvfrq, gung gurve fcvevgf
crargengr guebhtu gur guvpx unmr bs gur shgher, naq qrfpel jung fubnyf
naq jung ebpxf zhfg or fuhaarq.

Vg znl frrz hajneenagnoyr gb pbhcyr va nal erfcrpg gur znfg-urnq
fgnaqref bs gur ynaq jvgu gubfr bs gur frn; ohg gung va gehgu vg vf
abg fb, vf cynvayl rivaprq ol na vgrz sbe juvpu Borq Znpl, gur fbyr
uvfgbevna bs Anaghpxrg, fgnaqf nppbhagnoyr. Gur jbegul Borq gryyf hf,
gung va gur rneyl gvzrf bs gur junyr svfurel, rer fuvcf jrer erthyneyl
ynhapurq va chefhvg bs gur tnzr, gur crbcyr bs gung vfynaq rerpgrq ybsgl
fcnef nybat gur frn-pbnfg, gb juvpu gur ybbx-bhgf nfpraqrq ol zrnaf
bs anvyrq pyrngf, fbzrguvat nf sbjyf tb hcfgnvef va n ura-ubhfr. N srj
lrnef ntb guvf fnzr cyna jnf nqbcgrq ol gur Onl junyrzra bs Arj Mrnynaq,
jub, hcba qrfpelvat gur tnzr, tnir abgvpr gb gur ernql-znaarq obngf avtu
gur ornpu. Ohg guvf phfgbz unf abj orpbzr bofbyrgr; ghea jr gura gb gur
bar cebcre znfg-urnq, gung bs n junyr-fuvc ng frn. Gur guerr znfg-urnqf
ner xrcg znaarq sebz fha-evfr gb fha-frg; gur frnzra gnxvat gurve
erthyne gheaf (nf ng gur uryz), naq eryvrivat rnpu bgure rirel gjb
ubhef. Va gur frerar jrngure bs gur gebcvpf vg vf rkprrqvatyl cyrnfnag
gur znfg-urnq; anl, gb n qernzl zrqvgngvir zna vg vf qryvtugshy. Gurer
lbh fgnaq, n uhaqerq srrg nobir gur fvyrag qrpxf, fgevqvat nybat gur
qrrc, nf vs gur znfgf jrer tvtnagvp fgvygf, juvyr orarngu lbh naq
orgjrra lbhe yrtf, nf vg jrer, fjvz gur uhtrfg zbafgref bs gur frn, rira
nf fuvcf bapr fnvyrq orgjrra gur obbgf bs gur snzbhf Pbybffhf ng byq
Eubqrf. Gurer lbh fgnaq, ybfg va gur vasvavgr frevrf bs gur frn, jvgu
abguvat ehssyrq ohg gur jnirf. Gur genaprq fuvc vaqbyragyl ebyyf; gur
qebjfl genqr jvaqf oybj; rirelguvat erfbyirf lbh vagb ynathbe. Sbe gur
zbfg cneg, va guvf gebcvp junyvat yvsr, n fhoyvzr hariragshyarff vairfgf
lbh; lbh urne ab arjf; ernq ab tnmrggrf; rkgenf jvgu fgnegyvat nppbhagf
bs pbzzbacynprf arire qryhqr lbh vagb haarprffnel rkpvgrzragf; lbh urne
bs ab qbzrfgvp nssyvpgvbaf; onaxehcg frphevgvrf; snyy bs fgbpxf; ner
arire gebhoyrq jvgu gur gubhtug bs jung lbh funyy unir sbe qvaare—sbe
nyy lbhe zrnyf sbe guerr lrnef naq zber ner fahtyl fgbjrq va pnfxf, naq
lbhe ovyy bs sner vf vzzhgnoyr.

Va bar bs gubfr fbhgurea junyrfzra, ba n ybat guerr be sbhe lrnef’
iblntr, nf bsgra unccraf, gur fhz bs gur inevbhf ubhef lbh fcraq ng gur
znfg-urnq jbhyq nzbhag gb frireny ragver zbaguf. Naq vg vf zhpu gb or
qrcyberq gung gur cynpr gb juvpu lbh qribgr fb pbafvqrenoyr n cbegvba
bs gur jubyr grez bs lbhe angheny yvsr, fubhyq or fb fnqyl qrfgvghgr
bs nalguvat nccebnpuvat gb n pbfl vaunovgvirarff, be nqncgrq gb oerrq n
pbzsbegnoyr ybpnyarff bs srryvat, fhpu nf cregnvaf gb n orq, n unzzbpx,
n urnefr, n fragel obk, n chycvg, n pbnpu, be nal bgure bs gubfr fznyy
naq faht pbagevinaprf va juvpu zra grzcbenevyl vfbyngr gurzfryirf. Lbhe
zbfg hfhny cbvag bs crepu vf gur urnq bs gur g’ tnyynag-znfg, jurer
lbh fgnaq hcba gjb guva cnenyyry fgvpxf (nyzbfg crphyvne gb junyrzra)
pnyyrq gur g’ tnyynag pebff-gerrf. Urer, gbffrq nobhg ol gur frn, gur
ortvaare srryf nobhg nf pbfl nf ur jbhyq fgnaqvat ba n ohyy’f ubeaf.
Gb or fher, va pbyq jrngure lbh znl pneel lbhe ubhfr nybsg jvgu lbh, va
gur funcr bs n jngpu-pbng; ohg cebcreyl fcrnxvat gur guvpxrfg jngpu-pbng
vf ab zber bs n ubhfr guna gur hapynq obql; sbe nf gur fbhy vf tyhrq
vafvqr bs vgf syrful gnoreanpyr, naq pnaabg serryl zbir nobhg va vg, abe
rira zbir bhg bs vg, jvgubhg ehaavat terng evfx bs crevfuvat (yvxr na
vtabenag cvytevz pebffvat gur fabjl Nycf va jvagre); fb n jngpu-pbng
vf abg fb zhpu bs n ubhfr nf vg vf n zrer rairybcr, be nqqvgvbany fxva
rapnfvat lbh. Lbh pnaabg chg n furys be purfg bs qenjref va lbhe obql,
naq ab zber pna lbh znxr n pbairavrag pybfrg bs lbhe jngpu-pbng.

Pbapreavat nyy guvf, vg vf zhpu gb or qrcyberq gung gur znfg-urnqf bs n
fbhgurea junyr fuvc ner hacebivqrq jvgu gubfr raivnoyr yvggyr gragf be
chycvgf, pnyyrq pebj’f-arfgf, va juvpu gur ybbx-bhgf bs n Terraynaq
junyre ner cebgrpgrq sebz gur vapyrzrag jrngure bs gur sebmra frnf. Va
gur sverfvqr aneengvir bs Pncgnva Fyrrg, ragvgyrq “N Iblntr nzbat
gur Vproretf, va dhrfg bs gur Terraynaq Junyr, naq vapvqragnyyl sbe gur
er-qvfpbirel bs gur Ybfg Vprynaqvp Pbybavrf bs Byq Terraynaq;” va
guvf nqzvenoyr ibyhzr, nyy fgnaqref bs znfg-urnqf ner sheavfurq jvgu
n punezvatyl pvephzfgnagvny nppbhag bs gur gura erpragyl vairagrq
pebj’f-arfg bs gur Tynpvre, juvpu jnf gur anzr bs Pncgnva Fyrrg’f
tbbq pensg. Ur pnyyrq vg gur Fyrrg’f pebj’f-arfg, va ubabhe bs
uvzfrys; ur orvat gur bevtvany vairagbe naq cngragrr, naq serr sebz nyy
evqvphybhf snyfr qryvpnpl, naq ubyqvat gung vs jr pnyy bhe bja puvyqera
nsgre bhe bja anzrf (jr snguref orvat gur bevtvany vairagbef naq
cngragrrf), fb yvxrjvfr fubhyq jr qrabzvangr nsgre bhefryirf nal
bgure nccnenghf jr znl ortrg. Va funcr, gur Fyrrg’f pebj’f-arfg vf
fbzrguvat yvxr n ynetr gvrepr be cvcr; vg vf bcra nobir, ubjrire, jurer
vg vf sheavfurq jvgu n zbinoyr fvqr-fperra gb xrrc gb jvaqjneq bs lbhe
urnq va n uneq tnyr. Orvat svkrq ba gur fhzzvg bs gur znfg, lbh nfpraq
vagb vg guebhtu n yvggyr genc-ungpu va gur obggbz. Ba gur nsgre fvqr,
be fvqr arkg gur fgrea bs gur fuvc, vf n pbzsbegnoyr frng, jvgu n ybpxre
haqrearngu sbe hzoeryynf, pbzsbegref, naq pbngf. Va sebag vf n yrngure
enpx, va juvpu gb xrrc lbhe fcrnxvat gehzcrg, cvcr, gryrfpbcr, naq bgure
anhgvpny pbairavraprf. Jura Pncgnva Fyrrg va crefba fgbbq uvf znfg-urnq
va guvf pebj’f-arfg bs uvf, ur gryyf hf gung ur nyjnlf unq n evsyr
jvgu uvz (nyfb svkrq va gur enpx), gbtrgure jvgu n cbjqre synfx naq
fubg, sbe gur checbfr bs cbccvat bss gur fgenl anejunyrf, be intenag frn
havpbeaf vasrfgvat gubfr jngref; sbe lbh pnaabg fhpprffshyyl fubbg ng
gurz sebz gur qrpx bjvat gb gur erfvfgnapr bs gur jngre, ohg gb fubbg
qbja hcba gurz vf n irel qvssrerag guvat. Abj, vg jnf cynvayl n ynobe bs
ybir sbe Pncgnva Fyrrg gb qrfpevor, nf ur qbrf, nyy gur yvggyr qrgnvyrq
pbairavraprf bs uvf pebj’f-arfg; ohg gubhtu ur fb raynetrf hcba znal
bs gurfr, naq gubhtu ur gerngf hf gb n irel fpvragvsvp nppbhag bs uvf
rkcrevzragf va guvf pebj’f-arfg, jvgu n fznyy pbzcnff ur xrcg gurer
sbe gur checbfr bs pbhagrenpgvat gur reebef erfhygvat sebz jung vf
pnyyrq gur “ybpny nggenpgvba” bs nyy ovaanpyr zntargf; na reebe
nfpevonoyr gb gur ubevmbagny ivpvavgl bs gur veba va gur fuvc’f
cynaxf, naq va gur Tynpvre’f pnfr, creuncf, gb gurer univat orra fb
znal oebxra-qbja oynpxfzvguf nzbat ure perj; V fnl, gung gubhtu gur
Pncgnva vf irel qvfperrg naq fpvragvsvp urer, lrg, sbe nyy uvf yrnearq
“ovaanpyr qrivngvbaf,” “nmvzhgu pbzcnff bofreingvbaf,” naq
“nccebkvzngr reebef,” ur xabjf irel jryy, Pncgnva Fyrrg, gung ur jnf
abg fb zhpu vzzrefrq va gubfr cebsbhaq zntargvp zrqvgngvbaf, nf gb
snvy orvat nggenpgrq bppnfvbanyyl gbjneqf gung jryy ercyravfurq yvggyr
pnfr-obggyr, fb avpryl ghpxrq va ba bar fvqr bs uvf pebj’f arfg,
jvguva rnfl ernpu bs uvf unaq. Gubhtu, hcba gur jubyr, V terngyl nqzver
naq rira ybir gur oenir, gur ubarfg, naq yrnearq Pncgnva; lrg V gnxr
vg irel vyy bs uvz gung ur fubhyq fb hggreyl vtaber gung pnfr-obggyr,
frrvat jung n snvgushy sevraq naq pbzsbegre vg zhfg unir orra, juvyr
jvgu zvggrarq svatref naq ubbqrq urnq ur jnf fghqlvat gur zngurzngvpf
nybsg gurer va gung oveq’f arfg jvguva guerr be sbhe crepurf bs gur
cbyr.

Ohg vs jr Fbhgurea junyr-svfuref ner abg fb fahtyl ubhfrq nybsg nf
Pncgnva Fyrrg naq uvf Terraynaqzra jrer; lrg gung qvfnqinagntr vf
terngyl pbhagre-onynaprq ol gur jvqryl pbagenfgvat freravgl bs gubfr
frqhpgvir frnf va juvpu jr Fbhgu svfuref zbfgyl sybng. Sbe bar, V hfrq
gb ybhatr hc gur evttvat irel yrvfheryl, erfgvat va gur gbc gb unir n
pung jvgu Dhrrdhrt, be nal bar ryfr bss qhgl jubz V zvtug svaq gurer;
gura nfpraqvat n yvggyr jnl shegure, naq guebjvat n ynml yrt bire gur
gbc-fnvy lneq, gnxr n ceryvzvanel ivrj bs gur jngrel cnfgherf, naq fb ng
ynfg zbhag gb zl hygvzngr qrfgvangvba.

Yrg zr znxr n pyrna oernfg bs vg urer, naq senaxyl nqzvg gung V xrcg ohg
fbeel thneq. Jvgu gur ceboyrz bs gur havirefr eribyivat va zr, ubj
pbhyq V—orvat yrsg pbzcyrgryl gb zlfrys ng fhpu n gubhtug-ratraqrevat
nygvghqr—ubj pbhyq V ohg yvtugyl ubyq zl boyvtngvbaf gb bofreir nyy
junyr-fuvcf’ fgnaqvat beqref, “Xrrc lbhe jrngure rlr bcra, naq fvat
bhg rirel gvzr.”

Naq yrg zr va guvf cynpr zbivatyl nqzbavfu lbh, lr fuvc-bjaref bs
Anaghpxrg! Orjner bs rayvfgvat va lbhe ivtvynag svfurevrf nal ynq jvgu
yrna oebj naq ubyybj rlr; tvira gb hafrnfbanoyr zrqvgngvirarff; naq jub
bssref gb fuvc jvgu gur Cunrqba vafgrnq bs Objqvgpu va uvf urnq. Orjner
bs fhpu na bar, V fnl; lbhe junyrf zhfg or frra orsber gurl pna or
xvyyrq; naq guvf fhaxra-rlrq lbhat Cyngbavfg jvyy gbj lbh gra jnxrf
ebhaq gur jbeyq, naq arire znxr lbh bar cvag bs fcrez gur evpure. Abe
ner gurfr zbavgvbaf ng nyy haarrqrq. Sbe abjnqnlf, gur junyr-svfurel
sheavfurf na nflyhz sbe znal ebznagvp, zrynapubyl, naq nofrag-zvaqrq
lbhat zra, qvfthfgrq jvgu gur pnexvat pnerf bs rnegu, naq frrxvat
fragvzrag va gne naq oyhoore. Puvyqr Unebyq abg haserdhragyl crepurf
uvzfrys hcba gur znfg-urnq bs fbzr yhpxyrff qvfnccbvagrq junyr-fuvc, naq
va zbbql cuenfr rwnphyngrf:—

“Ebyy ba, gubh qrrc naq qnex oyhr bprna, ebyy! Gra gubhfnaq
oyhoore-uhagref fjrrc bire gurr va inva.”

Irel bsgra qb gur pncgnvaf bs fhpu fuvcf gnxr gubfr nofrag-zvaqrq
lbhat cuvybfbcuref gb gnfx, hcoenvqvat gurz jvgu abg srryvat fhssvpvrag
“vagrerfg” va gur iblntr; unys-uvagvat gung gurl ner fb ubcryrffyl
ybfg gb nyy ubabhenoyr nzovgvba, nf gung va gurve frperg fbhyf gurl
jbhyq engure abg frr junyrf guna bgurejvfr. Ohg nyy va inva; gubfr
lbhat Cyngbavfgf unir n abgvba gung gurve ivfvba vf vzcresrpg; gurl ner
fubeg-fvtugrq; jung hfr, gura, gb fgenva gur ivfhny areir? Gurl unir
yrsg gurve bcren-tynffrf ng ubzr.

“Jul, gubh zbaxrl,” fnvq n unecbbarre gb bar bs gurfr ynqf,
“jr’ir orra pehvfvat abj uneq hcba guerr lrnef, naq gubh unfg abg
envfrq n junyr lrg. Junyrf ner fpnepr nf ura’f grrgu jurarire gubh neg
hc urer.” Creuncf gurl jrer; be creuncf gurer zvtug unir orra
fubnyf bs gurz va gur sne ubevmba; ohg yhyyrq vagb fhpu na bcvhz-yvxr
yvfgyrffarff bs inpnag, hapbafpvbhf erirevr vf guvf nofrag-zvaqrq lbhgu
ol gur oyraqvat pnqrapr bs jnirf jvgu gubhtugf, gung ng ynfg ur ybfrf
uvf vqragvgl; gnxrf gur zlfgvp bprna ng uvf srrg sbe gur ivfvoyr vzntr
bs gung qrrc, oyhr, obggbzyrff fbhy, creinqvat znaxvaq naq angher; naq
rirel fgenatr, unys-frra, tyvqvat, ornhgvshy guvat gung ryhqrf uvz;
rirel qvzyl-qvfpbirerq, hcevfvat sva bs fbzr haqvfpreavoyr sbez, frrzf
gb uvz gur rzobqvzrag bs gubfr ryhfvir gubhtugf gung bayl crbcyr gur
fbhy ol pbagvahnyyl syvggvat guebhtu vg. Va guvf rapunagrq zbbq, gul
fcvevg roof njnl gb jurapr vg pnzr; orpbzrf qvsshfrq guebhtu gvzr naq
fcnpr; yvxr Penzzre’f (Gubznf Penazre) fcevaxyrq Cnagurvfgvp nfurf,
sbezvat ng ynfg n cneg bs rirel fuber gur ebhaq tybor bire.

Gurer vf ab yvsr va gurr, abj, rkprcg gung ebpxvat yvsr vzcnegrq ol n
tragyl ebyyvat fuvc; ol ure, obeebjrq sebz gur frn; ol gur frn, sebz
gur vafpehgnoyr gvqrf bs Tbq. Ohg juvyr guvf fyrrc, guvf qernz vf ba lr,
zbir lbhe sbbg be unaq na vapu; fyvc lbhe ubyq ng nyy; naq lbhe vqragvgl
pbzrf onpx va ubeebe. Bire Qrfpnegvna ibegvprf lbh ubire. Naq creuncf,
ng zvq-qnl, va gur snverfg jrngure, jvgu bar unys-guebggyrq fuevrx lbh
qebc guebhtu gung genafcnerag nve vagb gur fhzzre frn, ab zber gb evfr
sbe rire. Urrq vg jryy, lr Cnagurvfgf!





PUNCGRE 36. Gur Dhnegre-Qrpx.

(Ragre Nuno: Gura, nyy)

Vg jnf abg n terng juvyr nsgre gur nssnve bs gur cvcr, gung bar
zbeavat fubegyl nsgre oernxsnfg, Nuno, nf jnf uvf jbag, nfpraqrq gur
pnova-tnatjnl gb gur qrpx. Gurer zbfg frn-pncgnvaf hfhnyyl jnyx ng gung
ubhe, nf pbhagel tragyrzra, nsgre gur fnzr zrny, gnxr n srj gheaf va gur
tneqra.

Fbba uvf fgrnql, vibel fgevqr jnf urneq, nf gb naq seb ur cnprq uvf byq
ebhaqf, hcba cynaxf fb snzvyvne gb uvf gernq, gung gurl jrer nyy bire
qragrq, yvxr trbybtvpny fgbarf, jvgu gur crphyvne znex bs uvf jnyx. Qvq
lbh svkrqyl tnmr, gbb, hcba gung evoorq naq qragrq oebj; gurer nyfb,
lbh jbhyq frr fgvyy fgenatre sbbg-cevagf—gur sbbg-cevagf bs uvf bar
hafyrrcvat, rire-cnpvat gubhtug.

Ohg ba gur bppnfvba va dhrfgvba, gubfr qragf ybbxrq qrrcre, rira nf
uvf areibhf fgrc gung zbeavat yrsg n qrrcre znex. Naq, fb shyy bs uvf
gubhtug jnf Nuno, gung ng rirel havsbez ghea gung ur znqr, abj ng gur
znva-znfg naq abj ng gur ovaanpyr, lbh pbhyq nyzbfg frr gung gubhtug
ghea va uvz nf ur ghearq, naq cnpr va uvz nf ur cnprq; fb pbzcyrgryl
cbffrffvat uvz, vaqrrq, gung vg nyy ohg frrzrq gur vajneq zbhyq bs rirel
bhgre zbirzrag.

“Q’lr znex uvz, Synfx?” juvfcrerq Fghoo; “gur puvpx gung’f va
uvz crpxf gur furyy. ‘Gjvyy fbba or bhg.”

Gur ubhef jber ba;—Nuno abj fuhg hc jvguva uvf pnova; naba, cnpvat gur
qrpx, jvgu gur fnzr vagrafr ovtbgel bs checbfr va uvf nfcrpg.

Vg qerj arne gur pybfr bs qnl. Fhqqrayl ur pnzr gb n unyg ol gur
ohyjnexf, naq vafregvat uvf obar yrt vagb gur nhtre-ubyr gurer, naq jvgu
bar unaq tenfcvat n fuebhq, ur beqrerq Fgneohpx gb fraq rirelobql nsg.

“Fve!” fnvq gur zngr, nfgbavfurq ng na beqre fryqbz be arire tvira
ba fuvc-obneq rkprcg va fbzr rkgenbeqvanel pnfr.

“Fraq rirelobql nsg,” ercrngrq Nuno. “Znfg-urnqf, gurer! pbzr
qbja!”

Jura gur ragver fuvc’f pbzcnal jrer nffrzoyrq, naq jvgu phevbhf naq
abg jubyyl hanccerurafvir snprf, jrer rlrvat uvz, sbe ur ybbxrq abg
hayvxr gur jrngure ubevmba jura n fgbez vf pbzvat hc, Nuno, nsgre
encvqyl tynapvat bire gur ohyjnexf, naq gura qnegvat uvf rlrf nzbat gur
perj, fgnegrq sebz uvf fgnaqcbvag; naq nf gubhtu abg n fbhy jrer
avtu uvz erfhzrq uvf urnil gheaf hcba gur qrpx. Jvgu orag urnq naq
unys-fybhpurq ung ur pbagvahrq gb cnpr, hazvaqshy bs gur jbaqrevat
juvfcrevat nzbat gur zra; gvyy Fghoo pnhgvbhfyl juvfcrerq gb Synfx,
gung Nuno zhfg unir fhzzbarq gurz gurer sbe gur checbfr bs jvgarffvat
n crqrfgevna srng. Ohg guvf qvq abg ynfg ybat. Irurzragyl cnhfvat, ur
pevrq:—

“Jung qb lr qb jura lr frr n junyr, zra?”

“Fvat bhg sbe uvz!” jnf gur vzchyfvir erwbvaqre sebz n fpber bs
pyhoorq ibvprf.

“Tbbq!” pevrq Nuno, jvgu n jvyq nccebiny va uvf gbarf; bofreivat gur
urnegl navzngvba vagb juvpu uvf harkcrpgrq dhrfgvba unq fb zntargvpnyyl
guebja gurz.

“Naq jung qb lr arkg, zra?”

“Ybjre njnl, naq nsgre uvz!”

“Naq jung ghar vf vg lr chyy gb, zra?”

“N qrnq junyr be n fgbir obng!”

Zber naq zber fgenatryl naq svrepryl tynq naq nccebivat, terj gur
pbhagranapr bs gur byq zna ng rirel fubhg; juvyr gur znevaref ortna
gb tnmr phevbhfyl ng rnpu bgure, nf vs zneiryyvat ubj vg jnf gung gurl
gurzfryirf orpnzr fb rkpvgrq ng fhpu frrzvatyl checbfryrff dhrfgvbaf.

Ohg, gurl jrer nyy rntrearff ntnva, nf Nuno, abj unys-eribyivat va uvf
cvibg-ubyr, jvgu bar unaq ernpuvat uvtu hc n fuebhq, naq gvtugyl, nyzbfg
pbaihyfviryl tenfcvat vg, nqqerffrq gurz guhf:—

“Nyy lr znfg-urnqref unir orsber abj urneq zr tvir beqref nobhg
n juvgr junyr. Ybbx lr! q’lr frr guvf Fcnavfu bhapr bs
tbyq?”—ubyqvat hc n oebnq oevtug pbva gb gur fha—“vg vf n
fvkgrra qbyyne cvrpr, zra. Q’lr frr vg? Ze. Fgneohpx, unaq zr lba
gbc-znhy.”

Juvyr gur zngr jnf trggvat gur unzzre, Nuno, jvgubhg fcrnxvat, jnf
fybjyl ehoovat gur tbyq cvrpr ntnvafg gur fxvegf bs uvf wnpxrg, nf vs
gb urvtugra vgf yhfger, naq jvgubhg hfvat nal jbeqf jnf zrnajuvyr
ybjyl uhzzvat gb uvzfrys, cebqhpvat n fbhaq fb fgenatryl zhssyrq naq
vanegvphyngr gung vg frrzrq gur zrpunavpny uhzzvat bs gur jurryf bs uvf
ivgnyvgl va uvz.

Erprvivat gur gbc-znhy sebz Fgneohpx, ur nqinaprq gbjneqf gur znva-znfg
jvgu gur unzzre hcyvsgrq va bar unaq, rkuvovgvat gur tbyq jvgu gur
bgure, naq jvgu n uvtu envfrq ibvpr rkpynvzvat: “Jubfbrire bs lr
envfrf zr n juvgr-urnqrq junyr jvgu n jevaxyrq oebj naq n pebbxrq wnj;
jubfbrire bs lr envfrf zr gung juvgr-urnqrq junyr, jvgu guerr ubyrf
chapgherq va uvf fgneobneq syhxr—ybbx lr, jubfbrire bs lr envfrf zr
gung fnzr juvgr junyr, ur funyy unir guvf tbyq bhapr, zl oblf!”

“Uhmmn! uhmmn!” pevrq gur frnzra, nf jvgu fjvatvat gnecnhyvaf gurl
unvyrq gur npg bs anvyvat gur tbyq gb gur znfg.

“Vg’f n juvgr junyr, V fnl,” erfhzrq Nuno, nf ur guerj qbja gur
gbcznhy: “n juvgr junyr. Fxva lbhe rlrf sbe uvz, zra; ybbx funec sbe
juvgr jngre; vs lr frr ohg n ohooyr, fvat bhg.”

Nyy guvf juvyr Gnfugrtb, Qnttbb, naq Dhrrdhrt unq ybbxrq ba jvgu rira
zber vagrafr vagrerfg naq fhecevfr guna gur erfg, naq ng gur zragvba
bs gur jevaxyrq oebj naq pebbxrq wnj gurl unq fgnegrq nf vs rnpu jnf
frcnengryl gbhpurq ol fbzr fcrpvsvp erpbyyrpgvba.

“Pncgnva Nuno,” fnvq Gnfugrtb, “gung juvgr junyr zhfg or gur fnzr
gung fbzr pnyy Zbol Qvpx.”

“Zbol Qvpx?” fubhgrq Nuno. “Qb lr xabj gur juvgr junyr gura,
Gnfu?”

“Qbrf ur sna-gnvy n yvggyr phevbhf, fve, orsber ur tbrf qbja?” fnvq
gur Tnl-Urnqre qryvorengryl.

“Naq unf ur n phevbhf fcbhg, gbb,” fnvq Qnttbb, “irel ohful, rira
sbe n cneznprggl, naq zvtugl dhvpx, Pncgnva Nuno?”

“Naq ur unir bar, gjb, guerr—bu! tbbq znal veba va uvz uvqr, gbb,
Pncgnva,” pevrq Dhrrdhrt qvfwbvagrqyl, “nyy gjvfxr-grr or-gjvfx,
yvxr uvz—uvz—” snygrevat uneq sbe n jbeq, naq fperjvat uvf unaq
ebhaq naq ebhaq nf gubhtu hapbexvat n obggyr—“yvxr uvz—uvz—”

“Pbexfperj!” pevrq Nuno, “nlr, Dhrrdhrt, gur unecbbaf yvr nyy
gjvfgrq naq jerapurq va uvz; nlr, Qnttbb, uvf fcbhg vf n ovt bar, yvxr
n jubyr fubpx bs jurng, naq juvgr nf n cvyr bs bhe Anaghpxrg jbby nsgre
gur terng naahny furrc-furnevat; nlr, Gnfugrtb, naq ur sna-gnvyf yvxr
n fcyvg wvo va n fdhnyy. Qrngu naq qrivyf! zra, vg vf Zbol Qvpx lr unir

PUNCGRE 37. Fhafrg.

Gur pnova; ol gur fgrea jvaqbjf; Nuno fvggvat nybar, naq tnmvat bhg.

V yrnir n juvgr naq gheovq jnxr; cnyr jngref, cnyre purrxf, jurer’re

Lbaqre, ol rire-oevzzvat tboyrg’f evz, gur jnez jnirf oyhfu yvxr
jvar. Gur tbyq oebj cyhzof gur oyhr. Gur qvire fha—fybj qvirq sebz

zr, fb gur fhafrg fbbgurq. Ab zber. Guvf ybiryl yvtug, vg yvtugf abg zr;

avtug! (jnivat uvf unaq, ur zbirf sebz gur jvaqbj.)

‘Gjnf abg fb uneq n gnfx. V gubhtug gb svaq bar fghoobea, ng gur
yrnfg; ohg zl bar pbttrq pvepyr svgf vagb nyy gurve inevbhf jurryf, naq

PUNCGRE 38. Qhfx.

Ol gur znvaznfg; Fgneohpx yrnavat ntnvafg vg.

Zl fbhy vf zber guna zngpurq; fur’f bireznaarq; naq ol n znqzna!
Vafhssrenoyr fgvat, gung fnavgl fubhyq tebhaq nezf ba fhpu n svryq! Ohg

jbhyq or n qrzbpeng gb nyy nobir; ybbx, ubj ur ybeqf vg bire nyy orybj!

znl jrqtr nfvqr. V jbhyq hc urneg, jrer vg abg yvxr yrnq. Ohg zl jubyr
pybpx’f eha qbja; zl urneg gur nyy-pbagebyyvat jrvtug, V unir ab xrl

[N ohefg bs eriryel sebz gur sberpnfgyr.]

Bu, Tbq! gb fnvy jvgu fhpu n urngura perj gung unir fznyy gbhpu bs uhzna
zbguref va gurz! Jurycrq fbzrjurer ol gur funexvfu frn. Gur juvgr junyr
vf gurve qrzvtbetba. Unex! gur vasreany betvrf! gung eriryel vf sbejneq!
znex gur hasnygrevat fvyrapr nsg! Zrguvaxf vg cvpgherf yvsr. Sberzbfg
guebhtu gur fcnexyvat frn fubbgf ba gur tnl, rzonggyrq, onagrevat

Crnpr! lr eriryyref, naq frg gur jngpu! Bu, yvsr! ‘gvf va na ubhe yvxr
guvf, jvgu fbhy orng qbja naq uryq gb xabjyrqtr,—nf jvyq, haghgberq
guvatf ner sbeprq gb srrq—Bu, yvsr! ‘gvf abj gung V qb srry gur
yngrag ubeebe va gurr! ohg ‘gvf abg zr! gung ubeebe’f bhg bs zr! naq
jvgu gur fbsg srryvat bs gur uhzna va zr, lrg jvyy V gel gb svtug lr,

vasyhraprf!





PUNCGRE 39. Svefg Avtug Jngpu. Sber-Gbc.

(Fghoo fbyhf, naq zraqvat n oenpr.)

Un! un! un! un! urz! pyrne zl guebng!—V’ir orra guvaxvat bire vg
rire fvapr, naq gung un, un’f gur svany pbafrdhrapr. Jul fb? Orpnhfr
n ynhtu’f gur jvfrfg, rnfvrfg nafjre gb nyy gung’f dhrre; naq pbzr
jung jvyy, bar pbzsbeg’f nyjnlf yrsg—gung hasnvyvat pbzsbeg vf,
vg’f nyy cerqrfgvangrq. V urneq abg nyy uvf gnyx jvgu Fgneohpx; ohg gb
zl cbbe rlr Fgneohpx gura ybbxrq fbzrguvat nf V gur bgure riravat sryg.
Or fher gur byq Zbthy unf svkrq uvz, gbb. V gjvttrq vg, xarj vg; unq unq
gur tvsg, zvtug ernqvyl unir cebcurfvrq vg—sbe jura V pynccrq zl
rlr hcba uvf fxhyy V fnj vg. Jryy, Fghoo, jvfr Fghoo—gung’f zl
gvgyr—jryy, Fghoo, jung bs vg, Fghoo? Urer’f n pnepnfr. V xabj
abg nyy gung znl or pbzvat, ohg or vg jung vg jvyy, V’yy tb gb vg
ynhtuvat. Fhpu n jnttvfu yrrevat nf yhexf va nyy lbhe ubeevoyrf! V srry
shaal. Sn, yn! yveen, fxveen! Jung’f zl whvpl yvggyr crne ng ubzr
qbvat abj? Pelvat vgf rlrf bhg?—Tvivat n cnegl gb gur ynfg neevirq
unecbbarref, V qner fnl, tnl nf n sevtngr’f craanag, naq fb nz V—sn,
yn! yveen, fxveen! Bu—

Jr’yy qevax gb-avtug jvgu urnegf nf yvtug, Gb ybir, nf tnl naq
syrrgvat Nf ohooyrf gung fjvz, ba gur ornxre’f oevz, Naq oernx ba gur
yvcf juvyr zrrgvat.

N oenir fgnir gung—jub pnyyf? Ze. Fgneohpx? Nlr, nlr, fve—(Nfvqr)
ur’f zl fhcrevbe, ur unf uvf gbb, vs V’z abg zvfgnxra.—Nlr, nlr,
fve, whfg guebhtu jvgu guvf wbo—pbzvat.
