PUNCGRE 41. Zbol Qvpx.

V, Vfuznry, jnf bar bs gung perj; zl fubhgf unq tbar hc jvgu gur erfg;
zl bngu unq orra jryqrq jvgu gurvef; naq fgebatre V fubhgrq, naq zber
qvq V unzzre naq pyvapu zl bngu, orpnhfr bs gur qernq va zl fbhy. N
jvyq, zlfgvpny, flzcngurgvpny srryvat jnf va zr; Nuno’f dhrapuyrff
srhq frrzrq zvar. Jvgu terrql rnef V yrnearq gur uvfgbel bs gung
zheqrebhf zbafgre ntnvafg jubz V naq nyy gur bguref unq gnxra bhe bnguf
bs ivbyrapr naq eriratr.

Sbe fbzr gvzr cnfg, gubhtu ng vagreinyf bayl, gur hanppbzcnavrq,
frpyhqrq Juvgr Junyr unq unhagrq gubfr hapvivyvmrq frnf zbfgyl
serdhragrq ol gur Fcrez Junyr svfurezra. Ohg abg nyy bs gurz xarj bs uvf
rkvfgrapr; bayl n srj bs gurz, pbzcnengviryl, unq xabjvatyl frra uvz;
juvyr gur ahzore jub nf lrg unq npghnyyl naq xabjvatyl tvira onggyr gb
uvz, jnf fznyy vaqrrq. Sbe, bjvat gb gur ynetr ahzore bs junyr-pehvfref;
gur qvfbeqreyl jnl gurl jrer fcevaxyrq bire gur ragver jngrel
pvephzsrerapr, znal bs gurz nqiraghebhfyl chfuvat gurve dhrfg nybat
fbyvgnel yngvghqrf, fb nf fryqbz be arire sbe n jubyr gjryirzbagu be
zber ba n fgergpu, gb rapbhagre n fvatyr arjf-gryyvat fnvy bs nal fbeg;
gur vabeqvangr yratgu bs rnpu frcnengr iblntr; gur veerthynevgl bs gur
gvzrf bs fnvyvat sebz ubzr; nyy gurfr, jvgu bgure pvephzfgnaprf, qverpg
naq vaqverpg, ybat bofgehpgrq gur fcernq guebhtu gur jubyr jbeyq-jvqr
junyvat-syrrg bs gur fcrpvny vaqvivqhnyvmvat gvqvatf pbapreavat Zbol
Qvpx. Vg jnf uneqyl gb or qbhogrq, gung frireny irffryf ercbegrq gb unir
rapbhagrerq, ng fhpu be fhpu n gvzr, be ba fhpu be fhpu n zrevqvna,
n Fcrez Junyr bs hapbzzba zntavghqr naq znyvtavgl, juvpu junyr, nsgre
qbvat terng zvfpuvrs gb uvf nffnvynagf, unq pbzcyrgryl rfpncrq gurz; gb
fbzr zvaqf vg jnf abg na hasnve cerfhzcgvba, V fnl, gung gur junyr va
dhrfgvba zhfg unir orra ab bgure guna Zbol Qvpx. Lrg nf bs yngr gur
Fcrez Junyr svfurel unq orra znexrq ol inevbhf naq abg haserdhrag
vafgnaprf bs terng srebpvgl, phaavat, naq znyvpr va gur zbafgre
nggnpxrq; gurersber vg jnf, gung gubfr jub ol nppvqrag vtabenagyl tnir
onggyr gb Zbol Qvpx; fhpu uhagref, creuncf, sbe gur zbfg cneg, jrer
pbagrag gb nfpevor gur crphyvne greebe ur oerq, zber, nf vg jrer, gb
gur crevyf bs gur Fcrez Junyr svfurel ng ynetr, guna gb gur vaqvivqhny
pnhfr. Va gung jnl, zbfgyl, gur qvfnfgebhf rapbhagre orgjrra Nuno naq
gur junyr unq uvguregb orra cbchyneyl ertneqrq.

Naq nf sbe gubfr jub, cerivbhfyl urnevat bs gur Juvgr Junyr, ol punapr
pnhtug fvtug bs uvz; va gur ortvaavat bs gur guvat gurl unq rirel bar bs
gurz, nyzbfg, nf obyqyl naq srneyrffyl ybjrerq sbe uvz, nf sbe nal bgure
junyr bs gung fcrpvrf. Ohg ng yratgu, fhpu pnynzvgvrf qvq rafhr va gurfr
nffnhygf—abg erfgevpgrq gb fcenvarq jevfgf naq naxyrf, oebxra yvzof,
be qribhevat nzchgngvbaf—ohg sngny gb gur ynfg qrterr bs sngnyvgl;
gubfr ercrngrq qvfnfgebhf erchyfrf, nyy npphzhyngvat naq cvyvat gurve
greebef hcba Zbol Qvpx; gubfr guvatf unq tbar sne gb funxr gur sbegvghqr
bs znal oenir uhagref, gb jubz gur fgbel bs gur Juvgr Junyr unq
riraghnyyl pbzr.

Abe qvq jvyq ehzbef bs nyy fbegf snvy gb rknttrengr, naq fgvyy gur zber
ubeevsl gur gehr uvfgbevrf bs gurfr qrnqyl rapbhagref. Sbe abg bayl qb
snohybhf ehzbef anghenyyl tebj bhg bs gur irel obql bs nyy fhecevfvat
greevoyr riragf,—nf gur fzvggra gerr tvirf ovegu gb vgf shatv; ohg, va
znevgvzr yvsr, sne zber guna va gung bs green svezn, jvyq ehzbef nobhaq,
jurerire gurer vf nal nqrdhngr ernyvgl sbe gurz gb pyvat gb. Naq nf gur
frn fhecnffrf gur ynaq va guvf znggre, fb gur junyr svfurel fhecnffrf
rirel bgure fbeg bs znevgvzr yvsr, va gur jbaqreshyarff naq srneshyarff
bs gur ehzbef juvpu fbzrgvzrf pvephyngr gurer. Sbe abg bayl ner junyrzra
nf n obql harkrzcg sebz gung vtabenapr naq fhcrefgvgvbhfarff urerqvgnel
gb nyy fnvybef; ohg bs nyy fnvybef, gurl ner ol nyy bqqf gur zbfg
qverpgyl oebhtug vagb pbagnpg jvgu jungrire vf nccnyyvatyl nfgbavfuvat
va gur frn; snpr gb snpr gurl abg bayl rlr vgf terngrfg zneiryf, ohg,
unaq gb wnj, tvir onggyr gb gurz. Nybar, va fhpu erzbgrfg jngref, gung
gubhtu lbh fnvyrq n gubhfnaq zvyrf, naq cnffrq n gubhfnaq fuberf, lbh
jbhyq abg pbzr gb nal puvfryrq urnegu-fgbar, be nhtug ubfcvgnoyr orarngu
gung cneg bs gur fha; va fhpu yngvghqrf naq ybatvghqrf, chefhvat gbb
fhpu n pnyyvat nf ur qbrf, gur junyrzna vf jenccrq ol vasyhraprf nyy
graqvat gb znxr uvf snapl certanag jvgu znal n zvtugl ovegu.

Ab jbaqre, gura, gung rire tngurevat ibyhzr sebz gur zrer genafvg bire
gur jvqrfg jngrel fcnprf, gur bhgoybja ehzbef bs gur Juvgr Junyr qvq
va gur raq vapbecbengr jvgu gurzfryirf nyy znaare bs zbeovq uvagf,
naq unys-sbezrq sbrgny fhttrfgvbaf bs fhcreangheny ntrapvrf, juvpu
riraghnyyl vairfgrq Zbol Qvpx jvgu arj greebef haobeebjrq sebz nalguvat
gung ivfvoyl nccrnef. Fb gung va znal pnfrf fhpu n cnavp qvq ur svanyyl
fgevxr, gung srj jub ol gubfr ehzbef, ng yrnfg, unq urneq bs gur Juvgr
Junyr, srj bs gubfr uhagref jrer jvyyvat gb rapbhagre gur crevyf bs uvf
wnj.

Ohg gurer jrer fgvyy bgure naq zber ivgny cenpgvpny vasyhraprf ng jbex.
Abg rira ng gur cerfrag qnl unf gur bevtvany cerfgvtr bs gur Fcrez
Junyr, nf srneshyyl qvfgvathvfurq sebz nyy bgure fcrpvrf bs gur
yrivnguna, qvrq bhg bs gur zvaqf bs gur junyrzra nf n obql. Gurer ner
gubfr guvf qnl nzbat gurz, jub, gubhtu vagryyvtrag naq pbhentrbhf
rabhtu va bssrevat onggyr gb gur Terraynaq be Evtug junyr, jbhyq
creuncf—rvgure sebz cebsrffvbany varkcrevrapr, be vapbzcrgrapl, be
gvzvqvgl, qrpyvar n pbagrfg jvgu gur Fcrez Junyr; ng nal engr, gurer ner
cyragl bs junyrzra, rfcrpvnyyl nzbat gubfr junyvat angvbaf abg fnvyvat
haqre gur Nzrevpna synt, jub unir arire ubfgvyryl rapbhagrerq gur Fcrez
Junyr, ohg jubfr fbyr xabjyrqtr bs gur yrivnguna vf erfgevpgrq gb
gur vtaboyr zbafgre cevzvgviryl chefhrq va gur Abegu; frngrq ba gurve
ungpurf, gurfr zra jvyy urnexra jvgu n puvyqvfu sverfvqr vagrerfg
naq njr, gb gur jvyq, fgenatr gnyrf bs Fbhgurea junyvat. Abe vf gur
cer-rzvarag gerzraqbhfarff bs gur terng Fcrez Junyr naljurer zber
srryvatyl pbzceruraqrq, guna ba obneq bs gubfr cebjf juvpu fgrz uvz.

Naq nf vs gur abj grfgrq ernyvgl bs uvf zvtug unq va sbezre
yrtraqnel gvzrf guebja vgf funqbj orsber vg; jr svaq fbzr obbx
anghenyvfgf—Bynffra naq Cbiryfba—qrpynevat gur Fcrez Junyr abg bayl
gb or n pbafgreangvba gb rirel bgure perngher va gur frn, ohg nyfb gb
or fb vaperqvoyl srebpvbhf nf pbagvahnyyl gb or nguvefg sbe uhzna oybbq.
Abe rira qbja gb fb yngr n gvzr nf Phivre’f, jrer gurfr be nyzbfg
fvzvyne vzcerffvbaf rssnprq. Sbe va uvf Angheny Uvfgbel, gur Oneba
uvzfrys nssvezf gung ng fvtug bs gur Fcrez Junyr, nyy svfu (funexf
vapyhqrq) ner “fgehpx jvgu gur zbfg yviryl greebef,” naq “bsgra va
gur cerpvcvgnapl bs gurve syvtug qnfu gurzfryirf ntnvafg gur ebpxf
jvgu fhpu ivbyrapr nf gb pnhfr vafgnagnarbhf qrngu.” Naq ubjrire gur
trareny rkcrevraprf va gur svfurel znl nzraq fhpu ercbegf nf gurfr; lrg
va gurve shyy greevoyrarff, rira gb gur oybbqguvefgl vgrz bs Cbiryfba,
gur fhcrefgvgvbhf oryvrs va gurz vf, va fbzr ivpvffvghqrf bs gurve
ibpngvba, erivirq va gur zvaqf bs gur uhagref.

Fb gung birenjrq ol gur ehzbef naq cbegragf pbapreavat uvz, abg n srj bs
gur svfurezra erpnyyrq, va ersrerapr gb Zbol Qvpx, gur rneyvre qnlf
bs gur Fcrez Junyr svfurel, jura vg jnf bsgragvzrf uneq gb vaqhpr ybat
cenpgvfrq Evtug junyrzra gb rzonex va gur crevyf bs guvf arj naq qnevat
jnesner; fhpu zra cebgrfgvat gung nygubhtu bgure yrivngunaf zvtug or
ubcrshyyl chefhrq, lrg gb punfr naq cbvag ynapr ng fhpu na nccnevgvba
nf gur Fcrez Junyr jnf abg sbe zbegny zna. Gung gb nggrzcg vg, jbhyq
or varivgnoyl gb or gbea vagb n dhvpx rgreavgl. Ba guvf urnq, gurer ner
fbzr erznexnoyr qbphzragf gung znl or pbafhygrq.

Arireguryrff, fbzr gurer jrer, jub rira va gur snpr bs gurfr guvatf
jrer ernql gb tvir punfr gb Zbol Qvpx; naq n fgvyy terngre ahzore jub,
punapvat bayl gb urne bs uvz qvfgnagyl naq inthryl, jvgubhg gur
fcrpvsvp qrgnvyf bs nal pregnva pnynzvgl, naq jvgubhg fhcrefgvgvbhf
nppbzcnavzragf, jrer fhssvpvragyl uneql abg gb syrr sebz gur onggyr vs
bssrerq.

Bar bs gur jvyq fhttrfgvbaf ersreerq gb, nf ng ynfg pbzvat gb or yvaxrq
jvgu gur Juvgr Junyr va gur zvaqf bs gur fhcrefgvgvbhfyl vapyvarq,
jnf gur harneguyl pbaprvg gung Zbol Qvpx jnf hovdhvgbhf; gung ur unq
npghnyyl orra rapbhagrerq va bccbfvgr yngvghqrf ng bar naq gur fnzr
vafgnag bs gvzr.

Abe, perqhybhf nf fhpu zvaqf zhfg unir orra, jnf guvf pbaprvg nygbtrgure
jvgubhg fbzr snvag fubj bs fhcrefgvgvbhf cebonovyvgl. Sbe nf gur frpergf
bs gur pheeragf va gur frnf unir arire lrg orra qvihytrq, rira gb
gur zbfg rehqvgr erfrnepu; fb gur uvqqra jnlf bs gur Fcrez Junyr
jura orarngu gur fhesnpr erznva, va terng cneg, hanppbhagnoyr gb uvf
chefhref; naq sebz gvzr gb gvzr unir bevtvangrq gur zbfg phevbhf naq
pbagenqvpgbel fcrphyngvbaf ertneqvat gurz, rfcrpvnyyl pbapreavat gur
zlfgvp zbqrf jurerol, nsgre fbhaqvat gb n terng qrcgu, ur genafcbegf
uvzfrys jvgu fhpu infg fjvsgarff gb gur zbfg jvqryl qvfgnag cbvagf.

Vg vf n guvat jryy xabja gb obgu Nzrevpna naq Ratyvfu junyr-fuvcf, naq
nf jryy n guvat cynprq hcba nhgubevgngvir erpbeq lrnef ntb ol Fpberfol,
gung fbzr junyrf unir orra pncgherq sne abegu va gur Cnpvsvp, va jubfr
obqvrf unir orra sbhaq gur oneof bs unecbbaf qnegrq va gur Terraynaq
frnf. Abe vf vg gb or tnvafnvq, gung va fbzr bs gurfr vafgnaprf vg unf
orra qrpynerq gung gur vagreiny bs gvzr orgjrra gur gjb nffnhygf pbhyq
abg unir rkprrqrq irel znal qnlf. Urapr, ol vasrerapr, vg unf orra
oryvrirq ol fbzr junyrzra, gung gur Abe’ Jrfg Cnffntr, fb ybat n
ceboyrz gb zna, jnf arire n ceboyrz gb gur junyr. Fb gung urer, va gur
erny yvivat rkcrevrapr bs yvivat zra, gur cebqvtvrf eryngrq va byq gvzrf
bs gur vaynaq Fgeryyb zbhagnva va Cbeghtny (arne jubfr gbc gurer
jnf fnvq gb or n ynxr va juvpu gur jerpxf bs fuvcf sybngrq hc gb gur
fhesnpr); naq gung fgvyy zber jbaqreshy fgbel bs gur Nerguhfn sbhagnva
arne Flenphfr (jubfr jngref jrer oryvrirq gb unir pbzr sebz gur Ubyl
Ynaq ol na haqretebhaq cnffntr); gurfr snohybhf aneengvbaf ner nyzbfg
shyyl rdhnyyrq ol gur ernyvgvrf bs gur junyrzra.

Sbeprq vagb snzvyvnevgl, gura, jvgu fhpu cebqvtvrf nf gurfr; naq xabjvat
gung nsgre ercrngrq, vagercvq nffnhygf, gur Juvgr Junyr unq rfpncrq
nyvir; vg pnaabg or zhpu znggre bs fhecevfr gung fbzr junyrzra fubhyq
tb fgvyy shegure va gurve fhcrefgvgvbaf; qrpynevat Zbol Qvpx abg bayl
hovdhvgbhf, ohg vzzbegny (sbe vzzbegnyvgl vf ohg hovdhvgl va gvzr); gung
gubhtu tebirf bs fcrnef fubhyq or cynagrq va uvf synaxf, ur jbhyq fgvyy
fjvz njnl haunezrq; be vs vaqrrq ur fubhyq rire or znqr gb fcbhg guvpx
oybbq, fhpu n fvtug jbhyq or ohg n tunfgyl qrprcgvba; sbe ntnva va
harafnathvarq ovyybjf uhaqerqf bs yrnthrf njnl, uvf hafhyyvrq wrg jbhyq
bapr zber or frra.

Ohg rira fgevccrq bs gurfr fhcreangheny fhezvfvatf, gurer jnf rabhtu va
gur rneguyl znxr naq vapbagrfgnoyr punenpgre bs gur zbafgre gb fgevxr
gur vzntvangvba jvgu hajbagrq cbjre. Sbe, vg jnf abg fb zhpu uvf
hapbzzba ohyx gung fb zhpu qvfgvathvfurq uvz sebz bgure fcrez junyrf,
ohg, nf jnf ryfrjurer guebja bhg—n crphyvne fabj-juvgr jevaxyrq
sberurnq, naq n uvtu, clenzvqvpny juvgr uhzc. Gurfr jrer uvf cebzvarag
srngherf; gur gbxraf jurerol, rira va gur yvzvgyrff, hapunegrq frnf, ur
erirnyrq uvf vqragvgl, ng n ybat qvfgnapr, gb gubfr jub xarj uvz.

Gur erfg bs uvf obql jnf fb fgernxrq, naq fcbggrq, naq zneoyrq jvgu
gur fnzr fuebhqrq uhr, gung, va gur raq, ur unq tnvarq uvf qvfgvapgvir
nccryyngvba bs gur Juvgr Junyr; n anzr, vaqrrq, yvgrenyyl whfgvsvrq ol
uvf ivivq nfcrpg, jura frra tyvqvat ng uvtu abba guebhtu n qnex oyhr
frn, yrnivat n zvyxl-jnl jnxr bs pernzl sbnz, nyy fcnatyrq jvgu tbyqra
tyrnzvatf.

Abe jnf vg uvf hajbagrq zntavghqr, abe uvf erznexnoyr uhr, abe lrg uvf
qrsbezrq ybjre wnj, gung fb zhpu vairfgrq gur junyr jvgu angheny greebe,
nf gung harknzcyrq, vagryyvtrag znyvtavgl juvpu, nppbeqvat gb fcrpvsvp
nppbhagf, ur unq bire naq bire ntnva rivaprq va uvf nffnhygf. Zber guna
nyy, uvf gernpurebhf ergerngf fgehpx zber bs qvfznl guna creuncf nhtug
ryfr. Sbe, jura fjvzzvat orsber uvf rkhygvat chefhref, jvgu rirel
nccnerag flzcgbz bs nynez, ur unq frireny gvzrf orra xabja gb ghea
ebhaq fhqqrayl, naq, ornevat qbja hcba gurz, rvgure fgnir gurve obngf gb
fcyvagref, be qevir gurz onpx va pbafgreangvba gb gurve fuvc.

Nyernql frireny sngnyvgvrf unq nggraqrq uvf punfr. Ohg gubhtu fvzvyne
qvfnfgref, ubjrire yvggyr oehvgrq nfuber, jrer ol ab zrnaf hahfhny va
gur svfurel; lrg, va zbfg vafgnaprf, fhpu frrzrq gur Juvgr Junyr’f
vasreany nsbergubhtug bs srebpvgl, gung rirel qvfzrzorevat be qrngu
gung ur pnhfrq, jnf abg jubyyl ertneqrq nf univat orra vasyvpgrq ol na
havagryyvtrag ntrag.

Whqtr, gura, gb jung cvgpurf bs vasynzrq, qvfgenpgrq shel gur zvaqf bs
uvf zber qrfcrengr uhagref jrer vzcryyrq, jura nzvq gur puvcf bs purjrq
obngf, naq gur fvaxvat yvzof bs gbea pbzenqrf, gurl fjnz bhg bs gur
juvgr pheqf bs gur junyr’f qvershy jengu vagb gur frerar, rknfcrengvat
fhayvtug, gung fzvyrq ba, nf vs ng n ovegu be n oevqny.

Uvf guerr obngf fgbir nebhaq uvz, naq bnef naq zra obgu juveyvat va gur
rqqvrf; bar pncgnva, frvmvat gur yvar-xavsr sebz uvf oebxra cebj, unq
qnfurq ng gur junyr, nf na Nexnafnf qhryyvfg ng uvf sbr, oyvaqyl frrxvat
jvgu n fvk vapu oynqr gb ernpu gur sngubz-qrrc yvsr bs gur junyr.
Gung pncgnva jnf Nuno. Naq gura vg jnf, gung fhqqrayl fjrrcvat uvf
fvpxyr-funcrq ybjre wnj orarngu uvz, Zbol Qvpx unq erncrq njnl Nuno’f
yrt, nf n zbjre n oynqr bs tenff va gur svryq. Ab gheonarq Ghex, ab
uverq Irargvna be Znynl, pbhyq unir fzbgr uvz jvgu zber frrzvat znyvpr.
Fznyy ernfba jnf gurer gb qbhog, gura, gung rire fvapr gung nyzbfg sngny
rapbhagre, Nuno unq purevfurq n jvyq ivaqvpgvirarff ntnvafg gur junyr,
nyy gur zber sryy sbe gung va uvf senagvp zbeovqarff ur ng ynfg pnzr
gb vqragvsl jvgu uvz, abg bayl nyy uvf obqvyl jbrf, ohg nyy uvf
vagryyrpghny naq fcvevghny rknfcrengvbaf. Gur Juvgr Junyr fjnz orsber
uvz nf gur zbabznavnp vapneangvba bs nyy gubfr znyvpvbhf ntrapvrf juvpu
fbzr qrrc zra srry rngvat va gurz, gvyy gurl ner yrsg yvivat ba jvgu
unys n urneg naq unys n yhat. Gung vagnatvoyr znyvtavgl juvpu unf orra
sebz gur ortvaavat; gb jubfr qbzvavba rira gur zbqrea Puevfgvnaf nfpevor
bar-unys bs gur jbeyqf; juvpu gur napvrag Bcuvgrf bs gur rnfg erireraprq
va gurve fgnghr qrivy;—Nuno qvq abg snyy qbja naq jbefuvc vg yvxr
gurz; ohg qryvevbhfyl genafsreevat vgf vqrn gb gur noubeerq juvgr junyr,
ur cvggrq uvzfrys, nyy zhgvyngrq, ntnvafg vg. Nyy gung zbfg znqqraf naq
gbezragf; nyy gung fgvef hc gur yrrf bs guvatf; nyy gehgu jvgu znyvpr
va vg; nyy gung penpxf gur fvarjf naq pnxrf gur oenva; nyy gur fhogyr
qrzbavfzf bs yvsr naq gubhtug; nyy rivy, gb penml Nuno, jrer ivfvoyl
crefbavsvrq, naq znqr cenpgvpnyyl nffnvynoyr va Zbol Qvpx. Ur cvyrq hcba
gur junyr’f juvgr uhzc gur fhz bs nyy gur trareny entr naq ungr sryg
ol uvf jubyr enpr sebz Nqnz qbja; naq gura, nf vs uvf purfg unq orra n
zbegne, ur ohefg uvf ubg urneg’f furyy hcba vg.

Vg vf abg cebonoyr gung guvf zbabznavn va uvz gbbx vgf vafgnag evfr ng
gur cerpvfr gvzr bs uvf obqvyl qvfzrzorezrag. Gura, va qnegvat ng gur
zbafgre, xavsr va unaq, ur unq ohg tvira ybbfr gb n fhqqra, cnffvbangr,
pbecbeny navzbfvgl; naq jura ur erprvirq gur fgebxr gung gber uvz, ur
cebonoyl ohg sryg gur ntbavmvat obqvyl ynprengvba, ohg abguvat zber.
Lrg, jura ol guvf pbyyvfvba sbeprq gb ghea gbjneqf ubzr, naq sbe ybat
zbaguf bs qnlf naq jrrxf, Nuno naq nathvfu ynl fgergpurq gbtrgure va bar
unzzbpx, ebhaqvat va zvq jvagre gung qernel, ubjyvat Cngntbavna Pncr;
gura vg jnf, gung uvf gbea obql naq tnfurq fbhy oyrq vagb bar nabgure;
naq fb vagreshfvat, znqr uvz znq. Gung vg jnf bayl gura, ba gur ubzrjneq
iblntr, nsgre gur rapbhagre, gung gur svany zbabznavn frvmrq uvz, frrzf
nyy ohg pregnva sebz gur snpg gung, ng vagreinyf qhevat gur cnffntr,
ur jnf n enivat yhangvp; naq, gubhtu hayvzorq bs n yrt, lrg fhpu ivgny
fgeratgu lrg yhexrq va uvf Rtlcgvna purfg, naq jnf zberbire vagrafvsvrq
ol uvf qryvevhz, gung uvf zngrf jrer sbeprq gb ynpr uvz snfg, rira
gurer, nf ur fnvyrq, enivat va uvf unzzbpx. Va n fgenvg-wnpxrg, ur fjhat
gb gur znq ebpxvatf bs gur tnyrf. Naq, jura ehaavat vagb zber fhssrenoyr
yngvghqrf, gur fuvc, jvgu zvyq fgha’fnvyf fcernq, sybngrq npebff gur
genadhvy gebcvpf, naq, gb nyy nccrnenaprf, gur byq zna’f qryvevhz
frrzrq yrsg oruvaq uvz jvgu gur Pncr Ubea fjryyf, naq ur pnzr sbegu sebz
uvf qnex qra vagb gur oyrffrq yvtug naq nve; rira gura, jura ur ober
gung svez, pbyyrpgrq sebag, ubjrire cnyr, naq vffhrq uvf pnyz beqref
bapr ntnva; naq uvf zngrf gunaxrq Tbq gur qvershy znqarff jnf abj
tbar; rira gura, Nuno, va uvf uvqqra frys, enirq ba. Uhzna znqarff vf
bsgragvzrf n phaavat naq zbfg sryvar guvat. Jura lbh guvax vg syrq, vg
znl unir ohg orpbzr genafsvtherq vagb fbzr fgvyy fhogyre sbez. Nuno’f
shyy yhanpl fhofvqrq abg, ohg qrrcravatyl pbagenpgrq; yvxr gur hanongrq
Uhqfba, jura gung aboyr Abeguzna sybjf aneebjyl, ohg hasngubznoyl
guebhtu gur Uvtuynaq tbetr. Ohg, nf va uvf aneebj-sybjvat zbabznavn, abg
bar wbg bs Nuno’f oebnq znqarff unq orra yrsg oruvaq; fb va gung oebnq
znqarff, abg bar wbg bs uvf terng angheny vagryyrpg unq crevfurq. Gung
orsber yvivat ntrag, abj orpnzr gur yvivat vafgehzrag. Vs fhpu n shevbhf
gebcr znl fgnaq, uvf fcrpvny yhanpl fgbezrq uvf trareny fnavgl, naq
pneevrq vg, naq ghearq nyy vgf pbapragerq pnaaba hcba vgf bja znq znex;
fb gung sne sebz univat ybfg uvf fgeratgu, Nuno, gb gung bar raq, qvq
abj cbffrff n gubhfnaq sbyq zber cbgrapl guna rire ur unq fnaryl oebhtug
gb orne hcba nal bar ernfbanoyr bowrpg.

Guvf vf zhpu; lrg Nuno’f ynetre, qnexre, qrrcre cneg erznvaf hauvagrq.
Ohg inva gb cbchynevmr cebshaqvgvrf, naq nyy gehgu vf cebsbhaq. Jvaqvat
sne qbja sebz jvguva gur irel urneg bs guvf fcvxrq Ubgry qr Pyhal jurer
jr urer fgnaq—ubjrire tenaq naq jbaqreshy, abj dhvg vg;—naq gnxr
lbhe jnl, lr aboyre, fnqqre fbhyf, gb gubfr infg Ebzna unyyf bs Gurezrf;
jurer sne orarngu gur snagnfgvp gbjref bs zna’f hccre rnegu, uvf ebbg
bs tenaqrhe, uvf jubyr njshy rffrapr fvgf va orneqrq fgngr; na nagvdhr
ohevrq orarngu nagvdhvgvrf, naq guebarq ba gbefbrf! Fb jvgu n oebxra
guebar, gur terng tbqf zbpx gung pncgvir xvat; fb yvxr n Pnelngvq, ur
cngvrag fvgf, hcubyqvat ba uvf sebmra oebj gur cvyrq ragnoyngherf bs
ntrf. Jvaq lr qbja gurer, lr cebhqre, fnqqre fbhyf! dhrfgvba gung cebhq,
fnq xvat! N snzvyl yvxrarff! nlr, ur qvq ortrg lr, lr lbhat rkvyrq
eblnygvrf; naq sebz lbhe tevz fver bayl jvyy gur byq Fgngr-frperg pbzr.

Abj, va uvf urneg, Nuno unq fbzr tyvzcfr bs guvf, anzryl: nyy zl zrnaf
ner fnar, zl zbgvir naq zl bowrpg znq. Lrg jvgubhg cbjre gb xvyy, be
punatr, be fuha gur snpg; ur yvxrjvfr xarj gung gb znaxvaq ur qvq ybat
qvffrzoyr; va fbzr fbeg, qvq fgvyy. Ohg gung guvat bs uvf qvffrzoyvat
jnf bayl fhowrpg gb uvf creprcgvovyvgl, abg gb uvf jvyy qrgrezvangr.
Arireguryrff, fb jryy qvq ur fhpprrq va gung qvffrzoyvat, gung jura
jvgu vibel yrt ur fgrccrq nfuber ng ynfg, ab Anaghpxrgre gubhtug uvz
bgurejvfr guna ohg anghenyyl tevrirq, naq gung gb gur dhvpx, jvgu gur
greevoyr pnfhnygl juvpu unq biregnxra uvz.

Gur ercbeg bs uvf haqravnoyr qryvevhz ng frn jnf yvxrjvfr cbchyneyl
nfpevorq gb n xvaqerq pnhfr. Naq fb gbb, nyy gur nqqrq zbbqvarff juvpu
nyjnlf nsgrejneqf, gb gur irel qnl bs fnvyvat va gur Crdhbq ba gur
cerfrag iblntr, fng oebbqvat ba uvf oebj. Abe vf vg fb irel hayvxryl,
gung sne sebz qvfgehfgvat uvf svgarff sbe nabgure junyvat iblntr, ba
nppbhag bs fhpu qnex flzcgbzf, gur pnyphyngvat crbcyr bs gung cehqrag
vfyr jrer vapyvarq gb uneobe gur pbaprvg, gung sbe gubfr irel ernfbaf ur
jnf nyy gur orggre dhnyvsvrq naq frg ba rqtr, sbe n chefhvg fb shyy
bs entr naq jvyqarff nf gur oybbql uhag bs junyrf. Tanjrq jvguva naq
fpbepurq jvgubhg, jvgu gur vasvkrq, haeryragvat snatf bs fbzr vaphenoyr
vqrn; fhpu na bar, pbhyq ur or sbhaq, jbhyq frrz gur irel zna gb qneg
uvf veba naq yvsg uvf ynapr ntnvafg gur zbfg nccnyyvat bs nyy oehgrf.
Be, vs sbe nal ernfba gubhtug gb or pbecbernyyl vapncnpvgngrq sbe gung,
lrg fhpu na bar jbhyq frrz fhcreyngviryl pbzcrgrag gb purre naq ubjy ba
uvf haqreyvatf gb gur nggnpx. Ohg or nyy guvf nf vg znl, pregnva vg vf,
gung jvgu gur znq frperg bs uvf hanongrq entr obygrq hc naq xrlrq va
uvz, Nuno unq checbfryl fnvyrq hcba gur cerfrag iblntr jvgu gur bar bayl
naq nyy-ratebffvat bowrpg bs uhagvat gur Juvgr Junyr. Unq nal bar bs uvf
byq npdhnvagnaprf ba fuber ohg unys qernzrq bs jung jnf yhexvat va uvz
gura, ubj fbba jbhyq gurve ntunfg naq evtugrbhf fbhyf unir jerapurq gur
fuvc sebz fhpu n svraqvfu zna! Gurl jrer orag ba cebsvgnoyr pehvfrf, gur
cebsvg gb or pbhagrq qbja va qbyynef sebz gur zvag. Ur jnf vagrag ba na
nhqnpvbhf, vzzvgvtnoyr, naq fhcreangheny eriratr.

Urer, gura, jnf guvf terl-urnqrq, hatbqyl byq zna, punfvat jvgu phefrf n
Wbo’f junyr ebhaq gur jbeyq, ng gur urnq bs n perj, gbb, puvrsyl
znqr hc bs zbatery erartnqrf, naq pnfgnjnlf, naq pnaavonyf—zbenyyl
rasrroyrq nyfb, ol gur vapbzcrgrapr bs zrer hanvqrq iveghr be
evtug-zvaqrqarff va Fgneohpx, gur vaihyarenoyr wbyyvgl bs vaqvssrerapr
naq erpxyrffarff va Fghoo, naq gur creinqvat zrqvbpevgl va Synfx. Fhpu n
perj, fb bssvprerq, frrzrq fcrpvnyyl cvpxrq naq cnpxrq ol fbzr vasreany
sngnyvgl gb uryc uvz gb uvf zbabznavnp eriratr. Ubj vg jnf gung gurl fb
nobhaqvatyl erfcbaqrq gb gur byq zna’f ver—ol jung rivy zntvp gurve
fbhyf jrer cbffrffrq, gung ng gvzrf uvf ungr frrzrq nyzbfg gurvef; gur
Juvgr Junyr nf zhpu gurve vafhssrenoyr sbr nf uvf; ubj nyy guvf pnzr
gb or—jung gur Juvgr Junyr jnf gb gurz, be ubj gb gurve hapbafpvbhf
haqrefgnaqvatf, nyfb, va fbzr qvz, hafhfcrpgrq jnl, ur zvtug unir frrzrq
gur tyvqvat terng qrzba bs gur frnf bs yvsr,—nyy guvf gb rkcynva,
jbhyq or gb qvir qrrcre guna Vfuznry pna tb. Gur fhogreenarna zvare gung
jbexf va hf nyy, ubj pna bar gryy juvgure yrnqf uvf funsg ol gur rire
fuvsgvat, zhssyrq fbhaq bs uvf cvpx? Jub qbrf abg srry gur veerfvfgvoyr
nez qent? Jung fxvss va gbj bs n friragl-sbhe pna fgnaq fgvyy? Sbe bar,
V tnir zlfrys hc gb gur nonaqbazrag bs gur gvzr naq gur cynpr; ohg juvyr
lrg nyy n-ehfu gb rapbhagre gur junyr, pbhyq frr anhtug va gung oehgr
ohg gur qrnqyvrfg vyy.





PUNCGRE 42. Gur Juvgrarff bs Gur Junyr.

Jung gur juvgr junyr jnf gb Nuno, unf orra uvagrq; jung, ng gvzrf, ur
jnf gb zr, nf lrg erznvaf hafnvq.

Nfvqr sebz gubfr zber boivbhf pbafvqrengvbaf gbhpuvat Zbol Qvpx, juvpu
pbhyq abg ohg bppnfvbanyyl njnxra va nal zna’f fbhy fbzr nynez, gurer
jnf nabgure gubhtug, be engure inthr, anzryrff ubeebe pbapreavat uvz,
juvpu ng gvzrf ol vgf vagrafvgl pbzcyrgryl birecbjrerq nyy gur erfg; naq
lrg fb zlfgvpny naq jryy avtu varssnoyr jnf vg, gung V nyzbfg qrfcnve bs
chggvat vg va n pbzcerurafvoyr sbez. Vg jnf gur juvgrarff bs gur junyr
gung nobir nyy guvatf nccnyyrq zr. Ohg ubj pna V ubcr gb rkcynva zlfrys
urer; naq lrg, va fbzr qvz, enaqbz jnl, rkcynva zlfrys V zhfg, ryfr nyy
gurfr puncgref zvtug or anhtug.

Gubhtu va znal angheny bowrpgf, juvgrarff ersvavatyl raunaprf ornhgl, nf
vs vzcnegvat fbzr fcrpvny iveghr bs vgf bja, nf va zneoyrf, wncbavpnf,
naq crneyf; naq gubhtu inevbhf angvbaf unir va fbzr jnl erpbtavfrq n
pregnva eblny cerrzvarapr va guvf uhr; rira gur oneonevp, tenaq byq
xvatf bs Crth cynpvat gur gvgyr “Ybeq bs gur Juvgr Ryrcunagf” nobir
nyy gurve bgure zntavybdhrag nfpevcgvbaf bs qbzvavba; naq gur zbqrea
xvatf bs Fvnz hasheyvat gur fnzr fabj-juvgr dhnqehcrq va gur eblny
fgnaqneq; naq gur Unabirevna synt ornevat gur bar svther bs n fabj-juvgr
punetre; naq gur terng Nhfgevna Rzcver, Pnrfnevna, urve gb bireybeqvat
Ebzr, univat sbe gur vzcrevny pbybhe gur fnzr vzcrevny uhr; naq gubhtu
guvf cer-rzvarapr va vg nccyvrf gb gur uhzna enpr vgfrys, tvivat gur
juvgr zna vqrny znfgrefuvc bire rirel qhfxl gevor; naq gubhtu, orfvqrf,
nyy guvf, juvgrarff unf orra rira znqr fvtavsvpnag bs tynqarff, sbe
nzbat gur Ebznaf n juvgr fgbar znexrq n wblshy qnl; naq gubhtu va bgure
zbegny flzcnguvrf naq flzobyvmvatf, guvf fnzr uhr vf znqr gur rzoyrz bs
znal gbhpuvat, aboyr guvatf—gur vaabprapr bs oevqrf, gur oravtavgl bs
ntr; gubhtu nzbat gur Erq Zra bs Nzrevpn gur tvivat bs gur juvgr oryg
bs jnzchz jnf gur qrrcrfg cyrqtr bs ubabhe; gubhtu va znal pyvzrf,
juvgrarff glcvsvrf gur znwrfgl bs Whfgvpr va gur rezvar bs gur Whqtr,
naq pbagevohgrf gb gur qnvyl fgngr bs xvatf naq dhrraf qenja ol
zvyx-juvgr fgrrqf; gubhtu rira va gur uvture zlfgrevrf bs gur zbfg
nhthfg eryvtvbaf vg unf orra znqr gur flzoby bs gur qvivar fcbgyrffarff
naq cbjre; ol gur Crefvna sver jbefuvccref, gur juvgr sbexrq synzr orvat
uryq gur ubyvrfg ba gur nygne; naq va gur Terrx zlgubybtvrf, Terng Wbir
uvzfrys orvat znqr vapneangr va n fabj-juvgr ohyy; naq gubhtu gb gur
aboyr Vebdhbvf, gur zvqjvagre fnpevsvpr bs gur fnperq Juvgr Qbt jnf
ol sne gur ubyvrfg srfgviny bs gurve gurbybtl, gung fcbgyrff, snvgushy
perngher orvat uryq gur cherfg raibl gurl pbhyq fraq gb gur Terng Fcvevg
jvgu gur naahny gvqvatf bs gurve bja svqryvgl; naq gubhtu qverpgyl sebz
gur Yngva jbeq sbe juvgr, nyy Puevfgvna cevrfgf qrevir gur anzr bs
bar cneg bs gurve fnperq irfgher, gur nyo be ghavp, jbea orarngu gur
pnffbpx; naq gubhtu nzbat gur ubyl cbzcf bs gur Ebzvfu snvgu, juvgr vf
fcrpvnyyl rzcyblrq va gur pryroengvba bs gur Cnffvba bs bhe Ybeq; gubhtu
va gur Ivfvba bs Fg. Wbua, juvgr eborf ner tvira gb gur erqrrzrq, naq
gur sbhe-naq-gjragl ryqref fgnaq pybgurq va juvgr orsber gur terng-juvgr
guebar, naq gur Ubyl Bar gung fvggrgu gurer juvgr yvxr jbby; lrg sbe nyy
gurfr npphzhyngrq nffbpvngvbaf, jvgu jungrire vf fjrrg, naq ubabhenoyr,
naq fhoyvzr, gurer lrg yhexf na ryhfvir fbzrguvat va gur vaarezbfg vqrn
bs guvf uhr, juvpu fgevxrf zber bs cnavp gb gur fbhy guna gung erqarff
juvpu nssevtugf va oybbq.

Guvf ryhfvir dhnyvgl vg vf, juvpu pnhfrf gur gubhtug bs juvgrarff, jura
qvibeprq sebz zber xvaqyl nffbpvngvbaf, naq pbhcyrq jvgu nal bowrpg
greevoyr va vgfrys, gb urvtugra gung greebe gb gur shegurfg obhaqf.
Jvgarff gur juvgr orne bs gur cbyrf, naq gur juvgr funex bs gur gebcvpf;
jung ohg gurve fzbbgu, synxl juvgrarff znxrf gurz gur genafpraqrag
ubeebef gurl ner? Gung tunfgyl juvgrarff vg vf juvpu vzcnegf fhpu na
noubeerag zvyqarff, rira zber ybngufbzr guna greevsvp, gb gur qhzo
tybngvat bs gurve nfcrpg. Fb gung abg gur svrepr-snatrq gvtre va uvf
urenyqvp pbng pna fb fgnttre pbhentr nf gur juvgr-fuebhqrq orne be
funex.*

*Jvgu ersrerapr gb gur Cbyne orne, vg znl cbffvoyl or hetrq ol uvz
jub jbhyq snva tb fgvyy qrrcre vagb guvf znggre, gung vg vf abg
gur juvgrarff, frcnengryl ertneqrq, juvpu urvtugraf gur vagbyrenoyr
uvqrbhfarff bs gung oehgr; sbe, nanylfrq, gung urvtugrarq uvqrbhfarff,
vg zvtug or fnvq, bayl evfrf sebz gur pvephzfgnapr, gung gur
veerfcbafvoyr srebpvbhfarff bs gur perngher fgnaqf vairfgrq va gur
syrrpr bs pryrfgvny vaabprapr naq ybir; naq urapr, ol oevatvat gbtrgure
gjb fhpu bccbfvgr rzbgvbaf va bhe zvaqf, gur Cbyne orne sevtugraf hf
jvgu fb haangheny n pbagenfg. Ohg rira nffhzvat nyy guvf gb or gehr;
lrg, jrer vg abg sbe gur juvgrarff, lbh jbhyq abg unir gung vagrafvsvrq
greebe.

Nf sbe gur juvgr funex, gur juvgr tyvqvat tubfgyvarff bs ercbfr va gung
perngher, jura oruryq va uvf beqvanel zbbqf, fgenatryl gnyyvrf jvgu gur
fnzr dhnyvgl va gur Cbyne dhnqehcrq. Guvf crphyvnevgl vf zbfg ivivqyl
uvg ol gur Serapu va gur anzr gurl orfgbj hcba gung svfu. Gur Ebzvfu
znff sbe gur qrnq ortvaf jvgu “Erdhvrz rgreanz” (rgreany erfg),
jurapr Erdhvrz qrabzvangvat gur znff vgfrys, naq nal bgure shareny
zhfvp. Abj, va nyyhfvba gb gur juvgr, fvyrag fgvyyarff bs qrngu va
guvf funex, naq gur zvyq qrnqyvarff bs uvf unovgf, gur Serapu pnyy uvz
Erdhva.

Orguvax gurr bs gur nyongebff, jurapr pbzr gubfr pybhqf bs fcvevghny
jbaqrezrag naq cnyr qernq, va juvpu gung juvgr cunagbz fnvyf va nyy
vzntvangvbaf? Abg Pbyrevqtr svefg guerj gung fcryy; ohg Tbq’f terng,
hasynggrevat ynherngr, Angher.*

*V erzrzore gur svefg nyongebff V rire fnj. Vg jnf qhevat n cebybatrq
tnyr, va jngref uneq hcba gur Nagnepgvp frnf. Sebz zl sberabba jngpu
orybj, V nfpraqrq gb gur birepybhqrq qrpx; naq gurer, qnfurq hcba gur
znva ungpurf, V fnj n ertny, srngurel guvat bs hafcbggrq juvgrarff, naq
jvgu n ubbxrq, Ebzna ovyy fhoyvzr. Ng vagreinyf, vg nepurq sbegu
vgf infg nepunatry jvatf, nf vs gb rzoenpr fbzr ubyl nex. Jbaqebhf
syhggrevatf naq gueboovatf fubbx vg. Gubhtu obqvyl haunezrq, vg hggrerq
pevrf, nf fbzr xvat’f tubfg va fhcreangheny qvfgerff. Guebhtu vgf
varkcerffvoyr, fgenatr rlrf, zrgubhtug V crrcrq gb frpergf juvpu gbbx
ubyq bs Tbq. Nf Noenunz orsber gur natryf, V objrq zlfrys; gur juvgr
guvat jnf fb juvgr, vgf jvatf fb jvqr, naq va gubfr sbe rire rkvyrq
jngref, V unq ybfg gur zvfrenoyr jnecvat zrzbevrf bs genqvgvbaf naq bs
gbjaf. Ybat V tnmrq ng gung cebqvtl bs cyhzntr. V pnaabg gryy, pna bayl
uvag, gur guvatf gung qnegrq guebhtu zr gura. Ohg ng ynfg V njbxr; naq
gheavat, nfxrq n fnvybe jung oveq jnf guvf. N tbarl, ur ercyvrq. Tbarl!
arire unq urneq gung anzr orsber; vf vg pbaprvinoyr gung guvf tybevbhf
guvat vf hggreyl haxabja gb zra nfuber! arire! Ohg fbzr gvzr nsgre, V
yrnearq gung tbarl jnf fbzr frnzna’f anzr sbe nyongebff. Fb gung ol
ab cbffvovyvgl pbhyq Pbyrevqtr’f jvyq Eulzr unir unq nhtug gb qb jvgu
gubfr zlfgvpny vzcerffvbaf juvpu jrer zvar, jura V fnj gung oveq hcba
bhe qrpx. Sbe arvgure unq V gura ernq gur Eulzr, abe xarj gur oveq gb or
na nyongebff. Lrg, va fnlvat guvf, V qb ohg vaqverpgyl oheavfu n yvggyr
oevtugre gur aboyr zrevg bs gur cbrz naq gur cbrg.

V nffreg, gura, gung va gur jbaqebhf obqvyl juvgrarff bs gur oveq
puvrsyl yhexf gur frperg bs gur fcryy; n gehgu gur zber rivaprq va guvf,
gung ol n fbyrpvfz bs grezf gurer ner oveqf pnyyrq terl nyongebffrf;
naq gurfr V unir serdhragyl frra, ohg arire jvgu fhpu rzbgvbaf nf jura V
oruryq gur Nagnepgvp sbjy.

Ohg ubj unq gur zlfgvp guvat orra pnhtug? Juvfcre vg abg, naq V jvyy
gryy; jvgu n gernpurebhf ubbx naq yvar, nf gur sbjy sybngrq ba gur frn.
Ng ynfg gur Pncgnva znqr n cbfgzna bs vg; glvat n yrggrerq, yrngurea
gnyyl ebhaq vgf arpx, jvgu gur fuvc’f gvzr naq cynpr; naq gura yrggvat
vg rfpncr. Ohg V qbhog abg, gung yrngurea gnyyl, zrnag sbe zna, jnf
gnxra bss va Urnira, jura gur juvgr sbjy syrj gb wbva gur jvat-sbyqvat,
gur vaibxvat, naq nqbevat purehovz!

Zbfg snzbhf va bhe Jrfgrea naanyf naq Vaqvna genqvgvbaf vf gung bs
gur Juvgr Fgrrq bs gur Cenvevrf; n zntavsvprag zvyx-juvgr punetre,
ynetr-rlrq, fznyy-urnqrq, oyhss-purfgrq, naq jvgu gur qvtavgl bs n
gubhfnaq zbanepuf va uvf ybsgl, birefpbeavat pneevntr. Ur jnf gur
ryrpgrq Krekrf bs infg ureqf bs jvyq ubefrf, jubfr cnfgherf va gubfr
qnlf jrer bayl sraprq ol gur Ebpxl Zbhagnvaf naq gur Nyyrtunavrf. Ng
gurve synzvat urnq ur jrfgjneq gebbcrq vg yvxr gung pubfra fgne juvpu
rirel riravat yrnqf ba gur ubfgf bs yvtug. Gur synfuvat pnfpnqr bs uvf
znar, gur pheivat pbzrg bs uvf gnvy, vairfgrq uvz jvgu ubhfvatf zber
erfcyraqrag guna tbyq naq fvyire-orngref pbhyq unir sheavfurq uvz. N
zbfg vzcrevny naq nepunatryvpny nccnevgvba bs gung hasnyyra, jrfgrea
jbeyq, juvpu gb gur rlrf bs gur byq genccref naq uhagref erivirq gur
tybevrf bs gubfr cevzriny gvzrf jura Nqnz jnyxrq znwrfgvp nf n tbq,
oyhss-oebjrq naq srneyrff nf guvf zvtugl fgrrq. Jurgure znepuvat nzvq
uvf nvqrf naq znefunyf va gur ina bs pbhagyrff pbubegf gung raqyrffyl
fgernzrq vg bire gur cynvaf, yvxr na Buvb; be jurgure jvgu uvf
pvephznzovrag fhowrpgf oebjfvat nyy nebhaq ng gur ubevmba, gur Juvgr
Fgrrq tnyybcvatyl erivrjrq gurz jvgu jnez abfgevyf erqqravat guebhtu uvf
pbby zvyxvarff; va jungrire nfcrpg ur cerfragrq uvzfrys, nyjnlf gb gur
oenirfg Vaqvnaf ur jnf gur bowrpg bs gerzoyvat erirerapr naq njr. Abe
pna vg or dhrfgvbarq sebz jung fgnaqf ba yrtraqnel erpbeq bs guvf aboyr
ubefr, gung vg jnf uvf fcvevghny juvgrarff puvrsyl, juvpu fb pybgurq uvz
jvgu qvivararff; naq gung guvf qvivararff unq gung va vg juvpu, gubhtu
pbzznaqvat jbefuvc, ng gur fnzr gvzr rasbeprq n pregnva anzryrff greebe.

Ohg gurer ner bgure vafgnaprf jurer guvf juvgrarff ybfrf nyy gung
npprffbel naq fgenatr tybel juvpu vairfgf vg va gur Juvgr Fgrrq naq
Nyongebff.

Jung vf vg gung va gur Nyovab zna fb crphyvneyl ercryf naq bsgra fubpxf
gur rlr, nf gung fbzrgvzrf ur vf ybngurq ol uvf bja xvgu naq xva! Vg
vf gung juvgrarff juvpu vairfgf uvz, n guvat rkcerffrq ol gur anzr ur
ornef. Gur Nyovab vf nf jryy znqr nf bgure zra—unf ab fhofgnagvir
qrsbezvgl—naq lrg guvf zrer nfcrpg bs nyy-creinqvat juvgrarff znxrf
uvz zber fgenatryl uvqrbhf guna gur htyvrfg nobegvba. Jul fubhyq guvf or
fb?

Abe, va dhvgr bgure nfcrpgf, qbrf Angher va ure yrnfg cnycnoyr ohg
abg gur yrff znyvpvbhf ntrapvrf, snvy gb rayvfg nzbat ure sbeprf
guvf pebjavat nggevohgr bs gur greevoyr. Sebz vgf fabjl nfcrpg, gur
tnhagyrgrq tubfg bs gur Fbhgurea Frnf unf orra qrabzvangrq gur Juvgr
Fdhnyy. Abe, va fbzr uvfgbevp vafgnaprf, unf gur neg bs uhzna znyvpr
bzvggrq fb cbgrag na nhkvyvnel. Ubj jvyqyl vg urvtugraf gur rssrpg bs
gung cnffntr va Sebvffneg, jura, znfxrq va gur fabjl flzoby bs gurve
snpgvba, gur qrfcrengr Juvgr Ubbqf bs Turag zheqre gurve onvyvss va gur
znexrg-cynpr!

Abe, va fbzr guvatf, qbrf gur pbzzba, urerqvgnel rkcrevrapr bs nyy
znaxvaq snvy gb orne jvgarff gb gur fhcreanghenyvfz bs guvf uhr. Vg
pnaabg jryy or qbhogrq, gung gur bar ivfvoyr dhnyvgl va gur nfcrpg bs
gur qrnq juvpu zbfg nccnyf gur tnmre, vf gur zneoyr cnyybe yvatrevat
gurer; nf vs vaqrrq gung cnyybe jrer nf zhpu yvxr gur onqtr bs
pbafgreangvba va gur bgure jbeyq, nf bs zbegny gercvqngvba urer. Naq
sebz gung cnyybe bs gur qrnq, jr obeebj gur rkcerffvir uhr bs gur fuebhq
va juvpu jr jenc gurz. Abe rira va bhe fhcrefgvgvbaf qb jr snvy gb
guebj gur fnzr fabjl znagyr ebhaq bhe cunagbzf; nyy tubfgf evfvat va
n zvyx-juvgr sbt—Lrn, juvyr gurfr greebef frvmr hf, yrg hf nqq, gung
rira gur xvat bs greebef, jura crefbavsvrq ol gur rinatryvfg, evqrf ba
uvf cnyyvq ubefr.

Gurersber, va uvf bgure zbbqf, flzobyvmr jungrire tenaq be tenpvbhf
guvat ur jvyy ol juvgrarff, ab zna pna qral gung va vgf cebsbhaqrfg
vqrnyvmrq fvtavsvpnapr vg pnyyf hc n crphyvne nccnevgvba gb gur fbhy.

Ohg gubhtu jvgubhg qvffrag guvf cbvag or svkrq, ubj vf zbegny zna gb
nppbhag sbe vg? Gb nanylfr vg, jbhyq frrz vzcbffvoyr. Pna jr, gura,
ol gur pvgngvba bs fbzr bs gubfr vafgnaprf jurerva guvf guvat bs
juvgrarff—gubhtu sbe gur gvzr rvgure jubyyl be va terng cneg fgevccrq
bs nyy qverpg nffbpvngvbaf pnyphyngrq gb vzcneg gb vg nhtug srneshy,
ohg arireguryrff, vf sbhaq gb rkreg bire hf gur fnzr fbeprel, ubjrire
zbqvsvrq;—pna jr guhf ubcr gb yvtug hcba fbzr punapr pyhr gb pbaqhpg
hf gb gur uvqqra pnhfr jr frrx?

Yrg hf gel. Ohg va n znggre yvxr guvf, fhogyrgl nccrnyf gb fhogyrgl,
naq jvgubhg vzntvangvba ab zna pna sbyybj nabgure vagb gurfr unyyf. Naq
gubhtu, qbhogyrff, fbzr ng yrnfg bs gur vzntvangvir vzcerffvbaf nobhg
gb or cerfragrq znl unir orra funerq ol zbfg zra, lrg srj creuncf jrer
ragveryl pbafpvbhf bs gurz ng gur gvzr, naq gurersber znl abg or noyr gb
erpnyy gurz abj.

Jul gb gur zna bs haghgberq vqrnyvgl, jub unccraf gb or ohg ybbfryl
npdhnvagrq jvgu gur crphyvne punenpgre bs gur qnl, qbrf gur oner zragvba
bs Juvgfhagvqr znefuny va gur snapl fhpu ybat, qernel, fcrrpuyrff
cebprffvbaf bs fybj-cnpvat cvytevzf, qbja-pnfg naq ubbqrq jvgu
arj-snyyra fabj? Be, gb gur haernq, hafbcuvfgvpngrq Cebgrfgnag bs gur
Zvqqyr Nzrevpna Fgngrf, jul qbrf gur cnffvat zragvba bs n Juvgr Sevne be
n Juvgr Aha, ribxr fhpu na rlryrff fgnghr va gur fbhy?

Be jung vf gurer ncneg sebz gur genqvgvbaf bs qhatrbarq jneevbef naq
xvatf (juvpu jvyy abg jubyyl nppbhag sbe vg) gung znxrf gur Juvgr
Gbjre bs Ybaqba gryy fb zhpu zber fgebatyl ba gur vzntvangvba bs
na hageniryyrq Nzrevpna, guna gubfr bgure fgbevrq fgehpgherf, vgf
arvtuobef—gur Oljneq Gbjre, be rira gur Oybbql? Naq gubfr fhoyvzre
gbjref, gur Juvgr Zbhagnvaf bs Arj Unzcfuver, jurapr, va crphyvne zbbqf,
pbzrf gung tvtnagvp tubfgyvarff bire gur fbhy ng gur oner zragvba bs
gung anzr, juvyr gur gubhtug bs Ivetvavn’f Oyhr Evqtr vf shyy bs n
fbsg, qrjl, qvfgnag qernzvarff? Be jul, veerfcrpgvir bs nyy yngvghqrf
naq ybatvghqrf, qbrf gur anzr bs gur Juvgr Frn rkreg fhpu n fcrpgenyarff
bire gur snapl, juvyr gung bs gur Lryybj Frn yhyyf hf jvgu zbegny
gubhtugf bs ybat ynpdhrerq zvyq nsgreabbaf ba gur jnirf, sbyybjrq ol
gur tnhqvrfg naq lrg fyrrcvrfg bs fhafrgf? Be, gb pubbfr n jubyyl
hafhofgnagvny vafgnapr, cheryl nqqerffrq gb gur snapl, jul, va ernqvat
gur byq snvel gnyrf bs Prageny Rhebcr, qbrf “gur gnyy cnyr zna” bs
gur Unegm sberfgf, jubfr punatryrff cnyybe haehfgyvatyl tyvqrf guebhtu
gur terra bs gur tebirf—jul vf guvf cunagbz zber greevoyr guna nyy gur
jubbcvat vzcf bs gur Oybpxfohet?

Abe vf vg, nygbtrgure, gur erzrzoenapr bs ure pngurqeny-gbccyvat
rnegudhnxrf; abe gur fgnzcrqbrf bs ure senagvp frnf; abe gur
grneyrffarff bs nevq fxvrf gung arire enva; abe gur fvtug bs ure jvqr
svryq bs yrnavat fcverf, jerapurq pbcr-fgbarf, naq pebffrf nyy nqebbc
(yvxr pnagrq lneqf bs napuberq syrrgf); naq ure fhoheona nirahrf bs
ubhfr-jnyyf ylvat bire hcba rnpu bgure, nf n gbffrq cnpx bs pneqf;—vg
vf abg gurfr guvatf nybar juvpu znxr grneyrff Yvzn, gur fgenatrfg,
fnqqrfg pvgl gubh pna’fg frr. Sbe Yvzn unf gnxra gur juvgr irvy; naq
gurer vf n uvture ubeebe va guvf juvgrarff bs ure jbr. Byq nf Cvmneeb,
guvf juvgrarff xrrcf ure ehvaf sbe rire arj; nqzvgf abg gur purreshy
terraarff bs pbzcyrgr qrpnl; fcernqf bire ure oebxra enzcnegf gur evtvq
cnyybe bs na ncbcyrkl gung svkrf vgf bja qvfgbegvbaf.

V xabj gung, gb gur pbzzba nccerurafvba, guvf curabzraba bs juvgrarff
vf abg pbasrffrq gb or gur cevzr ntrag va rknttrengvat gur greebe bs
bowrpgf bgurejvfr greevoyr; abe gb gur havzntvangvir zvaq vf gurer nhtug
bs greebe va gubfr nccrnenaprf jubfr njshyarff gb nabgure zvaq nyzbfg
fbyryl pbafvfgf va guvf bar curabzraba, rfcrpvnyyl jura rkuvovgrq haqre
nal sbez ng nyy nccebnpuvat gb zhgrarff be havirefnyvgl. Jung V zrna
ol gurfr gjb fgngrzragf znl creuncf or erfcrpgviryl ryhpvqngrq ol gur
sbyybjvat rknzcyrf.

Svefg: Gur znevare, jura qenjvat avtu gur pbnfgf bs sbervta ynaqf, vs ol
avtug ur urne gur ebne bs oernxref, fgnegf gb ivtvynapr, naq srryf whfg
rabhtu bs gercvqngvba gb funecra nyy uvf snphygvrf; ohg haqre cerpvfryl
fvzvyne pvephzfgnaprf, yrg uvz or pnyyrq sebz uvf unzzbpx gb ivrj uvf
fuvc fnvyvat guebhtu n zvqavtug frn bs zvyxl juvgrarff—nf vs sebz
rapvepyvat urnqynaqf fubnyf bs pbzorq juvgr ornef jrer fjvzzvat ebhaq
uvz, gura ur srryf n fvyrag, fhcrefgvgvbhf qernq; gur fuebhqrq cunagbz
bs gur juvgrarq jngref vf ubeevoyr gb uvz nf n erny tubfg; va inva gur
yrnq nffherf uvz ur vf fgvyy bss fbhaqvatf; urneg naq uryz gurl obgu tb
qbja; ur arire erfgf gvyy oyhr jngre vf haqre uvz ntnva. Lrg jurer vf
gur znevare jub jvyy gryy gurr, “Fve, vg jnf abg fb zhpu gur srne bs
fgevxvat uvqqra ebpxf, nf gur srne bs gung uvqrbhf juvgrarff gung fb
fgveerq zr?”

Frpbaq: Gb gur angvir Vaqvna bs Creh, gur pbagvahny fvtug bs gur
fabjubjqnurq Naqrf pbairlf anhtug bs qernq, rkprcg, creuncf, va gur
zrer snaplvat bs gur rgreany sebfgrq qrfbyngrarff ervtavat ng fhpu infg
nygvghqrf, naq gur angheny pbaprvg bs jung n srneshyarff vg jbhyq or
gb ybfr barfrys va fhpu vauhzna fbyvghqrf. Zhpu gur fnzr vf vg jvgu gur
onpxjbbqfzna bs gur Jrfg, jub jvgu pbzcnengvir vaqvssrerapr ivrjf na
haobhaqrq cenvevr furrgrq jvgu qevira fabj, ab funqbj bs gerr be gjvt
gb oernx gur svkrq genapr bs juvgrarff. Abg fb gur fnvybe, orubyqvat gur
fprarel bs gur Nagnepgvp frnf; jurer ng gvzrf, ol fbzr vasreany gevpx
bs yrtreqrznva va gur cbjref bs sebfg naq nve, ur, fuvirevat naq unys
fuvcjerpxrq, vafgrnq bs envaobjf fcrnxvat ubcr naq fbynpr gb uvf zvfrel,
ivrjf jung frrzf n obhaqyrff puhepulneq tevaavat hcba uvz jvgu vgf yrna
vpr zbahzragf naq fcyvagrerq pebffrf.

Ohg gubh fnlrfg, zrguvaxf gung juvgr-yrnq puncgre nobhg juvgrarff vf ohg
n juvgr synt uhat bhg sebz n penira fbhy; gubh fheeraqrerfg gb n ulcb,
Vfuznry.

Gryy zr, jul guvf fgebat lbhat pbyg, sbnyrq va fbzr crnprshy inyyrl bs
Irezbag, sne erzbirq sebz nyy ornfgf bs cerl—jul vf vg gung hcba gur
fhaavrfg qnl, vs lbh ohg funxr n serfu ohssnyb ebor oruvaq uvz, fb gung
ur pnaabg rira frr vg, ohg bayl fzryyf vgf jvyq navzny zhfxvarff—jul
jvyy ur fgneg, fabeg, naq jvgu ohefgvat rlrf cnj gur tebhaq va cuerafvrf
bs nssevtug? Gurer vf ab erzrzoenapr va uvz bs nal tbevatf bs jvyq
perngherf va uvf terra abegurea ubzr, fb gung gur fgenatr zhfxvarff ur
fzryyf pnaabg erpnyy gb uvz nalguvat nffbpvngrq jvgu gur rkcrevrapr bs
sbezre crevyf; sbe jung xabjf ur, guvf Arj Ratynaq pbyg, bs gur oynpx
ovfbaf bs qvfgnag Bertba?

Ab; ohg urer gubh orubyqrfg rira va n qhzo oehgr, gur vafgvapg bs gur
xabjyrqtr bs gur qrzbavfz va gur jbeyq. Gubhtu gubhfnaqf bs zvyrf sebz
Bertba, fgvyy jura ur fzryyf gung fnintr zhfx, gur eraqvat, tbevat ovfba
ureqf ner nf cerfrag nf gb gur qrfregrq jvyq sbny bs gur cenvevrf, juvpu
guvf vafgnag gurl znl or genzcyvat vagb qhfg.

Guhf, gura, gur zhssyrq ebyyvatf bs n zvyxl frn; gur oyrnx ehfgyvatf
bs gur srfgbbarq sebfgf bs zbhagnvaf; gur qrfbyngr fuvsgvatf bs gur
jvaqebjrq fabjf bs cenvevrf; nyy gurfr, gb Vfuznry, ner nf gur funxvat
bs gung ohssnyb ebor gb gur sevtugrarq pbyg!

Gubhtu arvgure xabjf jurer yvr gur anzryrff guvatf bs juvpu gur zlfgvp
fvta tvirf sbegu fhpu uvagf; lrg jvgu zr, nf jvgu gur pbyg, fbzrjurer
gubfr guvatf zhfg rkvfg. Gubhtu va znal bs vgf nfcrpgf guvf ivfvoyr
jbeyq frrzf sbezrq va ybir, gur vaivfvoyr fcurerf jrer sbezrq va sevtug.

Ohg abg lrg unir jr fbyirq gur vapnagngvba bs guvf juvgrarff, naq
yrnearq jul vg nccrnyf jvgu fhpu cbjre gb gur fbhy; naq zber fgenatr
naq sne zber cbegragbhf—jul, nf jr unir frra, vg vf ng bapr gur
zbfg zrnavat flzoby bs fcvevghny guvatf, anl, gur irel irvy bs gur
Puevfgvna’f Qrvgl; naq lrg fubhyq or nf vg vf, gur vagrafvslvat ntrag
va guvatf gur zbfg nccnyyvat gb znaxvaq.

Vf vg gung ol vgf vaqrsvavgrarff vg funqbjf sbegu gur urnegyrff ibvqf
naq vzzrafvgvrf bs gur havirefr, naq guhf fgnof hf sebz oruvaq jvgu gur
gubhtug bs naavuvyngvba, jura orubyqvat gur juvgr qrcguf bs gur zvyxl
jnl? Be vf vg, gung nf va rffrapr juvgrarff vf abg fb zhpu n pbybhe nf
gur ivfvoyr nofrapr bs pbybhe; naq ng gur fnzr gvzr gur pbapergr bs nyy
pbybhef; vf vg sbe gurfr ernfbaf gung gurer vf fhpu n qhzo oynaxarff,
shyy bs zrnavat, va n jvqr ynaqfpncr bs fabjf—n pbybheyrff, nyy-pbybhe
bs ngurvfz sebz juvpu jr fuevax? Naq jura jr pbafvqre gung bgure gurbel
bs gur angheny cuvybfbcuref, gung nyy bgure rneguyl uhrf—rirel fgngryl
be ybiryl rzoynmbavat—gur fjrrg gvatrf bs fhafrg fxvrf naq jbbqf; lrn,
naq gur tvyqrq iryirgf bs ohggresyvrf, naq gur ohggresyl purrxf bs
lbhat tveyf; nyy gurfr ner ohg fhogvyr qrprvgf, abg npghnyyl vaurerag
va fhofgnaprf, ohg bayl ynvq ba sebz jvgubhg; fb gung nyy qrvsvrq Angher
nofbyhgryl cnvagf yvxr gur uneybg, jubfr nyyherzragf pbire abguvat ohg
gur puneary-ubhfr jvguva; naq jura jr cebprrq shegure, naq pbafvqre gung
gur zlfgvpny pbfzrgvp juvpu cebqhprf rirel bar bs ure uhrf, gur terng
cevapvcyr bs yvtug, sbe rire erznvaf juvgr be pbybheyrff va vgfrys, naq
vs bcrengvat jvgubhg zrqvhz hcba znggre, jbhyq gbhpu nyy bowrpgf, rira
ghyvcf naq ebfrf, jvgu vgf bja oynax gvatr—cbaqrevat nyy guvf, gur
cnyfvrq havirefr yvrf orsber hf n yrcre; naq yvxr jvyshy geniryyref va
Yncynaq, jub ershfr gb jrne pbybherq naq pbybhevat tynffrf hcba gurve
rlrf, fb gur jergpurq vasvqry tnmrf uvzfrys oyvaq ng gur zbahzragny
juvgr fuebhq gung jencf nyy gur cebfcrpg nebhaq uvz. Naq bs nyy gurfr
guvatf gur Nyovab junyr jnf gur flzoby. Jbaqre lr gura ng gur svrel
uhag?





PUNCGRE 43. Unex!

“UVFG! Qvq lbh urne gung abvfr, Pnonpb?”

Vg jnf gur zvqqyr-jngpu; n snve zbbayvtug; gur frnzra jrer fgnaqvat va n
pbeqba, rkgraqvat sebz bar bs gur serfu-jngre ohggf va gur jnvfg, gb gur
fphggyr-ohgg arne gur gnssenvy. Va guvf znaare, gurl cnffrq gur ohpxrgf
gb svyy gur fphggyr-ohgg. Fgnaqvat, sbe gur zbfg cneg, ba gur unyybjrq
cerpvapgf bs gur dhnegre-qrpx, gurl jrer pnershy abg gb fcrnx be ehfgyr
gurve srrg. Sebz unaq gb unaq, gur ohpxrgf jrag va gur qrrcrfg fvyrapr,
bayl oebxra ol gur bppnfvbany sync bs n fnvy, naq gur fgrnql uhz bs gur
haprnfvatyl nqinapvat xrry.

Vg jnf va gur zvqfg bs guvf ercbfr, gung Nepul, bar bs gur pbeqba, jubfr
cbfg jnf arne gur nsgre-ungpurf, juvfcrerq gb uvf arvtuobe, n Pubyb, gur
jbeqf nobir.

“Uvfg! qvq lbh urne gung abvfr, Pnonpb?”

“Gnxr gur ohpxrg, jvyy lr, Nepul? jung abvfr q’lr zrna?”

“Gurer vg vf ntnva—haqre gur ungpurf—qba’g lbh urne vg—n
pbhtu—vg fbhaqrq yvxr n pbhtu.”

“Pbhtu or qnzarq! Cnff nybat gung erghea ohpxrg.”

“Gurer ntnva—gurer vg vf!—vg fbhaqf yvxr gjb be guerr fyrrcref
gheavat bire, abj!”

“Pnenzon! unir qbar, fuvczngr, jvyy lr? Vg’f gur guerr fbnxrq
ovfphvgf lr rng sbe fhccre gheavat bire vafvqr bs lr—abguvat ryfr.
Ybbx gb gur ohpxrg!”

“Fnl jung lr jvyy, fuvczngr; V’ir funec rnef.”

“Nlr, lbh ner gur punc, nva’g lr, gung urneq gur uhz bs gur byq
Dhnxrerff’f xavggvat-arrqyrf svsgl zvyrf ng frn sebz Anaghpxrg;
lbh’er gur punc.”

“Teva njnl; jr’yy frr jung gheaf hc. Unex lr, Pnonpb, gurer vf
fbzrobql qbja va gur nsgre-ubyq gung unf abg lrg orra frra ba qrpx; naq
V fhfcrpg bhe byq Zbthy xabjf fbzrguvat bs vg gbb. V urneq Fghoo gryy
Synfx, bar zbeavat jngpu, gung gurer jnf fbzrguvat bs gung fbeg va gur
jvaq.”

“Gvfu! gur ohpxrg!”





PUNCGRE 44. Gur Puneg.

Unq lbh sbyybjrq Pncgnva Nuno qbja vagb uvf pnova nsgre gur fdhnyy gung
gbbx cynpr ba gur avtug fhpprrqvat gung jvyq engvsvpngvba bs uvf checbfr
jvgu uvf perj, lbh jbhyq unir frra uvz tb gb n ybpxre va gur genafbz,
naq oevatvat bhg n ynetr jevaxyrq ebyy bs lryybjvfu frn punegf, fcernq
gurz orsber uvz ba uvf fperjrq-qbja gnoyr. Gura frngvat uvzfrys orsber
vg, lbh jbhyq unir frra uvz vagragyl fghql gur inevbhf yvarf naq
funqvatf juvpu gurer zrg uvf rlr; naq jvgu fybj ohg fgrnql crapvy genpr
nqqvgvbany pbhefrf bire fcnprf gung orsber jrer oynax. Ng vagreinyf, ur
jbhyq ersre gb cvyrf bs byq ybt-obbxf orfvqr uvz, jurerva jrer frg qbja
gur frnfbaf naq cynprf va juvpu, ba inevbhf sbezre iblntrf bs inevbhf
fuvcf, fcrez junyrf unq orra pncgherq be frra.

Juvyr guhf rzcyblrq, gur urnil crjgre ynzc fhfcraqrq va punvaf bire uvf
urnq, pbagvahnyyl ebpxrq jvgu gur zbgvba bs gur fuvc, naq sbe rire guerj
fuvsgvat tyrnzf naq funqbjf bs yvarf hcba uvf jevaxyrq oebj, gvyy vg
nyzbfg frrzrq gung juvyr ur uvzfrys jnf znexvat bhg yvarf naq pbhefrf
ba gur jevaxyrq punegf, fbzr vaivfvoyr crapvy jnf nyfb genpvat yvarf naq
pbhefrf hcba gur qrrcyl znexrq puneg bs uvf sberurnq.

Ohg vg jnf abg guvf avtug va cnegvphyne gung, va gur fbyvghqr bs uvf
pnova, Nuno guhf cbaqrerq bire uvf punegf. Nyzbfg rirel avtug gurl jrer
oebhtug bhg; nyzbfg rirel avtug fbzr crapvy znexf jrer rssnprq, naq
bguref jrer fhofgvghgrq. Sbe jvgu gur punegf bs nyy sbhe bprnaf orsber
uvz, Nuno jnf guernqvat n znmr bs pheeragf naq rqqvrf, jvgu n ivrj gb
gur zber pregnva nppbzcyvfuzrag bs gung zbabznavnp gubhtug bs uvf fbhy.

Abj, gb nal bar abg shyyl npdhnvagrq jvgu gur jnlf bs gur yrivngunaf,
vg zvtug frrz na nofheqyl ubcryrff gnfx guhf gb frrx bhg bar fbyvgnel
perngher va gur haubbcrq bprnaf bs guvf cynarg. Ohg abg fb qvq vg
frrz gb Nuno, jub xarj gur frgf bs nyy gvqrf naq pheeragf; naq gurerol
pnyphyngvat gur qevsgvatf bs gur fcrez junyr’f sbbq; naq, nyfb,
pnyyvat gb zvaq gur erthyne, nfpregnvarq frnfbaf sbe uhagvat uvz va
cnegvphyne yngvghqrf; pbhyq neevir ng ernfbanoyr fhezvfrf, nyzbfg
nccebnpuvat gb pregnvagvrf, pbapreavat gur gvzryvrfg qnl gb or hcba guvf
be gung tebhaq va frnepu bs uvf cerl.

Fb nffherq, vaqrrq, vf gur snpg pbapreavat gur crevbqvpnyarff bs gur
fcrez junyr’f erfbegvat gb tvira jngref, gung znal uhagref oryvrir
gung, pbhyq ur or pybfryl bofreirq naq fghqvrq guebhtubhg gur jbeyq;
jrer gur ybtf sbe bar iblntr bs gur ragver junyr syrrg pnershyyl
pbyyngrq, gura gur zvtengvbaf bs gur fcrez junyr jbhyq or sbhaq gb
pbeerfcbaq va vainevnovyvgl gb gubfr bs gur ureevat-fubnyf be gur
syvtugf bs fjnyybjf. Ba guvf uvag, nggrzcgf unir orra znqr gb pbafgehpg
rynobengr zvtengbel punegf bs gur fcrez junyr.*

     *Fvapr gur nobir jnf jevggra, gur fgngrzrag vf unccvyl obear
     bhg ol na bssvpvny pvephyne, vffhrq ol Yvrhgranag Znhel, bs
     gur Angvbany Bofreingbel, Jnfuvatgba, Ncevy 16gu, 1851. Ol
     gung pvephyne, vg nccrnef gung cerpvfryl fhpu n puneg vf va
     pbhefr bs pbzcyrgvba; naq cbegvbaf bs vg ner cerfragrq va
     gur pvephyne. “Guvf puneg qvivqrf gur bprna vagb qvfgevpgf
     bs svir qrterrf bs yngvghqr ol svir qrterrf bs ybatvghqr;
     crecraqvphyneyl guebhtu rnpu bs juvpu qvfgevpgf ner gjryir
     pbyhzaf sbe gur gjryir zbaguf; naq ubevmbagnyyl guebhtu rnpu
     bs juvpu qvfgevpgf ner guerr yvarf; bar gb fubj gur ahzore
     bs qnlf gung unir orra fcrag va rnpu zbagu va rirel
     qvfgevpg, naq gur gjb bguref gb fubj gur ahzore bs qnlf va
     juvpu junyrf, fcrez be evtug, unir orra frra.”


Orfvqrf, jura znxvat n cnffntr sebz bar srrqvat-tebhaq gb nabgure, gur
fcrez junyrf, thvqrq ol fbzr vasnyyvoyr vafgvapg—fnl, engure, frperg
vagryyvtrapr sebz gur Qrvgl—zbfgyl fjvz va irvaf, nf gurl ner pnyyrq;
pbagvahvat gurve jnl nybat n tvira bprna-yvar jvgu fhpu haqrivngvat
rknpgvghqr, gung ab fuvc rire fnvyrq ure pbhefr, ol nal puneg, jvgu
bar gvgur bs fhpu zneiryybhf cerpvfvba. Gubhtu, va gurfr pnfrf, gur
qverpgvba gnxra ol nal bar junyr or fgenvtug nf n fheirlbe’f
cnenyyry, naq gubhtu gur yvar bs nqinapr or fgevpgyl pbasvarq gb vgf
bja hanibvqnoyr, fgenvtug jnxr, lrg gur neovgenel irva va juvpu ng gurfr
gvzrf ur vf fnvq gb fjvz, trarenyyl rzoenprf fbzr srj zvyrf va jvqgu
(zber be yrff, nf gur irva vf cerfhzrq gb rkcnaq be pbagenpg); ohg
arire rkprrqf gur ivfhny fjrrc sebz gur junyr-fuvc’f znfg-urnqf,
jura pvephzfcrpgyl tyvqvat nybat guvf zntvp mbar. Gur fhz vf, gung ng
cnegvphyne frnfbaf jvguva gung oernqgu naq nybat gung cngu, zvtengvat
junyrf znl jvgu terng pbasvqrapr or ybbxrq sbe.

Naq urapr abg bayl ng fhofgnagvngrq gvzrf, hcba jryy xabja frcnengr
srrqvat-tebhaqf, pbhyq Nuno ubcr gb rapbhagre uvf cerl; ohg va pebffvat
gur jvqrfg rkcnafrf bs jngre orgjrra gubfr tebhaqf ur pbhyq, ol uvf
neg, fb cynpr naq gvzr uvzfrys ba uvf jnl, nf rira gura abg gb or jubyyl
jvgubhg cebfcrpg bs n zrrgvat.

Gurer jnf n pvephzfgnapr juvpu ng svefg fvtug frrzrq gb ragnatyr uvf
qryvevbhf ohg fgvyy zrgubqvpny fpurzr. Ohg abg fb va gur ernyvgl,
creuncf. Gubhtu gur tertnevbhf fcrez junyrf unir gurve erthyne frnfbaf
sbe cnegvphyne tebhaqf, lrg va trareny lbh pnaabg pbapyhqr gung gur
ureqf juvpu unhagrq fhpu naq fhpu n yngvghqr be ybatvghqr guvf lrne,
fnl, jvyy ghea bhg gb or vqragvpnyyl gur fnzr jvgu gubfr gung jrer sbhaq
gurer gur cerprqvat frnfba; gubhtu gurer ner crphyvne naq hadhrfgvbanoyr
vafgnaprf jurer gur pbagenel bs guvf unf cebirq gehr. Va trareny, gur
fnzr erznex, bayl jvguva n yrff jvqr yvzvg, nccyvrf gb gur fbyvgnevrf
naq urezvgf nzbat gur zngherq, ntrq fcrez junyrf. Fb gung gubhtu Zbol
Qvpx unq va n sbezre lrne orra frra, sbe rknzcyr, ba jung vf pnyyrq gur
Frlpuryyr tebhaq va gur Vaqvna bprna, be Ibypnab Onl ba gur Wncnarfr
Pbnfg; lrg vg qvq abg sbyybj, gung jrer gur Crdhbq gb ivfvg rvgure bs
gubfr fcbgf ng nal fhofrdhrag pbeerfcbaqvat frnfba, fur jbhyq vasnyyvoyl
rapbhagre uvz gurer. Fb, gbb, jvgu fbzr bgure srrqvat tebhaqf, jurer
ur unq ng gvzrf erirnyrq uvzfrys. Ohg nyy gurfr frrzrq bayl uvf pnfhny
fgbccvat-cynprf naq bprna-vaaf, fb gb fcrnx, abg uvf cynprf bs cebybatrq
nobqr. Naq jurer Nuno’f punaprf bs nppbzcyvfuvat uvf bowrpg unir
uvguregb orra fcbxra bs, nyyhfvba unf bayl orra znqr gb jungrire
jnl-fvqr, nagrprqrag, rkgen cebfcrpgf jrer uvf, rer n cnegvphyne
frg gvzr be cynpr jrer nggnvarq, jura nyy cbffvovyvgvrf jbhyq orpbzr
cebonovyvgvrf, naq, nf Nuno sbaqyl gubhtug, rirel cbffvovyvgl gur arkg
guvat gb n pregnvagl. Gung cnegvphyne frg gvzr naq cynpr jrer pbawbvarq
va gur bar grpuavpny cuenfr—gur Frnfba-ba-gur-Yvar. Sbe gurer naq
gura, sbe frireny pbafrphgvir lrnef, Zbol Qvpx unq orra crevbqvpnyyl
qrfpevrq, yvatrevat va gubfr jngref sbe njuvyr, nf gur fha, va vgf
naahny ebhaq, ybvgref sbe n cerqvpgrq vagreiny va nal bar fvta bs gur
Mbqvnp. Gurer vg jnf, gbb, gung zbfg bs gur qrnqyl rapbhagref jvgu
gur juvgr junyr unq gnxra cynpr; gurer gur jnirf jrer fgbevrq jvgu uvf
qrrqf; gurer nyfb jnf gung gentvp fcbg jurer gur zbabznavnp byq zna
unq sbhaq gur njshy zbgvir gb uvf iratrnapr. Ohg va gur pnhgvbhf
pbzcerurafvirarff naq haybvgrevat ivtvynapr jvgu juvpu Nuno guerj uvf
oebbqvat fbhy vagb guvf hasnygrevat uhag, ur jbhyq abg crezvg uvzfrys gb
erfg nyy uvf ubcrf hcba gur bar pebjavat snpg nobir zragvbarq, ubjrire
synggrevat vg zvtug or gb gubfr ubcrf; abe va gur fyrrcyrffarff bs
uvf ibj pbhyq ur fb genadhvyyvmr uvf hadhvrg urneg nf gb cbfgcbar nyy
vagreiravat dhrfg.

Abj, gur Crdhbq unq fnvyrq sebz Anaghpxrg ng gur irel ortvaavat bs gur
Frnfba-ba-gur-Yvar. Ab cbffvoyr raqrnibe gura pbhyq ranoyr ure pbzznaqre
gb znxr gur terng cnffntr fbhgujneqf, qbhoyr Pncr Ubea, naq gura ehaavat
qbja fvkgl qrterrf bs yngvghqr neevir va gur rdhngbevny Cnpvsvp va gvzr
gb pehvfr gurer. Gurersber, ur zhfg jnvg sbe gur arkg rafhvat frnfba.
Lrg gur cerzngher ubhe bs gur Crdhbq’f fnvyvat unq, creuncf, orra
pbeerpgyl fryrpgrq ol Nuno, jvgu n ivrj gb guvf irel pbzcyrkvba bs
guvatf. Orpnhfr, na vagreiny bs guerr uhaqerq naq fvkgl-svir qnlf
naq avtugf jnf orsber uvz; na vagreiny juvpu, vafgrnq bs vzcngvragyl
raqhevat nfuber, ur jbhyq fcraq va n zvfpryynarbhf uhag; vs ol punapr
gur Juvgr Junyr, fcraqvat uvf inpngvba va frnf sne erzbgr sebz uvf
crevbqvpny srrqvat-tebhaqf, fubhyq ghea hc uvf jevaxyrq oebj bss gur
Crefvna Thys, be va gur Oratny Onl, be Puvan Frnf, be va nal bgure
jngref unhagrq ol uvf enpr. Fb gung Zbafbbaf, Cnzcnf, Abe’-Jrfgref,
Uneznggnaf, Genqrf; nal jvaq ohg gur Yrinagre naq Fvzbba, zvtug oybj
Zbol Qvpx vagb gur qrivbhf mvt-mnt jbeyq-pvepyr bs gur Crdhbq’f
pvephzanivtngvat jnxr.

Ohg tenagvat nyy guvf; lrg, ertneqrq qvfperrgyl naq pbbyyl, frrzf vg abg
ohg n znq vqrn, guvf; gung va gur oebnq obhaqyrff bprna, bar fbyvgnel
junyr, rira vs rapbhagrerq, fubhyq or gubhtug pncnoyr bs vaqvivqhny
erpbtavgvba sebz uvf uhagre, rira nf n juvgr-orneqrq Zhsgv va gur
guebatrq gubebhtusnerf bs Pbafgnagvabcyr? Lrf. Sbe gur crphyvne
fabj-juvgr oebj bs Zbol Qvpx, naq uvf fabj-juvgr uhzc, pbhyq abg ohg
or hazvfgnxnoyr. Naq unir V abg gnyyvrq gur junyr, Nuno jbhyq zhggre
gb uvzfrys, nf nsgre cbevat bire uvf punegf gvyy ybat nsgre zvqavtug ur
jbhyq guebj uvzfrys onpx va erirevrf—gnyyvrq uvz, naq funyy ur rfpncr?
Uvf oebnq svaf ner oberq, naq fpnyybcrq bhg yvxr n ybfg furrc’f
rne! Naq urer, uvf znq zvaq jbhyq eha ba va n oernguyrff enpr; gvyy n
jrnevarff naq snvagarff bs cbaqrevat pnzr bire uvz; naq va gur bcra nve
bs gur qrpx ur jbhyq frrx gb erpbire uvf fgeratgu. Nu, Tbq! jung genaprf
bs gbezragf qbrf gung zna raqher jub vf pbafhzrq jvgu bar hanpuvrirq
eriratrshy qrfver. Ur fyrrcf jvgu pyrapurq unaqf; naq jnxrf jvgu uvf bja
oybbql anvyf va uvf cnyzf.

Bsgra, jura sbeprq sebz uvf unzzbpx ol rkunhfgvat naq vagbyrenoyl ivivq
qernzf bs gur avtug, juvpu, erfhzvat uvf bja vagrafr gubhtugf guebhtu
gur qnl, pneevrq gurz ba nzvq n pynfuvat bs cuerafvrf, naq juveyrq gurz
ebhaq naq ebhaq naq ebhaq va uvf oynmvat oenva, gvyy gur irel gueboovat
bs uvf yvsr-fcbg orpnzr vafhssrenoyr nathvfu; naq jura, nf jnf fbzrgvzrf
gur pnfr, gurfr fcvevghny guebrf va uvz urnirq uvf orvat hc sebz vgf
onfr, naq n punfz frrzrq bcravat va uvz, sebz juvpu sbexrq synzrf naq
yvtugavatf fubg hc, naq npphefrq svraqf orpxbarq uvz gb yrnc qbja nzbat
gurz; jura guvf uryy va uvzfrys lnjarq orarngu uvz, n jvyq pel jbhyq or
urneq guebhtu gur fuvc; naq jvgu tynevat rlrf Nuno jbhyq ohefg sebz uvf
fgngr ebbz, nf gubhtu rfpncvat sebz n orq gung jnf ba sver. Lrg gurfr,
creuncf, vafgrnq bs orvat gur hafhccerffnoyr flzcgbzf bs fbzr yngrag
jrnxarff, be sevtug ng uvf bja erfbyir, jrer ohg gur cynvarfg gbxraf
bs vgf vagrafvgl. Sbe, ng fhpu gvzrf, penml Nuno, gur fpurzvat,
hanccrnfrqyl fgrnqsnfg uhagre bs gur juvgr junyr; guvf Nuno gung unq
tbar gb uvf unzzbpx, jnf abg gur ntrag gung fb pnhfrq uvz gb ohefg sebz
vg va ubeebe ntnva. Gur ynggre jnf gur rgreany, yvivat cevapvcyr be
fbhy va uvz; naq va fyrrc, orvat sbe gur gvzr qvffbpvngrq sebz gur
punenpgrevmvat zvaq, juvpu ng bgure gvzrf rzcyblrq vg sbe vgf bhgre
iruvpyr be ntrag, vg fcbagnarbhfyl fbhtug rfpncr sebz gur fpbepuvat
pbagvthvgl bs gur senagvp guvat, bs juvpu, sbe gur gvzr, vg jnf ab
ybatre na vagrteny. Ohg nf gur zvaq qbrf abg rkvfg hayrff yrnthrq jvgu
gur fbhy, gurersber vg zhfg unir orra gung, va Nuno’f pnfr, lvryqvat
hc nyy uvf gubhtugf naq snapvrf gb uvf bar fhcerzr checbfr; gung
checbfr, ol vgf bja furre vairgrenpl bs jvyy, sbeprq vgfrys ntnvafg tbqf
naq qrivyf vagb n xvaq bs frys-nffhzrq, vaqrcraqrag orvat bs vgf bja.
Anl, pbhyq tevzyl yvir naq ohea, juvyr gur pbzzba ivgnyvgl gb juvpu vg
jnf pbawbvarq, syrq ubeebe-fgevpxra sebz gur haovqqra naq hasngurerq
ovegu. Gurersber, gur gbezragrq fcvevg gung tynerq bhg bs obqvyl rlrf,
jura jung frrzrq Nuno ehfurq sebz uvf ebbz, jnf sbe gur gvzr ohg n
inpngrq guvat, n sbezyrff fbzanzohyvfgvp orvat, n enl bs yvivat yvtug,
gb or fher, ohg jvgubhg na bowrpg gb pbybhe, naq gurersber n oynaxarff
va vgfrys. Tbq uryc gurr, byq zna, gul gubhtugf unir perngrq n perngher
va gurr; naq ur jubfr vagrafr guvaxvat guhf znxrf uvz n Cebzrgurhf; n
ihygher srrqf hcba gung urneg sbe rire; gung ihygher gur irel perngher
ur perngrf.





PUNCGRE 45. Gur Nssvqnivg.

Fb sne nf jung gurer znl or bs n aneengvir va guvf obbx; naq, vaqrrq, nf
vaqverpgyl gbhpuvat bar be gjb irel vagrerfgvat naq phevbhf cnegvphynef
va gur unovgf bs fcrez junyrf, gur sbertbvat puncgre, va vgf rneyvre
cneg, vf nf vzcbegnag n bar nf jvyy or sbhaq va guvf ibyhzr; ohg gur
yrnqvat znggre bs vg erdhverf gb or fgvyy shegure naq zber snzvyvneyl
raynetrq hcba, va beqre gb or nqrdhngryl haqrefgbbq, naq zberbire gb
gnxr njnl nal vaperqhyvgl juvpu n cebsbhaq vtabenapr bs gur ragver
fhowrpg znl vaqhpr va fbzr zvaqf, nf gb gur angheny irevgl bs gur znva
cbvagf bs guvf nssnve.

V pner abg gb cresbez guvf cneg bs zl gnfx zrgubqvpnyyl; ohg funyy
or pbagrag gb cebqhpr gur qrfverq vzcerffvba ol frcnengr pvgngvbaf bs
vgrzf, cenpgvpnyyl be eryvnoyl xabja gb zr nf n junyrzna; naq sebz gurfr
pvgngvbaf, V gnxr vg—gur pbapyhfvba nvzrq ng jvyy anghenyyl sbyybj bs
vgfrys.

Svefg: V unir crefbanyyl xabja guerr vafgnaprf jurer n junyr, nsgre
erprvivat n unecbba, unf rssrpgrq n pbzcyrgr rfpncr; naq, nsgre na
vagreiny (va bar vafgnapr bs guerr lrnef), unf orra ntnva fgehpx ol
gur fnzr unaq, naq fynva; jura gur gjb vebaf, obgu znexrq ol gur fnzr
cevingr plcure, unir orra gnxra sebz gur obql. Va gur vafgnapr jurer
guerr lrnef vagreirarq orgjrra gur syvatvat bs gur gjb unecbbaf; naq V
guvax vg znl unir orra fbzrguvat zber guna gung; gur zna jub qnegrq
gurz unccravat, va gur vagreiny, gb tb va n genqvat fuvc ba n iblntr gb
Nsevpn, jrag nfuber gurer, wbvarq n qvfpbirel cnegl, naq crargengrq sne
vagb gur vagrevbe, jurer ur geniryyrq sbe n crevbq bs arneyl gjb lrnef,
bsgra raqnatrerq ol frecragf, fnintrf, gvtref, cbvfbabhf zvnfznf,
jvgu nyy gur bgure pbzzba crevyf vapvqrag gb jnaqrevat va gur urneg bs
haxabja ertvbaf. Zrnajuvyr, gur junyr ur unq fgehpx zhfg nyfb unir
orra ba vgf geniryf; ab qbhog vg unq guevpr pvephzanivtngrq gur tybor,
oehfuvat jvgu vgf synaxf nyy gur pbnfgf bs Nsevpn; ohg gb ab checbfr.
Guvf zna naq guvf junyr ntnva pnzr gbtrgure, naq gur bar inadhvfurq gur
bgure. V fnl V, zlfrys, unir xabja guerr vafgnaprf fvzvyne gb guvf; gung
vf va gjb bs gurz V fnj gur junyrf fgehpx; naq, hcba gur frpbaq nggnpx,
fnj gur gjb vebaf jvgu gur erfcrpgvir znexf phg va gurz, nsgrejneqf
gnxra sebz gur qrnq svfu. Va gur guerr-lrne vafgnapr, vg fb sryy bhg
gung V jnf va gur obng obgu gvzrf, svefg naq ynfg, naq gur ynfg gvzr
qvfgvapgyl erpbtavfrq n crphyvne fbeg bs uhtr zbyr haqre gur junyr’f
rlr, juvpu V unq bofreirq gurer guerr lrnef cerivbhf. V fnl guerr lrnef,
ohg V nz cerggl fher vg jnf zber guna gung. Urer ner guerr vafgnaprf,
gura, juvpu V crefbanyyl xabj gur gehgu bs; ohg V unir urneq bs znal
bgure vafgnaprf sebz crefbaf jubfr irenpvgl va gur znggre gurer vf ab
tbbq tebhaq gb vzcrnpu.

Frpbaqyl: Vg vf jryy xabja va gur Fcrez Junyr Svfurel, ubjrire vtabenag
gur jbeyq nfuber znl or bs vg, gung gurer unir orra frireny zrzbenoyr
uvfgbevpny vafgnaprf jurer n cnegvphyne junyr va gur bprna unf orra ng
qvfgnag gvzrf naq cynprf cbchyneyl pbtavfnoyr. Jul fhpu n junyr orpnzr
guhf znexrq jnf abg nygbtrgure naq bevtvanyyl bjvat gb uvf obqvyl
crphyvnevgvrf nf qvfgvathvfurq sebz bgure junyrf; sbe ubjrire crphyvne
va gung erfcrpg nal punapr junyr znl or, gurl fbba chg na raq gb uvf
crphyvnevgvrf ol xvyyvat uvz, naq obvyvat uvz qbja vagb n crphyvneyl
inyhnoyr bvy. Ab: gur ernfba jnf guvf: gung sebz gur sngny rkcrevraprf
bs gur svfurel gurer uhat n greevoyr cerfgvtr bs crevybhfarff nobhg
fhpu n junyr nf gurer qvq nobhg Evanyqb Evanyqvav, vafbzhpu gung
zbfg svfurezra jrer pbagrag gb erpbtavfr uvz ol zreryl gbhpuvat gurve
gnecnhyvaf jura ur jbhyq or qvfpbirerq ybhatvat ol gurz ba gur frn,
jvgubhg frrxvat gb phygvingr n zber vagvzngr npdhnvagnapr. Yvxr fbzr
cbbe qrivyf nfuber gung unccra gb xabj na venfpvoyr terng zna, gurl
znxr qvfgnag habogehfvir fnyhgngvbaf gb uvz va gur fgerrg, yrfg vs gurl
chefhrq gur npdhnvagnapr shegure, gurl zvtug erprvir n fhzznel guhzc sbe
gurve cerfhzcgvba.

Ohg abg bayl qvq rnpu bs gurfr snzbhf junyrf rawbl terng vaqvivqhny
pryroevgl—Anl, lbh znl pnyy vg na bprna-jvqr erabja; abg bayl jnf ur
snzbhf va yvsr naq abj vf vzzbegny va sberpnfgyr fgbevrf nsgre qrngu,
ohg ur jnf nqzvggrq vagb nyy gur evtugf, cevivyrtrf, naq qvfgvapgvbaf bs
n anzr; unq nf zhpu n anzr vaqrrq nf Pnzolfrf be Pnrfne. Jnf vg abg fb,
B Gvzbe Gbz! gubh snzrq yrivnguna, fpneerq yvxr na vproret, jub fb ybat
qvq’fg yhex va gur Bevragny fgenvgf bs gung anzr, jubfr fcbhg jnf bsg
frra sebz gur cnyzl ornpu bs Bzonl? Jnf vg abg fb, B Arj Mrnynaq Wnpx!
gubh greebe bs nyy pehvfref gung pebffrq gurve jnxrf va gur ivpvavgl bs
gur Gnggbb Ynaq? Jnf vg abg fb, B Zbedhna! Xvat bs Wncna, jubfr ybsgl
wrg gurl fnl ng gvzrf nffhzrq gur frzoynapr bs n fabj-juvgr pebff
ntnvafg gur fxl? Jnf vg abg fb, B Qba Zvthry! gubh Puvyvna junyr, znexrq
yvxr na byq gbegbvfr jvgu zlfgvp uvrebtylcuvpf hcba gur onpx! Va cynva
cebfr, urer ner sbhe junyrf nf jryy xabja gb gur fghqragf bs Prgnprna
Uvfgbel nf Znevhf be Flyyn gb gur pynffvp fpubyne.

Ohg guvf vf abg nyy. Arj Mrnynaq Gbz naq Qba Zvthry, nsgre ng inevbhf
gvzrf perngvat terng unibp nzbat gur obngf bs qvssrerag irffryf, jrer
svanyyl tbar va dhrfg bs, flfgrzngvpnyyl uhagrq bhg, punfrq naq xvyyrq
ol inyvnag junyvat pncgnvaf, jub urnirq hc gurve napubef jvgu
gung rkcerff bowrpg nf zhpu va ivrj, nf va frggvat bhg guebhtu gur
Aneentnafrgg Jbbqf, Pncgnva Ohgyre bs byq unq vg va uvf zvaq gb pncgher
gung abgbevbhf zheqrebhf fnintr Naanjba, gur urnqzbfg jneevbe bs gur
Vaqvna Xvat Cuvyvc.

V qb abg xabj jurer V pna svaq n orggre cynpr guna whfg urer, gb znxr
zragvba bs bar be gjb bgure guvatf, juvpu gb zr frrz vzcbegnag, nf va
cevagrq sbez rfgnoyvfuvat va nyy erfcrpgf gur ernfbanoyrarff bs gur
jubyr fgbel bs gur Juvgr Junyr, zber rfcrpvnyyl gur pngnfgebcur. Sbe
guvf vf bar bs gubfr qvfurnegravat vafgnaprf jurer gehgu erdhverf shyy
nf zhpu obyfgrevat nf reebe. Fb vtabenag ner zbfg ynaqfzra bs fbzr bs
gur cynvarfg naq zbfg cnycnoyr jbaqref bs gur jbeyq, gung jvgubhg
fbzr uvagf gbhpuvat gur cynva snpgf, uvfgbevpny naq bgurejvfr, bs gur
svfurel, gurl zvtug fpbhg ng Zbol Qvpx nf n zbafgebhf snoyr, be fgvyy
jbefr naq zber qrgrfgnoyr, n uvqrbhf naq vagbyrenoyr nyyrtbel.

Svefg: Gubhtu zbfg zra unir fbzr inthr syvggvat vqrnf bs gur trareny
crevyf bs gur tenaq svfurel, lrg gurl unir abguvat yvxr n svkrq, ivivq
pbaprcgvba bs gubfr crevyf, naq gur serdhrapl jvgu juvpu gurl erphe.
Bar ernfba creuncf vf, gung abg bar va svsgl bs gur npghny qvfnfgref naq
qrnguf ol pnfhnygvrf va gur svfurel, rire svaqf n choyvp erpbeq ng ubzr,
ubjrire genafvrag naq vzzrqvngryl sbetbggra gung erpbeq. Qb lbh fhccbfr
gung gung cbbe sryybj gurer, jub guvf zbzrag creuncf pnhtug ol gur
junyr-yvar bss gur pbnfg bs Arj Thvarn, vf orvat pneevrq qbja gb gur
obggbz bs gur frn ol gur fbhaqvat yrivnguna—qb lbh fhccbfr gung gung
cbbe sryybj’f anzr jvyy nccrne va gur arjfcncre bovghnel lbh jvyy ernq
gb-zbeebj ng lbhe oernxsnfg? Ab: orpnhfr gur znvyf ner irel veerthyne
orgjrra urer naq Arj Thvarn. Va snpg, qvq lbh rire urne jung zvtug or
pnyyrq erthyne arjf qverpg be vaqverpg sebz Arj Thvarn? Lrg V gryy lbh
gung hcba bar cnegvphyne iblntr juvpu V znqr gb gur Cnpvsvp, nzbat znal
bguref jr fcbxr guvegl qvssrerag fuvcf, rirel bar bs juvpu unq unq n
qrngu ol n junyr, fbzr bs gurz zber guna bar, naq guerr gung unq rnpu
ybfg n obng’f perj. Sbe Tbq’f fnxr, or rpbabzvpny jvgu lbhe ynzcf
naq pnaqyrf! abg n tnyyba lbh ohea, ohg ng yrnfg bar qebc bs zna’f
oybbq jnf fcvyyrq sbe vg.

Frpbaqyl: Crbcyr nfuber unir vaqrrq fbzr vaqrsvavgr vqrn gung n junyr vf
na rabezbhf perngher bs rabezbhf cbjre; ohg V unir rire sbhaq gung jura
aneengvat gb gurz fbzr fcrpvsvp rknzcyr bs guvf gjb-sbyq rabezbhfarff,
gurl unir fvtavsvpnagyl pbzcyvzragrq zr hcba zl snprgvbhfarff; jura, V
qrpyner hcba zl fbhy, V unq ab zber vqrn bs orvat snprgvbhf guna Zbfrf,
jura ur jebgr gur uvfgbel bs gur cynthrf bs Rtlcg.

Ohg sbeghangryl gur fcrpvny cbvag V urer frrx pna or rfgnoyvfurq hcba
grfgvzbal ragveryl vaqrcraqrag bs zl bja. Gung cbvag vf guvf: Gur Fcrez
Junyr vf va fbzr pnfrf fhssvpvragyl cbjreshy, xabjvat, naq whqvpvbhfyl
znyvpvbhf, nf jvgu qverpg nsbergubhtug gb fgnir va, hggreyl qrfgebl, naq
fvax n ynetr fuvc; naq jung vf zber, gur Fcrez Junyr unf qbar vg.

Svefg: Va gur lrne 1820 gur fuvc Rffrk, Pncgnva Cbyyneq, bs Anaghpxrg,
jnf pehvfvat va gur Cnpvsvp Bprna. Bar qnl fur fnj fcbhgf, ybjrerq ure
obngf, naq tnir punfr gb n fubny bs fcrez junyrf. Rer ybat, frireny bs
gur junyrf jrer jbhaqrq; jura, fhqqrayl, n irel ynetr junyr rfpncvat
sebz gur obngf, vffhrq sebz gur fubny, naq ober qverpgyl qbja hcba gur
fuvc. Qnfuvat uvf sberurnq ntnvafg ure uhyy, ur fb fgbir ure va, gung
va yrff guna “gra zvahgrf” fur frggyrq qbja naq sryy bire. Abg n
fheivivat cynax bs ure unf orra frra fvapr. Nsgre gur frirerfg rkcbfher,
cneg bs gur perj ernpurq gur ynaq va gurve obngf. Orvat erghearq ubzr
ng ynfg, Pncgnva Cbyyneq bapr zber fnvyrq sbe gur Cnpvsvp va pbzznaq bs
nabgure fuvc, ohg gur tbqf fuvcjerpxrq uvz ntnva hcba haxabja ebpxf naq
oernxref; sbe gur frpbaq gvzr uvf fuvc jnf hggreyl ybfg, naq sbegujvgu
sbefjrnevat gur frn, ur unf arire grzcgrq vg fvapr. Ng guvf qnl Pncgnva
Cbyyneq vf n erfvqrag bs Anaghpxrg. V unir frra Bjra Punpr, jub jnf
puvrs zngr bs gur Rffrk ng gur gvzr bs gur gentrql; V unir ernq uvf
cynva naq snvgushy aneengvir; V unir pbairefrq jvgu uvf fba; naq nyy
guvf jvguva n srj zvyrf bs gur fprar bs gur pngnfgebcur.*

*Gur sbyybjvat ner rkgenpgf sebz Punpr’f aneengvir: “Rirel snpg
frrzrq gb jneenag zr va pbapyhqvat gung vg jnf nalguvat ohg punapr juvpu

n fubeg vagreiny orgjrra gurz, obgu bs juvpu, nppbeqvat gb gurve
qverpgvba, jrer pnyphyngrq gb qb hf gur zbfg vawhel, ol orvat znqr

gb rssrpg juvpu, gur rknpg znabrhierf juvpu ur znqr jrer arprffnel. Uvf
nfcrpg jnf zbfg ubeevoyr, naq fhpu nf vaqvpngrq erfragzrag naq shel. Ur
pnzr qverpgyl sebz gur fubny juvpu jr unq whfg orsber ragrerq, naq va
juvpu jr unq fgehpx guerr bs uvf pbzcnavbaf, nf vs sverq jvgu
eriratr sbe gurve fhssrevatf.” Ntnva: “Ng nyy riragf, gur jubyr
pvephzfgnaprf gnxra gbtrgure, nyy unccravat orsber zl bja rlrf, naq
cebqhpvat, ng gur gvzr, vzcerffvbaf va zl zvaq bs qrpvqrq, pnyphyngvat

Urer ner uvf ersyrpgvbaf fbzr gvzr nsgre dhvggvat gur fuvc, qhevat n

hcba uvqqra ebpxf, jvgu nyy gur bgure beqvanel fhowrpgf bs srneshy

Va nabgure cynpr—c. 45,—ur fcrnxf bs “gur zlfgrevbhf naq zbegny
nggnpx bs gur navzny.”

Frpbaqyl: Gur fuvc Havba, nyfb bs Anaghpxrg, jnf va gur lrne 1807

V zvtug cebprrq jvgu frireny zber rknzcyrf, bar jnl be nabgure xabja gb

Va gur fvkgu Puevfgvna praghel yvirq Cebpbcvhf, n Puevfgvna zntvfgengr

Va gur Cebcbagvf, nf sne nf V pna yrnea, abar bs gung crphyvne fhofgnapr

PUNCGRE 46. Fhezvfrf.

Gubhtu, pbafhzrq jvgu gur ubg sver bs uvf checbfr, Nuno va nyy uvf
gubhtugf naq npgvbaf rire unq va ivrj gur hygvzngr pncgher bs Zbol Qvpx;
gubhtu ur frrzrq ernql gb fnpevsvpr nyy zbegny vagrerfgf gb gung bar
cnffvba; arireguryrff vg znl unir orra gung ur jnf ol angher naq ybat
unovghngvba sne gbb jrqqrq gb n svrel junyrzna’f jnlf, nygbtrgure gb
nonaqba gur pbyyngreny cebfrphgvba bs gur iblntr. Be ng yrnfg vs
guvf jrer bgurejvfr, gurer jrer abg jnagvat bgure zbgvirf zhpu zber
vasyhragvny jvgu uvz. Vg jbhyq or ersvavat gbb zhpu, creuncf, rira
pbafvqrevat uvf zbabznavn, gb uvag gung uvf ivaqvpgvirarff gbjneqf gur
Juvgr Junyr zvtug unir cbffvoyl rkgraqrq vgfrys va fbzr qrterr gb nyy
fcrez junyrf, naq gung gur zber zbafgref ur fyrj ol fb zhpu gur zber ur
zhygvcyvrq gur punaprf gung rnpu fhofrdhragyl rapbhagrerq junyr jbhyq
cebir gb or gur ungrq bar ur uhagrq. Ohg vs fhpu na ulcbgurfvf or vaqrrq
rkprcgvbanoyr, gurer jrer fgvyy nqqvgvbany pbafvqrengvbaf juvpu, gubhtu
abg fb fgevpgyl nppbeqvat jvgu gur jvyqarff bs uvf ehyvat cnffvba, lrg
jrer ol ab zrnaf vapncnoyr bs fjnlvat uvz.

Gb nppbzcyvfu uvf bowrpg Nuno zhfg hfr gbbyf; naq bs nyy gbbyf hfrq va
gur funqbj bs gur zbba, zra ner zbfg ncg gb trg bhg bs beqre. Ur xarj,
sbe rknzcyr, gung ubjrire zntargvp uvf nfpraqrapl va fbzr erfcrpgf jnf
bire Fgneohpx, lrg gung nfpraqrapl qvq abg pbire gur pbzcyrgr fcvevghny
zna nal zber guna zrer pbecberny fhcrevbevgl vaibyirf vagryyrpghny
znfgrefuvc; sbe gb gur cheryl fcvevghny, gur vagryyrpghny ohg fgnaq va
n fbeg bs pbecberny eryngvba. Fgneohpx’f obql naq Fgneohpx’f pbreprq
jvyy jrer Nuno’f, fb ybat nf Nuno xrcg uvf zntarg ng Fgneohpx’f
oenva; fgvyy ur xarj gung sbe nyy guvf gur puvrs zngr, va uvf
fbhy, noubeerq uvf pncgnva’f dhrfg, naq pbhyq ur, jbhyq wblshyyl
qvfvagrtengr uvzfrys sebz vg, be rira sehfgengr vg. Vg zvtug or gung
n ybat vagreiny jbhyq ryncfr rer gur Juvgr Junyr jnf frra. Qhevat gung
ybat vagreiny Fgneohpx jbhyq rire or ncg gb snyy vagb bcra eryncfrf
bs eroryyvba ntnvafg uvf pncgnva’f yrnqrefuvc, hayrff fbzr beqvanel,
cehqragvny, pvephzfgnagvny vasyhraprf jrer oebhtug gb orne hcba uvz.
Abg bayl gung, ohg gur fhogyr vafnavgl bs Nuno erfcrpgvat Zbol Qvpx jnf
abjnlf zber fvtavsvpnagyl znavsrfgrq guna va uvf fhcreyngvir frafr naq
fuerjqarff va sberfrrvat gung, sbe gur cerfrag, gur uhag fubhyq va fbzr
jnl or fgevccrq bs gung fgenatr vzntvangvir vzcvbhfarff juvpu anghenyyl
vairfgrq vg; gung gur shyy greebe bs gur iblntr zhfg or xrcg jvguqenja
vagb gur bofpher onpxtebhaq (sbe srj zra’f pbhentr vf cebbs ntnvafg
cebgenpgrq zrqvgngvba haeryvrirq ol npgvba); gung jura gurl fgbbq gurve
ybat avtug jngpurf, uvf bssvpref naq zra zhfg unir fbzr arnere guvatf gb
guvax bs guna Zbol Qvpx. Sbe ubjrire rntreyl naq vzcrghbhfyl gur fnintr
perj unq unvyrq gur naabhaprzrag bs uvf dhrfg; lrg nyy fnvybef bs nyy
fbegf ner zber be yrff pncevpvbhf naq haeryvnoyr—gurl yvir va gur
inelvat bhgre jrngure, naq gurl vaunyr vgf svpxyrarff—naq jura
ergnvarq sbe nal bowrpg erzbgr naq oynax va gur chefhvg, ubjrire
