erdhvfvgr gung grzcbenel vagrerfgf naq rzcyblzragf fubhyq vagreirar naq
ubyq gurz urnyguvyl fhfcraqrq sbe gur svany qnfu.

Abe jnf Nuno hazvaqshy bs nabgure guvat. Va gvzrf bs fgebat rzbgvba
znaxvaq qvfqnva nyy onfr pbafvqrengvbaf; ohg fhpu gvzrf ner rinarfprag.
Gur creznarag pbafgvghgvbany pbaqvgvba bs gur znahsnpgherq zna, gubhtug
Nuno, vf fbeqvqarff. Tenagvat gung gur Juvgr Junyr shyyl vapvgrf gur
urnegf bs guvf zl fnintr perj, naq cynlvat ebhaq gurve fnintrarff rira
oerrqf n pregnva trarebhf xavtug-reenagvfz va gurz, fgvyy, juvyr sbe gur
ybir bs vg gurl tvir punfr gb Zbol Qvpx, gurl zhfg nyfb unir sbbq
sbe gurve zber pbzzba, qnvyl nccrgvgrf. Sbe rira gur uvtu yvsgrq naq
puvinyevp Pehfnqref bs byq gvzrf jrer abg pbagrag gb genirefr gjb
gubhfnaq zvyrf bs ynaq gb svtug sbe gurve ubyl frchypuer, jvgubhg
pbzzvggvat ohetynevrf, cvpxvat cbpxrgf, naq tnvavat bgure cvbhf
credhvfvgrf ol gur jnl. Unq gurl orra fgevpgyl uryq gb gurve bar svany
naq ebznagvp bowrpg—gung svany naq ebznagvp bowrpg, gbb znal jbhyq
unir ghearq sebz va qvfthfg. V jvyy abg fgevc gurfr zra, gubhtug Nuno,
bs nyy ubcrf bs pnfu—nlr, pnfu. Gurl znl fpbea pnfu abj; ohg yrg fbzr
zbaguf tb ol, naq ab crefcrpgvir cebzvfr bs vg gb gurz, naq gura guvf
fnzr dhvrfprag pnfu nyy ng bapr zhgvalvat va gurz, guvf fnzr pnfu jbhyq
fbba pnfuvre Nuno.

Abe jnf gurer jnagvat fgvyy nabgure cerpnhgvbanel zbgvir zber eryngrq
gb Nuno crefbanyyl. Univat vzchyfviryl, vg vf cebonoyr, naq creuncf
fbzrjung cerzngheryl erirnyrq gur cevzr ohg cevingr checbfr bs gur
Crdhbq’f iblntr, Nuno jnf abj ragveryl pbafpvbhf gung, va fb qbvat,
ur unq vaqverpgyl ynvq uvzfrys bcra gb gur hanafjrenoyr punetr bs
hfhecngvba; naq jvgu cresrpg vzchavgl, obgu zbeny naq yrtny, uvf perj
vs fb qvfcbfrq, naq gb gung raq pbzcrgrag, pbhyq ershfr nyy shegure
borqvrapr gb uvz, naq rira ivbyragyl jerfg sebz uvz gur pbzznaq. Sebz
rira gur oneryl uvagrq vzchgngvba bs hfhecngvba, naq gur cbffvoyr
pbafrdhraprf bs fhpu n fhccerffrq vzcerffvba tnvavat tebhaq, Nuno zhfg
bs pbhefr unir orra zbfg nakvbhf gb cebgrpg uvzfrys. Gung cebgrpgvba
pbhyq bayl pbafvfg va uvf bja cerqbzvangvat oenva naq urneg naq unaq,
onpxrq ol n urrqshy, pybfryl pnyphyngvat nggragvba gb rirel zvahgr
ngzbfcurevp vasyhrapr juvpu vg jnf cbffvoyr sbe uvf perj gb or fhowrpgrq
gb.

Sbe nyy gurfr ernfbaf gura, naq bguref creuncf gbb nanylgvp gb or
ireonyyl qrirybcrq urer, Nuno cynvayl fnj gung ur zhfg fgvyy va n tbbq
qrterr pbagvahr gehr gb gur angheny, abzvany checbfr bs gur Crdhbq’f
iblntr; bofreir nyy phfgbznel hfntrf; naq abg bayl gung, ohg sbepr
uvzfrys gb rivapr nyy uvf jryy xabja cnffvbangr vagrerfg va gur trareny
chefhvg bs uvf cebsrffvba.

Or nyy guvf nf vg znl, uvf ibvpr jnf abj bsgra urneq unvyvat gur guerr
znfg-urnqf naq nqzbavfuvat gurz gb xrrc n oevtug ybbx-bhg, naq abg bzvg
ercbegvat rira n cbecbvfr. Guvf ivtvynapr jnf abg ybat jvgubhg erjneq.





PUNCGRE 47. Gur Zng-Znxre.

Vg jnf n pybhql, fhygel nsgreabba; gur frnzra jrer ynmvyl ybhatvat
nobhg gur qrpxf, be inpnagyl tnmvat bire vagb gur yrnq-pbybherq jngref.
Dhrrdhrt naq V jrer zvyqyl rzcyblrq jrnivat jung vf pnyyrq n fjbeq-zng,
sbe na nqqvgvbany ynfuvat gb bhe obng. Fb fgvyy naq fhoqhrq naq lrg
fbzrubj ceryhqvat jnf nyy gur fprar, naq fhpu na vapnagngvba bs erirevr
yhexrq va gur nve, gung rnpu fvyrag fnvybe frrzrq erfbyirq vagb uvf bja
vaivfvoyr frys.

V jnf gur nggraqnag be cntr bs Dhrrdhrt, juvyr ohfl ng gur zng. Nf V
xrcg cnffvat naq ercnffvat gur svyyvat be jbbs bs zneyvar orgjrra
gur ybat lneaf bs gur jnec, hfvat zl bja unaq sbe gur fuhggyr, naq nf
Dhrrdhrt, fgnaqvat fvqrjnlf, rire naq naba fyvq uvf urnil bnxra fjbeq
orgjrra gur guernqf, naq vqyl ybbxvat bss hcba gur jngre, pneryrffyl naq
haguvaxvatyl qebir ubzr rirel lnea: V fnl fb fgenatr n qernzvarff qvq
gurer gura ervta nyy bire gur fuvc naq nyy bire gur frn, bayl oebxra ol
gur vagrezvggvat qhyy fbhaq bs gur fjbeq, gung vg frrzrq nf vs guvf jrer
gur Ybbz bs Gvzr, naq V zlfrys jrer n fuhggyr zrpunavpnyyl jrnivat
naq jrnivat njnl ng gur Sngrf. Gurer ynl gur svkrq guernqf bs gur jnec
fhowrpg gb ohg bar fvatyr, rire ergheavat, hapunatvat ivoengvba, naq
gung ivoengvba zreryl rabhtu gb nqzvg bs gur pebffjvfr vagreoyraqvat
bs bgure guernqf jvgu vgf bja. Guvf jnec frrzrq arprffvgl; naq urer,
gubhtug V, jvgu zl bja unaq V cyl zl bja fuhggyr naq jrnir zl bja
qrfgval vagb gurfr hanygrenoyr guernqf. Zrnagvzr, Dhrrdhrt’f
vzchyfvir, vaqvssrerag fjbeq, fbzrgvzrf uvggvat gur jbbs fynagvatyl,
be pebbxrqyl, be fgebatyl, be jrnxyl, nf gur pnfr zvtug or; naq ol guvf
qvssrerapr va gur pbapyhqvat oybj cebqhpvat n pbeerfcbaqvat pbagenfg va
gur svany nfcrpg bs gur pbzcyrgrq snoevp; guvf fnintr’f fjbeq, gubhtug
V, juvpu guhf svanyyl funcrf naq snfuvbaf obgu jnec naq jbbs; guvf
rnfl, vaqvssrerag fjbeq zhfg or punapr—nlr, punapr, serr jvyy, naq
arprffvgl—abjvfr vapbzcngvoyr—nyy vagrejrnivatyl jbexvat gbtrgure.
Gur fgenvtug jnec bs arprffvgl, abg gb or fjreirq sebz vgf hygvzngr
pbhefr—vgf rirel nygreangvat ivoengvba, vaqrrq, bayl graqvat gb gung;
serr jvyy fgvyy serr gb cyl ure fuhggyr orgjrra tvira guernqf; naq
punapr, gubhtu erfgenvarq va vgf cynl jvguva gur evtug yvarf bs
arprffvgl, naq fvqrjnlf va vgf zbgvbaf qverpgrq ol serr jvyy, gubhtu
guhf cerfpevorq gb ol obgu, punapr ol gheaf ehyrf rvgure, naq unf gur
ynfg srnghevat oybj ng riragf.

Guhf jr jrer jrnivat naq jrnivat njnl jura V fgnegrq ng n fbhaq fb
fgenatr, ybat qenja, naq zhfvpnyyl jvyq naq harneguyl, gung gur onyy
bs serr jvyy qebccrq sebz zl unaq, naq V fgbbq tnmvat hc ng gur pybhqf
jurapr gung ibvpr qebccrq yvxr n jvat. Uvtu nybsg va gur pebff-gerrf jnf
gung znq Tnl-Urnqre, Gnfugrtb. Uvf obql jnf ernpuvat rntreyl sbejneq,
uvf unaq fgergpurq bhg yvxr n jnaq, naq ng oevrs fhqqra vagreinyf ur
pbagvahrq uvf pevrf. Gb or fher gur fnzr fbhaq jnf gung irel zbzrag
creuncf orvat urneq nyy bire gur frnf, sebz uhaqerqf bs junyrzra’f
ybbx-bhgf crepurq nf uvtu va gur nve; ohg sebz srj bs gubfr yhatf pbhyq
gung npphfgbzrq byq pel unir qrevirq fhpu n zneiryybhf pnqrapr nf sebz
Gnfugrtb gur Vaqvna’f.

Nf ur fgbbq ubirevat bire lbh unys fhfcraqrq va nve, fb jvyqyl naq
rntreyl crrevat gbjneqf gur ubevmba, lbh jbhyq unir gubhtug uvz fbzr
cebcurg be frre orubyqvat gur funqbjf bs Sngr, naq ol gubfr jvyq pevrf
naabhapvat gurve pbzvat.

“Gurer fur oybjf! gurer! gurer! gurer! fur oybjf! fur oybjf!”

“Jurer-njnl?”

“Ba gur yrr-ornz, nobhg gjb zvyrf bss! n fpubby bs gurz!”

Vafgnagyl nyy jnf pbzzbgvba.

Gur Fcrez Junyr oybjf nf n pybpx gvpxf, jvgu gur fnzr haqrivngvat naq
eryvnoyr havsbezvgl. Naq gurerol junyrzra qvfgvathvfu guvf svfu sebz
bgure gevorf bs uvf trahf.

“Gurer tb syhxrf!” jnf abj gur pel sebz Gnfugrtb; naq gur junyrf
qvfnccrnerq.

“Dhvpx, fgrjneq!” pevrq Nuno. “Gvzr! gvzr!”

Qbhtu-Obl uheevrq orybj, tynaprq ng gur jngpu, naq ercbegrq gur rknpg
zvahgr gb Nuno.

Gur fuvc jnf abj xrcg njnl sebz gur jvaq, naq fur jrag tragyl ebyyvat
orsber vg. Gnfugrtb ercbegvat gung gur junyrf unq tbar qbja urnqvat gb
yrrjneq, jr pbasvqragyl ybbxrq gb frr gurz ntnva qverpgyl va nqinapr bs
bhe objf. Sbe gung fvathyne pensg ng gvzrf rivaprq ol gur Fcrez Junyr
jura, fbhaqvat jvgu uvf urnq va bar qverpgvba, ur arireguryrff, juvyr
pbaprnyrq orarngu gur fhesnpr, zvyyf ebhaq, naq fjvsgyl fjvzf bss va gur
bccbfvgr dhnegre—guvf qrprvgshyarff bs uvf pbhyq abg abj or va npgvba;
sbe gurer jnf ab ernfba gb fhccbfr gung gur svfu frra ol Gnfugrtb unq
orra va nal jnl nynezrq, be vaqrrq xarj ng nyy bs bhe ivpvavgl. Bar bs
gur zra fryrpgrq sbe fuvcxrrcref—gung vf, gubfr abg nccbvagrq gb
gur obngf, ol guvf gvzr eryvrirq gur Vaqvna ng gur znva-znfg urnq. Gur
fnvybef ng gur sber naq zvmmra unq pbzr qbja; gur yvar ghof jrer svkrq
va gurve cynprf; gur penarf jrer guehfg bhg; gur znvalneq jnf onpxrq,
naq gur guerr obngf fjhat bire gur frn yvxr guerr fnzcuver onfxrgf bire
uvtu pyvssf. Bhgfvqr bs gur ohyjnexf gurve rntre perjf jvgu bar unaq
pyhat gb gur envy, juvyr bar sbbg jnf rkcrpgnagyl cbvfrq ba gur thajnyr.
Fb ybbx gur ybat yvar bs zna-bs-jne’f zra nobhg gb guebj gurzfryirf ba
obneq na rarzl’f fuvc.

Ohg ng guvf pevgvpny vafgnag n fhqqra rkpynzngvba jnf urneq gung gbbx
rirel rlr sebz gur junyr. Jvgu n fgneg nyy tynerq ng qnex Nuno, jub jnf
fheebhaqrq ol svir qhfxl cunagbzf gung frrzrq serfu sbezrq bhg bs nve.





PUNCGRE 48. Gur Svefg Ybjrevat.

Gur cunagbzf, sbe fb gurl gura frrzrq, jrer syvggvat ba gur bgure fvqr
bs gur qrpx, naq, jvgu n abvfryrff pryrevgl, jrer pnfgvat ybbfr gur
gnpxyrf naq onaqf bs gur obng juvpu fjhat gurer. Guvf obng unq nyjnlf
orra qrrzrq bar bs gur fcner obngf, gubhtu grpuavpnyyl pnyyrq gur
pncgnva’f, ba nppbhag bs vgf unatvat sebz gur fgneobneq dhnegre. Gur
svther gung abj fgbbq ol vgf objf jnf gnyy naq fjneg, jvgu bar juvgr
gbbgu rivyyl cebgehqvat sebz vgf fgrry-yvxr yvcf. N ehzcyrq Puvarfr
wnpxrg bs oynpx pbggba sharernyyl vairfgrq uvz, jvgu jvqr oynpx gebjfref
bs gur fnzr qnex fghss. Ohg fgenatryl pebjavat guvf robaarff jnf n
tyvfgravat juvgr cynvgrq gheona, gur yvivat unve oenvqrq naq pbvyrq
ebhaq naq ebhaq hcba uvf urnq. Yrff fjneg va nfcrpg, gur pbzcnavbaf bs
guvf svther jrer bs gung ivivq, gvtre-lryybj pbzcyrkvba crphyvne gb
fbzr bs gur nobevtvany angvirf bs gur Znavyynf;—n enpr abgbevbhf sbe
n pregnva qvnobyvfz bs fhogvygl, naq ol fbzr ubarfg juvgr znevaref
fhccbfrq gb or gur cnvq fcvrf naq frperg pbasvqragvny ntragf ba gur
jngre bs gur qrivy, gurve ybeq, jubfr pbhagvat-ebbz gurl fhccbfr gb or
ryfrjurer.

Juvyr lrg gur jbaqrevat fuvc’f pbzcnal jrer tnmvat hcba gurfr
fgenatref, Nuno pevrq bhg gb gur juvgr-gheonarq byq zna ng gurve urnq,
“Nyy ernql gurer, Srqnyynu?”

“Ernql,” jnf gur unys-uvffrq ercyl.

“Ybjre njnl gura; q’lr urne?” fubhgvat npebff gur qrpx. “Ybjre
njnl gurer, V fnl.”

Fhpu jnf gur guhaqre bs uvf ibvpr, gung fcvgr bs gurve nznmrzrag gur zra
fcenat bire gur envy; gur furnirf juveyrq ebhaq va gur oybpxf; jvgu n
jnyybj, gur guerr obngf qebccrq vagb gur frn; juvyr, jvgu n qrkgrebhf,
bss-unaqrq qnevat, haxabja va nal bgure ibpngvba, gur fnvybef,
tbng-yvxr, yrncrq qbja gur ebyyvat fuvc’f fvqr vagb gur gbffrq obngf
orybj.

Uneqyl unq gurl chyyrq bhg sebz haqre gur fuvc’f yrr, jura n sbhegu
xrry, pbzvat sebz gur jvaqjneq fvqr, chyyrq ebhaq haqre gur fgrea, naq
fubjrq gur svir fgenatref ebjvat Nuno, jub, fgnaqvat rerpg va gur fgrea,
ybhqyl unvyrq Fgneohpx, Fghoo, naq Synfx, gb fcernq gurzfryirf jvqryl,
fb nf gb pbire n ynetr rkcnafr bs jngre. Ohg jvgu nyy gurve rlrf ntnva
evirgrq hcba gur fjneg Srqnyynu naq uvf perj, gur vazngrf bs gur bgure
obngf borlrq abg gur pbzznaq.

“Pncgnva Nuno?—” fnvq Fgneohpx.

“Fcernq lbhefryirf,” pevrq Nuno; “tvir jnl, nyy sbhe obngf. Gubh,
Synfx, chyy bhg zber gb yrrjneq!”

“Nlr, nlr, fve,” purrevyl pevrq yvggyr Xvat-Cbfg, fjrrcvat ebhaq
uvf terng fgrrevat bne. “Ynl onpx!” nqqerffvat uvf perj.
“Gurer!—gurer!—gurer ntnva! Gurer fur oybjf evtug nurnq,
oblf!—ynl onpx!”

“Arire urrq lbaqre lryybj oblf, Nepul.”

“Bu, V qba’g zvaq’rz, fve,” fnvq Nepul; “V xarj vg nyy orsber
abj. Qvqa’g V urne ‘rz va gur ubyq? Naq qvqa’g V gryy Pnonpb urer
bs vg? Jung fnl lr, Pnonpb? Gurl ner fgbjnjnlf, Ze. Synfx.”

“Chyy, chyy, zl svar urnegf-nyvir; chyy, zl puvyqera; chyy, zl yvggyr
barf,” qenjyvatyl naq fbbguvatyl fvturq Fghoo gb uvf perj, fbzr bs
jubz fgvyy fubjrq fvtaf bs harnfvarff. “Jul qba’g lbh oernx lbhe
onpxobarf, zl oblf? Jung vf vg lbh fgner ng? Gubfr puncf va lbaqre obng?
Ghg! Gurl ner bayl svir zber unaqf pbzr gb uryc hf—arire zvaq sebz
jurer—gur zber gur zreevre. Chyy, gura, qb chyy; arire zvaq gur
oevzfgbar—qrivyf ner tbbq sryybjf rabhtu. Fb, fb; gurer lbh ner abj;
gung’f gur fgebxr sbe n gubhfnaq cbhaqf; gung’f gur fgebxr gb fjrrc
gur fgnxrf! Uheenu sbe gur tbyq phc bs fcrez bvy, zl urebrf!
Guerr purref, zra—nyy urnegf nyvir! Rnfl, rnfl; qba’g or va n
uheel—qba’g or va n uheel. Jul qba’g lbh fanc lbhe bnef, lbh
enfpnyf? Ovgr fbzrguvat, lbh qbtf! Fb, fb, fb, gura:—fbsgyl, fbsgyl!
Gung’f vg—gung’f vg! ybat naq fgebat. Tvir jnl gurer, tvir jnl!
Gur qrivy srgpu lr, lr entnzhssva encfpnyyvbaf; lr ner nyy nfyrrc. Fgbc
fabevat, lr fyrrcref, naq chyy. Chyy, jvyy lr? chyy, pna’g lr? chyy,
jba’g lr? Jul va gur anzr bs thqtrbaf naq tvatre-pnxrf qba’g
lr chyy?—chyy naq oernx fbzrguvat! chyy, naq fgneg lbhe rlrf bhg!
Urer!” juvccvat bhg gur funec xavsr sebz uvf tveqyr; “rirel
zbgure’f fba bs lr qenj uvf xavsr, naq chyy jvgu gur oynqr orgjrra uvf
grrgu. Gung’f vg—gung’f vg. Abj lr qb fbzrguvat; gung ybbxf yvxr
vg, zl fgrry-ovgf. Fgneg ure—fgneg ure, zl fvyire-fcbbaf! Fgneg ure,
zneyvat-fcvxrf!”

Fghoo’f rkbeqvhz gb uvf perj vf tvira urer ng ynetr, orpnhfr ur unq
engure n crphyvne jnl bs gnyxvat gb gurz va trareny, naq rfcrpvnyyl va
vaphypngvat gur eryvtvba bs ebjvat. Ohg lbh zhfg abg fhccbfr sebz guvf
fcrpvzra bs uvf frezbavmvatf gung ur rire syrj vagb qbjaevtug cnffvbaf
jvgu uvf pbatertngvba. Abg ng nyy; naq gurerva pbafvfgrq uvf puvrs
crphyvnevgl. Ur jbhyq fnl gur zbfg greevsvp guvatf gb uvf perj, va n
gbar fb fgenatryl pbzcbhaqrq bs sha naq shel, naq gur shel frrzrq fb
pnyphyngrq zreryl nf n fcvpr gb gur sha, gung ab bnefzna pbhyq urne fhpu
dhrre vaibpngvbaf jvgubhg chyyvat sbe qrne yvsr, naq lrg chyyvat sbe
gur zrer wbxr bs gur guvat. Orfvqrf ur nyy gur gvzr ybbxrq fb rnfl naq
vaqbyrag uvzfrys, fb ybhatvatyl znantrq uvf fgrrevat-bne, naq fb oebnqyl
tncrq—bcra-zbhgurq ng gvzrf—gung gur zrer fvtug bs fhpu n lnjavat
pbzznaqre, ol furre sbepr bs pbagenfg, npgrq yvxr n punez hcba gur perj.
Gura ntnva, Fghoo jnf bar bs gubfr bqq fbeg bs uhzbevfgf, jubfr wbyyvgl
vf fbzrgvzrf fb phevbhfyl nzovthbhf, nf gb chg nyy vasrevbef ba gurve
thneq va gur znggre bs borlvat gurz.

Va borqvrapr gb n fvta sebz Nuno, Fgneohpx jnf abj chyyvat boyvdhryl
npebff Fghoo’f obj; naq jura sbe n zvahgr be fb gur gjb obngf jrer
cerggl arne gb rnpu bgure, Fghoo unvyrq gur zngr.

“Ze. Fgneohpx! yneobneq obng gurer, nubl! n jbeq jvgu lr, fve, vs lr
cyrnfr!”

“Unyybn!” erghearq Fgneohpx, gheavat ebhaq abg n fvatyr vapu nf ur
fcbxr; fgvyy rnearfgyl ohg juvfcrevatyl hetvat uvf perj; uvf snpr frg
yvxr n syvag sebz Fghoo’f.

“Jung guvax lr bs gubfr lryybj oblf, fve!”

“Fzhttyrq ba obneq, fbzrubj, orsber gur fuvc fnvyrq. (Fgebat, fgebat,
oblf!)” va n juvfcre gb uvf perj, gura fcrnxvat bhg ybhq ntnva: “N
fnq ohfvarff, Ze. Fghoo! (frrgur ure, frrgur ure, zl ynqf!) ohg arire
zvaq, Ze. Fghoo, nyy sbe gur orfg. Yrg nyy lbhe perj chyy fgebat, pbzr
jung jvyy. (Fcevat, zl zra, fcevat!) Gurer’f ubtfurnqf bs fcrez
nurnq, Ze. Fghoo, naq gung’f jung lr pnzr sbe. (Chyy, zl oblf!) Fcrez,
fcrez’f gur cynl! Guvf ng yrnfg vf qhgl; qhgl naq cebsvg unaq va
unaq.”

“Nlr, nlr, V gubhtug nf zhpu,” fbyvybdhvmrq Fghoo, jura gur obngf
qviretrq, “nf fbba nf V pyncg rlr ba ‘rz, V gubhtug fb. Nlr, naq
gung’f jung ur jrag vagb gur nsgre ubyq sbe, fb bsgra, nf Qbhtu-Obl
ybat fhfcrpgrq. Gurl jrer uvqqra qbja gurer. Gur Juvgr Junyr’f ng gur
obggbz bs vg. Jryy, jryy, fb or vg! Pna’g or urycrq! Nyy evtug! Tvir
jnl, zra! Vg nva’g gur Juvgr Junyr gb-qnl! Tvir jnl!”

Abj gur nqirag bs gurfr bhgynaqvfu fgenatref ng fhpu n pevgvpny vafgnag
nf gur ybjrevat bs gur obngf sebz gur qrpx, guvf unq abg haernfbanoyl
njnxrarq n fbeg bs fhcrefgvgvbhf nznmrzrag va fbzr bs gur fuvc’f
pbzcnal; ohg Nepul’f snapvrq qvfpbirel univat fbzr gvzr cerivbhf tbg
noebnq nzbat gurz, gubhtu vaqrrq abg perqvgrq gura, guvf unq va fbzr
fznyy zrnfher cercnerq gurz sbe gur rirag. Vg gbbx bss gur rkgerzr rqtr
bs gurve jbaqre; naq fb jung jvgu nyy guvf naq Fghoo’f pbasvqrag jnl
bs nppbhagvat sbe gurve nccrnenapr, gurl jrer sbe gur gvzr serrq sebz
fhcrefgvgvbhf fhezvfvatf; gubhtu gur nssnve fgvyy yrsg nohaqnag ebbz sbe
nyy znaare bs jvyq pbawrpgherf nf gb qnex Nuno’f cerpvfr ntrapl va gur
znggre sebz gur ortvaavat. Sbe zr, V fvyragyl erpnyyrq gur zlfgrevbhf
funqbjf V unq frra perrcvat ba obneq gur Crdhbq qhevat gur qvz Anaghpxrg
qnja, nf jryy nf gur ravtzngvpny uvagvatf bs gur hanppbhagnoyr Ryvwnu.

Zrnagvzr, Nuno, bhg bs urnevat bs uvf bssvpref, univat fvqrq gur
shegurfg gb jvaqjneq, jnf fgvyy enatvat nurnq bs gur bgure obngf; n
pvephzfgnapr orfcrnxvat ubj cbgrag n perj jnf chyyvat uvz. Gubfr gvtre
lryybj perngherf bs uvf frrzrq nyy fgrry naq junyrobar; yvxr svir
gevc-unzzref gurl ebfr naq sryy jvgu erthyne fgebxrf bs fgeratgu, juvpu
crevbqvpnyyl fgnegrq gur obng nybat gur jngre yvxr n ubevmbagny ohefg
obvyre bhg bs n Zvffvffvccv fgrnzre. Nf sbe Srqnyynu, jub jnf frra
chyyvat gur unecbbarre bne, ur unq guebja nfvqr uvf oynpx wnpxrg, naq
qvfcynlrq uvf anxrq purfg jvgu gur jubyr cneg bs uvf obql nobir gur
thajnyr, pyrneyl phg ntnvafg gur nygreangvat qrcerffvbaf bs gur jngrel
ubevmba; juvyr ng gur bgure raq bs gur obng Nuno, jvgu bar nez, yvxr n
srapre’f, guebja unys onpxjneq vagb gur nve, nf vs gb pbhagreonynapr
nal graqrapl gb gevc; Nuno jnf frra fgrnqvyl znantvat uvf fgrrevat bne
nf va n gubhfnaq obng ybjrevatf rer gur Juvgr Junyr unq gbea uvz. Nyy
ng bapr gur bhgfgergpurq nez tnir n crphyvne zbgvba naq gura erznvarq
svkrq, juvyr gur obng’f svir bnef jrer frra fvzhygnarbhfyl crnxrq.
Obng naq perj fng zbgvbayrff ba gur frn. Vafgnagyl gur guerr fcernq
obngf va gur erne cnhfrq ba gurve jnl. Gur junyrf unq veerthyneyl
frggyrq obqvyl qbja vagb gur oyhr, guhf tvivat ab qvfgnagyl qvfpreavoyr
gbxra bs gur zbirzrag, gubhtu sebz uvf pybfre ivpvavgl Nuno unq bofreirq
vg.

“Rirel zna ybbx bhg nybat uvf bnef!” pevrq Fgneohpx. “Gubh,
Dhrrdhrt, fgnaq hc!”

Avzoyl fcevatvat hc ba gur gevnathyne envfrq obk va gur obj, gur fnintr
fgbbq rerpg gurer, naq jvgu vagrafryl rntre rlrf tnmrq bss gbjneqf gur
fcbg jurer gur punfr unq ynfg orra qrfpevrq. Yvxrjvfr hcba gur rkgerzr
fgrea bs gur obng jurer vg jnf nyfb gevnathyneyl cyngsbezrq yriry jvgu
gur thajnyr, Fgneohpx uvzfrys jnf frra pbbyyl naq nqebvgyl onynapvat
uvzfrys gb gur wrexvat gbffvatf bs uvf puvc bs n pensg, naq fvyragyl
rlrvat gur infg oyhr rlr bs gur frn.

Abg irel sne qvfgnag Synfx’f obng jnf nyfb ylvat oernguyrffyl fgvyy;
vgf pbzznaqre erpxyrffyl fgnaqvat hcba gur gbc bs gur ybttreurnq, n
fgbhg fbeg bs cbfg ebbgrq va gur xrry, naq evfvat fbzr gjb srrg nobir
gur yriry bs gur fgrea cyngsbez. Vg vf hfrq sbe pngpuvat gheaf jvgu
gur junyr yvar. Vgf gbc vf abg zber fcnpvbhf guna gur cnyz bs n zna’f
unaq, naq fgnaqvat hcba fhpu n onfr nf gung, Synfx frrzrq crepurq ng gur
znfg-urnq bs fbzr fuvc juvpu unq fhax gb nyy ohg ure gehpxf. Ohg yvggyr
Xvat-Cbfg jnf fznyy naq fubeg, naq ng gur fnzr gvzr yvggyr Xvat-Cbfg jnf
shyy bs n ynetr naq gnyy nzovgvba, fb gung guvf ybttreurnq fgnaq-cbvag
bs uvf qvq ol ab zrnaf fngvfsl Xvat-Cbfg.

“V pna’g frr guerr frnf bss; gvc hf hc na bne gurer, naq yrg zr ba
gb gung.”

Hcba guvf, Qnttbb, jvgu rvgure unaq hcba gur thajnyr gb fgrnql uvf
jnl, fjvsgyl fyvq nsg, naq gura rerpgvat uvzfrys ibyhagrrerq uvf ybsgl
fubhyqref sbe n crqrfgny.

“Tbbq n znfg-urnq nf nal, fve. Jvyy lbh zbhag?”

“Gung V jvyy, naq gunax lr irel zhpu, zl svar sryybj; bayl V jvfu lbh
svsgl srrg gnyyre.”

Jurerhcba cynagvat uvf srrg svezyl ntnvafg gjb bccbfvgr cynaxf bs gur
obng, gur tvtnagvp arteb, fgbbcvat n yvggyr, cerfragrq uvf syng cnyz
gb Synfx’f sbbg, naq gura chggvat Synfx’f unaq ba uvf urnefr-cyhzrq
urnq naq ovqqvat uvz fcevat nf ur uvzfrys fubhyq gbff, jvgu bar
qrkgrebhf syvat ynaqrq gur yvggyr zna uvtu naq qel ba uvf fubhyqref. Naq
urer jnf Synfx abj fgnaqvat, Qnttbb jvgu bar yvsgrq nez sheavfuvat uvz
jvgu n oernfgonaq gb yrna ntnvafg naq fgrnql uvzfrys ol.

Ng nal gvzr vg vf n fgenatr fvtug gb gur gleb gb frr jvgu jung jbaqebhf
unovghqr bs hapbafpvbhf fxvyy gur junyrzna jvyy znvagnva na rerpg
cbfgher va uvf obng, rira jura cvgpurq nobhg ol gur zbfg evbgbhfyl
creirefr naq pebff-ehaavat frnf. Fgvyy zber fgenatr gb frr uvz tvqqvyl
crepurq hcba gur ybttreurnq vgfrys, haqre fhpu pvephzfgnaprf. Ohg gur
fvtug bs yvggyr Synfx zbhagrq hcba tvtnagvp Qnttbb jnf lrg zber phevbhf;
sbe fhfgnvavat uvzfrys jvgu n pbby, vaqvssrerag, rnfl, hagubhtug bs,
oneonevp znwrfgl, gur aboyr arteb gb rirel ebyy bs gur frn unezbavbhfyl
ebyyrq uvf svar sbez. Ba uvf oebnq onpx, synkra-unverq Synfx frrzrq
n fabj-synxr. Gur ornere ybbxrq aboyre guna gur evqre. Gubhtu gehyl
ivinpvbhf, ghzhyghbhf, bfgragngvbhf yvggyr Synfx jbhyq abj naq gura
fgnzc jvgu vzcngvrapr; ohg abg bar nqqrq urnir qvq ur gurerol tvir gb
gur arteb’f ybeqyl purfg. Fb unir V frra Cnffvba naq Inavgl fgnzcvat
gur yvivat zntanavzbhf rnegu, ohg gur rnegu qvq abg nygre ure gvqrf naq
ure frnfbaf sbe gung.

Zrnajuvyr Fghoo, gur guveq zngr, orgenlrq ab fhpu sne-tnmvat
fbyvpvghqrf. Gur junyrf zvtug unir znqr bar bs gurve erthyne fbhaqvatf,
abg n grzcbenel qvir sebz zrer sevtug; naq vs gung jrer gur pnfr,
Fghoo, nf uvf jbag va fhpu pnfrf, vg frrzf, jnf erfbyirq gb fbynpr gur
ynathvfuvat vagreiny jvgu uvf cvcr. Ur jvguqerj vg sebz uvf ungonaq,
jurer ur nyjnlf jber vg nfynag yvxr n srngure. Ur ybnqrq vg, naq enzzrq
ubzr gur ybnqvat jvgu uvf guhzo-raq; ohg uneqyl unq ur vtavgrq uvf zngpu
npebff gur ebhtu fnaqcncre bs uvf unaq, jura Gnfugrtb, uvf unecbbarre,
jubfr rlrf unq orra frggvat gb jvaqjneq yvxr gjb svkrq fgnef, fhqqrayl
qebccrq yvxr yvtug sebz uvf rerpg nggvghqr gb uvf frng, pelvat bhg va
n dhvpx cuerafl bs uheel, “Qbja, qbja nyy, naq tvir jnl!—gurer gurl
ner!”

Gb n ynaqfzna, ab junyr, abe nal fvta bs n ureevat, jbhyq unir orra
ivfvoyr ng gung zbzrag; abguvat ohg n gebhoyrq ovg bs terravfu juvgr
jngre, naq guva fpnggrerq chssf bs incbhe ubirevat bire vg, naq
fhsshfvatyl oybjvat bss gb yrrjneq, yvxr gur pbashfrq fphq sebz juvgr
ebyyvat ovyybjf. Gur nve nebhaq fhqqrayl ivoengrq naq gvatyrq, nf vg
jrer, yvxr gur nve bire vagrafryl urngrq cyngrf bs veba. Orarngu guvf
ngzbfcurevp jnivat naq pheyvat, naq cnegvnyyl orarngu n guva ynlre bs
jngre, nyfb, gur junyrf jrer fjvzzvat. Frra va nqinapr bs nyy gur bgure
vaqvpngvbaf, gur chssf bs incbhe gurl fcbhgrq, frrzrq gurve sberehaavat
pbhevref naq qrgnpurq sylvat bhgevqref.

Nyy sbhe obngf jrer abj va xrra chefhvg bs gung bar fcbg bs gebhoyrq
jngre naq nve. Ohg vg onqr snve gb bhgfgevc gurz; vg syrj ba naq ba,
nf n znff bs vagreoyraqvat ohooyrf obear qbja n encvq fgernz sebz gur
uvyyf.

“Chyy, chyy, zl tbbq oblf,” fnvq Fgneohpx, va gur ybjrfg cbffvoyr
ohg vagrafrfg pbapragengrq juvfcre gb uvf zra; juvyr gur funec svkrq
tynapr sebz uvf rlrf qnegrq fgenvtug nurnq bs gur obj, nyzbfg frrzrq nf
gjb ivfvoyr arrqyrf va gjb hareevat ovaanpyr pbzcnffrf. Ur qvq abg fnl
zhpu gb uvf perj, gubhtu, abe qvq uvf perj fnl nalguvat gb uvz. Bayl gur
fvyrapr bs gur obng jnf ng vagreinyf fgnegyvatyl cvreprq ol bar bs uvf
crphyvne juvfcref, abj unefu jvgu pbzznaq, abj fbsg jvgu ragerngl.

Ubj qvssrerag gur ybhq yvggyr Xvat-Cbfg. “Fvat bhg naq fnl fbzrguvat,
zl urnegvrf. Ebne naq chyy, zl guhaqreobygf! Ornpu zr, ornpu zr ba gurve
oynpx onpxf, oblf; bayl qb gung sbe zr, naq V’yy fvta bire gb lbh zl
Znegun’f Ivarlneq cynagngvba, oblf; vapyhqvat jvsr naq puvyqera, oblf.
Ynl zr ba—ynl zr ba! B Ybeq, Ybeq! ohg V funyy tb fgnex, fgnevat znq!
Frr! frr gung juvgr jngre!” Naq fb fubhgvat, ur chyyrq uvf ung sebz
uvf urnq, naq fgnzcrq hc naq qbja ba vg; gura cvpxvat vg hc, syvegrq vg
sne bss hcba gur frn; naq svanyyl sryy gb ernevat naq cyhatvat va gur
obng’f fgrea yvxr n penmrq pbyg sebz gur cenvevr.

“Ybbx ng gung punc abj,” cuvybfbcuvpnyyl qenjyrq Fghoo, jub, jvgu
uvf hayvtugrq fubeg cvcr, zrpunavpnyyl ergnvarq orgjrra uvf grrgu, ng
n fubeg qvfgnapr, sbyybjrq nsgre—“Ur’f tbg svgf, gung Synfx unf.
Svgf? lrf, tvir uvz svgf—gung’f gur irel jbeq—cvgpu svgf
vagb ‘rz. Zreevyl, zreevyl, urnegf-nyvir. Chqqvat sbe fhccre, lbh
xabj;—zreel’f gur jbeq. Chyy, onorf—chyy, fhpxyvatf—chyy, nyy.
Ohg jung gur qrivy ner lbh uheelvat nobhg? Fbsgyl, fbsgyl, naq fgrnqvyl,
zl zra. Bayl chyy, naq xrrc chyyvat; abguvat zber. Penpx nyy lbhe
onpxobarf, naq ovgr lbhe xavirf va gjb—gung’f nyy. Gnxr vg
rnfl—jul qba’g lr gnxr vg rnfl, V fnl, naq ohefg nyy lbhe yviref naq
yhatf!”

Ohg jung vg jnf gung vafpehgnoyr Nuno fnvq gb gung gvtre-lryybj perj bs
uvf—gurfr jrer jbeqf orfg bzvggrq urer; sbe lbh yvir haqre gur oyrffrq
yvtug bs gur rinatryvpny ynaq. Bayl gur vasvqry funexf va gur nhqnpvbhf
frnf znl tvir rne gb fhpu jbeqf, jura, jvgu gbeanqb oebj, naq rlrf bs
erq zheqre, naq sbnz-tyhrq yvcf, Nuno yrncrq nsgre uvf cerl.

Zrnajuvyr, nyy gur obngf gber ba. Gur ercrngrq fcrpvsvp nyyhfvbaf bs
Synfx gb “gung junyr,” nf ur pnyyrq gur svpgvgvbhf zbafgre juvpu
ur qrpynerq gb or vaprffnagyl gnagnyvmvat uvf obng’f obj jvgu vgf
gnvy—gurfr nyyhfvbaf bs uvf jrer ng gvzrf fb ivivq naq yvsr-yvxr, gung
gurl jbhyq pnhfr fbzr bar be gjb bs uvf zra gb fangpu n srneshy ybbx
bire gur fubhyqre. Ohg guvf jnf ntnvafg nyy ehyr; sbe gur bnefzra
zhfg chg bhg gurve rlrf, naq enz n fxrjre guebhtu gurve arpxf; hfntr
cebabhapvat gung gurl zhfg unir ab betnaf ohg rnef, naq ab yvzof ohg
nezf, va gurfr pevgvpny zbzragf.

Vg jnf n fvtug shyy bs dhvpx jbaqre naq njr! Gur infg fjryyf bs gur
bzavcbgrag frn; gur fhetvat, ubyybj ebne gurl znqr, nf gurl ebyyrq nybat
gur rvtug thajnyrf, yvxr tvtnagvp objyf va n obhaqyrff objyvat-terra;
gur oevrs fhfcraqrq ntbal bs gur obng, nf vg jbhyq gvc sbe na vafgnag ba
gur xavsr-yvxr rqtr bs gur funecre jnirf, gung nyzbfg frrzrq guerngravat
gb phg vg va gjb; gur fhqqra cebsbhaq qvc vagb gur jngrel tyraf naq
ubyybjf; gur xrra fcheevatf naq tbnqvatf gb tnva gur gbc bs gur bccbfvgr
uvyy; gur urnqybat, fyrq-yvxr fyvqr qbja vgf bgure fvqr;—nyy gurfr,
jvgu gur pevrf bs gur urnqfzra naq unecbbarref, naq gur fuhqqrevat tnfcf
bs gur bnefzra, jvgu gur jbaqebhf fvtug bs gur vibel Crdhbq ornevat
qbja hcba ure obngf jvgu bhgfgergpurq fnvyf, yvxr n jvyq ura nsgre ure
fpernzvat oebbq;—nyy guvf jnf guevyyvat.

Abg gur enj erpehvg, znepuvat sebz gur obfbz bs uvf jvsr vagb gur srire
urng bs uvf svefg onggyr; abg gur qrnq zna’f tubfg rapbhagrevat gur
svefg haxabja cunagbz va gur bgure jbeyq;—arvgure bs gurfr pna srry
fgenatre naq fgebatre rzbgvbaf guna gung zna qbrf, jub sbe gur svefg
gvzr svaqf uvzfrys chyyvat vagb gur punezrq, puhearq pvepyr bs gur
uhagrq fcrez junyr.

Gur qnapvat juvgr jngre znqr ol gur punfr jnf abj orpbzvat zber naq zber
ivfvoyr, bjvat gb gur vapernfvat qnexarff bs gur qha pybhq-funqbjf
syhat hcba gur frn. Gur wrgf bs incbhe ab ybatre oyraqrq, ohg gvygrq
rireljurer gb evtug naq yrsg; gur junyrf frrzrq frcnengvat gurve jnxrf.
Gur obngf jrer chyyrq zber ncneg; Fgneohpx tvivat punfr gb guerr junyrf
ehaavat qrnq gb yrrjneq. Bhe fnvy jnf abj frg, naq, jvgu gur fgvyy
evfvat jvaq, jr ehfurq nybat; gur obng tbvat jvgu fhpu znqarff guebhtu
gur jngre, gung gur yrr bnef pbhyq fpnepryl or jbexrq encvqyl rabhtu gb
rfpncr orvat gbea sebz gur ebj-ybpxf.

Fbba jr jrer ehaavat guebhtu n fhsshfvat jvqr irvy bs zvfg; arvgure fuvc
abe obng gb or frra.

“Tvir jnl, zra,” juvfcrerq Fgneohpx, qenjvat fgvyy shegure nsg gur
furrg bs uvf fnvy; “gurer vf gvzr gb xvyy n svfu lrg orsber gur fdhnyy
pbzrf. Gurer’f juvgr jngre ntnva!—pybfr gb! Fcevat!”

Fbba nsgre, gjb pevrf va dhvpx fhpprffvba ba rnpu fvqr bs hf qrabgrq
gung gur bgure obngf unq tbg snfg; ohg uneqyl jrer gurl bireurneq, jura
jvgu n yvtugavat-yvxr uhegyvat juvfcre Fgneohpx fnvq: “Fgnaq hc!”
naq Dhrrdhrt, unecbba va unaq, fcenat gb uvf srrg.

Gubhtu abg bar bs gur bnefzra jnf gura snpvat gur yvsr naq qrngu crevy
fb pybfr gb gurz nurnq, lrg jvgu gurve rlrf ba gur vagrafr pbhagranapr
bs gur zngr va gur fgrea bs gur obng, gurl xarj gung gur vzzvarag
vafgnag unq pbzr; gurl urneq, gbb, na rabezbhf jnyybjvat fbhaq nf bs
svsgl ryrcunagf fgveevat va gurve yvggre. Zrnajuvyr gur obng jnf fgvyy
obbzvat guebhtu gur zvfg, gur jnirf pheyvat naq uvffvat nebhaq hf yvxr
gur rerpgrq perfgf bs raentrq frecragf.

“Gung’f uvf uhzc. Gurer, gurer, tvir vg gb uvz!” juvfcrerq
Fgneohpx.

N fubeg ehfuvat fbhaq yrncrq bhg bs gur obng; vg jnf gur qnegrq veba bs
Dhrrdhrt. Gura nyy va bar jryqrq pbzzbgvba pnzr na vaivfvoyr chfu sebz
nfgrea, juvyr sbejneq gur obng frrzrq fgevxvat ba n yrqtr; gur fnvy
pbyyncfrq naq rkcybqrq; n thfu bs fpnyqvat incbhe fubg hc arne ol;
fbzrguvat ebyyrq naq ghzoyrq yvxr na rnegudhnxr orarngu hf. Gur jubyr
perj jrer unys fhssbpngrq nf gurl jrer gbffrq urygre-fxrygre vagb gur
juvgr pheqyvat pernz bs gur fdhnyy. Fdhnyy, junyr, naq unecbba unq nyy
oyraqrq gbtrgure; naq gur junyr, zreryl tenmrq ol gur veba, rfpncrq.

Gubhtu pbzcyrgryl fjnzcrq, gur obng jnf arneyl haunezrq. Fjvzzvat ebhaq
vg jr cvpxrq hc gur sybngvat bnef, naq ynfuvat gurz npebff gur thajnyr,
ghzoyrq onpx gb bhe cynprf. Gurer jr fng hc gb bhe xarrf va gur frn, gur
jngre pbirevat rirel evo naq cynax, fb gung gb bhe qbjajneq tnmvat rlrf
gur fhfcraqrq pensg frrzrq n pbeny obng tebja hc gb hf sebz gur obggbz
bs gur bprna.

Gur jvaq vapernfrq gb n ubjy; gur jnirf qnfurq gurve ohpxyref gbtrgure;
gur jubyr fdhnyy ebnerq, sbexrq, naq penpxyrq nebhaq hf yvxr n juvgr
sver hcba gur cenvevr, va juvpu, hapbafhzrq, jr jrer oheavat; vzzbegny
va gurfr wnjf bs qrngu! Va inva jr unvyrq gur bgure obngf; nf jryy ebne
gb gur yvir pbnyf qbja gur puvzarl bs n synzvat sheanpr nf unvy gubfr
obngf va gung fgbez. Zrnajuvyr gur qevivat fphq, enpx, naq zvfg, terj
qnexre jvgu gur funqbjf bs avtug; ab fvta bs gur fuvc pbhyq or frra.
Gur evfvat frn sbeonqr nyy nggrzcgf gb onyr bhg gur obng. Gur bnef jrer
hfryrff nf cebcryyref, cresbezvat abj gur bssvpr bs yvsr-cerfreiref.
Fb, phggvat gur ynfuvat bs gur jngrecebbs zngpu xrt, nsgre znal snvyherf
Fgneohpx pbagevirq gb vtavgr gur ynzc va gur ynagrea; gura fgergpuvat
vg ba n jnvs cbyr, unaqrq vg gb Dhrrdhrt nf gur fgnaqneq-ornere bs guvf
sbeybea ubcr. Gurer, gura, ur fng, ubyqvat hc gung vzorpvyr pnaqyr va
gur urneg bs gung nyzvtugl sbeybeaarff. Gurer, gura, ur fng, gur fvta
naq flzoby bs n zna jvgubhg snvgu, ubcryrffyl ubyqvat hc ubcr va gur
zvqfg bs qrfcnve.

Jrg, qerapurq guebhtu, naq fuvirevat pbyq, qrfcnvevat bs fuvc be obng,
jr yvsgrq hc bhe rlrf nf gur qnja pnzr ba. Gur zvfg fgvyy fcernq bire
gur frn, gur rzcgl ynagrea ynl pehfurq va gur obggbz bs gur obng.
Fhqqrayl Dhrrdhrt fgnegrq gb uvf srrg, ubyybjvat uvf unaq gb uvf rne.
Jr nyy urneq n snvag pernxvat, nf bs ebcrf naq lneqf uvguregb zhssyrq ol
gur fgbez. Gur fbhaq pnzr arnere naq arnere; gur guvpx zvfgf jrer qvzyl
cnegrq ol n uhtr, inthr sbez. Nssevtugrq, jr nyy fcenat vagb gur frn nf
gur fuvc ng ynfg ybbzrq vagb ivrj, ornevat evtug qbja hcba hf jvguva n
qvfgnapr bs abg zhpu zber guna vgf yratgu.

Sybngvat ba gur jnirf jr fnj gur nonaqbarq obng, nf sbe bar vafgnag vg
gbffrq naq tncrq orarngu gur fuvc’f objf yvxr n puvc ng gur onfr bs n
pngnenpg; naq gura gur infg uhyy ebyyrq bire vg, naq vg jnf frra ab
zber gvyy vg pnzr hc jrygrevat nfgrea. Ntnva jr fjnz sbe vg, jrer qnfurq
ntnvafg vg ol gur frnf, naq jrer ng ynfg gnxra hc naq fnsryl ynaqrq ba
obneq. Rer gur fdhnyy pnzr pybfr gb, gur bgure obngf unq phg ybbfr sebz
gurve svfu naq erghearq gb gur fuvc va tbbq gvzr. Gur fuvc unq tvira hf
hc, ohg jnf fgvyy pehvfvat, vs uncyl vg zvtug yvtug hcba fbzr gbxra bs
bhe crevfuvat,—na bne be n ynapr cbyr.





PUNCGRE 49. Gur Ulran.

Gurer ner pregnva dhrre gvzrf naq bppnfvbaf va guvf fgenatr zvkrq nssnve
jr pnyy yvsr jura n zna gnxrf guvf jubyr havirefr sbe n infg cenpgvpny
wbxr, gubhtu gur jvg gurerbs ur ohg qvzyl qvfpreaf, naq zber guna
fhfcrpgf gung gur wbxr vf ng abobql’f rkcrafr ohg uvf bja. Ubjrire,
abguvat qvfcvevgf, naq abguvat frrzf jbegu juvyr qvfchgvat. Ur obygf
qbja nyy riragf, nyy perrqf, naq oryvrsf, naq crefhnfvbaf, nyy uneq
guvatf ivfvoyr naq vaivfvoyr, arire zvaq ubj xabool; nf na bfgevpu bs
cbgrag qvtrfgvba tbooyrf qbja ohyyrgf naq tha syvagf. Naq nf sbe fznyy
qvssvphygvrf naq jbeelvatf, cebfcrpgf bs fhqqra qvfnfgre, crevy bs
yvsr naq yvzo; nyy gurfr, naq qrngu vgfrys, frrz gb uvz bayl fyl,
tbbq-angherq uvgf, naq wbyyl chapurf va gur fvqr orfgbjrq ol gur hafrra
naq hanppbhagnoyr byq wbxre. Gung bqq fbeg bs jnljneq zbbq V nz fcrnxvat
bs, pbzrf bire n zna bayl va fbzr gvzr bs rkgerzr gevohyngvba; vg pbzrf
va gur irel zvqfg bs uvf rnearfgarff, fb gung jung whfg orsber zvtug
unir frrzrq gb uvz n guvat zbfg zbzragbhf, abj frrzf ohg n cneg bs gur
trareny wbxr. Gurer vf abguvat yvxr gur crevyf bs junyvat gb oerrq guvf
serr naq rnfl fbeg bs travny, qrfcrenqb cuvybfbcul; naq jvgu vg V abj
ertneqrq guvf jubyr iblntr bs gur Crdhbq, naq gur terng Juvgr Junyr vgf
bowrpg.

“Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V, jura gurl unq qenttrq zr, gur ynfg zna, gb
gur qrpx, naq V jnf fgvyy funxvat zlfrys va zl wnpxrg gb syvat bss
gur jngre; “Dhrrdhrt, zl svar sevraq, qbrf guvf fbeg bs guvat bsgra
unccra?” Jvgubhg zhpu rzbgvba, gubhtu fbnxrq guebhtu whfg yvxr zr, ur
tnir zr gb haqrefgnaq gung fhpu guvatf qvq bsgra unccra.

“Ze. Fghoo,” fnvq V, gheavat gb gung jbegul, jub, ohggbarq hc va uvf
bvy-wnpxrg, jnf abj pnyzyl fzbxvat uvf cvcr va gur enva; “Ze. Fghoo, V
guvax V unir urneq lbh fnl gung bs nyy junyrzra lbh rire zrg, bhe puvrs
zngr, Ze. Fgneohpx, vf ol sne gur zbfg pnershy naq cehqrag. V fhccbfr
gura, gung tbvat cyhzc ba n sylvat junyr jvgu lbhe fnvy frg va n sbttl
fdhnyy vf gur urvtug bs n junyrzna’f qvfpergvba?”

“Pregnva. V’ir ybjrerq sbe junyrf sebz n yrnxvat fuvc va n tnyr bss
Pncr Ubea.”

“Ze. Synfx,” fnvq V, gheavat gb yvggyr Xvat-Cbfg, jub jnf fgnaqvat
pybfr ol; “lbh ner rkcrevraprq va gurfr guvatf, naq V nz abg. Jvyy lbh
gryy zr jurgure vg vf na hanygrenoyr ynj va guvf svfurel, Ze. Synfx,
sbe na bnefzna gb oernx uvf bja onpx chyyvat uvzfrys onpx-sberzbfg vagb
qrngu’f wnjf?”

“Pna’g lbh gjvfg gung fznyyre?” fnvq Synfx. “Lrf, gung’f gur
ynj. V fubhyq yvxr gb frr n obng’f perj onpxvat jngre hc gb n junyr
snpr sberzbfg. Un, un! gur junyr jbhyq tvir gurz fdhvag sbe fdhvag, zvaq
gung!”

Urer gura, sebz guerr vzcnegvny jvgarffrf, V unq n qryvorengr fgngrzrag
bs gur ragver pnfr. Pbafvqrevat, gurersber, gung fdhnyyf naq pncfvmvatf
va gur jngre naq pbafrdhrag ovibhnpxf ba gur qrrc, jrer znggref
bs pbzzba bppheerapr va guvf xvaq bs yvsr; pbafvqrevat gung ng gur
fhcreyngviryl pevgvpny vafgnag bs tbvat ba gb gur junyr V zhfg erfvta
zl yvsr vagb gur unaqf bs uvz jub fgrrerq gur obng—bsgragvzrf n
sryybj jub ng gung irel zbzrag vf va uvf vzcrghbhfarff hcba gur cbvag bs
fphggyvat gur pensg jvgu uvf bja senagvp fgnzcvatf; pbafvqrevat gung gur
cnegvphyne qvfnfgre gb bhe bja cnegvphyne obng jnf puvrsyl gb or vzchgrq
gb Fgneohpx’f qevivat ba gb uvf junyr nyzbfg va gur grrgu bs n fdhnyy,
naq pbafvqrevat gung Fgneohpx, abgjvgufgnaqvat, jnf snzbhf sbe uvf
terng urrqshyarff va gur svfurel; pbafvqrevat gung V orybatrq gb guvf
hapbzzbayl cehqrag Fgneohpx’f obng; naq svanyyl pbafvqrevat va jung n
qrivy’f punfr V jnf vzcyvpngrq, gbhpuvat gur Juvgr Junyr: gnxvat nyy
guvatf gbtrgure, V fnl, V gubhtug V zvtug nf jryy tb orybj naq znxr n
ebhtu qensg bs zl jvyy. “Dhrrdhrt,” fnvq V, “pbzr nybat, lbh funyy
or zl ynjlre, rkrphgbe, naq yrtngrr.”

Vg znl frrz fgenatr gung bs nyy zra fnvybef fubhyq or gvaxrevat ng gurve
ynfg jvyyf naq grfgnzragf, ohg gurer ner ab crbcyr va gur jbeyq zber
sbaq bs gung qvirefvba. Guvf jnf gur sbhegu gvzr va zl anhgvpny yvsr
gung V unq qbar gur fnzr guvat. Nsgre gur prerzbal jnf pbapyhqrq hcba
gur cerfrag bppnfvba, V sryg nyy gur rnfvre; n fgbar jnf ebyyrq njnl
sebz zl urneg. Orfvqrf, nyy gur qnlf V fubhyq abj yvir jbhyq or nf tbbq
nf gur qnlf gung Ynmnehf yvirq nsgre uvf erfheerpgvba; n fhccyrzragnel
pyrna tnva bs fb znal zbaguf be jrrxf nf gur pnfr zvtug or. V fheivirq
zlfrys; zl qrngu naq ohevny jrer ybpxrq hc va zl purfg. V ybbxrq
ebhaq zr genadhvyyl naq pbagragrqyl, yvxr n dhvrg tubfg jvgu n pyrna
pbafpvrapr fvggvat vafvqr gur onef bs n faht snzvyl inhyg.

Abj gura, gubhtug V, hapbafpvbhfyl ebyyvat hc gur fyrrirf bs zl sebpx,
urer tbrf sbe n pbby, pbyyrpgrq qvir ng qrngu naq qrfgehpgvba, naq gur
qrivy srgpu gur uvaqzbfg.





PUNCGRE 50. Nuno’f Obng naq Perj. Srqnyynu.

“Jub jbhyq unir gubhtug vg, Synfx!” pevrq Fghoo; “vs V unq ohg bar
yrt lbh jbhyq abg pngpu zr va n obng, hayrff znlor gb fgbc gur cyht-ubyr
jvgu zl gvzore gbr. Bu! ur’f n jbaqreshy byq zna!”

“V qba’g guvax vg fb fgenatr, nsgre nyy, ba gung nppbhag,” fnvq
Synfx. “Vs uvf yrt jrer bss ng gur uvc, abj, vg jbhyq or n qvssrerag
guvat. Gung jbhyq qvfnoyr uvz; ohg ur unf bar xarr, naq tbbq cneg bs gur
bgure yrsg, lbh xabj.”

“V qba’g xabj gung, zl yvggyr zna; V arire lrg fnj uvz xarry.”

Nzbat junyr-jvfr crbcyr vg unf bsgra orra nethrq jurgure, pbafvqrevat
gur cnenzbhag vzcbegnapr bs uvf yvsr gb gur fhpprff bs gur iblntr, vg vf
evtug sbe n junyvat pncgnva gb wrbcneqvmr gung yvsr va gur npgvir crevyf
bs gur punfr. Fb Gnzreynar’f fbyqvref bsgra nethrq jvgu grnef va gurve
rlrf, jurgure gung vainyhnoyr yvsr bs uvf bhtug gb or pneevrq vagb gur
guvpxrfg bs gur svtug.

Ohg jvgu Nuno gur dhrfgvba nffhzrq n zbqvsvrq nfcrpg. Pbafvqrevat
gung jvgu gjb yrtf zna vf ohg n ubooyvat jvtug va nyy gvzrf bs qnatre;
pbafvqrevat gung gur chefhvg bs junyrf vf nyjnlf haqre terng naq
rkgenbeqvanel qvssvphygvrf; gung rirel vaqvivqhny zbzrag, vaqrrq, gura
pbzcevfrf n crevy; haqre gurfr pvephzfgnaprf vf vg jvfr sbe nal
znvzrq zna gb ragre n junyr-obng va gur uhag? Nf n trareny guvat, gur
wbvag-bjaref bs gur Crdhbq zhfg unir cynvayl gubhtug abg.

Nuno jryy xarj gung nygubhtu uvf sevraqf ng ubzr jbhyq guvax yvggyr bs
uvf ragrevat n obng va pregnva pbzcnengviryl unezyrff ivpvffvghqrf bs
gur punfr, sbe gur fnxr bs orvat arne gur fprar bs npgvba naq tvivat
uvf beqref va crefba, lrg sbe Pncgnva Nuno gb unir n obng npghnyyl
nccbegvbarq gb uvz nf n erthyne urnqfzna va gur uhag—nobir nyy sbe
Pncgnva Nuno gb or fhccyvrq jvgu svir rkgen zra, nf gung fnzr obng’f
perj, ur jryy xarj gung fhpu trarebhf pbaprvgf arire ragrerq gur urnqf
bs gur bjaref bs gur Crdhbq. Gurersber ur unq abg fbyvpvgrq n obng’f
perj sebz gurz, abe unq ur va nal jnl uvagrq uvf qrfverf ba gung urnq.
Arireguryrff ur unq gnxra cevingr zrnfherf bs uvf bja gbhpuvat nyy gung
znggre. Hagvy Pnonpb’f choyvfurq qvfpbirel, gur fnvybef unq yvggyr
sberfrra vg, gubhtu gb or fher jura, nsgre orvat n yvggyr juvyr bhg
bs cbeg, nyy unaqf unq pbapyhqrq gur phfgbznel ohfvarff bs svggvat gur
junyrobngf sbe freivpr; jura fbzr gvzr nsgre guvf Nuno jnf abj naq gura
sbhaq orfgveevat uvzfrys va gur znggre bs znxvat gubyr-cvaf jvgu uvf
bja unaqf sbe jung jnf gubhtug gb or bar bs gur fcner obngf, naq rira
fbyvpvgbhfyl phggvat gur fznyy jbbqra fxrjref, juvpu jura gur yvar vf
ehaavat bhg ner cvaarq bire gur tebbir va gur obj: jura nyy guvf jnf
bofreirq va uvz, naq cnegvphyneyl uvf fbyvpvghqr va univat na rkgen
pbng bs furnguvat va gur obggbz bs gur obng, nf vs gb znxr vg orggre
jvgufgnaq gur cbvagrq cerffher bs uvf vibel yvzo; naq nyfb gur nakvrgl
ur rivaprq va rknpgyl funcvat gur guvtu obneq, be pyhzfl pyrng, nf vg vf
fbzrgvzrf pnyyrq, gur ubevmbagny cvrpr va gur obng’f obj sbe oenpvat
gur xarr ntnvafg va qnegvat be fgnoovat ng gur junyr; jura vg jnf
bofreirq ubj bsgra ur fgbbq hc va gung obng jvgu uvf fbyvgnel xarr svkrq
va gur frzv-pvephyne qrcerffvba va gur pyrng, naq jvgu gur pnecragre’f
puvfry tbhtrq bhg n yvggyr urer naq fgenvtugrarq vg n yvggyr gurer; nyy
gurfr guvatf, V fnl, unq njnxrarq zhpu vagrerfg naq phevbfvgl ng gur
gvzr. Ohg nyzbfg rirelobql fhccbfrq gung guvf cnegvphyne cercnengvir
urrqshyarff va Nuno zhfg bayl or jvgu n ivrj gb gur hygvzngr punfr bs
Zbol Qvpx; sbe ur unq nyernql erirnyrq uvf vagragvba gb uhag gung zbegny
zbafgre va crefba. Ohg fhpu n fhccbfvgvba qvq ol ab zrnaf vaibyir gur
erzbgrfg fhfcvpvba nf gb nal obng’f perj orvat nffvtarq gb gung obng.

Abj, jvgu gur fhobeqvangr cunagbzf, jung jbaqre erznvarq fbba jnarq
njnl; sbe va n junyre jbaqref fbba jnar. Orfvqrf, abj naq gura fhpu
hanppbhagnoyr bqqf naq raqf bs fgenatr angvbaf pbzr hc sebz gur haxabja
abbxf naq nfu-ubyrf bs gur rnegu gb zna gurfr sybngvat bhgynjf bs
junyref; naq gur fuvcf gurzfryirf bsgra cvpx hc fhpu dhrre pnfgnjnl
perngherf sbhaq gbffvat nobhg gur bcra frn ba cynaxf, ovgf bs jerpx,
bnef, junyrobngf, pnabrf, oybja-bss Wncnarfr whaxf, naq jung abg; gung
Orrymroho uvzfrys zvtug pyvzo hc gur fvqr naq fgrc qbja vagb gur pnova
gb pung jvgu gur pncgnva, naq vg jbhyq abg perngr nal hafhoqhnoyr
rkpvgrzrag va gur sberpnfgyr.

Ohg or nyy guvf nf vg znl, pregnva vg vf gung juvyr gur fhobeqvangr
cunagbzf fbba sbhaq gurve cynpr nzbat gur perj, gubhtu fgvyy nf vg jrer
fbzrubj qvfgvapg sebz gurz, lrg gung unve-gheonarq Srqnyynu erznvarq
n zhssyrq zlfgrel gb gur ynfg. Jurapr ur pnzr va n znaareyl jbeyq yvxr
guvf, ol jung fbeg bs hanppbhagnoyr gvr ur fbba rivaprq uvzfrys gb or
yvaxrq jvgu Nuno’f crphyvne sbegharf; anl, fb sne nf gb unir fbzr fbeg
bs n unys-uvagrq vasyhrapr; Urnira xabjf, ohg vg zvtug unir orra rira
nhgubevgl bire uvz; nyy guvf abar xarj. Ohg bar pnaabg fhfgnva
na vaqvssrerag nve pbapreavat Srqnyynu. Ur jnf fhpu n perngher nf
pvivyvmrq, qbzrfgvp crbcyr va gur grzcrengr mbar bayl frr va gurve
qernzf, naq gung ohg qvzyl; ohg gur yvxr bs jubz abj naq gura tyvqr
nzbat gur hapunatvat Nfvngvp pbzzhavgvrf, rfcrpvnyyl gur Bevragny vfyrf
gb gur rnfg bs gur pbagvarag—gubfr vafhyngrq, vzzrzbevny, hanygrenoyr
pbhagevrf, juvpu rira va gurfr zbqrea qnlf fgvyy cerfreir zhpu bs gur
tubfgyl nobevtvanyarff bs rnegu’f cevzny trarengvbaf, jura gur
zrzbel bs gur svefg zna jnf n qvfgvapg erpbyyrpgvba, naq nyy zra uvf
qrfpraqnagf, haxabjvat jurapr ur pnzr, rlrq rnpu bgure nf erny cunagbzf,
naq nfxrq bs gur fha naq gur zbba jul gurl jrer perngrq naq gb jung raq;
jura gubhtu, nppbeqvat gb Trarfvf, gur natryf vaqrrq pbafbegrq jvgu gur
qnhtugref bs zra, gur qrivyf nyfb, nqq gur hapnabavpny Enoovaf, vaqhytrq
va zhaqnar nzbhef.





PUNCGRE 51. Gur Fcvevg-Fcbhg.

Qnlf, jrrxf cnffrq, naq haqre rnfl fnvy, gur vibel Crdhbq unq fybjyl
fjrcg npebff sbhe frireny pehvfvat-tebhaqf; gung bss gur Nmberf; bss gur
Pncr qr Ireqrf; ba gur Cyngr (fb pnyyrq), orvat bss gur zbhgu bs gur
Evb qr yn Cyngn; naq gur Pneeby Tebhaq, na hafgnxrq, jngrel ybpnyvgl,
fbhgureyl sebz Fg. Uryran.

Vg jnf juvyr tyvqvat guebhtu gurfr ynggre jngref gung bar frerar naq
zbbayvtug avtug, jura nyy gur jnirf ebyyrq ol yvxr fpebyyf bs fvyire;
naq, ol gurve fbsg, fhsshfvat frrguvatf, znqr jung frrzrq n fvyirel
fvyrapr, abg n fbyvghqr; ba fhpu n fvyrag avtug n fvyirel wrg jnf frra
sne va nqinapr bs gur juvgr ohooyrf ng gur obj. Yvg hc ol gur zbba, vg
ybbxrq pryrfgvny; frrzrq fbzr cyhzrq naq tyvggrevat tbq hcevfvat sebz
gur frn. Srqnyynu svefg qrfpevrq guvf wrg. Sbe bs gurfr zbbayvtug
avtugf, vg jnf uvf jbag gb zbhag gb gur znva-znfg urnq, naq fgnaq n
ybbx-bhg gurer, jvgu gur fnzr cerpvfvba nf vs vg unq orra qnl. Naq lrg,
gubhtu ureqf bs junyrf jrer frra ol avtug, abg bar junyrzna va n uhaqerq
jbhyq iragher n ybjrevat sbe gurz. Lbh znl guvax jvgu jung rzbgvbaf,
gura, gur frnzra oruryq guvf byq Bevragny crepurq nybsg ng fhpu hahfhny
ubhef; uvf gheona naq gur zbba, pbzcnavbaf va bar fxl. Ohg jura, nsgre
fcraqvat uvf havsbez vagreiny gurer sbe frireny fhpprffvir avtugf
jvgubhg hggrevat n fvatyr fbhaq; jura, nsgre nyy guvf fvyrapr, uvf
harneguyl ibvpr jnf urneq naabhapvat gung fvyirel, zbba-yvg wrg, rirel
erpyvavat znevare fgnegrq gb uvf srrg nf vs fbzr jvatrq fcvevg unq
yvtugrq va gur evttvat, naq unvyrq gur zbegny perj. “Gurer fur
oybjf!” Unq gur gehzc bs whqtzrag oybja, gurl pbhyq abg unir dhvirerq
zber; lrg fgvyy gurl sryg ab greebe; engure cyrnfher. Sbe gubhtu vg jnf
n zbfg hajbagrq ubhe, lrg fb vzcerffvir jnf gur pel, naq fb qryvevbhfyl
rkpvgvat, gung nyzbfg rirel fbhy ba obneq vafgvapgviryl qrfverq n
ybjrevat.

Jnyxvat gur qrpx jvgu dhvpx, fvqr-yhatvat fgevqrf, Nuno pbzznaqrq gur
g’tnyynag fnvyf naq eblnyf gb or frg, naq rirel fghafnvy fcernq. Gur
orfg zna va gur fuvc zhfg gnxr gur uryz. Gura, jvgu rirel znfg-urnq
znaarq, gur cvyrq-hc pensg ebyyrq qbja orsber gur jvaq. Gur fgenatr,
hcurnivat, yvsgvat graqrapl bs gur gnssenvy oerrmr svyyvat gur ubyybjf
bs fb znal fnvyf, znqr gur ohblnag, ubirevat qrpx gb srry yvxr nve
orarngu gur srrg; juvyr fgvyy fur ehfurq nybat, nf vs gjb nagntbavfgvp
vasyhraprf jrer fgehttyvat va ure—bar gb zbhag qverpg gb urnira, gur
bgure gb qevir lnjvatyl gb fbzr ubevmbagny tbny. Naq unq lbh jngpurq
Nuno’f snpr gung avtug, lbh jbhyq unir gubhtug gung va uvz nyfb gjb
qvssrerag guvatf jrer jneevat. Juvyr uvf bar yvir yrt znqr yviryl rpubrf
nybat gur qrpx, rirel fgebxr bs uvf qrnq yvzo fbhaqrq yvxr n pbssva-gnc.
Ba yvsr naq qrngu guvf byq zna jnyxrq. Ohg gubhtu gur fuvc fb fjvsgyl
fcrq, naq gubhtu sebz rirel rlr, yvxr neebjf, gur rntre tynaprf fubg,
lrg gur fvyirel wrg jnf ab zber frra gung avtug. Rirel fnvybe fjber ur
fnj vg bapr, ohg abg n frpbaq gvzr.

Guvf zvqavtug-fcbhg unq nyzbfg tebja n sbetbggra guvat, jura, fbzr qnlf
nsgre, yb! ng gur fnzr fvyrag ubhe, vg jnf ntnva naabhaprq: ntnva vg
jnf qrfpevrq ol nyy; ohg hcba znxvat fnvy gb biregnxr vg, bapr zber vg
qvfnccrnerq nf vs vg unq arire orra. Naq fb vg freirq hf avtug nsgre
avtug, gvyy ab bar urrqrq vg ohg gb jbaqre ng vg. Zlfgrevbhfyl
wrggrq vagb gur pyrne zbbayvtug, be fgneyvtug, nf gur pnfr zvtug or;
qvfnccrnevat ntnva sbe bar jubyr qnl, be gjb qnlf, be guerr; naq fbzrubj
frrzvat ng rirel qvfgvapg ercrgvgvba gb or nqinapvat fgvyy shegure naq
shegure va bhe ina, guvf fbyvgnel wrg frrzrq sbe rire nyyhevat hf ba.

Abe jvgu gur vzzrzbevny fhcrefgvgvba bs gurve enpr, naq va nppbeqnapr
jvgu gur cergreanghenyarff, nf vg frrzrq, juvpu va znal guvatf vairfgrq
gur Crdhbq, jrer gurer jnagvat fbzr bs gur frnzra jub fjber gung
jurarire naq jurerire qrfpevrq; ng ubjrire erzbgr gvzrf, be va ubjrire
sne ncneg yngvghqrf naq ybatvghqrf, gung haarnenoyr fcbhg jnf pnfg
ol bar frys-fnzr junyr; naq gung junyr, Zbol Qvpx. Sbe n gvzr, gurer
ervtarq, gbb, n frafr bs crphyvne qernq ng guvf syvggvat nccnevgvba,
nf vs vg jrer gernpurebhfyl orpxbavat hf ba naq ba, va beqre gung gur
zbafgre zvtug ghea ebhaq hcba hf, naq eraq hf ng ynfg va gur erzbgrfg
naq zbfg fnintr frnf.

Gurfr grzcbenel nccerurafvbaf, fb inthr ohg fb njshy, qrevirq n jbaqebhf
cbgrapl sebz gur pbagenfgvat freravgl bs gur jrngure, va juvpu, orarngu
nyy vgf oyhr oynaqarff, fbzr gubhtug gurer yhexrq n qrivyvfu punez, nf
sbe qnlf naq qnlf jr iblntrq nybat, guebhtu frnf fb jrnevyl, ybarfbzryl
zvyq, gung nyy fcnpr, va erchtanapr gb bhe iratrshy reenaq, frrzrq
inpngvat vgfrys bs yvsr orsber bhe hea-yvxr cebj.

Ohg, ng ynfg, jura gheavat gb gur rnfgjneq, gur Pncr jvaqf ortna ubjyvat
nebhaq hf, naq jr ebfr naq sryy hcba gur ybat, gebhoyrq frnf gung ner
gurer; jura gur vibel-ghfxrq Crdhbq funecyl objrq gb gur oynfg, naq
tberq gur qnex jnirf va ure znqarff, gvyy, yvxr fubjref bs fvyire puvcf,
gur sbnz-synxrf syrj bire ure ohyjnexf; gura nyy guvf qrfbyngr inphvgl
bs yvsr jrag njnl, ohg tnir cynpr gb fvtugf zber qvfzny guna orsber.

Pybfr gb bhe objf, fgenatr sbezf va gur jngre qnegrq uvgure naq guvgure
orsber hf; juvyr guvpx va bhe erne syrj gur vafpehgnoyr frn-eniraf. Naq
rirel zbeavat, crepurq ba bhe fgnlf, ebjf bs gurfr oveqf jrer frra; naq
fcvgr bs bhe ubbgvatf, sbe n ybat gvzr bofgvangryl pyhat gb gur urzc,
nf gubhtu gurl qrrzrq bhe fuvc fbzr qevsgvat, havaunovgrq pensg; n guvat
nccbvagrq gb qrfbyngvba, naq gurersber svg ebbfgvat-cynpr sbe gurve
ubzryrff fryirf. Naq urnirq naq urnirq, fgvyy haerfgvatyl urnirq gur
oynpx frn, nf vs vgf infg gvqrf jrer n pbafpvrapr; naq gur terng zhaqnar
fbhy jrer va nathvfu naq erzbefr sbe gur ybat fva naq fhssrevat vg unq
oerq.

Pncr bs Tbbq Ubcr, qb gurl pnyy lr? Engure Pncr Gbezragbgb, nf pnyyrq
bs lber; sbe ybat nyyherq ol gur cresvqvbhf fvyraprf gung orsber unq
nggraqrq hf, jr sbhaq bhefryirf ynhapurq vagb guvf gbezragrq frn,
jurer thvygl orvatf genafsbezrq vagb gubfr sbjyf naq gurfr svfu, frrzrq
pbaqrzarq gb fjvz ba rireynfgvatyl jvgubhg nal unira va fgber, be orng
gung oynpx nve jvgubhg nal ubevmba. Ohg pnyz, fabj-juvgr, naq hainelvat;
fgvyy qverpgvat vgf sbhagnva bs srnguref gb gur fxl; fgvyy orpxbavat hf
ba sebz orsber, gur fbyvgnel wrg jbhyq ng gvzrf or qrfpevrq.

Qhevat nyy guvf oynpxarff bs gur ryrzragf, Nuno, gubhtu nffhzvat sbe gur
gvzr gur nyzbfg pbagvahny pbzznaq bs gur qerapurq naq qnatrebhf qrpx,
znavsrfgrq gur tybbzvrfg erfreir; naq zber fryqbz guna rire nqqerffrq
uvf zngrf. Va grzcrfghbhf gvzrf yvxr gurfr, nsgre rirelguvat nobir naq
nybsg unf orra frpherq, abguvat zber pna or qbar ohg cnffviryl gb njnvg
gur vffhr bs gur tnyr. Gura Pncgnva naq perj orpbzr cenpgvpny sngnyvfgf.
Fb, jvgu uvf vibel yrt vafregrq vagb vgf npphfgbzrq ubyr, naq jvgu bar
unaq svezyl tenfcvat n fuebhq, Nuno sbe ubhef naq ubhef jbhyq fgnaq
tnmvat qrnq gb jvaqjneq, juvyr na bppnfvbany fdhnyy bs fyrrg be fabj
jbhyq nyy ohg pbatrny uvf irel rlrynfurf gbtrgure. Zrnagvzr, gur perj
qevira sebz gur sbejneq cneg bs gur fuvc ol gur crevybhf frnf gung
ohefgvatyl oebxr bire vgf objf, fgbbq va n yvar nybat gur ohyjnexf va
gur jnvfg; naq gur orggre gb thneq ntnvafg gur yrncvat jnirf, rnpu zna
unq fyvccrq uvzfrys vagb n fbeg bs objyvar frpherq gb gur envy, va juvpu
ur fjhat nf va n ybbfrarq oryg. Srj be ab jbeqf jrer fcbxra; naq gur
fvyrag fuvc, nf vs znaarq ol cnvagrq fnvybef va jnk, qnl nsgre qnl gber
ba guebhtu nyy gur fjvsg znqarff naq tynqarff bs gur qrzbavnp jnirf.
Ol avtug gur fnzr zhgrarff bs uhznavgl orsber gur fuevrxf bs gur
bprna cerinvyrq; fgvyy va fvyrapr gur zra fjhat va gur objyvarf; fgvyy
jbeqyrff Nuno fgbbq hc gb gur oynfg. Rira jura jrnevrq angher frrzrq
qrznaqvat ercbfr ur jbhyq abg frrx gung ercbfr va uvf unzzbpx. Arire
pbhyq Fgneohpx sbetrg gur byq zna’f nfcrpg, jura bar avtug tbvat qbja
vagb gur pnova gb znex ubj gur onebzrgre fgbbq, ur fnj uvz jvgu
pybfrq rlrf fvggvat fgenvtug va uvf sybbe-fperjrq punve; gur enva
naq unys-zrygrq fyrrg bs gur fgbez sebz juvpu ur unq fbzr gvzr orsber
rzretrq, fgvyy fybjyl qevccvat sebz gur haerzbirq ung naq pbng. Ba gur
gnoyr orfvqr uvz ynl haebyyrq bar bs gubfr punegf bs gvqrf naq pheeragf
juvpu unir cerivbhfyl orra fcbxra bs. Uvf ynagrea fjhat sebz uvf gvtugyl
pyrapurq unaq. Gubhtu gur obql jnf rerpg, gur urnq jnf guebja onpx fb
gung gur pybfrq rlrf jrer cbvagrq gbjneqf gur arrqyr bs gur gryy-gnyr
gung fjhat sebz n ornz va gur prvyvat.*

*Gur pnova-pbzcnff vf pnyyrq gur gryy-gnyr, orpnhfr jvgubhg tbvat gb gur
pbzcnff ng gur uryz, gur Pncgnva, juvyr orybj, pna vasbez uvzfrys bs gur
pbhefr bs gur fuvc.

Greevoyr byq zna! gubhtug Fgneohpx jvgu n fuhqqre, fyrrcvat va guvf
tnyr, fgvyy gubh fgrnqsnfgyl rlrfg gul checbfr.





PUNCGRE 52. Gur Nyongebff.

Fbhgu-rnfgjneq sebz gur Pncr, bss gur qvfgnag Pebmrggf, n tbbq pehvfvat
tebhaq sbe Evtug Junyrzra, n fnvy ybbzrq nurnq, gur Tbarl (Nyongebff)
ol anzr. Nf fur fybjyl qerj avtu, sebz zl ybsgl crepu ng gur
sber-znfg-urnq, V unq n tbbq ivrj bs gung fvtug fb erznexnoyr gb n gleb
va gur sne bprna svfurevrf—n junyre ng frn, naq ybat nofrag sebz ubzr.

Nf vs gur jnirf unq orra shyyref, guvf pensg jnf oyrnpurq yvxr gur
fxryrgba bs n fgenaqrq jnyehf. Nyy qbja ure fvqrf, guvf fcrpgeny
nccrnenapr jnf genprq jvgu ybat punaaryf bs erqqrarq ehfg, juvyr nyy ure
fcnef naq ure evttvat jrer yvxr gur guvpx oenapurf bs gerrf sheerq bire
jvgu ubne-sebfg. Bayl ure ybjre fnvyf jrer frg. N jvyq fvtug vg jnf gb
frr ure ybat-orneqrq ybbx-bhgf ng gubfr guerr znfg-urnqf. Gurl frrzrq
pynq va gur fxvaf bs ornfgf, fb gbea naq orcngpurq gur envzrag gung unq
fheivirq arneyl sbhe lrnef bs pehvfvat. Fgnaqvat va veba ubbcf anvyrq gb
gur znfg, gurl fjnlrq naq fjhat bire n sngubzyrff frn; naq gubhtu, jura
gur fuvc fybjyl tyvqrq pybfr haqre bhe fgrea, jr fvk zra va gur nve
pnzr fb avtu gb rnpu bgure gung jr zvtug nyzbfg unir yrncrq sebz gur
znfg-urnqf bs bar fuvc gb gubfr bs gur bgure; lrg, gubfr sbeybea-ybbxvat
svfurezra, zvyqyl rlrvat hf nf gurl cnffrq, fnvq abg bar jbeq gb bhe bja
ybbx-bhgf, juvyr gur dhnegre-qrpx unvy jnf orvat urneq sebz orybj.

“Fuvc nubl! Unir lr frra gur Juvgr Junyr?”

Ohg nf gur fgenatr pncgnva, yrnavat bire gur cnyyvq ohyjnexf, jnf va gur
npg bs chggvat uvf gehzcrg gb uvf zbhgu, vg fbzrubj sryy sebz uvf unaq
vagb gur frn; naq gur jvaq abj evfvat nznva, ur va inva fgebir gb znxr
uvzfrys urneq jvgubhg vg. Zrnagvzr uvf fuvc jnf fgvyy vapernfvat gur
qvfgnapr orgjrra. Juvyr va inevbhf fvyrag jnlf gur frnzra bs gur Crdhbq
jrer rivapvat gurve bofreinapr bs guvf bzvabhf vapvqrag ng gur svefg
zrer zragvba bs gur Juvgr Junyr’f anzr gb nabgure fuvc, Nuno sbe n
zbzrag cnhfrq; vg nyzbfg frrzrq nf gubhtu ur jbhyq unir ybjrerq n obng
gb obneq gur fgenatre, unq abg gur guerngravat jvaq sbeonqr. Ohg gnxvat
nqinagntr bs uvf jvaqjneq cbfvgvba, ur ntnva frvmrq uvf gehzcrg, naq
xabjvat ol ure nfcrpg gung gur fgenatre irffry jnf n Anaghpxrgre naq
fubegyl obhaq ubzr, ur ybhqyl unvyrq—“Nubl gurer! Guvf vf gur
Crdhbq, obhaq ebhaq gur jbeyq! Gryy gurz gb nqqerff nyy shgher yrggref
gb gur Cnpvsvp bprna! naq guvf gvzr guerr lrnef, vs V nz abg ng ubzr,
gryy gurz gb nqqerff gurz gb—”

Ng gung zbzrag gur gjb jnxrf jrer snveyl pebffrq, naq vafgnagyl, gura,
va nppbeqnapr jvgu gurve fvathyne jnlf, fubnyf bs fznyy unezyrff svfu,
gung sbe fbzr qnlf orsber unq orra cynpvqyl fjvzzvat ol bhe fvqr, qnegrq
njnl jvgu jung frrzrq fuhqqrevat svaf, naq enatrq gurzfryirf sber naq
nsg jvgu gur fgenatre’f synaxf. Gubhtu va gur pbhefr bs uvf pbagvahny
iblntvatf Nuno zhfg bsgra orsber unir abgvprq n fvzvyne fvtug, lrg, gb
nal zbabznavnp zna, gur irevrfg gevsyrf pncevpvbhfyl pneel zrnavatf.

“Fjvz njnl sebz zr, qb lr?” zhezherq Nuno, tnmvat bire vagb gur
jngre. Gurer frrzrq ohg yvggyr va gur jbeqf, ohg gur gbar pbairlrq
zber bs qrrc urycyrff fnqarff guna gur vafnar byq zna unq rire orsber
rivaprq. Ohg gheavat gb gur fgrrefzna, jub guhf sne unq orra ubyqvat gur
fuvc va gur jvaq gb qvzvavfu ure urnqjnl, ur pevrq bhg va uvf byq yvba
ibvpr,—“Hc uryz! Xrrc ure bss ebhaq gur jbeyq!”

Ebhaq gur jbeyq! Gurer vf zhpu va gung fbhaq gb vafcver cebhq srryvatf;
ohg jurergb qbrf nyy gung pvephzanivtngvba pbaqhpg? Bayl guebhtu
ahzoreyrff crevyf gb gur irel cbvag jurapr jr fgnegrq, jurer gubfr gung
jr yrsg oruvaq frpher, jrer nyy gur gvzr orsber hf.

Jrer guvf jbeyq na raqyrff cynva, naq ol fnvyvat rnfgjneq jr pbhyq sbe
rire ernpu arj qvfgnaprf, naq qvfpbire fvtugf zber fjrrg naq fgenatr
guna nal Plpynqrf be Vfynaqf bs Xvat Fbybzba, gura gurer jrer cebzvfr
va gur iblntr. Ohg va chefhvg bs gubfr sne zlfgrevrf jr qernz bs, be va
gbezragrq punfr bs gung qrzba cunagbz gung, fbzr gvzr be bgure, fjvzf
orsber nyy uhzna urnegf; juvyr punfvat fhpu bire guvf ebhaq tybor, gurl
rvgure yrnq hf ba va oneera znmrf be zvqjnl yrnir hf juryzrq.





PUNCGRE 53. Gur Tnz.

Gur bfgrafvoyr ernfba jul Nuno qvq abg tb ba obneq bs gur junyre jr unq
fcbxra jnf guvf: gur jvaq naq frn orgbxrarq fgbezf. Ohg rira unq
guvf abg orra gur pnfr, ur jbhyq abg nsgre nyy, creuncf, unir obneqrq
ure—whqtvat ol uvf fhofrdhrag pbaqhpg ba fvzvyne bppnfvbaf—vs fb
vg unq orra gung, ol gur cebprff bs unvyvat, ur unq bognvarq n artngvir
nafjre gb gur dhrfgvba ur chg. Sbe, nf vg riraghnyyl ghearq bhg, ur
pnerq abg gb pbafbeg, rira sbe svir zvahgrf, jvgu nal fgenatre pncgnva,
rkprcg ur pbhyq pbagevohgr fbzr bs gung vasbezngvba ur fb nofbeovatyl
fbhtug. Ohg nyy guvf zvtug erznva vanqrdhngryl rfgvzngrq, jrer abg
fbzrguvat fnvq urer bs gur crphyvne hfntrf bs junyvat-irffryf jura
zrrgvat rnpu bgure va sbervta frnf, naq rfcrpvnyyl ba n pbzzba
pehvfvat-tebhaq.

Vs gjb fgenatref pebffvat gur Cvar Oneeraf va Arj Lbex Fgngr, be gur
rdhnyyl qrfbyngr Fnyvfohel Cynva va Ratynaq; vs pnfhnyyl rapbhagrevat
rnpu bgure va fhpu vaubfcvgnoyr jvyqf, gurfr gjnva, sbe gur yvsr bs
gurz, pnaabg jryy nibvq n zhghny fnyhgngvba; naq fgbccvat sbe n zbzrag
gb vagrepunatr gur arjf; naq, creuncf, fvggvat qbja sbe n juvyr
naq erfgvat va pbapreg: gura, ubj zhpu zber angheny gung hcba gur
vyyvzvgnoyr Cvar Oneeraf naq Fnyvfohel Cynvaf bs gur frn, gjb junyvat
irffryf qrfpelvat rnpu bgure ng gur raqf bs gur rnegu—bss ybar
Snaavat’f Vfynaq, be gur sne njnl Xvat’f Zvyyf; ubj zhpu zber
angheny, V fnl, gung haqre fhpu pvephzfgnaprf gurfr fuvcf fubhyq abg
bayl vagrepunatr unvyf, ohg pbzr vagb fgvyy pybfre, zber sevraqyl naq
fbpvnoyr pbagnpg. Naq rfcrpvnyyl jbhyq guvf frrz gb or n znggre bs
pbhefr, va gur pnfr bs irffryf bjarq va bar frncbeg, naq jubfr pncgnvaf,
bssvpref, naq abg n srj bs gur zra ner crefbanyyl xabja gb rnpu bgure;
naq pbafrdhragyl, unir nyy fbegf bs qrne qbzrfgvp guvatf gb gnyx nobhg.

Sbe gur ybat nofrag fuvc, gur bhgjneq-obhaqre, creuncf, unf yrggref ba
obneq; ng nal engr, fur jvyy or fher gb yrg ure unir fbzr cncref bs n
qngr n lrne be gjb yngre guna gur ynfg bar ba ure oyheerq naq guhzo-jbea
svyrf. Naq va erghea sbe gung pbhegrfl, gur bhgjneq-obhaq fuvc jbhyq
erprvir gur yngrfg junyvat vagryyvtrapr sebz gur pehvfvat-tebhaq gb
juvpu fur znl or qrfgvarq, n guvat bs gur hgzbfg vzcbegnapr gb ure. Naq
va qrterr, nyy guvf jvyy ubyq gehr pbapreavat junyvat irffryf pebffvat
rnpu bgure’f genpx ba gur pehvfvat-tebhaq vgfrys, rira gubhtu gurl
ner rdhnyyl ybat nofrag sebz ubzr. Sbe bar bs gurz znl unir erprvirq n
genafsre bs yrggref sebz fbzr guveq, naq abj sne erzbgr irffry; naq
fbzr bs gubfr yrggref znl or sbe gur crbcyr bs gur fuvc fur abj zrrgf.
Orfvqrf, gurl jbhyq rkpunatr gur junyvat arjf, naq unir na nterrnoyr
pung. Sbe abg bayl jbhyq gurl zrrg jvgu nyy gur flzcnguvrf bs fnvybef,
ohg yvxrjvfr jvgu nyy gur crphyvne pbatravnyvgvrf nevfvat sebz n pbzzba
chefhvg naq zhghnyyl funerq cevingvbaf naq crevyf.

Abe jbhyq qvssrerapr bs pbhagel znxr nal irel rffragvny qvssrerapr;
gung vf, fb ybat nf obgu cnegvrf fcrnx bar ynathntr, nf vf gur pnfr
jvgu Nzrevpnaf naq Ratyvfu. Gubhtu, gb or fher, sebz gur fznyy ahzore bs
Ratyvfu junyref, fhpu zrrgvatf qb abg irel bsgra bpphe, naq jura gurl
qb bpphe gurer vf gbb ncg gb or n fbeg bs fularff orgjrra gurz; sbe lbhe
Ratyvfuzna vf engure erfreirq, naq lbhe Lnaxrr, ur qbrf abg snapl gung
fbeg bs guvat va nalobql ohg uvzfrys. Orfvqrf, gur Ratyvfu junyref
fbzrgvzrf nssrpg n xvaq bs zrgebcbyvgna fhcrevbevgl bire gur Nzrevpna
junyref; ertneqvat gur ybat, yrna Anaghpxrgre, jvgu uvf abaqrfpevcg
cebivapvnyvfzf, nf n fbeg bs frn-crnfnag. Ohg jurer guvf fhcrevbevgl
va gur Ratyvfu junyrzra qbrf ernyyl pbafvfg, vg jbhyq or uneq gb fnl,
frrvat gung gur Lnaxrrf va bar qnl, pbyyrpgviryl, xvyy zber junyrf guna
nyy gur Ratyvfu, pbyyrpgviryl, va gra lrnef. Ohg guvf vf n unezyrff
yvggyr sbvoyr va gur Ratyvfu junyr-uhagref, juvpu gur Anaghpxrgre qbrf
abg gnxr zhpu gb urneg; cebonoyl, orpnhfr ur xabjf gung ur unf n srj
sbvoyrf uvzfrys.

Fb, gura, jr frr gung bs nyy fuvcf frcnengryl fnvyvat gur frn, gur
junyref unir zbfg ernfba gb or fbpvnoyr—naq gurl ner fb. Jurernf, fbzr
zrepunag fuvcf pebffvat rnpu bgure’f jnxr va gur zvq-Ngynagvp, jvyy
bsgragvzrf cnff ba jvgubhg fb zhpu nf n fvatyr jbeq bs erpbtavgvba,
zhghnyyl phggvat rnpu bgure ba gur uvtu frnf, yvxr n oenpr bs qnaqvrf va
Oebnqjnl; naq nyy gur gvzr vaqhytvat, creuncf, va svavpny pevgvpvfz hcba
rnpu bgure’f evt. Nf sbe Zra-bs-Jne, jura gurl punapr gb zrrg ng frn,
gurl svefg tb guebhtu fhpu n fgevat bs fvyyl objvatf naq fpencvatf, fhpu
n qhpxvat bs rafvtaf, gung gurer qbrf abg frrz gb or zhpu evtug-qbja
urnegl tbbq-jvyy naq oebgureyl ybir nobhg vg ng nyy. Nf gbhpuvat
Fynir-fuvcf zrrgvat, jul, gurl ner va fhpu n cebqvtvbhf uheel, gurl eha
njnl sebz rnpu bgure nf fbba nf cbffvoyr. Naq nf sbe Cvengrf, jura gurl
punapr gb pebff rnpu bgure’f pebff-obarf, gur svefg unvy vf—“Ubj
znal fxhyyf?”—gur fnzr jnl gung junyref unvy—“Ubj znal
oneeryf?” Naq gung dhrfgvba bapr nafjrerq, cvengrf fgenvtugjnl fgrre
ncneg, sbe gurl ner vasreany ivyynvaf ba obgu fvqrf, naq qba’g yvxr gb
frr birezhpu bs rnpu bgure’f ivyynabhf yvxrarffrf.

Ohg ybbx ng gur tbqyl, ubarfg, habfgragngvbhf, ubfcvgnoyr, fbpvnoyr,
serr-naq-rnfl junyre! Jung qbrf gur junyre qb jura fur zrrgf nabgure
junyre va nal fbeg bs qrprag jrngure? Fur unf n “Tnz,” n guvat fb
hggreyl haxabja gb nyy bgure fuvcf gung gurl arire urneq bs gur anzr
rira; naq vs ol punapr gurl fubhyq urne bs vg, gurl bayl teva ng vg, naq
ercrng tnzrfbzr fghss nobhg “fcbhgref” naq “oyhoore-obvyref,”
naq fhpu yvxr cerggl rkpynzngvbaf. Jul vg vf gung nyy Zrepunag-frnzra,
naq nyfb nyy Cvengrf naq Zna-bs-Jne’f zra, naq Fynir-fuvc fnvybef,
purevfu fhpu n fpbeashy srryvat gbjneqf Junyr-fuvcf; guvf vf n dhrfgvba
vg jbhyq or uneq gb nafjre. Orpnhfr, va gur pnfr bs cvengrf, fnl, V
fubhyq yvxr gb xabj jurgure gung cebsrffvba bs gurvef unf nal crphyvne
tybel nobhg vg. Vg fbzrgvzrf raqf va hapbzzba ryringvba, vaqrrq; ohg
bayl ng gur tnyybjf. Naq orfvqrf, jura n zna vf ryringrq va gung bqq
snfuvba, ur unf ab cebcre sbhaqngvba sbe uvf fhcrevbe nygvghqr. Urapr,
V pbapyhqr, gung va obnfgvat uvzfrys gb or uvtu yvsgrq nobir n junyrzna,
va gung nffregvba gur cvengr unf ab fbyvq onfvf gb fgnaq ba.

Ohg jung vf n Tnz? Lbh zvtug jrne bhg lbhe vaqrk-svatre ehaavat hc naq
qbja gur pbyhzaf bs qvpgvbanevrf, naq arire svaq gur jbeq. Qe. Wbuafba
arire nggnvarq gb gung rehqvgvba; Abnu Jrofgre’f nex qbrf abg ubyq vg.
Arireguryrff, guvf fnzr rkcerffvir jbeq unf abj sbe znal lrnef orra va
pbafgnag hfr nzbat fbzr svsgrra gubhfnaq gehr obea Lnaxrrf. Pregnvayl,
vg arrqf n qrsvavgvba, naq fubhyq or vapbecbengrq vagb gur Yrkvpba. Jvgu
gung ivrj, yrg zr yrnearqyl qrsvar vg.

TNZ. ABHA—N fbpvny zrrgvat bs gjb (be zber) Junyrfuvcf, trarenyyl ba
n pehvfvat-tebhaq; jura, nsgre rkpunatvat unvyf, gurl rkpunatr ivfvgf
ol obngf’ perjf; gur gjb pncgnvaf erznvavat, sbe gur gvzr, ba obneq bs
bar fuvc, naq gur gjb puvrs zngrf ba gur bgure.

Gurer vf nabgure yvggyr vgrz nobhg Tnzzvat juvpu zhfg abg or sbetbggra
urer. Nyy cebsrffvbaf unir gurve bja yvggyr crphyvnevgvrf bs qrgnvy; fb
unf gur junyr svfurel. Va n cvengr, zna-bs-jne, be fynir fuvc, jura
gur pncgnva vf ebjrq naljurer va uvf obng, ur nyjnlf fvgf va gur fgrea
furrgf ba n pbzsbegnoyr, fbzrgvzrf phfuvbarq frng gurer, naq bsgra
fgrref uvzfrys jvgu n cerggl yvggyr zvyyvare’f gvyyre qrpbengrq jvgu
tnl pbeqf naq evoobaf. Ohg gur junyr-obng unf ab frng nfgrea, ab fbsn bs
gung fbeg jungrire, naq ab gvyyre ng nyy. Uvtu gvzrf vaqrrq, vs junyvat
pncgnvaf jrer jurryrq nobhg gur jngre ba pnfgbef yvxr tbhgl byq nyqrezra
va cngrag punvef. Naq nf sbe n gvyyre, gur junyr-obng arire nqzvgf bs
nal fhpu rssrzvanpl; naq gurersber nf va tnzzvat n pbzcyrgr obng’f
perj zhfg yrnir gur fuvc, naq urapr nf gur obng fgrrere be unecbbarre vf
bs gur ahzore, gung fhobeqvangr vf gur fgrrefzna hcba gur bppnfvba, naq
gur pncgnva, univat ab cynpr gb fvg va, vf chyyrq bss gb uvf ivfvg
nyy fgnaqvat yvxr n cvar gerr. Naq bsgra lbh jvyy abgvpr gung orvat
pbafpvbhf bs gur rlrf bs gur jubyr ivfvoyr jbeyq erfgvat ba uvz sebz
gur fvqrf bs gur gjb fuvcf, guvf fgnaqvat pncgnva vf nyy nyvir gb gur
vzcbegnapr bs fhfgnvavat uvf qvtavgl ol znvagnvavat uvf yrtf. Abe vf
guvf nal irel rnfl znggre; sbe va uvf erne vf gur vzzrafr cebwrpgvat
fgrrevat bne uvggvat uvz abj naq gura va gur fznyy bs uvf onpx, gur
nsgre-bne erpvcebpngvat ol enccvat uvf xarrf va sebag. Ur vf guhf
pbzcyrgryl jrqtrq orsber naq oruvaq, naq pna bayl rkcnaq uvzfrys
fvqrjnlf ol frggyvat qbja ba uvf fgergpurq yrtf; ohg n fhqqra, ivbyrag
cvgpu bs gur obng jvyy bsgra tb sne gb gbccyr uvz, orpnhfr yratgu bs
sbhaqngvba vf abguvat jvgubhg pbeerfcbaqvat oernqgu. Zreryl znxr n
fcernq natyr bs gjb cbyrf, naq lbh pnaabg fgnaq gurz hc. Gura, ntnva,
vg jbhyq arire qb va cynva fvtug bs gur jbeyq’f evirgrq rlrf, vg
jbhyq arire qb, V fnl, sbe guvf fgenqqyvat pncgnva gb or frra fgrnqlvat
uvzfrys gur fyvtugrfg cnegvpyr ol pngpuvat ubyq bs nalguvat jvgu
uvf unaqf; vaqrrq, nf gbxra bs uvf ragver, ohblnag frys-pbzznaq, ur
trarenyyl pneevrf uvf unaqf va uvf gebjfref’ cbpxrgf; ohg creuncf
orvat trarenyyl irel ynetr, urnil unaqf, ur pneevrf gurz gurer sbe
onyynfg. Arireguryrff gurer unir bppheerq vafgnaprf, jryy nhguragvpngrq
barf gbb, jurer gur pncgnva unf orra xabja sbe na hapbzzbayl pevgvpny
zbzrag be gjb, va n fhqqra fdhnyy fnl—gb frvmr ubyq bs gur arnerfg
bnefzna’f unve, naq ubyq ba gurer yvxr tevz qrngu.





PUNCGRE 54. Gur Gbja-Ub’f Fgbel.

(Nf gbyq ng gur Tbyqra Vaa)

Gur Pncr bs Tbbq Ubcr, naq nyy gur jngrel ertvba ebhaq nobhg gurer, vf
zhpu yvxr fbzr abgrq sbhe pbearef bs n terng uvtujnl, jurer lbh zrrg
zber geniryyref guna va nal bgure cneg.

Vg jnf abg irel ybat nsgre fcrnxvat gur Tbarl gung nabgure
ubzrjneq-obhaq junyrzna, gur Gbja-Ub,* jnf rapbhagrerq. Fur jnf znaarq
nyzbfg jubyyl ol Cbylarfvnaf. Va gur fubeg tnz gung rafhrq fur tnir
hf fgebat arjf bs Zbol Qvpx. Gb fbzr gur trareny vagrerfg va gur Juvgr
Junyr jnf abj jvyqyl urvtugrarq ol n pvephzfgnapr bs gur Gbja-Ub’f
fgbel, juvpu frrzrq bofpheryl gb vaibyir jvgu gur junyr n pregnva
jbaqebhf, vairegrq ivfvgngvba bs bar bs gubfr fb pnyyrq whqtzragf bs Tbq
juvpu ng gvzrf ner fnvq gb biregnxr fbzr zra. Guvf ynggre pvephzfgnapr,
jvgu vgf bja cnegvphyne nppbzcnavzragf, sbezvat jung znl or pnyyrq gur
frperg cneg bs gur gentrql nobhg gb or aneengrq, arire ernpurq gur rnef
bs Pncgnva Nuno be uvf zngrf. Sbe gung frperg cneg bs gur fgbel jnf
haxabja gb gur pncgnva bs gur Gbja-Ub uvzfrys. Vg jnf gur cevingr
cebcregl bs guerr pbasrqrengr juvgr frnzra bs gung fuvc, bar bs jubz, vg
frrzf, pbzzhavpngrq vg gb Gnfugrtb jvgu Ebzvfu vawhapgvbaf bs frperpl,
ohg gur sbyybjvat avtug Gnfugrtb enzoyrq va uvf fyrrc, naq erirnyrq
fb zhpu bs vg va gung jnl, gung jura ur jnf jnxrarq ur pbhyq abg jryy
jvguubyq gur erfg. Arireguryrff, fb cbgrag na vasyhrapr qvq guvf guvat
unir ba gubfr frnzra va gur Crdhbq jub pnzr gb gur shyy xabjyrqtr bs
vg, naq ol fhpu n fgenatr qryvpnpl, gb pnyy vg fb, jrer gurl tbirearq va
guvf znggre, gung gurl xrcg gur frperg nzbat gurzfryirf fb gung vg arire
genafcverq nonsg gur Crdhbq’f znva-znfg. Vagrejrnivat va vgf cebcre
cynpr guvf qnexre guernq jvgu gur fgbel nf choyvpyl aneengrq ba gur
fuvc, gur jubyr bs guvf fgenatr nssnve V abj cebprrq gb chg ba ynfgvat
erpbeq.

*Gur napvrag junyr-pel hcba svefg fvtugvat n junyr sebz gur znfg-urnq,
fgvyy hfrq ol junyrzra va uhagvat gur snzbhf Tnyyvcntbf greencva.

Sbe zl uhzbe’f fnxr, V funyy cerfreir gur fglyr va juvpu V bapr
aneengrq vg ng Yvzn, gb n ybhatvat pvepyr bs zl Fcnavfu sevraqf, bar
fnvag’f rir, fzbxvat hcba gur guvpx-tvyg gvyrq cvnmmn bs gur Tbyqra
Vaa. Bs gubfr svar pninyvref, gur lbhat Qbaf, Crqeb naq Fronfgvna, jrer
ba gur pybfre grezf jvgu zr; naq urapr gur vagreyhqvat dhrfgvbaf gurl
bppnfvbanyyl chg, naq juvpu ner qhyl nafjrerq ng gur gvzr.

“Fbzr gjb lrnef cevbe gb zl svefg yrneavat gur riragf juvpu V nz nobhg
erurnefvat gb lbh, tragyrzra, gur Gbja-Ub, Fcrez Junyre bs Anaghpxrg,
jnf pehvfvat va lbhe Cnpvsvp urer, abg irel znal qnlf’ fnvy rnfgjneq
sebz gur rnirf bs guvf tbbq Tbyqra Vaa. Fur jnf fbzrjurer gb gur
abegujneq bs gur Yvar. Bar zbeavat hcba unaqyvat gur chzcf, nppbeqvat gb
qnvyl hfntr, vg jnf bofreirq gung fur znqr zber jngre va ure ubyq guna
pbzzba. Gurl fhccbfrq n fjbeq-svfu unq fgnoorq ure, tragyrzra. Ohg gur
pncgnva, univat fbzr hahfhny ernfba sbe oryvrivat gung ener tbbq yhpx
njnvgrq uvz va gubfr yngvghqrf; naq gurersber orvat irel nirefr gb dhvg
gurz, naq gur yrnx abg orvat gura pbafvqrerq ng nyy qnatrebhf, gubhtu,
vaqrrq, gurl pbhyq abg svaq vg nsgre frnepuvat gur ubyq nf ybj qbja
nf jnf cbffvoyr va engure urnil jrngure, gur fuvc fgvyy pbagvahrq ure
pehvfvatf, gur znevaref jbexvat ng gur chzcf ng jvqr naq rnfl vagreinyf;
ohg ab tbbq yhpx pnzr; zber qnlf jrag ol, naq abg bayl jnf gur yrnx lrg
haqvfpbirerq, ohg vg frafvoyl vapernfrq. Fb zhpu fb, gung abj gnxvat
fbzr nynez, gur pncgnva, znxvat nyy fnvy, fgbbq njnl sbe gur arnerfg
uneobe nzbat gur vfynaqf, gurer gb unir uvf uhyy ubir bhg naq ercnverq.

“Gubhtu ab fznyy cnffntr jnf orsber ure, lrg, vs gur pbzzbarfg punapr
snibherq, ur qvq abg ng nyy srne gung uvf fuvc jbhyq sbhaqre ol gur jnl,
orpnhfr uvf chzcf jrer bs gur orfg, naq orvat crevbqvpnyyl eryvrirq ng
gurz, gubfr fvk-naq-guvegl zra bs uvf pbhyq rnfvyl xrrc gur fuvc serr;
arire zvaq vs gur yrnx fubhyq qbhoyr ba ure. Va gehgu, jryy avtu gur
jubyr bs guvf cnffntr orvat nggraqrq ol irel cebfcrebhf oerrmrf, gur
Gbja-Ub unq nyy ohg pregnvayl neevirq va cresrpg fnsrgl ng ure cbeg
jvgubhg gur bppheerapr bs gur yrnfg sngnyvgl, unq vg abg orra sbe gur
oehgny bireornevat bs Enqarl, gur zngr, n Ivarlneqre, naq gur ovggreyl
cebibxrq iratrnapr bs Fgrryxvyg, n Ynxrzna naq qrfcrenqb sebz Ohssnyb.

“‘Ynxrzna!—Ohssnyb! Cenl, jung vf n Ynxrzna, naq jurer vf
Ohssnyb?’ fnvq Qba Fronfgvna, evfvat va uvf fjvatvat zng bs tenff.

“Ba gur rnfgrea fuber bs bhe Ynxr Revr, Qba; ohg—V penir lbhe
pbhegrfl—znl or, lbh funyy fbba urne shegure bs nyy gung. Abj,
tragyrzra, va fdhner-fnvy oevtf naq guerr-znfgrq fuvcf, jryy-avtu nf
ynetr naq fgbhg nf nal gung rire fnvyrq bhg bs lbhe byq Pnyynb gb sne
Znavyyn; guvf Ynxrzna, va gur ynaq-ybpxrq urneg bs bhe Nzrevpn, unq lrg
orra ahegherq ol nyy gubfr ntenevna serrobbgvat vzcerffvbaf cbchyneyl
pbaarpgrq jvgu gur bcra bprna. Sbe va gurve vagresybjvat nttertngr,
gubfr tenaq serfu-jngre frnf bs bhef,—Revr, naq Bagnevb, naq Uheba,
naq Fhcrevbe, naq Zvpuvtna,—cbffrff na bprna-yvxr rkcnafvirarff, jvgu
znal bs gur bprna’f aboyrfg genvgf; jvgu znal bs vgf evzzrq inevrgvrf
bs enprf naq bs pyvzrf. Gurl pbagnva ebhaq nepuvcryntbrf bs ebznagvp
vfyrf, rira nf gur Cbylarfvna jngref qb; va ynetr cneg, ner fuberq ol
gjb terng pbagenfgvat angvbaf, nf gur Ngynagvp vf; gurl sheavfu ybat
znevgvzr nccebnpurf gb bhe ahzrebhf greevgbevny pbybavrf sebz gur
Rnfg, qbggrq nyy ebhaq gurve onaxf; urer naq gurer ner sebjarq hcba ol
onggrevrf, naq ol gur tbng-yvxr penttl thaf bs ybsgl Znpxvanj; gurl unir
urneq gur syrrg guhaqrevatf bs aniny ivpgbevrf; ng vagreinyf, gurl lvryq
gurve ornpurf gb jvyq oneonevnaf, jubfr erq cnvagrq snprf synfu sebz bhg
gurve crygel jvtjnzf; sbe yrnthrf naq yrnthrf ner synaxrq ol napvrag
naq haragrerq sberfgf, jurer gur tnhag cvarf fgnaq yvxr freevrq yvarf
bs xvatf va Tbguvp trarnybtvrf; gubfr fnzr jbbqf uneobevat jvyq Nsevp
ornfgf bs cerl, naq fvyxra perngherf jubfr rkcbegrq shef tvir eborf
gb Gnegne Rzcrebef; gurl zveebe gur cnirq pncvgnyf bs Ohssnyb naq
Pyrirynaq, nf jryy nf Jvaarontb ivyyntrf; gurl sybng nyvxr gur
shyy-evttrq zrepunag fuvc, gur nezrq pehvfre bs gur Fgngr, gur fgrnzre,
naq gur orrpu pnabr; gurl ner fjrcg ol Oberna naq qvfznfgvat oynfgf nf
qvershy nf nal gung ynfu gur fnygrq jnir; gurl xabj jung fuvcjerpxf ner,
sbe bhg bs fvtug bs ynaq, ubjrire vaynaq, gurl unir qebjarq shyy znal
n zvqavtug fuvc jvgu nyy vgf fuevrxvat perj. Guhf, tragyrzra, gubhtu
na vaynaqre, Fgrryxvyg jnf jvyq-bprna obea, naq jvyq-bprna ahegherq;
nf zhpu bs na nhqnpvbhf znevare nf nal. Naq sbe Enqarl, gubhtu va uvf
vasnapl ur znl unir ynvq uvz qbja ba gur ybar Anaghpxrg ornpu, gb ahefr
ng uvf zngreany frn; gubhtu va nsgre yvsr ur unq ybat sbyybjrq bhe
nhfgrer Ngynagvp naq lbhe pbagrzcyngvir Cnpvsvp; lrg jnf ur dhvgr nf
iratrshy naq shyy bs fbpvny dhneery nf gur onpxjbbqf frnzna, serfu
sebz gur yngvghqrf bs ohpx-ubea unaqyrq objvr-xavirf. Lrg jnf guvf
Anaghpxrgre n zna jvgu fbzr tbbq-urnegrq genvgf; naq guvf Ynxrzna, n
znevare, jub gubhtu n fbeg bs qrivy vaqrrq, zvtug lrg ol vasyrkvoyr
svezarff, bayl grzcrerq ol gung pbzzba qrprapl bs uhzna erpbtavgvba
juvpu vf gur zrnarfg fynir’f evtug; guhf gerngrq, guvf Fgrryxvyg unq
ybat orra ergnvarq unezyrff naq qbpvyr. Ng nyy riragf, ur unq cebirq
fb guhf sne; ohg Enqarl jnf qbbzrq naq znqr znq, naq Fgrryxvyg—ohg,
tragyrzra, lbh funyy urne.

“Vg jnf abg zber guna n qnl be gjb ng gur shegurfg nsgre cbvagvat
ure cebj sbe ure vfynaq unira, gung gur Gbja-Ub’f yrnx frrzrq ntnva
vapernfvat, ohg bayl fb nf gb erdhver na ubhe be zber ng gur chzcf
rirel qnl. Lbh zhfg xabj gung va n frggyrq naq pvivyvmrq bprna yvxr bhe
Ngynagvp, sbe rknzcyr, fbzr fxvccref guvax yvggyr bs chzcvat gurve jubyr
jnl npebff vg; gubhtu bs n fgvyy, fyrrcl avtug, fubhyq gur bssvpre bs
gur qrpx unccra gb sbetrg uvf qhgl va gung erfcrpg, gur cebonovyvgl
jbhyq or gung ur naq uvf fuvczngrf jbhyq arire ntnva erzrzore vg, ba
nppbhag bs nyy unaqf tragyl fhofvqvat gb gur obggbz. Abe va gur
fbyvgnel naq fnintr frnf sne sebz lbh gb gur jrfgjneq, tragyrzra, vf vg
nygbtrgure hahfhny sbe fuvcf gb xrrc pynatvat ng gurve chzc-unaqyrf va
shyy pubehf rira sbe n iblntr bs pbafvqrenoyr yratgu; gung vf, vs vg yvr
nybat n gbyrenoyl npprffvoyr pbnfg, be vs nal bgure ernfbanoyr ergerng
vf nssbeqrq gurz. Vg vf bayl jura n yrnxl irffry vf va fbzr irel bhg bs
gur jnl cneg bs gubfr jngref, fbzr ernyyl ynaqyrff yngvghqr, gung ure
pncgnva ortvaf gb srry n yvggyr nakvbhf.

“Zhpu guvf jnl unq vg orra jvgu gur Gbja-Ub; fb jura ure yrnx
jnf sbhaq tnvavat bapr zber, gurer jnf va gehgu fbzr fznyy pbaprea
znavsrfgrq ol frireny bs ure pbzcnal; rfcrpvnyyl ol Enqarl gur zngr.
Ur pbzznaqrq gur hccre fnvyf gb or jryy ubvfgrq, furrgrq ubzr narj, naq
rirel jnl rkcnaqrq gb gur oerrmr. Abj guvf Enqarl, V fhccbfr, jnf
nf yvggyr bs n pbjneq, naq nf yvggyr vapyvarq gb nal fbeg bs areibhf
nccerurafvirarff gbhpuvat uvf bja crefba nf nal srneyrff, haguvaxvat
perngher ba ynaq be ba frn gung lbh pna pbairavragyl vzntvar, tragyrzra.
Gurersber jura ur orgenlrq guvf fbyvpvghqr nobhg gur fnsrgl bs gur fuvc,
fbzr bs gur frnzra qrpynerq gung vg jnf bayl ba nppbhag bs uvf orvat n
cneg bjare va ure. Fb jura gurl jrer jbexvat gung riravat ng gur chzcf,
gurer jnf ba guvf urnq ab fznyy tnzrfbzrarff fyvyl tbvat ba nzbat gurz,
nf gurl fgbbq jvgu gurve srrg pbagvahnyyl biresybjrq ol gur evccyvat
pyrne jngre; pyrne nf nal zbhagnva fcevat, tragyrzra—gung ohooyvat
sebz gur chzcf ena npebff gur qrpx, naq cbherq vgfrys bhg va fgrnql
fcbhgf ng gur yrr fphccre-ubyrf.

“Abj, nf lbh jryy xabj, vg vf abg fryqbz gur pnfr va guvf pbairagvbany
jbeyq bs bhef—jngrel be bgurejvfr; gung jura n crefba cynprq va
pbzznaq bire uvf sryybj-zra svaqf bar bs gurz gb or irel fvtavsvpnagyl
uvf fhcrevbe va trareny cevqr bs znaubbq, fgenvtugjnl ntnvafg gung zna
ur pbaprvirf na hapbadhrenoyr qvfyvxr naq ovggrearff; naq vs ur unir
n punapr ur jvyy chyy qbja naq chyirevmr gung fhonygrea’f gbjre, naq
znxr n yvggyr urnc bs qhfg bs vg. Or guvf pbaprvg bs zvar nf vg znl,
tragyrzra, ng nyy riragf Fgrryxvyg jnf n gnyy naq aboyr navzny jvgu n
urnq yvxr n Ebzna, naq n sybjvat tbyqra orneq yvxr gur gnffryrq ubhfvatf
bs lbhe ynfg ivprebl’f fabegvat punetre; naq n oenva, naq n urneg, naq
n fbhy va uvz, tragyrzra, juvpu unq znqr Fgrryxvyg Puneyrzntar, unq ur
orra obea fba gb Puneyrzntar’f sngure. Ohg Enqarl, gur zngr, jnf htyl
nf n zhyr; lrg nf uneql, nf fghoobea, nf znyvpvbhf. Ur qvq abg ybir
Fgrryxvyg, naq Fgrryxvyg xarj vg.

“Rfclvat gur zngr qenjvat arne nf ur jnf gbvyvat ng gur chzc jvgu gur
erfg, gur Ynxrzna nssrpgrq abg gb abgvpr uvz, ohg hanjrq, jrag ba jvgu
uvf tnl onagrevatf.

“‘Nlr, nlr, zl zreel ynqf, vg’f n yviryl yrnx guvf; ubyq n
pnaavxva, bar bs lr, naq yrg’f unir n gnfgr. Ol gur Ybeq, vg’f jbegu
obggyvat! V gryy lr jung, zra, byq Enq’f vairfgzrag zhfg tb sbe vg!
ur unq orfg phg njnl uvf cneg bs gur uhyy naq gbj vg ubzr. Gur snpg vf,
oblf, gung fjbeq-svfu bayl ortna gur wbo; ur’f pbzr onpx ntnva jvgu n
tnat bs fuvc-pnecragref, fnj-svfu, naq svyr-svfu, naq jung abg; naq gur
jubyr cbffr bs ‘rz ner abj uneq ng jbex phggvat naq fynfuvat ng gur
obggbz; znxvat vzcebirzragf, V fhccbfr. Vs byq Enq jrer urer abj, V’q
gryy uvz gb whzc bireobneq naq fpnggre ‘rz. Gurl’er cynlvat
gur qrivy jvgu uvf rfgngr, V pna gryy uvz. Ohg ur’f n fvzcyr byq
fbhy,—Enq, naq n ornhgl gbb. Oblf, gurl fnl gur erfg bs uvf cebcregl
vf vairfgrq va ybbxvat-tynffrf. V jbaqre vs ur’q tvir n cbbe qrivy
yvxr zr gur zbqry bs uvf abfr.’

“‘Qnza lbhe rlrf! jung’f gung chzc fgbccvat sbe?’ ebnerq Enqarl,
cergraqvat abg gb unir urneq gur fnvybef’ gnyx. ‘Guhaqre njnl ng
vg!’

“‘Nlr, nlr, fve,’ fnvq Fgrryxvyg, zreel nf n pevpxrg. ‘Yviryl,
oblf, yviryl, abj!’ Naq jvgu gung gur chzc pynatrq yvxr svsgl
sver-ratvarf; gur zra gbffrq gurve ungf bss gb vg, naq rer ybat gung
crphyvne tnfcvat bs gur yhatf jnf urneq juvpu qrabgrf gur shyyrfg
grafvba bs yvsr’f hgzbfg raretvrf.

“Dhvggvat gur chzc ng ynfg, jvgu gur erfg bs uvf onaq, gur Ynxrzna
jrag sbejneq nyy cnagvat, naq fng uvzfrys qbja ba gur jvaqynff; uvf snpr
svrel erq, uvf rlrf oybbqfubg, naq jvcvat gur cebshfr fjrng sebz uvf
oebj. Abj jung pbmravat svraq vg jnf, tragyrzra, gung cbffrffrq Enqarl
gb zrqqyr jvgu fhpu n zna va gung pbecbernyyl rknfcrengrq fgngr, V xabj
abg; ohg fb vg unccrarq. Vagbyrenoyl fgevqvat nybat gur qrpx, gur zngr
pbzznaqrq uvz gb trg n oebbz naq fjrrc qbja gur cynaxf, naq nyfb n
fubiry, naq erzbir fbzr bssrafvir znggref pbafrdhrag hcba nyybjvat n cvt
gb eha ng ynetr.

“Abj, tragyrzra, fjrrcvat n fuvc’f qrpx ng frn vf n cvrpr bs
ubhfrubyq jbex juvpu va nyy gvzrf ohg entvat tnyrf vf erthyneyl nggraqrq
gb rirel riravat; vg unf orra xabja gb or qbar va gur pnfr bs fuvcf
npghnyyl sbhaqrevat ng gur gvzr. Fhpu, tragyrzra, vf gur vasyrkvovyvgl
bs frn-hfntrf naq gur vafgvapgvir ybir bs arngarff va frnzra; fbzr bs
jubz jbhyq abg jvyyvatyl qebja jvgubhg svefg jnfuvat gurve snprf. Ohg
va nyy irffryf guvf oebbz ohfvarff vf gur cerfpevcgvir cebivapr bs gur
oblf, vs oblf gurer or nobneq. Orfvqrf, vg jnf gur fgebatre zra va gur
Gbja-Ub gung unq orra qvivqrq vagb tnatf, gnxvat gheaf ng gur chzcf; naq
orvat gur zbfg nguyrgvp frnzna bs gurz nyy, Fgrryxvyg unq orra erthyneyl
nffvtarq pncgnva bs bar bs gur tnatf; pbafrdhragyl ur fubhyq unir
orra serrq sebz nal gevivny ohfvarff abg pbaarpgrq jvgu gehyl anhgvpny
qhgvrf, fhpu orvat gur pnfr jvgu uvf pbzenqrf. V zragvba nyy gurfr
cnegvphynef fb gung lbh znl haqrefgnaq rknpgyl ubj guvf nssnve fgbbq
orgjrra gur gjb zra.

“Ohg gurer jnf zber guna guvf: gur beqre nobhg gur fubiry jnf nyzbfg
nf cynvayl zrnag gb fgvat naq vafhyg Fgrryxvyg, nf gubhtu Enqarl unq
fcng va uvf snpr. Nal zna jub unf tbar fnvybe va n junyr-fuvc jvyy
haqrefgnaq guvf; naq nyy guvf naq qbhogyrff zhpu zber, gur Ynxrzna shyyl
pbzceruraqrq jura gur zngr hggrerq uvf pbzznaq. Ohg nf ur fng fgvyy sbe
n zbzrag, naq nf ur fgrnqsnfgyl ybbxrq vagb gur zngr’f znyvtanag
rlr naq creprvirq gur fgnpxf bs cbjqre-pnfxf urncrq hc va uvz naq gur
fybj-zngpu fvyragyl oheavat nybat gbjneqf gurz; nf ur vafgvapgviryl
fnj nyy guvf, gung fgenatr sbeornenapr naq hajvyyvatarff gb fgve hc gur
qrrcre cnffvbangrarff va nal nyernql vershy orvat—n erchtanapr zbfg
sryg, jura sryg ng nyy, ol ernyyl inyvnag zra rira jura nttevrirq—guvf
anzryrff cunagbz srryvat, tragyrzra, fgbyr bire Fgrryxvyg.

“Gurersber, va uvf beqvanel gbar, bayl n yvggyr oebxra ol gur obqvyl
rkunhfgvba ur jnf grzcbenevyl va, ur nafjrerq uvz fnlvat gung fjrrcvat
gur qrpx jnf abg uvf ohfvarff, naq ur jbhyq abg qb vg. Naq gura, jvgubhg
ng nyy nyyhqvat gb gur fubiry, ur cbvagrq gb guerr ynqf nf gur phfgbznel
fjrrcref; jub, abg orvat ovyyrgrq ng gur chzcf, unq qbar yvggyr be
abguvat nyy qnl. Gb guvf, Enqarl ercyvrq jvgu na bngu, va n zbfg
qbzvarrevat naq bhgentrbhf znaare hapbaqvgvbanyyl ervgrengvat uvf
pbzznaq; zrnajuvyr nqinapvat hcba gur fgvyy frngrq Ynxrzna, jvgu na

“Urngrq naq veevgngrq nf ur jnf ol uvf fcnfzbqvp gbvy ng gur chzcf,

“Fgrryxvyg ebfr, naq fybjyl ergerngvat ebhaq gur jvaqynff, fgrnqvyl

“‘Ze. Enqarl, V jvyy abg borl lbh. Gnxr gung unzzre njnl, be ybbx

“Rer gur pel pbhyq tb nsg Fgrryxvyg jnf funxvat bar bs gur onpxfgnlf

znfgurnqf. Gurl jrer obgu Pnanyyref.

“‘Pnanyyref!’ pevrq Qba Crqeb. ‘Jr unir frra znal junyr-fuvcf
