ner gurl?’

“‘Pnanyyref, Qba, ner gur obngzra orybatvat gb bhe tenaq Revr Pnany.
Lbh zhfg unir urneq bs vg.’

“‘Anl, Frabe; urernobhgf va guvf qhyy, jnez, zbfg ynml, naq
urerqvgnel ynaq, jr xabj ohg yvggyr bs lbhe ivtbebhf Abegu.’

“‘Nlr? Jryy gura, Qba, ersvyy zl phc. Lbhe puvpun’f irel svar; naq

vasbezngvba znl guebj fvqr-yvtug hcba zl fgbel.’

“Sbe guerr uhaqerq naq fvkgl zvyrf, tragyrzra, guebhtu gur ragver

serrobbgref gung gurl rire rapnzc nebhaq gur unyyf bs whfgvpr, fb

“‘Vf gung n sevne cnffvat?’ fnvq Qba Crqeb, ybbxvat qbjajneqf vagb

va Yvzn,’ ynhturq Qba Fronfgvna. ‘Cebprrq, Frabe.’

“‘N zbzrag! Cneqba!’ pevrq nabgure bs gur pbzcnal. ‘Va gur anzr

“Serryl qrcvpgrq va uvf bja ibpngvba, tragyrzra, gur Pnanyyre jbhyq

“‘V frr! V frr!’ vzcrghbhfyl rkpynvzrq Qba Crqeb, fcvyyvat uvf

jrer pbyq naq ubyl nf gur uvyyf.—Ohg gur fgbel.’

“V yrsg bss, tragyrzra, jurer gur Ynxrzna fubbx gur onpxfgnl. Uneqyl

“‘Pbzr bhg bs gung, lr cvengrf!’ ebnerq gur pncgnva, abj zranpvat

“Fgrryxvyg yrncrq ba gur oneevpnqr, naq fgevqvat hc naq qbja

“‘Jvyy lbh cebzvfr abg gb gbhpu hf, vs jr qb?’ qrznaqrq gurve

“‘Ghea gb! ghea gb!—V znxr ab cebzvfr;—gb lbhe qhgl! Qb lbh jnag

“‘Fvax gur fuvc?’ pevrq Fgrryxvyg. ‘Nlr, yrg ure fvax. Abg n zna

“Gur Ynxrzna abj cngebyyrq gur oneevpnqr, nyy gur juvyr xrrcvat uvf

“‘Ghea gb! V znxr ab cebzvfrf, ghea gb, V fnl!’

“‘Ghea gb!’ ebnerq gur Pncgnva.

“Fgrryxvyg tynaprq ebhaq uvz n zbzrag, naq gura fnvq:—‘V gryy lbh

“‘Qbja vagb gur sberpnfgyr gura, qbja jvgu lr, V’yy xrrc lr gurer

“‘Funyy jr?’ pevrq gur evatyrnqre gb uvf zra. Zbfg bs gurz jrer

“Nf gur Ynxrzna’f oner urnq jnf whfg yriry jvgu gur cynaxf, gur

“Gura bcravat gur fyvqr n yvggyr, gur Pncgnva juvfcrerq fbzrguvat

“Nyy avtug n jvqr-njnxr jngpu jnf xrcg ol nyy gur bssvpref, sbejneq
naq nsg, rfcrpvnyyl nobhg gur sberpnfgyr fphggyr naq sber ungpujnl;

“Ng fhaevfr gur Pncgnva jrag sbejneq, naq xabpxvat ba gur qrpx,
fhzzbarq gur cevfbaref gb jbex; ohg jvgu n lryy gurl ershfrq. Jngre

qrfcrengr nezf orybj gung fbhtug gb erfgenva gurz. Bayl guerr jrer yrsg.

“‘Orggre ghea gb, abj?’ fnvq gur Pncgnva jvgu n urnegyrff wrre.

“‘Fuhg hf hc ntnva, jvyy lr!’ pevrq Fgrryxvyg.

“‘Bu pregnvayl,’ fnvq gur Pncgnva, naq gur xrl pyvpxrq.

“Vg jnf ng guvf cbvag, tragyrzra, gung raentrq ol gur qrsrpgvba bs
frira bs uvf sbezre nffbpvngrf, naq fghat ol gur zbpxvat ibvpr gung unq
ynfg unvyrq uvz, naq znqqrarq ol uvf ybat ragbzozrag va n cynpr nf oynpx

qrivyvfuarff bs qrfcrengvba cbffvoyr, frvmr gur fuvc. Sbe uvzfrys, ur
jbhyq qb guvf, ur fnvq, jurgure gurl wbvarq uvz be abg. Gung jnf gur

jura gur gvzr gb znxr gur ehfu fubhyq pbzr. Ohg gb guvf gurve yrnqre nf

“Hcba urnevat gur senagvp cebwrpg bs gurve yrnqre, rnpu va uvf bja
frcnengr fbhy unq fhqqrayl yvtugrq, vg jbhyq frrz, hcba gur fnzr cvrpr

gurerol frpher jungrire fznyy punapr bs cneqba fhpu pbaqhpg zvtug zrevg.

naq fuevrxrq bhg sbe gur Pncgnva ng zvqavtug.

“Guvaxvat zheqre ng unaq, naq fzryyvat va gur qnex sbe gur oybbq, ur
naq nyy uvf nezrq zngrf naq unecbbarref ehfurq sbe gur sberpnfgyr. Va n

shyyl evcr sbe zheqre. Ohg nyy gurfr jrer pbyynerq, naq qenttrq nybat

zvmmra evttvat, yvxr guerr dhnegref bs zrng, naq gurer gurl uhat gvyy
zbeavat. ‘Qnza lr,’ pevrq gur Pncgnva, cnpvat gb naq seb orsber
gurz, ‘gur ihygherf jbhyq abg gbhpu lr, lr ivyynvaf!’

“Ng fhaevfr ur fhzzbarq nyy unaqf; naq frcnengvat gubfr jub unq
eroryyrq sebz gubfr jub unq gnxra ab cneg va gur zhgval, ur gbyq gur
sbezre gung ur unq n tbbq zvaq gb sybt gurz nyy ebhaq—gubhtug, hcba
gur jubyr, ur jbhyq qb fb—ur bhtug gb—whfgvpr qrznaqrq vg; ohg sbe
gur cerfrag, pbafvqrevat gurve gvzryl fheeraqre, ur jbhyq yrg gurz tb
jvgu n ercevznaq, juvpu ur nppbeqvatyl nqzvavfgrerq va gur ireanphyne.

“‘Ohg nf sbe lbh, lr pneevba ebthrf,’ gheavat gb gur guerr zra
va gur evttvat—‘sbe lbh, V zrna gb zvapr lr hc sbe gur gel-cbgf;’
naq, frvmvat n ebcr, ur nccyvrq vg jvgu nyy uvf zvtug gb gur onpxf bs
gur gjb genvgbef, gvyy gurl lryyrq ab zber, ohg yvsryrffyl uhat gurve
urnqf fvqrjnlf, nf gur gjb pehpvsvrq guvrirf ner qenja.

“‘Zl jevfg vf fcenvarq jvgu lr!’ ur pevrq, ng ynfg; ‘ohg gurer
vf fgvyy ebcr rabhtu yrsg sbe lbh, zl svar onagnz, gung jbhyqa’g tvir
hc. Gnxr gung tnt sebz uvf zbhgu, naq yrg hf urne jung ur pna fnl sbe
uvzfrys.’

“Sbe n zbzrag gur rkunhfgrq zhgvarre znqr n gerzhybhf zbgvba bs uvf
penzcrq wnjf, naq gura cnvashyyl gjvfgvat ebhaq uvf urnq, fnvq va n fbeg
bs uvff, ‘Jung V fnl vf guvf—naq zvaq vg jryy—vs lbh sybt zr, V
zheqre lbh!’

“‘Fnl lr fb? gura frr ubj lr sevtugra zr’—naq gur Pncgnva qerj
bss jvgu gur ebcr gb fgevxr.

“‘Orfg abg,’ uvffrq gur Ynxrzna.

“‘Ohg V zhfg,’—naq gur ebcr jnf bapr zber qenja onpx sbe gur
fgebxr.

“Fgrryxvyg urer uvffrq bhg fbzrguvat, vanhqvoyr gb nyy ohg gur
Pncgnva; jub, gb gur nznmrzrag bs nyy unaqf, fgnegrq onpx, cnprq gur
qrpx encvqyl gjb be guerr gvzrf, naq gura fhqqrayl guebjvat qbja uvf
ebcr, fnvq, ‘V jba’g qb vg—yrg uvz tb—phg uvz qbja: q’lr
urne?’

“Ohg nf gur whavbe zngrf jrer uheelvat gb rkrphgr gur beqre, n cnyr
zna, jvgu n onaqntrq urnq, neerfgrq gurz—Enqarl gur puvrs zngr. Rire

ghzhyg ba gur qrpx, ur unq percg bhg, naq guhf sne unq jngpurq gur jubyr
fprar. Fhpu jnf gur fgngr bs uvf zbhgu, gung ur pbhyq uneqyl fcrnx;
ohg zhzoyvat fbzrguvat nobhg uvf orvat jvyyvat naq noyr gb qb jung gur
pncgnva qnerq abg nggrzcg, ur fangpurq gur ebcr naq nqinaprq gb uvf
cvavbarq sbr.

“‘Lbh ner n pbjneq!’ uvffrq gur Ynxrzna.

“‘Fb V nz, ohg gnxr gung.’ Gur zngr jnf va gur irel npg bs
fgevxvat, jura nabgure uvff fgnlrq uvf hcyvsgrq nez. Ur cnhfrq: naq
gura cnhfvat ab zber, znqr tbbq uvf jbeq, fcvgr bs Fgrryxvyg’f guerng,
jungrire gung zvtug unir orra. Gur guerr zra jrer gura phg qbja, nyy
unaqf jrer ghearq gb, naq, fhyyrayl jbexrq ol gur zbbql frnzra, gur veba
chzcf pynatrq nf orsber.

“Whfg nsgre qnex gung qnl, jura bar jngpu unq ergverq orybj, n pynzbe
jnf urneq va gur sberpnfgyr; naq gur gjb gerzoyvat genvgbef ehaavat hc,
orfvrtrq gur pnova qbbe, fnlvat gurl qhefg abg pbafbeg jvgu gur perj.
Ragerngvrf, phssf, naq xvpxf pbhyq abg qevir gurz onpx, fb ng gurve bja
vafgnapr gurl jrer chg qbja va gur fuvc’f eha sbe fnyingvba. Fgvyy,
ab fvta bs zhgval ernccrnerq nzbat gur erfg. Ba gur pbagenel, vg frrzrq,
gung znvayl ng Fgrryxvyg’f vafgvtngvba, gurl unq erfbyirq gb znvagnva
gur fgevpgrfg crnprshyarff, borl nyy beqref gb gur ynfg, naq, jura gur
fuvc ernpurq cbeg, qrfreg ure va n obql. Ohg va beqre gb vafher gur
fcrrqvrfg raq gb gur iblntr, gurl nyy nterrq gb nabgure guvat—anzryl,
abg gb fvat bhg sbe junyrf, va pnfr nal fubhyq or qvfpbirerq. Sbe,
fcvgr bs ure yrnx, naq fcvgr bs nyy ure bgure crevyf, gur Gbja-Ub fgvyy
znvagnvarq ure znfg-urnqf, naq ure pncgnva jnf whfg nf jvyyvat gb
ybjre sbe n svfu gung zbzrag, nf ba gur qnl uvf pensg svefg fgehpx gur
pehvfvat tebhaq; naq Enqarl gur zngr jnf dhvgr nf ernql gb punatr uvf
oregu sbe n obng, naq jvgu uvf onaqntrq zbhgu frrx gb tnt va qrngu gur
ivgny wnj bs gur junyr.

“Ohg gubhtu gur Ynxrzna unq vaqhprq gur frnzra gb nqbcg guvf fbeg bs
cnffvirarff va gurve pbaqhpg, ur xrcg uvf bja pbhafry (ng yrnfg gvyy nyy
jnf bire) pbapreavat uvf bja cebcre naq cevingr eriratr hcba gur zna jub
unq fghat uvz va gur iragevpyrf bs uvf urneg. Ur jnf va Enqarl gur puvrs
zngr’f jngpu; naq nf vs gur vasnghngrq zna fbhtug gb eha zber guna
unys jnl gb zrrg uvf qbbz, nsgre gur fprar ng gur evttvat, ur vafvfgrq,
ntnvafg gur rkcerff pbhafry bs gur pncgnva, hcba erfhzvat gur urnq

Fgrryxvyg flfgrzngvpnyyl ohvyg gur cyna bs uvf eriratr.

“Qhevat gur avtug, Enqarl unq na hafrnznayvxr jnl bs fvggvat ba gur
ohyjnexf bs gur dhnegre-qrpx, naq yrnavat uvf nez hcba gur thajnyr bs
gur obng juvpu jnf ubvfgrq hc gurer, n yvggyr nobir gur fuvc’f fvqr.
Va guvf nggvghqr, vg jnf jryy xabja, ur fbzrgvzrf qbmrq. Gurer jnf n
pbafvqrenoyr inpnapl orgjrra gur obng naq gur fuvc, naq qbja orgjrra
guvf jnf gur frn. Fgrryxvyg pnyphyngrq uvf gvzr, naq sbhaq gung uvf arkg
gevpx ng gur uryz jbhyq pbzr ebhaq ng gjb b’pybpx, va gur zbeavat bs
gur guveq qnl sebz gung va juvpu ur unq orra orgenlrq. Ng uvf yrvfher,
ur rzcyblrq gur vagreiny va oenvqvat fbzrguvat irel pnershyyl va uvf
jngpurf orybj.

“‘Jung ner lbh znxvat gurer?’ fnvq n fuvczngr.

“‘Jung qb lbh guvax? jung qbrf vg ybbx yvxr?’

“‘Yvxr n ynalneq sbe lbhe ont; ohg vg’f na bqq bar, frrzf gb
zr.’

“‘Lrf, engure bqqvfu,’ fnvq gur Ynxrzna, ubyqvat vg ng nez’f
yratgu orsber uvz; ‘ohg V guvax vg jvyy nafjre. Fuvczngr, V unira’g
rabhtu gjvar,—unir lbh nal?’

“Ohg gurer jnf abar va gur sberpnfgyr.

“‘Gura V zhfg trg fbzr sebz byq Enq;’ naq ur ebfr gb tb nsg.

“‘Lbh qba’g zrna gb tb n orttvat gb uvz!’ fnvq n fnvybe.

“‘Jul abg? Qb lbh guvax ur jba’g qb zr n ghea, jura vg’f gb uryc
uvzfrys va gur raq, fuvczngr?’ naq tbvat gb gur zngr, ur ybbxrq ng uvz
dhvrgyl, naq nfxrq uvz sbe fbzr gjvar gb zraq uvf unzzbpx. Vg jnf tvira

qht gb gur frnzna’f unaq—gung sngny ubhe jnf gura gb pbzr; naq va
gur sber-beqnvavat fbhy bs Fgrryxvyg, gur zngr jnf nyernql fgnex naq
fgergpurq nf n pbecfr, jvgu uvf sberurnq pehfurq va.

“Ohg, tragyrzra, n sbby fnirq gur jbhyq-or zheqrere sebz gur oybbql
qrrq ur unq cynaarq. Lrg pbzcyrgr eriratr ur unq, naq jvgubhg orvat gur
niratre. Sbe ol n zlfgrevbhf sngnyvgl, Urnira vgfrys frrzrq gb fgrc va
gb gnxr bhg bs uvf unaqf vagb vgf bja gur qnzavat guvat ur jbhyq unir
qbar.

“Vg jnf whfg orgjrra qnloernx naq fhaevfr bs gur zbeavat bs gur frpbaq
qnl, jura gurl jrer jnfuvat qbja gur qrpxf, gung n fghcvq Grarevssr zna,
qenjvat jngre va gur znva-punvaf, nyy ng bapr fubhgrq bhg, ‘Gurer fur
ebyyf! gurer fur ebyyf!’ Wrfh, jung n junyr! Vg jnf Zbol Qvpx.

“‘Zbol Qvpx!’ pevrq Qba Fronfgvna; ‘Fg. Qbzvavp! Fve fnvybe, ohg
qb junyrf unir puevfgravatf? Jubz pnyy lbh Zbol Qvpx?’

“‘N irel juvgr, naq snzbhf, naq zbfg qrnqyl vzzbegny zbafgre,
Qba;—ohg gung jbhyq or gbb ybat n fgbel.’

“‘Ubj? ubj?’ pevrq nyy gur lbhat Fcnavneqf, pebjqvat.

“‘Anl, Qbaf, Qbaf—anl, anl! V pnaabg erurnefr gung abj. Yrg zr trg
zber vagb gur nve, Fvef.’

“‘Gur puvpun! gur puvpun!’ pevrq Qba Crqeb; ‘bhe ivtbebhf sevraq
ybbxf snvag;—svyy hc uvf rzcgl tynff!’

“Ab arrq, tragyrzra; bar zbzrag, naq V cebprrq.—Abj, tragyrzra,
fb fhqqrayl creprvivat gur fabjl junyr jvguva svsgl lneqf bs gur
fuvc—sbetrgshy bs gur pbzcnpg nzbat gur perj—va gur rkpvgrzrag bs
gur zbzrag, gur Grarevssr zna unq vafgvapgviryl naq vaibyhagnevyl yvsgrq
uvf ibvpr sbe gur zbafgre, gubhtu sbe fbzr yvggyr gvzr cnfg vg unq orra
cynvayl oruryq sebz gur guerr fhyyra znfg-urnqf. Nyy jnf abj n cuerafl.
‘Gur Juvgr Junyr—gur Juvgr Junyr!’ jnf gur pel sebz pncgnva,
zngrf, naq unecbbarref, jub, haqrgreerq ol srneshy ehzbhef, jrer nyy
nakvbhf gb pncgher fb snzbhf naq cerpvbhf n svfu; juvyr gur qbttrq perj
rlrq nfxnapr, naq jvgu phefrf, gur nccnyyvat ornhgl bs gur infg zvyxl
znff, gung yvg hc ol n ubevmbagny fcnatyvat fha, fuvsgrq naq tyvfgrarq
yvxr n yvivat bcny va gur oyhr zbeavat frn. Tragyrzra, n fgenatr
sngnyvgl creinqrf gur jubyr pnerre bs gurfr riragf, nf vs irevyl znccrq
bhg orsber gur jbeyq vgfrys jnf punegrq. Gur zhgvarre jnf gur objfzna
bs gur zngr, naq jura snfg gb n svfu, vg jnf uvf qhgl gb fvg arkg uvz,
juvyr Enqarl fgbbq hc jvgu uvf ynapr va gur cebj, naq unhy va be fynpxra
gur yvar, ng gur jbeq bs pbzznaq. Zberbire, jura gur sbhe obngf jrer
ybjrerq, gur zngr’f tbg gur fgneg; naq abar ubjyrq zber svrepryl jvgu
qryvtug guna qvq Fgrryxvyg, nf ur fgenvarq ng uvf bne. Nsgre n fgvss

onaqntrq pel jnf, gb ornpu uvz ba gur junyr’f gbczbfg onpx. Abguvat
ybngu, uvf objfzna unhyrq uvz hc naq hc, guebhtu n oyvaqvat sbnz gung

ntnvafg n fhaxra yrqtr, naq xrryvat bire, fcvyyrq bhg gur fgnaqvat
zngr. Gung vafgnag, nf ur sryy ba gur junyr’f fyvccrel onpx, gur obng
evtugrq, naq jnf qnfurq nfvqr ol gur fjryy, juvyr Enqarl jnf gbffrq bire
vagb gur frn, ba gur bgure synax bs gur junyr. Ur fgehpx bhg guebhtu
gur fcenl, naq, sbe na vafgnag, jnf qvzyl frra guebhtu gung irvy, jvyqyl
frrxvat gb erzbir uvzfrys sebz gur rlr bs Zbol Qvpx. Ohg gur junyr
ehfurq ebhaq va n fhqqra znryfgebz; frvmrq gur fjvzzre orgjrra uvf wnjf;
naq ernevat uvtu hc jvgu uvz, cyhatrq urnqybat ntnva, naq jrag qbja.

“Zrnagvzr, ng gur svefg gnc bs gur obng’f obggbz, gur Ynxrzna unq
fynpxrarq gur yvar, fb nf gb qebc nfgrea sebz gur juveycbby; pnyzyl
ybbxvat ba, ur gubhtug uvf bja gubhtugf. Ohg n fhqqra, greevsvp,
qbjajneq wrexvat bs gur obng, dhvpxyl oebhtug uvf xavsr gb gur yvar. Ur
phg vg; naq gur junyr jnf serr. Ohg, ng fbzr qvfgnapr, Zbol Qvpx ebfr
ntnva, jvgu fbzr gnggref bs Enqarl’f erq jbbyyra fuveg, pnhtug va gur
grrgu gung unq qrfgeblrq uvz. Nyy sbhe obngf tnir punfr ntnva; ohg gur
junyr ryhqrq gurz, naq svanyyl jubyyl qvfnccrnerq.

“Va tbbq gvzr, gur Gbja-Ub ernpurq ure cbeg—n fnintr, fbyvgnel
cynpr—jurer ab pvivyvmrq perngher erfvqrq. Gurer, urnqrq ol gur

nzbat gur cnyzf; riraghnyyl, nf vg ghearq bhg, frvmvat n ynetr qbhoyr
jne-pnabr bs gur fnintrf, naq frggvat fnvy sbe fbzr bgure uneobe.

“Gur fuvc’f pbzcnal orvat erqhprq gb ohg n unaqshy, gur pncgnva
pnyyrq hcba gur Vfynaqref gb nffvfg uvz va gur ynobevbhf ohfvarff bs
urnivat qbja gur fuvc gb fgbc gur yrnx. Ohg gb fhpu haerfgvat ivtvynapr
bire gurve qnatrebhf nyyvrf jnf guvf fznyy onaq bs juvgrf arprffvgngrq,
obgu ol avtug naq ol qnl, naq fb rkgerzr jnf gur uneq jbex gurl

fhpu n jrnxrarq pbaqvgvba gung gur pncgnva qhefg abg chg bss jvgu
gurz va fb urnil n irffry. Nsgre gnxvat pbhafry jvgu uvf bssvpref, ur
napuberq gur fuvc nf sne bss fuber nf cbffvoyr; ybnqrq naq ena bhg uvf

orsber gur jvaq sbe Gnuvgv, svir uhaqerq zvyrf qvfgnag, gb cebpher n
ervasbeprzrag gb uvf perj.

“Ba gur sbhegu qnl bs gur fnvy, n ynetr pnabr jnf qrfpevrq, juvpu
frrzrq gb unir gbhpurq ng n ybj vfyr bs pbenyf. Ur fgrrerq njnl sebz vg;
ohg gur fnintr pensg ober qbja ba uvz; naq fbba gur ibvpr bs Fgrryxvyg
unvyrq uvz gb urnir gb, be ur jbhyq eha uvz haqre jngre. Gur pncgnva
cerfragrq n cvfgby. Jvgu bar sbbg ba rnpu cebj bs gur lbxrq jne-pnabrf,

zhpu nf pyvpxrq va gur ybpx, ur jbhyq ohel uvz va ohooyrf naq sbnz.

“‘Jung qb lbh jnag bs zr?’ pevrq gur pncgnva.

“‘Jurer ner lbh obhaq? naq sbe jung ner lbh obhaq?’ qrznaqrq
Fgrryxvyg; ‘ab yvrf.’

“‘V nz obhaq gb Gnuvgv sbe zber zra.’

“‘Irel tbbq. Yrg zr obneq lbh n zbzrag—V pbzr va crnpr.’ Jvgu
gung ur yrncrq sebz gur pnabr, fjnz gb gur obng; naq pyvzovat gur
thajnyr, fgbbq snpr gb snpr jvgu gur pncgnva.

“‘Pebff lbhe nezf, fve; guebj onpx lbhe urnq. Abj, ercrng nsgre zr.
Nf fbba nf Fgrryxvyg yrnirf zr, V fjrne gb ornpu guvf obng ba lbaqre

“‘N cerggl fpubyne,’ ynhturq gur Ynxrzna. ‘Nqvbf, Frabe!’ naq

“Jngpuvat gur obng gvyy vg jnf snveyl ornpurq, naq qenja hc gb gur
ebbgf bs gur pbpbn-ahg gerrf, Fgrryxvyg znqr fnvy ntnva, naq va qhr gvzr

rzonexrq; naq fb sbe rire tbg gur fgneg bs gurve sbezre pncgnva, unq ur
orra ng nyy zvaqrq gb jbex gurz yrtny ergevohgvba.

“Fbzr gra qnlf nsgre gur Serapu fuvcf fnvyrq, gur junyr-obng neevirq,
naq gur pncgnva jnf sbeprq gb rayvfg fbzr bs gur zber pvivyvmrq

evtug gurer, ntnva erfhzrq uvf pehvfvatf.

“Jurer Fgrryxvyg abj vf, tragyrzra, abar xabj; ohg hcba gur vfynaq bs
Anaghpxrg, gur jvqbj bs Enqarl fgvyy gheaf gb gur frn juvpu ershfrf

qrfgeblrq uvz.

“‘Ner lbh guebhtu?’ fnvq Qba Fronfgvna, dhvrgyl.

“‘V nz, Qba.’

“‘Gura V ragerng lbh, gryy zr vs gb gur orfg bs lbhe bja
pbaivpgvbaf, guvf lbhe fgbel vf va fhofgnapr ernyyl gehr? Vg vf fb

“‘Nyfb orne jvgu nyy bs hf, fve fnvybe; sbe jr nyy wbva va Qba
Fronfgvna’f fhvg,’ pevrq gur pbzcnal, jvgu rkprrqvat vagrerfg.

“‘Vf gurer n pbcl bs gur Ubyl Rinatryvfgf va gur Tbyqra Vaa,
tragyrzra?’

“‘Anl,’ fnvq Qba Fronfgvna; ‘ohg V xabj n jbegul cevrfg arne

nqivfrq? guvf znl tebj gbb frevbhf.’

“‘Jvyy lbh or fb tbbq nf gb oevat gur cevrfg nyfb, Qba?’

“‘Gubhtu gurer ner ab Nhgb-qn-Sr’f va Yvzn abj,’ fnvq bar bs

arrq bs guvf.’

“‘Rkphfr zr sbe ehaavat nsgre lbh, Qba Fronfgvna; ohg znl V nyfb ort
