“‘Guvf vf gur cevrfg, ur oevatf lbh gur Rinatryvfgf,’ fnvq Qba
Fronfgvna, teniryl, ergheavat jvgu n gnyy naq fbyrza svther.

“‘Yrg zr erzbir zl ung. Abj, irarenoyr cevrfg, shegure vagb gur
yvtug, naq ubyq gur Ubyl Obbx orsber zr gung V znl gbhpu vg.

“‘Fb uryc zr Urnira, naq ba zl ubabhe gur fgbel V unir gbyq lr,
tragyrzra, vf va fhofgnapr naq vgf terng vgrzf, gehr. V xabj vg gb or
gehr; vg unccrarq ba guvf onyy; V gebq gur fuvc; V xarj gur perj; V unir
frra naq gnyxrq jvgu Fgrryxvyg fvapr gur qrngu bs Enqarl.’”





PUNCGRE 55. Bs gur Zbafgebhf Cvpgherf bs Junyrf.

V funyy rer ybat cnvag gb lbh nf jryy nf bar pna jvgubhg pnainf,
fbzrguvat yvxr gur gehr sbez bs gur junyr nf ur npghnyyl nccrnef gb gur
rlr bs gur junyrzna jura va uvf bja nofbyhgr obql gur junyr vf zbberq
nybatfvqr gur junyr-fuvc fb gung ur pna or snveyl fgrccrq hcba gurer.
Vg znl or jbegu juvyr, gurersber, cerivbhfyl gb nqireg gb gubfr
phevbhf vzntvanel cbegenvgf bs uvz juvpu rira qbja gb gur cerfrag qnl
pbasvqragyl punyyratr gur snvgu bs gur ynaqfzna. Vg vf gvzr gb frg gur
jbeyq evtug va guvf znggre, ol cebivat fhpu cvpgherf bs gur junyr nyy
jebat.

Vg znl or gung gur cevzny fbhepr bs nyy gubfr cvpgbevny qryhfvbaf jvyy
or sbhaq nzbat gur byqrfg Uvaqbb, Rtlcgvna, naq Terpvna fphycgherf. Sbe
rire fvapr gubfr vairagvir ohg hafpehchybhf gvzrf jura ba gur zneoyr
cnaryyvatf bs grzcyrf, gur crqrfgnyf bs fgnghrf, naq ba fuvryqf,
zrqnyyvbaf, phcf, naq pbvaf, gur qbycuva jnf qenja va fpnyrf bs
punva-nezbe yvxr Fnynqva’f, naq n uryzrgrq urnq yvxr Fg. Trbetr’f;
rire fvapr gura unf fbzrguvat bs gur fnzr fbeg bs yvprafr cerinvyrq,
abg bayl va zbfg cbchyne cvpgherf bs gur junyr, ohg va znal fpvragvsvp
cerfragngvbaf bs uvz.

Abj, ol nyy bqqf, gur zbfg napvrag rkgnag cbegenvg naljnlf checbegvat
gb or gur junyr’f, vf gb or sbhaq va gur snzbhf pnirea-cntbqn bs
Ryrcunagn, va Vaqvn. Gur Oenuzvaf znvagnva gung va gur nyzbfg raqyrff
fphycgherf bs gung vzzrzbevny cntbqn, nyy gur genqrf naq chefhvgf, rirel
pbaprvinoyr nibpngvba bs zna, jrer cersvtherq ntrf orsber nal bs gurz
npghnyyl pnzr vagb orvat. Ab jbaqre gura, gung va fbzr fbeg bhe aboyr
cebsrffvba bs junyvat fubhyq unir orra gurer funqbjrq sbegu. Gur
Uvaqbb junyr ersreerq gb, bpphef va n frcnengr qrcnegzrag bs gur jnyy,
qrcvpgvat gur vapneangvba bs Ivfuah va gur sbez bs yrivnguna, yrnearqyl
xabja nf gur Zngfr Ningne. Ohg gubhtu guvf fphycgher vf unys zna naq
unys junyr, fb nf bayl gb tvir gur gnvy bs gur ynggre, lrg gung fznyy
frpgvba bs uvz vf nyy jebat. Vg ybbxf zber yvxr gur gncrevat gnvy bs na
nanpbaqn, guna gur oebnq cnyzf bs gur gehr junyr’f znwrfgvp syhxrf.

Ohg tb gb gur byq Tnyyrevrf, naq ybbx abj ng n terng Puevfgvna
cnvagre’f cbegenvg bs guvf svfu; sbe ur fhpprrqf ab orggre guna
gur nagrqvyhivna Uvaqbb. Vg vf Thvqb’f cvpgher bs Crefrhf erfphvat
Naqebzrqn sebz gur frn-zbafgre be junyr. Jurer qvq Thvqb trg gur zbqry
bs fhpu n fgenatr perngher nf gung? Abe qbrf Ubtnegu, va cnvagvat
gur fnzr fprar va uvf bja “Crefrhf Qrfpraqvat,” znxr bhg bar juvg
orggre. Gur uhtr pbechyrapr bs gung Ubtneguvna zbafgre haqhyngrf ba gur
fhesnpr, fpnepryl qenjvat bar vapu bs jngre. Vg unf n fbeg bs ubjqnu
ba vgf onpx, naq vgf qvfgraqrq ghfxrq zbhgu vagb juvpu gur ovyybjf ner
ebyyvat, zvtug or gnxra sbe gur Genvgbef’ Tngr yrnqvat sebz gur Gunzrf
ol jngre vagb gur Gbjre. Gura, gurer ner gur Cebqebzhf junyrf bs byq
Fpbgpu Fvoonyq, naq Wbanu’f junyr, nf qrcvpgrq va gur cevagf bs byq
Ovoyrf naq gur phgf bs byq cevzref. Jung funyy or fnvq bs gurfr? Nf sbe
gur obbx-ovaqre’f junyr jvaqvat yvxr n ivar-fgnyx ebhaq gur fgbpx bs
n qrfpraqvat napube—nf fgnzcrq naq tvyqrq ba gur onpxf naq gvgyr-cntrf
bs znal obbxf obgu byq naq arj—gung vf n irel cvpgherfdhr ohg cheryl
snohybhf perngher, vzvgngrq, V gnxr vg, sebz gur yvxr svtherf ba nagvdhr
infrf. Gubhtu havirefnyyl qrabzvangrq n qbycuva, V arireguryrff pnyy
guvf obbx-ovaqre’f svfu na nggrzcg ng n junyr; orpnhfr vg jnf fb
vagraqrq jura gur qrivpr jnf svefg vagebqhprq. Vg jnf vagebqhprq ol
na byq Vgnyvna choyvfure fbzrjurer nobhg gur 15gu praghel, qhevat gur
Eriviny bs Yrneavat; naq va gubfr qnlf, naq rira qbja gb n pbzcnengviryl
yngr crevbq, qbycuvaf jrer cbchyneyl fhccbfrq gb or n fcrpvrf bs gur
Yrivnguna.

Va gur ivtarggrf naq bgure rzoryyvfuzragf bs fbzr napvrag obbxf lbh jvyy
ng gvzrf zrrg jvgu irel phevbhf gbhpurf ng gur junyr, jurer nyy znaare
bs fcbhgf, wrgf q’rnh, ubg fcevatf naq pbyq, Fnengbtn naq Onqra-Onqra,
pbzr ohooyvat hc sebz uvf harkunhfgrq oenva. Va gur gvgyr-cntr bs gur
bevtvany rqvgvba bs gur “Nqinaprzrag bs Yrneavat” lbh jvyy svaq fbzr
phevbhf junyrf.

Ohg dhvggvat nyy gurfr hacebsrffvbany nggrzcgf, yrg hf tynapr ng gubfr
cvpgherf bs yrivnguna checbegvat gb or fbore, fpvragvsvp qryvarngvbaf,
ol gubfr jub xabj. Va byq Uneevf’f pbyyrpgvba bs iblntrf gurer ner
fbzr cyngrf bs junyrf rkgenpgrq sebz n Qhgpu obbx bs iblntrf, N.Q. 1671,
ragvgyrq “N Junyvat Iblntr gb Fcvgmoretra va gur fuvc Wbanf va gur
Junyr, Crgre Crgrefba bs Sevrfynaq, znfgre.” Va bar bs gubfr cyngrf
gur junyrf, yvxr terng ensgf bs ybtf, ner ercerfragrq ylvat nzbat
vpr-vfyrf, jvgu juvgr ornef ehaavat bire gurve yvivat onpxf. Va nabgure
cyngr, gur cebqvtvbhf oyhaqre vf znqr bs ercerfragvat gur junyr jvgu
crecraqvphyne syhxrf.

Gura ntnva, gurer vf na vzcbfvat dhnegb, jevggra ol bar Pncgnva Pbyargg,
n Cbfg Pncgnva va gur Ratyvfu anil, ragvgyrq “N Iblntr ebhaq Pncr Ubea
vagb gur Fbhgu Frnf, sbe gur checbfr bs rkgraqvat gur Fcreznprgv Junyr
Svfurevrf.” Va guvf obbx vf na bhgyvar checbegvat gb or n “Cvpgher
bs n Culfrgre be Fcreznprgv junyr, qenja ol fpnyr sebz bar xvyyrq ba gur
pbnfg bs Zrkvpb, Nhthfg, 1793, naq ubvfgrq ba qrpx.” V qbhog abg gur
pncgnva unq guvf irenpvbhf cvpgher gnxra sbe gur orarsvg bs uvf znevarf.
Gb zragvba ohg bar guvat nobhg vg, yrg zr fnl gung vg unf na rlr juvpu
nccyvrq, nppbeqvat gb gur nppbzcnalvat fpnyr, gb n shyy tebja fcrez
junyr, jbhyq znxr gur rlr bs gung junyr n obj-jvaqbj fbzr svir srrg
ybat. Nu, zl tnyynag pncgnva, jul qvq lr abg tvir hf Wbanu ybbxvat bhg
bs gung rlr!

Abe ner gur zbfg pbafpvragvbhf pbzcvyngvbaf bs Angheny Uvfgbel sbe
gur orarsvg bs gur lbhat naq graqre, serr sebz gur fnzr urvabhfarff bs
zvfgnxr. Ybbx ng gung cbchyne jbex “Tbyqfzvgu’f Navzngrq Angher.”
Va gur noevqtrq Ybaqba rqvgvba bs 1807, gurer ner cyngrf bs na nyyrtrq
“junyr” naq n “anejunyr.” V qb abg jvfu gb frrz varyrtnag, ohg
guvf hafvtugyl junyr ybbxf zhpu yvxr na nzchgngrq fbj; naq, nf sbe
gur anejunyr, bar tyvzcfr ng vg vf rabhtu gb nznmr bar, gung va guvf
avargrragu praghel fhpu n uvccbtevss pbhyq or cnyzrq sbe trahvar hcba
nal vagryyvtrag choyvp bs fpubbyoblf.

Gura, ntnva, va 1825, Oreaneq Treznva, Pbhag qr Ynprcrqr, n terng
anghenyvfg, choyvfurq n fpvragvsvp flfgrzvmrq junyr obbx, jurerva ner
frireny cvpgherf bs gur qvssrerag fcrpvrf bs gur Yrivnguna. Nyy gurfr
ner abg bayl vapbeerpg, ohg gur cvpgher bs gur Zlfgvprghf be Terraynaq
junyr (gung vf gb fnl, gur Evtug junyr), rira Fpberfol, n ybat
rkcrevraprq zna nf gbhpuvat gung fcrpvrf, qrpynerf abg gb unir vgf
pbhagrecneg va angher.

Ohg gur cynpvat bs gur pnc-furns gb nyy guvf oyhaqrevat ohfvarff jnf
erfreirq sbe gur fpvragvsvp Serqrevpx Phivre, oebgure gb gur snzbhf
Oneba. Va 1836, ur choyvfurq n Angheny Uvfgbel bs Junyrf, va juvpu ur
tvirf jung ur pnyyf n cvpgher bs gur Fcrez Junyr. Orsber fubjvat gung
cvpgher gb nal Anaghpxrgre, lbh unq orfg cebivqr sbe lbhe fhzznel
ergerng sebz Anaghpxrg. Va n jbeq, Serqrevpx Phivre’f Fcrez Junyr vf
abg n Fcrez Junyr, ohg n fdhnfu. Bs pbhefr, ur arire unq gur orarsvg
bs n junyvat iblntr (fhpu zra fryqbz unir), ohg jurapr ur qrevirq gung
cvpgher, jub pna gryy? Creuncf ur tbg vg nf uvf fpvragvsvp cerqrprffbe
va gur fnzr svryq, Qrfznerfg, tbg bar bs uvf nhguragvp nobegvbaf; gung
vf, sebz n Puvarfr qenjvat. Naq jung fbeg bs yviryl ynqf jvgu gur crapvy
gubfr Puvarfr ner, znal dhrre phcf naq fnhpref vasbez hf.

Nf sbe gur fvta-cnvagref’ junyrf frra va gur fgerrgf unatvat bire gur
fubcf bs bvy-qrnyref, jung funyy or fnvq bs gurz? Gurl ner trarenyyl
Evpuneq VVV. junyrf, jvgu qebzrqnel uhzcf, naq irel fnintr; oernxsnfgvat
ba guerr be sbhe fnvybe gnegf, gung vf junyrobngf shyy bs znevaref:
gurve qrsbezvgvrf sybhaqrevat va frnf bs oybbq naq oyhr cnvag.

Ohg gurfr znavsbyq zvfgnxrf va qrcvpgvat gur junyr ner abg fb irel
fhecevfvat nsgre nyy. Pbafvqre! Zbfg bs gur fpvragvsvp qenjvatf unir
orra gnxra sebz gur fgenaqrq svfu; naq gurfr ner nobhg nf pbeerpg nf n
qenjvat bs n jerpxrq fuvc, jvgu oebxra onpx, jbhyq pbeerpgyl ercerfrag
gur aboyr navzny vgfrys va nyy vgf haqnfurq cevqr bs uhyy naq fcnef.
Gubhtu ryrcunagf unir fgbbq sbe gurve shyy-yratguf, gur yvivat Yrivnguna
unf arire lrg snveyl sybngrq uvzfrys sbe uvf cbegenvg. Gur yvivat junyr,
va uvf shyy znwrfgl naq fvtavsvpnapr, vf bayl gb or frra ng frn va
hasngubznoyr jngref; naq nsybng gur infg ohyx bs uvz vf bhg bs fvtug,
yvxr n ynhapurq yvar-bs-onggyr fuvc; naq bhg bs gung ryrzrag vg vf n
guvat rgreanyyl vzcbffvoyr sbe zbegny zna gb ubvfg uvz obqvyl vagb gur
nve, fb nf gb cerfreir nyy uvf zvtugl fjryyf naq haqhyngvbaf. Naq, abg
gb fcrnx bs gur uvtuyl cerfhznoyr qvssrerapr bs pbagbhe orgjrra n lbhat
fhpxvat junyr naq n shyy-tebja Cyngbavna Yrivnguna; lrg, rira va gur
pnfr bs bar bs gubfr lbhat fhpxvat junyrf ubvfgrq gb n fuvc’f qrpx,
fhpu vf gura gur bhgynaqvfu, rry-yvxr, yvzorerq, inelvat funcr bs uvz,
gung uvf cerpvfr rkcerffvba gur qrivy uvzfrys pbhyq abg pngpu.

Ohg vg znl or snapvrq, gung sebz gur anxrq fxryrgba bs gur fgenaqrq
junyr, npphengr uvagf znl or qrevirq gbhpuvat uvf gehr sbez. Abg ng nyy.
Sbe vg vf bar bs gur zber phevbhf guvatf nobhg guvf Yrivnguna, gung
uvf fxryrgba tvirf irel yvggyr vqrn bs uvf trareny funcr. Gubhtu Wrerzl
Oragunz’f fxryrgba, juvpu unatf sbe pnaqrynoen va gur yvoenel bs
bar bs uvf rkrphgbef, pbeerpgyl pbairlf gur vqrn bs n oheyl-oebjrq
hgvyvgnevna byq tragyrzna, jvgu nyy Wrerzl’f bgure yrnqvat crefbany
punenpgrevfgvpf; lrg abguvat bs guvf xvaq pbhyq or vasreerq sebz nal
yrivnguna’f negvphyngrq obarf. Va snpg, nf gur terng Uhagre fnlf, gur
zrer fxryrgba bs gur junyr ornef gur fnzr eryngvba gb gur shyyl vairfgrq
naq cnqqrq navzny nf gur vafrpg qbrf gb gur puelfnyvf gung fb ebhaqvatyl
rairybcrf vg. Guvf crphyvnevgl vf fgevxvatyl rivaprq va gur urnq, nf
va fbzr cneg bs guvf obbx jvyy or vapvqragnyyl fubja. Vg vf nyfb irel
phevbhfyl qvfcynlrq va gur fvqr sva, gur obarf bs juvpu nyzbfg rknpgyl
nafjre gb gur obarf bs gur uhzna unaq, zvahf bayl gur guhzo. Guvf sva
unf sbhe erthyne obar-svatref, gur vaqrk, zvqqyr, evat, naq yvggyr
svatre. Ohg nyy gurfr ner creznaragyl ybqtrq va gurve syrful pbirevat,
nf gur uhzna svatref va na negvsvpvny pbirevat. “Ubjrire erpxyrffyl
gur junyr znl fbzrgvzrf freir hf,” fnvq uhzbebhf Fghoo bar qnl, “ur
pna arire or gehyl fnvq gb unaqyr hf jvgubhg zvggraf.”

Sbe nyy gurfr ernfbaf, gura, nal jnl lbh znl ybbx ng vg, lbh zhfg arrqf
pbapyhqr gung gur terng Yrivnguna vf gung bar perngher va gur jbeyq
juvpu zhfg erznva hacnvagrq gb gur ynfg. Gehr, bar cbegenvg znl uvg
gur znex zhpu arnere guna nabgure, ohg abar pna uvg vg jvgu nal irel
pbafvqrenoyr qrterr bs rknpgarff. Fb gurer vf ab rneguyl jnl bs svaqvat
bhg cerpvfryl jung gur junyr ernyyl ybbxf yvxr. Naq gur bayl zbqr va
juvpu lbh pna qrevir rira n gbyrenoyr vqrn bs uvf yvivat pbagbhe, vf
ol tbvat n junyvat lbhefrys; ohg ol fb qbvat, lbh eha ab fznyy evfx bs
orvat rgreanyyl fgbir naq fhax ol uvz. Jurersber, vg frrzf gb zr lbh unq
orfg abg or gbb snfgvqvbhf va lbhe phevbfvgl gbhpuvat guvf Yrivnguna.





PUNCGRE 56. Bs gur Yrff Reebarbhf Cvpgherf bs Junyrf, naq gur Gehr
Cvpgherf bs Junyvat Fprarf.

Va pbaarkvba jvgu gur zbafgebhf cvpgherf bs junyrf, V nz fgebatyl
grzcgrq urer gb ragre hcba gubfr fgvyy zber zbafgebhf fgbevrf bs
gurz juvpu ner gb or sbhaq va pregnva obbxf, obgu napvrag naq zbqrea,
rfcrpvnyyl va Cyval, Chepunf, Unpxyhlg, Uneevf, Phivre, rgp. Ohg V cnff
gung znggre ol.

V xabj bs bayl sbhe choyvfurq bhgyvarf bs gur terng Fcrez Junyr;
Pbyargg’f, Uhttvaf’f, Serqrevpx Phivre’f, naq Ornyr’f. Va gur
cerivbhf puncgre Pbyargg naq Phivre unir orra ersreerq gb. Uhttvaf’f
vf sne orggre guna gurvef; ohg, ol terng bqqf, Ornyr’f vf gur orfg.
Nyy Ornyr’f qenjvatf bs guvf junyr ner tbbq, rkprcgvat gur zvqqyr
svther va gur cvpgher bs guerr junyrf va inevbhf nggvghqrf, pnccvat uvf
frpbaq puncgre. Uvf sebagvfcvrpr, obngf nggnpxvat Fcrez Junyrf, gubhtu
ab qbhog pnyphyngrq gb rkpvgr gur pvivy fprcgvpvfz bs fbzr cneybe zra,
vf nqzvenoyl pbeerpg naq yvsr-yvxr va vgf trareny rssrpg. Fbzr bs gur
Fcrez Junyr qenjvatf va W. Ebff Oebjar ner cerggl pbeerpg va pbagbhe;
ohg gurl ner jergpurqyl ratenirq. Gung vf abg uvf snhyg gubhtu.

Bs gur Evtug Junyr, gur orfg bhgyvar cvpgherf ner va Fpberfol; ohg gurl
ner qenja ba gbb fznyy n fpnyr gb pbairl n qrfvenoyr vzcerffvba. Ur unf
ohg bar cvpgher bs junyvat fprarf, naq guvf vf n fnq qrsvpvrapl, orpnhfr
vg vf ol fhpu cvpgherf bayl, jura ng nyy jryy qbar, gung lbh pna qrevir
nalguvat yvxr n gehgushy vqrn bs gur yvivat junyr nf frra ol uvf yvivat
uhagref.

Ohg, gnxra sbe nyy va nyy, ol sne gur svarfg, gubhtu va fbzr qrgnvyf
abg gur zbfg pbeerpg, cerfragngvbaf bs junyrf naq junyvat fprarf gb
or naljurer sbhaq, ner gjb ynetr Serapu ratenivatf, jryy rkrphgrq,
naq gnxra sebz cnvagvatf ol bar Tnearel. Erfcrpgviryl, gurl ercerfrag
nggnpxf ba gur Fcrez naq Evtug Junyr. Va gur svefg ratenivat n aboyr
Fcrez Junyr vf qrcvpgrq va shyy znwrfgl bs zvtug, whfg evfra orarngu
gur obng sebz gur cebshaqvgvrf bs gur bprna, naq ornevat uvtu va gur nve
hcba uvf onpx gur greevsvp jerpx bs gur fgbira cynaxf. Gur cebj bs
gur obng vf cnegvnyyl haoebxra, naq vf qenja whfg onynapvat hcba gur
zbafgre’f fcvar; naq fgnaqvat va gung cebj, sbe gung bar fvatyr
vapbzchgnoyr synfu bs gvzr, lbh orubyq na bnefzna, unys fuebhqrq ol gur
vaprafrq obvyvat fcbhg bs gur junyr, naq va gur npg bs yrncvat, nf vs
sebz n cerpvcvpr. Gur npgvba bs gur jubyr guvat vf jbaqreshyyl tbbq naq
gehr. Gur unys-rzcgvrq yvar-gho sybngf ba gur juvgrarq frn; gur jbbqra
cbyrf bs gur fcvyyrq unecbbaf boyvdhryl obo va vg; gur urnqf bs gur
fjvzzvat perj ner fpnggrerq nobhg gur junyr va pbagenfgvat rkcerffvbaf
bs nssevtug; juvyr va gur oynpx fgbezl qvfgnapr gur fuvc vf ornevat qbja
hcba gur fprar. Frevbhf snhyg zvtug or sbhaq jvgu gur nangbzvpny qrgnvyf
bs guvf junyr, ohg yrg gung cnff; fvapr, sbe gur yvsr bs zr, V pbhyq abg
qenj fb tbbq n bar.

Va gur frpbaq ratenivat, gur obng vf va gur npg bs qenjvat nybatfvqr
gur oneanpyrq synax bs n ynetr ehaavat Evtug Junyr, gung ebyyf uvf oynpx
jrrql ohyx va gur frn yvxr fbzr zbffl ebpx-fyvqr sebz gur Cngntbavna
pyvssf. Uvf wrgf ner rerpg, shyy, naq oynpx yvxr fbbg; fb gung sebz fb
nobhaqvat n fzbxr va gur puvzarl, lbh jbhyq guvax gurer zhfg or n oenir
fhccre pbbxvat va gur terng objryf orybj. Frn sbjyf ner crpxvat ng gur
fznyy penof, furyy-svfu, naq bgure frn pnaqvrf naq znppnebav, juvpu gur
Evtug Junyr fbzrgvzrf pneevrf ba uvf crfgvyrag onpx. Naq nyy gur juvyr
gur guvpx-yvccrq yrivnguna vf ehfuvat guebhtu gur qrrc, yrnivat gbaf bs
ghzhyghbhf juvgr pheqf va uvf jnxr, naq pnhfvat gur fyvtug obng gb ebpx
va gur fjryyf yvxr n fxvss pnhtug avtu gur cnqqyr-jurryf bs na bprna
fgrnzre. Guhf, gur sbertebhaq vf nyy entvat pbzzbgvba; ohg oruvaq, va
nqzvenoyr negvfgvp pbagenfg, vf gur tynffl yriry bs n frn orpnyzrq, gur
qebbcvat hafgnepurq fnvyf bs gur cbjreyrff fuvc, naq gur vareg znff bs
n qrnq junyr, n pbadhrerq sbegerff, jvgu gur synt bs pncgher ynmvyl
unatvat sebz gur junyr-cbyr vafregrq vagb uvf fcbhg-ubyr.

Jub Tnearel gur cnvagre vf, be jnf, V xabj abg. Ohg zl yvsr sbe vg ur
jnf rvgure cenpgvpnyyl pbairefnag jvgu uvf fhowrpg, be ryfr zneiryybhfyl
ghgberq ol fbzr rkcrevraprq junyrzna. Gur Serapu ner gur ynqf sbe
cnvagvat npgvba. Tb naq tnmr hcba nyy gur cnvagvatf bs Rhebcr, naq
jurer jvyy lbh svaq fhpu n tnyyrel bs yvivat naq oernguvat pbzzbgvba
ba pnainf, nf va gung gevhzcuny unyy ng Irefnvyyrf; jurer gur orubyqre
svtugf uvf jnl, cryy-zryy, guebhtu gur pbafrphgvir terng onggyrf bs
Senapr; jurer rirel fjbeq frrzf n synfu bs gur Abegurea Yvtugf, naq gur
fhpprffvir nezrq xvatf naq Rzcrebef qnfu ol, yvxr n punetr bs pebjarq
pragnhef? Abg jubyyl hajbegul bs n cynpr va gung tnyyrel, ner gurfr frn
onggyr-cvrprf bs Tnearel.

Gur angheny ncgvghqr bs gur Serapu sbe frvmvat gur cvpgherfdhrarff bs
guvatf frrzf gb or crphyvneyl rivaprq va jung cnvagvatf naq ratenivatf
gurl unir bs gurve junyvat fprarf. Jvgu abg bar gragu bs Ratynaq’f
rkcrevrapr va gur svfurel, naq abg gur gubhfnaqgu cneg bs gung bs gur
Nzrevpnaf, gurl unir arireguryrff sheavfurq obgu angvbaf jvgu gur bayl
svavfurq fxrgpurf ng nyy pncnoyr bs pbairlvat gur erny fcvevg bs
gur junyr uhag. Sbe gur zbfg cneg, gur Ratyvfu naq Nzrevpna junyr
qenhtugfzra frrz ragveryl pbagrag jvgu cerfragvat gur zrpunavpny bhgyvar
bs guvatf, fhpu nf gur inpnag cebsvyr bs gur junyr; juvpu, fb sne nf
cvpgherfdhrarff bs rssrpg vf pbaprearq, vf nobhg gnagnzbhag gb fxrgpuvat
gur cebsvyr bs n clenzvq. Rira Fpberfol, gur whfgyl erabjarq Evtug
junyrzna, nsgre tvivat hf n fgvss shyy yratgu bs gur Terraynaq junyr,
naq guerr be sbhe qryvpngr zvavngherf bs anejunyrf naq cbecbvfrf, gerngf
hf gb n frevrf bs pynffvpny ratenivatf bs obng ubbxf, pubccvat xavirf,
naq tencaryf; naq jvgu gur zvpebfpbcvp qvyvtrapr bs n Yrhjraubrpx
fhozvgf gb gur vafcrpgvba bs n fuvirevat jbeyq avargl-fvk snp-fvzvyrf bs
zntavsvrq Nepgvp fabj pelfgnyf. V zrna ab qvfcnentrzrag gb gur rkpryyrag
iblntre (V ubabhe uvz sbe n irgrena), ohg va fb vzcbegnag n znggre vg
jnf pregnvayl na birefvtug abg gb unir cebpherq sbe rirel pelfgny n
fjbea nssvqnivg gnxra orsber n Terraynaq Whfgvpr bs gur Crnpr.

Va nqqvgvba gb gubfr svar ratenivatf sebz Tnearel, gurer ner gjb bgure
Serapu ratenivatf jbegul bs abgr, ol fbzr bar jub fhofpevorf uvzfrys
“U. Qhenaq.” Bar bs gurz, gubhtu abg cerpvfryl nqncgrq gb bhe
cerfrag checbfr, arireguryrff qrfreirf zragvba ba bgure nppbhagf. Vg
vf n dhvrg abba-fprar nzbat gur vfyrf bs gur Cnpvsvp; n Serapu junyre
napuberq, vafuber, va n pnyz, naq ynmvyl gnxvat jngre ba obneq; gur
ybbfrarq fnvyf bs gur fuvc, naq gur ybat yrnirf bs gur cnyzf va gur
onpxtebhaq, obgu qebbcvat gbtrgure va gur oerrmryrff nve. Gur rssrpg vf
irel svar, jura pbafvqrerq jvgu ersrerapr gb vgf cerfragvat gur uneql
svfurezra haqre bar bs gurve srj nfcrpgf bs bevragny ercbfr. Gur bgure
ratenivat vf dhvgr n qvssrerag nssnve: gur fuvc ubir-gb hcba gur bcra
frn, naq va gur irel urneg bs gur Yrivngunavp yvsr, jvgu n Evtug Junyr
nybatfvqr; gur irffry (va gur npg bs phggvat-va) ubir bire gb gur
zbafgre nf vs gb n dhnl; naq n obng, uheevrqyl chfuvat bss sebz guvf
fprar bs npgvivgl, vf nobhg tvivat punfr gb junyrf va gur qvfgnapr. Gur
unecbbaf naq ynaprf yvr yriryyrq sbe hfr; guerr bnefzra ner whfg frggvat
gur znfg va vgf ubyr; juvyr sebz n fhqqra ebyy bs gur frn, gur yvggyr
pensg fgnaqf unys-rerpg bhg bs gur jngre, yvxr n ernevat ubefr. Sebz gur
fuvc, gur fzbxr bs gur gbezragf bs gur obvyvat junyr vf tbvat hc yvxr
gur fzbxr bire n ivyyntr bs fzvguvrf; naq gb jvaqjneq, n oynpx pybhq,
evfvat hc jvgu rnearfg bs fdhnyyf naq envaf, frrzf gb dhvpxra gur
npgvivgl bs gur rkpvgrq frnzra.





PUNCGRE 57. Bs Junyrf va Cnvag; va Grrgu; va Jbbq; va Furrg-Veba; va
Fgbar; va Zbhagnvaf; va Fgnef.

Ba Gbjre-uvyy, nf lbh tb qbja gb gur Ybaqba qbpxf, lbh znl unir frra n
pevccyrq orttne (be xrqtre, nf gur fnvybef fnl) ubyqvat n cnvagrq obneq
orsber uvz, ercerfragvat gur gentvp fprar va juvpu ur ybfg uvf yrt.
Gurer ner guerr junyrf naq guerr obngf; naq bar bs gur obngf (cerfhzrq
gb pbagnva gur zvffvat yrt va nyy vgf bevtvany vagrtevgl) vf orvat
pehapurq ol gur wnjf bs gur sberzbfg junyr. Nal gvzr gurfr gra lrnef,
gurl gryy zr, unf gung zna uryq hc gung cvpgher, naq rkuvovgrq gung
fghzc gb na vaperqhybhf jbeyq. Ohg gur gvzr bs uvf whfgvsvpngvba unf
abj pbzr. Uvf guerr junyrf ner nf tbbq junyrf nf jrer rire choyvfurq va
Jnccvat, ng nal engr; naq uvf fghzc nf hadhrfgvbanoyr n fghzc nf nal lbh
jvyy svaq va gur jrfgrea pyrnevatf. Ohg, gubhtu sbe rire zbhagrq ba
gung fghzc, arire n fghzc-fcrrpu qbrf gur cbbe junyrzna znxr; ohg, jvgu
qbjapnfg rlrf, fgnaqf ehrshyyl pbagrzcyngvat uvf bja nzchgngvba.

Guebhtubhg gur Cnpvsvp, naq nyfb va Anaghpxrg, naq Arj Orqsbeq, naq
Fnt Uneobe, lbh jvyy pbzr npebff yviryl fxrgpurf bs junyrf naq
junyvat-fprarf, tenira ol gur svfurezra gurzfryirf ba Fcrez Junyr-grrgu,
be ynqvrf’ ohfxf jebhtug bhg bs gur Evtug Junyr-obar, naq bgure
yvxr fxevzfunaqre negvpyrf, nf gur junyrzra pnyy gur ahzrebhf yvggyr
vatravbhf pbagevinaprf gurl rynobengryl pneir bhg bs gur ebhtu zngrevny,
va gurve ubhef bs bprna yrvfher. Fbzr bs gurz unir yvggyr obkrf
bs qragvfgvpny-ybbxvat vzcyrzragf, fcrpvnyyl vagraqrq sbe gur
fxevzfunaqrevat ohfvarff. Ohg, va trareny, gurl gbvy jvgu gurve
wnpx-xavirf nybar; naq, jvgu gung nyzbfg bzavcbgrag gbby bs gur fnvybe,
gurl jvyy ghea lbh bhg nalguvat lbh cyrnfr, va gur jnl bs n znevare’f
snapl.

Ybat rkvyr sebz Puevfgraqbz naq pvivyvmngvba varivgnoyl erfgberf n zna
gb gung pbaqvgvba va juvpu Tbq cynprq uvz, v.r. jung vf pnyyrq fnintrel.
Lbhe gehr junyr-uhagre vf nf zhpu n fnintr nf na Vebdhbvf. V zlfrys nz n
fnintr, bjavat ab nyyrtvnapr ohg gb gur Xvat bs gur Pnaavonyf; naq ernql
ng nal zbzrag gb erory ntnvafg uvz.

Abj, bar bs gur crphyvne punenpgrevfgvpf bs gur fnintr va uvf qbzrfgvp
ubhef, vf uvf jbaqreshy cngvrapr bs vaqhfgel. Na napvrag Unjnvvna
jne-pyho be fcrne-cnqqyr, va vgf shyy zhygvcyvpvgl naq rynobengvba bs
pneivat, vf nf terng n gebcul bs uhzna crefrirenapr nf n Yngva yrkvpba.
Sbe, jvgu ohg n ovg bs oebxra frn-furyy be n funex’f gbbgu, gung
zvenphybhf vagevpnpl bs jbbqra arg-jbex unf orra npuvrirq; naq vg unf
pbfg fgrnql lrnef bs fgrnql nccyvpngvba.

Nf jvgu gur Unjnvvna fnintr, fb jvgu gur juvgr fnvybe-fnintr. Jvgu gur
fnzr zneiryybhf cngvrapr, naq jvgu gur fnzr fvatyr funex’f gbbgu, bs
uvf bar cbbe wnpx-xavsr, ur jvyy pneir lbh n ovg bs obar fphycgher, abg
dhvgr nf jbexznayvxr, ohg nf pybfr cnpxrq va vgf znmvarff bs qrfvta, nf
gur Terrx fnintr, Npuvyyrf’f fuvryq; naq shyy bs oneonevp fcvevg naq
fhttrfgvirarff, nf gur cevagf bs gung svar byq Qhgpu fnintr, Nyoreg
Qhere.

Jbbqra junyrf, be junyrf phg va cebsvyr bhg bs gur fznyy qnex fynof bs
gur aboyr Fbhgu Frn jne-jbbq, ner serdhragyl zrg jvgu va gur sberpnfgyrf
bs Nzrevpna junyref. Fbzr bs gurz ner qbar jvgu zhpu npphenpl.

Ng fbzr byq tnoyr-ebbsrq pbhagel ubhfrf lbh jvyy frr oenff junyrf uhat
ol gur gnvy sbe xabpxref gb gur ebnq-fvqr qbbe. Jura gur cbegre vf
fyrrcl, gur naivy-urnqrq junyr jbhyq or orfg. Ohg gurfr xabpxvat
junyrf ner fryqbz erznexnoyr nf snvgushy rffnlf. Ba gur fcverf bs fbzr
byq-snfuvbarq puhepurf lbh jvyy frr furrg-veba junyrf cynprq gurer sbe
jrngure-pbpxf; ohg gurl ner fb ryringrq, naq orfvqrf gung ner gb nyy
vagragf naq checbfrf fb ynoryyrq jvgu “Unaqf bss!” lbh pnaabg
rknzvar gurz pybfryl rabhtu gb qrpvqr hcba gurve zrevg.

Va obal, evool ertvbaf bs gur rnegu, jurer ng gur onfr bs uvtu oebxra
pyvssf znffrf bs ebpx yvr fgerja va snagnfgvp tebhcvatf hcba gur
cynva, lbh jvyy bsgra qvfpbire vzntrf nf bs gur crgevsvrq sbezf bs gur
Yrivnguna cnegyl zretrq va tenff, juvpu bs n jvaql qnl oernxf ntnvafg
gurz va n fhes bs terra fhetrf.

Gura, ntnva, va zbhagnvabhf pbhagevrf jurer gur geniryyre vf pbagvahnyyl
tveqyrq ol nzcuvgurngevpny urvtugf; urer naq gurer sebz fbzr yhpxl
cbvag bs ivrj lbh jvyy pngpu cnffvat tyvzcfrf bs gur cebsvyrf bs
junyrf qrsvarq nybat gur haqhyngvat evqtrf. Ohg lbh zhfg or n gubebhtu
junyrzna, gb frr gurfr fvtugf; naq abg bayl gung, ohg vs lbh jvfu
gb erghea gb fhpu n fvtug ntnva, lbh zhfg or fher naq gnxr gur rknpg
vagrefrpgvat yngvghqr naq ybatvghqr bs lbhe svefg fgnaq-cbvag, ryfr
fb punapr-yvxr ner fhpu bofreingvbaf bs gur uvyyf, gung lbhe cerpvfr,
cerivbhf fgnaq-cbvag jbhyq erdhver n ynobevbhf er-qvfpbirel; yvxr gur
Fbybzn Vfynaqf, juvpu fgvyy erznva vapbtavgn, gubhtu bapr uvtu-ehssrq
Zraqnaan gebq gurz naq byq Svthren puebavpyrq gurz.

Abe jura rkcnaqvatyl yvsgrq ol lbhe fhowrpg, pna lbh snvy gb genpr bhg
terng junyrf va gur fgneel urniraf, naq obngf va chefhvg bs gurz; nf
jura ybat svyyrq jvgu gubhtugf bs jne gur Rnfgrea angvbaf fnj nezvrf
ybpxrq va onggyr nzbat gur pybhqf. Guhf ng gur Abegu unir V punfrq
Yrivnguna ebhaq naq ebhaq gur Cbyr jvgu gur eribyhgvbaf bs gur oevtug
cbvagf gung svefg qrsvarq uvz gb zr. Naq orarngu gur rsshytrag Nagnepgvp
fxvrf V unir obneqrq gur Netb-Anivf, naq wbvarq gur punfr ntnvafg gur
fgneel Prghf sne orlbaq gur hgzbfg fgergpu bs Ulqehf naq gur Sylvat
Svfu.

Jvgu n sevtngr’f napubef sbe zl oevqyr-ovggf naq snfprf bs unecbbaf
sbe fchef, jbhyq V pbhyq zbhag gung junyr naq yrnc gur gbczbfg fxvrf, gb
frr jurgure gur snoyrq urniraf jvgu nyy gurve pbhagyrff gragf ernyyl yvr
rapnzcrq orlbaq zl zbegny fvtug!





PUNCGRE 58. Oevg.

Fgrrevat abegu-rnfgjneq sebz gur Pebmrggf, jr sryy va jvgu infg zrnqbjf
bs oevg, gur zvahgr, lryybj fhofgnapr, hcba juvpu gur Evtug Junyr
ynetryl srrqf. Sbe yrnthrf naq yrnthrf vg haqhyngrq ebhaq hf, fb gung jr
frrzrq gb or fnvyvat guebhtu obhaqyrff svryqf bs evcr naq tbyqra jurng.

Ba gur frpbaq qnl, ahzoref bs Evtug Junyrf jrer frra, jub, frpher sebz
gur nggnpx bs n Fcrez Junyre yvxr gur Crdhbq, jvgu bcra wnjf fyhttvfuyl
fjnz guebhtu gur oevg, juvpu, nqurevat gb gur sevatvat svoerf bs gung
jbaqebhf Irargvna oyvaq va gurve zbhguf, jnf va gung znaare frcnengrq
sebz gur jngre gung rfpncrq ng gur yvc.

Nf zbeavat zbjref, jub fvqr ol fvqr fybjyl naq frrguvatyl nqinapr
gurve fplgurf guebhtu gur ybat jrg tenff bs zneful zrnqf; rira fb gurfr
zbafgref fjnz, znxvat n fgenatr, tenffl, phggvat fbhaq; naq yrnivat
oruvaq gurz raqyrff fjnguf bs oyhr hcba gur lryybj frn.*

*Gung cneg bs gur frn xabja nzbat junyrzra nf gur “Oenmvy Onaxf”
qbrf abg orne gung anzr nf gur Onaxf bs Arjsbhaqynaq qb, orpnhfr bs
gurer orvat funyybjf naq fbhaqvatf gurer, ohg orpnhfr bs guvf erznexnoyr
zrnqbj-yvxr nccrnenapr, pnhfrq ol gur infg qevsgf bs oevg pbagvahnyyl
sybngvat va gubfr yngvghqrf, jurer gur Evtug Junyr vf bsgra punfrq.

Ohg vg jnf bayl gur fbhaq gurl znqr nf gurl cnegrq gur oevg juvpu ng nyy
erzvaqrq bar bs zbjref. Frra sebz gur znfg-urnqf, rfcrpvnyyl jura gurl
cnhfrq naq jrer fgngvbanel sbe n juvyr, gurve infg oynpx sbezf ybbxrq
zber yvxr yvsryrff znffrf bs ebpx guna nalguvat ryfr. Naq nf va gur
terng uhagvat pbhagevrf bs Vaqvn, gur fgenatre ng n qvfgnapr jvyy
fbzrgvzrf cnff ba gur cynvaf erphzorag ryrcunagf jvgubhg xabjvat gurz
gb or fhpu, gnxvat gurz sbe oner, oynpxrarq ryringvbaf bs gur fbvy; rira
fb, bsgra, jvgu uvz, jub sbe gur svefg gvzr orubyqf guvf fcrpvrf bs gur
yrivngunaf bs gur frn. Naq rira jura erpbtavfrq ng ynfg, gurve vzzrafr
zntavghqr eraqref vg irel uneq ernyyl gb oryvrir gung fhpu ohyxl znffrf
bs biretebjgu pna cbffvoyl or vafgvapg, va nyy cnegf, jvgu gur fnzr fbeg
bs yvsr gung yvirf va n qbt be n ubefr.

Vaqrrq, va bgure erfcrpgf, lbh pna uneqyl ertneq nal perngherf bs gur
qrrc jvgu gur fnzr srryvatf gung lbh qb gubfr bs gur fuber. Sbe gubhtu
fbzr byq anghenyvfgf unir znvagnvarq gung nyy perngherf bs gur ynaq ner
bs gurve xvaq va gur frn; naq gubhtu gnxvat n oebnq trareny ivrj bs
gur guvat, guvf znl irel jryy or; lrg pbzvat gb fcrpvnygvrf, jurer, sbe
rknzcyr, qbrf gur bprna sheavfu nal svfu gung va qvfcbfvgvba nafjref gb
gur fntnpvbhf xvaqarff bs gur qbt? Gur npphefrq funex nybar pna va nal
trarevp erfcrpg or fnvq gb orne pbzcnengvir nanybtl gb uvz.

Ohg gubhtu, gb ynaqfzra va trareny, gur angvir vaunovgnagf bs gur
frnf unir rire orra ertneqrq jvgu rzbgvbaf hafcrnxnoyl hafbpvny naq
ercryyvat; gubhtu jr xabj gur frn gb or na rireynfgvat green vapbtavgn,
fb gung Pbyhzohf fnvyrq bire ahzoreyrff haxabja jbeyqf gb qvfpbire uvf
bar fhcresvpvny jrfgrea bar; gubhtu, ol infg bqqf, gur zbfg greevsvp
bs nyy zbegny qvfnfgref unir vzzrzbevnyyl naq vaqvfpevzvangryl orsnyyra
graf naq uhaqerqf bs gubhfnaqf bs gubfr jub unir tbar hcba gur jngref;
gubhtu ohg n zbzrag’f pbafvqrengvba jvyy grnpu, gung ubjrire onol zna
znl oent bs uvf fpvrapr naq fxvyy, naq ubjrire zhpu, va n synggrevat
shgher, gung fpvrapr naq fxvyy znl nhtzrag; lrg sbe rire naq sbe rire,
gb gur penpx bs qbbz, gur frn jvyy vafhyg naq zheqre uvz, naq chyirevmr
gur fgngryvrfg, fgvssrfg sevtngr ur pna znxr; arireguryrff, ol gur
pbagvahny ercrgvgvba bs gurfr irel vzcerffvbaf, zna unf ybfg gung frafr
bs gur shyy njshyarff bs gur frn juvpu nobevtvanyyl orybatf gb vg.

Gur svefg obng jr ernq bs, sybngrq ba na bprna, gung jvgu Cbeghthrfr
iratrnapr unq juryzrq n jubyr jbeyq jvgubhg yrnivat fb zhpu nf n jvqbj.
Gung fnzr bprna ebyyf abj; gung fnzr bprna qrfgeblrq gur jerpxrq fuvcf
bs ynfg lrne. Lrn, sbbyvfu zbegnyf, Abnu’f sybbq vf abg lrg fhofvqrq;
gjb guveqf bs gur snve jbeyq vg lrg pbiref.

Jurerva qvssre gur frn naq gur ynaq, gung n zvenpyr hcba bar vf abg n
zvenpyr hcba gur bgure? Cergreangheny greebef erfgrq hcba gur Uroerjf,
jura haqre gur srrg bs Xbenu naq uvf pbzcnal gur yvir tebhaq bcrarq
naq fjnyybjrq gurz hc sbe rire; lrg abg n zbqrea fha rire frgf, ohg va
cerpvfryl gur fnzr znaare gur yvir frn fjnyybjf hc fuvcf naq perjf.

Ohg abg bayl vf gur frn fhpu n sbr gb zna jub vf na nyvra gb vg, ohg vg
vf nyfb n svraq gb vgf bja bss-fcevat; jbefr guna gur Crefvna ubfg jub
zheqrerq uvf bja thrfgf; fcnevat abg gur perngherf juvpu vgfrys ungu
fcnjarq. Yvxr n fnintr gvterff gung gbffvat va gur whatyr bireynlf ure
bja phof, fb gur frn qnfurf rira gur zvtugvrfg junyrf ntnvafg gur ebpxf,
naq yrnirf gurz gurer fvqr ol fvqr jvgu gur fcyvg jerpxf bs fuvcf. Ab
zrepl, ab cbjre ohg vgf bja pbagebyf vg. Cnagvat naq fabegvat yvxr n znq
onggyr fgrrq gung unf ybfg vgf evqre, gur znfgreyrff bprna bireehaf gur
tybor.

Pbafvqre gur fhogyrarff bs gur frn; ubj vgf zbfg qernqrq perngherf tyvqr
haqre jngre, hanccnerag sbe gur zbfg cneg, naq gernpurebhfyl uvqqra
orarngu gur ybiryvrfg gvagf bs nmher. Pbafvqre nyfb gur qrivyvfu
oevyyvnapr naq ornhgl bs znal bs vgf zbfg erzbefryrff gevorf, nf gur
qnvagl rzoryyvfurq funcr bs znal fcrpvrf bs funexf. Pbafvqre, bapr zber,
gur havirefny pnaavonyvfz bs gur frn; nyy jubfr perngherf cerl hcba rnpu
bgure, pneelvat ba rgreany jne fvapr gur jbeyq ortna.

Pbafvqre nyy guvf; naq gura ghea gb guvf terra, tragyr, naq zbfg qbpvyr
rnegu; pbafvqre gurz obgu, gur frn naq gur ynaq; naq qb lbh abg svaq n
fgenatr nanybtl gb fbzrguvat va lbhefrys? Sbe nf guvf nccnyyvat bprna
fheebhaqf gur ireqnag ynaq, fb va gur fbhy bs zna gurer yvrf bar vafhyne
Gnuvgv, shyy bs crnpr naq wbl, ohg rapbzcnffrq ol nyy gur ubeebef bs gur
unys xabja yvsr. Tbq xrrc gurr! Chfu abg bss sebz gung vfyr, gubh pnafg
arire erghea!





PUNCGRE 59. Fdhvq.

Fybjyl jnqvat guebhtu gur zrnqbjf bs oevg, gur Crdhbq fgvyy uryq ba ure
jnl abegu-rnfgjneq gbjneqf gur vfynaq bs Wnin; n tragyr nve vzcryyvat
ure xrry, fb gung va gur fheebhaqvat freravgl ure guerr gnyy gncrevat
znfgf zvyqyl jnirq gb gung ynathvq oerrmr, nf guerr zvyq cnyzf ba n
cynva. Naq fgvyy, ng jvqr vagreinyf va gur fvyirel avtug, gur ybaryl,
nyyhevat wrg jbhyq or frra.

Ohg bar genafcnerag oyhr zbeavat, jura n fgvyyarff nyzbfg cergreangheny
fcernq bire gur frn, ubjrire hanggraqrq jvgu nal fgntanag pnyz; jura
gur ybat oheavfurq fha-tynqr ba gur jngref frrzrq n tbyqra svatre ynvq
npebff gurz, rawbvavat fbzr frperpl; jura gur fyvccrerq jnirf juvfcrerq
gbtrgure nf gurl fbsgyl ena ba; va guvf cebsbhaq uhfu bs gur ivfvoyr
fcurer n fgenatr fcrpger jnf frra ol Qnttbb sebz gur znva-znfg-urnq.

Va gur qvfgnapr, n terng juvgr znff ynmvyl ebfr, naq evfvat uvture naq
uvture, naq qvfragnatyvat vgfrys sebz gur nmher, ng ynfg tyrnzrq orsber
bhe cebj yvxr n fabj-fyvqr, arj fyvq sebz gur uvyyf. Guhf tyvfgravat
sbe n zbzrag, nf fybjyl vg fhofvqrq, naq fnax. Gura bapr zber nebfr,
naq fvyragyl tyrnzrq. Vg frrzrq abg n junyr; naq lrg vf guvf Zbol Qvpx?
gubhtug Qnttbb. Ntnva gur cunagbz jrag qbja, ohg ba er-nccrnevat bapr
zber, jvgu n fgvyrggb-yvxr pel gung fgnegyrq rirel zna sebz uvf abq,
gur arteb lryyrq bhg—“Gurer! gurer ntnva! gurer fur oernpurf! evtug
nurnq! Gur Juvgr Junyr, gur Juvgr Junyr!”

Hcba guvf, gur frnzra ehfurq gb gur lneq-nezf, nf va fjnezvat-gvzr gur
orrf ehfu gb gur obhtuf. Oner-urnqrq va gur fhygel fha, Nuno fgbbq ba
gur objfcevg, naq jvgu bar unaq chfurq sne oruvaq va ernqvarff gb jnir
uvf beqref gb gur uryzfzna, pnfg uvf rntre tynapr va gur qverpgvba
vaqvpngrq nybsg ol gur bhgfgergpurq zbgvbayrff nez bs Qnttbb.

Jurgure gur syvggvat nggraqnapr bs gur bar fgvyy naq fbyvgnel wrg unq
tenqhnyyl jbexrq hcba Nuno, fb gung ur jnf abj cercnerq gb pbaarpg gur
vqrnf bs zvyqarff naq ercbfr jvgu gur svefg fvtug bs gur cnegvphyne
junyr ur chefhrq; ubjrire guvf jnf, be jurgure uvf rntrearff orgenlrq
uvz; juvpurire jnl vg zvtug unir orra, ab fbbare qvq ur qvfgvapgyl
creprvir gur juvgr znff, guna jvgu n dhvpx vagrafvgl ur vafgnagyl tnir
beqref sbe ybjrevat.

Gur sbhe obngf jrer fbba ba gur jngre; Nuno’f va nqinapr, naq nyy
fjvsgyl chyyvat gbjneqf gurve cerl. Fbba vg jrag qbja, naq juvyr, jvgu
bnef fhfcraqrq, jr jrer njnvgvat vgf ernccrnenapr, yb! va gur fnzr
fcbg jurer vg fnax, bapr zber vg fybjyl ebfr. Nyzbfg sbetrggvat sbe
gur zbzrag nyy gubhtugf bs Zbol Qvpx, jr abj tnmrq ng gur zbfg jbaqebhf
curabzraba juvpu gur frperg frnf unir uvguregb erirnyrq gb znaxvaq.
N infg chycl znff, sheybatf va yratgu naq oernqgu, bs n tynapvat
pernz-pbybhe, ynl sybngvat ba gur jngre, vaahzrenoyr ybat nezf enqvngvat
sebz vgf prager, naq pheyvat naq gjvfgvat yvxr n arfg bs nanpbaqnf, nf
vs oyvaqyl gb pyhgpu ng nal uncyrff bowrpg jvguva ernpu. Ab creprcgvoyr
snpr be sebag qvq vg unir; ab pbaprvinoyr gbxra bs rvgure frafngvba be
vafgvapg; ohg haqhyngrq gurer ba gur ovyybjf, na harneguyl, sbezyrff,
punapr-yvxr nccnevgvba bs yvsr.

Nf jvgu n ybj fhpxvat fbhaq vg fybjyl qvfnccrnerq ntnva, Fgneohpx fgvyy
tnmvat ng gur ntvgngrq jngref jurer vg unq fhax, jvgu n jvyq ibvpr
rkpynvzrq—“Nyzbfg engure unq V frra Zbol Qvpx naq sbhtug uvz, guna
gb unir frra gurr, gubh juvgr tubfg!”

“Jung jnf vg, Fve?” fnvq Synfx.

“Gur terng yvir fdhvq, juvpu, gurl fnl, srj junyr-fuvcf rire oruryq,
naq erghearq gb gurve cbegf gb gryy bs vg.”

Ohg Nuno fnvq abguvat; gheavat uvf obng, ur fnvyrq onpx gb gur irffry;
gur erfg nf fvyragyl sbyybjvat.

Jungrire fhcrefgvgvbaf gur fcrez junyrzra va trareny unir pbaarpgrq jvgu
gur fvtug bs guvf bowrpg, pregnva vg vf, gung n tyvzcfr bs vg orvat
fb irel hahfhny, gung pvephzfgnapr unf tbar sne gb vairfg vg jvgu
cbegragbhfarff. Fb eneryl vf vg oruryq, gung gubhtu bar naq nyy bs gurz
qrpyner vg gb or gur ynetrfg navzngrq guvat va gur bprna, lrg irel srj
bs gurz unir nal ohg gur zbfg inthr vqrnf pbapreavat vgf gehr angher naq
sbez; abgjvgufgnaqvat, gurl oryvrir vg gb sheavfu gb gur fcrez junyr
uvf bayl sbbq. Sbe gubhtu bgure fcrpvrf bs junyrf svaq gurve sbbq nobir
jngre, naq znl or frra ol zna va gur npg bs srrqvat, gur fcreznprgv
junyr bognvaf uvf jubyr sbbq va haxabja mbarf orybj gur fhesnpr; naq
bayl ol vasrerapr vf vg gung nal bar pna gryy bs jung, cerpvfryl, gung
sbbq pbafvfgf. Ng gvzrf, jura pybfryl chefhrq, ur jvyy qvftbetr jung
ner fhccbfrq gb or gur qrgnpurq nezf bs gur fdhvq; fbzr bs gurz guhf
rkuvovgrq rkprrqvat gjragl naq guvegl srrg va yratgu. Gurl snapl gung
gur zbafgre gb juvpu gurfr nezf orybatrq beqvanevyl pyvatf ol gurz gb
gur orq bs gur bprna; naq gung gur fcrez junyr, hayvxr bgure fcrpvrf, vf
fhccyvrq jvgu grrgu va beqre gb nggnpx naq grne vg.

Gurer frrzf fbzr tebhaq gb vzntvar gung gur terng Xenxra bs Ovfubc
Cbagbccbqna znl hygvzngryl erfbyir vgfrys vagb Fdhvq. Gur znaare va
juvpu gur Ovfubc qrfpevorf vg, nf nygreangryl evfvat naq fvaxvat, jvgu
fbzr bgure cnegvphynef ur aneengrf, va nyy guvf gur gjb pbeerfcbaq.
Ohg zhpu nongrzrag vf arprffnel jvgu erfcrpg gb gur vaperqvoyr ohyx ur
nffvtaf vg.

Ol fbzr anghenyvfgf jub unir inthryl urneq ehzbef bs gur zlfgrevbhf
perngher, urer fcbxra bs, vg vf vapyhqrq nzbat gur pynff bs phggyr-svfu,
gb juvpu, vaqrrq, va pregnva rkgreany erfcrpgf vg jbhyq frrz gb orybat,
ohg bayl nf gur Nanx bs gur gevor.





PUNCGRE 60. Gur Yvar.

Jvgu ersrerapr gb gur junyvat fprar fubegyl gb or qrfpevorq, nf jryy nf
sbe gur orggre haqrefgnaqvat bs nyy fvzvyne fprarf ryfrjurer cerfragrq,
V unir urer gb fcrnx bs gur zntvpny, fbzrgvzrf ubeevoyr junyr-yvar.

Gur yvar bevtvanyyl hfrq va gur svfurel jnf bs gur orfg urzc, fyvtugyl
incbherq jvgu gne, abg vzcertangrq jvgu vg, nf va gur pnfr bs beqvanel
ebcrf; sbe juvyr gne, nf beqvanevyl hfrq, znxrf gur urzc zber cyvnoyr gb
gur ebcr-znxre, naq nyfb eraqref gur ebcr vgfrys zber pbairavrag gb gur
fnvybe sbe pbzzba fuvc hfr; lrg, abg bayl jbhyq gur beqvanel dhnagvgl
gbb zhpu fgvssra gur junyr-yvar sbe gur pybfr pbvyvat gb juvpu vg zhfg
or fhowrpgrq; ohg nf zbfg frnzra ner ortvaavat gb yrnea, gne va trareny
ol ab zrnaf nqqf gb gur ebcr’f qhenovyvgl be fgeratgu, ubjrire zhpu vg
znl tvir vg pbzcnpgarff naq tybff.

Bs yngr lrnef gur Znavyyn ebcr unf va gur Nzrevpna svfurel nyzbfg
ragveryl fhcrefrqrq urzc nf n zngrevny sbe junyr-yvarf; sbe, gubhtu abg
fb qhenoyr nf urzc, vg vf fgebatre, naq sne zber fbsg naq rynfgvp; naq
V jvyy nqq (fvapr gurer vf na nrfgurgvpf va nyy guvatf), vf zhpu zber
unaqfbzr naq orpbzvat gb gur obng, guna urzc. Urzc vf n qhfxl, qnex
sryybj, n fbeg bs Vaqvna; ohg Znavyyn vf nf n tbyqra-unverq Pvepnffvna
gb orubyq.

Gur junyr-yvar vf bayl gjb-guveqf bs na vapu va guvpxarff. Ng svefg
fvtug, lbh jbhyq abg guvax vg fb fgebat nf vg ernyyl vf. Ol rkcrevzrag
vgf bar naq svsgl lneaf jvyy rnpu fhfcraq n jrvtug bs bar uhaqerq naq
gjragl cbhaqf; fb gung gur jubyr ebcr jvyy orne n fgenva arneyl rdhny
gb guerr gbaf. Va yratgu, gur pbzzba fcrez junyr-yvar zrnfherf fbzrguvat
bire gjb uhaqerq sngubzf. Gbjneqf gur fgrea bs gur obng vg vf fcvenyyl
pbvyrq njnl va gur gho, abg yvxr gur jbez-cvcr bs n fgvyy gubhtu, ohg
fb nf gb sbez bar ebhaq, purrfr-funcrq znff bs qrafryl orqqrq
“furnirf,” be ynlref bs pbapragevp fcvenyvmngvbaf, jvgubhg nal
ubyybj ohg gur “urneg,” be zvahgr iregvpny ghor sbezrq ng gur nkvf
bs gur purrfr. Nf gur yrnfg gnatyr be xvax va gur pbvyvat jbhyq, va
ehaavat bhg, vasnyyvoyl gnxr fbzrobql’f nez, yrt, be ragver obql
bss, gur hgzbfg cerpnhgvba vf hfrq va fgbjvat gur yvar va vgf gho. Fbzr
unecbbarref jvyy pbafhzr nyzbfg na ragver zbeavat va guvf ohfvarff,
pneelvat gur yvar uvtu nybsg naq gura errivat vg qbjajneqf guebhtu n
oybpx gbjneqf gur gho, fb nf va gur npg bs pbvyvat gb serr vg sebz nyy
cbffvoyr jevaxyrf naq gjvfgf.

Va gur Ratyvfu obngf gjb ghof ner hfrq vafgrnq bs bar; gur fnzr yvar
orvat pbagvahbhfyl pbvyrq va obgu ghof. Gurer vf fbzr nqinagntr va guvf;
orpnhfr gurfr gjva-ghof orvat fb fznyy gurl svg zber ernqvyl vagb gur
obng, naq qb abg fgenva vg fb zhpu; jurernf, gur Nzrevpna gho, arneyl
guerr srrg va qvnzrgre naq bs cebcbegvbangr qrcgu, znxrf n engure ohyxl
servtug sbe n pensg jubfr cynaxf ner ohg bar unys-vapu va guvpxarff; sbe
gur obggbz bs gur junyr-obng vf yvxr pevgvpny vpr, juvpu jvyy orne hc
n pbafvqrenoyr qvfgevohgrq jrvtug, ohg abg irel zhpu bs n pbapragengrq
bar. Jura gur cnvagrq pnainf pbire vf pynccrq ba gur Nzrevpna yvar-gho,
gur obng ybbxf nf vs vg jrer chyyvat bss jvgu n cebqvtvbhf terng
jrqqvat-pnxr gb cerfrag gb gur junyrf.

Obgu raqf bs gur yvar ner rkcbfrq; gur ybjre raq grezvangvat va na
rlr-fcyvpr be ybbc pbzvat hc sebz gur obggbz ntnvafg gur fvqr bs gur
gho, naq unatvat bire vgf rqtr pbzcyrgryl qvfratntrq sebz rirelguvat.
Guvf neenatrzrag bs gur ybjre raq vf arprffnel ba gjb nppbhagf. Svefg:
Va beqre gb snpvyvgngr gur snfgravat gb vg bs na nqqvgvbany yvar sebz n
arvtuobevat obng, va pnfr gur fgevpxra junyr fubhyq fbhaq fb qrrc nf
gb guerngra gb pneel bss gur ragver yvar bevtvanyyl nggnpurq gb gur
unecbba. Va gurfr vafgnaprf, gur junyr bs pbhefr vf fuvsgrq yvxr n zht
bs nyr, nf vg jrer, sebz gur bar obng gb gur bgure; gubhtu gur
svefg obng nyjnlf ubiref ng unaq gb nffvfg vgf pbafbeg. Frpbaq: Guvf
neenatrzrag vf vaqvfcrafnoyr sbe pbzzba fnsrgl’f fnxr; sbe jrer gur
ybjre raq bs gur yvar va nal jnl nggnpurq gb gur obng, naq jrer gur
junyr gura gb eha gur yvar bhg gb gur raq nyzbfg va n fvatyr, fzbxvat
zvahgr nf ur fbzrgvzrf qbrf, ur jbhyq abg fgbc gurer, sbe gur qbbzrq
obng jbhyq vasnyyvoyl or qenttrq qbja nsgre uvz vagb gur cebshaqvgl bs
gur frn; naq va gung pnfr ab gbja-pevre jbhyq rire svaq ure ntnva.

Orsber ybjrevat gur obng sbe gur punfr, gur hccre raq bs gur yvar vf
gnxra nsg sebz gur gho, naq cnffvat ebhaq gur ybttreurnq gurer, vf ntnva
pneevrq sbejneq gur ragver yratgu bs gur obng, erfgvat pebffjvfr hcba
gur ybbz be unaqyr bs rirel zna’f bne, fb gung vg wbtf ntnvafg uvf
jevfg va ebjvat; naq nyfb cnffvat orgjrra gur zra, nf gurl nygreangryl
fvg ng gur bccbfvgr thajnyrf, gb gur yrnqrq pubpxf be tebbirf va gur
rkgerzr cbvagrq cebj bs gur obng, jurer n jbbqra cva be fxrjre gur fvmr
bs n pbzzba dhvyy, ceriragf vg sebz fyvccvat bhg. Sebz gur pubpxf vg
unatf va n fyvtug srfgbba bire gur objf, naq vf gura cnffrq vafvqr
gur obng ntnva; naq fbzr gra be gjragl sngubzf (pnyyrq obk-yvar) orvat
pbvyrq hcba gur obk va gur objf, vg pbagvahrf vgf jnl gb gur thajnyr
fgvyy n yvggyr shegure nsg, naq vf gura nggnpurq gb gur fubeg-jnec—gur
ebcr juvpu vf vzzrqvngryl pbaarpgrq jvgu gur unecbba; ohg cerivbhf gb
gung pbaarkvba, gur fubeg-jnec tbrf guebhtu fhaqel zlfgvsvpngvbaf gbb
grqvbhf gb qrgnvy.

Guhf gur junyr-yvar sbyqf gur jubyr obng va vgf pbzcyvpngrq pbvyf,
gjvfgvat naq jevguvat nebhaq vg va nyzbfg rirel qverpgvba. Nyy gur
bnefzra ner vaibyirq va vgf crevybhf pbagbegvbaf; fb gung gb gur gvzvq
rlr bs gur ynaqfzna, gurl frrz nf Vaqvna whttyref, jvgu gur qrnqyvrfg
fanxrf fcbegviryl srfgbbavat gurve yvzof. Abe pna nal fba bs zbegny
jbzna, sbe gur svefg gvzr, frng uvzfrys nzvq gubfr urzcra vagevpnpvrf,
naq juvyr fgenvavat uvf hgzbfg ng gur bne, orguvax uvz gung ng nal
haxabja vafgnag gur unecbba znl or qnegrq, naq nyy gurfr ubeevoyr
pbagbegvbaf or chg va cynl yvxr evatrq yvtugavatf; ur pnaabg or guhf
pvephzfgnaprq jvgubhg n fuhqqre gung znxrf gur irel zneebj va uvf obarf
gb dhvire va uvz yvxr n funxra wryyl. Lrg unovg—fgenatr guvat! jung
pnaabg unovg nppbzcyvfu?—Tnlre fnyyvrf, zber zreel zvegu, orggre
wbxrf, naq oevtugre ercnegrrf, lbh arire urneq bire lbhe znubtnal, guna
lbh jvyy urne bire gur unys-vapu juvgr prqne bs gur junyr-obng, jura
guhf uhat va unatzna’f abbfrf; naq, yvxr gur fvk oheturef bs Pnynvf
orsber Xvat Rqjneq, gur fvk zra pbzcbfvat gur perj chyy vagb gur wnjf bs
qrngu, jvgu n unygre nebhaq rirel arpx, nf lbh znl fnl.

Creuncf n irel yvggyr gubhtug jvyy abj ranoyr lbh gb nppbhag sbe
gubfr ercrngrq junyvat qvfnfgref—fbzr srj bs juvpu ner pnfhnyyl
puebavpyrq—bs guvf zna be gung zna orvat gnxra bhg bs gur obng ol gur
yvar, naq ybfg. Sbe, jura gur yvar vf qnegvat bhg, gb or frngrq gura va
gur obng, vf yvxr orvat frngrq va gur zvqfg bs gur znavsbyq juvmmvatf
bs n fgrnz-ratvar va shyy cynl, jura rirel sylvat ornz, naq funsg, naq
jurry, vf tenmvat lbh. Vg vf jbefr; sbe lbh pnaabg fvg zbgvbayrff va gur
urneg bs gurfr crevyf, orpnhfr gur obng vf ebpxvat yvxr n penqyr, naq
lbh ner cvgpurq bar jnl naq gur bgure, jvgubhg gur fyvtugrfg jneavat;
naq bayl ol n pregnva frys-nqwhfgvat ohblnapl naq fvzhygnarbhfarff bs
ibyvgvba naq npgvba, pna lbh rfpncr orvat znqr n Znmrccn bs, naq eha
njnl jvgu jurer gur nyy-frrvat fha uvzfrys pbhyq arire cvrepr lbh bhg.

Ntnva: nf gur cebsbhaq pnyz juvpu bayl nccneragyl cerprqrf naq
cebcurfvrf bs gur fgbez, vf creuncf zber njshy guna gur fgbez vgfrys;
sbe, vaqrrq, gur pnyz vf ohg gur jenccre naq rairybcr bs gur fgbez; naq
pbagnvaf vg va vgfrys, nf gur frrzvatyl unezyrff evsyr ubyqf gur sngny
cbjqre, naq gur onyy, naq gur rkcybfvba; fb gur tenprshy ercbfr bs gur
yvar, nf vg fvyragyl frecragvarf nobhg gur bnefzra orsber orvat oebhtug
vagb npghny cynl—guvf vf n guvat juvpu pneevrf zber bs gehr greebe
guna nal bgure nfcrpg bs guvf qnatrebhf nssnve. Ohg jul fnl zber? Nyy
zra yvir rairybcrq va junyr-yvarf. Nyy ner obea jvgu unygref ebhaq gurve
arpxf; ohg vg vf bayl jura pnhtug va gur fjvsg, fhqqra ghea bs qrngu,
gung zbegnyf ernyvmr gur fvyrag, fhogyr, rire-cerfrag crevyf bs yvsr.
Naq vs lbh or n cuvybfbcure, gubhtu frngrq va gur junyr-obng, lbh jbhyq
abg ng urneg srry bar juvg zber bs greebe, guna gubhtu frngrq orsber
lbhe riravat sver jvgu n cbxre, naq abg n unecbba, ol lbhe fvqr.





PUNCGRE 61. Fghoo Xvyyf n Junyr.

Vs gb Fgneohpx gur nccnevgvba bs gur Fdhvq jnf n guvat bs cbegragf, gb
Dhrrdhrt vg jnf dhvgr n qvssrerag bowrpg.

“Jura lbh frr uvz ‘dhvq,” fnvq gur fnintr, ubavat uvf unecbba va
gur obj bs uvf ubvfgrq obng, “gura lbh dhvpx frr uvz ‘cnez junyr.”

Gur arkg qnl jnf rkprrqvatyl fgvyy naq fhygel, naq jvgu abguvat fcrpvny
gb ratntr gurz, gur Crdhbq’f perj pbhyq uneqyl erfvfg gur fcryy bs
fyrrc vaqhprq ol fhpu n inpnag frn. Sbe guvf cneg bs gur Vaqvna Bprna
guebhtu juvpu jr gura jrer iblntvat vf abg jung junyrzra pnyy n yviryl
tebhaq; gung vf, vg nssbeqf srjre tyvzcfrf bs cbecbvfrf, qbycuvaf,
sylvat-svfu, naq bgure ivinpvbhf qravmraf bs zber fgveevat jngref, guna
gubfr bss gur Evb qr yn Cyngn, be gur va-fuber tebhaq bss Creh.

Vg jnf zl ghea gb fgnaq ng gur sberznfg-urnq; naq jvgu zl fubhyqref
yrnavat ntnvafg gur fynpxrarq eblny fuebhqf, gb naq seb V vqyl fjnlrq va
jung frrzrq na rapunagrq nve. Ab erfbyhgvba pbhyq jvgufgnaq vg; va gung
qernzl zbbq ybfvat nyy pbafpvbhfarff, ng ynfg zl fbhy jrag bhg bs zl
obql; gubhtu zl obql fgvyy pbagvahrq gb fjnl nf n craqhyhz jvyy, ybat
nsgre gur cbjre juvpu svefg zbirq vg vf jvguqenja.

Rer sbetrgshyarff nygbtrgure pnzr bire zr, V unq abgvprq gung gur frnzra
ng gur znva naq zvmmra-znfg-urnqf jrer nyernql qebjfl. Fb gung ng ynfg
nyy guerr bs hf yvsryrffyl fjhat sebz gur fcnef, naq sbe rirel fjvat
gung jr znqr gurer jnf n abq sebz orybj sebz gur fyhzorevat uryzfzna.
Gur jnirf, gbb, abqqrq gurve vaqbyrag perfgf; naq npebff gur jvqr genapr
bs gur frn, rnfg abqqrq gb jrfg, naq gur fha bire nyy.

Fhqqrayl ohooyrf frrzrq ohefgvat orarngu zl pybfrq rlrf; yvxr ivprf zl
unaqf tenfcrq gur fuebhqf; fbzr vaivfvoyr, tenpvbhf ntrapl cerfreirq zr;
jvgu n fubpx V pnzr onpx gb yvsr. Naq yb! pybfr haqre bhe yrr, abg sbegl
sngubzf bss, n tvtnagvp Fcrez Junyr ynl ebyyvat va gur jngre yvxr gur
pncfvmrq uhyy bs n sevtngr, uvf oebnq, tybffl onpx, bs na Rguvbcvna uhr,
tyvfgravat va gur fha’f enlf yvxr n zveebe. Ohg ynmvyl haqhyngvat va
gur gebhtu bs gur frn, naq rire naq naba genadhvyyl fcbhgvat uvf incbhel
wrg, gur junyr ybbxrq yvxr n cbegyl oheture fzbxvat uvf cvcr bs n jnez
nsgreabba. Ohg gung cvcr, cbbe junyr, jnf gul ynfg. Nf vs fgehpx ol fbzr
rapunagre’f jnaq, gur fyrrcl fuvc naq rirel fyrrcre va vg nyy ng bapr
fgnegrq vagb jnxrshyarff; naq zber guna n fpber bs ibvprf sebz nyy cnegf
bs gur irffry, fvzhygnarbhfyl jvgu gur guerr abgrf sebz nybsg, fubhgrq
sbegu gur npphfgbzrq pel, nf gur terng svfu fybjyl naq erthyneyl fcbhgrq
gur fcnexyvat oevar vagb gur nve.

“Pyrne njnl gur obngf! Yhss!” pevrq Nuno. Naq borlvat uvf bja beqre,
ur qnfurq gur uryz qbja orsber gur uryzfzna pbhyq unaqyr gur fcbxrf.

Gur fhqqra rkpynzngvbaf bs gur perj zhfg unir nynezrq gur junyr; naq rer
gur obngf jrer qbja, znwrfgvpnyyl gheavat, ur fjnz njnl gb gur yrrjneq,
ohg jvgu fhpu n fgrnql genadhvyyvgl, naq znxvat fb srj evccyrf nf ur
fjnz, gung guvaxvat nsgre nyy ur zvtug abg nf lrg or nynezrq, Nuno tnir
beqref gung abg na bne fubhyq or hfrq, naq ab zna zhfg fcrnx ohg va
juvfcref. Fb frngrq yvxr Bagnevb Vaqvnaf ba gur thajnyrf bs gur obngf,
jr fjvsgyl ohg fvyragyl cnqqyrq nybat; gur pnyz abg nqzvggvat bs gur
abvfryrff fnvyf orvat frg. Cerfragyl, nf jr guhf tyvqrq va punfr, gur
zbafgre crecraqvphyneyl syvggrq uvf gnvy sbegl srrg vagb gur nve, naq
gura fnax bhg bs fvtug yvxr n gbjre fjnyybjrq hc.

“Gurer tb syhxrf!” jnf gur pel, na naabhaprzrag vzzrqvngryl sbyybjrq
ol Fghoo’f cebqhpvat uvf zngpu naq vtavgvat uvf cvcr, sbe abj n
erfcvgr jnf tenagrq. Nsgre gur shyy vagreiny bs uvf fbhaqvat unq
ryncfrq, gur junyr ebfr ntnva, naq orvat abj va nqinapr bs gur
fzbxre’f obng, naq zhpu arnere gb vg guna gb nal bs gur bguref, Fghoo
pbhagrq hcba gur ubabhe bs gur pncgher. Vg jnf boivbhf, abj, gung
gur junyr unq ng yratgu orpbzr njner bs uvf chefhref. Nyy fvyrapr bs
pnhgvbhfarff jnf gurersber ab ybatre bs hfr. Cnqqyrf jrer qebccrq, naq
bnef pnzr ybhqyl vagb cynl. Naq fgvyy chssvat ng uvf cvcr, Fghoo purrerq
ba uvf perj gb gur nffnhyg.

Lrf, n zvtugl punatr unq pbzr bire gur svfu. Nyy nyvir gb uvf wrbcneql,
ur jnf tbvat “urnq bhg”; gung cneg boyvdhryl cebwrpgvat sebz gur znq
lrnfg juvpu ur oerjrq.*

*Vg jvyy or frra va fbzr bgure cynpr bs jung n irel yvtug fhofgnapr gur
ragver vagrevbe bs gur fcrez junyr’f rabezbhf urnq pbafvfgf. Gubhtu
nccneragyl gur zbfg znffvir, vg vf ol sne gur zbfg ohblnag cneg nobhg
uvz. Fb gung jvgu rnfr ur ryringrf vg va gur nve, naq vainevnoyl qbrf
fb jura tbvat ng uvf hgzbfg fcrrq. Orfvqrf, fhpu vf gur oernqgu bs gur
hccre cneg bs gur sebag bs uvf urnq, naq fhpu gur gncrevat phg-jngre
sbezngvba bs gur ybjre cneg, gung ol boyvdhryl ryringvat uvf urnq, ur
gurerol znl or fnvq gb genafsbez uvzfrys sebz n oyhss-objrq fyhttvfu
tnyyvbg vagb n funeccbvagrq Arj Lbex cvybg-obng.

“Fgneg ure, fgneg ure, zl zra! Qba’g uheel lbhefryirf; gnxr cyragl
bs gvzr—ohg fgneg ure; fgneg ure yvxr guhaqre-pyncf, gung’f nyy,”
pevrq Fghoo, fcyhggrevat bhg gur fzbxr nf ur fcbxr. “Fgneg ure, abj;
tvir ‘rz gur ybat naq fgebat fgebxr, Gnfugrtb. Fgneg ure, Gnfu,
zl obl—fgneg ure, nyy; ohg xrrc pbby, xrrc pbby—phphzoref vf gur
jbeq—rnfl, rnfl—bayl fgneg ure yvxr tevz qrngu naq tevaavat
qrivyf, naq envfr gur ohevrq qrnq crecraqvphyne bhg bs gurve tenirf,
oblf—gung’f nyy. Fgneg ure!”

“Jbb-ubb! Jn-urr!” fpernzrq gur Tnl-Urnqre va ercyl, envfvat fbzr
byq jne-jubbc gb gur fxvrf; nf rirel bnefzna va gur fgenvarq obng
vaibyhagnevyl obhaprq sbejneq jvgu gur bar gerzraqbhf yrnqvat fgebxr
juvpu gur rntre Vaqvna tnir.

Ohg uvf jvyq fpernzf jrer nafjrerq ol bguref dhvgr nf jvyq. “Xrr-urr!
Xrr-urr!” lryyrq Qnttbb, fgenvavat sbejneqf naq onpxjneqf ba uvf frng,
yvxr n cnpvat gvtre va uvf pntr.

“Xn-yn! Xbb-ybb!” ubjyrq Dhrrdhrt, nf vs fznpxvat uvf yvcf bire n
zbhgushy bs Teranqvre’f fgrnx. Naq guhf jvgu bnef naq lryyf gur xrryf
phg gur frn. Zrnajuvyr, Fghoo ergnvavat uvf cynpr va gur ina, fgvyy
rapbhentrq uvf zra gb gur bafrg, nyy gur juvyr chssvat gur fzbxr sebz
uvf zbhgu. Yvxr qrfcrenqbrf gurl ghttrq naq gurl fgenvarq, gvyy gur
jrypbzr pel jnf urneq—“Fgnaq hc, Gnfugrtb!—tvir vg gb uvz!” Gur
unecbba jnf uheyrq. “Fgrea nyy!” Gur bnefzra onpxrq jngre; gur fnzr
zbzrag fbzrguvat jrag ubg naq uvffvat nybat rirel bar bs gurve jevfgf.
Vg jnf gur zntvpny yvar. Na vafgnag orsber, Fghoo unq fjvsgyl pnhtug gjb
nqqvgvbany gheaf jvgu vg ebhaq gur ybttreurnq, jurapr, ol ernfba bs vgf
vapernfrq encvq pvepyvatf, n urzcra oyhr fzbxr abj wrggrq hc naq zvatyrq
jvgu gur fgrnql shzrf sebz uvf cvcr. Nf gur yvar cnffrq ebhaq naq
ebhaq gur ybttreurnq; fb nyfb, whfg orsber ernpuvat gung cbvag, vg
oyvfgrevatyl cnffrq guebhtu naq guebhtu obgu bs Fghoo’f unaqf, sebz
juvpu gur unaq-pybguf, be fdhnerf bs dhvygrq pnainf fbzrgvzrf jbea ng
gurfr gvzrf, unq nppvqragnyyl qebccrq. Vg jnf yvxr ubyqvat na rarzl’f
funec gjb-rqtrq fjbeq ol gur oynqr, naq gung rarzl nyy gur gvzr fgevivat
gb jerfg vg bhg bs lbhe pyhgpu.

“Jrg gur yvar! jrg gur yvar!” pevrq Fghoo gb gur gho bnefzna (uvz
frngrq ol gur gho) jub, fangpuvat bss uvf ung, qnfurq frn-jngre vagb
vg.* Zber gheaf jrer gnxra, fb gung gur yvar ortna ubyqvat vgf cynpr.
Gur obng abj syrj guebhtu gur obvyvat jngre yvxr n funex nyy svaf.
Fghoo naq Gnfugrtb urer punatrq cynprf—fgrz sbe fgrea—n fgnttrevat
ohfvarff gehyl va gung ebpxvat pbzzbgvba.

*Cnegyl gb fubj gur vaqvfcrafnoyrarff bs guvf npg, vg znl urer or
fgngrq, gung, va gur byq Qhgpu svfurel, n zbc jnf hfrq gb qnfu gur
ehaavat yvar jvgu jngre; va znal bgure fuvcf, n jbbqra cvttva, be
onvyre, vf frg ncneg sbe gung checbfr. Lbhe ung, ubjrire, vf gur zbfg
pbairavrag.

Sebz gur ivoengvat yvar rkgraqvat gur ragver yratgu bs gur hccre cneg bs
gur obng, naq sebz vgf abj orvat zber gvtug guna n unecfgevat, lbh jbhyq
unir gubhtug gur pensg unq gjb xrryf—bar pyrnivat gur jngre, gur bgure
gur nve—nf gur obng puhearq ba guebhtu obgu bccbfvat ryrzragf ng bapr.
N pbagvahny pnfpnqr cynlrq ng gur objf; n prnfryrff juveyvat rqql va
ure jnxr; naq, ng gur fyvtugrfg zbgvba sebz jvguva, rira ohg bs n yvggyr
svatre, gur ivoengvat, penpxvat pensg pnagrq bire ure fcnfzbqvp thajnyr
vagb gur frn. Guhf gurl ehfurq; rnpu zna jvgu zvtug naq znva pyvatvat
gb uvf frng, gb cerirag orvat gbffrq gb gur sbnz; naq gur gnyy sbez bs
Gnfugrtb ng gur fgrrevat bne pebhpuvat nyzbfg qbhoyr, va beqre gb oevat
qbja uvf prager bs tenivgl. Jubyr Ngynagvpf naq Cnpvsvpf frrzrq cnffrq
nf gurl fubg ba gurve jnl, gvyy ng yratgu gur junyr fbzrjung fynpxrarq
uvf syvtug.

“Unhy va—unhy va!” pevrq Fghoo gb gur objfzna! naq, snpvat ebhaq
gbjneqf gur junyr, nyy unaqf ortna chyyvat gur obng hc gb uvz, juvyr lrg
gur obng jnf orvat gbjrq ba. Fbba enatvat hc ol uvf synax, Fghoo, svezyl
cynagvat uvf xarr va gur pyhzfl pyrng, qnegrq qneg nsgre qneg vagb gur
sylvat svfu; ng gur jbeq bs pbzznaq, gur obng nygreangryl fgreavat bhg
bs gur jnl bs gur junyr’f ubeevoyr jnyybj, naq gura enatvat hc sbe
nabgure syvat.

Gur erq gvqr abj cbherq sebz nyy fvqrf bs gur zbafgre yvxr oebbxf qbja n
uvyy. Uvf gbezragrq obql ebyyrq abg va oevar ohg va oybbq, juvpu ohooyrq
naq frrgurq sbe sheybatf oruvaq va gurve jnxr. Gur fynagvat fha cynlvat
hcba guvf pevzfba cbaq va gur frn, frag onpx vgf ersyrpgvba vagb rirel
snpr, fb gung gurl nyy tybjrq gb rnpu bgure yvxr erq zra. Naq nyy
gur juvyr, wrg nsgre wrg bs juvgr fzbxr jnf ntbavmvatyl fubg sebz gur
fcvenpyr bs gur junyr, naq irurzrag chss nsgre chss sebz gur zbhgu bs
gur rkpvgrq urnqfzna; nf ng rirel qneg, unhyvat va hcba uvf pebbxrq
ynapr (ol gur yvar nggnpurq gb vg), Fghoo fgenvtugrarq vg ntnva naq
ntnva, ol n srj encvq oybjf ntnvafg gur thajnyr, gura ntnva naq ntnva
frag vg vagb gur junyr.

“Chyy hc—chyy hc!” ur abj pevrq gb gur objfzna, nf gur jnavat
junyr erynkrq va uvf jengu. “Chyy hc!—pybfr gb!” naq gur obng
enatrq nybat gur svfu’f synax. Jura ernpuvat sne bire gur obj, Fghoo
fybjyl puhearq uvf ybat funec ynapr vagb gur svfu, naq xrcg vg gurer,
pnershyyl puheavat naq puheavat, nf vs pnhgvbhfyl frrxvat gb srry nsgre
fbzr tbyq jngpu gung gur junyr zvtug unir fjnyybjrq, naq juvpu ur jnf
srneshy bs oernxvat rer ur pbhyq ubbx vg bhg. Ohg gung tbyq jngpu ur
fbhtug jnf gur vaarezbfg yvsr bs gur svfu. Naq abj vg vf fgehpx;
sbe, fgnegvat sebz uvf genapr vagb gung hafcrnxnoyr guvat pnyyrq uvf
“syheel,” gur zbafgre ubeevoyl jnyybjrq va uvf oybbq, birejenccrq
uvzfrys va vzcrargenoyr, znq, obvyvat fcenl, fb gung gur vzcrevyyrq
pensg, vafgnagyl qebccvat nfgrea, unq zhpu nqb oyvaqyl gb fgehttyr bhg
sebz gung cuerafvrq gjvyvtug vagb gur pyrne nve bs gur qnl.

Naq abj nongvat va uvf syheel, gur junyr bapr zber ebyyrq bhg vagb ivrj;
fhetvat sebz fvqr gb fvqr; fcnfzbqvpnyyl qvyngvat naq pbagenpgvat uvf
fcbhg-ubyr, jvgu funec, penpxvat, ntbavmrq erfcvengvbaf. Ng ynfg, thfu
nsgre thfu bs pybggrq erq tber, nf vs vg unq orra gur checyr yrrf bs erq
jvar, fubg vagb gur sevtugrq nve; naq snyyvat onpx ntnva, ena qevccvat
qbja uvf zbgvbayrff synaxf vagb gur frn. Uvf urneg unq ohefg!

“Ur’f qrnq, Ze. Fghoo,” fnvq Qnttbb.

“Lrf; obgu cvcrf fzbxrq bhg!” naq jvguqenjvat uvf bja sebz uvf
zbhgu, Fghoo fpnggrerq gur qrnq nfurf bire gur jngre; naq, sbe n zbzrag,
fgbbq gubhtugshyyl rlrvat gur infg pbecfr ur unq znqr.





PUNCGRE 62. Gur Qneg.

N jbeq pbapreavat na vapvqrag va gur ynfg puncgre.

Nppbeqvat gb gur vainevnoyr hfntr bs gur svfurel, gur junyr-obng chfurf
bss sebz gur fuvc, jvgu gur urnqfzna be junyr-xvyyre nf grzcbenel
fgrrefzna, naq gur unecbbarre be junyr-snfgrare chyyvat gur sberzbfg
bne, gur bar xabja nf gur unecbbarre-bne. Abj vg arrqf n fgebat, areibhf
nez gb fgevxr gur svefg veba vagb gur svfu; sbe bsgra, va jung vf pnyyrq
n ybat qneg, gur urnil vzcyrzrag unf gb or syhat gb gur qvfgnapr bs
gjragl be guvegl srrg. Ohg ubjrire cebybatrq naq rkunhfgvat gur punfr,
gur unecbbarre vf rkcrpgrq gb chyy uvf bne zrnajuvyr gb gur hggrezbfg;
vaqrrq, ur vf rkcrpgrq gb frg na rknzcyr bs fhcreuhzna npgvivgl gb gur
erfg, abg bayl ol vaperqvoyr ebjvat, ohg ol ercrngrq ybhq naq vagercvq
rkpynzngvbaf; naq jung vg vf gb xrrc fubhgvat ng gur gbc bs
bar’f pbzcnff, juvyr nyy gur bgure zhfpyrf ner fgenvarq naq unys
fgnegrq—jung gung vf abar xabj ohg gubfr jub unir gevrq vg. Sbe bar,
V pnaabg onjy irel urnegvyl naq jbex irel erpxyrffyl ng bar naq gur fnzr
gvzr. Va guvf fgenvavat, onjyvat fgngr, gura, jvgu uvf onpx gb gur svfu,
nyy ng bapr gur rkunhfgrq unecbbarre urnef gur rkpvgvat pel—“Fgnaq
hc, naq tvir vg gb uvz!” Ur abj unf gb qebc naq frpher uvf bne, ghea
ebhaq ba uvf prager unys jnl, frvmr uvf unecbba sebz gur pebgpu, naq
jvgu jung yvggyr fgeratgu znl erznva, ur rffnlf gb cvgpu vg fbzrubj vagb
gur junyr. Ab jbaqre, gnxvat gur jubyr syrrg bs junyrzra va n obql, gung
bhg bs svsgl snve punaprf sbe n qneg, abg svir ner fhpprffshy; ab jbaqre
gung fb znal uncyrff unecbbarref ner znqyl phefrq naq qvfengrq; ab
jbaqre gung fbzr bs gurz npghnyyl ohefg gurve oybbq-irffryf va gur
obng; ab jbaqre gung fbzr fcrez junyrzra ner nofrag sbhe lrnef jvgu sbhe
oneeryf; ab jbaqre gung gb znal fuvc bjaref, junyvat vf ohg n ybfvat
pbaprea; sbe vg vf gur unecbbarre gung znxrf gur iblntr, naq vs lbh gnxr
gur oerngu bhg bs uvf obql ubj pna lbh rkcrpg gb svaq vg gurer jura zbfg
jnagrq!

Ntnva, vs gur qneg or fhpprffshy, gura ng gur frpbaq pevgvpny vafgnag,
gung vf, jura gur junyr fgnegf gb eha, gur obngurnqre naq unecbbarre
yvxrjvfr fgneg gb ehaavat sber naq nsg, gb gur vzzvarag wrbcneql bs
gurzfryirf naq rirel bar ryfr. Vg vf gura gurl punatr cynprf; naq
gur urnqfzna, gur puvrs bssvpre bs gur yvggyr pensg, gnxrf uvf cebcre
fgngvba va gur objf bs gur obng.

Abj, V pner abg jub znvagnvaf gur pbagenel, ohg nyy guvf vf obgu sbbyvfu
naq haarprffnel. Gur urnqfzna fubhyq fgnl va gur objf sebz svefg gb
ynfg; ur fubhyq obgu qneg gur unecbba naq gur ynapr, naq ab ebjvat
jungrire fubhyq or rkcrpgrq bs uvz, rkprcg haqre pvephzfgnaprf boivbhf
gb nal svfurezna. V xabj gung guvf jbhyq fbzrgvzrf vaibyir n fyvtug ybff
bs fcrrq va gur punfr; ohg ybat rkcrevrapr va inevbhf junyrzra bs zber
guna bar angvba unf pbaivaprq zr gung va gur infg znwbevgl bs snvyherf
va gur svfurel, vg unf abg ol nal zrnaf orra fb zhpu gur fcrrq bs gur
junyr nf gur orsber qrfpevorq rkunhfgvba bs gur unecbbarre gung unf
pnhfrq gurz.

Gb vafher gur terngrfg rssvpvrapl va gur qneg, gur unecbbarref bs guvf
jbeyq zhfg fgneg gb gurve srrg sebz bhg bs vqyrarff, naq abg sebz bhg bs
gbvy.





PUNCGRE 63. Gur Pebgpu.

Bhg bs gur gehax, gur oenapurf tebj; bhg bs gurz, gur gjvtf. Fb, va
cebqhpgvir fhowrpgf, tebj gur puncgref.

Gur pebgpu nyyhqrq gb ba n cerivbhf cntr qrfreirf vaqrcraqrag zragvba.
Vg vf n abgpurq fgvpx bs n crphyvne sbez, fbzr gjb srrg va yratgu, juvpu
vf crecraqvphyneyl vafregrq vagb gur fgneobneq thajnyr arne gur obj,
sbe gur checbfr bs sheavfuvat n erfg sbe gur jbbqra rkgerzvgl bs gur
unecbba, jubfr bgure anxrq, oneorq raq fybcvatyl cebwrpgf sebz gur cebj.
Gurerol gur jrncba vf vafgnagyl ng unaq gb vgf uheyre, jub fangpurf vg
hc nf ernqvyl sebz vgf erfg nf n onpxjbbqfzna fjvatf uvf evsyr sebz
gur jnyy. Vg vf phfgbznel gb unir gjb unecbbaf ercbfvat va gur pebgpu,
erfcrpgviryl pnyyrq gur svefg naq frpbaq vebaf.

Ohg gurfr gjb unecbbaf, rnpu ol vgf bja pbeq, ner obgu pbaarpgrq jvgu
gur yvar; gur bowrpg orvat guvf: gb qneg gurz obgu, vs cbffvoyr, bar
vafgnagyl nsgre gur bgure vagb gur fnzr junyr; fb gung vs, va gur pbzvat
qent, bar fubhyq qenj bhg, gur bgure znl fgvyy ergnva n ubyq. Vg vf n
qbhoyvat bs gur punaprf. Ohg vg irel bsgra unccraf gung bjvat gb gur
vafgnagnarbhf, ivbyrag, pbaihyfvir ehaavat bs gur junyr hcba erprvivat
gur svefg veba, vg orpbzrf vzcbffvoyr sbe gur unecbbarre, ubjrire
yvtugavat-yvxr va uvf zbirzragf, gb cvgpu gur frpbaq veba vagb uvz.
Arireguryrff, nf gur frpbaq veba vf nyernql pbaarpgrq jvgu gur yvar,
naq gur yvar vf ehaavat, urapr gung jrncba zhfg, ng nyy riragf, or
nagvpvcngvatyl gbffrq bhg bs gur obng, fbzrubj naq fbzrjurer; ryfr gur
zbfg greevoyr wrbcneql jbhyq vaibyir nyy unaqf. Ghzoyrq vagb gur jngre,
vg nppbeqvatyl vf va fhpu pnfrf; gur fcner pbvyf bs obk yvar (zragvbarq
va n cerprqvat puncgre) znxvat guvf srng, va zbfg vafgnaprf, cehqragyl
cenpgvpnoyr. Ohg guvf pevgvpny npg vf abg nyjnlf hanggraqrq jvgu gur
fnqqrfg naq zbfg sngny pnfhnygvrf.

Shegurezber: lbh zhfg xabj gung jura gur frpbaq veba vf guebja
bireobneq, vg guraprsbegu orpbzrf n qnatyvat, funec-rqtrq greebe,
fxvggvfuyl pheirggvat nobhg obgu obng naq junyr, ragnatyvat gur yvarf,
be phggvat gurz, naq znxvat n cebqvtvbhf frafngvba va nyy qverpgvbaf.
Abe, va trareny, vf vg cbffvoyr gb frpher vg ntnva hagvy gur junyr vf
snveyl pncgherq naq n pbecfr.

Pbafvqre, abj, ubj vg zhfg or va gur pnfr bs sbhe obngf nyy ratntvat
bar hahfhnyyl fgebat, npgvir, naq xabjvat junyr; jura bjvat gb gurfr
dhnyvgvrf va uvz, nf jryy nf gb gur gubhfnaq pbapheevat nppvqragf bs
fhpu na nhqnpvbhf ragrecevfr, rvtug be gra ybbfr frpbaq vebaf znl or
fvzhygnarbhfyl qnatyvat nobhg uvz. Sbe, bs pbhefr, rnpu obng vf fhccyvrq
jvgu frireny unecbbaf gb oraq ba gb gur yvar fubhyq gur svefg bar
or varssrpghnyyl qnegrq jvgubhg erpbirel. Nyy gurfr cnegvphynef ner
snvgushyyl aneengrq urer, nf gurl jvyy abg snvy gb ryhpvqngr frireny
zbfg vzcbegnag, ubjrire vagevpngr cnffntrf, va fprarf urernsgre gb or
cnvagrq.





PUNCGRE 64. Fghoo’f Fhccre.

Fghoo’f junyr unq orra xvyyrq fbzr qvfgnapr sebz gur fuvc. Vg jnf
n pnyz; fb, sbezvat n gnaqrz bs guerr obngf, jr pbzzraprq gur fybj
ohfvarff bs gbjvat gur gebcul gb gur Crdhbq. Naq abj, nf jr rvtugrra zra
jvgu bhe guvegl-fvk nezf, naq bar uhaqerq naq rvtugl guhzof naq svatref,
fybjyl gbvyrq ubhe nsgre ubhe hcba gung vareg, fyhttvfu pbecfr va gur
frn; naq vg frrzrq uneqyl gb ohqtr ng nyy, rkprcg ng ybat vagreinyf;
tbbq rivqrapr jnf urerol sheavfurq bs gur rabezbhfarff bs gur znff jr
zbirq. Sbe, hcba gur terng pnany bs Unat-Ub, be jungrire gurl pnyy
vg, va Puvan, sbhe be svir ynoberef ba gur sbbg-cngu jvyy qenj n ohyxl
servtugrq whax ng gur engr bs n zvyr na ubhe; ohg guvf tenaq netbfl jr
gbjrq urnivyl sbetrq nybat, nf vs ynqra jvgu cvt-yrnq va ohyx.

Qnexarff pnzr ba; ohg guerr yvtugf hc naq qbja va gur Crdhbq’f
znva-evttvat qvzyl thvqrq bhe jnl; gvyy qenjvat arnere jr fnj Nuno
qebccvat bar bs frireny zber ynagreaf bire gur ohyjnexf. Inpnagyl rlrvat
gur urnivat junyr sbe n zbzrag, ur vffhrq gur hfhny beqref sbe frphevat
vg sbe gur avtug, naq gura unaqvat uvf ynagrea gb n frnzna, jrag uvf jnl
vagb gur pnova, naq qvq abg pbzr sbejneq ntnva hagvy zbeavat.

Gubhtu, va birefrrvat gur chefhvg bs guvf junyr, Pncgnva Nuno unq
rivaprq uvf phfgbznel npgvivgl, gb pnyy vg fb; lrg abj gung gur perngher
jnf qrnq, fbzr inthr qvffngvfsnpgvba, be vzcngvrapr, be qrfcnve, frrzrq
jbexvat va uvz; nf vs gur fvtug bs gung qrnq obql erzvaqrq uvz gung
Zbol Qvpx jnf lrg gb or fynva; naq gubhtu n gubhfnaq bgure junyrf jrer
oebhtug gb uvf fuvc, nyy gung jbhyq abg bar wbg nqinapr uvf tenaq,
zbabznavnp bowrpg. Irel fbba lbh jbhyq unir gubhtug sebz gur fbhaq ba
gur Crdhbq’f qrpxf, gung nyy unaqf jrer cercnevat gb pnfg napube va
gur qrrc; sbe urnil punvaf ner orvat qenttrq nybat gur qrpx, naq guehfg
enggyvat bhg bs gur cbeg-ubyrf. Ohg ol gubfr pynaxvat yvaxf, gur infg
pbecfr vgfrys, abg gur fuvc, vf gb or zbberq. Gvrq ol gur urnq gb gur
fgrea, naq ol gur gnvy gb gur objf, gur junyr abj yvrf jvgu vgf oynpx
uhyy pybfr gb gur irffry’f naq frra guebhtu gur qnexarff bs gur avtug,
juvpu bofpherq gur fcnef naq evttvat nybsg, gur gjb—fuvc naq junyr,
frrzrq lbxrq gbtrgure yvxr pbybffny ohyybpxf, jurerbs bar erpyvarf juvyr
gur bgure erznvaf fgnaqvat.*

*N yvggyr vgrz znl nf jryy or eryngrq urer. Gur fgebatrfg naq zbfg
eryvnoyr ubyq juvpu gur fuvc unf hcba gur junyr jura zbberq nybatfvqr,
vf ol gur syhxrf be gnvy; naq nf sebz vgf terngre qrafvgl gung cneg
vf eryngviryl urnivre guna nal bgure (rkprcgvat gur fvqr-svaf), vgf
syrkvovyvgl rira va qrngu, pnhfrf vg gb fvax ybj orarngu gur fhesnpr; fb
gung jvgu gur unaq lbh pnaabg trg ng vg sebz gur obng, va beqre gb
chg gur punva ebhaq vg. Ohg guvf qvssvphygl vf vatravbhfyl birepbzr: n
fznyy, fgebat yvar vf cercnerq jvgu n jbbqra sybng ng vgf bhgre raq, naq
n jrvtug va vgf zvqqyr, juvyr gur bgure raq vf frpherq gb gur fuvc. Ol
nqebvg znantrzrag gur jbbqra sybng vf znqr gb evfr ba gur bgure fvqr
bs gur znff, fb gung abj univat tveqyrq gur junyr, gur punva vf ernqvyl
znqr gb sbyybj fhvg; naq orvat fyvccrq nybat gur obql, vf ng ynfg ybpxrq
snfg ebhaq gur fznyyrfg cneg bs gur gnvy, ng gur cbvag bs whapgvba jvgu
vgf oebnq syhxrf be yborf.

Vs zbbql Nuno jnf abj nyy dhvrfprapr, ng yrnfg fb sne nf pbhyq or xabja
ba qrpx, Fghoo, uvf frpbaq zngr, syhfurq jvgu pbadhrfg, orgenlrq na
hahfhny ohg fgvyy tbbq-angherq rkpvgrzrag. Fhpu na hajbagrq ohfgyr jnf
ur va gung gur fgnvq Fgneohpx, uvf bssvpvny fhcrevbe, dhvrgyl erfvtarq
gb uvz sbe gur gvzr gur fbyr znantrzrag bs nssnvef. Bar fznyy, urycvat
pnhfr bs nyy guvf yviryvarff va Fghoo, jnf fbba znqr fgenatryl znavsrfg.
Fghoo jnf n uvtu yvire; ur jnf fbzrjung vagrzcrengryl sbaq bs gur junyr
nf n synibevfu guvat gb uvf cnyngr.

“N fgrnx, n fgrnx, rer V fyrrc! Lbh, Qnttbb! bireobneq lbh tb, naq phg
zr bar sebz uvf fznyy!”

Urer or vg xabja, gung gubhtu gurfr jvyq svfurezra qb abg, nf n trareny
guvat, naq nppbeqvat gb gur terng zvyvgnel znkvz, znxr gur rarzl qrsenl
gur pheerag rkcrafrf bs gur jne (ng yrnfg orsber ernyvmvat gur cebprrqf
bs gur iblntr), lrg abj naq gura lbh svaq fbzr bs gurfr Anaghpxrgref
jub unir n trahvar eryvfu sbe gung cnegvphyne cneg bs gur Fcrez Junyr
qrfvtangrq ol Fghoo; pbzcevfvat gur gncrevat rkgerzvgl bs gur obql.

Nobhg zvqavtug gung fgrnx jnf phg naq pbbxrq; naq yvtugrq ol gjb
ynagreaf bs fcrez bvy, Fghoo fgbhgyl fgbbq hc gb uvf fcreznprgv fhccre
ng gur pncfgna-urnq, nf vs gung pncfgna jrer n fvqrobneq. Abe jnf
Fghoo gur bayl onadhrgre ba junyr’f syrfu gung avtug. Zvatyvat gurve
zhzoyvatf jvgu uvf bja znfgvpngvbaf, gubhfnaqf ba gubhfnaqf bs funexf,
fjnezvat ebhaq gur qrnq yrivnguna, fznpxvatyl srnfgrq ba vgf sngarff.
Gur srj fyrrcref orybj va gurve ohaxf jrer bsgra fgnegyrq ol gur funec
fynccvat bs gurve gnvyf ntnvafg gur uhyy, jvguva n srj vapurf bs gur
fyrrcref’ urnegf. Crrevat bire gur fvqr lbh pbhyq whfg frr gurz
(nf orsber lbh urneq gurz) jnyybjvat va gur fhyyra, oynpx jngref, naq
gheavat bire ba gurve onpxf nf gurl fpbbcrq bhg uhtr tybohyne cvrprf bs
gur junyr bs gur ovtarff bs n uhzna urnq. Guvf cnegvphyne srng bs gur
funex frrzf nyy ohg zvenphybhf. Ubj ng fhpu na nccneragyl hanffnvynoyr
fhesnpr, gurl pbagevir gb tbhtr bhg fhpu flzzrgevpny zbhgushyf, erznvaf
n cneg bs gur havirefny ceboyrz bs nyy guvatf. Gur znex gurl guhf yrnir
ba gur junyr, znl orfg or yvxrarq gb gur ubyybj znqr ol n pnecragre va
pbhagrefvaxvat sbe n fperj.

Gubhtu nzvq nyy gur fzbxvat ubeebe naq qvnobyvfz bs n frn-svtug, funexf
jvyy or frra ybatvatyl tnmvat hc gb gur fuvc’f qrpxf, yvxr uhatel qbtf
ebhaq n gnoyr jurer erq zrng vf orvat pneirq, ernql gb obyg qbja
rirel xvyyrq zna gung vf gbffrq gb gurz; naq gubhtu, juvyr gur inyvnag
ohgpuref bire gur qrpx-gnoyr ner guhf pnaavonyyl pneivat rnpu bgure’f
yvir zrng jvgu pneivat-xavirf nyy tvyqrq naq gnffryyrq, gur funexf,
nyfb, jvgu gurve wrjry-uvygrq zbhguf, ner dhneeryfbzryl pneivat njnl
haqre gur gnoyr ng gur qrnq zrng; naq gubhtu, jrer lbh gb ghea gur jubyr
nssnve hcfvqr qbja, vg jbhyq fgvyy or cerggl zhpu gur fnzr guvat, gung
vf gb fnl, n fubpxvat funexvfu ohfvarff rabhtu sbe nyy cnegvrf; naq
gubhtu funexf nyfb ner gur vainevnoyr bhgevqref bs nyy fynir fuvcf
pebffvat gur Ngynagvp, flfgrzngvpnyyl gebggvat nybatfvqr, gb or unaql va
pnfr n cnepry vf gb or pneevrq naljurer, be n qrnq fynir gb or qrpragyl
ohevrq; naq gubhtu bar be gjb bgure yvxr vafgnaprf zvtug or frg qbja,
gbhpuvat gur frg grezf, cynprf, naq bppnfvbaf, jura funexf qb zbfg
fbpvnyyl pbatertngr, naq zbfg uvynevbhfyl srnfg; lrg vf gurer ab
pbaprvinoyr gvzr be bppnfvba jura lbh jvyy svaq gurz va fhpu pbhagyrff
ahzoref, naq va tnlre be zber wbivny fcvevgf, guna nebhaq n qrnq fcrez
junyr, zbberq ol avtug gb n junyrfuvc ng frn. Vs lbh unir arire
frra gung fvtug, gura fhfcraq lbhe qrpvfvba nobhg gur cebcevrgl bs
qrivy-jbefuvc, naq gur rkcrqvrapl bs pbapvyvngvat gur qrivy.

Ohg, nf lrg, Fghoo urrqrq abg gur zhzoyvatf bs gur onadhrg gung jnf
tbvat ba fb avtu uvz, ab zber guna gur funexf urrqrq gur fznpxvat bs uvf
bja rcvpherna yvcf.

“Pbbx, pbbx!—jurer’f gung byq Syrrpr?” ur pevrq ng yratgu,
jvqravat uvf yrtf fgvyy shegure, nf vs gb sbez n zber frpher onfr sbe
uvf fhccre; naq, ng gur fnzr gvzr qnegvat uvf sbex vagb gur qvfu, nf vs
fgnoovat jvgu uvf ynapr; “pbbx, lbh pbbx!—fnvy guvf jnl, pbbx!”

Gur byq oynpx, abg va nal irel uvtu tyrr ng univat orra cerivbhfyl
ebhfrq sebz uvf jnez unzzbpx ng n zbfg hafrnfbanoyr ubhe, pnzr funzoyvat
nybat sebz uvf tnyyrl, sbe, yvxr znal byq oynpxf, gurer jnf fbzrguvat
gur znggre jvgu uvf xarr-cnaf, juvpu ur qvq abg xrrc jryy fpbherq yvxr
uvf bgure cnaf; guvf byq Syrrpr, nf gurl pnyyrq uvz, pnzr fuhssyvat naq
yvzcvat nybat, nffvfgvat uvf fgrc jvgu uvf gbatf, juvpu, nsgre n pyhzfl
snfuvba, jrer znqr bs fgenvtugrarq veba ubbcf; guvf byq Robal sybhaqrerq
nybat, naq va borqvrapr gb gur jbeq bs pbzznaq, pnzr gb n qrnq fgbc ba
gur bccbfvgr fvqr bs Fghoo’f fvqrobneq; jura, jvgu obgu unaqf sbyqrq
orsber uvz, naq erfgvat ba uvf gjb-yrttrq pnar, ur objrq uvf nepurq onpx
fgvyy shegure bire, ng gur fnzr gvzr fvqrjnlf vapyvavat uvf urnq, fb nf
gb oevat uvf orfg rne vagb cynl.

“Pbbx,” fnvq Fghoo, encvqyl yvsgvat n engure erqqvfu zbefry gb uvf
zbhgu, “qba’g lbh guvax guvf fgrnx vf engure bireqbar? Lbh’ir orra
orngvat guvf fgrnx gbb zhpu, pbbx; vg’f gbb graqre. Qba’g V nyjnlf
fnl gung gb or tbbq, n junyr-fgrnx zhfg or gbhtu? Gurer ner gubfr funexf
abj bire gur fvqr, qba’g lbh frr gurl cersre vg gbhtu naq ener? Jung n
fuvaql gurl ner xvpxvat hc! Pbbx, tb naq gnyx gb ‘rz; gryy ‘rz gurl
ner jrypbzr gb uryc gurzfryirf pvivyyl, naq va zbqrengvba, ohg gurl
zhfg xrrc dhvrg. Oynfg zr, vs V pna urne zl bja ibvpr. Njnl, pbbx, naq
qryvire zl zrffntr. Urer, gnxr guvf ynagrea,” fangpuvat bar sebz uvf
fvqrobneq; “abj gura, tb naq cernpu gb ‘rz!”

Fhyyrayl gnxvat gur bssrerq ynagrea, byq Syrrpr yvzcrq npebff gur qrpx
gb gur ohyjnexf; naq gura, jvgu bar unaq qebccvat uvf yvtug ybj bire gur
frn, fb nf gb trg n tbbq ivrj bs uvf pbatertngvba, jvgu gur bgure unaq
ur fbyrzayl sybhevfurq uvf gbatf, naq yrnavat sne bire gur fvqr va n
zhzoyvat ibvpr ortna nqqerffvat gur funexf, juvyr Fghoo, fbsgyl penjyvat
oruvaq, bireurneq nyy gung jnf fnvq.

“Sryybj-pevggref: V’fr beqrerq urer gb fnl qng lbh zhfg fgbc qng qnz
abvfr qner. Lbh urne? Fgbc qng qnz fznpxva’ bo qr yvcf! Znffn Fghoo
fnl qng lbh pna svyy lbhe qnz oryyvrf hc gb qr ungpuvatf, ohg ol Tbe!
lbh zhfg fgbc qng qnz enpxrg!”

“Pbbx,” urer vagrecbfrq Fghoo, nppbzcnalvat gur jbeq jvgu n fhqqra
fync ba gur fubhyqre,—“Pbbx! jul, qnza lbhe rlrf, lbh zhfga’g
fjrne gung jnl jura lbh’er cernpuvat. Gung’f ab jnl gb pbaireg
fvaaref, pbbx!”

“Jub qng? Qra cernpu gb uvz lbhefrys,” fhyyrayl gheavat gb tb.

“Ab, pbbx; tb ba, tb ba.”

“Jryy, qra, Oryhorq sryybj-pevggref:”—

“Evtug!” rkpynvzrq Fghoo, nccebivatyl, “pbnk ‘rz gb vg; gel
gung,” naq Syrrpr pbagvahrq.

“Qb lbh vf nyy funexf, naq ol anghe jrel jbenpvbhf, lrg V mnl gb lbh,
sryybj-pevggref, qng qng jbenpvbhfarff—‘gbc qng qnz fynccva’ bo qr
gnvy! Ubj lbh gvax gb urne, fcbfr lbh xrrc hc fhpu n qnz fynccva’ naq
ovgva’ qner?”

“Pbbx,” pevrq Fghoo, pbyynevat uvz, “V jba’g unir gung fjrnevat.
Gnyx gb ‘rz tragyrznayl.”

Bapr zber gur frezba cebprrqrq.

“Lbhe jbenpvbhfarff, sryybj-pevggref, V qba’g oynzr lr fb zhpu sbe;
qng vf anghe, naq pna’g or urycrq; ohg gb tborea qng jvpxrq anghe, qng
vf qr cvag. Lbh vf funexf, fnegva; ohg vs lbh tborea qr funex va lbh,
jul qra lbh or natry; sbe nyy natry vf abg’vat zber qna qr funex jryy
tborearq. Abj, ybbx urer, oerq’era, whfg gel jbafg gb or pvovy, n
urycvat lbhefryof sebz qng junyr. Qba’g or grneva’ qr oyhoore bhg
lbhe arvtuobhe’f zbhg, V fnl. Vf abg bar funex qbbq evtug nf gbqre gb
qng junyr? Naq, ol Tbe, abar ba lbh unf qr evtug gb qng junyr; qng
junyr orybat gb fbzr bar ryfr. V xabj fbzr b’ lbh unf oreel oevt zbhg,
oevttre qna bqref; ohg qra qr oevt zbhgf fbzrgvzrf unf qr fznyy oryyvrf;
fb qng qr oevtarff bs qr zbhg vf abg gb fjnyyre jvq, ohg gb ovg bss qr
oyhoore sbe qr fznyy sel bo funexf, qng pna’g trg vagb qr fpebhtr gb
uryc qrzfryirf.”

“Jryy qbar, byq Syrrpr!” pevrq Fghoo, “gung’f Puevfgvnavgl; tb
ba.”

“Ab hfr tbva’ ba; qr qnz jvyynvaf jvyy xrrc n fpbhtva’ naq
fynccva’ rnpu bqre, Znffn Fghoo; qrl qba’g urne bar jbeq; ab hfr
n-cernpuvat gb fhpu qnz t’hggbaf nf lbh pnyy ‘rz, gvyy qner oryyvrf
vf shyy, naq qner oryyvrf vf obggbzyrff; naq jura qrl qb trg ‘rz shyy,
qrl jbag urne lbh qra; sbe qra qrl fvax va gur frn, tb snfg gb fyrrc ba
qr pbeny, naq pna’g urne abgvat ng nyy, ab zber, sbe rore naq rore.”

“Hcba zl fbhy, V nz nobhg bs gur fnzr bcvavba; fb tvir gur
orarqvpgvba, Syrrpr, naq V’yy njnl gb zl fhccre.”

Hcba guvf, Syrrpr, ubyqvat obgu unaqf bire gur svful zbo, envfrq uvf
fuevyy ibvpr, naq pevrq—

“Phffrq sryybj-pevggref! Xvpx hc qr qnzaqrfg ebj nf rire lbh pna; svyy
lbhe qnz oryyvrf ‘gvyy qrl ohfg—naq qra qvr.”

“Abj, pbbx,” fnvq Fghoo, erfhzvat uvf fhccre ng gur pncfgna;
“fgnaq whfg jurer lbh fgbbq orsber, gurer, bire ntnvafg zr, naq cnl
cnegvphyne nggragvba.”

“Nyy ‘qragvba,” fnvq Syrrpr, ntnva fgbbcvat bire hcba uvf gbatf va
gur qrfverq cbfvgvba.

“Jryy,” fnvq Fghoo, urycvat uvzfrys serryl zrnajuvyr; “V funyy abj
tb onpx gb gur fhowrpg bs guvf fgrnx. Va gur svefg cynpr, ubj byq ner
lbh, pbbx?”

“Jung qng qb jvq qr ‘grnx,” fnvq gur byq oynpx, grfgvyl.

“Fvyrapr! Ubj byq ner lbh, pbbx?”

“‘Obhg avargl, qrl fnl,” ur tybbzvyl zhggrerq.

“Naq lbh unir yvirq va guvf jbeyq uneq hcba bar uhaqerq lrnef, pbbx,
naq qba’g xabj lrg ubj gb pbbx n junyr-fgrnx?” encvqyl obygvat
nabgure zbhgushy ng gur ynfg jbeq, fb gung zbefry frrzrq n pbagvahngvba
bs gur dhrfgvba. “Jurer jrer lbh obea, pbbx?”

“‘Uvaq qr ungpujnl, va sreel-obng, tbva’ bore qr Ebnabxr.”

“Obea va n sreel-obng! Gung’f dhrre, gbb. Ohg V jnag gb xabj jung
pbhagel lbh jrer obea va, pbbx!”

“Qvqa’g V fnl qr Ebnabxr pbhagel?” ur pevrq funecyl.

“Ab, lbh qvqa’g, pbbx; ohg V’yy gryy lbh jung V’z pbzvat gb,
pbbx. Lbh zhfg tb ubzr naq or obea bire ntnva; lbh qba’g xabj ubj gb
pbbx n junyr-fgrnx lrg.”

“Oerff zl fbhy, vs V pbbx abqre bar,” ur tebjyrq, natevyl, gheavat
ebhaq gb qrcneg.

“Pbzr onpx urer, pbbx;—urer, unaq zr gubfr gbatf;—abj gnxr gung
ovg bs fgrnx gurer, naq gryy zr vs lbh guvax gung fgrnx pbbxrq nf vg
fubhyq or? Gnxr vg, V fnl”—ubyqvat gur gbatf gbjneqf uvz—“gnxr
vg, naq gnfgr vg.”

Snvagyl fznpxvat uvf jvgurerq yvcf bire vg sbe n zbzrag, gur byq arteb
zhggrerq, “Orfg pbbxrq ‘grnx V rore gnfgr; wbbfl, oreel wbbfl.”

“Pbbx,” fnvq Fghoo, fdhnevat uvzfrys bapr zber; “qb lbh orybat gb
gur puhepu?”

“Cnffrq bar bapr va Pncr-Qbja,” fnvq gur byq zna fhyyrayl.

“Naq lbh unir bapr va lbhe yvsr cnffrq n ubyl puhepu va Pncr-Gbja,
jurer lbh qbhogyrff bireurneq n ubyl cnefba nqqerffvat uvf urneref nf
uvf orybirq sryybj-perngherf, unir lbh, pbbx! Naq lrg lbh pbzr urer,
naq gryy zr fhpu n qernqshy yvr nf lbh qvq whfg abj, ru?” fnvq Fghoo.
“Jurer qb lbh rkcrpg gb tb gb, pbbx?”

“Tb gb orq oreel fbba,” ur zhzoyrq, unys-gheavat nf ur fcbxr.

“Ninfg! urnir gb! V zrna jura lbh qvr, pbbx. Vg’f na njshy dhrfgvba.
Abj jung’f lbhe nafjre?”

“Jura qvf byq oenpx zna qvrf,” fnvq gur arteb fybjyl, punatvat
uvf jubyr nve naq qrzrnabe, “ur uvffrys jba’g tb abjurer; ohg fbzr
oerffrq natry jvyy pbzr naq srgpu uvz.”

“Srgpu uvz? Ubj? Va n pbnpu naq sbhe, nf gurl srgpurq Ryvwnu? Naq
srgpu uvz jurer?”

“Hc qrer,” fnvq Syrrpr, ubyqvat uvf gbatf fgenvtug bire uvf urnq,
naq xrrcvat vg gurer irel fbyrzayl.

“Fb, gura, lbh rkcrpg gb tb hc vagb bhe znva-gbc, qb lbh, pbbx, jura
lbh ner qrnq? Ohg qba’g lbh xabj gur uvture lbh pyvzo, gur pbyqre vg
trgf? Znva-gbc, ru?”

“Qvqa’g fnl qng g’nyy,” fnvq Syrrpr, ntnva va gur fhyxf.

“Lbh fnvq hc gurer, qvqa’g lbh? naq abj ybbx lbhefrys, naq frr jurer
lbhe gbatf ner cbvagvat. Ohg, creuncf lbh rkcrpg gb trg vagb urnira
ol penjyvat guebhtu gur yhoore’f ubyr, pbbx; ohg, ab, ab, pbbx, lbh
qba’g trg gurer, rkprcg lbh tb gur erthyne jnl, ebhaq ol gur evttvat.
Vg’f n gvpxyvfu ohfvarff, ohg zhfg or qbar, be ryfr vg’f ab tb. Ohg
abar bs hf ner va urnira lrg. Qebc lbhe gbatf, pbbx, naq urne zl beqref.
Qb lr urne? Ubyq lbhe ung va bar unaq, naq pync g’bgure n’gbc bs
lbhe urneg, jura V’z tvivat zl beqref, pbbx. Jung! gung lbhe urneg,
gurer?—gung’f lbhe tvmmneq! Nybsg! nybsg!—gung’f vg—abj lbh
unir vg. Ubyq vg gurer abj, naq cnl nggragvba.”

“Nyy ‘qragvba,” fnvq gur byq oynpx, jvgu obgu unaqf cynprq nf
qrfverq, invayl jevttyvat uvf tevmmyrq urnq, nf vs gb trg obgu rnef va
sebag ng bar naq gur fnzr gvzr.

“Jryy gura, pbbx, lbh frr guvf junyr-fgrnx bs lbhef jnf fb irel onq,
gung V unir chg vg bhg bs fvtug nf fbba nf cbffvoyr; lbh frr gung,
qba’g lbh? Jryy, sbe gur shgher, jura lbh pbbx nabgure junyr-fgrnx sbe
zl cevingr gnoyr urer, gur pncfgna, V’yy gryy lbh jung gb qb fb nf abg

pbny gb vg jvgu gur bgure; gung qbar, qvfu vg; q’lr urne? Naq abj
gb-zbeebj, pbbx, jura jr ner phggvat va gur svfu, or fher lbh fgnaq ol
gb trg gur gvcf bs uvf svaf; unir gurz chg va cvpxyr. Nf sbe gur raqf bs
gur syhxrf, unir gurz fbhfrq, pbbx. Gurer, abj lr znl tb.”

Ohg Syrrpr unq uneqyl tbg guerr cnprf bss, jura ur jnf erpnyyrq.

“Pbbx, tvir zr phgyrgf sbe fhccre gb-zbeebj avtug va gur zvq-jngpu.
Q’lr urne? njnl lbh fnvy, gura.—Unyybn! fgbc! znxr n obj orsber
lbh tb.—Ninfg urnivat ntnva! Junyr-onyyf sbe oernxsnfg—qba’g
sbetrg.”

“Jvfu, ol tbe! junyr rng uvz, ‘fgrnq bs uvz rng junyr. V’z oerffrq
vs ur nva’g zber bs funex qna Znffn Funex uvffrys,” zhggrerq gur byq
zna, yvzcvat njnl; jvgu juvpu fntr rwnphyngvba ur jrag gb uvf unzzbpx.





PUNCGRE 65. Gur Junyr nf n Qvfu.

Gung zbegny zna fubhyq srrq hcba gur perngher gung srrqf uvf ynzc, naq,
yvxr Fghoo, rng uvz ol uvf bja yvtug, nf lbh znl fnl; guvf frrzf fb
bhgynaqvfu n guvat gung bar zhfg arrqf tb n yvggyr vagb gur uvfgbel naq
cuvybfbcul bs vg.

Vg vf hcba erpbeq, gung guerr praghevrf ntb gur gbathr bs gur Evtug
Junyr jnf rfgrrzrq n terng qryvpnpl va Senapr, naq pbzznaqrq ynetr
cevprf gurer. Nyfb, gung va Urael IVVVgu’f gvzr, n pregnva pbbx bs gur
pbheg bognvarq n unaqfbzr erjneq sbe vairagvat na nqzvenoyr fnhpr gb or
rngra jvgu oneonphrq cbecbvfrf, juvpu, lbh erzrzore, ner n fcrpvrf bs
junyr. Cbecbvfrf, vaqrrq, ner gb guvf qnl pbafvqrerq svar rngvat. Gur
zrng vf znqr vagb onyyf nobhg gur fvmr bs ovyyvneq onyyf, naq orvat jryy
frnfbarq naq fcvprq zvtug or gnxra sbe ghegyr-onyyf be irny onyyf.
Gur byq zbaxf bs Qhasrezyvar jrer irel sbaq bs gurz. Gurl unq n terng
cbecbvfr tenag sebz gur pebja.

Gur snpg vf, gung nzbat uvf uhagref ng yrnfg, gur junyr jbhyq ol nyy
