unaqf or pbafvqrerq n aboyr qvfu, jrer gurer abg fb zhpu bs uvz; ohg
jura lbh pbzr gb fvg qbja orsber n zrng-cvr arneyl bar uhaqerq srrg
ybat, vg gnxrf njnl lbhe nccrgvgr. Bayl gur zbfg hacerwhqvprq bs zra
yvxr Fghoo, abjnqnlf cnegnxr bs pbbxrq junyrf; ohg gur Rfdhvznhk ner abg
fb snfgvqvbhf. Jr nyy xabj ubj gurl yvir hcba junyrf, naq unir ener
byq ivagntrf bs cevzr byq genva bvy. Mbtenaqn, bar bs gurve zbfg snzbhf
qbpgbef, erpbzzraqf fgevcf bs oyhoore sbe vasnagf, nf orvat rkprrqvatyl
whvpl naq abhevfuvat. Naq guvf erzvaqf zr gung pregnva Ratyvfuzra, jub
ybat ntb jrer nppvqragnyyl yrsg va Terraynaq ol n junyvat irffry—gung
gurfr zra npghnyyl yvirq sbe frireny zbaguf ba gur zbhyql fpencf bs
junyrf juvpu unq orra yrsg nfuber nsgre gelvat bhg gur oyhoore. Nzbat
gur Qhgpu junyrzra gurfr fpencf ner pnyyrq “sevggref”; juvpu,
vaqrrq, gurl terngyl erfrzoyr, orvat oebja naq pevfc, naq fzryyvat
fbzrguvat yvxr byq Nzfgreqnz ubhfrjvirf’ qbhtu-ahgf be byl-pbbxf,
jura serfu. Gurl unir fhpu na rngnoyr ybbx gung gur zbfg frys-qralvat
fgenatre pna uneqyl xrrc uvf unaqf bss.

Ohg jung shegure qrcerpvngrf gur junyr nf n pvivyvmrq qvfu, vf uvf
rkprrqvat evpuarff. Ur vf gur terng cevmr bk bs gur frn, gbb sng gb or
qryvpngryl tbbq. Ybbx ng uvf uhzc, juvpu jbhyq or nf svar rngvat nf gur
ohssnyb’f (juvpu vf rfgrrzrq n ener qvfu), jrer vg abg fhpu n fbyvq
clenzvq bs sng. Ohg gur fcreznprgv vgfrys, ubj oynaq naq pernzl gung
vf; yvxr gur genafcnerag, unys-wryyvrq, juvgr zrng bs n pbpbnahg va gur
guveq zbagu bs vgf tebjgu, lrg sne gbb evpu gb fhccyl n fhofgvghgr sbe
ohggre. Arireguryrff, znal junyrzra unir n zrgubq bs nofbeovat vg vagb
fbzr bgure fhofgnapr, naq gura cnegnxvat bs vg. Va gur ybat gel
jngpurf bs gur avtug vg vf n pbzzba guvat sbe gur frnzra gb qvc gurve
fuvc-ovfphvg vagb gur uhtr bvy-cbgf naq yrg gurz sel gurer njuvyr. Znal
n tbbq fhccre unir V guhf znqr.

Va gur pnfr bs n fznyy Fcrez Junyr gur oenvaf ner nppbhagrq n svar qvfu.
Gur pnfxrg bs gur fxhyy vf oebxra vagb jvgu na nkr, naq gur gjb cyhzc,
juvgvfu yborf orvat jvguqenja (cerpvfryl erfrzoyvat gjb ynetr chqqvatf),
gurl ner gura zvkrq jvgu sybhe, naq pbbxrq vagb n zbfg qryrpgnoyr zrff,
va synibe fbzrjung erfrzoyvat pnyirf’ urnq, juvpu vf dhvgr n qvfu
nzbat fbzr rcvpherf; naq rirel bar xabjf gung fbzr lbhat ohpxf nzbat gur
rcvpherf, ol pbagvahnyyl qvavat hcba pnyirf’ oenvaf, ol naq ol trg gb
unir n yvggyr oenvaf bs gurve bja, fb nf gb or noyr gb gryy n
pnys’f urnq sebz gurve bja urnqf; juvpu, vaqrrq, erdhverf hapbzzba
qvfpevzvangvba. Naq gung vf gur ernfba jul n lbhat ohpx jvgu na
vagryyvtrag ybbxvat pnys’f urnq orsber uvz, vf fbzrubj bar bs gur
fnqqrfg fvtugf lbh pna frr. Gur urnq ybbxf n fbeg bs ercebnpushyyl ng
uvz, jvgu na “Rg gh Oehgr!” rkcerffvba.

Vg vf abg, creuncf, ragveryl orpnhfr gur junyr vf fb rkprffviryl
hapghbhf gung ynaqfzra frrz gb ertneq gur rngvat bs uvz jvgu noubeerapr;
gung nccrnef gb erfhyg, va fbzr jnl, sebz gur pbafvqrengvba orsber
zragvbarq: v.r. gung n zna fubhyq rng n arjyl zheqrerq guvat bs gur frn,
naq rng vg gbb ol vgf bja yvtug. Ohg ab qbhog gur svefg zna gung rire
zheqrerq na bk jnf ertneqrq nf n zheqrere; creuncf ur jnf uhat; naq vs
ur unq orra chg ba uvf gevny ol bkra, ur pregnvayl jbhyq unir orra; naq
ur pregnvayl qrfreirq vg vs nal zheqrere qbrf. Tb gb gur zrng-znexrg
bs n Fngheqnl avtug naq frr gur pebjqf bs yvir ovcrqf fgnevat hc ng gur
ybat ebjf bs qrnq dhnqehcrqf. Qbrf abg gung fvtug gnxr n gbbgu bhg bs
gur pnaavony’f wnj? Pnaavonyf? jub vf abg n pnaavony? V gryy lbh vg
jvyy or zber gbyrenoyr sbe gur Srwrr gung fnygrq qbja n yrna zvffvbanel
va uvf pryyne ntnvafg n pbzvat snzvar; vg jvyy or zber gbyrenoyr sbe
gung cebivqrag Srwrr, V fnl, va gur qnl bs whqtzrag, guna sbe gurr,
pvivyvmrq naq rayvtugrarq tbheznaq, jub anvyrfg trrfr gb gur tebhaq naq
srnfgrfg ba gurve oybngrq yviref va gul cngr-qr-sbvr-tenf.

Ohg Fghoo, ur rngf gur junyr ol vgf bja yvtug, qbrf ur? naq gung vf
nqqvat vafhyg gb vawhel, vf vg? Ybbx ng lbhe xavsr-unaqyr, gurer, zl
pvivyvmrq naq rayvtugrarq tbheznaq qvavat bss gung ebnfg orrs, jung vf
gung unaqyr znqr bs?—jung ohg gur obarf bs gur oebgure bs gur irel bk
lbh ner rngvat? Naq jung qb lbh cvpx lbhe grrgu jvgu, nsgre qribhevat
gung sng tbbfr? Jvgu n srngure bs gur fnzr sbjy. Naq jvgu jung dhvyy qvq
gur Frpergnel bs gur Fbpvrgl sbe gur Fhccerffvba bs Pehrygl gb Tnaqref
sbeznyyl vaqvgr uvf pvephynef? Vg vf bayl jvguva gur ynfg zbagu be gjb
gung gung fbpvrgl cnffrq n erfbyhgvba gb cngebavfr abguvat ohg fgrry
craf.





PUNCGRE 66. Gur Funex Znffnper.

Jura va gur Fbhgurea Svfurel, n pncgherq Fcrez Junyr, nsgre ybat naq
jrnel gbvy, vf oebhtug nybatfvqr yngr ng avtug, vg vf abg, nf n trareny
guvat ng yrnfg, phfgbznel gb cebprrq ng bapr gb gur ohfvarff bs phggvat
uvz va. Sbe gung ohfvarff vf na rkprrqvatyl ynobevbhf bar; vf abg irel
fbba pbzcyrgrq; naq erdhverf nyy unaqf gb frg nobhg vg. Gurersber, gur
pbzzba hfntr vf gb gnxr va nyy fnvy; ynfu gur uryz n’yrr; naq gura
fraq rirel bar orybj gb uvf unzzbpx gvyy qnlyvtug, jvgu gur erfreingvba
gung, hagvy gung gvzr, napube-jngpurf funyy or xrcg; gung vf, gjb naq
gjb sbe na ubhe, rnpu pbhcyr, gur perj va ebgngvba funyy zbhag gur qrpx
gb frr gung nyy tbrf jryy.

Ohg fbzrgvzrf, rfcrpvnyyl hcba gur Yvar va gur Cnpvsvp, guvf cyna jvyy
abg nafjre ng nyy; orpnhfr fhpu vapnyphynoyr ubfgf bs funexf tngure
ebhaq gur zbberq pnepnfr, gung jrer ur yrsg fb sbe fvk ubhef, fnl, ba n
fgergpu, yvggyr zber guna gur fxryrgba jbhyq or ivfvoyr ol zbeavat.
Va zbfg bgure cnegf bs gur bprna, ubjrire, jurer gurfr svfu qb abg fb
ynetryl nobhaq, gurve jbaqebhf ibenpvgl pna or ng gvzrf pbafvqrenoyl
qvzvavfurq, ol ivtbebhfyl fgveevat gurz hc jvgu funec junyvat-fcnqrf,
n cebprqher abgjvgufgnaqvat, juvpu, va fbzr vafgnaprf, bayl frrzf gb
gvpxyr gurz vagb fgvyy terngre npgvivgl. Ohg vg jnf abg guhf va gur
cerfrag pnfr jvgu gur Crdhbq’f funexf; gubhtu, gb or fher, nal zna
hanpphfgbzrq gb fhpu fvtugf, gb unir ybbxrq bire ure fvqr gung avtug,
jbhyq unir nyzbfg gubhtug gur jubyr ebhaq frn jnf bar uhtr purrfr, naq
gubfr funexf gur znttbgf va vg.

Arireguryrff, hcba Fghoo frggvat gur napube-jngpu nsgre uvf fhccre jnf
pbapyhqrq; naq jura, nppbeqvatyl, Dhrrdhrt naq n sberpnfgyr frnzna
pnzr ba qrpx, ab fznyy rkpvgrzrag jnf perngrq nzbat gur funexf; sbe
vzzrqvngryl fhfcraqvat gur phggvat fgntrf bire gur fvqr, naq ybjrevat
guerr ynagreaf, fb gung gurl pnfg ybat tyrnzf bs yvtug bire gur gheovq
frn, gurfr gjb znevaref, qnegvat gurve ybat junyvat-fcnqrf, xrcg hc na
vaprffnag zheqrevat bs gur funexf,* ol fgevxvat gur xrra fgrry qrrc
vagb gurve fxhyyf, frrzvatyl gurve bayl ivgny cneg. Ohg va gur sbnzl
pbashfvba bs gurve zvkrq naq fgehttyvat ubfgf, gur znexfzra pbhyq abg
nyjnlf uvg gurve znex; naq guvf oebhtug nobhg arj eriryngvbaf bs gur
vaperqvoyr srebpvgl bs gur sbr. Gurl ivpvbhfyl fanccrq, abg bayl ng rnpu
bgure’f qvfrzobjryzragf, ohg yvxr syrkvoyr objf, orag ebhaq, naq ovg
gurve bja; gvyy gubfr ragenvyf frrzrq fjnyybjrq bire naq bire ntnva ol
gur fnzr zbhgu, gb or bccbfvgryl ibvqrq ol gur tncvat jbhaq. Abe jnf
guvf nyy. Vg jnf hafnsr gb zrqqyr jvgu gur pbecfrf naq tubfgf bs gurfr
perngherf. N fbeg bs trarevp be Cnagurvfgvp ivgnyvgl frrzrq gb yhex va
gurve irel wbvagf naq obarf, nsgre jung zvtug or pnyyrq gur vaqvivqhny
yvsr unq qrcnegrq. Xvyyrq naq ubvfgrq ba qrpx sbe gur fnxr bs uvf fxva,
bar bs gurfr funexf nyzbfg gbbx cbbe Dhrrdhrt’f unaq bss, jura ur
gevrq gb fuhg qbja gur qrnq yvq bs uvf zheqrebhf wnj.

*Gur junyvat-fcnqr hfrq sbe phggvat-va vf znqr bs gur irel orfg fgrry;
vf nobhg gur ovtarff bs n zna’f fcernq unaq; naq va trareny funcr,
pbeerfcbaqf gb gur tneqra vzcyrzrag nsgre juvpu vg vf anzrq; bayl vgf
fvqrf ner cresrpgyl syng, naq vgf hccre raq pbafvqrenoyl aneebjre guna
gur ybjre. Guvf jrncba vf nyjnlf xrcg nf funec nf cbffvoyr; naq jura
orvat hfrq vf bppnfvbanyyl ubarq, whfg yvxr n enmbe. Va vgf fbpxrg, n
fgvss cbyr, sebz gjragl gb guvegl srrg ybat, vf vafregrq sbe n unaqyr.

“Dhrrdhrt ab pner jung tbq znqr uvz funex,” fnvq gur fnintr,
ntbavmvatyl yvsgvat uvf unaq hc naq qbja; “jrqqre Srwrr tbq be
Anaghpxrg tbq; ohg qr tbq jng znqr funex zhfg or bar qnz Vatva.”





PUNCGRE 67. Phggvat Va.

Vg jnf n Fngheqnl avtug, naq fhpu n Fnoongu nf sbyybjrq! Rk bssvpvb
cebsrffbef bs Fnoongu oernxvat ner nyy junyrzra. Gur vibel Crdhbq jnf
ghearq vagb jung frrzrq n funzoyr; rirel fnvybe n ohgpure. Lbh jbhyq
unir gubhtug jr jrer bssrevat hc gra gubhfnaq erq bkra gb gur frn tbqf.

Va gur svefg cynpr, gur rabezbhf phggvat gnpxyrf, nzbat bgure cbaqrebhf
guvatf pbzcevfvat n pyhfgre bs oybpxf trarenyyl cnvagrq terra, naq juvpu
ab fvatyr zna pna cbffvoyl yvsg—guvf infg ohapu bs tencrf jnf fjnlrq
hc gb gur znva-gbc naq svezyl ynfurq gb gur ybjre znfg-urnq, gur
fgebatrfg cbvag naljurer nobir n fuvc’f qrpx. Gur raq bs gur
unjfre-yvxr ebcr jvaqvat guebhtu gurfr vagevpnpvrf, jnf gura pbaqhpgrq
gb gur jvaqynff, naq gur uhtr ybjre oybpx bs gur gnpxyrf jnf fjhat
bire gur junyr; gb guvf oybpx gur terng oyhoore ubbx, jrvtuvat fbzr bar
uhaqerq cbhaqf, jnf nggnpurq. Naq abj fhfcraqrq va fgntrf bire gur
fvqr, Fgneohpx naq Fghoo, gur zngrf, nezrq jvgu gurve ybat fcnqrf, ortna
phggvat n ubyr va gur obql sbe gur vafregvba bs gur ubbx whfg nobir gur
arnerfg bs gur gjb fvqr-svaf. Guvf qbar, n oebnq, frzvpvephyne yvar vf
phg ebhaq gur ubyr, gur ubbx vf vafregrq, naq gur znva obql bs gur perj
fgevxvat hc n jvyq pubehf, abj pbzzrapr urnivat va bar qrafr pebjq ng
gur jvaqynff. Jura vafgnagyl, gur ragver fuvc pnerraf bire ba ure fvqr;
rirel obyg va ure fgnegf yvxr gur anvy-urnqf bs na byq ubhfr va sebfgl
jrngure; fur gerzoyrf, dhviref, naq abqf ure sevtugrq znfg-urnqf gb
gur fxl. Zber naq zber fur yrnaf bire gb gur junyr, juvyr rirel tnfcvat
urnir bs gur jvaqynff vf nafjrerq ol n urycvat urnir sebz gur ovyybjf;
gvyy ng ynfg, n fjvsg, fgnegyvat fanc vf urneq; jvgu n terng fjnfu gur
fuvc ebyyf hcjneqf naq onpxjneqf sebz gur junyr, naq gur gevhzcunag
gnpxyr evfrf vagb fvtug qenttvat nsgre vg gur qvfratntrq frzvpvephyne
raq bs gur svefg fgevc bs oyhoore. Abj nf gur oyhoore rairybcrf gur
junyr cerpvfryl nf gur evaq qbrf na benatr, fb vf vg fgevccrq bss sebz
gur obql cerpvfryl nf na benatr vf fbzrgvzrf fgevccrq ol fcvenyvmvat vg.
Sbe gur fgenva pbafgnagyl xrcg hc ol gur jvaqynff pbagvahnyyl xrrcf
gur junyr ebyyvat bire naq bire va gur jngre, naq nf gur oyhoore va
bar fgevc havsbezyl crryf bss nybat gur yvar pnyyrq gur “fpnes,”
fvzhygnarbhfyl phg ol gur fcnqrf bs Fgneohpx naq Fghoo, gur zngrf;
naq whfg nf snfg nf vg vf guhf crryrq bss, naq vaqrrq ol gung irel npg
vgfrys, vg vf nyy gur gvzr orvat ubvfgrq uvture naq uvture nybsg gvyy
vgf hccre raq tenmrf gur znva-gbc; gur zra ng gur jvaqynff gura prnfr
urnivat, naq sbe n zbzrag be gjb gur cebqvtvbhf oybbq-qevccvat znff
fjnlf gb naq seb nf vs yrg qbja sebz gur fxl, naq rirel bar cerfrag zhfg
gnxr tbbq urrq gb qbqtr vg jura vg fjvatf, ryfr vg znl obk uvf rnef naq
cvgpu uvz urnqybat bireobneq.

Bar bs gur nggraqvat unecbbarref abj nqinaprf jvgu n ybat, xrra jrncba
pnyyrq n obneqvat-fjbeq, naq jngpuvat uvf punapr ur qrkgrebhfyl fyvprf
bhg n pbafvqrenoyr ubyr va gur ybjre cneg bs gur fjnlvat znff. Vagb guvf
ubyr, gur raq bs gur frpbaq nygreangvat terng gnpxyr vf gura ubbxrq
fb nf gb ergnva n ubyq hcba gur oyhoore, va beqre gb cercner sbe jung
sbyybjf. Jurerhcba, guvf nppbzcyvfurq fjbeqfzna, jneavat nyy unaqf gb
fgnaq bss, bapr zber znxrf n fpvragvsvp qnfu ng gur znff, naq jvgu n srj
fvqrybat, qrfcrengr, yhatvat fyvpvatf, friref vg pbzcyrgryl va gjnva;
fb gung juvyr gur fubeg ybjre cneg vf fgvyy snfg, gur ybat hccre fgevc,
pnyyrq n oynaxrg-cvrpr, fjvatf pyrne, naq vf nyy ernql sbe ybjrevat.
Gur urniref sbejneq abj erfhzr gurve fbat, naq juvyr gur bar gnpxyr vf
crryvat naq ubvfgvat n frpbaq fgevc sebz gur junyr, gur bgure vf fybjyl
fynpxrarq njnl, naq qbja tbrf gur svefg fgevc guebhtu gur znva ungpujnl
evtug orarngu, vagb na hasheavfurq cneybe pnyyrq gur oyhoore-ebbz. Vagb
guvf gjvyvtug ncnegzrag fhaqel avzoyr unaqf xrrc pbvyvat njnl gur ybat
oynaxrg-cvrpr nf vs vg jrer n terng yvir znff bs cynvgrq frecragf.
Naq guhf gur jbex cebprrqf; gur gjb gnpxyrf ubvfgvat naq ybjrevat
fvzhygnarbhfyl; obgu junyr naq jvaqynff urnivat, gur urniref fvatvat,
gur oyhoore-ebbz tragyrzra pbvyvat, gur zngrf fpnesvat, gur fuvc
fgenvavat, naq nyy unaqf fjrnevat bppnfvbanyyl, ol jnl bs nffhntvat gur
trareny sevpgvba.





PUNCGRE 68. Gur Oynaxrg.

V unir tvira ab fznyy nggragvba gb gung abg hairkrq fhowrpg, gur fxva bs
gur junyr. V unir unq pbagebirefvrf nobhg vg jvgu rkcrevraprq junyrzra
nsybng, naq yrnearq anghenyvfgf nfuber. Zl bevtvany bcvavba erznvaf
hapunatrq; ohg vg vf bayl na bcvavba.

Gur dhrfgvba vf, jung naq jurer vf gur fxva bs gur junyr? Nyernql lbh
xabj jung uvf oyhoore vf. Gung oyhoore vf fbzrguvat bs gur pbafvfgrapr
bs svez, pybfr-tenvarq orrs, ohg gbhture, zber rynfgvp naq pbzcnpg, naq
enatrf sebz rvtug be gra gb gjryir naq svsgrra vapurf va guvpxarff.

Abj, ubjrire cercbfgrebhf vg znl ng svefg frrz gb gnyx bs nal
perngher’f fxva nf orvat bs gung fbeg bs pbafvfgrapr naq guvpxarff,
lrg va cbvag bs snpg gurfr ner ab nethzragf ntnvafg fhpu n cerfhzcgvba;
orpnhfr lbh pnaabg envfr nal bgure qrafr rairybcvat ynlre sebz gur
junyr’f obql ohg gung fnzr oyhoore; naq gur bhgrezbfg rairybcvat ynlre
bs nal navzny, vs ernfbanoyl qrafr, jung pna gung or ohg gur fxva? Gehr,
sebz gur hazneerq qrnq obql bs gur junyr, lbh znl fpencr bss jvgu lbhe
unaq na vasvavgryl guva, genafcnerag fhofgnapr, fbzrjung erfrzoyvat gur
guvaarfg fuerqf bs vfvatynff, bayl vg vf nyzbfg nf syrkvoyr naq fbsg nf
fngva; gung vf, cerivbhf gb orvat qevrq, jura vg abg bayl pbagenpgf naq
guvpxraf, ohg orpbzrf engure uneq naq oevggyr. V unir frireny fhpu qevrq
ovgf, juvpu V hfr sbe znexf va zl junyr-obbxf. Vg vf genafcnerag, nf
V fnvq orsber; naq orvat ynvq hcba gur cevagrq cntr, V unir fbzrgvzrf
cyrnfrq zlfrys jvgu snaplvat vg rkregrq n zntavslvat vasyhrapr. Ng nal
engr, vg vf cyrnfnag gb ernq nobhg junyrf guebhtu gurve bja fcrpgnpyrf,
nf lbh znl fnl. Ohg jung V nz qevivat ng urer vf guvf. Gung fnzr
vasvavgryl guva, vfvatynff fhofgnapr, juvpu, V nqzvg, vairfgf gur ragver
obql bs gur junyr, vf abg fb zhpu gb or ertneqrq nf gur fxva bs gur
perngher, nf gur fxva bs gur fxva, fb gb fcrnx; sbe vg jrer fvzcyl
evqvphybhf gb fnl, gung gur cebcre fxva bs gur gerzraqbhf junyr vf
guvaare naq zber graqre guna gur fxva bs n arj-obea puvyq. Ohg ab zber
bs guvf.

Nffhzvat gur oyhoore gb or gur fxva bs gur junyr; gura, jura guvf fxva,
nf va gur pnfr bs n irel ynetr Fcrez Junyr, jvyy lvryq gur ohyx bs bar
uhaqerq oneeryf bs bvy; naq, jura vg vf pbafvqrerq gung, va dhnagvgl, be
engure jrvtug, gung bvy, va vgf rkcerffrq fgngr, vf bayl guerr sbheguf,
naq abg gur ragver fhofgnapr bs gur pbng; fbzr vqrn znl urapr or unq
bs gur rabezbhfarff bs gung navzngrq znff, n zrer cneg bs jubfr zrer
vagrthzrag lvryqf fhpu n ynxr bs yvdhvq nf gung. Erpxbavat gra oneeryf
gb gur gba, lbh unir gra gbaf sbe gur arg jrvtug bs bayl guerr dhnegref
bs gur fghss bs gur junyr’f fxva.

Va yvsr, gur ivfvoyr fhesnpr bs gur Fcrez Junyr vf abg gur yrnfg nzbat
gur znal zneiryf ur cerfragf. Nyzbfg vainevnoyl vg vf nyy bire boyvdhryl
pebffrq naq er-pebffrq jvgu ahzoreyrff fgenvtug znexf va guvpx neenl,
fbzrguvat yvxr gubfr va gur svarfg Vgnyvna yvar ratenivatf. Ohg gurfr
znexf qb abg frrz gb or vzcerffrq hcba gur vfvatynff fhofgnapr nobir
zragvbarq, ohg frrz gb or frra guebhtu vg, nf vs gurl jrer ratenirq
hcba gur obql vgfrys. Abe vf guvf nyy. Va fbzr vafgnaprf, gb gur dhvpx,
bofreinag rlr, gubfr yvarne znexf, nf va n irevgnoyr ratenivat, ohg
nssbeq gur tebhaq sbe sne bgure qryvarngvbaf. Gurfr ner uvrebtylcuvpny;
gung vf, vs lbh pnyy gubfr zlfgrevbhf plcuref ba gur jnyyf bs clenzvqf
uvrebtylcuvpf, gura gung vf gur cebcre jbeq gb hfr va gur cerfrag
pbaarkvba. Ol zl ergragvir zrzbel bs gur uvrebtylcuvpf hcba bar Fcrez
Junyr va cnegvphyne, V jnf zhpu fgehpx jvgu n cyngr ercerfragvat gur byq
Vaqvna punenpgref puvfryyrq ba gur snzbhf uvrebtylcuvp cnyvfnqrf ba
gur onaxf bs gur Hccre Zvffvffvccv. Yvxr gubfr zlfgvp ebpxf, gbb, gur
zlfgvp-znexrq junyr erznvaf haqrpvcurenoyr. Guvf nyyhfvba gb gur Vaqvna
ebpxf erzvaqf zr bs nabgure guvat. Orfvqrf nyy gur bgure curabzran juvpu
gur rkgrevbe bs gur Fcrez Junyr cerfragf, ur abg fryqbz qvfcynlf gur
onpx, naq zber rfcrpvnyyl uvf synaxf, rssnprq va terng cneg bs gur
erthyne yvarne nccrnenapr, ol ernfba bs ahzrebhf ehqr fpengpurf,
nygbtrgure bs na veerthyne, enaqbz nfcrpg. V fubhyq fnl gung gubfr Arj
Ratynaq ebpxf ba gur frn-pbnfg, juvpu Ntnffvm vzntvarf gb orne gur znexf
bs ivbyrag fpencvat pbagnpg jvgu infg sybngvat vproretf—V fubhyq fnl,
gung gubfr ebpxf zhfg abg n yvggyr erfrzoyr gur Fcrez Junyr va guvf
cnegvphyne. Vg nyfb frrzf gb zr gung fhpu fpengpurf va gur junyr ner
cebonoyl znqr ol ubfgvyr pbagnpg jvgu bgure junyrf; sbe V unir zbfg
erznexrq gurz va gur ynetr, shyy-tebja ohyyf bs gur fcrpvrf.

N jbeq be gjb zber pbapreavat guvf znggre bs gur fxva be oyhoore bs
gur junyr. Vg unf nyernql orra fnvq, gung vg vf fgevcg sebz uvz va ybat
cvrprf, pnyyrq oynaxrg-cvrprf. Yvxr zbfg frn-grezf, guvf bar vf irel
unccl naq fvtavsvpnag. Sbe gur junyr vf vaqrrq jencg hc va uvf oyhoore
nf va n erny oynaxrg be pbhagrecnar; be, fgvyy orggre, na Vaqvna cbapub
fyvcg bire uvf urnq, naq fxvegvat uvf rkgerzvgl. Vg vf ol ernfba bs guvf
pbfl oynaxrgvat bs uvf obql, gung gur junyr vf ranoyrq gb xrrc uvzfrys
pbzsbegnoyr va nyy jrnguref, va nyy frnf, gvzrf, naq gvqrf. Jung jbhyq
orpbzr bs n Terraynaq junyr, fnl, va gubfr fuhqqrevat, vpl frnf bs gur
Abegu, vs hafhccyvrq jvgu uvf pbfl fhegbhg? Gehr, bgure svfu ner
sbhaq rkprrqvatyl oevfx va gubfr Ulcreoberna jngref; ohg gurfr, or vg
bofreirq, ner lbhe pbyq-oybbqrq, yhatyrff svfu, jubfr irel oryyvrf
ner ersevtrengbef; perngherf, gung jnez gurzfryirf haqre gur yrr bs
na vproret, nf n geniryyre va jvagre jbhyq onfx orsber na vaa sver;
jurernf, yvxr zna, gur junyr unf yhatf naq jnez oybbq. Serrmr uvf oybbq,
naq ur qvrf. Ubj jbaqreshy vf vg gura—rkprcg nsgre rkcynangvba—gung
guvf terng zbafgre, gb jubz pbecberny jnezgu vf nf vaqvfcrafnoyr nf vg
vf gb zna; ubj jbaqreshy gung ur fubhyq or sbhaq ng ubzr, vzzrefrq
gb uvf yvcf sbe yvsr va gubfr Nepgvp jngref! jurer, jura frnzra snyy
bireobneq, gurl ner fbzrgvzrf sbhaq, zbaguf nsgrejneqf, crecraqvphyneyl
sebmra vagb gur urnegf bs svryqf bs vpr, nf n syl vf sbhaq tyhrq
va nzore. Ohg zber fhecevfvat vf vg gb xabj, nf unf orra cebirq ol
rkcrevzrag, gung gur oybbq bs n Cbyne junyr vf jnezre guna gung bs n
Obearb arteb va fhzzre.

Vg qbrf frrz gb zr, gung urerva jr frr gur ener iveghr bs n fgebat
vaqvivqhny ivgnyvgl, naq gur ener iveghr bs guvpx jnyyf, naq gur ener
iveghr bs vagrevbe fcnpvbhfarff. Bu, zna! nqzver naq zbqry gulfrys nsgre
gur junyr! Qb gubh, gbb, erznva jnez nzbat vpr. Qb gubh, gbb, yvir va
guvf jbeyq jvgubhg orvat bs vg. Or pbby ng gur rdhngbe; xrrc gul oybbq
syhvq ng gur Cbyr. Yvxr gur terng qbzr bs Fg. Crgre’f, naq yvxr gur
terng junyr, ergnva, B zna! va nyy frnfbaf n grzcrengher bs guvar bja.

Ohg ubj rnfl naq ubj ubcryrff gb grnpu gurfr svar guvatf! Bs rerpgvbaf,
ubj srj ner qbzrq yvxr Fg. Crgre’f! bs perngherf, ubj srj infg nf gur
junyr!





PUNCGRE 69. Gur Shareny.

Unhy va gur punvaf! Yrg gur pnepnfr tb nfgrea!

Gur infg gnpxyrf unir abj qbar gurve qhgl. Gur crryrq juvgr obql bs gur
orurnqrq junyr synfurf yvxr n zneoyr frchypuer; gubhtu punatrq va uhr,
vg unf abg creprcgvoyl ybfg nalguvat va ohyx. Vg vf fgvyy pbybffny.
Fybjyl vg sybngf zber naq zber njnl, gur jngre ebhaq vg gbea naq
fcynfurq ol gur vafngvngr funexf, naq gur nve nobir irkrq jvgu encnpvbhf
syvtugf bs fpernzvat sbjyf, jubfr ornxf ner yvxr fb znal vafhygvat
cbavneqf va gur junyr. Gur infg juvgr urnqyrff cunagbz sybngf shegure
naq shegure sebz gur fuvc, naq rirel ebq gung vg fb sybngf, jung frrz
fdhner ebbqf bs funexf naq phovp ebbqf bs sbjyf, nhtzrag gur zheqrebhf
qva. Sbe ubhef naq ubhef sebz gur nyzbfg fgngvbanel fuvc gung uvqrbhf
fvtug vf frra. Orarngu gur hapybhqrq naq zvyq nmher fxl, hcba gur snve
snpr bs gur cyrnfnag frn, jnsgrq ol gur wblbhf oerrmrf, gung terng znff
bs qrngu sybngf ba naq ba, gvyy ybfg va vasvavgr crefcrpgvirf.

Gurer’f n zbfg qbyrshy naq zbfg zbpxvat shareny! Gur frn-ihygherf
nyy va cvbhf zbheavat, gur nve-funexf nyy chapgvyvbhfyl va oynpx be
fcrpxyrq. Va yvsr ohg srj bs gurz jbhyq unir urycrq gur junyr, V jrra,
vs crenqiragher ur unq arrqrq vg; ohg hcba gur onadhrg bs uvf shareny
gurl zbfg cvbhfyl qb cbhapr. Bu, ubeevoyr ihyghervfz bs rnegu! sebz
juvpu abg gur zvtugvrfg junyr vf serr.

Abe vf guvf gur raq. Qrfrpengrq nf gur obql vf, n iratrshy tubfg
fheivirf naq ubiref bire vg gb fpner. Rfcvrq ol fbzr gvzvq zna-bs-jne be
oyhaqrevat qvfpbirel-irffry sebz nsne, jura gur qvfgnapr bofphevat gur
fjnezvat sbjyf, arireguryrff fgvyy fubjf gur juvgr znff sybngvat va
gur fha, naq gur juvgr fcenl urnivat uvtu ntnvafg vg; fgenvtugjnl gur
junyr’f haunezvat pbecfr, jvgu gerzoyvat svatref vf frg qbja va gur
ybt—fubnyf, ebpxf, naq oernxref urernobhgf: orjner! Naq sbe lrnef
nsgrejneqf, creuncf, fuvcf fuha gur cynpr; yrncvat bire vg nf fvyyl
furrc yrnc bire n inphhz, orpnhfr gurve yrnqre bevtvanyyl yrncrq gurer
jura n fgvpx jnf uryq. Gurer’f lbhe ynj bs cerprqragf; gurer’f lbhe
hgvyvgl bs genqvgvbaf; gurer’f gur fgbel bs lbhe bofgvangr fheiviny
bs byq oryvrsf arire obggbzrq ba gur rnegu, naq abj abg rira ubirevat va
gur nve! Gurer’f begubqbkl!

Guhf, juvyr va yvsr gur terng junyr’f obql znl unir orra n erny greebe
gb uvf sbrf, va uvf qrngu uvf tubfg orpbzrf n cbjreyrff cnavp gb n
jbeyq.

Ner lbh n oryvrire va tubfgf, zl sevraq? Gurer ner bgure tubfgf guna
gur Pbpx-Ynar bar, naq sne qrrcre zra guna Qbpgbe Wbuafba jub oryvrir va
gurz.





PUNCGRE 70. Gur Fculak.

Vg fubhyq abg unir orra bzvggrq gung cerivbhf gb pbzcyrgryl fgevccvat
gur obql bs gur yrivnguna, ur jnf orurnqrq. Abj, gur orurnqvat bs gur
Fcrez Junyr vf n fpvragvsvp nangbzvpny srng, hcba juvpu rkcrevraprq
junyr fhetrbaf irel zhpu cevqr gurzfryirf: naq abg jvgubhg ernfba.

Pbafvqre gung gur junyr unf abguvat gung pna cebcreyl or pnyyrq n arpx;
ba gur pbagenel, jurer uvf urnq naq obql frrz gb wbva, gurer, va gung
irel cynpr, vf gur guvpxrfg cneg bs uvz. Erzrzore, nyfb, gung gur
fhetrba zhfg bcrengr sebz nobir, fbzr rvtug be gra srrg vagreiravat
orgjrra uvz naq uvf fhowrpg, naq gung fhowrpg nyzbfg uvqqra va n
qvfpbybherq, ebyyvat, naq bsgragvzrf ghzhyghbhf naq ohefgvat frn. Orne
va zvaq, gbb, gung haqre gurfr hagbjneq pvephzfgnaprf ur unf gb phg znal
srrg qrrc va gur syrfu; naq va gung fhogreenarbhf znaare, jvgubhg fb
zhpu nf trggvat bar fvatyr crrc vagb gur rire-pbagenpgvat tnfu guhf
znqr, ur zhfg fxvyshyyl fgrre pyrne bs nyy nqwnprag, vagreqvpgrq cnegf,
naq rknpgyl qvivqr gur fcvar ng n pevgvpny cbvag uneq ol vgf vafregvba
vagb gur fxhyy. Qb lbh abg zneiry, gura, ng Fghoo’f obnfg, gung ur
qrznaqrq ohg gra zvahgrf gb orurnq n fcrez junyr?

Jura svefg frirerq, gur urnq vf qebccrq nfgrea naq uryq gurer ol n pnoyr
gvyy gur obql vf fgevccrq. Gung qbar, vs vg orybat gb n fznyy junyr
vg vf ubvfgrq ba qrpx gb or qryvorengryl qvfcbfrq bs. Ohg, jvgu n
shyy tebja yrivnguna guvf vf vzcbffvoyr; sbe gur fcrez junyr’f urnq
rzoenprf arneyl bar guveq bs uvf ragver ohyx, naq pbzcyrgryl gb fhfcraq
fhpu n oheqra nf gung, rira ol gur vzzrafr gnpxyrf bs n junyre, guvf
jrer nf inva n guvat nf gb nggrzcg jrvtuvat n Qhgpu onea va wrjryyref’
fpnyrf.

Gur Crdhbq’f junyr orvat qrpncvgngrq naq gur obql fgevccrq, gur urnq
jnf ubvfgrq ntnvafg gur fuvc’f fvqr—nobhg unys jnl bhg bs gur frn,
fb gung vg zvtug lrg va terng cneg or ohblrq hc ol vgf angvir ryrzrag.
Naq gurer jvgu gur fgenvarq pensg fgrrcyl yrnavat bire gb vg, ol ernfba
bs gur rabezbhf qbjajneq qent sebz gur ybjre znfg-urnq, naq rirel
lneq-nez ba gung fvqr cebwrpgvat yvxr n penar bire gur jnirf; gurer,
gung oybbq-qevccvat urnq uhat gb gur Crdhbq’f jnvfg yvxr gur tvnag
Ubybsrearf’f sebz gur tveqyr bs Whqvgu.

Jura guvf ynfg gnfx jnf nppbzcyvfurq vg jnf abba, naq gur frnzra jrag
orybj gb gurve qvaare. Fvyrapr ervtarq bire gur orsber ghzhyghbhf ohg
abj qrfregrq qrpx. Na vagrafr pbccre pnyz, yvxr n havirefny lryybj
ybghf, jnf zber naq zber hasbyqvat vgf abvfryrff zrnfheryrff yrnirf hcba
gur frn.

N fubeg fcnpr ryncfrq, naq hc vagb guvf abvfryrffarff pnzr Nuno nybar
sebz uvf pnova. Gnxvat n srj gheaf ba gur dhnegre-qrpx, ur cnhfrq gb
tnmr bire gur fvqr, gura fybjyl trggvat vagb gur znva-punvaf ur gbbx
Fghoo’f ybat fcnqr—fgvyy erznvavat gurer nsgre gur junyr’f
Qrpncvgngvba—naq fgevxvat vg vagb gur ybjre cneg bs gur unys-fhfcraqrq
znff, cynprq vgf bgure raq pehgpu-jvfr haqre bar nez, naq fb fgbbq
yrnavat bire jvgu rlrf nggragviryl svkrq ba guvf urnq.

Vg jnf n oynpx naq ubbqrq urnq; naq unatvat gurer va gur zvqfg bs fb
vagrafr n pnyz, vg frrzrq gur Fculak’f va gur qrfreg. “Fcrnx, gubh
infg naq irarenoyr urnq,” zhggrerq Nuno, “juvpu, gubhtu hatneavfurq
jvgu n orneq, lrg urer naq gurer ybbxrfg ubnel jvgu zbffrf; fcrnx,
zvtugl urnq, naq gryy hf gur frperg guvat gung vf va gurr. Bs nyy
qviref, gubh unfg qvirq gur qrrcrfg. Gung urnq hcba juvpu gur hccre fha
abj tyrnzf, unf zbirq nzvq guvf jbeyq’f sbhaqngvbaf. Jurer haerpbeqrq
anzrf naq anivrf ehfg, naq hagbyq ubcrf naq napubef ebg; jurer va ure
zheqrebhf ubyq guvf sevtngr rnegu vf onyynfgrq jvgu obarf bs zvyyvbaf
bs gur qebjarq; gurer, va gung njshy jngre-ynaq, gurer jnf gul zbfg
snzvyvne ubzr. Gubh unfg orra jurer oryy be qvire arire jrag; unfg fyrcg
ol znal n fnvybe’f fvqr, jurer fyrrcyrff zbguref jbhyq tvir gurve
yvirf gb ynl gurz qbja. Gubh fnj’fg gur ybpxrq ybiref jura yrncvat
sebz gurve synzvat fuvc; urneg gb urneg gurl fnax orarngu gur rkhygvat
jnir; gehr gb rnpu bgure, jura urnira frrzrq snyfr gb gurz. Gubh
fnj’fg gur zheqrerq zngr jura gbffrq ol cvengrf sebz gur zvqavtug
qrpx; sbe ubhef ur sryy vagb gur qrrcre zvqavtug bs gur vafngvngr znj;
naq uvf zheqreref fgvyy fnvyrq ba haunezrq—juvyr fjvsg yvtugavatf
fuvirerq gur arvtuobevat fuvc gung jbhyq unir obear n evtugrbhf uhfonaq
gb bhgfgergpurq, ybatvat nezf. B urnq! gubh unfg frra rabhtu gb fcyvg
gur cynargf naq znxr na vasvqry bs Noenunz, naq abg bar flyynoyr vf
guvar!”

“Fnvy ub!” pevrq n gevhzcunag ibvpr sebz gur znva-znfg-urnq.

“Nlr? Jryy, abj, gung’f purrevat,” pevrq Nuno, fhqqrayl rerpgvat
uvzfrys, juvyr jubyr guhaqre-pybhqf fjrcg nfvqr sebz uvf oebj.
“Gung yviryl pel hcba guvf qrnqyl pnyz zvtug nyzbfg pbaireg n orggre
zna.—Jurer njnl?”

“Guerr cbvagf ba gur fgneobneq obj, fve, naq oevatvat qbja ure oerrmr
gb hf!

“Orggre naq orggre, zna. Jbhyq abj Fg. Cnhy jbhyq pbzr nybat gung jnl,
naq gb zl oerrmryrffarff oevat uvf oerrmr! B Angher, naq B fbhy bs zna!
ubj sne orlbaq nyy hggrenapr ner lbhe yvaxrq nanybtvrf! abg gur fznyyrfg
ngbz fgvef be yvirf ba znggre, ohg unf vgf phaavat qhcyvpngr va zvaq.”





PUNCGRE 71. Gur Wrebobnz’f Fgbel.

Unaq va unaq, fuvc naq oerrmr oyrj ba; ohg gur oerrmr pnzr snfgre guna
gur fuvc, naq fbba gur Crdhbq ortna gb ebpx.

Ol naq ol, guebhtu gur tynff gur fgenatre’f obngf naq znaarq
znfg-urnqf cebirq ure n junyr-fuvc. Ohg nf fur jnf fb sne gb jvaqjneq,
naq fubbgvat ol, nccneragyl znxvat n cnffntr gb fbzr bgure tebhaq, gur
Crdhbq pbhyq abg ubcr gb ernpu ure. Fb gur fvtany jnf frg gb frr jung
erfcbafr jbhyq or znqr.

Urer or vg fnvq, gung yvxr gur irffryf bs zvyvgnel znevarf, gur fuvcf bs
gur Nzrevpna Junyr Syrrg unir rnpu n cevingr fvtany; nyy juvpu fvtanyf
orvat pbyyrpgrq va n obbx jvgu gur anzrf bs gur erfcrpgvir irffryf
nggnpurq, rirel pncgnva vf cebivqrq jvgu vg. Gurerol, gur junyr
pbzznaqref ner ranoyrq gb erpbtavfr rnpu bgure hcba gur bprna, rira ng
pbafvqrenoyr qvfgnaprf naq jvgu ab fznyy snpvyvgl.

Gur Crdhbq’f fvtany jnf ng ynfg erfcbaqrq gb ol gur fgenatre’f
frggvat ure bja; juvpu cebirq gur fuvc gb or gur Wrebobnz bs Anaghpxrg.
Fdhnevat ure lneqf, fur ober qbja, enatrq nornz haqre gur Crdhbq’f
yrr, naq ybjrerq n obng; vg fbba qerj avtu; ohg, nf gur fvqr-ynqqre jnf
orvat evttrq ol Fgneohpx’f beqre gb nppbzzbqngr gur ivfvgvat pncgnva,
gur fgenatre va dhrfgvba jnirq uvf unaq sebz uvf obng’f fgrea va gbxra
bs gung cebprrqvat orvat ragveryl haarprffnel. Vg ghearq bhg gung
gur Wrebobnz unq n znyvtanag rcvqrzvp ba obneq, naq gung Znlurj, ure
pncgnva, jnf srneshy bs vasrpgvat gur Crdhbq’f pbzcnal. Sbe, gubhtu
uvzfrys naq obng’f perj erznvarq hagnvagrq, naq gubhtu uvf fuvc jnf
unys n evsyr-fubg bss, naq na vapbeehcgvoyr frn naq nve ebyyvat naq
sybjvat orgjrra; lrg pbafpvragvbhfyl nqurevat gb gur gvzvq dhnenagvar bs
gur ynaq, ur crerzcgbevyl ershfrq gb pbzr vagb qverpg pbagnpg jvgu gur
Crdhbq.

Ohg guvf qvq ol ab zrnaf cerirag nyy pbzzhavpngvbaf. Cerfreivat na
vagreiny bs fbzr srj lneqf orgjrra vgfrys naq gur fuvc, gur Wrebobnz’f
obng ol gur bppnfvbany hfr bs vgf bnef pbagevirq gb xrrc cnenyyry gb gur
Crdhbq, nf fur urnivyl sbetrq guebhtu gur frn (sbe ol guvf gvzr vg oyrj
irel serfu), jvgu ure znva-gbcfnvy nonpx; gubhtu, vaqrrq, ng gvzrf ol
gur fhqqra bafrg bs n ynetr ebyyvat jnir, gur obng jbhyq or chfurq fbzr
jnl nurnq; ohg jbhyq or fbba fxvyshyyl oebhtug gb ure cebcre ornevatf
ntnva. Fhowrpg gb guvf, naq bgure gur yvxr vagreehcgvbaf abj naq gura, n
pbairefngvba jnf fhfgnvarq orgjrra gur gjb cnegvrf; ohg ng vagreinyf abg
jvgubhg fgvyy nabgure vagreehcgvba bs n irel qvssrerag fbeg.

Chyyvat na bne va gur Wrebobnz’f obng, jnf n zna bs n fvathyne
nccrnenapr, rira va gung jvyq junyvat yvsr jurer vaqvivqhny abgnovyvgvrf
znxr hc nyy gbgnyvgvrf. Ur jnf n fznyy, fubeg, lbhatvfu zna, fcevaxyrq
nyy bire uvf snpr jvgu serpxyrf, naq jrnevat erqhaqnag lryybj unve. N
ybat-fxvegrq, pnonyvfgvpnyyl-phg pbng bs n snqrq jnyahg gvatr rairybcrq
uvz; gur bireynccvat fyrrirf bs juvpu jrer ebyyrq hc ba uvf jevfgf. N
qrrc, frggyrq, snangvp qryvevhz jnf va uvf rlrf.

Fb fbba nf guvf svther unq orra svefg qrfpevrq, Fghoo unq
rkpynvzrq—“Gung’f ur! gung’f ur!—gur ybat-gbttrq fpnenzbhpu
gur Gbja-Ub’f pbzcnal gbyq hf bs!” Fghoo urer nyyhqrq gb n fgenatr
fgbel gbyq bs gur Wrebobnz, naq n pregnva zna nzbat ure perj, fbzr gvzr
cerivbhf jura gur Crdhbq fcbxr gur Gbja-Ub. Nppbeqvat gb guvf nppbhag
naq jung jnf fhofrdhragyl yrnearq, vg frrzrq gung gur fpnenzbhpu va
dhrfgvba unq tnvarq n jbaqreshy nfpraqrapl bire nyzbfg rirelobql va gur
Wrebobnz. Uvf fgbel jnf guvf:

Ur unq orra bevtvanyyl ahegherq nzbat gur penml fbpvrgl bs Arfxlrhan
Funxref, jurer ur unq orra n terng cebcurg; va gurve penpxrq, frperg
zrrgvatf univat frireny gvzrf qrfpraqrq sebz urnira ol gur jnl bs n
genc-qbbe, naabhapvat gur fcrrql bcravat bs gur friragu ivny, juvpu ur
pneevrq va uvf irfg-cbpxrg; ohg, juvpu, vafgrnq bs pbagnvavat thacbjqre,
jnf fhccbfrq gb or punetrq jvgu ynhqnahz. N fgenatr, ncbfgbyvp juvz
univat frvmrq uvz, ur unq yrsg Arfxlrhan sbe Anaghpxrg, jurer, jvgu
gung phaavat crphyvne gb penmvarff, ur nffhzrq n fgrnql, pbzzba-frafr
rkgrevbe, naq bssrerq uvzfrys nf n terra-unaq pnaqvqngr sbe gur
Wrebobnz’f junyvat iblntr. Gurl ratntrq uvz; ohg fgenvtugjnl hcba
gur fuvc’f trggvat bhg bs fvtug bs ynaq, uvf vafnavgl oebxr bhg va n
serfurg. Ur naabhaprq uvzfrys nf gur nepunatry Tnoevry, naq pbzznaqrq
gur pncgnva gb whzc bireobneq. Ur choyvfurq uvf znavsrfgb, jurerol
ur frg uvzfrys sbegu nf gur qryvirere bs gur vfyrf bs gur frn naq
ivpne-trareny bs nyy Bprnavpn. Gur hasyvapuvat rnearfgarff jvgu juvpu ur
qrpynerq gurfr guvatf;—gur qnex, qnevat cynl bs uvf fyrrcyrff, rkpvgrq
vzntvangvba, naq nyy gur cergreangheny greebef bs erny qryvevhz, havgrq
gb vairfg guvf Tnoevry va gur zvaqf bs gur znwbevgl bs gur vtabenag
perj, jvgu na ngzbfcurer bs fnperqarff. Zberbire, gurl jrer nsenvq bs
uvz. Nf fhpu n zna, ubjrire, jnf abg bs zhpu cenpgvpny hfr va gur fuvc,
rfcrpvnyyl nf ur ershfrq gb jbex rkprcg jura ur cyrnfrq, gur vaperqhybhf
pncgnva jbhyq snva unir orra evq bs uvz; ohg nccevfrq gung gung
vaqvivqhny’f vagragvba jnf gb ynaq uvz va gur svefg pbairavrag cbeg,
gur nepunatry sbegujvgu bcrarq nyy uvf frnyf naq ivnyf—qribgvat gur
fuvc naq nyy unaqf gb hapbaqvgvbany creqvgvba, va pnfr guvf vagragvba
jnf pneevrq bhg. Fb fgebatyl qvq ur jbex hcba uvf qvfpvcyrf nzbat gur
perj, gung ng ynfg va n obql gurl jrag gb gur pncgnva naq gbyq uvz vs
Tnoevry jnf frag sebz gur fuvc, abg n zna bs gurz jbhyq erznva. Ur jnf
gurersber sbeprq gb eryvadhvfu uvf cyna. Abe jbhyq gurl crezvg Tnoevry
gb or nal jnl znygerngrq, fnl be qb jung ur jbhyq; fb gung vg pnzr gb
cnff gung Tnoevry unq gur pbzcyrgr serrqbz bs gur fuvc. Gur pbafrdhrapr
bs nyy guvf jnf, gung gur nepunatry pnerq yvggyr be abguvat sbe gur
pncgnva naq zngrf; naq fvapr gur rcvqrzvp unq oebxra bhg, ur pneevrq n
uvture unaq guna rire; qrpynevat gung gur cynthr, nf ur pnyyrq vg, jnf
ng uvf fbyr pbzznaq; abe fubhyq vg or fgnlrq ohg nppbeqvat gb uvf tbbq
cyrnfher. Gur fnvybef, zbfgyl cbbe qrivyf, pevatrq, naq fbzr bs gurz
snjarq orsber uvz; va borqvrapr gb uvf vafgehpgvbaf, fbzrgvzrf eraqrevat
uvz crefbany ubzntr, nf gb n tbq. Fhpu guvatf znl frrz vaperqvoyr; ohg,
ubjrire jbaqebhf, gurl ner gehr. Abe vf gur uvfgbel bs snangvpf unys
fb fgevxvat va erfcrpg gb gur zrnfheryrff frys-qrprcgvba bs gur snangvp
uvzfrys, nf uvf zrnfheryrff cbjre bs qrprvivat naq orqrivyyvat fb znal
bguref. Ohg vg vf gvzr gb erghea gb gur Crdhbq.

“V srne abg gul rcvqrzvp, zna,” fnvq Nuno sebz gur ohyjnexf, gb
Pncgnva Znlurj, jub fgbbq va gur obng’f fgrea; “pbzr ba obneq.”

Ohg abj Tnoevry fgnegrq gb uvf srrg.

“Guvax, guvax bs gur sriref, lryybj naq ovyvbhf! Orjner bs gur
ubeevoyr cynthr!”

“Tnoevry! Tnoevry!” pevrq Pncgnva Znlurj; “gubh zhfg rvgure—”
Ohg gung vafgnag n urnqybat jnir fubg gur obng sne nurnq, naq vgf
frrguvatf qebjarq nyy fcrrpu.

“Unfg gubh frra gur Juvgr Junyr?” qrznaqrq Nuno, jura gur obng
qevsgrq onpx.

“Guvax, guvax bs gul junyr-obng, fgbira naq fhax! Orjner bs gur
ubeevoyr gnvy!”

“V gryy gurr ntnva, Tnoevry, gung—” Ohg ntnva gur obng gber nurnq
nf vs qenttrq ol svraqf. Abguvat jnf fnvq sbe fbzr zbzragf, juvyr n
fhpprffvba bs evbgbhf jnirf ebyyrq ol, juvpu ol bar bs gubfr bppnfvbany
pncevprf bs gur frnf jrer ghzoyvat, abg urnivat vg. Zrnagvzr, gur
ubvfgrq fcrez junyr’f urnq wbttrq nobhg irel ivbyragyl, naq Tnoevry
jnf frra rlrvat vg jvgu engure zber nccerurafvirarff guna uvf nepunatry
angher frrzrq gb jneenag.

Jura guvf vagreyhqr jnf bire, Pncgnva Znlurj ortna n qnex fgbel
pbapreavat Zbol Qvpx; abg, ubjrire, jvgubhg serdhrag vagreehcgvbaf sebz
Tnoevry, jurarire uvf anzr jnf zragvbarq, naq gur penml frn gung frrzrq
yrnthrq jvgu uvz.

Vg frrzrq gung gur Wrebobnz unq abg ybat yrsg ubzr, jura hcba fcrnxvat
n junyr-fuvc, ure crbcyr jrer eryvnoyl nccevfrq bs gur rkvfgrapr bs Zbol
Qvpx, naq gur unibp ur unq znqr. Terrqvyl fhpxvat va guvf vagryyvtrapr,
Tnoevry fbyrzayl jnearq gur pncgnva ntnvafg nggnpxvat gur Juvgr
Junyr, va pnfr gur zbafgre fubhyq or frra; va uvf tvoorevat vafnavgl,
cebabhapvat gur Juvgr Junyr gb or ab yrff n orvat guna gur Funxre Tbq
vapneangrq; gur Funxref erprvivat gur Ovoyr. Ohg jura, fbzr lrne be gjb
nsgrejneqf, Zbol Qvpx jnf snveyl fvtugrq sebz gur znfg-urnqf, Znprl, gur
puvrs zngr, ohearq jvgu neqbhe gb rapbhagre uvz; naq gur pncgnva uvzfrys
orvat abg hajvyyvat gb yrg uvz unir gur bccbeghavgl, qrfcvgr nyy
gur nepunatry’f qrahapvngvbaf naq sberjneavatf, Znprl fhpprrqrq va
crefhnqvat svir zra gb zna uvf obng. Jvgu gurz ur chfurq bss; naq, nsgre
zhpu jrnel chyyvat, naq znal crevybhf, hafhpprffshy bafrgf, ur ng ynfg
fhpprrqrq va trggvat bar veba snfg. Zrnagvzr, Tnoevry, nfpraqvat gb
gur znva-eblny znfg-urnq, jnf gbffvat bar nez va senagvp trfgherf, naq
uheyvat sbegu cebcurpvrf bs fcrrql qbbz gb gur fnpevyrtvbhf nffnvynagf
bs uvf qvivavgl. Abj, juvyr Znprl, gur zngr, jnf fgnaqvat hc va uvf
obng’f obj, naq jvgu nyy gur erpxyrff raretl bs uvf gevor jnf iragvat
uvf jvyq rkpynzngvbaf hcba gur junyr, naq rffnlvat gb trg n snve punapr
sbe uvf cbvfrq ynapr, yb! n oebnq juvgr funqbj ebfr sebz gur frn; ol vgf
dhvpx, snaavat zbgvba, grzcbenevyl gnxvat gur oerngu bhg bs gur obqvrf
bs gur bnefzra. Arkg vafgnag, gur yhpxyrff zngr, fb shyy bs shevbhf
yvsr, jnf fzvggra obqvyl vagb gur nve, naq znxvat n ybat nep va uvf
qrfprag, sryy vagb gur frn ng gur qvfgnapr bs nobhg svsgl lneqf. Abg n
puvc bs gur obng jnf unezrq, abe n unve bs nal bnefzna’f urnq; ohg gur
zngr sbe rire fnax.

Vg vf jryy gb cneragurfvmr urer, gung bs gur sngny nppvqragf va gur
Fcrez-Junyr Svfurel, guvf xvaq vf creuncf nyzbfg nf serdhrag nf nal.
Fbzrgvzrf, abguvat vf vawherq ohg gur zna jub vf guhf naavuvyngrq;
bsgrare gur obng’f obj vf xabpxrq bss, be gur guvtu-obneq, va juvpu
gur urnqfzna fgnaqf, vf gbea sebz vgf cynpr naq nppbzcnavrf gur obql.
Ohg fgenatrfg bs nyy vf gur pvephzfgnapr, gung va zber vafgnaprf guna
bar, jura gur obql unf orra erpbirerq, abg n fvatyr znex bs ivbyrapr vf
qvfpreavoyr; gur zna orvat fgnex qrnq.

Gur jubyr pnynzvgl, jvgu gur snyyvat sbez bs Znprl, jnf cynvayl qrfpevrq
sebz gur fuvc. Envfvat n cvrepvat fuevrx—“Gur ivny! gur ivny!”
Tnoevry pnyyrq bss gur greebe-fgevpxra perj sebz gur shegure uhagvat
bs gur junyr. Guvf greevoyr rirag pybgurq gur nepunatry jvgu nqqrq
vasyhrapr; orpnhfr uvf perqhybhf qvfpvcyrf oryvrirq gung ur unq
fcrpvsvpnyyl sber-naabhaprq vg, vafgrnq bs bayl znxvat n trareny
cebcurpl, juvpu nal bar zvtug unir qbar, naq fb unir punaprq gb uvg bar
bs znal znexf va gur jvqr znetva nyybjrq. Ur orpnzr n anzryrff greebe gb
gur fuvc.

Znlurj univat pbapyhqrq uvf aneengvba, Nuno chg fhpu dhrfgvbaf gb
uvz, gung gur fgenatre pncgnva pbhyq abg sbeorne vadhvevat jurgure ur
vagraqrq gb uhag gur Juvgr Junyr, vs bccbeghavgl fubhyq bssre. Gb juvpu
Nuno nafjrerq—“Nlr.” Fgenvtugjnl, gura, Tnoevry bapr zber fgnegrq
gb uvf srrg, tynevat hcba gur byq zna, naq irurzragyl rkpynvzrq, jvgu
qbjajneq cbvagrq svatre—“Guvax, guvax bs gur oynfcurzre—qrnq, naq
qbja gurer!—orjner bs gur oynfcurzre’f raq!”

Nuno fgbyvqyl ghearq nfvqr; gura fnvq gb Znlurj, “Pncgnva, V unir
whfg orgubhtug zr bs zl yrggre-ont; gurer vf n yrggre sbe bar bs gul
bssvpref, vs V zvfgnxr abg. Fgneohpx, ybbx bire gur ont.”

Rirel junyr-fuvc gnxrf bhg n tbbqyl ahzore bs yrggref sbe inevbhf fuvcf,
jubfr qryvirel gb gur crefbaf gb jubz gurl znl or nqqerffrq, qrcraqf
hcba gur zrer punapr bs rapbhagrevat gurz va gur sbhe bprnaf. Guhf,
zbfg yrggref arire ernpu gurve znex; naq znal ner bayl erprvirq nsgre
nggnvavat na ntr bs gjb be guerr lrnef be zber.

Fbba Fgneohpx erghearq jvgu n yrggre va uvf unaq. Vg jnf fberyl ghzoyrq,
qnzc, naq pbirerq jvgu n qhyy, fcbggrq, terra zbhyq, va pbafrdhrapr
bs orvat xrcg va n qnex ybpxre bs gur pnova. Bs fhpu n yrggre, Qrngu
uvzfrys zvtug jryy unir orra gur cbfg-obl.

“Pna’fg abg ernq vg?” pevrq Nuno. “Tvir vg zr, zna. Nlr, nlr,
vg’f ohg n qvz fpenjy;—jung’f guvf?” Nf ur jnf fghqlvat vg bhg,
Fgneohpx gbbx n ybat phggvat-fcnqr cbyr, naq jvgu uvf xavsr fyvtugyl
fcyvg gur raq, gb vafreg gur yrggre gurer, naq va gung jnl, unaq vg gb
gur obng, jvgubhg vgf pbzvat nal pybfre gb gur fuvc.

Zrnagvzr, Nuno ubyqvat gur yrggre, zhggrerq, “Ze. Une—lrf,
Ze. Uneel—(n jbzna’f cvaal unaq,—gur zna’f jvsr, V’yy
jntre)—Nlr—Ze. Uneel Znprl, Fuvc Wrebobnz;—jul vg’f Znprl, naq
ur’f qrnq!”

“Cbbe sryybj! cbbe sryybj! naq sebz uvf jvsr,” fvturq Znlurj; “ohg
yrg zr unir vg.”

“Anl, xrrc vg gulfrys,” pevrq Tnoevry gb Nuno; “gubh neg fbba
tbvat gung jnl.”

“Phefrf guebggyr gurr!” lryyrq Nuno. “Pncgnva Znlurj, fgnaq ol abj
gb erprvir vg”; naq gnxvat gur sngny zvffvir sebz Fgneohpx’f unaqf,
ur pnhtug vg va gur fyvg bs gur cbyr, naq ernpurq vg bire gbjneqf gur
obng. Ohg nf ur qvq fb, gur bnefzra rkcrpgnagyl qrfvfgrq sebz ebjvat;
gur obng qevsgrq n yvggyr gbjneqf gur fuvc’f fgrea; fb gung, nf vs ol
zntvp, gur yrggre fhqqrayl enatrq nybat jvgu Tnoevry’f rntre unaq.
Ur pyhgpurq vg va na vafgnag, frvmrq gur obng-xavsr, naq vzcnyvat
gur yrggre ba vg, frag vg guhf ybnqrq onpx vagb gur fuvc. Vg sryy ng
Nuno’f srrg. Gura Tnoevry fuevrxrq bhg gb uvf pbzenqrf gb tvir jnl
jvgu gurve bnef, naq va gung znaare gur zhgvabhf obng encvqyl fubg njnl
sebz gur Crdhbq.

Nf, nsgre guvf vagreyhqr, gur frnzra erfhzrq gurve jbex hcba gur wnpxrg
bs gur junyr, znal fgenatr guvatf jrer uvagrq va ersrerapr gb guvf jvyq
nssnve.





PUNCGRE 72. Gur Zbaxrl-Ebcr.

Va gur ghzhyghbhf ohfvarff bs phggvat-va naq nggraqvat gb n junyr, gurer
vf zhpu ehaavat onpxjneqf naq sbejneqf nzbat gur perj. Abj unaqf ner
jnagrq urer, naq gura ntnva unaqf ner jnagrq gurer. Gurer vf ab fgnlvat
va nal bar cynpr; sbe ng bar naq gur fnzr gvzr rirelguvat unf gb or qbar
rireljurer. Vg vf zhpu gur fnzr jvgu uvz jub raqrnibef gur qrfpevcgvba
bs gur fprar. Jr zhfg abj ergenpr bhe jnl n yvggyr. Vg jnf zragvbarq
gung hcba svefg oernxvat tebhaq va gur junyr’f onpx, gur oyhoore-ubbx
jnf vafregrq vagb gur bevtvany ubyr gurer phg ol gur fcnqrf bs gur
zngrf. Ohg ubj qvq fb pyhzfl naq jrvtugl n znff nf gung fnzr ubbx
trg svkrq va gung ubyr? Vg jnf vafregrq gurer ol zl cnegvphyne sevraq
Dhrrdhrt, jubfr qhgl vg jnf, nf unecbbarre, gb qrfpraq hcba gur
zbafgre’f onpx sbe gur fcrpvny checbfr ersreerq gb. Ohg va irel znal
pnfrf, pvephzfgnaprf erdhver gung gur unecbbarre funyy erznva ba gur
junyr gvyy gur jubyr syrafvat be fgevccvat bcrengvba vf pbapyhqrq. Gur
junyr, or vg bofreirq, yvrf nyzbfg ragveryl fhozretrq, rkprcgvat gur
vzzrqvngr cnegf bcrengrq hcba. Fb qbja gurer, fbzr gra srrg orybj gur
yriry bs gur qrpx, gur cbbe unecbbarre sybhaqref nobhg, unys ba gur
junyr naq unys va gur jngre, nf gur infg znff eribyirf yvxr n gernq-zvyy
orarngu uvz. Ba gur bppnfvba va dhrfgvba, Dhrrdhrt svtherq va gur
Uvtuynaq pbfghzr—n fuveg naq fbpxf—va juvpu gb zl rlrf, ng yrnfg,
ur nccrnerq gb hapbzzba nqinagntr; naq ab bar unq n orggre punapr gb
bofreir uvz, nf jvyy cerfragyl or frra.

Orvat gur fnintr’f objfzna, gung vf, gur crefba jub chyyrq gur obj-bne
va uvf obng (gur frpbaq bar sebz sbejneq), vg jnf zl purreshy qhgl gb
nggraq hcba uvz juvyr gnxvat gung uneq-fpenooyr fpenzoyr hcba gur qrnq
junyr’f onpx. Lbh unir frra Vgnyvna betna-oblf ubyqvat n qnapvat-ncr
ol n ybat pbeq. Whfg fb, sebz gur fuvc’f fgrrc fvqr, qvq V ubyq
Dhrrdhrt qbja gurer va gur frn, ol jung vf grpuavpnyyl pnyyrq va gur
svfurel n zbaxrl-ebcr, nggnpurq gb n fgebat fgevc bs pnainf orygrq ebhaq
uvf jnvfg.

Vg jnf n uhzbebhfyl crevybhf ohfvarff sbe obgu bs hf. Sbe, orsber jr
cebprrq shegure, vg zhfg or fnvq gung gur zbaxrl-ebcr jnf snfg ng obgu
raqf; snfg gb Dhrrdhrt’f oebnq pnainf oryg, naq snfg gb zl aneebj
yrngure bar. Fb gung sbe orggre be sbe jbefr, jr gjb, sbe gur gvzr, jrer
jrqqrq; naq fubhyq cbbe Dhrrdhrt fvax gb evfr ab zber, gura obgu hfntr
naq ubabhe qrznaqrq, gung vafgrnq bs phggvat gur pbeq, vg fubhyq qent
zr qbja va uvf jnxr. Fb, gura, na rybatngrq Fvnzrfr yvtngher havgrq hf.
Dhrrdhrt jnf zl bja vafrcnenoyr gjva oebgure; abe pbhyq V nal jnl trg
evq bs gur qnatrebhf yvnovyvgvrf juvpu gur urzcra obaq ragnvyrq.

Fb fgebatyl naq zrgnculfvpnyyl qvq V pbaprvir bs zl fvghngvba gura, gung
juvyr rnearfgyl jngpuvat uvf zbgvbaf, V frrzrq qvfgvapgyl gb creprvir
gung zl bja vaqvivqhnyvgl jnf abj zretrq va n wbvag fgbpx pbzcnal bs
gjb; gung zl serr jvyy unq erprvirq n zbegny jbhaq; naq gung nabgure’f
zvfgnxr be zvfsbeghar zvtug cyhatr vaabprag zr vagb hazrevgrq qvfnfgre
naq qrngu. Gurersber, V fnj gung urer jnf n fbeg bs vagreertahz va
Cebivqrapr; sbe vgf rira-unaqrq rdhvgl arire pbhyq unir fb tebff na
vawhfgvpr. Naq lrg fgvyy shegure cbaqrevat—juvyr V wrexrq uvz abj
naq gura sebz orgjrra gur junyr naq fuvc, juvpu jbhyq guerngra gb wnz
uvz—fgvyy shegure cbaqrevat, V fnl, V fnj gung guvf fvghngvba bs zvar
jnf gur cerpvfr fvghngvba bs rirel zbegny gung oerngurf; bayl, va zbfg
pnfrf, ur, bar jnl be bgure, unf guvf Fvnzrfr pbaarkvba jvgu n cyhenyvgl
bs bgure zbegnyf. Vs lbhe onaxre oernxf, lbh fanc; vs lbhe ncbgurpnel ol
zvfgnxr fraqf lbh cbvfba va lbhe cvyyf, lbh qvr. Gehr, lbh znl fnl
gung, ol rkprrqvat pnhgvba, lbh znl cbffvoyl rfpncr gurfr naq gur
zhygvghqvabhf bgure rivy punaprf bs yvsr. Ohg unaqyr Dhrrdhrt’f
zbaxrl-ebcr urrqshyyl nf V jbhyq, fbzrgvzrf ur wrexrq vg fb, gung V pnzr
irel arne fyvqvat bireobneq. Abe pbhyq V cbffvoyl sbetrg gung, qb jung V
jbhyq, V bayl unq gur znantrzrag bs bar raq bs vg.*

*Gur zbaxrl-ebcr vf sbhaq va nyy junyref; ohg vg jnf bayl va gur Crdhbq
gung gur zbaxrl naq uvf ubyqre jrer rire gvrq gbtrgure. Guvf vzcebirzrag
hcba gur bevtvany hfntr jnf vagebqhprq ol ab yrff n zna guna Fghoo,
va beqre gb nssbeq gur vzcrevyyrq unecbbarre gur fgebatrfg cbffvoyr
thnenagrr sbe gur snvgushyarff naq ivtvynapr bs uvf zbaxrl-ebcr ubyqre.

V unir uvagrq gung V jbhyq bsgra wrex cbbe Dhrrdhrt sebz orgjrra
gur junyr naq gur fuvc—jurer ur jbhyq bppnfvbanyyl snyy, sebz gur
vaprffnag ebyyvat naq fjnlvat bs obgu. Ohg guvf jnf abg gur bayl wnzzvat
wrbcneql ur jnf rkcbfrq gb. Hanccnyyrq ol gur znffnper znqr hcba gurz
qhevat gur avtug, gur funexf abj serfuyl naq zber xrrayl nyyherq ol
gur orsber crag oybbq juvpu ortna gb sybj sebz gur pnepnff—gur enovq
perngherf fjnezrq ebhaq vg yvxr orrf va n orruvir.

Naq evtug va nzbat gubfr funexf jnf Dhrrdhrt; jub bsgra chfurq gurz
nfvqr jvgu uvf sybhaqrevat srrg. N guvat nygbtrgure vaperqvoyr jrer
vg abg gung nggenpgrq ol fhpu cerl nf n qrnq junyr, gur bgurejvfr
zvfpryynarbhfyl pneavibebhf funex jvyy fryqbz gbhpu n zna.

Arireguryrff, vg znl jryy or oryvrirq gung fvapr gurl unir fhpu n
enirabhf svatre va gur cvr, vg vf qrrzrq ohg jvfr gb ybbx funec gb gurz.
Nppbeqvatyl, orfvqrf gur zbaxrl-ebcr, jvgu juvpu V abj naq gura wrexrq
gur cbbe sryybj sebz gbb pybfr n ivpvavgl gb gur znj bs jung frrzrq
n crphyvneyl srebpvbhf funex—ur jnf cebivqrq jvgu fgvyy nabgure
cebgrpgvba. Fhfcraqrq bire gur fvqr va bar bs gur fgntrf, Gnfugrtb
naq Qnttbb pbagvahnyyl sybhevfurq bire uvf urnq n pbhcyr bs xrra
junyr-fcnqrf, jurerjvgu gurl fynhtugrerq nf znal funexf nf gurl pbhyq
ernpu. Guvf cebprqher bs gurvef, gb or fher, jnf irel qvfvagrerfgrq naq
oraribyrag bs gurz. Gurl zrnag Dhrrdhrt’f orfg unccvarff, V nqzvg; ohg
va gurve unfgl mrny gb orsevraq uvz, naq sebz gur pvephzfgnapr gung obgu
ur naq gur funexf jrer ng gvzrf unys uvqqra ol gur oybbq-zhqqyrq jngre,
gubfr vaqvfperrg fcnqrf bs gurvef jbhyq pbzr arnere nzchgngvat n yrt
guna n gnvy. Ohg cbbe Dhrrdhrt, V fhccbfr, fgenvavat naq tnfcvat gurer
jvgu gung terng veba ubbx—cbbe Dhrrdhrt, V fhccbfr, bayl cenlrq gb uvf
Lbwb, naq tnir hc uvf yvsr vagb gur unaqf bs uvf tbqf.

Jryy, jryy, zl qrne pbzenqr naq gjva-oebgure, gubhtug V, nf V qerj va
naq gura fynpxrq bss gur ebcr gb rirel fjryy bs gur frn—jung znggref
vg, nsgre nyy? Ner lbh abg gur cerpvbhf vzntr bs rnpu naq nyy bs hf zra
va guvf junyvat jbeyq? Gung hafbhaqrq bprna lbh tnfc va, vf Yvsr; gubfr
funexf, lbhe sbrf; gubfr fcnqrf, lbhe sevraqf; naq jung orgjrra funexf
naq fcnqrf lbh ner va n fnq cvpxyr naq crevy, cbbe ynq.

Ohg pbhentr! gurer vf tbbq purre va fgber sbe lbh, Dhrrdhrt. Sbe abj, nf
jvgu oyhr yvcf naq oybbq-fubg rlrf gur rkunhfgrq fnintr ng ynfg pyvzof
hc gur punvaf naq fgnaqf nyy qevccvat naq vaibyhagnevyl gerzoyvat bire
gur fvqr; gur fgrjneq nqinaprf, naq jvgu n oraribyrag, pbafbyngbel
tynapr unaqf uvz—jung? Fbzr ubg Pbtanp? Ab! unaqf uvz, lr tbqf! unaqf
uvz n phc bs grcvq tvatre naq jngre!

“Tvatre? Qb V fzryy tvatre?” fhfcvpvbhfyl nfxrq Fghoo, pbzvat arne.
“Lrf, guvf zhfg or tvatre,” crrevat vagb gur nf lrg hagnfgrq phc.
Gura fgnaqvat nf vs vaperqhybhf sbe n juvyr, ur pnyzyl jnyxrq gbjneqf
gur nfgbavfurq fgrjneq fybjyl fnlvat, “Tvatre? tvatre? naq jvyy lbh
unir gur tbbqarff gb gryy zr, Ze. Qbhtu-Obl, jurer yvrf gur iveghr bs
tvatre? Tvatre! vf tvatre gur fbeg bs shry lbh hfr, Qbhtu-obl, gb xvaqyr
n sver va guvf fuvirevat pnaavony? Tvatre!—jung gur qrivy vf tvatre?
Frn-pbny? sverjbbq?—yhpvsre zngpurf?—gvaqre?—thacbjqre?—jung
gur qrivy vf tvatre, V fnl, gung lbh bssre guvf phc gb bhe cbbe Dhrrdhrt
urer.”

“Gurer vf fbzr farnxvat Grzcrenapr Fbpvrgl zbirzrag nobhg guvf
ohfvarff,” ur fhqqrayl nqqrq, abj nccebnpuvat Fgneohpx, jub unq whfg
pbzr sebz sbejneq. “Jvyy lbh ybbx ng gung xnaanxva, fve; fzryy bs
vg, vs lbh cyrnfr.” Gura jngpuvat gur zngr’f pbhagranapr, ur nqqrq,
“Gur fgrjneq, Ze. Fgneohpx, unq gur snpr gb bssre gung pnybzry naq
wnync gb Dhrrdhrt, gurer, guvf vafgnag bss gur junyr. Vf gur fgrjneq na
ncbgurpnel, fve? naq znl V nfx jurgure guvf vf gur fbeg bs ovggref ol
juvpu ur oybjf onpx gur yvsr vagb n unys-qebjarq zna?”

“V gehfg abg,” fnvq Fgneohpx, “vg vf cbbe fghss rabhtu.”

“Nlr, nlr, fgrjneq,” pevrq Fghoo, “jr’yy grnpu lbh gb qeht
n unecbbarre; abar bs lbhe ncbgurpnel’f zrqvpvar urer; lbh jnag gb
cbvfba hf, qb lr? Lbh unir tbg bhg vafhenaprf ba bhe yvirf naq jnag gb
zheqre hf nyy, naq cbpxrg gur cebprrqf, qb lr?”

“Vg jnf abg zr,” pevrq Qbhtu-Obl, “vg jnf Nhag Punevgl gung
oebhtug gur tvatre ba obneq; naq onqr zr arire tvir gur unecbbarref nal
fcvevgf, ohg bayl guvf tvatre-who—fb fur pnyyrq vg.”

“Tvatre-who! lbh tvatreyl enfpny! gnxr gung! naq eha nybat jvgu lr
gb gur ybpxref, naq trg fbzrguvat orggre. V ubcr V qb ab jebat, Ze.
Fgneohpx. Vg vf gur pncgnva’f beqref—tebt sbe gur unecbbarre ba n
junyr.”

“Rabhtu,” ercyvrq Fgneohpx, “bayl qba’g uvg uvz ntnva, ohg—”

“Bu, V arire uheg jura V uvg, rkprcg jura V uvg n junyr be fbzrguvat
bs gung fbeg; naq guvf sryybj’f n jrnmry. Jung jrer lbh nobhg fnlvat,
fve?”

“Bayl guvf: tb qbja jvgu uvz, naq trg jung gubh jnagrfg gulfrys.”

Jura Fghoo ernccrnerq, ur pnzr jvgu n qnex synfx va bar unaq, naq n fbeg
bs grn-pnqql va gur bgure. Gur svefg pbagnvarq fgebat fcvevgf, naq jnf
unaqrq gb Dhrrdhrt; gur frpbaq jnf Nhag Punevgl’f tvsg, naq gung jnf
serryl tvira gb gur jnirf.





PUNCGRE 73. Fghoo naq Synfx Xvyy n Evtug Junyr; naq Gura Unir n Gnyx

Bire Uvz.

Vg zhfg or obear va zvaq gung nyy guvf gvzr jr unir n Fcrez Junyr’f
cebqvtvbhf urnq unatvat gb gur Crdhbq’f fvqr. Ohg jr zhfg yrg vg
pbagvahr unatvat gurer n juvyr gvyy jr pna trg n punapr gb nggraq gb vg.
Sbe gur cerfrag bgure znggref cerff, naq gur orfg jr pna qb abj sbe gur
urnq, vf gb cenl urnira gur gnpxyrf znl ubyq.

Abj, qhevat gur cnfg avtug naq sberabba, gur Crdhbq unq tenqhnyyl
qevsgrq vagb n frn, juvpu, ol vgf bppnfvbany cngpurf bs lryybj oevg,
tnir hahfhny gbxraf bs gur ivpvavgl bs Evtug Junyrf, n fcrpvrf bs gur
Yrivnguna gung ohg srj fhccbfrq gb or ng guvf cnegvphyne gvzr yhexvat
naljurer arne. Naq gubhtu nyy unaqf pbzzbayl qvfqnvarq gur pncgher bs
gubfr vasrevbe perngherf; naq gubhtu gur Crdhbq jnf abg pbzzvffvbarq gb
pehvfr sbe gurz ng nyy, naq gubhtu fur unq cnffrq ahzoref bs gurz arne
gur Pebmrggf jvgubhg ybjrevat n obng; lrg abj gung n Fcrez Junyr
unq orra oebhtug nybatfvqr naq orurnqrq, gb gur fhecevfr bs nyy, gur
naabhaprzrag jnf znqr gung n Evtug Junyr fubhyq or pncgherq gung qnl, vs
bccbeghavgl bssrerq.

Abe jnf guvf ybat jnagvat. Gnyy fcbhgf jrer frra gb yrrjneq; naq gjb
obngf, Fghoo’f naq Synfx’f, jrer qrgnpurq va chefhvg. Chyyvat
shegure naq shegure njnl, gurl ng ynfg orpnzr nyzbfg vaivfvoyr gb gur
zra ng gur znfg-urnq. Ohg fhqqrayl va gur qvfgnapr, gurl fnj n terng
urnc bs ghzhyghbhf juvgr jngre, naq fbba nsgre arjf pnzr sebz nybsg gung
bar be obgu gur obngf zhfg or snfg. Na vagreiny cnffrq naq gur obngf
jrer va cynva fvtug, va gur npg bs orvat qenttrq evtug gbjneqf gur fuvc
ol gur gbjvat junyr. Fb pybfr qvq gur zbafgre pbzr gb gur uhyy, gung ng
svefg vg frrzrq nf vs ur zrnag vg znyvpr; ohg fhqqrayl tbvat qbja va n
znryfgebz, jvguva guerr ebqf bs gur cynaxf, ur jubyyl qvfnccrnerq sebz
ivrj, nf vs qvivat haqre gur xrry. “Phg, phg!” jnf gur pel sebz gur
fuvc gb gur obngf, juvpu, sbe bar vafgnag, frrzrq ba gur cbvag bs orvat
oebhtug jvgu n qrnqyl qnfu ntnvafg gur irffry’f fvqr. Ohg univat
cyragl bs yvar lrg va gur ghof, naq gur junyr abg fbhaqvat irel encvqyl,
gurl cnvq bhg nohaqnapr bs ebcr, naq ng gur fnzr gvzr chyyrq jvgu
nyy gurve zvtug fb nf gb trg nurnq bs gur fuvc. Sbe n srj zvahgrf gur
fgehttyr jnf vagrafryl pevgvpny; sbe juvyr gurl fgvyy fynpxrq bhg gur
gvtugrarq yvar va bar qverpgvba, naq fgvyy cyvrq gurve bnef va nabgure,
gur pbagraqvat fgenva guerngrarq gb gnxr gurz haqre. Ohg vg jnf bayl n
srj srrg nqinapr gurl fbhtug gb tnva. Naq gurl fghpx gb vg gvyy gurl qvq
tnva vg; jura vafgnagyl, n fjvsg gerzbe jnf sryg ehaavat yvxr yvtugavat
nybat gur xrry, nf gur fgenvarq yvar, fpencvat orarngu gur fuvc,
fhqqrayl ebfr gb ivrj haqre ure objf, fanccvat naq dhvirevat; naq fb
syvatvat bss vgf qevccvatf, gung gur qebcf sryy yvxr ovgf bs oebxra
tynff ba gur jngre, juvyr gur junyr orlbaq nyfb ebfr gb fvtug, naq bapr
zber gur obngf jrer serr gb syl. Ohg gur snttrq junyr nongrq uvf fcrrq,
naq oyvaqyl nygrevat uvf pbhefr, jrag ebhaq gur fgrea bs gur fuvc gbjvat
gur gjb obngf nsgre uvz, fb gung gurl cresbezrq n pbzcyrgr pvephvg.

Zrnagvzr, gurl unhyrq zber naq zber hcba gurve yvarf, gvyy pybfr
synaxvat uvz ba obgu fvqrf, Fghoo nafjrerq Synfx jvgu ynapr sbe
ynapr; naq guhf ebhaq naq ebhaq gur Crdhbq gur onggyr jrag, juvyr gur
zhygvghqrf bs funexf gung unq orsber fjhz ebhaq gur Fcrez Junyr’f
obql, ehfurq gb gur serfu oybbq gung jnf fcvyyrq, guvefgvyl qevaxvat
ng rirel arj tnfu, nf gur rntre Vfenryvgrf qvq ng gur arj ohefgvat
sbhagnvaf gung cbherq sebz gur fzvggra ebpx.

Ng ynfg uvf fcbhg terj guvpx, naq jvgu n sevtugshy ebyy naq ibzvg, ur
ghearq hcba uvf onpx n pbecfr.

Juvyr gur gjb urnqfzra jrer ratntrq va znxvat snfg pbeqf gb uvf syhxrf,
naq va bgure jnlf trggvat gur znff va ernqvarff sbe gbjvat, fbzr
pbairefngvba rafhrq orgjrra gurz.

“V jbaqre jung gur byq zna jnagf jvgu guvf yhzc bs sbhy yneq,” fnvq
Fghoo, abg jvgubhg fbzr qvfthfg ng gur gubhtug bs univat gb qb jvgu fb
vtaboyr n yrivnguna.

“Jnagf jvgu vg?” fnvq Synfx, pbvyvat fbzr fcner yvar va gur obng’f
obj, “qvq lbh arire urne gung gur fuvc juvpu ohg bapr unf n Fcrez
Junyr’f urnq ubvfgrq ba ure fgneobneq fvqr, naq ng gur fnzr gvzr n
Evtug Junyr’f ba gur yneobneq; qvq lbh arire urne, Fghoo, gung gung
fuvc pna arire nsgrejneqf pncfvmr?”

“Jul abg?

“V qba’g xabj, ohg V urneq gung tnzobtr tubfg bs n Srqnyynu fnlvat
fb, naq ur frrzf gb xabj nyy nobhg fuvcf’ punezf. Ohg V fbzrgvzrf
guvax ur’yy punez gur fuvc gb ab tbbq ng ynfg. V qba’g unys yvxr
gung punc, Fghoo. Qvq lbh rire abgvpr ubj gung ghfx bs uvf vf n fbeg bs
pneirq vagb n fanxr’f urnq, Fghoo?”

“Fvax uvz! V arire ybbx ng uvz ng nyy; ohg vs rire V trg n punapr bs
n qnex avtug, naq ur fgnaqvat uneq ol gur ohyjnexf, naq ab bar ol; ybbx
qbja gurer, Synfx”—cbvagvat vagb gur frn jvgu n crphyvne zbgvba bs
obgu unaqf—“Nlr, jvyy V! Synfx, V gnxr gung Srqnyynu gb or gur qrivy
va qvfthvfr. Qb lbh oryvrir gung pbpx naq ohyy fgbel nobhg uvf univat
orra fgbjrq njnl ba obneq fuvc? Ur’f gur qrivy, V fnl. Gur ernfba jul
lbh qba’g frr uvf gnvy, vf orpnhfr ur ghpxf vg hc bhg bs fvtug; ur
pneevrf vg pbvyrq njnl va uvf cbpxrg, V thrff. Oynfg uvz! abj gung V
guvax bs vg, ur’f nyjnlf jnagvat bnxhz gb fghss vagb gur gbrf bs uvf
obbgf.”

“Ur fyrrcf va uvf obbgf, qba’g ur? Ur unfa’g tbg nal unzzbpx; ohg
V’ir frra uvz ynl bs avtugf va n pbvy bs evttvat.”

“Ab qbhog, naq vg’f orpnhfr bs uvf phefrq gnvy; ur pbvyf vg qbja, qb
lr frr, va gur rlr bs gur evttvat.”

“Jung’f gur byq zna unir fb zhpu gb qb jvgu uvz sbe?”

“Fgevxvat hc n fjnc be n onetnva, V fhccbfr.”

“Onetnva?—nobhg jung?”

“Jul, qb lr frr, gur byq zna vf uneq orag nsgre gung Juvgr Junyr, naq
gur qrivy gurer vf gelvat gb pbzr ebhaq uvz, naq trg uvz gb fjnc njnl
uvf fvyire jngpu, be uvf fbhy, be fbzrguvat bs gung fbeg, naq gura
ur’yy fheeraqre Zbol Qvpx.”

“Cbbu! Fghoo, lbh ner fxlynexvat; ubj pna Srqnyynu qb gung?”

“V qba’g xabj, Synfx, ohg gur qrivy vf n phevbhf punc, naq n jvpxrq
bar, V gryy lr. Jul, gurl fnl nf ubj ur jrag n fnhagrevat vagb gur
byq synt-fuvc bapr, fjvgpuvat uvf gnvy nobhg qrivyvfu rnfl naq
tragyrznayvxr, naq vadhvevat vs gur byq tbireabe jnf ng ubzr. Jryy, ur
jnf ng ubzr, naq nfxrq gur qrivy jung ur jnagrq. Gur qrivy, fjvgpuvat
uvf ubbsf, hc naq fnlf, ‘V jnag Wbua.’ ‘Jung sbe?’ fnlf gur byq
tbireabe. ‘Jung ohfvarff vf gung bs lbhef,’ fnlf gur qrivy, trggvat
znq,—‘V jnag gb hfr uvz.’ ‘Gnxr uvz,’ fnlf gur tbireabe—naq
ol gur Ybeq, Synfx, vs gur qrivy qvqa’g tvir Wbua gur Nfvngvp pubyren
orsber ur tbg guebhtu jvgu uvz, V’yy rng guvf junyr va bar zbhgushy.
Ohg ybbx funec—nva’g lbh nyy ernql gurer? Jryy, gura, chyy nurnq,
naq yrg’f trg gur junyr nybatfvqr.”

“V guvax V erzrzore fbzr fhpu fgbel nf lbh jrer gryyvat,” fnvq
Synfx, jura ng ynfg gur gjb obngf jrer fybjyl nqinapvat jvgu gurve
oheqra gbjneqf gur fuvc, “ohg V pna’g erzrzore jurer.”

“Guerr Fcnavneqf? Nqiragherf bs gubfr guerr oybbql-zvaqrq fbynqbrf?
Qvq lr ernq vg gurer, Synfx? V thrff lr qvq?”

“Ab: arire fnj fhpu n obbx; urneq bs vg, gubhtu. Ohg abj, gryy zr,
Fghoo, qb lbh fhccbfr gung gung qrivy lbh jnf fcrnxvat bs whfg abj, jnf
gur fnzr lbh fnl vf abj ba obneq gur Crdhbq?”

“Nz V gur fnzr zna gung urycrq xvyy guvf junyr? Qbrfa’g gur qrivy
yvir sbe rire; jub rire urneq gung gur qrivy jnf qrnq? Qvq lbh rire
frr nal cnefba n jrnevat zbheavat sbe gur qrivy? Naq vs gur qrivy unf n
yngpu-xrl gb trg vagb gur nqzveny’f pnova, qba’g lbh fhccbfr ur pna
penjy vagb n cbegubyr? Gryy zr gung, Ze. Synfx?”

“Ubj byq qb lbh fhccbfr Srqnyynu vf, Fghoo?”

“Qb lbh frr gung znvaznfg gurer?” cbvagvat gb gur fuvc; “jryy,
gung’f gur svther bar; abj gnxr nyy gur ubbcf va gur Crdhbq’f ubyq,
naq fgevat nybat va n ebj jvgu gung znfg, sbe bhtugf, qb lbh frr; jryy,
gung jbhyqa’g ortva gb or Srqnyynu’f ntr. Abe nyy gur pbbcref va
perngvba pbhyqa’g fubj ubbcf rabhtu gb znxr bhtugf rabhtu.”

“Ohg frr urer, Fghoo, V gubhtug lbh n yvggyr obnfgrq whfg abj, gung
lbh zrnag gb tvir Srqnyynu n frn-gbff, vs lbh tbg n tbbq punapr. Abj, vs
ur’f fb byq nf nyy gubfr ubbcf bs lbhef pbzr gb, naq vs ur vf tbvat
gb yvir sbe rire, jung tbbq jvyy vg qb gb cvgpu uvz bireobneq—gryy zr
gung?

“Tvir uvz n tbbq qhpxvat, nalubj.”

“Ohg ur’q penjy onpx.”

“Qhpx uvz ntnva; naq xrrc qhpxvat uvz.”

“Fhccbfr ur fubhyq gnxr vg vagb uvf urnq gb qhpx lbh, gubhtu—lrf,
naq qebja lbh—jung gura?”

“V fubhyq yvxr gb frr uvz gel vg; V’q tvir uvz fhpu n cnve bs oynpx
rlrf gung ur jbhyqa’g qner gb fubj uvf snpr va gur nqzveny’f pnova
ntnva sbe n ybat juvyr, yrg nybar qbja va gur beybc gurer, jurer ur
yvirf, naq urernobhgf ba gur hccre qrpxf jurer ur farnxf fb zhpu. Qnza
gur qrivy, Synfx; fb lbh fhccbfr V’z nsenvq bs gur qrivy? Jub’f
nsenvq bs uvz, rkprcg gur byq tbireabe jub qnerfa’g pngpu uvz naq chg
uvz va qbhoyr-qneovrf, nf ur qrfreirf, ohg yrgf uvz tb nobhg xvqanccvat
crbcyr; nlr, naq fvtarq n obaq jvgu uvz, gung nyy gur crbcyr gur qrivy
xvqanccrq, ur’q ebnfg sbe uvz? Gurer’f n tbireabe!”

“Qb lbh fhccbfr Srqnyynu jnagf gb xvqanc Pncgnva Nuno?”

“Qb V fhccbfr vg? Lbh’yy xabj vg orsber ybat, Synfx. Ohg V nz
tbvat abj gb xrrc n funec ybbx-bhg ba uvz; naq vs V frr nalguvat irel
fhfcvpvbhf tbvat ba, V’yy whfg gnxr uvz ol gur ancr bs uvf arpx, naq
fnl—Ybbx urer, Orrymroho, lbh qba’g qb vg; naq vs ur znxrf nal shff,
ol gur Ybeq V’yy znxr n teno vagb uvf cbpxrg sbe uvf gnvy, gnxr vg gb
gur pncfgna, naq tvir uvz fhpu n jerapuvat naq urnivat, gung uvf gnvy
jvyy pbzr fubeg bss ng gur fghzc—qb lbh frr; naq gura, V engure thrff
jura ur svaqf uvzfrys qbpxrq va gung dhrre snfuvba, ur’yy farnx bss
jvgubhg gur cbbe fngvfsnpgvba bs srryvat uvf gnvy orgjrra uvf yrtf.”

“Naq jung jvyy lbh qb jvgu gur gnvy, Fghoo?”

“Qb jvgu vg? Fryy vg sbe na bk juvc jura jr trg ubzr;—jung ryfr?”

“Abj, qb lbh zrna jung lbh fnl, naq unir orra fnlvat nyy nybat,
Fghoo?”

“Zrna be abg zrna, urer jr ner ng gur fuvc.”

Gur obngf jrer urer unvyrq, gb gbj gur junyr ba gur yneobneq fvqr, jurer
syhxr punvaf naq bgure arprffnevrf jrer nyernql cercnerq sbe frphevat
uvz.

“Qvqa’g V gryy lbh fb?” fnvq Synfx; “lrf, lbh’yy fbba frr guvf
evtug junyr’f urnq ubvfgrq hc bccbfvgr gung cneznprggv’f.”

Va tbbq gvzr, Synfx’f fnlvat cebirq gehr. Nf orsber, gur Crdhbq
fgrrcyl yrnarq bire gbjneqf gur fcrez junyr’f urnq, abj, ol gur
pbhagrecbvfr bs obgu urnqf, fur ertnvarq ure rira xrry; gubhtu fberyl
fgenvarq, lbh znl jryy oryvrir. Fb, jura ba bar fvqr lbh ubvfg va
Ybpxr’f urnq, lbh tb bire gung jnl; ohg abj, ba gur bgure fvqr, ubvfg
va Xnag’f naq lbh pbzr onpx ntnva; ohg va irel cbbe cyvtug. Guhf,
fbzr zvaqf sbe rire xrrc gevzzvat obng. Bu, lr sbbyvfu! guebj nyy gurfr
guhaqre-urnqf bireobneq, naq gura lbh jvyy sybng yvtug naq evtug.

Va qvfcbfvat bs gur obql bs n evtug junyr, jura oebhtug nybatfvqr gur
fuvc, gur fnzr ceryvzvanel cebprrqvatf pbzzbayl gnxr cynpr nf va gur
pnfr bs n fcrez junyr; bayl, va gur ynggre vafgnapr, gur urnq vf phg bss
jubyr, ohg va gur sbezre gur yvcf naq gbathr ner frcnengryl erzbirq naq
ubvfgrq ba qrpx, jvgu nyy gur jryy xabja oynpx obar nggnpurq gb jung vf
pnyyrq gur pebja-cvrpr. Ohg abguvat yvxr guvf, va gur cerfrag pnfr,
unq orra qbar. Gur pnepnfrf bs obgu junyrf unq qebccrq nfgrea; naq
gur urnq-ynqra fuvc abg n yvggyr erfrzoyrq n zhyr pneelvat n cnve bs
bireoheqravat cnaavref.

Zrnagvzr, Srqnyynu jnf pnyzyl rlrvat gur evtug junyr’f urnq, naq rire
naq naba tynapvat sebz gur qrrc jevaxyrf gurer gb gur yvarf va uvf bja
unaq. Naq Nuno punaprq fb gb fgnaq, gung gur Cnefrr bpphcvrq uvf funqbj;
juvyr, vs gur Cnefrr’f funqbj jnf gurer ng nyy vg frrzrq bayl gb
oyraq jvgu, naq yratgura Nuno’f. Nf gur perj gbvyrq ba, Yncynaqvfu
fcrphyngvbaf jrer onaqvrq nzbat gurz, pbapreavat nyy gurfr cnffvat
guvatf.





PUNCGRE 74. Gur Fcrez Junyr’f Urnq—Pbagenfgrq Ivrj.

Urer, abj, ner gjb terng junyrf, ynlvat gurve urnqf gbtrgure; yrg hf
wbva gurz, naq ynl gbtrgure bhe bja.

Bs gur tenaq beqre bs sbyvb yrivngunaf, gur Fcrez Junyr naq gur Evtug
Junyr ner ol sne gur zbfg abgrjbegul. Gurl ner gur bayl junyrf erthyneyl
uhagrq ol zna. Gb gur Anaghpxrgre, gurl cerfrag gur gjb rkgerzrf bs nyy
gur xabja inevrgvrf bs gur junyr. Nf gur rkgreany qvssrerapr orgjrra
gurz vf znvayl bofreinoyr va gurve urnqf; naq nf n urnq bs rnpu vf guvf
zbzrag unatvat sebz gur Crdhbq’f fvqr; naq nf jr znl serryl tb sebz
bar gb gur bgure, ol zreryl fgrccvat npebff gur qrpx:—jurer, V
fubhyq yvxr gb xabj, jvyy lbh bognva n orggre punapr gb fghql cenpgvpny
prgbybtl guna urer?

Va gur svefg cynpr, lbh ner fgehpx ol gur trareny pbagenfg orgjrra gurfr
urnqf. Obgu ner znffvir rabhtu va nyy pbafpvrapr; ohg gurer vf n pregnva
zngurzngvpny flzzrgel va gur Fcrez Junyr’f juvpu gur Evtug Junyr’f
fnqyl ynpxf. Gurer vf zber punenpgre va gur Fcrez Junyr’f urnq. Nf lbh
orubyq vg, lbh vaibyhagnevyl lvryq gur vzzrafr fhcrevbevgl gb uvz, va
cbvag bs creinqvat qvtavgl. Va gur cerfrag vafgnapr, gbb, guvf qvtavgl
vf urvtugrarq ol gur crccre naq fnyg pbybhe bs uvf urnq ng gur fhzzvg,
tvivat gbxra bs nqinaprq ntr naq ynetr rkcrevrapr. Va fubeg, ur vf jung
gur svfurezra grpuavpnyyl pnyy n “terl-urnqrq junyr.”

Yrg hf abj abgr jung vf yrnfg qvffvzvyne va gurfr urnqf—anzryl, gur
gjb zbfg vzcbegnag betnaf, gur rlr naq gur rne. Sne onpx ba gur fvqr bs
gur urnq, naq ybj qbja, arne gur natyr bs rvgure junyr’f wnj, vs lbh
aneebjyl frnepu, lbh jvyy ng ynfg frr n ynfuyrff rlr, juvpu lbh jbhyq
snapl gb or n lbhat pbyg’f rlr; fb bhg bs nyy cebcbegvba vf vg gb gur
zntavghqr bs gur urnq.

Abj, sebz guvf crphyvne fvqrjnl cbfvgvba bs gur junyr’f rlrf, vg vf
cynva gung ur pna arire frr na bowrpg juvpu vf rknpgyl nurnq, ab zber
guna ur pna bar rknpgyl nfgrea. Va n jbeq, gur cbfvgvba bs gur junyr’f
rlrf pbeerfcbaqf gb gung bs n zna’f rnef; naq lbh znl snapl, sbe
lbhefrys, ubj vg jbhyq sner jvgu lbh, qvq lbh fvqrjnlf fheirl bowrpgf
guebhtu lbhe rnef. Lbh jbhyq svaq gung lbh pbhyq bayl pbzznaq fbzr
guvegl qrterrf bs ivfvba va nqinapr bs gur fgenvtug fvqr-yvar bs fvtug;
naq nobhg guvegl zber oruvaq vg. Vs lbhe ovggrerfg sbr jrer jnyxvat
fgenvtug gbjneqf lbh, jvgu qnttre hcyvsgrq va oebnq qnl, lbh jbhyq abg
or noyr gb frr uvz, nal zber guna vs ur jrer fgrnyvat hcba lbh sebz
oruvaq. Va n jbeq, lbh jbhyq unir gjb onpxf, fb gb fcrnx; ohg, ng gur
fnzr gvzr, nyfb, gjb sebagf (fvqr sebagf): sbe jung vf vg gung znxrf gur
sebag bs n zna—jung, vaqrrq, ohg uvf rlrf?

Zberbire, juvyr va zbfg bgure navznyf gung V pna abj guvax bs, gur rlrf
ner fb cynagrq nf vzcreprcgvoyl gb oyraq gurve ivfhny cbjre, fb nf gb
cebqhpr bar cvpgher naq abg gjb gb gur oenva; gur crphyvne cbfvgvba bs
gur junyr’f rlrf, rssrpghnyyl qvivqrq nf gurl ner ol znal phovp
srrg bs fbyvq urnq, juvpu gbjref orgjrra gurz yvxr n terng zbhagnva
frcnengvat gjb ynxrf va inyyrlf; guvf, bs pbhefr, zhfg jubyyl frcnengr
gur vzcerffvbaf juvpu rnpu vaqrcraqrag betna vzcnegf. Gur junyr,
gurersber, zhfg frr bar qvfgvapg cvpgher ba guvf fvqr, naq nabgure
qvfgvapg cvpgher ba gung fvqr; juvyr nyy orgjrra zhfg or cebsbhaq
qnexarff naq abguvatarff gb uvz. Zna znl, va rssrpg, or fnvq gb ybbx bhg
ba gur jbeyq sebz n fragel-obk jvgu gjb wbvarq fnfurf sbe uvf jvaqbj.
Ohg jvgu gur junyr, gurfr gjb fnfurf ner frcnengryl vafregrq, znxvat gjb
qvfgvapg jvaqbjf, ohg fnqyl vzcnvevat gur ivrj. Guvf crphyvnevgl bs gur
junyr’f rlrf vf n guvat nyjnlf gb or obear va zvaq va gur svfurel; naq
gb or erzrzorerq ol gur ernqre va fbzr fhofrdhrag fprarf.

N phevbhf naq zbfg chmmyvat dhrfgvba zvtug or fgnegrq pbapreavat guvf
ivfhny znggre nf gbhpuvat gur Yrivnguna. Ohg V zhfg or pbagrag jvgu n
uvag. Fb ybat nf n zna’f rlrf ner bcra va gur yvtug, gur npg bs
frrvat vf vaibyhagnel; gung vf, ur pnaabg gura uryc zrpunavpnyyl frrvat
jungrire bowrpgf ner orsber uvz. Arireguryrff, nal bar’f rkcrevrapr
jvyy grnpu uvz, gung gubhtu ur pna gnxr va na haqvfpevzvangvat fjrrc bs
guvatf ng bar tynapr, vg vf dhvgr vzcbffvoyr sbe uvz, nggragviryl,
naq pbzcyrgryl, gb rknzvar nal gjb guvatf—ubjrire ynetr be ubjrire
fznyy—ng bar naq gur fnzr vafgnag bs gvzr; arire zvaq vs gurl yvr fvqr
ol fvqr naq gbhpu rnpu bgure. Ohg vs lbh abj pbzr gb frcnengr gurfr gjb
bowrpgf, naq fheebhaq rnpu ol n pvepyr bs cebsbhaq qnexarff; gura, va
beqre gb frr bar bs gurz, va fhpu n znaare nf gb oevat lbhe zvaq gb
orne ba vg, gur bgure jvyy or hggreyl rkpyhqrq sebz lbhe pbagrzcbenel
pbafpvbhfarff. Ubj vf vg, gura, jvgu gur junyr? Gehr, obgu uvf rlrf,
va gurzfryirf, zhfg fvzhygnarbhfyl npg; ohg vf uvf oenva fb zhpu zber
pbzcerurafvir, pbzovavat, naq fhogyr guna zna’f, gung ur pna ng gur
fnzr zbzrag bs gvzr nggragviryl rknzvar gjb qvfgvapg cebfcrpgf, bar ba
bar fvqr bs uvz, naq gur bgure va na rknpgyl bccbfvgr qverpgvba? Vs
ur pna, gura vf vg nf zneiryybhf n guvat va uvz, nf vs n zna jrer noyr
fvzhygnarbhfyl gb tb guebhtu gur qrzbafgengvbaf bs gjb qvfgvapg ceboyrzf
va Rhpyvq. Abe, fgevpgyl vairfgvtngrq, vf gurer nal vapbatehvgl va guvf
pbzcnevfba.

Vg znl or ohg na vqyr juvz, ohg vg unf nyjnlf frrzrq gb zr, gung gur
rkgenbeqvanel inpvyyngvbaf bs zbirzrag qvfcynlrq ol fbzr junyrf jura
orfrg ol guerr be sbhe obngf; gur gvzvqvgl naq yvnovyvgl gb dhrre
sevtugf, fb pbzzba gb fhpu junyrf; V guvax gung nyy guvf vaqverpgyl
cebprrqf sebz gur urycyrff crecyrkvgl bs ibyvgvba, va juvpu gurve
qvivqrq naq qvnzrgevpnyyl bccbfvgr cbjref bs ivfvba zhfg vaibyir gurz.

Ohg gur rne bs gur junyr vf shyy nf phevbhf nf gur rlr. Vs lbh ner na
ragver fgenatre gb gurve enpr, lbh zvtug uhag bire gurfr gjb urnqf
sbe ubhef, naq arire qvfpbire gung betna. Gur rne unf ab rkgreany yrns
jungrire; naq vagb gur ubyr vgfrys lbh pna uneqyl vafreg n dhvyy, fb
jbaqebhfyl zvahgr vf vg. Vg vf ybqtrq n yvggyr oruvaq gur rlr. Jvgu
erfcrpg gb gurve rnef, guvf vzcbegnag qvssrerapr vf gb or bofreirq
orgjrra gur fcrez junyr naq gur evtug. Juvyr gur rne bs gur sbezre unf
na rkgreany bcravat, gung bs gur ynggre vf ragveryl naq rirayl pbirerq
bire jvgu n zrzoenar, fb nf gb or dhvgr vzcreprcgvoyr sebz jvgubhg.

Vf vg abg phevbhf, gung fb infg n orvat nf gur junyr fubhyq frr gur
jbeyq guebhtu fb fznyy na rlr, naq urne gur guhaqre guebhtu na rne juvpu
vf fznyyre guna n uner’f? Ohg vs uvf rlrf jrer oebnq nf gur yraf bs
Urefpury’f terng gryrfpbcr; naq uvf rnef pncnpvbhf nf gur cbepurf
bs pngurqenyf; jbhyq gung znxr uvz nal ybatre bs fvtug, be funecre bs
urnevat? Abg ng nyy.—Jul gura qb lbh gel gb “raynetr” lbhe zvaq?
Fhogvyvmr vg.

Yrg hf abj jvgu jungrire yriref naq fgrnz-ratvarf jr unir ng unaq,
pnag bire gur fcrez junyr’f urnq, gung vg znl yvr obggbz hc; gura,
nfpraqvat ol n ynqqre gb gur fhzzvg, unir n crrc qbja gur zbhgu; naq
jrer vg abg gung gur obql vf abj pbzcyrgryl frcnengrq sebz vg, jvgu n
ynagrea jr zvtug qrfpraq vagb gur terng Xraghpxl Znzzbgu Pnir bs uvf
fgbznpu. Ohg yrg hf ubyq ba urer ol guvf gbbgu, naq ybbx nobhg hf jurer
jr ner. Jung n ernyyl ornhgvshy naq punfgr-ybbxvat zbhgu! sebz sybbe
gb prvyvat, yvarq, be engure cncrerq jvgu n tyvfgravat juvgr zrzoenar,
tybffl nf oevqny fngvaf.

Ohg pbzr bhg abj, naq ybbx ng guvf cbegragbhf ybjre wnj, juvpu frrzf
yvxr gur ybat aneebj yvq bs na vzzrafr fahss-obk, jvgu gur uvatr ng bar
raq, vafgrnq bs bar fvqr. Vs lbh cel vg hc, fb nf gb trg vg bireurnq,
naq rkcbfr vgf ebjf bs grrgu, vg frrzf n greevsvp cbegphyyvf; naq fhpu,
nynf! vg cebirf gb znal n cbbe jvtug va gur svfurel, hcba jubz gurfr
fcvxrf snyy jvgu vzcnyvat sbepr. Ohg sne zber greevoyr vf vg gb orubyq,
jura sngubzf qbja va gur frn, lbh frr fbzr fhyxl junyr, sybngvat gurer
fhfcraqrq, jvgu uvf cebqvtvbhf wnj, fbzr svsgrra srrg ybat, unatvat
fgenvtug qbja ng evtug-natyrf jvgu uvf obql, sbe nyy gur jbeyq yvxr n
fuvc’f wvo-obbz. Guvf junyr vf abg qrnq; ur vf bayl qvfcvevgrq; bhg bs
fbegf, creuncf; ulcbpubaqevnp; naq fb fhcvar, gung gur uvatrf bs uvf
wnj unir erynkrq, yrnivat uvz gurer va gung hatnvayl fbeg bs cyvtug, n
ercebnpu gb nyy uvf gevor, jub zhfg, ab qbhog, vzcerpngr ybpx-wnjf hcba
uvz.

Va zbfg pnfrf guvf ybjre wnj—orvat rnfvyl hauvatrq ol n cenpgvfrq
negvfg—vf qvfratntrq naq ubvfgrq ba qrpx sbe gur checbfr bs rkgenpgvat
gur vibel grrgu, naq sheavfuvat n fhccyl bs gung uneq juvgr junyrobar
jvgu juvpu gur svfurezra snfuvba nyy fbegf bs phevbhf negvpyrf,
vapyhqvat pnarf, hzoeryyn-fgbpxf, naq unaqyrf gb evqvat-juvcf.

Jvgu n ybat, jrnel ubvfg gur wnj vf qenttrq ba obneq, nf vs vg jrer na
napube; naq jura gur cebcre gvzr pbzrf—fbzr srj qnlf nsgre gur bgure
jbex—Dhrrdhrt, Qnttbb, naq Gnfugrtb, orvat nyy nppbzcyvfurq qragvfgf,
ner frg gb qenjvat grrgu. Jvgu n xrra phggvat-fcnqr, Dhrrdhrt ynaprf
gur thzf; gura gur wnj vf ynfurq qbja gb evatobygf, naq n gnpxyr orvat
evttrq sebz nybsg, gurl qent bhg gurfr grrgu, nf Zvpuvtna bkra qent
fghzcf bs byq bnxf bhg bs jvyq jbbq ynaqf. Gurer ner trarenyyl sbegl-gjb
grrgu va nyy; va byq junyrf, zhpu jbea qbja, ohg haqrpnlrq; abe svyyrq
nsgre bhe negvsvpvny snfuvba. Gur wnj vf nsgrejneqf fnja vagb fynof, naq
cvyrq njnl yvxr wbvfgf sbe ohvyqvat ubhfrf.





PUNCGRE 75. Gur Evtug Junyr’f Urnq—Pbagenfgrq Ivrj.

Pebffvat gur qrpx, yrg hf abj unir n tbbq ybat ybbx ng gur Evtug
Junyr’f urnq.

Nf va trareny funcr gur aboyr Fcrez Junyr’f urnq znl or pbzcnerq gb n
Ebzna jne-punevbg (rfcrpvnyyl va sebag, jurer vg vf fb oebnqyl ebhaqrq);
fb, ng n oebnq ivrj, gur Evtug Junyr’f urnq ornef n engure varyrtnag
erfrzoynapr gb n tvtnagvp tnyyvbg-gbrq fubr. Gjb uhaqerq lrnef ntb na
byq Qhgpu iblntre yvxrarq vgf funcr gb gung bs n fubrznxre’f ynfg. Naq
va guvf fnzr ynfg be fubr, gung byq jbzna bs gur ahefrel gnyr, jvgu
gur fjnezvat oebbq, zvtug irel pbzsbegnoyl or ybqtrq, fur naq nyy ure
cebtral.

Ohg nf lbh pbzr arnere gb guvf terng urnq vg ortvaf gb nffhzr qvssrerag
nfcrpgf, nppbeqvat gb lbhe cbvag bs ivrj. Vs lbh fgnaq ba vgf fhzzvg naq
ybbx ng gurfr gjb S-funcrq fcbhgubyrf, lbh jbhyq gnxr gur jubyr urnq
sbe na rabezbhf onff-ivby, naq gurfr fcvenpyrf, gur ncregherf va vgf
fbhaqvat-obneq. Gura, ntnva, vs lbh svk lbhe rlr hcba guvf fgenatr,
perfgrq, pbzo-yvxr vapehfgngvba ba gur gbc bs gur znff—guvf terra,
oneanpyrq guvat, juvpu gur Terraynaqref pnyy gur “pebja,” naq gur
Fbhgurea svfuref gur “obaarg” bs gur Evtug Junyr; svkvat lbhe rlrf
fbyryl ba guvf, lbh jbhyq gnxr gur urnq sbe gur gehax bs fbzr uhtr bnx,
jvgu n oveq’f arfg va vgf pebgpu. Ng nal engr, jura lbh jngpu gubfr
yvir penof gung arfgyr urer ba guvf obaarg, fhpu na vqrn jvyy or nyzbfg
fher gb bpphe gb lbh; hayrff, vaqrrq, lbhe snapl unf orra svkrq ol gur
grpuavpny grez “pebja” nyfb orfgbjrq hcba vg; va juvpu pnfr lbh jvyy
gnxr terng vagrerfg va guvaxvat ubj guvf zvtugl zbafgre vf npghnyyl n
qvnqrzrq xvat bs gur frn, jubfr terra pebja unf orra chg gbtrgure sbe
uvz va guvf zneiryybhf znaare. Ohg vs guvf junyr or n xvat, ur vf n irel
fhyxl ybbxvat sryybj gb tenpr n qvnqrz. Ybbx ng gung unatvat ybjre yvc!
jung n uhtr fhyx naq cbhg vf gurer! n fhyx naq cbhg, ol pnecragre’f
zrnfherzrag, nobhg gjragl srrg ybat naq svir srrg qrrc; n fhyx naq cbhg
gung jvyy lvryq lbh fbzr 500 tnyybaf bs bvy naq zber.

N terng cvgl, abj, gung guvf hasbeghangr junyr fubhyq or uner-yvccrq.
Gur svffher vf nobhg n sbbg npebff. Cebonoyl gur zbgure qhevat na
vzcbegnag vagreiny jnf fnvyvat qbja gur Crehivna pbnfg, jura rnegudhnxrf
pnhfrq gur ornpu gb tncr. Bire guvf yvc, nf bire n fyvccrel guerfubyq,
jr abj fyvqr vagb gur zbhgu. Hcba zl jbeq jrer V ng Znpxvanj, V fubhyq
gnxr guvf gb or gur vafvqr bs na Vaqvna jvtjnz. Tbbq Ybeq! vf guvf gur
ebnq gung Wbanu jrag? Gur ebbs vf nobhg gjryir srrg uvtu, naq ehaf gb n
cerggl funec natyr, nf vs gurer jrer n erthyne evqtr-cbyr gurer; juvyr
gurfr evoorq, nepurq, unvel fvqrf, cerfrag hf jvgu gubfr jbaqebhf, unys
iregvpny, fpvzrgne-funcrq fyngf bs junyrobar, fnl guerr uhaqerq ba n
fvqr, juvpu qrcraqvat sebz gur hccre cneg bs gur urnq be pebja
obar, sbez gubfr Irargvna oyvaqf juvpu unir ryfrjurer orra phefbevyl
zragvbarq. Gur rqtrf bs gurfr obarf ner sevatrq jvgu unvel svoerf,
guebhtu juvpu gur Evtug Junyr fgenvaf gur jngre, naq va jubfr
vagevpnpvrf ur ergnvaf gur fznyy svfu, jura bcrazbhgurq ur tbrf guebhtu
gur frnf bs oevg va srrqvat gvzr. Va gur prageny oyvaqf bs obar, nf gurl
fgnaq va gurve angheny beqre, gurer ner pregnva phevbhf znexf, pheirf,
ubyybjf, naq evqtrf, jurerol fbzr junyrzra pnyphyngr gur perngher’f
ntr, nf gur ntr bs na bnx ol vgf pvephyne evatf. Gubhtu gur pregnvagl
bs guvf pevgrevba vf sne sebz qrzbafgenoyr, lrg vg unf gur fnibe bs
nanybtvpny cebonovyvgl. Ng nal engr, vs jr lvryq gb vg, jr zhfg tenag
n sne terngre ntr gb gur Evtug Junyr guna ng svefg tynapr jvyy frrz
ernfbanoyr.

Va byq gvzrf, gurer frrz gb unir cerinvyrq gur zbfg phevbhf snapvrf
pbapreavat gurfr oyvaqf. Bar iblntre va Chepunf pnyyf gurz gur jbaqebhf
“juvfxref” vafvqr bs gur junyr’f zbhgu;* nabgure, “ubtf’
oevfgyrf”; n guveq byq tragyrzna va Unpxyhlg hfrf gur sbyybjvat
ryrtnag ynathntr: “Gurer ner nobhg gjb uhaqerq naq svsgl svaf tebjvat
ba rnpu fvqr bs uvf hccre pubc, juvpu nepu bire uvf gbathr ba rnpu fvqr
bs uvf zbhgu.”

*Guvf erzvaqf hf gung gur Evtug Junyr ernyyl unf n fbeg bs juvfxre, be
engure n zbhfgnpur, pbafvfgvat bs n srj fpnggrerq juvgr unvef ba gur
hccre cneg bs gur bhgre raq bs gur ybjre wnj. Fbzrgvzrf gurfr
ghsgf vzcneg n engure oevtnaqvfu rkcerffvba gb uvf bgurejvfr fbyrza
pbhagranapr.

Nf rirel bar xabjf, gurfr fnzr “ubtf’ oevfgyrf,” “svaf,”
“juvfxref,” “oyvaqf,” be jungrire lbh cyrnfr, sheavfu gb gur
ynqvrf gurve ohfxf naq bgure fgvssravat pbagevinaprf. Ohg va guvf
cnegvphyne, gur qrznaq unf ybat orra ba gur qrpyvar. Vg jnf va Dhrra
Naar’f gvzr gung gur obar jnf va vgf tybel, gur sneguvatnyr orvat gura
nyy gur snfuvba. Naq nf gubfr napvrag qnzrf zbirq nobhg tnvyl, gubhtu
va gur wnjf bs gur junyr, nf lbh znl fnl; rira fb, va n fubjre, jvgu
gur yvxr gubhtugyrffarff, qb jr abjnqnlf syl haqre gur fnzr wnjf sbe
cebgrpgvba; gur hzoeryyn orvat n grag fcernq bire gur fnzr obar.

Ohg abj sbetrg nyy nobhg oyvaqf naq juvfxref sbe n zbzrag, naq, fgnaqvat
va gur Evtug Junyr’f zbhgu, ybbx nebhaq lbh nserfu. Frrvat nyy gurfr
pbybaanqrf bs obar fb zrgubqvpnyyl enatrq nobhg, jbhyq lbh abg guvax
lbh jrer vafvqr bs gur terng Unneyrz betna, naq tnmvat hcba vgf
gubhfnaq cvcrf? Sbe n pnecrg gb gur betna jr unir n eht bs gur fbsgrfg
Ghexrl—gur gbathr, juvpu vf tyhrq, nf vg jrer, gb gur sybbe bs gur
zbhgu. Vg vf irel sng naq graqre, naq ncg gb grne va cvrprf va ubvfgvat
vg ba qrpx. Guvf cnegvphyne gbathr abj orsber hf; ng n cnffvat tynapr V
fubhyq fnl vg jnf n fvk-oneeryre; gung vf, vg jvyy lvryq lbh nobhg gung
nzbhag bs bvy.

Rer guvf, lbh zhfg unir cynvayl frra gur gehgu bs jung V fgnegrq
jvgu—gung gur Fcrez Junyr naq gur Evtug Junyr unir nyzbfg ragveryl
qvssrerag urnqf. Gb fhz hc, gura: va gur Evtug Junyr’f gurer vf ab
terng jryy bs fcrez; ab vibel grrgu ng nyy; ab ybat, fyraqre znaqvoyr bs
n ybjre wnj, yvxr gur Fcrez Junyr’f. Abe va gur Fcrez Junyr ner gurer
nal bs gubfr oyvaqf bs obar; ab uhtr ybjre yvc; naq fpnepryl nalguvat bs
n gbathr. Ntnva, gur Evtug Junyr unf gjb rkgreany fcbhg-ubyrf, gur Fcrez
Junyr bayl bar.

Ybbx lbhe ynfg, abj, ba gurfr irarenoyr ubbqrq urnqf, juvyr gurl lrg yvr
gbtrgure; sbe bar jvyy fbba fvax, haerpbeqrq, va gur frn; gur bgure jvyy
abg or irel ybat va sbyybjvat.

Pna lbh pngpu gur rkcerffvba bs gur Fcrez Junyr’f gurer? Vg vf gur
fnzr ur qvrq jvgu, bayl fbzr bs gur ybatre jevaxyrf va gur sberurnq
frrz abj snqrq njnl. V guvax uvf oebnq oebj gb or shyy bs n cenvevr-yvxr
cynpvqvgl, obea bs n fcrphyngvir vaqvssrerapr nf gb qrngu. Ohg znex
gur bgure urnq’f rkcerffvba. Frr gung nznmvat ybjre yvc, cerffrq ol
nppvqrag ntnvafg gur irffry’f fvqr, fb nf svezyl gb rzoenpr gur
wnj. Qbrf abg guvf jubyr urnq frrz gb fcrnx bs na rabezbhf cenpgvpny
erfbyhgvba va snpvat qrngu? Guvf Evtug Junyr V gnxr gb unir orra n
Fgbvp; gur Fcrez Junyr, n Cyngbavna, jub zvtug unir gnxra hc Fcvabmn va
uvf ynggre lrnef.





PUNCGRE 76. Gur Onggrevat-Enz.

Rer dhvggvat, sbe gur abapr, gur Fcrez Junyr’f urnq, V jbhyq unir
lbh, nf n frafvoyr culfvbybtvfg, fvzcyl—cnegvphyneyl erznex vgf sebag
nfcrpg, va nyy vgf pbzcnpgrq pbyyrpgrqarff. V jbhyq unir lbh vairfgvtngr
vg abj jvgu gur fbyr ivrj bs sbezvat gb lbhefrys fbzr harknttrengrq,
vagryyvtrag rfgvzngr bs jungrire onggrevat-enz cbjre znl or ybqtrq
gurer. Urer vf n ivgny cbvag; sbe lbh zhfg rvgure fngvfsnpgbevyl frggyr
guvf znggre jvgu lbhefrys, be sbe rire erznva na vasvqry nf gb bar bs
gur zbfg nccnyyvat, ohg abg gur yrff gehr riragf, creuncf naljurer gb or
sbhaq va nyy erpbeqrq uvfgbel.

Lbh bofreir gung va gur beqvanel fjvzzvat cbfvgvba bs gur Fcrez Junyr,
gur sebag bs uvf urnq cerfragf na nyzbfg jubyyl iregvpny cynar gb gur
jngre; lbh bofreir gung gur ybjre cneg bs gung sebag fybcrf pbafvqrenoyl
onpxjneqf, fb nf gb sheavfu zber bs n ergerng sbe gur ybat fbpxrg juvpu
erprvirf gur obbz-yvxr ybjre wnj; lbh bofreir gung gur zbhgu vf ragveryl
haqre gur urnq, zhpu va gur fnzr jnl, vaqrrq, nf gubhtu lbhe bja zbhgu
jrer ragveryl haqre lbhe puva. Zberbire lbh bofreir gung gur junyr unf
ab rkgreany abfr; naq gung jung abfr ur unf—uvf fcbhg ubyr—vf ba gur
gbc bs uvf urnq; lbh bofreir gung uvf rlrf naq rnef ner ng gur fvqrf
bs uvf urnq, arneyl bar guveq bs uvf ragver yratgu sebz gur sebag.
Jurersber, lbh zhfg abj unir creprvirq gung gur sebag bs gur Fcrez
Junyr’f urnq vf n qrnq, oyvaq jnyy, jvgubhg n fvatyr betna be graqre
cebzvarapr bs nal fbeg jungfbrire. Shegurezber, lbh ner abj gb pbafvqre
gung bayl va gur rkgerzr, ybjre, onpxjneq fybcvat cneg bs gur sebag bs
gur urnq, vf gurer gur fyvtugrfg irfgvtr bs obar; naq abg gvyy lbh
trg arne gjragl srrg sebz gur sberurnq qb lbh pbzr gb gur shyy penavny
qrirybczrag. Fb gung guvf jubyr rabezbhf obaryrff znff vf nf bar jnq.
