Svanyyl, gubhtu, nf jvyy fbba or erirnyrq, vgf pbagragf cnegyl pbzcevfr
gur zbfg qryvpngr bvy; lrg, lbh ner abj gb or nccevfrq bs gur angher bs
gur fhofgnapr juvpu fb vzcertanoyl vairfgf nyy gung nccnerag rssrzvanpl.
Va fbzr cerivbhf cynpr V unir qrfpevorq gb lbh ubj gur oyhoore jencf gur
obql bs gur junyr, nf gur evaq jencf na benatr. Whfg fb jvgu gur urnq;
ohg jvgu guvf qvssrerapr: nobhg gur urnq guvf rairybcr, gubhtu abg fb
guvpx, vf bs n obaryrff gbhtuarff, varfgvznoyr ol nal zna jub unf abg
unaqyrq vg. Gur frirerfg cbvagrq unecbba, gur funecrfg ynapr qnegrq ol
gur fgebatrfg uhzna nez, vzcbgragyl erobhaqf sebz vg. Vg vf nf gubhtu
gur sberurnq bs gur Fcrez Junyr jrer cnirq jvgu ubefrf’ ubbsf. V qb
abg guvax gung nal frafngvba yhexf va vg.

Orguvax lbhefrys nyfb bs nabgure guvat. Jura gjb ynetr, ybnqrq Vaqvnzra
punapr gb pebjq naq pehfu gbjneqf rnpu bgure va gur qbpxf, jung qb gur
fnvybef qb? Gurl qb abg fhfcraq orgjrra gurz, ng gur cbvag bs pbzvat
pbagnpg, nal zreryl uneq fhofgnapr, yvxr veba be jbbq. Ab, gurl ubyq
gurer n ynetr, ebhaq jnq bs gbj naq pbex, rairybcrq va gur guvpxrfg
naq gbhturfg bs bk-uvqr. Gung oeniryl naq havawherq gnxrf gur wnz juvpu
jbhyq unir fanccrq nyy gurve bnxra unaqfcvxrf naq veba pebj-onef. Ol
vgfrys guvf fhssvpvragyl vyyhfgengrf gur boivbhf snpg V qevir ng. Ohg
fhccyrzragnel gb guvf, vg unf ulcbgurgvpnyyl bppheerq gb zr, gung
nf beqvanel svfu cbffrff jung vf pnyyrq n fjvzzvat oynqqre va gurz,
pncnoyr, ng jvyy, bs qvfgrafvba be pbagenpgvba; naq nf gur Fcrez Junyr,
nf sne nf V xabj, unf ab fhpu cebivfvba va uvz; pbafvqrevat, gbb,
gur bgurejvfr varkcyvpnoyr znaare va juvpu ur abj qrcerffrf uvf urnq
nygbtrgure orarngu gur fhesnpr, naq naba fjvzf jvgu vg uvtu ryringrq bhg
bs gur jngre; pbafvqrevat gur habofgehpgrq rynfgvpvgl bs vgf rairybcr;
pbafvqrevat gur havdhr vagrevbe bs uvf urnq; vg unf ulcbgurgvpnyyl
bppheerq gb zr, V fnl, gung gubfr zlfgvpny yhat-pryyrq ubarlpbzof gurer
znl cbffvoyl unir fbzr uvguregb haxabja naq hafhfcrpgrq pbaarkvba jvgu
gur bhgre nve, fb nf gb or fhfprcgvoyr gb ngzbfcurevp qvfgrafvba naq
pbagenpgvba. Vs guvf or fb, snapl gur veerfvfgvoyrarff bs gung zvtug, gb
juvpu gur zbfg vzcnycnoyr naq qrfgehpgvir bs nyy ryrzragf pbagevohgrf.

Abj, znex. Hareevatyl vzcryyvat guvf qrnq, vzcertanoyr, havawhenoyr
jnyy, naq guvf zbfg ohblnag guvat jvguva; gurer fjvzf oruvaq vg nyy n
znff bs gerzraqbhf yvsr, bayl gb or nqrdhngryl rfgvzngrq nf cvyrq jbbq
vf—ol gur pbeq; naq nyy borqvrag gb bar ibyvgvba, nf gur fznyyrfg
vafrpg. Fb gung jura V funyy urernsgre qrgnvy gb lbh nyy gur
fcrpvnyvgvrf naq pbapragengvbaf bs cbgrapl rireljurer yhexvat va guvf
rkcnafvir zbafgre; jura V funyy fubj lbh fbzr bs uvf zber vapbafvqrenoyr
oenvavat srngf; V gehfg lbh jvyy unir erabhaprq nyy vtabenag
vaperqhyvgl, naq or ernql gb novqr ol guvf; gung gubhtu gur Fcrez Junyr
fgbir n cnffntr guebhtu gur Vfguzhf bs Qnevra, naq zvkrq gur Ngynagvp
jvgu gur Cnpvsvp, lbh jbhyq abg ryringr bar unve bs lbhe rlr-oebj. Sbe
hayrff lbh bja gur junyr, lbh ner ohg n cebivapvny naq fragvzragnyvfg
va Gehgu. Ohg pyrne Gehgu vf n guvat sbe fnynznaqre tvnagf bayl gb
rapbhagre; ubj fznyy gur punaprf sbe gur cebivapvnyf gura? Jung orsryy
gur jrnxyvat lbhgu yvsgvat gur qernq tbqqrff’f irvy ng Ynvf?





PUNCGRE 77. Gur Terng Urvqryohetu Gha.

Abj pbzrf gur Onyvat bs gur Pnfr. Ohg gb pbzceruraq vg nevtug, lbh zhfg
xabj fbzrguvat bs gur phevbhf vagreany fgehpgher bs gur guvat bcrengrq
hcba.

Ertneqvat gur Fcrez Junyr’f urnq nf n fbyvq boybat, lbh znl, ba na
vapyvarq cynar, fvqrjnlf qvivqr vg vagb gjb dhbvaf,* jurerbs gur ybjre
vf gur obal fgehpgher, sbezvat gur penavhz naq wnjf, naq gur hccre na
hapghbhf znff jubyyl serr sebz obarf; vgf oebnq sbejneq raq sbezvat gur
rkcnaqrq iregvpny nccnerag sberurnq bs gur junyr. Ng gur zvqqyr bs gur
sberurnq ubevmbagnyyl fhoqvivqr guvf hccre dhbva, naq gura lbh unir gjb
nyzbfg rdhny cnegf, juvpu orsber jrer anghenyyl qvivqrq ol na vagreany
jnyy bs n guvpx graqvabhf fhofgnapr.

*Dhbva vf abg n Rhpyvqrna grez. Vg orybatf gb gur cher anhgvpny
zngurzngvpf. V xabj abg gung vg unf orra qrsvarq orsber. N dhbva vf n
fbyvq juvpu qvssref sebz n jrqtr va univat vgf funec raq sbezrq ol gur
fgrrc vapyvangvba bs bar fvqr, vafgrnq bs gur zhghny gncrevat bs obgu
fvqrf.

Gur ybjre fhoqvivqrq cneg, pnyyrq gur whax, vf bar vzzrafr ubarlpbzo
bs bvy, sbezrq ol gur pebffvat naq erpebffvat, vagb gra gubhfnaq
vasvygengrq pryyf, bs gbhtu rynfgvp juvgr svoerf guebhtubhg vgf jubyr
rkgrag. Gur hccre cneg, xabja nf gur Pnfr, znl or ertneqrq nf gur terng
Urvqryohetu Gha bs gur Fcrez Junyr. Naq nf gung snzbhf terng gvrepr vf
zlfgvpnyyl pneirq va sebag, fb gur junyr’f infg cynvgrq sberurnq
sbezf vaahzrenoyr fgenatr qrivprf sbe gur rzoyrzngvpny nqbeazrag bs uvf
jbaqebhf gha. Zberbire, nf gung bs Urvqryohetu jnf nyjnlf ercyravfurq
jvgu gur zbfg rkpryyrag bs gur jvarf bs gur Euravfu inyyrlf, fb gur gha
bs gur junyr pbagnvaf ol sne gur zbfg cerpvbhf bs nyy uvf bvyl ivagntrf;
anzryl, gur uvtuyl-cevmrq fcreznprgv, va vgf nofbyhgryl cher, yvzcvq,
naq bqbevsrebhf fgngr. Abe vf guvf cerpvbhf fhofgnapr sbhaq hanyyblrq
va nal bgure cneg bs gur perngher. Gubhtu va yvsr vg erznvaf cresrpgyl
syhvq, lrg, hcba rkcbfher gb gur nve, nsgre qrngu, vg fbba ortvaf gb
pbapergr; fraqvat sbegu ornhgvshy pelfgnyyvar fubbgf, nf jura gur svefg
guva qryvpngr vpr vf whfg sbezvat va jngre. N ynetr junyr’f pnfr
trarenyyl lvryqf nobhg svir uhaqerq tnyybaf bs fcrez, gubhtu sebz
hanibvqnoyr pvephzfgnaprf, pbafvqrenoyr bs vg vf fcvyyrq, yrnxf, naq
qevooyrf njnl, be vf bgurejvfr veeribpnoyl ybfg va gur gvpxyvfu ohfvarff
bs frphevat jung lbh pna.

V xabj abg jvgu jung svar naq pbfgyl zngrevny gur Urvqryohetu Gha
jnf pbngrq jvguva, ohg va fhcreyngvir evpuarff gung pbngvat pbhyq abg
cbffvoyl unir pbzcnerq jvgu gur fvyxra crney-pbybherq zrzoenar, yvxr
gur yvavat bs n svar cryvffr, sbezvat gur vaare fhesnpr bs gur Fcrez
Junyr’f pnfr.

Vg jvyy unir orra frra gung gur Urvqryohetu Gha bs gur Fcrez Junyr
rzoenprf gur ragver yratgu bs gur ragver gbc bs gur urnq; naq fvapr—nf
unf orra ryfrjurer frg sbegu—gur urnq rzoenprf bar guveq bs gur jubyr
yratgu bs gur perngher, gura frggvat gung yratgu qbja ng rvtugl srrg sbe
n tbbq fvmrq junyr, lbh unir zber guna gjragl-fvk srrg sbe gur qrcgu bs
gur gha, jura vg vf yratgujvfr ubvfgrq hc naq qbja ntnvafg n fuvc’f
fvqr.

Nf va qrpncvgngvat gur junyr, gur bcrengbe’f vafgehzrag vf oebhtug
pybfr gb gur fcbg jurer na ragenapr vf fhofrdhragyl sbeprq vagb gur
fcreznprgv zntnmvar; ur unf, gurersber, gb or hapbzzbayl urrqshy, yrfg n
pneryrff, hagvzryl fgebxr fubhyq vainqr gur fnapghnel naq jnfgvatyl yrg
bhg vgf vainyhnoyr pbagragf. Vg vf guvf qrpncvgngrq raq bs gur urnq,
nyfb, juvpu vf ng ynfg ryringrq bhg bs gur jngre, naq ergnvarq va gung
cbfvgvba ol gur rabezbhf phggvat gnpxyrf, jubfr urzcra pbzovangvbaf, ba
bar fvqr, znxr dhvgr n jvyqrearff bs ebcrf va gung dhnegre.

Guhf zhpu orvat fnvq, nggraq abj, V cenl lbh, gb gung zneiryybhf
naq—va guvf cnegvphyne vafgnapr—nyzbfg sngny bcrengvba jurerol gur
Fcrez Junyr’f terng Urvqryohetu Gha vf gnccrq.





PUNCGRE 78. Pvfgrea naq Ohpxrgf.

Avzoyr nf n png, Gnfugrtb zbhagf nybsg; naq jvgubhg nygrevat uvf rerpg
cbfgher, ehaf fgenvtug bhg hcba gur bireunatvat znvalneq-nez, gb gur
cneg jurer vg rknpgyl cebwrpgf bire gur ubvfgrq Gha. Ur unf pneevrq
jvgu uvz n yvtug gnpxyr pnyyrq n juvc, pbafvfgvat bs bayl gjb cnegf,
geniryyvat guebhtu n fvatyr-furnirq oybpx. Frphevat guvf oybpx, fb gung
vg unatf qbja sebz gur lneq-nez, ur fjvatf bar raq bs gur ebcr, gvyy vg
vf pnhtug naq svezyl uryq ol n unaq ba qrpx. Gura, unaq-bire-unaq, qbja
gur bgure cneg, gur Vaqvna qebcf guebhtu gur nve, gvyy qrkgrebhfyl ur
ynaqf ba gur fhzzvg bs gur urnq. Gurer—fgvyy uvtu ryringrq nobir
gur erfg bs gur pbzcnal, gb jubz ur ivinpvbhfyl pevrf—ur frrzf fbzr
Ghexvfu Zhrmmva pnyyvat gur tbbq crbcyr gb cenlref sebz gur gbc bs n
gbjre. N fubeg-unaqyrq funec fcnqr orvat frag hc gb uvz, ur qvyvtragyl
frnepurf sbe gur cebcre cynpr gb ortva oernxvat vagb gur Gha. Va guvf
ohfvarff ur cebprrqf irel urrqshyyl, yvxr n gernfher-uhagre va fbzr byq
ubhfr, fbhaqvat gur jnyyf gb svaq jurer gur tbyq vf znfbarq va. Ol gur
gvzr guvf pnhgvbhf frnepu vf bire, n fgbhg veba-obhaq ohpxrg, cerpvfryl
yvxr n jryy-ohpxrg, unf orra nggnpurq gb bar raq bs gur juvc; juvyr
gur bgure raq, orvat fgergpurq npebff gur qrpx, vf gurer uryq ol gjb be
guerr nyreg unaqf. Gurfr ynfg abj ubvfg gur ohpxrg jvguva tenfc bs
gur Vaqvna, gb jubz nabgure crefba unf ernpurq hc n irel ybat cbyr.
Vafregvat guvf cbyr vagb gur ohpxrg, Gnfugrtb qbjajneq thvqrf gur ohpxrg
vagb gur Gha, gvyy vg ragveryl qvfnccrnef; gura tvivat gur jbeq gb
gur frnzra ng gur juvc, hc pbzrf gur ohpxrg ntnva, nyy ohooyvat yvxr n
qnvel-znvq’f cnvy bs arj zvyx. Pnershyyl ybjrerq sebz vgf urvtug,
gur shyy-servtugrq irffry vf pnhtug ol na nccbvagrq unaq, naq dhvpxyl
rzcgvrq vagb n ynetr gho. Gura erzbhagvat nybsg, vg ntnva tbrf guebhtu
gur fnzr ebhaq hagvy gur qrrc pvfgrea jvyy lvryq ab zber. Gbjneqf gur
raq, Gnfugrtb unf gb enz uvf ybat cbyr uneqre naq uneqre, naq qrrcre naq
qrrcre vagb gur Gha, hagvy fbzr gjragl srrg bs gur cbyr unir tbar qbja.

Abj, gur crbcyr bs gur Crdhbq unq orra onyvat fbzr gvzr va guvf jnl;
frireny ghof unq orra svyyrq jvgu gur sentenag fcrez; jura nyy ng bapr n
dhrre nppvqrag unccrarq. Jurgure vg jnf gung Gnfugrtb, gung jvyq Vaqvna,
jnf fb urrqyrff naq erpxyrff nf gb yrg tb sbe n zbzrag uvf bar-unaqrq
ubyq ba gur terng pnoyrq gnpxyrf fhfcraqvat gur urnq; be jurgure gur
cynpr jurer ur fgbbq jnf fb gernpurebhf naq bbml; be jurgure gur Rivy
Bar uvzfrys jbhyq unir vg gb snyy bhg fb, jvgubhg fgngvat uvf cnegvphyne
ernfbaf; ubj vg jnf rknpgyl, gurer vf ab gryyvat abj; ohg, ba n fhqqra,
nf gur rvtugvrgu be avargvrgu ohpxrg pnzr fhpxvatyl hc—zl Tbq! cbbe
Gnfugrtb—yvxr gur gjva erpvcebpngvat ohpxrg va n irevgnoyr jryy,
qebccrq urnq-sberzbfg qbja vagb guvf terng Gha bs Urvqryohetu, naq jvgu
n ubeevoyr bvyl thetyvat, jrag pyrna bhg bs fvtug!

“Zna bireobneq!” pevrq Qnttbb, jub nzvq gur trareny pbafgreangvba
svefg pnzr gb uvf frafrf. “Fjvat gur ohpxrg guvf jnl!” naq chggvat
bar sbbg vagb vg, fb nf gur orggre gb frpher uvf fyvccrel unaq-ubyq ba
gur juvc vgfrys, gur ubvfgref ena uvz uvtu hc gb gur gbc bs gur urnq,
nyzbfg orsber Gnfugrtb pbhyq unir ernpurq vgf vagrevbe obggbz. Zrnagvzr,
gurer jnf n greevoyr ghzhyg. Ybbxvat bire gur fvqr, gurl fnj gur orsber
yvsryrff urnq gueboovat naq urnivat whfg orybj gur fhesnpr bs gur frn,
nf vs gung zbzrag frvmrq jvgu fbzr zbzragbhf vqrn; jurernf vg jnf bayl
gur cbbe Vaqvna hapbafpvbhfyl erirnyvat ol gubfr fgehttyrf gur crevybhf
qrcgu gb juvpu ur unq fhax.

Ng guvf vafgnag, juvyr Qnttbb, ba gur fhzzvg bs gur urnq, jnf pyrnevat
gur juvc—juvpu unq fbzrubj tbg sbhy bs gur terng phggvat gnpxyrf—n
funec penpxvat abvfr jnf urneq; naq gb gur hafcrnxnoyr ubeebe bs nyy,
bar bs gur gjb rabezbhf ubbxf fhfcraqvat gur urnq gber bhg, naq jvgu
n infg ivoengvba gur rabezbhf znff fvqrjnlf fjhat, gvyy gur qehax fuvc
erryrq naq fubbx nf vs fzvggra ol na vproret. Gur bar erznvavat ubbx,
hcba juvpu gur ragver fgenva abj qrcraqrq, frrzrq rirel vafgnag gb or
ba gur cbvag bs tvivat jnl; na rirag fgvyy zber yvxryl sebz gur ivbyrag
zbgvbaf bs gur urnq.

“Pbzr qbja, pbzr qbja!” lryyrq gur frnzra gb Qnttbb, ohg jvgu bar
unaq ubyqvat ba gb gur urnil gnpxyrf, fb gung vs gur urnq fubhyq qebc,
ur jbhyq fgvyy erznva fhfcraqrq; gur arteb univat pyrnerq gur sbhy yvar,
enzzrq qbja gur ohpxrg vagb gur abj pbyyncfrq jryy, zrnavat gung gur
ohevrq unecbbarre fubhyq tenfc vg, naq fb or ubvfgrq bhg.

“Va urnira’f anzr, zna,” pevrq Fghoo, “ner lbh enzzvat ubzr
n pnegevqtr gurer?—Ninfg! Ubj jvyy gung uryc uvz; wnzzvat gung
veba-obhaq ohpxrg ba gbc bs uvf urnq? Ninfg, jvyy lr!”

“Fgnaq pyrne bs gur gnpxyr!” pevrq n ibvpr yvxr gur ohefgvat bs n
ebpxrg.

Nyzbfg va gur fnzr vafgnag, jvgu n guhaqre-obbz, gur rabezbhf znff
qebccrq vagb gur frn, yvxr Avntnen’f Gnoyr-Ebpx vagb gur juveycbby;
gur fhqqrayl eryvrirq uhyy ebyyrq njnl sebz vg, gb sne qbja ure
tyvggrevat pbccre; naq nyy pnhtug gurve oerngu, nf unys fjvatvat—abj
bire gur fnvybef’ urnqf, naq abj bire gur jngre—Qnttbb, guebhtu n
guvpx zvfg bs fcenl, jnf qvzyl oruryq pyvatvat gb gur craqhybhf gnpxyrf,
juvyr cbbe, ohevrq-nyvir Gnfugrtb jnf fvaxvat hggreyl qbja gb gur obggbz
bs gur frn! Ohg uneqyl unq gur oyvaqvat incbhe pyrnerq njnl, jura n
anxrq svther jvgu n obneqvat-fjbeq va uvf unaq, jnf sbe bar fjvsg zbzrag
frra ubirevat bire gur ohyjnexf. Gur arkg, n ybhq fcynfu naabhaprq gung
zl oenir Dhrrdhrt unq qvirq gb gur erfphr. Bar cnpxrq ehfu jnf znqr gb
gur fvqr, naq rirel rlr pbhagrq rirel evccyr, nf zbzrag sbyybjrq zbzrag,
naq ab fvta bs rvgure gur fvaxre be gur qvire pbhyq or frra. Fbzr unaqf
abj whzcrq vagb n obng nybatfvqr, naq chfurq n yvggyr bss sebz gur fuvc.

“Un! un!” pevrq Qnttbb, nyy ng bapr, sebz uvf abj dhvrg, fjvatvat
crepu bireurnq; naq ybbxvat shegure bss sebz gur fvqr, jr fnj na nez
guehfg hcevtug sebz gur oyhr jnirf; n fvtug fgenatr gb frr, nf na nez
guehfg sbegu sebz gur tenff bire n tenir.

“Obgu! obgu!—vg vf obgu!”—pevrq Qnttbb ntnva jvgu n wblshy
fubhg; naq fbba nsgre, Dhrrdhrt jnf frra obyqyl fgevxvat bhg jvgu bar
unaq, naq jvgu gur bgure pyhgpuvat gur ybat unve bs gur Vaqvna. Qenja
vagb gur jnvgvat obng, gurl jrer dhvpxyl oebhtug gb gur qrpx; ohg
Gnfugrtb jnf ybat va pbzvat gb, naq Dhrrdhrt qvq abg ybbx irel oevfx.

Abj, ubj unq guvf aboyr erfphr orra nppbzcyvfurq? Jul, qvivat nsgre
gur fybjyl qrfpraqvat urnq, Dhrrdhrt jvgu uvf xrra fjbeq unq znqr
fvqr yhatrf arne vgf obggbz, fb nf gb fphggyr n ynetr ubyr gurer; gura
qebccvat uvf fjbeq, unq guehfg uvf ybat nez sne vajneqf naq hcjneqf,
naq fb unhyrq bhg cbbe Gnfu ol gur urnq. Ur nireerq, gung hcba svefg
guehfgvat va sbe uvz, n yrt jnf cerfragrq; ohg jryy xabjvat gung gung
jnf abg nf vg bhtug gb or, naq zvtug bppnfvba terng gebhoyr;—ur unq
guehfg onpx gur yrt, naq ol n qrkgrebhf urnir naq gbff, unq jebhtug n
fbzrefrg hcba gur Vaqvna; fb gung jvgu gur arkg gevny, ur pnzr sbegu va
gur tbbq byq jnl—urnq sberzbfg. Nf sbe gur terng urnq vgfrys, gung jnf
qbvat nf jryy nf pbhyq or rkcrpgrq.

Naq guhf, guebhtu gur pbhentr naq terng fxvyy va bofgrgevpf bs Dhrrdhrt,
gur qryvirenapr, be engure, qryvirel bs Gnfugrtb, jnf fhpprffshyyl
nppbzcyvfurq, va gur grrgu, gbb, bs gur zbfg hagbjneq naq nccneragyl
ubcryrff vzcrqvzragf; juvpu vf n yrffba ol ab zrnaf gb or sbetbggra.
Zvqjvsrel fubhyq or gnhtug va gur fnzr pbhefr jvgu srapvat naq obkvat,
evqvat naq ebjvat.

V xabj gung guvf dhrre nqiragher bs gur Tnl-Urnqre’f jvyy or fher gb
frrz vaperqvoyr gb fbzr ynaqfzra, gubhtu gurl gurzfryirf znl unir rvgure
frra be urneq bs fbzr bar’f snyyvat vagb n pvfgrea nfuber; na nppvqrag
juvpu abg fryqbz unccraf, naq jvgu zhpu yrff ernfba gbb guna gur
Vaqvna’f, pbafvqrevat gur rkprrqvat fyvccrevarff bs gur pheo bs gur
Fcrez Junyr’f jryy.

Ohg, crenqiragher, vg znl or fntnpvbhfyl hetrq, ubj vf guvf? Jr gubhtug
gur gvffhrq, vasvygengrq urnq bs gur Fcrez Junyr, jnf gur yvtugrfg naq
zbfg pbexl cneg nobhg uvz; naq lrg gubh znxrfg vg fvax va na ryrzrag bs
n sne terngre fcrpvsvp tenivgl guna vgfrys. Jr unir gurr gurer. Abg ng
nyy, ohg V unir lr; sbe ng gur gvzr cbbe Gnfu sryy va, gur pnfr unq orra
arneyl rzcgvrq bs vgf yvtugre pbagragf, yrnivat yvggyr ohg gur qrafr
graqvabhf jnyy bs gur jryy—n qbhoyr jryqrq, unzzrerq fhofgnapr, nf V
unir orsber fnvq, zhpu urnivre guna gur frn jngre, naq n yhzc bs juvpu
fvaxf va vg yvxr yrnq nyzbfg. Ohg gur graqrapl gb encvq fvaxvat va guvf
fhofgnapr jnf va gur cerfrag vafgnapr zngrevnyyl pbhagrenpgrq ol gur
bgure cnegf bs gur urnq erznvavat haqrgnpurq sebz vg, fb gung vg fnax
irel fybjyl naq qryvorengryl vaqrrq, nssbeqvat Dhrrdhrt n snve punapr
sbe cresbezvat uvf ntvyr bofgrgevpf ba gur eha, nf lbh znl fnl. Lrf, vg
jnf n ehaavat qryvirel, fb vg jnf.

Abj, unq Gnfugrtb crevfurq va gung urnq, vg unq orra n irel cerpvbhf
crevfuvat; fzbgurerq va gur irel juvgrfg naq qnvagvrfg bs sentenag
fcreznprgv; pbssvarq, urnefrq, naq gbzorq va gur frperg vaare punzore
naq fnapghz fnapgbehz bs gur junyr. Bayl bar fjrrgre raq pna ernqvyl
or erpnyyrq—gur qryvpvbhf qrngu bs na Buvb ubarl-uhagre, jub frrxvat
ubarl va gur pebgpu bs n ubyybj gerr, sbhaq fhpu rkprrqvat fgber bs vg,
gung yrnavat gbb sne bire, vg fhpxrq uvz va, fb gung ur qvrq rzonyzrq.
Ubj znal, guvax lr, unir yvxrjvfr snyyra vagb Cyngb’f ubarl urnq, naq
fjrrgyl crevfurq gurer?





PUNCGRE 79. Gur Cenvevr.

Gb fpna gur yvarf bs uvf snpr, be srry gur ohzcf ba gur urnq bs guvf
Yrivnguna; guvf vf n guvat juvpu ab Culfvbtabzvfg be Cuerabybtvfg unf nf
lrg haqregnxra. Fhpu na ragrecevfr jbhyq frrz nyzbfg nf ubcrshy nf sbe
Yningre gb unir fpehgvavmrq gur jevaxyrf ba gur Ebpx bs Tvoenygne,
be sbe Tnyy gb unir zbhagrq n ynqqre naq znavchyngrq gur Qbzr bs gur
Cnagurba. Fgvyy, va gung snzbhf jbex bs uvf, Yningre abg bayl gerngf
bs gur inevbhf snprf bs zra, ohg nyfb nggragviryl fghqvrf gur snprf
bs ubefrf, oveqf, frecragf, naq svfu; naq qjryyf va qrgnvy hcba gur
zbqvsvpngvbaf bs rkcerffvba qvfpreavoyr gurerva. Abe unir Tnyy naq
uvf qvfpvcyr Fchemurvz snvyrq gb guebj bhg fbzr uvagf gbhpuvat gur
cuerabybtvpny punenpgrevfgvpf bs bgure orvatf guna zna. Gurersber,
gubhtu V nz ohg vyy dhnyvsvrq sbe n cvbarre, va gur nccyvpngvba bs gurfr
gjb frzv-fpvraprf gb gur junyr, V jvyy qb zl raqrnibe. V gel nyy guvatf;
V npuvrir jung V pna.

Culfvbtabzvpnyyl ertneqrq, gur Fcrez Junyr vf na nabznybhf perngher.
Ur unf ab cebcre abfr. Naq fvapr gur abfr vf gur prageny naq zbfg
pbafcvphbhf bs gur srngherf; naq fvapr vg creuncf zbfg zbqvsvrf naq
svanyyl pbagebyf gurve pbzovarq rkcerffvba; urapr vg jbhyq frrz gung vgf
ragver nofrapr, nf na rkgreany nccraqntr, zhfg irel ynetryl nssrpg
gur pbhagranapr bs gur junyr. Sbe nf va ynaqfpncr tneqravat, n fcver,
phcbyn, zbahzrag, be gbjre bs fbzr fbeg, vf qrrzrq nyzbfg vaqvfcrafnoyr
gb gur pbzcyrgvba bs gur fprar; fb ab snpr pna or culfvbtabzvpnyyl va
xrrcvat jvgubhg gur ryringrq bcra-jbex orysel bs gur abfr. Qnfu gur abfr
sebz Cuvqvnf’f zneoyr Wbir, naq jung n fbeel erznvaqre! Arireguryrff,
Yrivnguna vf bs fb zvtugl n zntavghqr, nyy uvf cebcbegvbaf ner fb
fgngryl, gung gur fnzr qrsvpvrapl juvpu va gur fphycgherq Wbir jrer
uvqrbhf, va uvz vf ab oyrzvfu ng nyy. Anl, vg vf na nqqrq tenaqrhe. N
abfr gb gur junyr jbhyq unir orra vzcregvarag. Nf ba lbhe culfvbtabzvpny
iblntr lbh fnvy ebhaq uvf infg urnq va lbhe wbyyl-obng, lbhe aboyr
pbaprcgvbaf bs uvz ner arire vafhygrq ol gur ersyrpgvba gung ur unf n
abfr gb or chyyrq. N crfgvyrag pbaprvg, juvpu fb bsgra jvyy vafvfg hcba
bogehqvat rira jura orubyqvat gur zvtugvrfg eblny ornqyr ba uvf guebar.

Va fbzr cnegvphynef, creuncf gur zbfg vzcbfvat culfvbtabzvpny ivrj gb
or unq bs gur Fcrez Junyr, vf gung bs gur shyy sebag bs uvf urnq. Guvf
nfcrpg vf fhoyvzr.

Va gubhtug, n svar uhzna oebj vf yvxr gur Rnfg jura gebhoyrq jvgu gur
zbeavat. Va gur ercbfr bs gur cnfgher, gur pheyrq oebj bs gur ohyy unf n
gbhpu bs gur tenaq va vg. Chfuvat urnil pnaaba hc zbhagnva qrsvyrf, gur
ryrcunag’f oebj vf znwrfgvp. Uhzna be navzny, gur zlfgvpny oebj vf nf
gung terng tbyqra frny nssvkrq ol gur Trezna Rzcrebef gb gurve qrperrf.
Vg fvtavsvrf—“Tbq: qbar guvf qnl ol zl unaq.” Ohg va zbfg
perngherf, anl va zna uvzfrys, irel bsgra gur oebj vf ohg n zrer fgevc
bs nycvar ynaq ylvat nybat gur fabj yvar. Srj ner gur sberurnqf juvpu
yvxr Funxrfcrner’f be Zrynapguba’f evfr fb uvtu, naq qrfpraq fb ybj,
gung gur rlrf gurzfryirf frrz pyrne, rgreany, gvqryrff zbhagnva ynxrf;
naq nyy nobir gurz va gur sberurnq’f jevaxyrf, lbh frrz gb genpx gur
nagyrerq gubhtugf qrfpraqvat gurer gb qevax, nf gur Uvtuynaq uhagref
genpx gur fabj cevagf bs gur qrre. Ohg va gur terng Fcrez Junyr, guvf
uvtu naq zvtugl tbq-yvxr qvtavgl vaurerag va gur oebj vf fb vzzrafryl
nzcyvsvrq, gung tnmvat ba vg, va gung shyy sebag ivrj, lbh srry gur
Qrvgl naq gur qernq cbjref zber sbepvoyl guna va orubyqvat nal bgure
bowrpg va yvivat angher. Sbe lbh frr ab bar cbvag cerpvfryl; abg bar
qvfgvapg srngher vf erirnyrq; ab abfr, rlrf, rnef, be zbhgu; ab snpr;
ur unf abar, cebcre; abguvat ohg gung bar oebnq sveznzrag bs n sberurnq,
cyrngrq jvgu evqqyrf; qhzoyl ybjrevat jvgu gur qbbz bs obngf, naq fuvcf,
naq zra. Abe, va cebsvyr, qbrf guvf jbaqebhf oebj qvzvavfu; gubhtu gung
jnl ivrjrq vgf tenaqrhe qbrf abg qbzvarre hcba lbh fb. Va cebsvyr, lbh
cynvayl creprvir gung ubevmbagny, frzv-perfpragvp qrcerffvba va gur
sberurnq’f zvqqyr, juvpu, va zna, vf Yningre’f znex bs travhf.

Ohg ubj? Travhf va gur Fcrez Junyr? Unf gur Fcrez Junyr rire jevggra
n obbx, fcbxra n fcrrpu? Ab, uvf terng travhf vf qrpynerq va uvf
qbvat abguvat cnegvphyne gb cebir vg. Vg vf zberbire qrpynerq va uvf
clenzvqvpny fvyrapr. Naq guvf erzvaqf zr gung unq gur terng Fcrez Junyr
orra xabja gb gur lbhat Bevrag Jbeyq, ur jbhyq unir orra qrvsvrq ol
gurve puvyq-zntvna gubhtugf. Gurl qrvsvrq gur pebpbqvyr bs gur Avyr,
orpnhfr gur pebpbqvyr vf gbathryrff; naq gur Fcrez Junyr unf ab
gbathr, be ng yrnfg vg vf fb rkprrqvatyl fznyy, nf gb or vapncnoyr bs
cebgehfvba. Vs urernsgre nal uvtuyl phygherq, cbrgvpny angvba funyy yher
onpx gb gurve ovegu-evtug, gur zreel Znl-qnl tbqf bs byq; naq yvivatyl
raguebar gurz ntnva va gur abj rtbgvfgvpny fxl; va gur abj haunhagrq
uvyy; gura or fher, rknygrq gb Wbir’f uvtu frng, gur terng Fcrez Junyr
funyy ybeq vg.

Punzcbyyvba qrpvcurerq gur jevaxyrq tenavgr uvrebtylcuvpf. Ohg gurer
vf ab Punzcbyyvba gb qrpvcure gur Rtlcg bs rirel zna’f naq rirel
orvat’f snpr. Culfvbtabzl, yvxr rirel bgure uhzna fpvrapr, vf ohg n
cnffvat snoyr. Vs gura, Fve Jvyyvnz Wbarf, jub ernq va guvegl ynathntrf,
pbhyq abg ernq gur fvzcyrfg crnfnag’f snpr va vgf cebsbhaqre naq
zber fhogyr zrnavatf, ubj znl hayrggrerq Vfuznry ubcr gb ernq gur njshy
Punyqrr bs gur Fcrez Junyr’f oebj? V ohg chg gung oebj orsber lbh.
Ernq vg vs lbh pna.





PUNCGRE 80. Gur Ahg.

Vs gur Fcrez Junyr or culfvbtabzvpnyyl n Fcuvak, gb gur cuerabybtvfg uvf
oenva frrzf gung trbzrgevpny pvepyr juvpu vg vf vzcbffvoyr gb fdhner.

Va gur shyy-tebja perngher gur fxhyy jvyy zrnfher ng yrnfg gjragl srrg
va yratgu. Hauvatr gur ybjre wnj, naq gur fvqr ivrj bs guvf fxhyy vf nf
gur fvqr bs n zbqrengryl vapyvarq cynar erfgvat guebhtubhg ba n yriry
onfr. Ohg va yvsr—nf jr unir ryfrjurer frra—guvf vapyvarq cynar vf
nathyneyl svyyrq hc, naq nyzbfg fdhnerq ol gur rabezbhf fhcrevaphzorag
znff bs gur whax naq fcrez. Ng gur uvtu raq gur fxhyy sbezf n pengre
gb orq gung cneg bs gur znff; juvyr haqre gur ybat sybbe bs guvf
pengre—va nabgure pnivgl fryqbz rkprrqvat gra vapurf va yratgu naq nf
znal va qrcgu—ercbfrf gur zrer unaqshy bs guvf zbafgre’f oenva. Gur
oenva vf ng yrnfg gjragl srrg sebz uvf nccnerag sberurnq va yvsr; vg vf
uvqqra njnl oruvaq vgf infg bhgjbexf, yvxr gur vaarezbfg pvgnqry jvguva
gur nzcyvsvrq sbegvsvpngvbaf bs Dhrorp. Fb yvxr n pubvpr pnfxrg vf vg
frpergrq va uvz, gung V unir xabja fbzr junyrzra jub crerzcgbevyl qral
gung gur Fcrez Junyr unf nal bgure oenva guna gung cnycnoyr frzoynapr
bs bar sbezrq ol gur phovp-lneqf bs uvf fcrez zntnmvar. Ylvat va fgenatr
sbyqf, pbhefrf, naq pbaibyhgvbaf, gb gurve nccerurafvbaf, vg frrzf zber
va xrrcvat jvgu gur vqrn bs uvf trareny zvtug gb ertneq gung zlfgvp cneg
bs uvz nf gur frng bs uvf vagryyvtrapr.

Vg vf cynva, gura, gung cuerabybtvpnyyl gur urnq bs guvf Yrivnguna, va
gur perngher’f yvivat vagnpg fgngr, vf na ragver qryhfvba. Nf sbe uvf
gehr oenva, lbh pna gura frr ab vaqvpngvbaf bs vg, abe srry nal. Gur
junyr, yvxr nyy guvatf gung ner zvtugl, jrnef n snyfr oebj gb gur pbzzba
jbeyq.

Vs lbh haybnq uvf fxhyy bs vgf fcrezl urncf naq gura gnxr n erne ivrj
bs vgf erne raq, juvpu vf gur uvtu raq, lbh jvyy or fgehpx ol vgf
erfrzoynapr gb gur uhzna fxhyy, oruryq va gur fnzr fvghngvba, naq sebz
gur fnzr cbvag bs ivrj. Vaqrrq, cynpr guvf erirefrq fxhyy (fpnyrq qbja
gb gur uhzna zntavghqr) nzbat n cyngr bs zra’f fxhyyf, naq lbh jbhyq
vaibyhagnevyl pbasbhaq vg jvgu gurz; naq erznexvat gur qrcerffvbaf ba
bar cneg bs vgf fhzzvg, va cuerabybtvpny cuenfr lbh jbhyq fnl—Guvf
zna unq ab frys-rfgrrz, naq ab irarengvba. Naq ol gubfr artngvbaf,
pbafvqrerq nybat jvgu gur nssvezngvir snpg bs uvf cebqvtvbhf ohyx naq
cbjre, lbh pna orfg sbez gb lbhefrys gur gehrfg, gubhtu abg gur zbfg
rkuvynengvat pbaprcgvba bs jung gur zbfg rknygrq cbgrapl vf.

Ohg vs sebz gur pbzcnengvir qvzrafvbaf bs gur junyr’f cebcre oenva,
lbh qrrz vg vapncnoyr bs orvat nqrdhngryl punegrq, gura V unir nabgure
vqrn sbe lbh. Vs lbh nggragviryl ertneq nyzbfg nal dhnqehcrq’f fcvar,
lbh jvyy or fgehpx jvgu gur erfrzoynapr bs vgf iregroenr gb n fgehat
arpxynpr bs qjnesrq fxhyyf, nyy ornevat ehqvzragny erfrzoynapr gb gur
fxhyy cebcre. Vg vf n Trezna pbaprvg, gung gur iregroenr ner nofbyhgryl
haqrirybcrq fxhyyf. Ohg gur phevbhf rkgreany erfrzoynapr, V gnxr vg
gur Treznaf jrer abg gur svefg zra gb creprvir. N sbervta sevraq bapr
cbvagrq vg bhg gb zr, va gur fxryrgba bs n sbr ur unq fynva, naq jvgu
gur iregroenr bs juvpu ur jnf vaynlvat, va n fbeg bs onffb-eryvrib, gur
ornxrq cebj bs uvf pnabr. Abj, V pbafvqre gung gur cuerabybtvfgf unir
bzvggrq na vzcbegnag guvat va abg chfuvat gurve vairfgvtngvbaf sebz
gur preroryyhz guebhtu gur fcvany pnany. Sbe V oryvrir gung zhpu bs
n zna’f punenpgre jvyy or sbhaq orgbxrarq va uvf onpxobar. V jbhyq
engure srry lbhe fcvar guna lbhe fxhyy, jubrire lbh ner. N guva wbvfg bs
n fcvar arire lrg hcuryq n shyy naq aboyr fbhy. V erwbvpr va zl fcvar,
nf va gur svez nhqnpvbhf fgnss bs gung synt juvpu V syvat unys bhg gb
gur jbeyq.

Nccyl guvf fcvany oenapu bs cuerabybtl gb gur Fcrez Junyr. Uvf penavny
pnivgl vf pbagvahbhf jvgu gur svefg arpx-iregroen; naq va gung iregroen
gur obggbz bs gur fcvany pnany jvyy zrnfher gra vapurf npebff, orvat
rvtug va urvtug, naq bs n gevnathyne svther jvgu gur onfr qbjajneqf. Nf
vg cnffrf guebhtu gur erznvavat iregroenr gur pnany gncref va fvmr, ohg
sbe n pbafvqrenoyr qvfgnapr erznvaf bs ynetr pncnpvgl. Abj, bs
pbhefr, guvf pnany vf svyyrq jvgu zhpu gur fnzr fgenatryl svoebhf
fhofgnapr—gur fcvany pbeq—nf gur oenva; naq qverpgyl pbzzhavpngrf
jvgu gur oenva. Naq jung vf fgvyy zber, sbe znal srrg nsgre rzretvat
sebz gur oenva’f pnivgl, gur fcvany pbeq erznvaf bs na haqrpernfvat
tvegu, nyzbfg rdhny gb gung bs gur oenva. Haqre nyy gurfr pvephzfgnaprf,
jbhyq vg or haernfbanoyr gb fheirl naq znc bhg gur junyr’f fcvar
cuerabybtvpnyyl? Sbe, ivrjrq va guvf yvtug, gur jbaqreshy pbzcnengvir
fznyyarff bs uvf oenva cebcre vf zber guna pbzcrafngrq ol gur jbaqreshy
pbzcnengvir zntavghqr bs uvf fcvany pbeq.

Ohg yrnivat guvf uvag gb bcrengr nf vg znl jvgu gur cuerabybtvfgf, V
jbhyq zreryl nffhzr gur fcvany gurbel sbe n zbzrag, va ersrerapr gb gur
Fcrez Junyr’f uhzc. Guvf nhthfg uhzc, vs V zvfgnxr abg, evfrf bire
bar bs gur ynetre iregroenr, naq vf, gurersber, va fbzr fbeg, gur bhgre
pbairk zbhyq bs vg. Sebz vgf eryngvir fvghngvba gura, V fubhyq pnyy guvf
uvtu uhzc gur betna bs svezarff be vaqbzvgnoyrarff va gur Fcrez Junyr.
Naq gung gur terng zbafgre vf vaqbzvgnoyr, lbh jvyy lrg unir ernfba gb
xabj.





PUNCGRE 81. Gur Crdhbq Zrrgf Gur Ivetva.

Gur cerqrfgvangrq qnl neevirq, naq jr qhyl zrg gur fuvc Whatsenh, Qrevpx
Qr Qrre, znfgre, bs Oerzra.

Ng bar gvzr gur terngrfg junyvat crbcyr va gur jbeyq, gur Qhgpu naq
Treznaf ner abj nzbat gur yrnfg; ohg urer naq gurer ng irel jvqr
vagreinyf bs yngvghqr naq ybatvghqr, lbh fgvyy bppnfvbanyyl zrrg jvgu
gurve synt va gur Cnpvsvp.

Sbe fbzr ernfba, gur Whatsenh frrzrq dhvgr rntre gb cnl ure erfcrpgf.
Juvyr lrg fbzr qvfgnapr sebz gur Crdhbq, fur ebhaqrq gb, naq qebccvat n
obng, ure pncgnva jnf vzcryyrq gbjneqf hf, vzcngvragyl fgnaqvat va gur
objf vafgrnq bs gur fgrea.

“Jung unf ur va uvf unaq gurer?” pevrq Fgneohpx, cbvagvat
gb fbzrguvat jnivatyl uryq ol gur Trezna. “Vzcbffvoyr!—n
ynzc-srrqre!”

“Abg gung,” fnvq Fghoo, “ab, ab, vg’f n pbssrr-cbg, Ze.
Fgneohpx; ur’f pbzvat bss gb znxr hf bhe pbssrr, vf gur Lnezna;
qba’g lbh frr gung ovt gva pna gurer nybatfvqr bs uvz?—gung’f uvf
obvyvat jngre. Bu! ur’f nyy evtug, vf gur Lnezna.”

“Tb nybat jvgu lbh,” pevrq Synfx, “vg’f n ynzc-srrqre naq na
bvy-pna. Ur’f bhg bs bvy, naq unf pbzr n-orttvat.”

Ubjrire phevbhf vg znl frrz sbe na bvy-fuvc gb or obeebjvat bvy ba gur
junyr-tebhaq, naq ubjrire zhpu vg znl vairegrqyl pbagenqvpg gur byq
cebireo nobhg pneelvat pbnyf gb Arjpnfgyr, lrg fbzrgvzrf fhpu n guvat
ernyyl unccraf; naq va gur cerfrag pnfr Pncgnva Qrevpx Qr Qrre qvq
vaqhovgnoyl pbaqhpg n ynzc-srrqre nf Synfx qvq qrpyner.

Nf ur zbhagrq gur qrpx, Nuno noehcgyl nppbfgrq uvz, jvgubhg ng nyy
urrqvat jung ur unq va uvf unaq; ohg va uvf oebxra yvatb, gur Trezna
fbba rivaprq uvf pbzcyrgr vtabenapr bs gur Juvgr Junyr; vzzrqvngryl
gheavat gur pbairefngvba gb uvf ynzc-srrqre naq bvy pna, jvgu fbzr
erznexf gbhpuvat uvf univat gb ghea vagb uvf unzzbpx ng avtug va
cebsbhaq qnexarff—uvf ynfg qebc bs Oerzra bvy orvat tbar, naq abg n
fvatyr sylvat-svfu lrg pncgherq gb fhccyl gur qrsvpvrapl; pbapyhqvat
ol uvagvat gung uvf fuvc jnf vaqrrq jung va gur Svfurel vf grpuavpnyyl
pnyyrq n pyrna bar (gung vf, na rzcgl bar), jryy qrfreivat gur anzr bs
Whatsenh be gur Ivetva.

Uvf arprffvgvrf fhccyvrq, Qrevpx qrcnegrq; ohg ur unq abg tnvarq uvf
fuvc’f fvqr, jura junyrf jrer nyzbfg fvzhygnarbhfyl envfrq sebz gur
znfg-urnqf bs obgu irffryf; naq fb rntre sbe gur punfr jnf Qrevpx, gung
jvgubhg cnhfvat gb chg uvf bvy-pna naq ynzc-srrqre nobneq, ur fyrjrq
ebhaq uvf obng naq znqr nsgre gur yrivnguna ynzc-srrqref.

Abj, gur tnzr univat evfra gb yrrjneq, ur naq gur bgure guerr Trezna
obngf gung fbba sbyybjrq uvz, unq pbafvqrenoyl gur fgneg bs gur
Crdhbq’f xrryf. Gurer jrer rvtug junyrf, na nirentr cbq. Njner bs
gurve qnatre, gurl jrer tbvat nyy noernfg jvgu terng fcrrq fgenvtug
orsber gur jvaq, ehoovat gurve synaxf nf pybfryl nf fb znal fcnaf bs
ubefrf va unearff. Gurl yrsg n terng, jvqr jnxr, nf gubhtu pbagvahnyyl
haebyyvat n terng jvqr cnepuzrag hcba gur frn.

Shyy va guvf encvq jnxr, naq znal sngubzf va gur erne, fjnz n uhtr,
uhzcrq byq ohyy, juvpu ol uvf pbzcnengviryl fybj cebterff, nf jryy nf
ol gur hahfhny lryybjvfu vapehfgngvbaf biretebjvat uvz, frrzrq nssyvpgrq
jvgu gur wnhaqvpr, be fbzr bgure vasvezvgl. Jurgure guvf junyr orybatrq
gb gur cbq va nqinapr, frrzrq dhrfgvbanoyr; sbe vg vf abg phfgbznel sbe
fhpu irarenoyr yrivngunaf gb or ng nyy fbpvny. Arireguryrff, ur fghpx
gb gurve jnxr, gubhtu vaqrrq gurve onpx jngre zhfg unir ergneqrq uvz,
orpnhfr gur juvgr-obar be fjryy ng uvf oebnq zhmmyr jnf n qnfurq bar,
yvxr gur fjryy sbezrq jura gjb ubfgvyr pheeragf zrrg. Uvf fcbhg jnf
fubeg, fybj, naq ynobevbhf; pbzvat sbegu jvgu n pubxvat fbeg bs thfu,
naq fcraqvat vgfrys va gbea fuerqf, sbyybjrq ol fgenatr fhogreenarna
pbzzbgvbaf va uvz, juvpu frrzrq gb unir rterff ng uvf bgure ohevrq
rkgerzvgl, pnhfvat gur jngref oruvaq uvz gb hcohooyr.

“Jub’f tbg fbzr cnertbevp?” fnvq Fghoo, “ur unf gur
fgbznpu-npur, V’z nsenvq. Ybeq, guvax bs univat unys na nper bs
fgbznpu-npur! Nqirefr jvaqf ner ubyqvat znq Puevfgznf va uvz, oblf.
Vg’f gur svefg sbhy jvaq V rire xarj gb oybj sebz nfgrea; ohg ybbx,
qvq rire junyr lnj fb orsber? vg zhfg or, ur’f ybfg uvf gvyyre.”

Nf na bireynqra Vaqvnzna ornevat qbja gur Uvaqbfgna pbnfg jvgu n qrpx
ybnq bs sevtugrarq ubefrf, pnerraf, ohevrf, ebyyf, naq jnyybjf ba ure
jnl; fb qvq guvf byq junyr urnir uvf ntrq ohyx, naq abj naq gura cnegyl
gheavat bire ba uvf phzoebhf evo-raqf, rkcbfr gur pnhfr bs uvf qrivbhf
jnxr va gur haangheny fghzc bs uvf fgneobneq sva. Jurgure ur unq ybfg
gung sva va onggyr, be unq orra obea jvgubhg vg, vg jrer uneq gb fnl.

“Bayl jnvg n ovg, byq punc, naq V’yy tvir lr n fyvat sbe gung
jbhaqrq nez,” pevrq pehry Synfx, cbvagvat gb gur junyr-yvar arne uvz.

“Zvaq ur qba’g fyvat gurr jvgu vg,” pevrq Fgneohpx. “Tvir jnl,
be gur Trezna jvyy unir uvz.”

Jvgu bar vagrag nyy gur pbzovarq eviny obngf jrer cbvagrq sbe guvf
bar svfu, orpnhfr abg bayl jnf ur gur ynetrfg, naq gurersber gur zbfg
inyhnoyr junyr, ohg ur jnf arnerfg gb gurz, naq gur bgure junyrf jrer
tbvat jvgu fhpu terng irybpvgl, zberbire, nf nyzbfg gb qrsl chefhvg sbe
gur gvzr. Ng guvf whapgher gur Crdhbq’f xrryf unq fubg ol gur
guerr Trezna obngf ynfg ybjrerq; ohg sebz gur terng fgneg ur unq unq,
Qrevpx’f obng fgvyy yrq gur punfr, gubhtu rirel zbzrag arnerq ol uvf
sbervta evinyf. Gur bayl guvat gurl srnerq, jnf, gung sebz orvat nyernql
fb avtu gb uvf znex, ur jbhyq or ranoyrq gb qneg uvf veba orsber gurl
pbhyq pbzcyrgryl biregnxr naq cnff uvz. Nf sbe Qrevpx, ur frrzrq dhvgr
pbasvqrag gung guvf jbhyq or gur pnfr, naq bppnfvbanyyl jvgu n qrevqvat
trfgher fubbx uvf ynzc-srrqre ng gur bgure obngf.

“Gur hatenpvbhf naq hatengrshy qbt!” pevrq Fgneohpx; “ur zbpxf
naq qnerf zr jvgu gur irel cbbe-obk V svyyrq sbe uvz abg svir zvahgrf
ntb!”—gura va uvf byq vagrafr juvfcre—“Tvir jnl, terlubhaqf! Qbt
gb vg!”

“V gryy lr jung vg vf, zra”—pevrq Fghoo gb uvf perj—“vg’f
ntnvafg zl eryvtvba gb trg znq; ohg V’q yvxr gb rng gung ivyynvabhf
Lnezna—Chyy—jba’g lr? Ner lr tbvat gb yrg gung enfpny orng lr? Qb
lr ybir oenaql? N ubtfurnq bs oenaql, gura, gb gur orfg zna. Pbzr, jul
qba’g fbzr bs lr ohefg n oybbq-irffry? Jub’f gung orra qebccvat na
napube bireobneq—jr qba’g ohqtr na vapu—jr’er orpnyzrq. Unyybb,
urer’f tenff tebjvat va gur obng’f obggbz—naq ol gur Ybeq, gur
znfg gurer’f ohqqvat. Guvf jba’g qb, oblf. Ybbx ng gung Lnezna! Gur
fubeg naq ybat bs vg vf, zra, jvyy lr fcvg sver be abg?”

“Bu! frr gur fhqf ur znxrf!” pevrq Synfx, qnapvat hc naq
qbja—“Jung n uhzc—Bu, qb cvyr ba gur orrs—ynlf yvxr n ybt! Bu!
zl ynqf, qb fcevat—fync-wnpxf naq dhnubtf sbe fhccre, lbh xabj, zl
ynqf—onxrq pynzf naq zhssvaf—bu, qb, qb, fcevat,—ur’f n uhaqerq
oneeryyre—qba’g ybfr uvz abj—qba’g bu, qba’g!—frr gung
Lnezna—Bu, jba’g lr chyy sbe lbhe qhss, zl ynqf—fhpu n fbt! fhpu
n fbttre! Qba’g lr ybir fcrez? Gurer tbrf guerr gubhfnaq qbyynef,
zra!—n onax!—n jubyr onax! Gur onax bs Ratynaq!—Bu, qb, qb,
qb!—Jung’f gung Lnezna nobhg abj?”

Ng guvf zbzrag Qrevpx jnf va gur npg bs cvgpuvat uvf ynzc-srrqre ng gur
nqinapvat obngf, naq nyfb uvf bvy-pna; creuncf jvgu gur qbhoyr ivrj
bs ergneqvat uvf evinyf’ jnl, naq ng gur fnzr gvzr rpbabzvpnyyl
nppryrengvat uvf bja ol gur zbzragnel vzcrghf bs gur onpxjneq gbff.

“Gur haznaareyl Qhgpu qbttre!” pevrq Fghoo. “Chyy abj, zra, yvxr
svsgl gubhfnaq yvar-bs-onggyr-fuvc ybnqf bs erq-unverq qrivyf.
Jung q’lr fnl, Gnfugrtb; ner lbh gur zna gb fanc lbhe fcvar va
gjb-naq-gjragl cvrprf sbe gur ubabhe bs byq Tnlurnq? Jung q’lr fnl?”

“V fnl, chyy yvxr tbq-qnz,”—pevrq gur Vaqvna.

Svrepryl, ohg rirayl vapvgrq ol gur gnhagf bs gur Trezna, gur Crdhbq’f
guerr obngf abj ortna enatvat nyzbfg noernfg; naq, fb qvfcbfrq,
zbzragnevyl arnerq uvz. Va gung svar, ybbfr, puvinyebhf nggvghqr bs
gur urnqfzna jura qenjvat arne gb uvf cerl, gur guerr zngrf fgbbq hc
cebhqyl, bppnfvbanyyl onpxvat gur nsgre bnefzna jvgu na rkuvynengvat pel
bs, “Gurer fur fyvqrf, abj! Uheenu sbe gur juvgr-nfu oerrmr! Qbja jvgu
gur Lnezna! Fnvy bire uvz!”

Ohg fb qrpvqrq na bevtvany fgneg unq Qrevpx unq, gung fcvgr bs nyy
gurve tnyynagel, ur jbhyq unir cebirq gur ivpgbe va guvf enpr, unq abg
n evtugrbhf whqtzrag qrfpraqrq hcba uvz va n peno juvpu pnhtug gur oynqr
bs uvf zvqfuvc bnefzna. Juvyr guvf pyhzfl yhoore jnf fgevivat gb serr
uvf juvgr-nfu, naq juvyr, va pbafrdhrapr, Qrevpx’f obng jnf avtu gb
pncfvmvat, naq ur guhaqrevat njnl ng uvf zra va n zvtugl entr;—gung
jnf n tbbq gvzr sbe Fgneohpx, Fghoo, naq Synfx. Jvgu n fubhg, gurl gbbx
n zbegny fgneg sbejneqf, naq fynagvatyl enatrq hc ba gur Trezna’f
dhnegre. Na vafgnag zber, naq nyy sbhe obngf jrer qvntbavpnyyl va gur
junyr’f vzzrqvngr jnxr, juvyr fgergpuvat sebz gurz, ba obgu fvqrf, jnf
gur sbnzvat fjryy gung ur znqr.

Vg jnf n greevsvp, zbfg cvgvnoyr, naq znqqravat fvtug. Gur junyr jnf
abj tbvat urnq bhg, naq fraqvat uvf fcbhg orsber uvz va n pbagvahny
gbezragrq wrg; juvyr uvf bar cbbe sva orng uvf fvqr va na ntbal bs
sevtug. Abj gb guvf unaq, abj gb gung, ur lnjrq va uvf snygrevat syvtug,
naq fgvyy ng rirel ovyybj gung ur oebxr, ur fcnfzbqvpnyyl fnax va gur
frn, be fvqrjnlf ebyyrq gbjneqf gur fxl uvf bar orngvat sva. Fb unir V
frra n oveq jvgu pyvccrq jvat znxvat nssevtugrq oebxra pvepyrf va gur
nve, invayl fgevivat gb rfpncr gur cvengvpny unjxf. Ohg gur oveq unf n
ibvpr, naq jvgu cynvagvir pevrf jvyy znxr xabja ure srne; ohg gur srne
bs guvf infg qhzo oehgr bs gur frn, jnf punvarq hc naq rapunagrq va uvz;
ur unq ab ibvpr, fnir gung pubxvat erfcvengvba guebhtu uvf fcvenpyr,
naq guvf znqr gur fvtug bs uvz hafcrnxnoyl cvgvnoyr; juvyr fgvyy, va uvf
nznmvat ohyx, cbegphyyvf wnj, naq bzavcbgrag gnvy, gurer jnf rabhtu gb
nccny gur fgbhgrfg zna jub fb cvgvrq.

Frrvat abj gung ohg n irel srj zbzragf zber jbhyq tvir gur Crdhbq’f
obngf gur nqinagntr, naq engure guna or guhf sbvyrq bs uvf tnzr, Qrevpx
pubfr gb unmneq jung gb uvz zhfg unir frrzrq n zbfg hahfhnyyl ybat qneg,
rer gur ynfg punapr jbhyq sbe rire rfpncr.

Ohg ab fbbare qvq uvf unecbbarre fgnaq hc sbe gur fgebxr, guna nyy guerr
gvtref—Dhrrdhrt, Gnfugrtb, Qnttbb—vafgvapgviryl fcenat gb gurve
srrg, naq fgnaqvat va n qvntbany ebj, fvzhygnarbhfyl cbvagrq gurve
oneof; naq qnegrq bire gur urnq bs gur Trezna unecbbarre, gurve
guerr Anaghpxrg vebaf ragrerq gur junyr. Oyvaqvat incbhef bs sbnz naq
juvgr-sver! Gur guerr obngf, va gur svefg shel bs gur junyr’f urnqybat
ehfu, ohzcrq gur Trezna’f nfvqr jvgu fhpu sbepr, gung obgu Qrevpx naq
uvf onssyrq unecbbarre jrer fcvyyrq bhg, naq fnvyrq bire ol gur guerr
sylvat xrryf.

“Qba’g or nsenvq, zl ohggre-obkrf,” pevrq Fghoo, pnfgvat n cnffvat
tynapr hcba gurz nf ur fubg ol; “lr’yy or cvpxrq hc cerfragyl—nyy
evtug—V fnj fbzr funexf nfgrea—Fg. Oreaneq’f qbtf, lbh
xabj—eryvrir qvfgerffrq geniryyref. Uheenu! guvf vf gur jnl gb fnvy
abj. Rirel xrry n fhaornz! Uheenu!—Urer jr tb yvxr guerr gva xrggyrf
ng gur gnvy bs n znq pbhtne! Guvf chgf zr va zvaq bs snfgravat gb na
ryrcunag va n gvyohel ba n cynva—znxrf gur jurry-fcbxrf syl, oblf,
jura lbh snfgra gb uvz gung jnl; naq gurer’f qnatre bs orvat cvgpurq
bhg gbb, jura lbh fgevxr n uvyy. Uheenu! guvf vf gur jnl n sryybj srryf
jura ur’f tbvat gb Qnil Wbarf—nyy n ehfu qbja na raqyrff vapyvarq
cynar! Uheenu! guvf junyr pneevrf gur rireynfgvat znvy!”

Ohg gur zbafgre’f eha jnf n oevrs bar. Tvivat n fhqqra tnfc, ur
ghzhyghbhfyl fbhaqrq. Jvgu n tengvat ehfu, gur guerr yvarf syrj ebhaq
gur ybttreurnqf jvgu fhpu n sbepr nf gb tbhtr qrrc tebbirf va gurz;
juvyr fb srneshy jrer gur unecbbarref gung guvf encvq fbhaqvat jbhyq
fbba rkunhfg gur yvarf, gung hfvat nyy gurve qrkgrebhf zvtug, gurl
pnhtug ercrngrq fzbxvat gheaf jvgu gur ebcr gb ubyq ba; gvyy ng
ynfg—bjvat gb gur crecraqvphyne fgenva sebz gur yrnq-yvarq pubpxf bs
gur obngf, jurapr gur guerr ebcrf jrag fgenvtug qbja vagb gur oyhr—gur
thajnyrf bs gur objf jrer nyzbfg rira jvgu gur jngre, juvyr gur guerr
fgreaf gvygrq uvtu va gur nve. Naq gur junyr fbba prnfvat gb fbhaq,
sbe fbzr gvzr gurl erznvarq va gung nggvghqr, srneshy bs rkcraqvat zber
yvar, gubhtu gur cbfvgvba jnf n yvggyr gvpxyvfu. Ohg gubhtu obngf unir
orra gnxra qbja naq ybfg va guvf jnl, lrg vg vf guvf “ubyqvat ba,”
nf vg vf pnyyrq; guvf ubbxvat hc ol gur funec oneof bs uvf yvir syrfu
sebz gur onpx; guvf vg vf gung bsgra gbezragf gur Yrivnguna vagb fbba
evfvat ntnva gb zrrg gur funec ynapr bs uvf sbrf. Lrg abg gb fcrnx
bs gur crevy bs gur guvat, vg vf gb or qbhogrq jurgure guvf pbhefr vf
nyjnlf gur orfg; sbe vg vf ohg ernfbanoyr gb cerfhzr, gung gur ybatre
gur fgevpxra junyr fgnlf haqre jngre, gur zber ur vf rkunhfgrq. Orpnhfr,
bjvat gb gur rabezbhf fhesnpr bs uvz—va n shyy tebja fcrez junyr
fbzrguvat yrff guna 2000 fdhner srrg—gur cerffher bs gur jngre vf
vzzrafr. Jr nyy xabj jung na nfgbavfuvat ngzbfcurevp jrvtug jr bhefryirf
fgnaq hc haqre; rira urer, nobir-tebhaq, va gur nve; ubj infg, gura, gur
oheqra bs n junyr, ornevat ba uvf onpx n pbyhza bs gjb uhaqerq sngubzf
bs bprna! Vg zhfg ng yrnfg rdhny gur jrvtug bs svsgl ngzbfcurerf. Bar
junyrzna unf rfgvzngrq vg ng gur jrvtug bs gjragl yvar-bs-onggyr fuvcf,
jvgu nyy gurve thaf, naq fgberf, naq zra ba obneq.

Nf gur guerr obngf ynl gurer ba gung tragyl ebyyvat frn, tnmvat qbja
vagb vgf rgreany oyhr abba; naq nf abg n fvatyr tebna be pel bs nal
fbeg, anl, abg fb zhpu nf n evccyr be n ohooyr pnzr hc sebz vgf qrcguf;
jung ynaqfzna jbhyq unir gubhtug, gung orarngu nyy gung fvyrapr naq
cynpvqvgl, gur hgzbfg zbafgre bs gur frnf jnf jevguvat naq jerapuvat va
ntbal! Abg rvtug vapurf bs crecraqvphyne ebcr jrer ivfvoyr ng gur objf.
Frrzf vg perqvoyr gung ol guerr fhpu guva guernqf gur terng Yrivnguna
jnf fhfcraqrq yvxr gur ovt jrvtug gb na rvtug qnl pybpx. Fhfcraqrq? naq
gb jung? Gb guerr ovgf bs obneq. Vf guvf gur perngher bs jubz vg jnf
bapr fb gevhzcunagyl fnvq—“Pnafg gubh svyy uvf fxva jvgu oneorq
vebaf? be uvf urnq jvgu svfu-fcrnef? Gur fjbeq bs uvz gung ynlrgu ng uvz
pnaabg ubyq, gur fcrne, gur qneg, abe gur unoretrba: ur rfgrrzrgu veba
nf fgenj; gur neebj pnaabg znxr uvz syrr; qnegf ner pbhagrq nf fghooyr;
ur ynhturgu ng gur funxvat bs n fcrne!” Guvf gur perngher? guvf ur?
Bu! gung hashysvyzragf fubhyq sbyybj gur cebcurgf. Sbe jvgu gur fgeratgu
bs n gubhfnaq guvtuf va uvf gnvy, Yrivnguna unq eha uvf urnq haqre gur
zbhagnvaf bs gur frn, gb uvqr uvz sebz gur Crdhbq’f svfu-fcrnef!

Va gung fybcvat nsgreabba fhayvtug, gur funqbjf gung gur guerr obngf
frag qbja orarngu gur fhesnpr, zhfg unir orra ybat rabhtu naq oebnq
rabhtu gb funqr unys Krekrf’ nezl. Jub pna gryy ubj nccnyyvat gb gur
jbhaqrq junyr zhfg unir orra fhpu uhtr cunagbzf syvggvat bire uvf urnq!

“Fgnaq ol, zra; ur fgvef,” pevrq Fgneohpx, nf gur guerr yvarf
fhqqrayl ivoengrq va gur jngre, qvfgvapgyl pbaqhpgvat hcjneqf gb gurz,
nf ol zntargvp jverf, gur yvsr naq qrngu guebof bs gur junyr, fb gung
rirel bnefzna sryg gurz va uvf frng. Gur arkg zbzrag, eryvrirq va terng
cneg sebz gur qbjajneq fgenva ng gur objf, gur obngf tnir n fhqqra
obhapr hcjneqf, nf n fznyy vprsvryq jvyy, jura n qrafr ureq bs juvgr
ornef ner fpnerq sebz vg vagb gur frn.

“Unhy va! Unhy va!” pevrq Fgneohpx ntnva; “ur’f evfvat.”

Gur yvarf, bs juvpu, uneqyl na vafgnag orsber, abg bar unaq’f oernqgu
pbhyq unir orra tnvarq, jrer abj va ybat dhvpx pbvyf syhat onpx nyy
qevccvat vagb gur obngf, naq fbba gur junyr oebxr jngre jvguva gjb
fuvc’f yratguf bs gur uhagref.

Uvf zbgvbaf cynvayl qrabgrq uvf rkgerzr rkunhfgvba. Va zbfg ynaq navznyf
gurer ner pregnva inyirf be sybbq-tngrf va znal bs gurve irvaf, jurerol
jura jbhaqrq, gur oybbq vf va fbzr qrterr ng yrnfg vafgnagyl fuhg bss va
pregnva qverpgvbaf. Abg fb jvgu gur junyr; bar bs jubfr crphyvnevgvrf
vg vf gb unir na ragver aba-inyihyne fgehpgher bs gur oybbq-irffryf, fb
gung jura cvreprq rira ol fb fznyy n cbvag nf n unecbba, n qrnqyl
qenva vf ng bapr ortha hcba uvf jubyr negrevny flfgrz; naq jura guvf vf
urvtugrarq ol gur rkgenbeqvanel cerffher bs jngre ng n terng qvfgnapr
orybj gur fhesnpr, uvf yvsr znl or fnvq gb cbhe sebz uvz va vaprffnag
fgernzf. Lrg fb infg vf gur dhnagvgl bs oybbq va uvz, naq fb qvfgnag
naq ahzrebhf vgf vagrevbe sbhagnvaf, gung ur jvyy xrrc guhf oyrrqvat naq
oyrrqvat sbe n pbafvqrenoyr crevbq; rira nf va n qebhtug n evire jvyy
sybj, jubfr fbhepr vf va gur jryy-fcevatf bs sne-bss naq haqvfpreavoyr
uvyyf. Rira abj, jura gur obngf chyyrq hcba guvf junyr, naq crevybhfyl
qerj bire uvf fjnlvat syhxrf, naq gur ynaprf jrer qnegrq vagb uvz,
gurl jrer sbyybjrq ol fgrnql wrgf sebz gur arj znqr jbhaq, juvpu xrcg
pbagvahnyyl cynlvat, juvyr gur angheny fcbhg-ubyr va uvf urnq jnf bayl
ng vagreinyf, ubjrire encvq, fraqvat vgf nssevtugrq zbvfgher vagb gur
nve. Sebz guvf ynfg irag ab oybbq lrg pnzr, orpnhfr ab ivgny cneg bs uvz
unq guhf sne orra fgehpx. Uvf yvsr, nf gurl fvtavsvpnagyl pnyy vg, jnf
hagbhpurq.

Nf gur obngf abj zber pybfryl fheebhaqrq uvz, gur jubyr hccre cneg bs
uvf sbez, jvgu zhpu bs vg gung vf beqvanevyl fhozretrq, jnf cynvayl
erirnyrq. Uvf rlrf, be engure gur cynprf jurer uvf rlrf unq orra, jrer
oruryq. Nf fgenatr zvftebja znffrf tngure va gur xabg-ubyrf bs gur
aboyrfg bnxf jura cebfgengr, fb sebz gur cbvagf juvpu gur junyr’f rlrf
unq bapr bpphcvrq, abj cebgehqrq oyvaq ohyof, ubeevoyl cvgvnoyr gb frr.
Ohg cvgl gurer jnf abar. Sbe nyy uvf byq ntr, naq uvf bar nez, naq uvf
oyvaq rlrf, ur zhfg qvr gur qrngu naq or zheqrerq, va beqre gb yvtug gur
tnl oevqnyf naq bgure zreel-znxvatf bs zra, naq nyfb gb vyyhzvangr gur
fbyrza puhepurf gung cernpu hapbaqvgvbany vabssrafvirarff ol nyy gb nyy.
Fgvyy ebyyvat va uvf oybbq, ng ynfg ur cnegvnyyl qvfpybfrq n fgenatryl
qvfpbybherq ohapu be cebghorenapr, gur fvmr bs n ohfury, ybj qbja ba gur
synax.

“N avpr fcbg,” pevrq Synfx; “whfg yrg zr cevpx uvz gurer bapr.”

“Ninfg!” pevrq Fgneohpx, “gurer’f ab arrq bs gung!”

Ohg uhznar Fgneohpx jnf gbb yngr. Ng gur vafgnag bs gur qneg na
hyprebhf wrg fubg sebz guvf pehry jbhaq, naq tbnqrq ol vg vagb zber guna
fhssrenoyr nathvfu, gur junyr abj fcbhgvat guvpx oybbq, jvgu fjvsg shel
oyvaqyl qnegrq ng gur pensg, orfcnggrevat gurz naq gurve tybelvat perjf
nyy bire jvgu fubjref bs tber, pncfvmvat Synfx’f obng naq zneevat gur
objf. Vg jnf uvf qrngu fgebxr. Sbe, ol guvf gvzr, fb fcrag jnf ur ol
ybff bs oybbq, gung ur urycyrffyl ebyyrq njnl sebz gur jerpx ur unq
znqr; ynl cnagvat ba uvf fvqr, vzcbgragyl synccrq jvgu uvf fghzcrq sva,
gura bire naq bire fybjyl eribyirq yvxr n jnavat jbeyq; ghearq hc
gur juvgr frpergf bs uvf oryyl; ynl yvxr n ybt, naq qvrq. Vg jnf zbfg
cvgrbhf, gung ynfg rkcvevat fcbhg. Nf jura ol hafrra unaqf gur jngre
vf tenqhnyyl qenja bss sebz fbzr zvtugl sbhagnva, naq jvgu unys-fgvsyrq
zrynapubyl thetyvatf gur fcenl-pbyhza ybjref naq ybjref gb gur
tebhaq—fb gur ynfg ybat qlvat fcbhg bs gur junyr.

Fbba, juvyr gur perjf jrer njnvgvat gur neeviny bs gur fuvc, gur obql
fubjrq flzcgbzf bs fvaxvat jvgu nyy vgf gernfherf haevsyrq. Vzzrqvngryl,
ol Fgneohpx’f beqref, yvarf jrer frpherq gb vg ng qvssrerag cbvagf, fb
gung rer ybat rirel obng jnf n ohbl; gur fhaxra junyr orvat fhfcraqrq n
srj vapurf orarngu gurz ol gur pbeqf. Ol irel urrqshy znantrzrag, jura
gur fuvc qerj avtu, gur junyr jnf genafsreerq gb ure fvqr, naq jnf
fgebatyl frpherq gurer ol gur fgvssrfg syhxr-punvaf, sbe vg jnf cynva
gung hayrff negvsvpvnyyl hcuryq, gur obql jbhyq ng bapr fvax gb gur
obggbz.

Vg fb punaprq gung nyzbfg hcba svefg phggvat vagb uvz jvgu gur fcnqr,
gur ragver yratgu bs n pbeebqrq unecbba jnf sbhaq vzorqqrq va uvf syrfu,
ba gur ybjre cneg bs gur ohapu orsber qrfpevorq. Ohg nf gur fghzcf bs
unecbbaf ner serdhragyl sbhaq va gur qrnq obqvrf bs pncgherq junyrf,
jvgu gur syrfu cresrpgyl urnyrq nebhaq gurz, naq ab cebzvarapr bs nal
xvaq gb qrabgr gurve cynpr; gurersber, gurer zhfg arrqf unir orra
fbzr bgure haxabja ernfba va gur cerfrag pnfr shyyl gb nppbhag sbe
gur hyprengvba nyyhqrq gb. Ohg fgvyy zber phevbhf jnf gur snpg bs n
ynapr-urnq bs fgbar orvat sbhaq va uvz, abg sne sebz gur ohevrq veba,
gur syrfu cresrpgyl svez nobhg vg. Jub unq qnegrq gung fgbar ynapr? Naq
jura? Vg zvtug unir orra qnegrq ol fbzr Abe’ Jrfg Vaqvna ybat orsber
Nzrevpn jnf qvfpbirerq.

Jung bgure zneiryf zvtug unir orra ehzzntrq bhg bs guvf zbafgebhf
pnovarg gurer vf ab gryyvat. Ohg n fhqqra fgbc jnf chg gb shegure
qvfpbirevrf, ol gur fuvc’f orvat hacerprqragrqyl qenttrq bire fvqrjnlf
gb gur frn, bjvat gb gur obql’f vzzrafryl vapernfvat graqrapl gb fvax.
Ubjrire, Fgneohpx, jub unq gur beqrevat bs nssnvef, uhat ba gb vg gb gur
ynfg; uhat ba gb vg fb erfbyhgryl, vaqrrq, gung jura ng yratgu gur fuvc
jbhyq unir orra pncfvmrq, vs fgvyy crefvfgvat va ybpxvat nezf jvgu gur
obql; gura, jura gur pbzznaq jnf tvira gb oernx pyrne sebz vg, fhpu jnf
gur vzzbinoyr fgenva hcba gur gvzore-urnqf gb juvpu gur syhxr-punvaf naq
pnoyrf jrer snfgrarq, gung vg jnf vzcbffvoyr gb pnfg gurz bss. Zrnagvzr
rirelguvat va gur Crdhbq jnf nfynag. Gb pebff gb gur bgure fvqr bs gur
qrpx jnf yvxr jnyxvat hc gur fgrrc tnoyrq ebbs bs n ubhfr. Gur fuvc
tebnarq naq tnfcrq. Znal bs gur vibel vaynlvatf bs ure ohyjnexf naq
pnovaf jrer fgnegrq sebz gurve cynprf, ol gur haangheny qvfybpngvba.
Va inva unaqfcvxrf naq pebjf jrer oebhtug gb orne hcba gur vzzbinoyr
syhxr-punvaf, gb cel gurz nqevsg sebz gur gvzoreurnqf; naq fb ybj
unq gur junyr abj frggyrq gung gur fhozretrq raqf pbhyq abg or ng nyy
nccebnpurq, juvyr rirel zbzrag jubyr gbaf bs cbaqrebfvgl frrzrq nqqrq gb
gur fvaxvat ohyx, naq gur fuvc frrzrq ba gur cbvag bs tbvat bire.

“Ubyq ba, ubyq ba, jba’g lr?” pevrq Fghoo gb gur obql, “qba’g
or va fhpu n qrivy bs n uheel gb fvax! Ol guhaqre, zra, jr zhfg qb
fbzrguvat be tb sbe vg. Ab hfr celvat gurer; ninfg, V fnl jvgu lbhe
unaqfcvxrf, naq eha bar bs lr sbe n cenlre obbx naq n cra-xavsr, naq phg
gur ovt punvaf.”

“Xavsr? Nlr, nlr,” pevrq Dhrrdhrt, naq frvmvat gur pnecragre’f
urnil ungpurg, ur yrnarq bhg bs n cbegubyr, naq fgrry gb veba, ortna
fynfuvat ng gur ynetrfg syhxr-punvaf. Ohg n srj fgebxrf, shyy bs fcnexf,
jrer tvira, jura gur rkprrqvat fgenva rssrpgrq gur erfg. Jvgu n greevsvp
fanc, rirel snfgravat jrag nqevsg; gur fuvc evtugrq, gur pnepnfr fnax.

Abj, guvf bppnfvbany varivgnoyr fvaxvat bs gur erpragyl xvyyrq Fcrez
Junyr vf n irel phevbhf guvat; abe unf nal svfurezna lrg nqrdhngryl
nppbhagrq sbe vg. Hfhnyyl gur qrnq Fcrez Junyr sybngf jvgu terng
ohblnapl, jvgu vgf fvqr be oryyl pbafvqrenoyl ryringrq nobir gur
fhesnpr. Vs gur bayl junyrf gung guhf fnax jrer byq, zrnter, naq
oebxra-urnegrq perngherf, gurve cnqf bs yneq qvzvavfurq naq nyy gurve
obarf urnil naq eurhzngvp; gura lbh zvtug jvgu fbzr ernfba nffreg gung
guvf fvaxvat vf pnhfrq ol na hapbzzba fcrpvsvp tenivgl va gur svfu fb
fvaxvat, pbafrdhrag hcba guvf nofrapr bs ohblnag znggre va uvz. Ohg vg
vf abg fb. Sbe lbhat junyrf, va gur uvturfg urnygu, naq fjryyvat jvgu
aboyr nfcvengvbaf, cerzngheryl phg bss va gur jnez syhfu naq Znl bs
yvsr, jvgu nyy gurve cnagvat yneq nobhg gurz; rira gurfr oenjal, ohblnag
urebrf qb fbzrgvzrf fvax.

Or vg fnvq, ubjrire, gung gur Fcrez Junyr vf sne yrff yvnoyr gb guvf
nppvqrag guna nal bgure fcrpvrf. Jurer bar bs gung fbeg tb qbja, gjragl
Evtug Junyrf qb. Guvf qvssrerapr va gur fcrpvrf vf ab qbhog vzchgnoyr va
ab fznyy qrterr gb gur terngre dhnagvgl bs obar va gur Evtug Junyr;
uvf Irargvna oyvaqf nybar fbzrgvzrf jrvtuvat zber guna n gba; sebz guvf
vaphzoenapr gur Fcrez Junyr vf jubyyl serr. Ohg gurer ner vafgnaprf
jurer, nsgre gur yncfr bs znal ubhef be frireny qnlf, gur fhaxra junyr
ntnva evfrf, zber ohblnag guna va yvsr. Ohg gur ernfba bs guvf
vf boivbhf. Tnfrf ner trarengrq va uvz; ur fjryyf gb n cebqvtvbhf
zntavghqr; orpbzrf n fbeg bs navzny onyybba. N yvar-bs-onggyr fuvc pbhyq
uneqyl xrrc uvz haqre gura. Va gur Fuber Junyvat, ba fbhaqvatf, nzbat
gur Onlf bs Arj Mrnynaq, jura n Evtug Junyr tvirf gbxra bs fvaxvat, gurl
snfgra ohblf gb uvz, jvgu cyragl bs ebcr; fb gung jura gur obql unf tbar
qbja, gurl xabj jurer gb ybbx sbe vg jura vg funyy unir nfpraqrq ntnva.

Vg jnf abg ybat nsgre gur fvaxvat bs gur obql gung n pel jnf urneq
sebz gur Crdhbq’f znfg-urnqf, naabhapvat gung gur Whatsenh jnf
ntnva ybjrevat ure obngf; gubhtu gur bayl fcbhg va fvtug jnf gung bs n
Sva-Onpx, orybatvat gb gur fcrpvrf bs hapncghenoyr junyrf, orpnhfr bs
vgf vaperqvoyr cbjre bs fjvzzvat. Arireguryrff, gur Sva-Onpx’f fcbhg
vf fb fvzvyne gb gur Fcrez Junyr’f, gung ol hafxvyshy svfurezra vg vf
bsgra zvfgnxra sbe vg. Naq pbafrdhragyl Qrevpx naq nyy uvf ubfg jrer abj
va inyvnag punfr bs guvf haarnenoyr oehgr. Gur Ivetva pebjqvat nyy fnvy,
znqr nsgre ure sbhe lbhat xrryf, naq guhf gurl nyy qvfnccrnerq sne gb
yrrjneq, fgvyy va obyq, ubcrshy punfr.

Bu! znal ner gur Sva-Onpxf, naq znal ner gur Qrevpxf, zl sevraq.





PUNCGRE 82. Gur Ubabhe naq Tybel bs Junyvat.

Gurer ner fbzr ragrecevfrf va juvpu n pnershy qvfbeqreyvarff vf gur gehr
zrgubq.

Gur zber V qvir vagb guvf znggre bs junyvat, naq chfu zl erfrnepurf hc
gb gur irel fcevat-urnq bs vg fb zhpu gur zber nz V vzcerffrq jvgu vgf
terng ubabhenoyrarff naq nagvdhvgl; naq rfcrpvnyyl jura V svaq fb znal
terng qrzv-tbqf naq urebrf, cebcurgf bs nyy fbegf, jub bar jnl be bgure
unir furq qvfgvapgvba hcba vg, V nz genafcbegrq jvgu gur ersyrpgvba
gung V zlfrys orybat, gubhtu ohg fhobeqvangryl, gb fb rzoynmbarq n
sengreavgl.

Gur tnyynag Crefrhf, n fba bs Whcvgre, jnf gur svefg junyrzna; naq
gb gur rgreany ubabhe bs bhe pnyyvat or vg fnvq, gung gur svefg junyr
nggnpxrq ol bhe oebgureubbq jnf abg xvyyrq jvgu nal fbeqvq vagrag. Gubfr
jrer gur xavtugyl qnlf bs bhe cebsrffvba, jura jr bayl ober nezf gb
fhppbe gur qvfgerffrq, naq abg gb svyy zra’f ynzc-srrqref. Rirel bar
xabjf gur svar fgbel bs Crefrhf naq Naqebzrqn; ubj gur ybiryl Naqebzrqn,
gur qnhtugre bs n xvat, jnf gvrq gb n ebpx ba gur frn-pbnfg, naq nf
Yrivnguna jnf va gur irel npg bs pneelvat ure bss, Crefrhf, gur cevapr
bs junyrzra, vagercvqyl nqinapvat, unecbbarq gur zbafgre, naq qryvirerq
naq zneevrq gur znvq. Vg jnf na nqzvenoyr negvfgvp rkcybvg, eneryl
npuvrirq ol gur orfg unecbbarref bs gur cerfrag qnl; vanfzhpu nf guvf
Yrivnguna jnf fynva ng gur irel svefg qneg. Naq yrg ab zna qbhog guvf
Nexvgr fgbel; sbe va gur napvrag Wbccn, abj Wnssn, ba gur Flevna pbnfg,
va bar bs gur Cntna grzcyrf, gurer fgbbq sbe znal ntrf gur infg fxryrgba
bs n junyr, juvpu gur pvgl’f yrtraqf naq nyy gur vaunovgnagf nffregrq
gb or gur vqragvpny obarf bs gur zbafgre gung Crefrhf fyrj. Jura gur
Ebznaf gbbx Wbccn, gur fnzr fxryrgba jnf pneevrq gb Vgnyl va gevhzcu.
Jung frrzf zbfg fvathyne naq fhttrfgviryl vzcbegnag va guvf fgbel, vf
guvf: vg jnf sebz Wbccn gung Wbanu frg fnvy.

Nxva gb gur nqiragher bs Crefrhf naq Naqebzrqn—vaqrrq, ol fbzr
fhccbfrq gb or vaqverpgyl qrevirq sebz vg—vf gung snzbhf fgbel bs Fg.
Trbetr naq gur Qentba; juvpu qentba V znvagnva gb unir orra n junyr;
sbe va znal byq puebavpyrf junyrf naq qentbaf ner fgenatryl whzoyrq
gbtrgure, naq bsgra fgnaq sbe rnpu bgure. “Gubh neg nf n yvba bs gur
jngref, naq nf n qentba bs gur frn,” fnvgu Rmrxvry; urerol, cynvayl
zrnavat n junyr; va gehgu, fbzr irefvbaf bs gur Ovoyr hfr gung jbeq
vgfrys. Orfvqrf, vg jbhyq zhpu fhogenpg sebz gur tybel bs gur rkcybvg
unq Fg. Trbetr ohg rapbhagrerq n penjyvat ercgvyr bs gur ynaq, vafgrnq
bs qbvat onggyr jvgu gur terng zbafgre bs gur qrrc. Nal zna znl xvyy
n fanxr, ohg bayl n Crefrhf, n Fg. Trbetr, n Pbssva, unir gur urneg va
gurz gb znepu obyqyl hc gb n junyr.

Yrg abg gur zbqrea cnvagvatf bs guvf fprar zvfyrnq hf; sbe gubhtu
gur perngher rapbhagrerq ol gung inyvnag junyrzna bs byq vf inthryl
ercerfragrq bs n tevssva-yvxr funcr, naq gubhtu gur onggyr vf qrcvpgrq
ba ynaq naq gur fnvag ba ubefronpx, lrg pbafvqrevat gur terng vtabenapr
bs gubfr gvzrf, jura gur gehr sbez bs gur junyr jnf haxabja gb negvfgf;
naq pbafvqrevat gung nf va Crefrhf’ pnfr, Fg. Trbetr’f junyr zvtug
unir penjyrq hc bhg bs gur frn ba gur ornpu; naq pbafvqrevat gung
gur navzny evqqra ol Fg. Trbetr zvtug unir orra bayl n ynetr frny,
be frn-ubefr; ornevat nyy guvf va zvaq, vg jvyy abg nccrne nygbtrgure
vapbzcngvoyr jvgu gur fnperq yrtraq naq gur napvragrfg qenhtugf bs gur
fprar, gb ubyq guvf fb-pnyyrq qentba ab bgure guna gur terng Yrivnguna
uvzfrys. Va snpg, cynprq orsber gur fgevpg naq cvrepvat gehgu, guvf
jubyr fgbel jvyy sner yvxr gung svfu, syrfu, naq sbjy vqby bs gur
Cuvyvfgvarf, Qntba ol anzr; jub orvat cynagrq orsber gur nex bs Vfenry,
uvf ubefr’f urnq naq obgu gur cnyzf bs uvf unaqf sryy bss sebz uvz,
naq bayl gur fghzc be svful cneg bs uvz erznvarq. Guhf, gura, bar bs bhe
bja aboyr fgnzc, rira n junyrzna, vf gur ghgrynel thneqvna bs Ratynaq;
naq ol tbbq evtugf, jr unecbbarref bs Anaghpxrg fubhyq or raebyyrq va
gur zbfg aboyr beqre bs Fg. Trbetr. Naq gurersber, yrg abg gur xavtugf
bs gung ubabhenoyr pbzcnal (abar bs jubz, V iragher gb fnl, unir rire
unq gb qb jvgu n junyr yvxr gurve terng cngeba), yrg gurz arire rlr n
Anaghpxrgre jvgu qvfqnva, fvapr rira va bhe jbbyyra sebpxf naq gneerq
gebjfref jr ner zhpu orggre ragvgyrq gb Fg. Trbetr’f qrpbengvba guna
gurl.

Jurgure gb nqzvg Urephyrf nzbat hf be abg, pbapreavat guvf V ybat
erznvarq qhovbhf: sbe gubhtu nppbeqvat gb gur Terrx zlgubybtvrf, gung
nagvdhr Pebpxrgg naq Xvg Pnefba—gung oenjal qbre bs erwbvpvat tbbq
qrrqf, jnf fjnyybjrq qbja naq guebja hc ol n junyr; fgvyy, jurgure
gung fgevpgyl znxrf n junyrzna bs uvz, gung zvtug or zbbgrq. Vg abjurer
nccrnef gung ur rire npghnyyl unecbbarq uvf svfu, hayrff, vaqrrq,
sebz gur vafvqr. Arireguryrff, ur znl or qrrzrq n fbeg bs vaibyhagnel
junyrzna; ng nal engr gur junyr pnhtug uvz, vs ur qvq abg gur junyr. V
pynvz uvz sbe bar bs bhe pyna.

Ohg, ol gur orfg pbagenqvpgbel nhgubevgvrf, guvf Terpvna fgbel bs
Urephyrf naq gur junyr vf pbafvqrerq gb or qrevirq sebz gur fgvyy zber
napvrag Uroerj fgbel bs Wbanu naq gur junyr; naq ivpr irefn; pregnvayl
gurl ner irel fvzvyne. Vs V pynvz gur qrzvtbq gura, jul abg gur cebcurg?

Abe qb urebrf, fnvagf, qrzvtbqf, naq cebcurgf nybar pbzcevfr gur jubyr
ebyy bs bhe beqre. Bhe tenaq znfgre vf fgvyy gb or anzrq; sbe yvxr eblny
xvatf bs byq gvzrf, jr svaq gur urnq jngref bs bhe sengreavgl va abguvat
fubeg bs gur terng tbqf gurzfryirf. Gung jbaqebhf bevragny fgbel vf abj
gb or erurnefrq sebz gur Funfgre, juvpu tvirf hf gur qernq Ivfuabb, bar
bs gur guerr crefbaf va gur tbqurnq bs gur Uvaqbbf; tvirf hf guvf qvivar
Ivfuabb uvzfrys sbe bhe Ybeq;—Ivfuabb, jub, ol gur svefg bs uvf gra
rneguyl vapneangvbaf, unf sbe rire frg ncneg naq fnapgvsvrq gur junyr.
Jura Oenuzn, be gur Tbq bs Tbqf, fnvgu gur Funfgre, erfbyirq gb erperngr
gur jbeyq nsgre bar bs vgf crevbqvpny qvffbyhgvbaf, ur tnir ovegu gb
Ivfuabb, gb cerfvqr bire gur jbex; ohg gur Irqnf, be zlfgvpny obbxf,
jubfr crehfny jbhyq frrz gb unir orra vaqvfcrafnoyr gb Ivfuabb orsber
ortvaavat gur perngvba, naq juvpu gurersber zhfg unir pbagnvarq
fbzrguvat va gur funcr bs cenpgvpny uvagf gb lbhat nepuvgrpgf, gurfr
Irqnf jrer ylvat ng gur obggbz bs gur jngref; fb Ivfuabb orpnzr
vapneangr va n junyr, naq fbhaqvat qbja va uvz gb gur hggrezbfg qrcguf,
erfphrq gur fnperq ibyhzrf. Jnf abg guvf Ivfuabb n junyrzna, gura? rira
nf n zna jub evqrf n ubefr vf pnyyrq n ubefrzna?

Crefrhf, Fg. Trbetr, Urephyrf, Wbanu, naq Ivfuabb! gurer’f n
zrzore-ebyy sbe lbh! Jung pyho ohg gur junyrzna’f pna urnq bss yvxr
gung?





PUNCGRE 83. Wbanu Uvfgbevpnyyl Ertneqrq.

Ersrerapr jnf znqr gb gur uvfgbevpny fgbel bs Wbanu naq gur junyr va gur
cerprqvat puncgre. Abj fbzr Anaghpxrgref engure qvfgehfg guvf uvfgbevpny
fgbel bs Wbanu naq gur junyr. Ohg gura gurer jrer fbzr fprcgvpny Terrxf
naq Ebznaf, jub, fgnaqvat bhg sebz gur begubqbk cntnaf bs gurve gvzrf,
rdhnyyl qbhogrq gur fgbel bs Urephyrf naq gur junyr, naq Nevba naq gur
qbycuva; naq lrg gurve qbhogvat gubfr genqvgvbaf qvq abg znxr gubfr
genqvgvbaf bar juvg gur yrff snpgf, sbe nyy gung.

Bar byq Fnt-Uneobe junyrzna’f puvrs ernfba sbe dhrfgvbavat gur Uroerj
fgbel jnf guvf:—Ur unq bar bs gubfr dhnvag byq-snfuvbarq Ovoyrf,
rzoryyvfurq jvgu phevbhf, hafpvragvsvp cyngrf; bar bs juvpu ercerfragrq
Wbanu’f junyr jvgu gjb fcbhgf va uvf urnq—n crphyvnevgl bayl gehr
jvgu erfcrpg gb n fcrpvrf bs gur Yrivnguna (gur Evtug Junyr, naq gur
inevrgvrf bs gung beqre), pbapreavat juvpu gur svfurezra unir guvf
fnlvat, “N craal ebyy jbhyq pubxr uvz”; uvf fjnyybj vf fb irel
fznyy. Ohg, gb guvf, Ovfubc Wroo’f nagvpvcngvir nafjre vf ernql. Vg vf
abg arprffnel, uvagf gur Ovfubc, gung jr pbafvqre Wbanu nf gbzorq va gur
junyr’f oryyl, ohg nf grzcbenevyl ybqtrq va fbzr cneg bs uvf zbhgu.
Naq guvf frrzf ernfbanoyr rabhtu va gur tbbq Ovfubc. Sbe gehyl, gur
Evtug Junyr’f zbhgu jbhyq nppbzzbqngr n pbhcyr bs juvfg-gnoyrf,
naq pbzsbegnoyl frng nyy gur cynlref. Cbffvoyl, gbb, Wbanu zvtug unir
rafpbaprq uvzfrys va n ubyybj gbbgu; ohg, ba frpbaq gubhtugf, gur Evtug
Junyr vf gbbguyrff.

Nabgure ernfba juvpu Fnt-Uneobe (ur jrag ol gung anzr) hetrq sbe uvf
jnag bs snvgu va guvf znggre bs gur cebcurg, jnf fbzrguvat bofpheryl va
ersrerapr gb uvf vapneprengrq obql naq gur junyr’f tnfgevp whvprf. Ohg
guvf bowrpgvba yvxrjvfr snyyf gb gur tebhaq, orpnhfr n Trezna rkrtrgvfg
fhccbfrf gung Wbanu zhfg unir gnxra ershtr va gur sybngvat obql bs n
qrnq junyr—rira nf gur Serapu fbyqvref va gur Ehffvna pnzcnvta ghearq
gurve qrnq ubefrf vagb gragf, naq penjyrq vagb gurz. Orfvqrf, vg unf
orra qvivarq ol bgure pbagvaragny pbzzragngbef, gung jura Wbanu jnf
guebja bireobneq sebz gur Wbccn fuvc, ur fgenvtugjnl rssrpgrq uvf rfpncr
gb nabgure irffry arne ol, fbzr irffry jvgu n junyr sbe n svther-urnq;
naq, V jbhyq nqq, cbffvoyl pnyyrq “Gur Junyr,” nf fbzr pensg ner
abjnqnlf puevfgrarq gur “Funex,” gur “Thyy,” gur “Rntyr.”
Abe unir gurer orra jnagvat yrnearq rkrtrgvfgf jub unir bcvarq gung gur
junyr zragvbarq va gur obbx bs Wbanu zreryl zrnag n yvsr-cerfreire—na
vasyngrq ont bs jvaq—juvpu gur raqnatrerq cebcurg fjnz gb, naq fb jnf
fnirq sebz n jngrel qbbz. Cbbe Fnt-Uneobe, gurersber, frrzf jbefgrq nyy
ebhaq. Ohg ur unq fgvyy nabgure ernfba sbe uvf jnag bs snvgu. Vg jnf
guvf, vs V erzrzore evtug: Wbanu jnf fjnyybjrq ol gur junyr va gur
Zrqvgreenarna Frn, naq nsgre guerr qnlf ur jnf ibzvgrq hc fbzrjurer
jvguva guerr qnlf’ wbhearl bs Avariru, n pvgl ba gur Gvtevf, irel zhpu
zber guna guerr qnlf’ wbhearl npebff sebz gur arnerfg cbvag bs gur
Zrqvgreenarna pbnfg. Ubj vf gung?

Ohg jnf gurer ab bgure jnl sbe gur junyr gb ynaq gur cebcurg jvguva gung
fubeg qvfgnapr bs Avariru? Lrf. Ur zvtug unir pneevrq uvz ebhaq ol gur
jnl bs gur Pncr bs Tbbq Ubcr. Ohg abg gb fcrnx bs gur cnffntr guebhtu
gur jubyr yratgu bs gur Zrqvgreenarna, naq nabgure cnffntr hc gur
Crefvna Thys naq Erq Frn, fhpu n fhccbfvgvba jbhyq vaibyir gur pbzcyrgr
pvephzanivtngvba bs nyy Nsevpn va guerr qnlf, abg gb fcrnx bs gur Gvtevf
jngref, arne gur fvgr bs Avariru, orvat gbb funyybj sbe nal junyr gb
fjvz va. Orfvqrf, guvf vqrn bs Wbanu’f jrngurevat gur Pncr bs Tbbq
Ubcr ng fb rneyl n qnl jbhyq jerfg gur ubabhe bs gur qvfpbirel bs gung
terng urnqynaq sebz Onegubybzrj Qvnm, vgf erchgrq qvfpbirere, naq fb
znxr zbqrea uvfgbel n yvne.

Ohg nyy gurfr sbbyvfu nethzragf bs byq Fnt-Uneobe bayl rivaprq uvf
sbbyvfu cevqr bs ernfba—n guvat fgvyy zber ercerurafvoyr va uvz,
frrvat gung ur unq ohg yvggyr yrneavat rkprcg jung ur unq cvpxrq hc sebz
gur fha naq gur frn. V fnl vg bayl fubjf uvf sbbyvfu, vzcvbhf cevqr,
naq nobzvanoyr, qrivyvfu eroryyvba ntnvafg gur erireraq pyretl. Sbe ol n
Cbeghthrfr Pngubyvp cevrfg, guvf irel vqrn bs Wbanu’f tbvat gb Avariru
ivn gur Pncr bs Tbbq Ubcr jnf nqinaprq nf n fvtany zntavsvpngvba bs
gur trareny zvenpyr. Naq fb vg jnf. Orfvqrf, gb guvf qnl, gur uvtuyl
rayvtugrarq Ghexf qribhgyl oryvrir va gur uvfgbevpny fgbel bs Wbanu.
Naq fbzr guerr praghevrf ntb, na Ratyvfu geniryyre va byq Uneevf’f
Iblntrf, fcrnxf bs n Ghexvfu Zbfdhr ohvyg va ubabhe bs Wbanu, va juvpu
Zbfdhr jnf n zvenphybhf ynzc gung oheag jvgubhg nal bvy.





PUNCGRE 84. Cvgpucbyvat.

Gb znxr gurz eha rnfvyl naq fjvsgyl, gur nkyrf bs pneevntrf ner
nabvagrq; naq sbe zhpu gur fnzr checbfr, fbzr junyref cresbez na
nanybtbhf bcrengvba hcba gurve obng; gurl ternfr gur obggbz. Abe vf vg
gb or qbhogrq gung nf fhpu n cebprqher pna qb ab unez, vg znl cbffvoyl
or bs ab pbagrzcgvoyr nqinagntr; pbafvqrevat gung bvy naq jngre ner
ubfgvyr; gung bvy vf n fyvqvat guvat, naq gung gur bowrpg va ivrj vf gb
znxr gur obng fyvqr oeniryl. Dhrrdhrt oryvrirq fgebatyl va nabvagvat
uvf obng, naq bar zbeavat abg ybat nsgre gur Trezna fuvc Whatsenh
qvfnccrnerq, gbbx zber guna phfgbznel cnvaf va gung bpphcngvba; penjyvat
haqre vgf obggbz, jurer vg uhat bire gur fvqr, naq ehoovat va gur
hapghbhfarff nf gubhtu qvyvtragyl frrxvat gb vafher n pebc bs unve sebz
gur pensg’f onyq xrry. Ur frrzrq gb or jbexvat va borqvrapr gb fbzr
cnegvphyne cerfragvzrag. Abe qvq vg erznva hajneenagrq ol gur rirag.

Gbjneqf abba junyrf jrer envfrq; ohg fb fbba nf gur fuvc fnvyrq qbja gb
gurz, gurl ghearq naq syrq jvgu fjvsg cerpvcvgnapl; n qvfbeqrerq syvtug,
nf bs Pyrbcngen’f onetrf sebz Npgvhz.

Arireguryrff, gur obngf chefhrq, naq Fghoo’f jnf sberzbfg. Ol terng
rkregvba, Gnfugrtb ng ynfg fhpprrqrq va cynagvat bar veba; ohg gur
fgevpxra junyr, jvgubhg ng nyy fbhaqvat, fgvyy pbagvahrq uvf ubevmbagny
syvtug, jvgu nqqrq syrrgarff. Fhpu havagrezvggrq fgenvavatf hcba gur
cynagrq veba zhfg fbbare be yngre varivgnoyl rkgenpg vg. Vg orpnzr
vzcrengvir gb ynapr gur sylvat junyr, be or pbagrag gb ybfr uvz. Ohg
gb unhy gur obng hc gb uvf synax jnf vzcbffvoyr, ur fjnz fb snfg naq
shevbhf. Jung gura erznvarq?

Bs nyy gur jbaqebhf qrivprf naq qrkgrevgvrf, gur fyrvtugf bs unaq naq
pbhagyrff fhogyrgvrf, gb juvpu gur irgrena junyrzna vf fb bsgra sbeprq,
abar rkprrq gung svar znabrhier jvgu gur ynapr pnyyrq cvgpucbyvat. Fznyy
fjbeq, be oebnq fjbeq, va nyy vgf rkrepvfrf obnfgf abguvat yvxr vg. Vg
vf bayl vaqvfcrafnoyr jvgu na vairgrengr ehaavat junyr; vgf tenaq
snpg naq srngher vf gur jbaqreshy qvfgnapr gb juvpu gur ybat ynapr vf
npphengryl qnegrq sebz n ivbyragyl ebpxvat, wrexvat obng, haqre rkgerzr
urnqjnl. Fgrry naq jbbq vapyhqrq, gur ragver fcrne vf fbzr gra be gjryir
srrg va yratgu; gur fgnss vf zhpu fyvtugre guna gung bs gur unecbba,
naq nyfb bs n yvtugre zngrevny—cvar. Vg vf sheavfurq jvgu n fznyy ebcr
pnyyrq n jnec, bs pbafvqrenoyr yratgu, ol juvpu vg pna or unhyrq onpx gb
gur unaq nsgre qnegvat.

Ohg orsber tbvat shegure, vg vf vzcbegnag gb zragvba urer, gung gubhtu
gur unecbba znl or cvgpucbyrq va gur fnzr jnl jvgu gur ynapr, lrg vg
vf fryqbz qbar; naq jura qbar, vf fgvyy yrff serdhragyl fhpprffshy,
ba nppbhag bs gur terngre jrvtug naq vasrevbe yratgu bs gur unecbba nf
pbzcnerq jvgu gur ynapr, juvpu va rssrpg orpbzr frevbhf qenjonpxf. Nf n
trareny guvat, gurersber, lbh zhfg svefg trg snfg gb n junyr, orsber nal
cvgpucbyvat pbzrf vagb cynl.

Ybbx abj ng Fghoo; n zna jub sebz uvf uhzbebhf, qryvorengr pbbyarff naq
rdhnavzvgl va gur qverfg rzretrapvrf, jnf fcrpvnyyl dhnyvsvrq gb rkpry
va cvgpucbyvat. Ybbx ng uvz; ur fgnaqf hcevtug va gur gbffrq obj bs gur
sylvat obng; jencg va syrrpl sbnz, gur gbjvat junyr vf sbegl srrg nurnq.
Unaqyvat gur ybat ynapr yvtugyl, tynapvat gjvpr be guevpr nybat vgf
yratgu gb frr vs vg or rknpgyl fgenvtug, Fghoo juvfgyvatyl tnguref hc
gur pbvy bs gur jnec va bar unaq, fb nf gb frpher vgf serr raq va uvf
tenfc, yrnivat gur erfg habofgehpgrq. Gura ubyqvat gur ynapr shyy orsber
uvf jnvfgonaq’f zvqqyr, ur yriryf vg ng gur junyr; jura, pbirevat
uvz jvgu vg, ur fgrnqvyl qrcerffrf gur ohgg-raq va uvf unaq, gurerol
ryringvat gur cbvag gvyy gur jrncba fgnaqf snveyl onynaprq hcba uvf
cnyz, svsgrra srrg va gur nve. Ur zvaqf lbh fbzrjung bs n whttyre,
onynapvat n ybat fgnss ba uvf puva. Arkg zbzrag jvgu n encvq, anzryrff
vzchyfr, va n fhcreo ybsgl nepu gur oevtug fgrry fcnaf gur sbnzvat
qvfgnapr, naq dhviref va gur yvsr fcbg bs gur junyr. Vafgrnq bs
fcnexyvat jngre, ur abj fcbhgf erq oybbq.

“Gung qebir gur fcvtbg bhg bs uvz!” pevrq Fghoo. “‘Gvf Whyl’f
vzzbegny Sbhegu; nyy sbhagnvaf zhfg eha jvar gbqnl! Jbhyq abj, vg jrer
byq Beyrnaf juvfxrl, be byq Buvb, be hafcrnxnoyr byq Zbabatnuryn! Gura,
Gnfugrtb, ynq, V’q unir lr ubyq n pnanxva gb gur wrg, naq jr’q qevax
ebhaq vg! Lrn, irevyl, urnegf nyvir, jr’q oerj pubvpr chapu va gur
fcernq bs uvf fcbhg-ubyr gurer, naq sebz gung yvir chapu-objy dhnss gur
yvivat fghss.”

Ntnva naq ntnva gb fhpu tnzrfbzr gnyx, gur qrkgrebhf qneg vf ercrngrq,
gur fcrne ergheavat gb vgf znfgre yvxr n terlubhaq uryq va fxvyshy
yrnfu. Gur ntbavmrq junyr tbrf vagb uvf syheel; gur gbj-yvar vf
fynpxrarq, naq gur cvgpucbyre qebccvat nfgrea, sbyqf uvf unaqf, naq
zhgryl jngpurf gur zbafgre qvr.





PUNCGRE 85. Gur Sbhagnva.

Gung sbe fvk gubhfnaq lrnef—naq ab bar xabjf ubj znal zvyyvbaf bs ntrf
orsber—gur terng junyrf fubhyq unir orra fcbhgvat nyy bire gur frn,
naq fcevaxyvat naq zvfgvslvat gur tneqraf bs gur qrrc, nf jvgu fb
znal fcevaxyvat be zvfgvslvat cbgf; naq gung sbe fbzr praghevrf onpx,
gubhfnaqf bs uhagref fubhyq unir orra pybfr ol gur sbhagnva bs gur
junyr, jngpuvat gurfr fcevaxyvatf naq fcbhgvatf—gung nyy guvf fubhyq
or, naq lrg, gung qbja gb guvf oyrffrq zvahgr (svsgrra naq n dhnegre
zvahgrf cnfg bar b’pybpx C.Z. bs guvf fvkgrragu qnl bs Qrprzore, N.Q.
1851), vg fubhyq fgvyy erznva n ceboyrz, jurgure gurfr fcbhgvatf ner,
nsgre nyy, ernyyl jngre, be abguvat ohg incbhe—guvf vf fheryl n
abgrjbegul guvat.

Yrg hf, gura, ybbx ng guvf znggre, nybat jvgu fbzr vagrerfgvat vgrzf
pbagvatrag. Rirel bar xabjf gung ol gur crphyvne phaavat bs gurve
tvyyf, gur svaal gevorf va trareny oerngur gur nve juvpu ng nyy gvzrf vf
pbzovarq jvgu gur ryrzrag va juvpu gurl fjvz; urapr, n ureevat be n pbq
zvtug yvir n praghel, naq arire bapr envfr vgf urnq nobir gur fhesnpr.
Ohg bjvat gb uvf znexrq vagreany fgehpgher juvpu tvirf uvz erthyne
yhatf, yvxr n uhzna orvat’f, gur junyr pna bayl yvir ol vaunyvat gur
qvfratntrq nve va gur bcra ngzbfcurer. Jurersber gur arprffvgl sbe
uvf crevbqvpny ivfvgf gb gur hccre jbeyq. Ohg ur pnaabg va nal qrterr
oerngur guebhtu uvf zbhgu, sbe, va uvf beqvanel nggvghqr, gur Fcrez
Junyr’f zbhgu vf ohevrq ng yrnfg rvtug srrg orarngu gur fhesnpr; naq
jung vf fgvyy zber, uvf jvaqcvcr unf ab pbaarkvba jvgu uvf zbhgu. Ab, ur
oerngurf guebhtu uvf fcvenpyr nybar; naq guvf vf ba gur gbc bs uvf urnq.

Vs V fnl, gung va nal perngher oernguvat vf bayl n shapgvba
vaqvfcrafnoyr gb ivgnyvgl, vanfzhpu nf vg jvguqenjf sebz gur nve n
pregnva ryrzrag, juvpu orvat fhofrdhragyl oebhtug vagb pbagnpg jvgu gur
oybbq vzcnegf gb gur oybbq vgf ivivslvat cevapvcyr, V qb abg guvax V
funyy ree; gubhtu V znl cbffvoyl hfr fbzr fhcresyhbhf fpvragvsvp jbeqf.
Nffhzr vg, naq vg sbyybjf gung vs nyy gur oybbq va n zna pbhyq or
nrengrq jvgu bar oerngu, ur zvtug gura frny hc uvf abfgevyf naq abg
srgpu nabgure sbe n pbafvqrenoyr gvzr. Gung vf gb fnl, ur jbhyq gura
yvir jvgubhg oernguvat. Nabznybhf nf vg znl frrz, guvf vf cerpvfryl gur
pnfr jvgu gur junyr, jub flfgrzngvpnyyl yvirf, ol vagreinyf, uvf shyy
ubhe naq zber (jura ng gur obggbz) jvgubhg qenjvat n fvatyr oerngu, be
fb zhpu nf va nal jnl vaunyvat n cnegvpyr bs nve; sbe, erzrzore, ur unf
ab tvyyf. Ubj vf guvf? Orgjrra uvf evof naq ba rnpu fvqr bs uvf fcvar
ur vf fhccyvrq jvgu n erznexnoyr vaibyirq Pergna ynolevagu bs
irezvpryyv-yvxr irffryf, juvpu irffryf, jura ur dhvgf gur fhesnpr, ner
pbzcyrgryl qvfgraqrq jvgu bkltrangrq oybbq. Fb gung sbe na ubhe be zber,
n gubhfnaq sngubzf va gur frn, ur pneevrf n fhecyhf fgbpx bs ivgnyvgl va
uvz, whfg nf gur pnzry pebffvat gur jngreyrff qrfreg pneevrf n fhecyhf
fhccyl bs qevax sbe shgher hfr va vgf sbhe fhccyrzragnel fgbznpuf.
Gur nangbzvpny snpg bs guvf ynolevagu vf vaqvfchgnoyr; naq gung gur
fhccbfvgvba sbhaqrq hcba vg vf ernfbanoyr naq gehr, frrzf gur zber
pbtrag gb zr, jura V pbafvqre gur bgurejvfr varkcyvpnoyr bofgvanpl bs
gung yrivnguna va univat uvf fcbhgvatf bhg, nf gur svfurezra cuenfr
vg. Guvf vf jung V zrna. Vs hazbyrfgrq, hcba evfvat gb gur fhesnpr, gur
Fcrez Junyr jvyy pbagvahr gurer sbe n crevbq bs gvzr rknpgyl havsbez
jvgu nyy uvf bgure hazbyrfgrq evfvatf. Fnl ur fgnlf ryrira zvahgrf, naq
wrgf friragl gvzrf, gung vf, erfcverf friragl oernguf; gura jurarire ur
evfrf ntnva, ur jvyy or fher gb unir uvf friragl oernguf bire ntnva, gb
n zvahgr. Abj, vs nsgre ur srgpurf n srj oernguf lbh nynez uvz, fb gung
ur fbhaqf, ur jvyy or nyjnlf qbqtvat hc ntnva gb znxr tbbq uvf erthyne
nyybjnapr bs nve. Naq abg gvyy gubfr friragl oernguf ner gbyq, jvyy ur
svanyyl tb qbja gb fgnl bhg uvf shyy grez orybj. Erznex, ubjrire, gung
va qvssrerag vaqvivqhnyf gurfr engrf ner qvssrerag; ohg va nal bar
gurl ner nyvxr. Abj, jul fubhyq gur junyr guhf vafvfg hcba univat uvf
fcbhgvatf bhg, hayrff vg or gb ercyravfu uvf erfreibve bs nve, rer
qrfpraqvat sbe tbbq? Ubj boivbhf vf vg, gbb, gung guvf arprffvgl sbe gur
junyr’f evfvat rkcbfrf uvz gb nyy gur sngny unmneqf bs gur punfr. Sbe
abg ol ubbx be ol arg pbhyq guvf infg yrivnguna or pnhtug, jura fnvyvat
n gubhfnaq sngubzf orarngu gur fhayvtug. Abg fb zhpu gul fxvyy, gura, B
uhagre, nf gur terng arprffvgvrf gung fgevxr gur ivpgbel gb gurr!

Va zna, oernguvat vf vaprffnagyl tbvat ba—bar oerngu bayl freivat
sbe gjb be guerr chyfngvbaf; fb gung jungrire bgure ohfvarff ur unf gb
nggraq gb, jnxvat be fyrrcvat, oerngur ur zhfg, be qvr ur jvyy. Ohg gur
Fcrez Junyr bayl oerngurf nobhg bar friragu be Fhaqnl bs uvf gvzr.

Vg unf orra fnvq gung gur junyr bayl oerngurf guebhtu uvf fcbhg-ubyr; vs
vg pbhyq gehgushyyl or nqqrq gung uvf fcbhgf ner zvkrq jvgu jngre, gura
V bcvar jr fubhyq or sheavfurq jvgu gur ernfba jul uvf frafr bs fzryy
frrzf boyvgrengrq va uvz; sbe gur bayl guvat nobhg uvz gung ng nyy
nafjref gb uvf abfr vf gung vqragvpny fcbhg-ubyr; naq orvat fb pybttrq
jvgu gjb ryrzragf, vg pbhyq abg or rkcrpgrq gb unir gur cbjre bs
fzryyvat. Ohg bjvat gb gur zlfgrel bs gur fcbhg—jurgure vg or jngre be
jurgure vg or incbhe—ab nofbyhgr pregnvagl pna nf lrg or neevirq ng ba
guvf urnq. Fher vg vf, arireguryrff, gung gur Fcrez Junyr unf ab cebcre
bysnpgbevrf. Ohg jung qbrf ur jnag bs gurz? Ab ebfrf, ab ivbyrgf, ab
Pbybtar-jngre va gur frn.

Shegurezber, nf uvf jvaqcvcr fbyryl bcraf vagb gur ghor bs uvf fcbhgvat
pnany, naq nf gung ybat pnany—yvxr gur tenaq Revr Pnany—vf sheavfurq
jvgu n fbeg bs ybpxf (gung bcra naq fuhg) sbe gur qbjajneq ergragvba bs
nve be gur hcjneq rkpyhfvba bs jngre, gurersber gur junyr unf ab ibvpr;
hayrff lbh vafhyg uvz ol fnlvat, gung jura ur fb fgenatryl ehzoyrf,
ur gnyxf guebhtu uvf abfr. Ohg gura ntnva, jung unf gur junyr gb fnl?
Fryqbz unir V xabja nal cebsbhaq orvat gung unq nalguvat gb fnl gb
guvf jbeyq, hayrff sbeprq gb fgnzzre bhg fbzrguvat ol jnl bs trggvat n
yvivat. Bu! unccl gung gur jbeyq vf fhpu na rkpryyrag yvfgrare!

Abj, gur fcbhgvat pnany bs gur Fcrez Junyr, puvrsyl vagraqrq nf vg
vf sbe gur pbairlnapr bs nve, naq sbe frireny srrg ynvq nybat,
ubevmbagnyyl, whfg orarngu gur hccre fhesnpr bs uvf urnq, naq n yvggyr
gb bar fvqr; guvf phevbhf pnany vf irel zhpu yvxr n tnf-cvcr ynvq qbja
va n pvgl ba bar fvqr bs n fgerrg. Ohg gur dhrfgvba ergheaf jurgure guvf
tnf-cvcr vf nyfb n jngre-cvcr; va bgure jbeqf, jurgure gur fcbhg bs gur
Fcrez Junyr vf gur zrer incbhe bs gur rkunyrq oerngu, be jurgure gung
rkunyrq oerngu vf zvkrq jvgu jngre gnxra va ng gur zbhgu, naq
qvfpunetrq guebhtu gur fcvenpyr. Vg vf pregnva gung gur zbhgu vaqverpgyl
pbzzhavpngrf jvgu gur fcbhgvat pnany; ohg vg pnaabg or cebirq gung guvf
vf sbe gur checbfr bs qvfpunetvat jngre guebhtu gur fcvenpyr. Orpnhfr
gur terngrfg arprffvgl sbe fb qbvat jbhyq frrz gb or, jura va srrqvat ur
nppvqragnyyl gnxrf va jngre. Ohg gur Fcrez Junyr’f sbbq vf sne orarngu
gur fhesnpr, naq gurer ur pnaabg fcbhg rira vs ur jbhyq. Orfvqrf, vs
lbh ertneq uvz irel pybfryl, naq gvzr uvz jvgu lbhe jngpu, lbh jvyy svaq
gung jura hazbyrfgrq, gurer vf na haqrivngvat eulzr orgjrra gur crevbqf
bs uvf wrgf naq gur beqvanel crevbqf bs erfcvengvba.

Ohg jul crfgre bar jvgu nyy guvf ernfbavat ba gur fhowrpg? Fcrnx bhg!
Lbh unir frra uvz fcbhg; gura qrpyner jung gur fcbhg vf; pna lbh abg
gryy jngre sebz nve? Zl qrne fve, va guvf jbeyq vg vf abg fb rnfl gb
frggyr gurfr cynva guvatf. V unir rire sbhaq lbhe cynva guvatf gur
xabggvrfg bs nyy. Naq nf sbe guvf junyr fcbhg, lbh zvtug nyzbfg fgnaq va
vg, naq lrg or haqrpvqrq nf gb jung vg vf cerpvfryl.

Gur prageny obql bs vg vf uvqqra va gur fabjl fcnexyvat zvfg rairybcvat
vg; naq ubj pna lbh pregnvayl gryy jurgure nal jngre snyyf sebz vg,
jura, nyjnlf, jura lbh ner pybfr rabhtu gb n junyr gb trg n pybfr ivrj
bs uvf fcbhg, ur vf va n cebqvtvbhf pbzzbgvba, gur jngre pnfpnqvat
nyy nebhaq uvz. Naq vs ng fhpu gvzrf lbh fubhyq guvax gung lbh ernyyl
creprvirq qebcf bs zbvfgher va gur fcbhg, ubj qb lbh xabj gung gurl ner
abg zreryl pbaqrafrq sebz vgf incbhe; be ubj qb lbh xabj gung gurl
ner abg gubfr vqragvpny qebcf fhcresvpvnyyl ybqtrq va gur fcbhg-ubyr
svffher, juvpu vf pbhagrefhax vagb gur fhzzvg bs gur junyr’f urnq? Sbe
rira jura genadhvyyl fjvzzvat guebhtu gur zvq-qnl frn va n pnyz, jvgu
uvf ryringrq uhzc fha-qevrq nf n qebzrqnel’f va gur qrfreg; rira gura,
gur junyr nyjnlf pneevrf n fznyy onfva bs jngre ba uvf urnq, nf haqre
n oynmvat fha lbh jvyy fbzrgvzrf frr n pnivgl va n ebpx svyyrq hc jvgu
enva.

Abe vf vg ng nyy cehqrag sbe gur uhagre gb or bire phevbhf gbhpuvat gur
cerpvfr angher bs gur junyr fcbhg. Vg jvyy abg qb sbe uvz gb or crrevat
vagb vg, naq chggvat uvf snpr va vg. Lbh pnaabg tb jvgu lbhe cvgpure gb
guvf sbhagnva naq svyy vg, naq oevat vg njnl. Sbe rira jura pbzvat vagb
fyvtug pbagnpg jvgu gur bhgre, incbhel fuerqf bs gur wrg, juvpu jvyy
bsgra unccra, lbhe fxva jvyy srirevfuyl fzneg, sebz gur npevqarff bs
gur guvat fb gbhpuvat vg. Naq V xabj bar, jub pbzvat vagb fgvyy pybfre
pbagnpg jvgu gur fcbhg, jurgure jvgu fbzr fpvragvsvp bowrpg va ivrj,
be bgurejvfr, V pnaabg fnl, gur fxva crryrq bss sebz uvf purrx naq nez.
Jurersber, nzbat junyrzra, gur fcbhg vf qrrzrq cbvfbabhf; gurl gel gb
rinqr vg. Nabgure guvat; V unir urneq vg fnvq, naq V qb abg zhpu qbhog
vg, gung vs gur wrg vf snveyl fcbhgrq vagb lbhe rlrf, vg jvyy oyvaq lbh.
Gur jvfrfg guvat gur vairfgvtngbe pna qb gura, vg frrzf gb zr, vf gb yrg
guvf qrnqyl fcbhg nybar.

Fgvyy, jr pna ulcbgurfvmr, rira vs jr pnaabg cebir naq rfgnoyvfu. Zl
ulcbgurfvf vf guvf: gung gur fcbhg vf abguvat ohg zvfg. Naq orfvqrf
bgure ernfbaf, gb guvf pbapyhfvba V nz vzcryyrq, ol pbafvqrengvbaf
gbhpuvat gur terng vaurerag qvtavgl naq fhoyvzvgl bs gur Fcrez Junyr;
V nppbhag uvz ab pbzzba, funyybj orvat, vanfzhpu nf vg vf na haqvfchgrq
snpg gung ur vf arire sbhaq ba fbhaqvatf, be arne fuberf; nyy bgure
junyrf fbzrgvzrf ner. Ur vf obgu cbaqrebhf naq cebsbhaq. Naq V nz
pbaivaprq gung sebz gur urnqf bs nyy cbaqrebhf cebsbhaq orvatf, fhpu nf
Cyngb, Cleeub, gur Qrivy, Whcvgre, Qnagr, naq fb ba, gurer nyjnlf tbrf
hc n pregnva frzv-ivfvoyr fgrnz, juvyr va gur npg bs guvaxvat qrrc
gubhtugf. Juvyr pbzcbfvat n yvggyr gerngvfr ba Rgreavgl, V unq gur
phevbfvgl gb cynpr n zveebe orsber zr; naq rer ybat fnj ersyrpgrq gurer,
n phevbhf vaibyirq jbezvat naq haqhyngvba va gur ngzbfcurer bire zl
urnq. Gur vainevnoyr zbvfgher bs zl unve, juvyr cyhatrq va qrrc gubhtug,
nsgre fvk phcf bs ubg grn va zl guva fuvatyrq nggvp, bs na Nhthfg abba;
guvf frrzf na nqqvgvbany nethzrag sbe gur nobir fhccbfvgvba.

Naq ubj aboyl vg envfrf bhe pbaprvg bs gur zvtugl, zvfgl zbafgre, gb
orubyq uvz fbyrzayl fnvyvat guebhtu n pnyz gebcvpny frn; uvf infg, zvyq
urnq bireuhat ol n pnabcl bs incbhe, ratraqrerq ol uvf vapbzzhavpnoyr
pbagrzcyngvbaf, naq gung incbhe—nf lbh jvyy fbzrgvzrf frr
vg—tybevsvrq ol n envaobj, nf vs Urnira vgfrys unq chg vgf frny hcba
uvf gubhtugf. Sbe, q’lr frr, envaobjf qb abg ivfvg gur pyrne nve; gurl
bayl veenqvngr incbhe. Naq fb, guebhtu nyy gur guvpx zvfgf bs gur qvz
qbhogf va zl zvaq, qvivar vaghvgvbaf abj naq gura fubbg, raxvaqyvat zl
sbt jvgu n urnirayl enl. Naq sbe guvf V gunax Tbq; sbe nyy unir qbhogf;
znal qral; ohg qbhogf be qravnyf, srj nybat jvgu gurz, unir vaghvgvbaf.
Qbhogf bs nyy guvatf rneguyl, naq vaghvgvbaf bs fbzr guvatf urnirayl;
guvf pbzovangvba znxrf arvgure oryvrire abe vasvqry, ohg znxrf n zna jub
ertneqf gurz obgu jvgu rdhny rlr.





PUNCGRE 86. Gur Gnvy.
