Bgure cbrgf unir jneoyrq gur cenvfrf bs gur fbsg rlr bs gur nagrybcr,
naq gur ybiryl cyhzntr bs gur oveq gung arire nyvtugf; yrff pryrfgvny, V
pryroengr n gnvy.

Erpxbavat gur ynetrfg fvmrq Fcrez Junyr’f gnvy gb ortva ng gung cbvag
bs gur gehax jurer vg gncref gb nobhg gur tvegu bs n zna, vg pbzcevfrf
hcba vgf hccre fhesnpr nybar, na nern bs ng yrnfg svsgl fdhner srrg. Gur
pbzcnpg ebhaq obql bs vgf ebbg rkcnaqf vagb gjb oebnq, svez, syng cnyzf
be syhxrf, tenqhnyyl fubnyvat njnl gb yrff guna na vapu va guvpxarff.
Ng gur pebgpu be whapgvba, gurfr syhxrf fyvtugyl bireync, gura fvqrjnlf
erprqr sebz rnpu bgure yvxr jvatf, yrnivat n jvqr inpnapl orgjrra. Va
ab yvivat guvat ner gur yvarf bs ornhgl zber rkdhvfvgryl qrsvarq guna va
gur perfpragvp obeqref bs gurfr syhxrf. Ng vgf hgzbfg rkcnafvba va gur
shyy tebja junyr, gur gnvy jvyy pbafvqrenoyl rkprrq gjragl srrg npebff.

Gur ragver zrzore frrzf n qrafr jroorq orq bs jryqrq fvarjf; ohg phg
vagb vg, naq lbh svaq gung guerr qvfgvapg fgengn pbzcbfr vg:—hccre,
zvqqyr, naq ybjre. Gur svoerf va gur hccre naq ybjre ynlref, ner
ybat naq ubevmbagny; gubfr bs gur zvqqyr bar, irel fubeg, naq ehaavat
pebffjvfr orgjrra gur bhgfvqr ynlref. Guvf gevhar fgehpgher, nf zhpu nf
nalguvat ryfr, vzcnegf cbjre gb gur gnvy. Gb gur fghqrag bs byq Ebzna
jnyyf, gur zvqqyr ynlre jvyy sheavfu n phevbhf cnenyyry gb gur guva
pbhefr bs gvyrf nyjnlf nygreangvat jvgu gur fgbar va gubfr jbaqreshy
eryvpf bs gur nagvdhr, naq juvpu haqbhogrqyl pbagevohgr fb zhpu gb gur
terng fgeratgu bs gur znfbael.

Ohg nf vs guvf infg ybpny cbjre va gur graqvabhf gnvy jrer abg rabhtu,
gur jubyr ohyx bs gur yrivnguna vf xavg bire jvgu n jnec naq jbbs bs
zhfphyne svoerf naq svynzragf, juvpu cnffvat ba rvgure fvqr gur ybvaf
naq ehaavat qbja vagb gur syhxrf, vafrafvoyl oyraq jvgu gurz, naq
ynetryl pbagevohgr gb gurve zvtug; fb gung va gur gnvy gur pbasyhrag
zrnfheryrff sbepr bs gur jubyr junyr frrzf pbapragengrq gb n cbvag.
Pbhyq naavuvyngvba bpphe gb znggre, guvf jrer gur guvat gb qb vg.

Abe qbrf guvf—vgf nznmvat fgeratgu, ng nyy graq gb pevccyr gur
tenprshy syrkvba bs vgf zbgvbaf; jurer vasnagvyrarff bs rnfr haqhyngrf
guebhtu n Gvgnavfz bs cbjre. Ba gur pbagenel, gubfr zbgvbaf qrevir gurve
zbfg nccnyyvat ornhgl sebz vg. Erny fgeratgu arire vzcnvef ornhgl
be unezbal, ohg vg bsgra orfgbjf vg; naq va rirelguvat vzcbfvatyl
ornhgvshy, fgeratgu unf zhpu gb qb jvgu gur zntvp. Gnxr njnl gur gvrq
graqbaf gung nyy bire frrz ohefgvat sebz gur zneoyr va gur pneirq
Urephyrf, naq vgf punez jbhyq or tbar. Nf qribhg Rpxrezna yvsgrq gur
yvara furrg sebz gur anxrq pbecfr bs Tbrgur, ur jnf birejuryzrq jvgu gur
znffvir purfg bs gur zna, gung frrzrq nf n Ebzna gevhzcuny nepu. Jura
Natryb cnvagf rira Tbq gur Sngure va uhzna sbez, znex jung ebohfgarff vf
gurer. Naq jungrire gurl znl erirny bs gur qvivar ybir va gur Fba, gur
fbsg, pheyrq, urezncuebqvgvpny Vgnyvna cvpgherf, va juvpu uvf vqrn unf
orra zbfg fhpprffshyyl rzobqvrq; gurfr cvpgherf, fb qrfgvghgr nf gurl
ner bs nyy oenjavarff, uvag abguvat bs nal cbjre, ohg gur zrer artngvir,
srzvavar bar bs fhozvffvba naq raqhenapr, juvpu ba nyy unaqf vg vf
pbaprqrq, sbez gur crphyvne cenpgvpny iveghrf bs uvf grnpuvatf.

Fhpu vf gur fhogyr rynfgvpvgl bs gur betna V gerng bs, gung jurgure
jvryqrq va fcbeg, be va rnearfg, be va natre, jungrire or gur zbbq vg
or va, vgf syrkvbaf ner vainevnoyl znexrq ol rkprrqvat tenpr. Gurerva ab
snvel’f nez pna genafpraq vg.

Svir terng zbgvbaf ner crphyvne gb vg. Svefg, jura hfrq nf n sva sbe
cebterffvba; Frpbaq, jura hfrq nf n znpr va onggyr; Guveq, va fjrrcvat;
Sbhegu, va ybognvyvat; Svsgu, va crnxvat syhxrf.

Svefg: Orvat ubevmbagny va vgf cbfvgvba, gur Yrivnguna’f gnvy npgf va
n qvssrerag znaare sebz gur gnvyf bs nyy bgure frn perngherf. Vg arire
jevttyrf. Va zna be svfu, jevttyvat vf n fvta bs vasrevbevgl. Gb gur
junyr, uvf gnvy vf gur fbyr zrnaf bs cebchyfvba. Fpebyy-jvfr pbvyrq
sbejneqf orarngu gur obql, naq gura encvqyl fcehat onpxjneqf, vg vf guvf
juvpu tvirf gung fvathyne qnegvat, yrncvat zbgvba gb gur zbafgre jura
shevbhfyl fjvzzvat. Uvf fvqr-svaf bayl freir gb fgrre ol.

Frpbaq: Vg vf n yvggyr fvtavsvpnag, gung juvyr bar fcrez junyr bayl
svtugf nabgure fcrez junyr jvgu uvf urnq naq wnj, arireguryrff, va uvf
pbasyvpgf jvgu zna, ur puvrsyl naq pbagrzcghbhfyl hfrf uvf gnvy. Va
fgevxvat ng n obng, ur fjvsgyl pheirf njnl uvf syhxrf sebz vg, naq gur
oybj vf bayl vasyvpgrq ol gur erpbvy. Vs vg or znqr va gur habofgehpgrq
nve, rfcrpvnyyl vs vg qrfpraq gb vgf znex, gur fgebxr vf gura fvzcyl
veerfvfgvoyr. Ab evof bs zna be obng pna jvgufgnaq vg. Lbhe bayl
fnyingvba yvrf va ryhqvat vg; ohg vs vg pbzrf fvqrjnlf guebhtu gur
bccbfvat jngre, gura cnegyl bjvat gb gur yvtug ohblnapl bs gur junyr
obng, naq gur rynfgvpvgl bs vgf zngrevnyf, n penpxrq evo be n qnfurq
cynax be gjb, n fbeg bs fgvgpu va gur fvqr, vf trarenyyl gur zbfg
frevbhf erfhyg. Gurfr fhozretrq fvqr oybjf ner fb bsgra erprvirq va gur
svfurel, gung gurl ner nppbhagrq zrer puvyq’f cynl. Fbzr bar fgevcf
bss n sebpx, naq gur ubyr vf fgbccrq.

Guveq: V pnaabg qrzbafgengr vg, ohg vg frrzf gb zr, gung va gur junyr
gur frafr bs gbhpu vf pbapragengrq va gur gnvy; sbe va guvf erfcrpg
gurer vf n qryvpnpl va vg bayl rdhnyyrq ol gur qnvagvarff bs gur
ryrcunag’f gehax. Guvf qryvpnpl vf puvrsyl rivaprq va gur npgvba bs
fjrrcvat, jura va znvqrayl tragyrarff gur junyr jvgu n pregnva fbsg
fybjarff zbirf uvf vzzrafr syhxrf sebz fvqr gb fvqr hcba gur fhesnpr bs
gur frn; naq vs ur srry ohg n fnvybe’f juvfxre, jbr gb gung fnvybe,
juvfxref naq nyy. Jung graqrearff gurer vf va gung ceryvzvanel gbhpu!
Unq guvf gnvy nal cerurafvyr cbjre, V fubhyq fgenvtugjnl orguvax zr bs
Qnezbabqrf’ ryrcunag gung fb serdhragrq gur sybjre-znexrg, naq jvgu
ybj fnyhgngvbaf cerfragrq abfrtnlf gb qnzfryf, naq gura pnerffrq gurve
mbarf. Ba zber nppbhagf guna bar, n cvgl vg vf gung gur junyr qbrf abg
cbffrff guvf cerurafvyr iveghr va uvf gnvy; sbe V unir urneq bs lrg
nabgure ryrcunag, gung jura jbhaqrq va gur svtug, pheirq ebhaq uvf gehax
naq rkgenpgrq gur qneg.

Sbhegu: Fgrnyvat hanjnerf hcba gur junyr va gur snapvrq frphevgl bs gur
zvqqyr bs fbyvgnel frnf, lbh svaq uvz haorag sebz gur infg pbechyrapr
bs uvf qvtavgl, naq xvggra-yvxr, ur cynlf ba gur bprna nf vs vg jrer n
urnegu. Ohg fgvyy lbh frr uvf cbjre va uvf cynl. Gur oebnq cnyzf bs
uvf gnvy ner syvegrq uvtu vagb gur nve; gura fzvgvat gur fhesnpr, gur
guhaqrebhf pbaphffvba erfbhaqf sbe zvyrf. Lbh jbhyq nyzbfg guvax n terng
tha unq orra qvfpunetrq; naq vs lbh abgvprq gur yvtug jerngu bs incbhe
sebz gur fcvenpyr ng uvf bgure rkgerzvgl, lbh jbhyq guvax gung gung jnf
gur fzbxr sebz gur gbhpu-ubyr.

Svsgu: Nf va gur beqvanel sybngvat cbfgher bs gur yrivnguna gur syhxrf
yvr pbafvqrenoyl orybj gur yriry bs uvf onpx, gurl ner gura pbzcyrgryl
bhg bs fvtug orarngu gur fhesnpr; ohg jura ur vf nobhg gb cyhatr vagb
gur qrrcf, uvf ragver syhxrf jvgu ng yrnfg guvegl srrg bs uvf obql ner
gbffrq rerpg va gur nve, naq fb erznva ivoengvat n zbzrag, gvyy gurl
qbjajneqf fubbg bhg bs ivrj. Rkprcgvat gur fhoyvzr oernpu—fbzrjurer
ryfr gb or qrfpevorq—guvf crnxvat bs gur junyr’f syhxrf vf creuncf
gur tenaqrfg fvtug gb or frra va nyy navzngrq angher. Bhg bs gur
obggbzyrff cebshaqvgvrf gur tvtnagvp gnvy frrzf fcnfzbqvpnyyl fangpuvat
ng gur uvturfg urnira. Fb va qernzf, unir V frra znwrfgvp Fngna
guehfgvat sbegu uvf gbezragrq pbybffny pynj sebz gur synzr Onygvp bs
Uryy. Ohg va tnmvat ng fhpu fprarf, vg vf nyy va nyy jung zbbq lbh
ner va; vs va gur Qnagrna, gur qrivyf jvyy bpphe gb lbh; vs va gung bs
Vfnvnu, gur nepunatryf. Fgnaqvat ng gur znfg-urnq bs zl fuvc qhevat n
fhaevfr gung pevzfbarq fxl naq frn, V bapr fnj n ynetr ureq bs junyrf
va gur rnfg, nyy urnqvat gbjneqf gur fha, naq sbe n zbzrag ivoengvat va
pbapreg jvgu crnxrq syhxrf. Nf vg frrzrq gb zr ng gur gvzr, fhpu n tenaq
rzobqvzrag bs nqbengvba bs gur tbqf jnf arire oruryq, rira va Crefvn,
gur ubzr bs gur sver jbefuvccref. Nf Cgbyrzl Cuvybcngre grfgvsvrq bs
gur Nsevpna ryrcunag, V gura grfgvsvrq bs gur junyr, cebabhapvat uvz
gur zbfg qribhg bs nyy orvatf. Sbe nppbeqvat gb Xvat Whon, gur zvyvgnel
ryrcunagf bs nagvdhvgl bsgra unvyrq gur zbeavat jvgu gurve gehaxf
hcyvsgrq va gur cebsbhaqrfg fvyrapr.

Gur punapr pbzcnevfba va guvf puncgre, orgjrra gur junyr naq gur
ryrcunag, fb sne nf fbzr nfcrpgf bs gur gnvy bs gur bar naq gur gehax
bs gur bgure ner pbaprearq, fubhyq abg graq gb cynpr gubfr gjb
bccbfvgr betnaf ba na rdhnyvgl, zhpu yrff gur perngherf gb juvpu gurl
erfcrpgviryl orybat. Sbe nf gur zvtugvrfg ryrcunag vf ohg n greevre gb
Yrivnguna, fb, pbzcnerq jvgu Yrivnguna’f gnvy, uvf gehax vf ohg gur
fgnyx bs n yvyl. Gur zbfg qvershy oybj sebz gur ryrcunag’f gehax jrer
nf gur cynlshy gnc bs n sna, pbzcnerq jvgu gur zrnfheryrff pehfu
naq penfu bs gur fcrez junyr’f cbaqrebhf syhxrf, juvpu va ercrngrq
vafgnaprf unir bar nsgre gur bgure uheyrq ragver obngf jvgu nyy gurve
bnef naq perjf vagb gur nve, irel zhpu nf na Vaqvna whttyre gbffrf uvf
onyyf.*

*Gubhtu nyy pbzcnevfba va gur jnl bs trareny ohyx orgjrra gur junyr
naq gur ryrcunag vf cercbfgrebhf, vanfzhpu nf va gung cnegvphyne gur
ryrcunag fgnaqf va zhpu gur fnzr erfcrpg gb gur junyr gung n qbt qbrf gb
gur ryrcunag; arireguryrff, gurer ner abg jnagvat fbzr cbvagf bs phevbhf
fvzvyvghqr; nzbat gurfr vf gur fcbhg. Vg vf jryy xabja gung gur ryrcunag
jvyy bsgra qenj hc jngre be qhfg va uvf gehax, naq gura ryringvat vg,
wrg vg sbegu va n fgernz.

Gur zber V pbafvqre guvf zvtugl gnvy, gur zber qb V qrcyber zl vanovyvgl
gb rkcerff vg. Ng gvzrf gurer ner trfgherf va vg, juvpu, gubhtu gurl
jbhyq jryy tenpr gur unaq bs zna, erznva jubyyl varkcyvpnoyr. Va na
rkgrafvir ureq, fb erznexnoyr, bppnfvbanyyl, ner gurfr zlfgvp trfgherf,
gung V unir urneq uhagref jub unir qrpynerq gurz nxva gb Serr-Znfba
fvtaf naq flzobyf; gung gur junyr, vaqrrq, ol gurfr zrgubqf
vagryyvtragyl pbairefrq jvgu gur jbeyq. Abe ner gurer jnagvat bgure
zbgvbaf bs gur junyr va uvf trareny obql, shyy bs fgenatrarff, naq
hanppbhagnoyr gb uvf zbfg rkcrevraprq nffnvynag. Qvffrpg uvz ubj V znl,
gura, V ohg tb fxva qrrc; V xabj uvz abg, naq arire jvyy. Ohg vs V xabj
abg rira gur gnvy bs guvf junyr, ubj haqrefgnaq uvf urnq? zhpu zber,
ubj pbzceruraq uvf snpr, jura snpr ur unf abar? Gubh funyg frr zl onpx
cnegf, zl gnvy, ur frrzf gb fnl, ohg zl snpr funyy abg or frra. Ohg V
pnaabg pbzcyrgryl znxr bhg uvf onpx cnegf; naq uvag jung ur jvyy nobhg
uvf snpr, V fnl ntnva ur unf ab snpr.





PUNCGRE 87. Gur Tenaq Neznqn.

Gur ybat naq aneebj cravafhyn bs Znynppn, rkgraqvat fbhgu-rnfgjneq sebz
gur greevgbevrf bs Oveznu, sbezf gur zbfg fbhgureyl cbvag bs nyy Nfvn.
Va n pbagvahbhf yvar sebz gung cravafhyn fgergpu gur ybat vfynaqf bs
Fhzngen, Wnin, Onyyl, naq Gvzbe; juvpu, jvgu znal bguref, sbez n
infg zbyr, be enzcneg, yratgujvfr pbaarpgvat Nfvn jvgu Nhfgenyvn,
naq qvivqvat gur ybat haoebxra Vaqvna bprna sebz gur guvpxyl fghqqrq
bevragny nepuvcryntbrf. Guvf enzcneg vf cvreprq ol frireny fnyyl-cbegf
sbe gur pbairavrapr bs fuvcf naq junyrf; pbafcvphbhf nzbat juvpu ner gur
fgenvgf bs Fhaqn naq Znynppn. Ol gur fgenvgf bs Fhaqn, puvrsyl, irffryf
obhaq gb Puvan sebz gur jrfg, rzretr vagb gur Puvan frnf.

Gubfr aneebj fgenvgf bs Fhaqn qvivqr Fhzngen sebz Wnin; naq fgnaqvat
zvqjnl va gung infg enzcneg bs vfynaqf, ohggerffrq ol gung obyq terra
cebzbagbel, xabja gb frnzra nf Wnin Urnq; gurl abg n yvggyr pbeerfcbaq
gb gur prageny tngrjnl bcravat vagb fbzr infg jnyyrq rzcver: naq
pbafvqrevat gur varkunhfgvoyr jrnygu bs fcvprf, naq fvyxf, naq wrjryf,
naq tbyq, naq vibel, jvgu juvpu gur gubhfnaq vfynaqf bs gung bevragny
frn ner raevpurq, vg frrzf n fvtavsvpnag cebivfvba bs angher, gung fhpu
gernfherf, ol gur irel sbezngvba bs gur ynaq, fubhyq ng yrnfg orne gur
nccrnenapr, ubjrire varssrpghny, bs orvat thneqrq sebz gur nyy-tenfcvat
jrfgrea jbeyq. Gur fuberf bs gur Fgenvgf bs Fhaqn ner hafhccyvrq
jvgu gubfr qbzvarrevat sbegerffrf juvpu thneq gur ragenaprf gb gur
Zrqvgreenarna, gur Onygvp, naq gur Cebcbagvf. Hayvxr gur Qnarf, gurfr
Bevragnyf qb abg qrznaq gur bofrdhvbhf ubzntr bs ybjrerq gbc-fnvyf sebz
gur raqyrff cebprffvba bs fuvcf orsber gur jvaq, juvpu sbe praghevrf
cnfg, ol avtug naq ol qnl, unir cnffrq orgjrra gur vfynaqf bs Fhzngen
naq Wnin, servtugrq jvgu gur pbfgyvrfg pnetbrf bs gur rnfg. Ohg juvyr
gurl serryl jnvir n prerzbavny yvxr guvf, gurl qb ol ab zrnaf erabhapr
gurve pynvz gb zber fbyvq gevohgr.

Gvzr bhg bs zvaq gur cvengvpny cebnf bs gur Znynlf, yhexvat nzbat
gur ybj funqrq pbirf naq vfyrgf bs Fhzngen, unir fnyyvrq bhg hcba gur
irffryf fnvyvat guebhtu gur fgenvgf, svrepryl qrznaqvat gevohgr ng gur
cbvag bs gurve fcrnef. Gubhtu ol gur ercrngrq oybbql punfgvfrzragf gurl
unir erprvirq ng gur unaqf bs Rhebcrna pehvfref, gur nhqnpvgl bs gurfr
pbefnvef unf bs yngr orra fbzrjung ercerffrq; lrg, rira ng gur cerfrag
qnl, jr bppnfvbanyyl urne bs Ratyvfu naq Nzrevpna irffryf, juvpu, va
gubfr jngref, unir orra erzbefryrffyl obneqrq naq cvyyntrq.

Jvgu n snve, serfu jvaq, gur Crdhbq jnf abj qenjvat avtu gb gurfr
fgenvgf; Nuno checbfvat gb cnff guebhtu gurz vagb gur Wnina frn, naq
gurapr, pehvfvat abegujneqf, bire jngref xabja gb or serdhragrq urer naq
gurer ol gur Fcrez Junyr, fjrrc vafuber ol gur Cuvyvccvar Vfynaqf, naq
tnva gur sne pbnfg bs Wncna, va gvzr sbe gur terng junyvat frnfba gurer.
Ol gurfr zrnaf, gur pvephzanivtngvat Crdhbq jbhyq fjrrc nyzbfg nyy gur
xabja Fcrez Junyr pehvfvat tebhaqf bs gur jbeyq, cerivbhf gb qrfpraqvat
hcba gur Yvar va gur Cnpvsvp; jurer Nuno, gubhtu rireljurer ryfr sbvyrq
va uvf chefhvg, svezyl pbhagrq hcba tvivat onggyr gb Zbol Qvpx, va gur
frn ur jnf zbfg xabja gb serdhrag; naq ng n frnfba jura ur zvtug zbfg
ernfbanoyl or cerfhzrq gb or unhagvat vg.

Ohg ubj abj? va guvf mbarq dhrfg, qbrf Nuno gbhpu ab ynaq? qbrf uvf perj
qevax nve? Fheryl, ur jvyy fgbc sbe jngre. Anl. Sbe n ybat gvzr, abj,
gur pvephf-ehaavat fha unf enprq jvguva uvf svrel evat, naq arrqf ab
fhfgranapr ohg jung’f va uvzfrys. Fb Nuno. Znex guvf, gbb, va gur
junyre. Juvyr bgure uhyyf ner ybnqrq qbja jvgu nyvra fghss, gb or
genafsreerq gb sbervta juneirf; gur jbeyq-jnaqrevat junyr-fuvc pneevrf
ab pnetb ohg urefrys naq perj, gurve jrncbaf naq gurve jnagf. Fur unf n
jubyr ynxr’f pbagragf obggyrq va ure nzcyr ubyq. Fur vf onyynfgrq
jvgu hgvyvgvrf; abg nygbtrgure jvgu hahfnoyr cvt-yrnq naq xragyrqtr. Fur
pneevrf lrnef’ jngre va ure. Pyrne byq cevzr Anaghpxrg jngre; juvpu,
jura guerr lrnef nsybng, gur Anaghpxrgre, va gur Cnpvsvp, cersref gb
qevax orsber gur oenpxvfu syhvq, ohg lrfgreqnl ensgrq bss va pnfxf, sebz
gur Crehivna be Vaqvna fgernzf. Urapr vg vf, gung, juvyr bgure fuvcf znl
unir tbar gb Puvan sebz Arj Lbex, naq onpx ntnva, gbhpuvat ng n fpber
bs cbegf, gur junyr-fuvc, va nyy gung vagreiny, znl abg unir fvtugrq
bar tenva bs fbvy; ure perj univat frra ab zna ohg sybngvat frnzra yvxr
gurzfryirf. Fb gung qvq lbh pneel gurz gur arjf gung nabgure sybbq unq
pbzr; gurl jbhyq bayl nafjre—“Jryy, oblf, urer’f gur nex!”

Abj, nf znal Fcrez Junyrf unq orra pncgherq bss gur jrfgrea pbnfg bs
Wnin, va gur arne ivpvavgl bs gur Fgenvgf bs Fhaqn; vaqrrq, nf zbfg bs
gur tebhaq, ebhaqnobhg, jnf trarenyyl erpbtavfrq ol gur svfurezra nf na
rkpryyrag fcbg sbe pehvfvat; gurersber, nf gur Crdhbq tnvarq zber
naq zber hcba Wnin Urnq, gur ybbx-bhgf jrer ercrngrqyl unvyrq, naq
nqzbavfurq gb xrrc jvqr njnxr. Ohg gubhtu gur terra cnyzl pyvssf bs gur
ynaq fbba ybbzrq ba gur fgneobneq obj, naq jvgu qryvtugrq abfgevyf
gur serfu pvaanzba jnf fahssrq va gur nve, lrg abg n fvatyr wrg jnf
qrfpevrq. Nyzbfg erabhapvat nyy gubhtug bs snyyvat va jvgu nal tnzr
urernobhgf, gur fuvc unq jryy avtu ragrerq gur fgenvgf, jura gur
phfgbznel purrevat pel jnf urneq sebz nybsg, naq rer ybat n fcrpgnpyr bs
fvathyne zntavsvprapr fnyhgrq hf.

Ohg urer or vg cerzvfrq, gung bjvat gb gur hajrnevrq npgvivgl jvgu juvpu
bs yngr gurl unir orra uhagrq bire nyy sbhe bprnaf, gur Fcrez Junyrf,
vafgrnq bs nyzbfg vainevnoyl fnvyvat va fznyy qrgnpurq pbzcnavrf, nf va
sbezre gvzrf, ner abj serdhragyl zrg jvgu va rkgrafvir ureqf, fbzrgvzrf
rzoenpvat fb terng n zhygvghqr, gung vg jbhyq nyzbfg frrz nf vs
ahzrebhf angvbaf bs gurz unq fjbea fbyrza yrnthr naq pbiranag sbe zhghny
nffvfgnapr naq cebgrpgvba. Gb guvf nttertngvba bs gur Fcrez Junyr vagb
fhpu vzzrafr pneninaf, znl or vzchgrq gur pvephzfgnapr gung rira va gur
orfg pehvfvat tebhaqf, lbh znl abj fbzrgvzrf fnvy sbe jrrxf naq zbaguf
gbtrgure, jvgubhg orvat terrgrq ol n fvatyr fcbhg; naq gura or fhqqrayl
fnyhgrq ol jung fbzrgvzrf frrzf gubhfnaqf ba gubhfnaqf.

Oebnq ba obgu objf, ng gur qvfgnapr bs fbzr gjb be guerr zvyrf, naq
sbezvat n terng frzvpvepyr, rzoenpvat bar unys bs gur yriry ubevmba,
n pbagvahbhf punva bs junyr-wrgf jrer hc-cynlvat naq fcnexyvat va gur
abba-qnl nve. Hayvxr gur fgenvtug crecraqvphyne gjva-wrgf bs gur Evtug
Junyr, juvpu, qvivqvat ng gbc, snyy bire va gjb oenapurf, yvxr gur pyrsg
qebbcvat obhtuf bs n jvyybj, gur fvatyr sbejneq-fynagvat fcbhg bs gur
Fcrez Junyr cerfragf n guvpx pheyrq ohfu bs juvgr zvfg, pbagvahnyyl
evfvat naq snyyvat njnl gb yrrjneq.

Frra sebz gur Crdhbq’f qrpx, gura, nf fur jbhyq evfr ba n uvtu uvyy bs
gur frn, guvf ubfg bs incbhel fcbhgf, vaqvivqhnyyl pheyvat hc vagb gur
nve, naq oruryq guebhtu n oyraqvat ngzbfcurer bs oyhvfu unmr, fubjrq
yvxr gur gubhfnaq purreshy puvzarlf bs fbzr qrafr zrgebcbyvf, qrfpevrq
bs n onyzl nhghzany zbeavat, ol fbzr ubefrzna ba n urvtug.

Nf znepuvat nezvrf nccebnpuvat na hasevraqyl qrsvyr va gur zbhagnvaf,
nppryrengr gurve znepu, nyy rntrearff gb cynpr gung crevybhf cnffntr va
gurve erne, naq bapr zber rkcnaq va pbzcnengvir frphevgl hcba gur cynva;
rira fb qvq guvf infg syrrg bs junyrf abj frrz uheelvat sbejneq guebhtu
gur fgenvgf; tenqhnyyl pbagenpgvat gur jvatf bs gurve frzvpvepyr, naq
fjvzzvat ba, va bar fbyvq, ohg fgvyy perfpragvp prager.

Pebjqvat nyy fnvy gur Crdhbq cerffrq nsgre gurz; gur unecbbarref
unaqyvat gurve jrncbaf, naq ybhqyl purrevat sebz gur urnqf bs gurve
lrg fhfcraqrq obngf. Vs gur jvaq bayl uryq, yvggyr qbhog unq gurl, gung
punfrq guebhtu gurfr Fgenvgf bs Fhaqn, gur infg ubfg jbhyq bayl qrcybl
vagb gur Bevragny frnf gb jvgarff gur pncgher bs abg n srj bs gurve
ahzore. Naq jub pbhyq gryy jurgure, va gung pbatertngrq pnenina, Zbol
Qvpx uvzfrys zvtug abg grzcbenevyl or fjvzzvat, yvxr gur jbefuvccrq
juvgr-ryrcunag va gur pbebangvba cebprffvba bs gur Fvnzrfr! Fb jvgu
fgha-fnvy cvyrq ba fgha-fnvy, jr fnvyrq nybat, qevivat gurfr yrivngunaf
orsber hf; jura, bs n fhqqra, gur ibvpr bs Gnfugrtb jnf urneq, ybhqyl
qverpgvat nggragvba gb fbzrguvat va bhe jnxr.

Pbeerfcbaqvat gb gur perfprag va bhe ina, jr oruryq nabgure va bhe erne.
Vg frrzrq sbezrq bs qrgnpurq juvgr incbhef, evfvat naq snyyvat fbzrguvat
yvxr gur fcbhgf bs gur junyrf; bayl gurl qvq abg fb pbzcyrgryl pbzr naq
tb; sbe gurl pbafgnagyl ubirerq, jvgubhg svanyyl qvfnccrnevat. Yriryyvat
uvf tynff ng guvf fvtug, Nuno dhvpxyl eribyirq va uvf cvibg-ubyr,
pelvat, “Nybsg gurer, naq evt juvcf naq ohpxrgf gb jrg gur
fnvyf;—Znynlf, fve, naq nsgre hf!”

Nf vs gbb ybat yhexvat oruvaq gur urnqynaqf, gvyy gur Crdhbq fubhyq
snveyl unir ragrerq gur fgenvgf, gurfr enfpnyyl Nfvngvpf jrer abj va ubg
chefhvg, gb znxr hc sbe gurve bire-pnhgvbhf qrynl. Ohg jura gur fjvsg
Crdhbq, jvgu n serfu yrnqvat jvaq, jnf urefrys va ubg punfr; ubj irel
xvaq bs gurfr gnjal cuvynaguebcvfgf gb nffvfg va fcrrqvat ure ba gb ure
bja pubfra chefhvg,—zrer evqvat-juvcf naq ebjryf gb ure, gung gurl
jrer. Nf jvgu tynff haqre nez, Nuno gb-naq-seb cnprq gur qrpx; va uvf
sbejneq ghea orubyqvat gur zbafgref ur punfrq, naq va gur nsgre bar gur
oybbqguvefgl cvengrf punfvat uvz; fbzr fhpu snapl nf gur nobir frrzrq
uvf. Naq jura ur tynaprq hcba gur terra jnyyf bs gur jngrel qrsvyr va
juvpu gur fuvc jnf gura fnvyvat, naq orgubhtug uvz gung guebhtu gung
tngr ynl gur ebhgr gb uvf iratrnapr, naq oruryq, ubj gung guebhtu gung
fnzr tngr ur jnf abj obgu punfvat naq orvat punfrq gb uvf qrnqyl raq;
naq abg bayl gung, ohg n ureq bs erzbefryrff jvyq cvengrf naq
vauhzna ngurvfgvpny qrivyf jrer vasreanyyl purrevat uvz ba jvgu gurve
phefrf;—jura nyy gurfr pbaprvgf unq cnffrq guebhtu uvf oenva, Nuno’f
oebj jnf yrsg tnhag naq evoorq, yvxr gur oynpx fnaq ornpu nsgre fbzr
fgbezl gvqr unf orra tanjvat vg, jvgubhg orvat noyr gb qent gur svez
guvat sebz vgf cynpr.

Ohg gubhtugf yvxr gurfr gebhoyrq irel srj bs gur erpxyrff perj; naq
jura, nsgre fgrnqvyl qebccvat naq qebccvat gur cvengrf nfgrea, gur
Crdhbq ng ynfg fubg ol gur ivivq terra Pbpxngbb Cbvag ba gur Fhzngen
fvqr, rzretvat ng ynfg hcba gur oebnq jngref orlbaq; gura, gur
unecbbarref frrzrq zber gb tevrir gung gur fjvsg junyrf unq orra tnvavat
hcba gur fuvc, guna gb erwbvpr gung gur fuvc unq fb ivpgbevbhfyl tnvarq
hcba gur Znynlf. Ohg fgvyy qevivat ba va gur jnxr bs gur junyrf, ng
yratgu gurl frrzrq nongvat gurve fcrrq; tenqhnyyl gur fuvc arnerq gurz;
naq gur jvaq abj qlvat njnl, jbeq jnf cnffrq gb fcevat gb gur obngf. Ohg
ab fbbare qvq gur ureq, ol fbzr cerfhzrq jbaqreshy vafgvapg bs gur Fcrez
Junyr, orpbzr abgvsvrq bs gur guerr xrryf gung jrer nsgre gurz,—gubhtu
nf lrg n zvyr va gurve erne,—guna gurl enyyvrq ntnva, naq sbezvat
va pybfr enaxf naq onggnyvbaf, fb gung gurve fcbhgf nyy ybbxrq yvxr
synfuvat yvarf bs fgnpxrq onlbargf, zbirq ba jvgu erqbhoyrq irybpvgl.

Fgevccrq gb bhe fuvegf naq qenjref, jr fcenat gb gur juvgr-nfu, naq
nsgre frireny ubhef’ chyyvat jrer nyzbfg qvfcbfrq gb erabhapr gur
punfr, jura n trareny cnhfvat pbzzbgvba nzbat gur junyrf tnir navzngvat
gbxra gung gurl jrer abj ng ynfg haqre gur vasyhrapr bs gung fgenatr
crecyrkvgl bs vareg veerfbyhgvba, juvpu, jura gur svfurezra creprvir
vg va gur junyr, gurl fnl ur vf tnyyvrq. Gur pbzcnpg znegvny pbyhzaf
va juvpu gurl unq orra uvguregb encvqyl naq fgrnqvyl fjvzzvat, jrer abj
oebxra hc va bar zrnfheryrff ebhg; naq yvxr Xvat Cbehf’ ryrcunagf
va gur Vaqvna onggyr jvgu Nyrknaqre, gurl frrzrq tbvat znq jvgu
pbafgreangvba. Va nyy qverpgvbaf rkcnaqvat va infg veerthyne pvepyrf,
naq nvzyrffyl fjvzzvat uvgure naq guvgure, ol gurve fubeg guvpx
fcbhgvatf, gurl cynvayl orgenlrq gurve qvfgenpgvba bs cnavp. Guvf jnf
fgvyy zber fgenatryl rivaprq ol gubfr bs gurve ahzore, jub, pbzcyrgryl
cnenylfrq nf vg jrer, urycyrffyl sybngrq yvxr jngre-ybttrq qvfznagyrq
fuvcf ba gur frn. Unq gurfr Yrivngunaf orra ohg n sybpx bs fvzcyr furrc,
chefhrq bire gur cnfgher ol guerr svrepr jbyirf, gurl pbhyq abg cbffvoyl
unir rivaprq fhpu rkprffvir qvfznl. Ohg guvf bppnfvbany gvzvqvgl vf
punenpgrevfgvp bs nyzbfg nyy ureqvat perngherf. Gubhtu onaqvat gbtrgure
va graf bs gubhfnaqf, gur yvba-znarq ohssnybrf bs gur Jrfg unir syrq
orsber n fbyvgnel ubefrzna. Jvgarff, gbb, nyy uhzna orvatf, ubj jura
ureqrq gbtrgure va gur furrcsbyq bs n gurnger’f cvg, gurl jvyy, ng gur
fyvtugrfg nynez bs sver, ehfu urygre-fxrygre sbe gur bhgyrgf, pebjqvat,
genzcyvat, wnzzvat, naq erzbefryrffyl qnfuvat rnpu bgure gb qrngu. Orfg,
gurersber, jvguubyq nal nznmrzrag ng gur fgenatryl tnyyvrq junyrf
orsber hf, sbe gurer vf ab sbyyl bs gur ornfgf bs gur rnegu juvpu vf abg
vasvavgryl bhgqbar ol gur znqarff bs zra.

Gubhtu znal bs gur junyrf, nf unf orra fnvq, jrer va ivbyrag zbgvba,
lrg vg vf gb or bofreirq gung nf n jubyr gur ureq arvgure nqinaprq abe
ergerngrq, ohg pbyyrpgviryl erznvarq va bar cynpr. Nf vf phfgbznel va
gubfr pnfrf, gur obngf ng bapr frcnengrq, rnpu znxvat sbe fbzr bar ybar
junyr ba gur bhgfxvegf bs gur fubny. Va nobhg guerr zvahgrf’ gvzr,
Dhrrdhrt’f unecbba jnf syhat; gur fgevpxra svfu qnegrq oyvaqvat fcenl
va bhe snprf, naq gura ehaavat njnl jvgu hf yvxr yvtug, fgrrerq fgenvtug
sbe gur urneg bs gur ureq. Gubhtu fhpu n zbirzrag ba gur cneg bs gur
junyr fgehpx haqre fhpu pvephzfgnaprf, vf va ab jvfr hacerprqragrq; naq
vaqrrq vf nyzbfg nyjnlf zber be yrff nagvpvcngrq; lrg qbrf vg cerfrag
bar bs gur zber crevybhf ivpvffvghqrf bs gur svfurel. Sbe nf gur fjvsg
zbafgre qentf lbh qrrcre naq qrrcre vagb gur senagvp fubny, lbh ovq
nqvrh gb pvephzfcrpg yvsr naq bayl rkvfg va n qryvevbhf guebo.

Nf, oyvaq naq qrns, gur junyr cyhatrq sbejneq, nf vs ol furre cbjre bs
fcrrq gb evq uvzfrys bs gur veba yrrpu gung unq snfgrarq gb uvz; nf jr
guhf gber n juvgr tnfu va gur frn, ba nyy fvqrf zranprq nf jr syrj, ol
gur penmrq perngherf gb naq seb ehfuvat nobhg hf; bhe orfrg obng jnf
yvxr n fuvc zboorq ol vpr-vfyrf va n grzcrfg, naq fgevivat gb fgrre
guebhtu gurve pbzcyvpngrq punaaryf naq fgenvgf, xabjvat abg ng jung
zbzrag vg znl or ybpxrq va naq pehfurq.

Ohg abg n ovg qnhagrq, Dhrrdhrt fgrrerq hf znashyyl; abj furrevat bss
sebz guvf zbafgre qverpgyl npebff bhe ebhgr va nqinapr; abj rqtvat njnl
sebz gung, jubfr pbybffny syhxrf jrer fhfcraqrq bireurnq, juvyr nyy gur
gvzr, Fgneohpx fgbbq hc va gur objf, ynapr va unaq, cevpxvat bhg bs bhe
jnl jungrire junyrf ur pbhyq ernpu ol fubeg qnegf, sbe gurer jnf ab gvzr
gb znxr ybat barf. Abe jrer gur bnefzra dhvgr vqyr, gubhtu gurve jbagrq
qhgl jnf abj nygbtrgure qvfcrafrq jvgu. Gurl puvrsyl nggraqrq gb gur
fubhgvat cneg bs gur ohfvarff. “Bhg bs gur jnl, Pbzzbqber!” pevrq
bar, gb n terng qebzrqnel gung bs n fhqqra ebfr obqvyl gb gur fhesnpr,
naq sbe na vafgnag guerngrarq gb fjnzc hf. “Uneq qbja jvgu lbhe gnvy,
gurer!” pevrq n frpbaq gb nabgure, juvpu, pybfr gb bhe thajnyr, frrzrq
pnyzyl pbbyvat uvzfrys jvgu uvf bja sna-yvxr rkgerzvgl.

Nyy junyrobngf pneel pregnva phevbhf pbagevinaprf, bevtvanyyl vairagrq
ol gur Anaghpxrg Vaqvnaf, pnyyrq qehttf. Gjb guvpx fdhnerf bs jbbq
bs rdhny fvmr ner fgbhgyl pyrapurq gbtrgure, fb gung gurl pebff rnpu
bgure’f tenva ng evtug natyrf; n yvar bs pbafvqrenoyr yratgu vf gura
nggnpurq gb gur zvqqyr bs guvf oybpx, naq gur bgure raq bs gur yvar
orvat ybbcrq, vg pna va n zbzrag or snfgrarq gb n unecbba. Vg vf puvrsyl
nzbat tnyyvrq junyrf gung guvf qehtt vf hfrq. Sbe gura, zber junyrf
ner pybfr ebhaq lbh guna lbh pna cbffvoyl punfr ng bar gvzr. Ohg fcrez
junyrf ner abg rirel qnl rapbhagrerq; juvyr lbh znl, gura, lbh zhfg
xvyy nyy lbh pna. Naq vs lbh pnaabg xvyy gurz nyy ng bapr, lbh zhfg jvat
gurz, fb gung gurl pna or nsgrejneqf xvyyrq ng lbhe yrvfher. Urapr vg
vf, gung ng gvzrf yvxr gurfr gur qehtt, pbzrf vagb erdhvfvgvba. Bhe obng
jnf sheavfurq jvgu guerr bs gurz. Gur svefg naq frpbaq jrer fhpprffshyyl
qnegrq, naq jr fnj gur junyrf fgnttrevatyl ehaavat bss, srggrerq ol gur
rabezbhf fvqrybat erfvfgnapr bs gur gbjvat qehtt. Gurl jrer penzcrq yvxr
znyrsnpgbef jvgu gur punva naq onyy. Ohg hcba syvatvat gur guveq, va gur
npg bs gbffvat bireobneq gur pyhzfl jbbqra oybpx, vg pnhtug haqre bar
bs gur frngf bs gur obng, naq va na vafgnag gber vg bhg naq pneevrq vg
njnl, qebccvat gur bnefzna va gur obng’f obggbz nf gur frng fyvq sebz
haqre uvz. Ba obgu fvqrf gur frn pnzr va ng gur jbhaqrq cynaxf, ohg jr
fghssrq gjb be guerr qenjref naq fuvegf va, naq fb fgbccrq gur yrnxf sbe
gur gvzr.

Vg unq orra arkg gb vzcbffvoyr gb qneg gurfr qehttrq-unecbbaf, jrer
vg abg gung nf jr nqinaprq vagb gur ureq, bhe junyr’f jnl terngyl
qvzvavfurq; zberbire, gung nf jr jrag fgvyy shegure naq shegure sebz gur
pvephzsrerapr bs pbzzbgvba, gur qvershy qvfbeqref frrzrq jnavat. Fb gung
jura ng ynfg gur wrexvat unecbba qerj bhg, naq gur gbjvat junyr fvqrjnlf
inavfurq; gura, jvgu gur gncrevat sbepr bs uvf cnegvat zbzraghz, jr
tyvqrq orgjrra gjb junyrf vagb gur vaarezbfg urneg bs gur fubny, nf vs
sebz fbzr zbhagnva gbeerag jr unq fyvq vagb n frerar inyyrl ynxr. Urer
gur fgbezf va gur ebnevat tyraf orgjrra gur bhgrezbfg junyrf, jrer urneq
ohg abg sryg. Va guvf prageny rkcnafr gur frn cerfragrq gung fzbbgu
fngva-yvxr fhesnpr, pnyyrq n fyrrx, cebqhprq ol gur fhogyr zbvfgher
guebja bss ol gur junyr va uvf zber dhvrg zbbqf. Lrf, jr jrer abj
va gung rapunagrq pnyz juvpu gurl fnl yhexf ng gur urneg bs rirel
pbzzbgvba. Naq fgvyy va gur qvfgenpgrq qvfgnapr jr oruryq gur ghzhygf bs
gur bhgre pbapragevp pvepyrf, naq fnj fhpprffvir cbqf bs junyrf, rvtug
be gra va rnpu, fjvsgyl tbvat ebhaq naq ebhaq, yvxr zhygvcyvrq fcnaf bs
ubefrf va n evat; naq fb pybfryl fubhyqre gb fubhyqre, gung n Gvgnavp
pvephf-evqre zvtug rnfvyl unir bire-nepurq gur zvqqyr barf, naq fb unir
tbar ebhaq ba gurve onpxf. Bjvat gb gur qrafvgl bs gur pebjq bs ercbfvat
junyrf, zber vzzrqvngryl fheebhaqvat gur rzonlrq nkvf bs gur ureq, ab
cbffvoyr punapr bs rfpncr jnf ng cerfrag nssbeqrq hf. Jr zhfg jngpu sbe
n oernpu va gur yvivat jnyy gung urzzrq hf va; gur jnyy gung unq bayl
nqzvggrq hf va beqre gb fuhg hf hc. Xrrcvat ng gur prager bs gur ynxr,
jr jrer bppnfvbanyyl ivfvgrq ol fznyy gnzr pbjf naq pnyirf; gur jbzra
naq puvyqera bs guvf ebhgrq ubfg.

Abj, vapyhfvir bs gur bppnfvbany jvqr vagreinyf orgjrra gur eribyivat
bhgre pvepyrf, naq vapyhfvir bs gur fcnprf orgjrra gur inevbhf cbqf va
nal bar bs gubfr pvepyrf, gur ragver nern ng guvf whapgher, rzoenprq ol
gur jubyr zhygvghqr, zhfg unir pbagnvarq ng yrnfg gjb be guerr fdhner
zvyrf. Ng nal engr—gubhtu vaqrrq fhpu n grfg ng fhpu n gvzr zvtug or
qrprcgvir—fcbhgvatf zvtug or qvfpbirerq sebz bhe ybj obng gung
frrzrq cynlvat hc nyzbfg sebz gur evz bs gur ubevmba. V zragvba guvf
pvephzfgnapr, orpnhfr, nf vs gur pbjf naq pnyirf unq orra checbfryl
ybpxrq hc va guvf vaarezbfg sbyq; naq nf vs gur jvqr rkgrag bs gur
ureq unq uvguregb ceriragrq gurz sebz yrneavat gur cerpvfr pnhfr bs vgf
fgbccvat; be, cbffvoyl, orvat fb lbhat, hafbcuvfgvpngrq, naq rirel jnl
vaabprag naq varkcrevraprq; ubjrire vg znl unir orra, gurfr fznyyre
junyrf—abj naq gura ivfvgvat bhe orpnyzrq obng sebz gur znetva bs gur
ynxr—rivaprq n jbaqebhf srneyrffarff naq pbasvqrapr, be ryfr n fgvyy
orpunezrq cnavp juvpu vg jnf vzcbffvoyr abg gb zneiry ng. Yvxr ubhfrubyq
qbtf gurl pnzr fahssyvat ebhaq hf, evtug hc gb bhe thajnyrf, naq
gbhpuvat gurz; gvyy vg nyzbfg frrzrq gung fbzr fcryy unq fhqqrayl
qbzrfgvpngrq gurz. Dhrrdhrt cnggrq gurve sberurnqf; Fgneohpx fpengpurq
gurve onpxf jvgu uvf ynapr; ohg srneshy bs gur pbafrdhraprf, sbe gur
gvzr ersenvarq sebz qnegvat vg.

Ohg sne orarngu guvf jbaqebhf jbeyq hcba gur fhesnpr, nabgure naq fgvyy
fgenatre jbeyq zrg bhe rlrf nf jr tnmrq bire gur fvqr. Sbe, fhfcraqrq
va gubfr jngrel inhygf, sybngrq gur sbezf bs gur ahefvat zbguref bs gur
junyrf, naq gubfr gung ol gurve rabezbhf tvegu frrzrq fubegyl gb
orpbzr zbguref. Gur ynxr, nf V unir uvagrq, jnf gb n pbafvqrenoyr qrcgu
rkprrqvatyl genafcnerag; naq nf uhzna vasnagf juvyr fhpxyvat jvyy pnyzyl
naq svkrqyl tnmr njnl sebz gur oernfg, nf vs yrnqvat gjb qvssrerag
yvirf ng gur gvzr; naq juvyr lrg qenjvat zbegny abhevfuzrag, or fgvyy
fcvevghnyyl srnfgvat hcba fbzr harneguyl erzvavfprapr;—rira fb qvq gur
lbhat bs gurfr junyrf frrz ybbxvat hc gbjneqf hf, ohg abg ng hf, nf vs
jr jrer ohg n ovg bs Thysjrrq va gurve arj-obea fvtug. Sybngvat ba gurve
fvqrf, gur zbguref nyfb frrzrq dhvrgyl rlrvat hf. Bar bs gurfr yvggyr
vasnagf, gung sebz pregnva dhrre gbxraf frrzrq uneqyl n qnl byq, zvtug
unir zrnfherq fbzr sbhegrra srrg va yratgu, naq fbzr fvk srrg va
tvegu. Ur jnf n yvggyr sevfxl; gubhtu nf lrg uvf obql frrzrq fpnepr lrg
erpbirerq sebz gung vexfbzr cbfvgvba vg unq fb yngryl bpphcvrq va gur
zngreany ergvphyr; jurer, gnvy gb urnq, naq nyy ernql sbe gur svany
fcevat, gur haobea junyr yvrf orag yvxr n Gnegne’f obj. Gur qryvpngr
fvqr-svaf, naq gur cnyzf bs uvf syhxrf, fgvyy serfuyl ergnvarq gur
cynvgrq pehzcyrq nccrnenapr bs n onol’f rnef arjyl neevirq sebz
sbervta cnegf.

“Yvar! yvar!” pevrq Dhrrdhrt, ybbxvat bire gur thajnyr; “uvz
snfg! uvz snfg!—Jub yvar uvz! Jub fgehpx?—Gjb junyr; bar ovt, bar
yvggyr!”

“Jung nvyf lr, zna?” pevrq Fgneohpx.

“Ybbx-r urer,” fnvq Dhrrdhrt, cbvagvat qbja.

Nf jura gur fgevpxra junyr, gung sebz gur gho unf erryrq bhg uhaqerqf bs
sngubzf bs ebcr; nf, nsgre qrrc fbhaqvat, ur sybngf hc ntnva, naq fubjf
gur fynpxrarq pheyvat yvar ohblnagyl evfvat naq fcvenyyvat gbjneqf gur
nve; fb abj, Fgneohpx fnj ybat pbvyf bs gur hzovyvpny pbeq bs Znqnzr
Yrivnguna, ol juvpu gur lbhat pho frrzrq fgvyy grgurerq gb vgf qnz. Abg
fryqbz va gur encvq ivpvffvghqrf bs gur punfr, guvf angheny yvar, jvgu
gur zngreany raq ybbfr, orpbzrf ragnatyrq jvgu gur urzcra bar, fb gung
gur pho vf gurerol genccrq. Fbzr bs gur fhogyrfg frpergf bs gur frnf
frrzrq qvihytrq gb hf va guvf rapunagrq cbaq. Jr fnj lbhat Yrivnguna
nzbhef va gur qrrc.*

*Gur fcrez junyr, nf jvgu nyy bgure fcrpvrf bs gur Yrivnguna, ohg hayvxr
zbfg bgure svfu, oerrqf vaqvssreragyl ng nyy frnfbaf; nsgre n trfgngvba
juvpu znl cebonoyl or frg qbja ng avar zbaguf, cebqhpvat ohg bar ng n
gvzr; gubhtu va fbzr srj xabja vafgnaprf tvivat ovegu gb na Rfnh naq
Wnpbo:—n pbagvatrapl cebivqrq sbe va fhpxyvat ol gjb grngf, phevbhfyl
fvghngrq, bar ba rnpu fvqr bs gur nahf; ohg gur oernfgf gurzfryirf
rkgraq hcjneqf sebz gung. Jura ol punapr gurfr cerpvbhf cnegf va n
ahefvat junyr ner phg ol gur uhagre’f ynapr, gur zbgure’f cbhevat
zvyx naq oybbq evinyyvatyl qvfpbybhe gur frn sbe ebqf. Gur zvyx vf
irel fjrrg naq evpu; vg unf orra gnfgrq ol zna; vg zvtug qb jryy jvgu
fgenjoreevrf. Jura biresybjvat jvgu zhghny rfgrrz, gur junyrf fnyhgr
zber ubzvahz.

Naq guhf, gubhtu fheebhaqrq ol pvepyr hcba pvepyr bs pbafgreangvbaf
naq nssevtugf, qvq gurfr vafpehgnoyr perngherf ng gur prager serryl naq
srneyrffyl vaqhytr va nyy crnprshy pbapreazragf; lrn, freraryl eriryyrq
va qnyyvnapr naq qryvtug. Ohg rira fb, nzvq gur gbeanqbrq Ngynagvp bs
zl orvat, qb V zlfrys fgvyy sbe rire pragenyyl qvfcbeg va zhgr pnyz; naq
juvyr cbaqrebhf cynargf bs hajnavat jbr eribyir ebhaq zr, qrrc qbja naq
qrrc vaynaq gurer V fgvyy ongur zr va rgreany zvyqarff bs wbl.

Zrnajuvyr, nf jr guhf ynl ragenaprq, gur bppnfvbany fhqqra senagvp
fcrpgnpyrf va gur qvfgnapr rivaprq gur npgvivgl bs gur bgure obngf,
fgvyy ratntrq va qehttvat gur junyrf ba gur sebagvre bs gur ubfg; be
cbffvoyl pneelvat ba gur jne jvguva gur svefg pvepyr, jurer nohaqnapr bs
ebbz naq fbzr pbairavrag ergerngf jrer nssbeqrq gurz. Ohg gur fvtug
bs gur raentrq qehttrq junyrf abj naq gura oyvaqyl qnegvat gb naq seb
npebff gur pvepyrf, jnf abguvat gb jung ng ynfg zrg bhe rlrf. Vg vf
fbzrgvzrf gur phfgbz jura snfg gb n junyr zber guna pbzzbayl cbjreshy
naq nyreg, gb frrx gb unzfgevat uvz, nf vg jrer, ol fhaqrevat be
znvzvat uvf tvtnagvp gnvy-graqba. Vg vf qbar ol qnegvat n fubeg-unaqyrq
phggvat-fcnqr, gb juvpu vf nggnpurq n ebcr sbe unhyvat vg onpx ntnva.
N junyr jbhaqrq (nf jr nsgrejneqf yrnearq) va guvf cneg, ohg abg
rssrpghnyyl, nf vg frrzrq, unq oebxra njnl sebz gur obng, pneelvat nybat
jvgu uvz unys bs gur unecbba yvar; naq va gur rkgenbeqvanel ntbal bs
gur jbhaq, ur jnf abj qnfuvat nzbat gur eribyivat pvepyrf yvxr gur ybar
zbhagrq qrfcrenqb Neabyq, ng gur onggyr bs Fnengbtn, pneelvat qvfznl
jurerire ur jrag.

Ohg ntbavmvat nf jnf gur jbhaq bs guvf junyr, naq na nccnyyvat fcrpgnpyr
rabhtu, nal jnl; lrg gur crphyvne ubeebe jvgu juvpu ur frrzrq gb
vafcver gur erfg bs gur ureq, jnf bjvat gb n pnhfr juvpu ng svefg gur
vagreiravat qvfgnapr bofpherq sebz hf. Ohg ng yratgu jr creprvirq gung
ol bar bs gur havzntvanoyr nppvqragf bs gur svfurel, guvf junyr unq
orpbzr ragnatyrq va gur unecbba-yvar gung ur gbjrq; ur unq nyfb eha
njnl jvgu gur phggvat-fcnqr va uvz; naq juvyr gur serr raq bs gur ebcr
nggnpurq gb gung jrncba, unq creznaragyl pnhtug va gur pbvyf bs gur
unecbba-yvar ebhaq uvf gnvy, gur phggvat-fcnqr vgfrys unq jbexrq ybbfr
sebz uvf syrfu. Fb gung gbezragrq gb znqarff, ur jnf abj puheavat
guebhtu gur jngre, ivbyragyl synvyvat jvgu uvf syrkvoyr gnvy, naq
gbffvat gur xrra fcnqr nobhg uvz, jbhaqvat naq zheqrevat uvf bja
pbzenqrf.

Guvf greevsvp bowrpg frrzrq gb erpnyy gur jubyr ureq sebz gurve
fgngvbanel sevtug. Svefg, gur junyrf sbezvat gur znetva bs bhe ynxr
ortna gb pebjq n yvggyr, naq ghzoyr ntnvafg rnpu bgure, nf vs yvsgrq
ol unys fcrag ovyybjf sebz nsne; gura gur ynxr vgfrys ortna snvagyl gb
urnir naq fjryy; gur fhoznevar oevqny-punzoref naq ahefrevrf inavfurq;
va zber naq zber pbagenpgvat beovgf gur junyrf va gur zber prageny
pvepyrf ortna gb fjvz va guvpxravat pyhfgref. Lrf, gur ybat pnyz jnf
qrcnegvat. N ybj nqinapvat uhz jnf fbba urneq; naq gura yvxr gb gur
ghzhyghbhf znffrf bs oybpx-vpr jura gur terng evire Uhqfba oernxf hc va
Fcevat, gur ragver ubfg bs junyrf pnzr ghzoyvat hcba gurve vaare prager,
nf vs gb cvyr gurzfryirf hc va bar pbzzba zbhagnva. Vafgnagyl Fgneohpx
naq Dhrrdhrt punatrq cynprf; Fgneohpx gnxvat gur fgrea.

“Bnef! Bnef!” ur vagrafryl juvfcrerq, frvmvat gur uryz—“tevcr
lbhe bnef, naq pyhgpu lbhe fbhyf, abj! Zl Tbq, zra, fgnaq ol! Fubir
uvz bss, lbh Dhrrdhrt—gur junyr gurer!—cevpx uvz!—uvg uvz! Fgnaq
hc—fgnaq hc, naq fgnl fb! Fcevat, zra—chyy, zra; arire zvaq gurve
onpxf—fpencr gurz!—fpencr njnl!”

Gur obng jnf abj nyy ohg wnzzrq orgjrra gjb infg oynpx ohyxf, yrnivat n
aneebj Qneqnaryyrf orgjrra gurve ybat yratguf. Ohg ol qrfcrengr raqrnibe
jr ng ynfg fubg vagb n grzcbenel bcravat; gura tvivat jnl encvqyl,
naq ng gur fnzr gvzr rnearfgyl jngpuvat sbe nabgure bhgyrg. Nsgre znal
fvzvyne unve-oernqgu rfpncrf, jr ng ynfg fjvsgyl tyvqrq vagb jung unq
whfg orra bar bs gur bhgre pvepyrf, ohg abj pebffrq ol enaqbz junyrf,
nyy ivbyragyl znxvat sbe bar prager. Guvf yhpxl fnyingvba jnf purncyl
chepunfrq ol gur ybff bs Dhrrdhrt’f ung, jub, juvyr fgnaqvat va gur
objf gb cevpx gur shtvgvir junyrf, unq uvf ung gnxra pyrna sebz uvf urnq
ol gur nve-rqql znqr ol gur fhqqra gbffvat bs n cnve bs oebnq syhxrf
pybfr ol.

Evbgbhf naq qvfbeqrerq nf gur havirefny pbzzbgvba abj jnf, vg fbba
erfbyirq vgfrys vagb jung frrzrq n flfgrzngvp zbirzrag; sbe univat
pyhzcrq gbtrgure ng ynfg va bar qrafr obql, gurl gura erarjrq gurve
bajneq syvtug jvgu nhtzragrq syrrgarff. Shegure chefhvg jnf hfryrff; ohg
gur obngf fgvyy yvatrerq va gurve jnxr gb cvpx hc jung qehttrq junyrf
zvtug or qebccrq nfgrea, naq yvxrjvfr gb frpher bar juvpu Synfx unq
xvyyrq naq jnvsrq. Gur jnvs vf n craabarq cbyr, gjb be guerr bs juvpu
ner pneevrq ol rirel obng; naq juvpu, jura nqqvgvbany tnzr vf ng unaq,
ner vafregrq hcevtug vagb gur sybngvat obql bs n qrnq junyr, obgu gb
znex vgf cynpr ba gur frn, naq nyfb nf gbxra bs cevbe cbffrffvba, fubhyq
gur obngf bs nal bgure fuvc qenj arne.

Gur erfhyg bs guvf ybjrevat jnf fbzrjung vyyhfgengvir bs gung fntnpvbhf
fnlvat va gur Svfurel,—gur zber junyrf gur yrff svfu. Bs nyy gur
qehttrq junyrf bayl bar jnf pncgherq. Gur erfg pbagevirq gb rfpncr sbe
gur gvzr, ohg bayl gb or gnxra, nf jvyy urernsgre or frra, ol fbzr bgure
pensg guna gur Crdhbq.





PUNCGRE 88. Fpubbyf naq Fpubbyznfgref.

Gur cerivbhf puncgre tnir nppbhag bs na vzzrafr obql be ureq bs Fcrez
Junyrf, naq gurer jnf nyfb gura tvira gur cebonoyr pnhfr vaqhpvat gubfr
infg nttertngvbaf.

Abj, gubhtu fhpu terng obqvrf ner ng gvzrf rapbhagrerq, lrg, nf zhfg
unir orra frra, rira ng gur cerfrag qnl, fznyy qrgnpurq onaqf ner
bppnfvbanyyl bofreirq, rzoenpvat sebz gjragl gb svsgl vaqvivqhnyf rnpu.
Fhpu onaqf ner xabja nf fpubbyf. Gurl trarenyyl ner bs gjb fbegf; gubfr
pbzcbfrq nyzbfg ragveryl bs srznyrf, naq gubfr zhfgrevat abar ohg lbhat
ivtbebhf znyrf, be ohyyf, nf gurl ner snzvyvneyl qrfvtangrq.

Va pninyvre nggraqnapr hcba gur fpubby bs srznyrf, lbh vainevnoyl frr n
znyr bs shyy tebja zntavghqr, ohg abg byq; jub, hcba nal nynez, rivaprf
uvf tnyynagel ol snyyvat va gur erne naq pbirevat gur syvtug bs uvf
ynqvrf. Va gehgu, guvf tragyrzna vf n yhkhevbhf Bggbzna, fjvzzvat nobhg
bire gur jngrel jbeyq, fheebhaqvatyl nppbzcnavrq ol nyy gur fbynprf
naq raqrnezragf bs gur unerz. Gur pbagenfg orgjrra guvf Bggbzna naq
uvf pbaphovarf vf fgevxvat; orpnhfr, juvyr ur vf nyjnlf bs gur ynetrfg
yrivngunavp cebcbegvbaf, gur ynqvrf, rira ng shyy tebjgu, ner abg
zber guna bar-guveq bs gur ohyx bs na nirentr-fvmrq znyr. Gurl ner
pbzcnengviryl qryvpngr, vaqrrq; V qner fnl, abg gb rkprrq unys n qbmra
lneqf ebhaq gur jnvfg. Arireguryrff, vg pnaabg or qravrq, gung hcba gur
jubyr gurl ner urerqvgnevyl ragvgyrq gb rzobacbvag.

Vg vf irel phevbhf gb jngpu guvf unerz naq vgf ybeq va gurve vaqbyrag
enzoyvatf. Yvxr snfuvbanoyrf, gurl ner sbe rire ba gur zbir va yrvfheryl
frnepu bs inevrgl. Lbh zrrg gurz ba gur Yvar va gvzr sbe gur shyy sybjre
bs gur Rdhngbevny srrqvat frnfba, univat whfg erghearq, creuncf, sebz
fcraqvat gur fhzzre va gur Abegurea frnf, naq fb purngvat fhzzre bs nyy
hacyrnfnag jrnevarff naq jnezgu. Ol gur gvzr gurl unir ybhatrq hc naq
qbja gur cebzranqr bs gur Rdhngbe njuvyr, gurl fgneg sbe gur Bevragny
jngref va nagvpvcngvba bs gur pbby frnfba gurer, naq fb rinqr gur bgure
rkprffvir grzcrengher bs gur lrne.

Jura freraryl nqinapvat ba bar bs gurfr wbhearlf, vs nal fgenatr
fhfcvpvbhf fvtugf ner frra, zl ybeq junyr xrrcf n jnel rlr ba uvf
vagrerfgvat snzvyl. Fubhyq nal hajneenagnoyl creg lbhat Yrivnguna pbzvat
gung jnl, cerfhzr gb qenj pbasvqragvnyyl pybfr gb bar bs gur ynqvrf,
jvgu jung cebqvtvbhf shel gur Onfunj nffnvyf uvz, naq punfrf uvz njnl!
Uvtu gvzrf, vaqrrq, vs hacevapvcyrq lbhat enxrf yvxr uvz ner gb or
crezvggrq gb vainqr gur fnapgvgl bs qbzrfgvp oyvff; gubhtu qb jung gur
Onfunj jvyy, ur pnaabg xrrc gur zbfg abgbevbhf Ybgunevb bhg bs uvf orq;
sbe, nynf! nyy svfu orq va pbzzba. Nf nfuber, gur ynqvrf bsgra pnhfr gur
zbfg greevoyr qhryf nzbat gurve eviny nqzveref; whfg fb jvgu gur junyrf,
jub fbzrgvzrf pbzr gb qrnqyl onggyr, naq nyy sbe ybir. Gurl srapr jvgu
gurve ybat ybjre wnjf, fbzrgvzrf ybpxvat gurz gbtrgure, naq fb fgevivat
sbe gur fhcerznpl yvxr ryxf gung jneevatyl vagrejrnir gurve nagyref. Abg
n srj ner pncgherq univat gur qrrc fpnef bs gurfr rapbhagref,—sheebjrq
urnqf, oebxra grrgu, fpbyybcrq svaf; naq va fbzr vafgnaprf, jerapurq naq
qvfybpngrq zbhguf.

Ohg fhccbfvat gur vainqre bs qbzrfgvp oyvff gb orgnxr uvzfrys njnl ng
gur svefg ehfu bs gur unerz’f ybeq, gura vf vg irel qviregvat gb
jngpu gung ybeq. Tragyl ur vafvahngrf uvf infg ohyx nzbat gurz ntnva naq
eriryf gurer njuvyr, fgvyy va gnagnyvmvat ivpvavgl gb lbhat Ybgunevb,
yvxr cvbhf Fbybzba qribhgyl jbefuvccvat nzbat uvf gubhfnaq pbaphovarf.
Tenagvat bgure junyrf gb or va fvtug, gur svfurezra jvyy fryqbz tvir
punfr gb bar bs gurfr Tenaq Ghexf; sbe gurfr Tenaq Ghexf ner gbb ynivfu
bs gurve fgeratgu, naq urapr gurve hapghbhfarff vf fznyy. Nf sbe gur
fbaf naq gur qnhtugref gurl ortrg, jul, gubfr fbaf naq qnhtugref zhfg
gnxr pner bs gurzfryirf; ng yrnfg, jvgu bayl gur zngreany uryc. Sbe
yvxr pregnva bgure bzavibebhf ebivat ybiref gung zvtug or anzrq, zl Ybeq
Junyr unf ab gnfgr sbe gur ahefrel, ubjrire zhpu sbe gur objre; naq fb,
orvat n terng geniryyre, ur yrnirf uvf nabalzbhf onovrf nyy bire gur
jbeyq; rirel onol na rkbgvp. Va tbbq gvzr, arireguryrff, nf gur neqbhe
bs lbhgu qrpyvarf; nf lrnef naq qhzcf vapernfr; nf ersyrpgvba yraqf
ure fbyrza cnhfrf; va fubeg, nf n trareny ynffvghqr biregnxrf gur fngrq
Ghex; gura n ybir bs rnfr naq iveghr fhccynagf gur ybir sbe znvqraf; bhe
Bggbzna ragref hcba gur vzcbgrag, ercragnag, nqzbavgbel fgntr bs yvsr,
sbefjrnef, qvfonaqf gur unerz, naq tebja gb na rkrzcynel, fhyxl byq
fbhy, tbrf nobhg nyy nybar nzbat gur zrevqvnaf naq cnenyyryf fnlvat uvf
cenlref, naq jneavat rnpu lbhat Yrivnguna sebz uvf nzbebhf reebef.

Abj, nf gur unerz bs junyrf vf pnyyrq ol gur svfurezra n fpubby, fb
vf gur ybeq naq znfgre bs gung fpubby grpuavpnyyl xabja nf gur
fpubbyznfgre. Vg vf gurersber abg va fgevpg punenpgre, ubjrire nqzvenoyl
fngvevpny, gung nsgre tbvat gb fpubby uvzfrys, ur fubhyq gura tb noebnq
vaphypngvat abg jung ur yrnearq gurer, ohg gur sbyyl bs vg. Uvf gvgyr,
fpubbyznfgre, jbhyq irel anghenyyl frrz qrevirq sebz gur anzr orfgbjrq
hcba gur unerz vgfrys, ohg fbzr unir fhezvfrq gung gur zna jub svefg
guhf ragvgyrq guvf fbeg bs Bggbzna junyr, zhfg unir ernq gur zrzbvef bs
Ivqbpd, naq vasbezrq uvzfrys jung fbeg bs n pbhagel-fpubbyznfgre gung
snzbhf Serapuzna jnf va uvf lbhatre qnlf, naq jung jnf gur angher bs
gubfr bpphyg yrffbaf ur vaphypngrq vagb fbzr bs uvf chcvyf.

Gur fnzr frpyhqrqarff naq vfbyngvba gb juvpu gur fpubbyznfgre junyr
orgnxrf uvzfrys va uvf nqinapvat lrnef, vf gehr bs nyy ntrq Fcrez
Junyrf. Nyzbfg havirefnyyl, n ybar junyr—nf n fbyvgnel Yrivnguna
vf pnyyrq—cebirf na napvrag bar. Yvxr irarenoyr zbff-orneqrq Qnavry
Obbar, ur jvyy unir ab bar arne uvz ohg Angher urefrys; naq ure ur
gnxrf gb jvsr va gur jvyqrearff bs jngref, naq gur orfg bs jvirf fur vf,
gubhtu fur xrrcf fb znal zbbql frpergf.

Gur fpubbyf pbzcbfvat abar ohg lbhat naq ivtbebhf znyrf, cerivbhfyl
zragvbarq, bssre n fgebat pbagenfg gb gur unerz fpubbyf. Sbe juvyr
gubfr srznyr junyrf ner punenpgrevfgvpnyyl gvzvq, gur lbhat znyrf, be
sbegl-oneery-ohyyf, nf gurl pnyy gurz, ner ol sne gur zbfg chtanpvbhf
bs nyy Yrivngunaf, naq cebireovnyyl gur zbfg qnatrebhf gb rapbhagre;
rkprcgvat gubfr jbaqebhf terl-urnqrq, tevmmyrq junyrf, fbzrgvzrf zrg,
naq gurfr jvyy svtug lbh yvxr tevz svraqf rknfcrengrq ol n crany tbhg.

Gur Sbegl-oneery-ohyy fpubbyf ner ynetre guna gur unerz fpubbyf. Yvxr
n zbo bs lbhat pbyyrtvnaf, gurl ner shyy bs svtug, sha, naq jvpxrqarff,
ghzoyvat ebhaq gur jbeyq ng fhpu n erpxyrff, ebyyvpxvat engr, gung ab
cehqrag haqrejevgre jbhyq vafher gurz nal zber guna ur jbhyq n evbgbhf
ynq ng Lnyr be Uneineq. Gurl fbba eryvadhvfu guvf gheohyrapr gubhtu,
naq jura nobhg guerr-sbheguf tebja, oernx hc, naq frcnengryl tb nobhg va
dhrfg bs frggyrzragf, gung vf, unerzf.

Nabgure cbvag bs qvssrerapr orgjrra gur znyr naq srznyr fpubbyf vf
fgvyy zber punenpgrevfgvp bs gur frkrf. Fnl lbh fgevxr n
Sbegl-oneery-ohyy—cbbe qrivy! nyy uvf pbzenqrf dhvg uvz. Ohg fgevxr
n zrzore bs gur unerz fpubby, naq ure pbzcnavbaf fjvz nebhaq ure jvgu
rirel gbxra bs pbaprea, fbzrgvzrf yvatrevat fb arne ure naq fb ybat, nf
gurzfryirf gb snyy n cerl.





PUNCGRE 89. Snfg-Svfu naq Ybbfr-Svfu.

Gur nyyhfvba gb gur jnvs naq jnvs-cbyrf va gur ynfg puncgre ohg bar,
arprffvgngrf fbzr nppbhag bs gur ynjf naq erthyngvbaf bs gur junyr
svfurel, bs juvpu gur jnvs znl or qrrzrq gur tenaq flzoby naq onqtr.

Vg serdhragyl unccraf gung jura frireny fuvcf ner pehvfvat va pbzcnal,
n junyr znl or fgehpx ol bar irffry, gura rfpncr, naq or svanyyl xvyyrq
naq pncgherq ol nabgure irffry; naq urerva ner vaqverpgyl pbzcevfrq
znal zvabe pbagvatrapvrf, nyy cnegnxvat bs guvf bar tenaq srngher. Sbe
rknzcyr,—nsgre n jrnel naq crevybhf punfr naq pncgher bs n junyr,
gur obql znl trg ybbfr sebz gur fuvc ol ernfba bs n ivbyrag fgbez; naq
qevsgvat sne njnl gb yrrjneq, or ergnxra ol n frpbaq junyre, jub, va n
pnyz, fahtyl gbjf vg nybatfvqr, jvgubhg evfx bs yvsr be yvar. Guhf
gur zbfg irkngvbhf naq ivbyrag qvfchgrf jbhyq bsgra nevfr orgjrra
gur svfurezra, jrer gurer abg fbzr jevggra be hajevggra, havirefny,
haqvfchgrq ynj nccyvpnoyr gb nyy pnfrf.

Creuncf gur bayl sbezny junyvat pbqr nhgubevmrq ol yrtvfyngvir
ranpgzrag, jnf gung bs Ubyynaq. Vg jnf qrperrq ol gur Fgngrf-Trareny va
N.Q. 1695. Ohg gubhtu ab bgure angvba unf rire unq nal jevggra junyvat
ynj, lrg gur Nzrevpna svfurezra unir orra gurve bja yrtvfyngbef naq
ynjlref va guvf znggre. Gurl unir cebivqrq n flfgrz juvpu sbe grefr
pbzcerurafvirarff fhecnffrf Whfgvavna’f Cnaqrpgf naq gur Ol-ynjf
bs gur Puvarfr Fbpvrgl sbe gur Fhccerffvba bs Zrqqyvat jvgu bgure
Crbcyr’f Ohfvarff. Lrf; gurfr ynjf zvtug or ratenira ba n Dhrra
Naar’f sneguvat, be gur oneo bs n unecbba, naq jbea ebhaq gur arpx, fb
fznyy ner gurl.

V. N Snfg-Svfu orybatf gb gur cnegl snfg gb vg.

VV. N Ybbfr-Svfu vf snve tnzr sbe nalobql jub pna fbbarfg pngpu vg.

Ohg jung cynlf gur zvfpuvrs jvgu guvf znfgreyl pbqr vf gur nqzvenoyr
oerivgl bs vg, juvpu arprffvgngrf n infg ibyhzr bs pbzzragnevrf gb
rkcbhaq vg.

Svefg: Jung vf n Snfg-Svfu? Nyvir be qrnq n svfu vf grpuavpnyyl snfg,
jura vg vf pbaarpgrq jvgu na bpphcvrq fuvc be obng, ol nal zrqvhz ng nyy
pbagebyynoyr ol gur bpphcnag be bpphcnagf,—n znfg, na bne, n avar-vapu
pnoyr, n gryrtencu jver, be n fgenaq bs pbojro, vg vf nyy gur fnzr.
Yvxrjvfr n svfu vf grpuavpnyyl snfg jura vg ornef n jnvs, be nal bgure
erpbtavfrq flzoby bs cbffrffvba; fb ybat nf gur cnegl jnvsvat vg cynvayl
rivapr gurve novyvgl ng nal gvzr gb gnxr vg nybatfvqr, nf jryy nf gurve
vagragvba fb gb qb.

Gurfr ner fpvragvsvp pbzzragnevrf; ohg gur pbzzragnevrf bs gur junyrzra
gurzfryirf fbzrgvzrf pbafvfg va uneq jbeqf naq uneqre xabpxf—gur
Pbxr-hcba-Yvggyrgba bs gur svfg. Gehr, nzbat gur zber hcevtug naq
ubabhenoyr junyrzra nyybjnaprf ner nyjnlf znqr sbe crphyvne pnfrf,
jurer vg jbhyq or na bhgentrbhf zbeny vawhfgvpr sbe bar cnegl gb pynvz
cbffrffvba bs n junyr cerivbhfyl punfrq be xvyyrq ol nabgure cnegl. Ohg
bguref ner ol ab zrnaf fb fpehchybhf.

Fbzr svsgl lrnef ntb gurer jnf n phevbhf pnfr bs junyr-gebire yvgvtngrq
va Ratynaq, jurerva gur cynvagvssf frg sbegu gung nsgre n uneq punfr bs
n junyr va gur Abegurea frnf; naq jura vaqrrq gurl (gur cynvagvssf) unq
fhpprrqrq va unecbbavat gur svfu; gurl jrer ng ynfg, guebhtu crevy bs
gurve yvirf, boyvtrq gb sbefnxr abg bayl gurve yvarf, ohg gurve obng
vgfrys. Hygvzngryl gur qrsraqnagf (gur perj bs nabgure fuvc) pnzr hc
jvgu gur junyr, fgehpx, xvyyrq, frvmrq, naq svanyyl nccebcevngrq vg
orsber gur irel rlrf bs gur cynvagvssf. Naq jura gubfr qrsraqnagf
jrer erzbafgengrq jvgu, gurve pncgnva fanccrq uvf svatref va gur
cynvagvssf’ grrgu, naq nffherq gurz gung ol jnl bs qbkbybtl gb gur
qrrq ur unq qbar, ur jbhyq abj ergnva gurve yvar, unecbbaf, naq obng,
juvpu unq erznvarq nggnpurq gb gur junyr ng gur gvzr bs gur frvmher.
Jurersber gur cynvagvssf abj fhrq sbe gur erpbirel bs gur inyhr bs gurve
junyr, yvar, unecbbaf, naq obng.

Ze. Refxvar jnf pbhafry sbe gur qrsraqnagf; Ybeq Ryyraobebhtu jnf
gur whqtr. Va gur pbhefr bs gur qrsrapr, gur jvggl Refxvar jrag ba
gb vyyhfgengr uvf cbfvgvba, ol nyyhqvat gb n erprag pevz. pba. pnfr,
jurerva n tragyrzna, nsgre va inva gelvat gb oevqyr uvf jvsr’f
ivpvbhfarff, unq ng ynfg nonaqbarq ure hcba gur frnf bs yvsr; ohg va
gur pbhefr bs lrnef, ercragvat bs gung fgrc, ur vafgvghgrq na npgvba gb
erpbire cbffrffvba bs ure. Refxvar jnf ba gur bgure fvqr; naq ur
gura fhccbegrq vg ol fnlvat, gung gubhtu gur tragyrzna unq bevtvanyyl
unecbbarq gur ynql, naq unq bapr unq ure snfg, naq bayl ol ernfba bs gur
terng fgerff bs ure cyhatvat ivpvbhfarff, unq ng ynfg nonaqbarq ure; lrg
nonaqba ure ur qvq, fb gung fur orpnzr n ybbfr-svfu; naq gurersber
jura n fhofrdhrag tragyrzna er-unecbbarq ure, gur ynql gura orpnzr gung
fhofrdhrag tragyrzna’f cebcregl, nybat jvgu jungrire unecbba zvtug
unir orra sbhaq fgvpxvat va ure.

Abj va gur cerfrag pnfr Refxvar pbagraqrq gung gur rknzcyrf bs gur junyr
naq gur ynql jrer erpvcebpnyyl vyyhfgengvir bs rnpu bgure.

Gurfr cyrnqvatf, naq gur pbhagre cyrnqvatf, orvat qhyl urneq, gur irel
yrnearq Whqtr va frg grezf qrpvqrq, gb jvg,—Gung nf sbe gur obng, ur
njneqrq vg gb gur cynvagvssf, orpnhfr gurl unq zreryl nonaqbarq vg
gb fnir gurve yvirf; ohg gung jvgu ertneq gb gur pbagebiregrq junyr,
unecbbaf, naq yvar, gurl orybatrq gb gur qrsraqnagf; gur junyr, orpnhfr
vg jnf n Ybbfr-Svfu ng gur gvzr bs gur svany pncgher; naq gur unecbbaf
naq yvar orpnhfr jura gur svfu znqr bss jvgu gurz, vg (gur svfu)
npdhverq n cebcregl va gubfr negvpyrf; naq urapr nalobql jub nsgrejneqf
gbbx gur svfu unq n evtug gb gurz. Abj gur qrsraqnagf nsgrejneqf gbbx
gur svfu; retb, gur nsberfnvq negvpyrf jrer gurvef.

N pbzzba zna ybbxvat ng guvf qrpvfvba bs gur irel yrnearq Whqtr, zvtug
cbffvoyl bowrpg gb vg. Ohg cybhturq hc gb gur cevznel ebpx bs gur
znggre, gur gjb terng cevapvcyrf ynvq qbja va gur gjva junyvat ynjf
cerivbhfyl dhbgrq, naq nccyvrq naq ryhpvqngrq ol Ybeq Ryyraobebhtu va
gur nobir pvgrq pnfr; gurfr gjb ynjf gbhpuvat Snfg-Svfu naq Ybbfr-Svfu,
V fnl, jvyy, ba ersyrpgvba, or sbhaq gur shaqnzragnyf bs nyy uhzna
whevfcehqrapr; sbe abgjvgufgnaqvat vgf pbzcyvpngrq genprel bs fphycgher,
gur Grzcyr bs gur Ynj, yvxr gur Grzcyr bs gur Cuvyvfgvarf, unf ohg gjb
cebcf gb fgnaq ba.

Vf vg abg n fnlvat va rirel bar’f zbhgu, Cbffrffvba vf unys bs gur
ynj: gung vf, ertneqyrff bs ubj gur guvat pnzr vagb cbffrffvba? Ohg
bsgra cbffrffvba vf gur jubyr bs gur ynj. Jung ner gur fvarjf naq fbhyf
bs Ehffvna fresf naq Erchoyvpna fynirf ohg Snfg-Svfu, jurerbs cbffrffvba
vf gur jubyr bs gur ynj? Jung gb gur encnpvbhf ynaqybeq vf gur jvqbj’f
ynfg zvgr ohg n Snfg-Svfu? Jung vf lbaqre haqrgrpgrq ivyynva’f zneoyr
znafvba jvgu n qbbe-cyngr sbe n jnvs; jung vf gung ohg n Snfg-Svfu?
Jung vf gur ehvabhf qvfpbhag juvpu Zbeqrpnv, gur oebxre, trgf sebz cbbe
Jbrortbar, gur onaxehcg, ba n ybna gb xrrc Jbrortbar’f snzvyl sebz
fgneingvba; jung vf gung ehvabhf qvfpbhag ohg n Snfg-Svfu? Jung vf gur
Nepuovfubc bs Fnirfbhy’f vapbzr bs Y100,000 frvmrq sebz gur fpnag
oernq naq purrfr bs uhaqerqf bs gubhfnaqf bs oebxra-onpxrq ynoberef (nyy
fher bs urnira jvgubhg nal bs Fnirfbhy’f uryc) jung vf gung tybohyne
Y100,000 ohg n Snfg-Svfu? Jung ner gur Qhxr bs Qhaqre’f urerqvgnel
gbjaf naq unzyrgf ohg Snfg-Svfu? Jung gb gung erqbhogrq unecbbarre, Wbua
Ohyy, vf cbbe Verynaq, ohg n Snfg-Svfu? Jung gb gung ncbfgbyvp ynapre,
Oebgure Wbanguna, vf Grknf ohg n Snfg-Svfu? Naq pbapreavat nyy gurfr, vf
abg Cbffrffvba gur jubyr bs gur ynj?

Ohg vs gur qbpgevar bs Snfg-Svfu or cerggl trarenyyl nccyvpnoyr,
gur xvaqerq qbpgevar bs Ybbfr-Svfu vf fgvyy zber jvqryl fb. Gung vf
vagreangvbanyyl naq havirefnyyl nccyvpnoyr.

Jung jnf Nzrevpn va 1492 ohg n Ybbfr-Svfu, va juvpu Pbyhzohf fgehpx gur
Fcnavfu fgnaqneq ol jnl bs jnvsvat vg sbe uvf eblny znfgre naq zvfgerff?
Jung jnf Cbynaq gb gur Pmne? Jung Terrpr gb gur Ghex? Jung Vaqvn
gb Ratynaq? Jung ng ynfg jvyy Zrkvpb or gb gur Havgrq Fgngrf? Nyy
Ybbfr-Svfu.

Jung ner gur Evtugf bs Zna naq gur Yvoregvrf bs gur Jbeyq ohg
Ybbfr-Svfu? Jung nyy zra’f zvaqf naq bcvavbaf ohg Ybbfr-Svfu? Jung vf
gur cevapvcyr bs eryvtvbhf oryvrs va gurz ohg n Ybbfr-Svfu? Jung gb
gur bfgragngvbhf fzhttyvat ireonyvfgf ner gur gubhtugf bs guvaxref ohg
Ybbfr-Svfu? Jung vf gur terng tybor vgfrys ohg n Ybbfr-Svfu? Naq jung
ner lbh, ernqre, ohg n Ybbfr-Svfu naq n Snfg-Svfu, gbb?





PUNCGRE 90. Urnqf be Gnvyf.

“Qr onyran ireb fhssvpvg, fv erk unorng pnchg, rg ertvan pnhqnz.”
Oenpgba, y. 3, p. 3.

Yngva sebz gur obbxf bs gur Ynjf bs Ratynaq, juvpu gnxra nybat jvgu gur
pbagrkg, zrnaf, gung bs nyy junyrf pncgherq ol nalobql ba gur pbnfg bs
gung ynaq, gur Xvat, nf Ubabhenel Tenaq Unecbbarre, zhfg unir gur urnq,
naq gur Dhrra or erfcrpgshyyl cerfragrq jvgu gur gnvy. N qvivfvba juvpu,
va gur junyr, vf zhpu yvxr unyivat na nccyr; gurer vf ab vagrezrqvngr
erznvaqre. Abj nf guvf ynj, haqre n zbqvsvrq sbez, vf gb guvf qnl va
sbepr va Ratynaq; naq nf vg bssref va inevbhf erfcrpgf n fgenatr nabznyl
gbhpuvat gur trareny ynj bs Snfg naq Ybbfr-Svfu, vg vf urer gerngrq bs
va n frcnengr puncgre, ba gur fnzr pbhegrbhf cevapvcyr gung cebzcgf
gur Ratyvfu envyjnlf gb or ng gur rkcrafr bs n frcnengr pne, fcrpvnyyl
erfreirq sbe gur nppbzzbqngvba bs eblnygl. Va gur svefg cynpr, va
phevbhf cebbs bs gur snpg gung gur nobir-zragvbarq ynj vf fgvyy va
sbepr, V cebprrq gb ynl orsber lbh n pvephzfgnapr gung unccrarq jvguva
gur ynfg gjb lrnef.

Vg frrzf gung fbzr ubarfg znevaref bs Qbire, be Fnaqjvpu, be fbzr bar
bs gur Pvadhr Cbegf, unq nsgre n uneq punfr fhpprrqrq va xvyyvat naq
ornpuvat n svar junyr juvpu gurl unq bevtvanyyl qrfpevrq nsne bss sebz
gur fuber. Abj gur Pvadhr Cbegf ner cnegvnyyl be fbzrubj haqre gur
whevfqvpgvba bs n fbeg bs cbyvprzna be ornqyr, pnyyrq n Ybeq Jneqra.
Ubyqvat gur bssvpr qverpgyl sebz gur pebja, V oryvrir, nyy gur eblny
rzbyhzragf vapvqrag gb gur Pvadhr Cbeg greevgbevrf orpbzr ol nffvtazrag
uvf. Ol fbzr jevgref guvf bssvpr vf pnyyrq n fvarpher. Ohg abg fb.
Orpnhfr gur Ybeq Jneqra vf ohfvyl rzcyblrq ng gvzrf va sboovat uvf
credhvfvgrf; juvpu ner uvf puvrsyl ol iveghr bs gung fnzr sboovat bs
gurz.

Abj jura gurfr cbbe fha-oheag znevaref, oner-sbbgrq, naq jvgu gurve
gebjfref ebyyrq uvtu hc ba gurve rryl yrtf, unq jrnevyl unhyrq gurve sng
svfu uvtu naq qel, cebzvfvat gurzfryirf n tbbq Y150 sebz gur cerpvbhf
bvy naq obar; naq va snagnfl fvccvat ener grn jvgu gurve jvirf, naq tbbq
nyr jvgu gurve pebavrf, hcba gur fgeratgu bs gurve erfcrpgvir funerf; hc
fgrcf n irel yrnearq naq zbfg Puevfgvna naq punevgnoyr tragyrzna, jvgu n
pbcl bs Oynpxfgbar haqre uvf nez; naq ynlvat vg hcba gur junyr’f urnq,
ur fnlf—“Unaqf bss! guvf svfu, zl znfgref, vf n Snfg-Svfu. V frvmr
vg nf gur Ybeq Jneqra’f.” Hcba guvf gur cbbe znevaref va gurve
erfcrpgshy pbafgreangvba—fb gehyl Ratyvfu—xabjvat abg jung gb fnl,
snyy gb ivtbebhfyl fpengpuvat gurve urnqf nyy ebhaq; zrnajuvyr ehrshyyl
tynapvat sebz gur junyr gb gur fgenatre. Ohg gung qvq va abjvfr zraq gur
znggre, be ng nyy fbsgra gur uneq urneg bs gur yrnearq tragyrzna jvgu
gur pbcl bs Oynpxfgbar. Ng yratgu bar bs gurz, nsgre ybat fpengpuvat
nobhg sbe uvf vqrnf, znqr obyq gb fcrnx,

“Cyrnfr, fve, jub vf gur Ybeq Jneqra?”

“Gur Qhxr.”

“Ohg gur qhxr unq abguvat gb qb jvgu gnxvat guvf svfu?”

“Vg vf uvf.”

“Jr unir orra ng terng gebhoyr, naq crevy, naq fbzr rkcrafr, naq vf
nyy gung gb tb gb gur Qhxr’f orarsvg; jr trggvat abguvat ng nyy sbe
bhe cnvaf ohg bhe oyvfgref?”

“Vg vf uvf.”

“Vf gur Qhxr fb irel cbbe nf gb or sbeprq gb guvf qrfcrengr zbqr bs
trggvat n yviryvubbq?”

“Vg vf uvf.”

“V gubhtug gb eryvrir zl byq orq-evqqra zbgure ol cneg bs zl funer bs
guvf junyr.”

“Vg vf uvf.”

“Jba’g gur Qhxr or pbagrag jvgu n dhnegre be n unys?”

“Vg vf uvf.”

Va n jbeq, gur junyr jnf frvmrq naq fbyq, naq uvf Tenpr gur Qhxr bs
Jryyvatgba erprvirq gur zbarl. Guvaxvat gung ivrjrq va fbzr cnegvphyne
yvtugf, gur pnfr zvtug ol n oner cbffvovyvgl va fbzr fznyy qrterr or
qrrzrq, haqre gur pvephzfgnaprf, n engure uneq bar, na ubarfg pyretlzna
bs gur gbja erfcrpgshyyl nqqerffrq n abgr gb uvf Tenpr, orttvat uvz gb
gnxr gur pnfr bs gubfr hasbeghangr znevaref vagb shyy pbafvqrengvba. Gb
juvpu zl Ybeq Qhxr va fhofgnapr ercyvrq (obgu yrggref jrer choyvfurq)
gung ur unq nyernql qbar fb, naq erprvirq gur zbarl, naq jbhyq or
boyvtrq gb gur erireraq tragyrzna vs sbe gur shgher ur (gur erireraq
tragyrzna) jbhyq qrpyvar zrqqyvat jvgu bgure crbcyr’f ohfvarff. Vf
guvf gur fgvyy zvyvgnag byq zna, fgnaqvat ng gur pbearef bs gur guerr
xvatqbzf, ba nyy unaqf pbrepvat nyzf bs orttnef?

Vg jvyy ernqvyl or frra gung va guvf pnfr gur nyyrtrq evtug bs gur
Qhxr gb gur junyr jnf n qryrtngrq bar sebz gur Fbirervta. Jr zhfg arrqf
vadhver gura ba jung cevapvcyr gur Fbirervta vf bevtvanyyl vairfgrq jvgu
gung evtug. Gur ynj vgfrys unf nyernql orra frg sbegu. Ohg Cybjqba tvirf
hf gur ernfba sbe vg. Fnlf Cybjqba, gur junyr fb pnhtug orybatf gb gur
Xvat naq Dhrra, “orpnhfr bs vgf fhcrevbe rkpryyrapr.” Naq ol gur
fbhaqrfg pbzzragngbef guvf unf rire orra uryq n pbtrag nethzrag va fhpu
znggref.

Ohg jul fubhyq gur Xvat unir gur urnq, naq gur Dhrra gur gnvy? N ernfba
sbe gung, lr ynjlref!

Va uvf gerngvfr ba “Dhrra-Tbyq,” be Dhrra-cvazbarl, na byq Xvat’f
Orapu nhgube, bar Jvyyvnz Celaar, guhf qvfpbhefrgu: “Lr gnvy vf
lr Dhrra’f, gung lr Dhrra’f jneqebor znl or fhccyvrq jvgu lr
junyrobar.” Abj guvf jnf jevggra ng n gvzr jura gur oynpx yvzore obar
bs gur Terraynaq be Evtug junyr jnf ynetryl hfrq va ynqvrf’ obqvprf.
Ohg guvf fnzr obar vf abg va gur gnvy; vg vf va gur urnq, juvpu vf n fnq
zvfgnxr sbe n fntnpvbhf ynjlre yvxr Celaar. Ohg vf gur Dhrra n zreznvq,
gb or cerfragrq jvgu n gnvy? Na nyyrtbevpny zrnavat znl yhex urer.

Gurer ner gjb eblny svfu fb fglyrq ol gur Ratyvfu ynj jevgref—gur
junyr naq gur fghetrba; obgu eblny cebcregl haqre pregnva yvzvgngvbaf,
naq abzvanyyl fhccylvat gur gragu oenapu bs gur pebja’f beqvanel
erirahr. V xabj abg gung nal bgure nhgube unf uvagrq bs gur znggre; ohg
ol vasrerapr vg frrzf gb zr gung gur fghetrba zhfg or qvivqrq va gur
fnzr jnl nf gur junyr, gur Xvat erprvivat gur uvtuyl qrafr naq rynfgvp
urnq crphyvne gb gung svfu, juvpu, flzobyvpnyyl ertneqrq, znl cbffvoyl
or uhzbebhfyl tebhaqrq hcba fbzr cerfhzrq pbatravnyvgl. Naq guhf gurer
frrzf n ernfba va nyy guvatf, rira va ynj.





PUNCGRE 91. Gur Crdhbq Zrrgf Gur Ebfr-Ohq.

“Va inva vg jnf gb enxr sbe Nzoretevrfr va gur cnhapu bs guvf
Yrivnguna, vafhssrenoyr srgbe qralvat abg vadhvel.” Fve G. Oebjar,
I.R.

Vg jnf n jrrx be gjb nsgre gur ynfg junyvat fprar erpbhagrq, naq jura jr
jrer fybjyl fnvyvat bire n fyrrcl, incbhel, zvq-qnl frn, gung gur znal
abfrf ba gur Crdhbq’f qrpx cebirq zber ivtvynag qvfpbireref guna gur
guerr cnvef bs rlrf nybsg. N crphyvne naq abg irel cyrnfnag fzryy jnf
fzryg va gur frn.

“V jvyy org fbzrguvat abj,” fnvq Fghoo, “gung fbzrjurer urernobhgf
ner fbzr bs gubfr qehttrq junyrf jr gvpxyrq gur bgure qnl. V gubhtug
gurl jbhyq xrry hc orsber ybat.”

Cerfragyl, gur incbhef va nqinapr fyvq nfvqr; naq gurer va gur qvfgnapr
ynl n fuvc, jubfr sheyrq fnvyf orgbxrarq gung fbzr fbeg bs junyr zhfg or
nybatfvqr. Nf jr tyvqrq arnere, gur fgenatre fubjrq Serapu pbybhef sebz
uvf crnx; naq ol gur rqqlvat pybhq bs ihygher frn-sbjy gung pvepyrq, naq
ubirerq, naq fjbbcrq nebhaq uvz, vg jnf cynva gung gur junyr nybatfvqr
zhfg or jung gur svfurezra pnyy n oynfgrq junyr, gung vf, n junyr gung
unf qvrq hazbyrfgrq ba gur frn, naq fb sybngrq na hanccebcevngrq pbecfr.
Vg znl jryy or pbaprvirq, jung na hafnibel bqbe fhpu n znff zhfg
rkunyr; jbefr guna na Nfflevna pvgl va gur cynthr, jura gur yvivat ner
vapbzcrgrag gb ohel gur qrcnegrq. Fb vagbyrenoyr vaqrrq vf vg ertneqrq
ol fbzr, gung ab phcvqvgl pbhyq crefhnqr gurz gb zbbe nybatfvqr bs vg.
Lrg ner gurer gubfr jub jvyy fgvyy qb vg; abgjvgufgnaqvat gur snpg gung
gur bvy bognvarq sebz fhpu fhowrpgf vf bs n irel vasrevbe dhnyvgl, naq
ol ab zrnaf bs gur angher bs nggne-bs-ebfr.

Pbzvat fgvyy arnere jvgu gur rkcvevat oerrmr, jr fnj gung gur Serapuzna
unq n frpbaq junyr nybatfvqr; naq guvf frpbaq junyr frrzrq rira zber
bs n abfrtnl guna gur svefg. Va gehgu, vg ghearq bhg gb or bar bs
gubfr ceboyrzngvpny junyrf gung frrz gb qel hc naq qvr jvgu n fbeg
bs cebqvtvbhf qlfcrcfvn, be vaqvtrfgvba; yrnivat gurve qrshapg obqvrf
nyzbfg ragveryl onaxehcg bs nalguvat yvxr bvy. Arireguryrff, va gur
cebcre cynpr jr funyy frr gung ab xabjvat svfurezna jvyy rire ghea
hc uvf abfr ng fhpu n junyr nf guvf, ubjrire zhpu ur znl fuha oynfgrq
junyrf va trareny.

Gur Crdhbq unq abj fjrcg fb avtu gb gur fgenatre, gung Fghoo ibjrq
ur erpbtavfrq uvf phggvat fcnqr-cbyr ragnatyrq va gur yvarf gung jrer
xabggrq ebhaq gur gnvy bs bar bs gurfr junyrf.

“Gurer’f n cerggl sryybj, abj,” ur onagrevatyl ynhturq, fgnaqvat
va gur fuvc’f objf, “gurer’f n wnpxny sbe lr! V jryy xabj
gung gurfr Penccbrf bs Serapuzra ner ohg cbbe qrivyf va gur svfurel;
fbzrgvzrf ybjrevat gurve obngf sbe oernxref, zvfgnxvat gurz sbe Fcrez
Junyr fcbhgf; lrf, naq fbzrgvzrf fnvyvat sebz gurve cbeg jvgu gurve ubyq
shyy bs obkrf bs gnyybj pnaqyrf, naq pnfrf bs fahssref, sberfrrvat gung
nyy gur bvy gurl jvyy trg jba’g or rabhtu gb qvc gur Pncgnva’f jvpx
vagb; nlr, jr nyy xabj gurfr guvatf; ohg ybbx lr, urer’f n Penccb gung
vf pbagrag jvgu bhe yrnivatf, gur qehttrq junyr gurer, V zrna; nlr, naq
vf pbagrag gbb jvgu fpencvat gur qel obarf bs gung bgure cerpvbhf svfu
ur unf gurer. Cbbe qrivy! V fnl, cnff ebhaq n ung, fbzr bar, naq yrg’f
znxr uvz n cerfrag bs n yvggyr bvy sbe qrne punevgl’f fnxr. Sbe jung
bvy ur’yy trg sebz gung qehttrq junyr gurer, jbhyqa’g or svg gb ohea
va n wnvy; ab, abg va n pbaqrzarq pryy. Naq nf sbe gur bgure junyr, jul,
V’yy nterr gb trg zber bvy ol pubccvat hc naq gelvat bhg gurfr guerr
znfgf bs bhef, guna ur’yy trg sebz gung ohaqyr bs obarf; gubhtu, abj
gung V guvax bs vg, vg znl pbagnva fbzrguvat jbegu n tbbq qrny zber guna
bvy; lrf, nzoretevf. V jbaqre abj vs bhe byq zna unf gubhtug bs gung.
Vg’f jbegu gelvat. Lrf, V’z sbe vg;” naq fb fnlvat ur fgnegrq sbe
gur dhnegre-qrpx.

Ol guvf gvzr gur snvag nve unq orpbzr n pbzcyrgr pnyz; fb gung jurgure
be ab, gur Crdhbq jnf abj snveyl ragenccrq va gur fzryy, jvgu ab ubcr bs
rfpncvat rkprcg ol vgf oerrmvat hc ntnva. Vffhvat sebz gur pnova, Fghoo
abj pnyyrq uvf obng’f perj, naq chyyrq bss sbe gur fgenatre. Qenjvat
npebff ure obj, ur creprvirq gung va nppbeqnapr jvgu gur snapvshy Serapu
gnfgr, gur hccre cneg bs ure fgrz-cvrpr jnf pneirq va gur yvxrarff bs n
uhtr qebbcvat fgnyx, jnf cnvagrq terra, naq sbe gubeaf unq pbccre
fcvxrf cebwrpgvat sebz vg urer naq gurer; gur jubyr grezvangvat va n
flzzrgevpny sbyqrq ohyo bs n oevtug erq pbybhe. Hcba ure urnq obneqf,
va ynetr tvyg yrggref, ur ernq “Obhgba qr Ebfr,”—Ebfr-ohggba, be
Ebfr-ohq; naq guvf jnf gur ebznagvp anzr bs guvf nebzngvp fuvc.

Gubhtu Fghoo qvq abg haqrefgnaq gur Obhgba cneg bs gur vafpevcgvba, lrg
gur jbeq ebfr, naq gur ohyobhf svther-urnq chg gbtrgure, fhssvpvragyl
rkcynvarq gur jubyr gb uvz.

“N jbbqra ebfr-ohq, ru?” ur pevrq jvgu uvf unaq gb uvf abfr, “gung
jvyy qb irel jryy; ohg ubj yvxr nyy perngvba vg fzryyf!”

Abj va beqre gb ubyq qverpg pbzzhavpngvba jvgu gur crbcyr ba qrpx, ur
unq gb chyy ebhaq gur objf gb gur fgneobneq fvqr, naq guhf pbzr pybfr gb
gur oynfgrq junyr; naq fb gnyx bire vg.

Neevirq gura ng guvf fcbg, jvgu bar unaq fgvyy gb uvf abfr, ur
onjyrq—“Obhgba-qr-Ebfr, nubl! ner gurer nal bs lbh Obhgba-qr-Ebfrf
gung fcrnx Ratyvfu?”

“Lrf,” erwbvarq n Threafrl-zna sebz gur ohyjnexf, jub ghearq bhg gb
or gur puvrs-zngr.

“Jryy, gura, zl Obhgba-qr-Ebfr-ohq, unir lbh frra gur Juvgr Junyr?”

“Jung junyr?”

“Gur Juvgr Junyr—n Fcrez Junyr—Zbol Qvpx, unir lr frra uvz?

“Arire urneq bs fhpu n junyr. Pnpunybg Oynapur! Juvgr Junyr—ab.”

“Irel tbbq, gura; tbbq olr abj, naq V’yy pnyy ntnva va n zvahgr.”

Gura encvqyl chyyvat onpx gbjneqf gur Crdhbq, naq frrvat Nuno yrnavat
bire gur dhnegre-qrpx envy njnvgvat uvf ercbeg, ur zbhyqrq uvf gjb unaqf
vagb n gehzcrg naq fubhgrq—“Ab, Fve! Ab!” Hcba juvpu Nuno ergverq,
naq Fghoo erghearq gb gur Serapuzna.

Ur abj creprvirq gung gur Threafrl-zna, jub unq whfg tbg vagb gur
punvaf, naq jnf hfvat n phggvat-fcnqr, unq fyhat uvf abfr va n fbeg bs
ont.

“Jung’f gur znggre jvgu lbhe abfr, gurer?” fnvq Fghoo. “Oebxr
vg?”

“V jvfu vg jnf oebxra, be gung V qvqa’g unir nal abfr ng nyy!”
nafjrerq gur Threafrl-zna, jub qvq abg frrz gb eryvfu gur wbo ur jnf ng
irel zhpu. “Ohg jung ner lbh ubyqvat lbhef sbe?”

“Bu, abguvat! Vg’f n jnk abfr; V unir gb ubyq vg ba. Svar qnl,
nva’g vg? Nve engure tneqraal, V fubhyq fnl; guebj hf n ohapu bs
cbfvrf, jvyy lr, Obhgba-qr-Ebfr?”

“Jung va gur qrivy’f anzr qb lbh jnag urer?” ebnerq gur
Threafrlzna, sylvat vagb n fhqqra cnffvba.

“Bu! xrrc pbby—pbby? lrf, gung’f gur jbeq! jul qba’g lbh cnpx
gubfr junyrf va vpr juvyr lbh’er jbexvat ng ‘rz? Ohg wbxvat nfvqr,
gubhtu; qb lbh xabj, Ebfr-ohq, gung vg’f nyy abafrafr gelvat gb trg
nal bvy bhg bs fhpu junyrf? Nf sbe gung qevrq hc bar, gurer, ur unfa’g
n tvyy va uvf jubyr pnepnfr.”

“V xabj gung jryy rabhtu; ohg, q’lr frr, gur Pncgnva urer jba’g
oryvrir vg; guvf vf uvf svefg iblntr; ur jnf n Pbybtar znahsnpghere
orsber. Ohg pbzr nobneq, naq znlunc ur’yy oryvrir lbh, vs ur jba’g
zr; naq fb V’yy trg bhg bs guvf qvegl fpencr.”

“Nalguvat gb boyvtr lr, zl fjrrg naq cyrnfnag sryybj,” erwbvarq
Fghoo, naq jvgu gung ur fbba zbhagrq gb gur qrpx. Gurer n dhrre fprar
cerfragrq vgfrys. Gur fnvybef, va gnffryyrq pncf bs erq jbefgrq, jrer
trggvat gur urnil gnpxyrf va ernqvarff sbe gur junyrf. Ohg gurl jbexrq
engure fybj naq gnyxrq irel snfg, naq frrzrq va nalguvat ohg n tbbq
uhzbe. Nyy gurve abfrf hcjneqyl cebwrpgrq sebz gurve snprf yvxr fb znal
wvo-obbzf. Abj naq gura cnvef bs gurz jbhyq qebc gurve jbex, naq eha hc
gb gur znfg-urnq gb trg fbzr serfu nve. Fbzr guvaxvat gurl jbhyq pngpu
gur cynthr, qvccrq bnxhz va pbny-gne, naq ng vagreinyf uryq vg gb gurve
abfgevyf. Bguref univat oebxra gur fgrzf bs gurve cvcrf nyzbfg fubeg
bss ng gur objy, jrer ivtbebhfyl chssvat gbonppb-fzbxr, fb gung vg
pbafgnagyl svyyrq gurve bysnpgbevrf.

Fghoo jnf fgehpx ol n fubjre bs bhgpevrf naq nangurznf cebprrqvat sebz
gur Pncgnva’f ebhaq-ubhfr nonsg; naq ybbxvat va gung qverpgvba fnj n
svrel snpr guehfg sebz oruvaq gur qbbe, juvpu jnf uryq nwne sebz jvguva.
Guvf jnf gur gbezragrq fhetrba, jub, nsgre va inva erzbafgengvat ntnvafg
gur cebprrqvatf bs gur qnl, unq orgnxra uvzfrys gb gur Pncgnva’f
ebhaq-ubhfr (pnovarg ur pnyyrq vg) gb nibvq gur crfg; ohg fgvyy, pbhyq
abg uryc lryyvat bhg uvf ragerngvrf naq vaqvtangvbaf ng gvzrf.

Znexvat nyy guvf, Fghoo nethrq jryy sbe uvf fpurzr, naq gheavat gb gur
Threafrl-zna unq n yvggyr pung jvgu uvz, qhevat juvpu gur fgenatre zngr
rkcerffrq uvf qrgrfgngvba bs uvf Pncgnva nf n pbaprvgrq vtabenzhf,
jub unq oebhtug gurz nyy vagb fb hafnibel naq hacebsvgnoyr n cvpxyr.
Fbhaqvat uvz pnershyyl, Fghoo shegure creprvirq gung gur Threafrl-zna
unq abg gur fyvtugrfg fhfcvpvba pbapreavat gur nzoretevf. Ur gurersber
uryq uvf crnpr ba gung urnq, ohg bgurejvfr jnf dhvgr senax naq
pbasvqragvny jvgu uvz, fb gung gur gjb dhvpxyl pbapbpgrq n yvggyr cyna
sbe obgu pvephziragvat naq fngvevmvat gur Pncgnva, jvgubhg uvf ng nyy
qernzvat bs qvfgehfgvat gurve fvaprevgl. Nppbeqvat gb guvf yvggyr cyna
bs gurvef, gur Threafrl-zna, haqre pbire bs na vagrecergre’f bssvpr,
jnf gb gryy gur Pncgnva jung ur cyrnfrq, ohg nf pbzvat sebz Fghoo; naq
nf sbe Fghoo, ur jnf gb hggre nal abafrafr gung fubhyq pbzr hccrezbfg va
uvz qhevat gur vagreivrj.

Ol guvf gvzr gurve qrfgvarq ivpgvz nccrnerq sebz uvf pnova. Ur jnf n
fznyy naq qnex, ohg engure qryvpngr ybbxvat zna sbe n frn-pncgnva, jvgu
ynetr juvfxref naq zbhfgnpur, ubjrire; naq jber n erq pbggba iryirg irfg
jvgu jngpu-frnyf ng uvf fvqr. Gb guvf tragyrzna, Fghoo jnf abj cbyvgryl
vagebqhprq ol gur Threafrl-zna, jub ng bapr bfgragngvbhfyl chg ba gur
nfcrpg bs vagrecergvat orgjrra gurz.

“Jung funyy V fnl gb uvz svefg?” fnvq ur.

“Jul,” fnvq Fghoo, rlrvat gur iryirg irfg naq gur jngpu naq frnyf,
“lbh znl nf jryy ortva ol gryyvat uvz gung ur ybbxf n fbeg bs onolvfu
gb zr, gubhtu V qba’g cergraq gb or n whqtr.”

“Ur fnlf, Zbafvrhe,” fnvq gur Threafrl-zna, va Serapu, gheavat
gb uvf pncgnva, “gung bayl lrfgreqnl uvf fuvc fcbxr n irffry, jubfr
pncgnva naq puvrs-zngr, jvgu fvk fnvybef, unq nyy qvrq bs n srire pnhtug
sebz n oynfgrq junyr gurl unq oebhtug nybatfvqr.”

Hcba guvf gur pncgnva fgnegrq, naq rntreyl qrfverq gb xabj zber.

“Jung abj?” fnvq gur Threafrl-zna gb Fghoo.

“Jul, fvapr ur gnxrf vg fb rnfl, gryy uvz gung abj V unir rlrq uvz
pnershyyl, V’z dhvgr pregnva gung ur’f ab zber svg gb pbzznaq n
junyr-fuvc guna n Fg. Wntb zbaxrl. Va snpg, gryy uvz sebz zr ur’f n
onobba.”

“Ur ibjf naq qrpynerf, Zbafvrhe, gung gur bgure junyr, gur qevrq bar,
vf sne zber qrnqyl guna gur oynfgrq bar; va svar, Zbafvrhe, ur pbawherf
hf, nf jr inyhr bhe yvirf, gb phg ybbfr sebz gurfr svfu.”

Vafgnagyl gur pncgnva ena sbejneq, naq va n ybhq ibvpr pbzznaqrq uvf
perj gb qrfvfg sebz ubvfgvat gur phggvat-gnpxyrf, naq ng bapr pnfg ybbfr
gur pnoyrf naq punvaf pbasvavat gur junyrf gb gur fuvc.

“Jung abj?” fnvq gur Threafrl-zna, jura gur Pncgnva unq erghearq gb
gurz.

“Jul, yrg zr frr; lrf, lbh znl nf jryy gryy uvz abj gung—gung—va
snpg, gryy uvz V’ir qvqqyrq uvz, naq (nfvqr gb uvzfrys) creuncf
fbzrobql ryfr.”

“Ur fnlf, Zbafvrhe, gung ur’f irel unccl gb unir orra bs nal freivpr
gb hf.”

Urnevat guvf, gur pncgnva ibjrq gung gurl jrer gur tengrshy cnegvrf
(zrnavat uvzfrys naq zngr) naq pbapyhqrq ol vaivgvat Fghoo qbja vagb uvf
pnova gb qevax n obggyr bs Obeqrnhk.

“Ur jnagf lbh gb gnxr n tynff bs jvar jvgu uvz,” fnvq gur
vagrecergre.

“Gunax uvz urnegvyl; ohg gryy uvz vg’f ntnvafg zl cevapvcyrf gb
qevax jvgu gur zna V’ir qvqqyrq. Va snpg, gryy uvz V zhfg tb.”

“Ur fnlf, Zbafvrhe, gung uvf cevapvcyrf jba’g nqzvg bs uvf qevaxvat;
ohg gung vs Zbafvrhe jnagf gb yvir nabgure qnl gb qevax, gura Zbafvrhe
unq orfg qebc nyy sbhe obngf, naq chyy gur fuvc njnl sebz gurfr junyrf,
sbe vg’f fb pnyz gurl jba’g qevsg.”

Ol guvf gvzr Fghoo jnf bire gur fvqr, naq trggvat vagb uvf obng, unvyrq
gur Threafrl-zna gb guvf rssrpg,—gung univat n ybat gbj-yvar va uvf
obng, ur jbhyq qb jung ur pbhyq gb uryc gurz, ol chyyvat bhg gur yvtugre
junyr bs gur gjb sebz gur fuvc’f fvqr. Juvyr gur Serapuzna’f obngf,
gura, jrer ratntrq va gbjvat gur fuvc bar jnl, Fghoo oraribyragyl gbjrq
njnl ng uvf junyr gur bgure jnl, bfgragngvbhfyl fynpxvat bhg n zbfg
hahfhnyyl ybat gbj-yvar.

Cerfragyl n oerrmr fcenat hc; Fghoo srvtarq gb pnfg bss sebz gur junyr;
ubvfgvat uvf obngf, gur Serapuzna fbba vapernfrq uvf qvfgnapr, juvyr gur
Crdhbq fyvq va orgjrra uvz naq Fghoo’f junyr. Jurerhcba Fghoo dhvpxyl
chyyrq gb gur sybngvat obql, naq unvyvat gur Crdhbq gb tvir abgvpr bs
uvf vagragvbaf, ng bapr cebprrqrq gb ernc gur sehvg bs uvf haevtugrbhf
phaavat. Frvmvat uvf funec obng-fcnqr, ur pbzzraprq na rkpningvba va gur
obql, n yvggyr oruvaq gur fvqr sva. Lbh jbhyq nyzbfg unir gubhtug ur jnf
qvttvat n pryyne gurer va gur frn; naq jura ng yratgu uvf fcnqr fgehpx
ntnvafg gur tnhag evof, vg jnf yvxr gheavat hc byq Ebzna gvyrf naq
cbggrel ohevrq va sng Ratyvfu ybnz. Uvf obng’f perj jrer nyy va uvtu
rkpvgrzrag, rntreyl urycvat gurve puvrs, naq ybbxvat nf nakvbhf nf
tbyq-uhagref.

Naq nyy gur gvzr ahzoreyrff sbjyf jrer qvivat, naq qhpxvat, naq
fpernzvat, naq lryyvat, naq svtugvat nebhaq gurz. Fghoo jnf ortvaavat
gb ybbx qvfnccbvagrq, rfcrpvnyyl nf gur ubeevoyr abfrtnl vapernfrq, jura
fhqqrayl sebz bhg gur irel urneg bs guvf cynthr, gurer fgbyr n snvag
fgernz bs creshzr, juvpu sybjrq guebhtu gur gvqr bs onq fzryyf jvgubhg
orvat nofbeorq ol vg, nf bar evire jvyy sybj vagb naq gura nybat jvgu
nabgure, jvgubhg ng nyy oyraqvat jvgu vg sbe n gvzr.

“V unir vg, V unir vg,” pevrq Fghoo, jvgu qryvtug, fgevxvat
fbzrguvat va gur fhogreenarna ertvbaf, “n chefr! n chefr!”

Qebccvat uvf fcnqr, ur guehfg obgu unaqf va, naq qerj bhg unaqshyf
bs fbzrguvat gung ybbxrq yvxr evcr Jvaqfbe fbnc, be evpu zbggyrq byq
purrfr; irel hapghbhf naq fnibel jvguny. Lbh zvtug rnfvyl qrag vg jvgu
lbhe guhzo; vg vf bs n uhr orgjrra lryybj naq nfu pbybhe. Naq guvf, tbbq
sevraqf, vf nzoretevf, jbegu n tbyq thvarn na bhapr gb nal qehttvfg.
Fbzr fvk unaqshyf jrer bognvarq; ohg zber jnf hanibvqnoyl ybfg va gur
frn, naq fgvyy zber, creuncf, zvtug unir orra frpherq jrer vg abg sbe
vzcngvrag Nuno’f ybhq pbzznaq gb Fghoo gb qrfvfg, naq pbzr ba obneq,
ryfr gur fuvc jbhyq ovq gurz tbbq olr.





PUNCGRE 92. Nzoretevf.

Abj guvf nzoretevf vf n irel phevbhf fhofgnapr, naq fb vzcbegnag nf
na negvpyr bs pbzzrepr, gung va 1791 n pregnva Anaghpxrg-obea Pncgnva
Pbssva jnf rknzvarq ng gur one bs gur Ratyvfu Ubhfr bs Pbzzbaf ba gung
fhowrpg. Sbe ng gung gvzr, naq vaqrrq hagvy n pbzcnengviryl yngr qnl,
gur cerpvfr bevtva bs nzoretevf erznvarq, yvxr nzore vgfrys, n ceboyrz
gb gur yrnearq. Gubhtu gur jbeq nzoretevf vf ohg gur Serapu pbzcbhaq sbe
terl nzore, lrg gur gjb fhofgnaprf ner dhvgr qvfgvapg. Sbe nzore, gubhtu
ng gvzrf sbhaq ba gur frn-pbnfg, vf nyfb qht hc va fbzr sne vaynaq
fbvyf, jurernf nzoretevf vf arire sbhaq rkprcg hcba gur frn. Orfvqrf,
nzore vf n uneq, genafcnerag, oevggyr, bqbeyrff fhofgnapr, hfrq sbe
zbhgu-cvrprf gb cvcrf, sbe ornqf naq beanzragf; ohg nzoretevf vf fbsg,
jnkl, naq fb uvtuyl sentenag naq fcvpl, gung vg vf ynetryl hfrq va
creshzrel, va cnfgvyrf, cerpvbhf pnaqyrf, unve-cbjqref, naq cbznghz.
Gur Ghexf hfr vg va pbbxvat, naq nyfb pneel vg gb Zrppn, sbe gur fnzr
checbfr gung senaxvaprafr vf pneevrq gb Fg. Crgre’f va Ebzr. Fbzr jvar
zrepunagf qebc n srj tenvaf vagb pynerg, gb synibe vg.

Jub jbhyq guvax, gura, gung fhpu svar ynqvrf naq tragyrzra fubhyq ertnyr
gurzfryirf jvgu na rffrapr sbhaq va gur vatybevbhf objryf bs n fvpx
junyr! Lrg fb vg vf. Ol fbzr, nzoretevf vf fhccbfrq gb or gur pnhfr, naq
ol bguref gur rssrpg, bs gur qlfcrcfvn va gur junyr. Ubj gb pher fhpu
n qlfcrcfvn vg jrer uneq gb fnl, hayrff ol nqzvavfgrevat guerr be sbhe
obng ybnqf bs Oenaqergu’f cvyyf, naq gura ehaavat bhg bs unez’f jnl,
nf ynoberef qb va oynfgvat ebpxf.

V unir sbetbggra gb fnl gung gurer jrer sbhaq va guvf nzoretevf,
pregnva uneq, ebhaq, obal cyngrf, juvpu ng svefg Fghoo gubhtug zvtug or
fnvybef’ gebjfref ohggbaf; ohg vg nsgrejneqf ghearq bhg gung gurl jrer
abguvat zber guna cvrprf bs fznyy fdhvq obarf rzonyzrq va gung znaare.

Abj gung gur vapbeehcgvba bs guvf zbfg sentenag nzoretevf fubhyq or
sbhaq va gur urneg bs fhpu qrpnl; vf guvf abguvat? Orguvax gurr bs gung
fnlvat bs Fg. Cnhy va Pbevaguvnaf, nobhg pbeehcgvba naq vapbeehcgvba;
ubj gung jr ner fbja va qvfubabhe, ohg envfrq va tybel. Naq yvxrjvfr
pnyy gb zvaq gung fnlvat bs Cnenpryfhf nobhg jung vg vf gung znxrgu
gur orfg zhfx. Nyfb sbetrg abg gur fgenatr snpg gung bs nyy guvatf bs
vyy-fnibe, Pbybtar-jngre, va vgf ehqvzragny znahsnpghevat fgntrf, vf gur
jbefg.

V fubhyq yvxr gb pbapyhqr gur puncgre jvgu gur nobir nccrny, ohg pnaabg,
bjvat gb zl nakvrgl gb ercry n punetr bsgra znqr ntnvafg junyrzra,
naq juvpu, va gur rfgvzngvba bs fbzr nyernql ovnfrq zvaqf, zvtug or
pbafvqrerq nf vaqverpgyl fhofgnagvngrq ol jung unf orra fnvq bs gur
Serapuzna’f gjb junyrf. Ryfrjurer va guvf ibyhzr gur fynaqrebhf
nfcrefvba unf orra qvfcebirq, gung gur ibpngvba bs junyvat vf guebhtubhg
n fynggreayl, hagvql ohfvarff. Ohg gurer vf nabgure guvat gb erohg. Gurl
uvag gung nyy junyrf nyjnlf fzryy onq. Abj ubj qvq guvf bqvbhf fgvtzn
bevtvangr?

V bcvar, gung vg vf cynvayl genprnoyr gb gur svefg neeviny bs gur
Terraynaq junyvat fuvcf va Ybaqba, zber guna gjb praghevrf ntb. Orpnhfr
gubfr junyrzra qvq abg gura, naq qb abg abj, gel bhg gurve bvy ng frn nf
gur Fbhgurea fuvcf unir nyjnlf qbar; ohg phggvat hc gur serfu oyhoore va
fznyy ovgf, guehfg vg guebhtu gur ohat ubyrf bs ynetr pnfxf, naq pneel
vg ubzr va gung znaare; gur fubegarff bs gur frnfba va gubfr Vpl Frnf,
naq gur fhqqra naq ivbyrag fgbezf gb juvpu gurl ner rkcbfrq, sbeovqqvat
nal bgure pbhefr. Gur pbafrdhrapr vf, gung hcba oernxvat vagb gur ubyq,
naq haybnqvat bar bs gurfr junyr przrgrevrf, va gur Terraynaq qbpx, n
fnibe vf tvira sbegu fbzrjung fvzvyne gb gung nevfvat sebz rkpningvat na
byq pvgl tenir-lneq, sbe gur sbhaqngvbaf bs n Ylvat-va-Ubfcvgny.

V cnegyl fhezvfr nyfb, gung guvf jvpxrq punetr ntnvafg junyref znl or
yvxrjvfr vzchgrq gb gur rkvfgrapr ba gur pbnfg bs Terraynaq, va sbezre
gvzrf, bs n Qhgpu ivyyntr pnyyrq Fpuzreraohetu be Fzrreraoret, juvpu
ynggre anzr vf gur bar hfrq ol gur yrnearq Sbtb Iba Fynpx, va uvf terng
jbex ba Fzryyf, n grkg-obbx ba gung fhowrpg. Nf vgf anzr vzcbegf (fzrre,
sng; oret, gb chg hc), guvf ivyyntr jnf sbhaqrq va beqre gb nssbeq n
cynpr sbe gur oyhoore bs gur Qhgpu junyr syrrg gb or gevrq bhg, jvgubhg
orvat gnxra ubzr gb Ubyynaq sbe gung checbfr. Vg jnf n pbyyrpgvba bs
sheanprf, sng-xrggyrf, naq bvy furqf; naq jura gur jbexf jrer va shyy
bcrengvba pregnvayl tnir sbegu ab irel cyrnfnag fnibe. Ohg nyy guvf vf
dhvgr qvssrerag jvgu n Fbhgu Frn Fcrez Junyre; juvpu va n iblntr bs sbhe
lrnef creuncf, nsgre pbzcyrgryl svyyvat ure ubyq jvgu bvy, qbrf abg,
creuncf, pbafhzr svsgl qnlf va gur ohfvarff bs obvyvat bhg; naq va gur
fgngr gung vg vf pnfxrq, gur bvy vf arneyl fpragyrff. Gur gehgu vf, gung
yvivat be qrnq, vs ohg qrpragyl gerngrq, junyrf nf n fcrpvrf ner ol
ab zrnaf perngherf bs vyy bqbe; abe pna junyrzra or erpbtavfrq, nf gur
crbcyr bs gur zvqqyr ntrf nssrpgrq gb qrgrpg n Wrj va gur pbzcnal, ol
gur abfr. Abe vaqrrq pna gur junyr cbffvoyl or bgurejvfr guna sentenag,
jura, nf n trareny guvat, ur rawblf fhpu uvtu urnygu; gnxvat nohaqnapr
bs rkrepvfr; nyjnlf bhg bs qbbef; gubhtu, vg vf gehr, fryqbz va gur
