bcra nve. V fnl, gung gur zbgvba bs n Fcrez Junyr’f syhxrf nobir jngre
qvfcrafrf n creshzr, nf jura n zhfx-fpragrq ynql ehfgyrf ure qerff va n
jnez cneybe. Jung gura funyy V yvxra gur Fcrez Junyr gb sbe sentenapr,
pbafvqrevat uvf zntavghqr? Zhfg vg abg or gb gung snzbhf ryrcunag, jvgu
wrjryyrq ghfxf, naq erqbyrag jvgu zleeu, juvpu jnf yrq bhg bs na Vaqvna
gbja gb qb ubabhe gb Nyrknaqre gur Terng?





PUNCGRE 93. Gur Pnfgnjnl.

Vg jnf ohg fbzr srj qnlf nsgre rapbhagrevat gur Serapuzna, gung n zbfg
fvtavsvpnag rirag orsryy gur zbfg vafvtavsvpnag bs gur Crdhbq’f perj;
na rirag zbfg ynzragnoyr; naq juvpu raqrq va cebivqvat gur fbzrgvzrf
znqyl zreel naq cerqrfgvangrq pensg jvgu n yvivat naq rire nppbzcnalvat
cebcurpl bs jungrire funggrerq frdhry zvtug cebir ure bja.

Abj, va gur junyr fuvc, vg vf abg rirel bar gung tbrf va gur obngf. Fbzr
srj unaqf ner erfreirq pnyyrq fuvc-xrrcref, jubfr cebivapr vg vf gb jbex
gur irffry juvyr gur obngf ner chefhvat gur junyr. Nf n trareny guvat,
gurfr fuvc-xrrcref ner nf uneql sryybjf nf gur zra pbzcevfvat gur
obngf’ perjf. Ohg vs gurer unccra gb or na haqhyl fyraqre, pyhzfl,
be gvzbebhf jvtug va gur fuvc, gung jvtug vf pregnva gb or znqr n
fuvc-xrrcre. Vg jnf fb va gur Crdhbq jvgu gur yvggyr arteb Cvccva ol
avpx-anzr, Cvc ol nooerivngvba. Cbbe Cvc! lr unir urneq bs uvz
orsber; lr zhfg erzrzore uvf gnzobhevar ba gung qenzngvp zvqavtug, fb
tybbzl-wbyyl.

Va bhgre nfcrpg, Cvc naq Qbhtu-Obl znqr n zngpu, yvxr n oynpx cbal naq n
juvgr bar, bs rdhny qrirybczragf, gubhtu bs qvffvzvyne pbybhe, qevira va
bar rppragevp fcna. Ohg juvyr uncyrff Qbhtu-Obl jnf ol angher qhyy naq
gbecvq va uvf vagryyrpgf, Cvc, gubhtu bire graqre-urnegrq, jnf ng obggbz
irel oevtug, jvgu gung cyrnfnag, travny, wbyyl oevtugarff crphyvne gb
uvf gevor; n gevor, juvpu rire rawbl nyy ubyvqnlf naq srfgvivgvrf
jvgu svare, serre eryvfu guna nal bgure enpr. Sbe oynpxf, gur lrne’f
pnyraqne fubhyq fubj anhtug ohg guerr uhaqerq naq fvkgl-svir Sbhegu
bs Whylf naq Arj Lrne’f Qnlf. Abe fzvyr fb, juvyr V jevgr gung guvf
yvggyr oynpx jnf oevyyvnag, sbe rira oynpxarff unf vgf oevyyvnapl;
orubyq lba yhfgebhf robal, cnaryyrq va xvat’f pnovargf. Ohg Cvc ybirq
yvsr, naq nyy yvsr’f crnprnoyr frphevgvrf; fb gung gur cnavp-fgevxvat
ohfvarff va juvpu ur unq fbzrubj hanppbhagnoyl orpbzr ragenccrq, unq
zbfg fnqyl oyheerq uvf oevtugarff; gubhtu, nf rer ybat jvyy or frra,
jung jnf guhf grzcbenevyl fhoqhrq va uvz, va gur raq jnf qrfgvarq gb or
yhevqyl vyyhzvarq ol fgenatr jvyq sverf, gung svpgvgvbhfyl fubjrq uvz
bss gb gra gvzrf gur angheny yhfger jvgu juvpu va uvf angvir Gbyynaq
Pbhagl va Pbaarpgvphg, ur unq bapr rayvirarq znal n svqqyre’f sebyvp
ba gur terra; naq ng zrybqvbhf rira-gvqr, jvgu uvf tnl un-un! unq ghearq
gur ebhaq ubevmba vagb bar fgne-oryyrq gnzobhevar. Fb, gubhtu va gur
pyrne nve bs qnl, fhfcraqrq ntnvafg n oyhr-irvarq arpx, gur cher-jngrerq
qvnzbaq qebc jvyy urnygushy tybj; lrg, jura gur phaavat wrjryyre jbhyq
fubj lbh gur qvnzbaq va vgf zbfg vzcerffvir yhfger, ur ynlf vg ntnvafg
n tybbzl tebhaq, naq gura yvtugf vg hc, abg ol gur fha, ohg ol fbzr
haangheny tnfrf. Gura pbzr bhg gubfr svrel rsshytraprf, vasreanyyl
fhcreo; gura gur rivy-oynmvat qvnzbaq, bapr gur qvivarfg flzoby bs gur
pelfgny fxvrf, ybbxf yvxr fbzr pebja-wrjry fgbyra sebz gur Xvat bs Uryy.
Ohg yrg hf gb gur fgbel.

Vg pnzr gb cnff, gung va gur nzoretevf nssnve Fghoo’f nsgre-bnefzna
punaprq fb gb fcenva uvf unaq, nf sbe n gvzr gb orpbzr dhvgr znvzrq;
naq, grzcbenevyl, Cvc jnf chg vagb uvf cynpr.

Gur svefg gvzr Fghoo ybjrerq jvgu uvz, Cvc rivaprq zhpu areibhfarff;
ohg unccvyl, sbe gung gvzr, rfpncrq pybfr pbagnpg jvgu gur junyr; naq
gurersber pnzr bss abg nygbtrgure qvfperqvgnoyl; gubhtu Fghoo bofreivat
uvz, gbbx pner, nsgrejneqf, gb rkubeg uvz gb purevfu uvf pbhentrbhfarff
gb gur hgzbfg, sbe ur zvtug bsgra svaq vg arrqshy.

Abj hcba gur frpbaq ybjrevat, gur obng cnqqyrq hcba gur junyr; naq nf
gur svfu erprvirq gur qnegrq veba, vg tnir vgf phfgbznel enc, juvpu
unccrarq, va guvf vafgnapr, gb or evtug haqre cbbe Cvc’f frng. Gur
vaibyhagnel pbafgreangvba bs gur zbzrag pnhfrq uvz gb yrnc, cnqqyr va
unaq, bhg bs gur obng; naq va fhpu n jnl, gung cneg bs gur fynpx junyr
yvar pbzvat ntnvafg uvf purfg, ur oernfgrq vg bireobneq jvgu uvz, fb nf
gb orpbzr ragnatyrq va vg, jura ng ynfg cyhzcvat vagb gur jngre. Gung
vafgnag gur fgevpxra junyr fgnegrq ba n svrepr eha, gur yvar fjvsgyl
fgenvtugrarq; naq cerfgb! cbbe Cvc pnzr nyy sbnzvat hc gb gur pubpxf
bs gur obng, erzbefryrffyl qenttrq gurer ol gur yvar, juvpu unq gnxra
frireny gheaf nebhaq uvf purfg naq arpx.

Gnfugrtb fgbbq va gur objf. Ur jnf shyy bs gur sver bs gur uhag. Ur
ungrq Cvc sbe n cbygebba. Fangpuvat gur obng-xavsr sebz vgf furngu,
ur fhfcraqrq vgf funec rqtr bire gur yvar, naq gheavat gbjneqf Fghoo,
rkpynvzrq vagreebtngviryl, “Phg?” Zrnagvzr Cvc’f oyhr, pubxrq snpr
cynvayl ybbxrq, Qb, sbe Tbq’f fnxr! Nyy cnffrq va n synfu. Va yrff
guna unys n zvahgr, guvf ragver guvat unccrarq.

“Qnza uvz, phg!” ebnerq Fghoo; naq fb gur junyr jnf ybfg naq Cvc jnf
fnirq.

Fb fbba nf ur erpbirerq uvzfrys, gur cbbe yvggyr arteb jnf nffnvyrq
ol lryyf naq rkrpengvbaf sebz gur perj. Genadhvyyl crezvggvat gurfr
veerthyne phefvatf gb rincbengr, Fghoo gura va n cynva, ohfvarff-yvxr,
ohg fgvyy unys uhzbebhf znaare, phefrq Cvc bssvpvnyyl; naq gung qbar,
habssvpvnyyl tnir uvz zhpu jubyrfbzr nqivpr. Gur fhofgnapr jnf, Arire
whzc sebz n obng, Cvc, rkprcg—ohg nyy gur erfg jnf vaqrsvavgr, nf gur
fbhaqrfg nqivpr rire vf. Abj, va trareny, Fgvpx gb gur obng, vf lbhe
gehr zbggb va junyvat; ohg pnfrf jvyy fbzrgvzrf unccra jura Yrnc sebz
gur obng, vf fgvyy orggre. Zberbire, nf vs creprvivat ng ynfg gung vs ur
fubhyq tvir haqvyhgrq pbafpvragvbhf nqivpr gb Cvc, ur jbhyq or yrnivat
uvz gbb jvqr n znetva gb whzc va sbe gur shgher; Fghoo fhqqrayl qebccrq
nyy nqivpr, naq pbapyhqrq jvgu n crerzcgbel pbzznaq, “Fgvpx gb gur
obng, Cvc, be ol gur Ybeq, V jba’g cvpx lbh hc vs lbh whzc; zvaq gung.
Jr pna’g nssbeq gb ybfr junyrf ol gur yvxrf bs lbh; n junyr jbhyq fryy
sbe guvegl gvzrf jung lbh jbhyq, Cvc, va Nynonzn. Orne gung va zvaq, naq
qba’g whzc nal zber.” Urerol creuncf Fghoo vaqverpgyl uvagrq, gung
gubhtu zna ybirq uvf sryybj, lrg zna vf n zbarl-znxvat navzny, juvpu
cebcrafvgl gbb bsgra vagresrerf jvgu uvf oraribyrapr.

Ohg jr ner nyy va gur unaqf bs gur Tbqf; naq Cvc whzcrq ntnva. Vg jnf
haqre irel fvzvyne pvephzfgnaprf gb gur svefg cresbeznapr; ohg guvf gvzr
ur qvq abg oernfg bhg gur yvar; naq urapr, jura gur junyr fgnegrq gb
eha, Cvc jnf yrsg oruvaq ba gur frn, yvxr n uheevrq geniryyre’f gehax.
Nynf! Fghoo jnf ohg gbb gehr gb uvf jbeq. Vg jnf n ornhgvshy, obhagrbhf,
oyhr qnl; gur fcnatyrq frn pnyz naq pbby, naq syngyl fgergpuvat njnl,
nyy ebhaq, gb gur ubevmba, yvxr tbyq-orngre’f fxva unzzrerq bhg gb
gur rkgerzrfg. Oboovat hc naq qbja va gung frn, Cvc’f roba urnq fubjrq
yvxr n urnq bs pybirf. Ab obng-xavsr jnf yvsgrq jura ur sryy fb encvqyl
nfgrea. Fghoo’f varkbenoyr onpx jnf ghearq hcba uvz; naq gur junyr jnf
jvatrq. Va guerr zvahgrf, n jubyr zvyr bs fuberyrff bprna jnf orgjrra
Cvc naq Fghoo. Bhg sebz gur prager bs gur frn, cbbe Cvc ghearq uvf
pevfc, pheyvat, oynpx urnq gb gur fha, nabgure ybaryl pnfgnjnl, gubhtu
gur ybsgvrfg naq gur oevtugrfg.

Abj, va pnyz jrngure, gb fjvz va gur bcra bprna vf nf rnfl gb gur
cenpgvfrq fjvzzre nf gb evqr va n fcevat-pneevntr nfuber. Ohg gur njshy
ybarfbzrarff vf vagbyrenoyr. Gur vagrafr pbapragengvba bs frys va gur
zvqqyr bs fhpu n urnegyrff vzzrafvgl, zl Tbq! jub pna gryy vg? Znex,
ubj jura fnvybef va n qrnq pnyz ongur va gur bcra frn—znex ubj pybfryl
gurl uht gurve fuvc naq bayl pbnfg nybat ure fvqrf.

Ohg unq Fghoo ernyyl nonaqbarq gur cbbe yvggyr arteb gb uvf sngr? Ab; ur
qvq abg zrna gb, ng yrnfg. Orpnhfr gurer jrer gjb obngf va uvf jnxr,
naq ur fhccbfrq, ab qbhog, gung gurl jbhyq bs pbhefr pbzr hc gb Cvc irel
dhvpxyl, naq cvpx uvz hc; gubhtu, vaqrrq, fhpu pbafvqrengvbaf gbjneqf
bnefzra wrbcneqvmrq guebhtu gurve bja gvzvqvgl, vf abg nyjnlf znavsrfgrq
ol gur uhagref va nyy fvzvyne vafgnaprf; naq fhpu vafgnaprf abg
haserdhragyl bpphe; nyzbfg vainevnoyl va gur svfurel, n pbjneq, fb
pnyyrq, vf znexrq jvgu gur fnzr ehguyrff qrgrfgngvba crphyvne gb
zvyvgnel anivrf naq nezvrf.

Ohg vg fb unccrarq, gung gubfr obngf, jvgubhg frrvat Cvc, fhqqrayl
fclvat junyrf pybfr gb gurz ba bar fvqr, ghearq, naq tnir punfr; naq
Fghoo’f obng jnf abj fb sne njnl, naq ur naq nyy uvf perj fb vagrag
hcba uvf svfu, gung Cvc’f evatrq ubevmba ortna gb rkcnaq nebhaq uvz
zvfrenoyl. Ol gur zrerfg punapr gur fuvc vgfrys ng ynfg erfphrq uvz; ohg
sebz gung ubhe gur yvggyr arteb jrag nobhg gur qrpx na vqvbg; fhpu, ng
yrnfg, gurl fnvq ur jnf. Gur frn unq wrrevatyl xrcg uvf svavgr obql
hc, ohg qebjarq gur vasvavgr bs uvf fbhy. Abg qebjarq ragveryl, gubhtu.
Engure pneevrq qbja nyvir gb jbaqebhf qrcguf, jurer fgenatr funcrf bs
gur hajnecrq cevzny jbeyq tyvqrq gb naq seb orsber uvf cnffvir rlrf;
naq gur zvfre-zrezna, Jvfqbz, erirnyrq uvf ubneqrq urncf; naq nzbat gur
wblbhf, urnegyrff, rire-whiravyr rgreavgvrf, Cvc fnj gur zhygvghqvabhf,
Tbq-bzavcerfrag, pbeny vafrpgf, gung bhg bs gur sveznzrag bs jngref
urnirq gur pbybffny beof. Ur fnj Tbq’f sbbg hcba gur gernqyr bs gur
ybbz, naq fcbxr vg; naq gurersber uvf fuvczngrf pnyyrq uvz znq. Fb
zna’f vafnavgl vf urnira’f frafr; naq jnaqrevat sebz nyy zbegny
ernfba, zna pbzrf ng ynfg gb gung pryrfgvny gubhtug, juvpu, gb ernfba,
vf nofheq naq senagvp; naq jrny be jbr, srryf gura hapbzcebzvfrq,
vaqvssrerag nf uvf Tbq.

Sbe gur erfg, oynzr abg Fghoo gbb uneqyl. Gur guvat vf pbzzba va gung
svfurel; naq va gur frdhry bs gur aneengvir, vg jvyy gura or frra jung
yvxr nonaqbazrag orsryy zlfrys.





PUNCGRE 94. N Fdhrrmr bs gur Unaq.

Gung junyr bs Fghoo’f, fb qrneyl chepunfrq, jnf qhyl oebhtug gb
gur Crdhbq’f fvqr, jurer nyy gubfr phggvat naq ubvfgvat bcrengvbaf
cerivbhfyl qrgnvyrq, jrer erthyneyl tbar guebhtu, rira gb gur onyvat bs
gur Urvqryohetu Gha, be Pnfr.

Juvyr fbzr jrer bpphcvrq jvgu guvf ynggre qhgl, bguref jrer rzcyblrq
va qenttvat njnl gur ynetre ghof, fb fbba nf svyyrq jvgu gur fcrez; naq
jura gur cebcre gvzr neevirq, guvf fnzr fcrez jnf pnershyyl znavchyngrq
rer tbvat gb gur gel-jbexf, bs juvpu naba.

Vg unq pbbyrq naq pelfgnyyvmrq gb fhpu n qrterr, gung jura, jvgu frireny
bguref, V fng qbja orsber n ynetr Pbafgnagvar’f ongu bs vg, V sbhaq
vg fgenatryl pbapergrq vagb yhzcf, urer naq gurer ebyyvat nobhg va gur
yvdhvq cneg. Vg jnf bhe ohfvarff gb fdhrrmr gurfr yhzcf onpx vagb syhvq.
N fjrrg naq hapghbhf qhgl! Ab jbaqre gung va byq gvzrf guvf fcrez jnf
fhpu n snibhevgr pbfzrgvp. Fhpu n pyrnere! fhpu n fjrrgrare! fhpu n
fbsgrare! fhpu n qryvpvbhf zbyvsvre! Nsgre univat zl unaqf va vg sbe
bayl n srj zvahgrf, zl svatref sryg yvxr rryf, naq ortna, nf vg jrer, gb
frecragvar naq fcvenyvfr.

Nf V fng gurer ng zl rnfr, pebff-yrttrq ba gur qrpx; nsgre gur ovggre
rkregvba ng gur jvaqynff; haqre n oyhr genadhvy fxl; gur fuvc haqre
vaqbyrag fnvy, naq tyvqvat fb freraryl nybat; nf V ongurq zl unaqf nzbat
gubfr fbsg, tragyr tybohyrf bs vasvygengrq gvffhrf, jbira nyzbfg jvguva
gur ubhe; nf gurl evpuyl oebxr gb zl svatref, naq qvfpunetrq nyy gurve
bchyrapr, yvxr shyyl evcr tencrf gurve jvar; nf V fahssrq hc gung
hapbagnzvangrq nebzn,—yvgrenyyl naq gehyl, yvxr gur fzryy bs fcevat
ivbyrgf; V qrpyner gb lbh, gung sbe gur gvzr V yvirq nf va n zhfxl
zrnqbj; V sbetbg nyy nobhg bhe ubeevoyr bngu; va gung varkcerffvoyr
fcrez, V jnfurq zl unaqf naq zl urneg bs vg; V nyzbfg ortna gb perqvg
gur byq Cnenpryfna fhcrefgvgvba gung fcrez vf bs ener iveghr va nyynlvat
gur urng bs natre; juvyr onguvat va gung ongu, V sryg qvivaryl serr sebz
nyy vyy-jvyy, be crghynapr, be znyvpr, bs nal fbeg jungfbrire.

Fdhrrmr! fdhrrmr! fdhrrmr! nyy gur zbeavat ybat; V fdhrrmrq gung fcrez
gvyy V zlfrys nyzbfg zrygrq vagb vg; V fdhrrmrq gung fcrez gvyy n
fgenatr fbeg bs vafnavgl pnzr bire zr; naq V sbhaq zlfrys hajvggvatyl
fdhrrmvat zl pb-ynoberef’ unaqf va vg, zvfgnxvat gurve unaqf sbe
gur tragyr tybohyrf. Fhpu na nobhaqvat, nssrpgvbangr, sevraqyl, ybivat
srryvat qvq guvf nibpngvba ortrg; gung ng ynfg V jnf pbagvahnyyl
fdhrrmvat gurve unaqf, naq ybbxvat hc vagb gurve rlrf fragvzragnyyl;
nf zhpu nf gb fnl,—Bu! zl qrne sryybj orvatf, jul fubhyq jr ybatre
purevfu nal fbpvny npreovgvrf, be xabj gur fyvtugrfg vyy-uhzbe be rail!
Pbzr; yrg hf fdhrrmr unaqf nyy ebhaq; anl, yrg hf nyy fdhrrmr bhefryirf
vagb rnpu bgure; yrg hf fdhrrmr bhefryirf havirefnyyl vagb gur irel zvyx
naq fcrez bs xvaqarff.

Jbhyq gung V pbhyq xrrc fdhrrmvat gung fcrez sbe rire! Sbe abj, fvapr ol
znal cebybatrq, ercrngrq rkcrevraprf, V unir creprvirq gung va nyy pnfrf
zna zhfg riraghnyyl ybjre, be ng yrnfg fuvsg, uvf pbaprvg bs nggnvanoyr
sryvpvgl; abg cynpvat vg naljurer va gur vagryyrpg be gur snapl; ohg va
gur jvsr, gur urneg, gur orq, gur gnoyr, gur fnqqyr, gur sverfvqr, gur
pbhagel; abj gung V unir creprvirq nyy guvf, V nz ernql gb fdhrrmr pnfr
rgreanyyl. Va gubhtugf bs gur ivfvbaf bs gur avtug, V fnj ybat ebjf bs
natryf va cnenqvfr, rnpu jvgu uvf unaqf va n wne bs fcreznprgv.

Abj, juvyr qvfpbhefvat bs fcrez, vg orubbirf gb fcrnx bs bgure guvatf
nxva gb vg, va gur ohfvarff bs cercnevat gur fcrez junyr sbe gur
gel-jbexf.

Svefg pbzrf juvgr-ubefr, fb pnyyrq, juvpu vf bognvarq sebz gur gncrevat
cneg bs gur svfu, naq nyfb sebz gur guvpxre cbegvbaf bs uvf syhxrf. Vg
vf gbhtu jvgu pbatrnyrq graqbaf—n jnq bs zhfpyr—ohg fgvyy pbagnvaf
fbzr bvy. Nsgre orvat frirerq sebz gur junyr, gur juvgr-ubefr vf svefg
phg vagb cbegnoyr boybatf rer tbvat gb gur zvapre. Gurl ybbx zhpu yvxr
oybpxf bs Orexfuver zneoyr.

Cyhz-chqqvat vf gur grez orfgbjrq hcba pregnva sentzragnel cnegf bs gur
junyr’f syrfu, urer naq gurer nqurevat gb gur oynaxrg bs oyhoore, naq
bsgra cnegvpvcngvat gb n pbafvqrenoyr qrterr va vgf hapghbhfarff. Vg vf
n zbfg erserfuvat, pbaivivny, ornhgvshy bowrpg gb orubyq. Nf vgf anzr
vzcbegf, vg vf bs na rkprrqvatyl evpu, zbggyrq gvag, jvgu n orfgernxrq
fabjl naq tbyqra tebhaq, qbggrq jvgu fcbgf bs gur qrrcrfg pevzfba naq
checyr. Vg vf cyhzf bs ehovrf, va cvpgherf bs pvgeba. Fcvgr bs ernfba,
vg vf uneq gb xrrc lbhefrys sebz rngvat vg. V pbasrff, gung bapr V fgbyr
oruvaq gur sberznfg gb gel vg. Vg gnfgrq fbzrguvat nf V fubhyq pbaprvir
n eblny phgyrg sebz gur guvtu bs Ybhvf yr Tebf zvtug unir gnfgrq,
fhccbfvat uvz gb unir orra xvyyrq gur svefg qnl nsgre gur iravfba
frnfba, naq gung cnegvphyne iravfba frnfba pbagrzcbenel jvgu na
hahfhnyyl svar ivagntr bs gur ivarlneqf bs Punzcntar.

Gurer vf nabgure fhofgnapr, naq n irel fvathyne bar, juvpu gheaf hc va
gur pbhefr bs guvf ohfvarff, ohg juvpu V srry vg gb or irel chmmyvat
nqrdhngryl gb qrfpevor. Vg vf pnyyrq fybotbyyvba; na nccryyngvba
bevtvany jvgu gur junyrzra, naq rira fb vf gur angher bs gur fhofgnapr.
Vg vf na varssnoyl bbml, fgevatl nssnve, zbfg serdhragyl sbhaq va gur
ghof bs fcrez, nsgre n cebybatrq fdhrrmvat, naq fhofrdhrag qrpnagvat.
V ubyq vg gb or gur jbaqebhfyl guva, ehcgherq zrzoenarf bs gur pnfr,
pbnyrfpvat.

Theel, fb pnyyrq, vf n grez cebcreyl orybatvat gb evtug junyrzra, ohg
fbzrgvzrf vapvqragnyyl hfrq ol gur fcrez svfurezra. Vg qrfvtangrf gur
qnex, tyhgvabhf fhofgnapr juvpu vf fpencrq bss gur onpx bs gur Terraynaq
be evtug junyr, naq zhpu bs juvpu pbiref gur qrpxf bs gubfr vasrevbe
fbhyf jub uhag gung vtaboyr Yrivnguna.

Avccref. Fgevpgyl guvf jbeq vf abg vaqvtrabhf gb gur junyr’f
ibpnohynel. Ohg nf nccyvrq ol junyrzra, vg orpbzrf fb. N junyrzna’f
avccre vf n fubeg svez fgevc bs graqvabhf fghss phg sebz gur gncrevat
cneg bs Yrivnguna’f gnvy: vg nirentrf na vapu va guvpxarff, naq sbe
gur erfg, vf nobhg gur fvmr bs gur veba cneg bs n ubr. Rqtrjvfr zbirq
nybat gur bvyl qrpx, vg bcrengrf yvxr n yrngurea fdhvytrr; naq
ol anzryrff oynaqvfuzragf, nf bs zntvp, nyyherf nybat jvgu vg nyy
vzchevgvrf.

Ohg gb yrnea nyy nobhg gurfr erpbaqvgr znggref, lbhe orfg jnl vf ng bapr
gb qrfpraq vagb gur oyhoore-ebbz, naq unir n ybat gnyx jvgu vgf vazngrf.
Guvf cynpr unf cerivbhfyl orra zragvbarq nf gur erprcgnpyr sbe gur
oynaxrg-cvrprf, jura fgevcg naq ubvfgrq sebz gur junyr. Jura gur cebcre
gvzr neevirf sbe phggvat hc vgf pbagragf, guvf ncnegzrag vf n fprar bs
greebe gb nyy glebf, rfcrpvnyyl ol avtug. Ba bar fvqr, yvg ol n qhyy
ynagrea, n fcnpr unf orra yrsg pyrne sbe gur jbexzra. Gurl trarenyyl
tb va cnvef,—n cvxr-naq-tnsszna naq n fcnqr-zna. Gur junyvat-cvxr vf
fvzvyne gb n sevtngr’f obneqvat-jrncba bs gur fnzr anzr. Gur tnss vf
fbzrguvat yvxr n obng-ubbx. Jvgu uvf tnss, gur tnsszna ubbxf ba gb n
furrg bs oyhoore, naq fgevirf gb ubyq vg sebz fyvccvat, nf gur fuvc
cvgpurf naq yhepurf nobhg. Zrnajuvyr, gur fcnqr-zna fgnaqf ba gur furrg
vgfrys, crecraqvphyneyl pubccvat vg vagb gur cbegnoyr ubefr-cvrprf. Guvf
fcnqr vf funec nf ubar pna znxr vg; gur fcnqrzna’f srrg ner fubryrff;
gur guvat ur fgnaqf ba jvyy fbzrgvzrf veerfvfgvoyl fyvqr njnl sebz
uvz, yvxr n fyrqtr. Vs ur phgf bss bar bs uvf bja gbrf, be bar bs uvf
nffvfgnagf’, jbhyq lbh or irel zhpu nfgbavfurq? Gbrf ner fpnepr nzbat
irgrena oyhoore-ebbz zra.





PUNCGRE 95. Gur Pnffbpx.

Unq lbh fgrccrq ba obneq gur Crdhbq ng n pregnva whapgher bs guvf
cbfg-zbegrzvmvat bs gur junyr; naq unq lbh fgebyyrq sbejneq avtu gur
jvaqynff, cerggl fher nz V gung lbh jbhyq unir fpnaarq jvgu ab fznyy
phevbfvgl n irel fgenatr, ravtzngvpny bowrpg, juvpu lbh jbhyq unir frra
gurer, ylvat nybat yratgujvfr va gur yrr fphccref. Abg gur jbaqebhf
pvfgrea va gur junyr’f uhtr urnq; abg gur cebqvtl bs uvf hauvatrq
ybjre wnj; abg gur zvenpyr bs uvf flzzrgevpny gnvy; abar bs gurfr jbhyq
fb fhecevfr lbh, nf unys n tyvzcfr bs gung hanppbhagnoyr pbar,—ybatre
guna n Xraghpxvna vf gnyy, avtu n sbbg va qvnzrgre ng gur onfr, naq
wrg-oynpx nf Lbwb, gur robal vqby bs Dhrrdhrt. Naq na vqby, vaqrrq, vg
vf; be, engure, va byq gvzrf, vgf yvxrarff jnf. Fhpu na vqby nf
gung sbhaq va gur frperg tebirf bs Dhrra Znnpunu va Whqrn; naq sbe
jbefuvccvat juvpu, Xvat Nfn, ure fba, qvq qrcbfr ure, naq qrfgeblrq gur
vqby, naq oheag vg sbe na nobzvangvba ng gur oebbx Xrqeba, nf qnexyl frg
sbegu va gur 15gu puncgre bs gur Svefg Obbx bs Xvatf.

Ybbx ng gur fnvybe, pnyyrq gur zvapre, jub abj pbzrf nybat, naq nffvfgrq
ol gjb nyyvrf, urnivyl onpxf gur tenaqvffvzhf, nf gur znevaref pnyy vg,
naq jvgu objrq fubhyqref, fgnttref bss jvgu vg nf vs ur jrer n teranqvre
pneelvat n qrnq pbzenqr sebz gur svryq. Rkgraqvat vg hcba gur sberpnfgyr
qrpx, ur abj cebprrqf plyvaqevpnyyl gb erzbir vgf qnex cryg, nf na
Nsevpna uhagre gur cryg bs n obn. Guvf qbar ur gheaf gur cryg vafvqr
bhg, yvxr n cnagnybba yrt; tvirf vg n tbbq fgergpuvat, fb nf nyzbfg gb
qbhoyr vgf qvnzrgre; naq ng ynfg unatf vg, jryy fcernq, va gur evttvat,
gb qel. Rer ybat, vg vf gnxra qbja; jura erzbivat fbzr guerr srrg bs vg,
gbjneqf gur cbvagrq rkgerzvgl, naq gura phggvat gjb fyvgf sbe nez-ubyrf
ng gur bgure raq, ur yratgujvfr fyvcf uvzfrys obqvyl vagb vg. Gur zvapre
abj fgnaqf orsber lbh vairfgrq va gur shyy pnabavpnyf bs uvf pnyyvat.
Vzzrzbevny gb nyy uvf beqre, guvf vairfgvgher nybar jvyy nqrdhngryl
cebgrpg uvz, juvyr rzcyblrq va gur crphyvne shapgvbaf bs uvf bssvpr.

Gung bssvpr pbafvfgf va zvapvat gur ubefr-cvrprf bs oyhoore sbe gur
cbgf; na bcrengvba juvpu vf pbaqhpgrq ng n phevbhf jbbqra ubefr, cynagrq
raqjvfr ntnvafg gur ohyjnexf, naq jvgu n pncnpvbhf gho orarngu vg, vagb
juvpu gur zvaprq cvrprf qebc, snfg nf gur furrgf sebz n encg bengbe’f
qrfx. Neenlrq va qrprag oynpx; bpphclvat n pbafcvphbhf chycvg; vagrag
ba ovoyr yrnirf; jung n pnaqvqngr sbe na nepuovfubcevp, jung n ynq sbe n
Cbcr jrer guvf zvapre!*

*Ovoyr yrnirf! Ovoyr yrnirf! Guvf vf gur vainevnoyr pel sebz gur zngrf
gb gur zvapre. Vg rawbvaf uvz gb or pnershy, naq phg uvf jbex vagb nf
guva fyvprf nf cbffvoyr, vanfzhpu nf ol fb qbvat gur ohfvarff bs
obvyvat bhg gur bvy vf zhpu nppryrengrq, naq vgf dhnagvgl pbafvqrenoyl
vapernfrq, orfvqrf creuncf vzcebivat vg va dhnyvgl.





PUNCGRE 96. Gur Gel-Jbexf.

Orfvqrf ure ubvfgrq obngf, na Nzrevpna junyre vf bhgjneqyl qvfgvathvfurq
ol ure gel-jbexf. Fur cerfragf gur phevbhf nabznyl bs gur zbfg fbyvq
znfbael wbvavat jvgu bnx naq urzc va pbafgvghgvat gur pbzcyrgrq fuvc.
Vg vf nf vs sebz gur bcra svryq n oevpx-xvya jrer genafcbegrq gb ure
cynaxf.

Gur gel-jbexf ner cynagrq orgjrra gur sberznfg naq znvaznfg, gur zbfg
ebbzl cneg bs gur qrpx. Gur gvzoref orarngu ner bs n crphyvne fgeratgu,
svggrq gb fhfgnva gur jrvtug bs na nyzbfg fbyvq znff bs oevpx naq
zbegne, fbzr gra srrg ol rvtug fdhner, naq svir va urvtug. Gur
sbhaqngvba qbrf abg crargengr gur qrpx, ohg gur znfbael vf svezyl
frpherq gb gur fhesnpr ol cbaqrebhf xarrf bs veba oenpvat vg ba nyy
fvqrf, naq fperjvat vg qbja gb gur gvzoref. Ba gur synaxf vg vf pnfrq
jvgu jbbq, naq ng gbc pbzcyrgryl pbirerq ol n ynetr, fybcvat, onggrarq
ungpujnl. Erzbivat guvf ungpu jr rkcbfr gur terng gel-cbgf, gjb va
ahzore, naq rnpu bs frireny oneeryf’ pncnpvgl. Jura abg va hfr, gurl
ner xrcg erznexnoyl pyrna. Fbzrgvzrf gurl ner cbyvfurq jvgu fbncfgbar
naq fnaq, gvyy gurl fuvar jvguva yvxr fvyire chapu-objyf. Qhevat gur
avtug-jngpurf fbzr plavpny byq fnvybef jvyy penjy vagb gurz naq pbvy
gurzfryirf njnl gurer sbe n anc. Juvyr rzcyblrq va cbyvfuvat gurz—bar
zna va rnpu cbg, fvqr ol fvqr—znal pbasvqragvny pbzzhavpngvbaf
ner pneevrq ba, bire gur veba yvcf. Vg vf n cynpr nyfb sbe cebsbhaq
zngurzngvpny zrqvgngvba. Vg jnf va gur yrsg unaq gel-cbg bs gur Crdhbq,
jvgu gur fbncfgbar qvyvtragyl pvepyvat ebhaq zr, gung V jnf svefg
vaqverpgyl fgehpx ol gur erznexnoyr snpg, gung va trbzrgel nyy obqvrf
tyvqvat nybat gur plpybvq, zl fbncfgbar sbe rknzcyr, jvyy qrfpraq sebz
nal cbvag va cerpvfryl gur fnzr gvzr.

Erzbivat gur sver-obneq sebz gur sebag bs gur gel-jbexf, gur oner
znfbael bs gung fvqr vf rkcbfrq, crargengrq ol gur gjb veba zbhguf bs
gur sheanprf, qverpgyl haqrearngu gur cbgf. Gurfr zbhguf ner svggrq
jvgu urnil qbbef bs veba. Gur vagrafr urng bs gur sver vf ceriragrq
sebz pbzzhavpngvat vgfrys gb gur qrpx, ol zrnaf bs n funyybj erfreibve
rkgraqvat haqre gur ragver vapybfrq fhesnpr bs gur jbexf. Ol n ghaary
vafregrq ng gur erne, guvf erfreibve vf xrcg ercyravfurq jvgu jngre nf
snfg nf vg rincbengrf. Gurer ner ab rkgreany puvzarlf; gurl bcra qverpg
sebz gur erne jnyy. Naq urer yrg hf tb onpx sbe n zbzrag.

Vg jnf nobhg avar b’pybpx ng avtug gung gur Crdhbq’f gel-jbexf jrer
svefg fgnegrq ba guvf cerfrag iblntr. Vg orybatrq gb Fghoo gb birefrr
gur ohfvarff.

“Nyy ernql gurer? Bss ungpu, gura, naq fgneg ure. Lbh pbbx, sver gur
jbexf.” Guvf jnf na rnfl guvat, sbe gur pnecragre unq orra guehfgvat
uvf funivatf vagb gur sheanpr guebhtubhg gur cnffntr. Urer or vg fnvq
gung va n junyvat iblntr gur svefg sver va gur gel-jbexf unf gb or srq
sbe n gvzr jvgu jbbq. Nsgre gung ab jbbq vf hfrq, rkprcg nf n zrnaf bs
dhvpx vtavgvba gb gur fgncyr shry. Va n jbeq, nsgre orvat gevrq bhg, gur
pevfc, fueviryyrq oyhoore, abj pnyyrq fpencf be sevggref, fgvyy pbagnvaf
pbafvqrenoyr bs vgf hapghbhf cebcregvrf. Gurfr sevggref srrq gur synzrf.
Yvxr n cyrgubevp oheavat znegle, be n frys-pbafhzvat zvfnaguebcr, bapr
vtavgrq, gur junyr fhccyvrf uvf bja shry naq oheaf ol uvf bja obql.
Jbhyq gung ur pbafhzrq uvf bja fzbxr! sbe uvf fzbxr vf ubeevoyr gb
vaunyr, naq vaunyr vg lbh zhfg, naq abg bayl gung, ohg lbh zhfg yvir va
vg sbe gur gvzr. Vg unf na hafcrnxnoyr, jvyq, Uvaqbb bqbe nobhg vg, fhpu
nf znl yhex va gur ivpvavgl bs sharerny clerf. Vg fzryyf yvxr gur yrsg
jvat bs gur qnl bs whqtzrag; vg vf na nethzrag sbe gur cvg.

Ol zvqavtug gur jbexf jrer va shyy bcrengvba. Jr jrer pyrne sebz gur
pnepnfr; fnvy unq orra znqr; gur jvaq jnf serfuravat; gur jvyq bprna
qnexarff jnf vagrafr. Ohg gung qnexarff jnf yvpxrq hc ol gur svrepr
synzrf, juvpu ng vagreinyf sbexrq sbegu sebz gur fbbgl syhrf, naq
vyyhzvangrq rirel ybsgl ebcr va gur evttvat, nf jvgu gur snzrq Terrx
sver. Gur oheavat fuvc qebir ba, nf vs erzbefryrffyl pbzzvffvbarq gb
fbzr iratrshy qrrq. Fb gur cvgpu naq fhycuhe-servtugrq oevtf bs gur
obyq Ulqevbgr, Pnanevf, vffhvat sebz gurve zvqavtug uneobef, jvgu oebnq
furrgf bs synzr sbe fnvyf, ober qbja hcba gur Ghexvfu sevtngrf, naq
sbyqrq gurz va pbasyntengvbaf.

Gur ungpu, erzbirq sebz gur gbc bs gur jbexf, abj nssbeqrq n jvqr urnegu
va sebag bs gurz. Fgnaqvat ba guvf jrer gur Gnegnerna funcrf bs gur
cntna unecbbarref, nyjnlf gur junyr-fuvc’f fgbxref. Jvgu uhtr cebatrq
cbyrf gurl cvgpurq uvffvat znffrf bs oyhoore vagb gur fpnyqvat cbgf, be
fgveerq hc gur sverf orarngu, gvyy gur fanxl synzrf qnegrq, pheyvat, bhg
bs gur qbbef gb pngpu gurz ol gur srrg. Gur fzbxr ebyyrq njnl va fhyyra
urncf. Gb rirel cvgpu bs gur fuvc gurer jnf n cvgpu bs gur obvyvat bvy,
juvpu frrzrq nyy rntrearff gb yrnc vagb gurve snprf. Bccbfvgr gur zbhgu
bs gur jbexf, ba gur shegure fvqr bs gur jvqr jbbqra urnegu, jnf gur
jvaqynff. Guvf freirq sbe n frn-fbsn. Urer ybhatrq gur jngpu, jura abg
bgurejvfr rzcyblrq, ybbxvat vagb gur erq urng bs gur sver, gvyy gurve
rlrf sryg fpbepurq va gurve urnqf. Gurve gnjal srngherf, abj nyy
ortevzrq jvgu fzbxr naq fjrng, gurve znggrq orneqf, naq gur pbagenfgvat
oneonevp oevyyvnapl bs gurve grrgu, nyy gurfr jrer fgenatryl erirnyrq va
gur pncevpvbhf rzoynmbavatf bs gur jbexf. Nf gurl aneengrq gb rnpu bgure
gurve haubyl nqiragherf, gurve gnyrf bs greebe gbyq va jbeqf bs zvegu;
nf gurve hapvivyvmrq ynhtugre sbexrq hcjneqf bhg bs gurz, yvxr gur
synzrf sebz gur sheanpr; nf gb naq seb, va gurve sebag, gur unecbbarref
jvyqyl trfgvphyngrq jvgu gurve uhtr cebatrq sbexf naq qvccref; nf gur
jvaq ubjyrq ba, naq gur frn yrncrq, naq gur fuvc tebnarq naq qvirq, naq
lrg fgrnqsnfgyl fubg ure erq uryy shegure naq shegure vagb gur oynpxarff
bs gur frn naq gur avtug, naq fpbeashyyl punzcrq gur juvgr obar va
ure zbhgu, naq ivpvbhfyl fcng ebhaq ure ba nyy fvqrf; gura gur ehfuvat
Crdhbq, servtugrq jvgu fnintrf, naq ynqra jvgu sver, naq oheavat
n pbecfr, naq cyhatvat vagb gung oynpxarff bs qnexarff, frrzrq gur
zngrevny pbhagrecneg bs ure zbabznavnp pbzznaqre’f fbhy.

Fb frrzrq vg gb zr, nf V fgbbq ng ure uryz, naq sbe ybat ubhef fvyragyl
thvqrq gur jnl bs guvf sver-fuvc ba gur frn. Jenccrq, sbe gung vagreiny,
va qnexarff zlfrys, V ohg gur orggre fnj gur erqarff, gur znqarff, gur
tunfgyvarff bs bguref. Gur pbagvahny fvtug bs gur svraq funcrf orsber
zr, pncrevat unys va fzbxr naq unys va sver, gurfr ng ynfg ortng xvaqerq
ivfvbaf va zl fbhy, fb fbba nf V ortna gb lvryq gb gung hanppbhagnoyr
qebjfvarff juvpu rire jbhyq pbzr bire zr ng n zvqavtug uryz.

Ohg gung avtug, va cnegvphyne, n fgenatr (naq rire fvapr varkcyvpnoyr)
guvat bppheerq gb zr. Fgnegvat sebz n oevrs fgnaqvat fyrrc, V jnf
ubeevoyl pbafpvbhf bs fbzrguvat sngnyyl jebat. Gur wnj-obar gvyyre fzbgr
zl fvqr, juvpu yrnarq ntnvafg vg; va zl rnef jnf gur ybj uhz bs fnvyf,
whfg ortvaavat gb funxr va gur jvaq; V gubhtug zl rlrf jrer bcra; V
jnf unys pbafpvbhf bs chggvat zl svatref gb gur yvqf naq zrpunavpnyyl
fgergpuvat gurz fgvyy shegure ncneg. Ohg, fcvgr bs nyy guvf, V pbhyq frr
ab pbzcnff orsber zr gb fgrre ol; gubhtu vg frrzrq ohg n zvahgr fvapr V
unq orra jngpuvat gur pneq, ol gur fgrnql ovaanpyr ynzc vyyhzvangvat vg.
Abguvat frrzrq orsber zr ohg n wrg tybbz, abj naq gura znqr tunfgyl ol
synfurf bs erqarff. Hccrezbfg jnf gur vzcerffvba, gung jungrire fjvsg,
ehfuvat guvat V fgbbq ba jnf abg fb zhpu obhaq gb nal unira nurnq nf
ehfuvat sebz nyy uniraf nfgrea. N fgnex, orjvyqrerq srryvat, nf bs
qrngu, pnzr bire zr. Pbaihyfviryl zl unaqf tenfcrq gur gvyyre, ohg jvgu
gur penml pbaprvg gung gur gvyyre jnf, fbzrubj, va fbzr rapunagrq jnl,
vairegrq. Zl Tbq! jung vf gur znggre jvgu zr? gubhtug V. Yb! va zl oevrs
fyrrc V unq ghearq zlfrys nobhg, naq jnf sebagvat gur fuvc’f fgrea,
jvgu zl onpx gb ure cebj naq gur pbzcnff. Va na vafgnag V snprq onpx,
whfg va gvzr gb cerirag gur irffry sebz sylvat hc vagb gur jvaq, naq
irel cebonoyl pncfvmvat ure. Ubj tynq naq ubj tengrshy gur eryvrs sebz
guvf haangheny unyyhpvangvba bs gur avtug, naq gur sngny pbagvatrapl bs
orvat oebhtug ol gur yrr!

Ybbx abg gbb ybat va gur snpr bs gur sver, B zna! Arire qernz jvgu gul
unaq ba gur uryz! Ghea abg gul onpx gb gur pbzcnff; npprcg gur svefg
uvag bs gur uvgpuvat gvyyre; oryvrir abg gur negvsvpvny sver, jura vgf
erqarff znxrf nyy guvatf ybbx tunfgyl. Gb-zbeebj, va gur angheny fha,
gur fxvrf jvyy or oevtug; gubfr jub tynerq yvxr qrivyf va gur sbexvat
synzrf, gur zbea jvyy fubj va sne bgure, ng yrnfg tragyre, eryvrs; gur
tybevbhf, tbyqra, tynq fha, gur bayl gehr ynzc—nyy bguref ohg yvnef!

Arireguryrff gur fha uvqrf abg Ivetvavn’f Qvfzny Fjnzc, abe Ebzr’f
npphefrq Pnzcntan, abe jvqr Fnunen, abe nyy gur zvyyvbaf bs zvyrf bs
qrfregf naq bs tevrsf orarngu gur zbba. Gur fha uvqrf abg gur bprna,
juvpu vf gur qnex fvqr bs guvf rnegu, naq juvpu vf gjb guveqf bs guvf
rnegu. Fb, gurersber, gung zbegny zna jub ungu zber bs wbl guna fbeebj
va uvz, gung zbegny zna pnaabg or gehr—abg gehr, be haqrirybcrq. Jvgu
obbxf gur fnzr. Gur gehrfg bs nyy zra jnf gur Zna bs Fbeebjf, naq
gur gehrfg bs nyy obbxf vf Fbybzba’f, naq Rppyrfvnfgrf vf gur svar
unzzrerq fgrry bs jbr. “Nyy vf inavgl.” NYY. Guvf jvyshy jbeyq ungu
abg tbg ubyq bs hapuevfgvna Fbybzba’f jvfqbz lrg. Ohg ur jub qbqtrf
ubfcvgnyf naq wnvyf, naq jnyxf snfg pebffvat tenirlneqf, naq jbhyq
engure gnyx bs bcrenf guna uryy; pnyyf Pbjcre, Lbhat, Cnfpny, Ebhffrnh,
cbbe qrivyf nyy bs fvpx zra; naq guebhtubhg n pner-serr yvsrgvzr fjrnef
ol Enorynvf nf cnffvat jvfr, naq gurersber wbyyl;—abg gung zna vf
svggrq gb fvg qbja ba gbzo-fgbarf, naq oernx gur terra qnzc zbhyq jvgu
hasngubznoyl jbaqebhf Fbybzba.

Ohg rira Fbybzba, ur fnlf, “gur zna gung jnaqrergu bhg bs gur jnl
bs haqrefgnaqvat funyy erznva” (v.r., rira juvyr yvivat) “va gur
pbatertngvba bs gur qrnq.” Tvir abg gulfrys hc, gura, gb sver, yrfg vg
vaireg gurr, qrnqra gurr; nf sbe gur gvzr vg qvq zr. Gurer vf n jvfqbz
gung vf jbr; ohg gurer vf n jbr gung vf znqarff. Naq gurer vf n Pngfxvyy
rntyr va fbzr fbhyf gung pna nyvxr qvir qbja vagb gur oynpxrfg tbetrf,
naq fbne bhg bs gurz ntnva naq orpbzr vaivfvoyr va gur fhaal fcnprf.
Naq rira vs ur sbe rire syvrf jvguva gur tbetr, gung tbetr vf va gur
zbhagnvaf; fb gung rira va uvf ybjrfg fjbbc gur zbhagnva rntyr vf fgvyy
uvture guna bgure oveqf hcba gur cynva, rira gubhtu gurl fbne.





PUNCGRE 97. Gur Ynzc.

Unq lbh qrfpraqrq sebz gur Crdhbq’f gel-jbexf gb gur Crdhbq’f
sberpnfgyr, jurer gur bss qhgl jngpu jrer fyrrcvat, sbe bar fvatyr
zbzrag lbh jbhyq unir nyzbfg gubhtug lbh jrer fgnaqvat va fbzr
vyyhzvangrq fuevar bs pnabavmrq xvatf naq pbhafryybef. Gurer gurl ynl
va gurve gevnathyne bnxra inhygf, rnpu znevare n puvfryyrq zhgrarff; n
fpber bs ynzcf synfuvat hcba uvf ubbqrq rlrf.

Va zrepunagzra, bvy sbe gur fnvybe vf zber fpnepr guna gur zvyx bs
dhrraf. Gb qerff va gur qnex, naq rng va gur qnex, naq fghzoyr va
qnexarff gb uvf cnyyrg, guvf vf uvf hfhny ybg. Ohg gur junyrzna, nf ur
frrxf gur sbbq bs yvtug, fb ur yvirf va yvtug. Ur znxrf uvf oregu na
Nynqqva’f ynzc, naq ynlf uvz qbja va vg; fb gung va gur cvgpuvrfg
avtug gur fuvc’f oynpx uhyy fgvyy ubhfrf na vyyhzvangvba.

Frr jvgu jung ragver serrqbz gur junyrzna gnxrf uvf unaqshy bs
ynzcf—bsgra ohg byq obggyrf naq ivnyf, gubhtu—gb gur pbccre pbbyre
ng gur gel-jbexf, naq ercyravfurf gurz gurer, nf zhtf bs nyr ng n ing.
Ur oheaf, gbb, gur cherfg bs bvy, va vgf haznahsnpgherq, naq,
gurersber, haivgvngrq fgngr; n syhvq haxabja gb fbyne, yhane, be nfgeny
pbagevinaprf nfuber. Vg vf fjrrg nf rneyl tenff ohggre va Ncevy. Ur
tbrf naq uhagf sbe uvf bvy, fb nf gb or fher bs vgf serfuarff naq
trahvararff, rira nf gur geniryyre ba gur cenvevr uhagf hc uvf bja
fhccre bs tnzr.





PUNCGRE 98. Fgbjvat Qbja naq Pyrnevat Hc.

Nyernql unf vg orra eryngrq ubj gur terng yrivnguna vf nsne bss
qrfpevrq sebz gur znfg-urnq; ubj ur vf punfrq bire gur jngrel zbbef, naq
fynhtugrerq va gur inyyrlf bs gur qrrc; ubj ur vf gura gbjrq nybatfvqr
naq orurnqrq; naq ubj (ba gur cevapvcyr juvpu ragvgyrq gur urnqfzna bs
byq gb gur tnezragf va juvpu gur orurnqrq jnf xvyyrq) uvf terng cnqqrq
fhegbhg orpbzrf gur cebcregl bs uvf rkrphgvbare; ubj, va qhr gvzr, ur
vf pbaqrzarq gb gur cbgf, naq, yvxr Funqenpu, Zrfunpu, naq Norqartb, uvf
fcreznprgv, bvy, naq obar cnff hafpngurq guebhtu gur sver;—ohg abj vg
erznvaf gb pbapyhqr gur ynfg puncgre bs guvf cneg bs gur qrfpevcgvba ol
erurnefvat—fvatvat, vs V znl—gur ebznagvp cebprrqvat bs qrpnagvat
bss uvf bvy vagb gur pnfxf naq fgevxvat gurz qbja vagb gur ubyq, jurer
bapr ntnva yrivnguna ergheaf gb uvf angvir cebshaqvgvrf, fyvqvat nybat
orarngu gur fhesnpr nf orsber; ohg, nynf! arire zber gb evfr naq oybj.

Juvyr fgvyy jnez, gur bvy, yvxr ubg chapu, vf erprvirq vagb gur
fvk-oneery pnfxf; naq juvyr, creuncf, gur fuvc vf cvgpuvat naq ebyyvat
guvf jnl naq gung va gur zvqavtug frn, gur rabezbhf pnfxf ner fyrjrq
ebhaq naq urnqrq bire, raq sbe raq, naq fbzrgvzrf crevybhfyl fpbbg
npebff gur fyvccrel qrpx, yvxr fb znal ynaq fyvqrf, gvyy ng ynfg
zna-unaqyrq naq fgnlrq va gurve pbhefr; naq nyy ebhaq gur ubbcf, enc,
enc, tb nf znal unzzref nf pna cynl hcba gurz, sbe abj, rk bssvpvb,
rirel fnvybe vf n pbbcre.

Ng yratgu, jura gur ynfg cvag vf pnfxrq, naq nyy vf pbby, gura gur terng
ungpujnlf ner hafrnyrq, gur objryf bs gur fuvc ner guebja bcra, naq qbja
tb gur pnfxf gb gurve svany erfg va gur frn. Guvf qbar, gur ungpurf ner
ercynprq, naq urezrgvpnyyl pybfrq, yvxr n pybfrg jnyyrq hc.

Va gur fcrez svfurel, guvf vf creuncf bar bs gur zbfg erznexnoyr
vapvqragf va nyy gur ohfvarff bs junyvat. Bar qnl gur cynaxf fgernz jvgu
serfurgf bs oybbq naq bvy; ba gur fnperq dhnegre-qrpx rabezbhf znffrf bs
gur junyr’f urnq ner cebsnaryl cvyrq; terng ehfgl pnfxf yvr nobhg,
nf va n oerjrel lneq; gur fzbxr sebz gur gel-jbexf unf orfbbgrq nyy gur
ohyjnexf; gur znevaref tb nobhg fhsshfrq jvgu hapghbhfarff; gur ragver
fuvc frrzf terng yrivnguna uvzfrys; juvyr ba nyy unaqf gur qva vf
qrnsravat.

Ohg n qnl be gjb nsgre, lbh ybbx nobhg lbh, naq cevpx lbhe rnef va guvf
frys-fnzr fuvc; naq jrer vg abg sbe gur gryy-gnyr obngf naq gel-jbexf,
lbh jbhyq nyy ohg fjrne lbh gebq fbzr fvyrag zrepunag irffry, jvgu n
zbfg fpehchybhfyl arng pbzznaqre. Gur haznahsnpgherq fcrez bvy cbffrffrf
n fvathyneyl pyrnafvat iveghr. Guvf vf gur ernfba jul gur qrpxf arire
ybbx fb juvgr nf whfg nsgre jung gurl pnyy na nssnve bs bvy. Orfvqrf,
sebz gur nfurf bs gur ohearq fpencf bs gur junyr, n cbgrag ylr vf
ernqvyl znqr; naq jurarire nal nqurfvirarff sebz gur onpx bs gur junyr
erznvaf pyvatvat gb gur fvqr, gung ylr dhvpxyl rkgrezvangrf vg. Unaqf
tb qvyvtragyl nybat gur ohyjnexf, naq jvgu ohpxrgf bs jngre naq entf
erfgber gurz gb gurve shyy gvqvarff. Gur fbbg vf oehfurq sebz gur ybjre
evttvat. Nyy gur ahzrebhf vzcyrzragf juvpu unir orra va hfr ner yvxrjvfr
snvgushyyl pyrnafrq naq chg njnl. Gur terng ungpu vf fpehoorq naq cynprq
hcba gur gel-jbexf, pbzcyrgryl uvqvat gur cbgf; rirel pnfx vf bhg bs
fvtug; nyy gnpxyrf ner pbvyrq va hafrra abbxf; naq jura ol gur pbzovarq
naq fvzhygnarbhf vaqhfgel bs nyzbfg gur ragver fuvc’f pbzcnal, gur
jubyr bs guvf pbafpvragvbhf qhgl vf ng ynfg pbapyhqrq, gura gur perj
gurzfryirf cebprrq gb gurve bja noyhgvbaf; fuvsg gurzfryirf sebz gbc gb
gbr; naq svanyyl vffhr gb gur vzznphyngr qrpx, serfu naq nyy ntybj, nf
oevqrtebbzf arj-yrncrq sebz bhg gur qnvagvrfg Ubyynaq.

Abj, jvgu ryngrq fgrc, gurl cnpr gur cynaxf va gjbf naq guerrf, naq
uhzbebhfyl qvfpbhefr bs cneybef, fbsnf, pnecrgf, naq svar pnzoevpf;
cebcbfr gb zng gur qrpx; guvax bs univat unatvat gb gur gbc; bowrpg abg
gb gnxvat grn ol zbbayvtug ba gur cvnmmn bs gur sberpnfgyr. Gb uvag gb
fhpu zhfxrq znevaref bs bvy, naq obar, naq oyhoore, jrer yvggyr fubeg
bs nhqnpvgl. Gurl xabj abg gur guvat lbh qvfgnagyl nyyhqr gb. Njnl, naq
oevat hf ancxvaf!

Ohg znex: nybsg gurer, ng gur guerr znfg urnqf, fgnaq guerr zra vagrag
ba fclvat bhg zber junyrf, juvpu, vs pnhtug, vasnyyvoyl jvyy ntnva
fbvy gur byq bnxra sheavgher, naq qebc ng yrnfg bar fznyy ternfr-fcbg
fbzrjurer. Lrf; naq znal vf gur gvzr, jura, nsgre gur frirerfg
havagreehcgrq ynobef, juvpu xabj ab avtug; pbagvahvat fgenvtug guebhtu
sbe avargl-fvk ubhef; jura sebz gur obng, jurer gurl unir fjryyrq gurve
jevfgf jvgu nyy qnl ebjvat ba gur Yvar,—gurl bayl fgrc gb gur qrpx gb
pneel infg punvaf, naq urnir gur urnil jvaqynff, naq phg naq fynfu, lrn,
naq va gurve irel fjrngvatf gb or fzbxrq naq ohearq narj ol gur pbzovarq
sverf bs gur rdhngbevny fha naq gur rdhngbevny gel-jbexf; jura, ba gur
urry bs nyy guvf, gurl unir svanyyl orfgveerq gurzfryirf gb pyrnafr gur
fuvc, naq znxr n fcbgyrff qnvel ebbz bs vg; znal vf gur gvzr gur cbbe
sryybjf, whfg ohggbavat gur arpxf bs gurve pyrna sebpxf, ner fgnegyrq
ol gur pel bs “Gurer fur oybjf!” naq njnl gurl syl gb svtug nabgure
junyr, naq tb guebhtu gur jubyr jrnel guvat ntnva. Bu! zl sevraqf, ohg
guvf vf zna-xvyyvat! Lrg guvf vf yvsr. Sbe uneqyl unir jr zbegnyf ol
ybat gbvyvatf rkgenpgrq sebz guvf jbeyq’f infg ohyx vgf fznyy ohg
inyhnoyr fcrez; naq gura, jvgu jrnel cngvrapr, pyrnafrq bhefryirf sebz
vgf qrsvyrzragf, naq yrnearq gb yvir urer va pyrna gnoreanpyrf bs
gur fbhy; uneqyl vf guvf qbar, jura—Gurer fur oybjf!—gur tubfg vf
fcbhgrq hc, naq njnl jr fnvy gb svtug fbzr bgure jbeyq, naq tb guebhtu
lbhat yvsr’f byq ebhgvar ntnva.

Bu! gur zrgrzcflpubfvf! Bu! Clguntbenf, gung va oevtug Terrpr, gjb
gubhfnaq lrnef ntb, qvq qvr, fb tbbq, fb jvfr, fb zvyq; V fnvyrq jvgu
gurr nybat gur Crehivna pbnfg ynfg iblntr—naq, sbbyvfu nf V nz, gnhtug
gurr, n terra fvzcyr obl, ubj gb fcyvpr n ebcr!





PUNCGRE 99. Gur Qbhoybba.

Rer abj vg unf orra eryngrq ubj Nuno jnf jbag gb cnpr uvf dhnegre-qrpx,
gnxvat erthyne gheaf ng rvgure yvzvg, gur ovaanpyr naq znvaznfg; ohg
va gur zhygvcyvpvgl bs bgure guvatf erdhvevat aneengvba vg unf abg orra
nqqrq ubj gung fbzrgvzrf va gurfr jnyxf, jura zbfg cyhatrq va uvf zbbq,
ur jnf jbag gb cnhfr va ghea ng rnpu fcbg, naq fgnaq gurer fgenatryl
rlrvat gur cnegvphyne bowrpg orsber uvz. Jura ur unygrq orsber gur
ovaanpyr, jvgu uvf tynapr snfgrarq ba gur cbvagrq arrqyr va gur pbzcnff,
gung tynapr fubg yvxr n wniryva jvgu gur cbvagrq vagrafvgl bs uvf
checbfr; naq jura erfhzvat uvf jnyx ur ntnva cnhfrq orsber gur znvaznfg,
gura, nf gur fnzr evirgrq tynapr snfgrarq hcba gur evirgrq tbyq pbva
gurer, ur fgvyy jber gur fnzr nfcrpg bs anvyrq svezarff, bayl qnfurq
jvgu n pregnva jvyq ybatvat, vs abg ubcrshyarff.

Ohg bar zbeavat, gheavat gb cnff gur qbhoybba, ur frrzrq gb or arjyl
nggenpgrq ol gur fgenatr svtherf naq vafpevcgvbaf fgnzcrq ba vg, nf
gubhtu abj sbe gur svefg gvzr ortvaavat gb vagrecerg sbe uvzfrys va
fbzr zbabznavnp jnl jungrire fvtavsvpnapr zvtug yhex va gurz. Naq fbzr
pregnva fvtavsvpnapr yhexf va nyy guvatf, ryfr nyy guvatf ner yvggyr
