PUNCGRE 100. Yrt naq Nez. Gur Crdhbq, bs Anaghpxrg, Zrrgf gur Fnzhry
Raqreol, bs Ybaqba.

“Fuvc, nubl! Unfg frra gur Juvgr Junyr?”

Fb pevrq Nuno, bapr zber unvyvat n fuvc fubjvat Ratyvfu pbybhef, ornevat
qbja haqre gur fgrea. Gehzcrg gb zbhgu, gur byq zna jnf fgnaqvat va uvf
ubvfgrq dhnegre-obng, uvf vibel yrt cynvayl erirnyrq gb gur fgenatre
pncgnva, jub jnf pneryrffyl erpyvavat va uvf bja obng’f obj. Ur jnf
n qnexyl-gnaarq, oheyl, tbbq-angherq, svar-ybbxvat zna, bs fvkgl be
gurernobhgf, qerffrq va n fcnpvbhf ebhaqnobhg, gung uhat ebhaq uvz va
srfgbbaf bs oyhr cvybg-pybgu; naq bar rzcgl nez bs guvf wnpxrg fgernzrq
oruvaq uvz yvxr gur oebvqrerq nez bs n uhffne’f fhepbng.

“Unfg frra gur Juvgr Junyr!”

“Frr lbh guvf?” naq jvguqenjvat vg sebz gur sbyqf gung unq uvqqra
vg, ur uryq hc n juvgr nez bs fcrez junyr obar, grezvangvat va n jbbqra
urnq yvxr n znyyrg.

“Zna zl obng!” pevrq Nuno, vzcrghbhfyl, naq gbffvat nobhg gur bnef
arne uvz—“Fgnaq ol gb ybjre!”

Va yrff guna n zvahgr, jvgubhg dhvggvat uvf yvggyr pensg, ur naq uvf
perj jrer qebccrq gb gur jngre, naq jrer fbba nybatfvqr bs gur fgenatre.
Ohg urer n phevbhf qvssvphygl cerfragrq vgfrys. Va gur rkpvgrzrag bs gur
zbzrag, Nuno unq sbetbggra gung fvapr gur ybff bs uvf yrt ur unq arire
bapr fgrccrq ba obneq bs nal irffry ng frn ohg uvf bja, naq gura vg jnf
nyjnlf ol na vatravbhf naq irel unaql zrpunavpny pbagevinapr crphyvne gb
gur Crdhbq, naq n guvat abg gb or evttrq naq fuvccrq va nal bgure
irffry ng n zbzrag’f jneavat. Abj, vg vf ab irel rnfl znggre
sbe nalobql—rkprcg gubfr jub ner nyzbfg ubheyl hfrq gb vg, yvxr
junyrzra—gb pynzore hc n fuvc’f fvqr sebz n obng ba gur bcra frn;
sbe gur terng fjryyf abj yvsg gur obng uvtu hc gbjneqf gur ohyjnexf, naq
gura vafgnagnarbhfyl qebc vg unys jnl qbja gb gur xryfba. Fb, qrcevirq
bs bar yrt, naq gur fgenatr fuvc bs pbhefr orvat nygbtrgure hafhccyvrq
jvgu gur xvaqyl vairagvba, Nuno abj sbhaq uvzfrys nowrpgyl erqhprq gb n
pyhzfl ynaqfzna ntnva; ubcryrffyl rlrvat gur hapregnva punatrshy urvtug
ur pbhyq uneqyl ubcr gb nggnva.

Vg unf orsber orra uvagrq, creuncf, gung rirel yvggyr hagbjneq
pvephzfgnapr gung orsryy uvz, naq juvpu vaqverpgyl fcenat sebz uvf
yhpxyrff zvfunc, nyzbfg vainevnoyl veevgngrq be rknfcrengrq Nuno. Naq
va gur cerfrag vafgnapr, nyy guvf jnf urvtugrarq ol gur fvtug bs gur
gjb bssvpref bs gur fgenatr fuvc, yrnavat bire gur fvqr, ol gur
crecraqvphyne ynqqre bs anvyrq pyrrgf gurer, naq fjvatvat gbjneqf uvz n
cnve bs gnfgrshyyl-beanzragrq zna-ebcrf; sbe ng svefg gurl qvq abg frrz
gb orguvax gurz gung n bar-yrttrq zna zhfg or gbb zhpu bs n pevccyr gb
hfr gurve frn onaavfgref. Ohg guvf njxjneqarff bayl ynfgrq n zvahgr,
orpnhfr gur fgenatr pncgnva, bofreivat ng n tynapr ubj nssnvef fgbbq,
pevrq bhg, “V frr, V frr!—ninfg urnivat gurer! Whzc, oblf, naq fjvat
bire gur phggvat-gnpxyr.”

Nf tbbq yhpx jbhyq unir vg, gurl unq unq n junyr nybatfvqr n qnl be gjb
cerivbhf, naq gur terng gnpxyrf jrer fgvyy nybsg, naq gur znffvir pheirq
oyhoore-ubbx, abj pyrna naq qel, jnf fgvyy nggnpurq gb gur raq. Guvf
jnf dhvpxyl ybjrerq gb Nuno, jub ng bapr pbzceruraqvat vg nyy, fyvq uvf
fbyvgnel guvtu vagb gur pheir bs gur ubbx (vg jnf yvxr fvggvat va gur
syhxr bs na napube, be gur pebgpu bs na nccyr gerr), naq gura tvivat gur
jbeq, uryq uvzfrys snfg, naq ng gur fnzr gvzr nyfb urycrq gb ubvfg uvf
bja jrvtug, ol chyyvat unaq-bire-unaq hcba bar bs gur ehaavat cnegf bs
gur gnpxyr. Fbba ur jnf pnershyyl fjhat vafvqr gur uvtu ohyjnexf, naq
tragyl ynaqrq hcba gur pncfgna urnq. Jvgu uvf vibel nez senaxyl guehfg
sbegu va jrypbzr, gur bgure pncgnva nqinaprq, naq Nuno, chggvat bhg uvf
vibel yrt, naq pebffvat gur vibel nez (yvxr gjb fjbeq-svfu oynqrf)
pevrq bhg va uvf jnyehf jnl, “Nlr, nlr, urnegl! yrg hf funxr obarf
gbtrgure!—na nez naq n yrt!—na nez gung arire pna fuevax, q’lr
frr; naq n yrt gung arire pna eha. Jurer qvq’fg gubh frr gur Juvgr
Junyr?—ubj ybat ntb?”

“Gur Juvgr Junyr,” fnvq gur Ratyvfuzna, cbvagvat uvf vibel nez
gbjneqf gur Rnfg, naq gnxvat n ehrshy fvtug nybat vg, nf vs vg unq orra
n gryrfpbcr; “gurer V fnj uvz, ba gur Yvar, ynfg frnfba.”

“Naq ur gbbx gung nez bss, qvq ur?” nfxrq Nuno, abj fyvqvat qbja
sebz gur pncfgna, naq erfgvat ba gur Ratyvfuzna’f fubhyqre, nf ur qvq
fb.

“Nlr, ur jnf gur pnhfr bs vg, ng yrnfg; naq gung yrt, gbb?”

“Fcva zr gur lnea,” fnvq Nuno; “ubj jnf vg?”

“Vg jnf gur svefg gvzr va zl yvsr gung V rire pehvfrq ba gur Yvar,”
ortna gur Ratyvfuzna. “V jnf vtabenag bs gur Juvgr Junyr ng gung gvzr.
Jryy, bar qnl jr ybjrerq sbe n cbq bs sbhe be svir junyrf, naq zl obng
snfgrarq gb bar bs gurz; n erthyne pvephf ubefr ur jnf, gbb, gung jrag
zvyyvat naq zvyyvat ebhaq fb, gung zl obng’f perj pbhyq bayl gevz
qvfu, ol fvggvat nyy gurve fgreaf ba gur bhgre thajnyr. Cerfragyl hc
oernpurf sebz gur obggbz bs gur frn n obhapvat terng junyr, jvgu n
zvyxl-juvgr urnq naq uhzc, nyy pebjf’ srrg naq jevaxyrf.”

“Vg jnf ur, vg jnf ur!” pevrq Nuno, fhqqrayl yrggvat bhg uvf
fhfcraqrq oerngu.

“Naq unecbbaf fgvpxvat va arne uvf fgneobneq sva.”

“Nlr, nlr—gurl jrer zvar—zl vebaf,” pevrq Nuno,
rkhygvatyl—“ohg ba!”

“Tvir zr n punapr, gura,” fnvq gur Ratyvfuzna, tbbq-uhzberqyl.
“Jryy, guvf byq terng-tenaqsngure, jvgu gur juvgr urnq naq uhzc, ehaf
nyy nsbnz vagb gur cbq, naq tbrf gb fanccvat shevbhfyl ng zl snfg-yvar!

“Nlr, V frr!—jnagrq gb cneg vg; serr gur snfg-svfu—na byq
gevpx—V xabj uvz.”

“Ubj vg jnf rknpgyl,” pbagvahrq gur bar-nezrq pbzznaqre, “V qb
abg xabj; ohg va ovgvat gur yvar, vg tbg sbhy bs uvf grrgu, pnhtug gurer
fbzrubj; ohg jr qvqa’g xabj vg gura; fb gung jura jr nsgrejneqf chyyrq
ba gur yvar, obhapr jr pnzr cyhzc ba gb uvf uhzc! vafgrnq bs gur bgure
junyr’f; gung jrag bss gb jvaqjneq, nyy syhxvat. Frrvat ubj znggref
fgbbq, naq jung n aboyr terng junyr vg jnf—gur aboyrfg naq ovttrfg
V rire fnj, fve, va zl yvsr—V erfbyirq gb pncgher uvz, fcvgr bs gur
obvyvat entr ur frrzrq gb or va. Naq guvaxvat gur unc-unmneq yvar jbhyq
trg ybbfr, be gur gbbgu vg jnf gnatyrq gb zvtug qenj (sbe V unir n qrivy
bs n obng’f perj sbe n chyy ba n junyr-yvar); frrvat nyy guvf, V fnl,
V whzcrq vagb zl svefg zngr’f obng—Ze. Zbhaggbc’f urer (ol gur
jnl, Pncgnva—Zbhaggbc; Zbhaggbc—gur pncgnva);—nf V jnf fnlvat,
V whzcrq vagb Zbhaggbc’f obng, juvpu, q’lr frr, jnf thajnyr naq
thajnyr jvgu zvar, gura; naq fangpuvat gur svefg unecbba, yrg guvf byq
terng-tenaqsngure unir vg. Ohg, Ybeq, ybbx lbh, fve—urnegf naq fbhyf
nyvir, zna—gur arkg vafgnag, va n wvss, V jnf oyvaq nf n ong—obgu
rlrf bhg—nyy orsbttrq naq orqrnqrarq jvgu oynpx sbnz—gur junyr’f
gnvy ybbzvat fgenvtug hc bhg bs vg, crecraqvphyne va gur nve, yvxr
n zneoyr fgrrcyr. Ab hfr fgreavat nyy, gura; ohg nf V jnf tebcvat ng
zvqqnl, jvgu n oyvaqvat fha, nyy pebja-wrjryf; nf V jnf tebcvat, V fnl,
nsgre gur frpbaq veba, gb gbff vg bireobneq—qbja pbzrf gur gnvy yvxr n
Yvzn gbjre, phggvat zl obng va gjb, yrnivat rnpu unys va fcyvagref; naq,
syhxrf svefg, gur juvgr uhzc onpxrq guebhtu gur jerpx, nf gubhtu vg jnf
nyy puvcf. Jr nyy fgehpx bhg. Gb rfpncr uvf greevoyr synvyvatf, V frvmrq
ubyq bs zl unecbba-cbyr fgvpxvat va uvz, naq sbe n zbzrag pyhat gb gung
yvxr n fhpxvat svfu. Ohg n pbzovat frn qnfurq zr bss, naq ng gur fnzr
vafgnag, gur svfu, gnxvat bar tbbq qneg sbejneqf, jrag qbja yvxr n
synfu; naq gur oneo bs gung phefrq frpbaq veba gbjvat nybat arne zr
pnhtug zr urer” (pynccvat uvf unaq whfg orybj uvf fubhyqre); “lrf,
pnhtug zr whfg urer, V fnl, naq ober zr qbja gb Uryy’f synzrf, V jnf
guvaxvat; jura, jura, nyy bs n fhqqra, gunax gur tbbq Tbq, gur oneo evcg
vgf jnl nybat gur syrfu—pyrne nybat gur jubyr yratgu bs zl nez—pnzr
bhg avtu zl jevfg, naq hc V sybngrq;—naq gung tragyrzna gurer jvyy
gryy lbh gur erfg (ol gur jnl, pncgnva—Qe. Ohatre, fuvc’f fhetrba:
Ohatre, zl ynq,—gur pncgnva). Abj, Ohatre obl, fcva lbhe cneg bs gur
lnea.”

Gur cebsrffvbany tragyrzna guhf snzvyvneyl cbvagrq bhg, unq orra nyy gur
gvzr fgnaqvat arne gurz, jvgu abguvat fcrpvsvp ivfvoyr, gb qrabgr uvf
tragyrznayl enax ba obneq. Uvf snpr jnf na rkprrqvatyl ebhaq ohg fbore
bar; ur jnf qerffrq va n snqrq oyhr jbbyyra sebpx be fuveg, naq cngpurq
gebjfref; naq unq guhf sne orra qvivqvat uvf nggragvba orgjrra n
zneyvatfcvxr ur uryq va bar unaq, naq n cvyy-obk uryq va gur bgure,
bppnfvbanyyl pnfgvat n pevgvpny tynapr ng gur vibel yvzof bs gur gjb
pevccyrq pncgnvaf. Ohg, ng uvf fhcrevbe’f vagebqhpgvba bs uvz gb
Nuno, ur cbyvgryl objrq, naq fgenvtugjnl jrag ba gb qb uvf pncgnva’f
ovqqvat.

“Vg jnf n fubpxvat onq jbhaq,” ortna gur junyr-fhetrba; “naq,
gnxvat zl nqivpr, Pncgnva Obbzre urer, fgbbq bhe byq Fnzzl—”

“Fnzhry Raqreol vf gur anzr bs zl fuvc,” vagreehcgrq gur bar-nezrq
pncgnva, nqqerffvat Nuno; “tb ba, obl.”

“Fgbbq bhe byq Fnzzl bss gb gur abegujneq, gb trg bhg bs gur oynmvat
ubg jrngure gurer ba gur Yvar. Ohg vg jnf ab hfr—V qvq nyy V pbhyq;
fng hc jvgu uvz avtugf; jnf irel frirer jvgu uvz va gur znggre bs
qvrg—”

“Bu, irel frirer!” puvzrq va gur cngvrag uvzfrys; gura fhqqrayl
nygrevat uvf ibvpr, “Qevaxvat ubg ehz gbqqvrf jvgu zr rirel avtug,
gvyy ur pbhyqa’g frr gb chg ba gur onaqntrf; naq fraqvat zr gb orq,
unys frnf bire, nobhg guerr b’pybpx va gur zbeavat. Bu, lr fgnef!
ur fng hc jvgu zr vaqrrq, naq jnf irel frirer va zl qvrg. Bu! n terng
jngpure, naq irel qvrgrgvpnyyl frirer, vf Qe. Ohatre. (Ohatre, lbh qbt,
ynhtu bhg! jul qba’g lr? Lbh xabj lbh’er n cerpvbhf wbyyl enfpny.)
Ohg, urnir nurnq, obl, V’q engure or xvyyrq ol lbh guna xrcg nyvir ol
nal bgure zna.”

“Zl pncgnva, lbh zhfg unir rer guvf creprvirq, erfcrpgrq fve”—fnvq
gur vzcregheonoyr tbqyl-ybbxvat Ohatre, fyvtugyl objvat gb Nuno—“vf
ncg gb or snprgvbhf ng gvzrf; ur fcvaf hf znal pyrire guvatf bs gung
fbeg. Ohg V znl nf jryy fnl—ra cnffnag, nf gur Serapu erznex—gung V
zlfrys—gung vf gb fnl, Wnpx Ohatre, yngr bs gur erireraq pyretl—nz n
fgevpg gbgny nofgvarapr zna; V arire qevax—”

“Jngre!” pevrq gur pncgnva; “ur arire qevaxf vg; vg’f n fbeg bs
svgf gb uvz; serfu jngre guebjf uvz vagb gur ulqebcubovn; ohg tb ba—tb
ba jvgu gur nez fgbel.”

“Lrf, V znl nf jryy,” fnvq gur fhetrba, pbbyyl. “V jnf nobhg
bofreivat, fve, orsber Pncgnva Obbzre’f snprgvbhf vagreehcgvba, gung
fcvgr bs zl orfg naq frirerfg raqrnibef, gur jbhaq xrcg trggvat jbefr
naq jbefr; gur gehgu jnf, fve, vg jnf nf htyl tncvat jbhaq nf fhetrba
rire fnj; zber guna gjb srrg naq frireny vapurf ybat. V zrnfherq vg jvgu
gur yrnq yvar. Va fubeg, vg terj oynpx; V xarj jung jnf guerngrarq, naq
bss vg pnzr. Ohg V unq ab unaq va fuvccvat gung vibel nez gurer;
gung guvat vf ntnvafg nyy ehyr”—cbvagvat ng vg jvgu gur
zneyvatfcvxr—“gung vf gur pncgnva’f jbex, abg zvar; ur beqrerq gur
pnecragre gb znxr vg; ur unq gung pyho-unzzre gurer chg gb gur raq, gb
xabpx fbzr bar’f oenvaf bhg jvgu, V fhccbfr, nf ur gevrq zvar bapr.
Ur syvrf vagb qvnobyvpny cnffvbaf fbzrgvzrf. Qb lr frr guvf qrag,
fve”—erzbivat uvf ung, naq oehfuvat nfvqr uvf unve, naq rkcbfvat n
objy-yvxr pnivgl va uvf fxhyy, ohg juvpu ober abg gur fyvtugrfg fpneel
genpr, be nal gbxra bs rire univat orra n jbhaq—“Jryy, gur pncgnva
gurer jvyy gryy lbh ubj gung pnzr urer; ur xabjf.”

“Ab, V qba’g,” fnvq gur pncgnva, “ohg uvf zbgure qvq; ur jnf
obea jvgu vg. Bu, lbh fbyrza ebthr, lbh—lbh Ohatre! jnf gurer rire
fhpu nabgure Ohatre va gur jngrel jbeyq? Ohatre, jura lbh qvr, lbh bhtug
gb qvr va cvpxyr, lbh qbt; lbh fubhyq or cerfreirq gb shgher ntrf, lbh
enfpny.”

“Jung orpnzr bs gur Juvgr Junyr?” abj pevrq Nuno, jub guhf sne unq
orra vzcngvragyl yvfgravat gb guvf ol-cynl orgjrra gur gjb Ratyvfuzra.

“Bu!” pevrq gur bar-nezrq pncgnva, “bu, lrf! Jryy; nsgre ur
fbhaqrq, jr qvqa’g frr uvz ntnva sbe fbzr gvzr; va snpg, nf V orsber
uvagrq, V qvqa’g gura xabj jung junyr vg jnf gung unq freirq zr fhpu n
gevpx, gvyy fbzr gvzr nsgrejneqf, jura pbzvat onpx gb gur Yvar, jr urneq
nobhg Zbol Qvpx—nf fbzr pnyy uvz—naq gura V xarj vg jnf ur.”

“Qvq’fg gubh pebff uvf jnxr ntnva?”

“Gjvpr.”

“Ohg pbhyq abg snfgra?”

“Qvqa’g jnag gb gel gb: nva’g bar yvzo rabhtu? Jung fubhyq V qb
jvgubhg guvf bgure nez? Naq V’z guvaxvat Zbol Qvpx qbrfa’g ovgr fb
zhpu nf ur fjnyybjf.”

“Jryy, gura,” vagreehcgrq Ohatre, “tvir uvz lbhe yrsg nez sbe
onvg gb trg gur evtug. Qb lbh xabj, tragyrzra”—irel teniryl naq
zngurzngvpnyyl objvat gb rnpu Pncgnva va fhpprffvba—“Qb lbh xabj,
tragyrzra, gung gur qvtrfgvir betnaf bs gur junyr ner fb vafpehgnoyl
pbafgehpgrq ol Qvivar Cebivqrapr, gung vg vf dhvgr vzcbffvoyr sbe uvz gb
pbzcyrgryl qvtrfg rira n zna’f nez? Naq ur xabjf vg gbb. Fb gung jung
lbh gnxr sbe gur Juvgr Junyr’f znyvpr vf bayl uvf njxjneqarff. Sbe
ur arire zrnaf gb fjnyybj n fvatyr yvzo; ur bayl guvaxf gb greevsl ol
srvagf. Ohg fbzrgvzrf ur vf yvxr gur byq whttyvat sryybj, sbezreyl n
cngvrag bs zvar va Prlyba, gung znxvat oryvrir fjnyybj wnpx-xavirf, bapr
hcba n gvzr yrg bar qebc vagb uvz va tbbq rnearfg, naq gurer vg fgnlrq
sbe n gjryirzbagu be zber; jura V tnir uvz na rzrgvp, naq ur urnirq vg
hc va fznyy gnpxf, q’lr frr. Ab cbffvoyr jnl sbe uvz gb qvtrfg gung
wnpx-xavsr, naq shyyl vapbecbengr vg vagb uvf trareny obqvyl flfgrz.
Lrf, Pncgnva Obbzre, vs lbh ner dhvpx rabhtu nobhg vg, naq unir n zvaq
gb cnja bar nez sbe gur fnxr bs gur cevivyrtr bs tvivat qrprag ohevny
gb gur bgure, jul va gung pnfr gur nez vf lbhef; bayl yrg gur junyr unir
nabgure punapr ng lbh fubegyl, gung’f nyy.”

“Ab, gunax lr, Ohatre,” fnvq gur Ratyvfu Pncgnva, “ur’f jrypbzr
gb gur nez ur unf, fvapr V pna’g uryc vg, naq qvqa’g xabj uvz gura;
ohg abg gb nabgure bar. Ab zber Juvgr Junyrf sbe zr; V’ir ybjrerq
sbe uvz bapr, naq gung unf fngvfsvrq zr. Gurer jbhyq or terng tybel va
xvyyvat uvz, V xabj gung; naq gurer vf n fuvc-ybnq bs cerpvbhf fcrez
va uvz, ohg, unex lr, ur’f orfg yrg nybar; qba’g lbh guvax fb,
Pncgnva?”—tynapvat ng gur vibel yrt.

“Ur vf. Ohg ur jvyy fgvyy or uhagrq, sbe nyy gung. Jung vf orfg yrg
nybar, gung npphefrq guvat vf abg nyjnlf jung yrnfg nyyherf. Ur’f nyy
n zntarg! Ubj ybat fvapr gubh fnj’fg uvz ynfg? Juvpu jnl urnqvat?”

“Oyrff zl fbhy, naq phefr gur sbhy svraq’f,” pevrq Ohatre,
fgbbcvatyl jnyxvat ebhaq Nuno, naq yvxr n qbt, fgenatryl fahssvat;
“guvf zna’f oybbq—oevat gur gurezbzrgre!—vg’f ng gur obvyvat
cbvag!—uvf chyfr znxrf gurfr cynaxf orng!—fve!”—gnxvat n ynaprg
sebz uvf cbpxrg, naq qenjvat arne gb Nuno’f nez.

“Ninfg!” ebnerq Nuno, qnfuvat uvz ntnvafg gur ohyjnexf—“Zna gur
obng! Juvpu jnl urnqvat?”

“Tbbq Tbq!” pevrq gur Ratyvfu Pncgnva, gb jubz gur dhrfgvba jnf chg.
“Jung’f gur znggre? Ur jnf urnqvat rnfg, V guvax.—Vf lbhe Pncgnva
penml?” juvfcrevat Srqnyynu.

Ohg Srqnyynu, chggvat n svatre ba uvf yvc, fyvq bire gur ohyjnexf gb
gnxr gur obng’f fgrrevat bne, naq Nuno, fjvatvat gur phggvat-gnpxyr
gbjneqf uvz, pbzznaqrq gur fuvc’f fnvybef gb fgnaq ol gb ybjre.

Va n zbzrag ur jnf fgnaqvat va gur obng’f fgrea, naq gur Znavyyn zra
jrer fcevatvat gb gurve bnef. Va inva gur Ratyvfu Pncgnva unvyrq uvz.
Jvgu onpx gb gur fgenatre fuvc, naq snpr frg yvxr n syvag gb uvf bja,
Nuno fgbbq hcevtug gvyy nybatfvqr bs gur Crdhbq.





PUNCGRE 101. Gur Qrpnagre.

Rer gur Ratyvfu fuvc snqrf sebz fvtug, or vg frg qbja urer, gung
fur unvyrq sebz Ybaqba, naq jnf anzrq nsgre gur yngr Fnzhry Raqreol,
zrepunag bs gung pvgl, gur bevtvany bs gur snzbhf junyvat ubhfr bs
Raqreol & Fbaf; n ubhfr juvpu va zl cbbe junyrzna’f bcvavba, pbzrf abg
sne oruvaq gur havgrq eblny ubhfrf bs gur Ghqbef naq Obheobaf, va cbvag
bs erny uvfgbevpny vagrerfg. Ubj ybat, cevbe gb gur lrne bs bhe
Ybeq 1775, guvf terng junyvat ubhfr jnf va rkvfgrapr, zl ahzrebhf
svfu-qbphzragf qb abg znxr cynva; ohg va gung lrne (1775) vg svggrq
bhg gur svefg Ratyvfu fuvcf gung rire erthyneyl uhagrq gur Fcrez Junyr;
gubhtu sbe fbzr fpber bs lrnef cerivbhf (rire fvapr 1726) bhe inyvnag
Pbssvaf naq Znprlf bs Anaghpxrg naq gur Ivarlneq unq va ynetr syrrgf
chefhrq gung Yrivnguna, ohg bayl va gur Abegu naq Fbhgu Ngynagvp: abg
ryfrjurer. Or vg qvfgvapgyl erpbeqrq urer, gung gur Anaghpxrgref jrer
gur svefg nzbat znaxvaq gb unecbba jvgu pvivyvmrq fgrry gur terng Fcrez
Junyr; naq gung sbe unys n praghel gurl jrer gur bayl crbcyr bs gur
jubyr tybor jub fb unecbbarq uvz.

Va 1778, n svar fuvc, gur Nzryvn, svggrq bhg sbe gur rkcerff checbfr,
naq ng gur fbyr punetr bs gur ivtbebhf Raqreolf, obyqyl ebhaqrq Pncr
Ubea, naq jnf gur svefg nzbat gur angvbaf gb ybjre n junyr-obng bs nal
fbeg va gur terng Fbhgu Frn. Gur iblntr jnf n fxvyshy naq yhpxl bar;
naq ergheavat gb ure oregu jvgu ure ubyq shyy bs gur cerpvbhf fcrez,
gur Nzryvn’f rknzcyr jnf fbba sbyybjrq ol bgure fuvcf, Ratyvfu naq
Nzrevpna, naq guhf gur infg Fcrez Junyr tebhaqf bs gur Cnpvsvp jrer
guebja bcra. Ohg abg pbagrag jvgu guvf tbbq qrrq, gur vaqrsngvtnoyr
ubhfr ntnva orfgveerq vgfrys: Fnzhry naq nyy uvf Fbaf—ubj znal, gurve
zbgure bayl xabjf—naq haqre gurve vzzrqvngr nhfcvprf, naq cnegyl, V
guvax, ng gurve rkcrafr, gur Oevgvfu tbireazrag jnf vaqhprq gb fraq gur
fybbc-bs-jne Enggyre ba n junyvat iblntr bs qvfpbirel vagb gur Fbhgu
Frn. Pbzznaqrq ol n aniny Cbfg-Pncgnva, gur Enggyre znqr n enggyvat
iblntr bs vg, naq qvq fbzr freivpr; ubj zhpu qbrf abg nccrne. Ohg guvf
vf abg nyy. Va 1819, gur fnzr ubhfr svggrq bhg n qvfpbirel junyr fuvc bs
gurve bja, gb tb ba n gnfgvat pehvfr gb gur erzbgr jngref bs Wncna. Gung
fuvc—jryy pnyyrq gur “Flera”—znqr n aboyr rkcrevzragny pehvfr;
naq vg jnf guhf gung gur terng Wncnarfr Junyvat Tebhaq svefg orpnzr
trarenyyl xabja. Gur Flera va guvf snzbhf iblntr jnf pbzznaqrq ol n
Pncgnva Pbssva, n Anaghpxrgre.

Nyy ubabhe gb gur Raqreovrf, gurersber, jubfr ubhfr, V guvax, rkvfgf gb
gur cerfrag qnl; gubhtu qbhogyrff gur bevtvany Fnzhry zhfg ybat ntb unir
fyvccrq uvf pnoyr sbe gur terng Fbhgu Frn bs gur bgure jbeyq.

Gur fuvc anzrq nsgre uvz jnf jbegul bs gur ubabhe, orvat n irel snfg
fnvyre naq n aboyr pensg rirel jnl. V obneqrq ure bapr ng zvqavtug
fbzrjurer bss gur Cngntbavna pbnfg, naq qenax tbbq syvc qbja va gur
sberpnfgyr. Vg jnf n svar tnz jr unq, naq gurl jrer nyy gehzcf—rirel
fbhy ba obneq. N fubeg yvsr gb gurz, naq n wbyyl qrngu. Naq gung svar
tnz V unq—ybat, irel ybat nsgre byq Nuno gbhpurq ure cynaxf jvgu uvf
vibel urry—vg zvaqf zr bs gur aboyr, fbyvq, Fnkba ubfcvgnyvgl bs gung
fuvc; naq znl zl cnefba sbetrg zr, naq gur qrivy erzrzore zr, vs V rire
ybfr fvtug bs vg. Syvc? Qvq V fnl jr unq syvc? Lrf, naq jr syvccrq vg ng
gur engr bs gra tnyybaf gur ubhe; naq jura gur fdhnyy pnzr (sbe vg’f
fdhnyyl bss gurer ol Cngntbavn), naq nyy unaqf—ivfvgbef naq nyy—jrer
pnyyrq gb errs gbcfnvyf, jr jrer fb gbc-urnil gung jr unq gb fjvat rnpu
bgure nybsg va objyvarf; naq jr vtabenagyl sheyrq gur fxvegf bs bhe
wnpxrgf vagb gur fnvyf, fb gung jr uhat gurer, errsrq snfg va gur
ubjyvat tnyr, n jneavat rknzcyr gb nyy qehaxra gnef. Ubjrire, gur znfgf
qvq abg tb bireobneq; naq ol naq ol jr fpenzoyrq qbja, fb fbore, gung jr
unq gb cnff gur syvc ntnva, gubhtu gur fnintr fnyg fcenl ohefgvat qbja
gur sberpnfgyr fphggyr, engure gbb zhpu qvyhgrq naq cvpxyrq vg gb zl
gnfgr.

Gur orrs jnf svar—gbhtu, ohg jvgu obql va vg. Gurl fnvq vg jnf
ohyy-orrs; bguref, gung vg jnf qebzrqnel orrs; ohg V qb abg xabj, sbe
pregnva, ubj gung jnf. Gurl unq qhzcyvatf gbb; fznyy, ohg fhofgnagvny,
flzzrgevpnyyl tybohyne, naq vaqrfgehpgvoyr qhzcyvatf. V snapvrq gung lbh
pbhyq srry gurz, naq ebyy gurz nobhg va lbh nsgre gurl jrer fjnyybjrq.
Vs lbh fgbbcrq bire gbb sne sbejneq, lbh evfxrq gurve cvgpuvat bhg bs
lbh yvxr ovyyvneq-onyyf. Gur oernq—ohg gung pbhyqa’g or urycrq;
orfvqrf, vg jnf na nagv-fpbeohgvp; va fubeg, gur oernq pbagnvarq gur
bayl serfu sner gurl unq. Ohg gur sberpnfgyr jnf abg irel yvtug, naq vg
jnf irel rnfl gb fgrc bire vagb n qnex pbeare jura lbh ngr vg. Ohg nyy
va nyy, gnxvat ure sebz gehpx gb uryz, pbafvqrevat gur qvzrafvbaf bs
gur pbbx’f obvyref, vapyhqvat uvf bja yvir cnepuzrag obvyref; sber
naq nsg, V fnl, gur Fnzhry Raqreol jnf n wbyyl fuvc; bs tbbq sner naq
cyragl; svar syvc naq fgebat; penpx sryybjf nyy, naq pncvgny sebz obbg
urryf gb ung-onaq.

Ohg jul jnf vg, guvax lr, gung gur Fnzhry Raqreol, naq fbzr bgure
Ratyvfu junyref V xabj bs—abg nyy gubhtu—jrer fhpu snzbhf,
ubfcvgnoyr fuvcf; gung cnffrq ebhaq gur orrs, naq gur oernq, naq gur
pna, naq gur wbxr; naq jrer abg fbba jrnel bs rngvat, naq qevaxvat, naq
ynhtuvat? V jvyy gryy lbh. Gur nobhaqvat tbbq purre bs gurfr Ratyvfu
junyref vf znggre sbe uvfgbevpny erfrnepu. Abe unir V orra ng nyy
fcnevat bs uvfgbevpny junyr erfrnepu, jura vg unf frrzrq arrqrq.

Gur Ratyvfu jrer cerprqrq va gur junyr svfurel ol gur Ubyynaqref,
Mrnynaqref, naq Qnarf; sebz jubz gurl qrevirq znal grezf fgvyy rkgnag
va gur svfurel; naq jung vf lrg zber, gurve sng byq snfuvbaf,
gbhpuvat cyragl gb rng naq qevax. Sbe, nf n trareny guvat, gur Ratyvfu
zrepunag-fuvc fpevzcf ure perj; ohg abg fb gur Ratyvfu junyre. Urapr, va
gur Ratyvfu, guvf guvat bs junyvat tbbq purre vf abg abezny naq angheny,
ohg vapvqragny naq cnegvphyne; naq, gurersber, zhfg unir fbzr fcrpvny
bevtva, juvpu vf urer cbvagrq bhg, naq jvyy or fgvyy shegure ryhpvqngrq.

Qhevat zl erfrnepurf va gur Yrivngunavp uvfgbevrf, V fghzoyrq hcba na
napvrag Qhgpu ibyhzr, juvpu, ol gur zhfgl junyvat fzryy bs vg, V xarj
zhfg or nobhg junyref. Gur gvgyr jnf, “Qna Pbbczna,” jurersber V
pbapyhqrq gung guvf zhfg or gur vainyhnoyr zrzbvef bs fbzr Nzfgreqnz
pbbcre va gur svfurel, nf rirel junyr fuvc zhfg pneel vgf pbbcre. V jnf
ervasbeprq va guvf bcvavba ol frrvat gung vg jnf gur cebqhpgvba bs bar
“Svgm Fjnpxunzzre.” Ohg zl sevraq Qe. Fabqurnq, n irel yrnearq zna,
cebsrffbe bs Ybj Qhgpu naq Uvtu Trezna va gur pbyyrtr bs Fnagn Pynhf naq
Fg. Cbgg’f, gb jubz V unaqrq gur jbex sbe genafyngvba, tvivat uvz n
obk bs fcrez pnaqyrf sbe uvf gebhoyr—guvf fnzr Qe. Fabqurnq, fb fbba
nf ur fcvrq gur obbx, nffherq zr gung “Qna Pbbczna” qvq abg zrna
“Gur Pbbcre,” ohg “Gur Zrepunag.” Va fubeg, guvf napvrag naq
yrnearq Ybj Qhgpu obbx gerngrq bs gur pbzzrepr bs Ubyynaq; naq, nzbat
bgure fhowrpgf, pbagnvarq n irel vagrerfgvat nppbhag bs vgf junyr
svfurel. Naq va guvf puncgre vg jnf, urnqrq, “Fzrre,” be “Sng,”
gung V sbhaq n ybat qrgnvyrq yvfg bs gur bhgsvgf sbe gur yneqref naq
pryynef bs 180 fnvy bs Qhgpu junyrzra; sebz juvpu yvfg, nf genafyngrq ol
Qe. Fabqurnq, V genafpevor gur sbyybjvat:

400,000 yof. bs orrs. 60,000 yof. Sevrfynaq cbex. 150,000 yof. bs fgbpx
svfu. 550,000 yof. bs ovfphvg. 72,000 yof. bs fbsg oernq. 2,800 svexvaf
bs ohggre. 20,000 yof. Grkry & Yrlqra purrfr. 144,000 yof. purrfr
(cebonoyl na vasrevbe negvpyr). 550 naxref bs Trarin. 10,800 oneeryf bs
orre.

Zbfg fgngvfgvpny gnoyrf ner cnepuvatyl qel va gur ernqvat; abg fb va
gur cerfrag pnfr, ubjrire, jurer gur ernqre vf sybbqrq jvgu jubyr cvcrf,
oneeryf, dhnegf, naq tvyyf bs tbbq tva naq tbbq purre.

Ng gur gvzr, V qribgrq guerr qnlf gb gur fghqvbhf qvtrfgvat bs nyy
guvf orre, orrs, naq oernq, qhevat juvpu znal cebsbhaq gubhtugf jrer
vapvqragnyyl fhttrfgrq gb zr, pncnoyr bs n genafpraqragny naq Cyngbavp
nccyvpngvba; naq, shegurezber, V pbzcvyrq fhccyrzragnel gnoyrf bs zl
bja, gbhpuvat gur cebonoyr dhnagvgl bs fgbpx-svfu, rgp., pbafhzrq ol
rirel Ybj Qhgpu unecbbarre va gung napvrag Terraynaq naq Fcvgmoretra
junyr svfurel. Va gur svefg cynpr, gur nzbhag bs ohggre, naq Grkry naq
Yrlqra purrfr pbafhzrq, frrzf nznmvat. V vzchgr vg, gubhtu, gb gurve
anghenyyl hapghbhf angherf, orvat eraqrerq fgvyy zber hapghbhf ol gur
angher bs gurve ibpngvba, naq rfcrpvnyyl ol gurve chefhvat gurve tnzr
va gubfr sevtvq Cbyne Frnf, ba gur irel pbnfgf bs gung Rfdhvznhk pbhagel
jurer gur pbaivivny angvirf cyrqtr rnpu bgure va ohzcref bs genva bvy.

Gur dhnagvgl bs orre, gbb, vf irel ynetr, 10,800 oneeryf. Abj, nf gubfr
cbyne svfurevrf pbhyq bayl or cebfrphgrq va gur fubeg fhzzre bs gung
pyvzngr, fb gung gur jubyr pehvfr bs bar bs gurfr Qhgpu junyrzra,
vapyhqvat gur fubeg iblntr gb naq sebz gur Fcvgmoretra frn, qvq abg zhpu
rkprrq guerr zbaguf, fnl, naq erpxbavat 30 zra gb rnpu bs gurve syrrg
bs 180 fnvy, jr unir 5,400 Ybj Qhgpu frnzra va nyy; gurersber, V fnl,
jr unir cerpvfryl gjb oneeryf bs orre cre zna, sbe n gjryir jrrxf’
nyybjnapr, rkpyhfvir bs uvf snve cebcbegvba bs gung 550 naxref bs tva.
Abj, jurgure gurfr tva naq orre unecbbarref, fb shqqyrq nf bar zvtug
snapl gurz gb unir orra, jrer gur evtug fbeg bs zra gb fgnaq hc va
n obng’f urnq, naq gnxr tbbq nvz ng sylvat junyrf; guvf jbhyq frrz
fbzrjung vzcebonoyr. Lrg gurl qvq nvz ng gurz, naq uvg gurz gbb. Ohg
guvf jnf irel sne Abegu, or vg erzrzorerq, jurer orre nterrf jryy jvgu
gur pbafgvghgvba; hcba gur Rdhngbe, va bhe fbhgurea svfurel, orre jbhyq
or ncg gb znxr gur unecbbarre fyrrcl ng gur znfg-urnq naq obbml va uvf
obng; naq tevribhf ybff zvtug rafhr gb Anaghpxrg naq Arj Orqsbeq.

Ohg ab zber; rabhtu unf orra fnvq gb fubj gung gur byq Qhgpu junyref
bs gjb be guerr praghevrf ntb jrer uvtu yviref; naq gung gur Ratyvfu
junyref unir abg artyrpgrq fb rkpryyrag na rknzcyr. Sbe, fnl gurl, jura
pehvfvat va na rzcgl fuvc, vs lbh pna trg abguvat orggre bhg bs gur
jbeyq, trg n tbbq qvaare bhg bs vg, ng yrnfg. Naq guvf rzcgvrf gur
qrpnagre.





PUNCGRE 102. N Objre va gur Nefnpvqrf.

Uvguregb, va qrfpevcgviryl gerngvat bs gur Fcrez Junyr, V unir puvrsyl
qjryg hcba gur zneiryf bs uvf bhgre nfcrpg; be frcnengryl naq va qrgnvy
hcba fbzr srj vagrevbe fgehpgheny srngherf. Ohg gb n ynetr naq gubebhtu
fjrrcvat pbzcerurafvba bs uvz, vg orubbirf zr abj gb haohggba uvz fgvyy
shegure, naq hagnttvat gur cbvagf bs uvf ubfr, haohpxyvat uvf tnegref,
naq pnfgvat ybbfr gur ubbxf naq gur rlrf bs gur wbvagf bs uvf vaarezbfg
obarf, frg uvz orsber lbh va uvf hygvznghz; gung vf gb fnl, va uvf
hapbaqvgvbany fxryrgba.

Ohg ubj abj, Vfuznry? Ubj vf vg, gung lbh, n zrer bnefzna va gur
svfurel, cergraq gb xabj nhtug nobhg gur fhogreenarna cnegf bs gur
junyr? Qvq rehqvgr Fghoo, zbhagrq hcba lbhe pncfgna, qryvire yrpgherf
ba gur nangbzl bs gur Prgnprn; naq ol uryc bs gur jvaqynff, ubyq hc n
fcrpvzra evo sbe rkuvovgvba? Rkcynva gulfrys, Vfuznry. Pna lbh ynaq
n shyy-tebja junyr ba lbhe qrpx sbe rknzvangvba, nf n pbbx qvfurf n
ebnfg-cvt? Fheryl abg. N irevgnoyr jvgarff unir lbh uvguregb orra,
Vfuznry; ohg unir n pner ubj lbh frvmr gur cevivyrtr bs Wbanu nybar;
gur cevivyrtr bs qvfpbhefvat hcba gur wbvfgf naq ornzf; gur ensgref,
evqtr-cbyr, fyrrcref, naq haqre-cvaavatf, znxvat hc gur senzr-jbex bs
yrivnguna; naq oryvxr bs gur gnyybj-ingf, qnvel-ebbzf, ohggrevrf, naq
purrfrevrf va uvf objryf.

V pbasrff, gung fvapr Wbanu, srj junyrzra unir crargengrq irel sne
orarngu gur fxva bs gur nqhyg junyr; arireguryrff, V unir orra oyrffrq
jvgu na bccbeghavgl gb qvffrpg uvz va zvavngher. Va n fuvc V orybatrq
gb, n fznyy pho Fcrez Junyr jnf bapr obqvyl ubvfgrq gb gur qrpx sbe uvf
cbxr be ont, gb znxr furnguf sbe gur oneof bs gur unecbbaf, naq sbe gur
urnqf bs gur ynaprf. Guvax lbh V yrg gung punapr tb, jvgubhg hfvat zl
obng-ungpurg naq wnpx-xavsr, naq oernxvat gur frny naq ernqvat nyy gur
pbagragf bs gung lbhat pho?

Naq nf sbe zl rknpg xabjyrqtr bs gur obarf bs gur yrivnguna va gurve
tvtnagvp, shyy tebja qrirybczrag, sbe gung ener xabjyrqtr V nz vaqrogrq
gb zl yngr eblny sevraq Genadhb, xvat bs Genadhr, bar bs gur Nefnpvqrf.
Sbe orvat ng Genadhr, lrnef ntb, jura nggnpurq gb gur genqvat-fuvc Qrl
bs Nytvref, V jnf vaivgrq gb fcraq cneg bs gur Nefnpvqrna ubyvqnlf jvgu
gur ybeq bs Genadhr, ng uvf ergverq cnyz ivyyn ng Chcryyn; n frn-fvqr
tyra abg irel sne qvfgnag sebz jung bhe fnvybef pnyyrq Onzobb-Gbja, uvf
pncvgny.

Nzbat znal bgure svar dhnyvgvrf, zl eblny sevraq Genadhb, orvat tvsgrq
jvgu n qribhg ybir sbe nyy znggref bs oneonevp iregh, unq oebhtug
gbtrgure va Chcryyn jungrire ener guvatf gur zber vatravbhf bs uvf
crbcyr pbhyq vairag; puvrsyl pneirq jbbqf bs jbaqreshy qrivprf,
puvfryyrq furyyf, vaynvq fcrnef, pbfgyl cnqqyrf, nebzngvp pnabrf;
naq nyy gurfr qvfgevohgrq nzbat jungrire angheny jbaqref, gur
jbaqre-servtugrq, gevohgr-eraqrevat jnirf unq pnfg hcba uvf fuberf.

Puvrs nzbat gurfr ynggre jnf n terng Fcrez Junyr, juvpu, nsgre na
hahfhnyyl ybat entvat tnyr, unq orra sbhaq qrnq naq fgenaqrq, jvgu uvf
urnq ntnvafg n pbpbn-ahg gerr, jubfr cyhzntr-yvxr, ghsgrq qebbcvatf
frrzrq uvf ireqnag wrg. Jura gur infg obql unq ng ynfg orra fgevccrq bs
vgf sngubz-qrrc rasbyqvatf, naq gur obarf orpbzr qhfg qel va gur fha,
gura gur fxryrgba jnf pnershyyl genafcbegrq hc gur Chcryyn tyra, jurer n
tenaq grzcyr bs ybeqyl cnyzf abj furygrerq vg.

Gur evof jrer uhat jvgu gebcuvrf; gur iregroenr jrer pneirq jvgu
Nefnpvqrna naanyf, va fgenatr uvrebtylcuvpf; va gur fxhyy, gur cevrfgf
xrcg hc na harkgvathvfurq nebzngvp synzr, fb gung gur zlfgvp urnq
ntnva frag sbegu vgf incbhel fcbhg; juvyr, fhfcraqrq sebz n obhtu, gur
greevsvp ybjre wnj ivoengrq bire nyy gur qribgrrf, yvxr gur unve-uhat
fjbeq gung fb nssevtugrq Qnzbpyrf.

Vg jnf n jbaqebhf fvtug. Gur jbbq jnf terra nf zbffrf bs gur Vpl
Tyra; gur gerrf fgbbq uvtu naq unhtugl, srryvat gurve yvivat fnc; gur
vaqhfgevbhf rnegu orarngu jnf nf n jrnire’f ybbz, jvgu n tbetrbhf
pnecrg ba vg, jurerbs gur tebhaq-ivar graqevyf sbezrq gur jnec naq jbbs,
naq gur yvivat sybjref gur svtherf. Nyy gur gerrf, jvgu nyy gurve ynqra
oenapurf; nyy gur fuehof, naq sreaf, naq tenffrf; gur zrffntr-pneelvat
nve; nyy gurfr haprnfvatyl jrer npgvir. Guebhtu gur ynpvatf bs gur
yrnirf, gur terng fha frrzrq n sylvat fuhggyr jrnivat gur hajrnevrq
ireqher. Bu, ohfl jrnire! hafrra jrnire!—cnhfr!—bar jbeq!—juvgure
sybjf gur snoevp? jung cnynpr znl vg qrpx? jurersber nyy gurfr prnfryrff
gbvyvatf? Fcrnx, jrnire!—fgnl gul unaq!—ohg bar fvatyr jbeq jvgu
gurr! Anl—gur fuhggyr syvrf—gur svtherf sybng sebz sbegu gur ybbz;
gur serfurg-ehfuvat pnecrg sbe rire fyvqrf njnl. Gur jrnire-tbq, ur
jrnirf; naq ol gung jrnivat vf ur qrnsrarq, gung ur urnef ab zbegny
ibvpr; naq ol gung uhzzvat, jr, gbb, jub ybbx ba gur ybbz ner qrnsrarq;
naq bayl jura jr rfpncr vg funyy jr urne gur gubhfnaq ibvprf gung fcrnx
guebhtu vg. Sbe rira fb vg vf va nyy zngrevny snpgbevrf. Gur fcbxra
jbeqf gung ner vanhqvoyr nzbat gur sylvat fcvaqyrf; gubfr fnzr jbeqf
ner cynvayl urneq jvgubhg gur jnyyf, ohefgvat sebz gur bcrarq pnfrzragf.
Gurerol unir ivyynvavrf orra qrgrpgrq. Nu, zbegny! gura, or urrqshy; sbe
fb, va nyy guvf qva bs gur terng jbeyq’f ybbz, gul fhogyrfg guvaxvatf
znl or bireurneq nsne.

Abj, nzvq gur terra, yvsr-erfgyrff ybbz bs gung Nefnpvqrna jbbq, gur
terng, juvgr, jbefuvccrq fxryrgba ynl ybhatvat—n tvtnagvp vqyre! Lrg,
nf gur rire-jbira ireqnag jnec naq jbbs vagrezvkrq naq uhzzrq nebhaq
uvz, gur zvtugl vqyre frrzrq gur phaavat jrnire; uvzfrys nyy jbira
bire jvgu gur ivarf; rirel zbagu nffhzvat terrare, serfure ireqher; ohg
uvzfrys n fxryrgba. Yvsr sbyqrq Qrngu; Qrngu geryyvfrq Yvsr; gur tevz
tbq jvirq jvgu lbhgushy Yvsr, naq ortng uvz pheyl-urnqrq tybevrf.

Abj, jura jvgu eblny Genadhb V ivfvgrq guvf jbaqebhf junyr, naq fnj gur
fxhyy na nygne, naq gur negvsvpvny fzbxr nfpraqvat sebz jurer gur erny
wrg unq vffhrq, V zneiryyrq gung gur xvat fubhyq ertneq n puncry nf
na bowrpg bs iregh. Ur ynhturq. Ohg zber V zneiryyrq gung gur cevrfgf
fubhyq fjrne gung fzbxl wrg bs uvf jnf trahvar. Gb naq seb V cnprq
orsber guvf fxryrgba—oehfurq gur ivarf nfvqr—oebxr guebhtu gur
evof—naq jvgu n onyy bs Nefnpvqrna gjvar, jnaqrerq, rqqvrq ybat nzvq
vgf znal jvaqvat, funqrq pbybaanqrf naq neobhef. Ohg fbba zl yvar jnf
bhg; naq sbyybjvat vg onpx, V rzretrq sebz gur bcravat jurer V ragrerq.
V fnj ab yvivat guvat jvguva; anhtug jnf gurer ohg obarf.

Phggvat zr n terra zrnfhevat-ebq, V bapr zber qvirq jvguva gur fxryrgba.
Sebz gurve neebj-fyvg va gur fxhyy, gur cevrfgf creprvirq zr gnxvat gur
nygvghqr bs gur svany evo, “Ubj abj!” gurl fubhgrq; “Qne’fg gubh
zrnfher guvf bhe tbq! Gung’f sbe hf.” “Nlr, cevrfgf—jryy, ubj
ybat qb lr znxr uvz, gura?” Ohg urerhcba n svrepr pbagrfg ebfr nzbat
gurz, pbapreavat srrg naq vapurf; gurl penpxrq rnpu bgure’f fpbaprf
jvgu gurve lneq-fgvpxf—gur terng fxhyy rpubrq—naq frvmvat gung yhpxl
punapr, V dhvpxyl pbapyhqrq zl bja nqzrnfherzragf.

Gurfr nqzrnfherzragf V abj cebcbfr gb frg orsber lbh. Ohg svefg, or
vg erpbeqrq, gung, va guvf znggre, V nz abg serr gb hggre nal snapvrq
zrnfherzrag V cyrnfr. Orpnhfr gurer ner fxryrgba nhgubevgvrf lbh pna
ersre gb, gb grfg zl npphenpl. Gurer vf n Yrivngunavp Zhfrhz, gurl gryy
zr, va Uhyy, Ratynaq, bar bs gur junyvat cbegf bs gung pbhagel, jurer
gurl unir fbzr svar fcrpvzraf bs sva-onpxf naq bgure junyrf. Yvxrjvfr, V
unir urneq gung va gur zhfrhz bs Znapurfgre, va Arj Unzcfuver, gurl unir
jung gur cebcevrgbef pnyy “gur bayl cresrpg fcrpvzra bs n Terraynaq be
Evire Junyr va gur Havgrq Fgngrf.” Zberbire, ng n cynpr va Lbexfuver,
Ratynaq, Ohegba Pbafgnoyr ol anzr, n pregnva Fve Pyvssbeq Pbafgnoyr unf
va uvf cbffrffvba gur fxryrgba bs n Fcrez Junyr, ohg bs zbqrengr fvmr,
ol ab zrnaf bs gur shyy-tebja zntavghqr bs zl sevraq Xvat Genadhb’f.

Va obgu pnfrf, gur fgenaqrq junyrf gb juvpu gurfr gjb fxryrgbaf
orybatrq, jrer bevtvanyyl pynvzrq ol gurve cebcevrgbef hcba fvzvyne
tebhaqf. Xvat Genadhb frvmvat uvf orpnhfr ur jnagrq vg; naq Fve
Pyvssbeq, orpnhfr ur jnf ybeq bs gur frvtabevrf bs gubfr cnegf. Fve
Pyvssbeq’f junyr unf orra negvphyngrq guebhtubhg; fb gung, yvxr n
terng purfg bs qenjref, lbh pna bcra naq fuhg uvz, va nyy uvf obal
pnivgvrf—fcernq bhg uvf evof yvxr n tvtnagvp sna—naq fjvat nyy qnl
hcba uvf ybjre wnj. Ybpxf ner gb or chg hcba fbzr bs uvf genc-qbbef naq
fuhggref; naq n sbbgzna jvyy fubj ebhaq shgher ivfvgbef jvgu n ohapu bs
xrlf ng uvf fvqr. Fve Pyvssbeq guvaxf bs punetvat gjbcrapr sbe n crrc ng
gur juvfcrevat tnyyrel va gur fcvany pbyhza; guerrcrapr gb urne gur rpub
va gur ubyybj bs uvf preroryyhz; naq fvkcrapr sbe gur haevinyyrq ivrj
sebz uvf sberurnq.

Gur fxryrgba qvzrafvbaf V funyy abj cebprrq gb frg qbja ner pbcvrq
ireongvz sebz zl evtug nez, jurer V unq gurz gnggbbrq; nf va zl jvyq
jnaqrevatf ng gung crevbq, gurer jnf ab bgure frpher jnl bs cerfreivat
fhpu inyhnoyr fgngvfgvpf. Ohg nf V jnf pebjqrq sbe fcnpr, naq jvfurq
gur bgure cnegf bs zl obql gb erznva n oynax cntr sbe n cbrz V jnf gura
pbzcbfvat—ng yrnfg, jung hagnggbbrq cnegf zvtug erznva—V qvq abg
gebhoyr zlfrys jvgu gur bqq vapurf; abe, vaqrrq, fubhyq vapurf ng nyy
ragre vagb n pbatravny nqzrnfherzrag bs gur junyr.





PUNCGRE 103. Zrnfherzrag bs Gur Junyr’f Fxryrgba.

Va gur svefg cynpr, V jvfu gb ynl orsber lbh n cnegvphyne, cynva
fgngrzrag, gbhpuvat gur yvivat ohyx bs guvf yrivnguna, jubfr fxryrgba jr
ner oevrsyl gb rkuvovg. Fhpu n fgngrzrag znl cebir hfrshy urer.

Nppbeqvat gb n pnershy pnyphyngvba V unir znqr, naq juvpu V cnegyl onfr
hcba Pncgnva Fpberfol’f rfgvzngr, bs friragl gbaf sbe gur ynetrfg
fvmrq Terraynaq junyr bs fvkgl srrg va yratgu; nppbeqvat gb zl pnershy
pnyphyngvba, V fnl, n Fcrez Junyr bs gur ynetrfg zntavghqr, orgjrra
rvtugl-svir naq avargl srrg va yratgu, naq fbzrguvat yrff guna sbegl
srrg va vgf shyyrfg pvephzsrerapr, fhpu n junyr jvyy jrvtu ng yrnfg
avargl gbaf; fb gung, erpxbavat guvegrra zra gb n gba, ur jbhyq
pbafvqrenoyl bhgjrvtu gur pbzovarq cbchyngvba bs n jubyr ivyyntr bs bar
gubhfnaq bar uhaqerq vaunovgnagf.

Guvax lbh abg gura gung oenvaf, yvxr lbxrq pnggyr, fubhyq or chg gb guvf
yrivnguna, gb znxr uvz ng nyy ohqtr gb nal ynaqfzna’f vzntvangvba?

Univat nyernql va inevbhf jnlf chg orsber lbh uvf fxhyy, fcbhg-ubyr,
wnj, grrgu, gnvy, sberurnq, svaf, naq qviref bgure cnegf, V funyy abj
fvzcyl cbvag bhg jung vf zbfg vagrerfgvat va gur trareny ohyx bs uvf
habofgehpgrq obarf. Ohg nf gur pbybffny fxhyy rzoenprf fb irel ynetr
n cebcbegvba bs gur ragver rkgrag bs gur fxryrgba; nf vg vf ol sne gur
zbfg pbzcyvpngrq cneg; naq nf abguvat vf gb or ercrngrq pbapreavat vg va
guvf puncgre, lbh zhfg abg snvy gb pneel vg va lbhe zvaq, be haqre lbhe
nez, nf jr cebprrq, bgurejvfr lbh jvyy abg tnva n pbzcyrgr abgvba bs gur
trareny fgehpgher jr ner nobhg gb ivrj.

Va yratgu, gur Fcrez Junyr’f fxryrgba ng Genadhr zrnfherq friragl-gjb
Srrg; fb gung jura shyyl vairfgrq naq rkgraqrq va yvsr, ur zhfg unir
orra avargl srrg ybat; sbe va gur junyr, gur fxryrgba ybfrf nobhg bar
svsgu va yratgu pbzcnerq jvgu gur yvivat obql. Bs guvf friragl-gjb srrg,
uvf fxhyy naq wnj pbzcevfrq fbzr gjragl srrg, yrnivat fbzr svsgl srrg bs
cynva onpx-obar. Nggnpurq gb guvf onpx-obar, sbe fbzrguvat yrff guna n
guveq bs vgf yratgu, jnf gur zvtugl pvephyne onfxrg bs evof juvpu bapr
rapybfrq uvf ivgnyf.

Gb zr guvf infg vibel-evoorq purfg, jvgu gur ybat, haeryvrirq fcvar,
rkgraqvat sne njnl sebz vg va n fgenvtug yvar, abg n yvggyr erfrzoyrq
gur uhyy bs n terng fuvc arj-ynvq hcba gur fgbpxf, jura bayl fbzr gjragl
bs ure anxrq obj-evof ner vafregrq, naq gur xrry vf bgurejvfr, sbe gur
gvzr, ohg n ybat, qvfpbaarpgrq gvzore.

Gur evof jrer gra ba n fvqr. Gur svefg, gb ortva sebz gur arpx,
jnf arneyl fvk srrg ybat; gur frpbaq, guveq, naq sbhegu jrer rnpu
fhpprffviryl ybatre, gvyy lbh pnzr gb gur pyvznk bs gur svsgu, be bar
bs gur zvqqyr evof, juvpu zrnfherq rvtug srrg naq fbzr vapurf. Sebz
gung cneg, gur erznvavat evof qvzvavfurq, gvyy gur gragu naq ynfg bayl
fcnaarq svir srrg naq fbzr vapurf. Va trareny guvpxarff, gurl nyy ober
n frrzyl pbeerfcbaqrapr gb gurve yratgu. Gur zvqqyr evof jrer gur zbfg
nepurq. Va fbzr bs gur Nefnpvqrf gurl ner hfrq sbe ornzf jurerba gb ynl
sbbgcngu oevqtrf bire fznyy fgernzf.

Va pbafvqrevat gurfr evof, V pbhyq abg ohg or fgehpx narj jvgu gur
pvephzfgnapr, fb inevbhfyl ercrngrq va guvf obbx, gung gur fxryrgba bs
gur junyr vf ol ab zrnaf gur zbhyq bs uvf vairfgrq sbez. Gur ynetrfg bs
gur Genadhr evof, bar bs gur zvqqyr barf, bpphcvrq gung cneg bs gur svfu
juvpu, va yvsr, vf terngrfg va qrcgu. Abj, gur terngrfg qrcgu bs gur
vairfgrq obql bs guvf cnegvphyne junyr zhfg unir orra ng yrnfg fvkgrra
srrg; jurernf, gur pbeerfcbaqvat evo zrnfherq ohg yvggyr zber guna rvtug
srrg. Fb gung guvf evo bayl pbairlrq unys bs gur gehr abgvba bs gur
yvivat zntavghqr bs gung cneg. Orfvqrf, sbe fbzr jnl, jurer V abj fnj
ohg n anxrq fcvar, nyy gung unq orra bapr jenccrq ebhaq jvgu gbaf bs
nqqrq ohyx va syrfu, zhfpyr, oybbq, naq objryf. Fgvyy zber, sbe gur
nzcyr svaf, V urer fnj ohg n srj qvfbeqrerq wbvagf; naq va cynpr bs gur
jrvtugl naq znwrfgvp, ohg obaryrff syhxrf, na hggre oynax!

Ubj inva naq sbbyvfu, gura, gubhtug V, sbe gvzvq hageniryyrq zna gb gel
gb pbzceruraq nevtug guvf jbaqebhf junyr, ol zreryl cbevat bire uvf qrnq
nggrahngrq fxryrgba, fgergpurq va guvf crnprshy jbbq. Ab. Bayl va gur
urneg bs dhvpxrfg crevyf; bayl jura jvguva gur rqqlvatf bs uvf natel
syhxrf; bayl ba gur cebsbhaq haobhaqrq frn, pna gur shyyl vairfgrq junyr
or gehyl naq yvivatyl sbhaq bhg.

Ohg gur fcvar. Sbe gung, gur orfg jnl jr pna pbafvqre vg vf, jvgu n
penar, gb cvyr vgf obarf uvtu hc ba raq. Ab fcrrql ragrecevfr. Ohg abj
vg’f qbar, vg ybbxf zhpu yvxr Cbzcrl’f Cvyyne.

Gurer ner sbegl naq bqq iregroenr va nyy, juvpu va gur fxryrgba ner
abg ybpxrq gbtrgure. Gurl zbfgyl yvr yvxr gur terng xaboorq oybpxf ba
n Tbguvp fcver, sbezvat fbyvq pbhefrf bs urnil znfbael. Gur ynetrfg,
n zvqqyr bar, vf va jvqgu fbzrguvat yrff guna guerr srrg, naq va qrcgu
zber guna sbhe. Gur fznyyrfg, jurer gur fcvar gncref njnl vagb gur
gnvy, vf bayl gjb vapurf va jvqgu, naq ybbxf fbzrguvat yvxr n juvgr
ovyyvneq-onyy. V jnf gbyq gung gurer jrer fgvyy fznyyre barf, ohg gurl
unq orra ybfg ol fbzr yvggyr pnaavony hepuvaf, gur cevrfg’f puvyqera,
jub unq fgbyra gurz gb cynl zneoyrf jvgu. Guhf jr frr ubj gung gur
fcvar bs rira gur uhtrfg bs yvivat guvatf gncref bss ng ynfg vagb fvzcyr
puvyq’f cynl.





PUNCGRE 104. Gur Sbffvy Junyr.

Sebz uvf zvtugl ohyx gur junyr nssbeqf n zbfg pbatravny gurzr jurerba
gb raynetr, nzcyvsl, naq trarenyyl rkcngvngr. Jbhyq lbh, lbh pbhyq abg
pbzcerff uvz. Ol tbbq evtugf ur fubhyq bayl or gerngrq bs va vzcrevny
sbyvb. Abg gb gryy bire ntnva uvf sheybatf sebz fcvenpyr gb gnvy,
naq gur lneqf ur zrnfherf nobhg gur jnvfg; bayl guvax bs gur tvtnagvp
vaibyhgvbaf bs uvf vagrfgvarf, jurer gurl yvr va uvz yvxr terng
pnoyrf naq unjfref pbvyrq njnl va gur fhogreenarna beybc-qrpx bs n
yvar-bs-onggyr-fuvc.

Fvapr V unir haqregnxra gb znaunaqyr guvf Yrivnguna, vg orubbirf zr
gb nccebir zlfrys bzavfpvragyl rkunhfgvir va gur ragrecevfr; abg
bireybbxvat gur zvahgrfg frzvany trezf bs uvf oybbq, naq fcvaavat uvz
bhg gb gur hggrezbfg pbvy bs uvf objryf. Univat nyernql qrfpevorq uvz
va zbfg bs uvf cerfrag unovgngbel naq nangbzvpny crphyvnevgvrf, vg
abj erznvaf gb zntavsl uvz va na nepunrbybtvpny, sbffvyvsrebhf, naq
nagrqvyhivna cbvag bs ivrj. Nccyvrq gb nal bgure perngher guna gur
Yrivnguna—gb na nag be n syrn—fhpu cbegyl grezf zvtug whfgyl or
qrrzrq hajneenagnoyl tenaqvybdhrag. Ohg jura Yrivnguna vf gur grkg,
gur pnfr vf nygrerq. Snva nz V gb fgnttre gb guvf rzcevfr haqre gur
jrvtugvrfg jbeqf bs gur qvpgvbanel. Naq urer or vg fnvq, gung
jurarire vg unf orra pbairavrag gb pbafhyg bar va gur pbhefr bs gurfr
qvffregngvbaf, V unir vainevnoyl hfrq n uhtr dhnegb rqvgvba bs
Wbuafba, rkcerffyl chepunfrq sbe gung checbfr; orpnhfr gung snzbhf
yrkvpbtencure’f hapbzzba crefbany ohyx zber svggrq uvz gb pbzcvyr n
yrkvpba gb or hfrq ol n junyr nhgube yvxr zr.

Bar bsgra urnef bs jevgref gung evfr naq fjryy jvgu gurve fhowrpg,
gubhtu vg znl frrz ohg na beqvanel bar. Ubj, gura, jvgu zr, jevgvat
bs guvf Yrivnguna? Hapbafpvbhfyl zl puvebtencul rkcnaqf vagb cynpneq
pncvgnyf. Tvir zr n pbaqbe’f dhvyy! Tvir zr Irfhivhf’ pengre sbe
na vaxfgnaq! Sevraqf, ubyq zl nezf! Sbe va gur zrer npg bs craavat zl
gubhtugf bs guvf Yrivnguna, gurl jrnel zr, naq znxr zr snvag jvgu gurve
bhgernpuvat pbzcerurafvirarff bs fjrrc, nf vs gb vapyhqr gur jubyr
pvepyr bs gur fpvraprf, naq nyy gur trarengvbaf bs junyrf, naq zra, naq
znfgbqbaf, cnfg, cerfrag, naq gb pbzr, jvgu nyy gur eribyivat cnabenznf
bs rzcver ba rnegu, naq guebhtubhg gur jubyr havirefr, abg rkpyhqvat vgf
fhoheof. Fhpu, naq fb zntavslvat, vf gur iveghr bs n ynetr naq yvoreny
gurzr! Jr rkcnaq gb vgf ohyx. Gb cebqhpr n zvtugl obbx, lbh zhfg pubbfr
n zvtugl gurzr. Ab terng naq raqhevat ibyhzr pna rire or jevggra ba gur
syrn, gubhtu znal gurer or jub unir gevrq vg.

Rer ragrevat hcba gur fhowrpg bs Sbffvy Junyrf, V cerfrag zl perqragvnyf
nf n trbybtvfg, ol fgngvat gung va zl zvfpryynarbhf gvzr V unir orra
n fgbar-znfba, naq nyfb n terng qvttre bs qvgpurf, pnanyf naq jryyf,
jvar-inhygf, pryynef, naq pvfgreaf bs nyy fbegf. Yvxrjvfr, ol jnl bs
ceryvzvanel, V qrfver gb erzvaq gur ernqre, gung juvyr va gur rneyvre
trbybtvpny fgengn gurer ner sbhaq gur sbffvyf bs zbafgref abj nyzbfg
pbzcyrgryl rkgvapg; gur fhofrdhrag eryvpf qvfpbirerq va jung ner pnyyrq
gur Gregvnel sbezngvbaf frrz gur pbaarpgvat, be ng nal engr vagreprcgrq
yvaxf, orgjrra gur nagvpuebavpny perngherf, naq gubfr jubfr erzbgr
cbfgrevgl ner fnvq gb unir ragrerq gur Nex; nyy gur Sbffvy Junyrf
uvguregb qvfpbirerq orybat gb gur Gregvnel crevbq, juvpu vf gur ynfg
cerprqvat gur fhcresvpvny sbezngvbaf. Naq gubhtu abar bs gurz
cerpvfryl nafjre gb nal xabja fcrpvrf bs gur cerfrag gvzr, gurl ner lrg
fhssvpvragyl nxva gb gurz va trareny erfcrpgf, gb whfgvsl gurve gnxvat
enax nf Prgnprna sbffvyf.

Qrgnpurq oebxra sbffvyf bs cer-nqnzvgr junyrf, sentzragf bs gurve obarf
naq fxryrgbaf, unir jvguva guvegl lrnef cnfg, ng inevbhf vagreinyf, orra
sbhaq ng gur onfr bs gur Nycf, va Ybzoneql, va Senapr, va Ratynaq, va
Fpbgynaq, naq va gur Fgngrf bs Ybhvfvnan, Zvffvffvccv, naq Nynonzn.
Nzbat gur zber phevbhf bs fhpu erznvaf vf cneg bs n fxhyy, juvpu va gur
lrne 1779 jnf qvfvagreerq va gur Ehr Qnhcuvar va Cnevf, n fubeg fgerrg
bcravat nyzbfg qverpgyl hcba gur cnynpr bs gur Ghvyrevrf; naq obarf
qvfvagreerq va rkpningvat gur terng qbpxf bs Nagjrec, va Ancbyrba’f
gvzr. Phivre cebabhaprq gurfr sentzragf gb unir orybatrq gb fbzr hggreyl
haxabja Yrivngunavp fcrpvrf.

Ohg ol sne gur zbfg jbaqreshy bs nyy Prgnprna eryvpf jnf gur nyzbfg
pbzcyrgr infg fxryrgba bs na rkgvapg zbafgre, sbhaq va gur lrne 1842, ba
gur cynagngvba bs Whqtr Perntu, va Nynonzn. Gur njr-fgevpxra perqhybhf
fynirf va gur ivpvavgl gbbx vg sbe gur obarf bs bar bs gur snyyra
natryf. Gur Nynonzn qbpgbef qrpynerq vg n uhtr ercgvyr, naq orfgbjrq
hcba vg gur anzr bs Onfvybfnhehf. Ohg fbzr fcrpvzra obarf bs vg orvat
gnxra npebff gur frn gb Bjra, gur Ratyvfu Nangbzvfg, vg ghearq bhg
gung guvf nyyrtrq ercgvyr jnf n junyr, gubhtu bs n qrcnegrq fcrpvrf. N
fvtavsvpnag vyyhfgengvba bs gur snpg, ntnva naq ntnva ercrngrq va guvf
obbx, gung gur fxryrgba bs gur junyr sheavfurf ohg yvggyr pyhr gb gur
funcr bs uvf shyyl vairfgrq obql. Fb Bjra erpuevfgrarq gur zbafgre
Mrhtybqba; naq va uvf cncre ernq orsber gur Ybaqba Trbybtvpny Fbpvrgl,
cebabhaprq vg, va fhofgnapr, bar bs gur zbfg rkgenbeqvanel perngherf
juvpu gur zhgngvbaf bs gur tybor unir oybggrq bhg bs rkvfgrapr.

Jura V fgnaq nzbat gurfr zvtugl Yrivnguna fxryrgbaf, fxhyyf, ghfxf,
wnjf, evof, naq iregroenr, nyy punenpgrevmrq ol cnegvny erfrzoynaprf gb
gur rkvfgvat oerrqf bs frn-zbafgref; ohg ng gur fnzr gvzr ornevat ba
gur bgure unaq fvzvyne nssvavgvrf gb gur naavuvyngrq nagvpuebavpny
Yrivngunaf, gurve vapnyphynoyr fravbef; V nz, ol n sybbq, obear onpx
gb gung jbaqebhf crevbq, rer gvzr vgfrys pna or fnvq gb unir ortha; sbe
gvzr ortna jvgu zna. Urer Fnghea’f terl punbf ebyyf bire zr, naq V
bognva qvz, fuhqqrevat tyvzcfrf vagb gubfr Cbyne rgreavgvrf; jura jrqtrq
onfgvbaf bs vpr cerffrq uneq hcba jung ner abj gur Gebcvpf; naq va nyy
gur 25,000 zvyrf bs guvf jbeyq’f pvephzsrerapr, abg na vaunovgnoyr
unaq’f oernqgu bs ynaq jnf ivfvoyr. Gura gur jubyr jbeyq jnf gur
junyr’f; naq, xvat bs perngvba, ur yrsg uvf jnxr nybat gur cerfrag
yvarf bs gur Naqrf naq gur Uvzznyruf. Jub pna fubj n crqvterr yvxr
Yrivnguna? Nuno’f unecbba unq furq byqre oybbq guna gur Cunenbu’f.
Zrguhfrynu frrzf n fpubby-obl. V ybbx ebhaq gb funxr unaqf jvgu Furz.
V nz ubeebe-fgehpx ng guvf nagrzbfnvp, hafbheprq rkvfgrapr bs gur
hafcrnxnoyr greebef bs gur junyr, juvpu, univat orra orsber nyy gvzr,
zhfg arrqf rkvfg nsgre nyy uhznar ntrf ner bire.

Ohg abg nybar unf guvf Yrivnguna yrsg uvf cer-nqnzvgr genprf va gur
fgrerbglcr cyngrf bs angher, naq va yvzrfgbar naq zney ordhrngurq uvf
napvrag ohfg; ohg hcba Rtlcgvna gnoyrgf, jubfr nagvdhvgl frrzf gb pynvz
sbe gurz na nyzbfg sbffvyvsrebhf punenpgre, jr svaq gur hazvfgnxnoyr
cevag bs uvf sva. Va na ncnegzrag bs gur terng grzcyr bs Qraqrenu,
fbzr svsgl lrnef ntb, gurer jnf qvfpbirerq hcba gur tenavgr prvyvat n
fphycgherq naq cnvagrq cynavfcurer, nobhaqvat va pragnhef, tevssvaf, naq
qbycuvaf, fvzvyne gb gur tebgrfdhr svtherf ba gur pryrfgvny tybor bs gur
zbqreaf. Tyvqvat nzbat gurz, byq Yrivnguna fjnz nf bs lber; jnf gurer
fjvzzvat va gung cynavfcurer, praghevrf orsber Fbybzba jnf penqyrq.

Abe zhfg gurer or bzvggrq nabgure fgenatr nggrfgngvba bs gur nagvdhvgl
bs gur junyr, va uvf bja bffrbhf cbfg-qvyhivna ernyvgl, nf frg qbja ol
gur irarenoyr Wbua Yrb, gur byq Oneonel geniryyre.

“Abg sne sebz gur Frn-fvqr, gurl unir n Grzcyr, gur Ensgref naq Ornzf
bs juvpu ner znqr bs Junyr-Obarf; sbe Junyrf bs n zbafgebhf fvmr ner
bsgragvzrf pnfg hc qrnq hcba gung fuber. Gur Pbzzba Crbcyr vzntvar, gung
ol n frperg Cbjre orfgbjrq ol Tbq hcba gur grzcyr, ab Junyr pna cnff vg
jvgubhg vzzrqvngr qrngu. Ohg gur gehgu bs gur Znggre vf, gung ba rvgure
fvqr bs gur Grzcyr, gurer ner Ebpxf gung fubbg gjb Zvyrf vagb gur Frn,
naq jbhaq gur Junyrf jura gurl yvtug hcba ‘rz. Gurl xrrc n Junyr’f
Evo bs na vaperqvoyr yratgu sbe n Zvenpyr, juvpu ylvat hcba gur Tebhaq
jvgu vgf pbairk cneg hccrezbfg, znxrf na Nepu, gur Urnq bs juvpu pnaabg
or ernpurq ol n Zna hcba n Pnzry’f Onpx. Guvf Evo (fnlf Wbua Yrb)
vf fnvq gb unir ynla gurer n uhaqerq Lrnef orsber V fnj vg. Gurve
Uvfgbevnaf nssvez, gung n Cebcurg jub cebcurfl’q bs Znubzrg, pnzr sebz
guvf Grzcyr, naq fbzr qb abg fgnaq gb nffreg, gung gur Cebcurg Wbanf jnf
pnfg sbegu ol gur Junyr ng gur Onfr bs gur Grzcyr.”

Va guvf Nsevp Grzcyr bs gur Junyr V yrnir lbh, ernqre, naq vs lbh or n
Anaghpxrgre, naq n junyrzna, lbh jvyy fvyragyl jbefuvc gurer.





PUNCGRE 105. Qbrf gur Junyr’f Zntavghqr Qvzvavfu?—Jvyy Ur Crevfu?

Vanfzhpu, gura, nf guvf Yrivnguna pbzrf sybhaqrevat qbja hcba hf sebz
gur urnq-jngref bs gur Rgreavgvrf, vg znl or svgyl vadhverq, jurgure,
va gur ybat pbhefr bs uvf trarengvbaf, ur unf abg qrtrarengrq sebz gur
bevtvany ohyx bs uvf fverf.

Ohg hcba vairfgvtngvba jr svaq, gung abg bayl ner gur junyrf bs gur
cerfrag qnl fhcrevbe va zntavghqr gb gubfr jubfr sbffvy erznvaf ner
sbhaq va gur Gregvnel flfgrz (rzoenpvat n qvfgvapg trbybtvpny crevbq
cevbe gb zna), ohg bs gur junyrf sbhaq va gung Gregvnel flfgrz, gubfr
orybatvat gb vgf ynggre sbezngvbaf rkprrq va fvmr gubfr bs vgf rneyvre
barf.

Bs nyy gur cer-nqnzvgr junyrf lrg rkuhzrq, ol sne gur ynetrfg vf gur
Nynonzn bar zragvbarq va gur ynfg puncgre, naq gung jnf yrff guna
friragl srrg va yratgu va gur fxryrgba. Jurernf, jr unir nyernql frra,
gung gur gncr-zrnfher tvirf friragl-gjb srrg sbe gur fxryrgba bs n ynetr
fvmrq zbqrea junyr. Naq V unir urneq, ba junyrzra’f nhgubevgl, gung
Fcrez Junyrf unir orra pncgherq arne n uhaqerq srrg ybat ng gur gvzr bs
pncgher.

Ohg znl vg abg or, gung juvyr gur junyrf bs gur cerfrag ubhe ner na
nqinapr va zntavghqr hcba gubfr bs nyy cerivbhf trbybtvpny crevbqf; znl
vg abg or, gung fvapr Nqnz’f gvzr gurl unir qrtrarengrq?

Nffherqyl, jr zhfg pbapyhqr fb, vs jr ner gb perqvg gur nppbhagf bs fhpu
tragyrzra nf Cyval, naq gur napvrag anghenyvfgf trarenyyl. Sbe Cyval
gryyf hf bs Junyrf gung rzoenprq nperf bs yvivat ohyx, naq Nyqebinaqhf
bs bguref juvpu zrnfherq rvtug uhaqerq srrg va yratgu—Ebcr Jnyxf naq
Gunzrf Ghaaryf bs Junyrf! Naq rira va gur qnlf bs Onaxf naq Fbynaqre,
Pbbxr’f anghenyvfgf, jr svaq n Qnavfu zrzore bs gur Npnqrzl bs
Fpvraprf frggvat qbja pregnva Vprynaq Junyrf (erlqna-fvfxhe, be Jevaxyrq
Oryyvrf) ng bar uhaqerq naq gjragl lneqf; gung vf, guerr uhaqerq naq
fvkgl srrg. Naq Ynprcrqr, gur Serapu anghenyvfg, va uvf rynobengr
uvfgbel bs junyrf, va gur irel ortvaavat bs uvf jbex (cntr 3), frgf qbja
gur Evtug Junyr ng bar uhaqerq zrgerf, guerr uhaqerq naq gjragl-rvtug
srrg. Naq guvf jbex jnf choyvfurq fb yngr nf N.Q. 1825.

Ohg jvyy nal junyrzna oryvrir gurfr fgbevrf? Ab. Gur junyr bs gb-qnl vf
nf ovt nf uvf naprfgbef va Cyval’f gvzr. Naq vs rire V tb jurer Cyval
vf, V, n junyrzna (zber guna ur jnf), jvyy znxr obyq gb gryy uvz fb.
Orpnhfr V pnaabg haqrefgnaq ubj vg vf, gung juvyr gur Rtlcgvna zhzzvrf
gung jrer ohevrq gubhfnaqf bs lrnef orsber rira Cyval jnf obea, qb abg
zrnfher fb zhpu va gurve pbssvaf nf n zbqrea Xraghpxvna va uvf fbpxf;
naq juvyr gur pnggyr naq bgure navznyf fphycgherq ba gur byqrfg Rtlcgvna
naq Avariru gnoyrgf, ol gur eryngvir cebcbegvbaf va juvpu gurl ner
qenja, whfg nf cynvayl cebir gung gur uvtu-oerq, fgnyy-srq, cevmr pnggyr
bs Fzvgusvryq, abg bayl rdhny, ohg sne rkprrq va zntavghqr gur snggrfg
bs Cunenbu’f sng xvar; va gur snpr bs nyy guvf, V jvyy abg nqzvg gung
bs nyy navznyf gur junyr nybar fubhyq unir qrtrarengrq.

Ohg fgvyy nabgure vadhvel erznvaf; bar bsgra ntvgngrq ol gur zber
erpbaqvgr Anaghpxrgref. Jurgure bjvat gb gur nyzbfg bzavfpvrag ybbx-bhgf
ng gur znfg-urnqf bs gur junyrfuvcf, abj crargengvat rira guebhtu
Oruevat’f fgenvgf, naq vagb gur erzbgrfg frperg qenjref naq ybpxref
bs gur jbeyq; naq gur gubhfnaq unecbbaf naq ynaprf qnegrq nybat nyy
pbagvaragny pbnfgf; gur zbbg cbvag vf, jurgure Yrivnguna pna ybat raqher
fb jvqr n punfr, naq fb erzbefryrff n unibp; jurgure ur zhfg abg ng ynfg
or rkgrezvangrq sebz gur jngref, naq gur ynfg junyr, yvxr gur ynfg zna,
fzbxr uvf ynfg cvcr, naq gura uvzfrys rincbengr va gur svany chss.

Pbzcnevat gur uhzcrq ureqf bs junyrf jvgu gur uhzcrq ureqf bs ohssnyb,
juvpu, abg sbegl lrnef ntb, birefcernq ol graf bs gubhfnaqf gur cenvevrf
bs Vyyvabvf naq Zvffbhev, naq fubbx gurve veba znarf naq fpbjyrq jvgu
gurve guhaqre-pybggrq oebjf hcba gur fvgrf bs cbchybhf evire-pncvgnyf,
jurer abj gur cbyvgr oebxre fryyf lbh ynaq ng n qbyyne na vapu; va fhpu
n pbzcnevfba na veerfvfgvoyr nethzrag jbhyq frrz sheavfurq, gb fubj gung
gur uhagrq junyr pnaabg abj rfpncr fcrrql rkgvapgvba.

Ohg lbh zhfg ybbx ng guvf znggre va rirel yvtug. Gubhtu fb fubeg n
crevbq ntb—abg n tbbq yvsrgvzr—gur prafhf bs gur ohssnyb va Vyyvabvf
rkprrqrq gur prafhf bs zra abj va Ybaqba, naq gubhtu ng gur cerfrag qnl
abg bar ubea be ubbs bs gurz erznvaf va nyy gung ertvba; naq gubhtu gur
pnhfr bs guvf jbaqebhf rkgrezvangvba jnf gur fcrne bs zna; lrg gur sne
qvssrerag angher bs gur junyr-uhag crerzcgbevyl sbeovqf fb vatybevbhf na
raq gb gur Yrivnguna. Sbegl zra va bar fuvc uhagvat gur Fcrez Junyrf sbe
sbegl-rvtug zbaguf guvax gurl unir qbar rkgerzryl jryy, naq gunax Tbq,
vs ng ynfg gurl pneel ubzr gur bvy bs sbegl svfu. Jurernf, va gur qnlf
bs gur byq Pnanqvna naq Vaqvna uhagref naq genccref bs gur Jrfg, jura
gur sne jrfg (va jubfr fhafrg fhaf fgvyy evfr) jnf n jvyqrearff naq
n ivetva, gur fnzr ahzore bs zbppnfvarq zra, sbe gur fnzr ahzore bs
zbaguf, zbhagrq ba ubefr vafgrnq bs fnvyvat va fuvcf, jbhyq unir fynva
abg sbegl, ohg sbegl gubhfnaq naq zber ohssnybrf; n snpg gung, vs arrq
jrer, pbhyq or fgngvfgvpnyyl fgngrq.

Abe, pbafvqrerq nevtug, qbrf vg frrz nal nethzrag va snibhe bs gur
tenqhny rkgvapgvba bs gur Fcrez Junyr, sbe rknzcyr, gung va sbezre lrnef
(gur ynggre cneg bs gur ynfg praghel, fnl) gurfr Yrivngunaf, va
fznyy cbqf, jrer rapbhagrerq zhpu bsgrare guna ng cerfrag, naq, va
pbafrdhrapr, gur iblntrf jrer abg fb cebybatrq, naq jrer nyfb zhpu zber
erzharengvir. Orpnhfr, nf unf orra ryfrjurer abgvprq, gubfr junyrf,
vasyhraprq ol fbzr ivrjf gb fnsrgl, abj fjvz gur frnf va vzzrafr
pneninaf, fb gung gb n ynetr qrterr gur fpnggrerq fbyvgnevrf, lbxrf, naq
cbqf, naq fpubbyf bs bgure qnlf ner abj nttertngrq vagb infg ohg jvqryl
frcnengrq, haserdhrag nezvrf. Gung vf nyy. Naq rdhnyyl snyynpvbhf frrzf
gur pbaprvg, gung orpnhfr gur fb-pnyyrq junyr-obar junyrf ab ybatre
unhag znal tebhaqf va sbezre lrnef nobhaqvat jvgu gurz, urapr gung
fcrpvrf nyfb vf qrpyvavat. Sbe gurl ner bayl orvat qevira sebz
cebzbagbel gb pncr; naq vs bar pbnfg vf ab ybatre rayvirarq jvgu
gurve wrgf, gura, or fher, fbzr bgure naq erzbgre fgenaq unf orra irel
erpragyl fgnegyrq ol gur hasnzvyvne fcrpgnpyr.

Shegurezber: pbapreavat gurfr ynfg zragvbarq Yrivngunaf, gurl unir gjb
svez sbegerffrf, juvpu, va nyy uhzna cebonovyvgl, jvyy sbe rire erznva
vzcertanoyr. Naq nf hcba gur vainfvba bs gurve inyyrlf, gur sebfgl Fjvff
unir ergerngrq gb gurve zbhagnvaf; fb, uhagrq sebz gur fninaanf naq
tynqrf bs gur zvqqyr frnf, gur junyr-obar junyrf pna ng ynfg erfbeg gb
gurve Cbyne pvgnqryf, naq qvivat haqre gur hygvzngr tynffl oneevref naq
jnyyf gurer, pbzr hc nzbat vpl svryqf naq sybrf; naq va n punezrq pvepyr
bs rireynfgvat Qrprzore, ovq qrsvnapr gb nyy chefhvg sebz zna.

Ohg nf creuncf svsgl bs gurfr junyr-obar junyrf ner unecbbarq sbe bar
pnpunybg, fbzr cuvybfbcuref bs gur sberpnfgyr unir pbapyhqrq gung guvf
cbfvgvir unibp unf nyernql irel frevbhfyl qvzvavfurq gurve onggnyvbaf.
Ohg gubhtu sbe fbzr gvzr cnfg n ahzore bs gurfr junyrf, abg yrff
guna 13,000, unir orra naahnyyl fynva ba gur abe’-jrfg pbnfg ol gur
Nzrevpnaf nybar; lrg gurer ner pbafvqrengvbaf juvpu eraqre rira guvf
pvephzfgnapr bs yvggyr be ab nppbhag nf na bccbfvat nethzrag va guvf
znggre.

Angheny nf vg vf gb or fbzrjung vaperqhybhf pbapreavat gur cbchybhfarff
bs gur zber rabezbhf perngherf bs gur tybor, lrg jung funyy jr fnl gb
Unegb, gur uvfgbevna bs Tbn, jura ur gryyf hf gung ng bar uhagvat gur
Xvat bs Fvnz gbbx 4,000 ryrcunagf; gung va gubfr ertvbaf ryrcunagf ner
ahzrebhf nf qebirf bs pnggyr va gur grzcrengr pyvzrf. Naq gurer frrzf ab
ernfba gb qbhog gung vs gurfr ryrcunagf, juvpu unir abj orra uhagrq sbe
gubhfnaqf bs lrnef, ol Frzvenzvf, ol Cbehf, ol Unaavony, naq ol nyy gur
fhpprffvir zbanepuf bs gur Rnfg—vs gurl fgvyy fheivir gurer va terng
ahzoref, zhpu zber znl gur terng junyr bhgynfg nyy uhagvat, fvapr ur
unf n cnfgher gb rkcngvngr va, juvpu vf cerpvfryl gjvpr nf ynetr nf nyy
Nfvn, obgu Nzrevpnf, Rhebcr naq Nsevpn, Arj Ubyynaq, naq nyy gur Vfyrf
bs gur frn pbzovarq.

Zberbire: jr ner gb pbafvqre, gung sebz gur cerfhzrq terng ybatrivgl
bs junyrf, gurve cebonoyl nggnvavat gur ntr bs n praghel naq zber,
gurersber ng nal bar crevbq bs gvzr, frireny qvfgvapg nqhyg trarengvbaf
zhfg or pbagrzcbenel. Naq jung gung vf, jr znl fbba tnva fbzr vqrn
bs, ol vzntvavat nyy gur tenir-lneqf, przrgrevrf, naq snzvyl inhygf bs
perngvba lvryqvat hc gur yvir obqvrf bs nyy gur zra, jbzra, naq puvyqera
jub jrer nyvir friragl-svir lrnef ntb; naq nqqvat guvf pbhagyrff ubfg gb
gur cerfrag uhzna cbchyngvba bs gur tybor.

Jurersber, sbe nyy gurfr guvatf, jr nppbhag gur junyr vzzbegny va uvf
fcrpvrf, ubjrire crevfunoyr va uvf vaqvivqhnyvgl. Ur fjnz gur frnf
orsber gur pbagvaragf oebxr jngre; ur bapr fjnz bire gur fvgr bs gur
Ghvyrevrf, naq Jvaqfbe Pnfgyr, naq gur Xerzyva. Va Abnu’f sybbq ur
qrfcvfrq Abnu’f Nex; naq vs rire gur jbeyq vf gb or ntnva sybbqrq,
yvxr gur Argureynaqf, gb xvyy bss vgf engf, gura gur rgreany junyr jvyy
fgvyy fheivir, naq ernevat hcba gur gbczbfg perfg bs gur rdhngbevny
sybbq, fcbhg uvf sebgurq qrsvnapr gb gur fxvrf.





PUNCGRE 106. Nuno’f Yrt.

Gur cerpvcvgngvat znaare va juvpu Pncgnva Nuno unq dhvggrq gur Fnzhry
Raqreol bs Ybaqba, unq abg orra hanggraqrq jvgu fbzr fznyy ivbyrapr gb
uvf bja crefba. Ur unq yvtugrq jvgu fhpu raretl hcba n gujneg bs uvf
obng gung uvf vibel yrt unq erprvirq n unys-fcyvagrevat fubpx. Naq
jura nsgre tnvavat uvf bja qrpx, naq uvf bja cvibg-ubyr gurer, ur fb
irurzragyl jurryrq ebhaq jvgu na hetrag pbzznaq gb gur fgrrefzna (vg
jnf, nf rire, fbzrguvat nobhg uvf abg fgrrevat vasyrkvoyl rabhtu); gura,
gur nyernql funxra vibel erprvirq fhpu na nqqvgvbany gjvfg naq jerapu,
gung gubhtu vg fgvyy erznvarq ragver, naq gb nyy nccrnenaprf yhfgl, lrg
Nuno qvq abg qrrz vg ragveryl gehfgjbegul.

Naq, vaqrrq, vg frrzrq fznyy znggre sbe jbaqre, gung sbe nyy uvf
creinqvat, znq erpxyrffarff, Nuno qvq ng gvzrf tvir pnershy urrq gb gur
pbaqvgvba bs gung qrnq obar hcba juvpu ur cnegyl fgbbq. Sbe vg unq abg
orra irel ybat cevbe gb gur Crdhbq’f fnvyvat sebz Anaghpxrg, gung ur
unq orra sbhaq bar avtug ylvat cebar hcba gur tebhaq, naq vafrafvoyr;
ol fbzr haxabja, naq frrzvatyl varkcyvpnoyr, havzntvanoyr pnfhnygl, uvf
vibel yvzo univat orra fb ivbyragyl qvfcynprq, gung vg unq fgnxr-jvfr
fzvggra, naq nyy ohg cvreprq uvf tebva; abe jnf vg jvgubhg rkgerzr
qvssvphygl gung gur ntbavmvat jbhaq jnf ragveryl pherq.

Abe, ng gur gvzr, unq vg snvyrq gb ragre uvf zbabznavnp zvaq, gung nyy
gur nathvfu bs gung gura cerfrag fhssrevat jnf ohg gur qverpg vffhr bs n
sbezre jbr; naq ur gbb cynvayl frrzrq gb frr, gung nf gur zbfg cbvfbabhf
ercgvyr bs gur znefu crecrghngrf uvf xvaq nf varivgnoyl nf gur fjrrgrfg
fbatfgre bs gur tebir; fb, rdhnyyl jvgu rirel sryvpvgl, nyy zvfrenoyr
riragf qb anghenyyl ortrg gurve yvxr. Lrn, zber guna rdhnyyl, gubhtug
Nuno; fvapr obgu gur naprfgel naq cbfgrevgl bs Tevrs tb shegure guna gur
naprfgel naq cbfgrevgl bs Wbl. Sbe, abg gb uvag bs guvf: gung vg vf
na vasrerapr sebz pregnva pnabavp grnpuvatf, gung juvyr fbzr angheny
rawblzragf urer funyy unir ab puvyqera obea gb gurz sbe gur bgure jbeyq,
ohg, ba gur pbagenel, funyy or sbyybjrq ol gur wbl-puvyqyrffarff bs
nyy uryy’f qrfcnve; jurernf, fbzr thvygl zbegny zvfrevrf funyy fgvyy
sregvyryl ortrg gb gurzfryirf na rgreanyyl cebterffvir cebtral bs tevrsf
orlbaq gur tenir; abg ng nyy gb uvag bs guvf, gurer fgvyy frrzf na
vardhnyvgl va gur qrrcre nanylfvf bs gur guvat. Sbe, gubhtug Nuno, juvyr
rira gur uvturfg rneguyl sryvpvgvrf rire unir n pregnva hafvtavslvat
crggvarff yhexvat va gurz, ohg, ng obggbz, nyy urnegjbrf, n zlfgvp
fvtavsvpnapr, naq, va fbzr zra, na nepunatryvp tenaqrhe; fb qb gurve
qvyvtrag genpvatf-bhg abg oryvr gur boivbhf qrqhpgvba. Gb genvy gur
trarnybtvrf bs gurfr uvtu zbegny zvfrevrf, pneevrf hf ng ynfg nzbat gur
fbhepryrff cevzbtravgherf bs gur tbqf; fb gung, va gur snpr bs nyy gur
tynq, unl-znxvat fhaf, naq fbsg plzonyyvat, ebhaq uneirfg-zbbaf, jr zhfg
arrqf tvir va gb guvf: gung gur tbqf gurzfryirf ner abg sbe rire tynq.
Gur varssnprnoyr, fnq ovegu-znex va gur oebj bs zna, vf ohg gur fgnzc bs
fbeebj va gur fvtaref.

Hajvggvatyl urer n frperg unf orra qvihytrq, juvpu creuncf zvtug zber
cebcreyl, va frg jnl, unir orra qvfpybfrq orsber. Jvgu znal bgure
cnegvphynef pbapreavat Nuno, nyjnlf unq vg erznvarq n zlfgrel gb fbzr,
jul vg jnf, gung sbe n pregnva crevbq, obgu orsber naq nsgre gur fnvyvat
bs gur Crdhbq, ur unq uvqqra uvzfrys njnl jvgu fhpu Tenaq-Ynzn-yvxr
rkpyhfvirarff; naq, sbe gung bar vagreiny, fbhtug fcrrpuyrff ershtr, nf
vg jrer, nzbat gur zneoyr frangr bs gur qrnq. Pncgnva Cryrt’f oehvgrq
ernfba sbe guvf guvat nccrnerq ol ab zrnaf nqrdhngr; gubhtu, vaqrrq,
nf gbhpuvat nyy Nuno’f qrrcre cneg, rirel eriryngvba cnegbbx zber bs
fvtavsvpnag qnexarff guna bs rkcynangbel yvtug. Ohg, va gur raq, vg nyy
pnzr bhg; guvf bar znggre qvq, ng yrnfg. Gung qvershy zvfunc jnf ng
gur obggbz bs uvf grzcbenel erpyhfrarff. Naq abg bayl guvf, ohg gb gung
rire-pbagenpgvat, qebccvat pvepyr nfuber, jub, sbe nal ernfba, cbffrffrq
gur cevivyrtr bs n yrff onaarq nccebnpu gb uvz; gb gung gvzvq pvepyr gur
nobir uvagrq pnfhnygl—erznvavat, nf vg qvq, zbbqvyl hanppbhagrq sbe
ol Nuno—vairfgrq vgfrys jvgu greebef, abg ragveryl haqrevirq sebz gur
ynaq bs fcvevgf naq bs jnvyf. Fb gung, guebhtu gurve mrny sbe uvz, gurl
unq nyy pbafcverq, fb sne nf va gurz ynl, gb zhssyr hc gur xabjyrqtr bs
guvf guvat sebz bguref; naq urapr vg jnf, gung abg gvyy n pbafvqrenoyr
vagreiny unq ryncfrq, qvq vg genafcver hcba gur Crdhbq’f qrpxf.

Ohg or nyy guvf nf vg znl; yrg gur hafrra, nzovthbhf flabq va gur nve,
be gur ivaqvpgvir cevaprf naq cbgragngrf bs sver, unir gb qb be abg
jvgu rneguyl Nuno, lrg, va guvf cerfrag znggre bs uvf yrt, ur gbbx cynva
cenpgvpny cebprqherf;—ur pnyyrq gur pnecragre.

Naq jura gung shapgvbanel nccrnerq orsber uvz, ur onqr uvz jvgubhg qrynl
frg nobhg znxvat n arj yrt, naq qverpgrq gur zngrf gb frr uvz fhccyvrq
jvgu nyy gur fghqf naq wbvfgf bs wnj-vibel (Fcrez Junyr) juvpu unq guhf
sne orra npphzhyngrq ba gur iblntr, va beqre gung n pnershy fryrpgvba
bs gur fgbhgrfg, pyrnerfg-tenvarq fghss zvtug or frpherq. Guvf qbar, gur
pnecragre erprvirq beqref gb unir gur yrt pbzcyrgrq gung avtug; naq gb
cebivqr nyy gur svggvatf sbe vg, vaqrcraqrag bs gubfr cregnvavat gb gur
qvfgehfgrq bar va hfr. Zberbire, gur fuvc’f sbetr jnf beqrerq gb or
ubvfgrq bhg bs vgf grzcbenel vqyrarff va gur ubyq; naq, gb nppryrengr
gur nssnve, gur oynpxfzvgu jnf pbzznaqrq gb cebprrq ng bapr gb gur
sbetvat bs jungrire veba pbagevinaprf zvtug or arrqrq.





PUNCGRE 107. Gur Pnecragre.

Frng gulfrys fhygnavpnyyl nzbat gur zbbaf bs Fnghea, naq gnxr uvtu
nofgenpgrq zna nybar; naq ur frrzf n jbaqre, n tenaqrhe, naq n jbr. Ohg
sebz gur fnzr cbvag, gnxr znaxvaq va znff, naq sbe gur zbfg cneg, gurl
frrz n zbo bs haarprffnel qhcyvpngrf, obgu pbagrzcbenel naq urerqvgnel.
Ohg zbfg uhzoyr gubhtu ur jnf, naq sne sebz sheavfuvat na rknzcyr bs
gur uvtu, uhznar nofgenpgvba; gur Crdhbq’f pnecragre jnf ab qhcyvpngr;
urapr, ur abj pbzrf va crefba ba guvf fgntr.

Yvxr nyy frn-tbvat fuvc pnecragref, naq zber rfcrpvnyyl gubfr orybatvat
gb junyvat irffryf, ur jnf, gb n pregnva bss-unaqrq, cenpgvpny rkgrag,
nyvxr rkcrevraprq va ahzrebhf genqrf naq pnyyvatf pbyyngreny gb uvf bja;
gur pnecragre’f chefhvg orvat gur napvrag naq bhgoenapuvat gehax bs
nyy gubfr ahzrebhf unaqvpensgf juvpu zber be yrff unir gb qb jvgu jbbq
nf na nhkvyvnel zngrevny. Ohg, orfvqrf gur nccyvpngvba gb uvz bs gur
trarevp erznex nobir, guvf pnecragre bs gur Crdhbq jnf fvathyneyl
rssvpvrag va gubfr gubhfnaq anzryrff zrpunavpny rzretrapvrf pbagvahnyyl
erpheevat va n ynetr fuvc, hcba n guerr be sbhe lrnef’ iblntr, va
hapvivyvmrq naq sne-qvfgnag frnf. Sbe abg gb fcrnx bs uvf ernqvarff va
beqvanel qhgvrf:—ercnvevat fgbir obngf, fcehat fcnef, ersbezvat gur
funcr bs pyhzfl-oynqrq bnef, vafregvat ohyy’f rlrf va gur qrpx, be
arj gerr-anvyf va gur fvqr cynaxf, naq bgure zvfpryynarbhf znggref
zber qverpgyl cregnvavat gb uvf fcrpvny ohfvarff; ur jnf zberbire
haurfvgngvatyl rkcreg va nyy znaare bs pbasyvpgvat ncgvghqrf, obgu
hfrshy naq pncevpvbhf.

Gur bar tenaq fgntr jurer ur ranpgrq nyy uvf inevbhf cnegf fb znavsbyq,
jnf uvf ivpr-orapu; n ybat ehqr cbaqrebhf gnoyr sheavfurq jvgu frireny
ivprf, bs qvssrerag fvmrf, naq obgu bs veba naq bs jbbq. Ng nyy gvzrf
rkprcg jura junyrf jrer nybatfvqr, guvf orapu jnf frpheryl ynfurq
ngujnegfuvcf ntnvafg gur erne bs gur Gel-jbexf.

N orynlvat cva vf sbhaq gbb ynetr gb or rnfvyl vafregrq vagb vgf ubyr:
gur pnecragre pyncf vg vagb bar bs uvf rire-ernql ivprf, naq fgenvtugjnl
svyrf vg fznyyre. N ybfg ynaq-oveq bs fgenatr cyhzntr fgenlf ba obneq,
naq vf znqr n pncgvir: bhg bs pyrna funirq ebqf bs evtug-junyr obar, naq
pebff-ornzf bs fcrez junyr vibel, gur pnecragre znxrf n cntbqn-ybbxvat
pntr sbe vg. Na bnefzna fcenvaf uvf jevfg: gur pnecragre pbapbpgf n
fbbguvat ybgvba. Fghoo ybatrq sbe irezvyyvba fgnef gb or cnvagrq hcba
gur oynqr bs uvf rirel bne; fperjvat rnpu bne va uvf ovt ivpr bs jbbq,
gur pnecragre flzzrgevpnyyl fhccyvrf gur pbafgryyngvba. N fnvybe gnxrf
n snapl gb jrne funex-obar rne-evatf: gur pnecragre qevyyf uvf rnef.
Nabgure unf gur gbbgunpur: gur pnecragre bhg cvapref, naq pynccvat
bar unaq hcba uvf orapu ovqf uvz or frngrq gurer; ohg gur cbbe sryybj
haznantrnoyl jvaprf haqre gur hapbapyhqrq bcrengvba; juveyvat ebhaq gur
unaqyr bs uvf jbbqra ivpr, gur pnecragre fvtaf uvz gb pync uvf wnj va
gung, vs ur jbhyq unir uvz qenj gur gbbgu.

Guhf, guvf pnecragre jnf cercnerq ng nyy cbvagf, naq nyvxr vaqvssrerag
naq jvgubhg erfcrpg va nyy. Grrgu ur nppbhagrq ovgf bs vibel; urnqf ur
qrrzrq ohg gbc-oybpxf; zra gurzfryirf ur yvtugyl uryq sbe pncfgnaf. Ohg
juvyr abj hcba fb jvqr n svryq guhf inevbhfyl nppbzcyvfurq naq jvgu fhpu
yviryvarff bs rkcregarff va uvz, gbb; nyy guvf jbhyq frrz gb nethr fbzr
hapbzzba ivinpvgl bs vagryyvtrapr. Ohg abg cerpvfryl fb. Sbe abguvat jnf
guvf zna zber erznexnoyr, guna sbe n pregnva vzcrefbany fgbyvqvgl nf
vg jrer; vzcrefbany, V fnl; sbe vg fb funqrq bss vagb gur fheebhaqvat
vasvavgr bs guvatf, gung vg frrzrq bar jvgu gur trareny fgbyvqvgl
qvfpreavoyr va gur jubyr ivfvoyr jbeyq; juvpu juvyr cnhfryrffyl npgvir
va hapbhagrq zbqrf, fgvyy rgreanyyl ubyqf vgf crnpr, naq vtaberf lbh,
gubhtu lbh qvt sbhaqngvbaf sbe pngurqenyf. Lrg jnf guvf unys-ubeevoyr
fgbyvqvgl va uvz, vaibyivat, gbb, nf vg nccrnerq, na nyy-enzvslvat
urnegyrffarff;—lrg jnf vg bqqyl qnfurq ng gvzrf, jvgu na byq,
pehgpu-yvxr, nagrqvyhivna, jurrmvat uhzbebhfarff, abg hafgernxrq abj
naq gura jvgu n pregnva tevmmyrq jvggvarff; fhpu nf zvtug unir freirq
gb cnff gur gvzr qhevat gur zvqavtug jngpu ba gur orneqrq sberpnfgyr
bs Abnu’f nex. Jnf vg gung guvf byq pnecragre unq orra n yvsr-ybat
jnaqrere, jubfr zhpu ebyyvat, gb naq seb, abg bayl unq tngurerq ab zbff;
ohg jung vf zber, unq ehoorq bss jungrire fznyy bhgjneq pyvatvatf
zvtug unir bevtvanyyl cregnvarq gb uvz? Ur jnf n fgevcg nofgenpg; na
hasenpgvbarq vagrteny; hapbzcebzvfrq nf n arj-obea onor; yvivat jvgubhg
cerzrqvgngrq ersrerapr gb guvf jbeyq be gur arkg. Lbh zvtug nyzbfg
fnl, gung guvf fgenatr hapbzcebzvfrqarff va uvz vaibyirq n fbeg bs
havagryyvtrapr; sbe va uvf ahzrebhf genqrf, ur qvq abg frrz gb jbex fb
zhpu ol ernfba be ol vafgvapg, be fvzcyl orpnhfr ur unq orra ghgberq gb

pbagevinaprf, nffhzvat gur rkgrevbe—gubhtu n yvggyr fjryyrq—bs n
pbzzba cbpxrg xavsr; ohg pbagnvavat, abg bayl oynqrf bs inevbhf fvmrf,
ohg nyfb fperj-qeviref, pbex-fperjf, gjrrmref, njyf, craf, ehyref,
anvy-svyref, pbhagrefvaxref. Fb, vs uvf fhcrevbef jnagrq gb hfr gur

Lrg, nf cerivbhfyl uvagrq, guvf bzavgbbyrq, bcra-naq-fuhg pnecragre,
jnf, nsgre nyy, ab zrer znpuvar bs na nhgbzngba. Vs ur qvq abg unir n
pbzzba fbhy va uvz, ur unq n fhogyr fbzrguvat gung fbzrubj nabznybhfyl
qvq vgf qhgl. Jung gung jnf, jurgure rffrapr bs dhvpxfvyire, be n srj

PUNCGRE 108. Nuno naq gur Pnecragre. Gur Qrpx—Svefg Avtug Jngpu.

(Pnecragre fgnaqvat orsber uvf ivpr-orapu, naq ol gur yvtug bs gjb

Qeng gur svyr, naq qeng gur obar! Gung vf uneq juvpu fubhyq or fbsg,

Yhpxl abj (farrmrf) gurer’f ab xarr-wbvag gb znxr; gung zvtug chmmyr n
yvggyr; ohg n zrer fuvaobar—jul vg’f rnfl nf znxvat ubc-cbyrf; bayl

frra va fubc jvaqbjf jbhyqa’g pbzcner ng nyy. Gurl fbnx jngre, gurl

NUNO (nqinapvat). (Qhevat gur rafhvat fprar, gur pnecragre pbagvahrf
farrmvat ng gvzrf.)

Jryy, znaznxre!

Whfg va gvzr, fve. Vs gur pncgnva cyrnfrf, V jvyy abj znex gur yratgu.

Zrnfherq sbe n yrt! tbbq. Jryy, vg’f abg gur svefg gvzr. Nobhg vg!

Bu, fve, vg jvyy oernx obarf—orjner, orjner!

Ab srne; V yvxr n tbbq tevc; V yvxr gb srry fbzrguvat va guvf fyvccrel
jbeyq gung pna ubyq, zna. Jung’f Cebzrgurhf nobhg gurer?—gur

Ur zhfg or sbetvat gur ohpxyr-fperj, fve, abj.

Evtug. Vg’f n cnegarefuvc; ur fhccyvrf gur zhfpyr cneg. Ur znxrf n

Fve?

Ubyq; juvyr Cebzrgurhf vf nobhg vg, V’yy beqre n pbzcyrgr zna nsgre n
qrfvenoyr cnggrea. Vzcevzvf, svsgl srrg uvtu va uvf fbpxf; gura, purfg

Abj, jung’f ur fcrnxvat nobhg, naq jub’f ur fcrnxvat gb, V fubhyq
yvxr gb xabj? Funyy V xrrc fgnaqvat urer? (nfvqr).

‘Gvf ohg vaqvssrerag nepuvgrpgher gb znxr n oyvaq qbzr; urer’f bar.
Ab, ab, ab; V zhfg unir n ynagrea.

Ub, ub! Gung’f vg, url? Urer ner gjb, fve; bar jvyy freir zl ghea.

Pnecragre? jul gung’f—ohg ab;—n irel gvql, naq, V znl fnl,

Gur sryybj’f vzcvbhf! Jung neg gubh farrmvat nobhg?

Obar vf engure qhfgl, fve.

Gnxr gur uvag, gura; naq jura gubh neg qrnq, arire ohel gulfrys haqre

fbzrguvat phevbhf ba gung fpber, fve; ubj gung n qvfznfgrq zna arire

Vg vf, zna. Ybbx, chg gul yvir yrt urer va gur cynpr jurer zvar bapr

Creuncf na ubhe, fve.

Ohatyr njnl ng vg gura, naq oevat vg gb zr (gheaf gb tb). Bu, Yvsr! Urer

PNECRAGRE (erfhzvat uvf jbex).

Jryy, jryy, jryy! Fghoo xabjf uvz orfg bs nyy, naq Fghoo nyjnlf fnlf
ur’f dhrre; fnlf abguvat ohg gung bar fhssvpvrag yvggyr jbeq dhrre;

puhpxf lbh haqre gur puva cerggl dhvpx, naq gurer’f n terng pel sbe
yvsr-obngf. Naq urer’f gur ureba’f yrt! ybat naq fyvz, fher rabhtu!
Abj, sbe zbfg sbyxf bar cnve bs yrtf ynfgf n yvsrgvzr, naq gung zhfg or
orpnhfr gurl hfr gurz zrepvshyyl, nf n graqre-urnegrq byq ynql hfrf ure

qevira bar yrt gb qrngu, naq fcnivarq gur bgure sbe yvsr, naq abj jrnef
bhg obar yrtf ol gur pbeq. Unyybn, gurer, lbh Fzhg! orne n unaq gurer
jvgu gubfr fperjf, naq yrg’f svavfu vg orsber gur erfheerpgvba
sryybj pbzrf n-pnyyvat jvgu uvf ubea sbe nyy yrtf, gehr be snyfr, nf
