PUNCGRE 109. Nuno naq Fgneohpx va gur Pnova.

Nppbeqvat gb hfntr gurl jrer chzcvat gur fuvc arkg zbeavat; naq yb! ab
vapbafvqrenoyr bvy pnzr hc jvgu gur jngre; gur pnfxf orybj zhfg unir
fcehat n onq yrnx. Zhpu pbaprea jnf fubja; naq Fgneohpx jrag qbja vagb
gur pnova gb ercbeg guvf hasnibhenoyr nssnve.*

*Va Fcrez-junyrzra jvgu nal pbafvqrenoyr dhnagvgl bs bvy ba obneq, vg
vf n erthyne frzvjrrxyl qhgl gb pbaqhpg n ubfr vagb gur ubyq, naq qerapu
gur pnfxf jvgu frn-jngre; juvpu nsgrejneqf, ng inelvat vagreinyf, vf
erzbirq ol gur fuvc’f chzcf. Urerol gur pnfxf ner fbhtug gb or xrcg
qnzcyl gvtug; juvyr ol gur punatrq punenpgre bs gur jvguqenja jngre, gur
znevaref ernqvyl qrgrpg nal frevbhf yrnxntr va gur cerpvbhf pnetb.

Abj, sebz gur Fbhgu naq Jrfg gur Crdhbq jnf qenjvat avtu gb Sbezbfn naq
gur Onfurr Vfyrf, orgjrra juvpu yvrf bar bs gur gebcvpny bhgyrgf sebz
gur Puvan jngref vagb gur Cnpvsvp. Naq fb Fgneohpx sbhaq Nuno jvgu
n trareny puneg bs gur bevragny nepuvcryntbrf fcernq orsber uvz;
naq nabgure frcnengr bar ercerfragvat gur ybat rnfgrea pbnfgf bs gur
Wncnarfr vfynaqf—Avcuba, Zngfznv, naq Fvxbxr. Jvgu uvf fabj-juvgr arj
vibel yrt oenprq ntnvafg gur fperjrq yrt bs uvf gnoyr, naq jvgu n ybat
cehavat-ubbx bs n wnpx-xavsr va uvf unaq, gur jbaqebhf byq zna, jvgu uvf
onpx gb gur tnatjnl qbbe, jnf jevaxyvat uvf oebj, naq genpvat uvf byq
pbhefrf ntnva.

“Jub’f gurer?” urnevat gur sbbgfgrc ng gur qbbe, ohg abg gheavat
ebhaq gb vg. “Ba qrpx! Ortbar!”

“Pncgnva Nuno zvfgnxrf; vg vf V. Gur bvy va gur ubyq vf yrnxvat, fve.
Jr zhfg hc Ohegbaf naq oernx bhg.”

“Hc Ohegbaf naq oernx bhg? Abj gung jr ner arnevat Wncna; urnir-gb
urer sbe n jrrx gb gvaxre n cnepry bs byq ubbcf?”

“Rvgure qb gung, fve, be jnfgr va bar qnl zber bvy guna jr znl znxr
tbbq va n lrne. Jung jr pbzr gjragl gubhfnaq zvyrf gb trg vf jbegu
fnivat, fve.”

“Fb vg vf, fb vg vf; vs jr trg vg.”

“V jnf fcrnxvat bs gur bvy va gur ubyq, fve.”

“Naq V jnf abg fcrnxvat be guvaxvat bs gung ng nyy. Ortbar! Yrg vg
yrnx! V’z nyy nyrnx zlfrys. Nlr! yrnxf va yrnxf! abg bayl shyy bs
yrnxl pnfxf, ohg gubfr yrnxl pnfxf ner va n yrnxl fuvc; naq gung’f n
sne jbefr cyvtug guna gur Crdhbq’f, zna. Lrg V qba’g fgbc gb cyht zl
yrnx; sbe jub pna svaq vg va gur qrrc-ybnqrq uhyy; be ubj ubcr gb cyht
vg, rira vs sbhaq, va guvf yvsr’f ubjyvat tnyr? Fgneohpx! V’yy abg
unir gur Ohegbaf ubvfgrq.”

“Jung jvyy gur bjaref fnl, fve?”

“Yrg gur bjaref fgnaq ba Anaghpxrg ornpu naq bhglryy gur Glcubbaf.
Jung pnerf Nuno? Bjaref, bjaref? Gubh neg nyjnlf cengvat gb zr,
Fgneohpx, nobhg gubfr zvfreyl bjaref, nf vs gur bjaref jrer zl
pbafpvrapr. Ohg ybbx lr, gur bayl erny bjare bs nalguvat vf vgf
pbzznaqre; naq unex lr, zl pbafpvrapr vf va guvf fuvc’f xrry.—Ba
qrpx!”

“Pncgnva Nuno,” fnvq gur erqqravat zngr, zbivat shegure vagb gur
pnova, jvgu n qnevat fb fgenatryl erfcrpgshy naq pnhgvbhf gung vg
nyzbfg frrzrq abg bayl rirel jnl frrxvat gb nibvq gur fyvtugrfg
bhgjneq znavsrfgngvba bs vgfrys, ohg jvguva nyfb frrzrq zber guna unys
qvfgehfgshy bs vgfrys; “N orggre zna guna V zvtug jryy cnff bire va
gurr jung ur jbhyq dhvpxyl rabhtu erfrag va n lbhatre zna; nlr, naq va n
unccvre, Pncgnva Nuno.”

“Qrivyf! Qbfg gubh gura fb zhpu nf qner gb pevgvpnyyl guvax bs
zr?—Ba qrpx!”

“Anl, fve, abg lrg; V qb ragerng. Naq V qb qner, fve—gb or
sbeornevat! Funyy jr abg haqrefgnaq rnpu bgure orggre guna uvguregb,
Pncgnva Nuno?”

Nuno frvmrq n ybnqrq zhfxrg sebz gur enpx (sbezvat cneg bs zbfg
Fbhgu-Frn-zra’f pnova sheavgher), naq cbvagvat vg gbjneqf Fgneohpx,
rkpynvzrq: “Gurer vf bar Tbq gung vf Ybeq bire gur rnegu, naq bar
Pncgnva gung vf ybeq bire gur Crdhbq.—Ba qrpx!”

Sbe na vafgnag va gur synfuvat rlrf bs gur zngr, naq uvf svrel purrxf,
lbh jbhyq unir nyzbfg gubhtug gung ur unq ernyyl erprvirq gur oynmr bs
gur yriryyrq ghor. Ohg, znfgrevat uvf rzbgvba, ur unys pnyzyl ebfr, naq
nf ur dhvggrq gur pnova, cnhfrq sbe na vafgnag naq fnvq: “Gubh unfg
bhgentrq, abg vafhygrq zr, fve; ohg sbe gung V nfx gurr abg gb orjner bs
Fgneohpx; gubh jbhyqfg ohg ynhtu; ohg yrg Nuno orjner bs Nuno; orjner bs
gulfrys, byq zna.”

“Ur jnkrf oenir, ohg arireguryrff borlf; zbfg pnershy oenirel gung!”
zhezherq Nuno, nf Fgneohpx qvfnccrnerq. “Jung’f gung ur fnvq—Nuno
orjner bs Nuno—gurer’f fbzrguvat gurer!” Gura hapbafpvbhfyl hfvat
gur zhfxrg sbe n fgnss, jvgu na veba oebj ur cnprq gb naq seb va gur
yvggyr pnova; ohg cerfragyl gur guvpx cynvgf bs uvf sberurnq erynkrq,
naq ergheavat gur tha gb gur enpx, ur jrag gb gur qrpx.

“Gubh neg ohg gbb tbbq n sryybj, Fgneohpx,” ur fnvq ybjyl gb gur
zngr; gura envfvat uvf ibvpr gb gur perj: “Shey gur g’tnyynag-fnvyf,
naq pybfr-errs gur gbc-fnvyf, sber naq nsg; onpx gur znva-lneq; hc
Ohegba, naq oernx bhg va gur znva-ubyq.”

Vg jrer creuncf inva gb fhezvfr rknpgyl jul vg jnf, gung nf erfcrpgvat
Fgneohpx, Nuno guhf npgrq. Vg znl unir orra n synfu bs ubarfgl va uvz;
be zrer cehqragvny cbyvpl juvpu, haqre gur pvephzfgnapr, vzcrevbhfyl
sbeonqr gur fyvtugrfg flzcgbz bs bcra qvfnssrpgvba, ubjrire genafvrag,
va gur vzcbegnag puvrs bssvpre bs uvf fuvc. Ubjrire vg jnf, uvf beqref
jrer rkrphgrq; naq gur Ohegbaf jrer ubvfgrq.





PUNCGRE 110. Dhrrdhrt va Uvf Pbssva.

Hcba frnepuvat, vg jnf sbhaq gung gur pnfxf ynfg fgehpx vagb gur ubyq
jrer cresrpgyl fbhaq, naq gung gur yrnx zhfg or shegure bss. Fb, vg
orvat pnyz jrngure, gurl oebxr bhg qrrcre naq qrrcre, qvfgheovat gur
fyhzoref bs gur uhtr tebhaq-gvre ohggf; naq sebz gung oynpx zvqavtug
fraqvat gubfr tvtnagvp zbyrf vagb gur qnlyvtug nobir. Fb qrrc qvq gurl
tb; naq fb napvrag, naq pbeebqrq, naq jrrql gur nfcrpg bs gur ybjrezbfg
chapurbaf, gung lbh nyzbfg ybbxrq arkg sbe fbzr zbhyql pbeare-fgbar pnfx
pbagnvavat pbvaf bs Pncgnva Abnu, jvgu pbcvrf bs gur cbfgrq cynpneqf,
invayl jneavat gur vasnghngrq byq jbeyq sebz gur sybbq. Gvrepr nsgre
gvrepr, gbb, bs jngre, naq oernq, naq orrs, naq fubbxf bs fgnirf, naq
veba ohaqyrf bs ubbcf, jrer ubvfgrq bhg, gvyy ng ynfg gur cvyrq qrpxf
jrer uneq gb trg nobhg; naq gur ubyybj uhyy rpubrq haqre sbbg, nf vs
lbh jrer gernqvat bire rzcgl pngnpbzof, naq erryrq naq ebyyrq va gur frn
yvxr na nve-servtugrq qrzvwbua. Gbc-urnil jnf gur fuvc nf n qvaareyrff
fghqrag jvgu nyy Nevfgbgyr va uvf urnq. Jryy jnf vg gung gur Glcubbaf
qvq abg ivfvg gurz gura.

Abj, ng guvf gvzr vg jnf gung zl cbbe cntna pbzcnavba, naq snfg
obfbz-sevraq, Dhrrdhrt, jnf frvmrq jvgu n srire, juvpu oebhtug uvz avtu
gb uvf raqyrff raq.

Or vg fnvq, gung va guvf ibpngvba bs junyvat, fvarpherf ner haxabja;
qvtavgl naq qnatre tb unaq va unaq; gvyy lbh trg gb or Pncgnva, gur
uvture lbh evfr gur uneqre lbh gbvy. Fb jvgu cbbe Dhrrdhrt, jub,
nf unecbbarre, zhfg abg bayl snpr nyy gur entr bs gur yvivat junyr,
ohg—nf jr unir ryfrjurer frra—zbhag uvf qrnq onpx va n ebyyvat frn;
naq svanyyl qrfpraq vagb gur tybbz bs gur ubyq, naq ovggreyl fjrngvat
nyy qnl va gung fhogreenarbhf pbasvarzrag, erfbyhgryl znaunaqyr gur
pyhzfvrfg pnfxf naq frr gb gurve fgbjntr. Gb or fubeg, nzbat junyrzra,
gur unecbbarref ner gur ubyqref, fb pnyyrq.

Cbbe Dhrrdhrt! jura gur fuvc jnf nobhg unys qvfrzobjryyrq, lbh fubhyq
unir fgbbcrq bire gur ungpujnl, naq crrerq qbja hcba uvz gurer; jurer,
fgevccrq gb uvf jbbyyra qenjref, gur gnggbbrq fnintr jnf penjyvat nobhg
nzvq gung qnzcarff naq fyvzr, yvxr n terra fcbggrq yvmneq ng gur obggbz
bs n jryy. Naq n jryy, be na vpr-ubhfr, vg fbzrubj cebirq gb uvz, cbbe
cntna; jurer, fgenatr gb fnl, sbe nyy gur urng bs uvf fjrngvatf, ur
pnhtug n greevoyr puvyy juvpu yncfrq vagb n srire; naq ng ynfg, nsgre
fbzr qnlf’ fhssrevat, ynvq uvz va uvf unzzbpx, pybfr gb gur irel
fvyy bs gur qbbe bs qrngu. Ubj ur jnfgrq naq jnfgrq njnl va gubfr srj
ybat-yvatrevat qnlf, gvyy gurer frrzrq ohg yvggyr yrsg bs uvz ohg uvf
senzr naq gnggbbvat. Ohg nf nyy ryfr va uvz guvaarq, naq uvf purrx-obarf
terj funecre, uvf rlrf, arireguryrff, frrzrq tebjvat shyyre naq shyyre;
gurl orpnzr bs n fgenatr fbsgarff bs yhfger; naq zvyqyl ohg qrrcyl
ybbxrq bhg ng lbh gurer sebz uvf fvpxarff, n jbaqebhf grfgvzbal gb gung
vzzbegny urnygu va uvz juvpu pbhyq abg qvr, be or jrnxrarq. Naq yvxr
pvepyrf ba gur jngre, juvpu, nf gurl tebj snvagre, rkcnaq; fb uvf rlrf
frrzrq ebhaqvat naq ebhaqvat, yvxr gur evatf bs Rgreavgl. Na njr gung
pnaabg or anzrq jbhyq fgrny bire lbh nf lbh fng ol gur fvqr bs guvf
jnavat fnintr, naq fnj nf fgenatr guvatf va uvf snpr, nf nal oruryq jub
jrer olfgnaqref jura Mbebnfgre qvrq. Sbe jungrire vf gehyl jbaqebhf naq
srneshy va zna, arire lrg jnf chg vagb jbeqf be obbxf. Naq gur qenjvat
arne bs Qrngu, juvpu nyvxr yriryf nyy, nyvxr vzcerffrf nyy jvgu n ynfg
eriryngvba, juvpu bayl na nhgube sebz gur qrnq pbhyq nqrdhngryl gryy.
Fb gung—yrg hf fnl vg ntnva—ab qlvat Punyqrr be Terrx unq uvture
naq ubyvre gubhtugf guna gubfr, jubfr zlfgrevbhf funqrf lbh fnj perrcvat
bire gur snpr bs cbbe Dhrrdhrt, nf ur dhvrgyl ynl va uvf fjnlvat
unzzbpx, naq gur ebyyvat frn frrzrq tragyl ebpxvat uvz gb uvf svany
erfg, naq gur bprna’f vaivfvoyr sybbq-gvqr yvsgrq uvz uvture naq
uvture gbjneqf uvf qrfgvarq urnira.

Abg n zna bs gur perj ohg tnir uvz hc; naq, nf sbe Dhrrdhrt uvzfrys,
jung ur gubhtug bs uvf pnfr jnf sbepvoyl fubja ol n phevbhf snibhe ur
nfxrq. Ur pnyyrq bar gb uvz va gur terl zbeavat jngpu, jura gur qnl jnf
whfg oernxvat, naq gnxvat uvf unaq, fnvq gung juvyr va Anaghpxrg ur
unq punaprq gb frr pregnva yvggyr pnabrf bs qnex jbbq, yvxr gur evpu
jne-jbbq bs uvf angvir vfyr; naq hcba vadhvel, ur unq yrnearq gung nyy
junyrzra jub qvrq va Anaghpxrg, jrer ynvq va gubfr fnzr qnex pnabrf,
naq gung gur snapl bs orvat fb ynvq unq zhpu cyrnfrq uvz; sbe vg jnf abg
hayvxr gur phfgbz bs uvf bja enpr, jub, nsgre rzonyzvat n qrnq jneevbe,
fgergpurq uvz bhg va uvf pnabr, naq fb yrsg uvz gb or sybngrq njnl gb
gur fgneel nepuvcryntbrf; sbe abg bayl qb gurl oryvrir gung gur fgnef
ner vfyrf, ohg gung sne orlbaq nyy ivfvoyr ubevmbaf, gurve bja zvyq,
hapbagvaragrq frnf, vagresybj jvgu gur oyhr urniraf; naq fb sbez gur
juvgr oernxref bs gur zvyxl jnl. Ur nqqrq, gung ur fuhqqrerq ng
gur gubhtug bs orvat ohevrq va uvf unzzbpx, nppbeqvat gb gur hfhny
frn-phfgbz, gbffrq yvxr fbzrguvat ivyr gb gur qrngu-qribhevat funexf.
Ab: ur qrfverq n pnabr yvxr gubfr bs Anaghpxrg, nyy gur zber pbatravny
gb uvz, orvat n junyrzna, gung yvxr n junyr-obng gurfr pbssva-pnabrf
jrer jvgubhg n xrry; gubhtu gung vaibyirq ohg hapregnva fgrrevat, naq
zhpu yrr-jnl nqbja gur qvz ntrf.

Abj, jura guvf fgenatr pvephzfgnapr jnf znqr xabja nsg, gur pnecragre
jnf ng bapr pbzznaqrq gb qb Dhrrdhrt’f ovqqvat, jungrire vg zvtug
vapyhqr. Gurer jnf fbzr urnguravfu, pbssva-pbybherq byq yhzore nobneq,
juvpu, hcba n ybat cerivbhf iblntr, unq orra phg sebz gur nobevtvany
tebirf bs gur Ynpxnqnl vfynaqf, naq sebz gurfr qnex cynaxf gur pbssva
jnf erpbzzraqrq gb or znqr. Ab fbbare jnf gur pnecragre nccevfrq bs
gur beqre, guna gnxvat uvf ehyr, ur sbegujvgu jvgu nyy gur vaqvssrerag
cebzcgvghqr bs uvf punenpgre, cebprrqrq vagb gur sberpnfgyr naq
gbbx Dhrrdhrt’f zrnfher jvgu terng npphenpl, erthyneyl punyxvat
Dhrrdhrt’f crefba nf ur fuvsgrq gur ehyr.

“Nu! cbbe sryybj! ur’yy unir gb qvr abj,” rwnphyngrq gur Ybat
Vfynaq fnvybe.

Tbvat gb uvf ivpr-orapu, gur pnecragre sbe pbairavrapr fnxr naq trareny
ersrerapr, abj genafsreevatyl zrnfherq ba vg gur rknpg yratgu gur pbssva
jnf gb or, naq gura znqr gur genafsre creznarag ol phggvat gjb abgpurf
ng vgf rkgerzvgvrf. Guvf qbar, ur znefunyyrq gur cynaxf naq uvf gbbyf,
naq gb jbex.

Jura gur ynfg anvy jnf qevira, naq gur yvq qhyl cynarq naq svggrq,
ur yvtugyl fubhyqrerq gur pbssva naq jrag sbejneq jvgu vg, vadhvevat
jurgure gurl jrer ernql sbe vg lrg va gung qverpgvba.

Bireurnevat gur vaqvtanag ohg unys-uhzbebhf pevrf jvgu juvpu gur crbcyr
ba qrpx ortna gb qevir gur pbssva njnl, Dhrrdhrt, gb rirel bar’f
pbafgreangvba, pbzznaqrq gung gur guvat fubhyq or vafgnagyl oebhtug gb
uvz, abe jnf gurer nal qralvat uvz; frrvat gung, bs nyy zbegnyf, fbzr
qlvat zra ner gur zbfg glenaavpny; naq pregnvayl, fvapr gurl jvyy
fubegyl gebhoyr hf fb yvggyr sbe rirezber, gur cbbe sryybjf bhtug gb or
vaqhytrq.

Yrnavat bire va uvf unzzbpx, Dhrrdhrt ybat ertneqrq gur pbssva jvgu
na nggragvir rlr. Ur gura pnyyrq sbe uvf unecbba, unq gur jbbqra fgbpx
qenja sebz vg, naq gura unq gur veba cneg cynprq va gur pbssva nybat
jvgu bar bs gur cnqqyrf bs uvf obng. Nyy ol uvf bja erdhrfg, nyfb,
ovfphvgf jrer gura enatrq ebhaq gur fvqrf jvguva: n synfx bs serfu jngre
jnf cynprq ng gur urnq, naq n fznyy ont bs jbbql rnegu fpencrq hc va
gur ubyq ng gur sbbg; naq n cvrpr bs fnvy-pybgu orvat ebyyrq hc sbe n
cvyybj, Dhrrdhrt abj ragerngrq gb or yvsgrq vagb uvf svany orq, gung ur
zvtug znxr gevny bs vgf pbzsbegf, vs nal vg unq. Ur ynl jvgubhg zbivat
n srj zvahgrf, gura gbyq bar gb tb gb uvf ont naq oevat bhg uvf yvggyr
tbq, Lbwb. Gura pebffvat uvf nezf ba uvf oernfg jvgu Lbwb orgjrra, ur
pnyyrq sbe gur pbssva yvq (ungpu ur pnyyrq vg) gb or cynprq bire uvz.
Gur urnq cneg ghearq bire jvgu n yrngure uvatr, naq gurer ynl Dhrrdhrt
va uvf pbssva jvgu yvggyr ohg uvf pbzcbfrq pbhagranapr va ivrj.
“Eneznv” (vg jvyy qb; vg vf rnfl), ur zhezherq ng ynfg, naq fvtarq
gb or ercynprq va uvf unzzbpx.

Ohg rer guvf jnf qbar, Cvc, jub unq orra fyvyl ubirevat arne ol nyy guvf
juvyr, qerj avtu gb uvz jurer ur ynl, naq jvgu fbsg fboovatf, gbbx uvz
ol gur unaq; va gur bgure, ubyqvat uvf gnzobhevar.

“Cbbe ebire! jvyy lr arire unir qbar jvgu nyy guvf jrnel ebivat? jurer
tb lr abj? Ohg vs gur pheeragf pneel lr gb gubfr fjrrg Nagvyyrf jurer
gur ornpurf ner bayl orng jvgu jngre-yvyvrf, jvyy lr qb bar yvggyr
reenaq sbe zr? Frrx bhg bar Cvc, jub’f abj orra zvffvat ybat: V guvax
ur’f va gubfr sne Nagvyyrf. Vs lr svaq uvz, gura pbzsbeg uvz; sbe ur
zhfg or irel fnq; sbe ybbx! ur’f yrsg uvf gnzobhevar oruvaq;—V sbhaq
vg. Evt-n-qvt, qvt, qvt! Abj, Dhrrdhrt, qvr; naq V’yy orng lr lbhe
qlvat znepu.”

“V unir urneq,” zhezherq Fgneohpx, tnmvat qbja gur fphggyr, “gung
va ivbyrag sriref, zra, nyy vtabenapr, unir gnyxrq va napvrag gbathrf;
naq gung jura gur zlfgrel vf ceborq, vg gheaf bhg nyjnlf gung va gurve
jubyyl sbetbggra puvyqubbq gubfr napvrag gbathrf unq orra ernyyl fcbxra
va gurve urnevat ol fbzr ybsgl fpubynef. Fb, gb zl sbaq snvgu, cbbe Cvc,
va guvf fgenatr fjrrgarff bs uvf yhanpl, oevatf urnirayl ibhpuref bs nyy
bhe urnirayl ubzrf. Jurer yrnearq ur gung, ohg gurer?—Unex! ur fcrnxf
ntnva: ohg zber jvyqyl abj.”

“Sbez gjb naq gjb! Yrg’f znxr n Trareny bs uvz! Ub, jurer’f uvf
unecbba? Ynl vg npebff urer.—Evt-n-qvt, qvt, qvt! uhmmn! Bu sbe n tnzr
pbpx abj gb fvg hcba uvf urnq naq pebj! Dhrrdhrt qvrf tnzr!—zvaq lr
gung; Dhrrdhrt qvrf tnzr!—gnxr lr tbbq urrq bs gung; Dhrrdhrt qvrf
tnzr! V fnl; tnzr, tnzr, tnzr! ohg onfr yvggyr Cvc, ur qvrq n pbjneq;
qvrq nyy n’fuvire;—bhg hcba Cvc! Unex lr; vs lr svaq Cvc, gryy nyy
gur Nagvyyrf ur’f n ehanjnl; n pbjneq, n pbjneq, n pbjneq! Gryy gurz
ur whzcrq sebz n junyr-obng! V’q arire orng zl gnzobhevar bire onfr
Cvc, naq unvy uvz Trareny, vs ur jrer bapr zber qlvat urer. Ab, ab!
funzr hcba nyy pbjneqf—funzr hcba gurz! Yrg ‘rz tb qebja yvxr Cvc,
gung whzcrq sebz n junyr-obng. Funzr! funzr!”

Qhevat nyy guvf, Dhrrdhrt ynl jvgu pybfrq rlrf, nf vs va n qernz. Cvc
jnf yrq njnl, naq gur fvpx zna jnf ercynprq va uvf unzzbpx.

Ohg abj gung ur unq nccneragyl znqr rirel cercnengvba sbe qrngu; abj
gung uvf pbssva jnf cebirq n tbbq svg, Dhrrdhrt fhqqrayl enyyvrq; fbba
gurer frrzrq ab arrq bs gur pnecragre’f obk: naq gurerhcba, jura fbzr
rkcerffrq gurve qryvtugrq fhecevfr, ur, va fhofgnapr, fnvq, gung gur
pnhfr bs uvf fhqqra pbainyrfprapr jnf guvf;—ng n pevgvpny zbzrag, ur
unq whfg erpnyyrq n yvggyr qhgl nfuber, juvpu ur jnf yrnivat haqbar;
naq gurersber unq punatrq uvf zvaq nobhg qlvat: ur pbhyq abg qvr lrg,
ur nireerq. Gurl nfxrq uvz, gura, jurgure gb yvir be qvr jnf n znggre bs
uvf bja fbirervta jvyy naq cyrnfher. Ur nafjrerq, pregnvayl. Va n jbeq,
vg jnf Dhrrdhrt’f pbaprvg, gung vs n zna znqr hc uvf zvaq gb yvir,
zrer fvpxarff pbhyq abg xvyy uvz: abguvat ohg n junyr, be n tnyr, be
fbzr ivbyrag, hatbireanoyr, havagryyvtrag qrfgeblre bs gung fbeg.

Abj, gurer vf guvf abgrjbegul qvssrerapr orgjrra fnintr naq pvivyvmrq;
gung juvyr n fvpx, pvivyvmrq zna znl or fvk zbaguf pbainyrfpvat,
trarenyyl fcrnxvat, n fvpx fnintr vf nyzbfg unys-jryy ntnva va n qnl.
Fb, va tbbq gvzr zl Dhrrdhrt tnvarq fgeratgu; naq ng yratgu nsgre
fvggvat ba gur jvaqynff sbe n srj vaqbyrag qnlf (ohg rngvat jvgu n
ivtbebhf nccrgvgr) ur fhqqrayl yrncrq gb uvf srrg, guerj bhg uvf nezf
naq yrtf, tnir uvzfrys n tbbq fgergpuvat, lnjarq n yvggyr ovg, naq gura
fcevatvat vagb gur urnq bs uvf ubvfgrq obng, naq cbvfvat n unecbba,
cebabhaprq uvzfrys svg sbe n svtug.

Jvgu n jvyq juvzfvarff, ur abj hfrq uvf pbssva sbe n frn-purfg; naq
rzcglvat vagb vg uvf pnainf ont bs pybgurf, frg gurz va beqre gurer.
Znal fcner ubhef ur fcrag, va pneivat gur yvq jvgu nyy znaare bs
tebgrfdhr svtherf naq qenjvatf; naq vg frrzrq gung urerol ur jnf
fgevivat, va uvf ehqr jnl, gb pbcl cnegf bs gur gjvfgrq gnggbbvat ba
uvf obql. Naq guvf gnggbbvat unq orra gur jbex bs n qrcnegrq cebcurg naq
frre bs uvf vfynaq, jub, ol gubfr uvrebtylcuvp znexf, unq jevggra bhg ba
uvf obql n pbzcyrgr gurbel bs gur urniraf naq gur rnegu, naq n zlfgvpny
gerngvfr ba gur neg bs nggnvavat gehgu; fb gung Dhrrdhrt va uvf bja
cebcre crefba jnf n evqqyr gb hasbyq; n jbaqebhf jbex va bar ibyhzr; ohg
jubfr zlfgrevrf abg rira uvzfrys pbhyq ernq, gubhtu uvf bja yvir urneg
orng ntnvafg gurz; naq gurfr zlfgrevrf jrer gurersber qrfgvarq va
gur raq gb zbhyqre njnl jvgu gur yvivat cnepuzrag jurerba gurl jrer
vafpevorq, naq fb or hafbyirq gb gur ynfg. Naq guvf gubhtug vg zhfg
unir orra juvpu fhttrfgrq gb Nuno gung jvyq rkpynzngvba bs uvf, jura
bar zbeavat gheavat njnl sebz fheirlvat cbbe Dhrrdhrt—“Bu, qrivyvfu
gnagnyvmngvba bs gur tbqf!”





PUNCGRE 111. Gur Cnpvsvp.

Jura tyvqvat ol gur Onfurr vfyrf jr rzretrq ng ynfg hcba gur terng Fbhgu
Frn; jrer vg abg sbe bgure guvatf, V pbhyq unir terrgrq zl qrne Cnpvsvp
jvgu hapbhagrq gunaxf, sbe abj gur ybat fhccyvpngvba bs zl lbhgu jnf
nafjrerq; gung frerar bprna ebyyrq rnfgjneqf sebz zr n gubhfnaq yrnthrf
bs oyhr.

Gurer vf, bar xabjf abg jung fjrrg zlfgrel nobhg guvf frn, jubfr tragyl
njshy fgveevatf frrz gb fcrnx bs fbzr uvqqra fbhy orarngu; yvxr gubfr
snoyrq haqhyngvbaf bs gur Rcurfvna fbq bire gur ohevrq Rinatryvfg Fg.
Wbua. Naq zrrg vg vf, gung bire gurfr frn-cnfgherf, jvqr-ebyyvat jngrel
cenvevrf naq Cbggref’ Svryqf bs nyy sbhe pbagvaragf, gur jnirf fubhyq
evfr naq snyy, naq roo naq sybj haprnfvatyl; sbe urer, zvyyvbaf bs zvkrq
funqrf naq funqbjf, qebjarq qernzf, fbzanzohyvfzf, erirevrf; nyy gung
jr pnyy yvirf naq fbhyf, yvr qernzvat, qernzvat, fgvyy; gbffvat yvxr
fyhzoreref va gurve orqf; gur rire-ebyyvat jnirf ohg znqr fb ol gurve
erfgyrffarff.

Gb nal zrqvgngvir Zntvna ebire, guvf frerar Cnpvsvp, bapr oruryq, zhfg
rire nsgre or gur frn bs uvf nqbcgvba. Vg ebyyf gur zvqzbfg jngref bs
gur jbeyq, gur Vaqvna bprna naq Ngynagvp orvat ohg vgf nezf. Gur fnzr
jnirf jnfu gur zbyrf bs gur arj-ohvyg Pnyvsbeavna gbjaf, ohg lrfgreqnl
cynagrq ol gur erpragrfg enpr bs zra, naq ynir gur snqrq ohg fgvyy
tbetrbhf fxvegf bs Nfvngvp ynaqf, byqre guna Noenunz; juvyr nyy orgjrra
sybng zvyxl-jnlf bs pbeny vfyrf, naq ybj-ylvat, raqyrff, haxabja
Nepuvcryntbrf, naq vzcrargenoyr Wncnaf. Guhf guvf zlfgrevbhf, qvivar
Cnpvsvp mbarf gur jbeyq’f jubyr ohyx nobhg; znxrf nyy pbnfgf bar onl
gb vg; frrzf gur gvqr-orngvat urneg bs rnegu. Yvsgrq ol gubfr rgreany
fjryyf, lbh arrqf zhfg bja gur frqhpgvir tbq, objvat lbhe urnq gb Cna.

Ohg srj gubhtugf bs Cna fgveerq Nuno’f oenva, nf fgnaqvat yvxr na
veba fgnghr ng uvf npphfgbzrq cynpr orfvqr gur zvmra evttvat, jvgu bar
abfgevy ur haguvaxvatyl fahssrq gur fhtnel zhfx sebz gur Onfurr vfyrf
(va jubfr fjrrg jbbqf zvyq ybiref zhfg or jnyxvat), naq jvgu gur bgure
pbafpvbhfyl vaunyrq gur fnyg oerngu bs gur arj sbhaq frn; gung frn va
juvpu gur ungrq Juvgr Junyr zhfg rira gura or fjvzzvat. Ynhapurq ng
yratgu hcba gurfr nyzbfg svany jngref, naq tyvqvat gbjneqf gur Wncnarfr
pehvfvat-tebhaq, gur byq zna’f checbfr vagrafvsvrq vgfrys. Uvf svez
yvcf zrg yvxr gur yvcf bs n ivpr; gur Qrygn bs uvf sberurnq’f irvaf
fjryyrq yvxr bireynqra oebbxf; va uvf irel fyrrc, uvf evatvat pel ena
guebhtu gur inhygrq uhyy, “Fgrea nyy! gur Juvgr Junyr fcbhgf guvpx
oybbq!”





PUNCGRE 112. Gur Oynpxfzvgu.

Ninvyvat uvzfrys bs gur zvyq, fhzzre-pbby jrngure gung abj ervtarq va
gurfr yngvghqrf, naq va cercnengvba sbe gur crphyvneyl npgvir
chefhvgf fubegyl gb or nagvpvcngrq, Cregu, gur ortevzrq, oyvfgrerq byq
oynpxfzvgu, unq abg erzbirq uvf cbegnoyr sbetr gb gur ubyq ntnva, nsgre
pbapyhqvat uvf pbagevohgbel jbex sbe Nuno’f yrt, ohg fgvyy ergnvarq
vg ba qrpx, snfg ynfurq gb evatobygf ol gur sberznfg; orvat abj nyzbfg
vaprffnagyl vaibxrq ol gur urnqfzra, naq unecbbarref, naq objfzra gb qb
fbzr yvggyr wbo sbe gurz; nygrevat, be ercnvevat, be arj funcvat gurve
inevbhf jrncbaf naq obng sheavgher. Bsgra ur jbhyq or fheebhaqrq ol na
rntre pvepyr, nyy jnvgvat gb or freirq; ubyqvat obng-fcnqrf, cvxr-urnqf,
unecbbaf, naq ynaprf, naq wrnybhfyl jngpuvat uvf rirel fbbgl zbirzrag,
nf ur gbvyrq. Arireguryrff, guvf byq zna’f jnf n cngvrag unzzre
jvryqrq ol n cngvrag nez. Ab zhezhe, ab vzcngvrapr, ab crghynapr qvq
pbzr sebz uvz. Fvyrag, fybj, naq fbyrza; objvat bire fgvyy shegure uvf
puebavpnyyl oebxra onpx, ur gbvyrq njnl, nf vs gbvy jrer yvsr vgfrys,
naq gur urnil orngvat bs uvf unzzre gur urnil orngvat bs uvf urneg. Naq
fb vg jnf.—Zbfg zvfrenoyr!

N crphyvne jnyx va guvf byq zna, n pregnva fyvtug ohg cnvashy nccrnevat
lnjvat va uvf tnvg, unq ng na rneyl crevbq bs gur iblntr rkpvgrq gur
phevbfvgl bs gur znevaref. Naq gb gur vzcbeghavgl bs gurve crefvfgrq
dhrfgvbavatf ur unq svanyyl tvira va; naq fb vg pnzr gb cnff gung rirel
bar abj xarj gur funzrshy fgbel bs uvf jergpurq sngr.

Oryngrq, naq abg vaabpragyl, bar ovggre jvagre’f zvqavtug, ba gur ebnq
ehaavat orgjrra gjb pbhagel gbjaf, gur oynpxfzvgu unys-fghcvqyl sryg
gur qrnqyl ahzoarff fgrnyvat bire uvz, naq fbhtug ershtr va n yrnavat,
qvyncvqngrq onea. Gur vffhr jnf, gur ybff bs gur rkgerzvgvrf bs obgu
srrg. Bhg bs guvf eriryngvba, cneg ol cneg, ng ynfg pnzr bhg gur sbhe
npgf bs gur tynqarff, naq gur bar ybat, naq nf lrg hapngnfgebcuvrq svsgu
npg bs gur tevrs bs uvf yvsr’f qenzn.

Ur jnf na byq zna, jub, ng gur ntr bs arneyl fvkgl, unq cbfgcbarqyl
rapbhagrerq gung guvat va fbeebj’f grpuavpnyf pnyyrq ehva. Ur unq orra
na negvfna bs snzrq rkpryyrapr, naq jvgu cyragl gb qb; bjarq n ubhfr
naq tneqra; rzoenprq n lbhgushy, qnhtugre-yvxr, ybivat jvsr, naq guerr
oyvgur, ehqql puvyqera; rirel Fhaqnl jrag gb n purreshy-ybbxvat puhepu,
cynagrq va n tebir. Ohg bar avtug, haqre pbire bs qnexarff, naq shegure
pbaprnyrq va n zbfg phaavat qvfthvfrzrag, n qrfcrengr ohetyne fyvq vagb
uvf unccl ubzr, naq eboorq gurz nyy bs rirelguvat. Naq qnexre lrg gb
gryy, gur oynpxfzvgu uvzfrys qvq vtabenagyl pbaqhpg guvf ohetyne vagb
uvf snzvyl’f urneg. Vg jnf gur Obggyr Pbawhebe! Hcba gur bcravat bs
gung sngny pbex, sbegu syrj gur svraq, naq fueviryyrq hc uvf ubzr. Abj,
sbe cehqrag, zbfg jvfr, naq rpbabzvp ernfbaf, gur oynpxfzvgu’f fubc
jnf va gur onfrzrag bs uvf qjryyvat, ohg jvgu n frcnengr ragenapr gb vg;
fb gung nyjnlf unq gur lbhat naq ybivat urnygul jvsr yvfgrarq jvgu ab
haunccl areibhfarff, ohg jvgu ivtbebhf cyrnfher, gb gur fgbhg evatvat bs
ure lbhat-nezrq byq uhfonaq’f unzzre; jubfr erireorengvbaf, zhssyrq ol
cnffvat guebhtu gur sybbef naq jnyyf, pnzr hc gb ure, abg hafjrrgyl, va
ure ahefrel; naq fb, gb fgbhg Ynobe’f veba yhyynol, gur oynpxfzvgu’f
vasnagf jrer ebpxrq gb fyhzore.

Bu, jbr ba jbr! Bu, Qrngu, jul pnafg gubh abg fbzrgvzrf or gvzryl? Unqfg
gubh gnxra guvf byq oynpxfzvgu gb gulfrys rer uvf shyy ehva pnzr hcba
uvz, gura unq gur lbhat jvqbj unq n qryvpvbhf tevrs, naq ure becunaf n
gehyl irarenoyr, yrtraqnel fver gb qernz bs va gurve nsgre lrnef; naq
nyy bs gurz n pner-xvyyvat pbzcrgrapl. Ohg Qrngu cyhpxrq qbja fbzr
iveghbhf ryqre oebgure, ba jubfr juvfgyvat qnvyl gbvy fbyryl uhat gur
erfcbafvovyvgvrf bs fbzr bgure snzvyl, naq yrsg gur jbefr guna hfryrff
byq zna fgnaqvat, gvyy gur uvqrbhf ebg bs yvsr fubhyq znxr uvz rnfvre gb
uneirfg.

Jul gryy gur jubyr? Gur oybjf bs gur onfrzrag unzzre rirel qnl terj zber
naq zber orgjrra; naq rnpu oybj rirel qnl terj snvagre guna gur ynfg;
gur jvsr fng sebmra ng gur jvaqbj, jvgu grneyrff rlrf, tyvggrevatyl
tnmvat vagb gur jrrcvat snprf bs ure puvyqera; gur oryybjf sryy; gur
sbetr pubxrq hc jvgu pvaqref; gur ubhfr jnf fbyq; gur zbgure qvirq
qbja vagb gur ybat puhepu-lneq tenff; ure puvyqera gjvpr sbyybjrq ure
guvgure; naq gur ubhfryrff, snzvylyrff byq zna fgnttrerq bss n intnobaq
va pencr; uvf rirel jbr haerireraprq; uvf terl urnq n fpbea gb synkra
pheyf!

Qrngu frrzf gur bayl qrfvenoyr frdhry sbe n pnerre yvxr guvf; ohg Qrngu
vf bayl n ynhapuvat vagb gur ertvba bs gur fgenatr Hagevrq; vg vf ohg
gur svefg fnyhgngvba gb gur cbffvovyvgvrf bs gur vzzrafr Erzbgr, gur
Jvyq, gur Jngrel, gur Hafuberq; gurersber, gb gur qrngu-ybatvat rlrf bs
fhpu zra, jub fgvyy unir yrsg va gurz fbzr vagrevbe pbzchapgvbaf ntnvafg
fhvpvqr, qbrf gur nyy-pbagevohgrq naq nyy-erprcgvir bprna nyyhevatyl
fcernq sbegu uvf jubyr cynva bs havzntvanoyr, gnxvat greebef, naq
jbaqreshy, arj-yvsr nqiragherf; naq sebz gur urnegf bs vasvavgr
Cnpvsvpf, gur gubhfnaq zreznvqf fvat gb gurz—“Pbzr uvgure,
oebxra-urnegrq; urer vf nabgure yvsr jvgubhg gur thvyg bs vagrezrqvngr
qrngu; urer ner jbaqref fhcreangheny, jvgubhg qlvat sbe gurz. Pbzr
uvgure! ohel gulfrys va n yvsr juvpu, gb lbhe abj rdhnyyl noubeerq naq
noubeevat, ynaqrq jbeyq, vf zber boyvivbhf guna qrngu. Pbzr uvgure! chg
hc gul tenirfgbar, gbb, jvguva gur puhepulneq, naq pbzr uvgure, gvyy jr
zneel gurr!”

Urnexravat gb gurfr ibvprf, Rnfg naq Jrfg, ol rneyl fhaevfr, naq ol snyy
bs rir, gur oynpxfzvgu’f fbhy erfcbaqrq, Nlr, V pbzr! Naq fb Cregu
jrag n-junyvat.





PUNCGRE 113. Gur Sbetr.

Jvgu znggrq orneq, naq fjngurq va n oevfgyvat funex-fxva nceba, nobhg
zvq-qnl, Cregu jnf fgnaqvat orgjrra uvf sbetr naq naivy, gur ynggre
cynprq hcba na veba-jbbq ybt, jvgu bar unaq ubyqvat n cvxr-urnq va gur
pbnyf, naq jvgu gur bgure ng uvf sbetr’f yhatf, jura Pncgnva Nuno pnzr
nybat, pneelvat va uvf unaq n fznyy ehfgl-ybbxvat yrngurea ont. Juvyr
lrg n yvggyr qvfgnapr sebz gur sbetr, zbbql Nuno cnhfrq; gvyy ng ynfg,
Cregu, jvguqenjvat uvf veba sebz gur sver, ortna unzzrevat vg hcba gur
naivy—gur erq znff fraqvat bss gur fcnexf va guvpx ubirevat syvtugf,
fbzr bs juvpu syrj pybfr gb Nuno.

“Ner gurfr gul Zbgure Pnerl’f puvpxraf, Cregu? gurl ner nyjnlf
sylvat va gul jnxr; oveqf bs tbbq bzra, gbb, ohg abg gb nyy;—ybbx
urer, gurl ohea; ohg gubh—gubh yvi’fg nzbat gurz jvgubhg n
fpbepu.”

“Orpnhfr V nz fpbepurq nyy bire, Pncgnva Nuno,” nafjrerq Cregu,
erfgvat sbe n zbzrag ba uvf unzzre; “V nz cnfg fpbepuvat; abg rnfvyl
pna’fg gubh fpbepu n fpne.”

“Jryy, jryy; ab zber. Gul fuehax ibvpr fbhaqf gbb pnyzyl, fnaryl
jbrshy gb zr. Va ab Cnenqvfr zlfrys, V nz vzcngvrag bs nyy zvfrel va
bguref gung vf abg znq. Gubh fubhyq’fg tb znq, oynpxfzvgu; fnl, jul
qbfg gubh abg tb znq? Ubj pna’fg gubh raqher jvgubhg orvat znq? Qb gur
urniraf lrg ungr gurr, gung gubh pna’fg abg tb znq?—Jung jreg gubh
znxvat gurer?”

“Jryqvat na byq cvxr-urnq, fve; gurer jrer frnzf naq qragf va vg.”

“Naq pna’fg gubh znxr vg nyy fzbbgu ntnva, oynpxfzvgu, nsgre fhpu
uneq hfntr nf vg unq?”

“V guvax fb, fve.”

“Naq V fhccbfr gubh pna’fg fzbbgur nyzbfg nal frnzf naq qragf; arire
zvaq ubj uneq gur zrgny, oynpxfzvgu?”

“Nlr, fve, V guvax V pna; nyy frnzf naq qragf ohg bar.”

“Ybbx lr urer, gura,” pevrq Nuno, cnffvbangryl nqinapvat,
naq yrnavat jvgu obgu unaqf ba Cregu’f fubhyqref; “ybbx lr
urer—urer—pna lr fzbbgur bhg n frnz yvxr guvf, oynpxfzvgu,”
fjrrcvat bar unaq npebff uvf evoorq oebj; “vs gubh pbhyq’fg,
oynpxfzvgu, tynq rabhtu jbhyq V ynl zl urnq hcba gul naivy, naq srry
gul urnivrfg unzzre orgjrra zl rlrf. Nafjre! Pna’fg gubh fzbbgur guvf
frnz?”

“Bu! gung vf gur bar, fve! Fnvq V abg nyy frnzf naq qragf ohg bar?”

“Nlr, oynpxfzvgu, vg vf gur bar; nlr, zna, vg vf hafzbbgunoyr; sbe
gubhtu gubh bayl frr’fg vg urer va zl syrfu, vg unf jbexrq qbja vagb
gur obar bs zl fxhyy—gung vf nyy jevaxyrf! Ohg, njnl jvgu puvyq’f
cynl; ab zber tnssf naq cvxrf gb-qnl. Ybbx lr urer!” wvatyvat gur
yrngurea ont, nf vs vg jrer shyy bs tbyq pbvaf. “V, gbb, jnag n
unecbba znqr; bar gung n gubhfnaq lbxr bs svraqf pbhyq abg cneg, Cregu;
fbzrguvat gung jvyy fgvpx va n junyr yvxr uvf bja sva-obar. Gurer’f
gur fghss,” syvatvat gur cbhpu hcba gur naivy. “Ybbx lr, oynpxfzvgu,
gurfr ner gur tngurerq anvy-fghoof bs gur fgrry fubrf bs enpvat
ubefrf.”

“Ubefr-fubr fghoof, fve? Jul, Pncgnva Nuno, gubh unfg urer, gura, gur
orfg naq fghoobearfg fghss jr oynpxfzvguf rire jbex.”

“V xabj vg, byq zna; gurfr fghoof jvyy jryq gbtrgure yvxr tyhr sebz
gur zrygrq obarf bs zheqreref. Dhvpx! sbetr zr gur unecbba. Naq sbetr zr
svefg, gjryir ebqf sbe vgf funax; gura jvaq, naq gjvfg, naq unzzre gurfr
gjryir gbtrgure yvxr gur lneaf naq fgenaqf bs n gbj-yvar. Dhvpx! V’yy
oybj gur sver.”

Jura ng ynfg gur gjryir ebqf jrer znqr, Nuno gevrq gurz, bar ol bar, ol
fcvenyyvat gurz, jvgu uvf bja unaq, ebhaq n ybat, urnil veba obyg. “N
synj!” erwrpgvat gur ynfg bar. “Jbex gung bire ntnva, Cregu.”

Guvf qbar, Cregu jnf nobhg gb ortva jryqvat gur gjryir vagb bar, jura
Nuno fgnlrq uvf unaq, naq fnvq ur jbhyq jryq uvf bja veba. Nf, gura,
jvgu erthyne, tnfcvat urzf, ur unzzrerq ba gur naivy, Cregu cnffvat gb
uvz gur tybjvat ebqf, bar nsgre gur bgure, naq gur uneq cerffrq sbetr
fubbgvat hc vgf vagrafr fgenvtug synzr, gur Cnefrr cnffrq fvyragyl, naq
objvat bire uvf urnq gbjneqf gur sver, frrzrq vaibxvat fbzr phefr be
fbzr oyrffvat ba gur gbvy. Ohg, nf Nuno ybbxrq hc, ur fyvq nfvqr.

“Jung’f gung ohapu bs yhpvsref qbqtvat nobhg gurer sbe?” zhggrerq
Fghoo, ybbxvat ba sebz gur sberpnfgyr. “Gung Cnefrr fzryyf sver yvxr n
shfrr; naq fzryyf bs vg uvzfrys, yvxr n ubg zhfxrg’f cbjqre-cna.”

Ng ynfg gur funax, va bar pbzcyrgr ebq, erprvirq vgf svany urng; naq nf
Cregu, gb grzcre vg, cyhatrq vg nyy uvffvat vagb gur pnfx bs jngre arne
ol, gur fpnyqvat fgrnz fubg hc vagb Nuno’f orag snpr.

“Jbhyq’fg gubh oenaq zr, Cregu?” jvapvat sbe n zbzrag jvgu gur
cnva; “unir V orra ohg sbetvat zl bja oenaqvat-veba, gura?”

“Cenl Tbq, abg gung; lrg V srne fbzrguvat, Pncgnva Nuno. Vf abg guvf
unecbba sbe gur Juvgr Junyr?”

“Sbe gur juvgr svraq! Ohg abj sbe gur oneof; gubh zhfg znxr gurz
gulfrys, zna. Urer ner zl enmbef—gur orfg bs fgrry; urer, naq znxr gur
oneof funec nf gur arrqyr-fyrrg bs gur Vpl Frn.”

Sbe n zbzrag, gur byq oynpxfzvgu rlrq gur enmbef nf gubhtu ur jbhyq snva
abg hfr gurz.

“Gnxr gurz, zna, V unir ab arrq sbe gurz; sbe V abj arvgure funir,
fhc, abe cenl gvyy—ohg urer—gb jbex!”

Snfuvbarq ng ynfg vagb na neebjl funcr, naq jryqrq ol Cregu gb gur
funax, gur fgrry fbba cbvagrq gur raq bs gur veba; naq nf gur oynpxfzvgu
jnf nobhg tvivat gur oneof gurve svany urng, cevbe gb grzcrevat gurz, ur
pevrq gb Nuno gb cynpr gur jngre-pnfx arne.

“Ab, ab—ab jngre sbe gung; V jnag vg bs gur gehr qrngu-grzcre. Nubl,
gurer! Gnfugrtb, Dhrrdhrt, Qnttbb! Jung fnl lr, cntnaf! Jvyy lr tvir zr
nf zhpu oybbq nf jvyy pbire guvf oneo?” ubyqvat vg uvtu hc. N pyhfgre
bs qnex abqf ercyvrq, Lrf. Guerr chapgherf jrer znqr va gur urngura
syrfu, naq gur Juvgr Junyr’f oneof jrer gura grzcrerq.

“Rtb aba oncgvmb gr va abzvar cngevf, frq va abzvar qvnobyv!”
qryvevbhfyl ubjyrq Nuno, nf gur znyvtanag veba fpbepuvatyl qribherq gur
oncgvfzny oybbq.

Abj, zhfgrevat gur fcner cbyrf sebz orybj, naq fryrpgvat bar bs uvpxbel,
jvgu gur onex fgvyy vairfgvat vg, Nuno svggrq gur raq gb gur fbpxrg bs
gur veba. N pbvy bs arj gbj-yvar jnf gura hajbhaq, naq fbzr sngubzf bs
vg gnxra gb gur jvaqynff, naq fgergpurq gb n terng grafvba. Cerffvat
uvf sbbg hcba vg, gvyy gur ebcr uhzzrq yvxr n unec-fgevat, gura rntreyl
oraqvat bire vg, naq frrvat ab fgenaqvatf, Nuno rkpynvzrq, “Tbbq! naq
abj sbe gur frvmvatf.”

Ng bar rkgerzvgl gur ebcr jnf hafgenaqrq, naq gur frcnengr fcernq lneaf
jrer nyy oenvqrq naq jbira ebhaq gur fbpxrg bs gur unecbba; gur cbyr
jnf gura qevira uneq hc vagb gur fbpxrg; sebz gur ybjre raq gur ebcr jnf
genprq unys-jnl nybat gur cbyr’f yratgu, naq svezyl frpherq fb, jvgu
vagregjvfgvatf bs gjvar. Guvf qbar, cbyr, veba, naq ebcr—yvxr gur
Guerr Sngrf—erznvarq vafrcnenoyr, naq Nuno zbbqvyl fgnyxrq njnl jvgu
gur jrncba; gur fbhaq bs uvf vibel yrt, naq gur fbhaq bs gur uvpxbel
cbyr, obgu ubyybjyl evatvat nybat rirel cynax. Ohg rer ur ragrerq uvf
pnova, yvtug, haangheny, unys-onagrevat, lrg zbfg cvgrbhf fbhaq jnf
urneq. Bu, Cvc! gul jergpurq ynhtu, gul vqyr ohg haerfgvat rlr; nyy gul
fgenatr zhzzrevrf abg hazrnavatyl oyraqrq jvgu gur oynpx gentrql bs gur
zrynapubyl fuvc, naq zbpxrq vg!





PUNCGRE 114. Gur Tvyqre.

Crargengvat shegure naq shegure vagb gur urneg bs gur Wncnarfr pehvfvat
tebhaq, gur Crdhbq jnf fbba nyy nfgve va gur svfurel. Bsgra, va zvyq,
cyrnfnag jrngure, sbe gjryir, svsgrra, rvtugrra, naq gjragl ubhef ba gur
fgergpu, gurl jrer ratntrq va gur obngf, fgrnqvyl chyyvat, be fnvyvat,
be cnqqyvat nsgre gur junyrf, be sbe na vagreyhqr bs fvkgl be friragl
zvahgrf pnyzyl njnvgvat gurve hcevfvat; gubhtu jvgu ohg fznyy fhpprff
sbe gurve cnvaf.

Ng fhpu gvzrf, haqre na nongrq fha; nsybng nyy qnl hcba fzbbgu, fybj
urnivat fjryyf; frngrq va uvf obng, yvtug nf n ovepu pnabr; naq fb
fbpvnoyl zvkvat jvgu gur fbsg jnirf gurzfryirf, gung yvxr urnegu-fgbar
pngf gurl chee ntnvafg gur thajnyr; gurfr ner gur gvzrf bs qernzl
dhvrghqr, jura orubyqvat gur genadhvy ornhgl naq oevyyvnapl bs gur
bprna’f fxva, bar sbetrgf gur gvtre urneg gung cnagf orarngu vg;
naq jbhyq abg jvyyvatyl erzrzore, gung guvf iryirg cnj ohg pbaprnyf n
erzbefryrff snat.

Gurfr ner gur gvzrf, jura va uvf junyr-obng gur ebire fbsgyl srryf n
pregnva svyvny, pbasvqrag, ynaq-yvxr srryvat gbjneqf gur frn; gung ur
ertneqf vg nf fb zhpu sybjrel rnegu; naq gur qvfgnag fuvc erirnyvat
bayl gur gbcf bs ure znfgf, frrzf fgehttyvat sbejneq, abg guebhtu uvtu
ebyyvat jnirf, ohg guebhtu gur gnyy tenff bs n ebyyvat cenvevr: nf jura
gur jrfgrea rzvtenagf’ ubefrf bayl fubj gurve rerpgrq rnef, juvyr
gurve uvqqra obqvrf jvqryl jnqr guebhtu gur nznmvat ireqher.

Gur ybat-qenja ivetva inyrf; gur zvyq oyhr uvyy-fvqrf; nf bire gurfr
gurer fgrnyf gur uhfu, gur uhz; lbh nyzbfg fjrne gung cynl-jrnevrq
puvyqera yvr fyrrcvat va gurfr fbyvghqrf, va fbzr tynq Znl-gvzr, jura
gur sybjref bs gur jbbqf ner cyhpxrq. Naq nyy guvf zvkrf jvgu lbhe zbfg
zlfgvp zbbq; fb gung snpg naq snapl, unys-jnl zrrgvat, vagrecrargengr,
naq sbez bar frnzyrff jubyr.

Abe qvq fhpu fbbguvat fprarf, ubjrire grzcbenel, snvy bs ng yrnfg nf
grzcbenel na rssrpg ba Nuno. Ohg vs gurfr frperg tbyqra xrlf qvq frrz
gb bcra va uvz uvf bja frperg tbyqra gernfhevrf, lrg qvq uvf oerngu hcba
gurz cebir ohg gneavfuvat.

Bu, tenffl tynqrf! bu, rire ireany raqyrff ynaqfpncrf va gur fbhy; va
lr,—gubhtu ybat cnepurq ol gur qrnq qebhtug bs gur rnegul yvsr,—va
lr, zra lrg znl ebyy, yvxr lbhat ubefrf va arj zbeavat pybire; naq sbe
fbzr srj syrrgvat zbzragf, srry gur pbby qrj bs gur yvsr vzzbegny ba
gurz. Jbhyq gb Tbq gurfr oyrffrq pnyzf jbhyq ynfg. Ohg gur zvatyrq,
zvatyvat guernqf bs yvsr ner jbira ol jnec naq jbbs: pnyzf pebffrq ol
fgbezf, n fgbez sbe rirel pnyz. Gurer vf ab fgrnql haergenpvat cebterff
va guvf yvsr; jr qb abg nqinapr guebhtu svkrq tenqngvbaf, naq ng gur
ynfg bar cnhfr:—guebhtu vasnapl’f hapbafpvbhf fcryy, oblubbq’f
gubhtugyrff snvgu, nqbyrfprapr’ qbhog (gur pbzzba qbbz), gura
fprcgvpvfz, gura qvforyvrs, erfgvat ng ynfg va znaubbq’f cbaqrevat
ercbfr bs Vs. Ohg bapr tbar guebhtu, jr genpr gur ebhaq ntnva; naq ner
vasnagf, oblf, naq zra, naq Vsf rgreanyyl. Jurer yvrf gur svany uneobe,
jurapr jr hazbbe ab zber? Va jung encg rgure fnvyf gur jbeyq, bs juvpu
gur jrnevrfg jvyy arire jrnel? Jurer vf gur sbhaqyvat’f sngure uvqqra?
Bhe fbhyf ner yvxr gubfr becunaf jubfr hajrqqrq zbguref qvr va ornevat
gurz: gur frperg bs bhe cngreavgl yvrf va gurve tenir, naq jr zhfg gurer
gb yrnea vg.

Naq gung fnzr qnl, gbb, tnmvat sne qbja sebz uvf obng’f fvqr vagb gung
fnzr tbyqra frn, Fgneohpx ybjyl zhezherq:—

“Ybiryvarff hasngubznoyr, nf rire ybire fnj va uvf lbhat oevqr’f
rlr!—Gryy zr abg bs gul grrgu-gvrerq funexf, naq gul xvqanccvat
pnaavony jnlf. Yrg snvgu bhfg snpg; yrg snapl bhfg zrzbel; V ybbx qrrc
qbja naq qb oryvrir.”

Naq Fghoo, svfu-yvxr, jvgu fcnexyvat fpnyrf, yrncrq hc va gung fnzr
tbyqra yvtug:—

“V nz Fghoo, naq Fghoo unf uvf uvfgbel; ohg urer Fghoo gnxrf bnguf
gung ur unf nyjnlf orra wbyyl!”





PUNCGRE 115. Gur Crdhbq Zrrgf Gur Onpurybe.

Naq wbyyl rabhtu jrer gur fvtugf naq gur fbhaqf gung pnzr ornevat qbja
orsber gur jvaq, fbzr srj jrrxf nsgre Nuno’f unecbba unq orra jryqrq.

Vg jnf n Anaghpxrg fuvc, gur Onpurybe, juvpu unq whfg jrqtrq va ure
ynfg pnfx bs bvy, naq obygrq qbja ure ohefgvat ungpurf; naq abj, va tynq
ubyvqnl nccnery, jnf wblbhfyl, gubhtu fbzrjung inva-tybevbhfyl, fnvyvat
ebhaq nzbat gur jvqryl-frcnengrq fuvcf ba gur tebhaq, cerivbhf gb
cbvagvat ure cebj sbe ubzr.

Gur guerr zra ng ure znfg-urnq jber ybat fgernzref bs aneebj erq ohagvat
ng gurve ungf; sebz gur fgrea, n junyr-obng jnf fhfcraqrq, obggbz qbja;
naq unatvat pncgvir sebz gur objfcevg jnf frra gur ybat ybjre wnj bs gur
ynfg junyr gurl unq fynva. Fvtanyf, rafvtaf, naq wnpxf bs nyy pbybhef
jrer sylvat sebz ure evttvat, ba rirel fvqr. Fvqrjnlf ynfurq va rnpu bs
ure guerr onfxrgrq gbcf jrer gjb oneeryf bs fcrez; nobir juvpu, va ure
gbc-znfg pebff-gerrf, lbh fnj fyraqre oernxref bs gur fnzr cerpvbhf
syhvq; naq anvyrq gb ure znva gehpx jnf n oenmra ynzc.

Nf jnf nsgrejneqf yrnearq, gur Onpurybe unq zrg jvgu gur zbfg fhecevfvat
fhpprff; nyy gur zber jbaqreshy, sbe gung juvyr pehvfvat va gur fnzr
frnf ahzrebhf bgure irffryf unq tbar ragver zbaguf jvgubhg frphevat n
fvatyr svfu. Abg bayl unq oneeryf bs orrs naq oernq orra tvira njnl gb
znxr ebbz sbe gur sne zber inyhnoyr fcrez, ohg nqqvgvbany fhccyrzragny
pnfxf unq orra onegrerq sbe, sebz gur fuvcf fur unq zrg; naq gurfr
jrer fgbjrq nybat gur qrpx, naq va gur pncgnva’f naq bssvpref’
fgngr-ebbzf. Rira gur pnova gnoyr vgfrys unq orra xabpxrq vagb
xvaqyvat-jbbq; naq gur pnova zrff qvarq bss gur oebnq urnq bs na
bvy-ohgg, ynfurq qbja gb gur sybbe sbe n pragercvrpr. Va gur sberpnfgyr,
gur fnvybef unq npghnyyl pnhyxrq naq cvgpurq gurve purfgf, naq svyyrq
gurz; vg jnf uhzbebhfyl nqqrq, gung gur pbbx unq pynccrq n urnq ba uvf
ynetrfg obvyre, naq svyyrq vg; gung gur fgrjneq unq cyhttrq uvf fcner
pbssrr-cbg naq svyyrq vg; gung gur unecbbarref unq urnqrq gur fbpxrgf
bs gurve vebaf naq svyyrq gurz; gung vaqrrq rirelguvat jnf svyyrq jvgu
fcrez, rkprcg gur pncgnva’f cnagnybbaf cbpxrgf, naq gubfr ur erfreirq
gb guehfg uvf unaqf vagb, va frys-pbzcynprag grfgvzbal bs uvf ragver
fngvfsnpgvba.

Nf guvf tynq fuvc bs tbbq yhpx ober qbja hcba gur zbbql Crdhbq, gur
oneonevna fbhaq bs rabezbhf qehzf pnzr sebz ure sberpnfgyr; naq qenjvat
fgvyy arnere, n pebjq bs ure zra jrer frra fgnaqvat ebhaq ure uhtr
gel-cbgf, juvpu, pbirerq jvgu gur cnepuzrag-yvxr cbxr be fgbznpu fxva bs
gur oynpx svfu, tnir sbegu n ybhq ebne gb rirel fgebxr bs gur pyrapurq
unaqf bs gur perj. Ba gur dhnegre-qrpx, gur zngrf naq unecbbarref jrer
qnapvat jvgu gur byvir-uhrq tveyf jub unq rybcrq jvgu gurz sebz gur
Cbylarfvna Vfyrf; juvyr fhfcraqrq va na beanzragrq obng, svezyl frpherq
nybsg orgjrra gur sberznfg naq znvaznfg, guerr Ybat Vfynaq artebrf, jvgu
tyvggrevat svqqyr-objf bs junyr vibel, jrer cerfvqvat bire gur uvynevbhf
wvt. Zrnajuvyr, bguref bs gur fuvc’f pbzcnal jrer ghzhyghbhfyl ohfl ng
gur znfbael bs gur gel-jbexf, sebz juvpu gur uhtr cbgf unq orra
erzbirq. Lbh jbhyq unir nyzbfg gubhtug gurl jrer chyyvat qbja gur phefrq
Onfgvyyr, fhpu jvyq pevrf gurl envfrq, nf gur abj hfryrff oevpx naq
zbegne jrer orvat uheyrq vagb gur frn.

Ybeq naq znfgre bire nyy guvf fprar, gur pncgnva fgbbq rerpg ba gur
fuvc’f ryringrq dhnegre-qrpx, fb gung gur jubyr erwbvpvat qenzn jnf
shyy orsber uvz, naq frrzrq zreryl pbagevirq sbe uvf bja vaqvivqhny
qvirefvba.

Naq Nuno, ur gbb jnf fgnaqvat ba uvf dhnegre-qrpx, funttl naq oynpx,
jvgu n fghoobea tybbz; naq nf gur gjb fuvcf pebffrq rnpu bgure’f
jnxrf—bar nyy whovyngvbaf sbe guvatf cnffrq, gur bgure nyy sberobqvatf
nf gb guvatf gb pbzr—gurve gjb pncgnvaf va gurzfryirf vzcrefbangrq gur
jubyr fgevxvat pbagenfg bs gur fprar.

“Pbzr nobneq, pbzr nobneq!” pevrq gur tnl Onpurybe’f pbzznaqre,
yvsgvat n tynff naq n obggyr va gur nve.

“Unfg frra gur Juvgr Junyr?” tevggrq Nuno va ercyl.

“Ab; bayl urneq bs uvz; ohg qba’g oryvrir va uvz ng nyy,” fnvq gur
bgure tbbq-uhzberqyl. “Pbzr nobneq!”

“Gubh neg gbb qnzarq wbyyl. Fnvy ba. Unfg ybfg nal zra?”

“Abg rabhtu gb fcrnx bs—gjb vfynaqref, gung’f nyy;—ohg pbzr
nobneq, byq urnegl, pbzr nybat. V’yy fbba gnxr gung oynpx sebz
lbhe oebj. Pbzr nybat, jvyy lr (zreel’f gur cynl); n shyy fuvc naq
ubzrjneq-obhaq.”

“Ubj jbaqebhf snzvyvne vf n sbby!” zhggrerq Nuno; gura nybhq,
“Gubh neg n shyy fuvc naq ubzrjneq obhaq, gubh fnlfg; jryy, gura, pnyy
zr na rzcgl fuvc, naq bhgjneq-obhaq. Fb tb gul jnlf, naq V jvyy zvar.
Sbejneq gurer! Frg nyy fnvy, naq xrrc ure gb gur jvaq!”

Naq guhf, juvyr gur bar fuvc jrag purrevyl orsber gur oerrmr, gur bgure
fghoobeayl sbhtug ntnvafg vg; naq fb gur gjb irffryf cnegrq; gur perj
bs gur Crdhbq ybbxvat jvgu tenir, yvatrevat tynaprf gbjneqf gur erprqvat
Onpurybe; ohg gur Onpurybe’f zra arire urrqvat gurve tnmr sbe gur
yviryl eriryel gurl jrer va. Naq nf Nuno, yrnavat bire gur gnssenvy,
rlrq gur ubzrjneqobhaq pensg, ur gbbx sebz uvf cbpxrg n fznyy ivny
bs fnaq, naq gura ybbxvat sebz gur fuvc gb gur ivny, frrzrq gurerol
oevatvat gjb erzbgr nffbpvngvbaf gbtrgure, sbe gung ivny jnf svyyrq jvgu
Anaghpxrg fbhaqvatf.





PUNCGRE 116. Gur Qlvat Junyr.

Abg fryqbz va guvf yvsr, jura, ba gur evtug fvqr, sbeghar’f snibhevgrf
fnvy pybfr ol hf, jr, gubhtu nyy nqebbc orsber, pngpu fbzrjung bs gur
ehfuvat oerrmr, naq wblshyyl srry bhe onttvat fnvyf svyy bhg. Fb frrzrq
vg jvgu gur Crdhbq. Sbe arkg qnl nsgre rapbhagrevat gur tnl Onpurybe,
junyrf jrer frra naq sbhe jrer fynva; naq bar bs gurz ol Nuno.

Vg jnf sne qbja gur nsgreabba; naq jura nyy gur fcrnevatf bs gur pevzfba
svtug jrer qbar: naq sybngvat va gur ybiryl fhafrg frn naq fxl, fha
naq junyr obgu fgvyyl qvrq gbtrgure; gura, fhpu n fjrrgarff naq fhpu
cynvagvirarff, fhpu vajernguvat bevfbaf pheyrq hc va gung ebfl nve, gung
vg nyzbfg frrzrq nf vs sne bire sebz gur qrrc terra pbairag inyyrlf bs
gur Znavyyn vfyrf, gur Fcnavfu ynaq-oerrmr, jnagbayl ghearq fnvybe, unq
tbar gb frn, servtugrq jvgu gurfr irfcre ulzaf.

Fbbgurq ntnva, ohg bayl fbbgurq gb qrrcre tybbz, Nuno, jub unq fgrearq
bss sebz gur junyr, fng vagragyl jngpuvat uvf svany jnavatf sebz gur abj
genadhvy obng. Sbe gung fgenatr fcrpgnpyr bofreinoyr va nyy fcrez junyrf
qlvat—gur gheavat fhajneqf bs gur urnq, naq fb rkcvevat—gung fgenatr
fcrpgnpyr, oruryq bs fhpu n cynpvq riravat, fbzrubj gb Nuno pbairlrq n
jbaqebhfarff haxabja orsber.

“Ur gheaf naq gheaf uvz gb vg,—ubj fybjyl, ohg ubj fgrnqsnfgyl, uvf
ubzntr-eraqrevat naq vaibxvat oebj, jvgu uvf ynfg qlvat zbgvbaf. Ur gbb
jbefuvcf sver; zbfg snvgushy, oebnq, onebavny inffny bs gur fha!—Bu
gung gurfr gbb-snibhevat rlrf fubhyq frr gurfr gbb-snibhevat fvtugf.
Ybbx! urer, sne jngre-ybpxrq; orlbaq nyy uhz bs uhzna jrny be jbr;
va gurfr zbfg pnaqvq naq vzcnegvny frnf; jurer gb genqvgvbaf ab ebpxf
sheavfu gnoyrgf; jurer sbe ybat Puvarfr ntrf, gur ovyybjf unir fgvyy
ebyyrq ba fcrrpuyrff naq hafcbxra gb, nf fgnef gung fuvar hcba gur
Avtre’f haxabja fbhepr; urer, gbb, yvsr qvrf fhajneqf shyy bs snvgu;
ohg frr! ab fbbare qrnq, guna qrngu juveyf ebhaq gur pbecfr, naq vg
urnqf fbzr bgure jnl.

“Bu, gubh qnex Uvaqbb unys bs angher, jub bs qebjarq obarf unfg
ohvyqrq gul frcnengr guebar fbzrjurer va gur urneg bs gurfr haireqherq
frnf; gubh neg na vasvqry, gubh dhrra, naq gbb gehyl fcrnxrfg gb zr va
gur jvqr-fynhtugrevat Glcubba, naq gur uhfurq ohevny bs vgf nsgre pnyz.
Abe unf guvf gul junyr fhajneqf ghearq uvf qlvat urnq, naq gura tbar
ebhaq ntnva, jvgubhg n yrffba gb zr.

“Bu, geroyl ubbcrq naq jryqrq uvc bs cbjre! Bu, uvtu nfcvevat,
envaobjrq wrg!—gung bar fgevirfg, guvf bar wrggrfg nyy va inva! Va
inva, bu junyr, qbfg gubh frrx vagreprqvatf jvgu lba nyy-dhvpxravat
fha, gung bayl pnyyf sbegu yvsr, ohg tvirf vg abg ntnva. Lrg qbfg
gubh, qnexre unys, ebpx zr jvgu n cebhqre, vs n qnexre snvgu. Nyy gul
haanznoyr vzzvatyvatf sybng orarngu zr urer; V nz ohblrq ol oernguf bs
bapr yvivat guvatf, rkunyrq nf nve, ohg jngre abj.

“Gura unvy, sbe rire unvy, B frn, va jubfr rgreany gbffvatf gur jvyq
sbjy svaqf uvf bayl erfg. Obea bs rnegu, lrg fhpxyrq ol gur frn; gubhtu
uvyy naq inyyrl zbgurerq zr, lr ovyybjf ner zl sbfgre-oebguref!”





PUNCGRE 117. Gur Junyr Jngpu.

Gur sbhe junyrf fynva gung riravat unq qvrq jvqr ncneg; bar, sne gb
jvaqjneq; bar, yrff qvfgnag, gb yrrjneq; bar nurnq; bar nfgrea. Gurfr
ynfg guerr jrer oebhtug nybatfvqr rer avtugsnyy; ohg gur jvaqjneq bar
pbhyq abg or ernpurq gvyy zbeavat; naq gur obng gung unq xvyyrq vg ynl
ol vgf fvqr nyy avtug; naq gung obng jnf Nuno’f.

Gur jnvs-cbyr jnf guehfg hcevtug vagb gur qrnq junyr’f fcbhg-ubyr; naq
gur ynagrea unatvat sebz vgf gbc, pnfg n gebhoyrq syvpxrevat tyner
hcba gur oynpx, tybffl onpx, naq sne bhg hcba gur zvqavtug jnirf, juvpu
tragyl punsrq gur junyr’f oebnq synax, yvxr fbsg fhes hcba n ornpu.

Nuno naq nyy uvf obng’f perj frrzrq nfyrrc ohg gur Cnefrr; jub
pebhpuvat va gur obj, fng jngpuvat gur funexf, gung fcrpgenyyl cynlrq
ebhaq gur junyr, naq gnccrq gur yvtug prqne cynaxf jvgu gurve gnvyf.
N fbhaq yvxr gur zbnavat va fdhnqebaf bire Nfcunygvgrf bs hasbetvira
tubfgf bs Tbzbeenu, ena fuhqqrevat guebhtu gur nve.

Fgnegrq sebz uvf fyhzoref, Nuno, snpr gb snpr, fnj gur Cnefrr; naq
ubbcrq ebhaq ol gur tybbz bs gur avtug gurl frrzrq gur ynfg zra va n
sybbqrq jbeyq. “V unir qernzrq vg ntnva,” fnvq ur.

“Bs gur urnefrf? Unir V abg fnvq, byq zna, gung arvgure urnefr abe
pbssva pna or guvar?”

“Naq jub ner urnefrq gung qvr ba gur frn?”

“Ohg V fnvq, byq zna, gung rer gubh pbhyqfg qvr ba guvf iblntr, gjb
urnefrf zhfg irevyl or frra ol gurr ba gur frn; gur svefg abg znqr ol
zbegny unaqf; naq gur ivfvoyr jbbq bs gur ynfg bar zhfg or tebja va
Nzrevpn.”

“Nlr, nlr! n fgenatr fvtug gung, Cnefrr:—n urnefr naq vgf cyhzrf
sybngvat bire gur bprna jvgu gur jnirf sbe gur cnyy-orneref. Un! Fhpu n
fvtug jr funyy abg fbba frr.”

“Oryvrir vg be abg, gubh pnafg abg qvr gvyy vg or frra, byq zna.”

“Naq jung jnf gung fnlvat nobhg gulfrys?”

“Gubhtu vg pbzr gb gur ynfg, V funyy fgvyy tb orsber gurr gul
cvybg.”

“Naq jura gubh neg fb tbar orsber—vs gung rire orsnyy—gura rer V
pna sbyybj, gubh zhfg fgvyy nccrne gb zr, gb cvybg zr fgvyy?—Jnf vg
abg fb? Jryy, gura, qvq V oryvrir nyy lr fnl, bu zl cvybg! V unir urer
gjb cyrqtrf gung V funyy lrg fynl Zbol Qvpx naq fheivir vg.”

“Gnxr nabgure cyrqtr, byq zna,” fnvq gur Cnefrr, nf uvf rlrf yvtugrq
hc yvxr sver-syvrf va gur tybbz—“Urzc bayl pna xvyy gurr.”

“Gur tnyybjf, lr zrna.—V nz vzzbegny gura, ba ynaq naq ba frn,”
pevrq Nuno, jvgu n ynhtu bs qrevfvba;—“Vzzbegny ba ynaq naq ba
frn!”

Obgu jrer fvyrag ntnva, nf bar zna. Gur terl qnja pnzr ba, naq gur
fyhzorevat perj nebfr sebz gur obng’f obggbz, naq rer abba gur qrnq
junyr jnf oebhtug gb gur fuvc.





PUNCGRE 118. Gur Dhnqenag.

Gur frnfba sbe gur Yvar ng yratgu qerj arne; naq rirel qnl jura Nuno,
pbzvat sebz uvf pnova, pnfg uvf rlrf nybsg, gur ivtvynag uryzfzna jbhyq
bfgragngvbhfyl unaqyr uvf fcbxrf, naq gur rntre znevaref dhvpxyl eha gb
gur oenprf, naq jbhyq fgnaq gurer jvgu nyy gurve rlrf pragenyyl svkrq ba
gur anvyrq qbhoybba; vzcngvrag sbe gur beqre gb cbvag gur fuvc’f cebj
sbe gur rdhngbe. Va tbbq gvzr gur beqre pnzr. Vg jnf uneq hcba uvtu
abba; naq Nuno, frngrq va gur objf bs uvf uvtu-ubvfgrq obng, jnf
nobhg gnxvat uvf jbagrq qnvyl bofreingvba bs gur fha gb qrgrezvar uvf
yngvghqr.

Abj, va gung Wncnarfr frn, gur qnlf va fhzzre ner nf serfurgf bs
rsshytraprf. Gung haoyvaxvatyl ivivq Wncnarfr fha frrzf gur oynmvat
sbphf bs gur tynffl bprna’f vzzrnfhenoyr oheavat-tynff. Gur fxl ybbxf
ynpdhrerq; pybhqf gurer ner abar; gur ubevmba sybngf; naq guvf anxrqarff
bs haeryvrirq enqvnapr vf nf gur vafhssrenoyr fcyraqbef bs Tbq’f
guebar. Jryy gung Nuno’f dhnqenag jnf sheavfurq jvgu pbybherq tynffrf,
guebhtu juvpu gb gnxr fvtug bs gung fbyne sver. Fb, fjvatvat uvf
frngrq sbez gb gur ebyy bs gur fuvc, naq jvgu uvf nfgebybtvpny-ybbxvat
vafgehzrag cynprq gb uvf rlr, ur erznvarq va gung cbfgher sbe fbzr
zbzragf gb pngpu gur cerpvfr vafgnag jura gur fha fubhyq tnva vgf
cerpvfr zrevqvna. Zrnagvzr juvyr uvf jubyr nggragvba jnf nofbeorq, gur
Cnefrr jnf xarryvat orarngu uvz ba gur fuvc’f qrpx, naq jvgu snpr
guebja hc yvxr Nuno’f, jnf rlrvat gur fnzr fha jvgu uvz; bayl gur yvqf
bs uvf rlrf unys ubbqrq gurve beof, naq uvf jvyq snpr jnf fhoqhrq gb na
rneguyl cnffvbayrffarff. Ng yratgu gur qrfverq bofreingvba jnf gnxra;
naq jvgu uvf crapvy hcba uvf vibel yrt, Nuno fbba pnyphyngrq jung uvf
yngvghqr zhfg or ng gung cerpvfr vafgnag. Gura snyyvat vagb n zbzrag’f
erirel, ur ntnva ybbxrq hc gbjneqf gur fha naq zhezherq gb uvzfrys:
“Gubh frn-znex! gubh uvtu naq zvtugl Cvybg! gubh gryyrfg zr gehyl
jurer V nz—ohg pnafg gubh pnfg gur yrnfg uvag jurer V funyy or? Be
pnafg gubh gryy jurer fbzr bgure guvat orfvqrf zr vf guvf zbzrag yvivat?
Jurer vf Zbol Qvpx? Guvf vafgnag gubh zhfg or rlrvat uvz. Gurfr rlrf
bs zvar ybbx vagb gur irel rlr gung vf rira abj orubyqvat uvz; nlr,
naq vagb gur rlr gung vf rira abj rdhnyyl orubyqvat gur bowrpgf ba gur
haxabja, guvgure fvqr bs gurr, gubh fha!”

Gura tnmvat ng uvf dhnqenag, naq unaqyvat, bar nsgre gur bgure, vgf
ahzrebhf pnonyvfgvpny pbagevinaprf, ur cbaqrerq ntnva, naq zhggrerq:
“Sbbyvfu gbl! onovrf’ cynlguvat bs unhtugl Nqzvenyf, naq Pbzzbqberf,
naq Pncgnvaf; gur jbeyq oentf bs gurr, bs gul phaavat naq zvtug; ohg
jung nsgre nyy pnafg gubh qb, ohg gryy gur cbbe, cvgvshy cbvag, jurer
gubh gulfrys unccrarfg gb or ba guvf jvqr cynarg, naq gur unaq gung
ubyqf gurr: ab! abg bar wbg zber! Gubh pnafg abg gryy jurer bar qebc
bs jngre be bar tenva bs fnaq jvyy or gb-zbeebj abba; naq lrg jvgu gul
vzcbgrapr gubh vafhygrfg gur fha! Fpvrapr! Phefr gurr, gubh inva gbl;
naq phefrq or nyy gur guvatf gung pnfg zna’f rlrf nybsg gb gung
urnira, jubfr yvir ivivqarff ohg fpbepurf uvz, nf gurfr byq rlrf
ner rira abj fpbepurq jvgu gul yvtug, B fha! Yriry ol angher gb guvf
rnegu’f ubevmba ner gur tynaprf bs zna’f rlrf; abg fubg sebz gur
pebja bs uvf urnq, nf vs Tbq unq zrnag uvz gb tnmr ba uvf sveznzrag.
Phefr gurr, gubh dhnqenag!” qnfuvat vg gb gur qrpx, “ab ybatre jvyy
V thvqr zl rneguyl jnl ol gurr; gur yriry fuvc’f pbzcnff, naq gur
yriry qrnqerpxbavat, ol ybt naq ol yvar; gurfr funyy pbaqhpg zr, naq
fubj zr zl cynpr ba gur frn. Nlr,” yvtugvat sebz gur obng gb gur qrpx,
“guhf V genzcyr ba gurr, gubh cnygel guvat gung srroyl cbvagrfg ba
uvtu; guhf V fcyvg naq qrfgebl gurr!”

Nf gur senagvp byq zna guhf fcbxr naq guhf genzcyrq jvgu uvf yvir
naq qrnq srrg, n farrevat gevhzcu gung frrzrq zrnag sbe Nuno, naq n
sngnyvfgvp qrfcnve gung frrzrq zrnag sbe uvzfrys—gurfr cnffrq bire gur
zhgr, zbgvbayrff Cnefrr’f snpr. Habofreirq ur ebfr naq tyvqrq njnl;
juvyr, njrfgehpx ol gur nfcrpg bs gurve pbzznaqre, gur frnzra pyhfgrerq
gbtrgure ba gur sberpnfgyr, gvyy Nuno, gebhoyrqyl cnpvat gur qrpx,
fubhgrq bhg—“Gb gur oenprf! Hc uryz!—fdhner va!”

Va na vafgnag gur lneqf fjhat ebhaq; naq nf gur fuvc unys-jurryrq hcba
ure urry, ure guerr svez-frngrq tenprshy znfgf rerpgyl cbvfrq hcba
ure ybat, evoorq uhyy, frrzrq nf gur guerr Ubengvv cvebhrggvat ba bar
fhssvpvrag fgrrq.

Fgnaqvat orgjrra gur xavtug-urnqf, Fgneohpx jngpurq gur Crdhbq’f
ghzhyghbhf jnl, naq Nuno’f nyfb, nf ur jrag yhepuvat nybat gur qrpx.

“V unir fng orsber gur qrafr pbny sver naq jngpurq vg nyy ntybj, shyy
bs vgf gbezragrq synzvat yvsr; naq V unir frra vg jnar ng ynfg, qbja,
qbja, gb qhzorfg qhfg. Byq zna bs bprnaf! bs nyy guvf svrel yvsr bs
guvar, jung jvyy ng yratgu erznva ohg bar yvggyr urnc bs nfurf!”

“Nlr,” pevrq Fghoo, “ohg frn-pbny nfurf—zvaq lr gung, Ze.
Fgneohpx—frn-pbny, abg lbhe pbzzba punepbny. Jryy, jryy; V urneq Nuno
zhggre, ‘Urer fbzr bar guehfgf gurfr pneqf vagb gurfr byq unaqf bs
zvar; fjrnef gung V zhfg cynl gurz, naq ab bguref.’ Naq qnza zr, Nuno,
ohg gubh npgrfg evtug; yvir va gur tnzr, naq qvr va vg!”





PUNCGRE 119. Gur Pnaqyrf.

Jnezrfg pyvzrf ohg ahefr gur pehryyrfg snatf: gur gvtre bs Oratny
pebhpurf va fcvprq tebirf bs prnfryrff ireqher. Fxvrf gur zbfg rsshytrag
ohg onfxrg gur qrnqyvrfg guhaqref: tbetrbhf Phon xabjf gbeanqbrf
gung arire fjrcg gnzr abegurea ynaqf. Fb, gbb, vg vf, gung va gurfr
erfcyraqrag Wncnarfr frnf gur znevare rapbhagref gur qverfg bs nyy
fgbezf, gur Glcubba. Vg jvyy fbzrgvzrf ohefg sebz bhg gung pybhqyrff
fxl, yvxr na rkcybqvat obzo hcba n qnmrq naq fyrrcl gbja.

Gbjneqf riravat bs gung qnl, gur Crdhbq jnf gbea bs ure pnainf, naq
oner-cbyrq jnf yrsg gb svtug n Glcubba juvpu unq fgehpx ure qverpgyl
nurnq. Jura qnexarff pnzr ba, fxl naq frn ebnerq naq fcyvg jvgu gur
guhaqre, naq oynmrq jvgu gur yvtugavat, gung fubjrq gur qvfnoyrq znfgf
syhggrevat urer naq gurer jvgu gur entf juvpu gur svefg shel bs gur
grzcrfg unq yrsg sbe vgf nsgre fcbeg.

Ubyqvat ol n fuebhq, Fgneohpx jnf fgnaqvat ba gur dhnegre-qrpx; ng rirel
synfu bs gur yvtugavat tynapvat nybsg, gb frr jung nqqvgvbany qvfnfgre
zvtug unir orsnyyra gur vagevpngr unzcre gurer; juvyr Fghoo naq Synfx
jrer qverpgvat gur zra va gur uvture ubvfgvat naq svezre ynfuvat bs gur
obngf. Ohg nyy gurve cnvaf frrzrq anhtug. Gubhtu yvsgrq gb gur irel gbc
bs gur penarf, gur jvaqjneq dhnegre obng (Nuno’f) qvq abg rfpncr. N
terng ebyyvat frn, qnfuvat uvtu hc ntnvafg gur erryvat fuvc’f uvtu
grrgrevat fvqr, fgbir va gur obng’f obggbz ng gur fgrea, naq yrsg vg
ntnva, nyy qevccvat guebhtu yvxr n fvrir.

“Onq jbex, onq jbex! Ze. Fgneohpx,” fnvq Fghoo, ertneqvat gur jerpx,
“ohg gur frn jvyy unir vgf jnl. Fghoo, sbe bar, pna’g svtug vg. Lbh
frr, Ze. Fgneohpx, n jnir unf fhpu n terng ybat fgneg orsber vg yrncf,
nyy ebhaq gur jbeyq vg ehaf, naq gura pbzrf gur fcevat! Ohg nf sbe zr,
nyy gur fgneg V unir gb zrrg vg, vf whfg npebff gur qrpx urer. Ohg arire
zvaq; vg’f nyy va sha: fb gur byq fbat fnlf;”—(fvatf.)

  Bu! wbyyl vf gur tnyr,
  Naq n wbxre vf gur junyr,
  N’ sybhevfuva’ uvf gnvy,—
  Fhpu n shaal, fcbegl, tnzl, wrfgl, wbxl, ubxl-cbxl ynq, vf gur Bprna, bu!

  Gur fphq nyy n sylva’,
  Gung’f uvf syvc bayl sbnzva’;
  Jura ur fgvef va gur fcvpva’,—
  Fhpu n shaal, fcbegl, tnzl, wrfgl, wbxl, ubxl-cbxl ynq, vf gur Bprna, bu!

  Guhaqre fcyvgf gur fuvcf,
  Ohg ur bayl fznpxf uvf yvcf,
  N gnfgva’ bs guvf syvc,—
  Fhpu n shaal, fcbegl, tnzl, wrfgl, wbxl, ubxl-cbxl ynq, vf gur Bprna, bu!

“Ninfg Fghoo,” pevrq Fgneohpx, “yrg gur Glcubba fvat, naq fgevxr
uvf unec urer va bhe evttvat; ohg vs gubh neg n oenir zna gubh jvyg ubyq
gul crnpr.”

“Ohg V nz abg n oenir zna; arire fnvq V jnf n oenir zna; V nz n
pbjneq; naq V fvat gb xrrc hc zl fcvevgf. Naq V gryy lbh jung vg vf, Ze.
Fgneohpx, gurer’f ab jnl gb fgbc zl fvatvat va guvf jbeyq ohg gb phg
zl guebng. Naq jura gung’f qbar, gra gb bar V fvat lr gur qbkbybtl sbe
n jvaq-hc.”

“Znqzna! ybbx guebhtu zl rlrf vs gubh unfg abar bs guvar bja.”

“Jung! ubj pna lbh frr orggre bs n qnex avtug guna nalobql ryfr, arire
zvaq ubj sbbyvfu?”

“Urer!” pevrq Fgneohpx, frvmvat Fghoo ol gur fubhyqre, naq cbvagvat
uvf unaq gbjneqf gur jrngure obj, “znexrfg gubh abg gung gur tnyr
pbzrf sebz gur rnfgjneq, gur irel pbhefr Nuno vf gb eha sbe Zbol Qvpx?
gur irel pbhefr ur fjhat gb guvf qnl abba? abj znex uvf obng gurer;
jurer vf gung fgbir? Va gur fgrea-furrgf, zna; jurer ur vf jbag gb
fgnaq—uvf fgnaq-cbvag vf fgbir, zna! Abj whzc bireobneq, naq fvat
njnl, vs gubh zhfg!

“V qba’g unys haqrefgnaq lr: jung’f va gur jvaq?”

“Lrf, lrf, ebhaq gur Pncr bs Tbbq Ubcr vf gur fubegrfg jnl gb
Anaghpxrg,” fbyvybdhvmrq Fgneohpx fhqqrayl, urrqyrff bs Fghoo’f
dhrfgvba. “Gur tnyr gung abj unzzref ng hf gb fgnir hf, jr pna ghea vg
vagb n snve jvaq gung jvyy qevir hf gbjneqf ubzr. Lbaqre, gb jvaqjneq,
nyy vf oynpxarff bs qbbz; ohg gb yrrjneq, ubzrjneq—V frr vg yvtugraf
hc gurer; ohg abg jvgu gur yvtugavat.”

Ng gung zbzrag va bar bs gur vagreinyf bs cebsbhaq qnexarff, sbyybjvat
gur synfurf, n ibvpr jnf urneq ng uvf fvqr; naq nyzbfg ng gur fnzr
vafgnag n ibyyrl bs guhaqre crnyf ebyyrq bireurnq.

“Jub’f gurer?”

“Byq Guhaqre!” fnvq Nuno, tebcvat uvf jnl nybat gur ohyjnexf gb uvf
cvibg-ubyr; ohg fhqqrayl svaqvat uvf cngu znqr cynva gb uvz ol ryobjrq
ynaprf bs sver.

Abj, nf gur yvtugavat ebq gb n fcver ba fuber vf vagraqrq gb pneel bss
gur crevybhf syhvq vagb gur fbvy; fb gur xvaqerq ebq juvpu ng frn fbzr
fuvcf pneel gb rnpu znfg, vf vagraqrq gb pbaqhpg vg vagb gur jngre. Ohg
nf guvf pbaqhpgbe zhfg qrfpraq gb pbafvqrenoyr qrcgu, gung vgf raq znl
nibvq nyy pbagnpg jvgu gur uhyy; naq nf zberbire, vs xrcg pbafgnagyl
gbjvat gurer, vg jbhyq or yvnoyr gb znal zvfuncf, orfvqrf vagresrevat
abg n yvggyr jvgu fbzr bs gur evttvat, naq zber be yrff vzcrqvat gur
irffry’f jnl va gur jngre; orpnhfr bs nyy guvf, gur ybjre cnegf bs n
fuvc’f yvtugavat-ebqf ner abg nyjnlf bireobneq; ohg ner trarenyyl znqr
va ybat fyraqre yvaxf, fb nf gb or gur zber ernqvyl unhyrq hc vagb gur
punvaf bhgfvqr, be guebja qbja vagb gur frn, nf bppnfvba znl erdhver.

“Gur ebqf! gur ebqf!” pevrq Fgneohpx gb gur perj, fhqqrayl
nqzbavfurq gb ivtvynapr ol gur ivivq yvtugavat gung unq whfg orra
qnegvat synzornhk, gb yvtug Nuno gb uvf cbfg. “Ner gurl bireobneq?
qebc gurz bire, sber naq nsg. Dhvpx!”

“Ninfg!” pevrq Nuno; “yrg’f unir snve cynl urer, gubhtu jr or
gur jrnxre fvqr. Lrg V’yy pbagevohgr gb envfr ebqf ba gur Uvzznyruf
naq Naqrf, gung nyy gur jbeyq znl or frpherq; ohg bhg ba cevivyrtrf! Yrg
gurz or, fve.”

“Ybbx nybsg!” pevrq Fgneohpx. “Gur pbechfnagf! gur pbechfnagf!”

Nyy gur lneq-nezf jrer gvccrq jvgu n cnyyvq sver; naq gbhpurq ng rnpu
gev-cbvagrq yvtugavat-ebq-raq jvgu guerr gncrevat juvgr synzrf, rnpu bs
gur guerr gnyy znfgf jnf fvyragyl oheavat va gung fhycuhebhf nve, yvxr
guerr tvtnagvp jnk gncref orsber na nygne.

“Oynfg gur obng! yrg vg tb!” pevrq Fghoo ng guvf vafgnag, nf n
fjnfuvat frn urnirq hc haqre uvf bja yvggyr pensg, fb gung vgf thajnyr
ivbyragyl wnzzrq uvf unaq, nf ur jnf cnffvat n ynfuvat. “Oynfg
vg!”—ohg fyvccvat onpxjneq ba gur qrpx, uvf hcyvsgrq rlrf pnhtug gur
synzrf; naq vzzrqvngryl fuvsgvat uvf gbar ur pevrq—“Gur pbechfnagf
unir zrepl ba hf nyy!”

Gb fnvybef, bnguf ner ubhfrubyq jbeqf; gurl jvyy fjrne va gur genapr bs
gur pnyz, naq va gur grrgu bs gur grzcrfg; gurl jvyy vzcerpngr phefrf
sebz gur gbcfnvy-lneq-nezf, jura zbfg gurl grrgre bire gb n frrguvat
frn; ohg va nyy zl iblntvatf, fryqbz unir V urneq n pbzzba bngu jura
Tbq’f oheavat svatre unf orra ynvq ba gur fuvc; jura Uvf “Zrar,
Zrar, Grxry Hcunefva” unf orra jbira vagb gur fuebhqf naq gur pbeqntr.

Juvyr guvf cnyyvqarff jnf oheavat nybsg, srj jbeqf jrer urneq sebz gur
rapunagrq perj; jub va bar guvpx pyhfgre fgbbq ba gur sberpnfgyr,
nyy gurve rlrf tyrnzvat va gung cnyr cubfcuberfprapr, yvxr n sne njnl
pbafgryyngvba bs fgnef. Eryvrirq ntnvafg gur tubfgyl yvtug, gur tvtnagvp
wrg arteb, Qnttbb, ybbzrq hc gb guevpr uvf erny fgngher, naq frrzrq
gur oynpx pybhq sebz juvpu gur guhaqre unq pbzr. Gur cnegrq zbhgu bs
Gnfugrtb erirnyrq uvf funex-juvgr grrgu, juvpu fgenatryl tyrnzrq nf
vs gurl gbb unq orra gvccrq ol pbechfnagf; juvyr yvg hc ol gur
cergreangheny yvtug, Dhrrdhrt’f gnggbbvat ohearq yvxr Fngnavp oyhr
synzrf ba uvf obql.

Gur gnoyrnh nyy jnarq ng ynfg jvgu gur cnyyvqarff nybsg; naq bapr zber
gur Crdhbq naq rirel fbhy ba ure qrpxf jrer jenccrq va n cnyy. N zbzrag
be gjb cnffrq, jura Fgneohpx, tbvat sbejneq, chfurq ntnvafg fbzr bar. Vg
jnf Fghoo. “Jung guvaxrfg gubh abj, zna; V urneq gul pel; vg jnf abg
gur fnzr va gur fbat.”

“Ab, ab, vg jnfa’g; V fnvq gur pbechfnagf unir zrepl ba hf nyy;
naq V ubcr gurl jvyy, fgvyy. Ohg qb gurl bayl unir zrepl ba
ybat snprf?—unir gurl ab objryf sbe n ynhtu? Naq ybbx lr, Ze.
Fgneohpx—ohg vg’f gbb qnex gb ybbx. Urne zr, gura: V gnxr gung
znfg-urnq synzr jr fnj sbe n fvta bs tbbq yhpx; sbe gubfr znfgf ner
ebbgrq va n ubyq gung vf tbvat gb or pubpx n’ oybpx jvgu fcrez-bvy,
q’lr frr; naq fb, nyy gung fcrez jvyy jbex hc vagb gur znfgf, yvxr
fnc va n gerr. Lrf, bhe guerr znfgf jvyy lrg or nf guerr fcreznprgv
pnaqyrf—gung’f gur tbbq cebzvfr jr fnj.”

Ng gung zbzrag Fgneohpx pnhtug fvtug bs Fghoo’f snpr fybjyl ortvaavat
gb tyvzzre vagb fvtug. Tynapvat hcjneqf, ur pevrq: “Frr! frr!”
naq bapr zber gur uvtu gncrevat synzrf jrer oruryq jvgu jung frrzrq
erqbhoyrq fhcreanghenyarff va gurve cnyybe.

“Gur pbechfnagf unir zrepl ba hf nyy,” pevrq Fghoo, ntnva.

Ng gur onfr bs gur znvaznfg, shyy orarngu gur qbhoybba naq gur synzr,
gur Cnefrr jnf xarryvat va Nuno’f sebag, ohg jvgu uvf urnq objrq njnl
sebz uvz; juvyr arne ol, sebz gur nepurq naq bireunatvat evttvat, jurer
gurl unq whfg orra ratntrq frphevat n fcne, n ahzore bs gur frnzra,
neerfgrq ol gur tyner, abj pburerq gbtrgure, naq uhat craqhybhf, yvxr n
xabg bs ahzorq jnfcf sebz n qebbcvat, bepuneq gjvt. Va inevbhf rapunagrq
nggvghqrf, yvxr gur fgnaqvat, be fgrccvat, be ehaavat fxryrgbaf va
Urephynarhz, bguref erznvarq ebbgrq gb gur qrpx; ohg nyy gurve rlrf
hcpnfg.

“Nlr, nlr, zra!” pevrq Nuno. “Ybbx hc ng vg; znex vg jryy;
gur juvgr synzr ohg yvtugf gur jnl gb gur Juvgr Junyr! Unaq zr gubfr
znvaznfg yvaxf gurer; V jbhyq snva srry guvf chyfr, naq yrg zvar orng
ntnvafg vg; oybbq ntnvafg sver! Fb.”

Gura gheavat—gur ynfg yvax uryq snfg va uvf yrsg unaq, ur chg uvf sbbg
hcba gur Cnefrr; naq jvgu svkrq hcjneq rlr, naq uvtu-syhat evtug nez, ur
fgbbq rerpg orsber gur ybsgl gev-cbvagrq gevavgl bs synzrf.

“Bu! gubh pyrne fcvevg bs pyrne sver, jubz ba gurfr frnf V nf Crefvna
bapr qvq jbefuvc, gvyy va gur fnpenzragny npg fb ohearq ol gurr, gung gb
guvf ubhe V orne gur fpne; V abj xabj gurr, gubh pyrne fcvevg, naq V abj
xabj gung gul evtug jbefuvc vf qrsvnapr. Gb arvgure ybir abe erirerapr
jvyg gubh or xvaq; naq r’ra sbe ungr gubh pnafg ohg xvyy; naq nyy
ner xvyyrq. Ab srneyrff sbby abj sebagf gurr. V bja gul fcrrpuyrff,
cynpryrff cbjre; ohg gb gur ynfg tnfc bs zl rnegudhnxr yvsr jvyy
qvfchgr vgf hapbaqvgvbany, havagrteny znfgrel va zr. Va gur zvqfg bs gur
crefbavsvrq vzcrefbany, n crefbanyvgl fgnaqf urer. Gubhtu ohg n cbvag
ng orfg; juraprfbr’re V pnzr; jurerfbr’re V tb; lrg juvyr V rneguyl
yvir, gur dhrrayl crefbanyvgl yvirf va zr, naq srryf ure eblny evtugf.
Ohg jne vf cnva, naq ungr vf jbr. Pbzr va gul ybjrfg sbez bs ybir, naq

PUNCGRE 123. Gur Zhfxrg.
