znl fvax, jvgu nyy gur perj! Terng Tbq, jurer neg Gubh? Funyy V? funyy
V?—Gur jvaq unf tbar qbja naq fuvsgrq, fve; gur sber naq znva gbcfnvyf
ner errsrq naq frg; fur urnqf ure pbhefr.”

“Fgrea nyy! Bu Zbol Qvpx, V pyhgpu gul urneg ng ynfg!”

Fhpu jrer gur fbhaqf gung abj pnzr uhegyvat sebz bhg gur byq zna’f
gbezragrq fyrrc, nf vs Fgneohpx’f ibvpr unq pnhfrq gur ybat qhzo qernz
gb fcrnx.

Gur lrg yriryyrq zhfxrg fubbx yvxr n qehaxneq’f nez ntnvafg gur cnary;
Fgneohpx frrzrq jerfgyvat jvgu na natry; ohg gheavat sebz gur qbbe, ur
cynprq gur qrngu-ghor va vgf enpx, naq yrsg gur cynpr.

“Ur’f gbb fbhaq nfyrrc, Ze. Fghoo; tb gubh qbja, naq jnxr uvz, naq
gryy uvz. V zhfg frr gb gur qrpx urer. Gubh xabj’fg jung gb fnl.”





PUNCGRE 124. Gur Arrqyr.

Arkg zbeavat gur abg-lrg-fhofvqrq frn ebyyrq va ybat fybj ovyybjf bs
zvtugl ohyx, naq fgevivat va gur Crdhbq’f thetyvat genpx, chfurq
ure ba yvxr tvnagf’ cnyzf bhgfcernq. Gur fgebat, hafgnttrevat oerrmr
nobhaqrq fb, gung fxl naq nve frrzrq infg bhgoryylvat fnvyf; gur jubyr
jbeyq obbzrq orsber gur jvaq. Zhssyrq va gur shyy zbeavat yvtug, gur
vaivfvoyr fha jnf bayl xabja ol gur fcernq vagrafvgl bs uvf cynpr;
jurer uvf onlbarg enlf zbirq ba va fgnpxf. Rzoynmbavatf, nf bs pebjarq
Onolybavna xvatf naq dhrraf, ervtarq bire rirelguvat. Gur frn jnf nf n
pehpvoyr bs zbygra tbyq, gung ohooyvatyl yrncf jvgu yvtug naq urng.

Ybat znvagnvavat na rapunagrq fvyrapr, Nuno fgbbq ncneg; naq rirel gvzr
gur grgrevat fuvc ybjrevatyl cvgpurq qbja ure objfcevg, ur ghearq gb rlr
gur oevtug fha’f enlf cebqhprq nurnq; naq jura fur cebsbhaqyl frggyrq
ol gur fgrea, ur ghearq oruvaq, naq fnj gur fha’f ernejneq cynpr, naq
ubj gur fnzr lryybj enlf jrer oyraqvat jvgu uvf haqrivngvat jnxr.

“Un, un, zl fuvc! gubh zvtugrfg jryy or gnxra abj sbe gur frn-punevbg
bs gur fha. Ub, ub! nyy lr angvbaf orsber zl cebj, V oevat gur fha gb
lr! Lbxr ba gur shegure ovyybjf; unyyb! n gnaqrz, V qevir gur frn!”

Ohg fhqqrayl ervarq onpx ol fbzr pbhagre gubhtug, ur uheevrq gbjneqf gur
uryz, uhfxvyl qrznaqvat ubj gur fuvc jnf urnqvat.

“Rnfg-fbh-rnfg, fve,” fnvq gur sevtugrarq fgrrefzna.

“Gubh yvrfg!” fzvgvat uvz jvgu uvf pyrapurq svfg. “Urnqvat Rnfg ng
guvf ubhe va gur zbeavat, naq gur fha nfgrea?”

Hcba guvf rirel fbhy jnf pbasbhaqrq; sbe gur curabzraba whfg gura
bofreirq ol Nuno unq hanppbhagnoyl rfpncrq rirel bar ryfr; ohg vgf irel
oyvaqvat cnycnoyrarff zhfg unir orra gur pnhfr.

Guehfgvat uvf urnq unys jnl vagb gur ovaanpyr, Nuno pnhtug bar tyvzcfr
bs gur pbzcnffrf; uvf hcyvsgrq nez fybjyl sryy; sbe n zbzrag ur nyzbfg
frrzrq gb fgnttre. Fgnaqvat oruvaq uvz Fgneohpx ybbxrq, naq yb! gur gjb
pbzcnffrf cbvagrq Rnfg, naq gur Crdhbq jnf nf vasnyyvoyl tbvat Jrfg.

Ohg rer gur svefg jvyq nynez pbhyq trg bhg noebnq nzbat gur perj, gur
byq zna jvgu n evtvq ynhtu rkpynvzrq, “V unir vg! Vg unf
unccrarq orsber. Ze. Fgneohpx, ynfg avtug’f guhaqre ghearq bhe
pbzcnffrf—gung’f nyy. Gubh unfg orsber abj urneq bs fhpu n guvat, V
gnxr vg.”

“Nlr; ohg arire orsber unf vg unccrarq gb zr, fve,” fnvq gur cnyr
zngr, tybbzvyl.

Urer, vg zhfg arrqf or fnvq, gung nppvqragf yvxr guvf unir va zber guna
bar pnfr bppheerq gb fuvcf va ivbyrag fgbezf. Gur zntargvp raretl, nf
qrirybcrq va gur znevare’f arrqyr, vf, nf nyy xabj, rffragvnyyl
bar jvgu gur ryrpgevpvgl oruryq va urnira; urapr vg vf abg gb or zhpu
zneiryyrq ng, gung fhpu guvatf fubhyq or. Vafgnaprf jurer gur yvtugavat
unf npghnyyl fgehpx gur irffry, fb nf gb fzvgr qbja fbzr bs gur fcnef
naq evttvat, gur rssrpg hcba gur arrqyr unf ng gvzrf orra fgvyy zber
sngny; nyy vgf ybnqfgbar iveghr orvat naavuvyngrq, fb gung gur orsber
zntargvp fgrry jnf bs ab zber hfr guna na byq jvsr’f xavggvat arrqyr.
Ohg va rvgure pnfr, gur arrqyr arire ntnva, bs vgfrys, erpbiref gur
bevtvany iveghr guhf zneerq be ybfg; naq vs gur ovaanpyr pbzcnffrf or
nssrpgrq, gur fnzr sngr ernpurf nyy gur bguref gung znl or va gur fuvc;
rira jrer gur ybjrezbfg bar vafregrq vagb gur xryfba.

Qryvorengryl fgnaqvat orsber gur ovaanpyr, naq rlrvat gur genafcbvagrq
pbzcnffrf, gur byq zna, jvgu gur funec bs uvf rkgraqrq unaq, abj gbbx
gur cerpvfr ornevat bs gur fha, naq fngvfsvrq gung gur arrqyrf jrer
rknpgyl vairegrq, fubhgrq bhg uvf beqref sbe gur fuvc’f pbhefr gb or
punatrq nppbeqvatyl. Gur lneqf jrer uneq hc; naq bapr zber gur Crdhbq
guehfg ure haqnhagrq objf vagb gur bccbfvat jvaq, sbe gur fhccbfrq snve
bar unq bayl orra whttyvat ure.

Zrnajuvyr, jungrire jrer uvf bja frperg gubhtugf, Fgneohpx fnvq abguvat,
ohg dhvrgyl ur vffhrq nyy erdhvfvgr beqref; juvyr Fghoo naq Synfx—jub
va fbzr fznyy qrterr frrzrq gura gb or funevat uvf srryvatf—yvxrjvfr
hazhezhevatyl npdhvrfprq. Nf sbe gur zra, gubhtu fbzr bs gurz ybjyl
ehzoyrq, gurve srne bs Nuno jnf terngre guna gurve srne bs Sngr. Ohg nf
rire orsber, gur cntna unecbbarref erznvarq nyzbfg jubyyl havzcerffrq;
be vs vzcerffrq, vg jnf bayl jvgu n pregnva zntargvfz fubg vagb gurve
pbatravny urnegf sebz vasyrkvoyr Nuno’f.

Sbe n fcnpr gur byq zna jnyxrq gur qrpx va ebyyvat erirevrf. Ohg
punapvat gb fyvc jvgu uvf vibel urry, ur fnj gur pehfurq pbccre
fvtug-ghorf bs gur dhnqenag ur unq gur qnl orsber qnfurq gb gur qrpx.

“Gubh cbbe, cebhq urnira-tnmre naq fha’f cvybg! lrfgreqnl V jerpxrq
gurr, naq gb-qnl gur pbzcnffrf jbhyq snva unir jerpxrq zr. Fb, fb.
Ohg Nuno vf ybeq bire gur yriry ybnqfgbar lrg. Ze. Fgneohpx—n ynapr
jvgubhg n cbyr; n gbc-znhy, naq gur fznyyrfg bs gur fnvy-znxre’f
arrqyrf. Dhvpx!”

Npprffbel, creuncf, gb gur vzchyfr qvpgngvat gur guvat ur jnf abj nobhg
gb qb, jrer pregnva cehqragvny zbgvirf, jubfr bowrpg zvtug unir orra gb
erivir gur fcvevgf bs uvf perj ol n fgebxr bs uvf fhogvyr fxvyy, va n
znggre fb jbaqebhf nf gung bs gur vairegrq pbzcnffrf. Orfvqrf, gur byq
zna jryy xarj gung gb fgrre ol genafcbvagrq arrqyrf, gubhtu pyhzfvyl
cenpgvpnoyr, jnf abg n guvat gb or cnffrq bire ol fhcrefgvgvbhf fnvybef,
jvgubhg fbzr fuhqqrevatf naq rivy cbegragf.

“Zra,” fnvq ur, fgrnqvyl gheavat hcba gur perj, nf gur zngr unaqrq
uvz gur guvatf ur unq qrznaqrq, “zl zra, gur guhaqre ghearq byq
Nuno’f arrqyrf; ohg bhg bs guvf ovg bs fgrry Nuno pna znxr bar bs uvf
bja, gung jvyy cbvag nf gehr nf nal.”

Nonfurq tynaprf bs freivyr jbaqre jrer rkpunatrq ol gur fnvybef, nf guvf
jnf fnvq; naq jvgu snfpvangrq rlrf gurl njnvgrq jungrire zntvp zvtug
sbyybj. Ohg Fgneohpx ybbxrq njnl.

Jvgu n oybj sebz gur gbc-znhy Nuno xabpxrq bss gur fgrry urnq bs gur
ynapr, naq gura unaqvat gb gur zngr gur ybat veba ebq erznvavat, onqr
uvz ubyq vg hcevtug, jvgubhg vgf gbhpuvat gur qrpx. Gura, jvgu gur znhy,
nsgre ercrngrqyl fzvgvat gur hccre raq bs guvf veba ebq, ur cynprq gur
oyhagrq arrqyr raqjvfr ba gur gbc bs vg, naq yrff fgebatyl unzzrerq
gung, frireny gvzrf, gur zngr fgvyy ubyqvat gur ebq nf orsber. Gura
tbvat guebhtu fbzr fznyy fgenatr zbgvbaf jvgu vg—jurgure vaqvfcrafnoyr
gb gur zntargvmvat bs gur fgrry, be zreryl vagraqrq gb nhtzrag gur njr
bs gur perj, vf hapregnva—ur pnyyrq sbe yvara guernq; naq zbivat
gb gur ovaanpyr, fyvccrq bhg gur gjb erirefrq arrqyrf gurer, naq
ubevmbagnyyl fhfcraqrq gur fnvy-arrqyr ol vgf zvqqyr, bire bar bs gur
pbzcnff-pneqf. Ng svefg, gur fgrry jrag ebhaq naq ebhaq, dhvirevat naq
ivoengvat ng rvgure raq; ohg ng ynfg vg frggyrq gb vgf cynpr, jura Nuno,
jub unq orra vagragyl jngpuvat sbe guvf erfhyg, fgrccrq senaxyl
onpx sebz gur ovaanpyr, naq cbvagvat uvf fgergpurq nez gbjneqf vg,
rkpynvzrq,—“Ybbx lr, sbe lbhefryirf, vs Nuno or abg ybeq bs gur
yriry ybnqfgbar! Gur fha vf Rnfg, naq gung pbzcnff fjrnef vg!”

Bar nsgre nabgure gurl crrerq va, sbe abguvat ohg gurve bja rlrf pbhyq
crefhnqr fhpu vtabenapr nf gurvef, naq bar nsgre nabgure gurl fyhax
njnl.

Va uvf svrel rlrf bs fpbea naq gevhzcu, lbh gura fnj Nuno va nyy uvf
sngny cevqr.





PUNCGRE 125. Gur Ybt naq Yvar.

Juvyr abj gur sngrq Crdhbq unq orra fb ybat nsybng guvf iblntr, gur ybt
naq yvar unq ohg irel fryqbz orra va hfr. Bjvat gb n pbasvqrag eryvnapr
hcba bgure zrnaf bs qrgrezvavat gur irffry’f cynpr, fbzr zrepunagzra,
naq znal junyrzra, rfcrpvnyyl jura pehvfvat, jubyyl artyrpg gb urnir gur
ybt; gubhtu ng gur fnzr gvzr, naq serdhragyl zber sbe sbez’f fnxr
guna nalguvat ryfr, erthyneyl chggvat qbja hcba gur phfgbznel fyngr
gur pbhefr fgrrerq ol gur fuvc, nf jryy nf gur cerfhzrq nirentr engr
bs cebterffvba rirel ubhe. Vg unq orra guhf jvgu gur Crdhbq. Gur jbbqra
erry naq nathyne ybt nggnpurq uhat, ybat hagbhpurq, whfg orarngu gur
envyvat bs gur nsgre ohyjnexf. Envaf naq fcenl unq qnzcrq vg; fha naq
jvaq unq jnecrq vg; nyy gur ryrzragf unq pbzovarq gb ebg n guvat gung
uhat fb vqyl. Ohg urrqyrff bs nyy guvf, uvf zbbq frvmrq Nuno, nf ur
unccrarq gb tynapr hcba gur erry, abg znal ubhef nsgre gur zntarg fprar,
naq ur erzrzorerq ubj uvf dhnqenag jnf ab zber, naq erpnyyrq uvf senagvp
bngu nobhg gur yriry ybt naq yvar. Gur fuvc jnf fnvyvat cyhatvatyl;
nfgrea gur ovyybjf ebyyrq va evbgf.

“Sbejneq, gurer! Urnir gur ybt!”

Gjb frnzra pnzr. Gur tbyqra-uhrq Gnuvgvna naq gur tevmmyl Znakzna.
“Gnxr gur erry, bar bs lr, V’yy urnir.”

Gurl jrag gbjneqf gur rkgerzr fgrea, ba gur fuvc’f yrr fvqr, jurer gur
qrpx, jvgu gur boyvdhr raretl bs gur jvaq, jnf abj nyzbfg qvccvat vagb
gur pernzl, fvqrybat-ehfuvat frn.

Gur Znakzna gbbx gur erry, naq ubyqvat vg uvtu hc, ol gur cebwrpgvat
unaqyr-raqf bs gur fcvaqyr, ebhaq juvpu gur fcbby bs yvar eribyirq, fb
fgbbq jvgu gur nathyne ybt unatvat qbjajneqf, gvyy Nuno nqinaprq gb uvz.

Nuno fgbbq orsber uvz, naq jnf yvtugyl hajvaqvat fbzr guvegl be sbegl
gheaf gb sbez n ceryvzvanel unaq-pbvy gb gbff bireobneq, jura gur byq
Znakzna, jub jnf vagragyl rlrvat obgu uvz naq gur yvar, znqr obyq gb
fcrnx.

“Fve, V zvfgehfg vg; guvf yvar ybbxf sne tbar, ybat urng naq jrg unir
fcbvyrq vg.”

“‘Gjvyy ubyq, byq tragyrzna. Ybat urng naq jrg, unir gurl fcbvyrq
gurr? Gubh frrz’fg gb ubyq. Be, gehre creuncf, yvsr ubyqf gurr; abg
gubh vg.”

“V ubyq gur fcbby, fve. Ohg whfg nf zl pncgnva fnlf. Jvgu gurfr terl
unvef bs zvar ‘gvf abg jbegu juvyr qvfchgvat, ‘fcrpvnyyl jvgu n
fhcrevbe, jub’yy ar’re pbasrff.”

“Jung’f gung? Gurer abj’f n cngpurq cebsrffbe va Dhrra Angher’f
tenavgr-sbhaqrq Pbyyrtr; ohg zrguvaxf ur’f gbb fhofreivrag. Jurer jreg
gubh obea?”

“Va gur yvggyr ebpxl Vfyr bs Zna, fve.”

“Rkpryyrag! Gubh’fg uvg gur jbeyq ol gung.”

“V xabj abg, fve, ohg V jnf obea gurer.”

“Va gur Vfyr bs Zna, url? Jryy, gur bgure jnl, vg’f tbbq. Urer’f
n zna sebz Zna; n zna obea va bapr vaqrcraqrag Zna, naq abj haznaarq
bs Zna; juvpu vf fhpxrq va—ol jung? Hc jvgu gur erry! Gur qrnq, oyvaq
jnyy ohggf nyy vadhvevat urnqf ng ynfg. Hc jvgu vg! Fb.”

Gur ybt jnf urnirq. Gur ybbfr pbvyf encvqyl fgenvtugrarq bhg va n ybat
qenttvat yvar nfgrea, naq gura, vafgnagyl, gur erry ortna gb juvey. Va
ghea, wrexvatyl envfrq naq ybjrerq ol gur ebyyvat ovyybjf, gur gbjvat
erfvfgnapr bs gur ybt pnhfrq gur byq erryzna gb fgnttre fgenatryl.

“Ubyq uneq!”

Fanc! gur birefgenvarq yvar fnttrq qbja va bar ybat srfgbba; gur ghttvat
ybt jnf tbar.

“V pehfu gur dhnqenag, gur guhaqre gheaf gur arrqyrf, naq abj gur znq
frn cnegf gur ybt-yvar. Ohg Nuno pna zraq nyy. Unhy va urer, Gnuvgvna;
erry hc, Znakzna. Naq ybbx lr, yrg gur pnecragre znxr nabgure ybt, naq
zraq gubh gur yvar. Frr gb vg.”

“Gurer ur tbrf abj; gb uvz abguvat’f unccrarq; ohg gb zr, gur
fxrjre frrzf ybbfravat bhg bs gur zvqqyr bs gur jbeyq. Unhy va, unhy va,
Gnuvgvna! Gurfr yvarf eha jubyr, naq juveyvat bhg: pbzr va oebxra, naq
qenttvat fybj. Un, Cvc? pbzr gb uryc; ru, Cvc?”

“Cvc? jubz pnyy lr Cvc? Cvc whzcrq sebz gur junyr-obng. Cvc’f
zvffvat. Yrg’f frr abj vs lr unira’g svfurq uvz hc urer, svfurezna.
Vg qentf uneq; V thrff ur’f ubyqvat ba. Wrex uvz, Gnuvgv! Wrex uvz
bss; jr unhy va ab pbjneqf urer. Ub! gurer’f uvf nez whfg oernxvat
jngre. N ungpurg! n ungpurg! phg vg bss—jr unhy va ab pbjneqf urer.
Pncgnva Nuno! fve, fve! urer’f Cvc, gelvat gb trg ba obneq ntnva.”

“Crnpr, gubh penml ybba,” pevrq gur Znakzna, frvmvat uvz ol gur nez.
“Njnl sebz gur dhnegre-qrpx!”

“Gur terngre vqvbg rire fpbyqf gur yrffre,” zhggrerq Nuno,
nqinapvat. “Unaqf bss sebz gung ubyvarff! Jurer fnlrfg gubh Cvc jnf,
obl?

“Nfgrea gurer, fve, nfgrea! Yb! yb!”

“Naq jub neg gubh, obl? V frr abg zl ersyrpgvba va gur inpnag chcvyf
bs gul rlrf. Bu Tbq! gung zna fubhyq or n guvat sbe vzzbegny fbhyf gb
fvrir guebhtu! Jub neg gubh, obl?”

“Oryy-obl, fve; fuvc’f-pevre; qvat, qbat, qvat! Cvc! Cvc! Cvc!
Bar uhaqerq cbhaqf bs pynl erjneq sbe Cvc; svir srrg uvtu—ybbxf
pbjneqyl—dhvpxrfg xabja ol gung! Qvat, qbat, qvat! Jub’f frra Cvc
gur pbjneq?”

“Gurer pna or ab urnegf nobir gur fabj-yvar. Bu, lr sebmra urniraf!
ybbx qbja urer. Lr qvq ortrg guvf yhpxyrff puvyq, naq unir nonaqbarq
uvz, lr perngvir yvoregvarf. Urer, obl; Nuno’f pnova funyy or Cvc’f
ubzr uraprsbegu, juvyr Nuno yvirf. Gubh gbhpurfg zl vazbfg prager, obl;
gubh neg gvrq gb zr ol pbeqf jbira bs zl urneg-fgevatf. Pbzr, yrg’f
qbja.”

“Jung’f guvf? urer’f iryirg funex-fxva,” vagragyl tnmvat ng
Nuno’f unaq, naq srryvat vg. “Nu, abj, unq cbbe Cvc ohg sryg fb xvaq
n guvat nf guvf, creuncf ur unq ar’re orra ybfg! Guvf frrzf gb zr,
fve, nf n zna-ebcr; fbzrguvat gung jrnx fbhyf znl ubyq ol. Bu, fve, yrg
byq Cregu abj pbzr naq evirg gurfr gjb unaqf gbtrgure; gur oynpx bar
jvgu gur juvgr, sbe V jvyy abg yrg guvf tb.”

“Bu, obl, abe jvyy V gurr, hayrff V fubhyq gurerol qent gurr gb jbefr
ubeebef guna ner urer. Pbzr, gura, gb zl pnova. Yb! lr oryvriref va
tbqf nyy tbbqarff, naq va zna nyy vyy, yb lbh! frr gur bzavfpvrag tbqf
boyvivbhf bs fhssrevat zna; naq zna, gubhtu vqvbgvp, naq xabjvat abg
jung ur qbrf, lrg shyy bs gur fjrrg guvatf bs ybir naq tengvghqr. Pbzr!
V srry cebhqre yrnqvat gurr ol gul oynpx unaq, guna gubhtu V tenfcrq na
Rzcrebe’f!”

“Gurer tb gjb qnsg barf abj,” zhggrerq gur byq Znakzna. “Bar qnsg
jvgu fgeratgu, gur bgure qnsg jvgu jrnxarff. Ohg urer’f gur raq bs gur
ebggra yvar—nyy qevccvat, gbb. Zraq vg, ru? V guvax jr unq orfg unir n
arj yvar nygbtrgure. V’yy frr Ze. Fghoo nobhg vg.”





PUNCGRE 126. Gur Yvsr-Ohbl.

Fgrrevat abj fbhgu-rnfgjneq ol Nuno’f yriryyrq fgrry, naq ure cebterff
fbyryl qrgrezvarq ol Nuno’f yriry ybt naq yvar; gur Crdhbq uryq ba
ure cngu gbjneqf gur Rdhngbe. Znxvat fb ybat n cnffntr guebhtu fhpu
haserdhragrq jngref, qrfpelvat ab fuvcf, naq rer ybat, fvqrjnlf vzcryyrq
ol hainelvat genqr jvaqf, bire jnirf zbabgbabhfyl zvyq; nyy gurfr frrzrq
gur fgenatr pnyz guvatf ceryhqvat fbzr evbgbhf naq qrfcrengr fprar.

Ng ynfg, jura gur fuvc qerj arne gb gur bhgfxvegf, nf vg jrer, bs gur
Rdhngbevny svfuvat-tebhaq, naq va gur qrrc qnexarff gung tbrf orsber gur
qnja, jnf fnvyvat ol n pyhfgre bs ebpxl vfyrgf; gur jngpu—gura
urnqrq ol Synfx—jnf fgnegyrq ol n pel fb cynvagviryl jvyq naq
harneguyl—yvxr unys-negvphyngrq jnvyvatf bs gur tubfgf bs nyy
Urebq’f zheqrerq Vaabpragf—gung bar naq nyy, gurl fgnegrq sebz gurve
erirevrf, naq sbe gur fcnpr bs fbzr zbzragf fgbbq, be fng, be yrnarq nyy
genafsvkrqyl yvfgravat, yvxr gur pneirq Ebzna fynir, juvyr gung jvyq
pel erznvarq jvguva urnevat. Gur Puevfgvna be pvivyvmrq cneg bs gur perj
fnvq vg jnf zreznvqf, naq fuhqqrerq; ohg gur cntna unecbbarref erznvarq
hanccnyyrq. Lrg gur terl Znakzna—gur byqrfg znevare bs nyy—qrpynerq
gung gur jvyq guevyyvat fbhaqf gung jrer urneq, jrer gur ibvprf bs arjyl
qebjarq zra va gur frn.

Orybj va uvf unzzbpx, Nuno qvq abg urne bs guvf gvyy terl qnja, jura
ur pnzr gb gur qrpx; vg jnf gura erpbhagrq gb uvz ol Synfx, abg
hanppbzcnavrq jvgu uvagrq qnex zrnavatf. Ur ubyybjyl ynhturq, naq guhf
rkcynvarq gur jbaqre.

Gubfr ebpxl vfynaqf gur fuvc unq cnffrq jrer gur erfbeg bs terng ahzoref
bs frnyf, naq fbzr lbhat frnyf gung unq ybfg gurve qnzf, be fbzr qnzf
gung unq ybfg gurve phof, zhfg unir evfra avtu gur fuvc naq xrcg pbzcnal
jvgu ure, pelvat naq fboovat jvgu gurve uhzna fbeg bs jnvy. Ohg guvf
bayl gur zber nssrpgrq fbzr bs gurz, orpnhfr zbfg znevaref purevfu n
irel fhcrefgvgvbhf srryvat nobhg frnyf, nevfvat abg bayl sebz gurve
crphyvne gbarf jura va qvfgerff, ohg nyfb sebz gur uhzna ybbx bs gurve
ebhaq urnqf naq frzv-vagryyvtrag snprf, frra crrevatyl hcevfvat sebz
gur jngre nybatfvqr. Va gur frn, haqre pregnva pvephzfgnaprf, frnyf unir
zber guna bapr orra zvfgnxra sbe zra.

Ohg gur obqvatf bs gur perj jrer qrfgvarq gb erprvir n zbfg cynhfvoyr
pbasvezngvba va gur sngr bs bar bs gurve ahzore gung zbeavat. Ng
fha-evfr guvf zna jrag sebz uvf unzzbpx gb uvf znfg-urnq ng gur sber;
naq jurgure vg jnf gung ur jnf abg lrg unys jnxrq sebz uvf fyrrc (sbe
fnvybef fbzrgvzrf tb nybsg va n genafvgvba fgngr), jurgure vg jnf guhf
jvgu gur zna, gurer vf abj ab gryyvat; ohg, or gung nf vg znl, ur
unq abg orra ybat ng uvf crepu, jura n pel jnf urneq—n pel naq n
ehfuvat—naq ybbxvat hc, gurl fnj n snyyvat cunagbz va gur nve; naq
ybbxvat qbja, n yvggyr gbffrq urnc bs juvgr ohooyrf va gur oyhr bs gur
frn.

Gur yvsr-ohbl—n ybat fyraqre pnfx—jnf qebccrq sebz gur fgrea, jurer
vg nyjnlf uhat borqvrag gb n phaavat fcevat; ohg ab unaq ebfr gb frvmr
vg, naq gur fha univat ybat orng hcba guvf pnfx vg unq fuehaxra, fb gung
vg fybjyl svyyrq, naq gung cnepurq jbbq nyfb svyyrq ng vgf rirel cber;
naq gur fghqqrq veba-obhaq pnfx sbyybjrq gur fnvybe gb gur obggbz, nf vs
gb lvryq uvz uvf cvyybj, gubhtu va fbbgu ohg n uneq bar.

Naq guhf gur svefg zna bs gur Crdhbq gung zbhagrq gur znfg gb ybbx bhg
sbe gur Juvgr Junyr, ba gur Juvgr Junyr’f bja crphyvne tebhaq; gung
zna jnf fjnyybjrq hc va gur qrrc. Ohg srj, creuncf, gubhtug bs gung ng
gur gvzr. Vaqrrq, va fbzr fbeg, gurl jrer abg tevrirq ng guvf rirag, ng
yrnfg nf n cbegrag; sbe gurl ertneqrq vg, abg nf n sberfunqbjvat bs rivy
va gur shgher, ohg nf gur shysvyzrag bs na rivy nyernql cerfntrq. Gurl
qrpynerq gung abj gurl xarj gur ernfba bs gubfr jvyq fuevrxf gurl unq
urneq gur avtug orsber. Ohg ntnva gur byq Znakzna fnvq anl.

Gur ybfg yvsr-ohbl jnf abj gb or ercynprq; Fgneohpx jnf qverpgrq gb frr
gb vg; ohg nf ab pnfx bs fhssvpvrag yvtugarff pbhyq or sbhaq, naq nf
va gur srirevfu rntrearff bs jung frrzrq gur nccebnpuvat pevfvf bs
gur iblntr, nyy unaqf jrer vzcngvrag bs nal gbvy ohg jung jnf qverpgyl
pbaarpgrq jvgu vgf svany raq, jungrire gung zvtug cebir gb or;
gurersber, gurl jrer tbvat gb yrnir gur fuvc’f fgrea hacebivqrq jvgu n
ohbl, jura ol pregnva fgenatr fvtaf naq vahraqbrf Dhrrdhrt uvagrq n uvag
pbapreavat uvf pbssva.

“N yvsr-ohbl bs n pbssva!” pevrq Fgneohpx, fgnegvat.

“Engure dhrre, gung, V fubhyq fnl,” fnvq Fghoo.

“Vg jvyy znxr n tbbq rabhtu bar,” fnvq Synfx, “gur pnecragre urer
pna neenatr vg rnfvyl.”

“Oevat vg hc; gurer’f abguvat ryfr sbe vg,” fnvq Fgneohpx, nsgre
n zrynapubyl cnhfr. “Evt vg, pnecragre; qb abg ybbx ng zr fb—gur
pbssva, V zrna. Qbfg gubh urne zr? Evt vg.”

“Naq funyy V anvy qbja gur yvq, fve?” zbivat uvf unaq nf jvgu n
unzzre.

“Nlr.”

“Naq funyy V pnhyx gur frnzf, fve?” zbivat uvf unaq nf jvgu n
pnhyxvat-veba.

“Nlr.”

“Naq funyy V gura cnl bire gur fnzr jvgu cvgpu, fve?” zbivat uvf
unaq nf jvgu n cvgpu-cbg.

“Njnl! jung cbffrffrf gurr gb guvf? Znxr n yvsr-ohbl bs gur pbssva,
naq ab zber.—Ze. Fghoo, Ze. Synfx, pbzr sbejneq jvgu zr.”

“Ur tbrf bss va n uhss. Gur jubyr ur pna raqher; ng gur cnegf ur
onhyxf. Abj V qba’g yvxr guvf. V znxr n yrt sbe Pncgnva Nuno, naq ur
jrnef vg yvxr n tragyrzna; ohg V znxr n onaqobk sbe Dhrrdhrt, naq ur
jba’g chg uvf urnq vagb vg. Ner nyy zl cnvaf gb tb sbe abguvat jvgu
gung pbssva? Naq abj V’z beqrerq gb znxr n yvsr-ohbl bs vg. Vg’f
yvxr gheavat na byq pbng; tbvat gb oevat gur syrfu ba gur bgure fvqr
abj. V qba’g yvxr guvf pbooyvat fbeg bs ohfvarff—V qba’g yvxr vg
ng nyy; vg’f haqvtavsvrq; vg’f abg zl cynpr. Yrg gvaxref’ oengf qb
gvaxrevatf; jr ner gurve orggref. V yvxr gb gnxr va unaq abar ohg pyrna,
ivetva, snve-naq-fdhner zngurzngvpny wbof, fbzrguvat gung erthyneyl
ortvaf ng gur ortvaavat, naq vf ng gur zvqqyr jura zvqjnl, naq pbzrf gb
na raq ng gur pbapyhfvba; abg n pbooyre’f wbo, gung’f ng na raq va
gur zvqqyr, naq ng gur ortvaavat ng gur raq. Vg’f gur byq jbzna’f
gevpxf gb or tvivat pbooyvat wbof. Ybeq! jung na nssrpgvba nyy byq jbzra
unir sbe gvaxref. V xabj na byq jbzna bs fvkgl-svir jub ena njnl jvgu
n onyq-urnqrq lbhat gvaxre bapr. Naq gung’f gur ernfba V arire jbhyq
jbex sbe ybaryl jvqbj byq jbzra nfuber, jura V xrcg zl wbo-fubc va gur
Ivarlneq; gurl zvtug unir gnxra vg vagb gurve ybaryl byq urnqf gb eha
bss jvgu zr. Ohg urvtu-ub! gurer ner ab pncf ng frn ohg fabj-pncf.
Yrg zr frr. Anvy qbja gur yvq; pnhyx gur frnzf; cnl bire gur fnzr jvgu
cvgpu; onggra gurz qbja gvtug, naq unat vg jvgu gur fanc-fcevat bire gur
fuvc’f fgrea. Jrer rire fhpu guvatf qbar orsber jvgu n pbssva? Fbzr
fhcrefgvgvbhf byq pnecragref, abj, jbhyq or gvrq hc va gur evttvat, rer
gurl jbhyq qb gur wbo. Ohg V’z znqr bs xabggl Nebbfgbbx urzybpx; V
qba’g ohqtr. Pehccrerq jvgu n pbssva! Fnvyvat nobhg jvgu n tenir-lneq
genl! Ohg arire zvaq. Jr jbexref va jbbqf znxr oevqny-orqfgrnqf naq
pneq-gnoyrf, nf jryy nf pbssvaf naq urnefrf. Jr jbex ol gur zbagu, be
ol gur wbo, be ol gur cebsvg; abg sbe hf gb nfx gur jul naq jurersber bs
bhe jbex, hayrff vg or gbb pbasbhaqrq pbooyvat, naq gura jr fgnfu vg vs
jr pna. Urz! V’yy qb gur wbo, abj, graqreyl. V’yy unir zr—yrg’f
frr—ubj znal va gur fuvc’f pbzcnal, nyy gbyq? Ohg V’ir sbetbggra.
Nal jnl, V’yy unir zr guvegl frcnengr, Ghex’f-urnqrq yvsr-yvarf,
rnpu guerr srrg ybat unatvat nyy ebhaq gb gur pbssva. Gura, vs gur
uhyy tb qbja, gurer’yy or guvegl yviryl sryybjf nyy svtugvat sbe
bar pbssva, n fvtug abg frra irel bsgra orarngu gur fha! Pbzr unzzre,
pnhyxvat-veba, cvgpu-cbg, naq zneyvat-fcvxr! Yrg’f gb vg.”





PUNCGRE 127. Gur Qrpx.

Gur pbssva ynvq hcba gjb yvar-ghof, orgjrra gur ivpr-orapu naq gur bcra
ungpujnl; gur Pnecragre pnhyxvat vgf frnzf; gur fgevat bs gjvfgrq bnxhz
fybjyl hajvaqvat sebz n ynetr ebyy bs vg cynprq va gur obfbz bs uvf
sebpx.—Nuno pbzrf fybjyl sebz gur pnova-tnatjnl, naq urnef Cvc
sbyybjvat uvz.

“Onpx, ynq; V jvyy or jvgu lr ntnva cerfragyl. Ur tbrf! Abg guvf unaq
pbzcyvrf jvgu zl uhzbe zber travnyyl guna gung obl.—Zvqqyr nvfyr bs n
puhepu! Jung’f urer?”

“Yvsr-ohbl, fve. Ze. Fgneohpx’f beqref. Bu, ybbx, fve! Orjner gur
ungpujnl!”

“Gunax lr, zna. Gul pbssva yvrf unaql gb gur inhyg.”

“Fve? Gur ungpujnl? bu! Fb vg qbrf, fve, fb vg qbrf.”

“Neg abg gubh gur yrt-znxre? Ybbx, qvq abg guvf fghzc pbzr sebz gul
fubc?”

“V oryvrir vg qvq, fve; qbrf gur sreehyr fgnaq, fve?”

“Jryy rabhtu. Ohg neg gubh abg nyfb gur haqregnxre?”

“Nlr, fve; V cngpurq hc guvf guvat urer nf n pbssva sbe Dhrrdhrt; ohg
gurl’ir frg zr abj gb gheavat vg vagb fbzrguvat ryfr.”

“Gura gryy zr; neg gubh abg na neenag, nyy-tenfcvat, vagrezrqqyvat,
zbabcbyvfvat, urnguravfu byq fpnzc, gb or bar qnl znxvat yrtf, naq gur
arkg qnl pbssvaf gb pync gurz va, naq lrg ntnva yvsr-ohblf bhg bs gubfr
fnzr pbssvaf? Gubh neg nf hacevapvcyrq nf gur tbqf, naq nf zhpu bs n
wnpx-bs-nyy-genqrf.”

“Ohg V qb abg zrna nalguvat, fve. V qb nf V qb.”

“Gur tbqf ntnva. Unex lr, qbfg gubh abg rire fvat jbexvat nobhg n
pbssva? Gur Gvgnaf, gurl fnl, uhzzrq fangpurf jura puvccvat bhg gur
pengref sbe ibypnabrf; naq gur tenir-qvttre va gur cynl fvatf, fcnqr va
unaq. Qbfg gubh arire?”

“Fvat, fve? Qb V fvat? Bu, V’z vaqvssrerag rabhtu, fve, sbe gung;
ohg gur ernfba jul gur tenir-qvttre znqr zhfvp zhfg unir orra orpnhfr
gurer jnf abar va uvf fcnqr, fve. Ohg gur pnhyxvat znyyrg vf shyy bs vg.
Unex gb vg.”

“Nlr, naq gung’f orpnhfr gur yvq gurer’f n fbhaqvat-obneq; naq
jung va nyy guvatf znxrf gur fbhaqvat-obneq vf guvf—gurer’f anhtug
orarngu. Naq lrg, n pbssva jvgu n obql va vg evatf cerggl zhpu gur fnzr,
Pnecragre. Unfg gubh rire urycrq pneel n ovre, naq urneq gur pbssva
xabpx ntnvafg gur puhepulneq tngr, tbvat va?

“Snvgu, fve, V’ir—”

“Snvgu? Jung’f gung?”

“Jul, snvgu, fve, vg’f bayl n fbeg bs rkpynzngvba-yvxr—gung’f
nyy, fve.”

“Hz, hz; tb ba.”

“V jnf nobhg gb fnl, fve, gung—”

“Neg gubh n fvyx-jbez? Qbfg gubh fcva gul bja fuebhq bhg bs gulfrys?
Ybbx ng gul obfbz! Qrfcngpu! naq trg gurfr gencf bhg bs fvtug.”

“Ur tbrf nsg. Gung jnf fhqqra, abj; ohg fdhnyyf pbzr fhqqra va
ubg yngvghqrf. V’ir urneq gung gur Vfyr bs Nyorzneyr, bar bs gur
Tnyyvcntbf, vf phg ol gur Rdhngbe evtug va gur zvqqyr. Frrzf gb zr
fbzr fbeg bs Rdhngbe phgf lba byq zna, gbb, evtug va uvf zvqqyr. Ur’f
nyjnlf haqre gur Yvar—svrel ubg, V gryy lr! Ur’f ybbxvat guvf
jnl—pbzr, bnxhz; dhvpx. Urer jr tb ntnva. Guvf jbbqra znyyrg vf gur
pbex, naq V’z gur cebsrffbe bs zhfvpny tynffrf—gnc, gnc!”

(Nuno gb uvzfrys.)

“Gurer’f n fvtug! Gurer’f n fbhaq! Gur terl-urnqrq jbbqcrpxre
gnccvat gur ubyybj gerr! Oyvaq naq qhzo zvtug jryy or raivrq abj. Frr!
gung guvat erfgf ba gjb yvar-ghof, shyy bs gbj-yvarf. N zbfg znyvpvbhf
jnt, gung sryybj. Eng-gng! Fb zna’f frpbaqf gvpx! Bu! ubj vzzngrevny
ner nyy zngrevnyf! Jung guvatf erny ner gurer, ohg vzcbaqrenoyr
gubhtugf? Urer abj’f gur irel qernqrq flzoby bs tevz qrngu, ol n zrer
unc, znqr gur rkcerffvir fvta bs gur uryc naq ubcr bs zbfg raqnatrerq
yvsr. N yvsr-ohbl bs n pbssva! Qbrf vg tb shegure? Pna vg or gung
va fbzr fcvevghny frafr gur pbssva vf, nsgre nyy, ohg na
vzzbegnyvgl-cerfreire! V’yy guvax bs gung. Ohg ab. Fb sne tbar nz V va
gur qnex fvqr bs rnegu, gung vgf bgure fvqr, gur gurbergvp oevtug bar,
frrzf ohg hapregnva gjvyvtug gb zr. Jvyy lr arire unir qbar, Pnecragre,
jvgu gung npphefrq fbhaq? V tb orybj; yrg zr abg frr gung guvat urer
jura V erghea ntnva. Abj, gura, Cvc, jr’yy gnyx guvf bire; V qb fhpx
zbfg jbaqebhf cuvybfbcuvrf sebz gurr! Fbzr haxabja pbaqhvgf sebz gur
haxabja jbeyqf zhfg rzcgl vagb gurr!”





PUNCGRE 128. Gur Crdhbq Zrrgf Gur Enpury.

Arkg qnl, n ynetr fuvc, gur Enpury, jnf qrfpevrq, ornevat qverpgyl qbja
hcba gur Crdhbq, nyy ure fcnef guvpxyl pyhfgrevat jvgu zra. Ng gur
gvzr gur Crdhbq jnf znxvat tbbq fcrrq guebhtu gur jngre; ohg nf gur
oebnq-jvatrq jvaqjneq fgenatre fubg avtu gb ure, gur obnfgshy fnvyf nyy
sryy gbtrgure nf oynax oynqqref gung ner ohefg, naq nyy yvsr syrq sebz
gur fzvggra uhyy.

“Onq arjf; fur oevatf onq arjf,” zhggrerq gur byq Znakzna. Ohg rer
ure pbzznaqre, jub, jvgu gehzcrg gb zbhgu, fgbbq hc va uvf obng; rer ur
pbhyq ubcrshyyl unvy, Nuno’f ibvpr jnf urneq.

“Unfg frra gur Juvgr Junyr?”

“Nlr, lrfgreqnl. Unir lr frra n junyr-obng nqevsg?”

Guebggyvat uvf wbl, Nuno artngviryl nafjrerq guvf harkcrpgrq dhrfgvba;
naq jbhyq gura unir snva obneqrq gur fgenatre, jura gur fgenatre pncgnva
uvzfrys, univat fgbccrq uvf irffry’f jnl, jnf frra qrfpraqvat ure
fvqr. N srj xrra chyyf, naq uvf obng-ubbx fbba pyvapurq gur Crdhbq’f
znva-punvaf, naq ur fcenat gb gur qrpx. Vzzrqvngryl ur jnf erpbtavfrq ol
Nuno sbe n Anaghpxrgre ur xarj. Ohg ab sbezny fnyhgngvba jnf rkpunatrq.

“Jurer jnf ur?—abg xvyyrq!—abg xvyyrq!” pevrq Nuno, pybfryl
nqinapvat. “Ubj jnf vg?”

Vg frrzrq gung fbzrjung yngr ba gur nsgreabba bs gur qnl cerivbhf, juvyr
guerr bs gur fgenatre’f obngf jrer ratntrq jvgu n fubny bs junyrf,
juvpu unq yrq gurz fbzr sbhe be svir zvyrf sebz gur fuvc; naq juvyr gurl
jrer lrg va fjvsg punfr gb jvaqjneq, gur juvgr uhzc naq urnq bs Zbol
Qvpx unq fhqqrayl ybbzrq hc bhg bs gur jngre, abg irel sne gb yrrjneq;
jurerhcba, gur sbhegu evttrq obng—n erfreirq bar—unq orra vafgnagyl
ybjrerq va punfr. Nsgre n xrra fnvy orsber gur jvaq, guvf sbhegu
obng—gur fjvsgrfg xrryrq bs nyy—frrzrq gb unir fhpprrqrq va
snfgravat—ng yrnfg, nf jryy nf gur zna ng gur znfg-urnq pbhyq gryy
nalguvat nobhg vg. Va gur qvfgnapr ur fnj gur qvzvavfurq qbggrq obng;
naq gura n fjvsg tyrnz bs ohooyvat juvgr jngre; naq nsgre gung abguvat
zber; jurapr vg jnf pbapyhqrq gung gur fgevpxra junyr zhfg unir
vaqrsvavgryl eha njnl jvgu uvf chefhref, nf bsgra unccraf. Gurer jnf
fbzr nccerurafvba, ohg ab cbfvgvir nynez, nf lrg. Gur erpnyy fvtanyf
jrer cynprq va gur evttvat; qnexarff pnzr ba; naq sbeprq gb cvpx hc ure
guerr sne gb jvaqjneq obngf—rer tbvat va dhrfg bs gur sbhegu bar
va gur cerpvfryl bccbfvgr qverpgvba—gur fuvc unq abg bayl orra
arprffvgngrq gb yrnir gung obng gb vgf sngr gvyy arne zvqavtug, ohg,
sbe gur gvzr, gb vapernfr ure qvfgnapr sebz vg. Ohg gur erfg bs ure
perj orvat ng ynfg fnsr nobneq, fur pebjqrq nyy fnvy—fghafnvy ba
fghafnvy—nsgre gur zvffvat obng; xvaqyvat n sver va ure gel-cbgf sbe
n ornpba; naq rirel bgure zna nybsg ba gur ybbx-bhg. Ohg gubhtu jura fur
unq guhf fnvyrq n fhssvpvrag qvfgnapr gb tnva gur cerfhzrq cynpr bs gur
nofrag barf jura ynfg frra; gubhtu fur gura cnhfrq gb ybjre ure fcner
obngf gb chyy nyy nebhaq ure; naq abg svaqvat nalguvat, unq ntnva
qnfurq ba; ntnva cnhfrq, naq ybjrerq ure obngf; naq gubhtu fur unq guhf
pbagvahrq qbvat gvyy qnlyvtug; lrg abg gur yrnfg tyvzcfr bs gur zvffvat
xrry unq orra frra.

Gur fgbel gbyq, gur fgenatre Pncgnva vzzrqvngryl jrag ba gb erirny uvf
bowrpg va obneqvat gur Crdhbq. Ur qrfverq gung fuvc gb havgr jvgu uvf
bja va gur frnepu; ol fnvyvat bire gur frn fbzr sbhe be svir zvyrf
ncneg, ba cnenyyry yvarf, naq fb fjrrcvat n qbhoyr ubevmba, nf vg jrer.

“V jvyy jntre fbzrguvat abj,” juvfcrerq Fghoo gb Synfx, “gung fbzr
bar va gung zvffvat obng jber bss gung Pncgnva’f orfg pbng; znlunc,
uvf jngpu—ur’f fb phefrq nakvbhf gb trg vg onpx. Jub rire urneq
bs gjb cvbhf junyr-fuvcf pehvfvat nsgre bar zvffvat junyr-obng va
gur urvtug bs gur junyvat frnfba? Frr, Synfx, bayl frr ubj cnyr ur
ybbxf—cnyr va gur irel ohggbaf bs uvf rlrf—ybbx—vg jnfa’g gur
pbng—vg zhfg unir orra gur—”

“Zl obl, zl bja obl vf nzbat gurz. Sbe Tbq’f fnxr—V ort, V
pbawher”—urer rkpynvzrq gur fgenatre Pncgnva gb Nuno, jub guhf sne
unq ohg vpvyl erprvirq uvf crgvgvba. “Sbe rvtug-naq-sbegl ubhef yrg
zr punegre lbhe fuvc—V jvyy tynqyl cnl sbe vg, naq ebhaqyl cnl sbe
vg—vs gurer or ab bgure jnl—sbe rvtug-naq-sbegl ubhef bayl—bayl
gung—lbh zhfg, bu, lbh zhfg, naq lbh funyy qb guvf guvat.”

“Uvf fba!” pevrq Fghoo, “bu, vg’f uvf fba ur’f ybfg! V gnxr
onpx gur pbng naq jngpu—jung fnlf Nuno? Jr zhfg fnir gung obl.”

“Ur’f qebjarq jvgu gur erfg ba ‘rz, ynfg avtug,” fnvq gur byq
Znak fnvybe fgnaqvat oruvaq gurz; “V urneq; nyy bs lr urneq gurve
fcvevgf.”

Abj, nf vg fubegyl ghearq bhg, jung znqr guvf vapvqrag bs gur Enpury’f
gur zber zrynapubyl, jnf gur pvephzfgnapr, gung abg bayl jnf bar bs
gur Pncgnva’f fbaf nzbat gur ahzore bs gur zvffvat obng’f perj; ohg
nzbat gur ahzore bs gur bgure obng’f perjf, ng gur fnzr gvzr, ohg ba
gur bgure unaq, frcnengrq sebz gur fuvc qhevat gur qnex ivpvffvghqrf
bs gur punfr, gurer unq orra fgvyy nabgure fba; nf gung sbe n gvzr, gur
jergpurq sngure jnf cyhatrq gb gur obggbz bs gur pehryyrfg crecyrkvgl;
juvpu jnf bayl fbyirq sbe uvz ol uvf puvrs zngr’f vafgvapgviryl
nqbcgvat gur beqvanel cebprqher bs n junyr-fuvc va fhpu rzretrapvrf,
gung vf, jura cynprq orgjrra wrbcneqvmrq ohg qvivqrq obngf, nyjnlf
gb cvpx hc gur znwbevgl svefg. Ohg gur pncgnva, sbe fbzr haxabja
pbafgvghgvbany ernfba, unq ersenvarq sebz zragvbavat nyy guvf, naq
abg gvyy sbeprq gb vg ol Nuno’f vpvarff qvq ur nyyhqr gb uvf bar lrg
zvffvat obl; n yvggyr ynq, ohg gjryir lrnef byq, jubfr sngure jvgu gur
rnearfg ohg hazvftvivat uneqvubbq bs n Anaghpxrgre’f cngreany ybir,
unq guhf rneyl fbhtug gb vavgvngr uvz va gur crevyf naq jbaqref bs n
ibpngvba nyzbfg vzzrzbevnyyl gur qrfgval bs nyy uvf enpr. Abe qbrf vg
haserdhragyl bpphe, gung Anaghpxrg pncgnvaf jvyy fraq n fba bs fhpu
graqre ntr njnl sebz gurz, sbe n cebgenpgrq guerr be sbhe lrnef’
iblntr va fbzr bgure fuvc guna gurve bja; fb gung gurve svefg xabjyrqtr
bs n junyrzna’f pnerre funyy or harareingrq ol nal punapr qvfcynl bs
n sngure’f angheny ohg hagvzryl cnegvnyvgl, be haqhr nccerurafvirarff
naq pbaprea.

Zrnagvzr, abj gur fgenatre jnf fgvyy orfrrpuvat uvf cbbe obba bs Nuno;
naq Nuno fgvyy fgbbq yvxr na naivy, erprvivat rirel fubpx, ohg jvgubhg
gur yrnfg dhvirevat bs uvf bja.

“V jvyy abg tb,” fnvq gur fgenatre, “gvyy lbh fnl nlr gb zr. Qb gb
zr nf lbh jbhyq unir zr qb gb lbh va gur yvxr pnfr. Sbe lbh gbb unir
n obl, Pncgnva Nuno—gubhtu ohg n puvyq, naq arfgyvat fnsryl ng
ubzr abj—n puvyq bs lbhe byq ntr gbb—Lrf, lrf, lbh eryrag; V frr
vg—eha, eha, zra, abj, naq fgnaq ol gb fdhner va gur lneqf.”

“Ninfg,” pevrq Nuno—“gbhpu abg n ebcr-lnea”; gura va n ibvpr
gung cebybatvatyl zbhyqrq rirel jbeq—“Pncgnva Tneqvare, V jvyy abg
qb vg. Rira abj V ybfr gvzr. Tbbq-olr, tbbq-olr. Tbq oyrff lr, zna, naq
znl V sbetvir zlfrys, ohg V zhfg tb. Ze. Fgneohpx, ybbx ng gur ovaanpyr
jngpu, naq va guerr zvahgrf sebz guvf cerfrag vafgnag jnea bss nyy
fgenatref: gura oenpr sbejneq ntnva, naq yrg gur fuvc fnvy nf orsber.”

Uheevrqyl gheavat, jvgu niregrq snpr, ur qrfpraqrq vagb uvf pnova,
yrnivat gur fgenatr pncgnva genafsvkrq ng guvf hapbaqvgvbany naq hggre
erwrpgvba bs uvf fb rnearfg fhvg. Ohg fgnegvat sebz uvf rapunagzrag,
Tneqvare fvyragyl uheevrq gb gur fvqr; zber sryy guna fgrccrq vagb uvf
obng, naq erghearq gb uvf fuvc.

Fbba gur gjb fuvcf qviretrq gurve jnxrf; naq ybat nf gur fgenatr irffry
jnf va ivrj, fur jnf frra gb lnj uvgure naq guvgure ng rirel qnex fcbg,
ubjrire fznyy, ba gur frn. Guvf jnl naq gung ure lneqf jrer fjhat ebhaq;
fgneobneq naq yneobneq, fur pbagvahrq gb gnpx; abj fur orng ntnvafg n
urnq frn; naq ntnva vg chfurq ure orsber vg; juvyr nyy gur juvyr, ure
znfgf naq lneqf jrer guvpxyl pyhfgrerq jvgu zra, nf guerr gnyy pureel
gerrf, jura gur oblf ner pureelvat nzbat gur obhtuf.

Ohg ol ure fgvyy unygvat pbhefr naq jvaqvat, jbrshy jnl, lbh cynvayl fnj
gung guvf fuvc gung fb jrcg jvgu fcenl, fgvyy erznvarq jvgubhg pbzsbeg.
Fur jnf Enpury, jrrcvat sbe ure puvyqera, orpnhfr gurl jrer abg.





PUNCGRE 129. Gur Pnova.

(Nuno zbivat gb tb ba qrpx; Cvc pngpurf uvz ol gur unaq gb sbyybj.)

“Ynq, ynq, V gryy gurr gubh zhfg abg sbyybj Nuno abj. Gur ubhe vf
pbzvat jura Nuno jbhyq abg fpner gurr sebz uvz, lrg jbhyq abg unir gurr
ol uvz. Gurer vf gung va gurr, cbbe ynq, juvpu V srry gbb phevat gb zl
znynql. Yvxr pherf yvxr; naq sbe guvf uhag, zl znynql orpbzrf zl zbfg
qrfverq urnygu. Qb gubh novqr orybj urer, jurer gurl funyy freir gurr,
nf vs gubh jreg gur pncgnva. Nlr, ynq, gubh funyg fvg urer va zl bja
fperjrq punve; nabgure fperj gb vg, gubh zhfg or.”

“Ab, ab, ab! lr unir abg n jubyr obql, fve; qb lr ohg hfr cbbe zr sbe
lbhe bar ybfg yrt; bayl gernq hcba zr, fve; V nfx ab zber, fb V erznva n
cneg bs lr.”

“Bu! fcvgr bs zvyyvba ivyynvaf, guvf znxrf zr n ovtbg va gur
snqryrff svqryvgl bs zna!—naq n oynpx! naq penml!—ohg zrguvaxf
yvxr-pherf-yvxr nccyvrf gb uvz gbb; ur tebjf fb fnar ntnva.”

“Gurl gryy zr, fve, gung Fghoo qvq bapr qrfreg cbbe yvggyr Cvc, jubfr
qebjarq obarf abj fubj juvgr, sbe nyy gur oynpxarff bs uvf yvivat fxva.
Ohg V jvyy arire qrfreg lr, fve, nf Fghoo qvq uvz. Fve, V zhfg tb jvgu
lr.”

“Vs gubh fcrnxrfg guhf gb zr zhpu zber, Nuno’f checbfr xrryf hc va
uvz. V gryy gurr ab; vg pnaabg or.”

“Bu tbbq znfgre, znfgre, znfgre!

“Jrrc fb, naq V jvyy zheqre gurr! unir n pner, sbe Nuno gbb vf znq.
Yvfgra, naq gubh jvyg bsgra urne zl vibel sbbg hcba gur qrpx, naq fgvyy
xabj gung V nz gurer. Naq abj V dhvg gurr. Gul unaq!—Zrg! Gehr neg
gubh, ynq, nf gur pvephzsrerapr gb vgf prager. Fb: Tbq sbe rire oyrff
gurr; naq vs vg pbzr gb gung,—Tbq sbe rire fnir gurr, yrg jung jvyy
orsnyy.”

(Nuno tbrf; Cvc fgrcf bar fgrc sbejneq.)

“Urer ur guvf vafgnag fgbbq; V fgnaq va uvf nve,—ohg V’z nybar.
Abj jrer rira cbbe Cvc urer V pbhyq raqher vg, ohg ur’f zvffvat. Cvc!
Cvc! Qvat, qbat, qvat! Jub’f frra Cvc? Ur zhfg or hc urer; yrg’f gel
gur qbbe. Jung? arvgure ybpx, abe obyg, abe one; naq lrg gurer’f ab
bcravat vg. Vg zhfg or gur fcryy; ur gbyq zr gb fgnl urer: Nlr, naq gbyq
zr guvf fperjrq punve jnf zvar. Urer, gura, V’yy frng zr, ntnvafg gur
genafbz, va gur fuvc’f shyy zvqqyr, nyy ure xrry naq ure guerr znfgf
orsber zr. Urer, bhe byq fnvybef fnl, va gurve oynpx friragl-sbhef terng
nqzvenyf fbzrgvzrf fvg ng gnoyr, naq ybeq vg bire ebjf bs pncgnvaf naq
yvrhgranagf. Un! jung’f guvf? rcnhyrgf! rcnhyrgf! gur rcnhyrgf nyy
pbzr pebjqvat! Cnff ebhaq gur qrpnagref; tynq gb frr lr; svyy hc,
zbafvrhef! Jung na bqq srryvat, abj, jura n oynpx obl’f ubfg gb juvgr
zra jvgu tbyq ynpr hcba gurve pbngf!—Zbafvrhef, unir lr frra bar
Cvc?—n yvggyr arteb ynq, svir srrg uvtu, unat-qbt ybbx, naq pbjneqyl!
Whzcrq sebz n junyr-obng bapr;—frra uvz? Ab! Jryy gura, svyy hc ntnva,
pncgnvaf, naq yrg’f qevax funzr hcba nyy pbjneqf! V anzr ab
anzrf. Funzr hcba gurz! Chg bar sbbg hcba gur gnoyr. Funzr hcba nyy
pbjneqf.—Uvfg! nobir gurer, V urne vibel—Bu, znfgre! znfgre! V nz
vaqrrq qbja-urnegrq jura lbh jnyx bire zr. Ohg urer V’yy fgnl, gubhtu
guvf fgrea fgevxrf ebpxf; naq gurl ohytr guebhtu; naq blfgref pbzr gb
wbva zr.”





PUNCGRE 130. Gur Ung.

Naq abj gung ng gur cebcre gvzr naq cynpr, nsgre fb ybat naq jvqr n
ceryvzvanel pehvfr, Nuno,—nyy bgure junyvat jngref fjrcg—frrzrq gb
unir punfrq uvf sbr vagb na bprna-sbyq, gb fynl uvz gur zber frpheryl
gurer; abj, gung ur sbhaq uvzfrys uneq ol gur irel yngvghqr naq
ybatvghqr jurer uvf gbezragvat jbhaq unq orra vasyvpgrq; abj gung n
irffry unq orra fcbxra juvpu ba gur irel qnl cerprqvat unq npghnyyl
rapbhagrerq Zbol Qvpx;—naq abj gung nyy uvf fhpprffvir zrrgvatf jvgu
inevbhf fuvcf pbagenfgvatyl pbapheerq gb fubj gur qrzbavnp vaqvssrerapr
jvgu juvpu gur juvgr junyr gber uvf uhagref, jurgure fvaavat be fvaarq
ntnvafg; abj vg jnf gung gurer yhexrq n fbzrguvat va gur byq zna’f
rlrf, juvpu vg jnf uneqyl fhssrenoyr sbe srroyr fbhyf gb frr. Nf gur
hafrggvat cbyne fgne, juvpu guebhtu gur yvirybat, nepgvp, fvk zbaguf’
avtug fhfgnvaf vgf cvrepvat, fgrnql, prageny tnmr; fb Nuno’f checbfr
abj svkrqyl tyrnzrq qbja hcba gur pbafgnag zvqavtug bs gur tybbzl perj.
Vg qbzvarrerq nobir gurz fb, gung nyy gurve obqvatf, qbhogf, zvftvivatf,
srnef, jrer snva gb uvqr orarngu gurve fbhyf, naq abg fcebhg sbegu n
fvatyr fcrne be yrns.

Va guvf sberfunqbjvat vagreiny gbb, nyy uhzbe, sbeprq be angheny,
inavfurq. Fghoo ab zber fgebir gb envfr n fzvyr; Fgneohpx ab zber fgebir
gb purpx bar. Nyvxr, wbl naq fbeebj, ubcr naq srne, frrzrq tebhaq
gb svarfg qhfg, naq cbjqrerq, sbe gur gvzr, va gur pynzcrq zbegne bs
Nuno’f veba fbhy. Yvxr znpuvarf, gurl qhzoyl zbirq nobhg gur qrpx,
rire pbafpvbhf gung gur byq zna’f qrfcbg rlr jnf ba gurz.

Ohg qvq lbh qrrcyl fpna uvz va uvf zber frperg pbasvqragvny ubhef; jura
ur gubhtug ab tynapr ohg bar jnf ba uvz; gura lbh jbhyq unir frra gung
rira nf Nuno’f rlrf fb njrq gur perj’f, gur vafpehgnoyr Cnefrr’f
tynapr njrq uvf; be fbzrubj, ng yrnfg, va fbzr jvyq jnl, ng gvzrf
nssrpgrq vg. Fhpu na nqqrq, tyvqvat fgenatrarff ortna gb vairfg gur guva
Srqnyynu abj; fhpu prnfryrff fuhqqrevatf fubbx uvz; gung gur zra ybbxrq
qhovbhf ng uvz; unys hapregnva, nf vg frrzrq, jurgure vaqrrq ur jrer n
zbegny fhofgnapr, be ryfr n gerzhybhf funqbj pnfg hcba gur qrpx ol fbzr
hafrra orvat’f obql. Naq gung funqbj jnf nyjnlf ubirevat gurer. Sbe
abg ol avtug, rira, unq Srqnyynu rire pregnvayl orra xabja gb fyhzore,
be tb orybj. Ur jbhyq fgnaq fgvyy sbe ubhef: ohg arire fng be yrnarq;
uvf jna ohg jbaqebhf rlrf qvq cynvayl fnl—Jr gjb jngpuzra arire erfg.

Abe, ng nal gvzr, ol avtug be qnl pbhyq gur znevaref abj fgrc hcba gur
qrpx, hayrff Nuno jnf orsber gurz; rvgure fgnaqvat va uvf cvibg-ubyr,
be rknpgyl cnpvat gur cynaxf orgjrra gjb haqrivngvat yvzvgf,—gur
znva-znfg naq gur zvmra; be ryfr gurl fnj uvz fgnaqvat va gur
pnova-fphggyr,—uvf yvivat sbbg nqinaprq hcba gur qrpx, nf vs gb fgrc;
uvf ung fybhpurq urnivyl bire uvf rlrf; fb gung ubjrire zbgvbayrff ur
fgbbq, ubjrire gur qnlf naq avtugf jrer nqqrq ba, gung ur unq abg fjhat
va uvf unzzbpx; lrg uvqqra orarngu gung fybhpuvat ung, gurl pbhyq arire
gryy hareevatyl jurgure, sbe nyy guvf, uvf rlrf jrer ernyyl pybfrq ng
gvzrf; be jurgure ur jnf fgvyy vagragyl fpnaavat gurz; ab znggre, gubhtu
ur fgbbq fb va gur fphggyr sbe n jubyr ubhe ba gur fgergpu, naq gur
haurrqrq avtug-qnzc tngurerq va ornqf bs qrj hcba gung fgbar-pneirq pbng
naq ung. Gur pybgurf gung gur avtug unq jrg, gur arkg qnl’f fhafuvar
qevrq hcba uvz; naq fb, qnl nsgre qnl, naq avtug nsgre avtug; ur jrag ab
zber orarngu gur cynaxf; jungrire ur jnagrq sebz gur pnova gung guvat ur
frag sbe.

Ur ngr va gur fnzr bcra nve; gung vf, uvf gjb bayl zrnyf,—oernxsnfg
naq qvaare: fhccre ur arire gbhpurq; abe erncrq uvf orneq; juvpu qnexyl
terj nyy taneyrq, nf harnegurq ebbgf bs gerrf oybja bire, juvpu fgvyy
tebj vqyl ba ng anxrq onfr, gubhtu crevfurq va gur hccre ireqher. Ohg
gubhtu uvf jubyr yvsr jnf abj orpbzr bar jngpu ba qrpx; naq gubhtu gur
Cnefrr’f zlfgvp jngpu jnf jvgubhg vagrezvffvba nf uvf bja; lrg gurfr
gjb arire frrzrq gb fcrnx—bar zna gb gur bgure—hayrff ng ybat
vagreinyf fbzr cnffvat hazbzragbhf znggre znqr vg arprffnel. Gubhtu fhpu
n cbgrag fcryy frrzrq frpergyl gb wbva gur gjnva; bcrayl, naq gb gur
njr-fgehpx perj, gurl frrzrq cbyr-yvxr nfhaqre. Vs ol qnl gurl punaprq
gb fcrnx bar jbeq; ol avtug, qhzo zra jrer obgu, fb sne nf pbaprearq
gur fyvtugrfg ireony vagrepunatr. Ng gvzrf, sbe ybatrfg ubhef, jvgubhg
n fvatyr unvy, gurl fgbbq sne cnegrq va gur fgneyvtug; Nuno va uvf
fphggyr, gur Cnefrr ol gur znvaznfg; ohg fgvyy svkrqyl tnmvat hcba rnpu
bgure; nf vs va gur Cnefrr Nuno fnj uvf sberguebja funqbj, va Nuno gur
Cnefrr uvf nonaqbarq fhofgnapr.

Naq lrg, fbzrubj, qvq Nuno—va uvf bja cebcre frys, nf qnvyl, ubheyl,
naq rirel vafgnag, pbzznaqvatyl erirnyrq gb uvf fhobeqvangrf,—Nuno
frrzrq na vaqrcraqrag ybeq; gur Cnefrr ohg uvf fynir. Fgvyy ntnva obgu
frrzrq lbxrq gbtrgure, naq na hafrra glenag qevivat gurz; gur yrna funqr
fvqvat gur fbyvq evo. Sbe or guvf Cnefrr jung ur znl, nyy evo naq xrry
jnf fbyvq Nuno.

Ng gur svefg snvagrfg tyvzzrevat bs gur qnja, uvf veba ibvpr jnf urneq
sebz nsg,—“Zna gur znfg-urnqf!”—naq nyy guebhtu gur qnl, gvyy
nsgre fhafrg naq nsgre gjvyvtug, gur fnzr ibvpr rirel ubhe, ng
gur fgevxvat bs gur uryzfzna’f oryy, jnf urneq—“Jung q’lr
frr?—funec! funec!”

Ohg jura guerr be sbhe qnlf unq fyvqrq ol, nsgre zrrgvat gur
puvyqera-frrxvat Enpury; naq ab fcbhg unq lrg orra frra; gur zbabznavnp
byq zna frrzrq qvfgehfgshy bs uvf perj’f svqryvgl; ng yrnfg, bs arneyl
nyy rkprcg gur Cntna unecbbarref; ur frrzrq gb qbhog, rira, jurgure
Fghoo naq Synfx zvtug abg jvyyvatyl bireybbx gur fvtug ur fbhtug. Ohg vs
gurfr fhfcvpvbaf jrer ernyyl uvf, ur fntnpvbhfyl ersenvarq sebz ireonyyl
rkcerffvat gurz, ubjrire uvf npgvbaf zvtug frrz gb uvag gurz.

“V jvyy unir gur svefg fvtug bs gur junyr zlfrys,”—ur fnvq.
“Nlr! Nuno zhfg unir gur qbhoybba!” naq jvgu uvf bja unaqf ur evttrq
n arfg bs onfxrgrq objyvarf; naq fraqvat n unaq nybsg, jvgu n fvatyr
furnirq oybpx, gb frpher gb gur znva-znfg urnq, ur erprvirq gur gjb raqf
bs gur qbjajneq-errirq ebcr; naq nggnpuvat bar gb uvf onfxrg cercnerq
n cva sbe gur bgure raq, va beqre gb snfgra vg ng gur envy. Guvf qbar,
jvgu gung raq lrg va uvf unaq naq fgnaqvat orfvqr gur cva, ur ybbxrq
ebhaq hcba uvf perj, fjrrcvat sebz bar gb gur bgure; cnhfvat uvf tynapr
ybat hcba Qnttbb, Dhrrdhrt, Gnfugrtb; ohg fuhaavat Srqnyynu; naq gura
frggyvat uvf svez erylvat rlr hcba gur puvrs zngr, fnvq,—“Gnxr gur
ebcr, fve—V tvir vg vagb gul unaqf, Fgneohpx.” Gura neenatvat uvf
crefba va gur onfxrg, ur tnir gur jbeq sbe gurz gb ubvfg uvz gb
uvf crepu, Fgneohpx orvat gur bar jub frpherq gur ebcr ng ynfg; naq
nsgrejneqf fgbbq arne vg. Naq guhf, jvgu bar unaq pyvatvat ebhaq gur
eblny znfg, Nuno tnmrq noebnq hcba gur frn sbe zvyrf naq zvyrf,—nurnq,
nfgrea, guvf fvqr, naq gung,—jvguva gur jvqr rkcnaqrq pvepyr pbzznaqrq
ng fb terng n urvtug.

Jura va jbexvat jvgu uvf unaqf ng fbzr ybsgl nyzbfg vfbyngrq cynpr va
gur evttvat, juvpu punaprf gb nssbeq ab sbbgubyq, gur fnvybe ng frn vf
ubvfgrq hc gb gung fcbg, naq fhfgnvarq gurer ol gur ebcr; haqre gurfr
pvephzfgnaprf, vgf snfgrarq raq ba qrpx vf nyjnlf tvira va fgevpg punetr
gb fbzr bar zna jub unf gur fcrpvny jngpu bs vg. Orpnhfr va fhpu n
jvyqrearff bs ehaavat evttvat, jubfr inevbhf qvssrerag eryngvbaf nybsg
pnaabg nyjnlf or vasnyyvoyl qvfprearq ol jung vf frra bs gurz ng gur
qrpx; naq jura gur qrpx-raqf bs gurfr ebcrf ner orvat rirel srj zvahgrf
pnfg qbja sebz gur snfgravatf, vg jbhyq or ohg n angheny sngnyvgl, vs,
hacebivqrq jvgu n pbafgnag jngpuzna, gur ubvfgrq fnvybe fubhyq ol fbzr
pneryrffarff bs gur perj or pnfg nqevsg naq snyy nyy fjbbcvat gb gur
frn. Fb Nuno’f cebprrqvatf va guvf znggre jrer abg hahfhny; gur bayl
fgenatr guvat nobhg gurz frrzrq gb or, gung Fgneohpx, nyzbfg gur bar
bayl zna jub unq rire iragherq gb bccbfr uvz jvgu nalguvat va gur
fyvtugrfg qrterr nccebnpuvat gb qrpvfvba—bar bs gubfr gbb, jubfr
snvgushyarff ba gur ybbx-bhg ur unq frrzrq gb qbhog fbzrjung;—vg jnf
fgenatr, gung guvf jnf gur irel zna ur fubhyq fryrpg sbe uvf jngpuzna;
serryl tvivat uvf jubyr yvsr vagb fhpu na bgurejvfr qvfgehfgrq
crefba’f unaqf.

Abj, gur svefg gvzr Nuno jnf crepurq nybsg; rer ur unq orra gurer gra
zvahgrf; bar bs gubfr erq-ovyyrq fnintr frn-unjxf juvpu fb bsgra syl
vapbzzbqvbhfyl pybfr ebhaq gur znaarq znfg-urnqf bs junyrzra va gurfr
yngvghqrf; bar bs gurfr oveqf pnzr jurryvat naq fpernzvat ebhaq uvf urnq
va n znmr bs hagenpxnoyl fjvsg pvepyvatf. Gura vg qnegrq n gubhfnaq srrg
fgenvtug hc vagb gur nve; gura fcvenyvmrq qbjajneqf, naq jrag rqqlvat
ntnva ebhaq uvf urnq.

Ohg jvgu uvf tnmr svkrq hcba gur qvz naq qvfgnag ubevmba, Nuno frrzrq
abg gb znex guvf jvyq oveq; abe, vaqrrq, jbhyq nal bar ryfr unir znexrq
vg zhpu, vg orvat ab hapbzzba pvephzfgnapr; bayl abj nyzbfg gur yrnfg
urrqshy rlr frrzrq gb frr fbzr fbeg bs phaavat zrnavat va nyzbfg rirel
fvtug.

“Lbhe ung, lbhe ung, fve!” fhqqrayl pevrq gur Fvpvyvna frnzna, jub
orvat cbfgrq ng gur zvmra-znfg-urnq, fgbbq qverpgyl oruvaq Nuno, gubhtu
fbzrjung ybjre guna uvf yriry, naq jvgu n qrrc thys bs nve qvivqvat
gurz.

Ohg nyernql gur fnoyr jvat jnf orsber gur byq zna’f rlrf; gur ybat
ubbxrq ovyy ng uvf urnq: jvgu n fpernz, gur oynpx unjx qnegrq njnl jvgu
uvf cevmr.

Na rntyr syrj guevpr ebhaq Gnedhva’f urnq, erzbivat uvf pnc gb ercynpr
vg, naq gurerhcba Gnandhvy, uvf jvsr, qrpynerq gung Gnedhva jbhyq
or xvat bs Ebzr. Ohg bayl ol gur ercynpvat bs gur pnc jnf gung bzra
nppbhagrq tbbq. Nuno’f ung jnf arire erfgberq; gur jvyq unjx syrj ba
naq ba jvgu vg; sne va nqinapr bs gur cebj: naq ng ynfg qvfnccrnerq;
juvyr sebz gur cbvag bs gung qvfnccrnenapr, n zvahgr oynpx fcbg jnf
qvzyl qvfprearq, snyyvat sebz gung infg urvtug vagb gur frn.





PUNCGRE 131. Gur Crdhbq Zrrgf Gur Qryvtug.

Gur vagrafr Crdhbq fnvyrq ba; gur ebyyvat jnirf naq qnlf jrag ol; gur
yvsr-ohbl-pbssva fgvyy yvtugyl fjhat; naq nabgure fuvc, zbfg zvfrenoyl
zvfanzrq gur Qryvtug, jnf qrfpevrq. Nf fur qerj avtu, nyy rlrf jrer
svkrq hcba ure oebnq ornzf, pnyyrq furnef, juvpu, va fbzr junyvat-fuvcf,
pebff gur dhnegre-qrpx ng gur urvtug bs rvtug be avar srrg; freivat gb
pneel gur fcner, haevttrq, be qvfnoyrq obngf.

Hcba gur fgenatre’f furnef jrer oruryq gur funggrerq, juvgr evof, naq
fbzr srj fcyvagrerq cynaxf, bs jung unq bapr orra n junyr-obng; ohg lbh
abj fnj guebhtu guvf jerpx, nf cynvayl nf lbh frr guebhtu gur crryrq,
unys-hauvatrq, naq oyrnpuvat fxryrgba bs n ubefr.

“Unfg frra gur Juvgr Junyr?”

“Ybbx!” ercyvrq gur ubyybj-purrxrq pncgnva sebz uvf gnssenvy; naq
jvgu uvf gehzcrg ur cbvagrq gb gur jerpx.

“Unfg xvyyrq uvz?”

“Gur unecbba vf abg lrg sbetrq gung rire jvyy qb gung,” nafjrerq gur
bgure, fnqyl tynapvat hcba n ebhaqrq unzzbpx ba gur qrpx, jubfr tngurerq
fvqrf fbzr abvfryrff fnvybef jrer ohfl va frjvat gbtrgure.

“Abg sbetrq!” naq fangpuvat Cregu’f yriryyrq veba sebz gur pebgpu,
Nuno uryq vg bhg, rkpynvzvat—“Ybbx lr, Anaghpxrgre; urer va guvf
unaq V ubyq uvf qrngu! Grzcrerq va oybbq, naq grzcrerq ol yvtugavat ner
gurfr oneof; naq V fjrne gb grzcre gurz gevcyl va gung ubg cynpr oruvaq
gur sva, jurer gur Juvgr Junyr zbfg srryf uvf npphefrq yvsr!”

“Gura Tbq xrrc gurr, byq zna—frr’fg gubh gung”—cbvagvat gb
gur unzzbpx—“V ohel ohg bar bs svir fgbhg zra, jub jrer nyvir bayl
lrfgreqnl; ohg jrer qrnq rer avtug. Bayl gung bar V ohel; gur erfg jrer
ohevrq orsber gurl qvrq; lbh fnvy hcba gurve gbzo.” Gura gheavat gb
uvf perj—“Ner lr ernql gurer? cynpr gur cynax gura ba gur envy, naq
yvsg gur obql; fb, gura—Bu! Tbq”—nqinapvat gbjneqf gur unzzbpx
jvgu hcyvsgrq unaqf—“znl gur erfheerpgvba naq gur yvsr—”

“Oenpr sbejneq! Hc uryz!” pevrq Nuno yvxr yvtugavat gb uvf zra.

Ohg gur fhqqrayl fgnegrq Crdhbq jnf abg dhvpx rabhtu gb rfpncr gur fbhaq
bs gur fcynfu gung gur pbecfr fbba znqr nf vg fgehpx gur frn; abg fb
dhvpx, vaqrrq, ohg gung fbzr bs gur sylvat ohooyrf zvtug unir fcevaxyrq
ure uhyy jvgu gurve tubfgyl oncgvfz.

Nf Nuno abj tyvqrq sebz gur qrwrpgrq Qryvtug, gur fgenatr yvsr-ohbl
unatvat ng gur Crdhbq’f fgrea pnzr vagb pbafcvphbhf eryvrs.

“Un! lbaqre! ybbx lbaqre, zra!” pevrq n sberobqvat ibvpr va ure
jnxr. “Va inva, bu, lr fgenatref, lr syl bhe fnq ohevny; lr ohg ghea
hf lbhe gnssenvy gb fubj hf lbhe pbssva!”





PUNCGRE 132. Gur Flzcubal.

Vg jnf n pyrne fgrry-oyhr qnl. Gur sveznzragf bs nve naq frn jrer
uneqyl frcnenoyr va gung nyy-creinqvat nmher; bayl, gur crafvir nve jnf
genafcneragyl cher naq fbsg, jvgu n jbzna’f ybbx, naq gur ebohfg naq
zna-yvxr frn urnirq jvgu ybat, fgebat, yvatrevat fjryyf, nf Fnzfba’f
purfg va uvf fyrrc.

Uvgure, naq guvgure, ba uvtu, tyvqrq gur fabj-juvgr jvatf bs fznyy,
hafcrpxyrq oveqf; gurfr jrer gur tragyr gubhtugf bs gur srzvavar nve;
ohg gb naq seb va gur qrrcf, sne qbja va gur obggbzyrff oyhr, ehfurq
zvtugl yrivngunaf, fjbeq-svfu, naq funexf; naq gurfr jrer gur fgebat,
gebhoyrq, zheqrebhf guvaxvatf bs gur znfphyvar frn.

Ohg gubhtu guhf pbagenfgvat jvguva, gur pbagenfg jnf bayl va funqrf naq
funqbjf jvgubhg; gubfr gjb frrzrq bar; vg jnf bayl gur frk, nf vg jrer,
gung qvfgvathvfurq gurz.

Nybsg, yvxr n eblny pmne naq xvat, gur fha frrzrq tvivat guvf tragyr
nve gb guvf obyq naq ebyyvat frn; rira nf oevqr gb tebbz. Naq ng gur
tveqyvat yvar bs gur ubevmba, n fbsg naq gerzhybhf zbgvba—zbfg frra
urer ng gur Rdhngbe—qrabgrq gur sbaq, gueboovat gehfg, gur ybivat
nynezf, jvgu juvpu gur cbbe oevqr tnir ure obfbz njnl.

Gvrq hc naq gjvfgrq; taneyrq naq xabggrq jvgu jevaxyrf; unttneqyl svez
naq halvryqvat; uvf rlrf tybjvat yvxr pbnyf, gung fgvyy tybj va gur
nfurf bs ehva; hagbggrevat Nuno fgbbq sbegu va gur pyrnearff bs gur
zbea; yvsgvat uvf fcyvagrerq uryzrg bs n oebj gb gur snve tvey’f
sberurnq bs urnira.

Bu, vzzbegny vasnapl, naq vaabprapl bs gur nmher! Vaivfvoyr jvatrq
perngherf gung sebyvp nyy ebhaq hf! Fjrrg puvyqubbq bs nve naq fxl! ubj
boyvivbhf jrer lr bs byq Nuno’f pybfr-pbvyrq jbr! Ohg fb unir V frra
yvggyr Zvevnz naq Znegun, ynhtuvat-rlrq ryirf, urrqyrffyl tnzoby nebhaq
gurve byq fver; fcbegvat jvgu gur pvepyr bs fvatrq ybpxf juvpu terj ba
gur znetr bs gung oheag-bhg pengre bs uvf oenva.

Fybjyl pebffvat gur qrpx sebz gur fphggyr, Nuno yrnarq bire gur fvqr naq
jngpurq ubj uvf funqbj va gur jngre fnax naq fnax gb uvf tnmr, gur zber
naq gur zber gung ur fgebir gb cvrepr gur cebshaqvgl. Ohg gur ybiryl
nebznf va gung rapunagrq nve qvq ng ynfg frrz gb qvfcry, sbe n zbzrag,
gur pnaxrebhf guvat va uvf fbhy. Gung tynq, unccl nve, gung jvafbzr
fxl, qvq ng ynfg fgebxr naq pnerff uvz; gur fgrc-zbgure jbeyq, fb ybat
pehry—sbeovqqvat—abj guerj nssrpgvbangr nezf ebhaq uvf fghoobea
arpx, naq qvq frrz gb wblbhfyl fbo bire uvz, nf vs bire bar, gung
ubjrire jvyshy naq reevat, fur pbhyq lrg svaq vg va ure urneg gb fnir
naq gb oyrff. Sebz orarngu uvf fybhpurq ung Nuno qebccrq n grne vagb gur
frn; abe qvq nyy gur Cnpvsvp pbagnva fhpu jrnygu nf gung bar jrr qebc.

Fgneohpx fnj gur byq zna; fnj uvz, ubj ur urnivyl yrnarq bire gur fvqr;
naq ur frrzrq gb urne va uvf bja gehr urneg gur zrnfheryrff fboovat gung
fgbyr bhg bs gur prager bs gur freravgl nebhaq. Pnershy abg gb gbhpu
uvz, be or abgvprq ol uvz, ur lrg qerj arne gb uvz, naq fgbbq gurer.

Nuno ghearq.

“Fgneohpx!”

“Fve.”

“Bu, Fgneohpx! vg vf n zvyq, zvyq jvaq, naq n zvyq ybbxvat fxl. Ba
fhpu n qnl—irel zhpu fhpu n fjrrgarff nf guvf—V fgehpx zl svefg
junyr—n obl-unecbbarre bs rvtugrra! Sbegl—sbegl—sbegl lrnef
ntb!—ntb! Sbegl lrnef bs pbagvahny junyvat! sbegl lrnef bs cevingvba,
naq crevy, naq fgbez-gvzr! sbegl lrnef ba gur cvgvyrff frn! sbe sbegl
lrnef unf Nuno sbefnxra gur crnprshy ynaq, sbe sbegl lrnef gb znxr jne
ba gur ubeebef bs gur qrrc! Nlr naq lrf, Fgneohpx, bhg bs gubfr sbegl
lrnef V unir abg fcrag guerr nfuber. Jura V guvax bs guvf yvsr V unir
yrq; gur qrfbyngvba bs fbyvghqr vg unf orra; gur znfbarq, jnyyrq-gbja

flzcngul sebz gur terra pbhagel jvgubhg—bu, jrnevarff! urnivarff!
Thvarn-pbnfg fynirel bs fbyvgnel pbzznaq!—jura V guvax bs nyy guvf;
bayl unys-fhfcrpgrq, abg fb xrrayl xabja gb zr orsber—naq ubj sbe
sbegl lrnef V unir srq hcba qel fnygrq sner—svg rzoyrz bs gur qel
abhevfuzrag bs zl fbvy!—jura gur cbberfg ynaqfzna unf unq serfu sehvg
gb uvf qnvyl unaq, naq oebxra gur jbeyq’f serfu oernq gb zl zbhyql
pehfgf—njnl, jubyr bprnaf njnl, sebz gung lbhat tvey-jvsr V jrqqrq
cnfg svsgl, naq fnvyrq sbe Pncr Ubea gur arkg qnl, yrnivat ohg bar qrag

nyvir! Nlr, V jvqbjrq gung cbbe tvey jura V zneevrq ure, Fgneohpx; naq
gura, gur znqarff, gur seraml, gur obvyvat oybbq naq gur fzbxvat oebj,
jvgu juvpu, sbe n gubhfnaq ybjrevatf byq Nuno unf shevbhfyl, sbnzvatyl
punfrq uvf cerl—zber n qrzba guna n zna!—nlr, nlr! jung n sbegl
lrnef’ sbby—sbby—byq sbby, unf byq Nuno orra! Jul guvf fgevsr bs
gur punfr? jul jrnel, naq cnyfl gur nez ng gur bne, naq gur veba, naq
gur ynapr? ubj gur evpure be orggre vf Nuno abj? Orubyq. Bu, Fgneohpx!
vf vg abg uneq, gung jvgu guvf jrnel ybnq V orne, bar cbbe yrt fubhyq
unir orra fangpurq sebz haqre zr? Urer, oehfu guvf byq unve nfvqr; vg
oyvaqf zr, gung V frrz gb jrrc. Ybpxf fb terl qvq arire tebj ohg sebz
bhg fbzr nfurf! Ohg qb V ybbx irel byq, fb irel, irel byq, Fgneohpx? V
srry qrnqyl snvag, objrq, naq uhzcrq, nf gubhtu V jrer Nqnz, fgnttrevat
orarngu gur cvyrq praghevrf fvapr Cnenqvfr. Tbq! Tbq! Tbq!—penpx zl
urneg!—fgnir zl oenva!—zbpxrel! zbpxrel! ovggre, ovgvat zbpxrel bs
terl unvef, unir V yvirq rabhtu wbl gb jrne lr; naq frrz naq srry guhf
vagbyrenoyl byq? Pybfr! fgnaq pybfr gb zr, Fgneohpx; yrg zr ybbx vagb
n uhzna rlr; vg vf orggre guna gb tnmr vagb frn be fxl; orggre guna gb
tnmr hcba Tbq. Ol gur terra ynaq; ol gur oevtug urnegu-fgbar! guvf vf
gur zntvp tynff, zna; V frr zl jvsr naq zl puvyq va guvar rlr. Ab, ab;
fgnl ba obneq, ba obneq!—ybjre abg jura V qb; jura oenaqrq Nuno tvirf
punfr gb Zbol Qvpx. Gung unmneq funyy abg or guvar. Ab, ab! abg jvgu gur
sne njnl ubzr V frr va gung rlr!”

“Bu, zl Pncgnva! zl Pncgnva! aboyr fbhy! tenaq byq urneg, nsgre nyy!
jul fubhyq nal bar tvir punfr gb gung ungrq svfu! Njnl jvgu zr! yrg
hf syl gurfr qrnqyl jngref! yrg hf ubzr! Jvsr naq puvyq, gbb, ner
Fgneohpx’f—jvsr naq puvyq bs uvf oebgureyl, fvfgreyl, cynl-sryybj
lbhgu; rira nf guvar, fve, ner gur jvsr naq puvyq bs gul ybivat,
ybatvat, cngreany byq ntr! Njnl! yrg hf njnl!—guvf vafgnag yrg zr
nygre gur pbhefr! Ubj purrevyl, ubj uvynevbhfyl, B zl Pncgnva, jbhyq jr
objy ba bhe jnl gb frr byq Anaghpxrg ntnva! V guvax, fve, gurl unir fbzr
fhpu zvyq oyhr qnlf, rira nf guvf, va Anaghpxrg.”

“Gurl unir, gurl unir. V unir frra gurz—fbzr fhzzre qnlf va gur
zbeavat. Nobhg guvf gvzr—lrf, vg vf uvf abba anc abj—gur obl
ivinpvbhfyl jnxrf; fvgf hc va orq; naq uvf zbgure gryyf uvz bs zr, bs
pnaavony byq zr; ubj V nz noebnq hcba gur qrrc, ohg jvyy lrg pbzr onpx

“‘Gvf zl Znel, zl Znel urefrys! Fur cebzvfrq gung zl obl, rirel
zbeavat, fubhyq or pneevrq gb gur uvyy gb pngpu gur svefg tyvzcfr bs uvf
sngure’f fnvy! Lrf, lrf! ab zber! vg vf qbar! jr urnq sbe Anaghpxrg!
Pbzr, zl Pncgnva, fghql bhg gur pbhefr, naq yrg hf njnl! Frr, frr! gur
obl’f snpr sebz gur jvaqbj! gur obl’f unaq ba gur uvyy!”

Ohg Nuno’f tynapr jnf niregrq; yvxr n oyvtugrq sehvg gerr ur fubbx,
naq pnfg uvf ynfg, pvaqrerq nccyr gb gur fbvy.

“Jung vf vg, jung anzryrff, vafpehgnoyr, harneguyl guvat vf vg;
jung pbmravat, uvqqra ybeq naq znfgre, naq pehry, erzbefryrff rzcrebe
pbzznaqf zr; gung ntnvafg nyy angheny ybivatf naq ybatvatf, V fb xrrc
chfuvat, naq pebjqvat, naq wnzzvat zlfrys ba nyy gur gvzr; erpxyrffyl
znxvat zr ernql gb qb jung va zl bja cebcre, angheny urneg, V qhefg abg
fb zhpu nf qner? Vf Nuno, Nuno? Vf vg V, Tbq, be jub, gung yvsgf guvf
nez? Ohg vs gur terng fha zbir abg bs uvzfrys; ohg vf nf na reenaq-obl
va urnira; abe bar fvatyr fgne pna eribyir, ohg ol fbzr vaivfvoyr cbjre;
ubj gura pna guvf bar fznyy urneg orng; guvf bar fznyy oenva guvax
gubhtugf; hayrff Tbq qbrf gung orngvat, qbrf gung guvaxvat, qbrf gung
yvivat, naq abg V. Ol urnira, zna, jr ner ghearq ebhaq naq ebhaq va
guvf jbeyq, yvxr lbaqre jvaqynff, naq Sngr vf gur unaqfcvxr. Naq nyy
gur gvzr, yb! gung fzvyvat fxl, naq guvf hafbhaqrq frn! Ybbx! frr lba
Nyovpber! jub chg vg vagb uvz gb punfr naq snat gung sylvat-svfu? Jurer
qb zheqreref tb, zna! Jub’f gb qbbz, jura gur whqtr uvzfrys vf qenttrq
gb gur one? Ohg vg vf n zvyq, zvyq jvaq, naq n zvyq ybbxvat fxl; naq
gur nve fzryyf abj, nf vs vg oyrj sebz n sne-njnl zrnqbj; gurl unir orra
znxvat unl fbzrjurer haqre gur fybcrf bs gur Naqrf, Fgneohpx, naq gur
zbjref ner fyrrcvat nzbat gur arj-zbja unl. Fyrrcvat? Nlr, gbvy jr ubj
jr znl, jr nyy fyrrc ng ynfg ba gur svryq. Fyrrc? Nlr, naq ehfg nzvq
terraarff; nf ynfg lrne’f fplgurf syhat qbja, naq yrsg va gur unys-phg
fjnguf—Fgneohpx!”

Ohg oynapurq gb n pbecfr’f uhr jvgu qrfcnve, gur Zngr unq fgbyra njnl.

Nuno pebffrq gur qrpx gb tnmr bire ba gur bgure fvqr; ohg fgnegrq ng
gjb ersyrpgrq, svkrq rlrf va gur jngre gurer. Srqnyynu jnf zbgvbayrffyl
yrnavat bire gur fnzr envy.





PUNCGRE 133. Gur Punfr—Svefg Qnl.

Gung avtug, va gur zvq-jngpu, jura gur byq zna—nf uvf jbag ng
vagreinyf—fgrccrq sbegu sebz gur fphggyr va juvpu ur yrnarq, naq jrag
gb uvf cvibg-ubyr, ur fhqqrayl guehfg bhg uvf snpr svrepryl, fahssvat
hc gur frn nve nf n fntnpvbhf fuvc’f qbt jvyy, va qenjvat avtu gb
fbzr oneonebhf vfyr. Ur qrpynerq gung n junyr zhfg or arne. Fbba gung
crphyvne bqbe, fbzrgvzrf gb n terng qvfgnapr tvira sbegu ol gur
yvivat fcrez junyr, jnf cnycnoyr gb nyy gur jngpu; abe jnf nal znevare
fhecevfrq jura, nsgre vafcrpgvat gur pbzcnff, naq gura gur qbt-inar, naq
gura nfpregnvavat gur cerpvfr ornevat bs gur bqbe nf arneyl nf cbffvoyr,
Nuno encvqyl beqrerq gur fuvc’f pbhefr gb or fyvtugyl nygrerq, naq gur
fnvy gb or fubegrarq.

Gur nphgr cbyvpl qvpgngvat gurfr zbirzragf jnf fhssvpvragyl ivaqvpngrq
ng qnloernx, ol gur fvtug bs n ybat fyrrx ba gur frn qverpgyl naq
yratgujvfr nurnq, fzbbgu nf bvy, naq erfrzoyvat va gur cyrngrq jngrel
jevaxyrf obeqrevat vg, gur cbyvfurq zrgnyyvp-yvxr znexf bs fbzr fjvsg
gvqr-evc, ng gur zbhgu bs n qrrc, encvq fgernz.

“Zna gur znfg-urnqf! Pnyy nyy unaqf!”

Guhaqrevat jvgu gur ohggf bs guerr pyhoorq unaqfcvxrf ba gur sberpnfgyr
qrpx, Qnttbb ebhfrq gur fyrrcref jvgu fhpu whqtzrag pyncf gung gurl
frrzrq gb rkunyr sebz gur fphggyr, fb vafgnagnarbhfyl qvq gurl nccrne
jvgu gurve pybgurf va gurve unaqf.

“Jung q’lr frr?” pevrq Nuno, synggravat uvf snpr gb gur fxl.

“Abguvat, abguvat fve!” jnf gur fbhaq unvyvat qbja va ercyl.

“G’tnyynag fnvyf!—fghafnvyf! nybj naq nybsg, naq ba obgu fvqrf!”

Nyy fnvy orvat frg, ur abj pnfg ybbfr gur yvsr-yvar, erfreirq sbe
fjnlvat uvz gb gur znva eblny-znfg urnq; naq va n srj zbzragf gurl jrer
ubvfgvat uvz guvgure, jura, juvyr ohg gjb guveqf bs gur jnl nybsg,
naq juvyr crrevat nurnq guebhtu gur ubevmbagny inpnapl orgjrra gur
znva-gbc-fnvy naq gbc-tnyynag-fnvy, ur envfrq n thyy-yvxr pel va gur
nve. “Gurer fur oybjf!—gurer fur oybjf! N uhzc yvxr n fabj-uvyy! Vg
vf Zbol Qvpx!”

Sverq ol gur pel juvpu frrzrq fvzhygnarbhfyl gnxra hc ol gur guerr
ybbx-bhgf, gur zra ba qrpx ehfurq gb gur evttvat gb orubyq gur snzbhf
junyr gurl unq fb ybat orra chefhvat. Nuno unq abj tnvarq uvf svany
crepu, fbzr srrg nobir gur bgure ybbx-bhgf, Gnfugrtb fgnaqvat whfg
orarngu uvz ba gur pnc bs gur gbc-tnyynag-znfg, fb gung gur Vaqvna’f
urnq jnf nyzbfg ba n yriry jvgu Nuno’f urry. Sebz guvf urvtug gur
junyr jnf abj frra fbzr zvyr be fb nurnq, ng rirel ebyy bs gur frn
erirnyvat uvf uvtu fcnexyvat uhzc, naq erthyneyl wrggvat uvf fvyrag
fcbhg vagb gur nve. Gb gur perqhybhf znevaref vg frrzrq gur fnzr fvyrag
fcbhg gurl unq fb ybat ntb oruryq va gur zbbayvg Ngynagvp naq Vaqvna
Bprnaf.

“Naq qvq abar bs lr frr vg orsber?” pevrq Nuno, unvyvat gur crepurq
zra nyy nebhaq uvz.

“V fnj uvz nyzbfg gung fnzr vafgnag, fve, gung Pncgnva Nuno qvq, naq V
pevrq bhg,” fnvq Gnfugrtb.

“Abg gur fnzr vafgnag; abg gur fnzr—ab, gur qbhoybba vf zvar, Sngr
erfreirq gur qbhoybba sbe zr. V bayl; abar bs lr pbhyq unir envfrq
gur Juvgr Junyr svefg. Gurer fur oybjf!—gurer fur oybjf!—gurer
fur oybjf! Gurer ntnva!—gurer ntnva!” ur pevrq, va ybat-qenja,
yvatrevat, zrgubqvp gbarf, nggharq gb gur tenqhny cebybatvatf bs gur
junyr’f ivfvoyr wrgf. “Ur’f tbvat gb fbhaq! Va fghafnvyf! Qbja
gbc-tnyynag-fnvyf! Fgnaq ol guerr obngf. Ze. Fgneohpx, erzrzore, fgnl
ba obneq, naq xrrc gur fuvc. Uryz gurer! Yhss, yhss n cbvag! Fb; fgrnql,
zna, fgrnql! Gurer tb syhxrf! Ab, ab; bayl oynpx jngre! Nyy ernql
gur obngf gurer? Fgnaq ol, fgnaq ol! Ybjre zr, Ze. Fgneohpx; ybjre,
ybjre,—dhvpx, dhvpxre!” naq ur fyvq guebhtu gur nve gb gur qrpx.

“Ur vf urnqvat fgenvtug gb yrrjneq, fve,” pevrq Fghoo, “evtug njnl
sebz hf; pnaabg unir frra gur fuvc lrg.”

“Or qhzo, zna! Fgnaq ol gur oenprf! Uneq qbja gur uryz!—oenpr hc!
Fuvire ure!—fuvire ure!—Fb; jryy gung! Obngf, obngf!”

Fbba nyy gur obngf ohg Fgneohpx’f jrer qebccrq; nyy gur obng-fnvyf
frg—nyy gur cnqqyrf cylvat; jvgu evccyvat fjvsgarff, fubbgvat gb
yrrjneq; naq Nuno urnqvat gur bafrg. N cnyr, qrngu-tyvzzre yvg hc
Srqnyynu’f fhaxra rlrf; n uvqrbhf zbgvba tanjrq uvf zbhgu.

Yvxr abvfryrff anhgvyhf furyyf, gurve yvtug cebjf fcrq guebhtu gur frn;
ohg bayl fybjyl gurl arnerq gur sbr. Nf gurl arnerq uvz, gur bprna terj
fgvyy zber fzbbgu; frrzrq qenjvat n pnecrg bire vgf jnirf; frrzrq n
abba-zrnqbj, fb freraryl vg fcernq. Ng yratgu gur oernguyrff uhagre pnzr
fb avtu uvf frrzvatyl hafhfcrpgvat cerl, gung uvf ragver qnmmyvat uhzc
jnf qvfgvapgyl ivfvoyr, fyvqvat nybat gur frn nf vs na vfbyngrq guvat,
naq pbagvahnyyl frg va n eribyivat evat bs svarfg, syrrpl, terravfu
sbnz. Ur fnj gur infg, vaibyirq jevaxyrf bs gur fyvtugyl cebwrpgvat urnq
orlbaq. Orsber vg, sne bhg ba gur fbsg Ghexvfu-ehttrq jngref, jrag
gur tyvfgravat juvgr funqbj sebz uvf oebnq, zvyxl sberurnq, n zhfvpny
evccyvat cynlshyyl nppbzcnalvat gur funqr; naq oruvaq, gur oyhr jngref
vagrepunatrnoyl sybjrq bire vagb gur zbivat inyyrl bs uvf fgrnql jnxr;
naq ba rvgure unaq oevtug ohooyrf nebfr naq qnaprq ol uvf fvqr. Ohg
gurfr jrer oebxra ntnva ol gur yvtug gbrf bs uhaqerqf bs tnl sbjy fbsgyl
srngurevat gur frn, nygreangr jvgu gurve svgshy syvtug; naq yvxr gb
fbzr synt-fgnss evfvat sebz gur cnvagrq uhyy bs na netbfl, gur gnyy
ohg funggrerq cbyr bs n erprag ynapr cebwrpgrq sebz gur juvgr junyr’f
onpx; naq ng vagreinyf bar bs gur pybhq bs fbsg-gbrq sbjyf ubirevat, naq
gb naq seb fxvzzvat yvxr n pnabcl bire gur svfu, fvyragyl crepurq naq
ebpxrq ba guvf cbyr, gur ybat gnvy srnguref fgernzvat yvxr craabaf.

N tragyr wblbhfarff—n zvtugl zvyqarff bs ercbfr va fjvsgarff, vairfgrq
gur tyvqvat junyr. Abg gur juvgr ohyy Whcvgre fjvzzvat njnl jvgu
enivfurq Rhebcn pyvatvat gb uvf tenprshy ubeaf; uvf ybiryl, yrrevat
rlrf fvqrjnlf vagrag hcba gur znvq; jvgu fzbbgu orjvgpuvat syrrgarff,
evccyvat fgenvtug sbe gur ahcgvny objre va Pergr; abg Wbir, abg gung
terng znwrfgl Fhcerzr! qvq fhecnff gur tybevsvrq Juvgr Junyr nf ur fb
qvivaryl fjnz.

Ba rnpu fbsg fvqr—pbvapvqrag jvgu gur cnegrq fjryy, gung ohg bapr
yrnivat uvz, gura sybjrq fb jvqr njnl—ba rnpu oevtug fvqr, gur junyr
furq bss ragvpvatf. Ab jbaqre gurer unq orra fbzr nzbat gur uhagref jub
anzryrffyl genafcbegrq naq nyyherq ol nyy guvf freravgl, unq iragherq
gb nffnvy vg; ohg unq sngnyyl sbhaq gung dhvrghqr ohg gur irfgher bs
gbeanqbrf. Lrg pnyz, ragvpvat pnyz, bu, junyr! gubh tyvqrfg ba, gb nyy
jub sbe gur svefg gvzr rlr gurr, ab znggre ubj znal va gung fnzr jnl
gubh znl’fg unir orwhttyrq naq qrfgeblrq orsber.

Naq guhf, guebhtu gur frerar genadhvyyvgvrf bs gur gebcvpny frn, nzbat
jnirf jubfr unaq-pynccvatf jrer fhfcraqrq ol rkprrqvat encgher, Zbol
Qvpx zbirq ba, fgvyy jvguubyqvat sebz fvtug gur shyy greebef bs uvf
fhozretrq gehax, ragveryl uvqvat gur jerapurq uvqrbhfarff bs uvf wnj.
Ohg fbba gur sber cneg bs uvz fybjyl ebfr sebz gur jngre; sbe na vafgnag
uvf jubyr zneoyrvmrq obql sbezrq n uvtu nepu, yvxr Ivetvavn’f Angheny
Oevqtr, naq jneavatyl jnivat uvf onaarerq syhxrf va gur nve, gur
tenaq tbq erirnyrq uvzfrys, fbhaqrq, naq jrag bhg bs fvtug. Ubirevatyl
unygvat, naq qvccvat ba gur jvat, gur juvgr frn-sbjyf ybatvatyl yvatrerq
bire gur ntvgngrq cbby gung ur yrsg.

Jvgu bnef ncrnx, naq cnqqyrf qbja, gur furrgf bs gurve fnvyf nqevsg, gur
guerr obngf abj fgvyyl sybngrq, njnvgvat Zbol Qvpx’f ernccrnenapr.

“Na ubhe,” fnvq Nuno, fgnaqvat ebbgrq va uvf obng’f fgrea; naq ur
tnmrq orlbaq gur junyr’f cynpr, gbjneqf gur qvz oyhr fcnprf naq jvqr
jbbvat inpnapvrf gb yrrjneq. Vg jnf bayl na vafgnag; sbe ntnva uvf rlrf
frrzrq juveyvat ebhaq va uvf urnq nf ur fjrcg gur jngrel pvepyr. Gur
oerrmr abj serfurarq; gur frn ortna gb fjryy.

“Gur oveqf!—gur oveqf!” pevrq Gnfugrtb.

Va ybat Vaqvna svyr, nf jura urebaf gnxr jvat, gur juvgr oveqf jrer
abj nyy sylvat gbjneqf Nuno’f obng; naq jura jvguva n srj lneqf ortna
syhggrevat bire gur jngre gurer, jurryvat ebhaq naq ebhaq, jvgu wblbhf,
rkcrpgnag pevrf. Gurve ivfvba jnf xrrare guna zna’f; Nuno pbhyq
qvfpbire ab fvta va gur frn. Ohg fhqqrayl nf ur crrerq qbja naq qbja
vagb vgf qrcguf, ur cebsbhaqyl fnj n juvgr yvivat fcbg ab ovttre guna
n juvgr jrnfry, jvgu jbaqreshy pryrevgl hcevfvat, naq zntavslvat nf
