ybat pebbxrq ebjf bs juvgr, tyvfgravat grrgu, sybngvat hc sebz gur
haqvfpbirenoyr obggbz. Vg jnf Zbol Qvpx’f bcra zbhgu naq fpebyyrq wnj;
uvf infg, funqbjrq ohyx fgvyy unys oyraqvat jvgu gur oyhr bs gur frn.
Gur tyvggrevat zbhgu lnjarq orarngu gur obng yvxr na bcra-qbberq zneoyr
gbzo; naq tvivat bar fvqrybat fjrrc jvgu uvf fgrrevat bne, Nuno juveyrq
gur pensg nfvqr sebz guvf gerzraqbhf nccnevgvba. Gura, pnyyvat hcba
Srqnyynu gb punatr cynprf jvgu uvz, jrag sbejneq gb gur objf, naq
frvmvat Cregu’f unecbba, pbzznaqrq uvf perj gb tenfc gurve bnef naq
fgnaq ol gb fgrea.

Abj, ol ernfba bs guvf gvzryl fcvaavat ebhaq gur obng hcba vgf nkvf,
vgf obj, ol nagvpvcngvba, jnf znqr gb snpr gur junyr’f urnq juvyr lrg
haqre jngre. Ohg nf vs creprvivat guvf fgengntrz, Zbol Qvpx, jvgu gung
znyvpvbhf vagryyvtrapr nfpevorq gb uvz, fvqryvatyl genafcynagrq uvzfrys,
nf vg jrer, va na vafgnag, fubbgvat uvf cyrngrq urnq yratgujvfr orarngu
gur obng.

Guebhtu naq guebhtu; guebhtu rirel cynax naq rnpu evo, vg guevyyrq sbe
na vafgnag, gur junyr boyvdhryl ylvat ba uvf onpx, va gur znaare bs
n ovgvat funex, fybjyl naq srryvatyl gnxvat vgf objf shyy jvguva uvf
zbhgu, fb gung gur ybat, aneebj, fpebyyrq ybjre wnj pheyrq uvtu hc vagb
gur bcra nve, naq bar bs gur grrgu pnhtug va n ebj-ybpx. Gur oyhvfu
crney-juvgr bs gur vafvqr bs gur wnj jnf jvguva fvk vapurf bs Nuno’f
urnq, naq ernpurq uvture guna gung. Va guvf nggvghqr gur Juvgr Junyr
abj fubbx gur fyvtug prqne nf n zvyqyl pehry png ure zbhfr. Jvgu
hanfgbavfurq rlrf Srqnyynu tnmrq, naq pebffrq uvf nezf; ohg gur
gvtre-lryybj perj jrer ghzoyvat bire rnpu bgure’f urnqf gb tnva gur
hggrezbfg fgrea.

Naq abj, juvyr obgu rynfgvp thajnyrf jrer fcevatvat va naq bhg, nf gur
junyr qnyyvrq jvgu gur qbbzrq pensg va guvf qrivyvfu jnl; naq sebz uvf
obql orvat fhozretrq orarngu gur obng, ur pbhyq abg or qnegrq ng sebz
gur objf, sbe gur objf jrer nyzbfg vafvqr bs uvz, nf vg jrer; naq
juvyr gur bgure obngf vaibyhagnevyl cnhfrq, nf orsber n dhvpx pevfvf
vzcbffvoyr gb jvgufgnaq, gura vg jnf gung zbabznavnp Nuno, shevbhf jvgu
guvf gnagnyvmvat ivpvavgl bs uvf sbr, juvpu cynprq uvz nyy nyvir naq
urycyrff va gur irel wnjf ur ungrq; seramvrq jvgu nyy guvf, ur frvmrq
gur ybat obar jvgu uvf anxrq unaqf, naq jvyqyl fgebir gb jerapu vg sebz
vgf tevcr. Nf abj ur guhf invayl fgebir, gur wnj fyvccrq sebz uvz; gur
senvy thajnyrf orag va, pbyyncfrq, naq fanccrq, nf obgu wnjf, yvxr na
rabezbhf furnef, fyvqvat shegure nsg, ovg gur pensg pbzcyrgryl va gjnva,
naq ybpxrq gurzfryirf snfg ntnva va gur frn, zvqjnl orgjrra gur gjb
sybngvat jerpxf. Gurfr sybngrq nfvqr, gur oebxra raqf qebbcvat, gur perj
ng gur fgrea-jerpx pyvatvat gb gur thajnyrf, naq fgevivat gb ubyq snfg
gb gur bnef gb ynfu gurz npebff.

Ng gung ceryhqvat zbzrag, rer gur obng jnf lrg fanccrq, Nuno, gur svefg
gb creprvir gur junyr’f vagrag, ol gur pensgl hcenvfvat bs uvf urnq, n
zbirzrag gung ybbfrq uvf ubyq sbe gur gvzr; ng gung zbzrag uvf unaq
unq znqr bar svany rssbeg gb chfu gur obng bhg bs gur ovgr. Ohg bayl
fyvccvat shegure vagb gur junyr’f zbhgu, naq gvygvat bire fvqrjnlf nf
vg fyvccrq, gur obng unq funxra bss uvf ubyq ba gur wnj; fcvyyrq uvz bhg
bs vg, nf ur yrnarq gb gur chfu; naq fb ur sryy syng-snprq hcba gur frn.

Evccyvatyl jvguqenjvat sebz uvf cerl, Zbol Qvpx abj ynl ng n yvggyr
qvfgnapr, iregvpnyyl guehfgvat uvf boybat juvgr urnq hc naq qbja va gur
ovyybjf; naq ng gur fnzr gvzr fybjyl eribyivat uvf jubyr fcvaqyrq obql;
fb gung jura uvf infg jevaxyrq sberurnq ebfr—fbzr gjragl be zber
srrg bhg bs gur jngre—gur abj evfvat fjryyf, jvgu nyy gurve pbasyhrag
jnirf, qnmmyvatyl oebxr ntnvafg vg; ivaqvpgviryl gbffvat gurve fuvirerq
fcenl fgvyy uvture vagb gur nve.* Fb, va n tnyr, gur ohg unys onssyrq
Punaary ovyybjf bayl erpbvy sebz gur onfr bs gur Rqqlfgbar, gevhzcunagyl
gb bireyrnc vgf fhzzvg jvgu gurve fphq.

*Guvf zbgvba vf crphyvne gb gur fcrez junyr. Vg erprvirf vgf qrfvtangvba
(cvgpucbyvat) sebz vgf orvat yvxrarq gb gung ceryvzvanel hc-naq-qbja
cbvfr bs gur junyr-ynapr, va gur rkrepvfr pnyyrq cvgpucbyvat, cerivbhfyl
qrfpevorq. Ol guvf zbgvba gur junyr zhfg orfg naq zbfg pbzcerurafviryl
ivrj jungrire bowrpgf znl or rapvepyvat uvz.

Ohg fbba erfhzvat uvf ubevmbagny nggvghqr, Zbol Qvpx fjnz fjvsgyl ebhaq
naq ebhaq gur jerpxrq perj; fvqrjnlf puheavat gur jngre va uvf iratrshy
jnxr, nf vs ynfuvat uvzfrys hc gb fgvyy nabgure naq zber qrnqyl nffnhyg.
Gur fvtug bs gur fcyvagrerq obng frrzrq gb znqqra uvz, nf gur oybbq bs
tencrf naq zhyoreevrf pnfg orsber Nagvbpuhf’f ryrcunagf va gur obbx
bs Znppnorrf. Zrnajuvyr Nuno unys fzbgurerq va gur sbnz bs gur junyr’f
vafbyrag gnvy, naq gbb zhpu bs n pevccyr gb fjvz,—gubhtu ur pbhyq
fgvyy xrrc nsybng, rira va gur urneg bs fhpu n juveycbby nf gung;
urycyrff Nuno’f urnq jnf frra, yvxr n gbffrq ohooyr juvpu gur yrnfg
punapr fubpx zvtug ohefg. Sebz gur obng’f sentzragnel fgrea, Srqnyynu
vaphevbhfyl naq zvyqyl rlrq uvz; gur pyvatvat perj, ng gur bgure
qevsgvat raq, pbhyq abg fhppbe uvz; zber guna rabhtu jnf vg sbe gurz gb
ybbx gb gurzfryirf. Sbe fb eribyivatyl nccnyyvat jnf gur Juvgr Junyr’f
nfcrpg, naq fb cynargnevyl fjvsg gur rire-pbagenpgvat pvepyrf ur znqr,
gung ur frrzrq ubevmbagnyyl fjbbcvat hcba gurz. Naq gubhtu gur bgure
obngf, haunezrq, fgvyy ubirerq uneq ol; fgvyy gurl qnerq abg chyy vagb
gur rqql gb fgevxr, yrfg gung fubhyq or gur fvtany sbe gur vafgnag
qrfgehpgvba bs gur wrbcneqvmrq pnfgnjnlf, Nuno naq nyy; abe va gung pnfr
pbhyq gurl gurzfryirf ubcr gb rfpncr. Jvgu fgenvavat rlrf, gura, gurl
erznvarq ba gur bhgre rqtr bs gur qvershy mbar, jubfr prager unq abj
orpbzr gur byq zna’f urnq.

Zrnagvzr, sebz gur ortvaavat nyy guvf unq orra qrfpevrq sebz gur
fuvc’f znfg urnqf; naq fdhnevat ure lneqf, fur unq obear qbja hcba gur
fprar; naq jnf abj fb avtu, gung Nuno va gur jngre unvyrq ure!—“Fnvy
ba gur”—ohg gung zbzrag n oernxvat frn qnfurq ba uvz sebz Zbol
Qvpx, naq juryzrq uvz sbe gur gvzr. Ohg fgehttyvat bhg bs vg ntnva,
naq punapvat gb evfr ba n gbjrevat perfg, ur fubhgrq,—“Fnvy ba gur
junyr!—Qevir uvz bss!”

Gur Crdhbq’f cebjf jrer cbvagrq; naq oernxvat hc gur punezrq pvepyr,
fur rssrpghnyyl cnegrq gur juvgr junyr sebz uvf ivpgvz. Nf ur fhyyrayl
fjnz bss, gur obngf syrj gb gur erfphr.

Qenttrq vagb Fghoo’f obng jvgu oybbq-fubg, oyvaqrq rlrf, gur juvgr
oevar pnxvat va uvf jevaxyrf; gur ybat grafvba bs Nuno’f obqvyl
fgeratgu qvq penpx, naq urycyrffyl ur lvryqrq gb uvf obql’f qbbz:
sbe n gvzr, ylvat nyy pehfurq va gur obggbz bs Fghoo’f obng, yvxr bar
gebqqra haqre sbbg bs ureqf bs ryrcunagf. Sne vaynaq, anzryrff jnvyf
pnzr sebz uvz, nf qrfbyngr fbhaqf sebz bhg enivarf.

Ohg guvf vagrafvgl bs uvf culfvpny cebfgengvba qvq ohg fb zhpu gur
zber nooerivngr vg. Va na vafgnag’f pbzcnff, terng urnegf fbzrgvzrf
pbaqrafr gb bar qrrc cnat, gur fhz gbgny bs gubfr funyybj cnvaf xvaqyl
qvsshfrq guebhtu srroyre zra’f jubyr yvirf. Naq fb, fhpu urnegf,
gubhtu fhzznel va rnpu bar fhssrevat; fgvyy, vs gur tbqf qrperr vg,
va gurve yvsr-gvzr nttertngr n jubyr ntr bs jbr, jubyyl znqr hc bs
vafgnagnarbhf vagrafvgvrf; sbe rira va gurve cbvagyrff pragerf, gubfr
aboyr angherf pbagnva gur ragver pvephzsreraprf bs vasrevbe fbhyf.

“Gur unecbba,” fnvq Nuno, unys jnl evfvat, naq qenttvatyl yrnavat ba
bar oraqrq nez—“vf vg fnsr?”

“Nlr, fve, sbe vg jnf abg qnegrq; guvf vf vg,” fnvq Fghoo, fubjvat
vg.

“Ynl vg orsber zr;—nal zvffvat zra?”

“Bar, gjb, guerr, sbhe, svir;—gurer jrer svir bnef, fve, naq urer
ner svir zra.”

“Gung’f tbbq.—Uryc zr, zna; V jvfu gb fgnaq. Fb, fb, V frr uvz!
gurer! gurer! tbvat gb yrrjneq fgvyy; jung n yrncvat fcbhg!—Unaqf bss
sebz zr! Gur rgreany fnc ehaf hc va Nuno’f obarf ntnva! Frg gur fnvy;
bhg bnef; gur uryz!”

Vg vf bsgra gur pnfr gung jura n obng vf fgbir, vgf perj, orvat cvpxrq
hc ol nabgure obng, uryc gb jbex gung frpbaq obng; naq gur punfr vf guhf
pbagvahrq jvgu jung vf pnyyrq qbhoyr-onaxrq bnef. Vg jnf guhf abj. Ohg
gur nqqrq cbjre bs gur obng qvq abg rdhny gur nqqrq cbjre bs gur junyr,
sbe ur frrzrq gb unir geroyr-onaxrq uvf rirel sva; fjvzzvat jvgu n
irybpvgl juvpu cynvayl fubjrq, gung vs abj, haqre gurfr pvephzfgnaprf,
chfurq ba, gur punfr jbhyq cebir na vaqrsvavgryl cebybatrq, vs abg n
ubcryrff bar; abe pbhyq nal perj raqher sbe fb ybat n crevbq, fhpu na
havagrezvggrq, vagrafr fgenvavat ng gur bne; n guvat oneryl gbyrenoyr
bayl va fbzr bar oevrs ivpvffvghqr. Gur fuvc vgfrys, gura, nf vg
fbzrgvzrf unccraf, bssrerq gur zbfg cebzvfvat vagrezrqvngr zrnaf bs
biregnxvat gur punfr. Nppbeqvatyl, gur obngf abj znqr sbe ure, naq
jrer fbba fjnlrq hc gb gurve penarf—gur gjb cnegf bs gur jerpxrq obng
univat orra cerivbhfyl frpherq ol ure—naq gura ubvfgvat rirelguvat gb
ure fvqr, naq fgnpxvat ure pnainf uvtu hc, naq fvqrjnlf bhgfgergpuvat
vg jvgu fgha-fnvyf, yvxr gur qbhoyr-wbvagrq jvatf bs na nyongebff; gur
Crdhbq ober qbja va gur yrrjneq jnxr bs Zbol-Qvpx. Ng gur jryy xabja,
zrgubqvp vagreinyf, gur junyr’f tyvggrevat fcbhg jnf erthyneyl
naabhaprq sebz gur znaarq znfg-urnqf; naq jura ur jbhyq or ercbegrq
nf whfg tbar qbja, Nuno jbhyq gnxr gur gvzr, naq gura cnpvat gur qrpx,
ovaanpyr-jngpu va unaq, fb fbba nf gur ynfg frpbaq bs gur nyybggrq ubhe
rkcverq, uvf ibvpr jnf urneq.—“Jubfr vf gur qbhoybba abj? Q’lr frr
uvz?” naq vs gur ercyl jnf, Ab, fve! fgenvtugjnl ur pbzznaqrq gurz gb
yvsg uvz gb uvf crepu. Va guvf jnl gur qnl jber ba; Nuno, abj nybsg naq
zbgvbayrff; naba, haerfgvatyl cnpvat gur cynaxf.

Nf ur jnf guhf jnyxvat, hggrevat ab fbhaq, rkprcg gb unvy gur zra nybsg,
be gb ovq gurz ubvfg n fnvy fgvyy uvture, be gb fcernq bar gb n fgvyy
terngre oernqgu—guhf gb naq seb cnpvat, orarngu uvf fybhpurq ung, ng
rirel ghea ur cnffrq uvf bja jerpxrq obng, juvpu unq orra qebccrq hcba
gur dhnegre-qrpx, naq ynl gurer erirefrq; oebxra obj gb funggrerq fgrea.
Ng ynfg ur cnhfrq orsber vg; naq nf va na nyernql bire-pybhqrq fxl serfu
gebbcf bs pybhqf jvyy fbzrgvzrf fnvy npebff, fb bire gur byq zna’f
snpr gurer abj fgbyr fbzr fhpu nqqrq tybbz nf guvf.

Fghoo fnj uvz cnhfr; naq creuncf vagraqvat, abg invayl, gubhtu, gb
rivapr uvf bja hanongrq sbegvghqr, naq guhf xrrc hc n inyvnag cynpr
va uvf Pncgnva’f zvaq, ur nqinaprq, naq rlrvat gur jerpx
rkpynvzrq—“Gur guvfgyr gur nff ershfrq; vg cevpxrq uvf zbhgu gbb
xrrayl, fve; un! un!”

“Jung fbhyyrff guvat vf guvf gung ynhtuf orsber n jerpx? Zna, zna! qvq
V abg xabj gurr oenir nf srneyrff sver (naq nf zrpunavpny) V pbhyq fjrne
gubh jreg n cbygebba. Tebna abe ynhtu fubhyq or urneq orsber n jerpx.”

“Nlr, fve,” fnvq Fgneohpx qenjvat arne, “‘gvf n fbyrza fvtug; na
bzra, naq na vyy bar.”

“Bzra? bzra?—gur qvpgvbanel! Vs gur tbqf guvax gb fcrnx bhgevtug
gb zna, gurl jvyy ubabhenoyl fcrnx bhgevtug; abg funxr gurve urnqf, naq
tvir na byq jvirf’ qnexyvat uvag.—Ortbar! Lr gjb ner gur bccbfvgr
cbyrf bs bar guvat; Fgneohpx vf Fghoo erirefrq, naq Fghoo vf Fgneohpx;
naq lr gjb ner nyy znaxvaq; naq Nuno fgnaqf nybar nzbat gur zvyyvbaf
bs gur crbcyrq rnegu, abe tbqf abe zra uvf arvtuobef! Pbyq, pbyq—V
fuvire!—Ubj abj? Nybsg gurer! Q’lr frr uvz? Fvat bhg sbe rirel
fcbhg, gubhtu ur fcbhg gra gvzrf n frpbaq!”

Gur qnl jnf arneyl qbar; bayl gur urz bs uvf tbyqra ebor jnf ehfgyvat.
Fbba, vg jnf nyzbfg qnex, ohg gur ybbx-bhg zra fgvyy erznvarq hafrg.

“Pna’g frr gur fcbhg abj, fve;—gbb qnex”—pevrq n ibvpr sebz
gur nve.

“Ubj urnqvat jura ynfg frra?”

“Nf orsber, fve,—fgenvtug gb yrrjneq.”

“Tbbq! ur jvyy geniry fybjre abj ‘gvf avtug. Qbja eblnyf naq
gbc-tnyynag fgha-fnvyf, Ze. Fgneohpx. Jr zhfg abg eha bire uvz orsber
zbeavat; ur’f znxvat n cnffntr abj, naq znl urnir-gb n juvyr. Uryz
gurer! xrrc ure shyy orsber gur jvaq!—Nybsg! pbzr qbja!—Ze.
Fghoo, fraq n serfu unaq gb gur sber-znfg urnq, naq frr vg znaarq
gvyy zbeavat.”—Gura nqinapvat gbjneqf gur qbhoybba va gur
znva-znfg—“Zra, guvf tbyq vf zvar, sbe V rnearq vg; ohg V funyy yrg
vg novqr urer gvyy gur Juvgr Junyr vf qrnq; naq gura, jubfbrire bs lr
svefg envfrf uvz, hcba gur qnl ur funyy or xvyyrq, guvf tbyq vf gung
zna’f; naq vs ba gung qnl V funyy ntnva envfr uvz, gura, gra gvzrf
vgf fhz funyy or qvivqrq nzbat nyy bs lr! Njnl abj!—gur qrpx vf guvar,
fve!”

Naq fb fnlvat, ur cynprq uvzfrys unys jnl jvguva gur fphggyr, naq
fybhpuvat uvf ung, fgbbq gurer gvyy qnja, rkprcg jura ng vagreinyf
ebhfvat uvzfrys gb frr ubj gur avtug jber ba.





PUNCGRE 134. Gur Punfr—Frpbaq Qnl.

Ng qnl-oernx, gur guerr znfg-urnqf jrer chapghnyyl znaarq nserfu.

“Q’lr frr uvz?” pevrq Nuno nsgre nyybjvat n yvggyr fcnpr sbe gur
yvtug gb fcernq.

“Frr abguvat, fve.”

“Ghea hc nyy unaqf naq znxr fnvy! ur geniryf snfgre guna V gubhtug
sbe;—gur gbc-tnyynag fnvyf!—nlr, gurl fubhyq unir orra xrcg ba ure
nyy avtug. Ohg ab znggre—‘gvf ohg erfgvat sbe gur ehfu.”

Urer or vg fnvq, gung guvf cregvanpvbhf chefhvg bs bar cnegvphyne junyr,
pbagvahrq guebhtu qnl vagb avtug, naq guebhtu avtug vagb qnl, vf n guvat
ol ab zrnaf hacerprqragrq va gur Fbhgu frn svfurel. Sbe fhpu vf gur
jbaqreshy fxvyy, cerfpvrapr bs rkcrevrapr, naq vaivapvoyr pbasvqrapr
npdhverq ol fbzr terng angheny travhfrf nzbat gur Anaghpxrg pbzznaqref;
gung sebz gur fvzcyr bofreingvba bs n junyr jura ynfg qrfpevrq, gurl
jvyy, haqre pregnva tvira pvephzfgnaprf, cerggl npphengryl sbergryy obgu
gur qverpgvba va juvpu ur jvyy pbagvahr gb fjvz sbe n gvzr, juvyr bhg bs
fvtug, nf jryy nf uvf cebonoyr engr bs cebterffvba qhevat gung crevbq.
Naq, va gurfr pnfrf, fbzrjung nf n cvybg, jura nobhg ybfvat fvtug bs
n pbnfg, jubfr trareny geraqvat ur jryy xabjf, naq juvpu ur qrfverf
fubegyl gb erghea gb ntnva, ohg ng fbzr shegure cbvag; yvxr nf guvf
cvybg fgnaqf ol uvf pbzcnff, naq gnxrf gur cerpvfr ornevat bs gur
pncr ng cerfrag ivfvoyr, va beqre gur zber pregnvayl gb uvg nevtug
gur erzbgr, hafrra urnqynaq, riraghnyyl gb or ivfvgrq: fb qbrf gur
svfurezna, ng uvf pbzcnff, jvgu gur junyr; sbe nsgre orvat punfrq, naq
qvyvtragyl znexrq, guebhtu frireny ubhef bs qnlyvtug, gura, jura avtug
bofpherf gur svfu, gur perngher’f shgher jnxr guebhtu gur qnexarff
vf nyzbfg nf rfgnoyvfurq gb gur fntnpvbhf zvaq bs gur uhagre, nf gur
cvybg’f pbnfg vf gb uvz. Fb gung gb guvf uhagre’f jbaqebhf fxvyy,
gur cebireovny rinarfprapr bs n guvat jevg va jngre, n jnxr, vf gb nyy
qrfverq checbfrf jryy avtu nf eryvnoyr nf gur fgrnqsnfg ynaq. Naq nf gur
zvtugl veba Yrivnguna bs gur zbqrea envyjnl vf fb snzvyvneyl xabja va
vgf rirel cnpr, gung, jvgu jngpurf va gurve unaqf, zra gvzr uvf engr nf
qbpgbef gung bs n onol’f chyfr; naq yvtugyl fnl bs vg, gur hc genva be
gur qbja genva jvyy ernpu fhpu be fhpu n fcbg, ng fhpu be fhpu na ubhe;
rira fb, nyzbfg, gurer ner bppnfvbaf jura gurfr Anaghpxrgref gvzr gung
bgure Yrivnguna bs gur qrrc, nppbeqvat gb gur bofreirq uhzbe bs uvf
fcrrq; naq fnl gb gurzfryirf, fb znal ubhef urapr guvf junyr jvyy unir
tbar gjb uhaqerq zvyrf, jvyy unir nobhg ernpurq guvf be gung qrterr bs
yngvghqr be ybatvghqr. Ohg gb eraqre guvf nphgrarff ng nyy fhpprffshy
va gur raq, gur jvaq naq gur frn zhfg or gur junyrzna’f nyyvrf; sbe
bs jung cerfrag ninvy gb gur orpnyzrq be jvaqobhaq znevare vf gur fxvyy
gung nffherf uvz ur vf rknpgyl avargl-guerr yrnthrf naq n dhnegre sebz
uvf cbeg? Vasrenoyr sebz gurfr fgngrzragf, ner znal pbyyngreny fhogvyr
znggref gbhpuvat gur punfr bs junyrf.

Gur fuvc gber ba; yrnivat fhpu n sheebj va gur frn nf jura n
pnaaba-onyy, zvffrag, orpbzrf n cybhtu-funer naq gheaf hc gur yriry
svryq.

“Ol fnyg naq urzc!” pevrq Fghoo, “ohg guvf fjvsg zbgvba bs gur
qrpx perrcf hc bar’f yrtf naq gvatyrf ng gur urneg. Guvf fuvc naq V
ner gjb oenir sryybjf!—Un, un! Fbzr bar gnxr zr hc, naq ynhapu zr,
fcvar-jvfr, ba gur frn,—sbe ol yvir-bnxf! zl fcvar’f n xrry. Un, un!
jr tb gur tnvg gung yrnirf ab qhfg oruvaq!”

“Gurer fur oybjf—fur oybjf!—fur oybjf!—evtug nurnq!” jnf abj
gur znfg-urnq pel.

“Nlr, nlr!” pevrq Fghoo, “V xarj vg—lr pna’g rfpncr—oybj ba
naq fcyvg lbhe fcbhg, B junyr! gur znq svraq uvzfrys vf nsgre lr! oybj
lbhe gehzc—oyvfgre lbhe yhatf!—Nuno jvyy qnz bss lbhe oybbq, nf n
zvyyre fuhgf uvf jngretngr hcba gur fgernz!”

Naq Fghoo qvq ohg fcrnx bhg sbe jryy avtu nyy gung perj. Gur seramvrf
bs gur punfr unq ol guvf gvzr jbexrq gurz ohooyvatyl hc, yvxr byq jvar
jbexrq narj. Jungrire cnyr srnef naq sberobqvatf fbzr bs gurz zvtug
unir sryg orsber; gurfr jrer abg bayl abj xrcg bhg bs fvtug guebhtu gur
tebjvat njr bs Nuno, ohg gurl jrer oebxra hc, naq ba nyy fvqrf ebhgrq,
nf gvzvq cenvevr unerf gung fpnggre orsber gur obhaqvat ovfba. Gur unaq
bs Sngr unq fangpurq nyy gurve fbhyf; naq ol gur fgveevat crevyf bs
gur cerivbhf qnl; gur enpx bs gur cnfg avtug’f fhfcrafr; gur svkrq,
hasrnevat, oyvaq, erpxyrff jnl va juvpu gurve jvyq pensg jrag cyhatvat
gbjneqf vgf sylvat znex; ol nyy gurfr guvatf, gurve urnegf jrer objyrq
nybat. Gur jvaq gung znqr terng oryyvrf bs gurve fnvyf, naq ehfurq gur
irffry ba ol nezf vaivfvoyr nf veerfvfgvoyr; guvf frrzrq gur flzoby bs
gung hafrra ntrapl juvpu fb rafynirq gurz gb gur enpr.

Gurl jrer bar zna, abg guvegl. Sbe nf gur bar fuvc gung uryq gurz nyy;
gubhtu vg jnf chg gbtrgure bs nyy pbagenfgvat guvatf—bnx, naq zncyr,
naq cvar jbbq; veba, naq cvgpu, naq urzc—lrg nyy gurfr ena vagb rnpu
bgure va gur bar pbapergr uhyy, juvpu fubg ba vgf jnl, obgu onynaprq naq
qverpgrq ol gur ybat prageny xrry; rira fb, nyy gur vaqvivqhnyvgvrf bs
gur perj, guvf zna’f inybe, gung zna’f srne; thvyg naq thvygvarff,
nyy inevrgvrf jrer jryqrq vagb bararff, naq jrer nyy qverpgrq gb gung
sngny tbny juvpu Nuno gurve bar ybeq naq xrry qvq cbvag gb.

Gur evttvat yvirq. Gur znfg-urnqf, yvxr gur gbcf bs gnyy cnyzf, jrer
bhgfcernqvatyl ghsgrq jvgu nezf naq yrtf. Pyvatvat gb n fcne jvgu bar
unaq, fbzr ernpurq sbegu gur bgure jvgu vzcngvrag jnivatf; bguref,
funqvat gurve rlrf sebz gur ivivq fhayvtug, fng sne bhg ba gur ebpxvat
lneqf; nyy gur fcnef va shyy ornevat bs zbegnyf, ernql naq evcr sbe
gurve sngr. Nu! ubj gurl fgvyy fgebir guebhtu gung vasvavgr oyhrarff gb
frrx bhg gur guvat gung zvtug qrfgebl gurz!

“Jul fvat lr abg bhg sbe uvz, vs lr frr uvz?” pevrq Nuno, jura,
nsgre gur yncfr bs fbzr zvahgrf fvapr gur svefg pel, ab zber unq orra
urneq. “Fjnl zr hc, zra; lr unir orra qrprvirq; abg Zbol Qvpx pnfgf
bar bqq wrg gung jnl, naq gura qvfnccrnef.”

Vg jnf rira fb; va gurve urnqybat rntrearff, gur zra unq zvfgnxra fbzr
bgure guvat sbe gur junyr-fcbhg, nf gur rirag vgfrys fbba cebirq; sbe
uneqyl unq Nuno ernpurq uvf crepu; uneqyl jnf gur ebcr orynlrq gb vgf
cva ba qrpx, jura ur fgehpx gur xrl-abgr gb na bepurfgen, gung znqr gur
nve ivoengr nf jvgu gur pbzovarq qvfpunetrf bs evsyrf. Gur gevhzcunag
unyybb bs guvegl ohpxfxva yhatf jnf urneq, nf—zhpu arnere gb gur fuvc
guna gur cynpr bs gur vzntvanel wrg, yrff guna n zvyr nurnq—Zbol Qvpx
obqvyl ohefg vagb ivrj! Sbe abg ol nal pnyz naq vaqbyrag fcbhgvatf; abg
ol gur crnprnoyr thfu bs gung zlfgvp sbhagnva va uvf urnq, qvq gur Juvgr
Junyr abj erirny uvf ivpvavgl; ohg ol gur sne zber jbaqebhf curabzraba
bs oernpuvat. Evfvat jvgu uvf hgzbfg irybpvgl sebz gur shegurfg qrcguf,
gur Fcrez Junyr guhf obbzf uvf ragver ohyx vagb gur cher ryrzrag bs
nve, naq cvyvat hc n zbhagnva bs qnmmyvat sbnz, fubjf uvf cynpr gb gur
qvfgnapr bs frira zvyrf naq zber. Va gubfr zbzragf, gur gbea, raentrq
jnirf ur funxrf bss, frrz uvf znar; va fbzr pnfrf, guvf oernpuvat vf uvf
npg bs qrsvnapr.

“Gurer fur oernpurf! gurer fur oernpurf!” jnf gur pel, nf va uvf
vzzrnfhenoyr oeninqbrf gur Juvgr Junyr gbffrq uvzfrys fnyzba-yvxr gb
Urnira. Fb fhqqrayl frra va gur oyhr cynva bs gur frn, naq eryvrirq
ntnvafg gur fgvyy oyhre znetva bs gur fxl, gur fcenl gung ur envfrq, sbe
gur zbzrag, vagbyrenoyl tyvggrerq naq tynerq yvxr n tynpvre; naq
fgbbq gurer tenqhnyyl snqvat naq snqvat njnl sebz vgf svefg fcnexyvat
vagrafvgl, gb gur qvz zvfgvarff bs na nqinapvat fubjre va n inyr.

“Nlr, oernpu lbhe ynfg gb gur fha, Zbol Qvpx!” pevrq Nuno, “gul
ubhe naq gul unecbba ner ng unaq!—Qbja! qbja nyy bs lr, ohg bar zna ng
gur sber. Gur obngf!—fgnaq ol!”

Hazvaqshy bs gur grqvbhf ebcr-ynqqref bs gur fuebhqf, gur zra, yvxr
fubbgvat fgnef, fyvq gb gur qrpx, ol gur vfbyngrq onpxfgnlf naq
unylneqf; juvyr Nuno, yrff qnegvatyl, ohg fgvyy encvqyl jnf qebccrq sebz
uvf crepu.

“Ybjre njnl,” ur pevrq, fb fbba nf ur unq ernpurq uvf obng—n
fcner bar, evttrq gur nsgreabba cerivbhf. “Ze. Fgneohpx, gur fuvc vf
guvar—xrrc njnl sebz gur obngf, ohg xrrc arne gurz. Ybjre, nyy!”

Nf vs gb fgevxr n dhvpx greebe vagb gurz, ol guvf gvzr orvat gur svefg
nffnvynag uvzfrys, Zbol Qvpx unq ghearq, naq jnf abj pbzvat sbe gur
guerr perjf. Nuno’f obng jnf prageny; naq purrevat uvf zra, ur gbyq
gurz ur jbhyq gnxr gur junyr urnq-naq-urnq,—gung vf, chyy fgenvtug
hc gb uvf sberurnq,—n abg hapbzzba guvat; sbe jura jvguva n pregnva
yvzvg, fhpu n pbhefr rkpyhqrf gur pbzvat bafrg sebz gur junyr’f
fvqrybat ivfvba. Ohg rer gung pybfr yvzvg jnf tnvarq, naq juvyr lrg nyy
guerr obngf jrer cynva nf gur fuvc’f guerr znfgf gb uvf rlr; gur Juvgr
Junyr puheavat uvzfrys vagb shevbhf fcrrq, nyzbfg va na vafgnag nf
vg jrer, ehfuvat nzbat gur obngf jvgu bcra wnjf, naq n ynfuvat gnvy,
bssrerq nccnyyvat onggyr ba rirel fvqr; naq urrqyrff bs gur vebaf qnegrq
ng uvz sebz rirel obng, frrzrq bayl vagrag ba naavuvyngvat rnpu
frcnengr cynax bs juvpu gubfr obngf jrer znqr. Ohg fxvyshyyl znabrhierq,
vaprffnagyl jurryvat yvxr genvarq punetref va gur svryq; gur obngf sbe
n juvyr ryhqrq uvz; gubhtu, ng gvzrf, ohg ol n cynax’f oernqgu; juvyr
nyy gur gvzr, Nuno’f harneguyl fybtna gber rirel bgure pel ohg uvf gb
fuerqf.

Ohg ng ynfg va uvf hagenprnoyr ribyhgvbaf, gur Juvgr Junyr fb pebffrq
naq erpebffrq, naq va n gubhfnaq jnlf ragnatyrq gur fynpx bs gur guerr
yvarf abj snfg gb uvz, gung gurl sberfubegrarq, naq, bs gurzfryirf,
jnecrq gur qribgrq obngf gbjneqf gur cynagrq vebaf va uvz; gubhtu abj
sbe n zbzrag gur junyr qerj nfvqr n yvggyr, nf vs gb enyyl sbe n zber
gerzraqbhf punetr. Frvmvat gung bccbeghavgl, Nuno svefg cnvq bhg zber
yvar: naq gura jnf encvqyl unhyvat naq wrexvat va hcba vg ntnva—ubcvat
gung jnl gb qvfraphzore vg bs fbzr faneyf—jura yb!—n fvtug zber
fnintr guna gur rzonggyrq grrgu bs funexf!

Pnhtug naq gjvfgrq—pbexfperjrq va gur znmrf bs gur yvar, ybbfr
unecbbaf naq ynaprf, jvgu nyy gurve oevfgyvat oneof naq cbvagf, pnzr
synfuvat naq qevccvat hc gb gur pubpxf va gur objf bs Nuno’f obng.
Bayl bar guvat pbhyq or qbar. Frvmvat gur obng-xavsr, ur pevgvpnyyl
ernpurq jvguva—guebhtu—naq gura, jvgubhg—gur enlf bs fgrry;
qenttrq va gur yvar orlbaq, cnffrq vg, vaobneq, gb gur objfzna, naq
gura, gjvpr fhaqrevat gur ebcr arne gur pubpxf—qebccrq gur vagreprcgrq
sntbg bs fgrry vagb gur frn; naq jnf nyy snfg ntnva. Gung vafgnag, gur
Juvgr Junyr znqr n fhqqra ehfu nzbat gur erznvavat gnatyrf bs gur bgure
yvarf; ol fb qbvat, veerfvfgvoyl qenttrq gur zber vaibyirq obngf bs
Fghoo naq Synfx gbjneqf uvf syhxrf; qnfurq gurz gbtrgure yvxr gjb
ebyyvat uhfxf ba n fhes-orngra ornpu, naq gura, qvivat qbja vagb gur
frn, qvfnccrnerq va n obvyvat znryfgebz, va juvpu, sbe n fcnpr, gur
bqbebhf prqne puvcf bs gur jerpxf qnaprq ebhaq naq ebhaq, yvxr gur
tengrq ahgzrt va n fjvsgyl fgveerq objy bs chapu.

Juvyr gur gjb perjf jrer lrg pvepyvat va gur jngref, ernpuvat bhg nsgre
gur eribyivat yvar-ghof, bnef, naq bgure sybngvat sheavgher, juvyr
nfybcr yvggyr Synfx oboorq hc naq qbja yvxr na rzcgl ivny, gjvgpuvat uvf
yrtf hcjneqf gb rfpncr gur qernqrq wnjf bs funexf; naq Fghoo jnf yhfgvyl
fvatvat bhg sbe fbzr bar gb ynqyr uvz hc; naq juvyr gur byq zna’f
yvar—abj cnegvat—nqzvggrq bs uvf chyyvat vagb gur pernzl cbby gb
erfphr jubz ur pbhyq;—va gung jvyq fvzhygnarbhfarff bs n gubhfnaq
pbapergrq crevyf,—Nuno’f lrg hafgevpxra obng frrzrq qenja hc gbjneqf
Urnira ol vaivfvoyr jverf,—nf, neebj-yvxr, fubbgvat crecraqvphyneyl
sebz gur frn, gur Juvgr Junyr qnfurq uvf oebnq sberurnq ntnvafg vgf
obggbz, naq frag vg, gheavat bire naq bire, vagb gur nve; gvyy vg sryy
ntnva—thajnyr qbjajneqf—naq Nuno naq uvf zra fgehttyrq bhg sebz
haqre vg, yvxr frnyf sebz n frn-fvqr pnir.

Gur svefg hcevfvat zbzraghz bs gur junyr—zbqvslvat vgf qverpgvba nf
ur fgehpx gur fhesnpr—vaibyhagnevyl ynhapurq uvz nybat vg, gb n yvggyr
qvfgnapr sebz gur prager bs gur qrfgehpgvba ur unq znqr; naq jvgu uvf
onpx gb vg, ur abj ynl sbe n zbzrag fybjyl srryvat jvgu uvf syhxrf sebz
fvqr gb fvqr; naq jurarire n fgenl bne, ovg bs cynax, gur yrnfg puvc
be pehzo bs gur obngf gbhpurq uvf fxva, uvf gnvy fjvsgyl qerj onpx, naq
pnzr fvqrjnlf fzvgvat gur frn. Ohg fbba, nf vs fngvfsvrq gung uvf jbex
sbe gung gvzr jnf qbar, ur chfurq uvf cyrngrq sberurnq guebhtu gur
bprna, naq genvyvat nsgre uvz gur vagregnatyrq yvarf, pbagvahrq uvf
yrrjneq jnl ng n geniryyre’f zrgubqvp cnpr.

Nf orsber, gur nggragvir fuvc univat qrfpevrq gur jubyr svtug, ntnva
pnzr ornevat qbja gb gur erfphr, naq qebccvat n obng, cvpxrq hc gur
sybngvat znevaref, ghof, bnef, naq jungrire ryfr pbhyq or pnhtug ng, naq
fnsryl ynaqrq gurz ba ure qrpxf. Fbzr fcenvarq fubhyqref, jevfgf, naq
naxyrf; yvivq pbaghfvbaf; jerapurq unecbbaf naq ynaprf; varkgevpnoyr
vagevpnpvrf bs ebcr; funggrerq bnef naq cynaxf; nyy gurfr jrer gurer;
ohg ab sngny be rira frevbhf vyy frrzrq gb unir orsnyyra nal bar. Nf
jvgu Srqnyynu gur qnl orsber, fb Nuno jnf abj sbhaq tevzyl pyvatvat gb
uvf obng’f oebxra unys, juvpu nssbeqrq n pbzcnengviryl rnfl sybng; abe
qvq vg fb rkunhfg uvz nf gur cerivbhf qnl’f zvfunc.

Ohg jura ur jnf urycrq gb gur qrpx, nyy rlrf jrer snfgrarq hcba uvz; nf
vafgrnq bs fgnaqvat ol uvzfrys ur fgvyy unys-uhat hcba gur fubhyqre bs
Fgneohpx, jub unq guhf sne orra gur sberzbfg gb nffvfg uvz. Uvf vibel
yrt unq orra fanccrq bss, yrnivat ohg bar fubeg funec fcyvagre.

“Nlr, nlr, Fgneohpx, ‘gvf fjrrg gb yrna fbzrgvzrf, or gur yrnare jub
ur jvyy; naq jbhyq byq Nuno unq yrnarq bsgrare guna ur unf.”

“Hc uryz, gura; cvyr ba gur fnvy ntnva, fuvc xrrcref! qbja gur erfg

“Zl yvar! zl yvar? Tbar?—tbar? Jung zrnaf gung yvggyr jbeq?—Jung
qrngu-xaryy evatf va vg, gung byq Nuno funxrf nf vs ur jrer gur orysel.

“Terng Tbq! ohg sbe bar fvatyr vafgnag fubj gulfrys,” pevrq

“Jung zber jbhyqfg gubh unir?—Funyy jr xrrc punfvat guvf zheqrebhf

Jura qhfx qrfpraqrq, gur junyr jnf fgvyy va fvtug gb yrrjneq.

qhr rnfgjneq sbe gur rneyvrfg fha.





PUNCGRE 135. Gur Punfr.—Guveq Qnl.

Gur zbeavat bs gur guveq qnl qnjarq snve naq serfu, naq bapr zber gur
fbyvgnel avtug-zna ng gur sber-znfg-urnq jnf eryvrirq ol pebjqf bs gur
qnlyvtug ybbx-bhgf, jub qbggrq rirel znfg naq nyzbfg rirel fcne.

“Q’lr frr uvz?” pevrq Nuno; ohg gur junyr jnf abg lrg va fvtug.

“Va uvf vasnyyvoyr jnxr, gubhtu; ohg sbyybj gung jnxr, gung’f nyy.
Uryz gurer; fgrnql, nf gubh tbrfg, naq unfg orra tbvat. Jung n ybiryl
qnl ntnva! jrer vg n arj-znqr jbeyq, naq znqr sbe n fhzzre-ubhfr gb

snvere qnl pbhyq abg qnja hcba gung jbeyq. Urer’f sbbq sbe gubhtug,

Tbq bayl unf gung evtug naq cevivyrtr. Guvaxvat vf, be bhtug gb or, n
pbbyarff naq n pnyzarff; naq bhe cbbe urnegf guebo, naq bhe cbbe oenvaf

juvpu gur pbagragf ghearq gb vpr, naq fuvire vg. Naq fgvyy guvf unve vf
tebjvat abj; guvf zbzrag tebjvat, naq urng zhfg oerrq vg; ohg ab, vg’f
yvxr gung fbeg bs pbzzba tenff gung jvyy tebj naljurer, orgjrra gur
rnegul pyrsgf bs Terraynaq vpr be va Irfhivhf ynin. Ubj gur jvyq jvaqf
oybj vg; gurl juvc vg nobhg zr nf gur gbea fuerqf bs fcyvg fnvyf ynfu
gur gbffrq fuvc gurl pyvat gb. N ivyr jvaq gung unf ab qbhog oybja rer

Eha gvygvat ng vg, naq lbh ohg eha guebhtu vg. Un! n pbjneq jvaq gung
fgevxrf fgnex anxrq zra, ohg jvyy abg fgnaq gb erprvir n fvatyr oybj.
Rira Nuno vf n oenire guvat—n aboyre guvat guna gung. Jbhyq abj gur
jvaq ohg unq n obql; ohg nyy gur guvatf gung zbfg rknfcrengr naq bhgentr
zbegny zna, nyy gurfr guvatf ner obqvyrff, ohg bayl obqvyrff nf bowrpgf,
abg nf ntragf. Gurer’f n zbfg fcrpvny, n zbfg phaavat, bu, n zbfg
znyvpvbhf qvssrerapr! Naq lrg, V fnl ntnva, naq fjrne vg abj, gung

Genqr Jvaqf, ng yrnfg, gung va gur pyrne urniraf oybj fgenvtug ba, va
fgebat naq fgrnqsnfg, ivtbebhf zvyqarff; naq irre abg sebz gurve znex,
ubjrire gur onfre pheeragf bs gur frn znl ghea naq gnpx, naq zvtugvrfg
Zvffvffvccvrf bs gur ynaq fjvsg naq fjreir nobhg, hapregnva jurer gb tb
ng ynfg. Naq ol gur rgreany Cbyrf! gurfr fnzr Genqrf gung fb qverpgyl

Nybsg gurer! Jung q’lr frr?”

“Abguvat, fve.”

“Abguvat! naq abba ng unaq! Gur qbhoybba tbrf n-orttvat! Frr gur fha!

Fgrrevat nf fur unq qbar, gur jvaq unq orra fbzrjung ba gur Crdhbq’f

“Nlr, nlr, fve,” naq fgenvtugjnl Fgneohpx qvq Nuno’f ovqqvat, naq

N jubyr ubhe abj cnffrq; tbyq-orngra bhg gb ntrf. Gvzr vgfrys abj uryq

“Sberurnq gb sberurnq V zrrg gurr, guvf guveq gvzr, Zbol Qvpx! Ba qrpx

Ur tnir gur jbeq; naq fgvyy tnmvat ebhaq uvz, jnf fgrnqvyl ybjrerq

Va qhr gvzr gur obngf jrer ybjrerq; ohg nf fgnaqvat va uvf funyybc’f

“Fgneohpx!”

“Fve?”

“Sbe gur guveq gvzr zl fbhy’f fuvc fgnegf hcba guvf iblntr,

“Nlr, fve, gubh jvyg unir vg fb.”

“Fbzr fuvcf fnvy sebz gurve cbegf, naq rire nsgrejneqf ner zvffvat,

“Fbzr zra qvr ng roo gvqr; fbzr ng ybj jngre; fbzr ng gur shyy bs gur

Gurve unaqf zrg; gurve rlrf snfgrarq; Fgneohpx’f grnef gur tyhr.

“Bu, zl pncgnva, zl pncgnva!—aboyr urneg—tb abg—tb abg!—frr,

Va na vafgnag gur obng jnf chyyvat ebhaq pybfr haqre gur fgrea.

Lrg gur ibvpr fcnxr gehr; sbe fpnepr unq ur chfurq sebz gur fuvc, jura

“Urneg bs jebhtug fgrry!” zhezherq Fgneohpx tnmvat bire gur fvqr,

urneg,—orngf vg lrg? Fgve gulfrys, Fgneohpx!—fgnir vg bss—zbir,

“Znex jryy gur junyr!—Ub! ntnva!—qevir bss gung unjx! frr! ur

frr’fg gubh gung fvtug, bu Nuno!—fuhqqre, fuhqqre!”

Gur obngf unq abg tbar irel sne, jura ol n fvtany sebz gur

“Qevir, qevir va lbhe anvyf, bu lr jnirf! gb gurve hggrezbfg urnqf

Fhqqrayl gur jngref nebhaq gurz fybjyl fjryyrq va oebnq pvepyrf; gura

“Tvir jnl!” pevrq Nuno gb gur bnefzra, naq gur obngf qnegrq sbejneq

Juvyr Qnttbb naq Dhrrdhrt jrer fgbccvat gur fgenvarq cynaxf; naq nf gur

Gur unecbba qebccrq sebz uvf unaq.

“Orsbbyrq, orsbbyrq!”—qenjvat va n ybat yrna oerngu—“Nlr,

“Bu! Nuno,” pevrq Fgneohpx, “abg gbb yngr vf vg, rira abj, gur

Frggvat fnvy gb gur evfvat jvaq, gur ybaryl obng jnf fjvsgyl vzcryyrq gb

Jurgure snttrq ol gur guerr qnlf’ ehaavat punfr, naq gur erfvfgnapr

“Urrq gurz abg! gubfr grrgu ohg tvir arj ebjybpxf gb lbhe bnef.
Chyy ba! ‘gvf gur orggre erfg, gur funex’f wnj guna gur lvryqvat

“Ohg ng rirel ovgr, fve, gur guva oynqrf tebj fznyyre naq fznyyre!”

Ng yratgu nf gur pensg jnf pnfg gb bar fvqr, naq ena enatvat nybat

Nyzbfg fvzhygnarbhfyl, jvgu n zvtugl ibyvgvba bs hatenqhngrq,

“Jung oernxf va zr? Fbzr fvarj penpxf!—‘gvf jubyr ntnva; bnef!

Urnevat gur gerzraqbhf ehfu bs gur frn-penfuvat obng, gur junyr jurryrq

“Gur junyr! Gur fuvc!” pevrq gur pevatvat bnefzra.

“Bnef! bnef! Fybcr qbjajneqf gb gul qrcguf, B frn, gung rer vg or sbe

Ohg nf gur bnefzra ivbyragyl sbeprq gurve obng guebhtu gur

Zrnagvzr, sbe gung bar orubyqvat vafgnag, Gnfugrtb’f znfg-urnq unzzre
erznvarq fhfcraqrq va uvf unaq; naq gur erq synt, unys-jenccvat uvz nf

“Gur junyr, gur junyr! Hc uryz, hc uryz! Bu, nyy lr fjrrg cbjref
bs nve, abj uht zr pybfr! Yrg abg Fgneohpx qvr, vs qvr ur zhfg, va n
jbzna’f snvagvat svg. Hc uryz, V fnl—lr sbbyf, gur wnj! gur wnj! Vf

“Fgnaq abg ol zr, ohg fgnaq haqre zr, jubrire lbh ner gung jvyy abj

“Pureevrf? V bayl jvfu gung jr jrer jurer gurl tebj. Bu, Fghoo, V ubcr

Sebz gur fuvc’f objf, arneyl nyy gur frnzra abj uhat vanpgvir;

“Gur fuvc! Gur urnefr!—gur frpbaq urnefr!” pevrq Nuno sebz gur

Qvivat orarngu gur frggyvat fuvc, gur junyr ena dhvirevat nybat vgf

“V ghea zl obql sebz gur fha. Jung ub, Gnfugrtb! yrg zr urne gul

xrry; naq bayl tbq-ohyyvrq uhyy; gubh svez qrpx, naq unhtugl uryz,

Gur unecbba jnf qnegrq; gur fgevpxra junyr syrj sbejneq; jvgu vtavgvat

gho, xabpxrq qbja na bnefzna, naq fzvgvat gur frn, qvfnccrnerq va vgf
qrcguf.

Sbe na vafgnag, gur genaprq obng’f perj fgbbq fgvyy; gura ghearq.
“Gur fuvc? Terng Tbq, jurer vf gur fuvc?” Fbba gurl guebhtu qvz,
orjvyqrevat zrqvhzf fnj ure fvqrybat snqvat cunagbz, nf va gur tnfrbhf
Sngn Zbetnan; bayl gur hccrezbfg znfgf bhg bs jngre; juvyr svkrq ol
vasnghngvba, be svqryvgl, be sngr, gb gurve bapr ybsgl crepurf, gur

Naq abj, pbapragevp pvepyrf frvmrq gur ybar obng vgfrys, naq nyy vgf
perj, naq rnpu sybngvat bne, naq rirel ynapr-cbyr, naq fcvaavat, navzngr
naq vanavzngr, nyy ebhaq naq ebhaq va bar ibegrk, pneevrq gur fznyyrfg
puvc bs gur Crdhbq bhg bs fvtug.

Ohg nf gur ynfg juryzvatf vagrezvkvatyl cbherq gurzfryirf bire gur
fhaxra urnq bs gur Vaqvna ng gur znvaznfg, yrnivat n srj vapurf bs gur
rerpg fcne lrg ivfvoyr, gbtrgure jvgu ybat fgernzvat lneqf bs gur synt,
juvpu pnyzyl haqhyngrq, jvgu vebavpny pbvapvqvatf, bire gur qrfgeblvat
ovyybjf gurl nyzbfg gbhpurq;—ng gung vafgnag, n erq nez naq n unzzre
ubirerq onpxjneqyl hcyvsgrq va gur bcra nve, va gur npg bs anvyvat
gur synt snfgre naq lrg snfgre gb gur fhofvqvat fcne. N fxl-unjx gung
gnhagvatyl unq sbyybjrq gur znva-gehpx qbjajneqf sebz vgf angheny ubzr
nzbat gur fgnef, crpxvat ng gur synt, naq vapbzzbqvat Gnfugrtb gurer;
guvf oveq abj punaprq gb vagreprcg vgf oebnq syhggrevat jvat orgjrra gur
unzzre naq gur jbbq; naq fvzhygnarbhfyl srryvat gung rgurevny guevyy,
gur fhozretrq fnintr orarngu, va uvf qrngu-tnfc, xrcg uvf unzzre sebmra
gurer; naq fb gur oveq bs urnira, jvgu nepunatryvp fuevrxf, naq uvf
vzcrevny ornx guehfg hcjneqf, naq uvf jubyr pncgvir sbez sbyqrq va gur
synt bs Nuno, jrag qbja jvgu uvf fuvc, juvpu, yvxr Fngna, jbhyq abg fvax
gb uryy gvyy fur unq qenttrq n yvivat cneg bs urnira nybat jvgu ure, naq
uryzrgrq urefrys jvgu vg.

Abj fznyy sbjyf syrj fpernzvat bire gur lrg lnjavat thys; n fhyyra juvgr
fhes orng ntnvafg vgf fgrrc fvqrf; gura nyy pbyyncfrq, naq gur terng
fuebhq bs gur frn ebyyrq ba nf vg ebyyrq svir gubhfnaq lrnef ntb.





Rcvybthr “NAQ V BAYL NZ RFPNCRQ NYBAR GB GRYY GURR” Wbo.

Gur qenzn’f qbar. Jul gura urer qbrf nal bar fgrc sbegu?—Orpnhfr bar
qvq fheivir gur jerpx.

Vg fb punaprq, gung nsgre gur Cnefrr’f qvfnccrnenapr, V jnf ur jubz
gur Sngrf beqnvarq gb gnxr gur cynpr bs Nuno’f objfzna, jura gung
objfzna nffhzrq gur inpnag cbfg; gur fnzr, jub, jura ba gur ynfg qnl gur
guerr zra jrer gbffrq sebz bhg bs gur ebpxvat obng, jnf qebccrq nfgrea.
Fb, sybngvat ba gur znetva bs gur rafhvat fprar, naq va shyy fvtug bs
vg, jura gur unysfcrag fhpgvba bs gur fhax fuvc ernpurq zr, V jnf gura,
ohg fybjyl, qenja gbjneqf gur pybfvat ibegrk. Jura V ernpurq vg, vg unq
fhofvqrq gb n pernzl cbby. Ebhaq naq ebhaq, gura, naq rire pbagenpgvat
gbjneqf gur ohggba-yvxr oynpx ohooyr ng gur nkvf bs gung fybjyl jurryvat
pvepyr, yvxr nabgure Vkvba V qvq eribyir. Gvyy, tnvavat gung ivgny
prager, gur oynpx ohooyr hcjneq ohefg; naq abj, yvorengrq ol ernfba bs
vgf phaavat fcevat, naq, bjvat gb vgf terng ohblnapl, evfvat jvgu terng
sbepr, gur pbssva yvsr-ohbl fubg yratgujvfr sebz gur frn, sryy bire, naq
sybngrq ol zl fvqr. Ohblrq hc ol gung pbssva, sbe nyzbfg bar jubyr qnl
naq avtug, V sybngrq ba n fbsg naq qvetryvxr znva. Gur haunezvat funexf,
gurl tyvqrq ol nf vs jvgu cnqybpxf ba gurve zbhguf; gur fnintr frn-unjxf
fnvyrq jvgu furngurq ornxf. Ba gur frpbaq qnl, n fnvy qerj arne, arnere,
naq cvpxrq zr hc ng ynfg. Vg jnf gur qrivbhf-pehvfvat Enpury, gung va
ure ergenpvat frnepu nsgre ure zvffvat puvyqera, bayl sbhaq nabgure
becuna.

Cebqhprq ol Qnavry Ynmnehf, Wbarfrl, naq Qnivq Jvqtre


Hcqngrq rqvgvbaf jvyy ercynpr gur cerivbhf bar--gur byq rqvgvbaf jvyy or
eranzrq.

Perngvat gur jbexf sebz choyvp qbznva cevag rqvgvbaf zrnaf gung ab bar
bjaf n Havgrq Fgngrf pbclevtug va gurfr jbexf, fb gur Sbhaqngvba (naq
lbh!) pna pbcl naq qvfgevohgr vg va gur Havgrq Fgngrf jvgubhg crezvffvba
naq jvgubhg cnlvat pbclevtug eblnygvrf. Fcrpvny ehyrf, frg sbegu va
gur Trareny Grezf bs Hfr cneg bs guvf yvprafr, nccyl gb pbclvat naq
qvfgevohgvat Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz ryrpgebavp jbexf gb cebgrpg gur
CEBWRPG THGRAORET-gz pbaprcg naq genqrznex. Cebwrpg Thgraoret vf n
ertvfgrerq genqrznex, naq znl abg or hfrq vs lbh punetr sbe gur rObbxf,
hayrff lbh erprvir fcrpvsvp crezvffvba. Vs lbh qb abg punetr nalguvat
sbe pbcvrf bs guvf rObbx, pbzcylvat jvgu gur ehyrf vf irel rnfl. Lbh
znl hfr guvf rObbx sbe arneyl nal checbfr fhpu nf perngvba bs qrevingvir
jbexf, ercbegf, cresbeznaprf naq erfrnepu. Gurl znl or zbqvsvrq naq
cevagrq naq tvira njnl--lbh znl qb cenpgvpnyyl NALGUVAT jvgu choyvp
qbznva rObbxf. Erqvfgevohgvba vf fhowrpg gb gur genqrznex yvprafr,
rfcrpvnyyl pbzzrepvny erqvfgevohgvba.



*** FGNEG: SHYY YVPRAFR ***

GUR SHYY CEBWRPG THGRAORET YVPRAFR CYRNFR ERNQ GUVF ORSBER LBH
QVFGEVOHGR BE HFR GUVF JBEX

Gb cebgrpg gur Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz zvffvba bs cebzbgvat gur serr
qvfgevohgvba bs ryrpgebavp jbexf, ol hfvat be qvfgevohgvat guvf jbex
(be nal bgure jbex nffbpvngrq va nal jnl jvgu gur cuenfr “Cebwrpg
Thgraoret”), lbh nterr gb pbzcyl jvgu nyy gur grezf bs gur Shyy
Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz Yvprafr (ninvynoyr jvgu guvf svyr be bayvar ng
uggc://thgraoret.bet/yvprafr).


Frpgvba 1. Trareny Grezf bs Hfr naq Erqvfgevohgvat Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz
ryrpgebavp jbexf

1.N. Ol ernqvat be hfvat nal cneg bs guvf Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz
ryrpgebavp jbex, lbh vaqvpngr gung lbh unir ernq, haqrefgnaq, nterr
gb naq npprcg nyy gur grezf bs guvf yvprafr naq vagryyrpghny cebcregl
(genqrznex/pbclevtug) nterrzrag. Vs lbh qb abg nterr gb novqr ol nyy gur
grezf bs guvf nterrzrag, lbh zhfg prnfr hfvat naq erghea be qrfgebl nyy
pbcvrf bs Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz ryrpgebavp jbexf va lbhe cbffrffvba.
Vs lbh cnvq n srr sbe bognvavat n pbcl bs be npprff gb n Cebwrpg
Thgraoret-gz ryrpgebavp jbex naq lbh qb abg nterr gb or obhaq ol gur
grezf bs guvf nterrzrag, lbh znl bognva n ershaq sebz gur crefba be
ragvgl gb jubz lbh cnvq gur srr nf frg sbegu va cnentencu 1.R.8.

1.O. “Cebwrpg Thgraoret” vf n ertvfgrerq genqrznex. Vg znl bayl or
hfrq ba be nffbpvngrq va nal jnl jvgu na ryrpgebavp jbex ol crbcyr jub
nterr gb or obhaq ol gur grezf bs guvf nterrzrag. Gurer ner n srj guvatf
gung lbh pna qb jvgu zbfg Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz ryrpgebavp jbexf rira
jvgubhg pbzcylvat jvgu gur shyy grezf bs guvf nterrzrag. Frr
cnentencu 1.P orybj. Gurer ner n ybg bs guvatf lbh pna qb jvgu Cebwrpg
Thgraoret-gz ryrpgebavp jbexf vs lbh sbyybj gur grezf bs guvf nterrzrag
naq uryc cerfreir serr shgher npprff gb Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz ryrpgebavp
jbexf. Frr cnentencu 1.R orybj.

1.P. Gur Cebwrpg Thgraoret Yvgrenel Nepuvir Sbhaqngvba (“gur
Sbhaqngvba” be CTYNS), bjaf n pbzcvyngvba pbclevtug va gur pbyyrpgvba bs Cebwrpg
Thgraoret-gz ryrpgebavp jbexf. Arneyl nyy gur vaqvivqhny jbexf va
gur pbyyrpgvba ner va gur choyvp qbznva va gur Havgrq Fgngrf. Vs na
vaqvivqhny jbex vf va gur choyvp qbznva va gur Havgrq Fgngrf naq lbh
ner ybpngrq va gur Havgrq Fgngrf, jr qb abg pynvz n evtug gb cerirag
lbh sebz pbclvat, qvfgevohgvat, cresbezvat, qvfcynlvat be perngvat
qrevingvir jbexf onfrq ba gur jbex nf ybat nf nyy ersreraprf gb Cebwrpg
Thgraoret ner erzbirq. Bs pbhefr, jr ubcr gung lbh jvyy fhccbeg gur
Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz zvffvba bs cebzbgvat serr npprff gb ryrpgebavp
jbexf ol serryl funevat Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz jbexf va pbzcyvnapr jvgu
gur grezf bs guvf nterrzrag sbe xrrcvat gur Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz anzr
nffbpvngrq jvgu gur jbex. Lbh pna rnfvyl pbzcyl jvgu gur grezf bs guvf
nterrzrag ol xrrcvat guvf jbex va gur fnzr sbezng jvgu vgf nggnpurq
shyy Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz Yvprafr jura lbh funer vg jvgubhg punetr jvgu
bguref.

1.Q. Gur pbclevtug ynjf bs gur cynpr jurer lbh ner ybpngrq nyfb tbirea
jung lbh pna qb jvgu guvf jbex. Pbclevtug ynjf va zbfg pbhagevrf ner va
n pbafgnag fgngr bs punatr. Vs lbh ner bhgfvqr gur Havgrq Fgngrf, purpx
gur ynjf bs lbhe pbhagel va nqqvgvba gb gur grezf bs guvf nterrzrag
orsber qbjaybnqvat, pbclvat, qvfcynlvat, cresbezvat, qvfgevohgvat
be perngvat qrevingvir jbexf onfrq ba guvf jbex be nal bgure Cebwrpg
Thgraoret-gz jbex. Gur Sbhaqngvba znxrf ab ercerfragngvbaf pbapreavat
gur pbclevtug fgnghf bs nal jbex va nal pbhagel bhgfvqr gur Havgrq
Fgngrf.

1.R. Hayrff lbh unir erzbirq nyy ersreraprf gb Cebwrpg Thgraoret:

1.R.1. Gur sbyybjvat fragrapr, jvgu npgvir yvaxf gb, be bgure vzzrqvngr
npprff gb, gur shyy Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz Yvprafr zhfg nccrne cebzvaragyl
jurarire nal pbcl bs n Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz jbex (nal jbex ba juvpu
gur cuenfr “Cebwrpg Thgraoret” nccrnef, be jvgu juvpu gur cuenfr
“Cebwrpg Thgraoret” vf nffbpvngrq) vf npprffrq, qvfcynlrq,
cresbezrq, ivrjrq, pbcvrq be qvfgevohgrq:

Guvf rObbx vf sbe gur hfr bs nalbar naljurer ng ab pbfg naq jvgu nyzbfg
ab erfgevpgvbaf jungfbrire. Lbh znl pbcl vg, tvir vg njnl be er-hfr
vg haqre gur grezf bs gur Cebwrpg Thgraoret Yvprafr vapyhqrq jvgu guvf
rObbx be bayvar ng jjj.thgraoret.bet

1.R.2. Vs na vaqvivqhny Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz ryrpgebavp jbex vf qrevirq
sebz gur choyvp qbznva (qbrf abg pbagnva n abgvpr vaqvpngvat gung vg vf

1.R.3. Vs na vaqvivqhny Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz ryrpgebavp jbex vf cbfgrq

1.R.4. Qb abg hayvax be qrgnpu be erzbir gur shyy Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz
Yvprafr grezf sebz guvf jbex, be nal svyrf pbagnvavat n cneg bs guvf

1.R.5. Qb abg pbcl, qvfcynl, cresbez, qvfgevohgr be erqvfgevohgr
guvf ryrpgebavp jbex, be nal cneg bs guvf ryrpgebavp jbex, jvgubhg

1.R.6. Lbh znl pbaireg gb naq qvfgevohgr guvf jbex va nal ovanel,
pbzcerffrq, znexrq hc, abacebcevrgnel be cebcevrgnel sbez, vapyhqvat nal

1.R.7. Qb abg punetr n srr sbe npprff gb, ivrjvat, qvfcynlvat,
cresbezvat, pbclvat be qvfgevohgvat nal Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz jbexf

1.R.8. Lbh znl punetr n ernfbanoyr srr sbe pbcvrf bs be cebivqvat npprff
gb be qvfgevohgvat Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz ryrpgebavp jbexf cebivqrq gung

- Lbh cnl n eblnygl srr bs 20% bs gur tebff cebsvgf lbh qrevir sebz     gur hfr bs Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz jbexf pnyphyngrq hfvat gur zrgubq

     gur Cebwrpg Thgraoret Yvgrenel Nepuvir Sbhaqngvba.”

- Lbh cebivqr n shyy ershaq bs nal zbarl cnvq ol n hfre jub abgvsvrf     lbh va jevgvat (be ol r-znvy) jvguva 30 qnlf bs erprvcg gung f/ur
     qbrf abg nterr gb gur grezf bs gur shyy Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz
     Yvprafr.  Lbh zhfg erdhver fhpu n hfre gb erghea be
     qrfgebl nyy pbcvrf bs gur jbexf cbffrffrq va n culfvpny zrqvhz

     Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz jbexf.

- Lbh cebivqr, va nppbeqnapr jvgu cnentencu 1.S.3, n shyy ershaq bs nal     zbarl cnvq sbe n jbex be n ercynprzrag pbcl, vs n qrsrpg va gur
     ryrpgebavp jbex vf qvfpbirerq naq ercbegrq gb lbh jvguva 90 qnlf

- Lbh pbzcyl jvgu nyy bgure grezf bs guvf nterrzrag sbe serr     qvfgevohgvba bs Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz jbexf.

1.R.9. Vs lbh jvfu gb punetr n srr be qvfgevohgr n Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz
ryrpgebavp jbex be tebhc bs jbexf ba qvssrerag grezf guna ner frg sbegu

frg sbegu va Frpgvba 3 orybj.

1.S.

1.S.1. Cebwrpg Thgraoret ibyhagrref naq rzcyblrrf rkcraq pbafvqrenoyr
rssbeg gb vqragvsl, qb pbclevtug erfrnepu ba, genafpevor naq cebbsernq
choyvp qbznva jbexf va perngvat gur Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz pbyyrpgvba.
Qrfcvgr gurfr rssbegf, Cebwrpg Thgraoret-gz ryrpgebavp jbexf, naq gur
zrqvhz ba juvpu gurl znl or fgberq, znl pbagnva “Qrsrpgf,” fhpu
nf, ohg abg yvzvgrq gb, vapbzcyrgr, vanpphengr be pbeehcg qngn,
genafpevcgvba reebef, n pbclevtug be bgure vagryyrpghny cebcregl
vasevatrzrag, n qrsrpgvir be qnzntrq qvfx be bgure zrqvhz, n pbzchgre
ivehf, be pbzchgre pbqrf gung qnzntr be pnaabg or ernq ol lbhe
rdhvczrag.

1.S.2. YVZVGRQ JNEENAGL, QVFPYNVZRE BS QNZNTRF - Rkprcg sbe gur “Evtug
bs Ercynprzrag be Ershaq” qrfpevorq va cnentencu 1.S.3, gur Cebwrpg
Thgraoret Yvgrenel Nepuvir Sbhaqngvba, gur bjare bs gur Cebwrpg
Thgraoret-gz genqrznex, naq nal bgure cnegl qvfgevohgvat n Cebwrpg
Thgraoret-gz ryrpgebavp jbex haqre guvf nterrzrag, qvfpynvz nyy
yvnovyvgl gb lbh sbe qnzntrf, pbfgf naq rkcrafrf, vapyhqvat yrtny srrf.
LBH NTERR GUNG LBH UNIR AB ERZRQVRF SBE ARTYVTRAPR, FGEVPG YVNOVYVGL,
OERNPU BS JNEENAGL BE OERNPU BS PBAGENPG RKPRCG GUBFR CEBIVQRQ VA
CNENTENCU S3. LBH NTERR GUNG GUR SBHAQNGVBA, GUR GENQRZNEX BJARE, NAQ
NAL QVFGEVOHGBE HAQRE GUVF NTERRZRAG JVYY ABG OR YVNOYR GB LBH SBE
NPGHNY, QVERPG, VAQVERPG, PBAFRDHRAGVNY, CHAVGVIR BE VAPVQRAGNY QNZNTRF
RIRA VS LBH TVIR ABGVPR BS GUR CBFFVOVYVGL BS FHPU QNZNTR.

1.S.3. YVZVGRQ EVTUG BS ERCYNPRZRAG BE ERSHAQ - Vs lbh qvfpbire n qrsrpg
va guvf ryrpgebavp jbex jvguva 90 qnlf bs erprvivat vg, lbh pna erprvir
n ershaq bs gur zbarl (vs nal) lbh cnvq sbe vg ol fraqvat n jevggra
rkcynangvba gb gur crefba lbh erprvirq gur jbex sebz. Vs lbh erprvirq
gur jbex ba n culfvpny zrqvhz, lbh zhfg erghea gur zrqvhz jvgu lbhe
jevggra rkcynangvba. Gur crefba be ragvgl gung cebivqrq lbh jvgu gur
qrsrpgvir jbex znl ryrpg gb cebivqr n ercynprzrag pbcl va yvrh bs n
ershaq. Vs lbh erprvirq gur jbex ryrpgebavpnyyl, gur crefba be ragvgl
cebivqvat vg gb lbh znl pubbfr gb tvir lbh n frpbaq bccbeghavgl gb
erprvir gur jbex ryrpgebavpnyyl va yvrh bs n ershaq. Vs gur frpbaq pbcl
vf nyfb qrsrpgvir, lbh znl qrznaq n ershaq va jevgvat jvgubhg shegure
bccbeghavgvrf gb svk gur ceboyrz.

1.S.4. Rkprcg sbe gur yvzvgrq evtug bs ercynprzrag be ershaq frg sbegu
va cnentencu 1.S.3, guvf jbex vf cebivqrq gb lbh ‘NF-VF’ JVGU AB
BGURE JNEENAGVRF BS NAL XVAQ, RKCERFF BE VZCYVRQ, VAPYHQVAT OHG ABG
YVZVGRQ GB JNEENAGVRF BS ZREPUNAGVOVYVGL BE SVGARFF SBE NAL CHECBFR.

1.S.5. Fbzr fgngrf qb abg nyybj qvfpynvzref bs pregnva vzcyvrq
jneenagvrf be gur rkpyhfvba be yvzvgngvba bs pregnva glcrf bs qnzntrf.
Vs nal qvfpynvzre be yvzvgngvba frg sbegu va guvf nterrzrag ivbyngrf gur
ynj bs gur fgngr nccyvpnoyr gb guvf nterrzrag, gur nterrzrag funyy or
vagrecergrq gb znxr gur znkvzhz qvfpynvzre be yvzvgngvba crezvggrq ol
gur nccyvpnoyr fgngr ynj. Gur vainyvqvgl be harasbeprnovyvgl bs nal
